line: What?

line: I need to speak to you.

name: Leonard
line: It's two o'clock in the morning

name: Sheldon
line: It's important.

name: Leonard
line: I highly doubt that. Go away. . Are you still out there?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: You're right, it can wait until morning.

name: Leonard
line: What, what, what, what, what?

name: Sheldon
line: Never mind. I clearly woke you up in the middle of a REM cycle, you're in no state to talk.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, what is it?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm uncomfortable having been included in your lie to Penny.

name: Leonard
line: What was I supposed to say.

name: Sheldon
line: You could have told her the truth.

name: Leonard
line: That would have hurt her feelings.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that a relevant factor?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Then I suppose you could have agreed to go.

name: Leonard
line: And what would I have said afterwards?

name: Sheldon
line: I would suggest something to the effect of, singing is neither an appropriate vocation nor avocation for you, and if you disagree, I'd recommend you have a CAT scan, to look for a tumour pressing on the cognitive processing centre of your brain.

name: Leonard
line: I couldn't say that, I would have to say, you were terrific and I can't wait to hear you sing again.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: It's the social protocol, it's what you do when you have a friend who's proud of something they really suck at.

name: Sheldon
line: I was not aware of that.

name: Leonard
line: Well now you are.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, alright. Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: When we played chess earlier, you were terrific and I can't wait to play you again. Goodnight.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard,  Leonard,  Leonard,  Leonard, .....

name: Leonard
line: Oooaw. This would be so much easier if I were a violent sociopath.  What?

name: Sheldon
line: I was analysing our lie, and I believe we're in danger of Penny seeing through the ruse.

name: Leonard
line: How?

name: Sheldon
line: Simple. If she were to log on to www.socalphysicsgroup.org/activities/other, click on upcoming events, scroll down to seminars, download the pdf schedule, and look for the seminar on molecular positronium, well then, bippidy-boppidy-boo, our pants are metaphorically on fire.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, sir, my trousers will not be igniting today.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Good morning.

name: Penny
line: Do you have any idea what time it is?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course I do. My watch is linked to the atomic clock in Boulder, Colorado. It's accurate to one tenth of a second. But as I'm saying this it occurs to me that once again your question may have been rhetorical.

name: Penny
line: What do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: Remember how Leonard told you we couldn't come to your performance because we were attending a symposium on molecular positronium?

name: Penny
line: I remember symposium.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, well, he lied.

name: Penny
line: Wait, what?

name: Sheldon
line: He lied, and I'm feeling very uncomfortable about it.

name: Penny
line: Well imagine how I'm feeling.

name: Sheldon
line: Hungry? Tired? I'm sorry this really isn't my strong suit.

name: Leonard
line: You told her I lied, why would you tell her I lied?

name: Sheldon
line: To help you.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, I'm not seeing the help.

name: Sheldon
line: She was going to see through your lie eventually, so I told her that you were lying to protect me.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I'm getting a bad feeling.

name: Sheldon
line: Hunger? Indigestion, I'm sorry I'm really not very good at this. Anyway, Penny now believes that on Friday night, we're going to participate in my cousin Leopold's drug intervention.

name: Leonard
line: Your cousin Leopold?

name: Sheldon
line: Yea, who most people call Leo, but he also answers to Lee, remember that, it's important.

name: Leonard
line: What's important?

name: Sheldon
line: Details, Leonard, the success or failure of our deceitful enterprise turns on details.

name: Leonard
line: Do you have a cousin Leopold.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I made him up. I think you'd call him Lee.

name: Leonard
line: I don't get it, I already told her a lie, why replace it with a different lie?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, first of all, your lie was laughably transparent, where mine is exquisitely convoluted. While you were sleeping I was weaving an un-unravelable web.

name: Leonard
line: Un-unravelable?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, if she googles Leopold Houston she'll find a facebook page, an online blog depicting his descent into drug use, and a desperate yet hopeful listing on e-harmony.com.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, why would I go to a drug intervention for your cousing.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, because it's in Long Beach, and I don't drive.

name: Leonard
line: We're going to Long Beach?

name: Sheldon
line: No, of course not, there's no cousin Leo, there's no intervention, focus Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on!

name: Sheldon
line: We just leave the house on Friday night, and we return in the wee hours emotionally wrung out from the work of convincing Leo to go back into rehab.

name: Leonard
line: So he goes back into rehab?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but, he can relapse if Penny ever invites us to go hear her sing again.

name: Leonard
line: You still told her I lied.

name: Sheldon
line: For a noble purpose, to spare me the social embarrassment of having a drug-addled first cousin, which I'm assuming is embarrassing, yes?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. How am I supposed to remember all of this.

name: Sheldon
line: That's the best part, you don't have to, see I told Penny that you would be embarrassed, if you knew that she found out that you had lied, so she's agreed to operate as if the original lie was still in force.

name: Leonard
line: So she's expecting me to lie about going to a symposium in Pasadena, when in actuality we're pretending to go to a drug intervention in Long Beach?

name: Sheldon
line: Un-unravelable.

name: Leonard
line: Oh hey Penny, wow, look at you, all ready for your showcase, you look great.

name: Penny
line: Thanks. I just wanted to come by and wish you guys luck with your symposium.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, well, thankyou.

name: Penny
line: You know, I got to tell you, a lot of friends would let their friend go alone, but that's not who you are, you are the kind of guy who stands by a friend when... when he has a symposium to go to.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what to say.

name: Penny
line: It's okay, Leonard

name: Leonard
line: Oh, okay, alright, good.

name: Howard
line: Oh boy, group hug.

name: Penny
line: Uh-huh!

name: Howard
line: Uh-huh?

name: Penny
line: Uh-huh!

name: Howard
line: Okay. So what's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, uh, Penny is on her way to perform in a one night showcase production of Rent, which we are unable to attend because we are going to a symposium on molecular positronium, given by Dr Emile Farminfarmian.

name: Howard
line: Wait a minute, Farminfarmian is speaking and you're Bogarding the symposium.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, I'm sorry... we're... we're

name: Howard
line: No, no, you're quark-blocking us.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what to say.

name: Howard
line: Wow.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, listen...

name: Howard
line: No, it's okay, it's your Millenium Falcon, you and Chewbacca do whatever you want to do. Me and Princess Leia here will find some other way to spend the evening.

name: Penny
line: Howard, wait. Sheldon, I think we should tell them.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, sure. I don't see a problem with that.

name: Penny
line: There's no symposium, Leonard lied to me, isn't that right Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Well... I don't know what to say.

name: Penny
line: It's okay, I do, look, Leonard is helping Sheldon through a family crisis, he made up the whole story about the symposium with Dr Farmin..farm...ian

name: Sheldon
line: Good for you.

name: Penny
line: Hah, yeah! Because he didn't want Sheldon to be embarrassed, and there is nothing to be embarrassed okay, every family in America has a relative holed up in a garage somewhere huffing paint thinner.

name: Howard
line: No, I'm lost too, I think she skipped a step.

name: Penny
line: No, look, Sheldon's cousin Leo escaped rehab, and he's in a Motel 8 at Long Beach, the whole family's going out for an intervention. Leonard is driving Sheldon down there to help him through this because he's such a good man.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, another hug, thank you.

name: Penny
line: Alright you guys, good luck.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks Penny.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, uh, break a leg.

name: Sheldon
line: Break a leg.

name: Howard
line: So, road trip to Long Beach.

name: Leonard
line: No, we're not going to Long Beach.

name: Raj
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Because Sheldon doesn't have a drug addicted cousin Leopold.

name: Raj
line: Oh, too bad. I've always wanted to go to Long Beach.

name: Sheldon
line: It's a very nice community. The Queen Mary is docked there, once the largest ocean liner in the world, it's now a hotel and restaurant where they host a surprisingly gripping murder mystery dinner.

name: Raj
line: Sounds fun.

name: Howard
line: I'm game.

name: Raj
line: Shotgun.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, Leonard gets nauseous unless he sits in front, and even then it's iffy.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, are we really going to Long Beach?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard,  Leonard,  Leonard...

name: Leonard
line: Let it go, Sheldon, the murderer was the first mate whether it makes sense to you or not.

name: Sheldon
line: No, that's the least of our worries. I've been doing some research on addiction, both the biochemical and behavioural aspects, and I think there's a problem with the current version of our lie.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about, it's fine, she bought it, it's over.

name: Sheldon
line: Sadly, it's not. Substance abuse is a lifelong struggle, but beyond that I have realised that the Leo I described would not have agreed to go to rehab.

name: Leonard
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: Because Leo is a middle child.

name: Leonard
line: There is no Leo, how can you say that?

name: Sheldon
line: You didn't read the bio, did you? He's not just a middle child, he's the quintessential middle child, from a broken home to boot. Psychologically speaking, the attention he gets by rebelling even to the point of self-destruction is more emotionally valuable than the help he would get at rehab.

name: Leonard
line: I've got a solution.

name: Sheldon
line: Great, what is it?

name: Leonard
line: Get out.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine.  I've hesitated to point this out, but I must now remind you that we are in our current predicament because of your initial and totally inadequate deceit. I'm just trying to clean up after your mess.  We'll talk in the morning.

name: Strange man
line: Morning.

name: Leonard
line: Who are you?

name: Man
line: I am Sheldon's cousin Leo.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, God! Sheldon does not have a cousin Leo.

name: Man
line: Au contraire. I'm 26 years old, I'm originally from  Denton, Texas, but I was a Navy brat so I was brought up on a variety of military bases around the world, as a result I've often felt like an outsider, never really fitting in, which is probably the reason for my substance abuse problem.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, we just went over this. As the quintessential middle child, your addiction is rooted in your unmet need for attention.

name: Man
line: Oh, Sheldon, are we really going to go with pop psychology.

name: Sheldon
line: For your information, this is all based on solid research, stick with the character profile I wrote for you.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, Leonard, this is Toby Loobenfeld, he's a research assistant in the particle physics lab, but he also minored in theatre at MIT.

name: Toby
line: It was more of a double major actually. Theatre and physics. You can guess which one my bourgeois parents pushed me towards.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I got it, Sheldon, why?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you see, while Leo would not have gone into rehab, it is completely plausible that we would have talked him into leaving the motel, and coming home with us.

name: Toby
line: Sheldon, how about this as my motivation. When I was fourteen years old I was abused in the Philippines by a club footed Navy chaplain.

name: Sheldon
line: No. We're going with middle child, and a generic predisposition to inadequate serotonin production.

name: Toby
line: Swell, how do I play genetic predisposition?

name: Sheldon
line: Subtextually, of course.  Just have fun with it.  Morning Penny.

name: Penny
line: Hi. How did the intervention go.

name: Sheldon
line: Unfortunately, we weren't able to convince him to go to rehab.

name: Penny
line: Well, based on what you told me, I'm not surprised.

name: Sheldon
line: But we did convince him to leave the motel. Come say hello. Leo, this is Penny, our friend and neighbour.

name: Penny
line: Hi Leo, how are you feeling?

name: Toby
line: Let me ask you something, Penny. Have you ever woken up in a fleabag motel, covered in your own vomit, next to a transsexual prostitute?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Toby
line: Then don't ask me how I'm feeling.

name: Leonard
line: Well, that's Leo. Hey, um, why don't you tell me about your showcase last night?

name: Penny
line: Oh, it was okay I guess, wasn't a big turn out but they both really seemed to like it.

name: Leonard
line: There were only two people there?

name: Penny
line: By the end. Yeah.

name: Toby
line: Damn you, Chaplain Horrigan!

name: Penny
line: I'm... I'm sorry.

name: Toby
line: The Philippines. 1992. The Subic Bay Naval Station. A young boy on the cusp of manhood. His only companions mongrel dogs and malarial mosquitos. Desperate and alone he reached out to a man who promised to introduce him to a merciful, loving God, but who instead introduced him to a gin pickled tongue shoved down his adolescent throat. What choice did he have but to drink, shoot and snort his pain away.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't forget his genetic predisposition towards addiction.

name: Toby
line: That's never been proven.

name: Sheldon
line: There have been studies.

name: Toby
line: Not double blind studies.

name: Sheldon
line: How could there be a double blind study, who would be the control group.

name: Leonard
line: As you can see, detoxing can get pretty ugly, let's give them some privacy.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Hey, do you want to come over to my place, have coffee?

name: Leonard
line: Sounds good.

name: Penny
line: I have a video of me singing last night, do you want to see it?

name: Leonard
line: Gee, why wouldn't I?

name: Penny
line: This is even better than you coming to the showcase, because now I get to watch you watch me.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah! Funny how things work out.

name: Toby
line: And that he loved the companionship and the wisdom that his own father failed to provide.

name: Sheldon
line: Your parents made the right decision.

name: Toby
line: I cannot work like this!

name: Toby
line: This is amazing. Just sitting on a couch, watching TV with a woman. Not being drunk, or high, or... or... wondering if you're a dude down there.

name: Penny
line: Leo, you are a very sweet, really funny guy. You're gonna do okay.

name: Toby
line: One day at a time, Penny, one day at a time.

name: Leonard
line: How long is he going to stay here.

name: Sheldon
line: He's a homeless drug addict, Leonard, where is he going to go? Boy, you have a lot to learn about lying.

name: Sheldon
line: Checkmate.

name: Leonard
line: O-o-o-o-h! Again?

name: Sheldon
line: Obviously you're not well suited for three-dimensional chess, perhaps three dimensional candyland would be more your speed.

name: Leonard
line: Just reset the board.

name: Sheldon
line: It must be humbling to suck on so many different levels.

name: Penny
line: Hi guys.

name: Leonard
line: Hey!

name: Penny
line: Did you get my mail.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, right here. How was Nebraska?

name: Penny
line: Oh, better than North Dakota!  I guess that joke's only funny in Nebraska.

name: Sheldon
line: From the data at hand you really can't draw that conclusion. All you can say with absolute certainty is that that joke is not funny here.

name: Penny
line: Boy, it's good to be back.

name: Leonard
line: How was your family?

name: Penny
line: Ugh, it was the worst trip, everyone got sick over the weekend.

name: Sheldon
line: Sick?

name: Leonard
line: Here we go.

name: Sheldon
line: What kind of sick?

name: Penny
line: Oh, the flu I guess.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't need you to guess, I need you to know, now when did the symptoms first appear?

name: Penny
line: Maybe Friday.

name: Sheldon
line: Friday, was that morning or afternoon?

name: Penny
line: I... I don't...

name: Sheldon
line: Think woman, who blew their nose and when?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, relax, she doesn't have any symptoms, I'm sure she's not contagious.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh please, if influenza was only contagious after symptoms appear it would have died out thousands of years ago. Somewhere between tool using and cave painting, homo habilus would have figured out to kill the guy with the runny nose.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, you'll have to excuse Sheldon, he's a bit of a germophobe.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's okay, I understand.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks for your consideration, now please leave.

name: Leonard
line: You'd better go before he starts spraying you with Lysol.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, thank you for getting my mail.

name: Leonard
line: No problem. Welcome home.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: What the hell are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm making petrie dishes to grow throat cultures.

name: Leonard
line: With lime jello?

name: Sheldon
line: I need a growth medium, and someone polished off the apricot yoghurt. Here, swab my throat.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think so.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard! If I'm going to get ahead of this thing I need to find out what's growing in my throat.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you are not sick. This is, but you are not.

name: Sheldon
line: We have no idea what pathogen Typhoid Penny has introduced into our environment. And having never been to Nebraska I'm fairly certain that I have no cornhusking antibodies.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, don't you think you're overreacting?

name: Sheldon
line: When I'm lying comatose in a hospital relying on inferior minds to cure me, these jello cultures and my accompanying notes will give them a fighting chance.

name: Leonard
line: I'm going back to bed.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait.  Put this in the bathroom.

name: Leonard
line: What for?

name: Sheldon
line: I need to measure my fluid intake and output to make sure my kidneys aren't shutting down.

name: Leonard
line: I mix pancake batter in this!

name: Sheldon
line: No, that measuring cup has always been for urine.

name: Leonard
line: You had time to make a label for everything in this apartment, including the label maker, but you didn't have ten seconds to make one that said urine cup?

name: Sheldon
line: It's right here on the bottom.

name: Leonard
line: Huh. I guess I owe the Betty Crocker company a letter of apology.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear God.  Leonard! Leonard, I'm sick!

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard! Leonard I'm sick!

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard! Leonard! Leonard. Leonard, my comforter fell down, and my sinuses hurt when I bend over. Leonard?  Ow!

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, where are you?

name: Leonard
line: I'm at work.

name: Sheldon
line: At six-thirty in the morning?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: On Sunday?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: They asked me to come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I didn't hear the phone ring.

name: Leonard
line: They texted me.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, as I predicted, I am sick. My fever has been tracking up exponentially since 2am, and I am producing sputum at an alarming rate.

name: Leonard
line: No kidding?

name: Sheldon
line: No. Not only that, it has shifted from clear to milky green.

name: Leonard
line: Alright, well, get some rest and drink plenty of fluids.

name: Sheldon
line: What else would I drink? Gasses? Solids? Ionised plasma?

name: Leonard
line: Drink whatever you want.

name: Sheldon
line: I want soup.

name: Leonard
line: Then make soup.

name: Sheldon
line: We don't have soup.

name: Leonard
line: I'm at work, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that a dog?

name: Leonard
line: Yes,

name: Sheldon
line: In the lab?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, they're training dogs to operate the centrifuge for when they need dogs to operate the centrifuge for blind scientists, I have to go.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Howard, it's the phone.

name: Howard
line: I know it's the phone, Ma, I hear the phone.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Well who's calling at this ungodly hour?

name: Howard
line: I don't know.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Well ask them why they're calling at this ungodly hour.

name: Howard
line: How can I ask them when I'm talking to you!  Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, it's Leonard, code Milky Green.

name: Howard
line: Dear Lord, not Milky Green!

name: Leonard
line: Affirmative, with fever.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Who's on the phone.

name: Howard
line: It's Leonard.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Why is he calling.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon's sick.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Were you playing with him?

name: Howard
line: For God's sake, Ma, I'm twenty six years old.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Excuse me Mr Grown-up. Whadda-ya want for breakfast.

name: Howard
line: Chocolate milk and eggoes please!

name: Leonard
line: Howard, listen to me.

name: Howard
line: Hang on, call waiting.

name: Leonard
line: No, don't, don't....

name: Howard
line: Hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, I'm sick.

name: Howard
line: Howard's sleeping, this is his mother. Why are you calling at this ungodly hour?

name: Sheldon
line: I need soup.

name: Howard
line: Then call your own mother.  It was Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: I tried to stop you.

name: Howard
line: It's my own fault, I forgot the protocol we put in place after the great ear infection of '06.

name: Leonard
line: You call Koothrappali, we need to find a place to lay low for the next eighteen to twenty four hours.

name: Howard
line: Stand by. Ma, can my friends come over?

name: Howard's Mother
line: I just had the carpets steamed.

name: Howard
line: That's a negatory. But there's a Planet of the Apes marathon at the New Art today.

name: Leonard
line: Five movies, two hours apiece. It's a start.

name: Waitress
line: Homeless crazy guy at table eighteen.

name: Penny
line: No, just crazy. Sheldon, what are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sick, thank you very much.

name: Penny
line: How could you have gotten it from me, I'm not sick.

name: Sheldon
line: You're a carrier. All these people here are doomed. You're doomed!

name: Penny
line: Shhh! Sheldon, what do you want.

name: Sheldon
line: I want soup.

name: Penny
line: Why didn't you just....  Why didn't you just have soup at home.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, I have an IQ of 187, don't you imagine that if there were a way for me to have had soup at home I would have thought of it?

name: Penny
line: You can have soup delivered.

name: Sheldon
line: I did not think of that. Clearly febrile delirium is setting in, please bring me some soup while I still understand what a spoon is for.

name: Penny
line: Okay, what kind of soup do you want.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my mother used to make me this split pea with little frankfurter slices and these home made croutons.

name: Penny
line: We have Chicken Tortilla and Potato Leek.

name: Sheldon
line: Can I get any of those with little frankfurter slices and home made croutons?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Then surprise me.  Would you call that moss green or forest green?

name: Howard
line: Look at this, everyone went chimp.

name: Raj
line: Well I'd like to point out, I voted for orang-utan, but you shouted me down. .

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hi Penny!

name: Penny
line: Hey, where are you?

name: Leonard
line: I'm... uh... at work.

name: Penny
line: You sound funny.

name: Leonard
line: I'm... uh... in a... I'm in a radiation suit. What's up?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well I'm at work too, and you'll never guess who's here infecting my entire station.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon's at the Cheesecake Factory.  Just tell him to go home.

name: Penny
line: He won't leave, he says he's afraid he'll pass out on the bus and someone will harvest his organs.

name: Leonard
line: He's paranoid, and he's established a nest.

name: Penny
line: Can you please come get him?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah, I'd be... I'd be happy to Penny.  Oh my God there's a breech in the radiation unit  The whole city is in jeopardy, oh my God, Professor Googenfeil is melting, gotta go, bye!  I feel really guilty.

name: Raj
line: You did what you had to do.

name: Howard
line: Take your stinking paws off my popcorn you damn dirty ape.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks for bringing me home.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's okay, I didn't really need to work today, it's not like I have rent or car payments or anything.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Good.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, you feel better.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, where are you going?

name: Penny
line: Um, home, to write some bad cheques.

name: Sheldon
line: You're going to leave me?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, you are a grown man, haven't you ever been sick before?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, of course, but, not by myself.

name: Penny
line: Really, never?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, once. When I was fifteen, and spending the summer at the Heidelberg Institute in Germany.

name: Penny
line: Studying abroad?

name: Sheldon
line: No, visiting professor. Anyway, the local cuisine was a little more sausage-based than I'm used to, and the result was an internal blitzkrieg with my lower intestine playing the part of Czechoslovakia.

name: Penny
line: And there was no-one there to take care of you?

name: Sheldon
line: No. No, my mum had to fly back to Texas to help my dad because the house had slipped off the cinderblocks again.

name: Penny
line: Again?

name: Sheldon
line: It was tornado season. And it was an aluminium house. Anyway, the housekeeper in the faculty residence didn't speak any English, when I finally managed to convince her I was sick, she said “Möchtest Du eine Darmspülung?”

name: Penny
line: What does that mean?

name: Sheldon
line: Based on what happened next, I assume it means “would you like an enema?”

name: Penny
line: Okay, sweetie, I'll take care of you, what do you need?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my mom used to give me sponge baths.

name: Penny
line: Okay, ground rules, no sponge baths, and definitely no enemas.

name: Sheldon
line: Agreed.

name: Raj
line: Here we go, ten and a half hours of apey goodness.

name: Leonard
line: Oh dammit, my glasses. Okay, I'm blind here guys, can you help me find them?

name: Howard
line: Sorry.  Found ‘em.

name: Leonard
line: Oh great.

name: Howard
line: Sorry, don't you have a spare.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, at home.

name: Raj
line: Well if you leave now, you can be back before the gorillas rip the crap out of Charlton Heston.

name: Howard
line: Unless Sheldon's there, in which case you'll be trapped forever in his whiny hyper neurotic snot-web.

name: Leonard
line: Hi, Penny. I was wondering, is Sheldon still at the restaurant? Okay, that was very nice of you. Okay, gotta go, got kind of a full blown Chernobyl thing here, gotta go, bye.  He's home, I'm screwed. Ten and a half hours of apey blurriness.

name: Raj
line: How about Lasic?

name: Leonard
line: You want me to get eye surgery?

name: Raj
line: Would you rather go back to the apartment and deal with Sheldon, or have a stranger carve out your corneas with a laser beam?

name: Howard
line: Well?

name: Leonard
line: I'm thinking!

name: Penny
line: Okay, nice and cosy, okay, I'll see you later.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. Will you please rub this on my chest.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Sheldon, can't you do that yourself?

name: Sheldon
line: Vaporub makes my hands smell funny.

name: Penny
line: But Sheldon....

name: Sheldon
line: Please, please, please, please, please, please, please.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe I'm doing this.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, counter-clockwise or my chest hair mats.

name: Penny
line: Sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Can you sing “Soft Kitty”.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: My mom used to sing it to me when I was sick.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, honey, I don't know it.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll teach you. “Soft kitty, warm kitty, little ball of fur, happy kitty, sleepy kitty, purr purr purr.” Now you.

name: Penny
line: Soft kitty, warm kitty...

name: Sheldon
line: Little ball of fur. Keep rubbing.

name: Penny
line: Little ball of fur.

name: Leonard
line: What do you see, what do you see.

name: Raj
line: The living room appears to be empty.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, he must be in his bedroom. My spare glasses are in my bedroom, on my dresser, next to my Bat-signal.

name: Howard
line: I'm not going in there.

name: Leonard
line: Raj?

name: Raj
line: No way, Jose.

name: Leonard
line: Well I can't do it, I can't see anything.

name: Howard
line: It's all right, wireless mini-cam and Bluetooth headset. We'll be your eyes.

name: Leonard
line: Fine.

name: Howard
line: One more thing. This is a subsonic impact sensor. If Sheldon gets out of bed and starts to walk, this device will register it and send a signal to the laptop. At that point, based on the geography of the apartment and the ambulatory speed of a sick Sheldon, you'll have seven seconds to get out, glasses or no glasses.

name: Leonard
line: Won't my footsteps set it off?

name: Howard
line: No, you'll be on your hands and knees. Now you'll need to get the sensor as close as you can to Sheldon's room.

name: Leonard
line: Well, how do I carry it if I'm on my hands and knees?

name: Howard
line: Stay low. Bear left. Now keep true.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Howard
line: It means go straight.

name: Leonard
line: Then just say go straight.

name: Howard
line: You don't stay go straight when you're giving bearings, you say keep true.

name: Leonard
line: Alright  I just hit my head.

name: Howard
line: Because you didn't keep true.  Okay, turn right.

name: Raj
line: The... the picture's breaking up.

name: Howard
line: Angle your head to the right. A little more. A little more.  That's it, now just keep true. Alright, you're close enough to Sheldon's room, deploy the sensor. Now turn it on.

name: Leonard
line: It wasn't on?

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Then why did I have to crawl?

name: Howard
line: Oh, I guess you didn't.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, it's on.

name: Howard
line: Good. From this point forward you will have to crawl.

name: Leonard
line: I know.

name: Howard
line: Hang on, the sensor's picking up something, turn your head back.

name: Penny
line: You rat bastard.

name: Howard
line: Told you the sensor would work.

name: Leonard
line: Hi!

name: Penny
line: You deliberately stuck me with Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I had to, you see what he's like.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny! Penny, I'm hungry.

name: Penny
line: Uh, it's okay, sweetie, good news, Leonard's home!

name: Leonard
line: No!

name: Penny
line: Here you go, good luck, bye.

name: Leonard
line: W-wait!

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I'm hungry!

name: Leonard
line: Wait! Penny! Take me with you!

name: Sheldon
line: I want grilled cheese.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you think Penny will come here and take care of us?

name: Leonard
line: I don't think Penny's ever coming here again.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm very congested.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, so?

name: Sheldon
line: Can you go to the kitchen, and get me the turkey baster labelled mucus.

name: Leonard
line: If I stand, I'll vomit.

name: Sheldon
line: Under the sink, yellow Tupperware bowl.

name: Sheldon
line: Here's the problem with teleportation.

name: Leonard
line: Lay it on me.

name: Sheldon
line: Assuming the device could be invented which would identify the quantum state of matter of an individual in one location, and transmit that pattern to a distant location for reassembly, you would not have actually transported the individual. You would have destroyed him in one location, and recreated him in another.

name: Leonard
line: How about that.

name: Sheldon
line: Personally, I would never use a transporter. Because the original Sheldon would have to be disintegrated in order to create a new Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Would the new Sheldon be in any way an improvement on the old Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: No, he would be exactly the same.

name: Leonard
line: That is a problem.

name: Sheldon
line: So, you see it too.

name: Dr Gablehouser
line: Dr Hofstadter, Dr Cooper.

name: Together
line: Dr Gablehouser.

name: Gablehouser
line: Gentlemen, I'd like you to meet Dennis Kim. Dennis is a highly sought after Doctorial candidate and we're hoping to have him do his graduate work here.

name: Leonard
line: Graduate work, very impressive.

name: Gablehouser
line: And he's only fifteen years old.

name: Sheldon
line: Not bad, I myself started graduate school at fourteen.

name: Dennis
line: Well, I lost a year while my family was tunnelling out of North Korea.

name: Leonard
line: Advantage Kim.

name: Gablehouser
line: I thought maybe you boys could show Dennis around, let him see why we're the best physics research facility in the country.

name: Dennis
line: I already know you're not. You don't have an open science grid computer, or a free electron laser, and the string theory research being done here is nothing but a dead end.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, that is my research, and it is by no means a dead end.

name: Dennis
line: Well, obviously you don't see it yet, but trust me, you will.

name: Gablehouser
line: Dennis, we discussed this, we're in the process of updating our equipment, and we welcome your input on our research goals, and we've agreed to look the other way if you want to use up to 20% of the grant money you attract to smuggle your grandfather out of Pyongyang. We want him here boys, make it happen.

name: Leonard
line: Yes sir.

name: Sheldon
line: You can count on us, we're on it. What the hell do you mean, dead end.

name: Dennis
line: I mean, the whole landscape of false vacuums in string theory could be as large as ten to the five-hundredth power. In addition... ooh, look, chocolate milk.

name: Sheldon
line: I sense a disturbance in the force.

name: Leonard
line: A bad feeling I have about this, mmm-hmmm.

name: Leonard
line: So, Dennis, how long have you been in America.

name: Dennis
line: A year and a half.

name: Leonard
line: No kidding, you speak English really well.

name: Dennis
line: So do you. Except for your tendency to end sentences with prepositions.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Dennis
line: That.

name: Sheldon
line: He's not wrong. Alright, and this is my office.

name: Dennis
line: Is this part of the tour?

name: Sheldon
line: Nope. Goodbye.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, Sheldon, we've hardly shown him anything.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, alright, this is my desk, these are my books, this is my door, please close it behind you. Goodbye.

name: Dennis
line: Looks like you're doing work in quantum loop corrections.

name: Sheldon
line: Keen observation, goodbye.

name: Dennis
line: You see where you went wrong, don't you?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Huh, yeah?

name: Sheldon
line: Get him out.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, Dennis, I'll show you the rec centre, they've got nautilus equipment.

name: Dennis
line: Do I look like I lift weights.

name: Leonard
line: Not heavy ones.

name: Dennis
line: It's startling to me you haven't considered a Lorentz invariant field theory approach.

name: Sheldon
line: You think I haven't considered it? You really think I haven't considered it?

name: Dennis
line: Have you considered it?

name: Sheldon
line: Get him out Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, Dennis, I'll show you the radiation lab.

name: Dennis
line: Wow, you won the Stephenson award.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, in fact I am the youngest person ever to win it.

name: Dennis
line: Really, how old?

name: Sheldon
line: Fourteen and a half.

name: Dennis
line: You were the youngest person ever to win it.

name: Leonard
line: It's like looking into an obnoxious little mirror, isn't it?

name: Penny
line: Mmm, this is really delicious, isn't it?  Still can't talk to me unless you're drunk, huh?  Oh, sweetie, you are so damaged.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I'm damaged too. How about a hug for Howie?

name: Penny
line: Sure. Raj, hug Howard.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh-uh-uh.

name: Leonard
line: Something you'd like to share? A tale of woe perhaps.

name: Sheldon
line: Fifteen years old. Dennis Kim is fifteen years old, and he's already correcting my work. Today I went from being Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart to... you know, that other guy.

name: Howard
line: Antonio Salieri?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, God, now even you're smarter than me.

name: Howard
line: You know, Sheldon, you don't have so many friends that you can afford to start insulting them.

name: Leonard
line: Just eat, Sheldon, you'll feel better.

name: Sheldon
line: Why waste food. In Texas when a cow goes dry they don't keep feeding it, they just take her out and shoot her between the eyes.

name: Penny
line: I'm confused, did Sheldon stop giving milk?

name: Leonard
line: You can't let this kid get to you. You always knew that someday someone would come along who was younger and smarter.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but I assumed I would have been dead hundreds of years, and that there would be an asterisk by his name because he would be a cyborg.

name: Penny
line: So, you've got a bit of competition, I really don't see what the big deal is.

name: Sheldon
line: Well of course you don't, you've never excelled at anything.

name: Penny
line: I don't understand, exactly how did he get any friends in the first place?

name: Howard
line: We liked Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Well, what are you going to do, Sheldon, give up?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. That's what a rational person does when his entire life's work is invalidated by a post-pubescent Asian wunderkind. He ceases his fruitless efforts, he donates his body to scientific research, and he waits to die.

name: Penny
line: You know, I'm confused again, is he waiting, or do we get to shoot him between the eyes?

name: Sheldon
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: I've decided you're right. My career is not over.

name: Leonard
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: But, since the arrival of Dennis Kim has rendered my research pointless, I just have to find something else to focus on.

name: Leonard
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: So I've decided, I'm going to collaborate with you.

name: Leonard
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: What exactly is it you do? I know you chatter on about it all the time, but I've never really paid attention.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, right now I'm designing an experiment to study the soft component of cosmic radiation at sea-level, but I really don't need any help.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, sure you do. Now, see, what's this here in the schematic, is that a laser array?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Hmmm. What happens if you use argon lasers instead of helium neon?

name: Leonard
line: It would blow up.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure?

name: Leonard
line: Pretty sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Pretty sure's not very scientific, is this how you normally work, just hunches and guesses and stuff?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Sheldon, I understand that you're going through a bit of a career crisis, you're searching for some other area where you can feel valuable and productive but I need to tell you something and I want you to listen carefully.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright.

name: Leonard
line: Go away.

name: Sheldon
line: If you're concerned about sharing credit with me, you're name can go first... I'm going.

name: Howard
line: It's a small brown paper bag, Ma, I'm looking at it right now.  Why would I make that up, there's no ding-dong in it.  How are two ding-dongs tomorrow going to help me today?

name: Sheldon
line: So, this is engineering, huh?

name: Howard
line: I'll talk to you later.

name: Sheldon
line: Engineering. Where the noble semi-skilled labourers execute the vision of those who think and dream. Hello, oompah-loompahs of science.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, what are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: I just came by to say hello.

name: Howard
line: I've been at this lab for three years, you've never came by to say hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, up until now I've had better things to do. So, what are we making today?

name: Howard
line: A small payload support structure for a European science experimental package that's going up on the next space shuttle.

name: Sheldon
line: Really, how does it work?

name: Howard
line: When this is done, it will be attached to the payload bay, and the sensor apparatus will rest on it.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, huh. So it's a shelf?

name: Howard
line: No, you don't understand, during acceleration it needs to stay perfectly level and provide... yeah, okay, it's a shelf.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, I notice you're using titanium, did you give any consideration to carbon nanotubes, they're lighter, cheaper and half twice the tensile strength.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, there's a diploma in my office that says I have a masters in engineering.

name: Sheldon
line: And you also have a note from your mother that says I love you, bubbula. But neither of those is a cogent argument for titanium over nanotubes.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Howard
line: Go away.

name: Sheldon
line: Did Leonard tell you to say that?

name: Howard
line: No, I thought of it all by myself.

name: Sheldon
line: Huh. It can't be a coincidence. There must be some causal link I'm missing.

name: Raj
line: Go away.

name: Sheldon
line: Curiouser and curiouser.

name: Howard
line: Is he here?

name: Leonard
line: If he were, I wouldn't be.

name: Raj
line: Do you know what he did. He watched me work for ten minutes, and then started to design a simple piece of software that could replace me.

name: Leonard
line: Is that even possible?

name: Raj
line: As it turns out, yes.

name: Howard
line: Something's got to be done about him, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Like what? He'll never be able to cope with the fact that some fifteen year-old kid is smarter and more accomplished than he is.

name: Raj
line: Well, what if something were to happen to this boy so he was no longer a threat to Sheldon?

name: Howard
line: Then our problem would be solved.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on, are we talking about murdering Dennis Kim? I'm not saying no.

name: Howard
line: We don't have to go that far, there are other means available.

name: Raj
line: We can't send him back to North Korea. He knows how to get out.

name: Howard
line: The only thing we need to do is make this Kim kid lose his focus.

name: Leonard
line: That won't happen, he's not interested in anything but physics.

name: Howard
line: What about biology?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Howard
line: You know, biology? The one thing that can completely derail a world class mind.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, he's fifteen.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, so, when I was fifteen I met Denise Polmerry and my grade point average fell from a 5.0 to a 1.8.

name: Raj
line: She was sleeping with you?

name: Howard
line: No, I just wasted a lot of time thinking about what it would be like if she did.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good, you're all here. Look, I've decided that if the three of you drop whatever it is you're working on and join me, we could lick cold fusion in less than a decade, twelve years tops.  Go away?  Hmm. Could it be me?

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey guys, what's up?

name: Howard
line: We need a hot fifteen year-old Asian girl with a thing for smart guys.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Howard, that's racist, any fifteen year-old girl will do the trick.

name: Raj
line: It's possible she may have misunderstood us.

name: Gablehouser
line: Dr Cooper? Oh, are we interrupting?

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, please, come in. Yeah, I think you'll appreciate this, very exciting.

name: Gablehouser
line: Oh, what are you working on?

name: Sheldon
line: Something remarkable. Since my prospects for the Nobel Prize in physics have disappeared, thank you very much, I've decided to refocus my efforts and use my people skills to win the Nobel Peace Prize. Look, I'm going to solve the Middle-East Crisis by building an exact replica of Jerusalem in the middle of the Mexican desert.

name: Gablehouser
line: To what end?

name: Sheldon
line: You know, it's like the baseball movie, build it and they will come.

name: Gablehouser
line: Who will come?

name: Sheldon
line: The Jewish people.

name: Gablehouser
line: What if they don't come.

name: Sheldon
line: We'll make it nice, put out a spread.

name: Gablehouser
line: Okay, well, um, speaking of spreads, we're having a small welcoming party this afternoon for Mr Kim, who's agreed to join us here at the University.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course he has, the oracle told us little Neo was the one. You can see the Matrix, can't you.

name: Gablehouser
line: Okay, well, uh, obviously you're very busy with your... uh, um, come Dennis. You'll have to excuse Dr Cooper, he's been under a lot of... um... he's nuts.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, la-la-la, Hava Nagila. They'll come, they'll settle and I'll win the prize...

name: Sheldon
line: I really don't understand your objections, Professor Goldfarb, why wouldn't the Senoran Desert make a perfectly good promised land?

name: Goldfarb
line: Go away.

name: Sheldon
line: We could call it Nuevo Cherusalem.

name: Goldfarb
line: Please go away.

name: Sheldon
line: Said Pharoah to Moses.

name: Gablehouser
line: Why are all these young women here?

name: Leonard
line: It's take your daughter to work day.

name: Gablehouser
line: Really, I was not aware of that.

name: Raj
line: Oh, yes. There was a very official email that was sent to everyone whose insurance files indicated they had daughters between the ages of 14 and 16.

name: Gablehouser
line: Hm?

name: Howard
line: Smooth.

name: Raj
line: Thank you.

name: Gablehouser
line: There's the man of the hour.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, so we now have a socially awkward genius in a room full of attractive age-appropriate women.

name: Howard
line: All he has to do now is hook up with one of them.

name: Leonard
line: Does anyone else see the flaw in this plan?

name: Raj
line: We need a social catalyst.

name: Leonard
line: Like what? We can't get fifteen year-old girls drunk.

name: Howard
line: Or can we?

name: Leonard
line: No, we can't.

name: Howard
line: I don't think you mean we can't. I think you mean we shouldn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, Howard. You're a Jew. If there was another wailing wall, exactly like the one in Jerusalem, but close to taco stands and cheap prescription drugs, would you still be able to wail at it? Okay, it's definitely me.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we cannot leave this to chance, lets pick a girl, and figure out how to get her together with Dennis.

name: Raj
line: Okay. How about that one.

name: Howard
line: Uh-uh. I know the type, cheerleader, student council, goes out with jocks, won't even look at anybody in the gifted programme. And if, after two years of begging, she does agree to go out with you, it turns out to be a set-up and you're in the back seat of your mom's car with your pants off while the whole football team laughs at you.

name: Raj
line: Are you crying?

name: Howard
line: No, I have allergies.

name: Raj
line: Okay, uh, how about her?

name: Leonard
line: Sure. If he wants to spend a couple of years doing her homework while she drinks herself into a stupor with non-fat White Russians, while you're the one holding her head out of the toilet while she's puking and telling you she wishes more guys were like you, and they she gets into Cornell because you wrote her essay for her, and you drive up to visit her one weekend and she acts like she doesn't even know you.

name: Raj
line: Okay, so not her either. How about her?

name: Howard
line: Interesting, kind of pretty, a little chubby so probably low self-esteem.

name: Leonard
line: I think that's our girl. One of us should go talk to her.

name: Raj
line: I can't talk to her, you do it.

name: Leonard
line: I can't just go up and talk to her. Howard, you talk to her.

name: Howard
line: Oh no, she'll never go for the kid once she gets a peek at this.

name: Raj
line: You know, if we were in India this would be simpler. Five minutes with her dad, twenty goats and a laptop and we'd be done.

name: Leonard
line: Well, we're not in India.

name: Raj
line: Alright, why don't we do it your way then? We'll arrange for this girl to move in across the hall from Dennis so he can pathetically moon over her for months on end.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, that was uncalled for.

name: Raj
line: You started it, dude.

name: Gablehouser
line: Could I have everyone's attention please. What a wonderful occasion this is. And how fortunate that it should happen to fall on take your daughter to work day. We're here to welcome Mr Dennis Kim to our little family.

name: Sheldon
line: Welcome Dennis Kim.

name: Gablehouser
line: Mr Kim was not only the valedictorian at Stamford University, he is also the youngest recipient of the prestigious Stephenson Award.

name: Sheldon
line: Youngest till the cyborgs rise up!

name: Gablehouser
line: And now, without any further ado, let me introduce the man of the hour, Mr Dennis Kim. Dennis! Dennis!

name: Dennis
line: What?

name: Gablehouser
line: Would you like to tell us a little bit about your upcoming research.

name: Dennis
line: Um, no thanks. I'm going to the mall with Emma.

name: Gablehouser
line: Well, uh, well, uh....

name: Leonard
line: The kid got a girl.

name: Raj
line: Unbelievable.

name: Howard
line: Did anyone see how he did it?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't worry, I've got this. Ladies and Gentlemen, honoured daughters. While Mr Kim, by virtue of his youth and naivety, has fallen prey to the inexplicable need for human contact, let me step in and assure you that my research will go on uninterrupted, and that social relationships will continue to baffle and repulse me. Thank you.

name: Howard
line: He's back.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, mission accomplished.

name: Raj
line: Forget the mission, how did that little yutz get a girl on his own?

name: Howard
line: I guess times have changed since we were young. Smart is the new sexy.

name: Leonard
line: Well, why do we go home alone every night, we're still smart.

name: Raj
line: Maybe we're too smart. So smart it's offputting.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, let's go with that.

name: Howard
line: Unbelievable. Components I built are on the International Space Station, and I get a ticket for launching a model rocket in the park.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know if the ticket was so much for the launch as it was for you telling the policewoman “you have to frisk me, I have a rocket in my pants.”

name: Raj
line: Hey, look at that.  It's Dennis Kim.

name: Howard
line: Wow, I almost didn't recognise him.

name: Raj
line: You know, I kind of feel bad about what we did to him.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, we really ruined his life.

name: Sheldon
line: Screw him, he was weak.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, more details about the new Star Trek film. There's going to be a scene depicting Spock's birth.

name: Raj
line: I'd be more interested in a scene depicting Spock's conception.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, please. For Vulcans, mating, or, if you will, Pon Farr, it's an extremely private matter.

name: Leonard
line: Still, I'd like to know the details. His mother was human, his father was Vulcan, they couldn't just conceive.

name: Howard
line: Maybe they had to go to a clinic. Imagine Spock's dad in a little room with a copy of pointy ears and shapely rears.

name: Raj
line: How come on Star Trek everybody's private parts are the same. No alien lady ever told Captain Kirk, hey, get your thing out of my nose.

name: Penny
line: Hi, can you help me, I was writing an email and the A key got stuck. Now it's just going “aaaaaaa”.

name: Leonard
line: What did you spill on it?

name: Penny
line: Nothing. Diet coke. And yoghurt. A little nail polish.

name: Leonard
line: I'll take a look at it.

name: Howard
line: Gentlemen, switching to local nerd news. Fishman, Chen, Chowdry, McNair aren't fielding a team in the university physics bowl this year.

name: Leonard
line: You're kidding, why not?

name: Howard
line: They formed a barbershop quartet, and got a gig playing Knotsbury Farm.

name: Penny
line: Wow, so in your world, you're like, the cool guys.

name: Howard
line: Recognise.

name: Leonard
line: This is our year! With those guys out, the entire physics bowl will kneel before Zod.

name: Penny
line: Zod?

name: Howard
line: Kryptonian villain. Long story.

name: Raj
line: Good story.

name: Sheldon
line: Well count me out.

name: Howard
line: What? Why?

name: Sheldon
line: You want me to use my intelligence in a tawdry competition? Would you ask Picasso to play Pictionary? Would you ask Noah Webster to play Boggle? Would you ask Jacques Cousteau to play Go Fish?

name: Leonard
line: Come on, you need a four person team, we're four people.

name: Sheldon
line: By that reasoning we should also play bridge, hold up a chuppah and enter the Olympic bobsled competition.

name: Penny
line: I want tickets to that please.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, what, do I need to quote Spock's dying words to you.

name: Sheldon
line: No, don't.

name: Leonard
line: The needs of the many.

name: Howard
line: Outweigh the needs of the few.

name: Sheldon
line: Or the one. Dammit, I'll do it.

name: Raj
line: Okay. First order of physics bowl business. We need a truly kick-ass team name. Suggestions.

name: Howard
line: How about the perpetual motion squad? It's beyond the laws of physics, plus a little heads up for the ladies.

name: Leonard
line: The ladies?

name: Howard
line: Perpetual motion squad, we can go all night.

name: Raj
line: I like it.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't. Teams are traditionally named after fierce creatures, thus intimidating ones opponent.

name: Raj
line: Then we can be the Bengal Tigers.

name: Sheldon
line: Poor choice. Gram for gram, no animal exceeds the relative fighting strength of the army ant.

name: Raj
line: Maybe so. But you can't incinerate a Bengal Tiger with a magnifying glass.

name: Leonard
line: Let's put it to a vote. All those in favour....

name: Sheldon
line: Point of order. I move that any vote on team names should be unanimous. No man should be forced to emblazon his chest with the bengal tiger, when common sense dictates it should be an army ant.

name: Leonard
line: Will the gentleman from the great state of denial yield for a question?

name: Sheldon
line: I will yield.

name: Leonard
line: After we go through the exercise of an annoying series of votes, all of which the gentleman will lose, does he then intend to threaten to quit if he does not get his way?

name: Sheldon
line: He does.

name: Leonard
line: I move we are the Army Ants, all those in favour?

name: Penny
line: Good afternoon, and welcome to today's physics bowl practice round. I'm Penny, and I'll be your host, because apparently I didn't have anything else to do on a Saturday afternoon, and isn't that just a little sad? Gentlemen, are you ready?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course.

name: Howard
line: Fire away.

name: Penny
line: You know, it's none of my business, but isn't a guy who can't speak in front of women going to hold you back a little?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, he'll be okay once the women are mixed into the crowd. He only has a problem when they're one on one and smell nice.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thanks Raj, it's vanilla oil.

name: Leonard
line: I was actually the one who noticed, okay, let's just start.

name: Penny
line: Okay, the first question is on the topic of optics. What is the shortest light pulse ever produced? Dr Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: And of course, the answer is 130 adoseconds.

name: Penny
line: That is correct.

name: Leonard
line: I knew that too.

name: Penny
line: Good for you, sweetie. Okay, next question. What is the quantum mechanical effect used to encode data on hard disk drives? Howard.

name: Sheldon
line: And of course, the answer is giant magneto resistance.

name: Penny
line: Right.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I buzzed in.

name: Sheldon
line: But I answered, it's called teamwork.

name: Howard
line: Don't you think I should answer the engineering questions? I am an engineer.

name: Sheldon
line: By that logic I should answer all the anthropology questions because I'm a mammal.

name: Leonard
line: Just ask another one.

name: Penny
line: Okay. What artificial satellite has seen glimpses of Einsteins predicted frame dragging?

name: Sheldon
line: And of course it's Gravity Probe B.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you have to let somebody else answer.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: Because it's polite.

name: Sheldon
line: What do manners have to do with it? This is war. Were the Romans polite when they salted the ground of Carthage to make sure nothing would ever grow again?

name: Penny
line: Leonard, you said I only had to ask questions.

name: Sheldon
line: The objective of the competition is to give correct answers, if I know them, why shouldn't I give them?

name: Howard
line: Some of us might have the correct answers too.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh please, you don't even have a PhD.

name: Howard
line: Alright, that's it.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, sit down.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: maybe we should take a little break.

name: Sheldon
line: Good idea, I need my wrist brace, all this button pushing is aggravating my old Nintendo injury.

name: Howard
line: I agree.

name: Penny
line: What did he say?

name: Howard
line: He compared Sheldon to a disposable feminine cleansing product one might use on a summer's eve.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and the bag it came in.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, excellent, I want to show you something.

name: Leonard
line: Can it wait, I need to talk to you.

name: Sheldon
line: Just look. I've designed the perfect uniforms for our team. The colours are based on Star Trek, the original series. The three of you will wear support red, and I will wear command gold.

name: Leonard
line: Why do they say AA?

name: Sheldon
line: Army Ants.

name: Leonard
line: Isn't that confusing? AA might mean something else to certain people.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would a physics bowl team be called anodised aluminium?

name: Leonard
line: No, I meant.... never mind. Hey, check it out. I got you a Batman cookie jar!

name: Sheldon
line: Oh neat, what's the occasion?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you're a friend, and you like Batman, and cookies, and you're off the team.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Howard, Raj and I just had a team meeting.

name: Sheldon
line: No you didn't.

name: Leonard
line: Yes we did, I just came from it.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, I don't know where you just came from, but it couldn't have been a team meeting because I'm on the team and I wasn't there, ergo the team did not meet.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let me try it this way, uh, I was at a coffee klatch with a couple of friends and one thing led to another and it turns out you're off the team.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: Because you're taking all the fun out of it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm sorry, is the winner of the physics bowl the team that has the most fun?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let me try it this way, you're annoying and no-one wants to play with you any more.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. Well. At this point I should inform you that I intend to form my own team and destroy the molecular bonds that bind your very matter together, and reduce the resulting particulate chaos to tears.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks for the heads up.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. One more thing.

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: It's on, bitch.

name: Howard
line: So who'd he get to be on his team.

name: Leonard
line: He won't say. He just smiles, and eats macaroons out of his bat jar.

name: Raj
line: He's using psychological warfare. We must reply in kind. I say we wait until he looks at us, then laugh like, yes, you are a smart and strong competitor, but we are also smart and strong and we have a reasonable chance of defeating you.

name: Leonard
line: How exactly would that laugh go?

name: Raj
line: Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee!

name: Howard
line: That sounds more like, we are a tall thin woman who wants to make a coat out of your Dalmatians.

name: Leonard
line: Guys, let's remember that Sheldon is still our friend and my room mate.

name: Howard
line: So?

name: Leonard
line: So nothing, let's destroy him.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen.

name: Raj
line: Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee!

name: Howard
line: Okay, we're going to need a strong fourth for our team.

name: Raj
line: You know who's apparently very smart, is the girl who played TV's Blossom. She got a PhD in neuroscience or something.

name: Leonard
line: Raj, we're not getting TV's Blossom to join our physics bowl team.

name: Raj
line: How about the girl from the Wonder Years?

name: Howard
line: Gentlemen, I believe I've found the solution to all our problems.

name: Leonard
line: We can't ask Leslie Winkle.

name: Raj
line: Why? Because you slept together and when she was done with you she discarded you like last night's chutney?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Howard
line: Sometimes you've got to take one for the team.

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Sack up, dude.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. Here I go, taking one for the team. In the sack. Hey Leslie.

name: Leslie
line: Hi guys.

name: Leonard
line: Leslie, I have a question for you, and it might be a little awkward, you know, given that I...

name: Howard
line: Hit that thang.

name: Leslie
line: Leonard, there's no reason to feel uncomfortable just because we've seen each other's faces and naked bodies contorted in the sweet agony of coitus.

name: Leonard
line: There's not? Gee, cos it sure sounds like there should be.

name: Leslie
line: Rest assured that any aspects of our sexual relationship regarding your preferences, your idiosyncrasies, your performance, are still protected by the inherent confidentiality of the bedroom.

name: Leonard
line: That's all very comforting, but if it's okay, I'd like to get on with my question now.

name: Leslie
line: Proceed.

name: Leonard
line: We are entering the physics bowl and we need a fourth for our team.

name: Leslie
line: No thanks, I'm really busy with my like sign dilepton super symmetry search.

name: Howard
line: Dilepton, schmilepton, we need you.

name: Leslie
line: Sorry.

name: Howard
line: Well, we tried. Just have to face Sheldon mano-e-mano-e-mano. A-mano.

name: Leslie
line: Wait, you're going up against Sheldon Cooper?

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Leslie
line: That arrogant, misogynistic East-Texas doorknob that told me I should abandon my work with high energy particles for laundry and child bearing?

name: Leonard
line: She's in.

name: Penny
line: So, how do you feel? Nice and loose? Come to play? Got your game face on?  Are you ready?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. You know you don't have to stay for the whole thing.

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, no, I want to. It sounds really interesting.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon.

name: Raj
line: Hee hee hee hee hee hee hee hee.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon. I'm just going to sit down.

name: Leonard
line: So, is that your team.

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, I don't need a team, I could easily defeat you single-handedly. But the rules require four, so may I introduce, the third floor janitor, he lady from the lunchroom, and, my Spanish is not good, either her son or her butcher. And what about your team? What rat have you recruited to the SS Sinking Ship?

name: Leslie
line: Hello, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Leslie Winkle?

name: Leslie
line: Yeah, Leslie Winkle. The answer to the question, who made Sheldon Cooper cry like a little girl?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, well, I'm polymerised tree sap and you're non-organic adhesive so, whatever verbal projectile you launch in my direction is reflected off of me, returns on its original trajectory, and adheres to you.

name: Leslie
line: Oh, ouch.

name: Dr Gablehouser
line: Okay, if everyone could please take your seats.

name: Leonard
line: Here's your tee-shirt.

name: Leslie
line: PMS? It's a couple of days early, but...

name: Leonard
line: No, it stands for Perpetual Motion Squad.

name: Leslie
line: Oh, right, of course, what was I thinking?

name: Gablehouser
line: Good afternoon everyone, and welcome to this year's physics bowl. Today's preliminary match features two great teams... AA versus PMS.

name: Howard
line: All night long, y'all!

name: Gablehouser
line: Okay, well let's jump right in, first question, for ten points. What is the isospan singlet partner of the Pi Zero Meson?  PMS?

name: Leonard
line: The Eta Meson.

name: Gablehouser
line: Correct.

name: Sheldon
line: Formal protest.

name: Gablehouser
line: On what grounds?

name: Sheldon
line: The Velcro on my wrist brace caught on my shirt.

name: Gablehouser
line: Denied. Alright, for ten points, what is the lightest element on earth with no stable isotope.  AA?

name: Sheldon
line: And of course, the answer is Technetium.

name: Gablehouser
line: Terrific. Next question, what is the force between two uncharged plates due to quantum vacuum fluctuation.  PMS?

name: Raj
line: Sheldon can suck on, the Casimir Effect.

name: Gablehouser
line: Correct.

name: Gablehouser
line: How does a quantum computer factor large numbers.  PMS?

name: Leslie
line: Shor's Algorithm.

name: Gablehouser
line: Correct.

name: Sheldon
line: 4.1855 times ten to the seventh ergs per calorie.

name: Leonard
line: Prevost's theory of exchanges.

name: Sheldon
line: Lamda equals one over Pi R squared N

name: Howard
line: 760 degrees celsius, the approximate temperature of the young lady in the front row.

name: Gablehouser
line: Mr Wolowitz, this is your second warning.

name: Sheldon
line: A sigma particle.

name: Leslie
line: Yes, assuming the hypothetical planet has a mass greater than the earth.

name: Gablehouser
line: Correct. Ladies and gentlemen, I hold in my hand the final question. The score now stands AA 1150, PMS 1175. So, for one hundred points, and the match, please turn your attention to the formula on the screens. Solve the equation.

name: Raj
line: Holy crap.

name: Leonard
line: What the hell is that.

name: Howard
line: It looks like something they found on the ship at Roswell.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, think, Leslie.

name: Leslie
line: Leonard, it's not going to work if you rush me, you have to let me get there.

name: Leonard
line: You're never going to let that go, are you?

name: Gablehouser
line: Ten seconds.  PMS.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry, I panicked.

name: Howard
line: Then guess.

name: Leonard
line: Um, eight.  Point four.

name: Gablehouser
line: I'm sorry, that's incorrect. AA, if you can answer correctly, the match is yours.

name: Howard
line: He doesn't have it. He's got squat.

name: Gablehouser
line: AA, I need your answer.

name: Third Floor Janitor
line: The answer is minus eight by alpha.

name: Sheldon
line: Hang on, hang on a second, that's not our answer. What are you doing?

name: Third Floor Janitor
line: Answering question. Winning physics bowl.

name: Sheldon
line: How do you know anything about physics?

name: Third Floor Janitor
line: Here I am janitor, in former Soviet Union I am physicist. Leningrad Politechnica. Go Polar Bears.

name: Sheldon
line: Well that's a delightful little story, but our arrangement was that you sit here and not say anything, I answer the questions.

name: Third Floor Janitor
line: You didn't answer question.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey look, now maybe you have democracy now in your beloved Russia, but on this physics bowl team I rule with an iron fist. . Ow!

name: Gablehouser
line: AA, I need your official answer.

name: Sheldon
line: Well it's not what he said.

name: Gablehouser
line: Then what is it?

name: Sheldon
line: I want a different question.

name: Gablehouser
line: You can't have a different question.

name: Sheldon
line: Formal protest.

name: Gablehouser
line: Denied.

name: Sheldon
line: Informal protest.

name: Gablehouser
line: Denied. I need your official answer.

name: Sheldon
line: No. I decline to provide one.

name: Gablehouser
line: Well, that's too bad, because the answer your teammate gave was correct.

name: Sheldon
line: That's your opinion.

name: Gablehouser
line: Alright, the winner of the match is...

name: Leonard
line: Hang on. Sheldon, is proving that you are single-handedly smarter than everyone else so important that you would rather lose by yourself than win as part of a team.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand the question.

name: Leonard
line: Go ahead.

name: Gablehouser
line: The winner is PMS!

name: Leonard
line: Sorry, somebody's sitting there.

name: Sheldon
line: Who?

name: Leonard
line: My Physics Bowl Trophy!

name: Sheldon
line: That trophy is meaningless, I forfeited, therefore you did not win.

name: Leonard
line: I know someone who would disagree.

name: Sheldon
line: Who?

name: Leonard
line: My Physics Bowl Trophy!  “Leonard is so smart, Sheldon who?”

name: Sheldon
line: Alright that is very immature.

name: Leonard
line: You're right, I'm sorry.  I'm not!

name: Penny
line: Okay, new contest.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Penny
line: I'm settling once and for all who is the smartest around here. Okay, are you ready?

name: Sheldon
line: Absolutely.

name: Leonard
line: Bring it on.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Marsha, Jan and Cindy were the three daughters of what TV family?  The Brady Bunch. Okay, Sammy Hagar replaced David Lee Roth as the lead singer in what group?

name: Sheldon
line: The Brady Bunch?

name: Penny
line: Van Halen. Alright, Madonna was married to this Ridgemont High alum.  Oh my God, Sean Penn!

name: Leonard
line: How do you know these things?

name: Penny
line: I go outside and I talk to people. Alright, here, what actor holds the record for being named people magazine's sexiest man alive?

name: Sheldon
line: William Shatner.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, I don't think it's Shatner.

name: Sheldon
line: Then it's got to be Patrick Stewart.

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Formal protest.

name: Penny
line: Alright, singer who sang “Oops I Did It Again.”  Okay, Tweetie Bird, taught he taw a what?

name: Sheldon
line: Romulan.

name: Penny
line: Yes. He taught he taw a Romulan.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, this sandwich is an unmitigated disaster. I asked for turkey and roast beef with lettuce and swiss on wholewheat.

name: Raj
line: What did they give you?

name: Sheldon
line: Turkey and roast beef with swiss and lettuce on wholewheat. It's the right ingredients but in the wrong order. In a proper sandwich the cheese is adjacent to the bread to create a moisture barrier against the lettuce. They might as well have dragged this thing through a car wash.

name: Leonard
line: I don't believe it.

name: Sheldon
line: I know, it's basic culinary science.

name: Leonard
line: Some guy is auctioning off a miniature time machine prop from the original film and no-one is bidding on it.

name: Howard
line: A time machine from the movie The Time Machine?

name: Leonard
line: No, a time machine from Sophie's Choice.

name: Raj
line: Boy, Sophie could have used a time machine in that movie. Did you see it, it's rough.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's cool.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh.

name: Raj
line: It's only $800?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. And that's my bid.

name: Sheldon
line: You bid $800.

name: Leonard
line: It was a spur of the moment thing, I figured it would go for thousands and I just wanted to be a part of it.

name: Sheldon
line: There's only 30 seconds left in the auction.

name: Howard
line: Do you have $800?

name: Leonard
line: Not to blow on a miniature time machine.

name: Howard
line: Don't worry, the way these things work there's people waiting ‘til the last second to bid, and then they swoop in and get it, it's called sniping.

name: Raj
line: Fifteen seconds.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, snipers.

name: Raj
line: Ten, nine, eight...

name: Leonard
line: Where are your snipers?

name: Raj
line: Five.

name: Leonard
line: Snipe.

name: Raj
line: Four.

name: Leonard
line: Snipe.

name: Raj
line: Three.

name: Leonard
line: Snipe!

name: Raj
line: Two.

name: Leonard
line: SNIPE!

name: Raj
line: One.

name: Leonard
line: Aaaa-aw!

name: Raj
line: Congratulations, you are the proud owner of a miniature time machine.

name: Howard
line: You lucky duck.

name: Sheldon
line: I wonder why no-one else bid, this is a classic piece of sci-fi movie memorabilia.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I know, I still can't afford it.

name: Howard
line: Why don't we share it? We'll each put in two hundred bucks and we'll take turns having it in our homes.

name: Raj
line: A time share time machine? I'm in. Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Need you ask? But I still don't understand why no-one else bid.

name: Sheldon
line: I understand why no-one else bid.

name: Raj
line: Did the listing actually say miniature?

name: Leonard
line: I just assumed. Who sells a full sized time machine for $800?

name: Sheldon
line: In a venn diagram, that would be an individual located within the intersection of the sets “no longer want my time machine” and “need $800”.

name: Howard
line: It's actually a tremendous bargain, even with shipping it works out to less than four dollars a pound.

name: Raj
line: Cocktain shrimp are $12.50.

name: Leonard
line: How are we going to get it upstairs?

name: Howard
line: If we take the dish off it might fit in the elevator.

name: Leonard
line: Yes but the elevator's been broken for two years.

name: Sheldon
line: I've been meaning to ask you, do you think we should make a call about that?

name: Howard
line: Not necessary, I have a masters in engineering, I remotely repair satellites on a regular basis. I troubleshoot space shuttle payloads. When the Mars rover started pulling to the left I performed a front end alignment from 62 million miles away.  No, that baby's broken.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, guys, push.

name: Howard
line: If I push any harder I'm going to give birth to my colon.

name: Raj
line: I can't feel my fingers, hurry up.

name: Sheldon
line: It's the same amount of work no matter how fast you go, basic physics.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: If my fingers ever work again, I've got a job for the middle one.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey guys.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, hi Penny.  Take a break, guys!

name: Penny
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, just, you know, moving... something upstairs.

name: Penny
line: What is it?

name: Leonard
line: It's... you know, time machine.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, okay, neat, but I really got to get to work, so....

name: Leonard
line: Uh, just give us a few minutes.

name: Penny
line: I don't have a few minutes, I'm running really late.

name: Sheldon
line: Then I have a simple solution, go up to the roof, hop over to the next building, there's a small gap, don't look down if you're subject to vertigo, and use their stairwell.

name: Penny
line: You're joking, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I never joke when it comes to vertigo.

name: Penny
line: Damn, okay, I'll just take the roof.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, if you wait for us to set up the time machine, I can drop you off at work yesterday. Time travel joke, it's not... never mind.

name: Sheldon
line: For what it's worth, I thought it was humorous.

name: Leonard
line: Let's just do this. Guys, ready to push?

name: Raj
line: In a minute. Howard stepped outside to throw up.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know what you were worried about. I think it really works in the room.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. It is by far the coolest thing I have ever owned.

name: Sheldon
line: The exact time machine that carried actor Rod Taylor from Victorian England into the post-apocalyptic future, which society had splintered into two factions, the sub-terranean Morlocks, who survived by feasting on the flesh of the gentle surface dwelling Eloy.

name: Howard
line: Talk about your chick magnets.

name: Raj
line: Oh yeah. The guy who lives next to me is always like, I have a Jacuzzi on my balcony, I have a Jacuzzi on my balcony. But wait until I tell him, I've got a time machine on my balcony. Stuff that in your speedos, Jacuzzi Bob!

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, I know we said we'd take turns, but I think you'd agree that practicality dictates it remain here.

name: Howard
line: You can't just keep it here, what if I meet a girl and say, “you wanna come up and see my time machine, it's at my friends house,” how lame is that?

name: Raj
line: He's got a point.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright, I think we're going to need some ground rules, in addition to the expected no shoes in the time machine and no eating in the time machine, I propose that we add pants must be worn at all times in the time machine.

name: Leonard
line: Seconded.

name: Howard
line: I was going to put down a towel.

name: Raj
line: I still want it on my balcony. I say we move it on a bi-monthly basis.

name: Leonard
line: That sounds fair.

name: Sheldon
line: Hold on. Bi-monthly is an ambiguous term, do you mean move it every other month, or twice a month?

name: Raj
line: Twice a month.

name: Sheldon
line: Then no.

name: Raj
line: Okay, every other month.

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you can't be selfish, we all paid for it, so it belongs to all of us. Now out of the way so I can sit in my time machine.  Okay, I am setting the dials for March 10th, 1876.

name: Howard
line: Good choice, Alexander Graham Bell invents the telephone and calls out for Dr Watson.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait a minute, I'd want to see that too.

name: Leonard
line: So, when it's your turn you can.

name: Sheldon
line: But if we all go back to the same point in time, Bell's lab is going to get very crowded, he'll know something's up.

name: Raj
line: Also, since the time machine doesn't move in space, you'll end up in 1876 Pasadena.

name: Howard
