line: And even if you can make it to Boston, what are you going to do, knock on the door and say to Mrs Bell, “hey Mrs Bell, big fan of your husband, can I come in and watch him invent the telephone?”

name: Raj
line: Mrs Bell was deaf, she's not even going to hear you knock.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I have a solution, first go into the future and obtain a cloaking device.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, how far into the future?

name: Sheldon
line: If I remember correctly, Captain Kirk will steal a cloaking device from the Romulans on Stardate 5027.3, which will be January 10th 2328 by pre-federation reckoning.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I am setting the dials for January 10th, 2328. Here we go into the future.  That was fun.

name: Raj
line: My turn.

name: Penny
line: Okay, first of all, what you call a gap was nearly three feet wide, I slipped and skinned my knee.

name: Leonard
line: Are you okay?

name: Penny
line: Zzz-zz-zz-zz! Second of all, the door to the stairwell of the other building was locked, so I had to go down the fire escape which ends on the third floor, forcing me to crawl through the window of a lovely Armenian family, who insisted I stay for lunch.

name: Leonard
line: That doesn't sound too bad.

name: Penny
line: It was eight courses of lamb, and they tried to fix me up with their son.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry.

name: Penny
line: Not done. By the time I finally got to work, they'd given my shift away. Yeah, that's right, I've lost an entire day's pay thanks to this... this...

name: Sheldon
line: Time machine.

name: Leonard
line: The lights flash and the dish spins, you wanna try it?

name: Penny
line: No! I don't want to try it, my God, you are grown men, how could you waste your lives with these stupid toys and costumes and comic books and... and now that... that...

name: Sheldon
line: Again, time machine.

name: Penny
line: Oh please, it's not a time machine, if anything it looks like something Elton John would drive through the Everglades.

name: Sheldon
line: It only moves in time. It would be worse than useless in a swamp.

name: Penny
line: Pathetic. All of you, completely pathetic.

name: Raj
line: My turn!

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, it's two in the morning.

name: Leonard
line: So?

name: Sheldon
line: So it's my turn. Why did you set it for the day before yesterday?

name: Leonard
line: Because I want to go back and keep myself from getting a time machine.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't. If you were to prevent yourself from buying it in the past, you would not have it available in the present to travel back and stop yourself from buying it, ergo you would still have it. This is a classic rookie time travel mistake.

name: Leonard
line: Can I go back and prevent you from explaining that to me?

name: Sheldon
line: Same paradox. If you were to travel back in time and, say, knock me unconscious, you would not then have the conversation that irritated you, motivating you to go back and knock me unconscious.

name: Leonard
line: What if I knocked you unconscious right now?

name: Sheldon
line: It won't change the past.

name: Leonard
line: But it would make the present so much nicer.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you upset about something?

name: Leonard
line: What was your first clue?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it was a number of things. First the late hour, then your demeanour seems very low energy, plus your irritability...

name: Leonard
line: Yes I'm upset.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! I don't usually pick up on those things. Good for me.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, good for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, wait. Did you want to talk about what's bothering you?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. Maybe.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow, I'm on fire tonight.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, here's the thing. Girls like Penny never end up with guys who own time machines.

name: Sheldon
line: I disagree. Your inability to successfully woo Penny long predates your acquisition of the time machine. That failure clearly stands on its own.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks for pointing it out.

name: Sheldon
line: In addition, your premise is flawed. In the original film, Rod Taylor got Yvette Mimeaux with that very time machine. In Back to the Future, Marty McFly got the opportunity to hook up with his extremely attractive young mother.

name: Leonard
line: Those are movies.

name: Sheldon
line: Well of course they're movies. Were you expecting me to come up with an example involving a real life time machine? That's absurd.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, guys, push.

name: Howard
line: If I push any harder I'm going to give birth to my colon.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey guys.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, hi Penny.  Take a break, guys!

name: Penny
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, just, you know, moving a... time machine.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, okay, neat, but I really got to get to work, so....

name: Leonard
line: No problem.  Hang on.

name: Penny
line: But, what about your time machine.

name: Leonard
line: Some things are more important than toys.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'm scared.

name: Leonard
line: Don't worry baby, I've got you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: It's still my turn.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: I'm packing up all my collectibles and taking them down to the comic book store to sell.

name: Sheldon
line: Well is that really necessary. If you need money you can always sell blood. And semen.

name: Leonard
line: It's not about money.

name: Raj
line: We brought food.

name: Howard
line: Lox and bagels, the breakfast of time travellers.

name: Leonard
line: Terrific, does anyone want to buy my share of the time machine?

name: Raj
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: Because I don't want it any more.

name: Howard
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: Just... personal reasons.

name: Sheldon
line: My spidey-sense tells me this has something to do with Penny.

name: Leonard
line: Look, do you want to buy me out or not?

name: Raj
line: I'll give you a hundred dollars, which will make me half owner, and we'll put it on my balcony.

name: Howard
line: Screw his balcony, I'll give you a hundred and twenty and we'll put it in my garage.

name: Leonard
line: I paid two hundred dollars for my share.

name: Raj
line: Dude, everyone knows a time machine loses half its value the minute you drive it off the lot.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll go for two hundred, that time machine stays right where it is.

name: Raj
line: Three hundred, and I'll throw in my original 1979 Mattel Millenium Falcon with real light speed sound effects.

name: Leonard
line: No, no more toys or action figures or props or replicas or costumes or robots or Darth Vader voice changers, I'm getting rid of all of it.

name: Howard
line: You can't do that, look what you've created here, it's like nerdvana.

name: Raj
line: More importantly, you've a Darth Vader voice changer?

name: Leonard
line: Not for long.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I call dibs on the Golden Age Flash.

name: Howard
line: Hang on, I need that to complete my Justice Society of America collection.

name: Raj
line: Too bad, I called dibs.

name: Howard
line: Well you can't just call dibs.

name: Raj
line: I can and I did, look up dibs on Wikipedia.

name: Sheldon
line: Dibs doesn't apply in a bidding war.

name: Leonard
line: It's not a bidding war, I'm selling it all to Larry down at the comic book store.

name: Raj
line: Why Larry? Did Larry call dibs?

name: Howard
line: Will you forget dibs!

name: Leonard
line: He offered me a fair price for the whole collection.

name: Sheldon
line: What's the number, I'll match it.

name: Raj
line: I'll match it, plus a thousand rupees.

name: Sheldon
line: What's the exchange rate.

name: Raj
line: None of your business. Take it or leave it.

name: Howard
line: Mom, my bar-mizvah bonds, how much do I got? Thanks. I can go twenty six hundred dollars and two trees in Israel.

name: Leonard
line: Forget it guys, if I sell to one of you, the other two are going to be really mad at me.

name: Sheldon
line: Who cares, as long as you pick me.

name: Raj
line: Okay, Leonard, put down the box, let's talk.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry Raj, my mind is made up.

name: Sheldon
line: No. I can't let you do this.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, get out of my way.

name: Sheldon
line: None shall pass.

name: Howard
line: Okay man, be cool, we're all friends here.

name: Penny
line: What the hell's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: You hypocrite!

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Little Miss “grown ups don't play with toys”. If I were to go into that apartment right now, would I find Beanie Babies? Are you not an accumulator of Care Bears and My Little Ponies? And who is that Japanese feline I see frolicking on your shorts? Hello,Hello Kitty!

name: Penny
line: Okay, okay look, if this is about yesterday, Leonard, I am really sorry about what I said, I was just a bit upset.

name: Leonard
line: No, I needed to hear it.

name: Penny
line: No you didn't. Look, you are a great guy, and it is things you love that make you who you are.

name: Howard
line: I guess that makes me large breasts.

name: Leonard
line: Still, I think it's time for me to get rid of this stuff and... you know... move on with my life.

name: Penny
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Wow. Good for you.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks. Hey, do you want to, I don't know, later...

name: Good looking man coming up stairs
line: Excuse me. Hey, Penny!

name: Penny
line: Hi Mike.

name: Mike
line: Are you ready to go.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I just have to change.

name: Mike
line: I'll give you a hand.

name: Penny
line: Oh, stop it! Bye guys.

name: Leonard
line: My turn on the time machine.

name: Sheldon
line: It worked. It really worked. They said I was mad, but it worked.  Oh no, not Morlocks! Not flesh-eating Morlocks! He-e-e-e-e-e-e-elp!

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, are you okay?

name: Sheldon
line: We have to get rid of the time machine.

name: Leonard
line: It is a little big for the living room, isn't it?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, that's the problem, it's too big.

name: Leonard
line: I'm glad you agree. I hired some guys to help us move it, come on in fellas.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh no, Morlocks? Eat him, eat him. Aaaaargh.  Leonard!!!!!!!!

name: Leonard
line: On the other hand, some physicists are concerned that if the super collider actually works, it will create a black hole and swallow up the Earth ending life as we know it.

name: Raj
line: Psh, what a bunch of crybabies. No guts, no glory man.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, check it out, the school of pharmacology is looking for volunteers.

name: Raj
line: We are testing a new medication for social anxiety, panic attacks, agoraphobia and obsessive compulsive disorder. Why would they be looking for test subjects here?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, Raj. Maybe the comic book store doesn't have a bulletin board.  What's going on?

name: Howard
line: Shhh! Hot girl in Sheldon's office.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon's office? Is she lost?

name: Howard
line: Don't think so. I followed her here from the parking lot.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe she's his lawyer.

name: Howard
line: Well she's free to examine my briefs.

name: Leonard
line: Howard...

name: Howard
line: I know, I'm disgusting, I should be punished. By her, oh look, I did it again.

name: Girl
line: Well, that should do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for coming by.  Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: Buddy.

name: Howard
line: Sorry I'm late, I'm working on a project that may take me up on the next space shuttle.

name: Sheldon
line: How can you be late, I wasn't expecting you at all.

name: Howard
line: Nobody ever expects me, sometimes you just look and... BAM!  Howard Wolowitz.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, are you going to introduce us?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, alright, this is Missy, Missy this is Leonard and Rajesh and you've already met Howard.

name: Missy
line: It's nice to meet you.

name: Leonard
line: You too, swell, also.

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: So, how do you two know each other.

name: Missy
line: Oh, he once spent nine months with my legs wrapped around his head.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me?

name: Sheldon
line: She's my twin sister, she thinks she's funny but frankly I've never been able to see it.

name: Missy
line: It's because you have no measurable sense of humour, Shelly.

name: Sheldon
line: How exactly would one measure a sense of humour? A humourmometer?

name: Howard
line: Well, I think you're delightfully droll. Or as the French say, Tres Drole.

name: Missy
line: Okay, so let me see if I got this. Leonard, Howard and... I'm sorry what was your name again.

name: Sheldon
line: Rajesh.

name: Leonard
line: So Missy, what brings you all the way from Texas?

name: Howard
line: Was it perhaps destiny, I think it was destiny.

name: Missy
line: My friend's getting married in Disneyland tomorrow night.

name: Howard
line: Destiny, thy name is Anaheim.

name: Missy
line: And I had to drop off some papers for Shelly to sign for my dad's estate.

name: Sheldon
line: The papers could have been mailed, Mom just sent you here to spy on me, didn't she.

name: Missy
line: I guess that's why they call you a genius.

name: Sheldon
line: They call me a genius because I'm a genius. Tell Mom that I currently weigh 165 pounds, and that I'm having regular bowel movements. Enjoy the wedding, goodbye.

name: Leonard and Howard together
line: Woah, woah.

name: Leonard
line: If the wedding's not until tomorrow, why don't you stay with us tonight?

name: Missy
line: Oh, I don't think so. Shelly doesn't like company. Even as a little boy he'd send his imaginary friends home at the end of the day.

name: Sheldon
line: They were not friends, they were imaginary colleagues.

name: Leonard
line: Look, you're here, we have plenty of room.

name: Sheldon
line: No we don't.

name: Howard
line: Come on, Shelly, she's family.

name: Sheldon
line: So what? I don't issue invitations to your mother.

name: Missy
line: Well it would be nice not to have to drive out to Anaheim in rush hour.

name: Sheldon
line: And don't ever call me Shelly.

name: Leonard
line: So it's settled. You'll stay with us.

name: Howard
line: I'll walk you to your car. You're in structure 3 level C, right?

name: Sheldon
line: What just happened?

name: Missy
line: So anyway, we're eight years old, and Sheldon converts my easy-bake oven to some kind of high-powered furnace.

name: Leonard
line: Hee-hee, just classic.

name: Sheldon
line: I needed a place to fire ceramic semi-conductor substrates for home-made integrated circuits.

name: Missy
line: He was trying to build some kind of armed robot to keep me out of his room.

name: Sheldon
line: Made necessary by her insistence on going into my room.

name: Missy
line: Anyway, I go to make those little corn muffins they give you, there's a big flash, next thing you know my eyebrows are gone.

name: Howard
line: Ha-ha, not your eyebrows?

name: Missy
line: Yep. I had to go through the entire second grade with crooked eyebrows my Mom drew on.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that what that was? I just assumed that the second grade curriculum had rendered you quizzical.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Leonard, you left your underwear in the dryer downstairs.

name: Leonard
line: Those are not mine.

name: Penny
line: Really, they have your little name label in them.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, no, I do, I use those... uh... just to polish up my... spear-fishing equipment. I spear fish. When I'm not crossbow hunting, I spear fish. Uh, Penny, this is Sheldon's twin sister, Missy. Missy, this is our neighbour Penny.

name: Missy
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Wow, you don't look that much alike.

name: Howard
line: Can I get a hallelujah.

name: Sheldon
line: Fraternal twins come from two separate eggs, they are no more alike than any other siblings.

name: Howard
line: Hallelujah.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guess what. I've been accepted as a test subject for a new miracle drug to overcome pathological shyness.

name: Penny
line: Hey, good for you, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Yes, I'm very hopeful. Hello Missy.  They mentioned there may be side effects.

name: Raj
line: So, Missy. Have you ever met a man from the exotic subcontinent of India?

name: Missy
line: Well, there's Dr Patel at our church.

name: Raj
line: Ah yes, Dr Patel, good man.

name: Howard
line: Do you like motorcycles, ‘cos I ride a hog.

name: Raj
line: A hog? You have a two cylinder scooter with a basket on the front.

name: Howard
line: You still have to wear a helmet.

name: Raj
line: Have you ever heard of the Kama Sutra?

name: Missy
line: The sex book?

name: Raj
line: The Indian sex book. In other words if you wonder wonder who wrote the book of love, it was us.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Sheldon's sister's pretty cute, I w....

name: Leonard
line: I wasn't staring!

name: Penny
line: I didn't say you were, I just said she was cute.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Huh, um, maybe, if you like women who are tall... and perfect.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, why are you ignoring your sister?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not ignoring my sister. I'm ignoring all of you.

name: Leonard
line: I brought snacks.

name: Missy
line: Oh my! Gherkins and....

name: Leonard
line: Onion dip, it's onion dip.

name: Missy
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: We don't entertain much.

name: Raj
line: Missy, do you enjoy pajamas?

name: Missy
line: I guess.

name: Raj
line: We Indians invented them. You're welcome.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well my people invented circumcision. You're welcome!

name: Penny
line: Missy, I'm going to go get my nails done. Do you want to come?

name: Missy
line: God yes. Thanks.

name: Penny
line: You're welcome.

name: Missy
line: Bye guys.

name: Howard
line: Bye Missy.

name: Leonard
line: Bye Missy, see you.

name: Penny
line: Goodbye Leonard!

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah, no, uh, bye Penny.

name: Howard
line: Okay, you two have to back off.

name: Raj
line: Why should I back off, you back off dude.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me, this is my apartment and she's my roommate's sister.

name: Howard
line: So what, you've already got Penny.

name: Leonard
line: How do I have Penny? In what universe do I have Penny?

name: Howard
line: So I can have Penny?

name: Leonard
line: Hell, no!

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, can I interject something. I'm ordering pizza online, is everyone okay with pepperoni?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, can I talk to you in private?

name: Sheldon
line: I guess. Don't worry, I was going to order you cheeseless.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: That's okay. Lactose intolerance is nothing to be embarrassed about.

name: Howard
line: I'm a fancy Indian man, we invented pajamas!

name: Raj
line: Hey, look at me, I don't have a foreskin.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, are you aware that your sister is an incredibly attractive woman?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmmm? She certainly has the symmetry and low body fat that western culture deems desirable. It's noteworth that at other points in history, heavier women were the standard for beauty because their girth suggested affluence.

name: Leonard
line: That's fascinating, but I...

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't say it was fascinating, I said it was noteworthy.

name: Leonard
line: Alright, noted. But my point is that Koothrappali and Wolowitz... they're hitting on your sister.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Okay. You know, I don't want to criticise your rhetorical style but, we'd be a lot further along in this conversation if you'd begun with that thought.

name: Leonard
line: That's great, but I....

name: Sheldon
line: What I'm saying is that we took quite an unnecessary detour from what I now understand to be your thesis.

name: Leonard
line: Whatever. You have to do something about it.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: Because she's your sister.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand. Yes, we shared a uterus for nine months, but since then we've pretty much gone our own separate ways.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, uh.... oh, consider this. With your father gone, it is your responsibility to make sure that Missy chooses a suitable mate.

name: Sheldon
line: I hadn't considered that. We do share DNA.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh.

name: Sheldon
line: So there is the possibility, however remote, that resting in her loins is the potential for another individual as remarkable as myself.

name: Leonard
line: Exactly. And, you owe it to yourself and to posterity to protect the genetic integrity of your sister's future offspring.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. If someone wants to get at Missy's fallopian tubes, they'll have to go through me.

name: Raj
line: I am Shiva the destroyer, I will have the woman!

name: Howard
line: I'm warning you, I was judo champion at math camp.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright, that's enough juvenile squabbling, stop it, stop it I say. I'm going to settle this right now. Neither of you are good enough for my sister.

name: Howard
line: Who are you to decide that?

name: Leonard
line: He's the man of his family, you have to respect his wishes.

name: Sheldon
line: You're out too, by the way.

name: Leonard
line: Say what?

name: Sheldon
line: It's nothing personal, I'd just prefer if my future niece or nephew didn't become flatulent every time they eat an Eskimo pie.

name: Howard
line: What are you so happy about?

name: Raj
line: I'm not happy, it's the medication, I can't stop smiling.

name: Sheldon
line: Now that Leonard's made me aware of how high the genetic stakes are, we have to face the fact that none of you are suitable mates for my sister.

name: Howard
line: Wait a minute. Leonard made you aware of that?

name: Leonard
line: We all make mistakes, let's move on.

name: Raj
line: Excuse me, but I think you're missing a big opportunity here.

name: Sheldon
line: How so?

name: Raj
line: Everybody knows genetic diversity produces the strongest offspring. Why not put a little mocha in the family latte.

name: Sheldon
line: In principle you have a point, but as a practical matter, need I remind you that it takes experimental pharmaceuticals to simply enable you to speak to the opposite sex.

name: Raj
line: I think you're focussing entirely too much on the drugs.

name: Howard
line: Is it ‘cause I'm Jewish, ‘cause I'd kill my Rabbi with a porkchop to be with your sister.

name: Sheldon
line: This has nothing to do with religion. This has to do with the fact that you're a tiny, tiny man who still lives with his mother.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you are really being unreasonable.

name: Sheldon
line: Am I? Here. Eat this cheese without farting and you can sleep with my sister.

name: Missy
line: Oh really?

name: Sheldon
line: Oops.

name: Missy
line: Shelly, can I speak to you for a minute? Alone?

name: Sheldon
line: Why does everyone suddenly want to talk to me alone? Usually nobody wants to be alone with me.

name: Leonard
line: We all make mistakes, let's move on.

name: Missy
line: Okay. I'm not even going to ask why you're pimping me out for cheese. But since when do you care at all about who I sleep with?

name: Sheldon
line: Truthfully, I've never given it any thought, but it has been pointed out to me that you carry DNA of great potential.

name: Missy
line: What on earth are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: Let me explain. You see, I'm a superior genetic mutation, an improvement on the existing mediocre stock.

name: Missy
line: And what do you mean, mediocre stock?

name: Sheldon
line: That would be you. But residing within you is the potential for another me. Perhaps even taller, smarter and less prone to freckling, a Sheldon 2.0 if you will.

name: Missy
line: Sheldon 2.0?

name: Sheldon
line: Exactly. Now, I am not saying that I should be the sole decider of who you mate with. If you're not attracted to the suitor then the likelihood of conception would be reduced.

name: Missy
line: You have got to be kidding me!

name: Sheldon
line: Not at all. Frequent coitus dramatically increases the odds of fertiliziation.

name: Missy
line: Okay Shelly, sit down. Now I've lived my whole life dealing with the fact that my twin brother is, as Mom puts it, one of God's special little people.

name: Sheldon
line: I always thought I was more like a cuckoo bird. You know, a superior creature whose egg is placed in the nest of ordinary birds. Of course the newly hatched cuckoo eats all the food, leaving the ordinary siblings to starve to death. Luckily for you, that's where the metaphor ended.

name: Missy
line: I thought it ended at cuckoo. Now you listen to me, if you want to start acting like a brother who cares about me, then terrific. Bring it on. But you try one time to tell me who I should be sleeping with, and you and I are going to go round and round the way we did when we were little. Remember?

name: Sheldon
line: I have an alternate proposal.

name: Missy
line: Go on.

name: Sheldon
line: You donate eggs. We will place them in cryogenic storage. I will find an appropriate sperm donor for your eggs, have them fertilized and implanted in you, that way everybody wins.

name: Sheldon
line: Correction. Missy can date whoever she wants.

name: Howard
line: Look, we have to settle this.

name: Leonard
line: I agree. Sheldon's sister is hiding at Penny's because we've all been hitting on her at the same time.

name: Raj
line: She's not hiding. She needed privacy to call her grandmother who's apparently very sick. Oh, and then I believe she has to wash her hair.

name: Howard
line: Oh, you poor, deluded bastard.

name: Raj
line: Don't start with me dude.

name: Howard
line: You want to go again? Let's go.

name: Leonard
line: Sit down.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: If we're going to fight over Missy, let's do it the right way. The honourable way.

name: Leonard
line: And he's down!

name: Howard
line: Come on, come on, get up.

name: Leonard
line: Stay down, bitch. Yeah, ha ha, natural selection at work.

name: Sheldon
line: I weep for humanity.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me while I go tell Missy the good news.

name: Penny
line: Ah, hey Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hi Penny, how's it going. Listen, that guy Mike that you were dating, is that still going on?

name: Penny
line: Uh, pretty much, why?

name: Leonard
line: Nothing, just catching up. By the way, may I speak to Missy please?

name: Penny
line: Of course.

name: Missy
line: Hi, Leonard, what's up?

name: Leonard
line: Well, since you're leaving tomorrow I was wondering if you'd like to go out to dinner with me?

name: Missy
line: That's so sweet. But no thanks.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. You have other plans, or...?

name: Missy
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Alright uh... enjoy the rest of your evening.

name: Missy
line: Thanks. See you.

name: Leonard
line: Um, here's something we didn't anticipate.

name: Penny
line: What do you want, Howard?

name: Howard
line: I'm fine, thanks for asking. I've come to call on Missy.

name: Penny
line: Missy?

name: Missy
line: Hi Howard.

name: Howard
line: The amazing Howard. Do you like magic?

name: Missy
line: Not really. No.

name: Howard
line: Then you are in for a treat. Behold, an ordinary cane.  Da-dah!

name: Missy
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: Missy?

name: Raj
line: Thank you. I apprec....  apprec.... appreeee.... oh-oh.

name: Penny
line: Oh, honey, is your medication wearing off?

name: Missy
line: Oh, hi, cutie pie. I was hoping you'd show up.

name: Missy
line: We had a dog who made a noise like that. Had to put him down.

name: Missy
line: Any news you want me to pass along to Mom?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, she might be interested to know that I have refocused my research from bosonic string theory to heteronic string theory.

name: Missy
line: Yeah, I'll just tell her you said hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, well, it was pleasant seeing you, other than that business with my testicles.

name: Missy
line: Come on, Shelly.  I want you to know I'm very proud of you.

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: Missy
line: Yup, I'm always bragging to my friends about my brother the rocket scientist.

name: Sheldon
line: You tell people I'm a rocket scientist?

name: Missy
line: Well yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm a theoretical physicist.

name: Missy
line: What's the difference?

name: Sheldon
line: What's the difference?

name: Missy
line: Goodbye Shelly.

name: Sheldon
line: My God! Why don't you just tell them I'm a toll taker at the Golden Gate Bridge? Rocket scientist, how humiliating.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys, guys, some of the other waitresses wanted me to ask you something.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, it's called trestling.

name: Howard
line: It combines the physical strength of arm wrestling with the mental agility of tetris into the ultimate sport.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's terrific, but what they wanted me to ask you was to cut it the hell out.  Right come on guys, come on.  Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you...

name: Sheldon
line: We might as well stop, it's a stalemate. You're beating me in tetris, but you've got the upper body strength of a Keebler Elf.

name: Raj
line: Keebler Elf? I've got your Keebler Elf right here.  Okay, it's a stalemate.

name: Penny
line: So Leonard, will we be seeing you on Saturday for your free birthday cheesecake?

name: Sheldon
line: He can't eat cheesecake, he's lactose intolerant.

name: Penny
line: Okay, he can have carrot cake.

name: Sheldon
line: What about the cream cheese frosting.

name: Penny
line: he can scrape it off.

name: Leonard
line: Forget about the cake, how did you know that my birthday is Saturday?

name: Penny
line: I did your horoscope, remember, I was going to do everybody's until Sheldon went on one of his typical psychotic rants.

name: Sheldon
line: For the record, that psychotic rant was a concise summation of the research of Bertram Forer, who in 1948 proved conclusively through meticulously designed experiments, that astrology is nothing but pseudo scientific hokum.

name: Penny
line: Blah blah blah, a typical Taurus. So, seriously, are we going to see you Saturday?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I don't think so.

name: Penny
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: I don't celebrate my birthday.

name: Penny
line: Shuddup, yeah you do.

name: Leonard
line: No, it's no big deal, it's just the way I was raised. My parents focussed on celebrating achievements, and being expelled from a birth canal was not considered one of them.

name: Penny
line: Uh, that's so silly.

name: Sheldon
line: It's actually based on very sound theories, his mother published a paper on it.

name: Penny
line: What was it called, “I hate my son and that's why he can't have cake?”

name: Sheldon
line: It was obviously effective, Leonard grew up to be an experimental physicist. Perhaps if she'd also denied him Christmas he'd be a little better at it.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Howard
line: Well I love birthdays, waking up to Mom's special French Toast breakfast, wearing the birthday king crown, playing laser tag with all my friends.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, see, that's what kids should have.

name: Howard
line: Actually that was last year.

name: Penny
line: So you've really never had a birthday party?

name: Leonard
line: No. But it was okay. I mean, when I was little I'd think maybe my parents would change their mind, and surprise me with a party, like this one birthday I came home from my Cello lesson, and I saw a lot of strange cars parked out front, and when I got to the door I could hear people whispering, and I could smell German chocolate cake, which is my favourite.

name: Penny
line: And?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, it turns out my grandfather had died.

name: Penny
line: Oh my God, that's terrible.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, it was kind of like a birthday party. I got to see all my cousins and there was cake, so...7

name: Penny
line: That's the saddest thing I've ever heard.

name: Howard
line: You think? Go ahead, tell her about your senior prom.

name: Howard
line: Make sure they remember no peanuts.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, every Thai restaurant in town knows you can't eat peanuts. They see me coming they go “ah, no peanut boy!”

name: Sheldon
line: Hello Penny. Leonard just left.

name: Penny
line: I know. I want to talk to you.

name: Sheldon
line: What would we talk about? We've no overlapping areas of interest I'm aware of, and you know I don't care for chit-chat.

name: Penny
line: Okay, can you just let me in.

name: Sheldon
line: Well alright, but I don't see this as a promising endeavour.

name: Penny
line: Okay, here's the deal, we are going to throw Leonard a kick-ass surprise party for his birthday on Saturday.

name: Sheldon
line: I hardly think so, Leonard made it very clear he doesn't want a party.

name: Howard
line: Did someone say party?

name: Penny
line: He just doesn't know he wants one because he's never had one.

name: Howard
line: I suppose that's possible, but for the record, I've never had a threesome and yet I still know I want one.

name: Penny
line: Howard, here's the difference. The possibility exists that Leonard could have a birthday party before hell freezes over.

name: Howard
line: Fine. If I do have a threesome, you can't be part of it. I'm just kidding, yes you can. Can you bring a friend?

name: Sheldon
line: I think a birthday party is a terrible idea. I envy Leonard for growing up without that anguish.

name: Penny
line: Anguish?

name: Sheldon
line: Year after year, I had to endure wearing conical hats while being forced into the crowded sweaty hell of bouncy castles, not to mention being blindfolded and spun towards a grotesque tailless donkey as the other children mocked my disorientation.

name: Penny
line: Okay, sweetie, I understand you have scars that no non-professional can heal, but nevertheless we are going to throw Leonard a birthday party.

name: Sheldon
line: Have I pointed out that I am extremely uncomfortable with dancing, loud music and most other forms of alcohol induced frivolity.

name: Penny
line: Nevertheless we are....

name: Sheldon
line: In addition I really don't think that Leonard wants a...

name: Penny
line: Okay, here's the deal, you either help me throw Leonard a birthday party or, so help me God, I will go into your bedroom and I will unbag all of your most valuable mint condition comic books. And on one of them, you won't know which, I'll draw a tiny happy face in ink.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't do that, if you make a mark on a mint comic book it's no longer mint.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, do you understand the concept of blackmail?

name: Sheldon
line: Well of course I... oh! Yeah, I have an idea, let's throw Leonard a kick ass birthday party.

name: Sheldon
line: That's not the secret knock. This is the secret knock.

name: Howard
line: What difference does it make?

name: Sheldon
line: The whole point of a secret knock is to establish a non-verbal signal to verify the identity of one's co-conspirators.

name: Penny
line: Is that Raj and Howard?

name: Sheldon
line: Possibly, but unverified.

name: Howard
line: Can you just let us in.

name: Sheldon
line: Luckily for you this is not a nuclear reactor.

name: Penny
line: So, what did you get the birthday boy?

name: Howard
line: Well, Raj got him an awesome limited edition Dark Knight sculpture based on Alex Ross's definitive Batman, and I got him this amazing autographed copy of the Feynman lectures on physics.

name: Penny
line: Nice. I got him a sweater.

name: Howard
line: Okay, well, he might like that, I've seen him... chilly.

name: Penny
line: Uh, Sheldon, I didn't see your present.

name: Sheldon
line: That's because I didn't bring one.

name: Penny
line: Well why not?

name: Howard
line: Don't ask.

name: Sheldon
line: The entire institution of gift giving makes no sense.

name: Howard
line: Too late.

name: Sheldon
line: Let's say that I go out and I spend fifty dollars on you, it's a laborious activity, because I have to imagine what you need, whereas you know what you need. Now I can simplify things, just give you the fifty dollars directly and, you could give me fifty dollars on my birthday, and so on until one of us dies leaving the other one old and fifty dollars richer. And I ask you, is it worth it?

name: Howard
line: Told you not to ask.

name: Penny
line: Well, Sheldon, you're his friend. Friends give each other presents.

name: Sheldon
line: I accept your premise, I reject your conclusion.

name: Howard
line: Try telling him it's a non-optional social convention.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Howard
line: Just do it.

name: Penny
line: It's a non-optional social convention.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Fair enough.

name: Howard
line: He came with a manual.

name: Sheldon
line: Question, how am I going to get Leonard a present before the party? I don't drive, and the only things available within walking distance are a Thai restaurant and a gas station. I suppose I could wrap up an order of mee krob and a couple of lottery scratchers.

name: Penny
line: Okay, let's do this, um, I will drive Sheldon to get a present, and Howard, you need to get rid of Leonard for about two hours.

name: Howard
line: No problem.

name: Penny
line: And then Raj, you bring the stuff across the hall and start setting up.

name: Howard
line: What if guests show up?

name: Penny
line: Entertain them.

name: Howard
line: What if they're women?

name: Penny
line: Stare at them and make them feel uncomfortable.

name: Howard
line: Hey!

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: How's it going?

name: Leonard
line: Fine.

name: Howard
line: So, listen, the New Art is showing the revised definitive cut of Blade Runner.

name: Leonard
line: Seen it.

name: Howard
line: No, you've seen the 25th anniversary final cut. This one has eight seconds of previously unseen footage. They say it completely changes the tone of the film.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Pass.

name: Howard
line: Come on, afterwards there's a Q & A with Harrison Ford's body double.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I am in the Halo battle of my life here, there's this kid in Copenhagen, he has no immune system so all he does is sit in his bubble and play Halo 24/7.

name: Howard
line: Can't you play him some other time?

name: Leonard
line: Not if you believe his doctors.

name: Howard
line: Oh my God, do you smell gas.

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, no.

name: Penny
line: Alright, you know they have DVDs over there.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but they have DVD burners over here. Leonard needs a DVD burner.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, a gift shouldn't be something someone needs, it should be something fun, you know, something they wouldn't buy for themselves.

name: Sheldon
line: You mean, like a sweater?

name: Penny
line: Well, it's a fun sweater, it's got a bold geometric print.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it the geometry that makes it fun.

name: Penny
line: Okay, the point is, one of the ways we show we care about people is by putting thought and imagination into the gifts we give them.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, I see, so not a DVD burner.

name: Penny
line: Exactly.

name: Sheldon
line: Something he wouldn't buy for himself. Something fun. Something like... oh, an 802.11n wireless router.

name: Leonard
line: Here you go, Copenhagen boy, how about a taste of Hans Christian Hand Grenade.  Come on, come on, oh you clever little.... Come on, come on, take that!

name: Howard
line: Oh-oh.  Oh-oh!

name: Leonard
line: What's the matter?

name: Howard
line: This granola bar, there's peanuts in it.

name: Leonard
line: Oh my God, why did you eat it?

name: Howard
line: I don't know, it was just there.

name: Leonard
line: Well if I had a gun there, would you have shot yourself?

name: Howard
line: Don't yell at me, I've got to go to the emergency room.

name: Leonard
line: Now?

name: Howard
line: No, after my tongue has swollen to the size of a brisket.

name: Leonard
line: Alright, um, just, uh, let me get my keys.

name: Howard
line: Oh God, oh God, oh God, oh....  The laundry is out of the hamper.  Okay Sheldon, what was it supposed to be? Fine, it's out of the washer. I'll call you when it's in the dryer.

name: Leonard
line: Alright, let's go.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you think.

name: Penny
line: Um, that one.

name: Sheldon
line: Because of the two additional Ethernet ports.

name: Penny
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: He doesn't need them, he's already got a 640 connect switch

name: Penny
line: Oh, okay then this one.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: I don't know, the man on the box looks so happy.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny! If I'm going to buy Leonard a gift, I'm going to do it right. I refuse to let him experience the same childhood trauma I did.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I know I'm going to regret this but, what trauma?

name: Sheldon
line: On my twelfth birthday I really wanted a titanium centrifuge, so, you know, I could separate radioactive isotopes.

name: Penny
line: Of course.

name: Sheldon
line: Instead of a titanium centrifuge, my parents bought me... wow, this is hard. They got me... a motorised dirt bike.

name: Penny
line: No?

name: Sheldon
line: What twelve year old boy wants a motorised dirt bike?

name: Penny
line: All of them.

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Huh?

name: Penny
line: Okay, so we're getting this one?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I suppose.

name: Penny
line: Okay, let's go.

name: Random woman
line: Excuse me, do you know anything about this stuff?

name: Sheldon
line: I know everything about this stuff.

name: Woman
line: Okay, I have my own wholesale flower business, and I want to hook up my computer in the front entrance with the one in my refrigerated warehouse.

name: Penny
line: Here, buy this one. Look, it's the one we're getting, see, happy guy available.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, no, she doesn't want that, she needs a point to point peer network with a range extender.

name: Woman
line: Thank you.

name: Random guy
line: Which hard drive do I want, firewire or USB?

name: Sheldon
line: It depends on what Bus you have.

name: Guy
line: I drive a Chevy Cavalier.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear lord.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, we have to go.

name: Sheldon
line: Not now, Penny, this poor man needs me.  You hold on, I'll be right with you. What computer do you have, and please don't say a white one?

name: Howard
line: Excuse me.

name: Nurse
line: Fill this out, have a seat.

name: Howard
line: No, listen, see we're throwing my friend a surprise party and I'm supposed to keep him out of his apartment for two hours.

name: Nurse
line: Uh-huh, fill this out and have a seat.

name: Howard
line: No, see, the only way I could get him to leave is to tell him I ate a peanut. Because I'm allergic to peanuts.

name: Nurse
line: Oh, well in that case fill this out and have a seat.

name: Howard
line: Look, all I need from you is to take me in the back and give me a band-aid so I can pretend I had a shot of epinephrine and they you tell my friend you need to keep me under observation for about an hour, hour and a half.

name: Nurse
line: Is that all you need?

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Nurse
line: Get out of my ER.

name: Howard
line: No, you don't understand.

name: Nurse
line: Oh, I understand, but unfortunately this hospital is not equipped to treat stupid.

name: Howard
line: Okay, I get it, I know how the world works, how about if I were to introduce you  to the man who freed your people.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, sorry I couldn't find a parking spot, how are you doing.

name: Howard
line: Bad, very bad.

name: Leonard
line: Really, ‘cos you don't look like you're swelling up at all, maybe we should just pick up some benedryl at the drug store and go home.

name: Howard
line: We can't go home.

name: Leonard
line: Why not?

name: Howard
line: Becauth  Becauth-th-th. Brissket, Brissket! Water, need water.

name: Leonard
line: Alright, I'll be right back.

name: Howard
line: Penny, look, I've got a problem.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well so do I, look you've got to stall Leonard a little longer.

name: Howard
line: I don't think I can.

name: Penny
line: You have to, we all have to be there at the same time to yell “surprise!”

name: Howard
line: Okay, you have to understand something, we're in a hospital right now.

name: Penny
line: Why, is Leonard okay.

name: Howard
line: Leonard's fine. I'm fine, thanks for asking, by the way.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I don't need your attitude, just hold him there a little longer.

name: Howard
line: Look, I've done my best but he wants to go home and I don't know how to stop him.

name: Penny
line: Okay, how about this. You keep him there a little longer and when you get to the party I'll point out which of my friends are easy.

name: Howard
line: Don't toy with me, woman.

name: Penny
line: I've got a hot former fat girl with no self-esteem, I've got a girl who punishes her father by sleeping around and an alcoholic who's two tequila shots away from letting you wear her like a hat.

name: Howard
line: Thy will be done.  I'm doing this for you, little buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, we don't have that in stock, but I can special order it for you.

name: Penny
line: Him.

name: Assistant
line: Excuse me, sir, you don't work here.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, well, apparently neither does anyone else.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, we have to go.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: Well, for one thing, we're late for Leonard's birthday party. And for another, I told him to call security.

name: Sheldon
line: Good luck.  By the way, a six year-old could hack your computer system.

name: Penny
line: Keep walking.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, 1-2-3-4 is not a secure password.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me, my friend is having an allergic reaction to peanuts.

name: Nurse
line: No he's not.

name: Leonard
line: Yes he is.

name: Nurse
line: Look, sir we are very busy here and I just don't...  holy crap!

name: Howard
line: Pees hep me!

name: Nurse
line: Code 4, I need a gurney, right away, right away.

name: Howard
line: Fank-u.

name: Leonard
line: Say what you will about the healthcare system in this country, but when they're afraid of lawsuits they sure test everything.

name: Howard
line: I really don't think the colonoscopy was necessary.

name: Leonard
line: You know, before you got all swollen up, I actually thought you were trying to keep me out of the apartment so you could throw me a surprise party.

name: Howard
line: Oh, right, it's your birthday, I had no idea it was your birthday, I completely forgot, wow, what a lousy way to spend a birthday, well it's all over now.

name: Leonard
line: There is a party, isn't there.

name: Howard
line: Maybe.

name: Leonard
line: Howard.

name: Howard
line: Are you mad?

name: Leonard
line: how could I be mad? You actually risked your life because you cared about me.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, that's why I did it.

name: Leonard
line: Alright. Here we go. My first birthday party.

name: Raj
line: Dude! Everybody left an hour ago! Surprise!

name: Raj
line: Okay Leonard, here I am at your birthday party, I don't know where you are dude, but it's really kick-ass. Everyone is very very drunk, and uh...  Oh look, there's a girl taking her shirt off.

name: Penny
line: That's my friend Carol. Remind me, I've got to introduce her to Howard.

name: Raj
line: Oh sweet Krishna, shake it, that-a rupee maker.

name: Penny
line: I'm so sorry you didn't get your party.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, it's okay.

name: Penny
line: Happy birthday anyways.

name: Leonard
line: Hey Penny, when, uh, when's your birthday?

name: Sheldon
line: Wo de zhing shi Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: No, it's Wo de ming zi shi Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Wo de ming zi shi Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: What's this?

name: Sheldon
line: That's what you did. I assumed as in a number of languages that the gesture was part of the phrase.

name: Howard
line: Well it's not.

name: Sheldon
line: How am I supposed to know that? As the teacher it's your obligation to separate your personal idiosyncrasies from the subject matter.

name: Howard
line: You know, I'm really glad you decided to learn Mandarin.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: Once you're fluent you'll have a billion more people to annoy instead of me.

name: Leonard
line: Hey!

name: Sheldon
line: Mai du lui tsa.

name: Howard
line: You just called Leonard a syphilitic donkey.

name: Sheldon
line: My apologies Leonard, I'm only as good as my teacher.

name: Leonard
line: Why are you learning Chinese?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe the Szechuan Palace has been passing off orange chicken as tangerine chicken and I intend to confront them.

name: Leonard
line: If I were you, I'd be more concerned by what they're passing off as chicken.

name: Penny
line: I need to use your window.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah, no, sure, go ahead.

name: Penny
line: Hey Jerkface, you forgot your iPod!

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'll tell you what's going on, that stupid self-centred bastard wrote about our sex life in his blog.  Drop dead, you stupid self-centred bastard!  Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, where were we?

name: Howard
line: Not now, I have a blog to find.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, are you okay?

name: Penny
line: I'm fine, Leonard, just go away.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I understand that breaking up with someone can be very painful....

name: Penny
line: GO AWAY!

name: Leonard
line: Okay, feel better, bye.  She doesn't want to talk.

name: Sheldon
line: Not surprising. Penny's emotional responses originate from the primitive portion of the brain known as the Amygdala, while speech is centred in the much more recently developed Neocortex. The former can easily overpower the latter giving scientific credence to the notion of being rendered speechless.  Or maybe she just doesn't want to talk.

name: Raj
line: Hey, look, I found an iPod.

name: Howard
line: It's smashed beyond repair, what are you going to do with it?

name: Raj
line: What else? Sell it on ebay as slightly used.

name: Leonard
line: It was Penny's boyfriend's, they broke up.

name: Howard
line: Apparently he posted intimate details of their physical relationship on his blog, which I cannot find anywhere.

name: Leonard
line: You know what, I'm going to go back and try talking to her again.

name: Howard
line: Good idea. Sit with her, hold her, comfort her, and if the moment feels right, see if you can cop a feel.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not going to do that, Howard.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not aware of any social convention that requires you to intervene at all.

name: Leonard
line: What about “damsel in distress?”

name: Sheldon
line: Twelfth century code of chivalry, not exactly current. You'd also have to be knighted for that to apply.

name: Leonard
line: I don't care. She's upset, I'm going over there.

line: Not necessarily. I'm often surprised by my lack of familiarity with Leonard. Just the other day I discovered, he not only has a loofah, he hides it. Why do you suppose a man would be ashamed of having a loofah? I myself prefer to have my excess epithelial cells slough off naturally, but I don't condemn those who seek to accelerate the process.   And until recently I had no idea that despite his lactose intolerance, he can tolerate small amounts of non-fat ice cream without producing a noxious gas that I maintain in the right concentration could be weaponised.

line: But on the other hand, if things don't go well with Leonard, I risk losing a really good friend. I mean, I guess he's not looking for a fling, he's the kind of guy that gets into a relationship for, I don't know, like you would say light years.

Now, since no-one knows when or if the poison has been released, until the box is opened, the cat can be thought of as both alive and dead.

line: Hey Raj.  Hey, listen, I don't know if you heard about what happened last night with Leonard and Sheldon, but I'm really upset about it, I mean they just, they let themselves into my place, and then they cleaned it, I mean can you even believe that? How weird is that?

The hallmark of the great human experiment is the willingness to recognise one's mistakes. Some mistakes, such as Madame Curie's discovery of Radium turned out to have great scientific potential even though she would later die a slow, painful death from radiation poisoning.
