Now, before dinner, his host says, “who's up for a little Kryptonian tetherball?” Superman says “sure,” works up a sweat, comes back to Earth, his uniform now stained with indestructible Kryptonian perspiration.

name: Raj
line: Booya.

name: Sheldon
line: Superman would have taken his uniform to a Kandorian dry cleaner before he left the Bottle.

name: Raj
line: “Kandorian dry cl...” I give up, you can't have a rational argument with this man.

name: Howard
line: Hey, isn't that the guy who won the MacArthur genius grant last year? No, not all at once.

name: Raj
line: Then how?

name: Howard
line: Leonard. Now, Raj. Now, Sheldon.

name: Raj
line: I didn't get a good look. Can I go again?

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: It's David Underhill. So what?

name: Sheldon
line: So what? His observation of high-energy positrons has provided the first conclusive evidence for the existence of galactic dark matter.

name: Leonard
line: I have two words for you. The first is big, the other's whoop.

name: Sheldon
line: It is a big whoop. It made almost all the work you've done since you've been here completely useless.

name: Leonard
line: Did not.

name: Howard
line: Did, too.

name: Leonard
line: Did... okay, maybe  some of it, but, look, the guy was just in the right place, at the right time with the right paradigm-shifting reinterpretation of the universe. He got lucky.

name: Raj
line: In more ways than one. He's a very handsome man.

name: Howard
line: Doesn't do anything for me. If I was gonna go that way, I'm more of a Zac Ephron kinda guy.

name: Raj
line: Oh, yeah, like you have a shot with Zac Ephron.

name: David
line: Excuse me, Are you Leonard Hofstadter?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah.

name: David
line: I'm David Underhill.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, y-yeah.

name: David
line: Yeah, Dr. Gablehauser said if I wanted to set something up in the photomultiplier lab, that you'd be able to give me a hand?

name: Leonard
line: You want to work with me?

name: David
line: Well, if you have a little time, yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Wow, y-yeah, sure. Yeah, no problem. Uh, Here's my home number, here's my cell, here's my office, here's my parents' number up in New Jersey, they always know how to reach me. So...

name: David
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Congratulations on the MacArthur Grant, by the way. Big fan.

name: David
line: Thanks. I'll call you.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Bye-bye! What are you looking at?You've never seen a hypocrite before?

name: Raj
line: Trailing badly, Wolowitz needs a strike if he has any hopes of catching up with Sheldon Cooper, who is dominating in the ninth frame with a career-best 68.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, guys!

name: Howard
line: That doesn't count. Do over! Do over!

name: Sheldon
line: There are no do-overs in Wii bowling.

name: Howard
line: There are always do-overs when my people play sports.

name: Sheldon
line: Where were you that's more important than Wii bowling night?

name: Leonard
line: Actually, I was...

name: Sheldon
line: It's a rhetorical question. There is nothing more important than Wii bowling night.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, it's just a video game. And we suck at it.

name: Sheldon
line: Nice motivational speech from the team captain.

name: Howard
line: Where were you?

name: Leonard
line: I was working with Dave Underhill.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, “Dave.” Sounds like Leonard's got a new BFF.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, he's pretty cool. I mean, not only is he a brilliant scientist, but it turns out he's a Black Diamond skier, he collects vintage motorcycles, he plays in a rock band.

name: Howard
line: So? We're in a rock band.

name: Leonard
line: No, we play Rock Band on our X-Box.

name: Sheldon
line: Nice motivational speech from our lead guitarist.

name: Leonard
line: He's funny, too. He does this hysterical impersonation of Stephen Hawking having phone sex. What are you wearing? That's not, he does it better. Anyway, he said he was gonna take me to the gym tomorrow, so I'm gonna go practice my situps.

name: Raj
line: Whoa. Humongous man crush, dude.

name: Howard
line: Yep. It's officially a bro-mance.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Sheldon, are you and Leonard putting up a Christmas tree?

name: Sheldon
line: No, because we don't celebrate the ancient pagan festival of Saturnalia.

name: Penny
line: Saturnalia?

name: Howard
line: Gather round, kids, it's time for Sheldon's beloved Christmas special.

name: Sheldon
line: In the pre-Christian era, as the winter solstice approached and the plants died, pagans brought evergreen boughs into their homes as an act of sympathetic magic, intended to guard the life essences of the plants until spring. This custom was later appropriated by Northern Europeans and eventually it becomes the so-called Christmas tree.

name: Howard
line: And that, Charlie Brown, is what boredom is all about.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, thank you for that, but I got you and Leonard a few silly neighbour gifts, so I'll just put them under my tree.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait! You bought me a present?

name: Penny
line: Uh-huh.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would you do such a thing?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. ‘Cause it's Christmas?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Penny. I know you think you're being generous, but the foundation of gift-giving is reciprocity. You haven't given me a gift, you've given me an obligation.

name: Howard
line: Don't feel bad, Penny, it's a classic rookie mistake. My first Hanukkah with Sheldon, he yelled at me for eight nights.

name: Penny
line: Now, honey, it's okay.You don't have to get me anything in return.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course I do. The essence of the custom is that I now have to go out and purchase for you a gift of commensurate value and representing the same perceived level of friendship as that represented by the gift you've given me. It's no wonder suicide rates skyrocket this time of year.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you know what? Forget it. I'm not giving you a present.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's too late. I see it. That elf sticker says to Sheldon. The die has been cast, the moving finger has writ, Hannibal has crossed the Alps.

name: Howard
line: I know. It's funny when it's not happening to us.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I am very, very sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: No. No, I brought this on myself by being such an endearing and important part of your life. I'm going to need a ride to the mall.

name: Howard
line: It's happening to us.

name: Leonard
line: Ow! Ow!

name: David
line: Are you gonna make it?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I guess.

name: David
line: All right.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks for letting me try out your motorcycle.

name: David
line: No problem.

name: Leonard
line: I had no idea it was so heavy. The thing just fell right over on me, didn't it?

name: David
line: Yeah. Lucky for you it wasn't moving.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, Leonard. Ooh, are you okay?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. It's just a little motorcycle accident.

name: Penny
line: My God, how fast were you going?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. It's all such a blur.

name: David
line: Ha ha ha. Good one. He couldn't even get it started. Hi. Dave.

name: Penny
line: Hi. Penny. So it's your motorcycle?

name: David
line: Uh-huh.

name: Penny
line: Oh, is it okay?

name: David
line: It's fine.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, lucky for the bike it landed on my leg.

name: David
line: You mind giving me a hand with speed racer here?

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah. Yeah, sure. So, um, Dave, how do you know Leonard?

name: David
line: I'm a physicist.

name: Penny
line: Ha-ha. No, you're not.

name: David
line: Why is that so surprising?

name: Penny
line: Uh, well, it's just that the physicists I know are indoorsy and pale.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not indoorsy. I just wear the appropriate sun block because I don't take melanoma lightly.

name: Penny
line: So, are you and Leonard working on an experiment together?

name: David
line: Yeah, actually we are.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, we're examining the radiation levels of photomultiplier tubes for a new dark matter detector.

name: Penny
line: Uh, sweetie, sweetie, Dave was talking. You know, I love science.

name: Leonard
line: Since when?

name: Penny
line: Since always. Call me a geek, but I am just nuts for the whole subatomic particle thing.

name: David
line: The last thing I would ever call you is a geek.

name: Penny
line: Ha. Well, that's what I am, queen of the nerds.

name: David
line: Well, if you like, I could show you the lab we're working in. We've got some cool toys, you know, lasers and stuff.

name: Penny
line: You know, I have always wanted to see a big science lab.

name: Leonard
line: Since when?

name: Penny
line: Since always.

name: David
line: Leonard, are you okay here?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah. I guess.

name: David
line: How 'bout we go see it now? Maybe afterwards we take the bike up the coast, we grab a little bite to eat...

name: Penny
line: Um,yeah, yeah, that sounds great, let me just get my jacket.

name: David
line: Boy, she'll do, huh?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, if you like that type.

name: David
line: So, you and her?

name: Leonard
line: No, just neighbours.

name: David
line: Really. I don't know how you live next door to that without doing something about it.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, science is my lady.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Let's go.

name: David
line: All right. See you tomorrow, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: See ya. ‘Bye, Penny. Have fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes?  Did you forget your key?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't see anything in here a woman would want.

name: Howard
line: You're kidding. You've got lotions and bath oils and soaps, that's the estrogen hat trick.

name: Leonard
line: What it is is a cacophonous assault of eucalyptus, bayberry, cinnamon and vanilla. It's as if my head were trapped in the pyjamas of a sultan.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, if you don't like this stuff, let's just go next door and build her a bear.

name: Sheldon
line: I told you before, bears are terrifying.

name: Howard
line: Come on, bath stuff, it's perfect! You got a scented candle, a cleansing buff, spearmint and green tea scented bath oil, promotes relaxation.

name: Sheldon
line: That presupposes Penny is tense.

name: Raj
line: She knows you. She's tense. We all are. Buy a basket!

name: Howard
line: Excuse me, we're ready.

name: Sheldon
line: No, we're not. Let's say for a moment that I accept the bath item gift hypothesis, I now lay the following conundrum at your feet, which size?

name: Howard
line: This one. Let's go.

name: Sheldon
line: You put no thought into that.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry. Uh, this one. Let's go!

name: Sheldon
line: I have insufficient data to proceed. Excuse me, miss?

name: Assistant
line: Yes?

name: Sheldon
line: If I were to give you this gift basket, based on that action alone and no other data, infer and describe the hypothetical relationship that exists between us.

name: Assistant
line: Excuse me?

name: Sheldon
line: Here. Now, are we friends? Colleagues? Lovers? Are you my grandmother?

name: Assistant
line: I don't understand what you're talking about and you're making me a little uncomfortable.

name: Howard
line: See? Sounds just like you and Penny. We'll take it.

name: David
line: Hey, Leonard. Come, join us.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey, Dave. And Penny, what a surprise.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Leonard. Dave was just showing me around the university. You know, this place is unbelievable!

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I know. I've been offering to show you around for a year and a half. You always said you had yoga.

name: Penny
line: I never said that.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe I heard you wrong. A lot of words sound like yoga.

name: David
line: This is an amazing woman, Leonard. She has a curious and agile mind, not to mention being curious and agile in other respects.

name: Penny
line: Oh, shut up!

name: Leonard
line: Yes, please shut up. So, um, Dave, don't you think you and I should get back to the lab? You know, that dark matter isn't going to detect itself.

name: David
line: Actually, I was thinking about taking the afternoon off so I could work on another experiment with Penny.

name: Penny
line: Really? We're going to do an experiment?

name: David
line: Uh-huh. We're going to explore the effects of tequila shots on a gorgeous 22-year-old woman.

name: Penny
line: It's not an experiment! You saw what happened last night.

name: David
line: You ready to go?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Oh, can I drive the motorcycle?

name: David
line: Yeah, why not? You can't do any worse than Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: That's funny. By the way, my leg is killing me. Thanks for asking.

name: Sheldon
line: Mmm, great news, Leonard, I've solved my Penny gift dilemma.

name: Leonard
line: Yippee.

name: Sheldon
line: You see, the danger was that I might under or over-reciprocate, but I have devised a foolproof plan. See, I will open her gift to me first and then excuse myself, feigning digestive distress.

name: Leonard
line: Brilliant.

name: Sheldon
line: It is, isn't it? Is it okay if I hide them in your room? The smell makes me nauseated.

name: Leonard
line: Do whatever you want.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you, that's very gracious.     Gentlemen.

name: Howard
line: Why couldn't you have just done what Leonard did and get Penny a new boyfriend?

name: Leonard
line: My leg is killing me. Thanks for asking.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I have just one question for you. While I am perfectly happy with the way things are between us, you said that you didn't want to go out with me because I was too smart for you! Well, news flash, lady, David Underhill is ten times smarter than me! You'd have to drive a railroad spike into his brain for me to beat him at checkers! Next to him, I'm like one of those sign-language gorillas who knows how to ask for grapes! So, my question is, what's up with that?

name: Penny
line: Why are you yelling at me?

name: Leonard
line: Sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! Never mind, we're cool.

name: Penny
line: Dave is not smarter than you. He's an idiot.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Why would you say that?

name: Penny
line: Because a smart guy takes the nude photos of his wife off his cell phone before he tries to take nude photos of his girlfriend.

name: Leonard
line: He tried to take nude photos of you?

name: Penny
line: That's what you took from that? The guy is married!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. I'm so... oh, that's terrible.

name: Penny
line: And you, if you are so okay with the way things are between us, why are you so jealous?

name: Leonard
line: Well, uh, the important thing is he's married and that's terrible!

name: Penny
line: Nice save, genius. Eggnog?

name: Leonard
line: Lactose.

name: Penny
line: It's just rum. It stopped being eggnog like half an hour ago.

name: Leonard
line: Smooth.

name: Penny
line: Smoother than you.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, it's Christmas, just give me this one.

name: Penny
line: Okay, Merry Christmas.

name: Leonard
line: By the way, my leg is killing me. Thanks for asking.

name: Penny
line: Merry Christmas.

name: Leonard
line: Merry Christmas.

name: Penny
line: How's your leg?

name: Leonard
line: Very good, thanks for asking. Come on in.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, good, Penny, you're here to exchange gifts. You'll be pleased to know I'm prepared for whatever you have to offer.

name: Penny
line: Okay, here.

name: Sheldon
line: I should note I'm having some digestive distress, so, if I excuse myself abruptly, don't be alarmed. Oh, a napkin.

name: Penny
line: Turn it over.

name: Sheldon
line: To Sheldon, live long and prosper. Leonard Nimoy.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, he came into the restaurant. Sorry the napkin's dirty. He wiped his mouth with it.

name: Sheldon
line: I possess the DNA of Leonard Nimoy?!

name: Penny
line: Well, yeah, yeah, I guess. But look, he signed it.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you realize what this means? All I need is a healthy ovum and I can grow my own Leonard Nimoy!

name: Penny
line: Okay, all I'm giving you is the napkin, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Be right back.

name: Penny
line: Here. Open it.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, a gift certificate for motorcycle lessons. Very thoughtful.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and I checked. Not letting the bike fall on you while standing still is lesson one.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, then, I think you'll appreciate what I got you.

name: Penny
line: Okay. 101 Totally Cool Science Experiments for Kids.

name: Leonard
line: You know, 'cause you're so into science.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon! What did you do?!

name: Sheldon
line: I know! It's not enough, is it? Here.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, look! Sheldon's hugging me.

name: Leonard
line: It's a Saturnalia miracle.

name: Howard
line: All right, that's the last servo. Behold the Mobile Omnidirectional Neutralization and Termination Eradicator. Or...

name: All
line: MONTE.

name: Howard
line: Featuring one articulated razor-sharp killing saw, one polycarbonate grinding and flipping wheel, steel armour plate exoskeleton top and bottom, and enough horsepower to drive a 110 pounds of mechanized death from zero to holy crap in 4.8 seconds.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it wrong to say I love our killer robot?

name: Raj
line: As with my father, I both love and fear it.

name: Howard
line: All right, enough chitchat, let's destroy something.

name: Together
line: One, two, three, go.

name: Raj
line: Okay. What shall be first to taste the wrath of Monte?

name: Leonard
line: Maybe we should start small.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Ooh, perhaps today is the day we finally find out what's inside the Magic Eight Ball.

name: Sheldon
line: Did it when I was four. It's an icosahedral dye floating in tinted blue water.

name: Raj
line: Man, call spoiler alert before you say things like that.

name: Leonard
line: How about the toaster oven?

name: Sheldon
line: What did the toaster oven ever do to you?

name: Leonard
line: What did I ever do to Jimmy Mullins in the third grade? He still punched me in the face with my own fists. Sorry, you little nerd, you were just in the wrong boys' room at the wrong time.

name: Howard
line: Gentlemen, goggles.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, this is an auspicious moment. Yeah, like Robert Oppenheimer or Neil Armstrong, we need the appropriate words to mark this historic scientific event.

name: Raj
line: How about “Die, toaster, die”?

name: Leonard
line: That'll do it.

name: Raj
line: All right, what's next?

name: Penny
line: No, I think I'm just going to stay in tonight and do laundry.

name: Howard
line: Oh yeah, they still got the full Monte.

name: Penny
line: Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh?

name: Penny
line: What the hell?

name: Leonard
line: Killer robot. We built it.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, it almost killed me.

name: Sheldon
line: If it wanted to kill you, you'd be dead.

name: Penny
line: So, who exactly does it want to kill?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, are you unaware of the upcoming Southern California Robot Fighting League Round Robin Invitational?

name: Penny
line: You know, since I moved last year, not all my mail has been forwarded.

name: Howard
line: It's a big deal. There's an awards banquet and a dance afterward. Perhaps you'd like to come with me. I know the other fellas would be really excited to see a girl there.

name: Penny
line: How is it supposed to be a dance if I'm the only girl?

name: Howard
line: Well, that may be a slight exaggeration. You'd be the only doable girl.

name: Penny
line: You're a pig, Howard.

name: Howard
line: How is doable anything but a compliment?

name: Leonard
line: Howard, why don't we just work on the robot?

name: Howard
line: Please, Leonard, not now. Once again, Penny and I have begun our little tango.

name: Penny
line: Our tango?

name: Howard
line: The carnal repartee, the erotic to and fro. But as delicious as the appetizer might be, at some point we will have to succumb and eat the entree while it's still... hot.

name: Leonard
line: I'm begging you, stop talking.

name: Penny
line: Look, normally I can just ignore you. I mean, I get it, you're a little peculiar. You know, like Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, excuse me, Penny, but in this room, you're the one who's peculiar.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you might be right. But back to you. I know you think you're some sort of smooth-talking ladies' man, but the truth is, you are just pathetic and creepy.

name: Howard
line: Um, so what are you saying?

name: Penny
line: I am saying it is not a compliment to call me doable. It's not sexy to stare at my ass and say, “Ooh, it must be jelly 'cause jam don't shake like that.” And most important, we are not dancing a tango, we're not to'ing and fro'ing. Nothing is ever going to happen between us. Ever.

name: Howard
line: Wait a minute. This isn't flirting, you're serious.

name: Penny
line: Flirting? You think I'm flirting with you? I am not flirting with you, no woman is ever gonna flirt with you, you're just gonna grow old and die alone.

name: Howard
line: Thanks for the heads up.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, where you going?

name: Howard
line: I'm going home to live my creepy, pathetic life.

name: Leonard
line: Wow.

name: Penny
line: Well, someone had to say it.  What?

name: Leonard
line: He said maybe we should enter you in the killer robot competition.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Howard, the phone is ringing!

name: Howard
line: Here's a crazy idea, Ma, answer it!

name: Howard's Mother
line: Hello? All right, hold on. It's your friend, Leonard! He wants to know why you're not at school today!

name: Howard
line: I don't go to school, Ma. I work at a university.

name: Howard's Mother
line: That's a school! Now pick up the phone!

name: Howard
line: I don't want to talk to anybody.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Should I ask Leonard to bring over your homework?!

name: Howard
line: I don't have homework. I'm a grown man with a master's degree in engineering!

name: Howard's Mother
line: Excuse me, Mr. Fancy-Pants. Want me to get you a Popsicle?

name: Howard
line: Cherry, please!

name: Howard's Mother
line: I ate the cherry. All that's left is green.

name: Howard
line: You make me want to kill myself.

name: Raj
line: What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, now they're just yelling about Popsicles. Sounds like Penny really got to him.

name: Raj
line: I'm not surprised. Despite his hard and crusty shell, Howard is a very sensitive man. Do you know he writes poetry? Mostly about men from Nantucket and hermits named Dave, but he does it with real sensitivity.

name: Kripke
line: Hey, Hofstadter. Word around the pwasma wab is you built a wobot?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, we did, Kripke.

name: Sheldon
line: His name is Monte.

name: Kripke
line: Well, if you have any dewusions about entewing him against my wobot, the Kwipke Kwippler in the Southern California Wobot Fighting League Wound Wobin Invitational, aka the S.C.aw.F.L.aw.aw.I., his name is gonna be Swrap Metal.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, is that really necessary?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I believe it is. This is trash talk, and trash talk is a traditional component in all sporting events. Kripke, your robot is inferior and it will be defeated by ours because ours exceeds yours in both design and execution. Also, I'm given to understand that your mother is overweight.

name: Raj
line: Oh, snap.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, of course, if that is the result of a glandular condition and not sloth and gluttony, I withdraw that comment.

name: Raj
line: What difference does it make? Fat is fat.

name: Sheldon
line: There are boundaries.

name: Kripke
line: Tell you what, forget the S.C.aw.F.L.aw.aw.I., let's settle this woboto a woboto.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you mean?

name: Kripke
line: There's no guawantee we've gotta go against each other in the Wound Wobin, so let's thwow down. You know, unless you're afwaid.

name: Sheldon
line: We accept your challenge. Name a time and place.

name: Kripke
line: Tomowow, thwee o'clock, the kinetics wab.

name: Sheldon
line: Make it so.

name: Leonard
line: No, don't make it so. Barry, we can't fight you tomorrow, our engineer is incapacitated.

name: Kripke
line: What's wrong with him?

name: Raj
line: He's depressed because he's pathetic and creepy and he can't get girls.

name: Kripke
line: We're all pathetic and cweepy and can't get girls, that's why we fight wobots. If you're not there, you'll be exposed to widicule.

name: Raj
line: I'm curious, what part of America is that accent from?

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you got a minute?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, come on in. What's up?

name: Leonard
line: I need you to apologize to How...

name: Penny
line: Get out.

name: Leonard
line: Come on. Wolowitz won't come out of his house and we need him for a robot battle.

name: Penny
line: Well, then have the robot go and get him.

name: Leonard
line: The robot didn't hurt his feelings.

name: Penny
line: His feelings needed to be hurt.

name: Leonard
line: He's been in bed for two days.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, probably with a blow-up doll.

name: Leonard
line: He's not with a... does it really matter who or what he's with? The guy is devastated.

name: Penny
line: Oh, please, how could I possibly devastate Howard?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, don't take this as a criticism, but you kind of have that overexposed-to-gamma-rays thing going on.

name: Penny
line: What does that mean?

name: Leonard
line: You know, like, most of the time, you're the easygoing Bruce Banner, but then, when you get angry, you kind of turn into, like, you know, grrrrr!

name: Penny
line: I turn into a bear?

name: Leonard
line: Seriously? Gamma rays? Bruce Banner? You didn't get The Incredible Hulk from that? Never mind, just, please go talk to him.

name: Penny
line: And say what? That I didn't mean it, because I meant it.

name: Leonard
line: Well, maybe you can go at it from a different angle, like, um, you see a glimmer of goodness in him and you only said what you said because you want to nurture it and make it shine.

name: Penny
line: Oh, pthththth.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let's try it this way. Remember the day that we first met and you asked me to go to your boyfriend's apartment to get your TV back and he was nine feet tall and he took my pants off and you said... what was that? What did you say? Oh, yes, you said you owed me one.

line: Okay, look. Howard, I just want to apologize for some things that I have said. About you. I've been informed that you have feelings. And apparently, I have hurt them. So, I'm sorry. Howard.

name: Howard
line: And then, when I was 14, I met Marcy Grossman. She was so beautiful. She just got her braces off but they left a little of the overbite. It was so hot, like a sexy little chipmunk. I didn't have the courage to ask her out, but I dedicated a song to her at the ninth grade talent show.

line: I guess you'd say, what can make me feel this way, Marcy Grossman, Marcy Grossman, Marcy Grossman, Talkin' 'bout Marcy...

line: Grossman.

line: Hello. This is Sheldon Cooper. I'm leaving a message for Barry Kripke. Barry, It was pleasant seeing you today in the cafeteria. I saw that you purchased the chef's salad. line: Hello, Kripke. Yes, Sheldon Cooper here. It occurred to me you hadn't returned any of my calls because I hadn't offered any concrete suggestions for pursuing our friendship.
