line: You're right. It's Anything Can Happen Thursday, let's hit the clubs and meet hot women!

name: Raj
line: Here we go. Lock up your daughters! We're going to hit it and quit it.

name: Leonard
line: Or we could finish eating and go to the comic book store.

name: Raj
line: Also a good plan.

name: Howard
line: Alright, but next Anything Can Happen Thursday, we're definitely going to a bar.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, absolutely.

name: Raj
line: You heard that, Ladies' Night ladies? We're eventually coming for you!

name: Sheldon
line: Fascinating.

name: Penny
line: Oh hey, guys, where're you headed?

name: Sheldon
line: To the comic book store. You're probably thinking, the comic book store? On a Thursday? Why, I've fallen down the rabbit hole and into a land of madness. What you have failed to take into account, Penny, is that this is Anything Can Happen Thursday.

name: Penny
line: You got me. While you're there, could pick me up a few comics for my nephew's birthday?

name: Sheldon
line: I think you mean comic books. Comics are feeble attempts at humour featuring talking babies and anthropomorphized pets found traditionally in the optimistically named funny pages.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, could you pick me up a few comics for my nephew's birthday?

name: Leonard
line: Sure. What does he like?

name: Penny
line: I don't know, he's 13. Just pick out anything.

name: Sheldon
line: Just pick out anything? Maybe at the same time we can pick out a new suit for him without knowing his size, or pick out his career for him without knowing his aptitude, or pick out a new breakfast cereal without knowing his fibre requirements or his feelings about little marshmallows.

name: Penny
line: Spider-Man. Get him Spider-Man.

name: Sheldon
line: Amazing Spider-Man, Ultimate Spider-Man, Spectacular Spider-Man, The Marvelous Adventures of Spider-Man, Spider-Man 2099?

name: Penny
line: Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: You know this can go on all night, why don't you just come with us?

name: Penny
line: Ugh, that's what I was trying to avoid.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I forgot Sensational Spider-Man.

name: Penny
line: Oh, what a cute, little store. Everybody's staring at me.

name: Leonard
line: Don't worry, they're more scared of you than you are of them.

name: Penny
line: Unlikely. Here, what about this one for my nephew?

name: Sheldon
line: A superb choice.

name: Penny
line: Oh, great.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, provided he has already read Infinite Crisis and 52, and is familiar with the re-establishment of the DC multiverse.

name: Penny
line: What's a multiverse?

name: Sheldon
line: Get her out of here.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, I'll help you pick something.

name: Raj
line: That's right. She's with us. Guys like that are so pathetic.

name: Howard
line: Tell me about it. Look, a new Batman belt buckle.

name: Store clerk
line: Oh, hey, Leonard. Can I help you find something?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey, Stuart. This is Penny. She's looking for some comic books.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, really. Blink twice if you're here against your will.

name: Leonard
line: I think we're fine, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Let me know if you need anything.

name: Penny
line: Thanks. He seems like a nice guy.

name: Leonard
line: You mean for someone who's into comic books?

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, I just meant for... yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, just because people appreciate comic books doesn't make them weirdos. Stuart's a terrific artist. He went to the Rhode Island School of Design.

name: Penny
line: What about the guy over there in the superhero T-shirt tucked into his sweatpants?

name: Leonard
line: Ah, yeah, that's Captain Sweatpants. He doesn't really help the point I'm trying to make.

name: Howard
line: Let it go, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Why should I let it go? I saw it first.

name: Howard
line: Yes, but I saw it from the front.

name: Sheldon
line: A far less impressive feat.

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on! I need this for my Batman collection.

name: Sheldon
line: I need it for my Robin collection.

name: Howard
line: Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock?

name: Sheldon
line: Why would I gamble? It's mine. Let go.

name: Howard
line: You let go.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you!

name: Leonard
line: Problem?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, he won't let go of my comic book.

name: Howard
line: It's my comic book!

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, we need a ruling.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, cut it in half?

name: Penny
line: Excuse me.

name: Stuart
line: Hello again.

name: Penny
line: Hi. What would you recommend as a present for a 13-year-old boy?

name: Stuart
line: A 13-year-old girl. But if you're dead set on a comic book, try this.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Hellblazer. What's this about?

name: Stuart
line: A morally ambiguous confidence man who smokes, has lung cancer and is tormented by the spirits of the undead.

name: Penny
line: Well, if that doesn't make me the favourite aunt, I don't know what will. Is this me?

name: Stuart
line: Depends. Do you like it?

name: Penny
line: It's really good.

name: Stuart
line: Yes, that's you.

name: Penny
line: That's so sweet, but what if I didn't like it?

name: Stuart
line: It'd still be you, but I'd feel like an idiot.

name: Leonard
line: I don't believe it. Stuart's putting the moves on Penny.

name: Howard
line: I have got to learn how to draw. Hey!

name: Sheldon
line: Once again, defeated by your own prurient interests.

name: Raj
line: Guys, have you seen Stuart all up in Penny's business over there?

name: Leonard
line: Nobody's up in anybody's business, let's just buy our stuff and go.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you've got my number, now, give me the picture.

name: Stuart
line: You drive a hard bargain, but here.

name: Penny
line: All right. So, um, just give me a call.

name: Sheldon
line: So, Leonard, how are you enjoying Anything Can Happen Thursday?

name: Sheldon
line: Look at that, that's a dent. Thank you, Howard Ham-Fisted Wolowitz. Did you just shut the TV off in the middle of the classic Deep Space Nine/Star Trek The Original Series Trouble With Tribbles crossover episode?

name: Leonard
line: Apparently so.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you ill?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Then is it fair to say that you're experiencing some sort of emotional turmoil over the events involving Penny earlier this evening?

name: Leonard
line: When did you pick up on that?

name: Sheldon
line: A moment ago, when you turned off the TV in the middle of }during the classic Deep Space Nine/Star Trek The Original Series Trouble With Tribbles crossover episode. Would you like some advice?

name: Leonard
line: Sure, why not?

name: Sheldon
line: Then, this is the perfect time to launch a blog with an interactive comments section.

name: Leonard
line: Gee, thanks a lot.

name: Sheldon
line: Would you rather I offer my personal insight?

name: Leonard
line: I don't need any insights. I just want to know why Penny's more interested in Stuart than me. We're practically the same guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I disagree. Stuart is taller, artistic, self-employed and, most significantly, he gets 45 percent off comic books.

name: Leonard
line: You're right, I really should be asking strangers on the Internet.

name: Sheldon
line: My original point.

name: Sheldon
line: Chinese food, vintage video games. After the nightmare of Anything Can Happen Thursday, this is Friday night the way it was meant to be.

name: Howard
line: Who's up for Sheldon-Free Saturday?

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey guys.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Penny... and Stuart, hey Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, guys.

name: Howard
line: So what are you kids up to?

name: Penny
line: Uh, Stuart has a piece in an art show that's opening tonight.

name: Leonard
line: And you guys are going together, great...

name: Stuart
line: It is great. Really great. Freaking awesome. What are you guys doing?

name: Penny
line: It's Friday night, that means Chinese food and vintage video games, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Vintage doesn't even begin to describe what we have planned. Tonight, we are playing the classic 1980 interactive text adventure, Zork. It's the buggy beta version.

name: Penny
line: Wow, Zork. Well, you guys have fun.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, see you guys.

name: Howard
line: See you, Stuart.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Howard?

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: Take me to a bar with women.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Okay! Let me just go inside and slip off my underwear.

name: Leonard
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: Well, if I get lucky, I don't want to be caught in my Aquaman briefs.

name: Leonard
line: Do you...?  Let's go.

name: Raj
line: May I have a grasshopper with a little umbrella, please?

name: Howard
line: No, he may not.

name: Raj
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: I'm not sitting here with a guy drinking a grasshopper with a little umbrella.

name: Raj
line: Fine. I'll have a chocolate martini.

name: Howard
line: Wrong again!

name: Raj
line: Come on, you know I can't talk to women unless I'm lit up like the Hindu festival of Diwali.

name: Howard
line: Look, there are plenty of bars in Los Angeles where you can order grasshoppers and chocolate martinis, but you wouldn't have to because there are no women in them.

name: Raj
line: Gotcha. I'll have a Brandy Alexander.

name: Howard
line: All right, the Three Musketeers just became the Dynamic Duo.

name: Leonard
line: Should we talk to some of these women?

name: Howard
line: It's way too early in the night for that. See, first we let the lawyers and the jocks thin the herd, and then we go after the weak and the old and the lame.

name: Leonard
line: That's your system?

name: Howard
line: That's my system. Oh, and if you spot a chick with a Seeing Eye dog, she's mine.

name: Penny
line: Oh come on. I think it's nice that Captain Sweatpants showed up to your art opening.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, it would have been nicer if he hadn't touched all the cheese.

name: Penny
line: Um, you know, it's kind of early. Do you want to maybe come in for some coffee or something?

name: Stuart
line: Oh, gee, it's a little late for coffee, isn't it?

name: Penny
line: Oh, you think coffee, means coffee, that is so sweet. Come on, I think I have decaf.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good, Stuart, I thought I heard your voice. Do you have a moment?

name: Stuart
line: Uh, yeah, I guess.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, we're a little busy here, so...

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing?

name: Stuart
line: We're having coffee.

name: Sheldon
line: Isn't it a little late for coffee?

name: Stuart
line: It's okay. She thinks she has decaf.

name: Penny
line: I'll just go look for it.

name: Stuart
line: What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I've spent the last three hours in an online debate in the DC Comics Batman chatroom, and I need your help.

name: Stuart
line: Oh yeah. Those guys can be very stubborn. What's the topic?

name: Sheldon
line: I am asserting, in the event that Batman's death proves permanent, that original Robin, Dick Grayson, is the logical successor to the Bat Cowl.

name: Stuart
line: Ooh, Sheldon, I'm afraid you couldn't be more wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: More wrong? Wrong is an absolute state and not subject to gradation.

name: Stuart
line: Of course it is. It's a little wrong to say a tomato is a vegetable, it's very wrong to say it's a suspension bridge. But returning to the original issue, Dick Grayson became Nightwing, a superhero in his own right. Batman 2 has to be the second Robin, Jason Todd.

name: Sheldon
line: Has to be? Has to be? I hope you're being deliberately provocative.

name: Penny
line: I found the decaf!

name: Stuart
line: Oh, great!

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, herbal tea for me, please.

name: Raj
line: Barkeep! Alexander me.

name: Leonard
line: How about those two?

name: Howard
line: Nah, they're eating peanuts, and my allergies, one kiss would put me in Cedar-Sinai for a week.

name: Leonard
line: What about the ones in the corner?

name: Howard
line: Possible, very possible. Do you want the one in the whiplash collar or the one who keeps blinking?

name: Leonard
line: I think Blinky's cute.

name: Howard
line: You got it, sir.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, so we just go over there?

name: Howard
line: No, we have a little prep work to do. Put this in your mouth. We walk past them, you stumble a bit. I say, sorry, my friend's had a little too much, and then I start to pull it out of your mouth and say, a little too much fun. Get it? I mean, they're laughing, we're laughing, and then we get them up to about a .15 blood alcohol level, and tell them we're millionaires.

name: Leonard
line: What else you got?

name: Howard
line: Depends. Are you willing to sit on my lap and pretend to be a ventriloquist dummy?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: I can't sit on your lap, you don't know the routine.

name: Stuart
line: I'm sorry, but you're obviously stuck in a pre-Zero Hour DC universe.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course I am. Removing Joe Chill as the killer of Batman's parents effectively deprived him of his raison d'être.

name: Stuart
line: Okay, you can throw all the French around you want, it doesn't make you right.

name: Sheldon
line: Au contraire.

name: Stuart
line: Plus, you're forgetting that the Infinite Crisis storyline restored Joe Chill to the Batman mythology.

name: Sheldon
line: I am forgetting nothing and I resent your tone.

name: Stuart
line: Okay, look, Sheldon, it's late and I've got to get some sleep.

name: Sheldon
line: So, I win.

name: Stuart
line: No, I'm tired.

name: Sheldon
line: So, I win.

name: Stuart
line: Fine. You win.

name: Sheldon
line: Darn tootin', I win.

name: Stuart
line: Penny, I really had a terrific time. Penny?

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, no, don't wake her. She'll maul you like a rabid wolverine.

name: Stuart
line: You know, I don't think that was decaf.

name: Howard
line: Wait, is this your card or isn't it? Trust me, this was their card.

name: Leonard
line: I thought you were good at this. You're always talking about how you go to bars and meet women.

name: Howard
line: I do, all the time.

name: Leonard
line: Well, what happened? We've been sitting here all night and the longest conversation you've had with a woman was when your mom called.

name: Howard
line: Wow, you're just going to make me come out and say it, aren't you?

name: Leonard
line: Say what?

name: Howard
line: You're weighing me down. I'm a falcon who hunts better solo.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. I'll sit here. You take flight and hunt.

name: Howard
line: Don't be ridiculous, you can't just tell a falcon when to hunt.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, you can. There's a whole sport built around it. Falconry.

name: Howard
line: Shut up. Let's just get Koothrappali and go.  Lucky bastard. It's got to be that stupid accent of his.  Hello. I am Sanjay Wolowitz from Bombay. Okay, I'm stumped.

name: Howard
line: Okay, are you from Star Wars universe?

name: Leonard
line: Yes

name: Howard
line: Were you in the original trilogy?

name: Leonard
line: Yes

name: Howard
line: Is there a picture of you in my wallet wearing a metal bikini?

name: Leonard
line: God, I hope not. And no, I'm not Princess Leia.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay, okay, my turn. Are you in the six Star Wars movies?

name: Leonard
line: Yes

name: Raj
line: Interesting. Are you a Droid?

name: Leonard
line: Yes

name: Raj
line: Do you kind of look like a shiny Sheldon?

name: Leonard
line: Yes

name: Raj
line: C3PO.

name: Leonard
line: You got it.

name: Sheldon
line: That's preposterous. I do not resemble C3PO. Don't get me wrong, I'm flattered, I just don't see it.

name: Howard
line: Leslie Winkle. You've reached friends with benefits. For a booty call, press one now.

name: Sheldon
line: What exactly does that expression mean, friends with benefits? Does he provide her with health insurance?

name: Leonard
line: No. Look, imagine you maintained a friendship with someone you had sex with, but you were free to date whoever you wanted.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, I can't imagine any of that.

name: Leonard
line: Alright, back to the game.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe it's my turn, you may begin your questions whenever you're ready.

name: Raj
line: Are you Spock?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't like this game.

name: Howard
line: So, where were we?

name: Raj
line: Aren't you leaving for your booty call?

name: Howard
line: No, it was something else. Why does everything have to be about sex with you? Come on. Who's turn is it?

name: Leonard
line: We were up to you.

name: Howard
line: Great, just start.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let's see. Are you from a TV series?

name: Howard
line: She dumped me!

name: Sheldon
line: I bet he's someone from Babylon 5, we're never going to guess.

name: Raj
line: What happened with Leslie, why did she dump you?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. She just said Howard, momma's a rolling stone. And then her call waiting beeped and she was gone.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand. If you were in a non-emotional relationship then why are you having  what appears be an emotional response?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, he obviously had feelings for her.

name: Howard
line: Of course I had feelings for her, I saw her naked for God's sake!

name: Leonard
line: Okay, uh look, you just need to get your mind off it. Do you want to go to the comic book store? Maybe go see a movie?

name: Howard
line: I don't want to go anywhere.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, I'm given to understand that there is an entire city in Nevada designed specifically to help people like Howard forget their problems. Where  you can replace them with new problems such as alcoholism, gambling addiction and sexually transmitted diseases.

name: Raj
line: Is it me, or was that Sheldon's way of saying Vegas baby!

name: Leonard
line: I've never been there, have you?

name: Raj
line: Me? No. I just got Vegas baby from Vince Vaughn in Swingers. .

name: Howard
line: It could be fun. I know my weekend's wide open, now that...

name: Leonard
line: Okay, then let's do this, lets go to Las Vegas.

name: Howard
line: Now? Right now?

name: Leonard
line: Why not? People do things right now all the time. Why can't we be right now people too. Go home, pack a bag and we'll be right now people. I have to stop at the drug store to refill a prescription, but after that we'll go right now.

name: Raj
line: What do you say, Howard?

name: Howard
line: I say Vegas baby!

name: Raj
line: What are you going to tell your mother?

name: Howard
line: Sea World, baby!

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Sheldon, are you coming?

name: Sheldon
line: I'd rather have a blowfly lay eggs and hatch larvae in my auditory canal.

name: Leonard
line: Great, we'll bring you back a tee-shirt.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Hello, neighbour.

name: Penny
line: Hello, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: And how are you doing this fine evening?

name: Penny
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. I'm glad.

name: Penny
line: Really? Are you drunk?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm just in a good mood. While my compatriots are in Las Vegas, I will be enjoying a blissful evening in my personal Fortress of Solitude.

name: Penny
line: That's Superman's big ice thing, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Do you know, I'm such a good mood, I'm actually finding your tenuous grasp of the English language folksy and charming today.

name: Penny
line: Mmm, what smells so good?

name: Sheldon
line: That is the intoxicating aroma of Kadhai Paneer, a perfect culinary representation of the freedom this evening holds. Not only is it Indian cuisine, which Koothrappali loathes, it contains a generous helping of peanuts, which would reduce Wolowitz to a wheezing 97 pound blister. And finally, it's main ingredient is Paneer, a farmer's cheese which would cause Leonard to render any room uninhabitable within minutes.

name: Penny
line: Yum. Well, enjoy your big evening.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny. I realize you are also on your own tonight, so if at some point you find yourself with nothing to do, please do not disturb me.

name: Penny
line: Have fun, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I shall.  No!

name: Penny
line: What's wrong, Superman? Locked out of your big ice thingy?

name: Raj
line: Look at this, mouthwash, lotion, body wash, shampoo and conditioner together in one tiny bottle. I love Las Vegas.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, could I borrow some after shave?

name: Howard
line: Black case, top compartment.

name: Leonard
line: That is a lot of cologne.

name: Howard
line: First row are your musks, second is wood, leathers and botanicals, third is assorted pheromones, tread lightly.

name: Raj
line: That's the spirit, Howard. Yes, we can.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, let's go.

name: Howard
line: You guys go ahead, I just have to finish up an email.

name: Leonard
line: That's not an email, that's Leslie's facebook page.

name: Howard
line: Okay, fine, I'm checking her facebook page, look at her status update, she's saying she dumped me, people need to know I dumped her.

name: Raj
line: But she did dump you.

name: Howard
line: Grow up, Raj,there's no place for truth on the internet. Just go, I'll catch up with you.

name: Leonard
line: Alright.

name: Raj
line: Oh, we should have a plan in case one of us gets lucky.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, uh, if I get lucky I'll take her to my stately manor outside Gotham City, and if you get lucky, I'll sleep on the moon.

name: Raj
line: Sounds like a plan.

name: Penny
line: Hang on, I think the emergency key is around here somewhere.

name: Sheldon
line: We have a bowl. Our keys go in a bowl. You should get a bowl.

name: Penny
line: So, how did the beautiful mind of Sheldon Cooper forget his key in the first place.

name: Sheldon
line: I left them in the bowl.

name: Penny
line: Oh-oh. I just remembered where the emergency key is.

name: Sheldon
line: Where?

name: Penny
line: In your apartment.

name: Sheldon
line: What's it doing in my apartment?

name: Penny
line: Well, I went in there a few weeks ago when you guys weren't home, and I forgot it there.

name: Sheldon
line: You were in my... why would you... what are you saying?

name: Penny
line: It's not a big deal, I was making coffee and I ran out of milk.

name: Sheldon
line: You're the milk thief! Leonard said I was crazy but I knew that carton felt lighter.

name: Penny
line: Alright, Sheldon, let's just calm down and we'll call the building manager, he'll come open your door, you just eat your dinner here while you're waiting.

name: Sheldon
line: Eat? My dinner? In your apartment?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, why not?

name: Sheldon
line: Sure, why not? And after the sun's down we can all pile in my pick-up and go skinny-dipping down at the creek. ‘Cause today's the day to stop making sense.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks.

name: Raj
line: I'm telling you, Leonard, video slot machines, free drinks brought to us by a bosomy barmaid and all you can eat shrimp for $3.95. Disneyland can suck it. This is the real happiest place on earth.

name: Leonard
line: Dude, check it out. That's laundry for a month!

name: Woman
line: Hi.

name: Raj
line: Hello.

name: Woman
line: What's your name?

name: Raj
line: Rajesh Ramayan Koothrappali.

name: Woman
line: Hello Rajesh Ram... Hi, Rajesh, I'm Michaela.

name: Raj
line: Hello, Michaela.

name: Michaela
line: So, are you interested a little party?

name: Raj
line: Why, yes, I love to party. Party is my middle name. Or it would be, if it weren't Ramayan.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, Raj, can I, can I talk to you for a moment.

name: Raj
line: Not now, Leonard, Michaela's inviting me to a party. You better call the moon and you make sure that they have a bed for you.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I really need to talk to you.

name: Raj
line: Excuse me, I'll be right back. Don't go anywhere. Don't move. Just stay the beautiful unspoiled American flower that you are.  What's wrong with you dude, that woman was all up in my jammy.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I hate to break this to you and whatever your jammy is, but, I'm pretty sure she is a prostitute.

name: Raj
line: What? No. ..

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let me put it this way, in your entire life, how many gorgeous women have walked straight up to you in a bar and asked if you wanted to party.

name: Raj
line: Maybe I can save her.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe, but I'm guessing it will cost you about $500 an hour to try.

name: Raj
line: It was lovely meeting you, best of luck in your future endeavours.

name: Michaela
line: Whatever.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I miss her already.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Howard's losing it. Check out his latest twitters. “I'm at the bottom of a black hole staring into the abyss. My life is meaningless, my future is without hope.”

name: Raj
line: Why don't we take him to see the Blue Man Group?

name: Leonard
line: You think that'd help?

name: Raj
line: USA Today calls them exuberant fun for the whole family.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, Howard isn't really the family fun kind of guy.

name: Raj
line: It's too bad he wasn't here for that hooker. She's exactly his type. A hooker. You know, I bet if we hired her, that would cheer him up.

name: Leonard
line: We're not going to get Wolowitz a hooker.

name: Raj
line: “I'm so lonely and horny I may open this $20 jar of peanuts and end it all.”

name: Leonard
line: Suppose it wouldn't hurt to get an estimate.

name: Sheldon
line: So, how was your day?

name: Penny
line: Are you trying to make small talk? Oh, sweetie, you really don't have to.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's the accepted convention. How was your day?

name: Penny
line: Well, uh, they shifted my schedule around at the restaurant so my hours are going to be a little different...

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, that's not going to interest me at all, just eat.

name: Raj
line: Hello again.

name: Michaela
line: Oh, hi.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, hi, listen, m, if you're not busy, well, w-we were thinking you could... well, we were wondering...

line: If you're really a prostitute.

line: No.

line: Okay, great. Um... uh, the thing is, we've got this friend, and he's kind of down in the dumps, and we thought that maybe you could cheer him up.

line: I think she knows what I meant.

line: How can she when you beat around the bush. She's from the mean streets where they shoot from the hip and keep it real.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, terrific. Um, uh, listen, is there a way that we can do this where he doesn't know that you're a... you know...

line: Okay, that's question 20, you have to guess.

line: How can one person be a whole movie?

line: Fine. I was Spock. Are you and Leonard friends with benefits.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you and Leonard friends with benefits?

line: Where did that even come from, did he say we were?

line: No, Leonard said nothing, but who knows what goes on over here when he pretends your mail was misdelivered.

name: Penny
line: No, just mail, no benefits.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm, I see.

name: Penny
line: Why are you asking?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm curious about the whole social construct. On its face, the idea of satisfying ones sexual appetite, assuming one is afflicted with such, without emotional entanglement, that seems eminently practical. What I've observed, however, is Howard Wolowitz crying like a little girl.

name: Penny
line: Well, some people just can't handle that kind of relationship.

name: Sheldon
line: Can you?

name: Penny
line: Excuse me?

name: Sheldon
line: Are you able to have sex with men without developing an emotional attachment?

name: Penny

name: Sheldon
line: Is this conversation making you uncomfortable?

name: Penny
line: Of course it's making me uncomfortable, can't you tell?

name: Sheldon
line: I really have no idea. I don't particularly excel at reading facial expressions, body language...

name: Penny
line: I'm uncomfortable, Sheldon!

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you, that's very helpful.

name: Howard
line: Alright, where are these amazing shrimp?

line: Behold?

name: Howard
line: Seriously, you think this is the size of a baby's arm?

name: Howard
line: I'm going back to the room.

name: Michaela
line: Boy, would it maybe kill them to put out a nice brisket?

line: Hi there, Howard Wolowitz.

name: Michaela

name: Penny
line: I don't think the manager's coming tonight so, here.

line: Are you suggesting I sleep on the couch.

name: Penny
line: Well, it wasn't the first suggestion that came to mind, but it's the one I'm going with.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't sleep on your couch. I sleep in a bed. And given it's dimensions I have no intention of living out E.M. Snickering's beloved children's book , The Tall Man From Cornwall.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: There was a tall man from Cornwall whose length exceeded his bed. My body fits on it, but barely upon it, there's no room for my big Cornish head.

name: Penny
line: Oh, alright. I will give you my bed on one condition. That you promise to zip your hole for the next eight hours.

name: Sheldon
line: May I say one last thing.

name: Penny
line: Only if it doesn't rhyme.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright. Goodnight.

name: Michaela
line: Turn ons. Let me see. Reading a good book in front of the fire. Long walks on the beach. Getting freaky on the Sabbath with a bacon cheeseburger.

name: Howard
line: Really, me too.

name: Michaela
line: Oy gevalt, you're hot.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Excuse me for a moment.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, how's it going.

name: Howard
line: Cut the crap, you set this up, didn't you?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

line: She's a hooker, isn't she.

line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny

name: Sheldon
line: I can't sleep. how are you going?

name: Penny
line: Maybe that's because your hole is still open.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm homesick.

name: Penny
line: Your home is twenty feet from here.

name: Sheldon
line: Twenty feet, twenty light years, it doesn't matter. It's in a galaxy far, far away.

name: Penny
line: Damn it. What do you want me to do

name: Sheldon
line: Sing soft kitty.

name: Sheldon

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose we can stay up and talk.

name: Penny
line: Soft kitty, warm kitty, little ball of fur. Happy kitty, um...

line: No. Start over.

name: Penny
line: Soft kitty, warm kitty, little ball of fur. Happy kitty, sleepy kitty, purr, purr, purr.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for letting me stay here.

name: Penny
line: Oh, you're welcome sweetie.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, I'm sleepy now, get out.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good, you're finally home.

name: Leonard
line: What were you doing at Penny's?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, we had dinner, uh, played some games, and then I spent the night. Oh, you'll be happy to know that I now have a much better understanding of friends with benefits.

name: Sheldon
line: Smell that? That's the smell of new comic books. Oh, yes!

name: Howard
line: They're on me today, boys.

name: Raj
line: You're paying? Have you been selling your sperm again?

name: Howard
line: No, I'm celebrating. As we speak, the space shuttle is docking at the International Space Station where it will deploy the Wolowitz Zero-Gravity Waste Disposal System.

name: Raj
line: Oh, get over yourself, it's a high-tech toilet.

name: Leonard
line: Just think. Thanks to your hard work, an international crew of astronauts will boldly go

name: Howard
line: Is that supposed to be funny?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe it is. The combination of the Star Trek reference and the play on words involving the double-meaning of the verb to go suggests that Leonard is humorously mocking your efforts in space plumbing.

name: Howard
line: Okay, make your little jokes, but of the four of us, I'm the only one making any real-world contribution to science and technology.

name: Raj
line: He's right. This is an important achievement, for two reasons. Number one, and, of course, number two.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, clever! Playing on the use of cardinal numbers as euphemisms for bodily functions.

name: Stuart
line: Here, Sheldon, I pulled the new Hellboy for you. It's mind-blowing.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, spoiler alert.

name: Stuart
line: I didn't spoil anything.

name: Sheldon
line: You told me it's mind-blowing, so, my mind is going into it pre-blown. And once a mind is pre-blown, it cannot be re-blown.

name: Stuart
line: I'm sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Said the Grinch to Christmas.

name: Stuart
line: Uh, hey, Leonard, can I talk to you about something?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, sure, what's up?

name: Stuart
line: Remember I went out with your friend Penny a couple weeks ago?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, vaguely.

name: Raj
line: Sure you remember. You went to the bar and made a fool of yourself trying to pick up strange women.

name: Leonard
line: What about it?

name: Stuart
line: Well, uh, the thing is, the date didn't go that well.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, too bad. I guess the thing to do now is just pick yourself up, dust yourself off, forget it and move on.

name: Stuart

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, Stuart. Have you read the new Flash?

line: Well, I have and it will knock your socks off! Good luck getting them back on.

line: Uh, anyway, I figured this is probably my last shot with Penny and I don't want to screw it up.

name: Leonard
line: Nobody wants that.

name: Stuart
line: So, here's my question. It's the second date, you think she'll be expecting things to get physical?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, oh, gee, my initial reaction is no. You know, let me think about it and get back to you, okay?

name: Stuart
line: Okay, so, you'll give me a call?

line: Yeah, or you call me.

line: Great.

line: Interesting. Penny's current suitor asking advice from her former suitor.

line: You know, thanks for closed-captioning my pain, Raj.

name: Howard
line: Hey, wanna make sure he gets nowhere with Penny without jeopardizing your friendship with either of them?

name: Leonard
line: I'm listening.

name: Howard
line: Just tell him to do everything you've done with her for the last two years.

name: Penny
line: Well, does it bother you, me going out with one of your friends? ‘Cause you know, you and me...

name: Leonard
line: No, no that's the past. I'm really more of a right now kind of guy. You know, living in the moment. Although I do have to live a little in the future, 'cause, well, that's my job. Of course, my fondness for classic science fiction does draw my attention backwards, but those stories often take place in the future. In conclusion, no, it doesn't bother me.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, that's really cool of you.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, well I wouldn't say cool, I'd just say, that's Leonard!

name: Penny
line: Well, In that case, do you mind giving me some advice?

name: Leonard
line: About Stuart? Love to.

line: He's very shy, how do I make him feel more comfortable around me?

name: Leonard
line: Well, uh, first of all, don't underestimate the value of discomfort.

name: Penny
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Well, yeah, Stuart thrives under pressure, that's why he works in a comic book store.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. It's Stuart.

name: Sheldon
line: You're not going to answer it?

name: Leonard
line: He wants to talk about Penny. I don't want to talk about Penny.

line: You're making an assumption. Perhaps the comic book store is on fire, and he needs your assistance.

name: Leonard
line: Why would he call me?

name: Leonard

name: Sheldon

name: Sheldon
line: You have to check your messages, the leaving of a message is one half of a social contract which is completed by the checking of the message. If that contract breaks down then all social contracts break down and we descend into anarchy.

name: Leonard
line: It must be hell inside your head.

name: Sheldon
line: At times.

name: Howard
line: Guys, we have a code red.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you mean code red the hospital emergency alert, code red the computer worm, or code red the cherry flavoured soft drink from the makers of Mountain Dew?

name: Howard
line: Look, I was going over the schematics on my zero-G toilet, and I made a teeny tiny mistake on the specifications for the diverter valve.

name: Leonard
line: How teeny tiny?

name: Howard
line: It's gonna fail after about ten flushes.

name: Sheldon
line: But the mission is for six months.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, see, that's the code red. It's kind of like a jack-in-the-box, no one knows exactly when, but at some point something way worse than a puppet is gonna pop out of that box.

name: Sheldon
line: Have you notified NASA?

name: Howard
line: No. Are you crazy?What am I gonna say? I screwed up your toilet and pretty soon there's gonna be crap floating all over your nice shiny space station?

name: Leonard
line: Well, what are you gonna do?

line: So, what do you need us for?

name: Raj
line: He can't figure out how to fix it.

line: Hey, you said you were gonna be supportive.

line: I'm trying, but you have to admit this is pretty damn funny.

name: Sheldon
line: I agree. It's the juxtaposition of the high-tech nature of space exploration against the banality of a malfunctioning toilet that provides the comic fodder here. Check your messages.

name: Howard
line: All right, this is an exact duplicate of the Wolowitz Zero-Gravity Human Waste Disposal System as deployed on the International Space Station.

line: Don't you mean the Wolowitz Zero-Gravity Human Waste Distribution System?

name: Leonard
line: Good one.

name: Raj
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, ha, it's hilarious. Now, here's an approximation of the spare parts available on the Space Station. We gotta find a way, using nothing but this, to reinforce this so the waste material avoids the spinning turbine.

name: Raj
line: You mean so it doesn't hit the fan?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I have to say, I thought the toilet humour would get less funny with repetition. Apparently, there is no law of diminishing comedic returns with space poop.

name: Stuart
line: Hey Leonard.

line: Hey Stuart.

line: Um...

name: Leonard

line: It wasn't bad advice. It just wasn't particularly helpful.

name: Sheldon
line: For what it's worth, my mother says that when we deceive for personal gain, we make Jesus cry.

line: All right, what if we use this two-inch PVC to reinforce the centre cross-support?

name: Howard
line: No good. I mean, it might work for the Japanese and the Americans, but have you seen the size of the Russians they got up there? This thing has to hold up against a hearty potato-based diet.

line: I feel terrible.

line: Maybe if you were helping, you'd feel better about yourself.

line: I deliberately tried to sabotage Stuart's date with Penny.

line: Of course you feel terrible. You completely screwed up your karma, dude.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't really believe in that superstition, do you?

name: Raj
line: It's not superstition. It's practically Newtonian. For every action, there's an equal and opposite reaction. Leonard pretends to be a friend and acts like a two-faced bitch, therefore, he is reborn as a banana slug. It's actually a very elegant system, you know, what goes around comes around.

name: Howard
line: Speaking of what goes around comes around...

name: Raj
line: Okay, look. Instead of trying to reinforce this structure here, what if we just ran another line, bypass it entirely?

line: It won't work. The diameter of the tubing is insufficient.

name: Sheldon
line: It won't work. No way to mount it.

name: Howard
line: Okay, here's an idea. What if I change my name and go live with my cousin and her husband Avi in Israel?

name: Sheldon
line: That could work.

name: Leonard
line: Morning.

name: Penny
line: Morning. What's up?

name: Leonard
line: Nothing. We just pulled an all-nighter trying to fix a zero-gravity... pasta maker. I'm gonna make a coffee run. Do you want any?

line: Great. So how'd it go with Stuart last night?

line: I really don't want to talk about it.

line: Yeah. Right. Sure. The thing is, before you guys went out, I spoke to him and...

line: Okay... I just... I kind of...

line: Look, Leonard, what goes on between me and Stuart is none of your business. So just leave it alone, okay?

line: If you really want to clean up your karma, go get my freakin' latte.

line: Hang on, I think I've got this. Help me see if we can wedge this little piece of PVC behind the support rod.

name: Sheldon
line: You're overestimating the tensile strength of the substructure you're building.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, I know what I'm doing.

name: Sheldon
line: If you knew what you were doing, there wouldn't be a space toilet where my coffee table should be.

name: Raj
line: Howard, wait. Why don't you use this instead of the PVC to keep the transverse filter assembly in place?

name: Howard
line: Because this is not a spare part from the space station. This is the thing from the pizza box that keeps the lid from touching the cheese.

name: Raj
line: That what that's for? In India, the lid just touches the cheese. Of course, we also have rampant poverty and periodic outbreaks of cholera, so a little cardboard in our cheese is no biggie.

line: Where are you going?

line: Oh, an excellent idea! I could certainly use a break.

line: Why does Leonard get to go?

line: ‘Cause he's upset over his situation with Penny and if I have to hear about it again, I'm going to kick him in his ovaries.

line: Thanks for understanding, Howard.

name: Howard
line: I got your back, sister. All right, I think we've got a prototype ready to test. Hand me that Tupperware.

line: Damn right it's heavy, it's my mother's meat loaf, it's been testing toilets for generations.

name: Sheldon
line: I must say, Howard, I think a detailed letter to MIT describing your current circumstances might entitle you to a refund on your master's degree.

name: Howard
line: Okay, simulated zero-gravity human waste disposal test with meat loaf analog in three, two, one.

name: Sheldon
line: Fascinating.

name: Raj
line: What do you think the problem is?

name: Howard
line: Not enough bread crumbs.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Stuart, I need to talk to you.

line: Sure, what's up?

name: Leonard
line: I think I gave you bad advice about Penny, and I want to apologize.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, going slow really worked.

name: Leonard
line: You're kidding. Never worked for me.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, last night at dinner, I did what you told me, I went really slow, I kept my distance, and two bottles of wine later, we were making out in my car.

line: Wine? I didn't say to give her wine.

name: Stuart
line: It doesn't matter, that's where it all went to hell.

name: Leonard
line: During the kissing? What did you do, sneeze in her mouth? I did that to a girl once.

line: No, everything was good and really hot, and I said “Oh, Penny,” and right where she was supposed to say, “Oh, Stuart,” she said... your name.

name: Leonard
line: Leonard?

name: Stuart
line: That is your name, right?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, no, yeah, wow, I'm sorry. That must've been the last thing you wanted to hear.

name: Stuart

name: Leonard
line: No doubt, no doubt. Okay, well, I'm sorry it didn't work out.

name: Stuart
line: Not your fault.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, how about that? See you soon.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Howard
line: Yes, sir, I understand classified. We'll keep it all classified, no one has to know but you and me.

name: Penny
line: What's classified?

name: Leonard
line: Howard's space toilet. I'll tell you later.

name: Howard
line: Well, they've deployed our solution. Let's just all hope it works.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't see why I have to worry. My career's not hanging in the balance. That was a joke. It's funny, because it's true.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, could you pass the soy sauce, please?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, were you talking to me?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I said Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, you did, didn't you?

name: Penny
line: What the hell is that?

name: Howard
line: Meatloaf.

name: Leonard
line: What was it doing on the ceiling?

name: Howard
line: That's classified.

name: Voice
line: Houston, International Space Station. We have a little situation up here. We'd like to make an unscheduled space walk.

name: Houston
line: ISS, Houston. Which crew members would be involved in this E.V.A.?

name: ISS voice
line: Houston, we'd all like to step outside for a few minutes.

name: Houston
line: ISS, I'm afraid we can't authorize that.

name: ISS voice
line: Uh, Houston, this is more of an FYI call. We are basically out the door.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, boy.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I can't comment without violating our agreement that I don't criticize your work.

name: Leonard
line: Then what was oh, boy?

name: Sheldon
line: Great restraint on my part.

name: Leonard
line: There's nothing wrong with the science here.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps you mean a different thing than I do when you say science.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, how's that?

name: Sheldon
line: You actually had it right in the first place. Once again, you've fallen for one of my classic pranks. Bazinga! Well, now here's a peculiar e-mail. The president of the university wants me to meet him at his office tomorrow morning at 8 a.m.

name: Leonard
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, how did we live before Twitter? I guess you'll find out what it is in the morning.

name: Sheldon
line: That's 14 hours away. For the next 840 minutes, I'm effectively one of Heisenberg's particles, I know where I am or I know how fast I'm going, but I can't know both. Yet how am I supposed to carry on with this huge annoying thing hovering over my head?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I know the feeling.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard.  Leonard.  Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, it's two o'clock in the morning.

name: Sheldon
line: Why is everybody keep telling me what time it is?

name: Leonard
line: Everybody?

name: Sheldon
line: You, the president of the university, his wife, their sullen teenage daughter. That entire family is fascinated by what time it is and whether people know it.

name: Leonard
line: You went to President Seibert's house in the middle of the night?

name: Sheldon
line: He didn't respond to my e-mail, his phone number is unlisted. Tell me what my other option was.

name: Leonard
line: You could have waited until morning. I know, look who I'm talking to.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you remember the grant proposal I submitted to the National Science Foundation to detect slow-moving monopoles at the magnetic North Pole?

name: Leonard
line: Hardly a day goes by when I don't think about it.

name: Sheldon
line: Aw, how nice. Well, a space opened up at the last minute on the NSF expedition to the Arctic Circle.

name: Leonard
line: Wait a minute. He offered to send you to the North Pole?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. In fact, he was quite enthusiastic. He said, “Frankly, if I could send you tonight, I would.”

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, do you want to go?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course not. I'm a theoretical physicist, a career I chose in no small part because it's indoors, but if I'm able to detect slow-moving magnetic monopoles there, I will be the scientist to confirm string theory. People will write books about me. Third-graders will create macaroni-art dioramas depicting scenes from my life.

name: Leonard
line: Sure, maybe a tableau of me trying to pummel you to death.

name: Sheldon
line: Sarcasm?

name: Leonard
line: Maybe.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm on the horns of a dilemma. Can you imagine me, Sheldon Cooper, at the North Pole?

name: Leonard
line: Easy peasy, I'm doing it right now.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not good with cold, Leonard. How often have we had to leave a movie theatre because I got a headache from drinking the Icee too fast? I can't go.

name: Leonard
line: Well, then don't go.

name: Sheldon
line: How can you say that? The scientific opportunity of a lifetime presents itself and my best friend says don't go.

name: Leonard
line: All right, then go.

name: Sheldon
line: Listen to you. How can I possibly go?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, what are the words I can say right now to end this conversation and let me go back to sleep?

name: Sheldon
line: Odd, President Seibert posed the exact same question.

name: Leonard
line: How was it resolved?

name: Sheldon
line: It wasn't. His wife set their dogs on me and rendered the question moot.

name: Howard
line: Just imagine. If he says yes, we'll have an entire summer without Sheldon.

name: Raj
line: We could play outside.

name: Howard
line: We could sit on the left side of the couch.

name: Raj
line: Our dreams are very small, aren't they?

name: Sheldon
line: Good news, gentlemen, I have tentatively accepted...

name: All
line: Yeah! Woo-hoo!

name: Sheldon
line: ...the invitation to join the Arctic Expedition.

name: Leonard
line: It's not gonna be the same without you.

name: Howard
line: Godspeed.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you, but your sentiments may be premature.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, I don't like where this is going.

name: Sheldon
line: I would like to propose that the three of you accompany me.

name: Howard
line: To the North Pole?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: Is this just so we won't touch your stuff while you're away?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll admit that was a concern. But the fact is, I'll need a support team. And the three of you are my first choice.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, there are others who might be more qualified, but the thought of interviewing them gave me a stomach ache. Now, I know I'm proposing an enormous undertaking, so why don't you take a few moments to discuss it?

name: Howard
line: We're not really gonna go to the North Pole with him, are we?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm still within earshot! You may want to wait for my door to close.

name: Howard
line: We're not really gonna go to the North Pole with him, are we?

name: Leonard
line: Hang on. Let's talk about it. This is a National Science Foundation expedition. I don't know how we can turn it down.

name: Howard
line: Easy. Instead of saying, no, we don't want to go on an NSF expedition, say, no, we don't want to spend “three months stuck in a cabin in the Arctic Circle with an anal nutbag.”

name: Raj
line: But if we were part of the team that confirmed string theory, we could drink for free in any bar in any college town with a university that has a strong science program.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, this is big science. You could be the engineer who builds the equipment that puts us on the cover of magazines.

name: Howard
line: I could also be the engineer who builds the crossbow that kills Sheldon.

name: Raj
line: You still might get on a magazine.

name: Howard
line: So you guys are seriously considering this?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Howard
line: And you think you can put up with Sheldon?

name: Raj
line: Well, I'm a Hindu. My religion teaches that if we suffer in this life we are rewarded in the next. Three months at the North Pole with Sheldon and I'm reborn as a well-hung billionaire with wings!

name: Sheldon
line: Well, gentlemen, have you reached a decision?

name: Leonard
line: I'm in.

name: Raj
line: Me, too.

name: Howard
line: Oh, damn it. Peer pressure. Fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent. And just an FYI, as I am the expedition's team leader, protocol dictates that be phrased fine, sir. But don't worry, there will be a briefing.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: What do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: I need access to the Cheesecake Factory's walk-in freezer.

name: Penny
line: Now, honey, I already told you, the hamburger meat is fresh and stored at a safe temperature.

name: Sheldon
line: No. This is to train for a three-month expedition to the magnetic North Pole.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know how that sentence could possibly confuse you, but to elaborate, I'm going to the Arctic Circle with Leonard, Wolowitz and Koothrappali.

name: Penny
line: You're all going?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: For three months?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Excuse me.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that a yes or a no on the freezer? The woman has the attention span of a gnat.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon says you're going to the North Pole.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Pretty cool, huh?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. I'm just a little surprised you didn't tell me.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, well, it all happened kind of fast, and we had to get physicals and buy thermal underwear and study up on, you know, snow and stuff. Sorry, I was gonna tell you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, no, you don't have to apologize. There's no reason you have to tell me. I was just, you know, surprised.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, yes, you were busy, you were surprised, all very fascinating. Now where do we stand on the freezer?

name: Penny
line: Is he serious?

name: Leonard
line: Actually, it would help.

name: Penny
line: All right, I'll see what I can do. So, three months at the North Pole. Wow, that is awesome.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, but at what point do you put this see what you can do plan into action?

name: Penny
line: Just a warning, Sheldon, the freezer locks from the outside.

name: Leonard
line: Did she seem upset to you?

name: Sheldon
line: No. Did she seem upset to you?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good, I got it right. Are you upset?

name: Leonard
line: A little bit.

name: Sheldon
line: Two for two. I'm on fire.

name: Leonard
line: I mean, I know she's not my girlfriend or anything, but wouldn't you think she'd feel a little bad that I'm going to be gone for the whole summer?

name: Sheldon
line: That feels like a bonus question. I'm going to stop here while I'm ahead, but I've had a great time.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright, now the purpose of this drill is to acclimate us to the use of tools in extreme temperatures such as we will face in the Arctic Circle.

name: Raj
line: Where are your tools?

name: Sheldon
line: Right here. All right, team, open up your practice kits. As the university did not permit me to bring the actual equipment we'll be using to the Cheesecake Factory, because apparently I'm “ridiculous,” I've provided substitutes which will exercise your fine motor skills. Leonard, you will be doing a series of complex mathematical problems on a vintage Casio model 1175 calculator watch I received when I won the Earth Science medal in 3rd grade. Treat it with respect. Raj, you will be painting sideburns and a Van Dyke on a six-inch figurine of Legolas the elf. Now, remember, a Van Dyke is a goatee without a moustache. Wolowitz, you will be completing a series of delicate surgical procedures on the classic children's game, Operation. To begin with, you will remove funny bone for two hundred dollars.

name: Howard
line: For this I went to MIT.

name: Sheldon
line: And begin.

name: Raj
line: I think I swallowed some paint!

name: Leonard
line: I can't press any of the buttons with my gloves. Oh, son of a bitch!

name: Sheldon
line: Adversity is to be expected. Continue.

name: Howard
line: Oh, boy, am I gonna get sued.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I can't do this.

name: Raj
line: Me either.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, use your imagination. Innovate. Did Han Solo let Luke Skywalker freeze to death on the ice planet of Hoth? No. He cut open a tauntaun and used its internal body heat to warm him up.

name: Howard
line: You heard the man. Hold him down and I'll cut him open.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on, I know I don't possess the tools of leadership, but I don't understand why we can't assemble the equipment inside the hut and then take it outside.

name: Sheldon
line: I hadn't thought of that. I guess we're done here.

name: Sheldon
line: Here, drink slash eat this.

name: Leonard
line: What is it?

name: Sheldon
line: It's hot chocolate with a stick of butter.

name: Howard
line: Okay, why?

name: Sheldon
line: Because in the frigid temperatures in the Arctic, we need to consume at least 5,000 calories a day just to maintain our body weight.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you know I can't eat butter. I'm lactose intolerant.

name: Sheldon
line: Way ahead of you, that's an “I Can't Believe It's Not Butter” stick.

name: Raj
line: But mummy, all the other guys are going to the North Pole.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: I don't care what the other guys are doing. If the other guys jumped in the Bay of Bengal and tried to swim to Sri Lanka, would you follow them?

name: Raj
line: If you were standing behind me nagging, I might.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Don't talk back to your mother. This trip is much too dangerous, Rajesh.

name: Raj
line: No, it's not. Howard, tell them.

name: Howard
line: Doctor and Mrs. Koothrappali, namaste. I understand your concern, but if it'll make you feel any better, my mother is fine with me going, and this is a woman who kept a safety rail on my bed until I was 17.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: So, she has no problem with her son being eaten by a walrus?

name: Sheldon
line: That's very unlikely, Mrs. Koothrappali. If Raj dies, it'll be from frostbite, gangrene, acute sunburn or being ripped to shreds by a fifteen hundred pound polar bear.

name: Howard
line: Ma, I'm putting you on speakerphone with Raj's parents. Can you tell them that you're okay with me going to the Arctic?

name: Howard's Mother
line: Arctic? I thought you said Arkansas!

name: Howard
line: I didn't say that. You never listen to me!

name: Howard's Mother
line: He doesn't tell me anything! He lives a secret life because he's ashamed!

name: Penny
line: Hey, Leonard, can I talk to you for a sec?

name: Leonard
line: Sure, but let's go out here where there's a little less yelling and guilt. What's up?

name: Penny
line: Well, I got you a little going away present.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, a blanket.

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, no, no, not just a blanket. See, it has sleeves. Yeah!  So, you can, you know, be all snoodled up while you do your science stuff.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, wow, cool.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'm gonna miss you.  See you later.

name: Leonard
line: Bye.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: I told you no. Why don't you believe me?

name: Howard's Mother
line: ‘Cause it doesn't make sense to me! How can it be that in the entire country of India, there isn't one Outback Steakhouse?!

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: I want a cookie, Meemaw.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, it's me.

name: Sheldon
line: But Meemaw just made cookies.

name: Leonard
line: Listen, I don't know if I can go on the expedition.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: I don't think I can go to the North Pole.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, Leonard, I know you're concerned about disappointing me but I want you to take comfort from the knowledge that my expectations of you are very low.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that's very comforting.

name: Sheldon
line: Comforting is a part of leadership. It's not a part I care for, but such is my burden.

name: Leonard
line: Terrific, it's just that I don't think Penny wants me to go.

name: Sheldon
line: Assuming that's a valid reason not to go, which it isn't, how do you know this? Did she say it?

name: Leonard
line: Not exactly. But she said she was gonna miss me and she gave me this.

name: Sheldon
line: What is it?

name: Leonard
line: It's a blanket with sleeves.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's clever. Let me see if I understand this correctly. Her missing you is an emotional state you find desirable?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, obviously.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Well, given that missing you is predicated on you leaving, logic dictates you must leave.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, okay, but I'm gonna be gone for three months. What if she doesn't miss me that long and she meets someone else?

name: Sheldon
line: She does have a short attention span.

name: Leonard
line: So, I can't go.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, you may be right. It appears that Penny secretly wants you in her life in a very intimate and carnal fashion.

name: Leonard
line: You really think so?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course not. Even in my sleep-deprived state, I've managed to pull off another one of my classic pranks. Bazinga!

name: Penny
line: Oh, Leonard, what time is it?

name: Leonard
line: It's 7 a.m. I'm sorry it's early, but we're leaving soon, and I needed to talk to you.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: What did you mean when you said you're going to miss me?

name: Penny
line: Um, I don't know. You'll be gone and I'll notice.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, um, what about this? What does this mean?

name: Penny
line: Wine, credit card and late night television are a bad combination.

name: Leonard
line: All right, fine. What about that really long hug? What did that mean?

name: Penny
line: That wasn't a long hug.

name: Leonard
line: It was at least five Mississippis. A standard hug is two Mississippis tops.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, I don't know what to tell you. It was just a hug.

name: Leonard
line: Glad we cleared that up.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: I guess I'll see you.

name: Penny
line: Okay, have a safe trip.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you. Bye.

name: Penny
line: Okay, bye.  Means I wish you weren't going.

name: Leonard
line: Damn it.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: We're out of ice.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, men, we begin initial assembly and deployment of the testing equipment starting tomorrow at 0700 hours, but until then, you are all off duty. I suggest you keep the shenanigans to a minimum as medical help is 18 hours away by dogsled.

name: Raj
line: What are you working on?

name: Howard
line: Crossbow.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, guys, can I just say something? How about we take a moment to think about where we are right now? This is literally the top of the world. Only a handful of people in all of human history will ever see what we are going to see.

name: Raj
line: He's right.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, wow.

name: Sheldon
line: It is remarkable.

name: Raj
line: So, who's up for a movie?

name: Howard
line: Good idea, what do you think? Ice Station Zebra or John Carpenter's The Thing?

name: Raj
line: I say double feature.

name: Leonard
line: Dinner's ready!

name: Sheldon
line: What are we having?

name: Leonard
line: Reconstituted Thai food.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you bring the dehydrated low-sodium soy sauce?

name: Leonard
line: Check.

name: Sheldon
line: Freeze-dried spicy mustard?

name: Leonard
line: Check.

name: Sheldon
line: Flash-frozen brown rice, not white?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, oh, sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Not to worry. I hid it. Bazinga! You're in my spot.

name: Howard
line: There's no time for a crossbow. Find me an icicle.

name: Sheldon
line: Three months. This is gonna be great!

name: Sheldon
line: Fellow warriors, this is Sheldor the Conqueror. We are about to enter Axel's fortress. Now this is a long run, so let's do another bladder check. Alright Barry, we'll wait for you again, but you really should see a doctor.  Sheldor is AFK.  Penny, are you experiencing some sort of difficulty?

name: Penny
line: Yes, I can't get my stupid door open.

name: Sheldon
line: You appear to have put your car key in the door lock, are you aware of that?

name: Penny
line: Yeah!

name: Sheldon
line: Alright then.

name: Penny
line: Dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit.

name: Sheldon
line: Would it be possible for you to do this a little more quietly?

name: Penny
line: I can't get the damned key out.

name: Sheldon
line: Well that's not surprising. That Baldwin lock on your door uses traditional edge mounted cylinders, whereas the key for your Volkswagon uses a centre cylinder system.

name: Penny
line: Thankyou, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. Point of inquiry, why did you put your car key in the door lock?

name: Penny
line: Why? I'll tell you why. Because today I had an audition, it took me two hours to get there, I waited an hour for my turn, and before I could even start they told me I looked too Midwest for the part. Too Midwest? What the hell does that even mean?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, the American Midwest was mostly settled by Scandinavian and Germanic peoples who, well they have a characteristic facial bone structure....

name: Penny
line: I know what it means, Sheldon! God, you know, I have been in L.A. for almost two years now, and I haven't got a single acting job, I have accomplished nothing, haven't gotten a raise at work, haven't even had sex in six months, and just now when I was walking up those stairs a fly flew in my mouth and I ate it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, actually, insects are a dietary staple in many cultures, they're almost pure protein.

name: Penny
line: Oh, sonofabitch!

name: Sheldon
line: I believe the condensation on your frozen foods weakened the structural integrity of the bag. But returning to your key conundrum, perhaps you should call a locksmith and have him open the door for you.

name: Penny
line: I did, and he said he'll get here when he gets here.

name: Sheldon
line: And you're frustrated because he phrased his reply in the form of a meaningless tautology?

name: Penny
line: No! I am frustrated because I am a failure at everything and my breath smells like fly.

name: Sheldon
line: There there.  Would you prefer to wait in our apartment?

name: Penny
line: No Sheldon, I'd rather sit on this freezing cold floor sobbing like a three year-old.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright then.

name: Penny
line: For God's sake!

name: Sheldon
line: Just when I think I've gotten the hang of sarcasm.

name: Sheldon
line: Make yourself comfortable.  Not there.  Sheldor is back online.

name: Penny
line: Sheldor?

name: Sheldon
line: The Conqueror.

name: Penny
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: AFK. I'm playing Age of Conan, an online multiplayer game set in the universe of Robert E. Howard's Conan the Barbarian.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Sheldon
line: Sheldor, back online.

name: Penny
line: What's AFK?

name: Sheldon
line: AFK. Away from keyboard.

name: Penny
line: OIC.

name: Sheldon
line: What does that stand for?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I see?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but what does it stand for?

name: Sheldon
line: Now just click on the enchanted boots to put them on.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I don't know. Can I see them in another colour?

name: Sheldon
line: Just click on them. Congratulations, you are now a level three warrior.

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Penny
line: Leonard, guess what, I'm a level three warrior.

name: Leonard
line: Great, you know there are groceries outside of your apartment?

name: Penny
line: Yeah yeah yeah, shhh!

name: Leonard
line: I only bring it up because your ice-cream is melting and it's starting to attract wildlife.

name: Penny
line: Uh-huh, yeah, do I stay in the jungle or go towards the beach?

name: Sheldon
line: It doesn't matter, right now you're looking for treasure.

name: Penny
line: Okay.  Wait, wait, where are you going?

name: Sheldon
line: You're okay, if you run into crocodiles just kick them with your boots.

name: Leonard
line: Want to catch me up?

name: Sheldon
line: Well let's see, uh, she attempted to open her apartment with her car key, because her face is overly Midwestern, um, she hasn't had sex in six months, and she ate a fly.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh. Seriously, six months?

name: Penny
line: Oh my God, a treasure chest, I'm rich!

name: Sheldon
line: Level three and she thinks she's rich! What a noob.

name: Raj
line: Okay, we're all set.

name: Howard
line: Let her rip.

name: Penny
line: Hi!

name: Leonard
line: Hey, check it out, it's just corn starch and water.

name: Sheldon
line: They make up a non-Newtonian fluid which is liquid, but solid under the percussive action of the speaker.

name: Howard
line: That's what makes it get all funky.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, okay. Listen, I need to talk to Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: No, that's what she said, Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, I bought the game, and I've been exploring the Island of Tordage but I can't figure out how to get past the guard captain.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you have the enchanted sword?

name: Penny
line: No, no, I've a bronze dagger.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't slay the guard captain with a bronze dagger, my Lord it's like the car key in your apartment door all over again.

name: Penny
line: Alright, alright, how do I get the sword?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, have you been to the Temple of Mithra?

name: Penny
line: Is that the place on the hill with the weird priests in front of it?

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, it's... oh for God's sakes, gimme.

name: Penny
line: Thank you, I really appreciate this.

name: Sheldon
line: You're going to have to learn to do these things for yourself, Penny.

name: Penny
line: Don't patronise me, just get the sword.

name: Howard
line: What the frak?

name: Leonard
line: Beats me. They were playing all last night too.

name: Raj
line: It's like some kind of weird comic book crossover.

name: Howard
line: Like if Hulk were dating Peppermint Patty.

name: Raj
line: I always thought Peppermint Patty was a lesbian?

name: Leonard
line: No, that's Marcie. Peppermint Patty's just athletic.

name: Sheldon
line: There you go, one enchanted sword.

name: Penny
line: Right, gimme, gimme, gimme, I want to kill the guard captain. .

name: Sheldon
line: That girl needs to get a life.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.  Shel-don.

name: Sheldon
line: Danger, danger.

name: Penny
line: No danger, look, it's just me, Penny, look, I got to level 25 and reached Purple Lotus Swamp, right?

name: Sheldon
line: You're in my bedroom.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Leonard gave me an emergency key.

name: Sheldon
line: People can't be in my bedroom.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well can we go talk in the living room?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not wearing pyjama bottoms.

name: Penny
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: I spilled grape juice.

name: Penny
line: Well, wear different pyjamas.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't wear different pyjamas, these are my Monday pyjamas. Penny, people cannot be in my bedroom.

name: Penny
line: Okay, just tell me, is it too soon to join a quest to the Black Castle?

name: Sheldon
line: You were invited on a quest to the Black Castle?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah, by some guys in Budapest, I'm just not sure it's the right move for my character.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course it's not, you're only a level 25, the Hungarians are just using you for dragon fodder.

name: Penny
line: Really? Boy, you'd think you could trust a horde of Hungarian barbarians.

name: Sheldon
line: Please Penny, enough, I have to sleep.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well you were great, thanks.  Oh, hey Leonard, listen, don't got in Sheldon's room, he's not wearing bottoms.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you want to catch me up again?

name: Gablehauser
line: People, I am very busy today.

name: Sheldon
line: I realise that Dr Gablehauser but it is your job, as head of the department, to mediate all inter-departmental disputes. University policy manual chapter four, subsection two, mediation of inter-departmental disputes.

name: Gablehauser
line: Fine. Dr Winkle, what colourful name did you call Dr Cooper this time?

name: Leslie
line: Dr Dumbass.

name: Gablehauser
line: Dr Cooper, Dr Winkle apologises.

name: Sheldon
line: No she doesn't.

name: Leslie
line: No I don't.

name: Sheldon
line: Here's the problem. I was clearly signed up to use the mainframe in Buckman 204, and Dr Winkle just wantonly ripped the sign-up sheet off the wall.

name: Leslie
line: It wasn't even an official sign-up sheet. He printed it himself and he put his name down in every slot for the next six months.

name: Sheldon
line: If it is a crime to ensure that the universities resources are not being squandered chasing sub-atomic wild geese then I plead guilty.  Oh, Penny!

name: Gablehauser
line: You need to get that Dr Cooper?

name: Sheldon
line: God, no.

name: Leslie
line: Well don't turn it off, you might miss your call from the Nobel committee letting you know you've been nominated as dumbass laureate of the year.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh yeah, well, you wouldn't even be nominated. Dr Gablehauser, I have a series of important multi-bit calculations and simulations to run. All she's doing is reducing irrelevant data and making a mock...

name: Gablehauser
line: Excuse me. Gablehauser.  It's for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. Penny, this is not a good time. No, I told you, you're not prepared for the Sanctum of Burning Souls. You need to be in a group of at least five for that quest, and one should be a level 35 healer. Penny, I can't log on and help you. We'll talk when I get home.  I'm not getting the computing time, am I?

name: Leslie
line: Dumbass.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, you have to do something about Penny. She is interfering with my sleep, she's interfering with my work, and if I had another significant aspect of my life, I'm sure she'd be interfering with that too.
