line: If we do get a new friend, he should be a guy you can trust. A guy who has your back.

name: Howard
line: And he should have a lot of money, and live in a cool place down by the beach where we could throw parties.

name: Sheldon
line: He should share our love of technology.

name: Howard
line: And he should know a lot of women.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, let's see, money, women, technology, okay we're agreed, our new friend is going to be Iron Man.

name: Raj
line: Welcome to the Raj Mahal.

name: Penny
line: Yes, it's very nice, goodnight Raj.

name: Raj
line: No, wait, the evening's not over.

name: Penny
line: Yes it is.

name: Raj
line: No, it's time to put on some R. Kelly and suck face.

name: Penny
line: Oh, wow, is the evening over.

name: Raj
line: Wait, wait, that's my mummy and daddy calling from India. I want you to meet my parents.

name: Penny
line: Wait, meet them.

name: Raj
line: Hello mummy and daddy, good to see you. I'm not drunk.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Why would you say that?

name: Raj
line: Just making conversation. Mummy, daddy, I want you to meet my new squeeze, Penny.

name: Penny
line: I am not your squeeze. There is no squeezing.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: I can't see her, centre her in the frame.

name: Raj
line: Here you go, cute huh?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: She's not Indian.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: So, she's not Indian, the boy's just sowing some wild oats.

name: Penny
line: No, no, there's no sowing, no squeezing, and no sucking face.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: What if he gets her pregnant. Is this little hotsy-totsy who you want as the mother of your grandchildren.

name: Raj
line: What right do you have to pick who I can have children with?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Look, Rajesh, I understand, you're in America, you want to try the local cuisine. But trust me, you don't want it for a steady diet.

name: Raj
line: Now you listen to me, I am no longer a child, and I will not be spoken to like one. Now if you'd excuse me, I have to go throw up.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: What's wrong with him?

name: Penny
line: I don't know, maybe it's the local cuisine. Okay, well, it's nice to meet you, just gonna set you on down over here, and I'm going to leave so, Namaste.  And FYI, you'd be lucky to have me as a daughter-in-law.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: She's feisty. I like that.

name: Penny
line: Raj, what are you doing. . No. No notes. If you have something to say to me, say it.

name: Raj
line: Sorry.

name: Penny
line: Oh, sweetie, it's okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Good morning, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, we're going to have to stop by Pottery Barn on the way to work, I bought these Star Wars sheets but they turned out to be much too stimulating to be compatible with a good night's sleep. I don't like the way Darth Vader stares at me.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not going to work.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, just because your career's been stagnant for a few years, that's no reason to give up.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I was up all night using the new free-electron laser for my X-ray diffraction experiment.

name: Sheldon
line: Did the laser accidentally burn out your retinas?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Then you can drive. Let's go.

name: Leonard
line: Didn't I tell you I'd be working nights, and that you'd have to make other arrangements.

name: Sheldon
line: You did.

name: Leonard
line: And?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't. Let's go.

name: Leonard
line: Goodnight, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: But how am I going to get to work?

name: Leonard
line: Take the bus.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't take the bus any more. They don't have seatbelts. And they won't let you lash yourself to the seat with bungee cords.

name: Leonard
line: You tried to lash yourself to the seat with bungee cords?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't try, I succeeded. For some reason it alarmed the other passengers and I was asked to de-bus.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, you're a big boy, you'll figure it out.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't talk to me like I'm a child. Now, take me to return my star wars sheets!

name: Sheldon
line: Penny,  Penny,  Penny...

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, what is it?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard's asleep.

name: Penny
line: Thanks for the update

name: Sheldon
line: No, wait. You have to drive me to work.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, uh, I really don't think I do.

name: Sheldon
line: But I don't drive, and I can't take the bus.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, honey, you'll be fine as long as you don't do that bungee cord thing, okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny. Didn't you recently state that you and I are friends?

name: Penny
line: Yes, Sheldon, we are friends.

name: Sheldon
line: Then I hereby invoke what I'm given to understand is an integral part of the implied covenant of friendship. The favour.

name: Penny
line: Oh, dear God.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, I didn't realize I was interrupting your morning prayers. When you're done, we'll go.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for driving me to work.

name: Penny
line: You know this is my day off, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good. I'm not keeping you from anything. Your check engine light is on.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Sheldon
line: Typically that's an indicator. To, you know, check your engine.

name: Penny
line: It's fine, it's been on for, like, a month.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, actually, that would be all the more reason to, you know, check your engine.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, it's fine.

name: Sheldon
line: If it were fine, the light wouldn't be on. That's why the manufacturer installed that light, to let you know it's not fine.

name: Penny
line: Uh, maybe the light's broken.

name: Sheldon
line: Is there a “check the check engine light light”?  O-o-o-oh!

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Studies have shown that performing tasks such as eating, talking on a cell phone or drinking coffee while driving reduces one's reaction time by the same factor as an ounce of alcohol.

name: Penny
line: Do you have any alcohol?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course not.

name: Penny
line: Too bad.

name: Sheldon
line: You're going up Euclid Avenue?

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard takes Los Robles Avenue.

name: Penny
line: Well, good for Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: Euclid Avenue is shorter as the crow flies, but it has speed bumps, which appreciably increase point-to-point drive time, making it the less efficient choice. But you have the conn. Of course, if you're not going to slow down for the speed bumps, I withdraw my previous objection. Here's a fun question. Do you know what the most common street name is?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: The answer's tricky. It's Second Street. You see, you'd think it would be First Street, but in most towns, First Street eventually gets renamed to something else, you know, like Main Street, Broad Street, Michigan Avenue. Leonard and I often use our commute time to exercise our minds  with brain-teasers like that. We also play games. Would you like to play one?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, come on, it's fun. Ooh! Another bump. Okay. I'll say an element, and uh, you say an element whose name starts with the last letter of the one I said, okay? I'll start. Helium. Now, you could say Mercury. That would give me a Y. Ooh.  Very clever, that's a tough one. So I go Ytterbium, which gets you back to M. So you go Molybdenum, and I say Magnesium, you say Manganese, and  I say Europium, and, and you're left with Mendelevium, and  there are no more M's because I believe that Meitnerium should still be called Ekairidium, so congratulations, you win. Do you wanna go again?

name: Penny
line: How about we just have a little quiet time now?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Hmm, huh, I'm sorry, I'm finding your reckless nonchalance regarding the check-engine light to be very troubling.

name: Penny
line: Get out.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I have to tell you that while I do have a theoretical understanding of the workings of an internal combustion engine, I'm not sure I'm capable of performing diagnostics.

name: Penny
line: I said, get out.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. I'll give it a shot.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Leonard, there you are, I'm ready to go home.

name: Leonard
line: I just got here.

name: Sheldon
line: Good, perfect timing.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I told you, I only have access to the free-electron laser at night. I can't drive you for the next few weeks.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you said you couldn't drive me to work, this is from work.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, help me out here.

name: Howard
line: No, just for the fun of it, I'm gonna take his side.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, how do you propose I get home?

name: Leonard
line: How did you get here in the first place?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny. But I sense that's no longer an option.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I need to get to the laser lab, you're just going to have to find someone else to take you home.

name: Howard
line: Oh damn, I picked the wrong side.

name: Sheldon
line: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa! Oh God, not Euclid Avenue! Aaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

name: Raj
line: Why did Howard leave you in the middle of the road anyway?

name: Sheldon
line: We had a difference of opinion.

name: Raj
line: Over what?

name: Sheldon
line: Whether or not he was trying to kill me. For the record, I maintain he was. Where are you going?

name: Raj
line: I'm taking you home.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, but I'm not going home. It's Wednesday, Wednesday is new comic book day, we have to go to the comic book store. And then we have to stop at Soup Plantation, it's creamy tomato soup day, and Radio Shack, there's a sale on triple-a batteries. Plus, we have to go to Pottery Barn and return my Star Wars sheets.

name: Raj
line: I have a better idea.

name: Sheldon
line: You want to go to pottery barn first?

name: Sheldon
line: Can you drive me to Pottery Barn?  Maybe if I turn off the night-light, I can keep the sheets.

name: Sheldon
line: Good morning.

name: All
line: Good morning.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, sit down.

name: Sheldon
line: She's in my spot. Don't look at me like that, everybody knows that my spot.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, you know  that we care about you.

name: Howard
line: And it's because we care about you that we've decided we have to speak up.

name: Penny
line: You're hurting the people around you, sweetie.

name: Leonard
line: So we made you an appointment, and we want you to keep it.

name: Sheldon
line: Department of motor vehicles new driver handbook? But I don't have a problem.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you need to learn how to drive.

name: Howard
line: This madness has to stop.

name: Leonard
line: Penny's taking you to the DMV, I'm going to bed.

name: Sheldon
line: Why Penny?

name: Leonard
line: Because rock breaks scissors, goodnight.

name: Penny
line: All right, come on Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hold on, I have one condition.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: We have to stop at Pottery Barn.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: And Radio Shack.

name: Penny
line: Fine.

name: Sheldon
line: And the comic book store.

name: Penny
line: All right!

name: Howard
line: Ooh, I want to go to the comic book store.

name: Raj
line: I like comic books.

name: Sheldon
line: I just don't see why I need a driver's license, Albert Einstein never had a driver's license.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but Albert Einstein didn't make me wet myself at 40 miles an hour.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and I never wanted to kick Albert Einstein in the nuts. You know, I gotta ask, why didn't you just get a license at 16 like everybody else?

name: Sheldon
line: I was otherwise engaged.

name: Penny
line: Doing what?

name: Sheldon
line: Examining perturbative amplitudes in n=4 supersymmetric theories leading to a re-examination of the ultraviolet properties of multi-loop n=8 supergravity using modern twistor theory.

name: Penny
line: Well, how 'bout when you were 17?

name: DMV Lady
line: Take this to the testing area, put your name at the top, sign the bottom, answer the questions, bring it back, next!  Application?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm actually more of a theorist.

name: Howard
line: The application in your hand, give it to her.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh.

name: DMV Lady
line: Take this to the testing area, put your name at the top, sign the bottom, answer the questions, bring it back, next!

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, but I have some concerns about these questions.

name: DMV Lady
line: Look at that sign up there.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes?

name: DMV Lady
line: Does it say I give a damn?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: DMV Lady
line: That's because I don't.

name: Sheldon
line: Just, look, see, this first question makes no sense, how many car lengths should you leave in front of you when driving? There's no possible way to answer that, a car length is not a standardized unit of measure.

name: DMV Lady
line: Look at the sign.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, it's C, just put down C.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't need your help, Penny.

name: DMV Lady
line: Listen to that little girl, honey, put C. Next!

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, wait, no, hang on, look at this next question.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, why are you arguing with the DMV?

name: Sheldon
line: How else are they going to learn? Look, question 2, when are roadways most slippery? Now, okay, there are three answers, none of which are correct. The correct answer is, when covered by a film of liquid sufficient to reduce the coefficient of static friction between the tire and the road to essentially zero, but not so deep as to introduce a new source of friction.

name: DMV Lady
line: Here's your learner's permit. Go away.

name: Sheldon
line: But I'm not done. I have many additional concerns about these questions.

name: DMV Lady
line: Don't make me climb over this counter.

name: Penny
line: Come on, let's go.

name: DMV Lady
line: Next!

name: Sheldon
line: Aced it.

name: Howard
line: Okay, that's it, let's boot it up.

name: Leonard
line: Booting.

name: Howard
line: This is a state-of-the-art simulator. I adapted it from something a friend of mine designed for the army.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that why I appear to be in downtown Fallujah, behind the wheel of an up-armored Humvee?

name: Howard
line: I haven't configured it yet. Let's see... Bradley tank... transport truck...  Batmobile...

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh!

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Here we go, red 2006 Ford Taurus on the streets of Pasadena.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmmmm?

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Statistically, red cars are stopped by police far more often than any other colour. I don't want any hassles with the fuzz.

name: Howard
line: Fine, what colour do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: You know the pale blue of Luke Skywalker's lightsaber, before it was digitally remastered?

name: Howard
line: Black it is.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, now, what you want to do first is turn on the ignition and shift into drive.

name: Sheldon
line: I haven't fastened my seat belt yet.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, fasten your seat belt.

name: Sheldon
line: Click. Now, are there air bags?

name: Leonard
line: You don't need air bags.

name: Sheldon
line: What if a simulated van rear-ends me?

name: Penny
line: I'll hit you in the face with a pillow.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, now shift into drive, pull out slowly into traffic.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: Oh.

name: Howard
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: Watch out.

name: Howard
line: Oh God!

name: Leonard
line: Watch, watch out, watch out for pedestrians!

name: Penny
line: Oh God, wait, slow, hit the brakes, hit the brakes!

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Sorry... excuse me... my bad... student driver...

name: Leonard
line: How did you manage to get on the second floor of the Glendale galleria?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. I was on the Pasadena freeway, I missed my exit, flew off the overpass, and one thing led to another.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe you want to give it a rest and try again tomorrow.

name: Sheldon
line: No. I quit.

name: Leonard
line: Aw, the pet store?

name: Sheldon
line: Remind me to compliment Wolowitz on the software, it's amazingly detailed.

name: Leonard
line: So wait,you're just gonna give up?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I'm not giving up, I never give up.

name: Leonard
line: So what is it you're doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm transcending the situation. I'm clearly too evolved for driving.

name: Leonard
line: What does that mean?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, have you ever wondered why my little toes and lateral incisors are significantly smaller than the average for someone of my size?

name: Leonard
line: I wonder a lot of things about you, Sheldon, but not... not that.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, those are indicators that I'm farther along the evolutionary scale than the average human.

name: Leonard
line: No kidding.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, no, no, I'm not going to go so far as to say that I represent a distinct new stage in humankind, you know, a Homo Novus, if you will, no, that's for anthropologists to decide. But I am convinced that the reason I cannot master the plebeian task of driving is because I'm not meant to.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, you are, you're meant to learn how to drive. Please learn how to drive!

name: Sheldon
line: No, no. Leonard, I'm meant for greater things, like unraveling the mysteries of the universe, not determining when it's safe to pass a stopped school bus on a country road.

name: Leonard
line: It's never safe.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, I know that now.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. Assuming that everything you say is true, how does the biologically superior Homo Novus get to work tomorrow morning?

name: Sheldon
line: Homo Novus doesn't know.

name: Leonard
line: Well, hang in there, maybe you'll evolve into something with wings.

name: Sheldon
line: Good morning, gentlemen.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Raj
line: Good morning. Is there some new kind of casual Friday I don't know about?

name: Leonard
line: No, he lives here now.

name: Howard
line: Really? Why?

name: Leonard
line: Well, since he won't take the bus and he's too evolved to drive, he decided it would be easier to just sleep in his office and shower in the radiation lab until I'm finished with my experiment.

name: Raj
line: But you finished your experiment a week ago.

name: Leonard
line: Yep

name: Cleaning Lady 1
line: Oh my God, again?

name: Cleaning Lady 2
line: It must be rats.

name: Cleaning Lady 1
line: Rats don't make toast and cut off the crust.

name: Sheldon
line: You saw nothing!

name: Leonard
line: So, if any of you are considering going into experimental physics, my door is always open. Once again, I'm sorry that the demonstration didn't quite work out, but now we know what happens when you accidentally spill peach Snapple into a helium neon laser. Short answer is... don't. And now to tell you about the theoretical physics department is Dr. Sheldon Cooper. Dr. Cooper?

name: Sheldon
line: Forget it.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me. Sheldon, we both agreed to do this.

name: Sheldon
line: It's a waste of time. I might as well explain the laws of thermodynamics to a bunch of labradoodles.

name: Leonard
line: If you don't do this, I won't take you to the comic book store.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. Nice work with the laser, by the way. Looking out at your fresh young faces, I remember when I too was deciding my academic future as a lowly graduate student. Of course, I was 14, and I'd already achieved more than most of you could ever hope to, despite my 9 o'clock bedtime. Now, there may be one or two of you in this room who has what it takes to succeed in theoretical physics, although, it's more likely that you'll spend your scientific careers teaching fifth graders how to make paper mache volcanoes with baking soda lava.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, good God.

name: Sheldon
line: In short, anyone who told you that you would someday be able to make any significant contribution to physics played a cruel trick on you, a cruel trick indeed. Any questions? Of course not. I weep for the future of science. Now if you'll excuse me, the latest issue of Batman is out. Come, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Laser demonstration's looking pretty good now, huh?

name: Raj
line: I love this time of the year. The leaves are turning, there's a bracing chill in the air.

name: Howard
line: Plus there's a whole new crop of female grad students about to put on just enough winter weight to make them needy and vulnerable. That's right, honey, have another calzone, Daddy can wait.

name: Raj
line: Isn't there a university policy against dating graduate students?

name: Leonard
line: No, if you can talk to them, you can ask them out.

name: Raj
line: Damn, there's always a catch.

name: Leslie Winkle
line: Hey, guys.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Leslie.

name: Leslie
line: So, dumbass, I heard you made a grad student throw up last night.

name: Sheldon
line: The truth can indeed be a finger down the throat of those unprepared to hear it. But why should I cater to second-rate minds?

name: Leslie
line: Because first-rate minds call you “dumbass”?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yeah? Well... you're a mean person.

name: Girl
line: Excuse me, Dr. Cooper, I'm Ramona Nowitzki, I was at your talk last night. I think you're just brilliant.

name: Sheldon
line: That is the prevailing opinion.

name: Leslie
line: Oh, now I'm gonna throw up.

name: Howard
line: Howard Wolowitz, department of engineering, co-designer of the International Space Station's Liquid Waste Disposal System.

name: Ramona
line: Ew. Dr. Cooper, I've read everything you've published. I especially liked your paper on grand unification using string-network condensates and was wondering how you determined that three-dimensional string-nets provided a unified picture of fermions and gauge bosons?

name: Sheldon
line: Amazing, an intelligent labradoodle.

name: Howard
line: Woof.

name: Sheldon
line: The fact is I'm quite close to a breakthrough in showing how neutrinos emerge from a string-net condensate.

name: Ramona
line: Oh, my God, that would change the way we view the entire physical universe.

name: Sheldon
line: It's what I do.

name: Howard
line: You know, the Pishkin-Wolowitz Liquid Waste Disposal System is turning a few heads as well.

name: Ramona
line: Again, ew. You know, I'd love to hear more about how you intend to add neutrinos. Could we get a cup of coffee sometime?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't drink coffee.

name: Howard
line: I do. I love me a cup of joe.

name: Ramona
line: Well, it doesn't have to be coffee. How about dinner?

name: Sheldon
line: I do eat dinner.

name: Ramona
line: Great. I know a terrific little Italian place.

name: Sheldon
line: I never eat in strange restaurants. One runs the risk of non-standard cutlery.

name: Ramona
line: Excuse me?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon lives in fear of the three-tined fork.

name: Sheldon
line: Three tines is not a fork, three tines is a trident. Forks are for eating, tridents are for ruling the seven seas.

name: Ramona
line: What if I brought food to your place?

name: Sheldon
line: That would be acceptable. On Mondays, I eat Thai food. Mee krob and chicken sate with extra peanut sauce from Siam Palace.

name: Ramona
line: You got it. I already have your address.

name: Sheldon
line: What a nice girl.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, do you have any idea what just happened?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Apparently I'm getting a free dinner.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, no, this thing's majorly out of order.  See? Sorry.

name: Ramona
line: That's okay. Guess I'm taking the stairs.

name: Penny
line: Where you going?

name: Penny
line: Oh, are you here to see Leonard?

name: Ramona
line: No, Dr. Cooper.

name: Penny
line: Dr. Sheldon Cooper?

name: Ramona
line: We're having dinner.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon Cooper? Tall, thin, looks a little like a giant praying mantis?

name: Ramona
line: He is cute, isn't he?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon Cooper?

name: Ramona
line: Hi, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Ramona. Come on in.

name: Ramona
line: Thanks. Where should I put this?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, the kitchen's fine.  Hey, what are you doing?

name: Penny
line: I need to see this.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh. The viewing area's right over there. Sheldon, your girl... date... person... Ramona's here.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, hello.

name: Ramona
line: Oh, sorry I'm late. I just got so caught up reading the draft of your latest paper.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you enjoy the humorous footnote where I illustrate mirror-symmetry by likening it to the Flash playing tennis with himself?

name: Ramona
line: So funny. But the idea that you might be able to incorporate gravity, I have to tell you, I found it physically exhilarating.

name: Sheldon
line: My hypotheses tend to have that effect.

name: Ramona
line: I'm sorry I didn't bring enough for your friends. I assumed we were going to be alone.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. No, we were just going.

name: Howard
line: To watch, right?

name: Leonard
line: No, come on, now, we're going out.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, we'll be quiet.

name: Leonard
line: Let's go. Okay, you two, just, have a nice... whatever this is.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you guys, look, I know this is none of my business, but I just, I have to ask, what's Sheldon's deal?

name: Leonard
line: What do you mean “deal”?

name: Penny
line: You know, like what's his deal? Is it girls? Guys? Sock puppets?

name: Leonard
line: Honestly, we've been operating under the assumption that he has no deal.

name: Penny
line: Come on, everybody has a deal.

name: Howard
line: Not Sheldon. Over the years, we've formulated many theories about how he might reproduce. I'm an advocate of mytosis.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry?

name: Howard
line: I believe one day Sheldon will eat an enormous amount of Thai food and split into two Sheldons.

name: Leonard
line: On the other hand, I think Sheldon might be the larval form of his species, and someday he'll spin a cocoon and emerge two months later with moth wings and an exoskeleton.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, thanks for the nightmares.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, do you want to hang out with us?

name: Penny
line: What are you guys gonna do?

name: Leonard
line: Uh...

name: Howard
line: My mom's making a brisket tonight.

name: Leonard
line: The one with the little onions? Mmm.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm busy, so, goodnight.

name: Howard
line: Her loss. Let's go.

name: Raj
line: Brisket party! B-to-the-R-to-the-I-S-K... To-the-E-to-the-T... Ooh...

name: Leonard
line: Don't.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, aren't you having breakfast?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: Are you experimenting with nutritional suppositories again?

name: Sheldon
line: Not in these pants.

name: Leonard
line: So, how'd it go with Ramona last night?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, great. She's smart, insightful and she has a very unique way of, you know, revering me.

name: Ramona
line: Here's your spinach mushroom omelette .

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Did anyone touch it?

name: Ramona
line: Gloves were worn by everyone involved. I was vigilant.

name: Sheldon
line: Ramona pointed out that I've been wasting 20 minutes a day standing on cafeteria lines.

name: Ramona
line: Time which would be better spent tackling the great physics problems of our day.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't tackle the big issues, Ramona. You fence with them. En garde. Riposte.

name: Leonard
line: Touche.

name: Leslie
line: Morning.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, hey Leslie.

name: Leslie
line: So, Sheldon, I see you're organizing your papers for the Smithsonian Museum of Dumbassery.

name: Ramona
line: There won't be any room until they get rid of the permanent Leslie Winkle exhibit.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good one.

name: Leslie
line: I see you got a grad student to fight your battles for you. I'll let you keep your lunch money today.

name: Ramona
line: Okay, Dr. Cooper is on the verge of a breakthrough. If you're going to stay, you'll have to be respectful and quiet.

name: Leonard
line: Wait for me.

name: Ramona
line: So have you worked out the neutrino issue?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, to paraphrase Mozart, all the subatomic particles are there, I just have to put them in the right order.

name: Ramona
line: You're so witty.

name: Sheldon
line: Aren't I?

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys, this package came for y...

name: Ramona
line: Dr. Cooper is working.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I'm close to a breakthrough. Ooh, it tickles

name: Penny
line: Sorry.   Holy crap on a cracker.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Penny.

name: Penny
line: Hi. You know, you probably don't want to go in there.

name: Leonard
line: Why? What are they doing?

name: Penny
line: You know, the only way I could explain it would be in a therapist's office with dolls.

name: Leonard
line: Hoo-boy.

name: Ramona
line: Dr. Cooper's working.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I can see that. Sheldon, Halo night, Koothrappali's. You coming?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes, it's Halo night. Let me just dry my tootsies.

name: Ramona
line: You're not going to Halo night.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I am. It's Wednesday. Wednesday's Halo night.

name: Ramona
line: Didn't a great man once say, “Science demands nothing less than the fervent and

name: Sheldon
line: He did.

name: Ramona
line: And who was that great man?

name: Sheldon
line: Me. Sorry, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Seriously? You're not coming?

name: Sheldon
line: You heard her. How can I argue with me?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, once again, you guys have a good... whatever this is.

name: Ramona
line: Dr. Cooper, I have to tell you, your friends are holding you back.

name: Sheldon
line: I prefer to think of it as I'm pulling them forward.

name: Ramona
line: Halo night? A man with your intellectual gifts doesn't waste an evening playing video games.

name: Sheldon
line: He does on Wednesdays.

name: Ramona
line: Not if he wants a Nobel Prize.

name: Sheldon
line: He does want that. Does a man with my intellectual gifts play paintball on weekends?

name: Ramona
line: What do you think?

name: Sheldon
line: Drat.

name: Ramona
line: Now shall we get back to work?

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose. Battlestar Galactica comes on tonight.  I guess I can wait for the DVD.  And then never ever watch it.

name: Montage of scenes
line: To the sound of “You Can Be My Yoko Ono” by Barenaked Ladies  we see 1. the guys set off for paintball while Sheldon, dressed in paintball gear, sadly waves them goodbye, 2. Ramona catch Sheldon hiding behind the shower curtain playing on a Nintendo DS, 3. Ramona remove a book Sheldon is reading to reveal a Batman comic underneath, 4. Sheldon escape the apartment in his paintball gear only to be chased back inside by Ramona returning with groceries, she finds him sitting in his underpants with his paintball helmet still on.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny,  Penny,  Penny

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, honey, I've told you, it's a small apartment, you only have to knock one time.

name: Sheldon
line: Please, please, I don't have a lot of time. Look, Ramona finally dozed off, and I need you to help me get rid of her.

name: Penny
line: Get rid of her how?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know, but apparently I'm in some kind of relationship, and you seem to be an expert at ending them.

name: Penny
line: Excuse me?

name: Sheldon
line: I see man after man leaving this apartment never to return.

name: Penny
line: Okay, first of all, it is not man after man.

name: Ramona
line: Dr. Cooper?!

name: Sheldon
line: Hide me.

name: Penny
line: Hide you?

name: Sheldon
line: I formally request sanctuary.

name: Ramona
line: Why aren't you working?

name: Sheldon
line: Um... she distracted me. I told you, Penny, I don't have time for your nonsense, I have important things to do.

name: Penny
line: Oh, man.

name: Ramona
line: I know what's going on here.

name: Penny
line: Really? Well, then will you explain it to me?

name: Ramona
line: You're in love with Dr. Cooper.

name: Penny
line: Uh, yeah, no, that's not it.

name: Ramona
line: Don't try to deny it. He's a remarkable man, but you have to let him go.

name: Penny
line: Oh, gee, okay.

name: Ramona
line: I know it's hard, but he's a gift to the whole world, and we can't be selfish.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, he's a gift all right.

name: Ramona
line: Sisters?

name: Penny
line: Um, sure, sisters.  Holy crap on a cracker.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon?  What are you doing?!

name: Sheldon
line: It's Morse code.

name: Leonard
line: Why?

name: Sheldon
line: So we can communicate through the wall.

name: Leonard
line: We are communicating through the wall.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but the communication is not encrypted.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know Morse code.

name: Sheldon
line: It's very simple. This is A  this is B  this is C...

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I'm not going to learn Morse code at three o'clock in the morning!

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Leonard
line: Don't come in here, don't come in here, don't come in here, don't  Aw! What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: Shh! Ramona's sleeping on the couch.

name: Leonard
line: I know. When is she going home?

name: Sheldon
line: Never, that's the problem. I need your help.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm invoking the Skynet clause of our friendship agreement.

name: Leonard
line: That only applies if you need me to help you destroy an artificial intelligence you created that's taking over the Earth.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on! Don't nitpick!

name: Leonard
line: Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Shh. All right, I'm invoking our bodysnatchers clause.

name: Leonard
line: The bodysnatchers clause requires me to help you destroy someone we know who's been replaced with an alien pod.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. She's in the living room. Go, I'll wait here.

name: Ramona
line: Sheldon, what are you doing out of bed?

name: Sheldon
line: Now! Do it!

name: Ramona
line: You know you need your sleep in order for your cognitive processing to perform at optimum levels. Now come on.

name: Sheldon
line: Godzilla clause?

name: Leonard
line: Not unless she destroys Tokyo.

name: Sheldon
line: Rats.

name: Sheldon
line: I've got it! I finally reconciled the black hole information paradox with my theory of string-network condensates!

name: Ramona
line: It's unbelievable! It's paradigm-altering!

name: Sheldon
line: And I could not have done it without you.

name: Ramona
line: Oh, please, I just offered a little encouragement.

name: Sheldon
line: It was a lot more than that. You helped me work out the masses of all the fermions, and you pumiced my hammer toe. How can I ever repay you?

name: Ramona
line: Well, would you consider naming it the Cooper-Nowitzki Theorem?

name: Sheldon
line: Who's Nowitzki?

name: Ramona
line: I'm Nowitzki.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you want me to share credit?

name: Ramona
line: Uh-huh.

name: Sheldon
line: Get out!

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, hi.

name: Ramona
line: Oh, bite me!

name: Penny
line: Sisters?

name: Girl
line: Excuse me, Dr. Cooper, I'm Kathy O'Brien. I just finished reading your paper reconciling the black hole information paradox with your theory of string-network condensates, and it just took my breath away.

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe when I publish it, I'll include an inhaler.

name: Kathy
line: Would you possibly have any time for me to pick your brain?

name: Sheldon
line: Let's see, today's Thursday. Thursday nights, I eat pizza from Giacomo's. Sausage, mushrooms, light olives.

name: Kathy
line: Great. I'll bring it to your place. I have the address.

name: Sheldon
line: What a nice girl.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, do you see what just happened here?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I'm getting a free pizza. I'm on a roll.

name: Sheldon
line: More Pad Thai, please.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, you've already had four servings.

name: Raj
line: You might want to slow down a bit, buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: Just one more bite.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon? Sheldon, are you okay?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm just so... full.

name: Leonard
line: That's it. No more Thai food.

name: Sheldon
line: Time. Alright Klingons, pencils down.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I have pokh.

name: All
line: Have it. Got it.

name: Leonard
line: Potl.

name: All
line: Yup. Have it. Have it.

name: Leonard
line: Pukhpa.

name: All
line: Have it. Got it. Yup.

name: Howard
line: I have Chorrr.

name: Raj & Sheldon
line: Got it. Yup.

name: Howard
line: Nekhmakh.

name: Raj & Sheldon
line: Yeah. Yeah.

line: And Kreplach.

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

line: That isn't Klingon, it's Yiddish for meat-filled dumpling.

name: Howard
line: Well, as it turns out, it's also a Klingon word.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Define it.

name: Howard
line: Kreplach, A hearty Klingon... dumpling.

name: Raj
line: Judge's ruling?

name: Sheldon
line: Bilurrrbe.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys, I need to use your TV.

name: Sheldon
line: What's wrong with your TV?

name: Penny
line: I don't know, it just died, I'm getting a bunch of static.

name: Howard
line: Did you pay your cable bill?

name: Penny
line: You sound just like the cable company. All right, so, shh, Tyra Banks is about to kick someone off  America's Next Top Model.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, Penny, but we're...

name: Leonard
line: No, no, don't tell her.

name: Sheldon
line: ...playing Klingon Boggle.

name: Leonard
line: Aw!

name: Howard
line: What do you mean, aw? Like she didn't know we were nerds?

name: Sheldon
line: All right, if you must watch, then mute it with closed captions, please.

name: Penny
line: Fine.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, Boggle warriors, kapla'!

name: Howard
line: Look at those women.

name: Leonard
line: They're gorgeous.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! Worf, nice! Too bad that's a proper noun.

name: Howard
line: Oh, look, the's the future Mrs. Wolowitz. No, wait, that's the future Mrs. Wolowitz. With her head in the lap of, what a coincidence. It's the future Mrs. Wolowitz.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, and they can all move in with you and your mother, the current Mrs. Wolowitz.

name: Sheldon
line: Is qochbe' spelled with a  or a ?

name: Howard
line: Why is that Mrs. Wolowitz crying?

name: Penny
line: Oh. That's Anais, none of the other girls in the house like her.

name: Howard
line: House? What house?

name: Penny
line: They all live in a house together.

name: Howard
line: A house, where?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. Somewhere in L.A.

name: Howard
line: Wait a minute, you're telling me that I'm within driving distance of a house filled with aspiring supermodels?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I guess.

name: Howard
line: And they live together and shower together and have naked pillow fights?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, wh-where are you going?

name: Penny
line: To pay my cable bill.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, pencils down! I have lokh, makh, and cherrrkh. Anybody got those?

name: Leonard
line: Did I miss anything? Did they kick Giselle off?

name: Raj
line: Not yet, but her underwater photo shoot was an embarrassment.

name: Howard
line: Sadly, Mrs. Giselle Wolowitz is sensitive to chlorine. Lucky for her I like my fashion models pruny and bug-eyed.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, the food's here.

name: Raj
line: There's the house, freeze frame, freeze frame.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Raj
line: Marking the star positions and physical landmarks so we can find the house of the supermodels.

name: Leonard
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: Isn't it obvious? Every week, they kick out a beautiful girl, making her feel unwanted and without self-esteem, a.k.a. the future Mrs. Howard Wolowitz.

name: Sheldon
line: Is my hamburger medium well?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Dill slices, not sweet?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Individual relish packets?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Onion rings?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Extra breading?

name: Leonard
line: I asked.

name: Sheldon
line: What did they say?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you protest?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Vociferously?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then what took you so long?

name: Leonard
line: Just eat.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys, what'd I miss? What'd I miss?

name: Howard
line: Giselle's hanging by a thread.

name: Penny
line: Oh, good, I hate her.

name: Howard
line: Then you're not invited to our wedding.

name: Leonard
line: Here you go.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, do we have to suffer through this transparently manipulative pseudo-reality again?

name: All
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: You and I have a standing TV schedule which is the result of extensive debate and compromise. Any alterations except for breaking news have to be pre-approved at the weekly roommate meeting.

name: Leonard
line: Put it on the agenda.

name: Sheldon
line: But you have to make a motion to put it on agenda.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I'll make a motion, but you're not going to like it.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Mock Parliamentary procedure. At least put it on mute.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Giselle's not getting kicked off. It's totally going to be Summer.  What?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon's onion ring. Just put it back!

name: Penny
line: It's one onion ring.

name: Howard
line: Just put it back before he comes!

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no,  no, I don't think that's where it was.

name: Howard
line: Okay, here he comes, deny, deny, people, wall of silence.

name: Sheldon
line: Who touched my...

name: All
line: Penny! Penny did it.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would you do that?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. I was hungry? What's the big deal?

name: Sheldon
line: The big deal is that nobody touches food on my plate.

name: Penny
line: All right. Look, I didn't know, I'm sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm sorry, but that is your second strike.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: You have two strikes. Three strikes and you're out. It's a sports metaphor.

name: Penny
line: A sports metaphor?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, baseball.

name: Penny
line: All right, yeah, I'll play along. What was my first strike?

name: Sheldon
line: March 18th. You violated my rule about forwarding email humour.

name: Penny
line: I did?

name: Sheldon
line: The photo of the cat who wants to “has cheezburger”?

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, everybody loves LOLcats. They're cute and they can't spell 'cause they're cats.

name: Sheldon
line: I trusted you with my email address, and you betrayed that trust by sending me Internet banality, strike one. Touching my food, strike two.

name: Leonard
line: Don't worry. They only stay on your record for a year.

name: Howard
line: You can get them removed early, but you have to take his class.

name: Penny
line: Come on, I touched one onion ring.

name: Sheldon
line: And then you put it back, compromising the integrity of all the other onion rings.

name: Penny
line: Oh, honey, the buses don't go where you live, do they?

name: Sheldon
line: Look, Penny, I wish I could be more lenient with you, but since you've become a permanent member of our social group I have to hold you to the same standards as everybody else.

name: Leonard
line: Congratulations. You're officially one of us.

name: Howard
line: One of us, one of us.

name: Penny
line: Well, what a thrill.

name: Sheldon
line: You're sitting in my spot.

name: Penny
line: Oh, jeez, you've got to be kidding me.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, she's in my spot.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, yeah. Uh, see, here's the thing, after you leave, I still have to live with him.

name: Penny
line: I don't care. I'm taking a stand. Metaphorically.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, that's it. Strike three.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, strike three.

name: Penny
line: I'm banished? What the hell kind of crap is that?

name: Leonard
line: Listen, don't worry. I'll talk to him.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you do that.

name: Leonard
line: Just so I know, would you be open to taking his class? You can do it online!

name: Howard
line: So based on our triangulation we've narrowed down the location of the top model house to three square miles in the Hollywood Hills.

name: Raj
line: Or possibly Durham, North Carolina.

name: Howard
line: When we find it, you want to go with us?

name: Leonard
line: To do what?

name: Raj
line: Party with the pretty girls, dude!

name: Leonard
line: Are you insane? You're not going to party with them, you're not even going to get anywhere near that place.

name: Howard
line: That's what they said to Neil Armstrong about the moon.

name: Sheldon
line: No one said anything of the kind to Neil Armstrong, the entire nation dedicated a decade of effort and treasure to put a man on the moon.

name: Howard
line: Well, my fellow Americans, before this year is out we will put a Wolowitz on one of America's top models.

name: Raj
line: And a large number of people will believe it never happened.

name: Penny
line: Okay, let me guess. A quesadilla with soy cheese for the lactose-intolerant Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Shrimp Caesar salad with no almonds for the highly allergic kosher-only-on-the-high-holidays Howard, and for our suddenly back on the Hindu wagon Raj, meatlover's pizza, no meat. Coming right up.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. Excuse me. You forgot my barbecue bacon cheeseburger, barbecue sauce, bacon and cheese on the side.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I didn't tell you? You're banished from the Cheesecake Factory.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: Well, you have three strikes. One, coming in. Two, sitting down. And three, I don't like your attitude.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't do that. Not only is it a violation of California state law, it flies directly in the face of Cheesecake Factory policy.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, no, there's a new policy. No shoes, no shirt, no Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: I bet we could sell that sign all over Pasadena.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, can I talk to you for a minute? Hi.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Look, here's the thing, um, I talked to Sheldon and he feels terrible and he agrees that he was unreasonable and out of line.

name: Penny
line: Really? Well, that's great.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, so just apologize to him, okay?

name: Penny
line: What? I'm not going to apologize to that nutcase.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on, it's easy, he'll even tell you what to say.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, don't you get it? If you guys keep going along with his insanity, you're just encouraging him.

name: Leonard
line: We're not encouraging. It's more like knuckling under.

name: Penny
line: Look, I like hanging out with you guys, but I'm not going to apologize for something I didn't do.

name: Leonard
line: Well, actually, technically, you did do it.

name: Penny
line: That's strike one, Leonard.

name: Penny
line: There you go, quesadilla, salad, there's your pizza, and thanks to Sheldon's heated discussion with my manager one barbecue bacon cheeseburger, barbecue sauce, bacon and cheese on the side.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Go ahead, eat it. I dare you

name: Howard
line: That's it. There's the house, I found America's top models!

name: Raj
line: Are you sure?

name: Howard
line: Look, on the roof, Anais and Giselle are sunbathing. European-style.

name: Leonard
line: You can recognize people on Google Earth?

name: Howard
line: Of course not, I got a buddy of mine at NORAD to have a spy drone fly over.

name: Leonard
line: NORAD? You're using military aircraft?

name: Howard
line: It was already targeted to poke around a nuclear reactor in Siberia, I took it an hour out of its way, tops.

name: Penny
line: Okay, where is he?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon? I just dropped him off at the comic book store. Why?

name: Penny
line: Here. Try and go online.

name: Leonard
line: Problem with the WiFi?

name: Penny
line: No, just try.

name: Sheldon
line: Greetings, hamburger toucher. You are probably wondering why you cannot IM with your little friends about how much you heart various things. Well, this recorded message is alerting you that I am putting an end to your parasitic piggybacking upon our WiFi. If you want to remedy the situation you can contact the phone company, set up your own WiFi and pay for it, or you may apologize to me.

name: Penny
line: Well?

name: Leonard
line: I reiterate, knuckle under.

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, no, no. It is on. I am gonna introduce your friend to a world of hurt.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Penny, you don't want to get into it with Sheldon. The guy is one lab accident away from being a supervillain.

name: Penny
line: I don't care, I was in junior rodeo, I can hogtie and castrate him in 60 seconds.

name: Howard
line: No need to neuter the nerd, I can get you back online.

name: Leonard
line: There, see? Problem solved.

name: Howard
line: Voila!

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, puny insects. As a consequence of your efforts to circumvent my will, everyone is awarded one additional strike.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks a lot, Howard.

name: Howard
line: What are you complaining about? I'm the one who has to take the class again.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! Hello.

name: Penny
line: Time to do your laundry, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: It's Saturday night. Saturday is laundry night.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you implying?

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, are all the machines taken? What are you gonna do?

name: Sheldon
line: No problem, I'll just do my laundry another night.

name: Penny
line: Another night? Well, I guess you can try, but deep inside your heart you'll know that laundry night is always Saturday night.

name: Sheldon
line: Woman, you are playing with forces beyond your ken.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, your ken can kiss my Barbie.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon  Sheldon  Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes?

name: Penny
line: Where are my clothes?

name: Sheldon
line: Your clothes?

name: Penny
line: Yes, I left them in the washers and when I went down to get them, they were gone.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? Despite the sign that says “Do not leave laundry unattended”?

name: Penny

name: Penny
line: Why did you have to make him happy?

name: Leonard
line: Because when he wasn't happy, we wanted to kill him. There was even a plan. We were going to throw his Kindle outside, and when he went to get it, lock the door and let him freeze to death.

name: Sheldon
line: That seems like a bit of an overreaction.

name: Leonard
line: No, the overreaction was the plan to tie your limbs to four different sled dog teams and yell mush. Look, we kept the original data. You can still publish the actual results.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but the actual results are unsuccessful and I've already sent an e-mail to everyone at the university explaining that I have confirmed string theory and forever changed man's understanding of the universe.

name: Leonard
line: Aw, see, yeah, you probably shouldn't have done that. So write another e-mail, set the record straight, it's no big deal.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right, Leonard, it's not a big deal. All you did was lie to me destroy my dream and humiliate me in front of the whole university. That, FYI, was sarcasm. I, in fact, believe it is a big deal

name: Penny
line: Oh, the poor thing.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I feel terrible.

name: Penny
line: Wait, wait. Aren't you going to go talk to him?

name: Leonard
line: What? Uh, he'll be fine, the guy's a trouper, come here.

name: Penny
line: No, you're right, you shouldn't talk to him. I will.

name: Leonard
line: Man, I cannot catch a break.

name: Penny
line: Hey. Do you want to talk?

name: Sheldon
line: About what? Being betrayed by my friends? Spending three months at the North Pole for nothing? And I didn't even get to go to Comic-Con!

name: Penny
line: Oh, hon... Uh...   Soft kitty, warm kitty...

name: Sheldon
line: That's for when I'm sick. Sad is not sick.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Sorry. I don't know your sad song.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't have a sad song. I'm not a child.

name: Penny
line: Well, you know, I do understand what you're going through.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? Did you just have the Nobel Prize in waitressing stolen from you?

name: Penny
line: Well, no, but when I was a senior in high school, one of my friends heard I was going to be named head cheerleader. Oh, I was so excited. My mom even made me a celebration pie. Then they named stupid Valerie Mossbacher head cheerleader. Big ol' slutbag.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you saying that you think a celebration pie is even remotely comparable to a Nobel Prize?

name: Penny
line: Well, they're pretty tasty.

name: Sheldon
line: And on a different, but not unrelated topic, based on your current efforts to buoy my spirits, do you truly believe that you were ever fit to be a cheer leader?

name: Penny
line: Look, Sheldon, I just don't think that the guys and Leonard really meant to hurt you. You know? They just told an unfortunate lie to deal with a difficult situation. Okay, you know what it's like? Remember that scene in the new Star Trek movie when Kirk has to take over the ship, so he tells Spock all that stuff he knew wasn't true, like saying Spock didn't care his mom died?

name: Sheldon
line: I missed Comic-Con and the new Star Trek movie!

name: Raj
line: I like the new look.

name: Howard
line: Thanks. I call it the Clooney.

name: Raj
line: I call it the Mario and Luigi, but whatever. Hey, how's Sheldon doing?

name: Leonard
line: Well, he came out of his room this morning wearing his Darth Vader helmet and tried to choke me to death with the Force, so I'd say, a little better.

name: Howard
line: If I may abruptly change the subject, did you and Penny finally... you know.

name: Leonard
line: Howard...

name: Howard
line: Personally, I don't care, but my genitals wanted me to ask.

name: Leonard
line: Well, tell your genitals what I do with Penny is none of their business.

name: Howard
line: He says they didn't do it.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, over here.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing?

name: Raj
line: I feel bad for the guy.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, why are you sitting by yourself?

name: Sheldon
line: Because I am without friends. Like the proverbial cheese, I stand alone. Even while seated.

name: Leonard
line: Come on. We said we were sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: It's going to take more than I'm sorry and a store-bought apology pie from Penny to make up for what you've done to me.

name: Kripke
line: Hey, Cooper. Wead your wetwaction e-mail. Way to destroy your weputation.

name: Sheldon
line: You see? People have been pointing and laughing at me all morning.

name: Kripke
line: That's not twue. People have been pointing and waughing at you your whole wife.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, I've had enough. Attention, everyone. I' m Dr. Sheldon Cooper. As many of you in the physics department might know, my career trajectory has taken a minor detour.

name: Kripke
line: Off a cwiff.

name: Sheldon
line: My credibility may have been damaged...

name: Kripke
line: Compwetely wecked.

name: Sheldon
line: But I would like to remind you that in science, there's no such thing as failure. There once was a man who referred to his prediction of a cosmological constant as the single biggest blunder of his career. That man's name was, surprise, surprise, Albert Einstein.

name: Kripke
line: Yeah, but wesearch into Dark Energy pwoved that Einstein's cosmowogical constant was actually wight all along, so you're still, surpwise, surpwise, a woser.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you think you're so clever. Well, let me just tell you, while I do not currently have a scathing retort, you check your e-mail periodically for a doozy.

name: Leonard
line: So much for our friendship with Sheldon.

name: Raj
line: Well, we'll always have the night the heat went out.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. Listen, since we got, you know, interrupted last night, I didn't have a chance to give you this.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Leonard, you shouldn't have. Oh, boy! What is it?

name: Leonard
line: It's a snowflake. From the North Pole.

name: Penny
line: Are you serious?

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh. It'll last forever. I preserved it in a one percent solution of polyvinyl acetal resin.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God. That's the most romantic thing anyone's ever said to me that I didn't understand.

name: Leonard
line: It's actually a pretty simple process. You see, cyanoacrylate are monomers which polymerize on...

name: Howard
line: Red alert, Leonard. Sheldon ran away.

name: Leonard
line: Man, I can not catch a break.

name: Penny
line: So, how do you know he ran away?

name: Howard
line: Well, he's not answering his phone, he handed in his resignation at the university and he sent me a text that said, I'm running away.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, thanks for letting me know.

name: Penny
line: Well, Leonard, aren't you going to do something?

name: Leonard
line: Of course I'm going to do something. Uh, Howard, you check the comic book store. Raj, go to the Thai restaurant. I'll stay here with Penny in her apartment.  Oh, damn it. It's Sheldon's mother. A break cannot be caught. Hi, Mrs. Cooper. He is? Sheldon went home to Texas. Yeah, no, I know he resigned. Yes, I guess it kind of is our fault. No, no, no, you, you're right, someone needs to come talk to him. Don't worry, I'll take care of it. Yeah. All right. New plan. Howard, you and Raj go to Texas. I'll stay here with Penny in her apartment.

name: Penny
line: Well, you're not gonna go with them?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you know, I gave you the snowflake and we were kissing and... Oh, come on, I don't want to go to Texas!

name: Howard
line: Oh, right, and I do? My people already crossed a desert once, we're done.

name: Leonard
line: Trust me, you'll be fine. See ya.

name: Penny
line: Well, wait a second, Leonard, come on, how can you not go? He's your best friend.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, but I already saw him naked. Just come here.

name: Penny
line: No. I promise I will be here when you get back. Just go help Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. We waited a few months. We can wait a few more days.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe you can.

name: Penny
line: Go.

name: Raj
line: Boy, you cannot catch a break, can you?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Here you go, Shelly.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks, Mom.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Hold your horses, young man. Here in Texas, we pray before we eat.

name: Sheldon
line: Aw, Mom.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: This is not California, land of the heathen. Gimme. By His hand we are all...

name: Sheldon
line: Fed.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Give us, Lord, our daily...

name: Sheldon
line: Bread.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Please know that we are truly...

name: Sheldon
line: Grateful.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: For every cup and every...

name: Sheldon
line: Plateful.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Amen. Now, that wasn't so hard, was it?

name: Sheldon
line: My objection was based on considerations other than difficulty.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Whatever. Jesus still loves you.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for carving a smiley face in my grilled cheese sandwich.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, I know how to take care of my baby. His eyes came out a little thin, but you can just pretend he's Chinese. So, do you want to talk about what happened with you and your little friends?

name: Sheldon
line: They're not my friends.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: All right. If you recall, when you were little, we sat right here at this very spot and we talked about some of the problems you had getting along with the neighbour kids.

name: Sheldon
line: That was different. They were threatened by my intelligence and too stupid to know that's why they hated me.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh baby, they knew very well why they hated you.

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe you bought a red cowboy hat.

name: Howard
line: Hello? I'm wearing a red turtleneck. Plus, it was the only boys' large they had.

name: Raj
line: I'm sorry, this does not look like Texas. Where's the tumbleweeds? Where's the saloons?

name: Leonard
line: Saloons?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, like in the movies I saw growing up in India. You know, uh, Four for Texas, Yellow Rose of Texas.

name: Howard
line: This neighbourhood is more Texas Chainsaw Massacre.

name: Raj
line: I was really hoping to see a cattle drive.

name: Leonard
line: What can I tell you? They probably have steaks on sale at that big-ass Costco over there.

name: Leonard
line: Will you please take that stupid hat off?

name: Howard
line: No, I want to blend in.

name: Raj
line: To what? Toy Story?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Hi, boys.

name: Howard
line: Howdy, ma'am.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Howdy to you, too. You got here quick.

name: Leonard
line: - We took the red-eye.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, come on in.

name: Howard
line: Thank you kindly.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Can I... Can I get you something to drink?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, no, thank you.

name: Howard
line: If y'all don't mind, I got a hankerin' for a Lone Star beer.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: There's no alcohol in this household. Stop talking like that and lose the hat.

name: Howard
line: Sorry. I'll take a diet Yoo-Hoo if you have it.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: You'll take a Cola.* What about you? Radge, isn't it? Oh, you still having trouble talking to the ladies? Because, you know, at our church we have a woman who's an amazing healer. Mostly she does, uh, crutch and wheelchair people, but I bet she'd be willing to take a shot at whatever Third World demon is running around inside of you.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: A girl?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yes, ma'am.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, good. I've been praying for you. Oh, Sheldon.

name: Leonard

name: Howard
line: Again.

name: Leonard
line: And bring you home. So, why don't you pack up your stuff and we'll head back.

name: Leonard
line: No, this is my home now. Thanks to you, my career is over and I will spend the rest of my life here in Texas trying to teach evolution to creationists.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: You watch your mouth, Shelly. Everyone's entitled to their opinion.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: And that is your opinion.

name: Sheldon
line: I forgive you. Let's go home.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Don't tell me prayer doesn't work.

line: I hope it's all right, I told my girlfriend Bernadette she could join us for dinner.

name: Leonard
line: Sure. The more, the merrier.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, no, that's a false equivalency. More does not equal merry. If there were 2,000 people in this apartment right now, would we be celebrating? No, we'd be suffocating.

line: Oh no, no, you see, in the winter, that seat is close enough to the radiator so that he's warm, yet not so close that he sweats. In the summer, it's directly in the path of a cross-breeze created by opening windows there and there. It faces the television at an angle that isn't direct, so he can still talk to everybody, yet not so wide that the picture looks distorted.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps there's hope for you after all.

line: Ooh, I love your shoes.

line: My mother was right. Hell is real.

line: Yeah, well, I don't think it's very funny.

line: So, Leonard, Howard says you're working on fundamental tests of quantum mechanics.

line: I am. Are you interested in physics?

line: Oh, I find it fascinating. If I hadn't gone into microbiology, I probably would have gone into physics. Or ice dancing.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, my tests of the Aharonov-Bohm quantum interference effect have reached an interesting point. Right now, we're testing the phase shift due to an electric potential.

name: Bernadette
line: That's amazing.

line: Yes. Leonard's work is nearly as amazing as third graders growing lima beans in wet paper towels.  While I appreciate the oh, snap, I'm uncomfortable having your moist breath in my ear.

line: Yes, I am. You want to see a simulation on my laptop?

line: Oh, yeah, show me. In microbiology, the most exciting thing I get to work with is yeast.

line: Bazinga. I don't care.

line: All right.  Go away. I agree, it's rude, but she asked for privacy.

line: Thanks, Raj. Okay, so here's the thing, I was wondering if you could maybe teach me a little physics?

line: Yeah, okay, cool. I don't need the PBS special, I just want to know enough so I can talk to Leonard about his job. You know, like Bernadette does.

line: Hey, fellas. This is my girlfriend Bernadette. My girlfriend Bernadette.

line: Wow! You really are a piece of work. It's not enough you get the prom queen, you have to get the head of the decorating committee, too?

name: Sheldon
line: Research journal, entry one. I'm about to embark on one of the great challenges of my scientific career, teaching Penny physics. I'm calling it Project Gorilla.

line: Hey, Sheldon.

line: Come in. Take a seat. Subject has arrived. I've extended a friendly casual greeting.

line: Ready to get started?

line: One moment. Subject appears well-rested and enthusiastic. Apparently, ignorance is bliss. All right, let us begin. Where's your notebook?

line: Tests. Here. It's college-ruled. I hope that's not too intimidating.

line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. Now, Introduction to Physics. What is physics? Physics comes from the ancient Greek word physika. It's at this point that you'll want to start taking notes. Physika means the science of natural things. And it is there, in ancient Greece, that our story begins.

name: Penny
line: Ancient Greece?

name: Sheldon
line: Hush. If you have questions, raise your hand. It's a warm summer evening, circa 600 BC, you've finished your shopping at the local market, or agora, and you look up at the night sky. There you notice some of the stars seem to move, so you name them planetes, or wanderer. Yes, Penny?

line: Um, does this have anything to do with Leonard's work?

That's all I know. Oh, wait! Fig Newtons were named after a town in Massachusetts, not the scientist.

line: I sense you're making a joke, but Bozeman does have a comedy club called The Loony Bin, so do not forward my mail there.

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on. So you were the victim of a crime. That's part of life. When my great-grandfather first came to this country, he put all his hopes and dreams into this little butcher shop he ran on the Lower East Side of New York. You know what happened? Every customer who walked into that butcher shop and asked for a pound of liver, got ripped off. But, those people moved on, and so should you.

name: Sheldon
line: I am moving on. I'm going to be a Bozite.

name: Leonard
line: They call themselves Bozites?

name: Sheldon
line: They should. It's one of the first things I plan to bring up upon arrival.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm going to miss you.

name: Sheldon
line: Please, Penny, as you know, I'm not comfortable with prolonged good-byes and maudlin displays of emotion, so I prepared a short video.

name: Sheldon on laptop screen
line: Greetings. As you know, I'm not comfortable with prolonged good-byes and maudlin displays of emotion, so I prepared this short video. The four of you are three of my closest friends and one treasured acquaintance. Though I cannot state categorically that my life will be diminished by not having you in it, I am comfortable if you choose to believe that. Since you intend to remain in this lawless metropolitan area, statistics suggest that you will succumb to tragic and gruesome ends before we meet again. Live long and prosper.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, that's so...

name: Sheldon
line: You might want to lock the door behind me. This isn't Bozeman.

name: Howard
line: How the hell do I know who's the friend and who's the acquaintance?

name: Sheldon
line: That is a bracing cold, an invigorating cold. Lord, is it cold!

name: Man
line: Help you with your bags, sir?

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you, fellow Bozite. And may I say, you are the living embodiment of all the promises made by our lovely town's Chamber of Commerce.  Wait! Wait! Excuse me!  One ticket to Pasadena, California, please.

name: Howard
line: Hey, look who's back!

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. The acquaintance is the first to greet me.

name: Penny
line: Whatcha doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm attempting to view my work as a fleeting peripheral image so as to engage the superior colliculus of my brain.

name: Penny
line: Interesting. I usually just have coffee. You've been up all night?

name: Sheldon
line: Is it morning?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Then I've been up all night.

name: Penny
line: And you're stuck?

name: Sheldon
line: Why else would a person try to engage their superior colliculus?

name: Penny
line: Oh, sorry, sweetie, I can't help you till I've had my coffee.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, I told you if you don't put him in his crate at night he just runs around the apartment.

name: Penny
line: What is he doing now?

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, he's either isolating the terms of his formula and examining them individually, or looking for the alligator that swallowed his hand after Peter Pan cut it off.

name: Sheldon
line: Captain Hook's hand was eaten by a crocodile, not an alligator. If you're going to mock me, at least get your facts straight.

name: Leonard
line: Aye, aye, Captain.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't see it! It just won't coalesce.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe you need a fresh start.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right.  It's a great idea, Leonard. Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Electrons move through graphene, act as if they have no mass...

name: Howard
line: How long has he been stuck?

name: Leonard
line: Intellectually about 30 hours. Emotionally about 29 years.

name: Sheldon
line: Unit cell contains two carbon atoms. Interior angle of a hexagon is 120 degrees.

name: Howard
line: Have you tried rebooting him?

name: Leonard
line: No, I think it's a firmware problem.

name: Raj
line: Hey, it's Disco Night at the Moonlight Roller Rink in Glendale tonight. Who's up for getting down?

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's perfect. Bernadette's been hocking me to take her roller skating.

name: Leonard
line: I think Penny likes to skate. The four of us could double.

name: Howard
line: What could be better? We're in.

name: Raj
line: Great. It's not like I brought it up because I wanted to go.

name: Howard
line: You can come with us.

name: Raj
line: No, it's okay. I don't have to go. I'm happy just to guide you and your ladies to suitable entertainment choices. I'm a walking brown Yelp.com.

name: Sheldon
line: Structure, constant structure. One atom...

name: Howard
line: Boy, he's really gone, isn't he?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, this morning he used a stick of butter as deodorant.

name: Howard
line: I thought I smelled popcorn.

name: Sheldon
line: Pattern is the same as fermions, travels on the pathways, hexagonal, it's always hexagonal...

name: Leonard
line: I haven't seen him this stuck since he tried to figure out the third Matrix movie.

name: Raj
line: Hey, those are my lima beans!

name: Sheldon
line: Not lima beans, carbon atoms.

name: Raj
line: But if I don't eat my lima beans, I can't have my cookie.

name: Leonard
line: Here, you want my peas?

name: Sheldon
line: Peas! Perfect, they can be electrons.

name: Howard
line: Want my corn?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't be ridiculous. What would I do with corn?

name: Leonard
line: So roller skating, should we all grab a bite to eat first?

name: Howard
line: Good. P.F. Chang's? My mom has coupons.

name: Leonard
line: Great. Your mom's not coming, right?

name: Howard
line: Not this time, I promise.

name: Raj
line: Okay, just to be clear, roller skating was my idea, and I'm very unhappy that you turned it into a double date, and I hope you both fall on your asses and break your coccyxes.

name: Sheldon
line: The plural of coccyx is coccyges.

name: Raj
line: Screw you. Give me back my lima beans.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, my God, have you ever been so embarrassed?

name: Penny
line: Not recently.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know which was lamer, their roller-skating or their disco dancing.

name: Penny
line: For me, the worst part was when people saw us leave with them.

name: Leonard
line: You had some nice moves out there, Howard.

name: Howard
line: Thanks. You, too.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Did you notice all the people looking at us?

name: Howard
line: Not really. I was in my boogie zone.

name: Bernadette
line: When Howard tried to do the splits...

name: Penny
line: Shh.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry. I'm moving a little slow. I think I bruised my coccyx.

name: Penny
line: Oh, poor baby.

name: Leonard
line: Don't tell Koothrappali. After you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, what a gentleman. Hey, Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my God! Are you...

name: Sheldon
line: Good Lord! You're ruining everything!

name: Penny
line: Oh, damn.

name: Leonard
line: Are you okay?

name: Penny
line: Do I look okay?

name: Leonard
line: Don't bark at me. I fell, too.

name: Penny
line: Oh, you've been falling all night. You're used to it.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, what the hell are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: The same thing I've been doing for three days. Trying to figure out why electrons behave as if they have no mass when travelling through a graphene sheet.

name: Bernadette
line: With marbles?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I needed something bigger than peas, now, didn't I?

name: Bernadette
line: Sheldon, when was the last time you got any sleep?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know, two, three days. Not important. I don't need sleep, I need answers. I need to determine where in this swamp of unbalanced formulas squatteth the toad of truth.

name: Penny
line: Toad of truth? Is that a physics thing?

name: Leonard
line: No, that's a crazy thing.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, Sheldon. What happens to our neuroreceptors when we don't get enough REM sleep?

name: Sheldon
line: They lose their sensitivity to serotonin and norepinephrine.

name: Bernadette
line: Which leads to...?

name: Sheldon
line: Impaired cognitive function.

name: Bernadette
line: Right, so march in there, brush your teeth and go to bed.

name: Sheldon
line: But I don't want to go to bed.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm going to count to three. One...

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, all right.

name: Leonard
line: That was amazing how you handled him.

name: Bernadette
line: I know how to deal with stubborn children. My mother used to run an illegal day care centre in our basement.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, you're... you're giggling in your sleep.

name: Leonard
line: It's not me, it's my new ringtone. The Joker from Batman.

name: Penny
line: Well, it creeps me out.

name: Leonard
line: Me, too, but I paid three bucks for it.

name: Penny
line: Just answer the phone.

name: Leonard
line: Hello. Yeah, I'm Leonard Hofstadter. Yeah, yeah, he's my roommate. Oh, God, is he okay? Yeah, alright, alright, I'll be right there.

name: Penny
line: What happened?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon's escaped and is terrorizing the village.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Have fun.

name: Leonard
line: Hi. I'm Dr. Hofstadter. Where is he?

name: Security Guard
line: Ball pit.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks for not calling the cops.

name: Security Guard
line: Oh, hey, it's no big deal. My sister's got a kid who's special.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, well, he's extra special. Hey, Shelly. What you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Size ratio was all wrong. Couldn't visualize it. Needed bigger carbon atoms.

name: Leonard
line: Sure, sure. How did you get into this place?

name: Sheldon
line: Back door has a five-pin tumbler system, single-circuit alarm. Child's play. You can start sorting protons and neutrons while I build carbon atoms.

name: Leonard
line: No, I don't think so. We need to go home now.

name: Sheldon
line: But I'm still working.

name: Leonard
line: If you don't come out of there, I'm going to have to drag you out.

name: Sheldon
line: You can try, but you'll never catch me.

name: Leonard
line: For God's sakes. Sheldon, come here!

name: Sheldon
line: Bazinga.  Bazinga.  Bazinga.  Bazinga.  Bazinga.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard and Penny.  Leonard and Penny.

name: Leonard
line: What! What, what, what?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard and Penny.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I have good news.

name: Leonard
line: And you had to barge in here and wake us up in the middle of the night?

name: Sheldon
line: Your cell phone was off.

name: Leonard
line: Because we didn't want to be disturbed.

name: Sheldon
line: And that didn't work out, did it?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, what do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: I came to tell you I've got the answer.

name: Leonard
line: Really? You figured out the graphene problem?

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, I'm still hopelessly stuck on that, but I figured out how to figure it out.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you know what, Leonard, I know I said I could handle your roommate, but I was wrong. We're going to have to break up.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Sheldon
line: Einstein.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm going to need a little more.

name: Sheldon
line: Albert Einstein.

name: Leonard
line: Keep going.

name: Sheldon
line: When Albert Einstein came up with special relativity, he was working at the patent office.

name: Leonard
line: So, you're going to go work at the patent office?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't be absurd. That's in Washington. You know I could never live in a city whose streets are laid out in a wheel-and-spoke pattern. No. I'm going to find a similarly menial job where my basal ganglia are occupied with a routine task, freeing my prefrontal cortex to work quietly in the background on my problem.

name: Leonard
line: Sounds like a great plan.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course it is. Even talking to you is sufficiently menial that I can feel the proverbial juices starting to flow.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, thanks for sharing with us. Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. Good night to you, too. Oh, by the way, I was watching you sleep for a moment, and I noticed that your snoring seems to be worse when you're on your back.

name: Penny
line: Leonard doesn't snore.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I wasn't talking to Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Told you.

name: Employment Office Assistant
line: So, Mr. Cooper, you're looking for a job.

name: Sheldon
line: A menial job. Like yours.

name: Assistant
line: Why, thank you for noticing. I'm Menial Employee of the Month. Do you have a particular field in mind?

name: Sheldon
line: I do. For thousands of years, the lowest classes of the human race have spent their lives labouring to erect monuments under the lash of their betters, until finally they dropped down and became one with the dust through which they trudged. Do you have anything like that?

name: Assistant
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Shouldn't you check your database?

name: Assistant
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: You didn't really type.

name: Assistant
line: I didn't really have to. So, how about construction?

name: Sheldon
