line: Oh, that would be good! Sawing, hammering, eating out of a lunch pail as my working-class fellows and I sit perched precariously on a girder high above the metropolis.

name: Assistant
line: No, no. This is putting up sheetrock at a housing project in Rosemead.

name: Sheldon
line: I could do that.

name: Assistant
line: Good.

name: Sheldon
line: One question.

name: Assistant
line: Yes?

name: Sheldon
line: What's sheetrock?

name: Assistant
line: Moving on. How about doing deliveries for a florist?

name: Sheldon
line: That seems acceptable.

name: Assistant
line: Do you have your own car?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't drive.

name: Assistant
line: Of course you don't. Mr. Cooper, let me just ask you a question. What was your last job?

name: Sheldon
line: Senior theoretical particle physicist at CalTech, focusing on M theory, or, in layman's terms, string theory.

name: Assistant
line: I see. Just give me a second. Security!

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'll get those drinks started for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Behind you.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, what the hell are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm trying to get these tables cleared. We're slammed.

name: Penny
line: No, wait, wait, no, wait. Wh.. what are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: A reasonable question. I asked myself, what is the most mind-numbing, pedestrian job conceivable, and three answers came to mind, uh, toll booth attendant, an Apple Store genius, and what Penny does. Now, since I don't like touching other people's coins, and I refuse to contribute to the devaluation of the word genius, here I am.

name: Penny
line: You just, you just walked in and they hired you, just like that?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, heavens, no. Since I don't need to be paid, I didn't need to be hired. I simply came in, picked up a tray, and started working for the man. Let me get that plate out of your way.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, this is ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it? Just a moment ago I had a minor epiphany regarding the polymer degradation phenomenon while scraping congealed nachos off a plate. Bernadette, table 10 wants their check.

name: Bernadette
line: Thanks, Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, wait, this isn't even what I do. I'm a waitress, not a busboy.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. That is more menial. Hello, I'm Sheldon. I'll be your server today. I don't recommend the salmon. I saw it in the kitchen.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, one bacon cheeseburger, breaking two Jewish dietary restrictions simultaneously, kudos. Beer-battered fish and chips. Now, here's your tartar sauce. I also brought you salsa. It's a little unconventional, but I think you'll like it. It's zingy. And for you, Factory Burrito Grande, no cheese, no sour cream, no ugly consequences from your lactose intolerance. Bon appétit.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on. Black beans, not pinto beans?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: Double guacamole?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course.

name: Leonard
line: No cilantro?

name: Sheldon
line: Nope.

name: Leonard
line: Lettuce shredded, not chopped?

name: Sheldon
line: Yep.

name: Leonard
line: You understand why I'm doing this to you?

name: Sheldon
line: I do.

name: Leonard
line: That'll be all. That was fun.

name: Raj
line: How long can he keep this up?

name: Leonard
line: I heard about this professor at MIT who melted down, bought a van, and spent the rest of his life as a mobile dog groomer.

name: Raj
line: He never went back to the university?

name: Leonard
line: Only to shampoo Professor Chambourg's shih tzu.

name: Raj
line: Sheesh.

name: Howard
line: I bet if we all chipped in, we could buy Sheldon a van.

name: Raj
line: But he's afraid of dogs.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that's the only thing wrong with that plan.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys, sorry you had to wait, but we are swamped. What's this?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon took our order.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon doesn't work here.

name: Leonard
line: Well, honey, not to complain, but we were starting to think you didn't either.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that really necessary? Good Lord. The interference pattern in the fracture. The motion of the wave through the molecular structure. I've been looking at it all wrong. I can't consider the electrons as particles. They move through the graphene as a wave. It's a wave! The moment to applaud would be now. Troglodytes.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, where are you going? Aren't you going to clean this up?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. I don't work here.

name: Howard
line: Happy now?

name: Raj
line: I'm on a cloud. Swing me.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, come here.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I miss you, too, sweetie. Listen, I got to go, but I'll see you tonight? Okay. Bye-bye. Yeah, bye-bye. No, you hang up first. Hello?

name: Raj
line: Dude, I'm glad you finally got a girlfriend, but do you have to do all that lovey-dovey stuff in front of those of us who don't?

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, he might have to. There's an economic concept known as a positional good in which an object is only valued by the possessor because it's not possessed by others. The term was coined in 1976 by economist Fred Hirsch to replace the more colloquial, but less precise neener-neener.

name: Howard
line: That's not true. My happiness is not dependent on my best friend being miserable and alone.

name: Raj
line: Thank you.

name: Howard
line: Although, I'd be lying if I said it wasn't a little bit of a perk.

name: Leonard
line: Who's miserable and alone?

name: Raj
line: Me.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. I used to be like that. Then I got a girlfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: In pre-1976 terms, neener-neener.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, what are you and Bernadette doing for your first Valentine's Day?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I am pulling out all the stops. There's a $39.95 lover's special at P.F. Chang's. Egg rolls, dumplings, bottomless wok, and you get your picture taken on the big marble horse out front.

name: Sheldon
line: Given that Saint Valentine was a third century Roman priest who was stoned and beheaded, wouldn't a more appropriate celebration of the evening be taking one's steady gal to witness a brutal murder?

name: Howard
line: I understand your point, but given a choice, Jews always go with Chinese food.

name: Raj
line: Well, if anyone's interested, I'll be spending this Valentine's Day the same way I spend every Valentine's Day. Buying a rotisserie chicken from the supermarket, taking it home, standing over the sink and eating it out of the package with my bare hands like an animal.

name: Raj
line: Fine, tell us you're going to have sex with Penny.

name: Leonard
line: That's not what I was going to tell you.

name: Raj
line: It's okay. I don't mind hearing about your sex life. It's his that bugs me.

name: Leonard
line: Guess who the university is sending to Switzerland to attend a conference and see the CERN supercollider on February 14?

name: Sheldon
line: Professor Norton, although, God knows why. He hasn't published anything of note since he won that Nobel Prize.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, Professor Norton can't make it. He threw his back out rock climbing.

name: Howard
line: I heard he threw his back out climbing on his new girlfriend.

name: Raj
line: The big-boobed weather girl on Channel 2?

name: Howard
line: That's the one.

name: Leonard
line: In any case, they're asking me to fill in for him.

name: Sheldon
line: In Switzerland or with the big-boobed weather girl?

name: Leonard
line: Switzerland. And I get to bring a guest!

name: Howard
line: Oh, man!

name: Raj
line: No way, dude!

name: Sheldon
line: This is incredible! I'm so happy, I'm not even going to question their judgment in picking you. I'm just going to run home and start packing.

name: Raj
line: Why wouldn't you take Penny?

name: Leonard
line: I am taking Penny.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Well, then I anticipate an awkward situation when you get home.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you got a minute?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course, my good friend. Come in. Help me out, which ski hat says après supercollider?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I'm not taking you to Switzerland.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, of course you are. Who else would you take?

name: Leonard
line: Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: What? That's absurd. Penny has no interest in subatomic particle research.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, but it'll be Valentine's Day. We can go sightseeing and skiing and make love in front of a roaring fire in the shadow of the snowcapped Alps.

name: Sheldon
line: But Penny has no interest in subatomic particle research.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Sorry? I've been dreaming about going to the Large Hadron Collider since I was nine years old.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, well, I've been dreaming about spending Valentine's Day with a girl since I was six.

name: Sheldon
line: Shame on you! That's no dream for a scientist!

name: Penny
line: Okay, what's the big surprise?

name: Leonard
line: Just a minute. This tray contains clues as to what you and I are going to be doing on Valentine's Day.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Wow. Okay. Let's see. We've got, uh, milk chocolate, Swiss cheese, fondue. My lactose-intolerant boyfriend is going to eat all this, then I'm going to climb on his back and rocket to the moon?

name: Leonard
line: No. But it does involve air travel. Okay, um, let me slice this Swiss cheese with my Swiss army knife, and then you can wash it down with a cup of Swiss Miss instant cocoa.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm starting to think Swiss is key here.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh.

name: Penny
line: We're going to Disneyland and ride the Matterhorn?

name: Leonard
line: How does that involve air travel?

name: Penny
line: We're going to Disney World and ride the Matterhorn?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Okay, sweetie, this started out fun, but I'm over it.

name: Leonard
line: We're going to Switzerland to see the CERN supercollider! And ski. We'll also go skiing.

name: Penny
line: We're going skiing in Switzerland?!

name: Leonard
line: Well, you'll ski, I'll fall, but, yeah, we will be in Switzerland for Valentine's Day.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, Leonard! That's incredible!

name: Sheldon
line: Not so fast. You might want to hold off on lighting your rabeliechtli, Penny.

name: Penny
line: My Rabe-what-ly?

name: Sheldon
line: Rabeliechtli. It means turnip light and refers to a traditional lantern hand-carved from a root vegetable and used to celebrate certain Swiss festivals. Which you will not be celebrating because, A, these festivals occur in the fall, and B, you will not be going to Switzerland.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, we've been through this. I'm taking Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: Afraid not. Do you recognize this?

name: Leonard
line: Not the roommate agreement.

name: Sheldon
line: Indeed, the roommate agreement. I call your attention to the Friendship Rider in Appendix C, Future Commitments. Number 37, in the event one friend is ever invited to visit the Large Hadron Collider, now under construction in Switzerland, he shall invite the other friend to accompany him.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, for God's sakes.

name: Penny
line: You actually put that in an agreement?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. We also put in what happens if one of us wins a MacArthur Grant, or if one of us gets superpowers, or if one of us is bitten by a zombie.

name: Sheldon
line: He can't kill me, even if I turn.

name: Penny
line: Is there anything in there about if one of you gets a girlfriend?

name: Sheldon
line: No, that seemed a little farfetched.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, do you really expect to enforce this?

name: Sheldon
line: I've lived up to all my commitments under the agreement. At least once a day I ask how you are, even though I simply don't care. I no longer stage spontaneous biohazard drills after 10 pm And I abandoned my goal to master Tuvan throat singing.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I know I shouldn't ask, but what is...?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: I'd be much further along if I'd been allowed to practice.

name: Leonard
line: Look, Sheldon, I know it's in the agreement, and if you turn into a zombie, I promise I will not kill you. In fact, I'll even let you eat my brains. But I am taking Penny to Switzerland.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that your final decision?

name: Leonard
line: It is.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well.

name: Penny
line: It's not over, is it?

name: Leonard
line: What do you think?

name: Leonard
line: Got a bit of traffic this morning, huh? Think it's gonna rain? Instead of underpants, I covered my crotch with potato salad this morning. Thoughts? Okay, I know what'll cheer you up, let's play one of your driving games.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. This game is called Traitors. I will name three historical figures, you put them in order of the heinousness of their betrayal. Benedict Arnold, Judas, Dr. Leonard Hofstadter.

name: Leonard
line: You really think I belong with Benedict Arnold and Judas?

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. Judas had the decency to hang himself after what he did.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, Sheldon. Can't you at least try to understand how much this means to me?

name: Sheldon
line: Round two, Leonard Hofstadter, Darth Vader, Rupert Murdoch.

name: Leonard
line: Rupert Murdoch?

name: Sheldon
line: He owns Fox, and they cancelled Firefly. Hint, he and Darth Vader are tied for number 2.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry I couldn't hang with you last night. I had a date with Bernadette.

name: Raj
line: I know. I saw the Tweet.

name: Howard
line: So, what did you end up doing?

name: Raj
line: Not much. Nuked a burrito. Prayed to the Hindu god Urvashi that your bowels would loosen and your penis would droop like a willow tree.

name: Leonard
line: You seen Sheldon?

name: Raj
line: No. Is he still mad about the supercollider?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. He thinks I betrayed him. I mean, come on, what would you guys do if you were me?

name: Howard
line: I'd take Sheldon to Switzerland.

name: Leonard
line: Seriously?

name: Howard
line: Absolutely. And I'd leave him there.

name: Raj
line: What the hell is that?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, let's see. Yup, 30 pieces of silverware.

name: Sheldon
line: Morning, old chum.

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: I've made you breakfast. Juice, coffee, and pancakes in the shape of some of your favorite fictional characters. See, here's Frodo.

name: Leonard
line: You made Frodo pancakes?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I used coconut shavings to do the hair on his feet. If you need to void your bladder before eating, I can keep them warm with this beret that I thoroughly laundered and pressed into service as a pancake cosy.

name: Leonard
line: Why are you doing this?

name: Sheldon
line: It's by way of an apology for my recent behaviour. I've had some time to reflect and I've come to realize that friendship is not an aggregation of written agreements. It's a result of two people respecting and caring for each other. Butterscotch scone?

name: Leonard
line: Thanks. It's good.

name: Sheldon
line: What you're tasting is respect and affection. And about a pound of Crisco. After you've finished breakfast, I thought we could spend the day watching the final season of Babylon 5 with director commentary.

name: Leonard
line: You hate Babylon 5.

name: Sheldon
line: I do. It fails as drama, science fiction, and it's hopelessly derivative. But you like it, and you're my friend.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, great. Still not taking you to Switzerland.

name: Sheldon
line: Drat. No Frodo for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: Hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright, let's dispense with the friendly banter, I believe you know why I'm here.

name: Penny
line: Well, I always figured it was to study us, discover our weaknesses, and report back to your alien overlords.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, amusing. Extraordinary intelligence might well appear extraterrestrial to you, but let me be more specific. I believe you know why I'm here in the laundry room.

name: Penny
line: Better acoustics for your throat singing?

name: Sheldon
line: It's actually not bad. But my true purpose in being here will be revealed in this brief PowerPoint presentation. Lights. Why Sheldon Cooper, PhD, should go to Switzerland to see the CERN supercollider. A PowerPoint presentation by Sheldon Cooper, PhD.

name: Penny
line: Oh, for God's sakes.

name: Sheldon
line: Here we have a highly gifted researcher in the field of particle physics whose work has brought him to the precipice of forever changing mankind's understanding of the universe. AKA me. And here we have a waitress brushing her teeth with her finger. AKA you.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. Is this supposed to be buttering me up?

name: Sheldon
line: Please hold all questions to the end of the presentation. This is the Large Hadron Collider at CERN in Switzerland, the product of decades of planning and construction. It is a Mecca for physicists the world over. This is Bath and Body Works on Colorado Boulevard. They sell scented soaps and lotions, some of which contain glitter. Now, let's see if we can match the individual to the appropriate destination.

name: Penny
line: Okay, show's over.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's not. I've got five more slides.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, this is Leonard's decision. He invited me to Switzerland, and I intend to go.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. Enjoy yourself. You're going to be in the presence of something that I've dreamed of seeing for decades. I just hope you'll be able to appreciate the magnitude of where you are and what it represents.

name: Penny
line: I'll talk to Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: You will?

name: Penny
line: Yes. If it means that much to you, you should go.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Penny, thank you!

name: Penny
line: You're welcome.

name: Sheldon
line: Since I rarely hug, I'm relying on your expertise regarding duration.

name: Penny
line: I think we're there.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good. Bye-bye.

name: Raj
line: You know what? Even though I don't have a girlfriend, I can still have a good time on Valentine's Day.

name: Howard
line: Trust me, you can't. I've tried.

name: Raj
line: No, no, no, I'm going to have a me day. First I'm going to go to one of those spas in Koreatown, take a steam and get a massage. Then I'm going to stop at a pet store and get licked by puppies.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I need to talk to you.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, my friend. Would you like some cholermus?

name: Leonard
line: Some what?

name: Sheldon
line: Cholermus. It's a traditional Swiss breakfast dish. I'm preparing my gastrointestinal system for the exotic cuisine of Switzerland.

name: Leonard
line: You're not going to Switzerland!

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, but I am. Didn't Penny tell you the good news?

name: Leonard
line: She told me that you went behind my back to guilt her into letting you go instead of her.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, that good news.

name: Leonard
line: Well, forget it. I was the one who was invited, I get to decide who goes with me, and it's Penny, not you!

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, could you lower the lights? I have a short PowerPoint presentation.

name: Leonard
line: I don't need to see your presentation. This discussion is over!

name: Sheldon
line: That's a somewhat ambiguous response. Am I going or not?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, at this point, I would go by myself before I would take you.

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, really.

name: Sheldon
line: Well then, you leave me no alternative. From this moment forward, we can be roommates, but we will no longer be friends.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry you feel that way.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think you're fully aware of the ramifications here, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Why don't you enlighten me?

name: Sheldon
line: With the friendship clause of our roommate agreement nullified you are no longer entitled to accompany me to go swimming at Bill Gates' house should I be invited.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, that's gotta sting.

name: Leonard
line: Just think, this time tomorrow we'll be in Geneva, Switzerland for our first Valentine's Day.

name: Penny
line: I know! I went shopping today and bought special undies for the occasion.

name: Leonard
line: Thermal? ‘Cause it's gonna be cold.

name: Penny
line: Think it through, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Oh!

name: Penny
line: Oh!

name: Leonard
line: Gesundheit. Or as they say in Switzerland, gesundheit. You getting a cold?

name: Penny
line: No, no, it's probably just allergies.

name: Leonard
line: Do you want an allergy pill? ‘Cause I have 'em all. Prescription, nonprescription, foreign, domestic, experimental.

name: Penny
line: Do any of them work?

name: Leonard
line: Not really, I'm just an enthusiast.

name: Leonard
line: Penny? You okay?

name: Penny
line: Did that sound okay to you? Do not come in here!

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Penny
line: I'm having a tea party. What do you think's going on? I think I might have the flu. Or the plague.

name: Leonard
line: Well, our plane leaves at 9 a.m. Do you think you'll feel better by then?

name: Penny
line: Yep. ‘Cause I'm gonna be dead.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Sheldon? Listen, Penny is pretty sick and she's not going to be able to go to Switzerland. So if you're still interested, you're welcome to come.

name: Sheldon
line: Great. I'll start packing. In a minute.  Oh, look, it's the cholermus.

name: Penny
line: Here's your soup.

name: Sheldon
line: Chicken?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: With the little stars?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Heated to 180 degrees?

name: Penny
line: Why don't I pour it in your lap, and you can tell me.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't have to be mean. I'm sick.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, I'm sick, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Not my problem. I just don't understand how this happened to me. I'm scrupulous about my hygiene. I regularly disinfect my hands, and I avoid contact with other people on general principle.

name: Penny
line: I don't know what to tell you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: It's you! I touched you!

name: Penny
line: Happy Valentine's Day.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my goodness, look at this room! Champagne! Roses! Oh, and little chocolates! This is going to be the best Valentine's Day ever.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I forgot about all this.

name: Raj
line: But I never will.

name: Leonard
line: Will you please turn your shirt off?

name: Raj
line: What? I'm giving myself dramatic entrance music. People will know I'm awesome and to be feared.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, right, there's nothing more awesome and frightening than a man who's got music blasting from between his nipples.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Stuart, what's going on?

name: Stuart
line: Well, you might want to mark your Google calendars. Stan Lee is coming to do a signing on Thursday.

name: Sheldon
line: Did he finally write a sequel to his autobiography? I'm sure ages 79 through 87 were just action-packed.

name: Stuart
line: No, just a regular comic signing. My uncle is his dermatologist and Stan's doing him a favour.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I don't want to know that! How can I possibly discuss with Stan Lee the scientific foundations for interstellar flight on a silver surfboard when part of my brain will be scanning his face for signs of contagious skin disease?

name: Leonard
line: Stan Lee does not have a contagious skin disease.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, look who thinks he's Stuart's uncle now.

name: Raj
line: Can't believe it. We're going to meet Stan Lee!

name: Howard
line: I'm sad to say I taught him those moves.

name: Leonard
line: I can't decide whether I want Stan Lee to autograph my Journey into Mystery 83, first appearance of Thor or my Fantastic Four number five, first appearance of Dr. Doom.  Alex, I'm going to go with what is... you're a dumbass?

name: Sheldon
line: I've decided I'm going to have Mr. Lee sign my copy of this month's Batman.

name: Howard
line: That's crazy. Stan Lee had nothing to do with Batman.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, which is why no one else will ask him to sign one, and I will be the possessor of a unique, albeit confusing, artifact, which will set me apart from the hoi polloi of comic book fandom.

name: Raj
line: That's a great idea, I'm going to get him to sign a Batman as well.

name: Sheldon
line: What is it about the word unique you don't understand?

name: Howard
line: Ow! Damn, paper cut. Nothing worse than a paper cut.

name: Raj
line: Well, obviously you don't remember your circumcision.

name: Sheldon
line: There's Neosporin and Band-Aids in my top desk drawer.

name: Howard
line: Why don't you keep that stuff in the bathroom?

name: Leonard
line: He does. And in the kitchen. And in the car. And in his pocket.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, but the ones in my pocket are mine.

name: Penny
line: Hi!

name: Leonard
line: Hey. Guess who's going to be at the comic bookstore on Thursday?

name: Penny
line: Um, can you give me a hint?

name: Leonard
line: Stan Lee.

name: Penny
line: Um, Stanley, Stanley, Stanley Tucci?

name: Leonard
line: No, no, Stan Lee.

name: Penny
line: Oh, oh, Stan Lee! Cool!

name: Leonard
line: You have no idea who he is, do you?

name: Penny
line: Of course I do. You're an important part of my life and I pay attention to the things you are interested in.

name: Leonard
line: Good, good, so, who's Stan Lee?

name: Penny
line: Um, he was on Star Trek.

name: Leonard
line: Nope.

name: Penny
line: Star Wars?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Um, uh, Stan Lee, oh, he was in those goofy kung fu movies you love so much?

name: Leonard
line: That's Bruce Lee.

name: Penny
line: Oh. So, is this Bruce Lee's nerdy brother, Stan?

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, why do you have all these unopened paychecks in your desk?

name: Sheldon
line: Because most of the things I'm planning to buy haven't been invented yet.

name: Howard
line: But there must be thousands of dollars here. Why don't you put it in the bank?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't trust banks. I believe that when the robots rise up, ATMs will lead the charge.

name: Howard
line: You've also got something from the Pasadena Municipal Court.

name: Sheldon
line: Undoubtedly yet another snide response to my repeated letters complaining that the flags in front of the courthouse are flying in the wrong order. From left to right, it's supposed to be federal, state, and then city of Pasadena.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. You sent more than one letter about that?

name: Sheldon
line: It bothers me.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, this is a summons.

name: Sheldon
line: A summons for what?

name: Sheldon
line: November 16? Penny, that's the evening you fell in your bathtub and I had to drive you to the emergency room.

name: Penny
line: No, it isn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, it is.

name: Penny
line: No, it isn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, I have an eidetic memory. Also, that's a picture of you in the passenger seat holding your dislocated shoulder.

name: Penny
line: Mmm, no, it isn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, then why is a summons for a traffic violation committed in your car, bearing your license plates, coming to me?

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, they sent me the ticket. I told them I wasn't driving and they were all, if it wasn't you, who was it?

name: Sheldon
line: So you betrayed me?

name: Penny
line: No! It wasn't a betrayal. It was more of a can't afford any more points on my license. I already have to buy my insurance from this place in the Cayman Islands.

name: Sheldon
line: But the only reason I was driving your car was because you were in distress and I was rescuing you.

name: Penny
line: Yes, yes, look, and now you have a photo to remember that heroic day.

name: Leonard
line: It's not that big a deal. You just go down to the court on Thursday and you pay the fine.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not going to pay a fine. That would imply I'm guilty.

name: Howard
line: You are guilty.  That one I liked.

name: Sheldon
line: I am not guilty. I only have a learner's permit, Penny was the teacher. When the light turned yellow she said go, go, go, so I went, went, went.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I'm sorry. I'll be happy to reimburse you for the fine. You know, as soon as I get a part in a movie or my own TV series.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't need to reimburse me because I'm not paying. On Thursday, I will have my day in court and justice will be done. In fact, I'm going to begin preparing my defence right now.

name: Howard
line: Okay, he's going to jail.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that's right. Thursday is Stan Lee Day.

name: Sheldon
line: Now you see what you've done? Because of you, we're all going to miss Stan Lee.

name: Leonard
line: Whoa! What do you mean all?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you're my friends. You'll be standing by my side, supporting me, feeding me legal precedents, and if you had the upper body strength, carrying me out on your shoulders when I'm victorious.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, okay. No.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you saying that you will not stand beside me as I plead my case?

name: Leonard
line: That's what I'm saying.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard?

name: Howard
line: Wow. Uh, Stan Lee, or you in court? Uh, if this was Sophie's Choice it would've been a much shorter movie. No.

name: Sheldon
line: Raj? You'll be there, won't you?  All right, then, my so-called friends have forsaken me. So, I guess it'll just be me and my eyewitness.

name: Penny
line: Oh, balls.

name: Sheldon
line: Please try to wear something appropriate. It won't help my case if the judge is busy trying to read the word Juicy scrawled across your buttocks.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.  Penny.

name: Penny
line: Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: That's just wrong.

name: Penny
line: All right, let's go.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, hold on. Before we get to the courthouse, I'd like to call on your skills as an actress.

name: Penny
line: What is this?

name: Sheldon
line: I've taken the liberty of scripting your appearance on the witness stand because, let's face it, you're somewhat of a loose cannon. Now, don't worry, it's written in your vernacular. So shall we rehearse?

name: Penny
line: Do I have a choice?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, of course you have a choice. Although we live in a deterministic universe, each individual has free will. Now, sit down. I call your attention to the events of November 16. Do you remember that date?

name: Penny
line: Darn tootin', I do, if the court will excuse my homespun, corn-fed Nebraskan turn of phrase.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent. Go on.

name: Penny
line: The reason that date is, like, so totally fixed in my memory is that I had the privilege to be witness to one of the most heroic acts I've ever seen in, like, ever.

name: Sheldon
line: And who performed that heroic act?

name: Penny
line: Why, you did, sir. You. Dr. Sheldon Cooper, and may I add, it is a privilege to know you.

name: Sheldon
line: There's no need for compliments, this court is only interested in the facts.

name: Penny
line: But it is a fact that it's a privilege to know you. Totally. A teardrop rolls down my cheek?

name: Sheldon
line: Only a suggestion. A catch in your throat would work just as well.

name: Penny
line: But it is a fact that it's a privilege to know you. Totally.

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe you should put on your Juicy pants again.

name: Judge
line: Pay the cashier. Sheldon Cooper?

name: Sheldon
line: Good morning, Your Honour. Dr. Sheldon Cooper appearing in pro se. That is to say, representing himself.

name: Judge
line: I know what it means. I went to law school.

name: Sheldon
line: And yet you wound up in traffic court. Anyway, if it would please the court, I'd like to begin with an opening statement.

name: Judge
line: The court would advise you to make it quick, as the court had a dicey-looking breakfast burrito this morning and just took an Imodium.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well, a quick opening statement. Like a milking stool, my case rests on three legs. I will demonstrate that I was improperly instructed in driving by a woman whose lack of respect for society borders on the sociopathic. I will argue that the emergency met the legal doctrine of quod est necessarium est licitum, that which is necessary is legal. But first, I will raise a Sixth Amendment issue. I'm unable to confront my accuser, a non-human entity, to wit, a camera. So, to sum up, improper instruction, quod est necessarium est licitum, Sixth Amendment. My milk stool is complete.

name: Judge
line: Impressive.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Judge
line: Guilty. Pay the cashier.

name: Sheldon
line: I object. You're completely ignoring the law.

name: Judge
line: No, I'm following the law. I'm ignoring you.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? I would point out that I am at the top of my profession, while you preside over the kiddy table of yours.

name: Judge
line: Dr. Cooper, before I find you in contempt and throw you in jail, I'm going to give you a chance to apologize for that last remark.

name: Sheldon
line: I am a scientist. I never apologize for the truth.

name: Sheldon
line: That's my spot.

name: Raj
line: I can't wait to ask Stan Lee why he insists on giving all his characters first and last names that start with the same letter.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on, why would you do that?

name: Raj
line: Bruce Banner, Reed Richards, Sue Storm, Stephen Strange, Otto Octavius, Silver Surfer, Peter Parker, oh, and worst of all, J. Jonah Jameson, Jr.

name: Howard
line: Okay, I'm cutting. I'm not gonna talk to Stan Lee after you cheese him off.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon's in jail.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon's in jail?

name: Raj
line: You called it.

name: Leonard
line: For what?

name: Penny
line: What do you think? For doing the same crap he always does, except to a judge. He has to stay in there until he apologizes.

name: Leonard
line: So tell him to apologize.

name: Penny
line: Oh, gee, thanks, Leonard. That didn't occur to me. If he doesn't apologize by 5 o'clock he is going to spend the night in jail.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, that's terrible. Ooh, the line's moving. Got to go. Bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me? Excuse me, jailor?

name: Guard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I need to use the restroom.

name: Guard
line: Knock yourself out.

name: Sheldon
line: That's the toilet?

name: Guard
line: Well, it ain't a wishing well.

name: Sheldon
line: Please tell the judge I'm ready to apologize.

name: Leonard
line: Look at that. To my friend, Leonard, from Stan Lee, Excelsior!

name: Howard
line: Awesome. Mine says, To my friend, Howard, from Stan Lee, Excelsior!

name: Raj
line: Mine says, To Raj, from Stan Lee.

name: Howard
line: That's 'cause you pissed him off about his character names.

name: Raj
line: Hey, I didn't even mention Dum Dum Dugan or Green Goblin, Matt Murdock, Pepper Potts, Victor Von Doom, oh, and worst of all, Millie the Model.

name: Penny
line: We're home.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey, buddy. How'd it go?

name: Sheldon
line: You know very well how it went.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, but we all want to hear it from you.

name: Sheldon
line: I was found guilty and fined $533.

name: Penny
line: I'm going to write you a cheque for that. As long as you promise to put it in your drawer and never cash it, like the others.

name: Sheldon
line: I also now have three points on a driver's licence I do not yet possess, and I was forced to issue an undeserved apology, simply because I refuse to urinate in a stainless steel bowl in front of criminals.

name: Howard
line: Plus, you didn't get to meet Stan Lee.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, that's enough, Howard. The poor guy's had a tough time. He had to spend the entire afternoon in jail wearing that suit.

name: Howard
line: You're right, so it would be cruel to mention that after he finished signing autographs, Stan Lee took Stuart and us out for gelato.

name: Sheldon
line: You had gelato with Stan Lee?

name: Howard
line: He said we could call him Stan.

name: Leonard
line: Except for Raj.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I hope you're satisfied, Penny. You are responsible for all the evil that has befallen me today.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I realize that...

name: Sheldon
line: Not finished. It is because of you that I now have a criminal record, and it is because of you that I missed out on having gelato with Stan Lee.

name: Penny
line: Okay, maybe you'll have another chance to have...

name: Sheldon
line: No, no. I will never have another chance to have gelato with Stan Lee because opportunities to have gelato with Stan Lee come but once in a lifetime. The moving finger writes, and having writ, moves on!

name: Penny
line: Did he just somehow give me the finger?

name: Howard
line: Not just the finger. The moving finger.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, hey, Penny. Wow. Hi.

name: Penny
line: What's going on?

name: Stuart
line: Nothing. I'm just getting ready to close up and head out.

name: Penny
line: Ah. Cool. Got any fun plans?

name: Stuart
line: Oh, yeah. Big night tonight. Gonna share a can of tuna with the cat.

name: Penny
line: Oh, nice.

name: Stuart
line: Not even my cat. I just feed it. Some nights it doesn't even show up.

name: Penny
line: Oh, okay. Well, I was hoping, um, you could do me a favour.

name: Stuart
line: Sure, yeah, name it.

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm kind of responsible for Sheldon missing Stan Lee, and I really want to make it up to him. So I was hoping you could give me his phone number so maybe I can arrange for them to meet.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, I'm sorry, I don't have his phone number.

name: Penny
line: Hmm. Damn. All right. Thank you.

name: Stuart
line: Mm-hmm. Wait. I have his address.

name: Penny
line: Really? Great!

name: Stuart
line: But I can't give it to you.

name: Penny
line: Then why did you tell me you had it?

name: Stuart
line: I don't know. Just chatting. You're looking at a guy who could very well get stood up by a stray cat tonight.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, Stuart. Thanks anyway.

name: Stuart
line: Mm-hmm. Wait.

name: Penny
line: Yeah?

name: Stuart
line: Maybe we can make a deal.

name: Penny
line: What kind of deal?

name: Stuart
line: I will give you the address if you go to my cousin's wedding with me.

name: Penny
line: You're extorting a date out of me?

name: Stuart
line: I kind of have to. The cousin who's getting married is the cousin I usually go to weddings with.

name: Penny
line: Can I bring Leonard?

name: Stuart
line: Sure. What the hell.

name: Penny
line: Deal.

name: Stuart
line: We'll tell people he's your cousin.

name: Sheldon
line: This is Stan Lee's front door. We were on Stan Lee's curb, then we were on Stan Lee's walk, and now we're at Stan Lee's front door.

name: Penny
line: Yup.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Lord, you just rang Stan Lee's doorbell. At Stan Lee's house. We're about to go in and have milk and cookies with Stan Lee.

name: Penny
line: Okay, sweetie, I don't know if we're gonna have cookies, or he's just gonna say hi, or really what's gonna happen, so just let me talk, and we'll...

name: Stan Lee
line: Yeah?

name: Penny
line: Are you Stan Lee?

name: Stan Lee
line: Oh, damn.

name: Penny
line: Hi. I'm Penny. This is my friend, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: We're not friends at the moment. Depends on how this goes.

name: Penny
line: Right, right. Anyway, Sheldon here is a huge fan of yours, and he was supposed to meet you the other day at the comic book store, but he kind of ended up in jail.

name: Stan Lee
line: I see. And you thought you'd just come over to my house uninvited?

name: Sheldon
line: You said we were invited.

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, no, I said I'm inviting you to come with me to Stan Lee's house.

name: Stan Lee
line: You know, you fan boys are unbelievable. Do you think you can just ring my doorbell any time you want? I mean, why don't you just come on in and watch the Lakers game with me?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm not much of a sports fan, but thank you.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. He doesn't really understand sarcasm.

name: Stan Lee
line: Well, I'll give him something he'll understand. Joanie, call the police!

name: Penny
line: Nice to meet you.

name: Raj
line: Fantastic Four, Daredevil, Invincible Iron Man, Happy Hogan, Curt Connors...

name: Howard
line: Would you just let it go?

name: Raj
line: And worst of all, Fin Fang Foom.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, where've you been?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll tell you where I've been. You boys may have had gelato with Stan Lee and gotten autographed comics, but I saw the inside of his house and got an autographed application for a restraining order.

name: Howard
line: Sweet.

name: Sheldon
line: Plus, I get to hang out with him again at the hearing. This is going to look great hanging next to my restraining order from Leonard Nimoy.

name: Leonard
line: Why do I always have to carry the heavy stuff?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it's very simple. In our ragtag band of scientists with nothing to lose, I'm the smart one, Wolowitz is the funny one, and Koothrappali is the lovable foreigner who struggles to understand our ways and fails. That leaves you, by default, as the muscle.

name: Leonard
line: One more floor, and I'd be the pulled muscle.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's about time, I'm starving.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, well, we didn't actually get Chinese food.

name: Penny
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Don't panic, this is better.

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, you didn't trade the food for magic beans, did you?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course not. And, technically, magic beans would be food, although eating them would be quite a waste, since you could plant them and overnight have a giant beanstalk, which would provide enough roughage for a small city.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, sometimes I don't listen, sometimes I just watch your jaw go up and down.

name: Leonard
line: We were on our way to the Chinese restaurant when we thought we saw Adam West, so we followed him.

name: Penny
line: Who's Adam West?

name: Sheldon
line: Who's Adam West? Leonard, what do the two of you talk about after the coitus?

name: Howard
line: My guess is, “Hey, four minutes! New record!” That's why I'm the funny one.

name: Leonard
line: Anyway, we followed the guy to this garage sale, and they had the coolest stuff.

name: Howard
line: They were closing up. We got this whole box for sixty bucks.

name: Leonard
line: We didn't even get to go through it all. There could be anything in here.

name: Penny
line: There a new girlfriend in there? ‘Cause you might need one.

name: Leonard
line: No. But there is an original final draft Ghostbusters script with actual slime stains!  Oh, you're right, it's Ghostbusters 2. Never mind.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God. An Alf doll. When I was 11 my mother got me one to help me sleep after my dad left. I used to pretend that my dad had moved to the planet Melmac, and Alf was going to bring him back to me. But he never did. Where's my daddy, puppet? Where is he?

name: Penny
line: That is so sad.

name: Sheldon
line: No, what's sad is that you don't know Adam West was TV's Batman.

name: Leonard
line: Here's Spock's head with no body. Here's Mr. T's body with no head. Oh, yeah, here's Spock's body with Mr. T's head. I pity the fool who's illogical.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm just gonna go home and make a grilled cheese and window-shop on eHarmony.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, bye.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Ooh, look, an Indiana Jones connect-the-dots.

name: Raj
line: And an Aquaman action figure.

name: Howard
line: Looks like someone drew a penis on him.

name: Raj
line: Huh? That'll come off.

name: Howard
line: You see what you're doing? Stop that.

name: Sheldon
line: Fascinating.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: It appears to be a Lord of the Rings ring.

name: Leonard
line: Oh.

name: Raj
line: It's even got the Elvish engraving on it.

name: Sheldon
line: It's not Elvish. It's the language of Mordor written in Elvish script. One Ring to

name: Raj
line: One Ring to find them.

name: Howard
line: One Ring to bring them all.

name: Leonard
line: And in the darkness bind them.

name: Raj
line: Holy crap, are we nerdy.

name: Howard
line: So, I was doing some checking on the ring.

name: Raj
line: Hold on. Sheldon, is there ketchup on that table?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, there is. Oh, here's a fun fact, ketchup started out as a general term for sauce, typically made of, uh, mushrooms or fish brine with herbs and spices. Some popular early main ingredients included blueberry, anchovy, oyster, kidney bean and grape.

name: Raj
line: No, that's okay. I'll get it.

name: Howard
line: Listen, I was looking at the ring, and it seemed a little weird. No copyright notice on it. So, I took it down to this buddy of mine who deals with, shall we say, the seedy underbelly of the collectibles world.

name: Leonard
line: Seedy underbelly?

name: Howard
line: You know, your black market phasers, your screen-worn Lieutenant Uhura panties, that kind of stuff.

name: Raj
line: Who's this mysterious buddy you suddenly have?

name: Howard
line: Just a guy. I know a guy.

name: Raj
line: Is it Eddie Crispo?

name: Howard
line: No, I can't tell you who it is. Stop asking.

name: Raj
line: Who else could it be? It has to be Eddie Crispo.

name: Howard
line: I know lots of dangerous people, okay?

name: Raj
line: Name one.

name: Howard
line: Eddie Crispo. Anyway, he said this isn't a replica. It's the real deal.

name: Sheldon
line: If you're suggesting that that is the actual ring of power forged by Sauron in Mount Doom, I look at you with an expression of exhaustion and ever so slight amusement.

name: Leonard
line: He's not saying it's a magic ring. You're not, are you?

name: Howard
line: No, but it's close. Look at the markings inside. Those are production markings. Nine rings were made for use in the Lord of the Rings movies. Three were given to members of the cast. The rest were destroyed. Except one. One was stolen. Gentlemen, this is the one ring.

name: Sheldon
line: Mine!

name: Leonard
line: No, it is not yours. We all went in on the box together.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, yes, but I found it in the box, and the laws of maritime salvage clearly state that the finder of a sunken treasure is the owner of the treasure.

name: Leonard
line: How is this maritime salvage?

name: Sheldon
line: Other than the lack of water, how is it not?

name: Raj
line: Wait, wait. Sheldon, stop being crazy for a second. How much is something like this worth?

name: Howard
line: Well, it's tough to say since it's hot, but on the underground market, my guy figures...

name: Raj
line: Your guy Eddie Crispo?

name: Howard
line: Yes. He figures ten, maybe 15 thousand.

name: Raj
line: Okay, that's a lot of money. The wise thing to do is invest it in something practical. Like a jet ski.

name: Howard
line: Why do you want a jet ski?

name: Raj
line: All the wealthy and beautiful people in movies ride Jet Skis. That can't just be a coincidence.

name: Sheldon
line: We can't sell it. We have to keep it and love it and polish it, and only take it out occasionally when we go to the park and re-enact our favourite scenes from the movies.

name: Howard
line: It's sad how great that sounds.

name: Leonard
line: Guys, it's stolen. It should go back to Peter Jackson. He made the movies, it belongs to him.

name: Howard
line: Fine. He can have it back as long as he promises to make me a hobbit in his next movie.

name: Raj
line: There are no Jewish hobbits.

name: Howard
line: Clearly, you've never been to my house for dinner on Rosh Hashanah.

name: Leonard
line: We are not blackmailing Peter J... All right, where's the ring?

name: Sheldon
line: You mean my ring?

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: The ring was unguarded, it was just sitting on the table, anyone could have taken it. Proof? I did.

name: Leonard
line: Give me that.

name: Raj
line: Look, let's be reasonable. We all want to do different things with the ring, but your ideas are stupid, and I want a jet ski.

name: Sheldon
line: I found it. The ring is mine. I don't understand why in this group I never get my way.

name: Leonard
line: You always get your way.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll stipulate to that if you give me the ring.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys. Enjoying your food that I actually brought you instead of promising food, but bringing you a box of random crap?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, it's delicious, the sarcasm's a little stale, though. Hey, how about this? Until we figure out what to do with the ring, Penny holds on to it.

name: Penny
line: What ring?

name: Leonard
line: This ring.

name: Sheldon
line: Looking for something?

name: Leonard
line: Will you hold on to this for a couple of days?

name: Penny
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: It's a prop from a movie, and we're kind of fighting over it.

name: Penny
line: Okay, just to be clear, the first piece of jewellery my boyfriend gives me is a prop from a movie, and I don't even get to keep it?

name: Howard
line: If you had gone out with me three years ago, by now, you'd have my great Aunt Ida's brooch that she smuggled out of occupied Belgium in a cat.

name: Leonard
line: How am I looking now?

name: Sheldon
line: Ow! You hit me! I'm bleeding!

name: Leonard
line: What was that?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon tried to take the ring and I punched him.

name: Leonard
line: That's my girl.

name: Howard
line: So, Sheldon, how's it feel to get beaten up by a girl?

name: Sheldon
line: It's not the first time. I have a twin sister whose assaults began in utero. If only I'd had the presence of mind to reabsorb her, then I'd have a mole with hair in it instead of a tedious yearly Christmas letter.

name: Raj
line: Gentlemen, have you come to the realization that the only reasonable course of action is to sell the ring and divide the money?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Raj
line: I was afraid of that.  Go ahead.

name: Man on Screen
line: Greetings from Mumbai. I am Raj's attorney, Venkatesh Koothrappali.

name: Raj
line: Also my cousin.

name: Howard
line: You brought a lawyer?

name: Venkatesh
line: Don't answer that. I'll get straight to the point. My client's prepared to surrender any interest he has in the ring in exchange for two Kawasaki Jet Skis.

name: Leonard
line: We're not giving him two Jet Skis.

name: Venkatesh
line: Look, we're big boys, why don't we just cut to the chase and meet in the middle? One Kawasaki Jet Ski, done and done.

name: Leonard
line: No Jet Skis.

name: Venkatesh
line: All right, forget the Jet Skis.

name: Raj
line: Forget the Jet Skis? That was our line in the sand! What happened to “tear them a new one?”

name: Venkatesh
line: What can I say? They played hardball. We lost.

name: Raj
line: You're useless.

name: Venkatesh
line: I told you that when you hired me.

name: Raj
line: I'm signing off now.

name: Venkatesh
line: Call your mother, she worries.

name: Howard
line: Okay, just so you know, if we're bringing in cousins who are lawyers, prepare for shock and awe.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? I am ending this. Penny didn't want to hold the ring anymore. She gave it to me, I have it. I'm sending it back. Where's the ring?

name: Sheldon
line: You mean this ring? Next time be aware of your surroundings while urinating in a public men's room.

name: Leonard
line: Give me that.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's mine.

name: Raj
line: It's all of ours.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, now, this is ridiculous!

name: Howard
line: Then let go!

name: Leonard
line: I'm not letting go, you let go.

name: Howard
line: I say this ring belongs to the last person who can hold on.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. But can't we go home and start this?

name: Raj
line: Sure. Let go of the ring.

name: Leonard
line: All right, it starts now.

name: Howard
line: You do realize there's a giant bug movie marathon tonight on the Syfy Channel.

name: Raj
line: Wait, my laptop.

name: Howard
line: You know, there's a point when this becomes idiotic.

name: Leonard
line: And it wasn't when we were driving like this?

name: Sheldon
line: I would advise the three of you that resistance is futile. I have endless patience. I once spent two-and-a-half hours on hold with Hewlett-Packard customer service just to complain about their customer service.

name: Leonard
line: You want to talk about endless patience? Penny made me watch all five seasons of Sex and the City.

name: Raj
line: There are six seasons, dude.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, crap!

name: Raj
line: No, no, no, the sixth season is great. We go to Paris with Carrie and get our heart broken, and then Mr. Big shows up, we don't know if we can trust him again. It's a wild ride.

name: Leonard
line: Door.

name: Raj
line: Okay, everybody, and plie. And relevae.

name: Penny
line: Whatcha doin'?

name: Leonard
line: Last one holding the ring decides its fate. I know, it sounds silly.

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, no, no, no, you are my boyfriend. Nothing you do is silly to me.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: FYI, this is a bag from Victoria's Secret.

name: Leonard
line: I'm out.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry, Ma, I have to stay late at the office.

name: Raj
line: No, he's doesn't! He's lying to you!

name: Howard
line: Will you be quiet?

name: Raj
line: Well, if you want privacy let go of the ring. I'm so glad we came to this gentile strip club! Howard, here's more bacon to tuck into the shiksa's G-string!

name: Howard
line: I'll call you back.

name: Raj
line: I think it's lovely you call your mommy and let her know you're going to be late for dinner. From what I know about these things, if a woman doesn't breast-feed on time, it's very uncomfortable for her boobies.

name: Howard
line: Don't you talk about my mother's boobies!

name: Raj
line: If you're offended, let go of the ring and go on home to your mother's boobies.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent, excellent. Tire each other out, the ring will be mine. Howard, why don't you go after Raj's mother?

name: Raj
line: Why don't we go after your mother?

name: Sheldon
line: Go ahead. I have no illusions about my mother. She is a kind, loving, religiously fanatical right-wing Texan with a slightly out-of-scale head and a mild Dr. Pepper addiction. Anything you'd like to add?

name: Howard
line: That's not gonna Better pull out the big gun.

name: Raj
line: You're right. Let's talk about your grandmother.

name: Sheldon
line: No! I call no Meemaws.

name: Raj
line: Think about this. The only way your mother was born was your Meemaw had sex.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't want to hear this.

name: Howard
line: Then let go of the ring and walk away.

name: Sheldon
line: Never.

name: Howard
line: All right. I'll bet your Meemaw didn't just have sex to have your mother. I bet she had sex because she liked it.

name: Sheldon
line: Stop it!

name: Raj
line: Yeah, Meemaw did the nasty.

name: Sheldon
line: I said stop it!

name: Howard
line: We're getting to him.

name: Sheldon
line: Waterfalls!

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Waterfalls. Crashing waves. Babbling brooks.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Subliminal messaging. I'm going to make you want to pee. Dripping faucets. Leaky gutter. Peeing.

name: Raj
line: It's, it's not working, dude.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh-ho-ho, it's working all right. I have to pee.

name: Raj
line: Then let go of the ring and go.

name: Howard
line: No, actually, I wouldn't mind going, too.

name: Raj
line: Fine. Um, on the count of three. One, two...

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, just to clarify. When you get to three, do we stand up or do we pee?

name: Howard
line: We stand up.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent choice.

name: Raj
line: Three.

name: Howard
line: Something tells me this was a bad day to wear suede shoes.

name: Sheldon
line: I've done it! I've won! The ring is mine! It's mine!  We're going to clean it up and make it pretty. My own. My love. My precious.  Where's the ring?

name: Leonard
line: It's in a FedEx box on its way back to where it came from.

name: Raj
line: The fires of Mount Doom?

name: Leonard
line: Peter Jackson's office in New Zealand. It wasn't ours.

name: Howard
line: You quit the game! You had no right to take it.

name: Leonard
line: I came in here, you guys were all sleeping. The ring was on the floor. No one was touching it.

name: Raj
line: Well, so then we start the game over until there's a winner.

name: Leonard
line: There wasn't ever going to be a winner. There was going to be a selfish, petty person with a ring and three people who used to be his friend. Is that really what you guys want? ‘Cause if it is, fine, I don't want anything to do with you. And I don't know what happened in that bathroom, but I am not cleaning it up!  My precious.

name: Sheldon
line: I knew it. Give us the precious!

name: Leonard
line: NEVER!

name: Penny
line: Ugh, gotta go back to dating dumb guys from the gym.

name: Raj
line: Okay in Avatar when they have sex in Pandora they hook up their ponytails, so we know their ponytails are like their junk.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, so?

name: Raj
line: So, when they ride horses and fly on the birds, they also use their ponytails.

name: Howard
line: What's your point?

name: Raj
line: My point is, if I were a horse or a bird, I'd be very nervous around James Cameron.

name: Sheldon
line: It amazes me how you constantly obsess over fictional details when there are more important things in the real world to worry about. For example, why wasn't William Shatner in the new Star Trek movie?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Sheldon, I was up in the administration office, and I happened to overhear the name of the winner of this year's Chancellor's Award for Science.

name: Sheldon
line: And you want to rub my nose in the fact that my contributions are being overlooked again? I am the William Shatner of theoretical physics. All right, I'll play. What self-important, preening fraud are they honouring this year?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I'm so glad you asked it like that. You.

name: Sheldon
line: I won?

name: Leonard
line: You won.

name: Sheldon
line: I won! This is astonishing. Not that I won the award, no one deserves it more. Actually, I guess I misspoke. It's not astonishing, more like inevitable. I'm not sure what to do first. Maybe I should call my mother. Wait! I know, I'm going to conduct an interview with myself and post it online.

name: Raj
line: Well, good for him.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, the one thing the William Shatner of theoretical physics needed was an ego boost.

name: Howard
line: Didn't it look like that spear was going to go right through your skull?

name: Raj
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you didn't want a Slurpee at 7-Eleven, you don't get glasses.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that will be another congratulatory call for me. Uh, mute, please.

name: Howard
line: Uh, hang on, flaming arrow.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello? Oh, Chancellor Morton, how are you, sir? Yes, I was expecting your call  three years ago. I see. Wait. What happens if I choose not to give a speech? Uh-huh. And if I don't want to forfeit the award? Well, you've got that tied up in a neat little bow. All right. Thank you.  Problem.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: They expect me to give a speech at the banquet. I can't give a speech.

name: Howard
line: Well, no, you're mistaken. You give speeches all the time. What you can't do is shut up.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, before the movie, you did 20 minutes on why guacamole turns brown. It turned brown while you were talking.

name: Sheldon
line: I am perfectly comfortable speaking to small groups. I cannot speak to large crowds.

name: Leonard
line: What, to you, is a large crowd?

name: Sheldon
line: Any group big enough to trample me to death. General rule of thumb is 36 adults or 70 children.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, congratulations. Brought you cheesecake from work. You know, 'cause of your award, not because a busboy sneezed on it.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not accepting the award.

name: Penny
line: Why not?

name: Howard
line: Turns out the great Sheldon Cooper has stage fright.

name: Penny
line: That's no reason to back out. You know, I once got a pretty big honour in high school, and I was terrified about appearing in front of a big crowd, but I went through with it, and you know what? The world looked pretty darn good sitting on a haystack in the back of a Ford F-150 as a member of the Corn Queen's court.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Yeah, I'll bear that in mind if I'm ever nominated for the Hillbilly Peace Prize.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you're being ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Am I? Let me tell you a story.

name: Howard
line: Where's 70 children when you need ‘em?

name: Sheldon
line: I was 14 and graduating summa cum laude from college. Summa cum laude is Latin for with highest honours.

name: Penny
line: I just love how you always skip over the part where no one asks.

name: Sheldon
line: I was valedictorian and expected to give an address. Even now, I can remember that moment when I walked up to the podium and looked out at the crowd. There must have been thousands of people. My heart started pounding in my chest. I began to hyperventilate. My vision became blurry, and before I knew it... oh, dear.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon? Sheldon, are you okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't trample me.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on, Mother, you know why I can't accept the award. With all due respect, I don't think praying will help. No, I have not heard the song, Jesus, Take the Wheel. No, no, no, no, no, no, no, you don't need to start singing it. Yes, I'll buy it on the iTunes, Mother. Good-bye, Mother.  Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Sit down, we want to talk to you.

name: Sheldon
line: Am I in trouble? Did my mother call you?

name: Penny
line: Just sit.

name: Leonard
line: We think we can help you with your stage fright.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I doubt that. I haven't figured out a way, and I'm much smarter than all of you.

name: Penny
line: Yes, but you're not smarter than all of us put together.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm sorry, that is what I meant.

name: Penny
line: Okay, your problem is, you're trying to do this all by yourself.

name: Leonard
line: We can help you. We can be your team. Like, uh, Professor Xavier and his X-Men.

name: Sheldon
line: I do like the X-Men.

name: Penny
line: Did I see X-Men?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, we watched it last week. You said you liked it.

name: Penny
line: Oh. I say a lot of things, sweetie. So, how about it, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. If you're my X-Men, what are your powers?

name: Penny
line: Okay. Well, I am going to take you shopping, get you a nice suit. Might give you more confidence.

name: Sheldon
line: That's not exactly a mutation that would get you into Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters, but go on. Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: I thought I could try to analyze you and get to the root of your anxiety.

name: Sheldon
line: What qualifies you to attempt to understand my mind?

name: Leonard
line: My mother is a highly regarded psychiatrist, and I've been in therapy ever since she accused me of breast-feeding co-dependently.

name: Howard
line: Raj says he can teach you, what did you call it? I don't know, some Indian meditation crap.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. Well, I assume, since the rest of you have set the bar so low, you're saving the most impressive contribution for last. Go ahead, Howard. Dazzle me.

name: Howard
line: My power is the ability to pretend like I give a damn about your piddly-ass problems. And that's 24-7, buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: And I appreciate the pretence.

name: Penny
line: So, what do you say, Sheldon? Are we your X-Men?

name: Sheldon
line: No. The X-Men were named for the X in Charles Xavier. Since I am Sheldon Cooper, you will be my C-Men.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's not a good name.

name: Raj
line: Okay, Sheldon. I'm going to be leading you through a series of meditation exercises. These methods come from the ancient gurus of India and have helped me overcome my own fears.

name: Sheldon
line: And yet, you can't speak to women.

name: Raj
line: True, but thanks to meditation, I am able to stay in the same room with them without urinating. Now, close your eyes.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, but don't punch me.

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: When I was little, my sister would say to me, close your eyes, you'll get a surprise, and then she'd punch me.

name: Raj
line: I'm not going to punch you.

name: Sheldon
line: That's what my sister used to say.

name: Raj
line: Do you want to do this or not?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. Proceed.

name: Raj
line: All right. Imagine yourself in the one place you feel most at home. Where is that?

name: Sheldon
line: Sim City. More specifically, the Sim City I designed, Sheldonopolis.

name: Raj
line: Okay, you're in Sheldonopolis.

name: Sheldon
line: Where exactly? Sheldon Square? Sheldon Towers? Sheldon Stadium, home of the Fighting Sheldons?

name: Raj
line: Whatever you like.

name: Sheldon
line: I thought this was supposed to be a guided meditation.

name: Raj
line: Fine. You're in Sheldon Square.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? This time of year? It's a bit nippy.

name: Raj
line: Then, put on a sweater.

name: Sheldon
line: Suppose I could run downtown and pick up something at Shel-Mart.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, whatever. Just go buy a sweater.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, the nice thing about Shel-Mart is I own it, so I get a 15% discount.

name: Raj
line: You own the damn thing. Just take a freaking sweater!

name: Sheldon
line: Look, I didn't turn a profit last quarter by taking product off the shelves willy-nilly.

name: Raj
line: All right. You've paid for a sweater, and you're in Sheldon Square.

name: Sheldon
line: Hang on. It's a cardigan. I have to button it. Oh, no.

name: Raj
line: What now?

name: Sheldon
line: A Godzilla-like monster is approaching the city. I have to get my people to safety. People of Sheldonopolis, this is your mayor. Follow me. If the children can't run, leave them behind. Oh, the simulated horror!  Raj? Just as I suspected. Meditation is nothing but hokum.

name: Sheldon
line: I question your premise. How is a new suit going to prevent me from passing out in front of a ballroom full of people?

name: Penny
line: It'll give you confidence. You know, sometimes when I'm feeling all stressed out about something, I go out and buy a cute top or a fun skirt and I have a whole new outlook on life.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't you eventually realize you're just the same stressed out person in a cute top or a fun skirt?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's when I buy shoes. Now, let's see what we've got. Ooh! This is nice.

name: Sheldon
line: It's only one colour.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, so?

name: Sheldon
line: That's a lot of money for only one colour.

name: Penny
line: Fine. Why don't you pick out what you like.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. . This is pretty sharp.

name: Penny
line: No, you're wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: This is great. I had a suit like this when I was six.  Okay, I think we have a winner.

name: Penny
line: Where the hell d'you find that?

name: Sheldon
line: In the prom department.

name: Penny
line: It's ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Says the former member of the Corn Queen's Court.

name: Penny
line: Please just try this one on.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. But anything I put on now is only going to suffer in comparison.  This is absurd. I look like a clown.

name: Leonard
line: So, Sheldon, how you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: That's how you start a psychotherapy session? How am I doing? I was promised a riverboat journey into the jungles of my subconscious. Instead, I get the same question I hear from the lady who slices my bologna at Ralph's.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, I'll start again.

name: Sheldon
line: Would it be helpful to you if I told you about my dreams?

name: Leonard
line: Um, I don't know, maybe.

name: Sheldon
line: I recently had a dream that I was a giant. But everything around me was to scale, so it all looked normal.

name: Leonard
line: How did you know you were a giant if everything was to scale?

name: Sheldon
line: I was wearing size a million pants.

name: Leonard
line: Why don't we just talk?

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, the talking cure. Classical Freudian, good choice. If it will help speed things along, uh, my answers to the standard Rorschach ink blot test are A, a bat, B, a bat, C, a bat, and D, my father killing my mother with a hypodermic needle.

name: Leonard
line: Why don't I just start? Sometimes people have trouble accepting accolades if, on a subconscious level, they don't feel they deserve them. Do you think maybe that's what's happening here?

name: Sheldon
line: Really, Leonard? You're just going to try to recycle Adler's doctrine of the inferiority complex? I could probably get that from the woman at Ralph's. And she'd let me taste some pieces of cheese for free.

name: Leonard
line: But it could be part of your problem. Let me give you an example. When I was eight, I won a ribbon at the science fair for my project, “Do Lima Beans Grow Better to Classical Music.” But my mother pointed out that it was just a rehash of my brother's earlier “Do Lima Beans Grow Worse to Rock ‘n' Roll.” I felt so guilty, I gave the ribbon back.

name: Sheldon
line: And how did that make you feel?

name: Leonard
line: Terrible. I worked really hard on that project. I stayed up all night singing the clown's aria from Pagliacci to a lima bean sprout.

name: Sheldon
line: Go on.

name: Leonard
line: It wasn't my fault. I had never seen my brother's project. And my mother could've told me before instead of at the ceremony in front of everyone.

name: Sheldon
line: So, I hear you saying you're angry with your mother.

name: Leonard
line: Damn right, I'm angry with my mother. For God's sake, I was eight years old. She humiliated me. That's when the bed-wetting started again.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: For what?

name: Sheldon
line: If someone as damaged as you can find his way to crawl out of bed each morning, I think I can face a simple award ceremony.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, that's it? I thought we had a whole hour!

name: Leonard
line: Good evening, ladies and gentlemen. My name is Dr. Leonard Hofstadter, and it is my very great honour to introduce the winner of this year's Chancellor's award for Science and my good friend, Dr. Sheldon Cooper. But before I do, I'd like to share with you a letter from Sheldon's mother, who couldn't be here tonight. Isn't that nice? His mother sent him a letter. She's proud of him. I wonder what that feels like. Dear Shelly. That's what she calls him. Shelly, it's a pet name. You know what my mother's pet name for me is? Leonard. But I digress. Dear Shelly. I am so proud of...

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear.

name: Penny
line: What's the matter?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm getting dizzy.

name: Raj
line: Don't worry. You're surrounded by your C-Men.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't do this. I'm going to faint.

name: Penny
line: Here, drink this. It'll relax you.

name: Sheldon
line: Alcohol? I don't drink alcohol.

name: Penny
line: Fine, faint.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't feel different, this alcohol's defective.

name: Penny
line: Here, see if this one works.

name: Leonard
line: First of all, the projects were totally different. I was showing that classical music nurtures lima beans and makes them grow, but my mother didn't hear me. If you'd like to look at the relationship between nurturing and growth, I'd like to point out that my brother is eight inches taller than me.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm ready.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, right. Ladies and gentlemen, our guest of honour, Dr. Sheldon Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks, shorty,I'll take it from here. All right, you people ready to have some fun? You have a basic understanding of differential calculus and at least one year of algebraic topology? Well, then here come the jokes. Why did the chicken cross the Mobius strip? To get to the same side, bazinga! All right, a neutron walks into a bar and asks, how much for a drink? The bartender says, for you, no charge. Hello? I know you're out there. I can hear you metabolizing oxygen and expelling carbon dioxide. Looks like we have some academic dignitaries in the audience. Dr. Randall from the geology department, only man who's happy when they take his work for granite. Ba-da cha! I kid the geologists, of course, but it's only 'cause I have no respect for the field. Let's get serious for a moment. Why are we all here? ‘Cause we're scientists. And what do scientists study? The universe. And what's the universe made of? I am so glad you asked.  There's antimony, arsenic, aluminium, selenium, and hydrogen and oxygen and nitrogen and rhenium, and nickel, neodymium,

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, Leonard. Would you be able to answer some questions I'm having about the events of last night?

name: Penny
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Question one, where are my pants?

name: Leonard
line: You might want to check YouTube.

name: Sheldon
line: What do I search?

name: Leonard
line: It's already loaded. Just hit play.

name: On-screen Sheldon
line: All right, people, let's get down to the math. It is only three dimensional thinking that limits our imagination. Can I take my pants off over my head? Of course not. My body's in the way. But if we had access to higher dimensions, we could move our pants around our bodies through the fourth dimension and our days of dropping trousers would be over.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Lord, this couldn't be any more humiliating.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-uh, give it a minute.

name: On-screen Sheldon
line: Now, for the astronomers in the audience, get ready to see the dark side of the moon. And here's Uranus.

name: Penny
line: Having a little trouble catching your breath there?

name: Leonard
line: No, no, I'm good. If my P.E. teachers had told me this is what I was training for, I would have tried a lot harder.

name: Penny
line: Do or do not. There is no try.

name: Leonard
line: Did you just quote Star Wars?

name: Penny
line: I believe I quoted Empire Strikes Back.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my God. I'm lying in bed with a beautiful woman who can quote Yoda. I love you, Penny.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Oh. Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: You're welcome. I just wanted to put that out there.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, no, I, I'm, I'm glad.

name: Leonard
line: Good. Glad is good.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Yeah. No, no. Um. So, it's getting pretty late. We should probably go to sleep.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Hmm.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, probably.

name: Penny
line: Okay, good night, sweetie.

name: Leonard
line: Good night.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Leonard, where do you come down on giant ants?

name: Raj
line: Sheldon says impossible. Howard and I say not only possible, but as a mode of transportation, way cooler than a Batmobile.

name: Sheldon
line: You are ignoring the square-cube law. The giant ant would be crushed under the weight of its own exoskeleton. And for the record, the appropriate ranking of cool modes of transportation is jet pack, hoverboard, transporter, Batmobile, and then giant ant.

name: Leonard
line: Seriously? You have nothing better to do than sit around and discuss the possibility of giant ants?

name: Howard
line: What's with him?

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps he's at a sensitive point in his monthly cycle.

name: Howard
line: Are you saying he's man-struating?

name: Sheldon
line: Not literally. But as far back as the 17th century, scientists observed a 33-day fluctuation in men's hormone levels.

name: Raj
line: Interesting. That might explain my weepy days in the middle of the month. You know what I'm talking about.

name: Howard
line: Okay, forget giant ants. How about giant rabbits?

name: Raj
line: Big or small, I don't like rabbits. They always look like they're about to say something, but they never do.

name: Sheldon
line: Rabbits do have a respiratory system that would support great size. And on a side note, they are one of the few mammals whose scrotum is in front of the penis.

name: Raj
line: Maybe that's what they want to talk about.

name: Howard
line: Leonard, where do you stand on giant rabbits and scrotal position?

name: Leonard
line: I honestly don't care.

name: Raj
line: Really? Because every time we've talked about unusual animal genitals, you've always had some pretty strong and controversial opinions.

name: Leonard
line: What do you want from me? I just don't give a rat's ass.

name: Howard
line: Would that be a giant rat's ass?

name: Sheldon
line: For the record, giant rats are possible.

name: Leonard
line: Can we please talk about something else? Maybe something vaguely related to life as we know it on this planet?

name: Howard
line: Okay, how about this for a topic, why is Leonard being a giant douche? Assuming giant douches are possible.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course they are. Leonard's being one.

name: Raj
line: Maybe he's having a lover's spat with Penny.

name: Leonard
line: No, there was no spat.

name: Howard
line: Oh, but something happened.

name: Leonard
line: I don't want to talk about it.

name: Sheldon
line: But I sense you're going to and I don't want to hear about it. Excuse me.

name: Howard
line: What'd you do, Romeo? You pour maple syrup all over your body and ask her if she was in the mood for a short stack?

name: Raj
line: Did you think it would be funny to put on a pair of her panties and jump around, but it wound up just creeping her out?

name: Leonard
line: What? No.

name: Raj
line: I'm just asking, dude. It happens.

name: Stuart
line: You guys still on for bowling tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. In fact, I've prepared some trash talk for the occasion. You bowl like your mama. Unless, of course, she bowls well. In which case, you bowl nothing like her.

name: Stuart
line: Oh. Ouch.

name: Sheldon
line: That is what is referred to as a burn on you.

name: Howard
line: Did you ask her to start waxing?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Raj
line: Did you start waxing?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: While making love, did you accidentally spank your own ass and cry out Mommy?

line: I'm walking away from you now.

name: Howard
line: That wasn't a no.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, I think we're getting close.

name: Howard
line: Did you take a Benadryl and fall asleep while pleasuring her? Because you can die that way.

name: Raj
line: Oh, that would be a good way to go.
