line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Good, Penny, reminder, bowling tonight at seven o'clock.

name: Penny
line: Oh, right, bowling.

name: Leonard
line: You don't have to come if you don't want to.

name: Penny
line: No, no, it's okay. I mean, let's face it, you guys would get creamed without me.

name: Sheldon
line: We would indeed. In this particular case, your lack of femininity works to our advantage.

name: Penny
line: It's always nice chatting with you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Sarcasm?

name: Penny
line: Thinly veiled contempt.

name: Sheldon
line: Remember, seven o'clock.

name: Penny
line: Got it.

name: Sheldon
line: Pacific Daylight time!

name: Penny
line: Bite me!

name: Sheldon
line: Please reserve that butch spirit for the lanes.

line: I thought you were bringing your own bowling shoes.

name: Sheldon
line: These are my own bowling shoes.

name: Howard
line: Then what's with the disinfectant?

name: Sheldon
line: I know where my feet have been.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, Penny! And you guys. Albino Bob couldn't make it, so I brought a substitute. I believe some of you know Wil Wheaton.

name: Wil
line: Hi, Sheldon. How's it going?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, well, well. If it isn't Wil Wheaton, the Green Goblin to my Spider-Man, the Pope Paul the fifth to my Galileo, the Internet Explorer to my Firefox.

name: Wil
line: You're not still carrying a grudge because I beat you at that card tournament, are you?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm the proud owner of Wil Wheaton stinks dot com, dot net, and dot org. What does that tell you?

name: Wil
line: It tells me that I am living rent-free right here . You ready to bowl?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm ready. I don't know if Stuart told you what you're up against tonight, but before you stands the co-captain of the East Texas Christian Youth Holy Roller Bowling League championship team. Seven to twelve year-old division. Also, Penny's pretty good.

name: Wil
line: Great. Then it's on.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, foolish Wil Wheaton, it was never off.

name: Wil
line: Yes!

name: Sheldon
line: A common spare. The Miss Congeniality of the bowling pageant. Before you jump on Twitter to tout your modest accomplishment, watch how it's really done. I am the ball. My thoughts are its thoughts. Its holes are my holes.  Yes. Tweet that, Tweety Bird.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I just wanted to tell you I'm a big fan.

name: Wil
line: Oh, thanks.

name: Howard
line: I'm sure you're probably sick of Star Trek questions, but, Whoopi Goldberg, you ever hit that?

name: Raj
line: Ah, beer. The magic elixir that can turn this poor, shy Indian boy into the life of the party. Oh, yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Chilli cheese fry?

name: Penny
line: Yes. I love chilli cheese fries.

name: Leonard
line: Really? You love them?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, why?

name: Leonard
line: No reason. I'm just glad to hear you're comfortable saying you love something.

name: Penny
line: Do you really want to get into this right now?

name: Leonard
line: Get into what? Why wouldn't you love the chilli cheese fries? They've been in your life a long time. They make you happy. They deserve to know.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, you just caught me by surprise last night. I didn't know what to say.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, now you've had some time to think about it. So, what do you want to say?

name: Penny
line: I'm not sure.

name: Leonard
line: How can you not be sure?

name: Penny

name: Leonard
line: No, the place to have the conversation was in bed after I said, I love you, and you said, Thank you, good night.

name: Penny
line: Don't push it, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: I am not pushing anything.

name: Penny
line: You are. You don't get to decide when I'm ready to say I love you!

name: Raj
line: Ah, the premature I love you.

name: Howard
line: I guessed premature. Does that count?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny,  Penny,  Penny.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: This is for you.

name: Penny
line: Ice cream?

name: Sheldon
line: I've been familiarizing myself with female emotional crises by studying the comic strip Cathy. When she's upset, she says Ach and eats ice cream.

name: Penny
line: Um, Ach.

name: Sheldon
line: If you were a cat, I would have brought you a lasagna.

name: Penny
line: Did Leonard send you over here?

name: Sheldon
line: No, we haven't spoken since your abrupt departure last night caused us to forfeit to Stuart and his dastardly ringer Wil Wheaton.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm sorry about that.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not too proud to admit that I cried myself to sleep.

name: Penny
line: Again, I'm sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: And let me tell you sleep did not come easily with Leonard in the next room singing along with Alanis Morrisette.

name: Penny
line: You're kidding.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Clearly another woman in dire need of ice cream.

name: Penny
line: All right, Sheldon, what part of this is supposed to make me feel better?

name: Sheldon
line: The part where I tell you I've engineered a rematch with Stuart's team for tonight.

name: Penny
line: Oh, honey, I don't know. Things are a little weird with Leonard right now.

name: Sheldon
line: You want me to remove him from the team? I'm the captain, I can do that.

name: Penny
line: No, no, that's okay. Just let me talk to him, and I'll get back to you.

name: Sheldon
line: When are you going to talk to him?

name: Penny
line: I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: He's in the laundry room now. Now would be a good time.

name: Penny
line: You're not gonna leave me alone until I do it, are you?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I think we both know the answer to that question.

name: Penny
line: I think we should talk now.

name: Leonard
line: What? No, it's okay. We don't have to talk 'cause there's nothing to talk about. Everything's good.

name: Penny
line: Really? So, you didn't get all snarky 'cause I said something nice to a bowl of chilli fries?

name: Leonard
line: All right, maybe I overreacted. So we're in two different places emotionally. So what? And maybe I'm a little ahead of you. That's fine. You know. In fact, it makes sense, 'cause let's face it, I've been in this relationship two years longer than you.

name: Penny
line: Look, Leonard, you have to know how much I care about you. It's just that I've said the L word too soon before, and it didn't work out very well.

name: Leonard
line: Really? I wouldn't know what that's like.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. You know what I'm talking about, though.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I do.

name: Penny
line: So, we're good?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, that's what I'm telling you. We are good. We are great.

name: Sheldon
line: All right! Fence mended, problem swept under the rug. Time to bowl! Yes, I was eavesdropping, there's a lot at stake here.

name: Sheldon
line: Attention, all bowlers. I've taken the liberty of having these made for our rematch.

name: Penny
line: The Wesley Crushers?

line: No, not the Wesley Crushers. The Wesley “Crushers.”

line: I don't get it.

name: Leonard
line: Wesley Crusher was Wil Wheaton's character on Star Trek.

name: Penny
line: Still don't get it.

name: Sheldon
line: It's a blindingly clever play on words. By appropriating his character's name and adding the S, we imply that we we'll be the crushers of Wesley.

line: Okay, I'm sorry, honey, but the Wesley Crushers sounds like a bunch of people who like Wesley Crusher.

name: Sheldon
line: What? No! Again, it's not the Wesley Crushers. It's the Wesley “Crushers.”

line: You know, if you want it to mean you're crushing Wesley, it'd be the “Wesley” Crushers.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you people even hear yourselves? It's not the Wesley Crushers. It's not the “Wesley” Crushers. It's the Wesley “Crushers.”

name: Wil
line: Hey, look. They named their team after me.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's not the... Never mind.

line: So, we're all clear on the bet and the stakes?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. The losers will be publicly humiliated in a fashion to be chosen by the victor. FYI, I plan on having you publish a scientific paper expounding the discredited Velikovsky hypothesis.

line: Ouch again.

line: Hey, Sheldon, I just wanted you to know that I'm really looking forward to wiping the floor with you.

line: Oh, yes? Well, before I respond, let me ask you a question. Is your mother a good or poor bowler?

name: Wil
line: After you.

name: Sheldon
line: No, after you, as we are currently crushing you, Wesley.

line: It's customary for the player on the right-hand lane to bowl first.

line: All right.

name: Sheldon
line: I so loathe you.

name: Wil
line: That's right, Sheldon. Embrace the dark side.

line: That's not even from your franchise!

name: Stuart
line: I, um, I want you to know that even though we're on opposite sides, I, I bear you no ill will.

line: Thank you, Stuart. It's nice to know.

name: Stuart
line: Mmm, mmm. People from opposite sides often have good relationships. You know, Romeo and Juliet, Tony and Maria from West Side Story, what's-his-name and the big blue chick in Avatar. I'm gonna bowl now.

line: It's good that we got out and did something physical.

line: Mm-hmm.

name: Leonard
line: Gets us out of our heads. You get in your head, you start to overthink, overanalyze, obsess, you worry. That's not what we're doing tonight. Tonight we're just throwing a ball at some pins.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's right.

name: Leonard
line: Mm-hmm, and someday, we don't know when, maybe you'll love me back. Ooh, I'm up.

line: Shel-don! Shel-don! Shel-don! Shel-don!

line: Excuse me. I don't know who you're chanting for as I am currently the ball.

line: Thank you, Jesus! As my mother would say.

line: I'm glad you patched things up with your boyfriend.

line: Oh, yeah, me, too.

line: It's always tough when the L bomb gets dropped and you're not ready for it.

line: Tell me about it.

line: I dated this one girl, and I told her that I loved her, and she said she wasn't sure. And she strung me along for almost two years. It was brutal.

line: Oh, I'm sorry.

line: Thanks. Yeah, I wish she had just broken up with me right there, put me out of my misery.

line: Wil, you're up.

line: Oh, that's me.

line: Did you let Wil Wheaton get in your head?

line: What are you talking about?

line: Well, if he does, don't believe it. He's not above playing the dead meemaw card.

line: Penny, you're up.

line: All right, remember, his meemaw's alive and be the ball.

line: Yeah, I got it.

line: I know.

line: So just take your time and concentrate.

line: Yeah, you are! Just back off!

line: You did this, didn't you?

line: You and I made a pact that if either of us ever got a hot girlfriend, that person would have his girlfriend hook the other guy up with one of her girlfriends.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I don't remember that.

name: Sheldon
line: June 30th, 2004. Opening day of Spider-man 2 at the AMC Pasadena. They only had red icees, no blue.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Howard
line: So you've been with Penny for like a month and a half now. Where's my shorty, Morty?

name: Leonard
line: Howard, you can't hold me to that.

name: Howard
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Because when I made that agreement, I didn't think I'd ever have a hot girlfriend. And I was positive you never would.

name: Raj
line: Hey, how come I wasn't part of this deal?

name: Sheldon
line: You had left the refreshment stand in order to indulge in your customary preemptive pre-show urination.

name: Raj
line: Oh, so that's how it works? I have a teeny bladder and now I don't get a hot girlfriend?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, Raj, that's how it works.

name: Raj
line: Damn.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, damn it. Can I have a napkin?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, no.

name: Leonard
line: But you have a whole bunch of 'em.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I've moved to a four-napkin system. Lap, hands, face and personal emergencies. If you like, starting tomorrow, I'll add a guest napkin, but I'm afraid there's nothing I can do for you today.  Good luck. That's the face napkin.

name: Howard
line: So, have you talked to Penny yet?

name: Leonard
line: No, I haven't.

name: Howard
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Because I've been busy, because I haven't figured out a way to bring it up, and mostly, and I can't stress how key this is, because I don't want to.

name: Howard
line: Leonard, a pact is a pact. You have to get Penny to fix me up.

name: Leonard
line: It's not that simple. What am I supposed to say? Penny, do you have any friends you'd like to never hear from again?

name: Howard
line: Come on, I'm smart, I have good job and I have only three percent body fat.

name: Raj
line: It's true. I've seen him at the beach, he's like a human chicken wing.

name: Howard
line: Leonard, come on.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. I'll ask if she has a friend for you.

name: Howard
line: A hot friend.

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Howard
line: And tall. I want our kids to be able to ride space mountain before they're 20.

name: Leonard
line: I'll see what I can do.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Sheldon, guess what I heard today?

name: Sheldon
line: I'd imagine you heard any number of things today. When you arrived at work you undoubtedly heard, hello, Raj, how are you, Raj? Given that you're wearing a new sweater-vest, you may have heard new sweater-vest? And possibly, though far less likely, nice sweater-vest.

name: Raj
line: Why don't I just tell you what I heard today.

name: Sheldon
line: That would probably save us some time.

name: Raj
line: Saturday night at the comic book store, they're having a Mystic Warlords of Ka-ah tournament. First prize is five hundred dollars. If we team up, we'd be unstoppable.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, Raj, but I have no interest in playing a game in which I find no challenge.

name: Raj
line: What about the money?

name: Sheldon
line: I have money.

name: Raj
line: But this is other money.

name: Sheldon
line: How does it different from the money I have?

name: Raj
line: Half of it will be mine.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you need it to buy a less disturbing sweater-vest?

name: Raj
line: Leonard, help.

name: Leonard
line: Are you kidding? I couldn't even talk him into giving me one of his freakin' napkins.

name: Penny
line: Wow, you really are a genius.

name: Leonard
line: Not really. I googled how to do that. So, listen, have you ever made a pact with someone?

name: Penny
line: You mean, like a pinky swear?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, fine, like a pinky swear.

name: Penny
line: Well, in the first grade, my friend Rosie and I made a pact to marry Bert and Ernie. You know, from Sesame Street?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm familiar with Bert and Ernie.

name: Penny
line: Then we found out we both wanted Ernie. We didn't speak again until middle school.

name: Leonard
line: Over puppets?

name: Penny
line: The heart wants what the heart wants, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Speaking of what the heart wants, um, a long time ago, I made a pact with Wolowitz that kind of involves you.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I don't know where you're going with this, but tread carefully because it may be the last conversation we ever have.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, nothing like that. The deal was that if either of us ever got a girlfriend, we'd have her fix the other one up with one of her friends.

name: Penny
line: And you thought a good time to bring this up be right after sex.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I sure as hell wasn't going to bring it up before sex, and during, I was trying to remember what I read on google, so...

name: Penny
line: I'm not hooking Wolowitz up with one of my friends.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, it doesn't have to be a good friend. And you know that deep down inside, Howard's a really nice guy.

name: Penny
line: The problem isn't what's on the inside. It's the creepy candy coating.

name: Leonard
line: Will you at least think about it? Just as a favour to me?

name: Penny
line: Oh, great thing about Ernie, was he never asked me for anything. He just gave.

name: Sheldon
line: Got it. Got it. Got it. Got it. Got it. Got it. Betty and Veronica? Ugh.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, Sheldon, the new Green Lantern figurine's coming in tomorrow. Want me to set one aside for you?

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. You just robbed me of the opportunity to stumble upon the figurine and make the oh-so-satisfying journey from discovery to desire to possession.

name: Stuart
line: All right, I won't set one aside for you.

name: Sheldon
line: But I must have it.

name: Stuart
line: Okay, I'll set one aside for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. You know, I can buy all these things online. I come here for the personal service.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Stuart, is the Wil Wheaton signed up for the mystic warlords tournament THE Wil Wheaton from Star Trek?

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, he lives around here. Big gamer.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, I'm sorry, did I rob you of the opportunity to stumble onto that for yourself?

name: Sheldon
line: You don't understand. Growing up, I idolized Wil Wheaton? Wesley Crusher had an eidetic memory just like me.

name: Raj
line: Oh, what a coincidence. Maybe you can discuss that with him while you're playing in the tournament. Sign here.

name: Sheldon
line: I was such a fan that in 1995, I travelled ten hours by bus to a sci-fi convention in Jackson, Mississippi, wearing my Star Fleet Academy cadet uniform in order to meet Wil Wheaton and get him to autograph my mint in-package Wesley Crusher action figure.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, it'll be like a reunion then. Sign here.

name: Sheldon
line: My arduous journey, however, was for naught. Although advertised to appear, he did not show up. It was at that moment, I vowed eternal hatred for Wil Wheaton.

name: Raj
line: Okay, great, you can tell him you hate him. Sign here.

name: Sheldon
line: It might also interest you to know that Wil Wheaton currently ranks sixth on my all-time enemies list, right between director Joel Schumacher, who nearly destroyed the Batman movie franchise, and Billy Sparks, who lived down the street from me and put dog poop on the handles of my bicycle.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I get it, he's a bad guy. Sign here.

name: Sheldon
line: In the words of Khan Noonien Singh in the immortal wrath of Khan, he tasks me, he tasks me and I shall have him.

name: Raj
line: No doubt, sign here.

name: Sheldon
line: From hell's heart, I stab at thee.

name: Stuart
line: All right, Raj, looks like you're teamed up with die, Wil Wheaton, die.

name: Howard
line: So, tell me more about the future mother of my children.

name: Penny
line: She's adorable, Howard. I think you'll like her.

name: Howard
line: Great. So what did you tell her about me? Did you mention the body fat?

name: Penny
line: No, I thought that would be a nice surprise for her.

name: Howard
line: Good, good.

name: Penny
line: I just told her you're an aerospace engineer, you speak five languages...

name: Howard
line: Six if you count Klingon.

name: Leonard
line: Girls don't count Klingon, Howard. Right?

name: Penny
line: Right. Oh, and I told her you have an unhealthy attachment to your mother.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: I'm kidding.

name: Leonard
line: Another delightful surprise for her.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, it's your play. Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: My enchanted troll bludgeons your screaming harpy with a cursed mace. Game.

name: Raj
line: Sorry, boys. Say hi to your mother when she picks you up. Or I could just tell her later tonight! We pwned them, dude! Up top!

name: Sheldon
line: Look at him. Wil Wheaton, my old friend, I have chased you round the moons of Nibia and round the Antares maelstrom and round perdition's flames!

name: Raj
line: You know you keep quoting Wrath of Khan, but he was in next generation. It's a totally different set of characters.

name: Sheldon
line: Silence! How much longer must I wait for my revenge?

name: Raj
line: Well, if Wil Wheaton and Stuart win their match and we beat lonely Larry and Captain Sweatpants in the next round, we'll face off for the championship.

name: Sheldon
line: So, my path to satisfaction is blocked by lonely Larry and Captain Sweatpants. Very well. They must be destroyed.

name: Raj
line: Dude, you have to stop talking like that. It's really lame.

name: Sheldon
line: Silence!

name: Howard
line: So, Penny tells me you're working as a waitress to put yourself through grad school. That's pretty great, what are you studying?

name: Bernadette
line: Microbiology.

name: Howard
line: Oh, cool. So you could study me.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't understand.

name: Howard
line: Microbiology is the study of tiny living things.

name: Bernadette
line: I know, I'm studying it.

name: Howard
line: And I said you could study me 'cause I'm a tiny living thing. It's a joke.

name: Bernadette
line: Are you sure?

name: Howard
line: Do you like science-fiction?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Role-playing games?

name: Bernadette
line: Like in the bedroom or like Dungeons and Dragons?

name: Howard
line: Either.

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Gonna be a long night.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, it's your fault.

name: Leonard
line: I had to ask. You didn't have to say yes.

name: Howard
line: You like magic?

name: Bernadette
line: Not really.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Long, long night.

name: Sheldon
line: I play my endless serpent. Raj will play ecstatic frenzy, which means Larry will have to play chaos overlord, then Captain Sweatpants, molten river. I play nightshade dryad, game, set and match. Now fetch me Wil Wheaton! bortaS bIr jablu'DI' reH QaQqu' nay'

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Did that guy just say revenge is a dish best served cold in Klingon?

name: Stuart
line: I believe so.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: What is wrong with him?

name: Stuart
line: Everyone has a different theory.

name: Howard
line: How about computers? Do you like computers?

name: Bernadette
line: I use them. I don't like them.

name: Howard
line: Okay... Puppies? Where do you stand on puppies?

name: Bernadette
line: A puppy once bit my face.

name: Howard
line: Of course it did.

name: Leonard
line: How about that? Einstein was wrong.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Approaching the speed of light doesn't slow down time. Approaching them does.

name: Howard
line: Excuse me. Oh, damn. It's my mother.

name: Bernadette
line: Are you going to answer it?

name: Howard
line: I'm torn. She might be dying, and, you know, I wouldn't want to miss that. On the other hand, if I let it go to voicemail, I could play it over and over.

name: Bernadette
line: I know how you feel. My mother makes me crazy.

name: Howard
line: Not as crazy as my mother makes me.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, yeah? Does your mother call you every day at work to see if you've had a healthy lunch?

name: Howard
line: My mother calls me at work to see if I had a healthy bowel movement.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, well, does she lay out your clothes for you in the morning like you're nine years old?

name: Howard
line: You live with your mother?

name: Bernadette
line: No. That's the sad part.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, rough. Okay, check this out. My mother made me wear rubber gloves to kindergarten so I wouldn't pick up a disease from the other children.

name: Bernadette
line: That's nothing. I couldn't ride a bicycle 'cause my mother was afraid I'd hit a bump and lose my virginity.

name: Howard
line: Oh, wow. You didn't, did you?

name: Bernadette
line: Not on a bicycle. In a Camry.

name: Howard
line: Corolla!

name: Bernadette
line: Oh!

name: Howard
line: More wine?

name: Bernadette
line: I'd love some.

name: Howard
line: Listen, you have to come to shabbat dinner at my house sometime.

name: Bernadette
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: A catholic girl like you wearing a big cross like that might just give my mother the big brain aneurysm I've been hoping for.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, but only if you come to Sunday dinner at my house wearing a yarmulke.

name: Howard
line: It's a date.

name: Penny
line: Am I a matchmaker or what?

name: Raj
line: Lava serpent.

name: Stuart
line: Nest of snakes.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Underworld guardian.

name: Sheldon
line: Underworld guardian. We skirmish to the death.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Invisibility spell.

name: Sheldon
line: Luminescence spell.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Water nymph.

name: Sheldon
line: Fire demon.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Two-headed tiger.

name: Sheldon
line: Three-headed lion.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Sulphur.

name: Sheldon
line: Brimstone.

name: Raj
line: Problem, Wil Wheaton?

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Hang on.

name: Sheldon
line: You're holding two moderate spell cards, a small rock and a potion of Zancor, which will be about as much help as an air conditioner on the ice planet Hoth. Your only move is to play the potion, lose the skirmish, and two moves later, the game.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: I think he's got me.

name: Sheldon
line: The year was 1995, the place, Jackson, Mississippi. Having spent ten hours on a bus, during which I had to twice violate my personal rule against relieving myself on board a moving vehicle, I finally arrived at the fourth annual Dixie-Trek convention only to find that my idol Wil Wheaton decided he had better things to do than to show up and sign my action figure.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: You betrayed me, Wil Wheaton. Now I have my revenge.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: You went to the '95 Dixie-Trek? Oh, dude, my grandmother had just died, and I had to go to her funeral.

name: Sheldon
line: Your mee-maw died? That's terrible.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Yeah, it was. But I'm really sorry that I disappointed you.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, I understand. Anything happened to my mee-maw, I'd be one inconsolable moon pie. I should clarify that statement by explaining that she calls me moon pie.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: It's special relationship, isn't it, between a boy and his grandmother?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes.

name: Raj
line: Okay, great, everybody loves their grandmas! Now, come on, Sheldon, finish him off!

name: Wil Wheaton
line: It's okay, Sheldon. I let you down. I deserve it. Potion of Zancor.

name: Raj
line: What are you waiting for? Kill Wil Wheaton! From hell's heart, stab at him!

name: Sheldon
line: I can't.

name: Raj
line: Sure you can. Do it! Do it!

name: Sheldon
line: No. I came here to defeat Wil Wheaton, the man who destroyed my dreams. But I can't defeat Wil Wheaton, the man who loved his mee-maw. Enchanted bunny.

name: Raj
line: No! Not enchanted bunny!

name: Wil Wheaton
line: I call my mee-maw nana. And she's going be very happy to hear that my small rock kills your enchanted bunny. Game over, moon pie.

name: Sheldon
line: I... I... I don't understand. Your grandmother's alive?

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Oh, you catch on quick. Come on, Stewie, let's get our prize money.

name: Stuart
line: That was fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Wheaton! Wheaton! Wheaton!

name: Leonard
line: Kites, ho!

name: Howard
line: Kites ho!

name: Raj
line: Kites ho!

name: All three
line: Kites, ho!

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. You're misusing the word ho. It's an interjection used to call attention to a destination, not an object, as in, uh, Land, ho! Or, uh, Westward, ho!

name: The three guys
line: Kites, ho!

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys. What you doing? Going out to discover electricity?

name: Leonard
line: If you're referring to the work of Benjamin Franklin, he did not discover electricity, he merely used a kite to determine that lightning consists of electricity. He also invented the Franklin stove, bifocals and the flexible urinary catheter. Kites, ho.

name: Leonard
line: We're heading out for some kite fighting.

name: Penny
line: Kite fighting?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. It's an extremely competitive, cutthroat sport.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, actually, the risk of throat cutting is very low. On the other hand, severe string burn is a real and ever-Present danger.

name: Leonard
line: You want to come watch?

name: Penny
line: Oh, gee, sounds amazing, but, um, I've got some friends coming over. Not a big thing, we're just gonna watch the Nebraska game.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Football, sure.

name: Howard
line: Good guess.

name: Penny
line: I would've invited you, but I know you're not a football fan.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, I'm not, so, great. You've got plans doing something you like, I've got plans doing something I like, so it's good.

name: Penny
line: Well, maybe we'll hang out later, you know, after everybody's gone.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, great.

name: Penny
line: See ya.

name: Leonard
line: Well, this sucks.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, I got bored and drifted off. Where exactly in the interaction did the sucking lie?

name: Raj
line: Leonard just realized that Penny's been hiding him from her friends because he's a tiny, little man who flies kites.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that certainly would suck.

name: Sheldon
line: Wolowitz is trying to outflank us. Let out some string, add altitude and I'll go under and cut his line.

name: Leonard
line: Why wouldn't Penny want her friends to meet me?

name: Sheldon
line: Focus, Leonard, focus! The heat of battle is upon us, the dogs of war are unleashed.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe Koothrappali's right, maybe I embarrass her.

name: Sheldon
line: You're embarrassing me right now, a grown man worrying about such nonsense when in the middle of flying kites.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Sorry won't bring their kites down. Ow! String burn! String burn!

name: Raj
line: Oh, they think we're flanking, they're playing right into our hands. On the count of three, we execute the flying scissor. One, two...

name: Howard
line: Whoa! Did you see that?

name: Raj
line: See what?

name: Howard
line: That chick, she smiled at me.

name: Raj
line: No, she didn't.

name: Howard
line: Yes, she did.

name: Raj
line: Come on, scissors, scissors!

name: Howard
line: Hold my line.

name: Raj
line: Wait, what are you doing? I can't scissors by myself! Howard! Come back!

name: Sheldon
line: Victory!

name: Raj
line: Son of a bitch.

name: Raj
line: You're a sucky friend, you know that? A sucky, sucky friend.

name: Howard
line: What was I supposed to do? She gave me that come-hither look.

name: Raj
line: If she gave you any look at l. It was a you suck look.

name: Howard
line: I would've caught up to her if I hadn't pulled a hammy.

name: Raj
line: Oh, please, you weigh 80 pounds. You don't have a hammy.

name: Leonard
line: So, Penny doesn't want me around her friends, I embarrass her. What else could it be?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, her actions could be out of concern for your feelings. Perhaps she's excluded you from these gatherings because she's scouting for a new mate and doesn't want to do it in front of you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, how kind of her.

name: Sheldon
line: Agreed. Most primates don't show that sort of discretion. A female bonobo will copulate with a new male in front of the old one without so much as a how do you do?

name: Raj
line: You always do this, you know? You ditch me for a woman you don't have a shot with.

name: Howard
line: I totally had a shot.

name: Raj
line: With a woman you were chasing through a park? That's not a shot, that's a felony. What's worse, it cost me my prized Patang fighting kite. Sheldon, I don't suppose there's any chance you could give me my kite back?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, Raj, but the rules of aerial warfare dictate at the fallen kite go to the victor. And without rules, the competition has no meaning. And without meaning, the following would be an empty gesture.  I have your kite. I have your kite.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: How was your football party?

name: Penny
line: It was pretty good. We won.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that's excellent. It's a weird figure of speech, isn't it, we won when you weren't

name: Penny
line: I'm glad to hear it.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey, on a related subject, are you embarrassed to have me around your friends?

name: Penny
line: Oh, my god, no. Why would you ask that?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you know, I just noticed I haven't really met any of them.

name: Penny
line: Sure you have.

name: Leonard
line: Well, yeah, no, I met the huge ex-boyfriend and the smaller yet still larger than me ex-boyfriend. Were they here today?

name: Penny
line: Of course not.

name: Leonard
line: Of course not. Why would they be? Why would I ask? Why am I rambling? Why don't you stop me?

name: Penny
line: Leonard, look, if you want to meet my friends, that would be great. I just, you know, I didn't want you to be bored.

name: Leonard
line: I wouldn't be bored. Why would I be bored?

name: Penny
line: Well, 'cause they're not genius scientists.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, I like all sorts of people. In fact, some of my best friends aren't geniuses.

name: Penny
line: Like who?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, some of my Facebook friends aren't geniuses. My point is, if we're going to be a couple, I should be friends with your friends.

name: Penny
line: Okay, great. Well, then why don't you come over next Saturday and watch the game with us.

name: Leonard
line: Another football game?

name: Penny
line: They have them every week.

name: Leonard
line: Did not know that.

name: Penny
line: You wanted to meet my friends.

name: Leonard
line: Sure, sure, just I don't know much about football.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's okay, a lot of the guys' girlfriends don't know football. They just kind of drink and talk in the kitchen.

name: Leonard
line: Great.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, a complete pass. First down, New England. I think I'm starting to get this.

name: Raj
line: Really? The only thing I've learned in the last two hours is that American men love drinking beer, pee too often and have trouble getting erections.

name: Leonard
line: Focus on the game, not the commercials, Raj.

name: Raj
line: I'm just saying, maybe if you people cut back on the beer, you could get out of the bathroom and satisfy your women without pharmaceutical help.

name: Howard
line: Raj, what are you doing here? You were supposed to help me pimp out my Vespa.

name: Raj
line: I'm sorry, are you under the impression that we're still friends?

name: Howard
line: Oh come on, you're not still grinding on the kite thing, are you?

name: Raj
line: It's not just the kite thing. Every time we go some place, you think you can just dump me whenever someone prettier comes along, even though you don't have a shot with them.

name: Howard
line: But I had a shot with that jogger.

name: Raj
line: Fine. Paint green flames on your little scooter with her.

name: Howard
line: It's not a little scooter. It's the second biggest Vespa they make! Are you watching football?

name: Leonard
line: There's no fooling you. Now, what is this sacks statistic they put up there?

name: Howard
line: All I know about Saks is, my mother shops there.

name: Leonard
line: Sacks, sacks...

name: Sheldon
line: It's football nomenclature for when a quarterback is tackled behind the line of scrimmage.

name: Leonard
line: Huh... Scrimmage...

name: Sheldon
line: The line of scrimmage is the imaginary transverse line separating the offence from the defence.

name: Leonard
line: Oh.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon knows football?

name: Leonard
line: Apparently.

name: Howard
line: I mean, Quidditch, sure. But football?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, how do you know this stuff?

name: Sheldon
line: I grew up in Texas. Football is ubiquitous in Texas. Pro football, college football, high school football, peewee football, in fact, every form of football except the original, European football, which most Texans believe to be a Commie plot.

name: Leonard
line: Unbelievable.

name: Sheldon
line: If you're interested, I also know all about frying meat that isn't chicken as if it were chicken.

name: Leonard
line: So you could teach me?

name: Sheldon
line: Football or chicken-fried meats?

name: Leonard
line: Football. I'm going to Penny's on Saturday to watch a game with her friends and I don't want to look like an idiot. I want to blend in.

name: Sheldon
line: If you want to blend in with Penny's friends, I'd think looking like an idiot would be the perfect camouflage.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, Sheldon, please teach me about football. It'll be fun.

name: Sheldon
line: That's exactly what my father said. Come to the games, watch the games, week in and week out from the time I was five until I went off to college. Longest seven years of my life.

name: Leonard
line: Please, I'm asking you as a friend.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you making this a tier one friendship request?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine.

name: Leonard
line: I really appreciate this.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, yeah. All right, Poindexter, sit down, shut up and listen.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry?

name: Sheldon
line: That's how my father always began our football conversations. And if you'd like, after the game, I'll take you outside and teach you how to shoot close enough to a racoon that it craps itself.

name: Leonard
line: When are you going to stop making Cylon toast?

name: Sheldon
line: When I have enough to destroy all the human toast on the battlestar known as Galactica. Is that what you're wearing to watch football at Penny's?

name: Leonard
line: What's wrong with a football jersey?

name: Sheldon
line: Nothing. That, however, appears to be a football cocktail dress.

name: Leonard
line: I's the smallest size they had, except the one for dogs. I can't believe they had one for dogs.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. Canine football fans are a common sight in Texas. Cats, however, refuse to wear sporting apparel. My sister found that out the hard way.

name: Leonard
line: Anyway, wish me luck.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, wait. Am I correct in assuming that your attempt to be accepted by Penny's peers is based on your desire to ensure your continuing mating privileges with her?

name: Leonard
line: Well, I wouldn't put it exactly that way.

name: Sheldon
line: How would you put it?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, okay, like you said.

name: Sheldon
line: Huh. Seems like an awful lot of trouble to go through for intercourse. Don't you have access to women who will do it for money? By the way, another accepted usage for the term ho.

name: Leonard
line: Good-Bye, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hold on I believe that social convention dictate you not arrive empty-Handed. Would you like to bring some Cylon toast?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, no, I'm trying to fit in, not get laughed at.

name: Sheldon
line: What's funny about Cylon toast?

name: Raj
line: It's open.

name: Howard
line: Hey, pal.

name: Raj
line: What do you want?

name: Howard
line: I brought you a little gift. New kite.

name: Raj
line: The kite you made me lose was an authentic Patang, an Indian fighting kite that my brother sent to me from New Delhi. It took me a day to put together and two days to paint. This is Hello Kitty.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but it comes with a little coin purse. Does a Patang?

name: Raj
line: Wow, you just don't get it, do you? Buying me something pretty isn't going to make our problem just go away.

name: Howard
line: Look, I admit I haven't always been the best friend I could be.

name: Raj
line: You've been a sucky friend, a sucky, sucky friend.

name: Howard
line: Stipulated.

name: Raj
line: And you do it all the time. Last week in the mall at Radio Shack, we were looking for a phone with giant numbers for your mother, and I suddenly realize you're not even there.

name: Howard
line: I know, I know.

name: Raj
line: And where were you?

name: Howard
line: Getting shot down by the girl at Hot Dog on a Stick. But in my defence, she was gorgeous, and working that squeezer to make the lemonade, going up and down and up and down. It was like a free pole dance right in the middle of the food court.

name: Raj
line: You're impossible.

name: Howard
line: Hey, at least I can talk to women without being drunk.

name: Raj
line: Excuse me, I have selective mutism, a recognized medical disorder. You're just a douche.

name: Howard
line: No. You know what? Maybe that's what this whole thing's about. You're not mad at me, you're mad at yourself.

name: Raj
line: No, I'm mad at you. I hate myself, but I'm mad at you.

name: Howard
line: Fine. You're mad at me. I get it. Now, how about we go spend the day together? Just the two of us. We'll go anywhere you want.

name: Raj
line: I don't know.

name: Howard
line: Come on. Let me take you someplace nice.

name: Raj
line: I... I do enjoy the La Brea Tar Pits.

name: Howard
line: Really, now? With the traffic and the parking, it's... okay, fine. The Tar Pits. Let's go.

name: Raj
line: Oh, why can't I stay mad at you?

name: Leonard
line: Go! Go! Go! Go-Go-Go-Go! Yes! Are you people watching this? Is this amazing or what?

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, that's a highlight from the '98 championship game.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Did not know that.

name: Penny
line: How much beer have you had?

name: Leonard
line: None, why?

name: Penny
line: Oh. I was just kind of hoping you were drunk. Now we're back live.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, yeah. I can see the difference.

name: Guy in baseball hat
line: Oh, where's the flag, that's intentional grounding.

name: Second guy
line: Totally.

name: Leonard
line: That completely was a forward pass, which they threw intentionally incomplete to avoid loss of yardage or to conserve time. I can't believe they're not being penalized with the loss of a down and by having to move the line of scrimmage back to the spot of the foul.

name: Penny
line: Here, have some pizza, sweetie.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, you know I'm lactose intolerant.

name: Penny
line: I know. I just need you stop talking.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. I'd like to make a sandwich, but I'm out of bread.

name: Penny
line: There's some in the fridge.

name: Sheldon
line: You shouldn't keep your bread in the refrigerator. Staleness is caused by crystallization of the starch molecules, which occurs faster at cool temperatures.

name: Penny
line: On Earth, we say thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: So Leonard, how goes the mimesis?

name: Leonard
line: Mimesis?

name: Sheldon
line: You know. Mimesis. An action in which the mimic takes on the properties of a specific object or organism. Mimesis.

name: Leonard
line: What the hell are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm attempting to communicate with you without my meaning becoming apparent to those around you. Let me try again. Have the indigenous fauna accepted you as one of their own? Nudge, nudge, wink, wink.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I guess so.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Oh, FYI. After I eat my sandwich, I'm taking Koothrappali's Patang kite out for a test run. Would you like to get your delta-wing raptor and join me?

name: Leonard
line: I don't want to fly kites, Sheldon. We're watching football here.

name: Sheldon
line: I can see that. I was providing you with an alternative. A courtesy I was never offered in similar circumstances.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, look at that. The Oklahoma coach has thrown down a red flag indicating he's challenging the ruling on the field. I hope he's right, 'cause if he's not, it'll cost him one of his three time-Outs.

name: Penny
line: You know, Leonard, honey, I wouldn't mind if you wanted to go fly kites with Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: No, I'll watch the end of the game. Besides, there's only three minutes left.

name: Penny
line: Until half time.

name: Leonard
line: This is just half? We've been here for hours.

name: Penny
line: And you're gonna be here for a couple more.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, you're kidding me.

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Nice meeting all of you.

name: Penny
line: So, yeah, anyway, that's my boyfriend. He is really smart.

name: Raj
line: I really like my saber-toothed cat. Thank you.

name: Howard
line: My pleasure. Maybe after lunch, we can go to Marie Callender's and have some pie.

name: Raj
line: I'd like that. This is turning out to be a perfect Saturday.

name: Howard
line: Good. I'm glad. Oh, man. Did you see the way she smiled at me?

name: Raj
line: Fine. Go ahead.

name: Howard
line: No. This is our day.

name: Raj
line: If you want to chase after her, chase after her.

name: Howard
line: Ah, who am I kidding? I wouldn't have a shot with a girl like that.

name: Raj
line: Don't put yourself down. You're a very attractive man.

name: Howard
line: You think so?

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Absolutely. It wouldn't kill you to take a Pilates class with me now and then, but you have a certain wiry appeal.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, it doesn't matter ‘cause she wasn't really smiling at me.

name: Raj
line: Actually, in this case, I think she was.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Raj
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Bye.

name: Raj
line: What a douche.

name: Penny
line: Wow, Sheldon, I cannot believe you made up your own game.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Research Lab is more than a game. It's like the slogan says, the physics is theoretical, but the fun is real.

name: Leonard
line: We must not be playing it right.

name: Penny
line: All right, five. One, two, three, four, five. Oh, wow, look at that, my Department of Defence research grant is renewed.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! Great roll! Now you can demolish your Soviet-style cyclotron and build the large Hadron Collider.

name: Penny
line: Yay.

name: Sheldon
line: You're a natural at this, Penny. And as the first beta testers, you two'll have quite the edge when we play with Wolowitz and Koothrappali on Sunday.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, gee, Sheldon, I don't think we can play on Sunday.

name: Sheldon
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Because of the reasons that Penny will now tell you. Penny?

name: Penny
line: Actually, I have to pick up my friend Justin from the airport.

name: Leonard
line: There you go, she has to pick up her friend Justin at the airport, aAnd I can't play 'cause I'm going with her, right?

name: Penny
line: Um, yeah, if you want. I mean, there may not be room. He's got a lot of stuff, like guitars and amplifiers.

name: Leonard
line: Wait. What are you talking about?

name: Penny
line: My friend, Justin.

name: Sheldon
line: Pay attention, Leonard. That's why she can't play on Sunday.

name: Leonard
line: Who is this Justin?

name: Sheldon
line: Your turn, Leonard.

name: Penny
line: I told you about him.

name: Leonard
line: No, you didn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Roll the dice, Leonard.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, my friend from Omaha, plays the guitar. Anyway, he's coming to L.A. looking for some session work, so I told him he could just crash on my couch for a few weeks.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on, Leonard, if you roll a six, Penny dies horribly in a nuclear meltdown. See what I mean when I say the fun is real?

name: Leonard
line: Hang on. Some guy is going to be sleeping on your couch?

name: Penny
line: He's not some guy. He's my friend.

name: Leonard
line: So by friend, do you mean friend friend, gay friend, or ex boyfriend who you're now platonic with but still might have a thing for you friend”?

name: Penny
line: Well, he's definitely not gay.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, a definitely not gay musician sleeping on my girlfriend's couch. Yippee.

name: Penny
line: Okay, we went out a little bit, a long time ago, but we were never like going out.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, not to be pedantic, but the last I checked went out was in fact the past tense of going out, which I think we all know is a popular euphemism for saw each other naked.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll just roll for you.

name: Penny
line: Do you have a problem with Justin staying with me?

name: Leonard
line: What was your first clue?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh-oh! Industrial accident.

name: Penny
line: You know what? Don't talk to me like I'm an idiot.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not talking to you like you're an idiot! I'm saying the whole idea is idiotic!

name: Sheldon
line: You accidentally stare at a helium-argon laser. Lose one turn and a retina.

name: Penny
line: How is that not talking to me like I'm an idiot? It's my friend, it's my couch, and it's my freakin' life!

name: Sheldon
line: It's also your roll.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? It is your life. If you want to have some stupid guitarist stay on your couch, then fine. Why don't you just rent some bunk beds and invite The Black Eyed Peas?

name: Penny
line: Hey, if I want to invite the entire line up of Lollapalooza to sleep in my apartment, I will, and it's none of your business!

name: Leonard
line: Are you listening to yourself? Do you know how childish you sound right now?

name: Penny
line: Oh, now I'm a child? Well, at least I'm not an idiot anymore!

name: Leonard
line: The two aren't mutually exclusive!

name: Penny
line: Oh, you are such a...  What the hell is he doing?

name: Leonard
line: He's drowning us out. He doesn't like fighting.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, just stop, look, the fight is over. Oh, and FYI, you never even heard of The Black Eyed Peas until you met me!

name: Leonard
line: I heard of 'em. Didn't know they were a band. Sheldon, she's gone. You can turn off the blender.

name: Sheldon
line: Has your relationship reached its inevitable ugly end?

name: Leonard
line: No, we just had a little spat.

name: Sheldon
line: Look on the bright side. As the result of Penny's forfeit, you have become the world's first winner of Research Lab. Would you like a commemorative snow cone?

name: Leonard
line: I don't get how she can just announce that an old boyfriend is going to be sleeping on her couch.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, I thought of a game we can play in the car.

name: Leonard
line: I don't want to play a game, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: It's called Scientists. Now, I will name three scientists, then you will put them in order of the size of their contribution to their respective fields. To make this game even more compelling, you must consider only the contribution of the man to the field, not the validity of the field itself. For example, Abu Musa Jabir ibn Hayn made a greater contribution to the discredited field of alchemy than Halbert Vanderplatt made to neurobiology. Okay, ready to have some fun?

name: Leonard
line: An old boyfriend who's definitely not gay. That's what a guy likes to hear, definitely.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, I'll start with an easy one, um, Isaac Newton, Madame Curie and Niels Bohr.

name: Leonard
line: And then I say one little thing and I end up being the bad guy!

name: Sheldon
line: Hint, Madame Curie had her husband to help her.

name: Leonard
line: What am I supposed to say? Sure, Penny, I'm cool with your old boyfriend sleeping in your apartment. Well, Leonard, it doesn't matter if you're cool or not because I'm Penny and I'm pretty and I can do whatever the hell I want! Oh, I get it! You think you're doing me a favour just by being in a relationship with me! No, no, Leonard! I'm doing you a favour just by being in the same room as you!

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard! Stop the car!

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I can't listen to the two of you fight anymore.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on, come on, we're late.

name: Leonard
line: Calm down, we'll make the movie.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe my alarm is appropriate, given the situation. The movie starts in 17 minutes, which means we'll need to make all the lights on Colorado Boulevard, plus skip the concession stand, and preshow urination.

name: Raj
line: Oh, dude, I wish you had said something before I pounded that last Red Bull.

name: Sheldon
line: Go, go, Power Rangers, go!

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. We're, uh, going to the movies.

name: Sheldon
line: No, we're not. We're standing in the hallway, suffering through an awkward encounter.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on. They're showing a new digital print of Time Bandits, you wouldn't want to come, would you?

name: Penny
line: Not really, no.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, invitation pointlessly offered, invitation declined as expected, everyone's civil, nobody's fighting. Have a nice evening.

name: Leonard
line: Just give us a minute.

name: Howard
line: Oh, take all the time you need.

name: Leonard
line: So, are we going to talk about last night?

name: Penny
line: Are you ready to apologize?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: E-e-e-e-eh! Wrong answer, but thank you for playing.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on. This is stupid.

name: Penny
line: Oh, there it is again! You think I'm stupid!

name: Leonard
line: No, there's a difference between being stupid and acting stupid.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah? well, there's a difference between being a jerk and being an ass!

name: Leonard
line: No, there isn't! They're synonyms!

name: Raj
line: Well, that was rather unpleasant.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I don't think I need my preshow urination anymore.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, when that woman moved in three years ago I told you not to talk to her, and now look, we're going to be late for the movies.

name: Howard
line: Hey! Look! Amazing Spider-Man 183.

name: Sheldon
line: Got it.

name: Howard
line: Remember this one? Spider-Man loses a big fight and then his girlfriend breaks up with him. Want me to get it for you? It'll help take your mind off things.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, guys. What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, we need to kill a couple hours till the next showing of Time Bandits.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, well, no problem. I was thinking of closing early and going home, but let's face it, that's just a slightly smaller lonely room filled with comic books.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks, Stuart. Let me ask you something. Do you think it's okay for Penny to have an ex-boyfriend sleep on her couch?

name: Howard
line: No, I mean, she's obviously way out of line.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you!

name: Howard
line: But if she dumps you, she'll have a new boyfriend by tomorrow morning and you'll have a new girlfriend when you figure out how to build one. So the only question is, how long until you fold?

name: Leonard
line: I am not going to fold.

name: Raj
line: Well, excuse me, I don't think Penny's out of line at all. You don't own her. It's like my girl, Beyonce says, if you like it, you shoulda put a ring on it.”

name: Howard
line: Come on. At the very least, when she found out Leonard was upset about it, she should've backed off.

name: Raj
line: You mean like when a guy's upset because his friend agreed to take a cooking class with him and then doesn't show up because he's doing a juice fast with his mother?

name: Howard
line: I didn't know you were upset about that.

name: Raj
line: Really! Did you miss all the subtle indicators, like me saying, Howard, I am upset.

name: Howard
line: Okay, sorry.

name: Raj
line: Maybe it means something different in this country. Back in India, it means you're upset with a guy named Howard!

name: Howard
line: I said I'm sorry.

name: Raj
line: Sorry doesn't make up for the fact that I had to make chicken and rice with this vegan guy. Do you know what vegan chicken and rice is? Rice!

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, you think I was having fun, sitting around all night listening to my mother say “Have you ever peed so much in your life?”

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God, you are such a mama's boy.

name: Howard
line: Hey, don't bring my mother into this!

name: Raj
line: You brought your mother into this!

name: Sheldon
line: Stop it, both of you. All this fighting, I might as well be back with my parents! Damn it, George, I told you if you didn't quit drinkin' I'd leave you! Well, I guess that makes you a liar, 'cause I'm drunk as hell and you're still here! Stop yelling! You're making Sheldon cry! I'll tell you what's making Sheldon cry! That I let you name him Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: Boy, what got him so upset?

name: Raj
line: Oh, sure, you can tell when Sheldon's upset.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thank you very much. Come back soon. With the other half of my tip. Hey, Sheldon, what are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: This is a restaurant. It's lunchtime. I would think, as a waitress, you'd be familiar with the paradigm.

name: Penny
line: Is Leonard coming?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I believe Leonard is waiting for you to come crawling back to him and apologize.

name: Penny
line: Well, that's not gonna happen.

name: Sheldon
line: I assumed that would be your attitude. Hence, my true purpose in coming here.

name: Penny
line: Which is?

name: Sheldon
line: I want you to crawl back to him and apologize.

name: Penny
line: I'm busy.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, miss. I'd like to order lunch.

name: Penny
line: Fine. What do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: I have a few questions. First, I notice that you offer soup and a half-sandwich?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Where exactly does the half-sandwich come from? Are you giving me half of someone else's sandwich, or do I have to wait for someone else in the restaurant to order the other half?

name: Penny
line: No, no, Sheldon, they just make a half-sandwich.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't make a half-sandwich. If it's not half of a whole sandwich, it's just a small sandwich.

name: Penny
line: Okay, fine, it's soup and a small sandwich. Is that what you want?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course not. I'll have my usual.

name: Penny
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: Aren't you going to ask me if I want a beverage?

name: Penny
line: Don't you usually get lemonade?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Do you want lemonade?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Anything else?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I want you to apologize to Leonard.

name: Penny
line: I am not going to apologize. I've done nothing wrong. He is completely overreacting.

name: Sheldon
line: Irrelevant. The disruption in your relationship is making my life intolerable.

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm sorry, Sheldon, but this really isn't about you.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't follow.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah, I'll be right there. Look, Sheldon, I have to go.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, let's assume, ad argumentum, that in this case, Leonard is wrong.

name: Penny
line: Leonard is wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: Considering the number of transgressions you've committed that he's overlooked, don't you think that, just this once, you could return the favour?

name: Penny
line: I'm coming. Goodbye, Sheldon. What do you mean, transgressions I've committed?

name: Sheldon
line: Were you under the impression that Leonard has no complaints about you?

name: Penny
line: Like what? Yeah, yeah, I see you, you're making a little cheque sign in the air, I got it, just hold your horses. What does Leonard complain about?

name: Sheldon
line: Your driving, the plethora of stuffed animals on your bed that stare at him during your amorous activities, your constant tardiness, your singing.

name: Penny
line: My singing?

name: Sheldon
line: That's actually from my list, but Leonard would be a fool if he didn't agree with it.

name: Penny
line: Okay, if Leonard has so many problems with me, why hasn't he just said so?

name: Sheldon
line: Because, according to him, you're oversensitive and have a temper.

name: Penny
line: Oh, really? Well, then, do me a favour and tell Leonard that he can drop dead!

name: Sheldon
line: And she wonders why she's constantly undertipped.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good, you're home. I need you to do me a favour.

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Go apologize to Penny.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Right now would be good.

name: Penny
line: Leonard!

name: Sheldon
line: Although, a few minutes ago would have been better.

name: Penny
line: I hear you don't like my stuffed animals, my driving or my punctuality.

name: Leonard
line: What? Who would tell you something like that? Why would you tell her something like that?

name: Penny
line: It doesn't matter why he told me. It's true, isn't it?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, yeah, it's true, but I can live with that stuff. What I can't live with is you casually informing me that some guy's going to be staying in your apartment without even asking me first!

name: Penny
line: That isn't even your problem, the problem is you don't trust me!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on. Sheldon, have you ever once heard me say that I don't trust Penny? Sheldon? Where did he go?

name: Penny
line: Oh, your yelling must have freaked him out again.

name: Leonard
line: Where are you going? You just walk away in the middle of an argument?!

name: Penny
line: No, I'm going to go find your damn roommate before he hurts himself trying to cross the street or something!

name: Leonard
line: Why didn't you say so?

name: Penny
line: Oh, now I need your permission for that, too?!

name: Leonard
line: Well, I can't read your mind, Penny!

name: Penny
line: Really? Why not? You're so smart, and I'm so dumb!

name: Sheldon
line: Raj.  Raj.  Raj.

name: Raj
line: Stop knocking! It's open! Please tell my parents that our dark matter research is at a critical juncture, and I can't come home for my cousin Sanjay's wedding.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Sheldon, ask our son what we're supposed to say to Mr. and Mrs. Choudhry, whose daughter, Lakshmi is flying in from London, for the sole purpose of meeting him.

name: Raj
line: I didn't ask you to set me up with Lakshmi.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: You should be thanking us!

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Yes, Lakshmi just got her stomach stapled. You have an opportunity to get in good with her before she loses weight, and her self-esteem goes up.

name: Raj
line: I don't care! And why don't you think I can find a woman for myself?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Because you're 27, and the closest thing we have to a daughter-in-law is that Jewish boy Howard.

name: Raj
line: Oh, that is completely below the belt. Sheldon, tell my parents that Howard and I are just friends. Sheldon? Howard and I are just friends! Fine. I'll come home for Sanjay's wedding.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon!

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing? He's not a lost dog.

name: Penny
line: Hey, why don't you just let me find him while you sit there hitting your imaginary brake?

name: Leonard
line: The brake might be imaginary, but that stop sign you just ran wasn't.

name: Penny
line: What stop sign?

name: Leonard
line: Eyes on the road. Eyes on the road!

name: Howard's Mother
line: Howard, answer the door! I'm busy!

name: Howard
line: I'm busy too, you answer it.

name: Howard's Mother
line: I can't! I'm on the toilet!

name: Howard
line: For God's sake, I don't need to hear that! Can't you just say, I'm busy?

name: Howard's Mother
line: I said I'm busy, but that wasn't good enough for you!

name: Howard
line: You know what? I hope it's one of those home invasion deals, and they shoot me in the head.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Well, if it's a home invader, don't tell them I'm on the toilet!

name: Howard
line: There's no one there. You're hearing things, you crazy old lady!

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Stuart, have you seen Sheldon?

name: Stuart
