line: Now, let's talk about magnetic monopoles. Can you explain to our audience just what a monopole is?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. First, consider an ordinary magnet which has,  as even the most uneducated in your audience must know, two poles,  a north and south pole. If you cut that in half, you have two smaller magnets, each with its own north and south pole.

name: Ira
line: Uh, Dr. Cooper, I think there might be something wrong with our connection.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I hear you fine. As I was saying, an ordinary magnet has two poles. The primary characteristic of a monopole is that it has only one pole, hence, monopole.

name: Sheldon
line: A requirement for string theory, or M-theory, if you will, is the existence of such monopoles. I, myself, led an expedition to the Arctic Circle in search of said particles. Kripke, I found the nozzle! I'm going to kill you!

name: Howard
line: So nice you could join me this evening. You're looking lovely as always.

name: Katee Sackhoff
line: Thanks, Howard. Always nice to be part of your masturbatory fantasies.

name: Howard
line: Come on, Katee, don't make it sound so cheap.

name: Katee
line: I'm sorry, fiddling with yourself in the bathtub is a real class act.

name: Howard
line: Thank you. So, shall we get started?

name: Katee
line: Sure. But can I ask you a question first?

name: Howard
line: You want to play Cylon and colonist?

name: Katee
line: No. I want to know why you're playing make-believe with me when you could be out with a real woman tonight.

name: Howard
line: You mean, Bernadette?

name: Katee
line: No, I mean Princess Leia. Of course I mean Bernadette. She's a wonderful girl and she really likes you.

name: Howard
line: I know, but she's not you.

name: Katee
line: I'm not me. The real me is in Beverly Hills going out with a tall, handsome, rich guy.

name: Howard
line: Really? Tall?

name: Katee
line: Six-four.

name: Howard
line: Ouch.

name: Katee
line: The point is, you've got a wonderful girl in your life, and you're ignoring her in order to spend your nights in the bathtub with a mental image and a wash cloth.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Howard! What are you doing in there?

name: Howard
line: I'm taking a bath!

name: Howard's Mother
line: I hope that's all you're doing! We share that tub!

name: Howard
line: Don't remind me!  Oh, man. All soaped up and no place to go.

name: Leonard
line: How ya doin', buddy?

name: Sheldon
line: I was humiliated on national radio. How do you think I'm doing?

name: Leonard
line: Come on, it wasn't that bad.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you want?

name: Raj
line: We represent the Lollipop Guild, and we want you.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, so Kripke played a joke on you.

name: Sheldon
line: It wasn't funny.

name: Raj
line: I thought it was funny.

name: Leonard
line: Raj.

name: Raj
line: You laughed.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you laugh?

name: Leonard
line: I fell on the floor. All right, he got you, you can get him back.

name: Sheldon
line: I refuse to sink to his level.

name: Raj
line: You can't sink. With all that helium in you, you're lucky you don't float away.

name: Leonard
line: Are you really admitting defeat?

name: Sheldon
line: I never admit defeat.

name: Leonard
line: Good.

name: Sheldon
line: However, on an unrelated topic, I am never getting out of this bed again.

name: Leonard
line: What if you could make Kripke look even sillier than he made you look?

name: Raj
line: I don't think that's possible, dude.

name: Leonard
line: You're not helping.

name: Raj
line: I didn't come to help, I came to mock.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, what you need to do is figure out a way to exact vengeance on Kripke, like, uh, like, how the Joker got back at Batman for putting him in the Arkham Asylum for the Criminally Insane.

name: Raj
line: That's true. He didn't just stay there and talk about his feelings with the other psychotic villains. He, he broke out and poisoned Gotham's water supply.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I suppose I could poison Kripke.

name: Leonard
line: No, no.

name: Sheldon
line: It's a simple matter. There are several toxic chemicals that'd be untraceable in an autopsy.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, uh, that's the spirit, but, um, let's dial it back to a non-lethal form of vengeance.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! How about we put awhoopee cushion on his office chair? He'll sit down, it'll sound like he's flatulent, even though he's not.

name: Leonard
line: Let's keep thinking.

name: Penny
line: Oh, gee, you're too late. Scarlett Johansson and Wonder Woman were just in here trolling around for neurotic, little weasels.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I came to talk to Bernadette. She's working today, right?

name: Penny
line: Yes, but I don't think she wants to see you.

name: Howard
line: Why not?

name: Penny
line: Come on, Howard. You hurt her feelings by not calling her all week. Plus, I've kind of been talkin' some smack about ya.

name: Bernadette
line: Hello, Howard.

name: Howard
line: Wait, Bernadette, I need to talk to you.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't now, I'm working.

name: Howard
line: This will only take a second. You asked me to think about where our relationship was going, and I did. Bernadette? Will you marry me?

name: Bernadette
line: Is this more comedy that I don't understand?

name: Howard
line: No. I'm serious. I'm never going to find another girl like you who likes me and is, you know, real.

name: Bernadette
line: So, this isn't a joke?

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Bernadette
line: Then you're insane.

name: Howard
line: I prefer to think of myself as quirky.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, we've only been on three dates. We haven't even had sex yet.

name: Howard
line: Fair enough. When's your break?

name: Bernadette
line: Wow.

name: Howard
line: Don't you just hate when this happens?

name: Penny
line: Wow.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, how's this for revenge? A solution of hydrogen peroxide, and one of saturated potassium iodide.

name: Raj
line: What's this?

name: Sheldon
line: Mountain Dew. Ah, refreshing. Now, we're going to combine these chemicals with ordinary dish soap, creating a little exothermic release of oxygen.

name: Raj
line: Foamy vengeance.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, exactly.

name: Leonard
line: This is brilliant, Sheldon. How are we going to deploy it in Kripke's office?

name: Sheldon
line: Already taken care of. Observe. This is a live shot of Kripke's lab via a mini webcam I was able to install, thanks to a dollar bill discreetly placed in the night janitor's shirt pocket. At the same time, I also secured large quantities of these chemicals above the tiles in the drop ceiling.

name: Raj
line: Oh, Sheldon, you remind me of a young Lex Luthor.

name: Sheldon
line: You flatter me, sir.

name: Leonard
line: Let me guess, motion sensors?

name: Sheldon
line: The reaction will be triggered when Kripke reaches the center of the room. Mwah, ha, ha.

name: Leonard
line: I gotta say, I am really impressed. This is truly the Sheldon Cooper way to get even.

name: Sheldon
line: It may be low-tech, but I still maintain the whoopee cushion has comic validity.

name: Raj
line: Here comes Kripke!

name: Leonard
line: Who is that with him?

name: Raj
line: I believe that's the president of the university.

name: Leonard
line: And the board of directors. Abort! Abort!

name: Sheldon
line: There is no abort.

name: Raj
line: Well, how could you not put in an abort?

name: Sheldon
line: I made a boo-boo, all right?

name: Kripke
line: I think the board will weally appweciate how well we're using that NSA gwant, Pwesident Seibert. Wight here we have a micwo-contwolled pwasma...

name: Raj
line: Wow. Looks like the Ganges on laundry day.

name: Leonard
line: At least they don't know it was you.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, Kripke. This classic prank comes to you from the malevolent mind of Sheldon Cooper. If you'd like to see the look on your stupid face, this video is being instantly uploaded to YouTube. Oh, and a hat tip to Leonard Hofstadter and Raj Koothrappali for their support and encouragement in this enterprise.

name: Raj
line: Well, I'm going back to India. What's your plan?

name: Penny
line: Hey, here's your tip from table seven.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, thanks.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Howard
line: Testing. Check. Check two.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, now what?

name: Penny
line: You want me to throw him out?

name: Bernadette
line: No, that's okay.

name: Penny
line: Are you sure? He's small. I bet I can get a nice, tight spiral on him.

name: Howard
line: I want to dedicate this number to a great gal who I've done wrong.   Bernadette, I am so sorry for trying to propose to you, Bernadette, you found it creepy but that's just the kind of thing I do. I know now it was too soon to talk of love. It was just a crazy idea that came to me in my tub. But, Bernadette, give me one more chance, sweet Bernadette, I'll get the hang of this thing they call romance, sweet Bernadette, I dream to once again kiss your lips, sweet Bernadette. Sincerely yours, Howard Wolowitz, Bernadette...

name: Penny
line: Oh, I am so sorry.

name: Bernadette
line: Are you kidding? That's the most romantic thing anyone's ever done for me.

name: Howard
line: ...Bernadette! Thank you, Cheesecake Factory!

name: Howard
line: And now the kung pao chicken.

name: Leonard
line: Alright.

name: Raj
line: Smooth.

name: Howard
line: And finally, my moo shu pork.

name: Raj
line: Whoo-hoo!

name: Howard
line: Ah, there you have it, gentlemen. Our entire dinner unpacked by robot.

name: Raj
line: And it only took 28 minutes.

name: Sheldon
line: Impressive, but we must be cautious.

name: Howard
line: Why?

name: Sheldon
line: Today, it's a Chinese food retrieval robot. Tomorrow, it travels back in time and tries to kill Sarah Connor.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think that's going to happen, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: No one ever does. That's why it happens.

name: Penny
line: Hey. Is the food here? Ooh. What's that?

name: Howard
line: That, dear lady, is the Wolowitz Programmable Hand, designed for extravehicular repairs on the International Space Station.

name: Penny
line: Ah, cool.

name: Howard
line: Ask me to pass the soy sauce.

name: Penny
line: Oh, does that come up much on the space station?

name: Howard
line: Mostly with Asian and Jewish astronauts.

name: Penny
line: All right. Pass the soy sauce.

name: Howard
line: Coming up.

name: Leonard
line: So how's work?

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's not bad. Kind of hungry.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, we all are.

name: Howard
line: Just wait.

name: Sheldon
line: You realize, Penny, that the technology that went into this arm will one day make unskilled food servers such as yourself obsolete.

name: Penny
line: Really? They're going to make a robot that spits on your hamburger?

name: Sheldon
line: I thought you broke up with her. Why is she here?

name: Howard
line: Okay, here we go. Passing the soy sauce. Put out your hand.

name: Penny
line: Oh ha-ha, oh. That's amazing.

name: Sheldon
line: I wouldn't say amazing. At best, it's a modest leap forward from the basic technology that gave us Country Bear Jamboree.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes?  Peace?

name: Howard
line: No, not peace. Hang on.

name: Penny
line: Does NASA know you're using that thing as a napkin holder?

name: Howard
line: You kidding? They still think it's in a secure locker at JPL.

name: Penny
line: You stole it?

name: Howard
line: Borrowed. The trick is to carry it out to your car like you own it.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Oh. Amy's at the dry cleaners, and she's made a very amusing pun. “I don't care for perchloroethylene, and I don't like glycol ether.” Get it? She doesn't like glycol ether. Sounds like either.  L-O-L.

name: Penny
line: Who's Amy?

name: Leonard
line: His girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon has a girlfriend?

name: Sheldon
line: She's not my girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: How long has this been going on?

name: Leonard
line: Four months.

name: Sheldon
line: She's not my girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Are you telling me, for the past four months I have been asking you what's new and you never thought to go with Sheldon has a girlfriend?

name: Sheldon
line: She's not my girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Ah, du-du-du-du-du. How did they meet?

name: Howard
line: Raj and I entered Sheldon's information on a dating site, and it spit out Amy Farrah Fowler.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God! Sheldon and Amy.

name: Howard
line: Or, as we call them, Shamy.

name: Penny
line: Shamy. I am so digging the Shamy.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, everyone pay attention. Yes, I have a friend named Amy Farrah Fowler. Yes, she is female. Yes, we communicate on a daily basis, but no, she is not my girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, what do you communicate about?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my work in physics, her work in neurobiology, and most recently, the possibility of our having a child together.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Wait a minute- a child? You never see this girl. You just e-mail and text and Twitter. Now you're considering having a baby?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy pointed out that between the two of us, our genetic material has the potential of producing the first in a line of intellectually superior, benign overlords to guide humanity to a brighter tomorrow.

name: Howard
line: I'm guessing that future historians will condemn us for not taking this opportunity to kill Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I have a question.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, Penny.

name: Penny
line: You don't even like people touching you. How are you going to have sex?

name: Sheldon
line: Why on Earth would we have sex?

name: Penny
line: Oh, honey, did your mom not have the talk with you? You know, when your private parts started growing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm quite aware of the way humans usually reproduce, which is messy, unsanitary, and based on living next to you for three years, involves loud and unnecessary appeals to a deity.

name: Penny
line: Oh, God.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, exactly. Consequently, if Amy and I choose to bring new life into this world, it will be accomplished clinically, with fertility experts in a lab with petri dishes. Which reminds me, you have broad hips and a certain corn-fed vigour. Is your womb available for rental?

name: Leonard
line: Still digging the Shamy?

name: Penny
line: Look, Sheldon, before you race off to the fertility clinic, you might want to think about, uh gee, I don't know, maybe actually spending some time with her.

name: Sheldon
line: You mean dating?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't date Amy.

name: Penny
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: She's not my girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, don't think of it as dating a girlfriend. Think of it as, uh, getting to know the future mother of your child.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I hadn't considered that. I suppose she will have to have access to our progeny. And you don't think I can achieve the required intimacy via text messaging?

name: Penny
line: Probably not.

name: Sheldon
line: Huh. It would appear as if the phone companies have been lying to me.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

name: Penny
line: You do realize I stand on the other side of the door waiting for you to finish knocking three times.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. I can see the shadow of your feet under the door.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, my point is it's a waste of time.

name: Sheldon
line: If you're looking for an example of a waste of time, I would refer you to the conversation we're having right now.

name: Penny
line: What do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: I've decided to take your advice and have arranged to go on a date with Amy Farrah Fowler.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's great. Have fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. You have to drive me.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: You know I don't drive.

name: Penny
line: Well, go ask Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: I did. He said, and I quote, ask Penny, it was her cockamamie idea.

name: Penny
line: Leonard said cockamamie?

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, I'm paraphrasing. Having been raised in a Christian household, I'm uncomfortable with the language he used. And to be honest, I'm not entirely comfortable with cockamamie.

name: Penny
line: Okay, fine. When's the date?

name: Sheldon
line: Now.

name: Penny
line: Now?

name: Sheldon
line: Hurry. We're going to be late.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, did it ever occur to you that I might have other plans?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. Do you have other plans?

name: Penny
line: Well, no, not per se, but...

name: Sheldon
line: So this conversation is as pointless as your door-knocking soliloquy?

name: Penny
line: Let me get my cockamamie keys.

name: Howard
line: Oh, God, that feels so good. Yeah, that's the spot. Oh, baby.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, dinner's ready!

name: Howard
line: I'll eat later. I'm busy! Oh, yeah. Just like a real hand. Hmm.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for driving me.

name: Penny
line: You're welcome.

name: Sheldon
line: I wish you weren't wearing flip-flops. It's dangerous to drive in flip-flops.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Sorry. I just don't want to be yet another flip-flop fatality.

name: Penny
line: Can I ask you a question?

name: Sheldon
line: Given your community college education, I encourage you to ask me as many as possible.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Well, my question is, and I'm pretty sure I know the answer, is this your first date?

name: Sheldon
line: That depends. Does square-dancing with my sister at a Teens for Jesus Fourth of July Hoedown count as a date?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Then, this is my first date.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Well, then, there's a couple of things you should probably know.

name: Sheldon
line: I have a master's degree and two doctorates. The things I should know, I do know.

name: Penny
line: My point is, I know more about dating than you, and if you were as smart as you think you are, you would listen to me.

name: Sheldon
line: If you know so much, how come I have a date tonight and you have nothing better to do than drive me to it?

name: Penny
line: Fair point.

name: Raj
line: You know, there's something I've always wondered about Aquaman.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah?

name: Raj
line: Where does he poop?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Raj
line: What would a toilet look like in Atlantis? How would you flush it? And when you did flush it, where would the poop go?

name: Leonard
line: Hold that thought. Hey, Howard, what's going on? What? Hold on, Howard, Howard, slow down. The robot hand is stuck on your what?  You're not going to believe this.

name: Penny
line: So, um, Amy, Sheldon tells me you're a neuro something-or-other.

name: Amy
line: Neurobiologist. Your check engine light is on.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's okay.

name: Amy
line: But the light indicates...

name: Sheldon
line: Don't bother. I've wasted many an hour tilting at that particular windmill.

name: Penny
line: Um, what is that scent you're wearing? It smells great.

name: Amy
line: Dandruff shampoo. I have dry scalp.

name: Penny
line: Ah. Well, your hair looks very nice.

name: Amy
line: Are you a homosexual?

name: Penny
line: No, no, I was just giving you a compliment.

name: Amy
line: Hmm. Would have been more flattered if you were a homosexual.

name: Penny
line: Guys, how 'bout some music?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, I wouldn't care for that. Amy?

name: Amy
line: No, thank you.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Uncomfortable silence it is. Hey, Sheldon, have you told Amy what it was like for you growing up in Texas?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Well, why don't you tell her?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. It was hell.

name: Penny
line: Any follow up, Amy?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Penny
line: I myself grew up in Nebraska. Small town outside of Omaha. You know, nice place, mostly family farms, a few meth labs.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, how is this better than uncomfortable silence?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. I was just trying something.

name: Sheldon
line: Muggles.

name: Raj
line: You slipped and fell into a robot hand?

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: Penis first?

name: Howard
line: Yes. Now, help me!

name: Leonard
line: I'd suggest a lubricant, but I have a feeling you fell on some of that as well.

name: Howard
line: Not funny, Leonard.

name: Raj
line: Really? A robot hand's got a death grip on your junk, dude. That's funny, ask anyone.

name: Howard
line: Please, before my mother walks in, just get this off me!

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let's see.

name: Howard
line: No, no! Don't touch, the program is paused.

name: Leonard
line: Well, then let's un-pause it.

name: Howard
line: No, no! I loaded the wrong program. The hand thinks it's holding a screwdriver in outer space. If you continue the program, it's gonna start twisting.

name: Raj
line: A-All right, um, how about this. When, when Winnie the Pooh got his head stuck in the honey tree, his friends all grabbed onto him and pulled and pulled.

name: Leonard
line: You do what you want, I'm not touching another man's honey tree.

name: Raj
line: All right, uh, forget pulling. How about we get an electric saw and cut it off?

name: Howard
line: What? No saws! One circumcision was enough.

name: Leonard
line: How about an acetylene torch?

name: Howard
line: Okay, I can't believe this needs to be said out loud. No pulling, no saws, no torches.

name: Leonard
line: Well, then what do you want us to do?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, I made cookies for you and your little friends!

name: Howard
line: That's great, Mom, thanks!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I'll bring them up with some Hawaiian Punch!

name: Howard
line: Don't come up here!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Why not?! Are you ashamed of your mother?!

name: Howard
line: Yes, but that's not the point! Get me out of here.

name: Leonard
line: You have any ideas, Raj?

name: Raj
line: Right now, all I can think about is cookies and Hawaiian Punch.

name: Penny
line: Hey, here's another possible topic of conversation. This is a big night for Sheldon. Right, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Big night? The winter solstice is a big night. It's over 14 hours in Southern California.

name: Amy
line: That's an amusing factoid.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: No, no. My point is, uh, tonight is Sheldon's first official date. Discuss.

name: Amy
line: Is this true?

name: Sheldon
line: Apparently, a semi-incestuous Teens for Jesus Fourth of July Hoedown didn't count.

name: Penny
line: So, um, Amy, what about you? Do you date much?

name: Amy
line: Once a year. It's a deal I made with my mother in exchange for her silence on the matter, as well as the occasional use of her George Foreman Grill that seals in the flavour without the fat. How about you, Penny? Do you go on many dates?

name: Penny
line: Uh, yeah, I wouldn't say many. A few. . What's

name: Sheldon
line: Your characterization of approximately 171 different men as a few.

name: Penny
line: What? Where did you get 171 men?

name: Sheldon
line: Simple extrapolation. In the three years that I've known you, you were single for two. During that time, I saw 17 different suitors. If we work backwards, correcting for observation bias and postulate an initial dating age of 15...

name: Penny
line: Whoa, wait, wait, wait. I did not start dating at 15.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. 16?

name: Sheldon
line: My mistake. Now, assuming the left side of a bell curve peaking around the present, that would bring the total up to 193 men. Plus or minus eight men.

name: Amy
line: Remarkable. Did you have sexual intercourse with all of these men?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Although that number would be fairly easy to calculate.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Sheldon
line: Based on the number of awkward encounters I've had with strange men leaving her apartment in the morning, plus the number of times she's returned home wearing the same clothes she wore the night before...

name: Penny
line: Okay, Sheldon, I think you've made your point.

name: Sheldon
line: So we multiply 193, minus 21 men before the loss of virginity, so 172 times 0.18 gives us 30.96 sexual partners. Let's round that up to 31.

name: Penny
line: Okay, Sheldon, you are so wrong. That is not even close to the real number. I'm gonna need a drink over here.

name: Amy
line: This is very interesting. Cultural perceptions are subjective. Penny, to your mind, are you a slut?

name: Penny
line: No! No! No. Let's just all finish our dinners, okay?

name: Sheldon
line: This is an interesting topic. How many sexual encounters have you had?

name: Amy
line: Does volunteering for a scientific experiment in which orgasm was achieved by electronically stimulating the pleasure centres of the brain count?

name: Sheldon
line: I should think so.

name: Amy
line: Then 128.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, come on. Almost there.

name: Howard
line: Don't tug. No tugging.

name: Raj
line: Next time, take your own advice.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me, could you help us out?

name: Nurse
line: My, my, my. What do we have here?

name: Howard
line: I slipped and fell.

name: Nurse
line: Yeah, we get that a lot. What is this?

name: Howard
line: It's a robot arm.

name: Nurse
line: Where's the rest of the robot?

name: Howard
line: I only built the arm.

name: Nurse
line: ‘Cause that's all you needed, right?

name: Howard
line: Can you please just help me?

name: Nurse
line: All right, all right. Hang on, stay calm.   I need an orderly with a wheelchair. I got a robot hand grasping a man's penis out here.

line: Hey, I got new boots this year. Guaranteed to add three inches.

name: Sheldon
line: That's sad. Let's ask ourselves, is there anyone we know who would make a more manly and convincing son of Krypton?

name: Stuart
line: Than than Leonard in high-heeled boots? Howard's mother in high-heeled boots?

name: Sheldon
line: I was thinking specifically of the gentleman over there moving his lips as he enjoys the latest exploits of Betty and Veronica.

name: Leonard
line: Zack?

name: Howard
line: He is the only person we know with actual muscles.

name: Leonard
line: You can't replace me with Zack.

name: Sheldon
line: Why not? Penny did it.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, she seems happier. Why wouldn't we be?

name: Zack
line: Score. I got an Archie, Betty and Veronica, and a Jughead. All set for my weekend number twos.

name: Sheldon
line: Congratulations. Zack, how would you like to be Superman?

name: Zack
line: I don't know, sounds like a lot of responsibility.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, if Zack's going to be Superman, I want to be Green Lantern.

name: Raj
line: But I'm Green Lantern.

name: Leonard
line: You can be Aquaman.

name: Raj
line: I don't want to be Aquaman. He sucks. He sucks underwater. He sucks fish pee.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, I believe Aquaman uses his telepathic powers to request the fish do their business elsewhere.

name: Zack
line: Hey, babe.

name: Penny
line: I'm still mad at you.

name: Zack
line: Well, you won't be when you hear the great news.

name: Penny
line: What great news?

name: Zack
line: We're going to a costume party at the comic book store on New Year's Eve, and you get to be Wonder Woman.

name: Sheldon
line: Complete with bulletproof bracelets and lasso of truth. Invisible plane sold separately.

name: Penny
line: Wait, why me? Wh-Why can't your girlfriend be Wonder Woman?

name: Howard
line: She and her lab team are under quarantine. Seems at the Christmas party they were doing Jell-O shots out of petri dishes that used to contain yellow fever.

name: Penny
line: Okay, what about your friend Amy?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy Farrah Fowler doesn't believe in wearing costumes. She isn't the free spirit I am.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, forget it. I'm not spending my New Year's Eve at a comic book store wearing a Wonder Woman costume.

name: Howard
line: He says he'll wear it if you'll be Aquaman.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: We're going to be late. I'm pacing nervously.

name: Leonard
line: You're jogging.

name: Sheldon
line: This is how the Flash paces.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not Sheldon. I'm the Flash. And now I'm going to the Grand Canyon to scream in frustration. I'm back.

name: Howard
line: I'm Batman.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I hardly think so. The real caped crusader calls his crime-fighting cohorts when he's running late.

name: Howard
line: I had to walk. I couldn't get Raj on the back of my scooter.

name: Raj
line: I've said this before, and I'll say it again. Aquaman sucks.

name: Zack
line: Look up in the sky. It's a bird. It's a plane. I forget the rest.

name: Penny
line: All right. Let's get this thing over with.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. But in what universe is Wonder Woman blonde?

name: Howard
line: Relax. No one's going to be looking at her hair. Ow! I mean, ow.

name: Zack
line: Hold on. The costume came with a black wig. Where is it, babe?

name: Penny
line: No. I'm not wearing it. It looks stupid.

name: Zack
line: Come on. We're trying to win a contest here.

name: Penny
line: Forget it. I'm not wearing the wig.

name: Zack
line: Penny, there's no I in Justice League.

name: Howard
line: Well, actually.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't. He's making our case.

name: Zack
line: Okay, babe. Uh, kind of embarrassing me in front of my friends.

name: Penny
line: Okay. You know what? I changed my mind. I'm not going.

name: Raj
line: Looks like someone else is going to have to be Wonder Woman.

name: Zack
line: Babe, open up.

name: Penny
line: I'm not talking to you.

name: Zack
line: Then who are you talking to? Babe?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny,  Penny.

name: Penny
line: What the hell is wrong with you?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm the Flash. I just knocked 30,000 times.

name: Penny
line: Okay. What do you want, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: I understand why you're upset.

name: Penny
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. You're afraid that costume makes you look fat.

name: Penny
line: No. Wait, wait, does it?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't worry. Wonder Woman was an Amazon. And Amazons tend to be very beefy gals.

name: Penny
line: Good-bye, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: But they're not blonde, so put on your wig. Hello?

name: Raj
line: Stupid Aquaman.

name: Leonard
line: If it makes you feel any better, when I was dating Penny, she used to flip out on me all the time.

name: Zack
line: Whoa. You dated Penny?

name: Leonard
line: She didn't tell you?

name: Zack
line: She told me she dated a guy named Leonard. Who would have thought it was you?

name: Leonard
line: Who else would it be?

name: Zack
line: I don't know. Somebody bigger and, yeah, sure. Why not you?

name: Sheldon
line: I may have failed.

name: Howard
line: Okay, I guess we just go without a Wonder Woman.

name: Zack
line: I don't want to go without Penny.

name: Raj
line: Oh, great. No Superman, no Wonder Woman? All we've got is a skinny Flash, an Indian Aquaman, a nearsighted Green Lantern, and a teeny, tiny Dark Knight.

name: Sheldon
line: Obviously, we're no longer a Justice League. We have no choice but to switch to our Muppet Baby costumes.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, I call Kermit.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm Kermit. You're Scooter.

name: Raj
line: Oh, man. Scooter sucks. He's the Aquaman of the Muppet Babies.

name: Howard
line: No, we can still make this work. Leonard, you talk to Penny.

name: Leonard
line: What makes you think I can convince her?

name: Howard
line: You got her to have sex with you. Obviously, your superpower is brainwashing.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let me see if I understand this. You want me to convince my ex-girlfriend to go to a costume party with her new boyfriend just so we can win a stupid prize?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. And make her wear the black wig. Good luck.

name: Penny
line: Go away, Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: It's Leonard.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Go away, Leonard.

name: Penny
line: It's open.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: I'm not going to that party, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, listen. You don't have to wear the wig. At this party, we're gonna win first prize just by showing up with a girl.

name: Penny
line: It's not the wig.

name: Leonard
line: Did I do something? I mean, I tried to be friends with Zack, like you said, which believe me, was difficult, given how you and me used to be, you know, you and me, and now you and him are you and him.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look. We're not really me and him.

name: Leonard
line: Then what are you?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. I only started seeing Zack again so I wouldn't be alone on New Year's Eve. How pathetic is that?

name: Leonard
line: Not as pathetic as dressing up like this and going to a comic book store on New Year's Eve.

name: Penny
line: You make a cute Green Arrow.

name: Leonard
line: Green Lantern.

name: Penny
line: Like there's a difference.

name: Leonard
line: There's a big difference. Arrow. Lantern.

name: Penny
line: Whatever. Look, if Zack and I had just gone to a regular club or a party, it would have been fine, but this, with the costumes, and you.

name: Leonard
line: What about me?

name: Penny
line: Nothing. Let's go to the party.  How do I look?

name: Leonard
line: Um, I guarantee you'll be the prettiest girl there.

name: Howard
line: Okay, the good news is, we have a Wonder Woman.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh.

name: Zack
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: What's the bad news?

name: Howard
line: Superman probably isn't getting laid tonight.

name: Zack
line: Aw, damn.

name: Stuart
line: And the award for best group costume goes to Justice League of America number three!

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you! Thank you so much!

name: Stuart
line: Okay. Okay, ten seconds to midnight.

name: All
line: Ten, nine, eight...

name: Sheldon
line: No, wait! I have a speech.

name: All
line: Seven, six...

name: Sheldon
line: Stop counting!

name: All
line: Five, four, three...

name: Sheldon
line: This is my moment, dag nab it!

name: All
line: Two, one! Happy New Year!

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not going to say another word until you people settle down. I'm waiting.

name: Zack
line: That was a great party. We should dress like this all the time.

name: Penny
line: Are you high?

name: Leonard
line: You're being a bully.

name: Howard
line: Check it out. Those guys are breaking into that car.

name: Leonard
line: What should we do?

name: Sheldon
line: We're the Justice League of America. There's only one thing we can do. Turn around and slowly walk away.

name: Zack
line: Nah. Hold up.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I know our winter thermostat setting is 72 degrees, but I'm a little warm, so I'm going to turn it down.

name: Sheldon
line: Good Lord, how you frustrate me, Leonard Hofstadter!  Fine.

name: Howard
line: Ma, Ma, calm down. Listen to me. I know it says click with the mouse, but on a laptop, the trackpad is the mouse. Now, put your finger on it. Doesn't matter which finger. Good choice. Now move it down to your e-mail icon. Yeah, the little envelope. What do you mean, what does it look like? It looks like an envelope! Fine, you don't like the computer, don't use it! Sure, we can exchange it for a salad spinner. Good-bye!

name: Raj
line: That's a Hanukkah present you're regretting, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: I won't say that all senior citizens who can't master technology should be publicly flogged, but if we made an example of one or two, it might give the others incentive to try harder.

name: Leonard
line: I had a great idea. You know how we're always having to stop and solve differential equations, like when you're doing Fourier analysis, or using the Schrodinger equation?

name: Sheldon
line: Howard doesn't. He's only an engineer.

name: Leonard
line: I was thinking, we could write a little app that would use handwriting recognition, and then run it through a symbolic evaluation engine. You just use your smartphone, take a picture of the equation and bam!

name: Raj
line: You know what's a great app? The one that makes fart noises.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, Leonard, that's actually a valid idea. Very good.

name: Leonard
line: Can you say that and not make it sound like I'm a cat who learned how to use the toilet?

name: Sheldon
line: No. The two achievements are equally surprising and equally admirable, though if pressed, I'd have to give a slight edge to the cat. I'll save you the pain and nervousness of waiting for the answer. I agree to be part of your project. Congratulations.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yay for me. What about you guys? I can't promise anything, but people do make money off stuff like this.

name: Howard
line: A few extra bucks would be nice. I could finally move out of my mother's house.

name: Raj
line: Where would you go?

name: Howard
line: I always dreamed about building a little place of my own over the garage.

name: Raj
line: You know, if I made more money, I could take time off from work and give pretty girls submarine rides.

name: Howard
line: What's that? Some weird sex thing?

name: Raj
line: No. You take pretty girls underwater in your private submarine, and you show them fish. Why does everything have to be dirty with you?

name: Leonard
line: I was thinking we could work on this at night, and then maybe in a couple of weeks, we'll have ourselves an app to sell.

name: Howard
line: Sounds like we're in business.

name: Raj
line: I think we should take a picture to capture this moment.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh!

name: Raj
line: Was that the best 99 cents I ever spent, or what?

name: Leonard
line: I checked the App Store. No one is doing handwriting-recognition differential equation solving.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear Lord, shush.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: You have so few good ideas, Leonard. And you're just going to spill the beans in front of an outsider?

name: Penny
line: Who, me?

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, I don't think Penny cares about handwriting-recognition based differential...

name: Sheldon
line: The stars at night are big and bright, deep in the heart of Texas.

name: Leonard
line: She's not going to steal our idea.

name: Penny
line: What idea?

name: Leonard
line: We're gonna write an application...

name: Sheldon
line: The prairie sky is wide and high, deep in the heart...

name: Penny
line: Okay, stop, stop!

name: Sheldon
line: Of Texas.

name: Penny
line: Whatever your secret is, I'm sure it's boring, so I'm not interested.

name: Leonard
line: It's not boring at all. You see, in higher order mathematics, there are certain sets of equations that...

name: Penny
line: Bored.

name: Leonard
line: Satisfied?

name: Sheldon
line: Hardly. Consider this unlikely but very plausible scenario. A young woman alone in the big city. Her ridiculous dream of becoming an actress lies shattered about her.

name: Penny
line: Hey, wait a minute.

name: Howard
line: Well, hang on. Let's see where he's going.

name: Sheldon
line: Then it hits her. How is she going to survive? I mean, she has no prospects, no marketable skills. And then one day, she meets a group of geniuses and their friend Howard.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I...

name: Penny
line: Hang on. Let's see where he's going.

name: Sheldon
line: She befriends them, and then lies in wait until they reveal a marketable idea, which she steals and sells to the highest bidder.

name: Leonard
line: That is ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, is it? Well let's see you come up with an explanation as to why this woman hangs out with us all the time.

name: Penny
line: Oh, great. You know what? I've already mooched dinner off you guys. I don't need to listen to this.

name: Howard
line: There's your answer, free food.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, I've taken the liberty of drafting these workflow charts which outline our various duties and the path we will follow as we develop our ground-breaking new app.

name: Raj
line: Hey, why am I in charge of phone support? Seems a bit racist.

name: Sheldon
line: A customer service representative with an Indian accent will create the impression we're a vast enterprise that uses overseas call centres.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Very clever. But still racist.

name: Sheldon
line: Duly noted, Steve from Wichita.

name: Howard
line: Why am I listed as your executive assistant?

name: Sheldon
line: Because the word secretary has fallen into disrepute. FYI, my mother's birthday is coming up. I'm going to need you to pick up a present.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we need to stop for a minute.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, please, we can talk during our break. We have one coming up at midnight. We'll need snacks.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you're not in charge. It's my idea. I'm in charge.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course you are. Look at the organizational chart. You're clearly listed as founder.

name: Leonard
line: Well, yes, and you're listed as Chief Executive Officer, Chief Financial Officer and Chief Operating Officer.

name: Sheldon
line: You missed Chief Science Officer, Chairman of the Board, and Head of the Secret Santa Committee.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. You need to get clear on this right now. I am in charge of this project.

name: Raj
line: Ooh. Leonard's going all alpha nerd on Sheldon's ass.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. All right, I'm not going to argue with you. Sheldon Cooper is nothing if not a team player. Dr. Hofstadter, you have the conn.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you. I thought we might start by talking about the user interface.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear Lord, we're doomed.

name: Leonard
line: So this button here will allow you to scan a new equation, but over here, you can press this, and just substitute new values for the coefficients.

name: Sheldon
line: Good one, boss.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: This diagram. I assume you were opening with a joke. It certainly buoyed up this employee's esprit de corps.

name: Leonard
line: It's not a joke. It's the real design.

name: Sheldon
line: In that case, may I offer 27 little tweaks to make it slightly less embarrassing?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I think this will work. Let's just try it my way.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm, I'm sorry. I assumed that you wanted candid truth-telling from your employees, but I realize now, you want the mindless nattering of complacent yes-men.

name: Leonard
line: Are you done?

name: Sheldon
line: If you say so, boss.

name: Howard
line: So right now, this button-press event is just triggering a dummy procedure call...

name: Sheldon
line: How about this for the app name? The Surprisingly Helpful Equation-Linked Differential Optimized Numerator.

name: Raj
line: So it spells Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Does it? A happy accident.

name: Leonard
line: We're not doing names now. Howard?

name: Howard
line: Like I was saying, right now it's just a dummy procedure, but eventually, it will drop us into...

name: Sheldon
line: All right, fine. If we're not going to give it a name, can we at least give it a secret code designation?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, but hear me out. The atomic bomb was The Manhattan Project. Windows 95 was originally Project Chicago. For our app, I would humbly suggest Project Nodlehs.

name: Leonard
line: That's just Sheldon backwards.

name: Sheldon
line: Another happy accident.

name: Leonard
line: We're not wasting time with names right now.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. Is that decision open for discussion?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Is the decision to not discuss it open for discussion?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Again, right now it's just a dummy procedure, but eventually, it will drop us into...

name: Sheldon
line: I call for a vote of no confidence and an immediate change in leadership.

name: Leonard
line: Oh Sheldon, stop it.

name: Sheldon
line: When in the course of human events, it becomes necessary to dissolve the bonds that tie three competent scientists together...

name: Leonard
line: That's enough, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, let's get right to the vote. Show of hands all those opposed to Leonard and his reign of tyranny.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, that's it, you're fired.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? Why?

name: Leonard
line: Because you're impossible to work with.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. And is that open for discussion?

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Good morning, shoemaker. I think you'll be pleased with what the elves were up to last night.

name: Leonard
line: But I fired you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I know. I'm now an independent contractor.

name: Leonard
line: No, you are now nothing. You have no connection to this project whatsoever.

name: Sheldon
line: But I made it better.

name: Leonard
line: I don't want it better. I want it my way.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that speaks volumes, doesn't it? All right, I suppose I'll go put on my bus pants.

name: Leonard
line: What the hell are bus pants?

name: Sheldon
line: They are pants one wears over one's regular pants when one sits on bus seats that other people have previously sat on. But perhaps from your lofty heights atop the corporate ladder, you've lost touch with the struggles of the common man.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I'm still happy to drive you to work. Nothing's changed in that regard. We're still roommates, we're still friends.

name: Sheldon
line: Except you identified me, your best friend, as a gangrenous limb that needed to be severed from the organism and tossed away. The desperate act of a little man with a big Napoleon complex.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? Go put on your bus pants.

name: Raj
line: Mm. Last night, I had a dream we got so rich from the app, you and I bought matching side-by-side mansions. But there was a secret tunnel connecting your front yard to my back yard. What do you think that means?

name: Howard
line: It means after we play handball, I'm showering at home.

name: Sheldon
line: Good morning, Friend Howard. Friend Raj. I see you gentlemen are enjoying beverages. Perhaps they would taste better out of these.

name: Raj
line: World's Greatest Astrophysicist?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't thank me. You earned it.

name: Howard
line: Howard Wolowitz. Why not World's Greatest Engineer?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. I typed that into the label maker, but I just couldn't press enter. Now down to business. What would it take for you to abandon Leonard and join me in a rival company? Unless, of course, the mugs are sufficient, in which case, welcome aboard.

name: Howard
line: We're not quitting on Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: I understand. And your loyalty is admirable. But what if I were to up the ante?

name: Raj
line: What are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: Monogrammed key chains with a built-in laser pointer. No? How about can cosies emblazoned with our university mascot? Go, Beavers. I'll be back.

name: Howard
line: Okay, let's try this one. Spherical Hankel function.

name: Leonard
line: Hold on. That's it!

name: Howard
line: Eureka!

name: Raj
line: Hey, we agreed when it was Eureka time, we were all gonna say it together.

name: Howard
line: Fine. Let's say it together.

name: Raj
line: No. The moment has passed.

name: Sheldon
line: Greetings, gentlemen. How goes your little project?

name: Raj
line: You mean, Project Lenwoloppali?

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, a combination of all your names. Very clever. I assume Koothranardowitz was taken?

name: Leonard
line: We're actually scanning equations and getting good results.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, well then, by all means, carry on. I wouldn't want to impede your progress.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, did you solve the install time problem yet?

name: Howard
line: No. It's a little tricky. I'm gonna try having it pick up the libraries dynam...

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?!

name: Sheldon
line: Playing the theremin.

name: Leonard
line: No. I mean, what are you doing with a theremin?

name: Sheldon
line: Playing it. I've loved the theremin from the first moment I heard the original Star Trek theme. And it's been killing me that it just sits in my closet, gathering dust.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon! We're working here!

name: Sheldon
line: That's all right. I can barely hear you over my theremin.  Well, that was a little uncalled for.

name: Leonard
line: No, that was completely called for. We need quiet.

name: Sheldon
line: So, your project is more important than mine?

name: Leonard
line: Well, seeing as your project is to sabotage my project, yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't beat around the bush, Leonard. If you don't want me here, just say the word, and I'll leave.

name: Sheldon
line: Could have beaten around the bush a little.

name: Sheldon
line: Nobody knows the trouble I've seen, nobody knows my sorrow-ow-ow-ow.

name: Penny
line: What you doing? Trying to contact your home planet?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm practicing my theremin.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Sheldon
line: Nobody knows the trouble I've seen. Glory, hallelujah.

name: Penny
line: Something got you down, there, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard kicked me out of my own apartment. And his app team.

name: Penny
line: Oh, honey, I'm sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: He wouldn't drive me to work today. I had to wear my bus pants.

name: Penny
line: Is that so?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. And they're still sticky.

name: Penny
line: Aw.

name: Sheldon
line: Probably going to have to throw them away.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you don't need Leonard and his app. You can make one with me.

name: Sheldon
line: With you?

name: Penny
line: Seriously, I have a great idea for one.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it better than your idea to move to Los Angeles and become a famous actress?

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, when you see someone wearing shoes you like, you just snap a picture of them, and the app goes on the Internet to find out where you can buy them.

name: Sheldon
line: That's your app idea?

name: Penny
line: Well, you don't like it?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't say that. But no, I don't.

name: Penny
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Penny, where do I begin? The simple-mindedness of your idea is exceeded only by its crass consumerism and banality.

name: Penny
line: And Leonard didn't want to work with you? Imagine that.

name: Sheldon
line: I know, it's baffling.  Nobody knows the trouble I've seen.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I'm gonna make some cocoa. Do you want some?

name: Sheldon
line: Do you make it with milk or water?

name: Penny
line: Milk.

name: Sheldon
line: Real cocoa?

name: Penny
line: That's what it says on the packet.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you have those little marshmallows?

name: Penny
line: No, sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I suppose it's appropriate.

name: Penny
line: What does that mean?

name: Sheldon
line: A disappointing drink for a disappointing day.

name: Raj
line: Hey, look at this. 20 people from the university have already signed up for our private beta.

name: Leonard
line: I'm telling you, the Lenwoloppali Differential Equation Scanner meets a real need. We've got a hit.

name: Raj
line: What do you think we should sell it for?

name: Howard
line: Well, based on the fact that our potential market is about 70 or 80 guys, and you want a submarine, I'd say about a million dollars a pop.

name: Raj
line: Well, what if we put out a lite version for half a million? You know, get the word of mouth going.

name: Penny
line: Hi. I'm sorry to bother you guys, but you've got to come take your Sheldon back.

name: Leonard
line: What's he doing in your apartment?

name: Penny
