name: Howard
line: Hey. How was dinner?

name: Leonard
line: Swell. I need a drink. Do we have any alcohol?

name: Sheldon
line: No. But we have potatoes, I could make you vodka. It'll take two weeks.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, are you okay?

name: Leonard
line: Um, I'm not sure.

name: Howard
line: What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Well, Mrs. Latham said she was seriously considering donating money so we could get a cryogenic centrifugal pump.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, wow!

name: Howard
line: Yes!

name: Leonard
line: Then she stuck her tongue down my throat.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: Okay, we can't keep explaining everything. Read that book we got you.

name: Leonard
line: She hit on me.

name: Howard
line: Wait-wait-wait. Are you telling us that old lady wanted to have sex with you in exchange for giving your department millions of dollars?

name: Leonard
line: I think so.

name: Howard
line: You lucky duck.

name: Penny
line: You're really a broken toy, aren't you?

name: Leonard
line: I was able to get out of there before anything else happened, but she wants to see me again tomorrow night.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent! What are you planning to wear?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, you're an expert on trading sexual favours for material gain, walk him through this.

name: Leonard
line: Well, n-no, hold on a second, I'm not going to sleep with her.

name: Sheldon
line: But we need a cryogenic centrifugal pump.

name: Leonard
line: Well, forget it! It's not gonna happen.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, come now, Leonard, this may be your only chance to make a real contribution to science!

name: Leonard
line: I repeat, not gonna happen.

name: Penny
line: What was all that about me trading sexual favours for material gain?

name: Sheldon
line: It was a compliment. I believe in giving credit where credit is due.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, fine. I'll tell him. Leonard, Mrs. Latham's car is here for you.

name: Leonard
line: I won't be too late. I'm just gonna make a final pitch for the funding and then say good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Hold on, I have something for you.

name: Leonard
line: What's this?

name: Sheldon
line: Just a few things you may need tonight. There's, uh, baby oil, condoms and, uh, a little something I procured from the school of pharmacology. They say it is to Viagra as Viagra is to a green M&M.

name: Leonard
line: I am not going to have sex with her.

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe this will overcome your reluctance. I went on the Internet and found a photograph of a 25-year-old Mrs. Latham to get your libido humming. Check out those saddle shoes. Rar!

name: Leonard
line: Are you insane? I'm not going to prostitute myself just so we can get some new equipment.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, come on! Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Good night, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Given how much time you spend engaging in pointless self-abuse, you might consider, just this once, using your genitalia to actually accomplish something!

name: Penny
line: He still won't shag the old lady, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: No. But thank you for asking.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. Hi.

name: Mrs Latham
line: Hello, Leonard. I hope you're hungry.

name: Leonard
line: I'm very hungry. For food, right?

name: Mrs Latham
line: Oh, I made you uncomfortable last night. I'm so sorry.

name: Leonard
line: No, that's okay.

name: Mrs Latham
line: No, it most certainly is not. Leonard, I'm making the donation to your department regardless of what happens between us.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Mrs Latham
line: Well, of course. There's no quid pro quo here. You and your colleagues are doing remarkable research, and you deserve the money.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Then what was last night about?

name: Mrs Latham
line: I took a shot, sue me.

name: Leonard
line: Oh.

name: Mrs Latham
line: You're a very handsome man, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Mrs Latham
line: It was foolish of me to think someone your age might ever be interested in someone like me.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, don't say that. You're a very attractive woman.

name: Mrs Latham
line: Oh, please.

name: Leonard
line: No, it's true.

name: Mrs Latham
line: Well, aren't you sweet. Just for the record, you'd remember a night with me for the rest of your life.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sure I would. But why, why, exactly?

name: Mrs Latham
line: You're a very smart man. How do you think I landed such a rich husband?

name: Leonard
line: I hadn't really given it much thought.

name: Mrs Latham
line: Well, think about it.

name: Leonard
line: Do you mean?

name: Mrs Latham
line: Yep. I'm that good.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, what the hell.

name: Penny
line: Good morning, slut.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Oh, please, I recognize the walk of shame when I see it. All you're missing is a little smeared mascara and a purse with panties wadded up in it.

name: Sheldon
line: What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, nothing's going on. Excuse me.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you just getting home?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a good sign, right?

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm so proud of you! You sold yourself out like a common streetwalker!

name: Leonard
line: No, I didn't do it for the money.

name: Sheldon
line: She stiffed you?

name: Penny
line: I believe that's what your roommate did to her.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Again, read the book we gave you.

name: Leonard
line: No, I mean, I, I, I got the money first.

name: Sheldon
line: Smart. Get paid up front. Yeah, I think you have a real knack for gigolo work, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I'm gonna go lie down.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a good idea, get your rest. There are a lot more rich old ladies out there, and Daddy needs a new linear accelerator. And I thought he didn't learn anything from his relationship with you.

name: Penny
line: Hey!

name: Sheldon
line: Another compliment! Learn to recognize them.

name: Seibert
line: Ah, there he is! The man of the hour! He took one for the team!

name: Leonard
line: I didn't do it for the money!

name: Seibert
line: Keep telling yourself that, it makes it easier. Trust me, I know.

name: Raj
line: Cool, buddy! That's awesome!

name: Howard
line: How was she?

name: Howard
line: What's so funny?

name: Bernadette
line: Nothing. Just thinking about the noises people make during sex.

name: Howard
line: I do sometimes get a bit carried away, don't I?

name: Bernadette
line: It's cute. You sound a little like a drunken monkey. Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh!

name: Howard
line: You know it's meant as a compliment.

name: Bernadette
line: That's how I take it.

name: Howard
line: This is perfect. I hope this moment never ends.

name: Bernadette
line: Me too.

name: Howard
line: Well, gotta go.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh! Already? Why don't you stay over?

name: Howard
line: Well, I'd love to, but you know my mother needs me in the morning.

name: Bernadette
line: Please, I think the woman can manage to put a wig on by herself.

name: Howard
line: It's not just the wig. It's pinning her hair up, drawing on her eyebrows. It's a two-person job.

name: Bernadette
line: It's just, when you leave right after we make love, it makes me feel cheap.

name: Howard
line: Oh, honey, I'm sorry. What can I do?

name: Bernadette
line: Stay.

name: Howard
line: Okay. Like, what, another five, ten minutes?

name: Bernadette
line: Go home.

name: Howard
line: Your call.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, have you ever considered us living together?

name: Howard
line: Boy, I don't know. You, me, Ma living under the same roof?

name: Bernadette
line: No, I mean just you and me. You can move in here, or we can find a place.

name: Howard
line: I've got a better solution.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: We wait for my mom's heart to explode from all the salt she eats. Then we just stick her in the ground, flip her mattress and move into the big bedroom.

name: Bernadette
line: Great.

name: Howard
line: Look at us planning a future together.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Who's there? Are you a sex criminal?

name: Howard
line: Sex criminals don't have keys, Ma.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Where were you so late?

name: Howard
line: I was out with Bernadette.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I know what that means, I watch Dr. Phil. I hope to God you used a condom!

name: Howard
line: I'm not having this conversation with you, Ma!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: God forbid you get one of those new fancy sex diseases!

name: Howard
line: Nobody has a disease!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I hope not. I share a toilet with you. Is that what you want? To give your mother herpes?

name: Howard
line: That's it. I don't have to take this. Good luck with your eyebrows in the morning!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Who's there? Are you a sex criminal?

name: Howard
line: I'm still leaving! I just forgot my Claritin.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, what's up?

name: Howard
line: I need a place to crash.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, sure. Why?

name: Howard
line: Big fight with my mother.

name: Leonard
line: Still arguing over which CSI is the best?

name: Howard
line: No, we agreed they all have their merits. This was about Bernadette.

name: Sheldon
line: What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Howard's gonna sleep here tonight. He had a fight with his mother.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you offer him a hot beverage?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, social protocol states when a friend is upset, you offer them a hot beverage, such as tea.

name: Howard
line: Tea does sound nice.

name: Sheldon
line: You heard the man, Leonard. And while you're at it, I'm upset that we have an unannounced houseguest, so make me cocoa. Point of inquiry, given that Leonard is your secondary friend and Koothrappali is your primary friend, why didn't you seek refuge under his roof?

name: Howard
line: There's no room. His sister is staying with him.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, wait. What?

name: Sheldon
line: Cocoa, Leonard. Focus. I'm down in the dumps here.

name: Leonard
line: Priya's in town?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, some work thing. Anyway, my mother seems to think that Bernadette...

name: Leonard
line: Hold on. When did Priya get here?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. A couple of days ago. The thing is, Bernadette doesn't like that I have to take care of my mother, and my mother doesn't trust Bernadette.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that's a real pickle. Bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't worry. As your tertiary friend, I am prepared to step in and comfort you.

name: Howard
line: That's not really necessary.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no. I'll finish making the tea, while you narcissistically ramble on about whatever's troubling you.

name: Howard
line: Thanks.

name: Sheldon
line: That's what tertiary friends are for.

name: Raj
line: Who is it?

name: Leonard
line: It's Leonard.

name: Raj
line: You can't come in.

name: Leonard
line: I just want to talk to her.

name: Raj
line: I forbid it.

name: Priya
line: Open the door, Rajesh.

name: Raj
line: You heard me. I forbidded it.

name: Priya
line: Forbidded it?

name: Raj
line: Forbaded it?

name: Priya
line: Get out of the way. What are you doing here?

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing here?

name: Priya
line: I have business in Los Angeles.

name: Leonard
line: Why didn't you call?

name: Raj
line: Clearly, she was sending you a message to take a hike, Mike.

name: Priya
line: I'm sorry. I thought about calling, but I just wasn't sure if seeing you was such a good idea.

name: Leonard
line: I know. Last time I came on too strong. Can we talk in private?

name: Raj
line: No!

name: Priya
line: Sure.

name: Raj
line: It's completely inappropriate for a single woman to entertain a man in private. If you insist on talking, you must do it on the couch! All right, you may talk in the bedroom, but I want this door to remain open! All right, just this once you may close the door. But keep in mind I'll be right out here monitoring the situation!  Oh, damn it. Leonard, when you get this message, call me.  Priya, this is your brother. When you get this, tell Leonard to check his voicemail.

name: Sheldon
line: Would you be sleeping over again this evening? Because you're welcome to.

name: Howard
line: That's very nice of you, but I made other plans.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, just keep in mind that should you ever need a slightly apathetic tertiary friend, I stand at the ready.

name: Priya
line: Hi, Howard. Hi, Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Why are you holding hands? I forbid you to hold hands.

name: Priya
line: Rajesh, you know Leonard and I spent the night together.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, but you were just sleeping, because I forboded you to have sex.

name: Leonard
line: The word is forbade.

name: Raj
line: Are you sure? That doesn't sound right.

name: Priya
line: Listen, Rajesh, Leonard and I have decided to see each other again, and you don't get to tell me who I can and can't have a relationship with.

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, he can. The Hindu Code of Manu is very clear in these matters. If a woman's father is not around, the duty of controlling her base desires falls to the closest male member of her family, in this case, Raj. The code also states that if she disobeys, she will be reborn in the womb of a jackal and tormented by diseases. If true, that seems like an awfully large gamble given that the prize is Leonard.

name: Raj
line: There it is, Priya. We're Indian. We believe this stuff.

name: Priya
line: I think it also says that if you eat beef, you need to live with cows for three months and drink their urine.

name: Raj
line: Some of it makes sense, some of it's crazy. My point is, you can't go out with Leonard.

name: Penny
line: Who can't go out with Leonard?

name: Raj
line: My sister.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, this is Raj's sister, Priya.

name: Priya
line: It's very nice to meet you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, you, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Priya, if you're experiencing any tension or awkwardness, it may stem from the fact that Leonard and Penny used to, if I may quote Howard, do the dance with no pants.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon!

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: Hey, Bernadette, can I talk to you for a second?

name: Bernadette
line: Sure.

name: Raj
line: Penny, you became disenchanted with Leonard as a lover. Would you please tell my sister why?

name: Howard
line: Listen, my mom's going to Palm Springs to visit her sister. That's two whole nights in a row I can sleep over with you all the way to morning. Unless the desert air dries out her sinuses, in which case I'll have to schlep out there with the big humidifier.

name: Bernadette
line: That's it? That's your big solution to all of our problems? If your mom's nose holds up, we get two nights together?

name: Howard
line: Isn't that great?

name: Bernadette
line: No, it's not great. You need to make a choice. Me or your mother.

name: Howard
line: Oh, uh...

name: Bernadette
line: Wrong answer.

name: Howard
line: No, wait. You didn't let me finish.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm listening.

name: Howard
line: Uh...

name: Bernadette
line: Agh!

name: Amy
line: I came as quickly as I could.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Why?

name: Amy
line: To comfort you, of course. Sheldon told me about Leonard dating Rajesh's sister. So I high-tailed it over here to pick up the pieces of your broken heart.

name: Penny
line: Amy, I'm fine.

name: Amy
line: You don't have to be strong for me. Now let's talk about Priya, that man-stealing bitch.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Amy
line: In situations like this, best girlfriends are often catty about the other woman. Rawr.

name: Penny
line: Really, I am not upset about Leonard and Priya.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Then perhaps you don't understand what's going on. Your former boyfriend has replaced you with what appears to be a very suitable mate. Arguably much more suitable than you.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Well, good for him. Hey, what do you mean, more suitable?

name: Amy
line: Well, granted, Penny, your secondary sexual characteristics are reasonably bodacious. But Priya is highly educated, she's an accomplished professional, and she comes from the culture that literally wrote the book on neat ways to have sex. Whereas you, on the other hand, are a community college dropout who comes from the culture that wrote the book on tipping cows.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Okay, I got it. I got it. So, what is all that stuff?

name: Amy
line: This is a portable electroencephalogram. I'm doing research on emotions and brain activity. So when you start crying, I can see which region of the brain is activated. Then I'm going to stimulate the analogous area in the brain of a rhesus monkey and see if he cries. Cool, huh?

name: Howard
line: I choose you.

name: Bernadette
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: Yep. I moved out of my mother's house. Cord is cut. I'm all yours.

name: Bernadette
line: What did she say when you told her?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. She hasn't responded to my email yet.

name: Bernadette
line: This is so great. I love you, Howard.

name: Howard
line: I love you, too. So what's for dinner?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, I don't really have much of anything in the house.

name: Howard
line: That's fine. Why don't we go fool around in our bedroom? And then you can go shopping.

name: Leonard
line: I thought maybe after we eat, we could see an early movie.

name: Priya
line: I'd love that.

name: Leonard
line: I love the way you say, I'd love that.

name: Raj
line: She says it the same way I do. I'd love that. Everybody in India says it that way. It's not a big deal.

name: Priya
line: Rajesh, don't be a child.

name: Raj
line: I'm not being a child. Leonard, I swear to God, if your sister ever comes to town, I shall have my way with her.

name: Leonard
line: My sister's 38 and married.

name: Raj
line: All the more shame that will fall upon the house of Hofstadter.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, I thought I smelled pizza.

name: Sheldon
line: That's remarkable. If pepperoni were an explosive substance, you could replace German shepherds at our nation's airports.

name: Priya
line: Hi. Penny, right?

name: Penny
line: Oh, yes. Hi, hi. I'm sorry. I didn't know you had company. I don't want to impose.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no. It's not an imposition. At this point, in our ecosystem, you are akin to the plover, a small scavenging bird that eats extra food from between the teeth of crocodiles. Please, fly into our open maw, and have at it.

name: Penny
line: If I had more than a box of baking soda in my refrigerator, I wouldn't have to take that.

name: Amy
line: Hi, bestie.

name: Penny
line: Hi. So, um, Priya, you're a lawyer, right?

name: Priya
line: I know. Pretty boring, huh?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on. It's not boring at all. She's currently helping set up a secondary derivative market which would allow overseas car firms to hedge their investments against potential advancements in battery technology. Hmm?

name: Priya
line: Thank you, Leonard. That doesn't make it sound boring at all.

name: Amy
line: So, how you holding up?

name: Penny
line: I'm fine.

name: Amy
line: Oh, who are you kidding? She's breathtaking.

name: Priya
line: So, Penny, Leonard tells me you're an actress. That must be pretty exciting.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, yeah. It's real great. Today I drove to Van Nuys for an audition I thought was going to be for a cat food commercial. Turned out to be porn.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you get the part?

name: Penny
line: I didn't do the audition.

name: Sheldon
line: Given the state of your career, can you really afford to be picky?

name: Priya
line: I took acting classes when I was at Cambridge. I loved it. We did Taming of the Shrew.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, wow. I love Taming of the Shrew. I did a paper on it in high school. Who knows not where a wasp does wear his sting? In his tail.

name: Priya
line: In his tongue.

name: Leonard
line: Whose tongue?

name: Priya
line: Yours, if you talk of tails, and so farewell.

name: Leonard
line: What, with my tongue in your tail?

name: Amy
line: I'm regretting my earlier cattiness. She is an absolute delight.

name: Bernadette
line: Wow.

name: Howard
line: Wow, indeed.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't believe we're finally living together.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. You know what would make this moment perfect?

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: A little snack. You got any string cheese?

name: Bernadette
line: No. I, I might have some cheddar.

name: Howard
line: Not as good. You can't make strings with it. Remind me to put it on your shopping list.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: You have hypo-allergenic detergent?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Better put it on the list. If you wash my underwear with regular soap, I get little red bumps on my tuchus.

name: Bernadette
line: Wait a second. I'm doing your laundry?

name: Howard
line: Well, honey, it's not gonna do itself. Oh, before I forget, tomorrow morning, you're driving me to the dentist.

name: Bernadette
line: I have to take you?

name: Howard
line: You don't have to take me. You get to take me.

name: Bernadette
line: Wait a minute. Are you telling me your mother usually takes you to the dentist?

name: Howard
line: It's not weird. There's lots of kids there with their moms.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't believe this.

name: Howard
line: What? It's fun. If I have no cavities, afterwards, we go out for a treat.

name: Bernadette
line: All right, Howard, let's get something straight right now. I'm not going to be your mother.

name: Howard
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Where did that come from?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Who's that? Is it a sex criminal?

name: Howard
line: Nobody wants to do that to you, Ma.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Where were you?

name: Howard
line: Didn't you read my email?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: You know I can't turn on that ferkakta computer. I left you some brisket on the kitchen counter.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Remember to floss after. We have the dentist in the morning!

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey. What's up?

name: Amy
line: I just wanted to check in on you.

name: Penny
line: Why?

name: Amy
line: It seems like the appropriate thing to do when one's best friend finds herself replaced by a smart, beautiful woman with the smouldering sexuality of a crouched Bengal tiger.

name: Penny
line: I already told you, I'm okay with it. I mean, if anything, I'm quite pleased  that Leonard has found someone  that makes him so happy.

name: Amy
line: It's okay, it's okay.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Now, let's get these electrodes attached and see what's going on in that pretty little noggin of yours.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: I smell Chinese food.

name: Sheldon
line: It's actually Thai. You're slipping.

name: Penny
line: Are Leonard and Priya here?

name: Sheldon
line: They went to Catalina for the weekend.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Where's Raj?

name: Sheldon
line: At home, forbidding it.

name: Penny
line: How about Howard?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm given to understand his mother grounded him for running away.

name: Penny
line: Oh, okay. Well, I guess it's just the two of us, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, it's the three of us.

name: Amy
line: What up, bestie? Good news. Thanks to you, I was able to make a rhesus monkey cry like a disgraced televangelist.

name: Penny
line: Great.

name: Amy
line: So, you feeling better?

name: Penny
line: Not really.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you have a guest who's upset.

name: Sheldon
line: Right. I'll make tea.

name: Penny
line: Oh, sweetie, it's okay. I don't want tea.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. It's not optional.

name: Sheldon
line: Buona sera, Luigi's Pizza. Buona sera. It means good evening in Italian. May I say, having to explain that to you calls into question the authenticity of your ristorante?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I'm out of here.

name: Sheldon
line: Un momento. Oh, for heaven's sake, now you're being deliberately stupid.  Where are you going?

name: Leonard
line: I'm having dinner with Priya at Raj's. I think Howard's going to be there. You want to join us?

name: Sheldon
line: But tonight's Thursday. On Thursdays, everybody comes over here and has pizza. Or a reasonable facsimile prepared by someone claiming to be Luigi, but who sounds suspiciously like Jackie Chan.

name: Leonard
line: Can't we make a one-time exception for tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: We could. We could also stop using the letter M, but I think that idea is isguided and oronic.

name: Leonard
line: Just come with me to Raj's.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I don't want to go to a party.

name: Leonard
line: It's not a party. It's the same group of people who hang out here, hanging out over there.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, but five people eating and chatting is a party.

name: Leonard
line: How come it's not a party when we do it here?

name: Sheldon
line: Because we don't throw parties.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what to tell you, Sheldon. I'm going to see Priya. Everyone's over there. You coming or not?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, no, sir, and do you know why? In a word, tradition. Every Thursday night for the last eight years, you and I and our friends have gathered here in this very spot to break bread covered with cheese and sauce, discuss the issues of the day, and yes, share a laugh or two. But I guess our rich heritage means nothing to you.

name: Leonard
line: I guess you're right. See you later.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait! Leonard! Wait! What am I going to do for dinner?

name: Leonard
line: Come with me to Raj's and eat there.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't do that. What if he serves haggis and blood pudding?

name: Leonard
line: I really doubt that's what he'll serve.

name: Sheldon
line: But what if he does? I'll be obliged to dine on liver and lungs stuffed in a sheep's stomach. And frankly, blood pudding is essentially the same thing. I don't know why he's serving both.

name: Leonard
line: What do you want to do? You want to come with me, or do you want to sit here alone?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I'll go to your haggis party. But I'm telling you, this is adness. This is utter and coplete adness.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear!

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Raj's television. I just realized we're about to spend an evening watching a plasma screen with a cluster of dead pixels in the upper left-hand corner.

name: Leonard
line: So don't watch TV. Read a book.

name: Sheldon
line: And be a social pariah? Oh, you know that's not my style.

name: Leonard
line: Ugh!

name: Sheldon
line: The audible sigh is a show of exasperation, right?

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it about me or the dead pixels?

name: Raj
line: Hey, you're just in time. We made Tex-Mex.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, sounds great.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Indians making Tex-Mex. Might as well have had the Chinese pizza.

name: Priya
line: Hey, you.

name: Leonard
line: Hi.

name: Howard
line: That's got to be fun for you, huh? Watching Hofstadter suck the saliva out of your sister's mouth?

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Before this evening goes any further, we need to decide where everyone is going to sit.

name: Priya
line: There is no assigned seats, Sheldon. Just sit anywhere. Make yourself comfortable.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, what fun. We're like hippies at a love-in.

name: Leonard
line: Just sit here.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, right on, man. Right on. Oh, look, it's Harry Potter and 98% of The Sorcerer's Stone.

name: Raj
line: Okay, we've got fajitas with all the fixins, so you make your own.

name: Sheldon
line: Wonderful. Dinner, some assembly required.

name: Priya
line: Do you want a margarita, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: A margarita? Where are we? What is happening?

name: Penny
line: Oh. Hey, Sheldon. What can I get ya?

name: Sheldon
line: Water. Neat. With a little umbrella.

name: Penny
line: Where are all your friends?

name: Sheldon
line: Sadly, Penny, this evening, I am the Dark Knight, roaming these mean streets alone. A windbreaker for my cape, and a stern expression for my cowl.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me? Isn't this the point where the world-weary barkeep absentmindedly wipes down the bar and coaxes the woes out of the troubled patron?

name: Penny
line: Well, I was getting your stupid umbrella, but all right. What's troubling you, buddy?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think your heart's in it, but since you asked. Apparently, because Leonard is dating Raj's sister, we're all forced to hang out at his apartment.

name: Penny
line: Oh, the horror.

name: Sheldon
line: Indeed. Yeah, at one point, Raj put on reggae music, and his sister took off her shoes. It was like the last days of Caligula.  Oh, I have to get this. Umbrella?

name: Penny
line: Ugh!

name: Sheldon
line: Wonder what she's exasperated about. Hello?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, are you all right? When last we spoke, you were going to take a taxi home from Raj's, but according to Facebook, you just checked in at the Cheesecake Factory.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I was in a taxi, but the driver didn't look at all like the photograph on his license, so I leapt out and ran for it.

name: Amy
line: Wise.

name: Penny
line: There you go. Just like recovering alcoholics drink in the Caribbean.

name: Amy
line: Hi, bestie.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Hi, Amy. How you been?

name: Amy
line: Fine. From this angle, I can see up your nose.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's a great time to be alive, isn't it?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't worry. My problems can wait while you two hens finish your clucking.

name: Penny
line: Look, Sheldon, Leonard is dating Priya. She is staying with Raj. That means you're all probably gonna be hanging out there more.

name: Amy
line: Penny, I'm sorry you got dragged into this. I know you're devastated that your ex-boyfriend has found an exciting new lover with flawless, caramel-coloured skin.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm not upset about Leonard and Priya.

name: Amy
line: Your flaring nostrils indicate otherwise.

name: Sheldon
line: Cluck-cluck-cluck.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, look at me. I think it's time to face the fact that Leonard is the nucleus of your social group. Where he goes, the group goes.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard the nucleus? That makes no sense. I'm the whimsical elf that everyone looks to for a good time.

name: Amy
line: I'm not saying that you're not fun. You're the most fun person I know.

name: Penny
line: A lot of people think I'm fun to be around.

name: Amy
line: Don't be needy, bestie. That's probably part of what chased Leonard away. What I am saying, Sheldon, is that your group is Leonard-centric. If it were a town, it would be Leonardville. If it were an Islamic nation, Leonardstan. If it were the birthplace of motion pictures, we'd all be singing Hooray for Leonardwood.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, I got one. If you guys were a band, you'd be called Leonard and the Leonards.

name: Amy
line: So needy.

name: Leonard
line: What you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm setting out snacks.

name: Leonard
line: You do realize everyone's eating at Raj's again tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't say the snacks were for you now, did I, Nosy Rosie?

name: Leonard
line: You're having people over?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Must be killing you wondering who. Fine, I'll tell you. Stuart from the comic bookstore, Barry Kripke from the university, Penny's ex-boyfriend Zack and TV's LeVar Burton.

name: Leonard
line: Really? LeVar Burton's coming here?

name: Sheldon
line: Possibly. I Tweeted him.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, tell him I loved him on Star Trek.

name: Sheldon
line: Please, Leonard, stop trying to horn in on my new friends.

name: Leonard
line: Of course. Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah?

name: Sheldon
line: We had a good run, you and I.

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: But change is a part of life.

name: Leonard
line: It certainly is.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. I have guests coming. I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask you to leave now.

name: Leonard
line: I am leaving.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't make this harder than it is, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Good-bye, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: And good-bye to you, sir. He'll be back.

name: Leonard
line: Of course I'll be back. I live here!

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it would appear LeVar Burton won't be joining us so let's get started. Um, I thought we'd begin by going around the room, introducing ourselves and saying a little bit about why we're here. Okay. I'm Sheldon. Uh, for regular readers of The New England Journal of High Energy Physics, I need no introduction. If you're not familiar with that publication, there's a free copy in your goody bag. Stuart?

name: Stuart
line: Um. Hi. I'm Stuart. I run a comic bookstore, which for financial reasons, I'm currently living in. And I guess what I'm hoping for most out of tonight is a hot shower.

name: Sheldon
line: That's very nice, Stuart. Zack?

name: Zack
line: I'm Zack, and I'm, uh... uh... could you come back to me?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. Barry?

name: Barry
line: I'm Barry Kwipke, and I'm here because you told me there was going to be a whaffle. When is the whaffle?

name: Sheldon
line: Patience, patience, Barry. The whaffle... the raffle is the grand finale to an evening-long festival of fun and folly.

name: Barry
line: One more question...

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, you must be present to win.

name: Zack
line: Okay, I'm ready. I'm Zack, and I'm, uh... oh, crap, why is this so hard?

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi.

name: Amy
line: Yo, P-dog.

name: Penny
line: What's up?

name: Bernadette
line: We're here to kidnap you for a girls' night out.

name: Amy
line: Parenthetical, the term kidnap is being used playfully.

name: Penny
line: I kind of figured that.

name: Amy
line: Good. Now put this pillowcase over your head.

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Amy
line: She used to be much more fun, until Leonard punched her in the heart.

name: Bernadette
line: We just thought you might want to go out and have a good time, maybe go dancing.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Gee, thanks, but I'm not really in the mood.

name: Amy
line: You do understand that it will distract you from obsessing over the rich variety of sweet loving that your ex-boyfriend is currently receiving from the fiery jewel of Mumbai.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, if I agree to go out with you guys, will you promise to stop pestering me about Leonard and Priya?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Bernadette
line: Sure.

name: Penny
line: All right. I'll go change. Come on in.

name: Amy
line: If you'd have let me bring the chloroform, we wouldn't have had to put up with all this jibber-jabber.

name: Zack
line: Anyway, after we get done snowboarding, I go back to the lodge and get in the Jacuzzi. There's no one around, so naturally, I'm free-balling it. Next thing I know, this beautiful chick shows up, drunk out of her skull, wants to get in with me.

name: Sheldon
line: Question. Was it a Jacuzzi or a hot tub?

name: Barry
line: Weally? That's your question?

name: Zack
line: What's the difference?

name: Sheldon
line: Jacuzzi is a commercial brand. Hot tub is the generic term, i.e., all Jacuzzis are hot tubs, but not all hot tubs are Jacuzzis.

name: Zack
line: Is that like all thumbs are fingers, but not all fingers are thumbs?

name: Sheldon
line: Surprisingly, yes.

name: Zack
line: Nice. Now, what exactly are toes?

name: Stuart
line: Can you please get back to the drunk girl? I'd like something to think about in the shower.

name: Zack
line: Oh, yeah. Right. Anyway, she takes off all of her clothes, climbs into the hot tub, and the first thing I notice...

name: Sheldon
line: The water level rose.

name: Zack
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course it did. It's said that Archimedes, the ancient Greek mathematician, discovered the principle of displacement while taking a bath.

name: Barry
line: Tewwific. Go ahead, Zack. Naked dwunk girl, fwee-balling, continue.

name: Sheldon
line: Forgive me, but I think you'll find my story is more interesting.

name: Barry
line: Does yours have wet bweasts in it?

name: Sheldon
line: Better. It has a gold crown. You see, the king wondered how much gold was in it and charged Archimedes with coming up with the solution. Because the crown was irregularly shaped, there was no way to mathematically determine its volume. But, while bathing, Archimedes realized he could immerse the crown and measure the amount the water rose.

name: Zack
line: So, long story short, I nailed her.

name: Sheldon
line: When he finished, he shouted Eureka!

name: Zack
line: No, I always shout, Holy Moly! Don't know why. Just do.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, that concludes the getting to know you portion of the evening. Who's ready to play some vintage video games? And tonight's selections include ColecoVision's Smurf Rescue in Gargamel's Castle, Atari's Cookie Monster Munch, and for you text adventure aficionados, Zork. Pick me, pick me. I'm fun.

name: Barry
line: That all sucks the big haiwy meatball. How about I go get the kawaoke machine out of my car, get plastered and blow the woof off this place?

name: Zack
line: Great, I'll make a beer run.

name: Stuart
line: And I'll take a shower. We'll meet back here in fifteen.

name: Barry
line: Check.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm unhappy.

name: Leonard
line: This is delicious. Where'd you learn to make chili?

name: Priya
line: When I was at university in England, my flatmate was from Texas.

name: Leonard
line: I hope she wasn't anything like my flatmate from Texas.

name: Priya
line: Sheldon is a bit quirky, isn't he?

name: Howard
line: Oh, please. That crazy bastard's looking at quirky in the rearview mirror.

name: Leonard
line: Did you know that, per our roommate agreement, I have to wash my feet before I get in the shower? And not in the sink. We each have special buckets.

name: Howard
line: Raj, did you ever tell your sister about the time Sheldon got punched by Bill Gates?

name: Priya
line: Oh, God, you're kidding.

name: Raj
line: Nope. Gates gave a speech at the university. Sheldon went up to him afterwards and said, maybe if you weren't so distracted by sick children in Africa, you could have put a little more thought into Windows Vista.”

name: Leonard
line: Bam. Right in the nose. Made me proud to own a PC.

name: Raj
line: I'd like to propose a toast to a rare and wonderful Sheldon-free evening.

name: Leonard
line: Hear, hear.

name: Howard
line: Cheers. You realize that's the first time we've ever done that without having to listen to Sheldon tell us why it's called a toast?

name: Priya
line: Why is it called a toast?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, the ancient Romans put spiced toast in their punch bowls.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon tells it better.

name: Leonard
line: He kind of does.

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Aw, hell, I miss him.

name: Penny
line: So, where do you guys want to go dancing?

name: Bernadette
line: We were hoping you'd know a place.

name: Amy
line: Yes, perhaps somewhere packed tightly with young, beautiful bodies sweating and writhing against each other in a glorious orgy of the flesh.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, I know that place. What do you think?

name: Amy
line: That should display enough of your bosom to attract a new mate, or a hungry infant.

name: Penny
line: Okay, let's go through this one more time. Just because Leonard has a new girlfriend does not mean I need to go out and hook up with some guy.

name: Bernadette
line: But you could if you wanted to, right?

name: Penny
line: Well, yeah, I guess.

name: Bernadette
line: Pick out the hottest guy in the room, take him home, do unspeakable things to him, then kick him to the curb with a smile on his face and teeth marks on his heinie?

name: Penny
line: More or less.

name: Amy
line: What's that like?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. It's fun while you're doing it. And then after, it's mostly embarrassment, self-loathing and regret.

name: Bernadette
line: I would take that deal all day long.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, it's not gonna happen tonight. You know, for the first time in my life, I am not in a relationship, and I'm totally okay with it.

name: Amy
line: You know, if being on your own is new to you, I'd be happy to share some tension-relieving techniques for ladies I've perfected over the years. For example, do you have an electric toothbrush?

name: Penny
line: Um, no.

name: Amy
line: You should get one.

name: Bernadette
line: What's that?

name: Amy
line: It appears to be something preserved between two pieces of acrylic.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's a snowflake from the North Pole. Leonard gave it to me last year.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, God, that is so romantic.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it was.

name: Bernadette
line: Leonard's really one of a kind.

name: Amy
line: Saying that while holding a snowflake is a little bit heavy-handed, don't you think?

name: Penny
line: Let me see that. Oh, screw it. I can deal with a little self-loathing. Let's go find me a heinie to bite.

name: Amy
line: Outstanding. And if we fail, we can always stop at CVS and pick you out a nice toothbrush. I call mine Gerard.

name: Bernadette
line: That's kind of creepy.

name: Stuart
line: Anybody do Walking on Sunshine yet?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Stuart
line: Dibs.

name: Priya
line: I'm sorry, Sheldon bought a loom and learned how to weave?

name: Leonard
line: He actually got pretty good. He made us all matching serapes.

name: Raj
line: I still wear mine when there's a nip in the air.

name: Priya
line: Now, was this before or after he adopted the 25 cats?

name: Leonard
line: Long before the cats. I think it was around the time he tried to declare our apartment a sovereign nation. I still have some of the currency.

name: Sheldon
line: All my friends.  All my friends.  All my friends.

name: Howard
line: I think it's like Beetlejuice. We said his name too many times.

name: Raj
line: Come on in.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. I thought you were with your new buddies.

name: Sheldon
line: I had to leave. They were having fun wrong.

name: Priya
line: Come here, Sheldon. Sit here with me.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Priya
line: Would you like some homemade chili?

name: Sheldon
line: Are there beans in it?

name: Priya
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Then it's not chili. Real chili has no beans in it, but you're from a foreign land, so your ignorance is forgiven.

name: Priya
line: Sheldon, do you want some or not?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, please. Your girlfriend's a little short-tempered.

name: Raj
line: I'd like to propose a toast to friends, no matter how quirky.

name: All
line: Cheers.

name: Sheldon
line: Priya, do you know why this is called a toast?

name: Priya
line: Actually, I do. I believe the Romans used to put spiced toast in their punch bowls.

name: Sheldon
line: She's also a bit of a know-it-all. Mmm. This is good. Whatever it is.

name: LeVar Burton
line: Hello? I... Oh, I don't think so. I am so done with Twitter.

name: Priya
line: Morning.

name: Leonard
line: Morning.

name: Priya
line: Sleep okay?

name: Leonard
line: Mm-hmm. Great. Hey, can I ask you something?

name: Priya
line: Sure.

name: Leonard
line: Last night, me wanting to try that stuff out of the Kama Sutra, was that fun for you or kinda racially insensitive?

name: Priya
line: Yeah, just because you're in bed with an Indian woman, you think that gives you permission to use crazy positions from an ancient Indian love manual?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, if you can find a book called weird sex with white boys, I'd be okay with that.

name: Priya
line: No, you have such beautiful eyes. Have you ever thought about getting contacts?

name: Leonard
line: I tried in the seventh grade. I could never get used to them.

name: Priya
line: Oh, that's too bad.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, if I had contacts I would have been the coolest debate club president ever to be stuffed into his own cello case.

name: Priya
line: If you had them on now, you could see what we're going to do next.

name: Leonard
line: Th-th-th-that's okay. I can infer from context.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Raj, wanna see a new magic trick I've been working on?

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, if I may interject here with a piece of friendly advice. Is working on magic tricks really how you want to spend your time? Granted, you're just an engineer, but that doesn't mean you might not someday build a geegaw or a thingamabob that may get you a thank you in someone else's Nobel prize acceptance speech.

name: Raj
line: Is the trick making him disappear? Sure, let's see it.

name: Howard
line: Here, shuffle these.

name: Raj
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: Now spread them out on the table face down. Pick one, look at it.

name: Raj
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: Now remember your card, put it back in the deck.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it any wonder he doesn't have a doctorate?

name: Howard
line: Remind me, what's your birthday?

name: Raj
line: October sixth.

name: Howard
line: Okay, October is the tenth month. So ten, one plus zero is one, plus six is seven. Turn over the seventh card.

name: Raj
line: How about that!

name: Howard
line: Is that your card?

name: Raj
line: Yes, it is. Very cool!

name: Sheldon
line: It's not cool. It's a childish trick designed to confuse and intrigue simpletons. How'd you do it?

name: Howard
line: A magician never reveals his secrets. But surely a future Nobel prize winner can figure it out.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Give me a second.

name: Howard
line: You ever notice when he thinks real hard, it smells like bacon?

name: Random man
line: Oh, hey!

name: Leonard
line: Sorry! Oop!

name: Leonard
line: Sorry! Pardon me! Oh, I'm so sorry! My fault! Check it out. I just got contacts.

name: Penny
line: One, two, three, four, five. No way.

name: Howard
line: That's your card, right?

name: Penny
line: Seven of clubs! That is amazing!

name: Sheldon
line: It's not amazing. All magic tricks are merely a combination of manipulation and misdirection with the occasional dwarf in a box wiggling his feet.

name: Howard
line: Oh, really? So how did I do it?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I don't care how you did it. I have more important things to think about. Clearly, the cards are marked.

name: Howard
line: I thought you had more important things to think about.

name: Sheldon
line: I do. You just happen to have caught me on a break. Oh, let me see those cards.

name: Penny
line: Oh, big deal. Not knowing is part of the fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Not knowing is part of the fun. Was that the motto of your community college?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, guys, what do you think? Priya took me clothes shopping.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you look great. Good for you, Priya. I could never get that stupid hoodie off him when we were... well, you look great.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Priya
line: Lets go hang everything up.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, good. New contacts. I should have done this years ago.

name: Howard
line: So you finally getting used to them doing it on a daily basis?

name: Penny
line: I'm not going out with him. He can sleep with whoever he wants.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I was talking to Raj.

name: Penny
line: Oopsy.

name: Sheldon
line: This deck is rigged in some fashion.

name: Howard
line: Fine. Get another deck and I'll do the trick with that.

name: Sheldon
line: So you're saying this is a regulation deck?

name: Howard
line: I'm saying believe in magic, you muggle.

name: Penny
line: You know, well, I'm happy Leonard's found someone. Not that anybody asked.

name: Priya
line: How many Star Trek uniforms do you have?

name: Leonard
line: Just two. Everyday and dress.

name: Priya
line: Uh-huh. Listen, we need to talk about something.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my god, you're breaking up with me! Why would you take me out shopping and then break up with me? That is so cruel.

name: Priya
line: Leonard, I'm not breaking up with you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, okay. So, what's up?

name: Priya
line: It's a little weird, your ex-girlfriend hanging out here all the time.

name: Leonard
line: I know. I usually never see my ex-girlfriends, unless their hard drives crash.

name: Priya
line: I'm just saying, how would you feel if I was hanging out with my ex-boyfriend?

name: Leonard
line: Um, not great, I guess. But Penny and I are just friends.

name: Priya
line: I don't care. This is a woman you have slept with. If you want her around, then I have to wonder if maybe you're not ready to move on.

name: Leonard
line: No, no-no-no, I'm ready! I gave up the gift of sight for you. If that's not moving on, what is?

name: Priya
line: You need to cut the cord with Penny.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Okay.

name: Priya
line: You don't sound very confident.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, I'm confident. It's not like I'm unfamiliar with the get lost conversation. Although, this will be the first time I'll be the one saying it.

name: Priya
line: Thank you. I appreciate it.

name: Leonard
line: Sure. Oh, god, you smell so good. Of course, that could just be my other senses getting stronger. Hypothetically, if I had access To a Lieutenant Uhura uniform, would you wear it?

name: Priya
line: Leonard, it is a source of great pain to me and my family that my brother has that outfit in his wardrobe. Can we not discuss it?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry. I'm, never mind.

name: Howard
line: And was your card the jack of diamonds?

name: Penny
line: Oh, unbelievable! Know how he did it yet?

name: Sheldon
line: Um...

name: Penny
line: Aw, he has the same look my little nephew gets when he can't figure out how I got his nose.

name: Howard
line: You know, I have some remedial magic tricks that might be more your speed. Like, ooh, look! The pencil's rubber!

name: Penny
line: Hey, I think I know how you did the card trick.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, oh, please, if I don't know, you don't know. That's axiomatic.

name: Penny
line: Come here.

name: Howard
line: You're right.

name: Penny
line: Not too bad for someone who doesn't know what axiomatic means.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hi.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you. What happened with the contacts?

name: Leonard
line: One of them's upstairs. The other one sort of slipped back into my skull.

name: Penny
line: Hey, is that one of the new shirts Priya got you?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: You don't wanna wash that.

name: Leonard
line: No?

name: Penny
line: No, that's silk. Seriously, what would you do without me?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: You know, I gotta tell you, I think you got a real winner with Priya.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, me, too.

name: Penny
line: She seems really sweet. Believe me, you do not want to take that for granted. There are a lot of bitches out there.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, bitches are the worst.

name: Penny
line: All right, well I'll see you later.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, Penny, there's something I have to tell you.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, uh, how do I put this? Um, are you familiar with Darwin's observation of the finches in the Galapagos Islands?

name: Penny
line: Did they make a movie about it?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Then no.

name: Leonard
line: All right, well, anyway, Darwin observed that when two groups of finches competed over the same food source, eventually one of them would evolve a different beak shape so they could feed on something else.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: So what do you think we can learn from that behaviour that we can apply to our own lives?

name: Penny
line: Uh, a bird in the hand is worth two in the bush?

name: Leonard
line: Sure, that has birds in it.

name: Penny
line: It's fun talking to you, Leonard, I always learn stuff.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, but I'm gonna count that.

name: Priya
line: Do you really have to wear that in bed?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. The doctor didn't want me to rub my eye during the night. It was either this or one of those giant neck cones.

name: Priya
line: So did you get to talk to Penny?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yes. Indeed, I did.

name: Priya
line: And?

name: Leonard
line: She completely understood everything I said. Case closed.

name: Priya
line: Was she upset?

name: Leonard
line: Maybe, but that's not my problem. She's not my girlfriend, you are.

name: Priya
line: I hope you weren't cruel to her.

name: Leonard
line: Is the autumn cruel for letting the flowers die, or is that just nature's way?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard?  Leonard?  Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I think I figured out Wolowitz's magic trick, and I need you to pick a card.

name: Leonard
line: I am not opening that door, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: As you wish.  Pick a card, put it back, and prepare to be amazed.  Did you pick one?

name: Leonard
line: Yep.

name: Sheldon
line: Is this your card?

name: Leonard
line: Nope.

name: Sheldon
line: Drat. Is this your card?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll be right back.

name: Sheldon
line: Pick a card, Sheldon. Now look at it, and put it back in the deck. Now do you remember your card? Of course I do, I have an eidetic memory. My apologies. Now shuffle the cards. Shuffling. Wait here. Processing image, cross-referencing.

name: Leonard
line: Whatcha doin'?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm reverse engineering Wolowitz's magic trick.

name: Leonard
line: What's up with the infrared cameras?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm measuring residual heat levels on the playing cards to determine which one's been touched. By the way, if you hope to have children, I suggest you switch from briefs to boxers. Your testicles look a tad warm.

name: Leonard
line: Holy crap, are you connected to the Oak Ridge National Laboratory?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I'm using their Cray Supercomputer to analyze shuffling patterns.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, that computer is used for National defence. Hacking into it is a Federal crime.

name: Sheldon
line: Relax, we're not under attack right now.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I'm leaving before the black helicopters get here.

name: Sheldon
line: And is this my card? Rats! I wonder if Howard used a radioactive tracer. Where am I going to find Uranium-235 this time of night? Come on, Craigslist.

name: Leonard
line: Is it racist that I took you to an Indian restaurant?

name: Priya
line: It's okay, I like Indian food.

name: Leonard
line: Or as you probably call it back home, food.

name: Priya
line: Why didn't you wear your contacts? Don't you like them?

name: Leonard
line: No, no, I do. It's just I knew I was having curry tonight and I only want one part of my body to burn at a time.

name: Priya
line: You know, my company offered me a position here in Los Angeles.

name: Leonard
line: Does that mean you'd relocate here permanently?

name: Priya
line: Maybe. What do you think?

name: Leonard
line: Oh,  I love it. Oh, that's great!

name: Penny
line: Hi! Hi! Just hang on.

name: Leonard
line: Small world.

name: Priya
line: You did talk to her, didn't you?

name: Leonard
line: Of course, I did. I talked and talked and talked.

name: Penny
line: Hey! Look at Leonard in his fancy-ass grownup clothes. Way to go, Priya. For once, he doesn't look like a mannequin in the boys' department. Hey, did he tell you I saved the silk shirt?

name: Priya
line: No, he did not.

name: Penny
line: He was gonna throw it in the washing machine with his Spiderman underwear. That's our Lenny, huh?

name: Priya
line: Yes, that's our Lenny.

name: Penny
line: So, how's the food here? Oh, wow, that is really, really good. Oh, I'm sorry. You guys are on a date. We can hang out anytime. Have fun.

name: Leonard
line: Bye.

name: Priya
line: Good night.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's, hot, hot, hot, hot! Whoo! It really sneaks up on ya, huh? All right, I gotta go.

name: Leonard
line: It is pretty spicy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I've been meaning to tell you, I figured out your magic trick.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. In fact, I improved upon it.

name: Howard
line: I'd love to see that. How about you, Raj?

name: Raj
line: Beefaroni and a show? How do you turn that down?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Pick a card.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Bippity-boppity-boo.

name: Howard
line: What's with the wand and the beep?

name: Sheldon
line: The wand is called showmanship, and the beep is none of your business. Oh! Excuse me, I'm getting a text message completely unrelated to this magic trick. Oh, look, my dry cleaning's ready. And your card was the five of spades. Ta-da.

name: Raj
line: These cards have barcodes on them. The wand is a reader. It's transmitting to your phone.

name: Sheldon
line: I said, ta-da. Show's over.

name: Howard
line: That's pathetic. Let me show you how a real magician does it. Raj, take a card. Don't let me see it.

name: Raj
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: Three of clubs.

name: Raj
line: Son of a gun, you're blowing my mind!

name: Howard
line: Bippity-boppity-boo-yah!

name: Sheldon
line: That does it. I'm getting uranium.

name: Raj
line: You ever gonna tell him?

name: Howard
line: Maybe. When it stops being fun.

name: Raj
line: So never.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, I was just on my way to work.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, okay, it's not important. It can wait.

name: Penny
line: No, it's all right. Walk me down. So, what's up?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I kind of have a problem I was hoping you could help me with.

name: Penny
line: Sure, anything.

name: Leonard
line: Move out.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Well, uh, not far. Hey, if you ever wanna start a family, La Cañada has some great schools.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm not moving anywhere. What the hell is this all about?

name: Leonard
line: Why does it have to be about anything? Can't a fella ask his buddy to relocate, no questions asked?

name: Penny
line: Oh, for god's sake, Leonard, this is about Priya, isn't it? She doesn't want me hanging out with you.

name: Leonard
line: Yes. There, I said it.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, I happen to like your girlfriend.

name: Leonard
line: And she likes you.

name: Penny
line: No, she doesn't.

name: Leonard
line: Not really, no.

name: Penny
line: It doesn't matter. Look, I promise from now on I will keep my distance from you.

name: Leonard
line: Well, now, hold on. What kind of distance are we talking about? Because we are neighbours. I mean, I can hear the toilet flush in your apartment.

name: Penny
line: You can hear my toilet flush?

name: Leonard
line: I don't listen for it, but it's nice to know everything's okay with your plumbing. The building's plumbing.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, I get it. You're in a new relationship now. And I'm happy for you. So why don't we just shake hands and part friends?

name: Leonard
line: Well, now hold on, how about this? How about we still hang out, but on the down-low?

name: Penny
line: Are you really that kind of guy?

name: Leonard
line: No. I actually felt kinda silly just saying on the down-low.

name: Penny
line: Good-bye, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, wait.  Damned contacts.

name: Howard
line: Incoming.

name: Raj
line: Hi!

name: Howard
line: Hey!

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Why so glum, chum?

name: Sheldon
line: Apparently, you can't hack into a government supercomputer and then try to buy uranium without the Department of Homeland Security tattling to your mother.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's too bad. Figure out the magic trick yet?

name: Sheldon
line: Figure out the magic trick yet?

name: Howard
line: Want me to tell you how to do it?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Howard
line: I'll show you one more time. Raj?

name: Sheldon
line: Hang on. This time do it with me, so I can make sure there's no monkey business.

name: Howard
line: All right. . Two of hearts.

name: Sheldon
line: I hate you.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, he's gonna win the Nobel prize.

name: Sheldon
line: Why hast thou forsaken me, O deity whose existence I doubt?

name: Policeman
line: Here. Breathe into this bag.

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: They stole everything, Leonard, everything.

name: Policeman
line: Are you the roommate?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, Leonard Hofstadter. What happened?

name: Policeman
line: Your friend here called 911 to report a robbery.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my God, what did they get?

name: Sheldon
line: What didn't they get? They got my enchanted weapons, my vicious gladiator armour, my wand of untainted power, and all my gold.

name: Leonard
line: You called the police because someone hacked your World of Warcraft account?

name: Sheldon
line: What choice did I have? The mighty Sheldor, level 85 blood elf, hero of the Eastern kingdoms, has been picked clean, like a carcass in the desert sun. Plus, the FBI hung up on me.

name: Policeman
line: Into the bag.

name: Sheldon
line: They took my battle ostrich.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, not Glenn?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, Glenn! The only bird I ever loved.

name: Policeman
line: Good luck, fellas.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you, officer.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait a minute! You're not going to do anything?

name: Policeman
line: Mr. Cooper, there's nothing...

name: Sheldon
line: Doctor Cooper.

name: Policeman
line: Seriously?

name: Leonard
line: Not the kind with access to drugs.

name: Policeman
line: Fine. Dr. Cooper. I'm sorry for your loss, but the Pasadena Police Department doesn't have jurisdiction in Pandora.

name: Sheldon
line: That's from Avatar, World of Warcraft takes place in Azeroth. Goodness gracious, how are you allowed to carry a gun? Can you at least refer me to a rogue ex-cop?

name: Policeman
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: You know, one who was drummed off the force because he refused to play by the rules, and now he hires himself out to impose his own brand of rough justice?

name: Policeman
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you, officer.

name: Sheldon
line: It's all gone. All gone.

name: Leonard
line: I'm really sorry, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: What kind of world do we live in, where a man would take another man's battle ostrich?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: This act of aggression must be met with swift and cruel ferocity. It is time to cry havoc, and let slip the dogs of war.

name: Leonard
line: I'm on it.  Hi, Mrs. Wolowitz. Is, is Howard there? Okay, thanks. That particular dog of war will have to call you back after his bath.

name: Sheldon
line: See if Raj is done with Pilates.

name: Sheldon
line: Three thousand hours. Three thousand hours clicking on that mouse, collecting weapons and gold. It's almost as if it was a huge waste of time.

name: Howard
line: Whoever did this knew what they were doing. He got in and out of your account in under 15 minutes, transferred all your stuff, and didn't leave a digital fingerprint.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! There isn't enough camomile tea in the world to quell the rage in my heart.

name: Raj
line: Hold on. I'm talking to an orc under the bridge in Thunder Bluff who says if we pay him, he'll help us track down your things.

name: Sheldon
line: Can we trust him?

name: Raj
line: I should say so, he appears to be a member of the Nigerian royal family.

name: Howard
line: Whoa! Somebody's auctioning off a jewelled ostrich bridle!

name: Sheldon
line: No. Glenn's was leather. He was a simple ostrich. Is! Is, I haven't given up hope.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Penny. We're kind of in the middle of a crisis, here.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I know. Bernadette told me. Sorry, Sheldon. I know that game meant a lot to you.

name: Sheldon
line: That game? Excuse me, Penny, but Doodle Jump is a game. Angry Birds is a game. World of Warcraft is a massively multi-player online role-playing... all right, technically it's a game.

name: Raj
line: Bad news, the Nigerian prince may be a fraud.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, anyways, I brought you a day-old cheesecake to cheer you up!

name: Sheldon
line: Stale pastry is hollow succour to a man who is bereft of ostrich.

name: Penny
line: Just say thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: I thought I just did.

name: Penny
line: All right. See you later.

name: Priya
line: Oh! Hello.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hi! I was just dropping off a cheesecake to Sheldon. He was robbed of a bunch of imaginary crap that's useful in a make-believe place.

name: Priya
line: I don't know what that means.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, sadly, I do.

name: Penny
line: Did you know last weekend Priya took Leonard rollerblading at the beach? Can you believe that?

name: Bernadette
line: I feel like I'm supposed to say that bitch, but I don't have enough information.

name: Penny
line: I am the one who spent two years trying to get him to even go to the beach in the first place. And he was so phobic about stepping on medical waste, I had to carry him to the water.

name: Bernadette
line: I took Howard to the beach once. He almost burst into flames like a vampire.

name: Penny
line: So what's the thanks I get for turning Leonard into quality boyfriend material? I have to tiptoe around his new girlfriend.

name: Amy
line: I think you're on.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. That bitch!

name: Penny
line: Want some coffee liqueur on your ice cream?

name: Amy
line: Ah, here's the alcohol and drug peer pressure Mother warned me about. I was starting to think it was never going to happen. Yes, please.

name: Penny
line: You guys should've seen Leonard when I first met him. There was no eye contact. He was either looking up at the ceiling, or down at his shoes.

name: Amy
line: I'm drunk.

name: Penny
line: You know, for the first couple of months, whenever I would take off my bra, he would giggle and say, oh boy, my breast friends.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, if it makes you feel any better, I'm never speaking to Priya again.

name: Penny
line: No, don't do that. No reason to be mean to her.

name: Amy
line: This may be the alcohol talking, but I believe there is. Are you familiar with the recent study of Tanzanian chimpanzees by Nishida and Hosaka out of Kyoto University?

name: Penny
line: No, but I can name all the Kardashians.

name: Amy
line: Primates, such as ourselves, have a natural instinct to ostracize ill-mannered members of the troop. Bernadette's urge to shun, scowl or fling her waste at Priya is hard-wired into her DNA.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't have an urge to fling my waste.

name: Amy
line: Believe me, it's there, we all have it. Hit me with some more booze, and I'll show you.

name: Howard
line: All right, here we are, this is the tavern where all the black-market weapon trades go down.

name: Raj
line: I don't think my character should be in a place like this. Everyone's undressing her with their eyes.

name: Howard
line: Maybe if you stop dropping your sword and bending over to pick it up.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, what exactly are we looking for?

name: Howard
line: Redheaded troll, goes by the name of Glumly. According to the message boards, if you want to move stolen goods and it's after school hours, he's your guy.

name: Priya
line: Leonard, is this going to take much longer? I thought we were going to spend some time together.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, we are. In the meantime, you're welcome to whip up a quick character and join us.

name: Priya
line: Seriously?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you have to put in a credit card number, but it's fun.

name: Priya
line: Maybe I should just go home.

name: Howard
line: Our troll just walked in! I got him!

name: Leonard
line: We got him. We're almost done.

name: Howard
line: So, how do you guys want to play this?

name: Sheldon
line: Be ruthless. You tell him if he doesn't start talking, we'll register a complaint with his Internet service provider.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, what if he gets his Internet from his cable company? He could lose his HBO and all their delightful original programming.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't care! I'm losin' it, man!

name: Leonard
line: Why don't we play this smart? Try a little good goblin, bad goblin.

name: Priya
line: Oh, dear Lord.

name: Howard
line: Nah, I think we have to be more subtle.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I see where this is going. Fine, I'll have sex with him.

name: Leonard
line: That's not where it was going.

name: Raj
line: Good, because I would hate that.

name: Priya
line: Leonard, you're busy, let's talk tomorrow.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, wait. Hang on. Are you upset?

name: Priya
line: No, no, I think it's sexy to date a boy trapped in a man's body.

name: Leonard
line: Good, good. I'll tell you what happens.

name: Sheldon
line: And people think I don't get sarcasm.

name: Amy
line: Well, well, well. Look who it is.

name: Penny
line: Okay, be nice.

name: Priya
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: Hi. We're just heading out for a drink.

name: Amy
line: Because I do that now.

name: Bernadette
line: Count your blessings you're not a Tanzanian chimp.

name: Priya
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Don't listen to her, she's had a lot of ice cream. Do you want to join us?

name: Priya
line: Oh, thank you, but I have work to do.

name: Amy
line: Four women walk down the stairs, how many reach the lobby?

name: Leonard
line: Did your sister say anything when you got home last night?

name: Raj
line: Oh, no, don't put me in the middle of this. I'm not going to be your go-between.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, help me out. Am I in trouble?

name: Raj
line: There's no reason to worry.

name: Leonard
line: That's a relief.

name: Raj
line: I'm sure many women in happy relationships spend their nights skyping with their ex-boyfriend Sanjay.

name: Howard
line: Good news, gentlemen, I found our hacker.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. No one can hide from me, not Waldo, not Carmen San Diego, not even topless Natalie Portman.

name: Sheldon
line: I've never said these words before, but good job, Howard!

name: Howard
line: Thanks. Our culprit is one Mr. Todd Zarnecki, 2711 Ocean View Road, Carlsbad, California.

name: Sheldon
line: The name and the address drip with evil.

name: Raj
line: What else do we know about him?

name: Howard
line: Well, quite a bit, actually.

name: Leonard
line: I'll bet he's some loser who lives with his parents.

name: Howard
line: Yes, he does live with his parents. Here's a Google Earth shot of their house.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent! It's in a cul-de-sac. We can box him in.

name: Leonard
line: Hold on, you're thinking of going there?

name: Sheldon
line: Carlsbad is only a couple of hours away.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. You walk up to the house, knock on the door and demand your stuff back. What if he says no?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know if you've been following the news, Leonard, but there have been some terrific advancements in the field of torture.

name: Leonard
line: No one's getting tortured.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, we'll abide by the Geneva Convention. But ask yourself this, in the course of our lives, how much lunch money has been taken from us? How many kites? How many Scooby-Doo Trapper Keepers?

name: Raj
line: I totally had one of those.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course you did. It was a fun and practical way of organizing your school work. But the bullies took it from us. Well, no more. Tonight, we take back our dignity, our birthright and our pride. What do you say? Who's with me?

name: Raj
line: I have a hip-hop aerobics class at five, could we go after?

name: Sheldon
line: Sure.

name: Howard
line: Also, tonight's the Sabbath and my mother and I have a tradition of lighting the candles and

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, geez, I don't know if I can ditch Priya two nights in a row.

name: Raj
line: Oh, come on, man. Bros before... my sister.

name: Leonard
line: Aw, screw it. I'm in.

name: Raj
line: Me, too.

name: Howard
line: And me.

name: Sheldon
line: One moment.  I'm hell-bent on catching a cyber criminal, not the common cold.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, I thought this delay was so you could watch Wheel of Fortune with your mother.

name: Howard
line: I am. She's just bleaching her moustache. Check it out. Hey, Ma! Before and After! Four words, 17 letters, two N's, one V.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Fanny pack of wolves.

name: Leonard
line: That's incredible.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, she's kind of a Wheel savant.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-oh, that's Priya.

name: Raj
line: Sitar music for her ringtone is not cool, dude.

name: Leonard
line: Hit the... Hey, sweetie. Yeah, I'm sorry. I'm gonna be working late. I, I, I miss you, too. Okay, sure, I'll call you when I get home. Okay, bye-bye.

name: Raj
line: Very nice. You lie to my sister.

name: Howard
line: That's the nicest thing he does to your sister.

name: Raj
line: Oh, guess who.

name: Leonard
line: Cover for me.

name: Raj
line: Hello, Priya. What's up? How would I know if Leonard's at work or not? Don't be suspicious. Look, if you want your relationship with Leonard to continue, you're going to have to believe whatever wild-eyed, cockamamie excuse the white devil has the nerve to offer you. Okay? Yeah, bye-bye. You owe me.

name: Howard
line: New puzzle, Ma. Same name. One N, two D's, three O's.

name: Howard's Mother
line: Whoopi and Rube Goldberg!

name: Sheldon
line: That's uncanny.

name: Howard
line: I know. It's her superpower. Well, that and jiggling her arm fat.

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe we're going all the way to San Diego to confront this guy.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, we're kind of bad-asses, aren't we?

name: Leonard
line: Totally.

name: Raj
line: Hey, how about we stay the night and hit Legoland in the morning?

name: Sheldon
line: Sea World is better. It has Shamu, who is literally tons of fun. But for the moment, let's stay focused on Todd Zarnecki.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, we're coming for you, Todd Zarnecki. And for the record, Legoland is more interactive.

name: Sheldon
line: I almost feel sorry for the poor fool, sitting in his split-level suburban ranch, unaware that a vengeful horde is barrelling down the San Diego Freeway at 71 miles an hour. Ease up there, lead foot. You trying to get us killed?

name: Raj
line: I took the liberty of burning us a mix of heroic questing music.

name: Sheldon
line: This says Beyonce Bootylicious Dance Mix.

name: Raj
line: It's a re-writable CD. Just put it in.

name: Howard
line: Beyonce? Really?

name: Raj
line: She's curvy and she owns it. I like that.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah, I'm feeling it.

name: Sheldon
line: We are winged fury! Which is still no excuse for going over the posted speed limit.

name: Howard
line: Next time we go to kick someone's ass, we take the train.

name: Sheldon
line: I always prefer the train.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, let's go.

name: Sheldon
line: Coming.

name: Howard
line: Why did you bring that?

name: Sheldon
line: No weapon strikes more fear into a man's heart than a Klingon bat'leth.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let's get clear on something. We're just going to tell this guy to transfer all of your stuff back into your account and then be on our way. No one's bat'lething anybody.

name: Sheldon
line: So my blade shall not taste blood tonight?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, now I just feel silly holding it.

name: Leonard
line: Come on.

name: Sheldon
line: Can I at least kick down the door?

name: Leonard
line: You're welcome to try, but the other day, it took you 15 minutes to get into a FedEx box.

name: Voice Inside
line: Who is it?

name: Sheldon
line: Your doom!

name: Raj
line: Don't say your doom. Who opens the door for their doom?

name: Sheldon
line: Good point. Basket of puppies.

name: Huge man
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Are you Todd Zarnecki?

name: Todd
line: Yeah. Who are you?

name: Sheldon
line: I am Sheldor of Azeroth. I want my things back.

name: Todd
line: I don't think so. Let me see that.

name: Sheldon
line: Careful. That's a collectible.

name: Todd
line: I know. I've always wanted one.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, he's even more cunning than we thought.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, the joke's on him. Without the certificate of authenticity, that bat'leth is worthless.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, he walked right into our trap.

name: Raj
line: Legoland seems like a hollow dream now.

name: Leonard
line: Oh-oh.

name: Raj
line: What's the matter?

name: Leonard
line: Something's wrong, I'm not getting any gas. Anybody know anything about internal combustion engines?

line: Of course.

name: Raj
line: Very basic.

line: Does anybody know how to fix an internal combustion engine?

line: No.

name: Howard
line: No, not a clue.

line: Well, we'd better call somebody to come pick us up.

line: Thank you, Penny.

name: Penny
line: No problem. So, Leonard, I think it's interesting you didn't call your girlfriend to come get you.

line: Uh, I kind of told her I was working.

line: Yeah, she doesn't really understand the whole Warcraft adventure-role-playing thing.

name: Penny
line: Well, doesn't matter if she gets it, as long as she's pretty.

line: This one's funny, Leonard. How come you couldn't make it work with her?

line: So did you at least get Sheldon's fake stuff back?

line: No. We failed in our noble quest.
