line: Todd Zarnecki was mean.

name: Penny
line: All right. Hang on.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Penny
line: I'm gonna show you how we finish a quest in Nebraska. Oh. Beyonce.  This ain't no Beyonce.

name: Todd
line: Now what?

name: Penny
line: Give my friend his stuff back.

name: Todd
line: I don't know what you're talking about.

name: Penny
line: Well, then, good news. Today's the day a girl's finally going to touch you in your little special place.  Now give him his stuff back.

name: Todd
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: We did it! I said, we.

name: Priya
line: Oh, hold the door.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hi.

name: Priya
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Going to see Leonard?

name: Priya
line: Yes. How have you been?

name: Penny
line: Fine. You?

name: Priya
line: Very well, thank you.

name: Penny
line: Alright, well great seeing you.

name: Priya
line: Yeah, you too.

name: Penny
line: Amy's right. I do want to fling my poop at her.

name: Leonard
line: Whatcha doin' there? Working on a new plan to catch the roadrunner?

name: Sheldon
line: The humorous implication being that I am Wile E. Coyote?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: And this is a schematic for a bird-trapping device that will ultimately backfire and cause me physical injury?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: What I'm doing here is trying to determine when I'm going to die.

name: Leonard
line: A lot of people are working on that research. So what is all this?

name: Sheldon
line: My family history factoring in longevity, propensity for disease, et cetera.

name: Leonard
line: Interesting. Cause of death for Uncle Carl was KBB. What's KBB?

name: Sheldon
line: Killed by badger.

name: Leonard
line: How's that?

name: Sheldon
line: It was Thanksgiving. Uncle Carl said, I think there's a badger living in our chimney. Hand me that flashlight. Those were the last words he ever spoke to us.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think you need to worry about death by badgers being hereditary.

name: Sheldon
line: Not true. The fight or flight instinct is coded genetically. Instead of fleeing, he chose to fight barehanded against a brawny member of the weasel family. Who's to say that I don't share that flawed DNA?

name: Leonard
line: You can always get a badger and find out.

name: Sheldon
line: But seriously, even if I disregard the Uncle Carl factor, at best I have 60 years left.

name: Leonard
line: That long, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: 60 only takes me to here. I need to get to here.

name: Leonard
line: What's there?

name: Sheldon
line: The earliest estimate of the singularity, when man will be able to transfer his consciousness into machines and achieve immortality.

name: Leonard
line: So, you're upset about missing out on becoming some sort of freakish self-aware robot?

name: Sheldon
line: By this much.

name: Leonard
line: Tough break. You want eggs?

name: Sheldon
line: You don't get it, Leonard. I'm going to miss so much, the unified field theory,  cold fusion, the dogapus.

name: Leonard
line: What's a dogapus?

name: Sheldon
line: A hybrid dog and octopus. Man's underwater best friend.

name: Leonard
line: Is somebody working on that?

name: Sheldon
line: I was going to. I planned on giving it to myself on my 300th birthday.

name: Leonard
line: Wait a minute. You hate dogs.

name: Sheldon
line: A dogapus can play fetch with eight balls. No one can hate that.

name: Howard
line: What do we owe you?

name: Leonard
line: It came to $28.17. Let's say six bucks apiece.

name: Howard
line: Here you go.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Never mind. I got it.

name: Penny
line: Oh, you wanted me to pay.

name: Leonard
line: It's no big deal.

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, no. You're right. We're not going out anymore, I should pay for myself.  What?

name: Howard
line: He said if he had woman parts, he'd eat for free the rest of his life.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but you wouldn't be able to talk to yourself. I'm a little low on cash.

name: Leonard
line: Hmm? How much you got?

name: Penny
line: Nothing.

name: Leonard
line: How can you walk around with no money?

name: Penny
line: I'm cute. I get by.

name: Leonard
line: It's okay, you can owe me.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, six bucks.

name: Sheldon
line: No, thank you. I'm not eating pizza tonight.

name: Penny
line: But it's Thursday. Thursday's pizza night.

name: Sheldon
line: Not for me. Thursday is now Cruciferous Vegetable Night. Tonight's selection, brussels sprouts.

line: Really? You're changing the Sheldonian calendar?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a small price to pay.

name: Penny
line: For what?

name: Leonard
line: No, no, don't ask.

name: Penny
line: Sorry, sorry, sorry, sorry, sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: In order to live long enough to fuse my consciousness with cybernetics, I need to change my diet.

name: Penny
line: Wait. Cybernetics is robot stuff, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Correct.

name: Penny
line: So you want to turn yourself into some sort of robot?

name: Sheldon
line: Essentially, yes.

name: Penny
line: Okay, here's my question. Didn't you already do that?

name: Sheldon
line: Flattering, but sadly, no. I'm also planning to begin an exercise regimen designed to strengthen my cardiovascular system. AKA jogging.

name: Penny
line: Wait. Honey,have you ever run before?

name: Sheldon
line: Certainly. I've run from bullies, dogs, angry chickens, and one particularly persistent P.E. teacher determined to bend me over and give me a scoliosis test.

name: Howard
line: You're right, Penny jogs. Maybe you guys can run together.

name: Sheldon
line: That's an excellent idea. Yeah, if we chat, it will create the illusion of time going faster.

name: Penny
line: No, it won't. Um, how does he know I jog?

name: Howard
line: Oh, he watches you from his car with high-powered binoculars.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, that is so creepy!

name: Howard
line: I know!  And he says he's not gonna stop.  Then see a shrink and figure out how to talk to women.

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh.  U-u-ugh.  Lenu-u-ugh.

name: Leonard
line: What the hell? What's the matter?

name: Sheldon
line: I have pain radiating from my navel to my lower right abdomen. I'm nauseated and feverish. I believe I may have cholera.

name: Leonard
line: There's no cholera in Pasadena. Just like last summer, when there was no malaria in Pasadena.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if it's not cholera, then based on a quick Internet search, the other explanations in decreasing order of likelihood are Hirschsprung's Disease, botulism, a 30-foot tapeworm or accidental ingestion of chrysanthemum blossoms.

name: Leonard
line: When would you have accidentally eaten chrysanthemum blossoms?

name: Sheldon
line: It's part of an unlikely scenario that involves sleepwalking and a 24-hour flower mart with a less-than-vigilant proprietor. Oh, Lord, my belly!

name: Leonard
line: Have you had your appendix out?

name: Sheldon
line: I haven't. I've been meaning to, but who has the time?

name: Leonard
line: Let's get you to the hospital.

name: Sheldon
line: So this is how it ends, with cruel irony. Just as I make the commitment to preserving my body, I am betrayed by my appendix, a vestigial organ. Do you know the original purpose of the appendix, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: I do. And yet I'm doomed while you live on.

name: Leonard
line: Funny how things work out, isn't it?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Lord, I think it's about to burst!  On the other hand, it might have been the Brussels sprouts.

name: Leonard
line: Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Good night. Appendicitis. What a nervous Nelly.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

name: Penny
line: Coming, coming. Hey, nice knees.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. They're my mother's.

name: Penny
line: Oh. And the Flash shirt is what? Because you're gonna run really fast?

line: No, the Flash shirt is because it's Friday, but it's nice when things work out. Where's your heart rate monitor?

line: Okay.

line: Yeah, I've been reading up on biomechanics. I think you'll be surprised at my... Wah! Oh!

line: I think so.

line: Oh, let me help you up.

line: Well, okay, with the Indian food, the pizza, the Thai food, the tank of gas, the frozen yogurt and your rent, uh, a little over fourteen hundred dollars.

name: Sheldon
line: Coming! . Greetings, friends.

line: Greetings, whatever the hell you are.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: I am a mobile virtual presence device. Recent events have demonstrated to me that my body is too fragile to endure the vicissitudes of the world. Until such time as I am able to transfer my consciousness, I shall remain in a secure location and interact with the world in this manner.

name: Howard
line: Really? That's your question? When did he put a ramp in?

name: Sheldon-bot
line: You're in my spot. This may seem a little odd at first, but over time you'll grow accustomed to dealing with me in this configuration.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, to be honest, I don't see much difference.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Thank you. That's what I was going for. Now, Leonard, tomorrow, when we go to work, you'll need to allow some extra time to get me down the stairs. For your convenience, I disassemble into four pieces.

name: Leonard
line: This is ridiculous. I'm coming to talk to you.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: You don't know where I am. My physical body is safely ensconced in a secure, undisclosed location.

name: Leonard
line: You're in your bedroom.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: No, I'm not.

name: Leonard
line: I can hear your voice coming from your bedroom.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: No, you can't. Wait. Come back. Halt. Authorized personnel only!

name: Penny
line: So, either one of you weirdos want to buy my underwear? Only fourteen hundred bucks.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, this is ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm behind you. Please look at me when you're talking to me.

name: Leonard
line: I am looking at you.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you're not. Pay no attention to that man in the bed.

name: Leonard
line: You cannot exist as a virtual presence. Not here and certainly not at work. Oh, good God.

name: Sheldon
line: At my age, do you know how I'm statistically most likely to die?

name: Leonard
line: At the hands of your roommate?

name: Sheldon
line: An accident.

name: Leonard
line: That's how I'm going to make it look.

name: Sheldon
line: Until I can transfer my intellect to a more durable container, my body will remain safely ensconced in my bed.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, but don't expect my help.

name: Sheldon
line: You have to help, it's in the roommate agreement.

name: Leonard
line: No, it's not.

name: Sheldon
line: Section 74.C. The various obligations and duties of the parties in the event one of them becomes a robot.

name: Leonard
line: I'll be damned.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: This is delightful.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: It's much easier to enjoy the picturesque route we travel to work when you remove the spectre of fiery vehicular death.

name: Leonard
line: Refresh my memory. Why didn't I just put you in the trunk?

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Because I called shotgun. Remember?

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: You seem tense. Perhaps this will relax you.

name: Leonard
line: I don't want to listen to music, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Very well. I don't understand why you're not enjoying this. Together, in this car, with my enhanced capabilities, we're like Knight Rider.

name: Leonard
line: Except in Knight Rider, the car isn't a yammering sphincter.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: You mock the sphincter, but the sphincter is a class of muscle without which human beings couldn't survive. There are over 50 different sphincters in the human body. How many can you name?

name: Leonard
line: I was wrong, this is exactly like Knight Rider.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Perhaps you'd be interested in a different game.

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: This is a photograph of the 1911 Solvay Conference on the theory of radiation and quanta. Using Photoshop, I've introduced a few anachronisms. See if you can spot all 24. I'll give you the first one. Madame Curie should not be wearing a digital watch. And go.

name: Leonard
line: That's it. Bye-bye.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Bazinga.

name: Leonard
line: Whoa!

name: Sheldon-bot
line: I have an override switch.

name: Leonard
line: I almost died!

name: Sheldon-bot
line: And I'm safe and sound in bed. Who's crazy now?

name: Leonard
line: I'm still going to go with you.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Hello, Professor Hoskins. Nice to see you, Mindy. Konichi-wa Dr. Nakamora. Sorry the Swedes disproved your theory. Leonard, my door.

name: Leonard
line: What about it?

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Be a lamb and open it for me.

name: Leonard
line: Why? What's the problem?

name: Sheldon-bot
line: You think you have me stymied, don't you?

name: Leonard
line: No, I think a doorknob has you stymied.

name: Howard
line: Oh, look, it's Leonard and R2-D-Bag.

name: Raj
line: That's my joke. I told it last night. You can't just use it.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Raj, be a lamb and open the door for me.

name: Raj
line: Oh, sure.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: He's a lamb. You're not.

name: Raj
line: I'm a lamb.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Isn't this nice? The pleasures of fellowship and camaraderie without having to tolerate your germy breath on my skin.

name: Howard
line: I say we just take him to Tatooine and sell him to some Jawas.

name: Raj
line: That's two, dude. Write your own jokes.

name: Penny
line: Oh, great. Hi, I'm Penny, I'll be your waitress.

name: Leonard
line: Why are you introducing yourself?

name: Penny
line: I'd rather people not know I have any prior connection to you whatsoever.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Can you tell me the specials this evening?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I'm not waiting on you.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Obviously. I don't even have water yet.

name: Penny
line: Because you're not here.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: That's discrimination against the otherwise located. I'm going to have to go over your head. Manager, manager. Oh, Lord, look who it is.

name: Howard
line: Is that Steve Wozniak?

name: Leonard
line: I think it is.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: The Great and Powerful Woz.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, Steve Wozniak was one of the cofounders of Apple Computer. He and Steve Jobs started it...

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I know who he is. I watch Dancing with the Stars.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: I must speak to him.

name: Leonard
line: Of course you must.

name: Penny
line: You know, there's an Olive Garden down the street. You guys should try it sometime.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Excuse me, Mr. Wozniak?

name: Steve Wozniak
line: Oh, hey. Nice virtual presence device.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Thank you. I just want to say I'm a big fan. You're my fifteenth favourite technological visionary.

name: Steve Wozniak
line: Only fifteenth?

name: Sheldon-bot
line: It's still six spots above Steve Jobs. I care neither for turtlenecks nor showmanship.

name: Steve Wozniak
line: Yeah, I never got that turtleneck thing.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: One of my proudest possessions is a vintage 1977 Apple Two. Despite the file system limitations of Apple DOS 3.3, it was a pretty nifty little achievement.

name: Steve Wozniak
line: Thanks, we were shooting for nifty. You know, if you had it here, I'd autograph it for you.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Don't move for 15 to 30 minutes, depending on how the buses are running.

name: Steve Wozniak
line: Nerds.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm coming, Woz, I'm coming.  Ow! Aw.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

name: Penny
line: What up, Shel-Bot?

name: Sheldon-bot
line: I can't get out of bed. I hurt my ankle.

line: What do you want me to do?

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Sing me Soft Kitty.

line: Really, you want me to sing Soft Kitty to a computer monitor?

line: Would you rather come over and sing it to me in person?

name: Penny
line: Soft kitty, warm kitty, little ball of fur.

name: Sheldon-bot
line: Closer to the microphone.

name: Penny
line: Happy kitty, sleepy...

name: Sheldon-bot
line: No. You have to start over.

name: Penny
line: Soft kitty, warm kitty, little ball of fur. Happy kitty, sleepy kitty, purr, purr, purr.

name: Dr. Brian Greene
line: My new book, The Hidden Reality, takes on a grand question. Is our universe the only universe? You see, there's a growing belief among scientists like me that ours may only be one among many universes populating a gigantic cosmos. In The Hidden Reality, I explore this possibility without presuming any knowledge of mathematics or physics on the part of the reader.

name: Sheldon
line: Hysterical.

name: Amy
line: I'm glad you talked me into this. We work so hard, sometimes, it's nice to goof off and do something silly.

name: Sheldon
line: Agreed. Wait till you hear how he dumbs down Werner Heisenberg for the crowd. You may actually believe you're in a comedy club.

name: Greene
line: You can think about Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle much like the special order menu that you find in certain Chinese restaurants, where you have dishes in column A and other dishes in column B, and if you order the first dish in column A, you can't order the corresponding dish in column B. That's sort of like the Uncertainly Principle.

name: Sheldon
line: Ba-dum-bump.

name: Amy
line: Say, I heard an interesting tidbit about Howard and Bernadette.

name: Sheldon
line: Really, Amy? Gossip? I'm disappointed in you.

name: Amy
line: Now, now. Evolutionary biologist Robin Dunbar has identified gossip as an aid to social bonding in large groups.

name: Sheldon
line: Forgive my language, but poppycock.

name: Amy
line: What if he's right? And by not participating in gossip, society breaks down into small feral bands of tattooed motorcycle riders fighting to the death over the last few cans of tuna fish?

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. In the parlance of the urban music scene, what's the 4-1-1?

name: Amy
line: Bernadette is thinking about breaking up with Howard.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe our nation's tuna cans are safe. Excuse me. Dr. Greene, question?

name: Greene
line: Yes?

name: Sheldon
line: You've dedicated your life's work to educating the general populace about complex scientific ideas.

name: Greene
line: Yes, in part.

name: Sheldon
line: Have you ever considered trying to do something useful? Perhaps, reading to the elderly?

name: Greene
line: Excuse me?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, but not your books. Something they might enjoy. I kid, of course. Big fan.

name: Leonard
line: Nice shot.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. My father taught me archery as a child. It's odd how the activity brings back the smell of Kmart bourbon.

name: Leonard
line: Perfect.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. What an elf I would have made. Whoo, what do you think you're doing?

name: Leonard
line: Shooting at a target?

name: Sheldon
line: With what?

name: Leonard
line: An arrow.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? I didn't see you draw one from your quiver.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not going to do that, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, the people at Nintendo can only go so far in helping us recreate an actual athletic experience. We have to do our part, too.  That was uncalled for, but I'll play along. Ow! I had an unusual experience with Amy last night.

name: Leonard
line: Really? How could you tell?

name: Sheldon
line: She was attempting to engage me in gossip.

name: Leonard
line: You don't say?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I think prolonged exposure to Penny has turned her into a bit of a Gabby Gertie.

name: Leonard
line: So, what's the gossip?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, please, I was just pointing it out. I have no desire to engage in the activity.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, don't tell me.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, get this. Bernadette is thinking about breaking up with Howard.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. That's too bad. I wonder what happened.

name: Sheldon
line: Mm, it's hard to say. I can only speculate based on the data I collected watching my parents' marriage implode. In that case, the woman dives into religion, while the man dives into a bottle-blonde bartender who tries to buy my love with action figures. Oop! Out of arrows.

name: Leonard
line: Boy, you sure get your money's worth out of these games.

name: Leonard
line: - Priya, can I come in?

name: Priya
line: Sure.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, God.

name: Priya
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: It's okay. You didn't know. I'll take care of it.

name: Priya
line: What, what did I do?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon doesn't allow flossing that close to the mirror.

name: Priya
line: You're kidding.

name: Leonard
line: It's a splatter thing. There's a little piece of tape on the floor you're supposed to stand behind.

name: Priya
line: That's madness.

name: Leonard
line: I know. Just do it. There's a big inspection coming up, and I don't want to lose my TV privileges.

name: Priya
line: You really need to let me take a look at that roommate agreement one of these days.

name: Leonard
line: Mm, I don't know. I get a lawyer, he gets a lawyer, it's just easier to stand behind the tape.

name: Priya
line: Oh, by the way, a fellow at work said I could use his Dodger tickets this weekend. Does that sound like fun?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah! Dodgers are baseball, right?

name: Priya
line: You'll need to explain the game to me.

name: Leonard
line: Mm, it's complicated, but as I remember it, the essentials are, get chosen last, get hit by the ball, cry, go home.

name: Priya
line: Well, regardless, I've got four tickets, and I was thinking we can bring Bernadette and Howard. She's really interesting, and I bet I can get used to him.

name: Leonard
line: Well, it might not be a great idea to invite those two.

name: Priya
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Don't tell anybody I told you, but I heard she might be breaking up with him.

name: Priya
line: Oh, too bad. Although I do know one person for whom that's good news.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Who?

name: Priya
line: My brother. He's got a big crush on Bernadette.

name: Leonard
line: What? You're kidding!

name: Priya
line: Mmm. I found poems he wrote about her. Very disturbing. Oh, Bernadette, please play my clarinet.

name: Leonard
line: Wow, that's hard to believe.

name: Priya
line: Yes. And for years, everyone in my family was convinced that he was the clarinet enthusiast. Hmm. What's that piece of tape?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that one doesn't apply to you. You sit.

name: Leonard
line: Hey!

name: Penny
line: Hey! How's it going?

name: Leonard
line: Not too bad. Did you hear about Howard and Bernadette?

name: Penny
line: ‘Course I heard about it. How did you hear about it?

name: Leonard
line: I heard about it from Sheldon. He got it from Amy.

name: Penny
line: Oh, damn it. I told Amy that in the strictest confidence. Boy, some people are such blabbermouths. Well, whatever, I'm sure Bernadette can do better.

name: Leonard
line: Do you think a sexually ambivalent Indian astrophysicist with selective mutism and alcohol issues is better than a hundred-pound Jewish guy who lives with his mom?

name: Penny
line: You are kidding. Raj likes Bernadette?

name: Leonard
line: I didn't say Raj. Who said Raj?

name: Penny
line: Okay, give. How do you know? Did he tell you?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Well, then who?

name: Leonard
line: I can't say.

name: Penny
line: Priya told you. What a little gossip. You know, not an attractive quality in a woman, Leonard. Not judging, just my opinion.

name: Leonard
line: Well, The point is, if this got out, it would destroy Howard and Raj's friendship.

name: Penny
line: You don't have to worry. Unlike Amy and Priya, I know how to keep a secret.

name: Leonard
line: You're the one who told Amy in the first place.

name: Penny
line: In confidence!

name: Raj
line: Hello, Mummy. Hello, Daddy. How are you?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: We're very rich in a very poor country. So, all in all, can't complain.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: So, Priya, how are enjoying staying with your brother?

name: Priya
line: It's fine. But if I'm going to stay in Los Angeles much longer, I think I should get my own place.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Why? Is Rajesh not making you feel comfortable? Rajesh, why aren't you making your sister comfortable?

name: Raj
line: I am making her comfortable. Besides, she's not sleeping here half the time anyway.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: What? Where are you sleeping, Priya?

name: Priya
line: It's a figure of speech, Daddy. It means I-I work late.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Please tell me you're not dating an American. I knew this would happen. Rajesh, are you letting your sister date that little Howard boy?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Now, hold on. If she is dating an American, that's not a bad way to go. He's Jewish. Those chaps are very successful, and they don't drink a lot.

name: Raj
line: It, it doesn't matter. Howard has a girlfriend.

name: Priya
line: For now.

name: Raj
line: What does that mean?

name: Priya
line: I'll tell you later.

name: Raj
line: Is something going on with him and Bernadette?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Who's Bernadette?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Doesn't sound Jewish.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: You can't tell by that. Winona Ryder is Jewish.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Okay, we're getting off the subject. Rajesh, I want you to try harder to make your sister feel welcome.

name: Priya
line: Thank you, Daddy.

name: Raj
line: Don't worry. Everything I have, I share with her. Including my friend Leon...

name: Priya
line: Good night, Mummy. Good night, Daddy.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God, I think you broke my toe!

name: Priya
line: Well you should have kept your mouth shut.

name: Raj
line: Fair enough. Now, what's up with Clarinet? Bernadette!

name: Sheldon
line: I've been thinking about Dr. Greene's efforts to make science palatable for the masses.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah? What about it?

name: Sheldon
line: That's all. I've just been thinking about it. Now, I'm thinking about fractal equations. Now I'm thinking about the origin of the phrase train of thought. Now I'm thinking about trains.

name: Raj
line: Are you listening to this guy?

name: Howard
line: Hmm? Oh, I'm sorry. I was somewhere else.

name: Leonard
line: Lucky bastard.

name: Sheldon
line: Now I'm thinking about Jell-O.

name: Raj
line: So what's up?

name: Howard
line: It's a Bernadette thing.

name: Raj
line: Oh, no. I hope everything's okay.

name: Leonard
line: Whatever it is, we're here for you. You can tell us anything.

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Good or devastating.

name: Howard
line: I'm gonna ask her to marry me.

name: Leonard
line: Marry you?

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. I just need to figure out the right time to pop the question.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I'd wait.

name: Raj
line: No rush, no rush.

name: Howard
line: Oh, great. It's my cousin David about the ring. Hey, David, what'd you find? Oh, sure, a half a carat's fine. Her freakishly small hands make anything look big. It's one of the reasons I love her.

name: Leonard
line: Man, he's going to be blindsided.

name: Raj
line: I know. It'll be awful.

name: Sheldon
line: Why are you smiling?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, Raj, why?

name: Raj
line: Uh, a smile means something different in my country. You know, tears of joy, smile of sadness. India's a goofy place.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm back to trains. Woo-woo.

name: Amy
line: Did I tell you our lab got a grant to study addiction?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Amy
line: Fascinating work. I recently trained a capuchin monkey to smoke cigarettes.

name: Sheldon
line: Have you learned anything?

name: Amy
line: Yes. He looks much cooler than the non-smoking monkeys. Although it's not much of a contest. The other monkeys just sit around and masturbate.

name: Sheldon
line: If you don't mind, I'd like to stop listening to you and start talking.

name: Amy
line: By all means.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard has announced his intention to propose marriage to Bernadette.

name: Amy
line: I don't understand. The original piece of gossip indicated an impending breakup.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. The group consensus is that his proposal will be met with an humiliating, soul-crushing rejection. Everyone was set a-twitter. Although oddly, no one tweeted.

name: Amy
line: It's not surprising that the story has captured the attention of our little circle of friends. Are you familiar with meme theory?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm familiar with everything, but go on.

name: Amy
line: Meme theory suggests that items of gossip are like living things that seek to reproduce using humans as their host.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm no stranger to memetic epidemiology. At Johnson Elementary School, the phrase Shelly Cooper's a smelly pooper spread like wildfire.

name: Amy
line: I should think so. That's gold.

name: Sheldon
line: Your meme hypothesis does intrigue me. How might we examine this more closely?

name: Amy
line: Do you have any ethical qualms regarding human experimentation?

name: Sheldon
line: It's one of the few forms of interaction with people that I don't find repellent.

name: Amy
line: We need to fabricate a tantalizing piece of gossip.

name: Sheldon
line: And a second non-tantalizing piece to use as a control.

name: Amy
line: Then we'll track its progress through our social group and interpret the results through the competing academic prisms of memetic theory, algebraic gossip and epidemiology.

name: Sheldon
line: Look at you, getting me to engage in the social sciences. You're a vixen, Amy Farrah Fowler.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, Amy. What's up?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon and I engaged in sexual intercourse. In other news, I'm thinking of starting an herb garden. Mum's the word. Gotta go.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, hey, Raj, what are you doing here?

name: Raj
line: I just felt like drinking alone, because I'm deep and dark.

name: Bernadette
line: Uh-huh. So, uh, Howard's not here?

name: Raj
line: No. It's just one of those times when it's just you and me. Like when the three of us went to the movies and you and I waited outside the bathroom while Howard threw up Red Vines and Cherry Coke. Do you remember that?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: Me, too. Good times.

name: Penny
line: Hey, 16 wants to order appetizers.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, thanks.

name: Raj
line: This was nice.

name: Penny
line: What the hell are you doing? Howard is your best friend, and that is his girlfriend. You should be ashamed of yourself.

name: Raj
line: I was when I came in, but it's amazing what liquor does to guilt. Besides what you might not know is, Bernadette is planning on breaking up with Howard.

name: Penny
line: Well, I know that. How do you know that?

name: Raj
line: My sister told me.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that gossipy bitch! No offense.

name: Raj
line: None taken. You should hear how she talks about you.

name: Penny
line: Okay, listen, just because Howard and Bernadette are having problems, does not mean you should be here sniffing around.

name: Raj
line: What can I do? I can't stop thinking about her.

name: Penny
line: All right, try thinking about this. Sheldon and Amy had sex.

name: Raj
line: Shut your ass!

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's true. Amy told me.

name: Raj
line: How did that even happen? Did they know that's what they were doing when they were doing it?

name: Penny
line: I-I guess they just figured it out at some point.

name: Raj
line: Wow. I can't believe old Smelly Pooper finally got laid.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hope you're hungry.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. A friendly sentiment in this country, cruel taunt in the Sudan. It's a lesson in context.

name: Leonard
line: Will Amy be joining us for dinner?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I believe so.

name: Leonard
line: Good, good. Everything okay between you two?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Why do you ask?

name: Leonard
line: No reason. I was just talking to Raj, and he mentioned what a lovely glow she has these days.

name: Sheldon
line: Did he mean as if she'd been out in the sun, tending an herb garden without wearing a hat or sunblock?

name: Leonard
line: No. That's not what he meant.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, we may never know. As my mother would say, the Asians are an inscrutable folk. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have work to do.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, you do. You dog, you.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you get that?

name: Amy
line: Every word. Our false gossip meme appears to have reached node lambda.

name: Sheldon
line: This is moving faster than we thought.

name: Amy
line: Agreed. It appears the rate of gossip transmission is proportional to the number of nodes squared.

name: Sheldon
line: I must say, Amy, pretending to have intercourse with you is giving me a great deal of satisfaction.

name: Amy
line: Slow down, Sheldon. I'm not quite there yet.

name: Leonard
line: Pass the soy sauce.

name: Howard
line: Sure.

name: Amy
line: Bernadette just asked about my sexual encounter with you. The meme has reached full penetration.

name: Sheldon
line: Pun intended?

name: Amy
line: No. Happy accident.

name: Sheldon
line: This is remarkable. Took less than 24 hours.

name: Amy
line: I should let you know that she asked for details about our dalliance.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. So it went beyond the mere fact of coitus to a blow by blow, as it were.

name: Amy
line: Pun intended?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. What pun?

name: Amy
line: Not important. I described your lovemaking as aloof, but effective.

name: Sheldon
line: I wish you hadn't done that. That's going to make me a chick magnet, and I'm so busy as it is.

name: Howard
line: Hey, everybody, I got something I want to ask Bernadette, and I can't think of a better time than when I'm with all my friends.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hold on, Howard. There's lots of better times.

name: Raj
line: Leonard, please. The man is talking. Let him get it out, and let the chips fall where they may.

name: Howard
line: Thank you. Bernadette Maryann Rostenkowski...

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, God. What's happening?

name: Howard
line: I know things haven't been perfect with us, and we've had our problems, but I just have to tell you, from the moment I...

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, let me just stop you right here.

name: Raj
line: This is it.

name: Bernadette
line: Yes.

name: Howard
line: Yes, what?

name: Bernadette
line: Yes, I will marry you.

name: Howard
line: You will?

name: Raj
line: You will?

name: Bernadette
line: I will. I will!

name: Howard
line: Oh, I love you so much.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I love you, too.

name: Leonard
line: Congratulations!

name: Priya
line: Oh, it's so exciting.

name: Amy
line: I wonder what changed her mind.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps your talk of my sexual prowess renewed her faith in love.

name: Amy
line: As good an explanation as any.

name: Leonard
line: That's great.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, Amy. Bernadette just texted me. Howard proposed?

name: Amy
line: Yes, not important. Just stopped by to let you know I'm getting orthotics. Also, I'm carrying Sheldon's baby. Mum's the word.

name: Leonard
line: You're pregnant?

name: Amy
line: Wow. Is there anything on there about orthotics?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, are you in the shower?

name: Leonard
line: I can't hear you, I'm in the shower.

name: Sheldon
line: I asked if you were in the shower, but that's moot now.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Moot. Rendered unimportant by recent events.

name: Leonard
line: I can't hear you, I'm in the shower.

name: Sheldon
line: I have to skip the chitchat. Emergency.

name: Leonard
line: What kind of emergency?

name: Sheldon
line: Mathematical. 32-ounce banana smoothie, 16-ounce bladder.

name: Leonard
line: You might not want to do that.

name: Sheldon
line: I assure you I do.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I'm not alone in here.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Priya
line: Hello, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing in there? She can't be in here.

name: Leonard
line: We were in here first, you can't be in here.

name: Sheldon
line: According to the roommate agreement, paragraph nine, subsection B, the right to bathroom privacy is suspended in the event of force majeure. And believe me, I am experiencing a very majeure force.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on, you can't wait two minutes?

name: Priya
line: Oh, Leonard, let the man pee.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?  Penny?  Penny?

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Move. Move. Move!

name: Sheldon
line: Dr. Leonard Hofstadter, you are officially charged with two violations of the roommate agreement. Do you waive reading of the charges?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, fine.

name: Priya
line: Hang on. No, my client does not waive reading of the charges.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Cool. I've got a lawyer. And I've seen her naked.

name: Priya
line: Proceed.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. Count the first, on or about the 28th day of April, the accused did knowingly and with malice aforethought deny access to the shared bathroom in a time of emergency, to wit, my back teeth were floating. Count the second, the accused exceeded the agreed upon occupancy of the shower, to wit, one, unless we are under attack by water-soluble aliens.

name: Priya
line: Can I see the roommate agreement?

name: Sheldon
line: Um, it's fairly technical.

name: Priya
line: I think I can handle it.

name: Leonard
line: Top of her class, Cambridge University. Licensed to practice law in three countries. And your face.

name: Priya
line: All right, based on a cursory reading, it doesn't look like you have much of a case, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Do so, do so.

name: Priya
line: Oh, I'm afraid not. Section seven here, on the right to enter the bathroom in emergency situations, is not specific as to what constitutes an emergency.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's ridiculous. A bathroom emergency is self-explanatory.

name: Priya
line: Is it? If Leonard forgot to trim his nose hair, could he barge in while you were showering?

name: Sheldon
line: Irrelevant. Leonard doesn't trim his nose hair. He thinks because he's short nobody can see up there.

name: Priya
line: My point is, Sheldon, the legal principle is ambiguity in a contract benefits the party that did not draft it, in this case, Leonard. So much for count one.

name: Sheldon
line: But...

name: Priya
line: There's no buts, Sheldon, that's how the law works.

name: Leonard
line: Schooled!

name: Priya
line: As for the shower capacity issue, I cite addendum J. When Sheldon showers second, any and all measures shall be taken to ensure an adequate supply of hot water. I believe this supercedes the occupancy issue.

name: Leonard
line: Superceded!

name: Sheldon
line: This isn't over.

name: Leonard
line: No offence, but shower sex with you is now the second best thing that's happened today.

name: Raj
line: Mmm, Greek food on pizza night? This is the most delightfully cruel thing we've done to Sheldon since we left that fake message from Stephen Hawking on his voice mail.

name: Priya
line: Seriously?

name: Sheldon
line: What is that you're eating? Tonight is pizza night.

name: Leonard
line: I'd like to refer that to my attorney.

name: Priya
line: According to what I see here, Thursday nights are Franconi's pizza night.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, and when Franconi's went out of business, we switched to Graziano's.

name: Howard
line: That's interesting. Can you just switch restaurants like that, Priya?

name: Priya
line: A good question, Howard. Turns out you can't. According to the document you drew up, Sheldon, the selection of a new takeout restaurant requires public hearings and a 60-day comment period. Were those criteria met?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: All
line: Opa!

name: Sheldon
line: This is Greek food? Leonard, you hate Greek food.

name: Leonard
line: Not as much as you.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. I'm nothing if not adaptable.

name: Leonard
line: I got you the lamb kabob.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. If you think about it, Greek food isn't that far from italian food. They share a spice palette. And what a civilization is the Greeks. They gave us science, democracy, and little cubes of charred meat that taste like sweat.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?  Penny?  Penny?

name: Penny
line: Hey. What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: The mean Indian lady tried to make me eat lamb. Congratulations. Pizza night will now be at your apartment. Order one.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'm sorry, honey, I'm meeting Amy and Bernadette for dinner. But you're welcome to tag along.

name: Sheldon
line: A girls night? Oh, I don't know if I'm up for an evening talking about rainbows, unicorns and menstrual cramps.

name: Penny
line: Okay, suit yourself. We'll probably be trashing Priya a little.

name: Sheldon
line: Shotgun.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'd like to propose a toast to a wonderful girls night out.

name: Amy
line: Fair warning, we can get ker-razy.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. Last week we smoked cigars and pretended to be dragons.

name: Sheldon
line: Really, Amy? Tobacco and alcohol? Need I remind you not a lot of scientific discoveries were made by people having a good time?

name: Amy
line: Why did you bring him? He's harshing my buzz.

name: Penny
line: I felt sorry for him. Priya's giving him a hard time.

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh, the Priya bashing's starting early. Yay! Okay, what's up with those pantsuits?

name: Amy
line: I need some context.

name: Penny
line: Pantsuits suck.

name: Amy
line: And that opens her up To justifiable ridicule for wearing them. Good one, Bernadette. See? Ker-razy.

name: Bernadette
line: Whee-ee-ee!

name: Amy
line: You smell like baby powder.

name: Sheldon
line: It's talc. But as that's a primary ingredient of baby powder, I understand your confusion.

name: Amy
line: Oh, I'm not confused at all. You're like a sexy toddler.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know how to process that.

name: Bernadette
line: I do. Amy and Sheldon sitting in a tree. K-I-S-S-S-S-I-N-G.

name: Penny
line: That's too many S's for kissing.

name: Bernadette
line: Not if they're doing it for a long time.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, have you ever kissed a girl?

name: Sheldon
line: Other than my mother, my sister and my mee-maw, no. But in the interest of full disclosure, I was once on a bus and had to give mouth-to-mouth resuscitation to an elderly nun who passed out from heat exhaustion. Every year I get a Christmas card from her, signed with far too many X's and O's.

name: Bernadette
line: That doesn't count. Aren't you even a little curious?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you're a scientist, where is the curiosity?

name: Amy
line: I'm available for experimentation.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Not necessary. We know everything there is to know about kissing. It requires 34 facial muscles and 112 postural muscles.

name: Amy
line: Oh, blah, blah, blah. Give me some sugar, bestie .

name: Sheldon
line: I'm certainly glad no one said they were curious about Aztec human sacrifice.

name: Penny
line: Hey, I know, let's take Sheldon dancing.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I totally want to see Sheldon dance. I bet he looks like a spider on a hot plate.

name: Sheldon
line: No, thank you, but for the record, I'm an excellent dancer. Proficient in the rumba, waltz and cha-cha.

name: Amy
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't see why that's surprising. I excel at so many things. You've had my sourdough bread.

name: Penny
line: Did you take dance lessons?

name: Sheldon
line: Against my will. In the South, pre-adolescent children are forced through a process called cotillion, which indoctrinates them with all the social graces and dance skills needed to function in 18th century Vienna.

name: Penny
line: Oh, we are so taking you dancing.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you most certainly are not.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, what does your cotillion training say is expected of a gentleman when three ladies ask him to escort them to a dance soiree?

name: Sheldon
line: I saved a nun's life. Why am I being punished?

name: Penny
line: Take us to a place we can waltz.

name: Taxi driver
line: Where you can what?

name: Sheldon
line: Waltz. It's a social dance from Austria, choreographed to a three-four time signature.

name: Taxi Driver
line: Here we go.

name: Amy
line: I kissed a girl and I liked it, I hope my boyfriend don't mind it.

name: Sheldon
line: What happened to you?

name: Penny
line: Shake it baby, shake it!

name: Bernadette
line: Muy caliente, Sheldon!

name: Elderly Korean Gentleman
line: Care to dance?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I'm sorry, I'm engaged.

name: Korean
line: How about you?

name: Penny
line: Oh, what the hell. Ooh!

name: Amy
line: How come if we're the smart people, we don't do this every night?

name: Sheldon
line: What's 16 times 14?

name: Amy
line: My burps taste like cranberry juice.

name: Sheldon
line: And there's your answer.

name: Amy
line: Would you like to come in for a nightcap?

name: Sheldon
line: If you're referring to the beverage, you know I don't drink. If you're referring to the hat you don while wearing a nightshirt and holding a candle, I have one.

name: Amy
line: I have yoo-hoo.

name: Sheldon
line: It's hard to say no to yoo-hoo. The name literally beckons.

name: Amy
line: Make yourself comfortable.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Is someone smoking?

name: Amy
line: Oh, that's just Ricky.

name: Sheldon
line: You own a smoking monkey?

name: Amy
line: Don't be silly. He's one of the animals in my department's nicotine addiction study.

name: Sheldon
line: What's he doing here?

name: Amy
line: I'm giving him emphysema. The least I can do is let him hang out and watch cable.

name: Sheldon
line: Remarkable. Aren't you worried about secondhand smoke?

name: Amy
line: A little. The real danger is him biting my face off while I'm sleeping.

name: Sheldon
line: is he deliberately blowing smoke at me?

name: Amy
line: Yeah. He's kind of an ass.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. May I share something with you that's troubling me?

name: Amy
line: Of course. What's rattling around that big bulbous brain of yours?

name: Sheldon
line: Priya has essentially nullified my roommate agreement with Leonard, making life in the apartment very uncomfortable for me.

name: Amy
line: And you want me to kill her? Done.

name: Sheldon
line: No, of course not.

name: Amy
line: I trained Ricky how to smoke. I can train him to shoot a poison dart. No jury would convict us 'cause people love monkeys.

name: Sheldon
line: I understand the alcohol has stirred up whatever it is that makes girls go wild, but I really need to talk to smart Amy now.

name: Amy
line: Excuse me. Have you considered that your intelligence might be the very thing causing your dilemma?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Amy
line: What do you think Ricky over here would do if an interloper encroached on his territory?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, when challenged, monkeys generally assert their dominance through chasing, assault and a stylized penile display. That's a little outside my comfort zone.

name: Amy
line: You're being too literal. My point is, he would not meekly surrender to the rules, and neither should you.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you suggesting I play dirty?

name: Amy
line: Yes, dirty. Dirty, dirty, dirty. Which brings me to our next order of business.

name: Sheldon
line: Fascinating.

name: Amy
line: I hope you don't take what I'm about to do as a comment on what we just did.

name: Sheldon
line: Who's to say you shouldn't be dissecting our brains? You really are an ass.

name: Leonard
line: Morning, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good, you're up. I've written a new and improved roommate agreement that benefits me greatly. I'd like you to sign it.

name: Leonard
line: Why would I want to do that?

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent question. Do you remember what happened to the alien, played by talented character actor Frank Gorshin, in the Star Trek episode Let That Be Your Last Battlefield?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, Captain Kirk activated the self-destruct sequence and threatened to blow up the Enterpriseand kill them both unless he gave in?

name: Sheldon
line: Affirmative. Computer, this is Dr. Sheldon Cooper. Activate self-destruct sequence. Code 1-1-A-2-B.

name: Female Voice
line: Self-destruct sequence activated.

name: Leonard
line: What are you gonna do, Sheldon, blow up the apartment?

name: Sheldon
line: That was my first thought, but all my cool stuff is here.

name: Priya
line: So what happens when it counts down?

name: Sheldon
line: Unless Leonard signs the new agreement in the next 41 seconds, this computer will send an e-mail to your parents in India saying that you're in a secret relationship with the whiter-than-marshmallow-fluff Leonard Hofstadter.

name: Priya
line: Oh, my God.

name: Leonard
line: What's the big deal?

name: Priya
line: Trust me, it's a big deal.

name: Leonard
line: They're gonna find out about me eventually, right?

name: Priya
line: Yeah, of course, just not today.

name: Sheldon
line: 20 seconds.

name: Leonard
line: Are you ashamed of me?

name: Priya
line: Of course not.

name: Leonard
line: Then why can't we tell your parents?

name: Priya
line: Please, don't push this.

name: Sheldon
line: He does that all the time, doesn't he? 15.

name: Priya
line: Okay, fine, Sheldon, you win. Turn it off.

name: Leonard
line: No, he's bluffing.

name: Sheldon
line: I never bluff. Ten.

name: Leonard
line: It's blackmail!

name: Sheldon
line: Nine.

name: Priya
line: We give up.

name: Sheldon
line: Eight.

name: Leonard
line: This is ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: It's a laptop with a full charge. Honestly, what do you see in him?

name: Priya
line: Give him what he wants or we're done.

name: Sheldon
line: Three.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: Two.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I'll sign it!

name: Female Voice
line: Self-destruct sequence aborted.

name: Sheldon
line: You may have gone to Cambridge, but I'm an honorary graduate of Starfleet academy.

name: Sheldon
line: Good morning, Amy.

name: Amy
line: It most assuredly is not.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you experiencing dehydration, headache, nausea and shame?

line: Yes. I also found a Korean man's business card tucked into my cleavage. What happened last night?

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, memory impairment, the free prize at the bottom of every vodka bottle.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Last night you gave me some excellent advice regarding my problem here at home, you kissed me and then vomited on and off for 40 minutes, following which you passed out on your bathroom floor. I then folded a towel under your head as a pillow, set your oven clock to the correct time because it was driving me crazy, and I left.

name: Amy
line: Okay. Don't really know where we go from here.

name: Sheldon
line: I suggest we treat our relationship as if it were a crashed computer and restore it to the last point we both agree it worked.

name: Amy
line: Terrific. Thank you.  They were out of menthols! Get off my back! Not easy living with a temperamental little primate.

line: Come on, Priya, just admit I embarrass you!

line: You're preaching to the choir, sister.

name: Amy
line: I must say, Penny, this is great fun.

line: Glad you're enjoying yourself.

name: Amy
line: Until I met you and Bernadette, my trips to the bathroom had been entirely focused on elimination. Now they have a delightful social aspect.

line: Amy, you must've been in the bathroom with other women before.

line: Of course I have. But they were strangers and seemed off-put when I engaged in friendly stall-to-stall chit-chat.

line: Some women don't like to get chummy when their panties are down.

line: The reason I ask is that many people experience bladder shyness, the inability to pass urine

line: No, it's not. It's a strategic manoeuvre. Leonard's new girlfriend is testing Bernadette's loyalty to you and the group. That bitch is crafty.

line: Okay, Amy, you're being silly. I am not concerned about who hangs out with who. And I certainly don't have a problem with Leonard's new girlfriend who wears way too much makeup. Ooh, these are cute. Of course if I buy them, I'll have to rent my womb out to a gay couple.

line: It doesn't matter. I'm going to tell her we can't make it.

line: Wait. What are you talking about?

line: By accepting the invitation, Bernadette becomes a double agent inside the enemy camp. She could ferret out Priya's tactics, identify her weaknesses and feed her false information, such as, Leonard's no stranger to back-alley cockfights.

line: I don't know. I'm not a very good liar. They kind of whup that out of you in Catholic school.

line: Don't worry. I'll teach you. I did two years of Cub Scouts before they found out I was a girl.

line: Okay, I don't know you people. I'm just an innocent woman wondering if this shoe store will take my Texaco card.

line: Good news. I finally have a handle on my idea for three-person chess.

line: Uh, do you know how I solved the balanced centre combat-area problem? Five words, transitional quadrilateral to triangular tessellation.

line: It's what I do. But wait, there's more. I also invented two new chess pieces. The serpent, and the old woman.

line: When the serpent slithers to an opposing player's piece, that piece is considered poisoned and will die after two more moves. Ugh.

line: All right.

name: Sheldon
line: Unless, it gets to the old woman in time, in which case she sucks out the poison, turning her into the Grand Empress, a piece combining the power of the knight, queen and serpent.

line: And a third person. It's three-person chess. I must say, ever since you started having regular intercourse, your mind has lost its keen edge. You should reflect on that.
