line: Sorry. Walking tree.

name: Sheldon
line: Last one.

name: Raj
line: I'm taking a stroll and I'm sporting wood.

name: Howard
line: Okay, the Eagle has landed.

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Howard
line: Bernadette and my mother are having a get-to-know-you lunch at the Old Town Deli.

name: Raj
line: Oh, that sounds lovely.

name: Howard
line: Hope so. Of course, if history is any indication, my mother will swallow her whole and spit out her bones like an owl.

name: Leonard
line: Have you met Bernadette's parents?

name: Howard
line: You mean Adolf and Eva? Not yet. One goose step at a time.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, that's my water.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear Lord!

name: Leonard
line: That's not your water.

name: Raj
line: I know.

name: Sheldon
line: Where's the mouthwash?

name: Raj
line: Where indeed.

name: Howard
line: Ma, I'm home! Where are you?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I'm in the toilet.

name: Howard
line: So, how'd it go?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Too soon to say. I'm not done yet.

name: Howard
line: No, I mean lunch, today, with Bernadette.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Oh! I had a pastrami sandwich. She had eggplant lasagna. Like that's what a person orders in a Jewish deli.

name: Howard
line: Besides food, did you get along? Did you talk?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Oh, sure. Did you know she's going to school to become a microbiologist?

name: Howard
line: No, she never mentioned it.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I bet she did and you didn't listen.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, that's probably it. So, what do you think? Do you like her? She's great, huh?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: She's a lovely girl. Cute as a button.

name: Howard
line: That's good to hear, 'cause I've got some news.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I hope it's good news, because I've got nothing but disappointment in here!

name: Howard
line: Bernadette and I are getting married. Ma? You too busy bearing down? Ma?  Oh, my God, Ma? Ma? Ma? Stand back, I'm gonna break the door down!  Son of a bitch! Ma, help!

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: Haven't seen you in a while. How's it going?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, other than waiting out the exponential growth period of the virulent organisms trooping through my microvilli into my circulatory system, hunky-dory.  Did I say something amusing?

name: Penny
line: I don't know, maybe, I have no idea what you said.

name: Sheldon
line: So your mirth is merely a discharge of nervous energy with no semantic content at all?

name: Penny
line: My mirth. Classic.

name: Sheldon
line: Is there a station coming up where I can board your giggling train of thought?

name: Penny
line: It's not a big deal, Sheldon. It's just, ever since Leonard's been dating Raj's sister, I've had to keep my distance. I don't get to hear all your jibber-jabber.

name: Sheldon
line: Jibber-jabber? I don't jibber-jabber.

name: Penny
line: What are you doing at work these days?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm working on time-dependent backgrounds in string theory, specifically quantum field theory in D-dimensional de Sitter space.

name: Penny
line: Alright, come on, even you have to admit that's jibber-jabber.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting, do you know where the phrase jibber-jabber comes from?

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, you're about to jibber-jabber about jibber-jabber.

name: Leonard
line: Howard and his mother are at the hospital. Come on, we gotta go.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God! What happened?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, I just got a text. Come on, hurry.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, let's go!

name: Sheldon
line: To a hospital? Full of sick people? Oh, I don't think so.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, your friend and his mother are there, we're going.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't.

name: Penny
line: Oh, don't tell me you're afraid of germs.

name: Sheldon
line: Not all germs. Just the ones that will kill me. It's the same way I'm not afraid of all steak knives, just the ones that might be plunged in my thorax.

name: Leonard
line: Right, fine. I'll tell Howard you didn't come because you're more concerned about your own well-being than his.

name: Sheldon
line: I would think he would know that.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you know what? You are unbelievable. You buy all these superhero T-shirts, but when it's time for you to step up and do the right thing, you just hide in the laundry room.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, I'll go. Just for the record, my Aunt Ruth died in a hospital. She went in to visit my Uncle Roger, caught something and bit the dust a week later. The two of them now share a coffee can on my mother's mantel.

name: Howard
line: So I knocked down the bathroom door, picked up my poor unconscious mother, carried her to the car, and drove like a madman to the emergency room.

name: Bernadette
line: You're a real hero, Howard.

name: Howard
line: No, I did what any son would do.

name: Penny
line: Hang on a second, you picked up your mother? Her own legs are barely able to do that.

name: Howard
line: I was filled with adrenaline. It happens to be how women lift cars off babies.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm saying, it'd be easier to lift a car.

name: Howard
line: What can I tell you? After I found the courage to put her pants back on, I was unstoppable.

name: Leonard
line: So, how is she?

name: Howard
line: They're running tests. I don't know. It may have been a heart attack or heart-attack-like event.

name: Penny
line: What's the difference?

name: Sheldon
line: A heart-attack-like event is an event that's like a heart attack.

name: Penny
line: Thanks for clearing that up.

name: Sheldon
line: Regardless, coronary problems are eminently treatable. What's more likely going to kill Howard's mother are the antibiotic-resistant super-bugs festering in every nook and cranny of this hospital.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you're not helping.

name: Sheldon
line: Disagree.

name: Leonard
line: Go sit over there.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll sit over there, it looks cleaner.

name: Leonard
line: Is there a history of heart disease in your family?

name: Howard
line: My family is the history of heart disease. There's a cave painting in France of one of my ancestors doing this .

name: Bernadette
line: So it's probably genetic.

name: Howard
line: Well, maybe. Mom also had just gotten some news that might have upset her.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: It's not important.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, Howard, I'm going to be your wife. You can share anything with me.

name: Howard
line: You'd think that. But no.

name: Bernadette
line: You told her we were going to get married and she had a heart attack?

name: Howard
line: You can't take that personally.

name: Penny
line: How else is she supposed to take it?

name: Howard
line: What you've got to keep in mind is that ever since my dad left, I've been the whole world to my mother. I mean, she'd be threatened by any woman who can give me what she can't.

name: Bernadette
line: You mean sexual intercourse?

name: Howard
line: Well, when you say it like that you make it sound creepy.

name: Priya
line: What happened?

name: Bernadette
line: Howard's mother had a heart attack because I have sex with him and she can't.

name: Howard
line: Bernie, wait!

name: Sheldon
line: I'll give you $1,000 if you'll drive me home.

name: Priya
line: Nice of you to come for Howard.

name: Penny
line: Well, he's my friend. It's what you do.

name: Priya
line: I'm sorry, did I miss something?

name: Penny
line: It's just so weird. Howard Wolowitz is my friend. You know, once he tried to stick his tongue down my throat and I broke his nose.

name: Priya
line: That's a little easier to believe than he's your friend.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, tell me about it.

name: Priya
line: You know, my brother had a group of friends like this in India. They dressed up in leotards and goggles and called themselves the New Delhi Power Rangers.

name: Penny
line: You mean when he was little.

name: Priya
line: Not as little as you'd want him to be.

name: Penny
line: You know, this stuff is horrible. You want to see if we can find the cafeteria and get real coffee?

name: Priya
line: Sure. We're going to the cafeteria to get some coffee. You want anything?

name: Leonard
line: I'm fine. That's nice that they're getting along.

name: Raj
line: Your girlfriend and your ex-girlfriend are hanging out together? Oh, yeah, that can only be good for you.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Raj
line: One of them broke up with you. Do you really want her telling the other one why?

name: Leonard
line: I don't care. I don't have anything to hide.

name: Raj
line: Good, good. Then you have nothing to worry about.

name: Leonard
line: No, I do not. You are a mean little man.

name: Raj
line: You'd think it'd be because my parents didn't love me, but actually they loved me a great deal.

name: Howard
line: Bernie, it's not you. She's just set in her ways.

name: Bernadette
line: How can we be together if the thought of us getting married might kill your mother?

name: Howard
line: It's the circle of life, sweetie. One day our son will marry someone and it will kill you.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, I have to go to the bathroom and no one will take me home.

name: Howard
line: What's wrong with the bathroom here?

name: Sheldon
line: Pneumococcus, streptococcus, staphylococcus and other assorted coccuses.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, my mother is on her deathbed and my fiancée is grief-stricken over putting her there. I'm not taking you home.

name: Sheldon
line: Will you at least go with me to the restroom here, so you can open the door and flush the urinal?

name: Howard
line: No!

name: Sheldon
line: This might be a good time to point out, Howard, that friendship requires a certain give and take. Hold the door!

name: Doctor
line: Mr. Wolowitz?

name: Howard
line: Is she okay?

name: Doctor
line: It wasn't a heart attack. She's awake, she's resting comfortably. We're still running a few tests.

name: Howard
line: Can I see her?

name: Doctor
line: Actually, she said, and I quote, she'd like to see the little Catholic girl first.

name: Bernadette
line: Me? Why me?

name: Howard
line: Jews have been asking that for centuries. There's no real good answer.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, well, wish me luck.

name: Howard
line: Don't worry, you'll be fine. Let's just hide Mr. Cross. If it touches her, it burns.

name: Doctor
line: You brought a Catholic girl home to your mother?

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Doctor
line: Why don't I write you a prescription for Xanax.

name: Sheldon
line: Finally.  Oh, what fresh hell is this?

name: Doctor
line: Wait, you can't leave here, you've been exposed.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I haven't. It's all good.

name: Penny
line: You want to talk about crazy mothers, Leonard's mom wouldn't give him any sort of approval growing up.

name: Priya
line: Oh, the poor thing.

name: Penny
line: It makes him desperate to please women. That's why the foreplay goes on and on.

name: Priya
line: It does, doesn't it?

name: Penny
line: It's like he's trying to win a prize. A word of advice, don't doze off. You will never hear the end of it.

name: Sheldon
line: Help me! Come back! Penny!

name: Leonard
line: There are a couple of things I did with Penny that might be a little silly, but...

name: Raj
line: Like what?

name: Leonard
line: Every once in a while, before we'd go to bed, I'd put on a little show for her.

name: Raj
line: What do you mean, a show?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you know, the way I took my clothes off.

name: Raj
line: Like, to music?

name: Leonard
line: I'd look pretty stupid if there was no music.

name: Raj
line: So you'd do a striptease?

name: Leonard
line: I wasn't swinging around a pole.

name: Raj
line: Good, good.

name: Leonard
line: There was one time I put body glitter on.

name: Raj
line: Well, I don't think you have to worry about Penny telling my sister that.

name: Leonard
line: No, she wouldn't.

name: Raj
line: Your big problem is me telling her.

name: Leonard
line: You really are a mean little man.

name: Priya
line: Oh, God, that's so true.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I know, right?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, what took you guys so long?

name: Priya
line: Oh, we were just chatting.

name: Leonard
line: That's nice. What about?

name: Penny
line: We were just comparing notes about how you are in the sack.

name: Leonard
line: That's funny.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: What if she wasn't kidding?

name: Leonard
line: It doesn't matter. I'm the king of foreplay.

name: Howard
line: Hey, how'd it go?

name: Bernadette
line: You're a putz. You know what that means?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Do you?

name: Bernadette
line: Your mother just taught it to me. She thinks she got food poisoning from that deli and she just wanted to make sure I was okay.

name: Howard
line: And are you?

name: Bernadette
line: No, because I'm engaged to a putz. You let me believe I was the reason she had a heart attack.

name: Howard
line: Well, based on the available evid...

name: Bernadette
line: Shut up! She said I'm a wonderful girl and that you're lucky to have me.

name: Howard
line: Where are you going?

name: Bermadette
line: To the toilet! Is that okay with you?

name: Howard
line: Is it just me, or does she sound sexy when she's angry?

name: Sheldon
line: Mountain Elf.

name: Raj
line: He takes the elf from off the shelf.

name: Leonard
line: Hell Hounds.

name: Raj
line: Hell Hounds. Who let the Satanic dogs out? Who? Who-who?

name: Howard
line: Colossal Serpent.

name: Raj
line: I got a colossal serpent right here.

name: Sheldon
line: Must you?

name: Raj
line: Sorry, I'm just trying to cheer my buddy up. Rotting Zombie. Sheldon's new Facebook photo.

name: Sheldon
line: Zandor, Wizard of the North. Ha! I win.

name: Howard
line: If you skip the part about being under a two-week quarantine because you were exposed to a deadly disease, absolutely.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you guys ready to order?

name: Howard
line: Uh..

name: Leonard
line: Sure

name: Penny
line: Okay, Priya?

name: Priya
line: Uh, I'll have the Shepherd's Pie. You want to split that with me?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, no, no, he doesn't.

name: Priya
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you have milk in the taters, milk in the gravy, parmesan crust. Your lactose-intolerant boyfriend will turn into a gas-filled Macy's Day balloon.

name: Sheldon
line: Not quite accurate. The Macy's balloons are filled with helium, whereas Leonard produces copious amounts of methane.

name: Leonard
line: So, no, on the Shepherd's Pie. Can we move on?

name: Leonard
line: Sea bass. I'll have the sea bass.

name: Howard
line: You gotta like this, the girlfriend and the ex-girlfriend bonding over your rooty-tooty stinky booty.

name: Leonard
line: Kill me.

name: Sheldon
line: It wouldn'help. The human body is capable of being flatulent for hours after death.

name: Bernadette
line: Guys, sorry I'm late. I have amazing news.

name: Sheldon
line: Bernadette, before you change the subject, does anyone have any final comments on Leonard's faulty digestive system?

name: Leonard
line: So, what's your news, Bernadette?

name: Bernadette
line: The thesis committee accepted my doctoral dissertation. I'm getting my PhD.

name: Penny
line: Oh!

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, congratulations.

name: Penny
line: Wow, so that means you're a doctor, you're a doctor, you're a doctor, you're a doctor, and Howard, you know a lot of doctors.

name: Howard
line: Congratulations, honey.

name: Bernadette
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: So, Howard, tell us, how's it feel knowing that when you two get married, you'll be referred to as Mr. and Dr. Wolowitz?

name: Sheldon
line: Unless he takes Bernadette's last name. And considering her advanced status, that could open some doors for him.

name: Howard
line: Please, this isn't about me. I'm proud of you.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, you'll be really be proud of this. I was headhunted by a big pharmaceutical company. They're gonna pay me a buttload of money!

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Bernadette, that's great. Howard, do you make a buttload?

name: Howard
line: Better than what you've got a buttload of.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, if I roll down the windows in the car, everything's peachy. If you do it, you're still not a doctor.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, just a heads-up on the car window deal. It helps, but everything is not peachy.

name: Raj
line: Oh, if there was a problem, you can't solve it, check out the hook while my DJ revolves it. Ice, Ice, baby. Ice, Ice, baby. .

name: Priya
line: Oh, God, I feel ridiculous in this dress.

name: Leonard
line: You look beautiful, Lieutenant Uhura. Now prepare for inspection.

name: Priya
line: Shh, my brother's going to hear you.

name: Leonard
line: Relax, he's got headphones on. And we're ten miles above Earth in a starship.

name: Raj
line: Really, ten miles? You're orbiting inside the atmosphere? Moron.

name: Priya
line: I can't believe I'm wearing my brother's Halloween costume.

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe you think he only wears it on Halloween. Open the landing bay doors, shuttle craft approaching.

name: Raj
line: Okay, gotta go.

name: Howard
line: Hey, what's up?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Is that my future daughter-in-law, the doctor?

name: Howard
line: No, Ma! It's Raj!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: He's a doctor too, right?

name: Howard
line: Yes!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Like Leonard and the skinny weirdo!

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, yes! Everybody's a doctor but me!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Well, whose fault is that?

name: Howard
line: What's up?

name: Raj
line: Leonard's putting disgusting memories in my memory foam mattress. Can I stay here tonight?

name: Howard
line: Sure, but I'm going out with Bernadette. It'll just be you and my mother.

name: Raj
line: I guess that's okay.

name: Howard
line: Ma, can Rajesh sleep over?!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Of course, he and I can play doctor!

name: Raj
line: She's kidding, right?

name: Howard
line: I don't know, she's pretty feisty since they put her on hormone-replacement therapy.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Paging Dr. Cutie Pie!

name: Sheldon
line: I must say, Amy, I was very impressed to see that Bernadette got her PhD.

name: Amy
line: It's indeed admirable. Although, it is microbiology.

name: Sheldon
line: Your doctorate is in neurobiology. I fail to see the distinction.

name: Amy
line: I'll make it simple for you. I study the brain, the organ responsible for Beethoven's Fifth Symphony. Bernadette studies yeast, the organism responsible for Michelob Lite. Is there something wrong with your neck?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a little stiff. What a remarkably fragile structure to support such a valuable payload. Not unlike balancing a Faberge egg on a Pixie Stick.

name: Amy
line: Have you considered massage?

name: Sheldon
line: I'd like to respond to that sarcastically. Yes, I relish the thought of a stranger covering my body with oil and rubbing it.

name: Amy
line: I was proposing you massage your muscles with your own hands.

name: Sheldon
line: Still sounds like a lot of unnecessary touching.

name: Amy
line: Trust me. With your right hand, locate the spot where the scapula meets the acromion process.

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Amy
line: Now push your third finger along the ridge of the shoulder blade, making a small rotation as you do so.

name: Sheldon
line: Rotating.

name: Amy
line: You should feel a small node-like object rolling back and forth along the bone.

name: Sheldon
line: You mean the myofascial point?

name: Amy
line: Obviously. Now bear down on it like the seventh grade noogies we all know too well.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear Lord, yes, yes, oh, yes! Amy, I've never been touched like this before! Oh! Oh, my hands are magic!

name: Amy
line: Don't flatter yourself. Your hands are blunt tools guided by my knowledge of the nervous system. I could just as easily have paralyzed you.

name: Sheldon
line: There's someone at my door.

name: Amy
line: That doesn't interest me. Goodbye.

name: Raj
line: Can I sleep here tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Raj
line: Leonard's having astronomically inaccurate Star Trek sex with my sister.

name: Sheldon
line: I can see how that would be upsetting. Come in. I'll get the sheets and blankets for the couch.

name: Raj
line: Oh, don't bother. I'll just sleep in Leonard's room.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I can't authorize that.

name: Raj
line: Well, he's in my bed. Why can't I be in his?

name: Sheldon
line: The Hammurabic Code is an eye for an eye, not a bed for a bed.

name: Raj
line: Come on, dude, I'm exhausted, and Tyra Banks says the most important item in your makeup bag is a good night's sleep.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. This is a form indemnifying me from your use of Leonard's bedroom. Sign here, indicating that I tried to stop you and did so using a stern facial expression.

name: Raj
line: Good night, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. Not yet. We still have to go over safety procedures. Now, the apartment has three emergency exits located here, here, and here. In the event of a power outage, luminous paint will guide you to the nearest exit.

name: Raj
line: You're kidding.

name: Sheldon
line: I never kid about safety.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing here?

name: Raj
line: I was sleeping.

name: Leonard
line: In my bed?

name: Raj
line: Well, I would've slept in my own bed, but it was being used to bring shame to my family. And the memory of Gene Roddenberry.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, you heard?

name: Raj
line: Scotty, I need more power.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry. Does Sheldon know you're sleeping in here?

name: Raj
line: Are you kidding? He made me sign a waiver, participate in an emergency fire drill and take a refresher course in CPR. Thank God he had a dummy.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. Mouth-to-Mouth Mona. You know, she used to date Howard?

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God, she's that Mona? Why can't you and my sister spend your nights here?

name: Leonard
line: We tried. She doesn't get along with Sheldon.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon doesn't get along with Sheldon. It's still no reason for me to have to listen to you arm your photon torpedoes every night.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, how about this. Until Priya gets her own place, you stay here and I'll stay at your apartment.

name: Raj
line: Can I bring girls here?

name: Leonard
line: You? Sure. Bring as many as you want.

name: Raj
line: Okay, deal.

name: Leonard
line: Just not against their will.

name: Leonard
line: Do you really think you should be eating that cake?

name: Howard
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: If you're gonna be a trophy husband for a rich wife, you might want to watch your waistline.

name: Raj
line: He's right. A minute on the lips, a lifetime on the hips.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, ha-ha. First of all, I'm not threatened by my fiancée's success. I'm proud of her. And secondly, I have my own career.

name: Leonard
line: Until you have kids.

name: Sheldon
line: Good news, Raj. I got the blood work back from the lab. You're okay to stay for a while.

name: Raj
line: When did you take my blood?

name: Sheldon
line: Not important. Your sugar was a little high. I'd follow up with your regular physician. In the meantime, I have some paperwork here for you to go over.

name: Raj
line: What the hell is this?

name: Sheldon
line: Boilerplate stuff. A modified roommate agreement for a temporary house guest. And a living will and durable power of attorney.

name: Raj
line: This says you can make end of life decisions for me.

name: Sheldon
line: As your friend, let's hope it doesn't come to that. Please sign.

name: Raj
line: Did you sign this?

name: Leonard
line: There's a reciprocity clause. You get to pull the plug on him, too.

name: Raj
line: Well, that seems fair.

name: Sheldon
line: Congratulations and welcome temporarily aboard. Here's your I.D. Card, your key and your lapel pin. Which Leonard was too cool to wear. FYI, part of your responsibilities as roommate pro tem will be to drive me to and from work, the comic book store, the barbershop and the park for one hour every other Sunday for fresh air.

name: Leonard
line: Bring a ball or a Frisbee, you know, something he can chase.

name: Sheldon
line: Also, you're tasked with bringing home all takeout dinners. Tonight is Thai food. You'll find the standard order in appendix B or downloadable from my FTP server. If you have any questions, here's the FAQ sheet, or if you prefer the human touch, I do a live web chat called Apartment Talk on Tuesday nights.

name: Leonard
line: No backsies.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, dinner!

name: Sheldon
line: What is this?

name: Raj
line: This is the difference between eating and dining.

name: Sheldon
line: Remarkable. I'm just realizing how much Leonard's been skating by all these years.

name: Raj
line: It's not a big thing. Just think of me as a brown Martha Stewart.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Sheldon, did you change your Wi-Fi password again?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, it's “Penny, get your own Wi-Fi.” No spaces.

name: Penny
line: Thanks. Wow! What's with the fancy spread?

name: Sheldon
line: My new roommate is bending over backwards to ingratiate himself to me.  Uh, nice touch, by the way.

name: Penny
line: What do you mean, new roommate? What happened to Leonard?

name: Sheldon
line: The same thing that happened to Homo Erectus. He was replaced by a superior species.

name: Raj
line: I'm the new Homo in town. That came out wrong.

name: Penny
line: All right, let me try this again. Where's Leonard?

name: Raj
line: He's living at my place, so I'm living here.

name: Sheldon
line: You're living here provisionally. But I must say it's looking good.

name: Penny
line: Woah, Leonard and Priya are living together? That's big.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Origami napkin swans, that's the headline.

name: Raj
line: It's a good thing.

name: Howard
line: So do you know what kind of research you'll be doing at this pharmaceutical company?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, there are a couple of opportunities available, but I volunteered for the premature ejaculation project. I mean, it's not like either one of us has heart disease. Oh, I almost forgot. I got you a little present.

name: Howard
line: Oh, Bernie, no. You didn't have to.

name: Bernadette
line: I wanted to. Come on, open it.

name: Howard
line: You bought me a Rolex? How much did this cost?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, you let me worry about the money. I just want my baby to have pretty things.

name: Raj
line: More wine?

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, no, no. I've had way too much already.

name: Sheldon
line: Here's an interesting fact about alcohol.

name: Penny
line: Hit me.

name: Sheldon
line: Man is not the only species that ferments fruit in order to become intoxicated. Can you guess what the other is? Hint, sometimes they pack the alcohol in their trunks.

name: Penny
line: Monkeys.

name: Sheldon
line: When does a monkey have a trunk?

name: Penny
line: When a suitcase just won't do.

name: Sheldon
line: Mmm, all right. It would appear as if alcohol is playing keep-away with your intelligence. Good night. Please note, it is now past ten p.m. Per our roommate agreement, kindly refrain from raucous laughter, clinking of glasses, and celebratory gunfire.

name: Penny
line: Okay, explain something to me. You watch Leonard put up with that guy for years and years. What has to break inside your brain for you to think, Oh, Krishna, I've got to get me some of that?

name: Raj
line: Well, it's a lot better than having to wear noise-cancelling headphones in my own apartment.

name: Penny
line: What? Oh, God, yeah. Yeah. Leonard's a noisy little dude in the sack.

name: Raj
line: Every night.

name: Penny
line: Really? Even during allergy season, when he has to alternate between kissing and breathing?

name: Raj
line: It's my sister. Can we not talk about this any more?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Sorry, sorry. Can I tell you a secret?

name: Raj
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: I screwed up. Leonard's a great guy. Never should have broken up with him.

name: Raj
line: Well, uh, to paraphrase Shakespeare, It's better to have loved and lost than to stay home every night and download increasingly shameful pornography.

name: Penny
line: Oh, you poor baby.

name: Raj
line: What's wrong with me, Penny?

name: Penny
line: Nothing, nothing. You know, if we weren't friends, and you hadn't brought up that creepy pornography story, I'd be on you like the speed of light squared on matter to make energy.

name: Raj
line: Hey, you totally got that right! E equals M C squared.

name: Penny
line: I listen. I have no idea what it means, but I listen. To friendship.

name: Raj
line: To friendship.

name: Sheldon
line: Would you booze hounds please stop that infernal clinking? And the answer was elephant!

name: Leonard
line: Mmm. Mmm.

name: Priya
line: Leonard, sweetheart, we're kissing, not eating hot soup.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry.

name: Priya
line: That's my parents on video chat. Go hide in the bedroom.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on! Why don't we just tell them that we're dating?

name: Priya
line: Oh, we've been through this. It's not the time.

name: Leonard
line: When is the time?

name: Priya
line: I've got five brothers and sisters. One of them is bound to screw up real big, and then I'll tell my parents about you. Now, shoo.

name: Leonard
line: Fine.

name: Priya
line: Hello, Mummy. Hello, Daddy.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: We heard there was a tornado in Kansas City. Is that close to you?

name: Priya
line: No.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Where is your brother?

name: Priya
line: Out with friends.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: I don't like it, a young girl alone in an apartment.

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: I'll sleep so much better when you move back here next month.

name: Leonard
line: You're moving back to India?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Who's that?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Oh, my God! There's someone in your apartment. Call the police in America!

name: Leonard
line: When were you going to tell me about this?

name: Priya
line: Oh, hello, Leonard. What a pleasant surprise! Mummy, Daddy, you remember Rajesh's friend Leonard.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: I thought you said Rajesh was out with his friends.

name: Priya
line: He has many friends.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Rajesh has many friends?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Why are you lying to us?

name: Leonard
line: She's lying because she doesn't want you to know we're dating.

name: Priya
line: Leonard!

name: Leonard
line: Well, what difference does it make? If you're moving back to India, we're obviously breaking up.

name: Priya
line: You know what? I don't want to deal with this right now.

name: Leonard
line: So. Hot in India?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Of course it is. It always is. It's India. Now, what do you have to say for yourself?

name: Leonard
line: Uh. That is a beautiful tapestry.

name: Penny
line: Oh, God. Oh, God! Oh. Okay, look. This never happened. Do you understand me?  Really? Still can't talk to me?

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing here?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I said, what are you doing here?

name: Leonard
line: I live here.

name: Sheldon
line: I have paperwork that says differently.

name: Leonard
line: Priya's going back to India.

name: Sheldon
line: Irrelevant. Rajesh and I have a good thing going and you're not going to ruin it.  What are you doing here?

name: Howard
line: I've been up all night. I had a fight with Bernadette.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: She gave me a beautiful watch.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, do you understand this?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Talk to him.

name: Penny
line: Damn.

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Penny
line: Oh. It's, it's not what it looks like.

name: Sheldon
line: What does it look like?

name: Sheldon
line: All right, I'm ready for my next question.

name: Amy
line: In a world where rhinoceroses are domesticated pets, who wins the Second World War?

name: Sheldon
line: Uganda.

name: Amy
line: Defend.

name: Sheldon
line: Kenya rises to power on the export of rhinoceroses. A Central African power block is formed, colonizing North Africa and Europe. When war breaks out, no one can afford the luxury of a rhino. Kenya withers, Uganda triumphs.

name: Amy
line: Correct. My turn.

name: Sheldon
line: In a world where a piano is a weapon, not a musical instrument, on what does Scott Joplin play The Maple Leaf Rag?

name: Amy
line: Tuned bayonets.

name: Sheldon
line: Defend.

name: Amy
line: Isn't it obvious?

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. My apologies.

name: Leonard
line: What the hell are you guys playing?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a game we invented. It's called Counterfactuals.

name: Amy
line: We postulate an alternate world that differs from ours in one key aspect and then pose questions to each other.

name: Sheldon
line: It's fun for ages eight to eighty. Join us.

name: Leonard
line: All right. I like a good brainteaser. Give it a whirl.

name: Sheldon
line: You're in luck, this is an easy one. In a world where mankind is ruled by a giant intelligent beaver, what food is no longer consumed?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, a BLT where the B stands for beaver? I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, be serious. We're playing a game here.

name: Leonard
line: I can figure this out, let's see. Um, well, beavers eat tree bark. The only tree bark I know that humans consume is cinnamon. So, I'll say cinnamon.

name: Sheldon
line: Incorrect. Obviously, the answer is cheese Danish.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Amy
line: In a world ruled by a giant beaver, mankind builds many dams to please the beaver overlord. The low-lying city of Copenhagen is flooded. Thousands die. Devastated, the Danes never invent their namesake pastry. How does one miss that?

name: Leonard
line: This is ridiculous. You're just making stuff up.

name: Amy
line: Is he always like this when he loses?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. You should've been here for the great Jenga tantrum of 2008.

name: Leonard
line: You bumped the table and you know it.

name: Amy
line: Perhaps it would be kinder to play a game more suited to his abilities. We'll close our eyes and count to ten while you hide.

name: Leonard
line: I'm going to my room.

name: Amy
line: Very good, Leonard. But next time, don't tell us where you're hiding.

name: Leonard
line: Did you guys see the paper in The American Physics Journal on supersolids? It's pretty interesting. This guy's working from a hypothesis where...

name: Raj
line: Spoiler alert! Spoiler alert.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Raj
line: Don't ruin it for me, man. I printed out a PDF to read on the potty.

name: Howard
line: On the potty? What are you, five?

name: Raj
line: It's a potty. What do you call it?

name: Howard
line: Toilet.

name: Raj
line: That's a little vulgar for the dinner table, don't you think?

name: Howard
line: Oh, and potty is okay?

name: Raj
line: Potty is innocent. Potty is adorable.

name: Howard
line: What do you do in the potty, wee-wee?

name: Raj
line: If I don't have to boom-boom.

name: Sheldon
line: Greetings. You all remember Amy Farrah Fowler.

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Howard
line: Nice to see you.

name: Amy
line: Hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Sorry we're late.

name: Amy
line: I must take responsibility. I had to stop for feminine hygiene supplies.

name: Howard
line: Ah, ah.

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe she's experiencing her menses.

name: Amy
line: Actually, I'm not. In order to avoid surprises, I wear them all the time.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, ah.

name: Howard
line: Okay. Toilet's sounding pretty good now, huh?

name: Penny
line: Hey, look, it's Shamy.

name: Amy
line: Shamy?

name: Sheldon
line: A juvenile amalgamation of our names. Sheldon and Amy,  Shamy.

name: Amy
line: Oh. I don't like that. Don't do that.

name: Penny
line: All righty. What's new?

name: Amy
line: Well, just recently, I learned that you refer to us as Shamy, and I don't like that.

name: Penny
line: I got it. But what I was going for was, you know, how's your life?

name: Amy
line: Like everybody else's. Subject to entropy, decay and eventual death. Thank you for asking. Why is she not taking our order?

name: Sheldon
line: I should've warned you, one has to navigate a labyrinth of social nonsense before one can be fed here.

name: Amy
line: Really? I assumed an establishment called the Cheesecake Factory would function more efficiently.

name: Sheldon
line: It's how they lure you in. I believe it's called bait and switch.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm just gonna walk away, 'cause I don't want to be here.

name: Leonard
line: So, this is nice. First time we've all gotten together to eat.

name: Amy
line: You're right, he's a festival of humdrum chitchat.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, that's all I got. Howard, you're up.

name: Howard
line: Um, tell us about your work, Amy.

name: Amy
line: I doubt you'd understand. Sheldon tells me you only have a master's degree.

name: Howard
line: Raj, do you have any questions for Amy?

name: Amy
line: I'm curious as to why we're not eating alone.

name: Sheldon
line: They can't function without me. I'm the social glue that holds this little group together. You're welcome.

name: Leonard
line: Listen, can I talk to you about your girlfriend?

name: Sheldon
line: She's not my girlfriend. She's a girl and she's my friend, but there's no touching or unsanitary exchange of saliva.

name: Leonard
line: Got it.

name: Sheldon
line: Although, for the record, on one occasion, she licked her thumb to remove raspberry jelly from the corner of my mouth. It's an action we both regret to this day.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh. Anyway, I'm not sure she's the best fit for our little, how should we call it, rebel alliance.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I never identified with the rebel alliance. Despite their tendency to build Death Stars, I've always been more of an empire man.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, not my point.

name: Sheldon
line: I know what your point is. You're intimidated by Amy's intellect. To that I say, buck up.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, let me just get right to it. Amy is judgmental, sanctimonious and frankly just obnoxious.

name: Sheldon
line: So?

name: Leonard
line: So we already have you for all that.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you suggesting I terminate my relationship with Amy?

name: Leonard
line: No, no, of course not. Just have your relationship someplace else.

name: Sheldon
line: May I point out that for eight long months, I suffered in silence as your female companion filled our apartment with her off-key country music caterwauling, the unappetizing spectacle of her grinding a pumice stone against her calloused feet in our living room, and night after night of uninformative TV documentaries about the Jersey Shore.

name: Leonard
line: Suffered in silence?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. And I'd thank you to do the same.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Silence?

name: Raj
line: Ah. Nothing makes beer taste better than cool clear Rocky Mountain spring water. Where are the Rocky Mountains, anyway?

name: Howard
line: Philadelphia.

name: Raj
line: Really? I thought they were out West someplace.

name: Howard
line: Think about it, Raj. Where did the movie Rocky take place?

name: Raj
line: Philadelphia. Okay, now I get it.

name: Penny
line: So this is the plan? From now on, we're just gonna hide out in here to avoid the Shamy?

name: Raj
line: I'm very comfortable here. Penny, dear, why don't you shoot another silver bullet my way?

name: Penny
line: Get one yourself.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, somebody's been taking bitchy pills.

name: Penny
line: God, he's an ass when he drinks.

name: Howard
line: Oh, he's an ass when he doesn't. You just don't hear it.

name: Leonard
line: I think we need to start entertaining the possibility that the Shamy could go on for years.

name: Raj
line: Well, if that's the case, Penny will have to get satellite TV and maybe once a week run a vacuum through this place.

name: Penny
line: I thought you were going to talk to Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: I did.

name: Penny
line: Well, what'd he say?

name: Leonard
line: Well, he pointed out that he kinda, sorta had to put up with you.

name: Penny
line: Kinda, sorta had to?

name: Leonard
line: I didn't agree with him.

name: Penny
line: Well, you defended me, right?

name: Leonard
line: I tried, but  he made a fairly well-reasoned argument.

name: Howard
line: You're not doing that right.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Howard
line: Gimme.

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Trust me.

name: Penny
line: No!

name: Howard
line: I do this for my mom all the time. See? With the grain.

name: Penny
line: Wow, that is better.

name: Howard
line: And someday, when you have varicose veins, I'll show you how to massage them.

name: Raj
line: Oh, God, never again.

name: Leonard
line: I assume by never again, you mean never again will you drink all of Penny's beer, then run down to the gas station for a couple of 40s, a box of Slim Jims and the latest issue of Bombay Badonkadonks.

name: Raj
line: I was homesick.

name: Howard
line: The highlight of the evening was when you showed us your Bollywood break dancing skills.

name: Raj
line: That's very offensive.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, we all thought so.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: John and Yoko.

name: Howard
line: More like Yoko and Yoko.

name: Sheldon
line: Greetings.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: I brought Amy here to show her some of the work I'm doing.

name: Amy
line: It's very impressive, for theoretical work.

name: Sheldon
line: Do I detect a hint of condescension?

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry, was I being too subtle? I meant compared to the real-world applications of neurobiology, theoretical physics is, what's the word I'm looking for? Hmm, cute.

name: Leonard and Howard together
line: Oooh!

name: Sheldon
line: Are you suggesting the work of a neurobiologist like Babinski could ever rise to the significance of a physicist like Clarke-Maxwell or Dirac?

name: Amy
line: I'm stating it outright. Babinski eats Dirac for breakfast and defecates Clarke-Maxwell.

name: Sheldon
line: You take that back.

name: Amy
line: Absolutely not. My colleagues and I are mapping the neurological substrates that subserve global information processing, which is required for all cognitive reasoning, including scientific inquiry, making my research ipso facto prior in the ordo cognoscendi. That means it's better than his research, and by extension, of course, yours.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, I'm-I'm still trying to work on the defecating Clark Maxwell, so...

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, but a grand unified theory, insofar as it explains everything, will ipso facto explain neurobiology.

name: Amy
line: Yes, but if I'm successful, I will be able to map and reproduce your thought processes in deriving a grand unified theory, and therefore, subsume your conclusions under my paradigm.

name: Sheldon
line: That's the rankest psychologism, and was conclusively revealed as hogwash by Gottlob Frege in the 1890s!

name: Amy
line: We appear to have reached an impasse.

name: Sheldon
line: I agree. I move our relationship terminate immediately.

name: Amy
line: Seconded.

name: Sheldon
line: There being no objections...

name: All
line: No, uh-uh.

name: Sheldon
line: The motion carries. Good day, Amy Farrah Fowler.

name: Amy
line: Good day, Sheldon Cooper.

name: Howard
line: Women, huh? Can't live with them, can't successfully refute their hypotheses.

name: Sheldon
line: Amen to that.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: I hear you broke up with Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: A breakup would imply she was my girlfriend. She was a girl who was my friend who is now a girl who is not my friend.

name: Penny
line: Wow. That's like the worst country song ever. So, how are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Regarding what?

name: Penny
line: Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't follow.

name: Penny
line: Well, breakups, or whatever the hell this is, can be tough.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, I assure you, I'm fine. My relationship with Amy was purely intellectual. There were no emotional bonds, the severing of which would cause me any discomfort. The relationship simply outlived its utility, and I'm continuing on with my life as before.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Good.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm off to buy a pussycat.

name: Leonard
line: I gotta tell you guys, I'm a little worried about Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: We're all a little worried about Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: No, I mean since the Shamy hit a reef.

name: Howard
line: Oh, I thought you were just making a generalization, you know, I'm worried about Sheldon someday setting off a low-yield nuclear device because the cafeteria ran out of lime Jell-O.

name: Raj
line: What does hit a reef mean?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, went splitsville.

name: Raj
line: Pardon?

name: Leonard
line: Turned to boom-boom.

name: Raj
line: Ah.

name: Leonard
line: I think Sheldon really misses Amy.

name: Howard
line: You should lend him your copy of Bombay Badonkadonks.

name: Leonard
line: He got a cat to keep him company.

name: Raj
line: You're kidding.

name: Leonard
line: He takes it everywhere, to bed, to the bathroom.

name: Raj
line: He takes the kitty to the potty?

name: Howard
line: I thought we discussed the P-word.

name: Raj
line: Don't try to change me, dude. I am what I am.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, gentlemen.

name: Howard
line: Hey. Aren't you going to introduce us to your little friend?

name: Sheldon
line: My apologies. Raj, Howard, I'd like you to meet Dr. Robert Oppenheimer.

name: Howard
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Hi.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, if you'll excuse me, the father of the atomic bomb wants a saucer of milk.

name: Howard
line: Okay, I get it. We're worried about Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.  Oh, no.

name: Sheldon
line: Robert Oppenheimer was lonely.

name: Leonard
line: So you decided to get the whole Manhattan Project?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. This is Enrico Fermi, Richard Feynman, Edward Teller, Otto Frisch, and Zazzles.

name: Leonard
line: Zazzles?

name: Sheldon
line: I was going to name him Herman von Helmholtz, but he's so zazzy.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we need to talk.

name: Sheldon
line: About what?

name: Leonard
line: Cats, Sheldon. You're clearly upset about Amy being gone, and you're trying to replace her with a bunch of cats.

name: Sheldon
line: Clowder.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: A group of cats is a clowder. Or a glaring.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, yeah, fine.

name: Sheldon
line: It's the kind of thing you ought to know now that we have one.

name: Leonard
line: Terrific. My-my point is you need to face up to what you're feeling with this breakup.

name: Sheldon
line: It wasn't a breakup. A breakup would imply that Amy was my girlfriend.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I got it, I got it, she's not your girlfriend. Now listen to me. I know about loneliness. I know about trying to replace someone with other stuff. When I broke up with Penny, I got back into my cello, I built a bunch of model rockets, I got those weightlifting gloves and that five-pound dumbbell.

name: Sheldon
line: You didn't break up, she dumped you.

name: Leonard
line: She didn't dump me. It was mutual!

name: Sheldon
line: I was there. She dumped you.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, fine. Live with cats. Be like my Aunt Nancy. She had dozens of them. And do you know what happened after she died? They ate her.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't have to sell me on cats, Leonard. I'm already a fan. All right, fellas, who's in the mood for Fancy Feast? Well, that's not fancy at all.

name: Leonard
line: Hi, Mrs. Cooper. Thanks for coming.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Where is he?

name: Leonard
line: He's in his bedroom.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Now, when you said on the phone he broke up with a girl, you meant an actual girl, not something you kids whipped up in a lab?

name: Leonard
line: No, she's real.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Did they sin?

name: Leonard
line: No, no, it's not like that. It's, uh, I don't know what it's like. But there is something I should prepare you for.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, relax, Leonard, I have raised that boy. I've seen him at his best, I've seen him at his worst. There's nothing he can do that'll surprise me.

name: Leonard
line: Hold on to that thought.

name: Sheldon
line: Come in.

name: Leonard
line: Surprise.

name: Sheldon
line: Mom, what an unexpected pleasure.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: My, my, that's a powerful smell.

name: Sheldon
line: I'd like you to meet Oppenheimer, Frisch, Panofsky, Feynman, Weisskopf...

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Yeah, I get it. You got a lot of cats and you gave 'em cute Jewish names.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing here?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Leonard called, and he said that you were pining for a young lady.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's preposterous. I'm not pining over anyone.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, lambchop, we can quibble what to call it, but I think we can both agree it's creepy.

name: Sheldon
line: I do not agree. Cats make wonderful companions. They don't argue or question my intellectual authority, and this little guy here, I think you'll find to be quite zazzy.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: You should have called sooner.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Shelly! Dinner's ready!

name: Sheldon
line: Coming!

name: Mrs Cooper
line: No cats!

name: Sheldon
line: Aw. What is she doing here?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: I called her.

name: Amy
line: Your mother thinks you might be losing your mind over me. As a neurobiologist, I was curious.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, rest assured, I am in full possession of my faculties.

name: Leonard
line: 25 cats!

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, God bless you, dear. Sheldon, sit down. Let's talk.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, but you're not fooling me. Whenever you say we have to talk, it means you want me to listen.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Then stop talking.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, ma'am.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Now, the reason I called Amy over was to find out what type of person she is. And after chatting a bit, I have to say that while she is a perfectly unique young woman, you two are definitely not suited for each other.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a peculiar conclusion. By any standard, Amy is more similar to me than anyone I've ever met.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, I'm sorry, Shelly, I can't see it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, whether you see it or not is irrelevant. I can't see subatomic particles, but nevertheless, they're there.

name: Amy
line: Excellent point.

name: Sheldon
line: A physics point.

name: Amy
line: Touche.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, putting aside the pig Latin, it's a good thing that you two decided to end the relationship so I didn't have to end it for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, after consideration, I believe we may have acted rashly. I propose we resume our relationship and attempt to resolve our differences.

name: Amy
line: I'll agree to that only if you'll stipulate that 80% of our difficulties were caused by you.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll go as high as 40.

name: Amy
line: Sixty-five.

name: Sheldon

name: Leonard
line: What the hell? How long has she been here?

name: Sheldon
line: Since we got home from the comic bookstore.

name: Leonard
line: That was two hours ago.

name: Sheldon
line: As per your suggestion, we're hanging out. Quite frankly, I don't see what all the hoopla's about. Go on, Amy.

name: Amy
line: From a neurobiological standpoint, Leonard, you may be alone because your psychological state is causing an actual pheromone-based stink of desperation.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you know that, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: I did.

name: Amy
line: I understand that some people find mates in social gathering places such as bars or taverns. Have you tried a bar or tavern?

name: Leonard
line: No, I'm not gonna try to pick up a woman in a bar.

name: Sheldon
line: Wise decision. You see, Amy, success at a bar is based on classic male attributes such as height, strength, attractiveness, the ability to hold one's liquor and throw darts, separately or together. Leonard has none of these attributes, right, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Amy
line: That's not true of all bars. Juice bars, for example.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! Good point, Amy. Yeah, building on your premise, Leonard could frequent sushi bars, salad bars, oyster bars, the Apple Genius Bar, what are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Keep going. I'm listening.

name: Amy
line: That was rude.

name: Sheldon
line: He does it all the time. He's a cornucopia of social awkwardness.

name: Amy
line: Cornucopia. What a mellifluous word.

name: Sheldon
line: Let's make that our word of the day.

name: Amy
line: Agreed. And we'll use mellifluous tomorrow.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I have to void my bladder. It was nice spending this time with you.

name: Amy
line: Wait. I have a request.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes?

name: Amy
line: I'd like you to meet my mother.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. Can I get back to you on that?

name: Amy
line: Certainly. Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Good night.  Leonard, Leonard, Leonard,

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, what?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy Farrah Fowler has asked me to meet her mother.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. So?

name: Sheldon
line: What does that mean?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you know how you're always saying that Amy is a girl who's your friend, and not your girlfriend?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh-huh.

name: Leonard
line: You can't say that anymore.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. What?

name: Leonard
line: Look, she obviously wants to take your relationship to the next level.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't want the next level. I like this level. Fix it for me!

name: Leonard
line: Me? Well, how am I supposed to fix it?

name: Sheldon
line: Simple! You want a girlfriend, Amy wants to be someone's girlfriend. Take her off my hands. I give you my blessing.

name: Leonard
line: That is insane.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. It would never work. Amy finds you tedious.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, good luck.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait! What am I supposed to do?

name: Leonard
line: Well, have you considered telling her how you feel?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I'm a physicist, not a hippie.

name: Leonard
line: All right, well, let me see if I can explain your situation using physics. What would you be if you were attached to another object by an inclined plane wrapped helically around an axis?

name: Sheldon
line: Screwed.

name: Leonard
line: There you go.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy's right. He is tedious.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, get the door!

name: Howard
line: Why can't you get it?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: You know I'm doing a bowel cleanse for my colonoscopy! I'm like an upside-down volcano here.

name: Howard
line: Oh, hey. I hope you didn't hear that.

name: Leonard
line: The volcano thing? No.

name: Howard
line: What's with the T-shirt? You working at the Apple store now?

name: Leonard
line: No, it's just something I threw on.

name: Howard
line: I know all your shirts. That's not one of them. You were pretending to work at the Genius Bar to pick up women, weren't you?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Turns out, they guard the iPods, but they don't guard the shirts.

name: Howard
line: So, how'd it go?

name: Leonard
line: It was going well. I was showing this super hot girl how to boot up in Safe Mode. The manager got suspicious, and, well, long story short, they really do have a little jail in the mall.

name: Howard
line: Just FYI, don't try to go back with a fake moustache. I mean, they may not really be geniuses, but they see right through that.

name: Leonard
line: I want to invoke the girlfriend pact, Howard.

name: Howard
line: You that desperate?

name: Leonard
line: No, I just, I want what you have. You know, I want a woman in my life.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Holy Moses, how much liquid can be in one tukus?

name: Leonard
line: To be clear, I meant like Bernadette, not your mother.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I know what you mean.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I'm off to meet Bernadette's friend. How do I look?

name: Sheldon
line: As if one of the plants from Invasion of the Body Snatchers duplicated you in every way, only with an absurd amount of hair gel.

name: Leonard
line: What are you working on?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm removing my digital footprint from the Internet so Amy Farrah Fowler can't find me and compel me to meet her mother.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, you're going off the grid.

name: Sheldon
line: Exactly.

name: Leonard
line: The old Unabomber approach. Kudos.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. I've also sent Amy a relationship termination notice and changed my cell phone number and e-mail address.

name: Leonard
line: What if she just comes over?

name: Sheldon
line: She'll get lost. We no longer live at 2311 Los Robles. We now live at 311 Los Robles.

name: Leonard
line: You changed the address on the building? What about mail?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no worries, I explained my predicament to our letter carrier. He was sympathetic. His exact words were, Got your back, Jack. Bitches be crazy.

name: Leonard
line: Who is it?

name: Amy
line: Amy Farrah Fowler.

name: Sheldon
line: Darn! She found me!

name: Leonard
line: She's been here before.

name: Sheldon
line: The only flaw in an otherwise perfect plan. Now, get my back, Jack.

name: Leonard
line: What do you want to do?

name: Sheldon
line: Tell her I'm not here.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, where are you?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. You'll have to devise a scenario that plausibly explains my absence, keeping in mind that the key to a good lie lies in the details.

name: Leonard
line: Hi, Amy. Sheldon's not here.

name: Amy
line: All right.

name: Sheldon
line: Way to go on the details.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks again for doing this, Bernadette.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I take pacts very seriously. One time at my lab, a petri dish of genetically modified super-virus went missing. That day we made a pinky swear never to admit we crossed Ebola with the common cold.

name: Howard
line: Why the hell would you cross Ebola with the common cold?

name: Bernadette
line: We never did. That would be a terrible, terrible thing.

name: Girl
line: Hi. Sorry I'm late, I was at the gym. Spin class. Worked up quite a sweat.

name: Bernadette
line: Joy, this is Leonard. Leonard, this is Joy.

name: Leonard
line: Hi.

name: Joy
line: Hi. You don't look like a genius. Go ahead, say something smart.

name: Leonard
line: Uh...

name: Joy
line: Aah! Time's up. Just kidding. First thing you need to know about me, I'm hilarious.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. So, Bernadette tells me she knows you from self-defence classes?

name: Joy
line: Yeah. Israeli Krav Maga. Lots of fun. Basically, a hundred different ways to rip a guy's nuts off.

name: Leonard
line: Wow. Wouldn't think there'd be that many.

name: Joy
line: Number 42!

name: Leonard
line: Whoa!

name: Bernadette
line: Isn't she a pip?

name: Sheldon
line: Proxima Centauri's the nearest star. The celestial bodies that follow are Alpha Centauri A, Toli, Barnard's Star, Wolf 359, Lalande 21185, Sirius A, Sirius B, BL-Ceti, UV-Ceti, Ross 154, Ross 248, Epsilon Eridani, Lac-9352, Ross 128, Procyon A, oh, darn, that's wrong!  EZ Aquarii A, EZ Aquarii B, EZ Aquarii C, Procyon A. Those are the stars that are nearest to me. Tra-la-la and fiddle-dee-dee.  Oh, dear. They really do be crazy.

name: Joy
line: This lobster's good on the way down and the way up.

name: Leonard
line: Should be, it's thirty dollars a pound.

name: Joy
line: Hey, this is a date, right?

name: Leonard
line: Yep, it is.

name: Leonard
line: Whoa!

name: Joy
line: Excuse me, I have to go to the little girls' room and take a wicked whiz.

name: Bernadette
line: I'll go with you.

name: Joy
line: Fair warning, I had the asparagus. My pee is gonna stink up the place.

name: Howard
line: I think she likes you.

name: Sheldon
line: EZ Aquarii B, EZ Aquarii C, excuse me, madam.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Rats!

name: Amy
line: I believe a misunderstanding may have occurred when I asked you to meet my mother.

name: Sheldon
line: No misunderstanding. I've learned what that request actually means, and I don't want to be joined to another object by an inclined plane wrapped helically around an axis.

name: Amy
line: In what way are you screwed? All I want to do is present you as my boyfriend to my mother so she'll be satisfied that I'm in a relationship.

name: Sheldon
line: So we'd be perpetrating a ruse?

name: Amy
line: Precisely.

name: Sheldon
line: And you haven't fallen hopelessly in love with me?

name: Amy
line: Don't be absurd. I find the notion of romantic love to be an unnecessary cultural construct that adds no value to human relationships.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy Farrah Fowler, that's the most pragmatic thing anyone has ever said to me.

name: Amy
line: I trust this clarification allows us to return to boy-slash-friend-slash-girl-slash-friend status.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. Would you like to join me for Chinese food?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, please, you're suffocating me.

name: Sheldon
line: My apologies. Good night, Amy.

name: Amy
line: Good night, Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: Come on, just give her a chance. Maybe she'll grow on you.

name: Leonard
line: Or maybe she'll finally succeed in ripping my nuts off. There are still 93 ways she hasn't tried yet. Look, Howard, I appreciate the effort, but this is, like, the worst date of my life.

name: Howard
line: Seriously? I was once robbed by a pre-op transsexual I met on J-Date, and that didn't even crack my top ten.

name: Leonard
line: I guess the difference is, I have some self-respect.

name: Howard
line: Not that I've ever seen.

name: Leonard
line: It's relatively new. I just know that I'm not gonna spend time with someone I don't like simply to have a girlfriend. I'm okay on my own.

name: Joy
line: Good news, I made lots of room for dessert.

name: Leonard
line: Look, uh, Joy, it was nice to meet you, but...

name: Joy
line: Yeah, you, too. Hey, you got anything for next weekend? I need a date for my cousin's wedding.

name: Leonard
line: You're asking me out?

name: Joy
line: Yeah. And it's an open bar, so I'll probably be giving it away.

name: Leonard
line: I look forward to it.

name: Mrs Fowler
line: It's nice to meet you, too, Sheldon. I honestly didn't believe Amy when she told me she had a boyfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: I assure you I am quite real and I'm having regular intercourse with your daughter.

name: Mrs Fowler
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. We're like wild animals in heat. It's a wonder neither of us has been hurt.

name: Mrs Fowler
line: Amy, what is he saying?

name: Amy
line: You wanted me to have a boyfriend, Mother. Well, here he is. Have to sign off now. My hunger for Sheldon is stirring in my loins.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes, it's time for me to make love to your daughter's vagina.

name: Mrs Fowler
line: Oh!

name: Amy
line: Thank you, Sheldon, that went very well.

name: Sheldon
line: Agreed. Amy, I find myself wondering if we should actually engage in coitus at least one time in our relationship. Bazinga. Bedtime. Please show yourself out.

name: Howard
line: Gagh!

name: Leonard
line: Problem?

name: Howard
line: This is the worst cobbler I've ever eaten. I mean it tastes like it was made of actual ground-up shoemaker.

name: Sheldon
line: Amusing. A play on the two meanings of cobbler.

name: Raj
line: Hey guys, guess who I found at LAX. My baby sister Priya.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. I object. You propose a guessing game, yet you don't give me enough time to guess. For the record, I was going to say your sister Priya.

name: Priya
line: Oh, Sheldon. You haven't changed a bit, have you?

name: Sheldon
line: Why would I change?

name: Leonard
line: The hope has been that you'd eventually bend to public opinion. So, Priya, what brings you back to LA?

name: Priya
line: I have a one day layover on my way to Toronto. Corporate merger.

name: Raj
line: Can you believe it? Little Priya's one of the lead attorneys for the biggest car company in India.

name: Sheldon
line: Given that when we met her she was finishing law school and planning an internship at a large Indian car company, it's actually extremely plausible.

name: Leonard
line: And your poll numbers just keep dropping.

name: Priya
line: I want to catch up with all of you, but first I really must visit the loo.

name: Leonard
line: I'm going too, I'll show you where it is.

name: Raj
line: Alright, this goes without saying, but I'm just going to say it anyway. Hands off my sister.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would I touch her, she's covered with airplane germs.

name: Raj
line: I'm so not talking to you. I'm talking to him.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I've got a girlfriend now.

name: Raj
line: Oh please. My sister's much hotter than your girlfriend and you know it.

name: Howard
line: Let's just agree they're both hot.

name: Raj
line: Dude, that's my sister you're talking about.

name: Howard
line: Okay, forget who's hotter. The first time Priya came to LA, Leonard and I made a pact out of respect to our friendship, and to you, that neither of us would hit on her.

name: Raj
line: Did you pinky swear?

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: Okay then.

name: Sheldon
line: Cobbler. I'm still laughing.

name: Priya
line: It's really nice to see you again Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. It's good to see you too. Here you go.

name: Priya
line: Thanks.

name: Leonard
line: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa.  Okay.

name: Howard
line: So, you got any special plans with your sister?

name: Raj
line: Oh, not really, just hang out.

name: Sheldon
line: I always tell people, if you have only one day in Los Angeles, make it a train day.

name: Raj
line: Train day?

name: Sheldon
line: The fun starts with brunch at Carney's in Studio City, a hot dog stand in a converted railroad dining car. Next stop, Travel Town, an outdoor museum featuring 43 railroad engines, cars and other rolling stock from the 1880s to the 1930s. Finally, we're off to the glitz and glamour of Hollywood for dinner at, that's right, the Hollywood Carney's, a hot dog stand in a different converted railroad dining car.

name: Raj
line: I don't think we're going to do that.

name: Sheldon
line: Well then apparently, you hate fun.

name: Leonard
line: Hmm, Priya's not back yet? Well, I guess that's not unusual, women, men, the whole sitting, standing deal, so, what are we talking about?

name: Raj
line: Uh, my plans with Priya.

name: Sheldon
line: He rejected train day.

name: Leonard
line: Did you make it clear that it's two different train cars turned into hot dog stands?

name: Sheldon
line: Abundantly.

name: Leonard
line: I guess he just hates fun.

name: Sheldon
line: That's what I said.

name: Priya
line: Okay, so, what's new with you guys.

name: Howard
line: I have a girlfriend now.

name: Priya
line: Hey, good for you.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I just wanna put it out there in case I inadvertently squirt any pheromones in your direction. Happy? .

name: Leonard
line: So, uh, Priya, what are your plans while you're here.

name: Priya
line: I don't know, I just have the one day.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you like trains?

name: Priya
line: Not particularly.

name: Sheldon
line: You might as well just wait at the airport for your flight.

name: Sheldon
line: You are in a forest. There is quicksand to the west, a path leads to the east. Go east. An iron gate blocks your way. Open gate. It's locked. Hmm, well, so much for that.

name: Leonard
line: It's getting pretty late, how come you're still up?

name: Sheldon
line: I've found an emulator online that lets you play classic text based computer games from the 1980s.

name: Leonard
line: That's pretty cool.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh yes. It runs on the world's most powerful graphics chip, imagination.

name: Leonard
line: You've really got to get out more.

name: Sheldon
line: Go north. You can't go that way. Go west. A troll blocks your passage. Okay, fasten your seatbelts, kill troll. With what? With sword.  You don't have the sword. Good golly, it's as if it's actually happening to me.

name: Priya
line: Raj finally went to bed.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, well,  Sheldon's still up.

name: Priya
line: You said he goes to bed at nine.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, he does but he got caught up in a computer game and...

name: Sheldon
line: Hit troll with axe. Hit troll with axe. Hit troll with axe. Oh my, this is one tough troll.

name: Priya
line: Can't you get rid of him?

name: Leonard
line: If the past is any indication, no.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I'm trapped in quicksand, the axe is dragging me down.

name: Leonard
line: Drop axe.

name: Sheldon
line: Drop axe. Brilliant.

name: Leonard
line: Give me a minute. Sheldon,

name: Sheldon
line: Hold on. I have to figure out how to get the bucket, so I can carry the mud past the dragon.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you need to work in the morning.

name: Sheldon
line: I know.

name: Leonard
line: Well then, bed mister.

name: Sheldon
line: Five more minutes.

name: Leonard
line: Really? You're going to risk getting sleepy in the middle of your thermodynamic fluctuations seminar? You know what happens when you yawn in public.

name: Sheldon
line: Everyone will see my oddly shaped uvula.

name: Leonard
line: You don't want that, do you?

name: Sheldon
line: No. But it's a shame our society mocks the differently uvulated. Who was at the door?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, building manager. They have to fix a pipe so the water will be off tomorrow from noon to two.

name: Sheldon
line: That's unacceptable. We're supposed to be given written notice.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, it doesn't matter, we'll be at work.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, what if I spill tomato soup on my shirt and have to come home to change, only to find there's no water for an enzyme soak.

name: Leonard
line: Bifurcated uvula, Sheldon!

name: Sheldon
line: I'll have the chicken noodle. Goodnight.

name: Leonard
line: We're going to have to be very quiet.

name: Sheldon
line: I know how to get the bucket! I can turn the axe around and use the handle to reach it. Let's see. Go north. You are in a forest. Go north. You are in a forest. Go north. You are in a forest. Oh dear, I believe I'm lost. Well, I'll just have to get a fresh start tomorrow.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, no, no. You just need, you just need, you just need to map it out. Come on, I'll help you. So, uh, you stopped at the stream and you turned north three times?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: You're right, you're lost, good luck.

name: Priya
line: Oh! Leonard, wake up.

name: Leonard
line: Huh! Sorry!

name: Priya
line: For what?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. When I'm in bed with a girl, it's just, it's my go to response.

name: Priya
line: It's six o' clock, I have to get back to Raj's before he wakes up and realises I'm gone.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, right, sure. I wish you could stay in LA a while longer.

name: Priya
line: Mmm. Me too.

name: Leonard
line: You know, I was thinking, there are some great research facilities in India.

name: Priya
line: Where are you going with this, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Well, I'm just saying, I don't have any real ties here, so if I were to move to New Delhi we could, you know, go out.

name: Priya
line: Leonard, didn't we have this conversation five years ago.

name: Leonard
line: Well, yes, but, things have changed, you know, you're older, I'm older. Look, no more superhero bedsheets.

name: Priya
line: Sweetheart, just because we have fun when I come to town doesn't mean I want to have a serious relationship.

name: Leonard
line: It doesn't?

name: Priya
line: Mm-mm. And besides, I could never bring a white boy home to my parents. They'd have a cow. Which is a much bigger deal in India.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not that white. My great-great grandmother was half Cherokee. I know that's not the right kind of Indian but it is something.

name: Priya
line: Aha, you're funny.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard.  Leonard.  Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I heard a woman laughing.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, yeah, I was trying to see if I could laugh as a woman.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Well, good job, quite convincing. I smell perfume.

name: Leonard
line: Air freshener.

name: Sheldon
line: And is that lipstick on your cheek and neck.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, rash, that's a bad rash.

name: Sheldon
line: My sympathies. I am no stranger to the crimson scourge that is dermatitis. Can I interest you in a topical steroid from my lotion and unguent collection?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah, yeah, that sounds great.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well, I'm sure I can find something that will help you ditch that itch.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, he's in the bathroom, let's go.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you prefer ointment or cream?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, cream.

name: Sheldon
line: With or without a numbing agent?

name: Leonard
line: Without.
