line: Really? Leonard, there are no heroes when it comes to dermatitis.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. With.

name: Sheldon
line: Prescription or non-prescription strength.

name: Leonard
line: Use your best judgement.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I think I have a nice 2009 AnaMantle HC. It's usually indicated for acutely inflamed haemorrhoids, but it also goes nicely with non mucosal body parts.

name: Leonard
line: Sounds great.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent choice.

name: Leonard
line: Right, right, alright.

name: Sheldon
line: Priya?

name: Priya
line: Good morning, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: For shame, Leonard. For shame. And to think I was ready to waste the last of my good haemorrhoid cream on you.

name: Leonard
line: Making pretty good time, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: Is that really what you want to talk about, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you want to talk about?

name: Leonard
line: Please don't tell anyone I spent the night with Raj's sister.

name: Sheldon
line: There it is. What if someone asks?

name: Leonard
line: No-one's going to ask if I spent the night with Raj's sister.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps. But they might ask me something else.

name: Leonard
line: Like what?

name: Sheldon
line: Like, has Leonard betrayed any of his friends recently?

name: Leonard
line: Priya and I are both adults. We didn't betray Raj.

name: Sheldon
line: In fact, you did, but I was referring to Howard.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: April 12th, 2005, Bob's Big Boy, Toluca Lake. Raj had just introduced us to Priya for the first time, and she was enjoying the sweet taste of Hindu rebellion in the form of a Bob's Super Big Boy hamburger. In order to preserve your friendship, you and Howard made a pinky swear that neither of you would attempt to woo her. I had a patty melt.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, fine, I betrayed Howard.

name: Sheldon
line: And Raj.

name: Leonard
line: Alright, and Raj.

name: Sheldon
line: And me.

name: Leonard
line: You?

name: Sheldon
line: Violation of the roommate agreement, overnight guest notification clause.

name: Leonard
line: Okay fine, I'm, I'm a horrible human being, I'm the Darth Vader of Pasadena.

name: Sheldon
line: You're far too short to be Darth Vader. At best you might be a turncoat Ewok.

name: Leonard
line: My point is, Priya's gone. And it would be much better if no-one else found out about this.

name: Sheldon
line: You mean, you want me to keep a secret.

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: You know I can't keep a secret.

name: Leonard
line: You can if you try. Think about it this way, if I were Batman and you were Alfred, you'd keep that secret. Right?

name: Sheldon
line: Why do you get to be Batman?

name: Leonard
line: Because, well, Batman has the secret.

name: Sheldon
line: Well Alfred has secrets too.

name: Leonard
line: Like what?

name: Sheldon
line: Alfred knows that Barbara Gordon is Batgirl. Which I've now just told to Batman. See, I can't keep a secret.

name: Sheldon
line: Ta-da!

name: Leonard
line: What.

name: Sheldon
line: Ta-da. It's short for da-da-da-da!

name: Leonard
line: Kind of busy here, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I know, that's why I shortened it.

name: Leonard
line: What do you want.

name: Sheldon
line: I came to go over your alibi for last night.

name: Leonard
line: What alibi?

name: Sheldon
line: You've asked me to lie on your behalf, and as you know, I am deeply uncomfortable with impromptu dishonest, so I've provided you with an iron clad alibi. You couldn't have spent last night with Priya, because you were with another woman.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I'm so sure I'm going to regret this, but, who was I with?

name: Sheldon
line: The fun loving, and morally loose, Miss Maggie McGeary.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, God.

name: Sheldon
line: You met her at Pasadena's most popular Irish watering hole, Lucky Baldwin's, where Maggie spends her nights tending bar, with a head full of curls and a heart full of dreams.

name: Leonard
line: Leonard, call me if you're interested in coitus. Sincerely, Maggie McGeary.

name: Sheldon
line: And if anyone were to actually call that number they will hear this.

name: Mechanical voice on Sheldon's phone
line: Top of the morning to you. You've reached Maggie McGeary. Leave a message after the wee little beep.

name: Sheldon
line: It's pretty convincing, huh? And it wasn't even a real person. And here is the clincher. A lock of Maggie's flaming auburn hair.

name: Leonard
line: Where did you get that?

name: Sheldon
line: From an orang-u-tan in the primate lab.

name: Leonard
line: An orang-u-tan?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, no-one's going to run a DNA test on it, Leonard, honestly you over-think everything.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I don't need an alibi. Nobody's going to ask about last night as long as you just zip your lip.  Thankyou. Now don't worry, everything is going to be fine. (Sheldon writes “I doubt it” on Leonard's whiteboard.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Leonard, will you please tell Howard my sister's never been attracted to him.

name: Leonard
line: C'mon Raj, how am I supposed to know who she's attracted to. Or was attracted to. Or who she might be attracted to. In the future.

name: Sheldon
line: And I have nothing to contribute to this conversation. Because I too know absolutely nothing about Priya's preferences in male companionship. And with that, I will re-zip my lip.

name: Raj
line: Hey, so what did you guys think of the new episode of Caprica last night?

name: Leonard
line: I didn't see it.

name: Howard
line: Didn't see it? What were you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I was out.

name: Raj
line: On Caprica night?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I, uh, went for a drink.

name: Howard
line: Really, you, and where, where did you go?

name: Leonard
line: To, uh, Lucky Baldwin's.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I've heard of that place, isn't that Pasadena's favourite Irish watering hole.

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you meet anyone interesting there, perhaps a promiscuous redheaded barmaid?

name: Leonard
line: As a matter of fact I.. I... I can't... I can't... I can't do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Sure you can, you're doing fine, it's very believable.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I'm sorry Raj, but the truth is I was with Priya last night.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't listen to him, he's still light headed from all the Irish whiskey and pickled eggs in his system.

name: Raj
line: What were you doing with Priya?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe they engaged in coitus but, more importantly, if Leonard had not abandoned his story, would you have found it plausible?

name: Raj
line: What? You slept with my sister?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: How could you? We had a pact!

name: Raj
line: Excuse me, I think how could you she's my sister takes precedence over a five year old pinky swear!

name: Sheldon
line: May I point out, in a parallel universe, your friends are saying Maggie McGeary, she sounds lovely.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I admit it, I may have crossed a line here, but come on, Raj, your sister is a grown woman. To her, I'm a forbidden piece of white chocolate.

name: Raj
line: I... I don't believe it, this is a terrible betrayal of my trust.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, would it help if I told you that I offered her my heart and she kind of stomped on it.

name: Raj
line: How hard did she stomp?

name: Leonard
line: Very hard.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I'm good.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, Raj, I just want to say that I'd never betray your trust. Unlike Leonard, I respect you.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: Mmm.

name: Leonard
line: Was it out of respect that you didn't tell Raj about the time you dropped his iPhone in a urinal?

name: Raj
line: Dude! I put that thing on my face!

name: Sheldon
line: I think a more amusing violation of Raj's trust is when Howard convinced him that foreigners give presents to Americans on Thanksgiving.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I didn't see you giving back your Snoopy snowcone maker.

name: Raj
line: That was all a lie? This year's gifts are already wrapped!

name: Howard
line: And as long as we're talking about betraying our friends, how about the month Sheldon spent grinding up insects and mixing them into Leonard's food.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, excuse me. That was not a betrayal, that was an experiment to determine at what concentration food starts tasting mothy.

name: Leonard
line: You put moths in my food?

name: Sheldon
line: For science.

name: Raj
line: I can't believe you kissed my sister with moth mouth.

name: Leonard
line: Well, uh, I can't believe you used Sheldon's toothbrush.

name: Sheldon
line: You used my toothbrush?

name: Raj
line: Not the brush part, just the little rubber thing to pick food from my teeth and massage my gums.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I, I, I think it's safe to say that we've all done some things we're not particularly proud of. But come on, we're friends. Friends overlook each other's minor lapses. For the record, Howard, I'm sorry that I broke our pact.

name: Howard
line: Thankyou, and I'm sorry about your phone. And Thanksgiving. And while we're at it, you don't have to wash our clothes on the fourth of July.

name: Raj
line: As long as we're apologising, Sheldon, I, I'm sorry I used your toothbrush.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm sorry. But that behaviour is beyond the pale and cannot be tolerated. We are no longer friends.

name: Raj
line: I got you a talking Thomas the Tank Engine for Thanksgiving.

name: Sheldon
line: With real puffing smoke?

name: Raj
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Alright. But I'm watching you.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you got Snoopy out. Can I have a snowcone?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, sure.

name: Leonard
line: These are pretty god, what flavour is this?

name: Sheldon
line: Guess.

name: Leonard
line: Papaya?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Guava?

name: Sheldon
line: You're so close.

name: Leonard
line: I give up.

name: Sheldon
line: Mango, caterpillar. What are you doing? You said you liked it!

name: Leonard
line: No, seriously, I think I've finally figured out my problem with women.

name: Sheldon
line: The capybara is the largest member of the rodent family.

name: Leonard
line: What does that have to do with me and women?

name: Sheldon
line: Nothing. It was a desperate attempt to introduce an alternate topic of conversation.

name: Leonard
line: My problem is, I don't project confidence. So I decided that the next time I meet a woman I think is attractive, rather than holding back and being cautious, I'm going to assume the mantle of self-assurance.

name: Raj
line: Oh, yeah? What's that look like?

name: Leonard
line: Hi. I'm Leonard. And you are beautiful. You pop, sparkle and buzz electric. I'm going to pick you up at eight, show you a night you will never forget.

name: Raj
line: Where are we going?

name: Howard
line: Good news. I made it onto the team for the new Defence Department laser-equipped surveillance satellite.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. If we're changing topics, I believe I have first dibs with capybara, a rodent the size of a baby hippo.

name: Leonard
line: Congratulations Howard.

name: Howard
line: Thanks. Listen, I have to get a security clearance, so you guys might be hearing from the FBI.

name: Raj
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa! I don't want to speak to the FBI.

name: Leonard
line: Why not?

name: Raj
line: I'm brown and I talk funny.

name: Howard
line: They're just doing a background check on me.

name: Raj
line: It doesn't matter. They'll find a reason to give me a one-way ticket back to Gandhi-ville. By the way, when I say that, it's not offensive.

name: Leonard
line: Don't be ridiculous, Raj. You're here legally.

name: Raj
line: Nobody cares. Do you know how long it's been since I got through airport security without being given a colonoscopy?

name: Sheldon
line: You know, I try very hard to make our lunch hours educational and informative, but your insistence on talking about your own lives stymies me at every turn.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, Sheldon, tell us about your giant rodents.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you squandered your time with me, and the moment has now passed. Feast on your disappointment, much as the capybara feasts on its own waste.

name: Raj
line: Oh, Bella, don't you see? Edward's only pushing you away because he loves you.  Coming.

name: Woman at Door
line: Dr. Koothrappali?  I'm Special Agent Page, FBI. May I come in?  I'd like to talk to you about Howard Wolowitz.  Oh, thank you. All right. Well, how long have you known Mr. Wolowitz?

name: Raj
line: Rum cake?

name: Page
line: No, thanks. Now, about Mr. Wolowitz.

name: Raj
line: Seven years.

name: Page
line: I see.

name: Raj
line: I'm in this country legally, you know.

name: Page
line: I'm sure you are. Now, to your knowledge, has Mr. Wolowitz ever committed a crime?

name: Raj
line: Of course not. I'm here on an H-1B visa, which means I can't be associated in any way with crime or criminal activity. And I'm not.

name: Page
line: Good. To your knowledge, does Mr. Wolowitz have any foreign contacts?

name: Raj
line: No, just me. Oh, there it is. Here comes a cavity search.

name: Page
line: Excuse me?

name: Raj
line: Please don't send me back to India, it's so crowded. It's like the whole country is one endless Comic-Con, except everybody's wearing the same costume, Indian Guy.

name: Page
line: Dr. Koothrappali, I'm not...

name: Raj
line: I love this country! The-the baseball, the freedom, the rampant morbid obesity! From California to the New York Island, I'm a real Yankee Doodle boy!

name: Page
line: Dr. Koothrappali, please.

name: Raj
line: My country 'tis of thee, duh duh duh liberty, It's really great.

name: Leonard
line: So, when Howard said the FBI would be contacting me, I was expecting Mulder. Glad to see I got Scully.

name: Page
line: Who?

name: Leonard
line: Mulder and Scully. X-Files. The truth is out there. Never mind. Uh, so, what would you like to know?

name: Page
line: You work with Mr. Wolowitz here at the university, correct?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. Of course, we're in different departments. He's an engineer and I'm an experimental physicist. You know, one of those guys who examines the building blocks of creation and says, Hello, maker of the universe, I see what you did there. Good one.

name: Page
line: Right. Now, how would you characterize your relationship with Mr. Wolowitz?

name: Leonard
line: Good. It's a good relationship. Of course, most of my relationships are good. Probably because I exude confidence. People are drawn to that, you know? Confidence, not exuding.

name: Page
line: Do you know of any groups Mr. Wolowitz is a member of?

name: Leonard
line: You are beautiful, you know that? You pop, sparkle and buzz electric. I'm going to pick you up at eight, show you a night you will never forget.

name: Page
line: Sounds great.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Page
line: Yeah. Can my six-foot-two Navy SEAL husband come with us?

name: Leonard
line: Is that, oh, my, I didn't see the ring with my glasses off, so, look at that, I'm starting to exude.

name: Leonard
line: Want to get that?

name: Sheldon
line: Not particularly.

name: Leonard
line: Could you get that?

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose I could if I were asked.

name: Leonard
line: Would you please get that?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. Why do you have to make things so complicated?

name: Page
line: Dr. Cooper?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Page
line: I'm Special Agent Page, FBI.

name: Sheldon
line: You say you're Special Agent Page, FBI.

name: Page
line: Here's my I.D.

name: Sheldon
line: And here is my Justice League membership card. But that doesn't prove I know Batman.

name: Page
line: I just want to ask you a few questions about Howard Wolowitz.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. All right. I doubt anyone would risk the stiff penalties for impersonating a federal officer just to ask questions about a minor league engineer with an unresolved Oedipal complex.

name: Page
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: For the record, I truly support the FBI in the mission which is expressed through their motto?

name: Page
line: Fidelity, bravery, integrity?

name: Sheldon
line: Correct. Now to business. 18 years ago, I sent the FBI Crime Lab samples from a bag of excrement that had been lit on fire on my front porch for fingerprinting and DNA analysis. Why haven't I heard back yet?

name: Page
line: Well, the FBI Crime Lab does have a lot on its plate.

name: Sheldon
line: That's of little comfort to a nation attempting to scrape burning feces off its shoes.

name: Page
line: Would you mind if we talked about Mr. Wolowitz now?

name: Sheldon
line: A little, but go on.

name: Page
line: Thank you. Would you characterize him as responsible?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm going to answer that with a visual aid. This is my nine-disc complete Lord of the Rings trilogy blu-ray set.  Mr. Wolowitz borrowed it, damaged plastic retention hub number three, and then returned it to me, hoping I wouldn't notice. Would you characterize that as responsible?

name: Page
line: That's really not the sort of thing we're interested in.

name: Sheldon
line: You heard me say blu-ray, right?

name: Page
line: I did.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. Would you be interested in knowing that Mr. Wolowitz once snuck onto my World of Warcraft account and changed the name of a certain level-80 warlock from Sheldor to Smeldor?

name: Page
line: I'm afraid not. Is there anything else?

name: Sheldon
line: Is there anything else? Where would you like to start? He refuses to pay fines when he's overdue with books I lend him. He crashed the Mars Rover while attempting to impress a woman. He recommended that I go see the third Matrix movie because it was, and I quote, just as good as the first one. If that's not irresponsible, I don't know what is.

name: Page
line: The Mars Rover?

name: Sheldon
line: Did I say Mars Rover?

name: Page
line: You did.

name: Sheldon
line: That was actually a poorly chosen example, as it had nothing to do with me.

name: Page
line: Yes, well, let's talk about it anyway.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't want to. Not that my disinclination to discuss the topic should be interpreted as evidence of Howard Wolowitz's culpability in the destruction of government property worth millions of dollars.

name: Page
line: Thank you, Dr. Cooper. I think I have all I need.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good. I was afraid you were going to fixate on that Mars Rover incident.

name: Howard
line: Hey, buddies. Guess who didn't get security clearance to work on the giant space laser?

name: Leonard
line: What happened?

name: Howard
line: Apparently, the background interviews didn't go well. You guys wouldn't know anything about that, would you?

name: Raj
line: Well, actually, I may have gotten a little tipsy when I talked to her.

name: Leonard
line: And I may have hit on her a little bit.

name: Raj
line: I may have thrown up rum cake on her shoes.

name: Howard
line: I see. Well, it's good to know, when I need you guys, I can always count on you to step up and ruin everything.

name: Leonard
line: I feel awful.

name: Raj
line: Ah, me, too.

name: Leonard
line: To tell you the truth, I thought if anyone was going to screw things up for Howard, it'd be Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, your expectations have been subverted. Aha.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing up?

name: Sheldon
line: Sleep eludes me, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Maybe sleep has met you before.

name: Sheldon
line: Mockery? That's all you have to offer?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry. Why can't you sleep?

name: Sheldon
line: Who knows? I haven't watched any scary movies recently. I'm no longer obsessing over why the predicted mass of the quantum vacuum has little effect on the expansion of the universe. And it's been weeks since I took that accidental sip of Red Bull.

name: Leonard
line: Did something happen today that's bothering you?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I did mention the Mars Rover incident to that FBI agent and probably cost Howard his security clearance.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: But why should that keep me up?

name: Leonard
line: Because you feel guilty?

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. So you're saying my insomnia is caused by a guilty conscience.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, you don't have insomnia. You're sleeping now.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me?

name: Leonard
line: You're having a guilt-ridden dream.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you have any evidence to support that hypothesis?

name: Leonard
line: How about that Gorn sitting on the couch?

name: Sheldon
line: That seems fairly conclusive.  No, Gorn, no. That's where I sit.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for agreeing to see me, Agent Page.

name: Page
line: Thank you for filing a complaint with my superior, Dr. Cooper. I understand you want to recant your statement about Howard Wolowitz.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Page
line: Was your statement untrue?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Page
line: Then I'm afraid you can't withdraw it.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. I don't recall you saying no backsies.

name: Page
line: Is there anything else?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I'd like to offer a laudatory statement about Howard's many excellent qualities that I believe will tip the scales back in his favour. Howard Joel Wolowitz. H is for honesty, of which he has much. O's for outstanding, which he is such. W's for witty, he's quick with a joke. A's for artistic, his ability...

name: Page
line: I'm sorry, Dr. Cooper, this matter is already closed.

name: Sheldon
line: But I still have rd Joel Wolowitz left to go.

name: Page
line: It's closed.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand why you people are picking on my friend, Howard, when there are much more serious security threats to pursue. For instance, when I first met Leonard, he was on the verge of giving away rocket secrets to a North Korean spy, and not one agent ever investigated that.

name: Page
line: This is Leonard Hofstadter?

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's a different Leonard. He's Chinese, red hair, six fingers. Good-bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Raj. Have you seen Howard?

name: Raj
line: I think he's eating lunch. Uh, Sheldon, I want you to meet Neil deGrasse Tyson from the Hayden Planetarium in New York.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm quite familiar with Dr. Tyson. He's responsible for the demotion of Pluto from planetary status. I liked Pluto. Ergo I do not like you.

name: Dr Tyson
line: But I actually didn't demote Pluto. That was a vote of the International Astronomical Union.

name: Sheldon
line: If ifs and buts were candy and nuts, we'd all have a merry Christmas. Think about that, Dr. Tyson.

name: Dr Tyson
line: Is that the guy you were telling me about?

name: Raj
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard. The person at fault for you not getting a security clearance is me.

name: Howard
line: You?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but before you get upset, I want you to know I went to the FBI and retracted my statement.

name: Howard
line: And they were okay with that?

name: Sheldon
line: No. If anything, I made it worse. In any case, I have been riddled with guilt, which is causing Gorn-infested REM sleep. So, I'm here now to say I'm sorry.

name: Howard
line: Are you kidding me? You've set my career back at least two years, and you think you can make it right with I'm sorry?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I followed the social protocol. I attempted to right the wrong, and when I failed to do so I delivered a heartfelt apology. Now you say apology accepted, and I will offer you a one-time-only high five.

name: Howard
line: Your apology is not accepted.

name: Sheldon
line: You're tricking me. It really is, isn't it?

name: Howard
line: Leave me alone, Sheldon.

name: Dr Tyson
line: Dr. Cooper, I just wanted you to know I'm sorry for the role I played in the Pluto matter.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, shut up.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: What are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: I have troubles, Penny. I've come to pour them out to the sympathetic ear of the local barkeep.

name: Penny
line: You know, they have a really nice bar over at the Olive Garden.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't like the Olive Garden. They treat me like family.

name: Penny
line: Okay, Sheldon. What can I get you?

name: Sheldon
line: Alcohol.

name: Penny
line: Could you be a little more specific?

name: Sheldon
line: Ethyl alcohol. 40 millilitres.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, honey, I don't know millilitres.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah. Blame President James “Jimmy” Carter. He started America on a path to the metric system but then just gave up. He wonders why he was a one-term president.

name: Penny
line: Would you say that's about 40 milliliters?

name: Sheldon
line: More or less.

name: Penny
line: Great.  Now, where were we?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe you were about to ask me to choose a cocktail. Fortunately, thanks to computer-savvy alcoholics, there's an app for that. Let's see. Harvey Wallbanger. Eh. Sex on the Beach. I hardly think so. Rob Roy, Silk Slipper, Mad Hatter. Ooh! I'll have a Rosewater Ricky.

name: Penny
line: A what?

name: Sheldon
line: You'll need pitted, brandied cherries, gin, rosewater, angostura bitters and overproofed rum. Now, first, dust the cherries with sugar, then spray them with a mixture of rum and bitters. Then ignite the rum, caramel...

name: Penny
line: Here you go, one Rosewater Ricky.

name: Sheldon
line: That's not how it looks in the picture.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, you know, every bartender makes it differently. Why don't you give it a try.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. To the metric system.  I can't taste the cherries.

name: Penny
line: All right. Sheldon, what's on your mind?

name: Sheldon
line: I wronged Howard, and he won't accept my apology.

name: Penny
line: Oh, right, that. Yes, Leonard told me. Sorry, honey.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, you face failure on a daily basis. How do you cope?

name: Penny
line: I drink.

name: Sheldon
line: To drinking.  Nope. Oh, if only there were some way to force Howard to accept my apology so I could escape this miasma of guilt.

name: Penny
line: You know, sometimes stuff just happens, and there's nothing you can do about it. For example, Lisa Peterson hasn't talked to me since the 11th grade, because no matter how much you apologize, you can't go back and un-dry-hump someone's boyfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. You're saying I'm facing Starfleet Academy's unwinnable command scenario, the Kobayashi Maru.

name: Penny
line: Exactly. Sometimes you can't win.

name: Sheldon
line: Captain Kirk won.

name: Penny
line: Kirk cheated.

name: Sheldon
line: Impressive that you know that. It's hard to believe I'm actually having this conversation with you.

name: Penny
line: Right there with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Kirk beat the Kobayashi Maru by reprogramming the simulator. That's it.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll reprogram Howard.

name: Penny
line: What? Sheldon, you can't reprogram people.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you can't reprogram people. To James Tiberius Kirk.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, all.

name: Raj
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, you're feeling better about me today, aren't you?

name: Howard
line: Not really.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, you are. I'm using neurolinguistic programming to modify your thought patterns.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Go away, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: There's a nine ninety five e-book down the drain.

name: Raj
line: What's in the bag?

name: Sheldon
line: It's for Howard.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Sheldon, you can't fix this with gifts.

name: Sheldon
line: Nevertheless, I've hurt you, and whether you forgive me or not, I want you to have this.

name: Howard
line: You're giving me a couch cushion?

name: Sheldon
line: No. The cushion is merely symbolic. I'm giving you my spot on the couch.

name: Howard
line: But you love that spot.

name: Sheldon
line: No. I love my mother. My feelings for my spot are much greater. It is the singular location in space around which revolves my entire universe. And now it's yours.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God, dude. Now you have to forgive him.

name: Howard
line: All right. Apology accepted.

name: Sheldon
line: High five. Not too hard. Thank you.

name: Raj
line: I haven't cried like this since Toy Story 3.

name: Howard
line: I got to tell you, Sheldon, I understand why you chose this spot. I mean, the temperature is good, but there's no draft. I can see the television, but I can still talk to...

name: Sheldon
line: I changed my mind. Get out of my spot.

name: Penny
line: How long?

name: Leonard
line: 94 seconds.

name: Penny
line: Okay, help me out here. How does an archaeology professor get that good with a whip?

name: Howard
line: Maybe he took a class at the adult bookstore. That's how I learned.

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe you've never seen Raiders of the Lost Ark.

name: Penny
line: And I can't believe you've never read Eat, Pray, Love.

name: Leonard
line: When she comes out with Eat, Pray, Run Away From A Giant Boulder, I'll read it.

name: Howard
line: I don't care if Eat, Pray, Love changed your life, I'm not reading it.

name: Penny
line: You know, I could totally rock a hat like that.

name: Sheldon
line: That's the work of noted Hollywood costume designer Deborah Nadoolman. She also designed the iconic red and black jacket in Michael Jackson's Thriller video, which I've never viewed in its entirety, as I find zombies dancing in choreographed synchronicity implausible. And also, it's really scary.

name: Leonard
line: Would someone please turn off the Sheldon commentary track?

name: Sheldon
line: There's no switch. Just listen and learn.

name: Howard
line: Penny, if you think this is good, you should come with us Friday to see it on the big screen at the Colonial.

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm watching it now. Why would I want to see it again on Friday?

name: Sheldon
line: Because the print they're showing on Friday has an additional 21 seconds of previously unseen footage.

name: Penny
line: What, 21 seconds? That'll be like seeing a whole new movie!

name: Leonard
line: Exactly. They say it finally solves the submarine controversy.

name: Sheldon
line: Did Leonard? I'm no expert, but I believe what we just heard from Penny was sarcasm.  Oh, good. I'm eight for 26 this month.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I think I'll pass. But you guys enjoy your extra 21 seconds.

name: Leonard
line: Bet if I could make you understand why this is such a cool thing, we'd still be together.

name: Penny
line: Mm, yeah, no, we wouldn't.

name: Howard
line: Uh-huh. I'm guessing 21 seconds had something to do with that, too.

name: Sheldon
line: May I point out to you all that the screening is first come, first served?

name: Leonard
line: Relax, it's five o'clock. The movie doesn't start till midnight.

name: Sheldon
line: Another way of saying that is the movie starts at midnight, and it's already five o'clock. Let's go.

name: Howard
line: You know, if we miss it, we'll have the fun of listening to Sheldon whine about it for the rest of our lives.

name: Sheldon
line: See? Howard's on my side.

name: Howard
line: Actually, I'm not. I'm using sarcasm to mock you.

name: Sheldon
line: Drat. Now I'm 8 for 27.

name: Leonard
line: Don't worry, Sheldon. We'll be fine.

name: Sheldon
line: But how were our seats?

name: Leonard
line: Excellent.

name: Sheldon
line: I rest my case. Amy, don't you agree we should leave now and get in line?

name: Amy
line: Actually, as the newest member of your social group, I believe I'll gain more acceptance by arbitrarily siding with your friends from time to time.

name: Sheldon
line: Shrewd.

name: Amy
line: Leonard, you're right. We should enjoy our meal, arrive late, and risk winding up with terrible seats, assuming we get in at all.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you, Amy.

name: Amy
line: See? It's working.

name: Bernadette
line: Knock-knock.

name: Howard
line: Who's there?

name: Bernadette
line: Olive.

name: Howard
line: Olive you, too.

name: Leonard
line: Guys, that's really starting to get old.

name: Howard
line: Knock-knock.

name: Leonard
line: Who's there?

name: Howard
line: I have a girlfriend and you don't.

name: Leonard
line: Hysterical!

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, now, we don't know that yet. He isn't finished. I have a girlfriend and you don't who?

name: Howard
line: So. Are you sure you don't want to come with us to Raiders?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, no. That movie has melting faces. It reminds me too much of the time I dropped that vial of flesh-eating bacteria into the Rhesus monkey lab. Besides, Penny and I are having a girls' night tonight.

name: Amy
line: Girls' night? What does that entail?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, you know, girls get together, hang out, share girl talk.

name: Amy
line: I'm a girl.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. Well, maybe you can join us. I'll ask Penny.

name: Amy
line: No need. Penny and I are very close.

name: Bernadette
line: You are?

name: Amy
line: Yes. In fact, our menses are synchronized. Penny. Bernadette tells me you're planning a girls' night.

name: Penny
line: Yeah?

name: Amy
line: I'm a girl.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Um, it was, it was just going to be me and Bernadette. Besides, I thought you were going to the movies with Sheldon and the guys.

name: Amy
line: Yes, but they're not girls. I'm a girl.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, no, no, I-I-I got that.

name: Amy
line: What's the dress code?

name: Penny
line: Uh, just wear something comfortable.

name: Amy
line: All right. I'll have to go shopping.

name: Sheldon
line: Knock-knock.

name: Leonard
line: Who‘s there?

name: Sheldon
line: Hugh.

name: Leonard
line: Hugh who?

name: Sheldon
line: Hugh people need to listen to me. It's time to get in line for the movie. And that's how you tell a knock-knock joke.

name: Sheldon
line: Under normal circumstances I'd say, I told you so. But as I have told you so with such vehemence and frequency already, the phrase has lost all meaning. Therefore, I will be replacing it with the phrase I informed you thusly.

name: Howard
line: Ooh. Can't wait for that to start.

name: Sheldon
line: I informed you thusly.

name: Raj
line: Eight for 28.

name: Sheldon
line: This is where we could have been if we hadn't stopped for dinner. This is where we could have been if Koothrappali hadn't ordered dessert.

name: Raj
line: Well I earned it, dude, I ate all my broccoli.

name: Sheldon
line: And here's where we are. The runts in a large litter, unlikely to ever reach the nourishing teats of Indiana Jones.

name: Leonard
line: So I guess it's a good thing we stopped for dinner.

name: Raj
line: You know, guys, when facing disappointment, Eat, Pray, Love teaches us-

name: Howard
line: Oh, shut up.

name: Amy
line: So anyway, to make a long story short, turns out I have an unusually firm cervix.

name: Penny
line: You know Amy, when we say girl talk, it doesn't just have to be about our lady parts.

name: Amy
line: Shame. ‘Cause I have a real zinger about my titled uterus.

name: Bernadette
line: Penny, your nails look great.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thanks. I found this place in Alhambra. It's in a woman's basement. I think it's a front

name: Amy
line: A colleague of mine did her graduate thesis on the fungus that grows on improperly sterilized manicure implements. Well don't tell me that's not girl talk.

name: Penny
line: So where should we go tonight? A bar? A club? A movie?

name: Bernadette
line: Or we could just stay here.

name: Amy
line: Yes, and continue to bond. I have a feeling that after tonight, one of you will become my best friend forever. Or BFF, if you prefer. Which I don't.

name: Penny
line: All right, time to open Bachelor Number Two.

name: Bernadette
line: Gee, I don't know if I should drink more. I have to drive home, and I've got enough trouble seeing over the dashboard as it is.

name: Penny
line: That's okay. Y ou can just sleep here.

name: Amy
line: Oh, good, a slumber party! We'll do makeovers, initiate phony phone calls, and have spirited pillow fights in our frilly nighties!

name: Penny
line: Oh, gosh, Amy. I don't know if I would call this an actual slumber party.

name: Amy
line: Well, that's disappointing. I've always wanted to be invited to a slumber party.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, you never were?

name: Penny
line: Not even when you were a kid?

name: Amy
line: Well, there was the time I had my tonsils out, and I shared a room with a little Vietnamese girl. She didn't make it through the night, but up till then, it was kind of fun.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Well, I guess we're having a slumber party. Oh!

name: Amy
line: Pillow fight!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I hope they let us in soon. I'm tired of running to the gas station to use the bathroom. The guy makes me buy a Gatorade every time. It's a vicious circle.

name: Howard
line: Too bad you don't have a stadium pal like me.

name: Leonard
line: What's a stadium pal?

name: Howard
line: Let me put it this way, takes care of the bathroom problem, and it keeps your calf warm.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys, bad news. I just did a quick calculation. Given the size of the theatre  and the length of this line, we might not get seats.

name: Sheldon
line: What did he say?

name: Leonard
line: Nice going, Raj, just got him down for his nap.

name: Sheldon
line: We might not get seats?

name: Leonard
line: It's fine, it's fine. Go back to sleep.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I informed you thusly. I so informed you thusly.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, you talk to him. Howard? You're peeing, aren't you?

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Hey, look who's here! Hey, buddies!

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if it isn't Wil Wheaton, the Jar Jar Binks of the Star Trek universe.

name: Wil
line: Mee-sa think that very funny.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you-sa can go think that at the back of the line. No cuts, no buts, no coconuts.

name: Theatre Staff
line: Wil Wheaton.

name: Wil
line: Yeah.

name: Theatre Staff
line: I'm a big fan.

name: Sheldon
line: Of what? Poorly executed beards?

name: Wil
line: Do you think you could get me and my friends into the movie? We got here a little late.

name: Theatre Staff
line: No problem. Come on, I'll hook you up.

name: Wil
line: Oh, awesome. We-sa gonna go into the movie now. Bye-bye.

name: Sheldon
line: This is Indiana Jones, not Star Trek. There should be no value to his pseudo-celebrity here. And even at Star Trek conventions, they only let him in if he helps set up.

name: Leonard
line: Calm down, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I will not calm down. This affront to justice and decency cannot go unanswered. As Captain Jean-Luc Picard once said, the line must be drawn here! This far, no farther!

name: Leonard
line: Had to wake him up from his nap, didn't you?

name: Bernadette
line: You know what I really love about Howard? His chest hair.

name: Penny
line: Howard has a hairy chest?

name: Bernadette
line: No, just the one. But it's really long.

name: Penny
line: Okay, there you go, Sultry Sunrise Red. What do you think?

name: Amy
line: My nails have never looked so pretty before. Get it off.

name: Raj
line: Oh, oh, uh, looks like they're getting ready to let people in.

name: Sheldon
line: Listen to what Mr. Wil Wheaton is tweeting. Best seats in house for Raiders screening. Suck on that, Sheldon Cooper.

name: Leonard
line: Why do you read his Twitter feed? You know it's only going to upset you.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe in knowing my enemy, Leonard. Had Twitter existed at the time, would not General Custer have followed the tweets of Sitting Bull? Would not Lee have followed Grant? Would not Spy have followed Spy? I have more examples, but excuse me.  Hello. Well, this seems like an odd time to test my cell phone quality, but go on. Test phrases? All right. Imatote. Ulbu. Twad. All together? I'm a total buttwad. Why are you laughing? Hello?

name: Penny
line: And that, girls, is how you make a phony phone call.

name: Amy
line: I'm not sure I grasp the full entertainment value, but all right. Next on Wikipedia's list of slumber party activities, Truth or Dare.

name: Penny
line: Okay, it's your game. You go first.

name: Amy
line: Hang on. I'm familiarizing myself with the rules. Seems fairly straightforward. Bernadette, truth or dare?

name: Bernadette
line: Truth.

name: Amy
line: All right. To what temperature must you heat beef in order to kill the prion that causes bovine spongiform encephalopathy?

name: Bernadette
line: Um.

name: Amy
line: Remember, you have to answer honestly.

name: Penny
line: Wait. No, Amy, you're supposed to ask her something personal or embarrassing.

name: Amy
line: Oh. All right. What is the circumference of your areolas?

name: Sheldon
line: Munching on complimentary popcorn. Woot, woot. Oh, the gall. I hope his next tweet is popcorn lodged in trachea, choking to death, woot, woot.

name: Theatre staff
line: Guys, I am sorry. We are full up.

name: Sheldon
line: No!

name: Theatre staff
line: We're full up.

name: Leonard
line: We really want to see this. Is there anything you can do?

name: Theatre staff
line: Sorry. Fire regulations. Should've gotten here earlier.

name: Sheldon
line: This is nothing but a blatant abuse of power by a petty functionary. Explain to me why Wil Wheaton and his lackeys get in and we don't.

name: Theatre staff
line: ‘Cause I'm the petty functionary with the clipboard, bitch.

name: Howard
line: I guess that's that. Let's go home.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what? I'm going back to I told you so. I told you so.

name: Raj
line: We can still see something. Uh, the new Sandra Bullock movie is playing two blocks away. You know Sandy B always brings it.

name: Sheldon
line: Look, a side door. Come on, Short Round.

name: Howard
line: I guess we'd better go after him.

name: Leonard
line: Short Round?

name: Raj
line: Indy's young sidekick from Temple of Doom.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I know who it is, but why is it me?

name: Raj
line: You're right. It should be a cuddly Asian boy. Like me.

name: Amy
line: And Absolon hath kist hir nether yea, and Nicholas is scalded in the towte. This tale is doon, and God save al the rowte.”

name: Penny
line: What the hell was that?

name: Amy
line: Bernadette dared me to tell a dirty story. The Miller's Tale by Chaucer is the dirtiest story I know. It would have been hidden in sock drawers if people in the 14th century had worn socks.

name: Bernadette
line: I thought it was pretty spicy. Especially the part where he kisses her nether yea.

name: Amy
line: You might not like it as much if you knew what nether yea meant. Hint, if one cares about hygiene, one ought not be kissing it.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, my turn. Penny, truth or dare?

name: Penny
line: Truth.

name: Bernadette
line: Why are you still hanging out with Leonard so much even though you broke up with him?

name: Amy
line: Oh, that's an excellent question. For two people who claim to be no longer pair-bonded, you spend an inordinate amount of time in each other's company.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Dare.

name: Amy
line: I don't believe the rules allow for an ex post facto option change.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, just because we're not seeing each other anymore doesn't mean we can't be friends. I mean, Leonard's a great guy.

name: Amy
line: Then, why did you terminate your relationship with him?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. He got really serious, and I wasn't ready for it.

name: Amy
line: Interesting. How will you react if, in the future, you become ready for it, and Leonard is unavailable, because another woman has realized that he is, to use your words, a great guy?

name: Penny
line: You can only ask one question.

name: Amy and Bernadette together
line: That one.

name: Penny
line: You know what, I don't want to play anymore.

name: Amy
line: Well, I'm not sure how this is scored, but I believe we may have won.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon? Sheldon?

name: Howard
line: Where did he go?  We're looking for Sheldon, not Marmaduke.

name: Sheldon
line: You whistled?

name: Leonard
line: What is that?

name: Sheldon
line: Raiders of the Lost Ark, with 21 additional seconds. If I can't see it, no one else can see it.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, this is crazy.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Crazy was leaving the projection booth unattended.

name: Leonard
line: Listen to me. You are over-tired. You're not thinking right. Put the movie back before we get into trouble.

name: Sheldon
line: Trouble is my middle name, Leonard. Actually, it's Lee, but I prefer Trouble.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Oh, look who they let in.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't worry, Wil Wheaton. I was just leaving.  Da-da-da-da, da-da-da!

name: Howard
line: Come on, Short Round.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Da-da-da-da, da-da-da!

name: Raj
line: Come on, guys! Hurry up! Hurry up!

name: Howard
line: Let's see you run with a bag of urine strapped to your leg.

name: Wil
line: He's got the movie! Get him!

name: Sheldon
line: Why is there never a pontoon plane when you need one?

name: Bernadette
line: She's been in there a long time.

name: Amy
line: Clearly, losing Truth or Dare upset her. Perhaps we should try to take her mind off it with another popular slumber party activity.

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh, like what?

name: Amy
line: Well, the Internet suggests that slumber party guests often engage in harmless experimentation with lesbianism.

name: Bernadette
line: Where exactly on the Internet have you been looking?

name: Amy
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, Amy. Look, I'm sorry I got so upset. I just,whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa,whoa! What are you doing?

name: Amy
line: Don't worry. I'll avoid the nether yea.

name: Bernadette
line: I might have gone with eating raw cookie dough.

name: Raj
line: You know who's got to be the bravest person in the Marvel Universe? Whoever has to give She-Hulk a bikini wax.

name: Howard
line: You want to talk brave, how about Captain America's undocumented Mexican gardener?

name: Leonard
line: He's not braver than whoever uses the bathroom after The Thing?

name: Sheldon
line: As usual, you're all wrong. The bravest person in the Marvel Universe is the doctor who gives Wolverine his prostate exam.

name: Howard
line: How about the guy who gets a prostate exam from Wolverine?

name: Sheldon
line: Now you just being silly. Wolverine's never displayed the slightest interest in helping others prevent prostate cancer.  Hello. Yes, the elevator's out of order you'll have to use the stairs. Of course you can. Pizza dates back to the 16th century, while the first elevator was not installed until 1852. That means that for over 300 years, people carried pizzas up stairs. Be part of that proud tradition.

name: Leonard
line: I'll go get Penny while that guy spits on our food.

name: Raj
line: Do you think they gave Wolverine an Adamantium prostate?

name: Howard
line: That's a stupid question.

name: Raj
line: We're having a conversation about probing the heinies of superheroes. There are no stupid questions.

name: Man
line: Yes?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, um, is Penny here?

name: Man
line: You're Leonard, right?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Man
line: Damn, it's good to finally meet you, son.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I think a bit of context here might help.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, Leonard. I see you met my dad.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, good. Context.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Come on in, buddy. Take a load off.

name: Penny
line: Oh, gee, dad, Leonard can't stay. He just dropped by to say hello. Thanks for stopping by, sweetie. I'll see you later.  Bye.

name: Leonard
line: That was odd.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure you have enough comics? You're going to be monitoring the telescope for 12 hours, and by my estimate, you've only selected seven hours of reading material. That's even factoring in your difficulty in parsing American comic book idioms like Bamf and Snikt.

name: Raj
line: Is that racist? It feels racist.

name: Howard
line: Don't be oversensitive. He's calling you illiterate, not your race.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay. Good. I don't need more comics. Howard's gonna stop by, we're gonna play intergalactic battleship and Indian Monopoly.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't care for novelty editions of Monopoly. I prefer the classics, regular and Klingon.

name: Howard
line: Actually, Indian Monopoly's just like regular, except the money's in Rupees, instead of hotels you build call centers, and when you pick a chance card, you might die of dysentery. Just FYI, that was racist.

name: Leonard
line: You'll never guess what just happened.

name: Sheldon
line: You went out in the hallway, stumbled into an interdimensional portal which brought you 5,000 years into the future, where you took advantage of the advanced technology to build a time machine, and now you're back to bring us all with you to the year 7010 where we are transported to work at the thinkatorium by telepathically controlled flying dolphins?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Aw.

name: Leonard
line: Penny kissed me.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, who would ever guess that?

name: Raj
line: What... what kind of a kiss?

name: Leonard
line: A big kiss. On the mouth.

name: Howard
line: Is it possible that she was going for your cheek and you moved and she accidentally got lip? That happens with me and my mom all the time.

name: Leonard
line: She introduced me to her father, kissed me and then shut the door in my face.

name: Howard
line: Maybe she was trying to send you a message.

name: Leonard
line: You think?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. This man is not my father. I'm being held hostage. So I'm going to do something insane in the hopes that you'll call 911.

name: Leonard
line: Penny kissing me is not insane. She used to kiss me all the time.

name: Sheldon
line: Einstein defined insanity as doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. By that standard, Penny is cuckoo for cocoa puffs.

name: Leonard
line: I'm just saying, it felt like it may have meant something.

name: Howard
line: Ah, this takes me back. Leonard obsessing about Penny. I mean, don't get me wrong, I love your new stuff, but once in a while it's nice to hear the hits.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, ooh! Do our babies will be smart and beautiful. That one always makes me laugh.

name: Leonard
line: Why do I bother talking to you people?

name: Sheldon
line: If it'll make you feel better, we rarely listen.

name: Penny
line: Hey, can I talk to you out here for a sec?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm starting to think we're never going to see that pizza.

name: Penny
line: So you're probably wondering what that was all about.

name: Leonard
line: What, uh, the kissing and everything? Nah, women do that to me all the time.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, okay. The thing is, I kind of told my father we got back together again.

name: Leonard
line: What? Why?

name: Penny
line: Well, you're the first guy he's ever really approved of, you know? You're a scientist who went to college and you don't have a neck tattoo or outstanding warrants or, or a baby.

name: Leonard
line: What kind of guys did you used to go out with?

name: Penny
line: Just guys. Anyway, when I told him we split up, he was heartbroken, and he kept bugging me, how's Leonard? why can't you get back together with Leonard? I bet Leonard never tipped a cow over on himself. So to get him off my back, I told him we worked things out.

name: Leonard
line: Really? How, how'd we manage that?

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Well, did you apologize? Did you have to woo me?

name: Penny
line: Get over yourself. I whistled, you came running.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, no, I don't think so.

name: Penny
line: Okay, why are you arguing about this?

name: Leonard
line: I'm just saying, if we fake got back together, that's totally not how it fake happened.

name: Penny
line: Oh, okay, whatever. Will you please just play along until my dad leaves?

name: Leonard
line: Hold on, you actually want me to deceive your father with some sort of sham play acting and kissing? Cause I'm good with that.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Penny, you out here?

name: Penny
line: Come on, honey, not in front of my dad.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Relax, I've seen you do a lot worse with a lot stupider.

name: Leonard
line: See? He doesn't mind.

name: Penny's Dad
line: So, Leonard, I'm taking your gal out for a steak dinner, you want to join us?

name: Penny
line: Oh, dad, that's nice, but Leonard has to work. Right, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I do, I have to work. But I'm gonna blow that off to spend the evening with my sweetie and her father, 'cause, you know, just the kind of boyfriend I am.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: Come here, you.

name: Raj
line: Miss.

name: Howard
line: How could that be a miss? C-6 was a hit, C-8 was a hit. Part of your starship has to be on C-7.

name: Raj
line: Not if it has a hole in the middle.

name: Howard
line: What kind of spaceship has a hole in the middle?

name: Raj
line: A Romulan battle bagel?

name: Bernadette
line: Knock-knock.

name: Howard
line: Oh, great, you made it. Come on in. I invited her.

name: Bernadette
line: So where's the telescope?

name: Howard
line: It's in Hawaii, but Raj controls it from here. He's hoping to see Epsilon Eridani dim, which would be evidence of a planet orbiting it.

name: Bernadette
line: So we just sit and stare at the screen, waiting for something to happen?

name: Howard
line: I did it with you when we rented The Notebook.  Yes, Gena Rowlands is a treasure. You'd better open up that bottle of wine or I'm gonna end up with swimmer's ear.

name: Raj
line: Excuse me. I can't be drinking, I'm about to make an important scientific discovery here.

name: Howard
line: What? Galileo did his best work while drinking wine.

name: Raj
line: How do you know that?

name: Howard
line: Well, he was Italian. It's a reasonable assumption.

name: Raj
line: Dude, can you even open your mouth without spewing a cultural stereotype?

name: Howard
line: Oh, I, I'm sorry, Galileo drank diet sprite. Look, you're my best friend, she's my girlfriend, you should bond. You know, like you and my mom did.

name: Raj
line: Your mom creeps the hell out of me.

name: Howard
line: Yes, but she's stopped calling you slumdog millionaire.

name: Raj
line: I do appreciate that.

name: Bernadette
line: Here we go.

name: Howard
line: Well I'd like to propose a toast. To science and friendship.

name: Bernadette
line: Hold on. Wait. No, it's okay, go ahead.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I was working with Penicillin-resistant gonorrhoea in the lab today and I was just trying to remember if I washed my hands.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks for the steak, Wyatt.

name: Penny's dad
line: My pleasure. It's nice to have dinner with a boyfriend of Penny's that knows how to use a napkin.

name: Penny
line: So not funny, dad.

name: Wyatt
line: Let me tell you about this one genius she was going out with, this, this fella Donnie.

name: Penny
line: Oh, will you please let it go?

name: Wyatt
line: Donnie was gonna make millions turning farm waste into biofuel and selling it to the government.

name: Leonard
line: A lot of people are doing that.

name: Penny
line: Oh, see?

name: Wyatt
line: Yeah, but all Donnie did was mix pig poop with a little water and pump it into his mom's Camry.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's great. It's a funny story. Moving on.

name: Wyatt
line: And Donnie was a rocket scientist compared to that boy who wanted to get beer pong into the Olympics. What was his name, sweetheart?

name: Penny
line: Curtis, and I'm pretty sure he was joking.

name: Wyatt
line: I don't know. That petition looked real to me.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, okay, I think this ends the ex-boyfriend portion of our evening.

name: Wyatt
line: Well, I'm just glad you finally found yourself a keeper.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks, Wyatt. I'm a keeper.

name: Wyatt

name: Penny
line: Oh, gee, dad, he'd love to, but Leonard has to work in the morning.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe I could go in a little late.

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, you can't. Your career is far too important.

name: Wyatt
line: Behind every great man is a nagging woman who won't let him have any fun, am I right, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Don't I know it.

name: Wyatt
line: Well, good night, son.

name: Leonard
line: Good night, Wyatt. Oh, good night, honey.

name: Penny
line: Good night.

name: Leonard
line: I love you.

name: Penny
line: Love you, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, friggety-frak. Not this again.

name: Howard
line: Three, four, five, pass go, get 2,000 Rupees, Six, seven, whoops. Can't go any further. There's a sacred cow in my way.

name: Raj
line: Bernadette, please tell your boyfriend to cool it with the cow jokes.

line: It won't help. Once he finds a joke he likes, he sticks with it.

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Like his haircut material.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, right. Did you get your hair cut?

name: Raj

name: Bernadette
line: Which is still so funny.

name: Raj
line: And when you go to a Chinese restaurant, he always gets the same fortune in his fortune cookie.

name: Bernadette
line: Right. Help, I'm a prisoner in a Chinese fortune cookie factory.

line: Okay, I think that's enough about me.

name: Raj
line: He's right. Let's make fun of his mother. Howard, come rub my feet! My corns are killing me!

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, help me out of the tub! I'm stuck again!

name: Leonard
line: Coming. Hey, lovebug.

name: Penny
line: Shut up. You know what I've been doing for the last hour?

name: Leonard
line: Mm, dreamily doodling Mrs. Leonard Hofstadter in a notebook?

name: Penny
line: Listening to my father go on and on about what a great guy you are.

name: Leonard
line: You got to admit, I am, I'm delightful.

name: Penny
line: Why are you making this so difficult?

name: Leonard
line: It's not difficult for me. I'm having fun.

name: Penny
line: Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: What do you want me to do? You started this. Do you want to go over and tell him we're broken up?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Well, then, what do you want?

name: Penny
line: I don't know.

name: Leonard
line: Don't you think that's something you should have figured out before you stomped over here?

name: Penny
line: Maybe.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, Penny, excellent. I'd like to say I'm very happy that you're back together, and if I can figure out a way to do so and sound sincere, I will. In the meantime, I'd like to go over some proposed changes to the roommate agreement specifically to address Penny's annoying personal habits.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God. What personal habits?

name: Leonard
line: I have a list. FYI, overuse of the phrase, oh, my god, is number 12.

name: Penny
line: Okay, Sheldon, you don't have to do this because Leonard and I are not...

name: Leonard
line: Ba-ba-ba-ba. Are you sure you want to include him in this?

name: Sheldon
line: Include me in what? Is there a plot afoot? I'll have no truck with plots.

name: Penny
line: No, you're right. No, there's, there's no plots, no trucks, no feet. So what other annoying habits shall we discuss?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, we don't discuss anything. Leonard is the signatory to the Roommate Agreement. As such, he bears responsibility for all your infractions and must pay all fines.

name: Leonard
line: Fines?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. If Penny's going to be spending nights here again, you'll need to set up an escrow account. Sign here.

name: Raj
line: Hello, Hawaii. This is Dr. Koothrappali in Pasadena. I'd like you to reposition the telescope, please. Scarlett Johansson's house! I'm kidding, Hawaii. Mahalo. Whoo!

name: Howard
line: It might have been a mistake to open that second bottle of wine.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, live and learn. So, Raj, do you think this planet you're looking for could have an atmosphere that supports life?

name: Raj
line: Maybe. If it did, I'd be famous. I'd be on the cover of magazines. And then, instead of living alone in my tiny apartment, I'd have a big mansion.

name: Bernadette
line: That sounds great.

name: Raj
line: It is. If you like wandering around a big, empty house with no one to love you.

name: Howard
line: We'd come visit you.

name: Raj
line: No, you wouldn't. You'd be intimidated by my wealth and fame. My only friends would be my genetically engineered monkey butler, and the little people I hired to be my living chess set.

name: Bernadette
line: He's taking a turn to the dark side, isn't he?

name: Howard
line: Hold on. He could come back.

name: Raj
line: Oh, what's the point of everything?

name: Howard
line: Nope. He's gone.

name: Raj
line: You know it's been more than a year since I've even kissed a girl?

name: Howard
line: What about that hook-up at Comic-Con you told me about?

name: Raj
line: Oh, grow up. I was lying. I lie all the time. Nobody wants to kiss me.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, you poor, poor thing. Raj, you have to know you're a wonderful man. There are a lot of girls out there who'll want to kiss you.

name: Bernadette
line: You just have to look.

name: Howard
line: No!

name: Bernadette
line: Well, this was fun.

name: Wyatt
line: Oh! I think I got a nibble.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, b-be careful. Give him some line. Okay, now reel him in.

name: Wyatt
line: Oh, look at that baby. They're really biting, huh?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. They do that when you set it on easy.

name: Wyatt
line: Oh, that's me. Hello. Oh, hi, sweetie. Yeah, I got up early and didn't want to wake you, so I went out for coffee and ran into Leonard on the way back. Guess what, we're fishing. Yeah. Right here on his couch.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, baby. I love you! Mwuh, mwuh, mwuh, mwuh, mwuh.

name: Wyatt
line: That's Leonard says he loves you. What? I see. The whole thing's bull squirt, huh? Well, that's very disappointing. Bye.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey. There's been something I've been meaning to tell you.

name: Wyatt
line: I can't believe you would lie to me like that.

name: Leonard
line: Just for the record, I did not want to be a part of this.

name: Wyatt
line: I'll get to you in a minute.

name: Leonard
line: No hurry.

name: Wyatt
line: That my own daughter thinks I don't love her enough to support her no matter what choices she makes, well, that hurts me deeply.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, daddy...

name: Wyatt
line: Let me finish.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Wyatt
line: I thought we were past the days when you would try to pull the wool over my eyes. Telling me the baggie in your underwear drawer is potpourri? And the pee stick in your bathroom is to check for diabetes?

name: Penny
line: You know, I'm sorry.

name: Wyatt
line: You're a grown woman, and I respect your right to make your own decisions, but all I ask is you respect me enough to be honest about them.

name: Penny
line: You're right. Look, from now on, I will tell you the truth.

name: Wyatt
line: Thank you. Now, why don't you go and put some clothes on and we'll grab a bite to eat before I head for the airport. Now you.

name: Penny
line: Daddy, he had nothing to do...

name: Wyatt
line: Keep walking.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Wyatt
line: Please, please, please don't give up on her.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Wyatt
line: I can't go back to the skateboard idiots, the white rappers and all those sweaty dumb-asses with their backwards hats.

name: Leonard
line: Gee, I don't know if it's in the cards, sir.

name: Wyatt
line: Then, stack the deck. Cheat. Lie. I don't care. I want grandkids before I die, and I want them to grow up in a house without wheels.

name: Leonard
line: I'll give it a shot.

name: Wyatt
line: Thank you. Now I'm going to do something here to help you along.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me?

name: Wyatt
line: Just don't panic. Now, get your sorry, lying ass out of my face and make sure I never see it again!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, the reverse psychology thing. I see. That's very clever.

name: Wyatt
line: Don't yap. Just get out.

name: Leonard
line: I'll friend you on Facebook.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, there you are. Just so you know, I was up all night, but I have finally completed the Penny-specific section of the new roommate agreement.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, well, not necessary. We broke up again.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you even think about other people, Leonard? Do you?

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, how'd it go last night?

name: Raj
line: Oh, you know. Same old, same old. Looked through a telescope, saw some stars. Big whoop.

name: Leonard
line: Really? You waited months for time with that telescope. What happened?

name: Raj
line: Why? You writing a book?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm going to propose a hypothesis. Last night, Raj accidentally made contact with an alien civilization and has been ordered by the United States government to keep it a secret.

name: Raj
line: Nothing happened. Can we please just change the subject?

name: Sheldon
line: That sounds rehearsed. We are not alone.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Raj
line: Hey.

line: You get to play with Raj's big telescope last night?

name: Howard
line: Whoa. Where did that come from?

line: He never touched my telescope.

name: Howard
line: Way to go shutting up.

name: Raj
line: I did shut up. Now you shut up.

name: Howard
line: Fine.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. How come you didn't call me this morning?

name: Sheldon
line: It's not what it looks like. It's not what it looks like.

name: Leonard
line: What are you grinding about?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny's brain teaser this morning. She and Koothrappali emerge from your bedroom. She is dishevelled, and Raj is dressed only in a sheet. The sole clue, it's not what it looks like.

name: Leonard
line: Just let it go, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: If I could, I would, but I can't, so I shan't. Now, knowing Penny, the obvious answer is, they engaged in coitus. But, since that's what it looked like, we can rule that out. Let's put on our thinking cap, shall we?  Raj is from India, a tropical country. Third World hygiene. Parasitic infections are common, such as pinworms. Mm-hmm. The procedure for diagnosing pinworms is to wait until the subject is asleep, and the worms crawl out of the rectum for air.  Yes, just like that. Penny could have been inspecting Raj's anal region for parasites. Oh, boy. That's a true blue friend.

name: Leonard
line: They slept together, Sherlock.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you weren't listening. She said, it's not what it looks like.

name: Leonard
line: She lied.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Well don't I look silly sitting here wearing this?

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey. Leonard, is it awkward for you knowing that one of your dear friends had sexual intercourse with a woman you used to love in the very place you lay your head?

name: Leonard
line: No, I'm fine with it.

name: Sheldon
line: That sounds like sarcasm, but I'm going to disregard it, because I have an agenda. Paintball. Specifically, the interdepartmental tournament this weekend. Now, in order to function better as a fighting unit, I thought we should establish a chain of command. Now, it goes without saying that I would outrank the three of you, but the question remains, by how much? Now, I don't see me as some four-star general, back at HQ riding a desk and playing golf with the Secretary of Defence. But I also can't be Sergeant Cooper, because that might lead you to think of me as just a regular Joe. This might take some thought. As you were.

name: Leonard
line: What the hell is wrong with you?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, how could you do that?

name: Raj

name: Howard

name: Raj

name: Raj
line: Why do you care so much? You're dating my sister, and Penny and I are in love.

name: Leonard and Howard together
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, if I may interject, I've decided my rank will be captain. If it's good enough for Kirk, Crunch and Kangaroo, it's good enough for me.

name: Howard

name: Raj
line: Yes, I am. The god Kamadeva has shot us with his flowery arrows of love.

name: Raj
line: He's the Hindu version of Cupid, but way better, because he rides a giant parrot.

name: Raj
line: Rubbish. He's talking rubbish.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Bernadette, please play my clarinet.

name: Penny
line: Coming. Yup, that's good. Wine glasses should have handles.

name: Amy
line: Keeping accurate track of your alcohol intake. Smart idea considering how trampy you get when you've had a few.

name: Penny
line: You heard what I did?

name: Amy
line: Well, I heard who you did.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, I screwed up everything. I hurt Leonard, I hurt Raj, I mean, what is wrong with me? I feel like two totally different people, Dr. Jekyll and Mrs. Whore.

line: Don't be so hard on yourself. Do you know the story of Catherine the Great?

name: Amy
line: She ruled Russia in the late seventeen hundreds, and one night, when she was feeling particularly randy, she used an intricate system of pulleys to have intimate relations with a horse.

name: Penny
line: I'm... I'm sorry. What does this have to do with me?

name: Amy
line: She engaged in interspecies hanky-panky, and people still call her great. I'm sure your reputation can survive you shagging a little Indian boy.

name: Bernadette
line: You jerk face! What did you tell Howard? Did you say there was something going on between us? Because he thinks there is. He's completely freaking out!

name: Raj

name: Raj

name: Bernadette
line: Of course you do. You're a cutie pie. Any girl would be lucky to have you.

name: Penny
line: You know, I've done this before. In kindergarten, I was supposed to marry Jason Sorensen at recess, but by the time my class got out there, he was already engaged to Chelsea Himmelfarb. So what did I do? Hung upside down from the monkey bars, let all the boys see my underpants.

name: Amy
line: You can't blame yourself. When your prefrontal cortex fails to make you happy, promiscuity rewards you with the needed flood of dopamine. We neurobiologists refer to this as the skank reflex.

name: Penny
line: You know what? Let's get out of here.

name: Penny

name: Amy

name: Penny
line: Yeah, sure. Yay!

line: Yeah, I'm gonna go pack a bag.

line: Oh, there you are. Leonard, I know you're upset about recent events, and I have someone here to help.

name: Leonard

name: Dr Hofstadter

name: Leonard
line: Well, uh, okay, um, I don't want to get back together with Penny. We tried it, it was crazy, it didn't work, but I can't deal with the fact that she slept with my friend Raj. And then I find out that Raj's sister Priya, who I've been going out with for eight months, is moving back to India. So I'm just completely confused and alone.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: I understand.

name: Leonard
line: Got any advice?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Yes. Buck up.

name: Leonard

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Sorry. Buck up, sissy pants.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks, Mother. I feel much better.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: If you need any more help from me, my books are available on Amazon. Logging off.

name: Amy
line: Ninety-nine, one hundred. It's like a waterfall of liquid gold. My turn.

name: Penny
line: You know, I don't even know what the point of me staying in L.A. is. I haven't gotten a single acting job since I moved out here. The closest I came was last month, I got a callback for a hemorrhoid commercial.

line: Give it a second to load. Whenever you're ready, AT&T! Okay, here we go. This is us here. To the south is Professor Loomis and the Geology Department. According to their Twitter feed, they're out of sunblock, which means they'll have to hug the tree line or risk melanoma. That's our edge. All we have to do is move quickly over this ridge, the rock-worshipping pasty-faced bastards won't know what hit them. All right, let's move out.

line: Hang on, Sheldon. How could you not tell me your sister was moving back to India?

line: Wait. I just want you all to know that I forgive you. This mutiny isn't your fault, it's mine. I haven't earned these bars. Although what I lack in leadership, apparently I more than make up for in sewing.
