line: Oh, sweetie. Haemorrhoids acting up again?

name: Penny
line: You don't know the half of it.

name: Actress
line: Oh, yes, I do. Try a dab of this.

name: Penny
line: Rose-scented Preparation-H for women?

name: Actress
line: Now, the H is for Her.

name: Leonard
line: I'm proud of you.

name: Penny
line: Shh! Here comes my joke.

name: Actress
line: How are you doing?

name: Penny
line: Sittin' pretty.

name: Howard
line: It's amazing people keep coming to comic book stores instead of just downloading comics digitally.

name: Leonard
line: It's probably for the best. For a lot of these guys, the weekly trip here is the only chance their mom has to go down to the basement and change their sheets.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that reminds me, I get fresh sheets tonight. Yay.

name: Sheldon
line: Well? What do you think of New Comic Book Night? Magic, huh?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I'm disappointed. As a brilliant man, you're entitled to a vice. I could understand frequenting an opium den or hunting your fellow man for sport. But this? Lame-o.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, A, comic books employ storytelling through sequential art, a medium that dates back 17,000 years to the cave paintings of Lascaux, and B, you play the harp. Like that's cool.

name: Stuart
line: Can I help you find anything?

name: Amy
line: A comic that depicts a woman whose bosom can't be used as a floatation device.

name: Stuart
line: Sorry. Most of the guys who come in here like big boobs. Couple of them have big boobs.

name: Raj
line: Hey, look, the new Warlords of Ka'a expansion pack is out.

name: Howard
line: A new one? Unbelievable. They just keep making up more cheesy monsters, slapping them on cards and selling them at 25 bucks a pop. It's like a secret tax on guys who can't get laid.

name: Raj
line: They're not even trying. Remember the Satanimals pack with the Hellephant? Why, absurd. What was he, a bad elephant who died and went to hell? What could an elephant possibly do that would cause him eternal damnation?

name: Howard
line: Wild West and Witches? What kind of loser cares about a showdown between Billy the Kid and the White Wizard of the North?

name: Raj
line: A total loser. Obviously a guy with a six-shooter beats an old man with a magic wand.

name: Leonard
line: Well, ho-hold on. What if the wizard casts a Helmet of Confusion spell on Billy the Kid's cowboy hat?

name: Howard
line: What? Please! This is Billy the Kid we're talking about. I mean, the wizard would get shot between the eyes before he could ever get out the words, what the hell is Billy the Kid doing in the mystic realm of Ka'a?

name: Stuart
line: Leonard, what's the deal with Sheldon's friend Amy? Are they a couple?

name: Leonard
line: Couple of weirdos. Why?

name: Howard
line: You interested in Amy?

name: Stuart
line: Well, I mean, she didn't look through me with soul-sucking, ball-shriveling hatred and contempt. I like that in a woman. Could you run it by Sheldon if I could ask her out?

name: Leonard
line: Sure. I guess.

name: Raj
line: Stuart, settle an argument for us. Who would win, Billy the Kid or the White Wizard?

name: Stuart
line: If I tell you that, I'm robbing you of the hours of fun you could have for the magical, rootin' tootin' low price of $24.95.

name: Raj
line: I'll take one.

name: Howard
line: Mmm, make it two.

name: Leonard
line: I hate all of you and myself. Three.

name: Stuart
line: I'll ring it up. Like shooting nerds in a barrel.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, can I talk to you about something? It's a little awkward.

name: Sheldon
line: I know what this is about. Given the professional standstill you're at, you're wondering if this is the appropriate time to abandon your research and focus on teaching. Yes. And if I may suggest, consider changing disciplines. Yeah, to the humanities, perhaps history. One of the advantages of teaching history is that you don't have to create things, you know, you just have to remember stuff that happened and then parrot it back. You could have fun with that.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that's not it. Stuart's kind of interested in Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course he is. She's very interesting. Did you know, when she was 14, she severed the webbing between her own toes?

name: Leonard
line: No. He wanted me to find out if you'd have a problem with him asking her out.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not sure how to respond, Leonard. I don't own Amy. Can't own a person. At least not since? 1863. President Lincoln freed the? Slaves! Come on Leonard, if you're going to teach history, these are the kind of facts you'll have to know.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? Never mind. I'm going to tell him it's okay to ask her out.

name: Sheldon
line: The question is moot. There is no way that Stuart, an impoverished peddler of picture books, would be at all appealing to Amy Farrah Fowler, a noted neurobiologist capable of performing surgery on her own feet with nothing but nitrous oxide from cans of whipped cream as anesthesia.

name: Leonard
line: All right, but just for the record, I checked in with you to see how you'd feel about it.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. The record shall so reflect. Now, getting back to the problem at hand, what to do with a washed-up experimental physicist.

name: Leonard
line: I am not washed-up.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Leonard. Lots of people love you and want to help you, but they can't until you admit the problem.

name: Penny
line: Well, ladies, we killed the bottle.

name: Amy
line: I had half a glass.

name: Bernadette
line: I didn't have any.

name: Penny
line: Okay, don't judge me. So, what do you want to do, go to the movies, go dancing, lay down for a little bit?

name: Amy
line: Or we play Travel Twister.

name: Bernadette
line: Amy, really? Twister?

name: Amy
line: Excuse me. I've passed many an enjoyable evening playing this game. And I'm sure it's a lot more exciting when you play with other people. What do you say, bestie? We can do shirts and skins. I'm shirts. Called it.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm too small for Twister. And roller coasters. And sitting with my feet on the floor. Hope you enjoyed the prenatal cigarettes, Mom.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you know, my mom smoked pot when she was pregnant with me, and I turned out just fine. Hey, look, I have peach schnapps. Thank God.

name: Amy
line: Guys, something happened.

name: Penny
line: What's wrong?

name: Amy
line: I think a boy likes me.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi. It's Stuart. We met at the comic book store. I was wondering if you'd like to get coffee sometime. It's okay if you say no. It might be the kick in the pants I need to start taking Zoloft.

name: Penny
line: Amy, little vixen. Just working it under all those layers of wool and polyester.

name: Bernadette
line: What are you going to do? Doesn't he know you have a boyfriend?

name: Penny
line: Oh, she doesn't have a boyfriend, she has a Sheldon. So do you like Stuart?

name: Amy
line: I don't know. He's nice. He's funny. He has the sallow, drawn countenance associated with an overactive thyroid gland. That's kind of hot.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, sweetie, we all love Sheldon, but you've been with him over a year now. If it's not going anywhere, what does it hurt to look around?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, yeah, I guess they're not engaged like me and Howie.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, for what it's worth, engaged people can look around, too. Lot of options out there.

name: Sheldon
line: Where's Stuart?

name: Speccy Guy Behind Counter
line: Out.

name: Sheldon
line: Who are you?

name: Speccy Guy
line: I'm Dale. He left me in charge.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Dale
line: Yeah. I don't get it, either.

name: Leonard
line: I want to return this Wild West and Witches Ka'a expansion pack.

name: Dale
line: Sorry. I don't do returns. They're hard.

name: Leonard
line: Sure, sure. Uh, when will Stuart be back?

name: Dale
line: I don't know. He went out for coffee. With a girl.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I guess I was wrong.

name: Leonard
line: You okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Am I okay? Leonard, I'm on a lifelong trajectory that includes a Nobel Prize and cities named after me, all four wisdom teeth fit comfortably in my mouth without need of extraction, and my bowel movements run like a German train schedule. Am I okay?

name: Dale
line: I'm okay, too!

name: Raj
line: Wild Bill Witchcock.

name: Leonard
line: A tribe of Abra-Comanches.

name: Sheldon
line: Flaming Spittoon. And for the record, I'm very disappointed in you cowpokes. We're playing our inaugural round of Wild West and Witches, and I'm the only one who bothered to dress for the occasion.  Patooie.

name: Howard
line: We're not wearing cowboy hats, Sheldon. It looks ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: And I suppose my boots and spurs are ridiculous, too?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Very.

name: Raj
line: Incredibly so.

name: Sheldon
line: Did it look ridiculous when we got the Satanimals pack and I dressed up as a Beelzebobcat?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Very.

name: Raj
line: Incredibly so.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, fine. Let's just play.

name: Leonard
line: We should go easy on him. Amy's out with Stuart tonight.

name: Howard
line: Wait a minute. Are you telling me that Sheldon's patented blend of condescension and no sex isn't enough to hold on to a woman?

name: Sheldon
line: Cluck, cluck, cluck. What are we, ladies at a quilting bee? Or are we men playing a fantasy card game set in a magical frontier town?

name: Howard
line: Sorry. Creepy Tepee.

name: Raj
line: Annie Ogly.

name: Leonard
line: Hocus Pocus Pocahontas.

name: Sheldon
line: And may I point out it is the three of you who are obsessed with Stuart and Amy, not me. I think you need to ask yourselves who's really being ridiculous here.

name: Leonard
line: It's you.

name: Howard
line: You are.

name: Raj
line: Totally you.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys, check it out. The deluxe limited edition Wild West and Witches expansion pack in the signed and numbered collector's tin.

name: Leonard
line: Oh come on, no! We just bought the regular pack.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, a sheriff's badge.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, it's also a wand.

name: Leonard
line: With a hologram? Nice. Hey, do you see this?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm in the matrix, Leonard, I see everything.

name: Leonard
line: You've got to be kidding me. You friended Stuart on Facebook?

name: Howard
line: I thought you didn't like Facebook anymore.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't be silly. I'm a fan of anything that tries to replace actual human contact.

name: Raj
line: Please. You're looking at Facebook to find out how their date went.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? You think I care if a man, what, shared a pumpkin latte with a dynamite lady?

name: Raj
line: You're so full of it.

name: Sheldon
line: You are free to believe whatever you like. And unfriend Rajesh Koothrappali.

name: Raj
line: You unfriended me? Seriously?

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah. Now he's gonna miss all those great updates like, I can't believe I waited this long to make my own potpourri.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, why don't you just acknowledge that you have feelings for Amy and you don't want her going out with other men?

name: Sheldon
line: And unfriend Leonard Hofstadter.

name: Howard
line: Here's a radical thought. Go old-school, challenge Stuart to a fight. I mean, nothing makes the ladies hotter than two skinny white guys swatting at each other with their eyes closed.

name: Sheldon
line: And unfriend Howard Wolowitz.

name: Leonard
line: That's all of us. Can I use the laptop?

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: I have to buy that stupid collector's tin.

name: Penny
line: Who do we love?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Who do we love?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Who do we love?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Hello, Sheldon. Come on in.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: I came to ask if you would like to go on a date with me.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, what?

name: Sheldon
line: A date. You and me. Dining, dancing, perhaps you'd like to take in a prizefight.

name: Penny
line: God, are you trying to make Amy jealous?

name: Sheldon
line: No. Why is everyone so obsessed with Amy and Stuart? And whether or not they may be having more pumpkin lattes or intercourse tonight.

name: Penny
line: Okay, listen to me. Playing games is not gonna help get Amy back.

name: Sheldon
line: I am not trying to get her back. But, out of curiosity, what is a way?

name: Penny
line: All right, honey, let me tell you a story. There was a guy I liked, and I never told him how I felt. Eventually, he started going out with someone else, and I always regretted it. Do you see where I'm going with this?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe I do.

name: Penny
line: Mm.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm the guy.

name: Penny
line: You're not the guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure? That would explain so much. Your constant presence in my apartment, that baffling dalliance with Leonard just to be near me, the way you call me sweetie all the time.

name: Penny
line: I call everyone sweetie.

name: Sheldon
line: You tramp.

name: Penny
line: Look, Sheldon, all I'm saying is strap on a pair and go talk to Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Strap on a pair? Of what, skates?

name: Penny
line: Oh, sweetie, you are so not the guy.

name: Stuart
line: If you're bored, you can go. I understand.

name: Amy
line: No, I'm having a nice time.

name: Stuart
line: Don't patronize me.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Excuse me. Pardon me. Pardon me. Excuse me. Hi, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Hi, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Pardon me. Excuse me.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, what are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: The thought of you sitting in a darkened theatre with a character like Stuart is repellent. No offence, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: None taken. Although repellent is kind of a, kind of a strong word.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry this causes you discomfort, but based on the currently established parameters of our relationship, I can put myself in any repellent situation I want.

name: Stuart
line: Um, again...

name: Sheldon
line: Stuart, please. You're being rude.

name: Amy
line: Anything else?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe I would like to alter the paradigm of our relationship.

name: Amy
line: I'm listening.

name: Sheldon
line: With the understanding that nothing changes whatsoever, physical or otherwise, I would not object to us no longer characterizing you as not my girlfriend.

name: Amy
line: Interesting. Now try it without the quadruple negative.

name: Sheldon
line: You're being impossible.

name: Amy
line: Hi, Stuart.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Amy, will you be my girlfriend?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that's enough of that. Sorry to interrupt. You two enjoy your date. Here's a dollar for your troubles. Get yourself some Sour Patch Kids.

name: Stuart
line: So, other than you taking your relationship to the next level with another guy, this was nice.

name: Amy
line: Yes, well, thanks for seeing me to my door.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, you're welcome.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy.  Amy.  Amy. Let's wrap things up out there.

name: Amy
line: Um, good night, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Take the hint, Stuart. The lady said good night.

name: Amy
line: How did you get into my apartment?

name: Sheldon
line: Wow. Is that the kind of nagging I can expect now that you're my girlfriend? Good thing I drew this up.

name: Amy
line: What's that?

name: Sheldon
line: I present to you the relationship agreement. A binding covenant that, in its 31 pages, enumerates, iterates and codifies the rights and responsibilities of Sheldon Lee Cooper, here and after known as the boyfriend, and Amy Farrah Fowler, here and after known as the girlfriend.

name: Amy
line: It's so romantic.

name: Sheldon
line: Mutual indemnification always is. Why don't you start perusing while I set up my notary stamp.

name: Sheldon
line: Feel free to retain a lawyer.

name: Amy
line: Penny, I said right hand red.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I heard you. I got red.

name: Amy
line: Bernadette, left foot yellow.

name: Bernadette
line: We should play limbo next. No one beats me at limbo.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.  Amy.  Bernadette.

name: Amy
line: That's my boyfriend. It's open!

name: Sheldon
line: I got a splinter.

name: Amy
line: What do you want me to do about it?

name: Sheldon
line: Relationship agreement Section 4, Boo-boos and Ouchies. You have to take care of it.

name: Amy
line: I should've gotten a lawyer.

name: Bernadette
line: Looks like it's just us playing.  Penny?  Penny, we're out of wine!

name: Penny
line: You should probably drive.

name: Penny
line: Hi. Did Sheldon change the Wi-Fi password again?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, it's “Penny already eats our food, she can pay for Wi-Fi.” No spaces.

name: Penny
line: Okay. If you can't get me to stop eating your food, what makes you think you can get me to stop using your Wi-Fi?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe that you're capable of great change. Like when I finally got you to stop saying Valentimes Day.

name: Leonard
line: You want to hear something weird?

name: Penny
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: In the year 2000, Pope John Paul II was named an honorary Harlem Globetrotter.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: You asked Penny if she wanted to hear something weird.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, because I have something weird to tell her.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I thought it was a game.

name: Penny
line: What's yours?

name: Leonard
line: There's this guy, Jimmy Speckerman, who used to torment me in high school. He sent me a message through Facebook. He's in town and wants to have drinks.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, Penny, if it were a game, here are your choices. An e-mail from an old acquaintance, or the head of one of the largest religious institutions in the world slam dunking to Sweet Georgia Brown. Pick.

name: Leonard
line: Just do it, 'cause he's not gonna let it go.

name: Penny
line: Basketball Pope.

name: Sheldon
line: And that's how it's done.

name: Penny
line: What are you gonna do about your bully? Are you gonna see him?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: Is this the fellow who peed in your Hawaiian Punch?

name: Leonard
line: No, that was a different guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Was he the one who wedgied you so hard, your testicle reascended, and you spent your whole Christmas break waiting for it to come back down?

name: Leonard
line: No, that was a different, different guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Was he the one who used your head to open a nut?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, oh, oh. Was he the one who made you eat your arm hair?

name: Leonard
line: No, but, actually, that was this guy's sister.

name: Penny
line: All right, well, what do you think he wants?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, the holidays are just around the corner. Maybe he wants to see if he can lodge the other testicle up there.

name: Leonard
line: I told you. That was a different guy.

name: Penny
line: Hmm. That's too bad. We could have spent New Year's Eve waiting for the ball to drop.

name: Leonard
line: It's two a.m. What are you doing up?

name: Sheldon
line: Nobel Prize acceptance ceremony streaming live from Stockholm.

name: Leonard
line: Sure. You want to see what all the scientists are wearing this year.

name: Sheldon
line: Look at these men. They've managed to win the top science prize in the world with no more understanding of the quantum underpinnings of the expansion of the early universe than God gave a goose. You should pay attention, Leonard. Someday this could be you up there.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks.

name: Sheldon
line: So, what's got you up? Did you have a bad clam?

name: Leonard
line: I didn't have clams.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't watch you 24 hours a day. I don't know what you do.

name: Leonard
line: It's this Jimmy Speckerman thing. I can't decide if I should agree to see him or not. Of course that might be because the last time I ran into him, he made me floss with my own shoelaces.

name: Sheldon
line: Wear loafers. Look at Dr. Saul Perlmutter up there, clutching that Nobel Prize. What's the matter, Saul? You afraid someone's going to steal it? Like you stole Einstein's cosmological constant?

name: Leonard
line: You know what? I am tired of living in fear of this guy. I'm gonna go see him and finally say all the things I should have said in high school. You know, pick on someone your own size, you did not have sex with my mother, and yes, I do know why I'm hitting myself.”

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, now Perlmutter's shaking the King's hand. Yeah, check for your watch, Gustaf. He might have lifted it.

name: Bernadette
line: I love this dress. How come I never see you wear it?

name: Penny
line: ‘Cause when I wear it, it's a shirt. So, what's Howard doing tonight?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, they all went with Leonard to confront his childhood bully.

name: Penny
line: Oh, terrific. High school quarterback against four mathletes.

name: Amy
line: When Leonard gets back, I'd love to check his serotonin levels. Do you think he'd let me draw a syringe full of his blood?

name: Penny
line: Hmm, he's not crazy about needles, but if you get him to go jogging, it'll just pour out of his nose.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't think I can meet the girl who was always mean to me. Tammy Bodnick. One time while I was in gym class, she stole all my clothes and left an elf costume in my locker.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's awful.

name: Bernadette
line: Worst part was, it was too big.

name: Amy
line: That's nothing. In ninth grade, the girls put Rogaine in my hand lotion. Within six months, the nicknames began to fly. I think the one that hurt the most was Gorilla Fingers Fowler.

name: Penny
line: Wow. You poor thing.

name: Bernadette
line: What about you?

name: Penny
line: Oh. I don't know. I guess my school was a nice place. We didn't really have bullies.

name: Amy
line: Come on, no one ever gave anyone mean nicknames or picked on them or put gum in their hairy knuckles so the school nurse had to use peanut butter to get it out?

name: Penny
line: No, we weren't really like that. I mean, look, we played pranks on each other, but it was never mean. Like, okay, this one girl, Kathy Geiger, got really good grades, so we blindfolded her, tied her up and left her in a cornfield overnight.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, my God, that's awful.

name: Penny
line: No, it was funny. Everyone laughed.

name: Amy
line: Did Kathy Geiger laugh?

name: Penny
line: Uh, probably. It's hard to say. She kind of had an ear of corn in her mouth.

name: Amy
line: Who would have thought Fuzzy Fingers Fowler is best friends with a bully?

name: Penny
line: What? I was not a bully.

name: Bernadette
line: Kind of sounds like you were. And maybe a felon.

name: Amy
line: Shh. That's how you wind up in a cornfield.

name: Raj
line: Is that him over there?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Raj
line: How about that guy? He looks like he'd hate you.

name: Leonard
line: You know, I can really do this by myself.

name: Howard
line: Hey, we're here to support you, buddy.

name: Leonard
line: No, you're not. You're here to see if I get my underwear pulled over my head.

name: Howard
line: You wore underwear? You fool.

name: Raj
line: So, have you figured out what you're going to say to him?

name: Leonard
line: You bet. I am going to make him apologize for all the crap he pulled on me in school.

name: Howard
line: That's quite a list. I can't read your handwriting, what's that word?

name: Leonard
line: Scrotum.

name: Raj
line: What's that one?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, stapled.

name: Jimmy
line: Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hi.

name: Jimmy
line: Holy crap, man, it's good to see you.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. You, too. Uh, Jimmy, this is Sheldon and Raj and Howard.

name: Jimmy
line: Hi. Fellas. Hey, can I get a beer? Wow. Look at you. Little Leonard Hofstadter. I hear you're a big-time scientist now.

name: Sheldon
line: And there's the first zinger. Ouch.

name: Leonard
line: I'm doing okay, I guess.

name: Jimmy
line: Okay? Come on, I read online you're a physicist at a university, you won some medal.

name: Leonard
line: The Newcomb medal.

name: Jimmy
line: Yeah, congratulations.

name: Sheldon
line: Congratulations? The Newcomb medal? Oh, please. That's the scientific equivalent of a smiley face sticker on your homework.

name: Jimmy
line: From what I read, it sounded like a big deal.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good Lord, are we going to stand here and listen to him tear Leonard apart like this?

name: Raj
line: Hey, I won a Newcomb medal, too.

name: Sheldon
line: My point.

name: Jimmy
line: You should have seen this guy back in the day. Huh? He was so little, he could fit in just about anywhere. Lockers, trash cans. Oh, man, how did you get inside that backpack?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I can't take all the credit. You helped a lot.

name: Jimmy
line: Yeah. We were practically a comedy team.

name: Howard
line: Like the Black Death and Europe.

name: Leonard
line: Jimmy, I'm kind of curious why you wanted to see me.

name: Jimmy
line: Okay, here it is. I have this great money-making idea. I just need a gear head to get it to the finish line.

name: Sheldon
line: Technically, Howard's the gear head. Leonard's just a dime store laser jockey.

name: Leonard
line: What's the idea?

name: Jimmy
line: This is just between us, right?

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Jimmy
line: Okay. What do you think about a pair of glasses that makes any movie you want into 3D?

name: Raj
line: That sounds amazing. First movie I'm watching, Annie.

name: Howard
line: How exactly would these glasses work?

name: Jimmy
line: How the hell should I know? That's why I need a nerd.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think something like that's even possible.

name: Jimmy
line: Aw, come on, you can figure it out. You're like the smartest guy I've ever known.

name: Sheldon
line: The smartest? All right, you know, I may not have a firm grasp on sarcasm, but even I know that was a doozy. Leonard, you can't live in fear of this man forever.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I got this.

name: Sheldon
line: You clearly don't. What my spineless friend lacks the courage to say is you're a terrible person who took advantage of his tiny size, his uncoordinated nature and his congenital lack of masculinity.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I platonically love you, man, but face it, you're a mess.

name: Jimmy
line: I don't understand.

name: Leonard
line: I think what he's trying to say is that maybe in high school you picked on me a little bit.

name: Sheldon
line: A little bit? The man Super Glued Hershey's Kisses to your nipples.

name: Raj
line: That's funny because those aren't the kind of kisses you want on your nipples.

name: Jimmy
line: What is that?

name: Sheldon
line: This is a list of your heinous acts against Leonard. One of which is certainly the cause of him wetting his bed well into his teens.

name: Leonard
line: 14 is not, oh , yeah, never mind.

name: Jimmy
line: What's this word?

name: Leonard
line: Nancy. You called me Nancy for three years.

name: Sheldon
line: You really need to work on your penmanship.

name: Jimmy
line: Oh, man, I, I don't know what to say. I always thought we were just having some fun.

name: Leonard
line: It wasn't fun for me.

name: Sheldon
line: You're being too kind, Leonard. You ruined him.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, guys.

name: Raj
line: That was pretty badass, dude.

name: Sheldon
line: I help the weak. It's yet another way I'm exactly like Batman.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, for the record, Jimmy wasn't the reason I wet the bed. That one has my mother written all over it.

name: Penny
line: Anyway, I'm really sorry I made fun of your stutter in high school.

name: Bernadette
line: You're doing great.

name: Penny
line: Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Oh, God, just finish the sentence. Okay, well, I'm sorry you feel that way. Bye. No one wants to hear my apologies.

name: Amy
line: I think your mistake is doing it over the phone. If they could look into your eyes, they'd melt.

name: Bernadette
line: Penny, it doesn't matter what you did in the past. You're a good person now.

name: Penny
line: That's easy for you to say. You weren't just called a b-b-b-b-bitch.

name: Amy
line: Perhaps you could assuage your guilt through altruism. Which word's tripping you up? Assuage or altruism?

name: Penny
line: Both.

name: Bernadette
line: You'll feel better by doing something nice for someone.

name: Penny
line: I actually knew that.

name: Amy
line: I never doubted you.

name: Bernadette
line: Every other week I serve at a soup kitchen downtown.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, I can't do that. If I stand over a steaming pot, my hair just goes boing! What else could I do?

name: Amy
line: There's Habitat for Humanity, building houses for the poor.

name: Penny
line: Okay, come on, I don't even have my own house, I'm going to build one for someone else?

name: Amy
line: How about donating some of your clothes?

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, that's perfect. ‘Cause I have so many clothes I don't wear, and they're just taking up space, and I go shopping to buy more stuff and I have no place to put it. This will totally fix that.

name: Bernadette
line: What about helping people?

name: Penny
line: And helping people.

name: Leonard
line: Here's your cocoa.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, half and half instead of whole milk?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Heated to precisely 183 degrees?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Seven little marshmallows, no more no less?

name: Leonard
line: You got one for good luck.  I'll get it.

name: Sheldon
line: One for good luck. Must be the kind of math they do at Princeton.

name: Jimmy
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing here?

name: Jimmy
line: I want to apologize for stapling your balls and throwing you naked in the girls' locker room, stuffing that parrot down your pants. What's this word?

name: Leonard
line: Laxative.

name: Jimmy
line: Oh, right. Junior prom. That was not cool, man. I am so, so sorry.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Jimmy
line: Yeah. I just hope you can forgive me.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah. Sure, I guess.

name: Jimmy
line: You're a beautiful guy.

name: Leonard
line: Well, yeah, thanks, Jimmy.

name: Jimmy
line: Okay, I got to go.

name: Leonard
line: Are you okay to drive?

name: Jimmy
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah. I drive better drunk. You know, it makes you pay attention.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, come on in. I'll make you a cup of coffee.

name: Jimmy
line: I wouldn't be imposing?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, we can't let him drive.

name: Sheldon
line: Then take away his keys and make him wander the streets with the other drunks.

name: Leonard
line: You remember Sheldon and Raj and Howard.

name: Jimmy
line: Not really, no. It's funny, huh, Leonard? Back in school, I was the winner and you were the loser. And now we're reversed. You're the winner.

name: Sheldon
line: You'd think a winner could make a decent cup of cocoa.

name: Jimmy
line: You mind if I use your bathroom?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, just back there.

name: Howard
line: How about that? After all these years, your big bad high school bully finally apologizes.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. It kind of rekindles your faith in the basic goodness of people.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what would be nice?

name: Raj
line: What's that?

name: Sheldon
line: As a symbolic gesture to all the bullies who've tormented us for years, we open our home to Jimmy and once he's asleep we kill him. I said it would be nice, I didn't say we should do it.

name: Penny
line: Ah, I feel just like Mother Teresa. Except for the virgin part. That ship sailed a long time ago.

name: Bernadette
line: I think Mother Teresa would have washed the clothes first.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, I bet her laundry room wasn't down five flights of stairs. You know, giving really is better than receiving. I used to think it was such a cliche, but it seems to be the... oh, look at these cute jeans someone just threw away.

name: Bernadette
line: Donated.

name: Penny
line: Yes, to a poor waitress who loves a boot cut.

name: Bernadette
line: Penny.

name: Penny
line: Come on, they would be so cute on me, and, ah, they go great with this sweater!

name: Amy
line: I don't think Mother Teresa... Oh, that is adorable.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: In case it comes up again, this right here is an imposition.

name: Leonard
line: What was I supposed to do? He needed a place to sleep it off.

name: Sheldon
line: You're soft. This world's going to chew you up and spit you out.

name: Jimmy
line: When did I have tacos?

name: Leonard
line: Morning, Jimmy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, there it is, tacos.

name: Jimmy
line: Man, I tied one on.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, you did. So, uh, listen, it was great to see you again. And , and, and thanks for the apology.

name: Jimmy
line: What apology?

name: Leonard
line: For all the crappy stuff you did to me in high school.

name: Jimmy
line: Geez, you're still harping on that? What a puss.

name: Leonard
line: That's my French toast.

name: Jimmy
line: It's good. You really know your way around a kitchen, Nancy.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not going to say I told you so, but we could have killed him.

name: Leonard
line: I might kill him right now.

name: Sheldon
line: The Dark Knight has your back. He's scared, but he has your back.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Jimmy, it's time for you to go.

name: Jimmy
line: Yeah, all right, let me just finish this.

name: Leonard
line: No, you're done. I want you out of my apartment right now.

name: Sheldon
line: Well said, Boy Wonder.

name: Jimmy
line: Or what?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't answer that. It's a trick question. I speak from experience.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not afraid of you any more, Jimmy. Now get out!  Uh-oh.

name: Sheldon
line: You did it, Leonard, you stood up to your bully.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I feel pretty good about myself. You think we can outrun him?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't need to outrun him, I just need to outrun you.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't feel good about this.

name: Penny
line: Then sit in the car and keep it running.

name: Amy
line: You were right, a whole new load.

name: Penny
line: Come on, yoga top. Mama needs a new yoga top.

name: Amy
line: Check it out, Bernadette, suede boots, your size.

name: Bernadette
line: God, they're cute. Oh, why did they have to be cute?

name: Penny
line: Wait, wait, wait, guys, just hang on.

name: Amy
line: What is it, the fuzz?

name: Penny
line: Look at us. What are we doing?

name: Amy
line: I was gleefully following you to a life of crime, looking forward to the day we might be cell mates. I don't know about Bernadette.

name: Penny
line: You know, this is wrong. Let's put everything back. Here.

name: Bernadette
line: It's okay, I serve soup to poor people!

name: Howard
line: Completely empty box. If you'd like to examine it?

name: Leonard
line: Mm-hmm. Yep. I see nothing in this box but a wasted childhood.

name: Howard
line: Little snarky there, cello lessons. And we have this completely ordinary cylinder. If you'd like to examine it?

name: Raj
line: Ordinary, yet I sense it is dripping with magical potential.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear Lord. A man pops out for a moment to evacuate his bowels and catch up on the adventures of the Caped Crusader, only to emerge and discover his apartment has been transformed into a cabaret.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, he's just practising for his cousin's birthday party.

name: Howard
line: As I was saying, empty box, empty cylinder, and, ooh, voila.

name: Raj
line: I'm telling you, dude, there's a seat on the Hogwarts Express with your name on it.

name: Sheldon
line: This is how you're going to entertain your little cousin and his friends? By lying to them?

name: Howard
line: How is this lying?

name: Sheldon
line: A magic show is an inherently deceitful proposition. This is an ordinary top hat. You've chosen that card freely. I do not have a set of lock picks lodged in my keister.

name: Raj
line: Can't you just enjoy the wonder, Sheldon? Why must you peek behind the curtain? Or up the butt?

name: Sheldon
line: If we poison the critical thinking faculties of children by telling them that rabbits come out of hats, then we create adults who believe in astrology and homeopathy and that Ryan Reynolds was a better choice for Green Lantern than lovable rogue Nathan Fillion.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, he's just gonna do a few magic tricks for some kids. I really don't think they're gonna end up liking the Green Lantern movie.

name: Howard
line: Don't be so hard on him. It's natural to be a little cranky when you have a quarter in your ear!

name: Sheldon
line: Coins lodged in body parts is not a source of amusement. When I was five, Billy Sparks put a Mexican peso up my nose.

name: Howard
line: How is that not amusing?

name: Sheldon
line: It's still there. Takes me 45 minutes to get through airport security.

name: Howard
line: Look, I made Sheldon disappear. Ta-da.

name: Leonard
line: Next time, you should open with that.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, look who's out on a date. Pasadena's favourite power couple, Shamy.

name: Sheldon
line: And that is the answer to the question, what is wrong with eating at The Cheesecake Factory?

name: Penny
line: So, are we celebrating anything special tonight?

name: Amy
line: Oh, yes. Our relationship agreement specifies that the second Thursday of every month, or the third Thursday in a month with five Thursdays, is date night.

name: Penny
line: That is so hot.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, without objection, the minutes of the previous date are considered read and agreed to. Any new business?

name: Amy
line: How was your day?

name: Sheldon
line: Superb. This morning I made a palindrome with my Alpha-Bits. Nice hat, Bob Tahecin.

name: Amy
line: Sounds like you hit the ground running. I have a bit of good news myself. My most recent paper on how a cooperative long-term potentiation can map memory sequences in dendritic branches made the cover of Neuron.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh! Speaking of good news, somebody just hit 100 Twitter followers.

name: Amy
line: That's nice. Anyway, I've been dreaming of this day for a long time.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, me, too. Triple digits, I'm not gonna lie, feels pretty good.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I'm the sole author on a paper being published in a distinguished journal that may change the course of my field.

name: Sheldon
line: Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm. Ooh, 101! Air's getting a bit thin up here.

name: Penny
line: So, are we ready to order?

name: Amy
line: Give me a minute. I'm gonna go wash up.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that's odd. We both washed up when we came in. It's probably a euphemism for urination.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, what is wrong with you?

name: Sheldon
line: Not much. Although, I can be faulted for being overly fond of koala bears. I don't know what it is, when they smart munching on eucalyptus, I just melt inside.

name: Penny
line: Okay, Amy just told you some exciting news, and you acted like it was no big deal.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I see why you're confused. No, her news sounded important, but what you're forgetting is, it was an achievement in the field of biology. That's all about yucky, squishy things.

name: Penny
line: Honey, she's upset. You're her boyfriend. You have to at least try to be excited by the things she's excited by.

name: Sheldon
line: What if they simply don't excite me?

name: Penny
line: Well, just smile and think about koalas.

name: Sheldon
line: She'd see right through that. We go to the zoo all the time. She knows my koala face. And for future reference, it's this.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, you have a lot of magic stuff.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. I started when I was a teenager. I thought I could show a girl a few tricks and invite her up to my bedroom to see the rest of the act.

name: Bernadette
line: Did it work?

name: Howard
line: Ah, let's just say the only wand that ever saw any action was this one. Oh, look what my mom made us for the act.

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh. I like the fabric. Where'd she get it?

name: Howard
line: Well, she cut up one of her old bathing suits. She made these two vests and half a dozen napkins.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Has she tried on the vest yet?

name: Howard
line: I just gave it to her!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I hope it fits, she has a tricky figure! She's short and stacked, like me!

name: Howard
line: She's not stacked like you, Ma! She never steps on hers!

name: Bernadette
line: Listen, Howie, maybe I'm not the best choice to be a magician's assistant.

name: Howard
line: You'll do fine. Hand me those rings? See? You nailed it.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, i-it's just that I'm not that comfortable with little kids.

name: Howard
line: Well, that's because you haven't been around them much. This is good practice. I mean, you are gonna be a mom someday, right?

name: Bernadette
line: Mmm, yeah, sure.

name: Howard
line: Oh-ho-ho! I haven't seen this trick in years. It's called the dove pan. You let everyone see the pan is empty, but there's a secret compartment in the lid. And then you open it and produce a live... Don't look in there.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, a little Red Dead Redemption, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: How come you're not doing a mission? You're just wandering around.

name: Sheldon
line: Had a rough night. I thought I'd go for a walk and clear my head.

name: Leonard
line: Some people go outside and do that.

name: Sheldon
line: It's after nine o'clock, at this hour the streets of Pasadena are teeming with drunken sailors and alley cats.

name: Leonard
line: You want to talk about it?

name: Sheldon
line: No. I think I'll just go in this saloon and drink my troubles away.

name: Leonard
line: You know digital alcohol is never a solution. What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: Hard as this may be to believe, it's possible that I'm not boyfriend material.

name: Leonard
line: Glad I was sitting down for that. Did you and Amy get in a fight?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy had a fight. I was being perfectly reasonable. I'm gonna have a whiskey. Do you want anything?

name: Leonard
line: No, I can't. I'm playing Grand Theft Auto later. Look, I'm no expert in women.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll say.

name: Leonard
line: That's not necessary when someone's trying to help you.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. It's the alcohol talking. Go on.

name: Leonard
line: Sometimes with women you want to listen to what upsets them and then show them that you can grow and change.

name: Sheldon
line: Nuts to that. What else you got?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what to tell you. Buy her something.

name: Sheldon
line: How does that work?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you skip over any attempt to repair your emotional connection and you win back her affection with an empty financial gesture.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that approach has Sheldon Cooper written all over it.

name: Leonard
line: Glad I could help.

name: Sheldon
line: It's appreciated. And if you ever manage to find a woman again, I'll be glad to return the favour.

name: Howard
line: And now, all the rings are magically linked together. My fiancee's wearing a magic ring, too. It made all my money disappear.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, ah, right.  And now, the great Howdini's next miraculous illusion.

name: Child
line: When are we gonna have cake?

name: Bernadette
line: After you've been thoroughly amazed.

name: Child
line: But we want cake now.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, you're not getting cake right now, capisce?

name: Howard
line: Okay. Okay. Now, my lovely assistant is going to bring me an ordinary pitcher of milk.

name: Second child
line: I know how you do that trick.

name: Bernadette
line: Do you know how to pipe down?

name: Howard
line: Okay, we're going to roll up this newspaper.

name: Second child
line: It's a fake pitcher.

name: Bernadette
line: You got wax in your ears? The man said it's an ordinary pitcher. Howdini.

name: Howard
line: Okay, we're going to stick this in here  and then I'm going to pour in the milk. I hope this works, because I didn't bring a change of pants.

name: Second child
line: Look, I Googled it. It's a fake pitcher.

name: Bernadette
line: That's it. No cake for you. Anyone else want to join the No Cake Club?

name: Howard
line: She's just kidding, boys and girls. Everyone gets cake.

name: Bernadette
line: Not him.

name: Howard
line: Just give me the pitcher. Behold! Wrong pitcher.

name: Bernadette
line: I told you I'm not good with kids.

name: Howard
line: Yes, you did. Oh, I think my crotch is starting to curdle.

name: Bernadette
line: The thing is, my mother worked full-time. I had to take care of my brothers and sisters.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, so?

name: Bernadette
line: Ugh, it was horrible. With their snotty noses and their poopy diapers and their little shrieky voices, always complaining. I don't want to get dressed. Joey keeps spitting in my mouth. This isn't the way Mom makes waffles. Well, okay, put your hand in here. Let's see how you like this waffle!

name: Howard
line: All right, settle down. Red light. Red light, red light! Okay, we're fine.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sorry. I know it makes me sound like a bad person, but I just don't like children.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, no, we all got that. But don't you think it'll be different when the child is ours?

name: Bernadette
line: Right, when it's our kid that's ruined my body and kept me up all night and I've got no career and no future and nothing to be happy about for the next 20 years, sure, that'll be completely different.

name: Howard
line: Well, yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think there's anything in this jewellery store that Amy would appreciate more than the humidifier we were just looking at at Sears.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, now I know what I sound like to you when I say stupid stuff.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, a pocket watch.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I don't think Amy wants a pocket watch.

name: Sheldon
line: No, but maybe she wants a man with a pocket watch.

name: Penny
line: Still saying stupid stuff. Ooh, does she like bracelets?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, she's very fond of her silver one that says allergic to penicillin. Maybe they have a dressier version of that?

name: Assistant
line: Well, how are we doing this afternoon? Are we looking for anything special? Perhaps a ring for the lady?

name: Penny
line: Trust me, we are not a couple.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. I don't see why you get to snort derisively and point that out. You'd be lucky to land a fella like me.

name: Penny
line: Fine, go ahead.

name: Sheldon
line: Trust me, we are not a couple.

name: Assistant
line: My apologies. How can I help you today?

name: Penny
line: He's in trouble with his girlfriend and needs to buy her a present.

name: Assistant
line: Great, trouble with girlfriends is what's putting my daughter through USC.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, are these real diamonds?

name: Assistant
line: Yes. Channel set baguettes, 20 points total weight.

name: Sheldon
line: Remarkable. Diamonds, crystallized carbon. Every day, people go to the grocery store and come home with sacks full of carbon in the form of charcoal briquettes that they toss in their barbeques and set on fire. But just because you've got some carbon with the atoms stacked neatly, you expect me to plunk down thousands of dollars.

name: Assistant
line: Actually, that's only 750. Everything's on sale.

name: Sheldon
line: Really. Talk to me about that pocket watch.

name: Howard
line: I'm still trying to wrap my mind around it. I always thought I'd be a dad someday.

name: Raj
line: Oh, me, too. You're so caring. I've often pictured you guiding a young boy into manhood.

name: Leonard
line: There you go, Howard. Sounds like Raj'll have your babies, problem solved.

name: Raj
line: Hey, just because a man shows caring for another man doesn't mean he's displaying the love that dare not speak its name. Did she definitely say she didn't want kids?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, she doesn't like them. And from what I saw, the feeling was mutual.

name: Leonard
line: What are you gonna do?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. I can't see a life where I don't have kids. I mean, people have kids. I mean, even Donkey Kong had Donkey Kong Jr. So he could teach someone how to kidnap princesses and throw barrels at Italian plumbers.

name: Leonard
line: You know, there's no guarantee even if you have kids that you're going to like them.

name: Raj
line: Wow, that's rough. Where'd you get that?

name: Leonard
line: It's right off the dust jacket of my mom's last book.

name: Howard
line: Maybe me and Bernadette aren't right for each other.

name: Leonard
line: Look, Howard, I'd say there's a lot of fish in the sea, but I watched you dangle your hook in the water for years. Do not throw her back.

name: Howard
line: I don't want to, but this is kind of a deal breaker.

name: Raj
line: What's your mom going to say if you call off the wedding?

name: Howard
line: Huh, it'll kill her. On the other hand, if I don't give her grandchildren, that'll kill her, too. So, either way, on the Mom front, I'm golden.

name: Sheldon
line: What time did you tell Amy to be here?

name: Penny
line: Eight o'clock.  Sheldon, that pocket watch is ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Nonsense. I look like a train conductor. Under what pretext did you lure her here?

name: Penny
line: I said, hey, want to come over and hang out?

name: Sheldon
line: Good, good, if you had said something clever, she might've gotten suspicious.

name: Amy
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Amy
line: What's he doing here?

name: Penny
line: Okay, he wants to talk to you.

name: Amy
line: Well, I don't want to talk to him. And I'm pretty disappointed in you, too. Although we both know that won't last.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, you're up.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Amy, I'd like to apologize. Your accomplishment was impressive. And I'm proud of you.

name: Amy
line: We both know that's your koala face.

name: Sheldon
line: I told you.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, he bought you this.

name: Amy
line: Jewellery? Seriously? Sheldon, you are the most shallow, self-centred person I have ever met. Do you really think another transparently manip..oh! It's a tiara! A tiara! I have a tiara! Put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me.

name: Penny
line: You look beautiful.

name: Amy
line: Of course I do, I'm a princess, and this is my tiara!

name: Sheldon
line: You're right, the tiara was too much.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard! Bernadette's... Oh, she slipped right by me.

name: Bernadette
line: Here's your vest back.

name: Howard
line: You should keep it. You could wear it again sometime.

name: Bernadette
line: Where?

name: Howard
line: I don't know, hunting?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Don't forget to talk to her about this mishegas where I don't get grandkids!

name: Howard
line: Don't worry, Ma. I will, as soon as I can figure out a way to bring up such a sensitive issue!

name: Bernadette
line: I guess you talked to your mom, huh?

name: Howard
line: I was upset. My mom can be a pretty good shoulder to cry on, if the smell of Bengay doesn't burn your eyes.

name: Bernadette
line: Look, it's obvious having kids is really important to you, and I think I came up with a solution.

name: Howard
line: Really? That's great. What?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, seeing as how I make way more money than you anyway, what if I work and you stay home with the kids?

name: Howard
line: Me?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. You know, you'll watch Barney and pull Cheerios out of their noses and go on play dates, and I'll work and have conversations with people my own age and enjoy my life.

name: Howard

line: I bet it is. Why don't women like me?

line: Let me check on that. How about a Web search for why don't women like me?”

line: My name is Siri.

name: Raj
line: Ah, one name. Like, uh, Cher, Madonna, Adele. All the women who rock me. My name is Rajesh, but you can call me Raj.

name: Raj
line: I'd like you to call me sexy.

name: Siri
line: From now on, I'll call you sexy. Okay?

line: Okay.

name: Siri
line: I found ten restaurants whose reviews mention gelato. Seven of them are fairly close to you.

name: Siri
line: You are most certainly welcome, sexy.

line: Well done, Dr. Koothrappali.

line: I'm sorry?

name: Sheldon
line: You've taken a great evolutionary leap by abandoning human interaction and allowing yourself to romantically bond with a soulless machine. Kudos.

name: Raj
line: I haven't bonded with it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, of course. I understand. You're afraid the world isn't ready for your taboo love. Your secret's safe with me.

line: It's just a phone.

name: Barry Kripke
line: Cooper.

line: Kripke.

name: Barry
line: Heads up. Pwofessor Wothman urinated in the particle physics wab again, so we're going to move up his wetirement party. Fwiday, five o'cwock, pot wuck.

line: Thanks, Barry. Siri, remind me Friday morning to make my famous popovers.

name: Siri
line: All right, I'll remind you.

name: Barry
line: You got Siwi, huh? Voice wecognition on that thing is tewible. Wook. Siwi, can you wecommend a westauwant?

line: I'm sorry, Bawwy. I don't understand wecommend a westauwant.

line: Wisten to me. Not westauwant, westauwant.

line: Well, that wady took high-wes pictures of my junk wast night for Cwaigswist. Waiter.

line: It's open.

line: Hey. You ready to go?

line: Yeah, hang on. Let me just finish this chapter.

line: Can you finish it later?

name: Penny
line: No, I can't. Reading books is a big part of my life now because, you know, we'd have more fun things to talk about if I read more.

name: Leonard
line: Great. Good. Great. What are you reading?

name: Penny
line: Two Weeks to Rock Hard Abs.

name: Leonard
line: They kind of spoil the ending right in the name of that, don't they? All right. Look, just remember how this works. We don't get mad about these things. Uh, speaking of which, I've addressed your bug report on my date planning. Got a really fun evening for you. It's kind of a surprise.

name: Penny
line: All right. Terrific. Well, let me just go find a pair of shoes that aren't so tall. We wouldn't want you to feel like you were out for a walk with your mommy.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Oh. Here's my list for you, right there.

name: Leonard
line: All right, fair enough. I certainly can be quieter when we kiss. I thought it was an expression of passion, but if it's coming across as juicy and weird, who wants that? Uh, uh, I'm sorry, can you be more specific on how my eyebrows are stupid? Nah, never mind, it's right here.

name: Raj
line: Good timing. Dinner's almost ready.

name: Howard
line: Great.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, smells amazing in here.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, what are we eating?

name: Raj
line: Oh, an exotic little treat. I was just talking to Siri about Peking duck, and she said she knew about four Chinese grocers, two of which were fairly close to me. Her spontaneity is contagious.

name: Bernadette
line: Who's Siri? Is he dating somebody new?

name: Howard
line: Yes. His phone.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. Is that cute or creepy?

name: Howard
line: Uh-huh.

name: Raj
line: Can I pour you some wine? I think you'll enjoy it. The traditional choice with Peking duck is a Sauvignon Blanc, but Siri suggested an off-dry Riesling. I wasn't sure, but I didn't want to have an argument with her in the middle of Trader Joe's. Now, what should we put Siri in for dinner? Leopard, sparkles, or to paraphrase Coco Chanel, you can never go wrong with a little black case. Siri, play some smooth jazz.

name: Siri
line: Playing smooth jazz.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God, Kenny G? This woman can read me like a book. I can't believe I bought my soul mate at Glendale Galleria.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know if I want to stay.

name: Penny
line: This is amazing. How did you even get this idea?

name: Leonard
line: I called your dad. I asked him what things you liked to do when you were a kid. This seemed easier than getting a cow out here so you could tip it.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you're kind of really great.

name: Leonard
line: You mean for a person whose neck massages feel like an eagle is trying to carry you to its nest?

name: Penny
line: Okay, bug report. I just complimented you. You should take it and shut up.

name: Leonard
line: Right. Sorry, sorry.

name: Penny
line: And stop apologizing all the time.

name: Leonard
line: Right. Sorry.

name: Penny
line: All right, let's shoot stuff. You want me to show you what to do?

line: I play a lot of Grand Theft Auto. I think I know how to handle a gat.

line: Wow. You are cute when you get all gangsta.

name: Leonard
line: So, I've got a gunshot wound. That's pretty badass.

line: No, you've got a Reebok with a gunshot wound and an ouchie on your pinkie toe.

name: Leonard
line: Hello? They gave me a Band-Aid. Hospitals do not issue Band-Aids unless it is medically necessary. That is the law.

name: Penny
line: Well, thank you for a really cool evening.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you for hiding my Star Wars socks at the emergency room. Is it a good time to evaluate the beta test and see where we stand?

name: Penny
line: Things are looking good.

name: Leonard
line: So, are we still taking things slow? Because a gunshot wound today, last week, I slammed my thumb in the kitchen drawer. We don't know how much time I have.

line: Good night, you.

line: Guten Tag, das YouTube. Ich bin ein Bavarian.

name: Siri
line: Dave, I found six vacuum cleaner repair shops in your area. Four are fairly close to you.  Hello, sexy. What can I help you with? If you'd like to make love to me, just tell me.  I'm sorry. I don't understand.

name: Raj
line: No!

name: Leonard
line: Aaargh. What the hell?

name: Sheldon
line: Emergency preparedness drill.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, come on!

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, you know how it works. Once a quarter, keep our readiness up. Now, rise and shine, sleepy head. Half the town is probably dead.

name: Leonard
line: I have to get a lock for my door.

name: Sheldon
line: I think you'll like the drill tonight. I've tried to make it fun. Each of these cards contains a detailed scenario of a possible apocalyptic event. Everything from wild fires to a surprise invasion by Canada. Pick a catastrophe, any catastrophe.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, Canada is not going to invade California.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, really? You think those hippies in Washington and Oregon can stop them?

name: Leonard
line: Fine.

name: Sheldon
line: All righty! An 8.2 magnitude earthquake devastates Pasadena, reducing mighty edifices to dust, engulfing the city in flames. The streets flow with blood and echo with the cries of the wounded. Oh, excellent choice. Now, put on your hard hat and safety vest.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, fun. I get to spend another night in front of our apartment dressed like one of the Village People.

name: Sheldon
line: You make that joke every three months. I still don't get it. Leonard, wait. What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, what am I doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Look around you, there's hypothetical broken glass everywhere. Really? You're going to face Armageddon without your orthotics? All right, your choice.  Uh-oh, hypothetical aftershock!

name: Leonard
line: Aah!

name: Sheldon
line: And that's why we wear hard hats.

name: Howard
line: Check it out, press release from NASA.

name: Raj
line: Um, Expedition 31 will launch this spring to the International Space Station. Crew members will include Commander Tom ‘Tombo' Johnson, astronaut Mike ‘Supernova' Novacelik and Payload Specialist Howard Wolowitz.

line: This is going right into my synagogue's newsletter.

name: Raj
line: Dude, if you're going to be an astronaut, you need to pick a cool nickname.

name: Howard
line: I don't get to pick it. The other guys have to give it to me.

name: Raj
line: Oh. If I had one, it would be Brown Dynamite.

name: Howard
line: Are you not listening to me? The other astronauts have to give you your nickname.

name: Raj
line: Are you not looking at me? I am Brown Dynamite. Why do you put six sugars in your coffee?

name: Leonard
line: Because the cafeteria doesn't offer little packets of methamphetamine.

name: Howard
line: Emergency drill night last night, huh?

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh.

name: Raj
line: How'd you do?

name: Leonard
line: You know what, I'm so tired I can't even think straight. I'm going home. Will one of you guys give this nutbag a ride back later?

name: Sheldon
line: You can't go home. You have to take me to the dentist at four o'clock.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, can't you take the bus to the dentist?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course I can. It's coming back under the residual effects of the anaesthesia, that's the problem. Two years ago after a deep gum cleaning, I thought I got on a bus but somehow wound up on a booze cruise to Mexico.

line: They put you under for a cleaning?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, they have to, I'm a biter.

line: Whatever, Sheldon. I'm exhausted. I'm not taking you to the dentist.

name: Sheldon
line: Wrong, sir. Wrong. Under section 37B of the roommate agreement, miscellaneous duties, you are obligated to take me to the dentist. See? It's right here after providing a confirmation sniff on questionable dairy products.”

name: Leonard
line: You know what, I am sick of the roommate agreement. It's ridiculous. I'm your roommate, not your chauffeur. You know, I had better things to do yesterday than drive you all the way to the good model train store in Garden Grove because the one in Pasadena has gotten too big for its britches.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it has. Ask anybody.

name: Leonard
line: I don't care. I'm done.

line: Hold on. Are you saying that you want to invoke Clause 209?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what that is, but if it means I can go home and sleep, then yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Think carefully here. Clause 209 suspends our friendship, and strips down the roommate agreement to its bare essentials. Our responsibilities toward each other would only be rent, utilities and a perfunctory chin jut of recognition as we pass in the hall.  ‘Sup?

line: All right. That's it. We are now no longer companions, boon or otherwise. We are now merely acquaintances. To amend the words of Toy Story, you have not got a friend in me.

line: Well, if Amy's too busy, that gives the rest of you an opportunity to make my life easier, thus assuring yourselves a footnote in my memoirs, tentatively entitled You're Welcome, Mankind. All right, then, just shout when you hear the task you want to undertake. Uh, dentist. Okay, we can circle back to that one. Um, well, who wants to take me Wednesday morning to get new heels put on my dress shoes? Anyone? Oh. That one had hoot written all over it. Um, all right, uh, dermatologist? Allergist? Podiatrist? Supercuts? Okay, okay, here's a fun one. Um, I need a new picture frame and I have a hankering for Swedish meatballs. Who wants to spend the day with me at IKEA?

line: What's that?

line: Great. Great. So, what's new with your family? How's your mother? Is she alive?

line: Oh, I'm so sorry for your loss. On a cheerier note, I have a teeth-cleaning appointment this afternoon. What do you say you take me over there, buddy boy?

line: Yes. And now, I can't make any promises, but that's the sort of thing that gets a fella on the short list for the number eight friend slot.

line: Sheldon, I'm working. I can't take you to the dentist. Also, and I can't stress this enough, I don't want to take you to the dentist.

line: Okay, uh, what if we make Rocket Man your ringtone, and the next time you talk to those guys, I'll call you and they'll hear it. Plant the seed.

line: Not necessary. No. I found a service that'll send a van to your house for a teeth cleaning. Mostly they cater to dogs, but the fellow on the phone seemed to have an open mind.

name: Leonard
line: All right, Sheldon, if you need me to take you to the dentist, I will take you to the dentist.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you suggesting that you've come to your senses and wish to re-establish the mutual benefits that stem from full participation in the roommate agreement?

name: Leonard
line: Absolutely. If you admit that you're a 30-year-old man who's incapable of functioning on his own.

name: Sheldon
line: I will admit nothing of the sort. And now if you'll excuse me, I have to call my dentist and see if I can also get my hair shampooed and my nails clipped.

line: Oh, good, your power's out, too.

line: Because last month, I sent the electric company a Starbucks gift card, an apology note, and a few snapshots of me in a bra.

name: Sheldon
line: Power failure. Implementing power-failure protocol.

name: Leonard
line: What happened to all your glow-in-the-dark-emergency-exit stuff you had painted on the floor?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that was wildly carcinogenic. Anyway, it's too bad you're no longer entitled to the full benefits of my friendship, because I happen to be extremely prepared for such an emergency. Please try not to see anything by this light. It's not for you.

name: Leonard
line: It's just a blackout, I'm sure the power will be back on soon.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm sure some fool in the Donner party said the snow would stop any day now. I like to think they ate him first.

line: You know, I got some candles in my apartment.

name: Sheldon
line: But candles? During a blackout? Are you mad? That's a fire hazard. No, Pasadena Water and Power recommends the far safer glow stick.

name: Leonard
line: You call that a glow stick? That is a glow stick. Come on, let's go.

name: Sheldon
line: Before you go, consider this. Not only do I have a deep-cycle marine battery power source which is more than capable of running our entertainment system, I also have all 61 episodes of the BBC series Red Dwarf and Fiddle-Faddle. All yours if you're willing to reinstate the roommate agreement.

name: Penny
line: I've got wine at my place and some bubble wrap we could pop.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, he'll be back. Wine and a girl in the dark, he's gonna be bored out of his mind.

name: Leonard
line: To wine and bubble wrap. And to not having to watch Sheldon demonstrate his reverse osmosis machine that converts urine into drinking water.

name: Penny
line: You know, in Girl Scouts, Tammie Dinisha said you could do that with panty hose. Boy, was she wrong. Anyway, you want to make out?

line: I thought because our relationship's in a beta test, you wanted to take things slow.

line: Okay. Do you want to make out slow?

line: I can go so slow it'll be like there's a snail in your mouth.

line: Excuse me, Leonard.

line: Since when don't you knock? It's like the only good thing about you.

name: Sheldon
line: Social niceties have been suspended, Leonard. We're in a state of a emergency. The world has descended into darkened turmoil. Lawlessness and savagery are the order of the day.

line: Fine, what is it?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm making s'mores. I wanted to alert you in case you smelled caramelizing marshmallows and thought a nearby candy factory was on fire.

name: Leonard
line: S'mores, huh? Good for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, or good for us if you sign here and reinstate the full roommate agreement.

name: Leonard
line: No, thanks. I'm good.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? Huh! Okay. In that case, I will have a s'more by myself. And then I'm gonna have s'more. By myself.

line: Aw.

name: Leonard
line: No, don't aw him. He brought this all on himself.

line: But he's sad.

line: No, he's crazy. Sometimes crazy looks like sad so it'll suck you back in.

line: I think he misses his little buddy.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. But mark my words, this frustrating, bogus teenage make-out session is not over.

name: Leonard
line: I thought you said candles were dangerous.

name: Sheldon
line: This is a Bunsen burner. I'm a scientist, I know what I'm doing. Oh, drat.  Aw. It took me a gallon of urine to make that water.

name: Leonard
line: Listen, Sheldon, this is stupid. I don't see why we can't be friends. And I'm willing to drive you around and help you out with stuff. I just don't want to do it because of some silly roommate agreement.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you proposing?

name: Leonard
line: That we go back to the way things were. But when I do something for you, you show a little appreciation.

name: Sheldon
line: And how would I do that?

name: Leonard
line: You say thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Every time?

name: Leonard
line: It's not crazy.

name: Sheldon
line: Counter-proposal. We reinstate the full roommate agreement with the following addendum, in the spirit of Mother's Day or Father's Day, once a year, we set aside day to celebrate all your contributions to my life, both actual and imagined by you. We could call it Leonard's Day.

name: Leonard
line: I kind of like the sound of that.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course you do. It's about you, like everything else.  Oh, thank goodness. I don't think I had it in me to make another glass of water.

name: Leonard
line: So, do I get breakfast in bed on Leonard's Day?

line: No.

line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Can I control the thermostat?

line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Do I get a card?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course you get a card. It's Leonard's Day.

line: Hey, guys, the building manager said the reason the power went out is someone went down into the basement and just pulled the main breaker switch.

name: Leonard
line: Really. Who do you think did that, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I don't know. But whoever that mystery man was, you should be eternally grateful, for without him, there would be no Leonard's Day.

line: Oh, no pressure. Just get him a crummy card, you're good.

line: All right, test my ring tone. That really is a good song.

line: Oh, yeah. There's a reason he's Sir Elton John. They don't make you a knight for writing Wake Me Up Before You Go Go.

line: Not now!

line: Gentlemen, I think I've come up with a fun way to get young people interested in science. Physics Mad-Libs. Now, give me a number.

line: Ha. Perfect. Okay. Get this. Professor Jones told the symposium he had a new method for calculating the mass of a muon. Five times the limit of E to the upsilon as in a . Okay. No, no. I'll start over. Professor

line: Oh, President Siebert, I assume you'd like to respond to one of the suggestions I put in the box by your office.

For example, you're adorable, intelligent and a good earner. I could conservatively see you going for at least two oxen and a goose.  You would fetch a unicorn.
