name: Kripke
line: It's out, wight?

name: Kripke
line: Time. Wan out of woom.

name: Leonard
line: You know all those terrible things bullies used to do to us?

name: Raj
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: I get it.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey! He did that on purpose,

name: Leonard
line: No, he didn't. Nothing that's happening here is being done on purpose. Okay, uh, forget one-on-one. Let's try a free throw contest. First person who makes a basket wins the office.

name: Kripke
line: Making it too easy there, Hofstadter.

name: Leonard
line: No. No, I'm not.

name: Sheldon
line: Use the force, Sheldon. Use the force.  I'm gonna need more force.

name: Kripke
line: Aw wight, Cooper, pwepare to have your heart bwoken.  Do I get points for that?

name: Leonard
line: All right, we gave it 45 minutes. It's no longer funny. Let's try something else.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you propose?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, on the count of three, both of you bounce the balls as hard as you can. The highest bounce wins the office.

name: Kripke
line: Oh, you are going down, Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think so, Kripke. I've bounced many a rubber ball in my day.

name: Leonard
line: All right, that's enough trash talk. One, two, three.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon was higher.

name: Leonard
line: Congratulations, Sheldon. You win office.

name: Sheldon
line: Who's unsatisfactory in P.E. now?

name: Amy
line: Oh, what a great movie.

name: Penny
line: I cannot believe you've never seen Grease.

name: Amy
line: My mother didn't allow me to watch it. She was afraid it might encourage me to join a gang.

name: Bernadette
line: I've got to go. I've got to get up early. My company's testing a new steroid that supposedly doesn't shrink testicles, and the last one there has to do the measuring.

name: Amy
line: I guess I should get going, too. Good night, painting Penny. Good night, real Penny.

name: Penny
line: Good night, real Amy.

name: Amy
line: You don't have to say good night to painting Amy, 'cause she's never leaving.

name: Bernadette
line: Good night, real Penny.

name: Penny
line: Bye.

name: Bernadette
line: Good night, transvestite Penny.

name: Penny
line: Ah, okay. Let us take you off the wall. Out of sight, out of mind. I wish.

name: Amy
line: You know, can I borrow that movie? Those singing hooligans really got my motor running.

name: Penny
line: Sure, sure. Enjoy. I mean, get it back to me when you can, or, you know what, actually, you keep it. It's just going to be my gift to you. Bye.

name: Amy
line: Thank you. Wait. Where'd the painting go?

name: Penny
line: It's right over there.

name: Amy
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: I have no idea. That is weird.

name: Amy
line: You hate it.

name: Penny
line: No. No, no. It's just, it's a little big.

name: Amy
line: I feel like an idiot.

name: Penny
line: No, come on, you're not an idiot. Look, just help me put it back up.

name: Amy
line: Why? So you can just take it down when I leave? I don't need your pity.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Amy, come on.

name: Amy
line: I'm just glad I didn't go for the sculpture.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, the spoils. I see why victors love them.

name: Raj
line: I'm happy for you, Sheldon. But I have to admit I'm going to miss sharing an office with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course you are. Feel free to drop by any time.

name: Raj
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. Call first.

name: Rothman
line: Oh. Hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Professor Rothman. This isn't your office any more. You're retired.

name: Rothman
line: I think the word you're looking for is invisible.

name: Penny
line: I came to say I'm sorry.

name: Amy
line: Don't bother.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Amy, please.

name: Amy
line: I'm so humiliated. I sat there the whole time that we were watching Grease, thinking you liked the painting.

name: Penny
line: I know.

name: Amy
line: I was a fool from Summer Lovin' to the very last rama lama lama ke ding a de dinga a dong.

name: Penny
line: You're right. You're absolutely right. I should have been honest with you and told you the gift was too much.

name: Amy
line: Yes, too much. Because our friendship is fundamentally asymmetrical. I clearly like you more than you like me.

name: Penny
line: I don't think you can put a number on how much one person likes another.

name: Amy
line: I bought you a painting that's 12 square feet in area. There's a number.

name: Penny
line: Amy, come on...

name: Amy
line: If you don't like feet, you can try dollars. The painting set me back three grand.

name: Penny
line: Three gr... Oh, my God! Look, look, Amy, all you need to know is, you are my friend and I don't want to lose you out of my life.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry, I'm just having trouble believing you right now.

name: Penny
line: Grab your hammer.

name: Amy
line: No. Damage is done.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, I didn't want to say this, but the real reason I took the painting down was because it made Bernadette very jealous.

name: Amy
line: Oh, my goodness, how could I have not seen that? The painting is a constant reminder that of the three of us, she is the least cool.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, th-th-th-that's what it is, so...

name: Amy
line: You have such a good heart.

name: Penny
line: Huh, I try.

name: Amy
line: Come on.

name: Penny
line: Well where are we going?

name: Amy
line: We're going to go put this painting back up in your apartment.

name: Penny
line: Well, what about Bernadette?

name: Amy
line: Oh, screw her. She's just lucky we let her hang out with us.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm trying to raise the temperature in here before my nipples tear through my shirt.

name: Howard
line: Why don't you just turn up the thermostat?

name: Sheldon
line: Aha! Good question. It turns out the thermostat for my new office isn't in my new office. No. It's next door, in Professor Davenport's office, who is currently enjoying the hot flashes associated with menopause.

name: Leonard
line: Why is there a hole here?

name: Raj
line: Well, at least you finally got a window that opens. That's nice.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it? Listen.

name: Raj
line: What, you don't like wind chimes?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I hate them, but it gets worse. There it is.

name: Howard
line: The bird?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, It's completely out of tune with the wind chimes.

name: Raj
line: So?

name: Sheldon
line: You don't get it, do you? That's a mockingbird. Mockingbirds can change their song, which means he's out of tune on purpose. He's mocking me. Oh dear. There it is again. Do you feel it?

name: Howard
line: The growing realization that you are one wacky bastard? Yep.

name: Sheldon
line: No. The vibration. We are directly underneath the geology lab, and they're running their confounded sieve shakers again. Hey, gravel monkeys, if you need to shake rocks, try jiggling your heads around!

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, relax.

name: Sheldon
line: How can I relax? My nervous system is being stretched out like the strings of a harp and plucked by holes and birds and wind and the low-hanging scrotum of the difficult-to-evict Professor Rothman.

name: Leonard
line: If you're not happy, why don't you just let Kripke have the office?

name: Sheldon
line: What, and let him win? Do I look crazy to you? We're trying to think down here, you geode-loving feldspar jockeys!  And you, the notes are C, D, E, G and A. You pick one or I am chopping down that tree!

name: Penny
line: How's that?

name: Amy
line: Little higher on the right.

name: Penny
line: Now?

name: Amy
line: Little more. No. That's got it.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, okay. That's, uh, that's good.

name: Amy
line: I'll let you in on a little secret.

name: Penny
line: Mm.

name: Amy
line: Originally we were painted nude. But I had him add clothes, 'cause I thought it was an unnecessary challenge to our heterosexuality.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, good call.

name: Amy
line: But if you ever change your mind, all it would take is some warm, soapy water and a couple of sponges.

name: Penny
line: You're talking about the painting, right?

name: Amy
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Help! Somebody help!

name: Leonard
line: What happened?

name: Sheldon
line: I was trying to see what was in here and my head got stuck.

name: Leonard
line: Why would you do that?

name: Sheldon
line: It's called scientific curiosity. Now go get butter.

name: Leonard
line: Hang in there. I'll be right back.

name: Leonard
line: I'm just gonna run to the store and get a few things. I'll pick you up when you're done.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. I like it a little better when you stay, but all right.

name: Barber
line: Hey, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. I'm here for my haircut with Mr. D'Onofrio.

name: Barber
line: I'm sorry, Uncle Tony's in the hospital. He's pretty sick.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear, Mr. D'Onofrio's in the hospital. Why do these things always happen to me?

name: Barber
line: I can cut it for you.

name: Sheldon
line: You're not Mr. D'Onofrio. I get my hair cut by Mr. D'Onofrio. You believe this guy?

name: Leonard
line: Excuse us for a second. Sheldon, it's okay, he can do it. He's a barber.

name: Sheldon
line: He's not a barber, he's the nephew. He's an example of the kind of nepotism that runs rampant in the barbering industry. Besides, Mr. D'Onofrio knows exactly how I like my hair done because he has all my haircut records from my barber in Texas.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: When I first moved here I was nervous about finding a new barber, so my mother had all my haircut records sent here to Mr. D'Onofrio.

name: Leonard
line: There's no such thing as haircut records.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, there are.

name: Leonard
line: Have you ever seen them?

name: Sheldon
line: No, but my mother assured me they were sent here, and I'll bet you dollars to doughnuts that this one doesn't have them. Uh, excuse me. Do you have access to my haircut records?

name: Barber
line: Your what?

name: Sheldon
line: To paraphrase T.S. Eliot, this is the way the world ends, not with a bang but with a nephew.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you're a grown man, he's a professional, and your haircut is number three on that poster from 1946. Just sit down and let him do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, but if I come out of this looking like a dork, it's on you.

name: Barber
line: So my kid said the funniest thing today.

name: Sheldon
line: Nope.

name: Leonard
line: When you tell this story later, the word we usually use is quirky.

name: Sheldon
line: Can you pass the Parmesan cheese?

name: Leonard
line: Sure. What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm trying to get the hair out of my eyes.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you are one day late for your haircut.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for captioning my nightmare.

name: Howard
line: Lookie here, I got my travel orders.

name: Raj
line: Payload Specialist Howard Wolowitz is requested to report to the NASA Johnson Space Center, Houston, Texas, for astronaut training Monday eight a.m.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but it's from NASA, so it's oh eight hundred.

name: Raj
line: But it says eight a.m.

name: Howard
line: You read it as oh eight hundred.

name: Raj
line: It doesn't have an oh in front of it.

name: Howard
line: You know what does have an oh in front of it? Oh, my God, I'm an astronaut, and you're dying of jealousy.

name: Leonard
line: So, what kind of things are they...  will you stop that?

name: Sheldon
line: I can't help it, I feel like a teen heartthrob.

name: Penny
line: You know, Sheldon, I used to cut my brother's hair. I could do it for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, I know you mean well, offering the skills of the hill folk, but, um, here in town we don't churn our own butter, we don't, uh, make dresses out of gunny sacks, and, uh, we sure as shootin' don't get our hair cut by bottle-blonde...

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, be nice.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, it's the bad boy attitude that comes with this hair.

name: Raj
line: You could go to my guy. He's at Juan-Juan in Beverly Hills. They bring you a cup of tea, they'll massage your scalp. It's about two hundred dollars, but sometimes you look in the next chair and you see a superstar like Tony Danza.

name: Howard
line: Quick question here, have we actually changed the conversation from I'm going

name: Raj
line: Now who's dying of jealousy? Oh, it's you.

name: Amy
line: I'm a cowboy, on a steel horse I ride. I'm wanted... I'm wanted... wanted, dead or alive. Sheldon, you're ruining girlfriend-boyfriend sing-along night.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. I'm looking for a barber and I'm running out of time. My hair is growing at the rate of 4.6 yoctometers per femtosecond. I mean, if you're quiet, you can hear it.

name: Amy
line: What about Supercuts?

name: Sheldon
line: I tried once. They do men's and women's hair in the same room at the same time. It's like Sodom and Gomorrah with mousse.

name: Amy
line: Well, this isn't a crisis. Why don't you just let your hair grow out a little?

name: Sheldon
line: Why don't I let my hair grow out? Um, why don't I start wearing Birkenstocks and, uh, uh, seeking validation of my opinions by asking can you dig it?

name: Amy
line: Well, I don't know. I think you might look sexy with long hair. The kind that flows down to your shoulders and blows back while riding on a horse, bareback and bare-chested. I'm gonna go brush my teeth, it might take a while.

name: Howard
line: Hi.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi, sweetie.

name: Howard
line: I miss you.

name: Bernadette
line: I miss you, too. So tell me all about your first day.

name: Howard
line: Oh, wow, where do I even start? I got to experience zero gravity.

name: Bernadette
line: Cool. How do they do that?

name: Howard
line: It's pretty neat. You get in this plane that goes almost straight up for, like, 20 seconds, and then straight back down like it's going to crash, and they do it over and over again, you know, no matter how many times you throw up.

name: Bernadette
line: You threw up?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, and the craziest part is, because there's no gravity, the throw-up kind of floats there, in a little ball, and if your mouth is open because you're screaming, sometimes it just floats right back in. Boy, does everyone laugh at you when that happens.

name: Bernadette
line: That sounds mean.

name: Howard
line: No. Yeah, I would have laughed, too, but I didn't want the vomit to come back out. Anyway, oh, could you do me a favour and overnight me some more underwear?

name: Bernadette
line: Sure, why?

name: Howard
line: I got a look at the centrifuge they're going to spin me around in tomorrow, and I have a hunch I packed a little light.

name: Sheldon
line: Mr. D'Onofrio? It's Sheldon. They didn't have anything barber-themed in the gift shop, so I got you this. I don't know if you can read his little T-shirt. It says, um, get well bear-y soon. Trust me, if you were even a little conscious right now, you'd be laughing. Anyway, there's new studies that show, people in comas are aware of everything going on around them. With that in mind, if you can hear me, move away from the light and toward the sound of these scissors.

name: Nurse
line: Can I help you?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Do you have something I could use as a cape?

name: Nurse
line: Oh, dear, did we spit out our pills, slip out of the ninth floor, and go on a little adventure?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, no, I'm just here to get my hair cut.

name: Nurse
line: I-I see. J-Jus-Just wait here one moment. Security!

name: Sheldon
line: I got to run. But not with scissors, that would be unsafe.

name: Penny
line: So, if I move my horsey here, isn't that checkmate and I win?

name: Leonard
line: Hmm.

name: Penny
line: Well, is it or isn't it?

name: Leonard
line: You know, I think this is a good stopping point. Uh, it's your first real game. I threw a lot of information at you.

name: Penny
line: Well, no, I mean, your king is trapped. He can't go here because of my lighthouse, and he can't go here because of my pointy-head guy.

name: Leonard
line: Like I said, complicated game.

name: Penny
line: So did I win or not?

name: Leonard
line: Did you have fun? Because if you had fun, then you are, you are a winner. Now that's, that-that's what chess is all about.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey. Sorry, Sheldon, I'll move.

name: Sheldon
line: Eh, why? My spot, your spot, what difference does it make?

name: Penny
line: Okay, what just happened?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. Between you playing chess like Bobby Fischer and Sheldon being okay with you in his spot, I'm guessing someone went back in time, stepped on a bug, and changed the course of human events.

name: Penny
line: Uh, sweetie, are you all right?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I'm not all right. It's been six days since I was supposed to get a haircut and nothing horrible has happened.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm sorry, I don't understand.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, explain it to her.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, he's crazy.

name: Sheldon
line: I have spent my whole life trying to bring order to the universe by carefully planning every moment of every day. But all my efforts, our dinner schedule, my pyjama rotation, my bowel movement spreadsheet, it's clear now, I've been wasting my time.

name: Leonard
line: Good. I'm taking that disgusting chart off the fridge.

name: Penny
line: You know, Sh-Sheldon, sometimes it's nice not knowing what's coming. I mean, look at me and Leonard. We went out, we broke up, now we're trying again. We don't know what's gonna happen.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, please, everyone knows what's going to happen. But I see your point.

name: Leonard
line: I think this could be good for you. Maybe it's time for you to shake things up a bit.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. I should embrace the chaos.

name: Leonard
line: Great. What are you going to do first?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. I could do anything. All bets are off. The world is my oyster. I got it. I'm going to put on my Tuesday pyjamas tonight.

name: Leonard
line: I got to tell you, I'm a little worried about him.

name: Penny
line: If I were you, I'd be worried that a girl who's never played chess in her life just kicked your ass.

name: Howard
line: Hi.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, what happened to you?

name: Howard
line: We did overnight survival training in the wilderness. Big fun. Big, big fun. I was gonna freshen up for you but I blacked out a little on the way to the bathroom.

name: Bernadette
line: Survival training? Is that like camping?

name: Howard
line: Uh-huh. Except you don't have food or water, and they don't have a sunset Sabbath service like they do at Camp Hess-Kramer.

name: Bernadette
line: Do you sleep in tents?

name: Howard
line: No. I slept in a hole I dug in the ground with my bare hands. And at some point during the night, an armadillo crawled in and spooned me.

name: Bernadette
line: Poor baby.

name: Howard
line: But I did it. I survived. I wasn't sure I was going to when the sandstorm hit. I just pulled my turtleneck up over my head and waited for death. But somehow as I sat there, wrapped in a cocoon of my own neck-sweat, I found that primal part of the human spirit that just wants to keep on living, no matter what the cost.

name: Bernadette
line: You're so brave. I'm proud of you.

name: Howard
line: I ate a butterfly. It was so small and beautiful, but I was so hungry.

name: Bernadette
line: Are you crying?

name: Howard
line: No, I don't think it's possible. I'm severely dehydrated. My pee is like toothpaste.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, if you're not able to do this, come home. It won't change how I feel about you.

name: Howard
line: Thanks, honey, but I can't quit. If I do, I'll just be a guy who had a chance to be an astronaut and gave it up.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, is there anything I could do to help?

name: Howard
line: No. Wait. Send more underwear.

name: Leonard
line: Don't let this be Sheldon playing bongos. Please don't let this be Sheldon playing bongos.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, Leonard, do you like my bongos? Bet you didn't know that I had bongos.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, it's three o'clock in the morning.

name: Sheldon
line: Three in the morning is a good time for bongos.

name: Leonard
line: I was sleeping.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard sleeps while I play bongos.

name: Leonard
line: No, he doesn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard no sleep while I play bongos. Bongo solo.

name: Leonard
line: Stop! Stop it! Stop! Stop! Stop it!

name: Penny
line: What the hell?!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hi, Penny, guess what? Sheldon got bongos.

name: Penny
line: Why did you get bongos?

name: Sheldon
line: Richard Feynman played the bongos. I thought I'd give that a try.

name: Leonard
line: Richard Feynman was a famous physicist.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Leonard, it's three o'clock in the morning. I don't care if Richard Feynman was a purple leprechaun who lived in my butt.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny meant if he were a purple leprechaun. Penny forgot to use the subjunctive.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, go to bed. You have work in the morning.

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe, maybe not. Maybe tomorrow I start a bongo band and tour the world.

name: Leonard
line: W-w-wuh, no, no, hang on,uh, uh, roommate agreement. No hootenannies, sing-a-longs, or barbershop quartets after ten p.m.

name: Sheldon
line: Roommate agreement? Are you kidding? We are living in a world of chaos. Roommate agreement.

name: Penny
line: Where are you going?

name: Sheldon
line: Wherever the music takes me, kitten. I play bongos walking down the stairs.  Oh! Oh! Never play bongos walking down the stairs.

name: Bernadette
line: Surprise.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing here?

name: Bernadette
line: I'm here to help you get through this. You can't do it on your own, you need someone to take care of you.

name: Howard
line: Oh, I love you so much.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I love you.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, your bath is getting cold!

name: Howard
line: Don't worry, once she falls asleep, I'll spoon you like an armadillo.

name: Amy
line: He showed up in the middle of the night with his bongos. I foolishly thought it was some sort of musical booty call.

name: Leonard
line: Poor guy. He must have been exhausted. Sheldon like to sleep while Leonard play the bongo!

name: Amy
line: That was kind of uncalled for.

name: Leonard
line: No, it was called for.

name: Sheldon
line: What's going on?

name: Penny
line: All right, Sheldon, this craziness has gone on long enough. Please come home so I can cut your hair.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, you're not trained. You're not licensed. Most importantly, you don't have access to my haircut records.

name: Penny
line: All right, honey, look, we've known each other for a long time now, right? I've taken you to Disneyland, I kicked a bully in the nuts for you, I sing you Soft Kitty when you're sick, you've even saw me naked once.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, duh, what?

name: Penny
line: It was a long story. Anyway, Sheldon, I promise I know what I'm doing. Please let me cut your hair.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, what do you think?

name: Amy
line: There's not a hair on my body I wouldn't let this woman trim.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, let's go. Thank you for letting me sleep on your couch.

name: Amy
line: There's only so many times a woman can say how about the bed?

name: Leonard
line: What's this about Sheldon seeing you naked?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, relax. It was just her bottom and her breasts.

name: Penny
line: Almost done.

name: Sheldon
line: At the end of the haircut, Mr. D'Onofrio would tell me a dirty joke.

name: Penny
line: Well, sorry, I don't know any dirty jokes.

name: Sheldon
line: That's okay, I never understood them anyway.

name: Penny
line: Okay, what do you think?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm, well, it's a little Hollywood. But I think I can pull it off. Well done, Penny.

name: Penny
line: Ha, told you. Okay, I'm just gonna clean up your neck a little and then you are good to go.

name: Sheldon
line: Fun time. Hah. Sorry, sometimes the clippers tickle me.

name: Penny
line: Okay.  Okay, yep, we're all done now. It's just, it's good. Let me just take that away from you. Okay.

name: Sgeldon
line: Thank you very much.

name: Penny
line: You are welcome. Yeah, I'm gonna have to move.

name: Raj
line: Hey, want to spend some time playing the new Star Wars game this weekend?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I don't know. I kind of promised myself I'd get off the computer, be more physically active. Get some exercise.

name: Howard
line: You're about to walk up three flights of stairs.

name: Leonard
line: Good point, I'm in.

name: Raj
line: You know what would be great? Let's do it like the old days.

name: Leonard
line: You mean, are you talking gaming marathon?

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Start Saturday morning, go 48 hours, sleeping bags, junk food.

name: Howard
line: Turn off our phones so our moms can't call.

name: Leonard
line: It would be like our World Of Warcraft a few years ago when the neighbours called the cops on us.

name: Howard
line: They called the cops because of the smell. They thought we were dead.

name: Raj
line: We were badass back in the day.

name: Leonard
line: All right, let's do it.

name: Howard
line: 48 hours of Star Wars gaming.

name: Raj
line: It's on like Alderaan.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Sheldon, clear your weekend. Starting Saturday morning, Star Wars< marathon

name: Raj
line: Woo-hoo!

name: Sheldon
line: Movies or video games? Or board game? Or trading card games? Or Lego's? Or dress up? Or comic books? Or dramatic readings of novelizations? Yes to all!

name: Leonard
line: We are going to play the online game.

name: Sheldon
line: The online game? Bully!

name: Amy
line: Gentlemen, as much as I'm sure Sheldon would enjoy playing intergalactic make-believe, he and I have other plans. We are attending my Aunt Flora's 93rd birthday party.

name: Sheldon
line: Just tell her I can't come.

name: Amy
line: She'll be disappointed if we don't show up.

name: Sheldon
line: She's 93. She won't be disappointed for very long.

name: Amy
line: No, hang on. I followed all the protocols set forth by you in the relationship agreement. I made a written record request 72 hours in advance. I checked the tyre pressure on the car. I even contacted the Centres For Disease Control to find out what shots they recommend for travel to Orange County. FYI, it's none.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, the relationship agreement was not designed for either one of us to get our way.

name: Amy
line: You use it to get your way.

name: Sheldon
line: I use it to get the right way. The fact that the right way is also my way is a happy coincidence.

name: Amy
line: You gave me your word. You're coming with me.

name: Leonard
line: We'll miss you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, who wants to spend the whole weekend, running around a bunch of pretend planets battling made up monsters. That's for babies.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but it's got lightsabres.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, please, Amy! It's got lightsabres!

name: Sheldon
line: Hello Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Hey Sheldon. Help you with anything?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I'm attending a party this weekend, for a 93-year-old woman. Can you recommend a gift?

name: Stuart
line: Uh, I don't know. Could put a tennis ball on the end of Excalibur. Make a pretty badass cane.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you supply the the tennis ball?

name: Stuart
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Then no. What else?

name: Stuart
line: Hmm. Oh, have this collectors edition Batman utility belt. Maybe she can use it as a wearable pill caddy.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, she'd just look silly wearing that without the rest of the costume.

name: Stuart
line: I'm sorry Sheldon, that's it. That's all I got.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's not your fault. I've been to the model train store. I've been to Radio Shack. This woman is impossible to shop for.

name: Leonard
line: I'd make fun of Sheldon for having girl problems if I wasn't in shock that Sheldon has girl problems.

name: Sheldon
line: No, Leonard, go ahead and mock. Like my daddy always said, Shelly, women aren't anything but flippin' pains in the bottom.

name: Leonard
line: That's what your father used to say?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I took out the bad words and the yeehaw, but you get the gist.

name: Howard
line: Look, if you don't want to go to the party, just don't go. You're a grown man. Act like one. Tell Amy you want to spend the weekend having a sleepover and playing video games with your friends. Maybe she'll dig it. Women like a firm hand on the tiller.

name: Raj
line: I can never find the tiller. I got a book; it didn't help.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I always thought if I were ever enslaved, it would be by an advanced species from another planet, not some hotsy-totsy from Glendale.

name: Howard
line: Now, I downloaded an app that might be helpful in this situation.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. I'm smart as a whip. I should be able to figure this out.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, listen, I kind of made plans with the guys this weekend, but then I wondered, because we're in this relationship-beta-test, if I should have asked you first. Then I thought if I did check with you first, you'd think that I was taking things to seriously. And then, then I got a nosebleed.

name: Penny
line: You don't have to check with me. Do whatever you want.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. I guess I was hoping for a different reaction, but okay.

name: Penny
line: Really, what were you hoping for?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, maybe that you'd be a little upset, and then you'd realize that I'm a stallion that has to run free. And that would turn you on a little.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm an actress. Ask me again.

name: Leonard
line: Do you mind if I spend the weekend playing video games with the guys?

name: Penny
line: Whu... the entire weekend? You mean I wouldn't see you at all? But I ju... No, no, I knew what I was getting into. You can't put a saddle on Leonard Hofstadter. Oh, my, is it getting hot in here? Ay, papi.

name: Leonard
line: Ay papi? What is that?

name: Penny
line: An acting choice.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. So you chose that when you become turned on, you turn into Speedy Gonzalez?

name: Penny
line: Choo got a problem with that, papi?

name: Leonard
line: Uh-uh.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny!  Penny!  Penny!

name: Penny
line: Sorry, Stallion. Your weird friend Giraffe is here.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, Penny. I just stopped by to bring you this gift.

name: Penny
line: Gummy bears? Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Now that you're in my debt, please manipulate Amy into releasing me from my commitment to attend her aunt's tedious birthday party.

name: Penny
line: Not a chance.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. I thought the candy might not be enough so let me up the ante. These are Cooper Coupons. These are for various things I can do for you. Um, oh, this one is for one free grammar check. Uh, you could use it for emails, letters, tattoos, what have you. Um, oh, this is fun one. This is an afternoon with me at the California Science Center, where I point out their mistakes.

name: Leonard
line: Keep an eye on those expiration dates, I've been burned more than once.

name: Penny
line: All right, sweetie, I'm not going to get involved in your relationship.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, come on. It's just a simple favour. Now, when's the last time I asked you to do something for me?

name: Penny
line: Yesterday. You made me look in your ear to see if there was a ladybug in it.

name: Sheldon
line: When is the last time I asked you to do something that wasn't a medical emergency?

name: Penny
line: Yesterday. You made me look in your ear to see if there was a ladybug in it.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, then, I have no choice but to go on to plan B.

name: Penny
line: What's that?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm going to run around outside with a wet head and try to catch a cold.

name: Amy
line: Good morning.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Amy
line: I think you're really going to enjoy yourself today. Not only do you get to meet my relatives, but since my aunt's nursing home is catering the party, all of the food is incredibly soft. It's like a vacation for your teeth.

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Amy
line: You sure you're okay with this?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I decided to find a way that I could have this experience and enjoy it.

name: Amy
line: Thank you. That means a lot to me.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, don't thank me. Thank wireless technology. I realized, I can go to your aunt's awful party and still spend the whole day gaming with my friends.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, my relatives are going to want to talk to you, and you're going to be sitting there playing a game? Isn't that a little rude?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I got that covered. Headset. I won't hear a word the old geezers are saying.

name: Amy
line: You know, if playing that game is more important to you than honouring your commitment to me, and you don't mind me showing up at a party all by myself after I've already told everybody I'll be bringing somebody, then, fine. Go home and play your game.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks. Ooh, listen, I wouldn't mind a piece of birthday cake, provided the old gal's candle blow is clean and dry.

name: Raj
line: Here you go. I've got everything we'll need for the big game. Low fat turkey jerky, low-carb beer, 100-calorie snack packs.

name: Leonard
line: You pick up a Y chromosome while you were there? You might be short one.

name: Raj
line: Hey, I plan on levelling up in the game, not my swimsuit size, thank you very much.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, the game offers us a choice between playing for the Republic and the light side, or the Sith Empire and the dark side.

name: Leonard
line: Well, we're always the good guys. In D&D, we're lawful good, in City Of Heroes, we're the heroes, in Grand Theft Auto, we pay the prostitutes promptly and never hit them with a bat.

name: Sheldon
line: Those women are prostitutes? You said they were raising money for stem cell research.

name: Howard
line: Hey, guys, I got a surprise.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, if it's yoghurt that helps ladies poop, I think Raj beat you to it.

name: Howard
line: No. Bernadette's going to be playing with us. So, that's pretty cool, huh? Right? Sure it is, yeah.

name: Raj
line: What, you invited your girlfriend? This is supposed to be our weekend.

name: Howard
line: I had no choice. Last night, she said, why don't we go out for brunch tomorrow and then maybe the Arboretum. And I said, well, no, I promised the guys I was going to play a video game with them all weekend. And she said, that sounds like fun, can I come, too? And then I didn't answer for a second, and then she said, well, do you not want me to come? And then I bought her a new laptop and the game, and she's parking the car right now.

name: Sheldon
line: Is the whip sound app contextually appropriate here?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, it is, but I think you might've waited too long for it to be funny.  I was wrong, it's still funny.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good. Hah-hah!

name: Penny
line: Amy, what's wrong?

name: Amy
line: My boyfriend's a jerk.

name: Penny
line: Well, I know he didn't cheat on you, so what happened?

name: Amy
line: I had to go to my aunt's party all by myself, and everybody was like, where's this boyfriend you're always talking about? Is he real, or did you make him up like Armin the miniature horse breeder?

name: Penny
line: Who's Armin the miniature horse breeder?

name: Amy
line: The pretend boyfriend I invented to get my family off my back. It unravelled quickly when I couldn't answer the question how'd you two meet?

name: Penny
line: I would have thought at a miniature horse show.

name: Amy
line: Oh, that's good.

name: Penny
line: Mm.

name: Amy
line: I panicked and said Woodstock. I just wanted to show Sheldon off to my family.

name: Penny
line: Sure, I get that. I mean, he's your first boyfriend and all.

name: Amy
line: Not just my first boyfriend, he's the best boyfriend. I mean, think about it. I'm dating Sheldon Cooper.

name: Penny
line: Yes. On purpose.

name: Amy
line: He's handsome, he's lanky, he's brilliant, and his skin has that pale, waxy quality.

name: Penny
line: Well, sickly is the new sexy.

name: Amy
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Mm. You know, Amy, sometimes when you're in a relationship with someone you really care about, the sucky part is, it leaves you open to getting hurt.

name: Amy
line: Do you ever worry about Leonard doing that to you?

name: Penny
line: That's hilarious. No.

name: Bernadette
line: Get that guy! Get that guy! Pew! Pew! Pew! Pew!

name: Sheldon
line: Dr. Rostenkowski, it may interest you to know that saying pew, pew, pew isn't as effective as pressing your blaster key. In the same way that saying whee doesn't make the land speeder go.

name: Bernadette
line: Pew!

name: Leonard
line: Raj, Imperial Troopers on your tail.

name: Raj
line: Got him. When Gandhi advocated his philosophy of non-violence, I bet he didn't know how much fun it was killing stuff.

name: Leonard
line: All right, I think we got them all. Let's divide up the loot.

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh, look at this pretty purple robe I just got. You should put on yours and then we'll match.

name: Howard
line: But I worked hard to get this armour.

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry, I just thought it'd be nice if people knew we were a couple.

name: Howard
line: Fine, I'll change.

name: Sheldon
line: Hah-hah!

name: Amy
line: I don't think I want to play a game.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on. They're playing one across the hall, we should, too. Okay, we are gonna take turns bouncing a quarter off the table, and if it goes into this cup, the other person has to drink. Then you get to go again...

name: Amy
line: Like that?

name: Penny
line: Wow. Yeah, b-beginner's luck. So, now I will drink this entire cup of beer, and you will go again and we can... uh... all right. So, yeah, okay, now I'm gonna drink this entire cup and then I'm going to drink another one... Okay, seriously, stop. What the hell?

name: Amy
line: Spent a lot of my childhood throwing coins into wishing wells hoping for friends. At a certain point, you start doing trick shots just to keep things interesting.

name: Penny
line: Whoa, whoa, give me a second to catch up here. Hold on.

name: Amy
line: That'd be my boyfriend. Happier playing his dopey Star Trek game with his friends than hanging out with me.

name: Penny
line: Wars.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Star Wars. They get all cranky when you mix the two up.

name: Amy
line: What's the difference?

name: Penny
line: There's absolutely no difference.

name: Amy
line: How do I get him to treat me better?

name: Penny
line: All right. Let me give you a little girlfriend 101. Usually the first move out of the gate is you withhold sex, but that will work better after Sheldon hits puberty. So, I'd say give him the silent treatment.

name: Amy
line: No, he loves that.

name: Penny
line: Hmm.

name: Amy
line: Our record for sitting in a room together and not speaking to each other is six-and-a half hours. He said it was a magical evening.

name: Penny
line: All right, then we're gonna have to go with an oldie but goodie, making a scene.

name: Amy
line: I don't think I'd be good at that.

name: Penny
line: That's why you're lucky to have me. Back in Omaha, there are two different restaurants I'm not allowed into. Both Chili's.

name: Raj
line: Bernadette, remember, your character's the healer in our group. You're in charge of healing all of us, not just Howard.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't help it. My Howie Wowie has an owie.

name: Sheldon
line: That is the most sickeningly sweet thing I have ever experienced. And I am sipping Kool-Aid through a Red Vine.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon Cooper, I've got a bone to pick with you, and I'm about to do it in front of all your friends.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you pick that bone. You pick that bone clean!

name: Amy
line: I'm gonna publicly shame you, and then sit back as societal pressure compels you to modify your behaviour.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, burn!

name: Amy
line: And if you don't start treating me better, I'm leaving you for a miniature horse breeder named Armin.

name: Sheldon
line: Armin who?

name: Amy
line: Armin... damn it.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, she wanted to show you off to her family, and you stood her up, okay? Look at this adorable, smushy face. Smush, smush, smush, smush.

name: Amy
line: You're hurting me.

name: Penny
line: No, Sheldon hurt you.

name: Amy
line: Before; now it's you.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Sheldon
line: I think I understand. You're the one person who can say Sheldon Cooper is your boyfriend, but that rings hollow if you can't lord him over others in the flesh. I forget what I bring to the party and what I take away when I leave. Please accept these valuable Cooper Coupons as restitution.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, she doesn't want your stupid...

name: Amy
line: Ooh, Science Center. Redeeming. Let's go.

name: Sheldon
line: Well played, Amy Farrah Fowler. Let me get my coat.  Oh, grow up, Leonard.

name: Raj
line: But e-excuse me, I have something to say. None of you may realize it, but I was very much looking forward to this weekend. It was gonna be like the old days, the four of us hanging out playing video games before you guys all got girlfriends. Do you have any idea what it's like to be the only one without a girlfriend? Even if I get one someday, I'll still be the guy who got a girl after Sheldon Cooper!

name: Penny
line: And that's how a girl makes a scene. I'm sorry, sweetie. You're right. You deserve your weekend. Come on, Amy, let's go.

name: Amy
line: What about the Science Center?

name: Penny
line: I'll let you hold my hair while I throw up.

name: Amy
line: Rain check.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm gonna go, too.

name: Howard
line: I'll miss you.

name: Bernadette
line: I'll miss you.

name: Howard
line: I'll miss you more.

name: Bernadette
line: No, I'll...

name: Raj
line: Just leave! Okay, now. This is the way it's supposed to be. Men together, fighting the forces of evil.

name: All
line: Hear! Hear!

name: Raj
line: I can't believe this is only 64 calories.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard Joel Wolowitz! I've been worried sick for two days, and I know you turned off your phone! You open up this door right now because I've had it up to here! I have been to the morgue and the hospital, and I spent the last half hour walking up these ferkakta stairs!

name: Howard
line: That's my ride, got to go.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, Priya's calling in a few minutes on Skype, and we are gonna have a dinner date.

name: Sheldon
line: It's eight o'clock in the morning in Mumbai. How can she have dinner?

name: Leonard
line: Fine, whatever. Priya will be having breakfast.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, so technically it's not a dinner date. I suppose you could call it a, uh, dinfast date. But if you did, you'd open yourself to peer-based mocking, such as, Hey, Leonard, how was your dinfast with Priya last night?

name: Leonard
line: That doesn't sound like mocking.

name: Sheldon
line: You didn't let me finish. Dinfast . Are those soy-based candles?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. Why?

name: Sheldon
line: Paraffin candles may contain carcinogens. Unless lung cancer is the ambiance you were going for at your dinfast. Dinfast .

name: Leonard
line: Listen, I don't want to be rude, but Priya's gonna be calling any minute, so...

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes, Priya. Leonard, you know I make a point of never interfering in your personal affairs.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, I've always admired that about you.

name: Sheldon
line: As well you should. But I'm going to make an exception here.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, good.

name: Sheldon
line: Priya has moved back to India to pursue her law career. Instead of desperately trying to keep this intercontinental relationship alive, you could use that time to take up a hobby.

name: Leonard
line: A hobby?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I read recently about a fellow in Kansas with an enormous ball of twine. I bet you could give him a run for his money.

name: Leonard
line: You know, some people might say that it's great that we're trying to make things work long distance. They'd say things like, love is stronger than the miles between you.

name: Sheldon
line: When I rise to power, those people will be sterilized.

name: Leonard
line: You video-chat with Amy all the time. How is this different?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't you like Amy?

name: Leonard
line: Of course I like Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, there's the difference.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me, that's Priya.

name: Priya
line: Hi, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, honey.

name: Priya
line: I miss you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I miss you, too.

name: Sheldon
line: I miss the old days when your romantic partners could be returned to the video store.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks for letting me stay here while Leonard Skypes with his girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's no problem. It's actually kind of nice. You reading, me reading. We're like an old married couple.

name: Sheldon
line: If we were an old married couple, the wife would serve iced tea and snickerdoodles.

name: Penny
line: I don't have iced tea and snickerdoodles.

name: Sheldon
line: A good wife would go to the store.

name: Penny
line: I want a divorce.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. On the way to see the lawyer, pick up some tea and cookies. I must say, I am enjoying your new chair.

name: Penny
line: It's great, isn't it?

name: Sheldon
line: It is. Aligns the lumbar, cradles the coccyx, balances the buttocks. This is a chair worthy of the name.

name: Penny
line: What name?

name: Sheldon
line: Chair.

name: Penny
line: Oh, all right, well, I'm glad you like it. I mean, I still can't get over the fact someone just threw it away.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it was just sitting on the street. I paid a homeless guy ten bucks to help me get it up here.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear. Oh, dear. Oh, dear.

name: Penny
line: What is wrong?

name: Sheldon
line: I've been sitting in garbage!

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, take it easy.

name: Sheldon
line: You take it easy! I need to use your shower.

name: Penny
line: I went into this marriage with so much hope.

name: Sheldon
line: There's a wet Band-Aid on the shower floor. .

name: Raj
line: This is fun. I've never used a hydraulic thermoforming press before.

name: Howard
line: Pretty sweet, huh? This little baby set the university back 175 grand.

name: Leonard
line: That's three minutes. Should we see what we got?

name: Howard
line: Hang on.

name: Raj
line: Oh, yeah. This is one good-looking panini.

name: Howard
line: Hand me the tuna melt.

name: Leonard
line: Yep.

name: Howard
line: Thank you. How's it going with the long-distance love affair?

name: Leonard
line: Not easy, but we're making it work.

name: Howard
line: When you say making it work, does that include doing the cyber nasty?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Howard
line: You know, the virtual pickle tickle. The digital bow-chicka-bow-bow.

name: Raj
line: Come on, dude. This is my sister you're talking about.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Leonard jiggling his junk at her through a webcam has got to be easier for you to deal with than him actually touching her with it.

name: Leonard
line: There's no junk jiggling. We just talk.

name: Howard
line: Are you insane? With high-speed Internet, you have at your fingertips the greatest advancement in the field of sex since the invention of the washcloth.

name: Leonard
line: I can't do that.

name: Howard
line: Well, if you don't, you're gonna lose Priya to some fancy guy in a turban who grew up with Kama Sutra coloring books.

name: Raj
line: How can you be so racist?

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on, tell me I'm wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Leonard, good. There you are. I need you to check my head for chair lice.

name: Leonard
line: I did it last night, I'm not doing it again.

name: Howard
line: Just his head, right?

name: Leonard
line: I don't want to talk about it. You didn't catch bugs from Penny's chair.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I did. And now they're cavorting at the base of my hair follicles like dancing hippies at the Redwood National Forest.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you do this all the time. You fixate on some crazy idea and then blow it way out of proportion.

name: Sheldon
line: Name one time I've ever done that.

name: Leonard
line: How about when you put GPS trackers in your garbage because you were convinced North Korean spies were stealing your doodles? The chicken nuggets you were sure were human nuggets. The strangely-shaped cloud that was following you around town. The time you put on my shirt by mistake and were convinced you'd started growing again.

name: Sheldon
line: I said, name one. You really need to work on your listening skills.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

name: Penny
line: Yello.

name: Sheldon
line: You need to remove that chair from the building. It's a health hazard.

name: Penny
line: Okay, relax. I took off the slipcovers, had them dry-cleaned and then fumigated the cushions.

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. It's cleaner than my couch. Found half a Hot Pocket in there.

name: Sheldon
line: It certainly looks okay. Has a strong toxic chemical smell. That's reassuring.

name: Penny
line: Why don't you give it a try, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. It is a comfortable chair.

name: Penny
line: Why don't you just admit you overreacted?

name: Sheldon
line: No, thank you. (Sees insect. More appear and swarm all over him. He jumps out of a daydream on his own couch. Jumps up and runs out to Penny's apartment.

line: It's like living with a Chihuahua.

line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

line: What's the word, hummingbird?

line: For your safety, please wait in my apartment as I call the authorities so they may remove the chair of death.

line: No.

line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

line: What's the gist, physicist?

name: Sheldon
line: Under my authority as a self-appointed member of the Centres for Disease Control street team, these premises are condemned.  As a man with a keen sense of style, I must tell you, that chair does not work with the room. .  Penny.  Penny.   Penny.

line: So, here we are. Back in bed together.

line: Yep, here we are.

line: Okay, so I, I, I guess I'll just jump right in.

line: Uh, you're a naughty girl. And, and, uh, I, I want to punish you with my love?

line: That's terrible. Try again.

line: Okay. Uh, uh, you're not naughty. Uh, you're, you're, you're dirty. You're, you're a, a dirty girl?

line: Oh, yes. Yes, I am.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, yeah. Uh, okay. You're a, you're a, you're a, a dirty, disgusting, revolting girl. Ugh!

line: God, Leonard, stop talking.

name: Leonard
line: Why don't you just give me five minutes? I'll Google how to do this. I'll call you right back.

name: Priya
line: Shh-shh-shh. Just be quiet and do what I tell you.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, like usual. Good.

name: Priya
line: Take off your shirt.

name: Leonard
line: All rightie. Shirt coming off. Ta-da! Man nipples.

name: Priya
line: I said be quiet.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, ma'am.

name: Priya
line: Now take off your shorts.

name: Leonard
line: Taking shorts off. There we go. Naked, naked, naked!

name: Priya
line: Wonderful. Now I'll take off my clothes.

name: Leonard
line: Cool.  Uh-oh!

name: Priya
line: Here I am, baby. You miss these?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, damn it!

name: Priya
line: Oh, Leonard! Already?

name: Leonard
line: No, no! No-no-no! The screen froze. It's probably just buffering, just give it a second.

name: Priya
line: Fine.

name: Leonard
line: So, how are your mom and dad?

name: Priya
line: Yeah, I really don't want to talk about my parents now.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Sure, sure.

name: Sheldon
line: If your video's frozen, try resetting the TCP/IP stack.

name: Leonard
line: Oh! I didn't even think of that. Thanks.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. Please let me know when you and your girlfriend are done hogging the bandwidth for your self-abuse. I'm trying to stream a movie on Netflix in here.

name: Amy
line: Five, six, seven, eight. Tall and tan and young and lovely, the girl from Ipanema goes walking, and when she passes, each one she passes goes...

name: Sheldon
line: Amy.  Amy.  Amy.

name: Amy
line: Oh... You are aware that your ritualistic knocking behaviour is symptomatic of obsessive compulsive disorder?

name: Sheldon
line: Is not. Is not, is not.

name: Amy
line: Denial. Denial, denial. Come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Would you like to hear me play a bossa nova standard on the harp?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Amy
line: How about the theme song to the classic television show Diff'rent Strokes? Now the world don't move to the beat...

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Amy
line: Well, that's every song I know. What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: You're good friends with Penny, right?

name: Amy
line: Best friends, besties, BFFs, peas in a pod, sisters who would share travelling pants. Go on.

name: Sheldon
line: I was hoping she might listen to you about the dangers of owning unhygienic furniture.

name: Amy
line: For general educational purposes, or has she acquired a bar stool dipped in cholera?

name: Sheldon
line: Cholera is water-borne. You're mocking me.

name: Amy
line: Yes, I am.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny has dragged a chair in off the street whose unknown provenance jeopardizes the health and welfare of every resident in our building.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, just because you have a focus on cleanliness bordering on the psychotic doesn't mean I have to participate.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, name your price.

name: Amy
line: Kiss me where I've never been kissed before.

name: Sheldon
line: You mean like Salt Lake City?

name: Amy
line: Never mind. I'll talk to Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Will you listen to me play my harp now?

name: Sheldon
line: No. I dislike the sound of the harp. Its overuse in classic television sitcoms always makes me think I'm going to experience an episode from my past.  I'm sorry, Mommy. Don't be mad at me. Don't do that!

name: Leonard
line: I don't know about this, Howard.

name: Howard
line: What? You're having trouble with the long-distance lovemaking. This is your answer. There are two interfaces that simulate a human mouth. You have one, Priya has one in India. When you move your lips and tongue on yours, it transmits exactly what you're doing to hers. See? Internet kissing.  Give it a try.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think so.

name: Raj
line: I'll try it. Like this?

name: Howard
line: Almost. Really get your tongue in there, to activate the motion sensor.

name: Raj
line: Like this?

name: Howard
line: Close. Really French it.

name: Raj
line: Better?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, you got it, you got it.

name: Raj
line: I'm impressed. This is very lifelike.

name: Howard
line: Whoa! You just bit my tongue!

name: Raj
line: I, I nibbled. I was being playful.

name: Howard
line: Why do you have to make everything weird?

name: Raj
line: Sorry. Better?

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Penny
line: Pretty cool, huh? Probably would cost, like, two hundred bucks in a store.

name: Amy
line: I do appreciate a bargain. This entire ensemble once belonged to my dead grandmother.

name: Penny
line: You're kidding.

name: Amy
line: Everything except bra and panties. And they're a leopard-spotted secret I share with Victoria.

name: Penny
line: And now me.

name: Amy
line: I just have one question about the chair.

name: Penny
line: And what's that?

name: Amy
line: Aren't you worried about it being unhygienic?

name: Penny
line: No, it's completely fine. Hmm. I get it. Sheldon sent you. He put you up to this.

name: Amy
line: No, he didn't.

name: Penny
line: Really?

name: Amy
line: Yes, he did. He absolutely did.

name: Penny
line: My God, Amy, that's really crappy of you.

name: Amy
line: It is?

name: Penny
line: Yeah! Letting Sheldon use you to manipulate me? I thought you were my friend.

name: Amy
line: No, I am your friend. Please don't be mad at me.

name: Penny
line: I can't even believe this. You know, maybe you should just go.

name: Amy
line: No, no, I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. I take it all back. Look. I'm, uh, I'm sitting in your chair. There's nothing wrong with it. It's a great chair. Please let me continue to be part of your world. Ow!

name: Penny
line: What's wrong?

name: Amy
line: Something in the chair's biting my tushy. It's not important. Ow!

name: Penny
line: Wait. Get up, get up!  Swear you won't tell Sheldon what happened!

name: Amy
line: I swear! Can I tell my doctor? I'm probably gonna need shots!

name: Penny
line: Yeah, sure!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey, babe, I think I figured this thing out.

name: Priya
line: Oh, Leonard, listen...

name: Leonard
line: No, you listen. You're my woman, and I'm gonna make you feel things you have never felt before.

name: Priya
line: Leonard...

name: Leonard
line: That's right, say my name, and beg me for more, 'cause, I'm gonna give it to you.

line: My parents are here.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Hello, Leonard, if I may also say your name.

name: Howard
line: Check it out. Free chair.

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Hey, you know, if this was in Sheldon and Leonard's apartment, I wouldn't wind up sitting on the floor all the time.

name: Howard
line: On three?

name: Together
line: Three!

name: Raj
line: What kind of idiot throws away a terrific chair like this?

name: Penny
line: Oh my God, I love this chicken.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you know what they say, the best things in life are free.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you're right, I eat your food a lot. How about this, you can raid my fridge any time you want.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's very kind of you. Next time I have a hankering to wash down a D cell battery with a jar of old pickle juice, I'll come a-knocking.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Raj, you didn't send your RSVP in. I'm supposed to ask you if you're bringing someone to the wedding.

name: Raj
line: I'll let you know.

name: Howard
line: Well, can you make it soon. There's a battle royale going on over the seating charts. In one corner, Bernadette's mom, and the other three, mine.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I hate wedding receptions. I wish the bride and groom would take a cue from Bilbo Baggins, slip on the ring, disappear and everyone goes home.

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, you liked Professor Guyster's wedding.

name: Sheldon
line: They had a make your own sundae bar. Ooh, that was a night to remember. Do you know, on the one trip, I just had a bowl of nuts.

name: Howard
line: Anyway, you gotta let me know if you have a plus one, because if not my mom's trying to sneak in the doctor who sucked the fat out of her neck.

name: Raj
line: Alright, uh, fine, I'm coming and I'm bringing somebody. Uh, Koothrappali plus one.

name: Leonard
line: Who you bringing?

name: Raj
line: Who are you bringing?

name: Penny
line: He's bringing me. Who are you bringing?

name: Raj
line: Wow, what a bunch of Nosey O'Donnells.

name: Howard
line: Come on, who is it?

name: Raj
line: I'm not telling. I'm from Asia. I'm mysterious. Deal with it.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, are you having a make your own sundae bar?

name: Howard
line: No, uh, I don't think so.

name: Sheldon
line: Well you should. 50% of marriages end in divorce, but 100% of make your own sundae bars end in happiness.

name: Raj
line: Hello Mummy, Daddy, how are you?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: Pretty good, can't complain.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Oh I'm sure you can. Just give it a minute.

name: Raj
line: Listen, uh, there's something I want to talk to you about. I, I wasn't ready until now, but I think it's time.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: It's finally happening. You're coming out of the closet, aren't you?

name: Mrs Koothrappali
line: We love you, and we accept your alternate lifestyle. Just keep it to yourself.

line: No, I'm not gay. If anything, I'm metrosexual.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: What's that?

name: Raj
line: It means I like women as well as their skincare products.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Well, if you're not coming out, why did you call us during the cricket semi-finals?

name: Raj
line: ‘Cause I, I'm tired of trying to meet someone and, I think I'd like you to help me find uh, a wife.

name: Mrs Koothrappali

name: Raj
line: Yes.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Matchmaking, very smart move son. Much better than marrying for love.
