line: We married for love.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: And it's been wonderful.

name: Sheldon
line: Quantum physics makes me so happy.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm glad.

name: Sheldon
line: It's like looking at the universe naked.

name: Penny
line: Hi, you guys got a minute?

name: Leonard
line: Sure, what's up?

name: Penny
line: Well, I was thinking about Sheldon's little joke the other night about me eating all your food.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that was no joke. But I understand your confusion as I am our group's resident cut-up.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, you are our resident cut-up?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: Prove it.

name: Sheldon
line: Knock, knock.

name: Leonard
line: Who's there?

name: Sheldon
line: Interrupting physicist.

name: Leonard
line: Interrupting physi...

name: Sheldon
line: MUON!

name: Penny
line: Anyway, I got a little residual cheque from my commercial and I thought, hey, how about I get the guys a little thankyou to pay them back. So, Sheldon, ta-da!

name: Sheldon
line: Ah! A vintage, mint in box, 1975 Mego Star Trek transporter with real transporter action. Hot-darn!

name: Leonard
line: Where did you get that?

name: Penny
line: Uh, from Stuart at the comic-book store.

name: Leonard
line: You went to the comic-book store by yourself?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it was fun, I walked in and two different guys got asthma attacks. Felt pretty good.

name: Sheldon
line: Well this calls for an expression of gratitude.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, am I about to get a rare Sheldon Cooper hug?

name: Sheldon
line: Not this time. Then they wouldn't be special. Thanks Penny.

name: Penny
line: You're welcome. Don't worry, I didn't forget about you. Leonard, I got you a label maker.

name: Leonard
line: Wow. No, it's great. Also, uh, mint in box.

name: Penny
line: Mmm. And, I got you a transporter too!

name: Leonard
line: Awesome!

name: Sheldon
line: Look, it was actually designed for my vintage Mr Spock action figure.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's great. Let's open it up and put him in there.

name: Leonard
line: Ah!

name: Sheldon
line: Oh dear Lord. No!

name: Penny
line: Why, they're just toys?

name: Sheldon
line: They're mint in box.

name: Leonard
line: They're Collectables.

name: Penny
line: C'mon can't we just open one up and take a...

name: Together
line: No!

name: Leonard
line: Once you open the box it loses its value.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah, my mom gave me the same lecture about my virginity. Gotta tell you, it was a lot more fun taking it out and playing with it.

name: Bernadette
line: Are you sure you want us here when you meet this woman?

name: Raj
line: Oh yes. In my culture it's expected to have a chaparone to oversee a first date. Plus I want to make a good impression and, no offence, but with you guys here I look like six two.

name: Bernadette
line: The nuns always chaparoned the dances at my high school. They used to make us leave room between us for the holy spirit.

name: Howard
line: Hindus do the same thing. Except they leave room for a cow.

name: Raj
line: Listen, I love your charming racist humour, but any chance you could not knock my religion while she's here.

name: Howard
line: Yesterday you made fun of me for eating lox.

name: Raj
line: It's different. You're people don't worship lox.

name: Howard
line: Well clearly you've never been to brunch with my cousins.

name: Bernadette
line: So, arranged marriages. The parents just decide, and then you have to get married?

name: Raj
line: Oh, no, no, I get a say in it. But I'm sure whoever shows up will be better company than a threesome I've been having with Aunt Jemima and Mrs Butterworth.

name: Girl
line: Excuse me, are you Rajesh?

name: Raj
line: Oh, yes. You must be Lakshmi. Uh, nice to meet you.

name: Lakshmi
line: Nice to meet you too.

name: Raj
line: Oh, uh, these are my, my friends. This is Bernadette.

name: Bernadette
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: And this is Howard.

name: Howard
line: Nice to meet you.

name: Lakshmi
line: You too.

name: Raj
line: Please have a seat.  I'm thinking double wedding!

name: Voice of Spock
line: Dr Cooper. Dr Cooper?

name: Sheldon
line: Is someone there?

name: Spock
line: Down here, on your desk.

name: Sheldon
line: Spock?

name: Spock
line: I need to speak with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Fascinating. The only logical explanation is that this is a dream.

name: Spock
line: It is not the only logical explanation. For example, you could be hallucinating after being hit on the head by, say, a coconut.

name: Sheldon
line: Was I hit on the head by a coconut.

name: Spock
line: I'm not going to dignify that with a response. Now, to the matter at hand. You need to play with the transporter toy.

name: Sheldon
line: But it's mint in box.

name: Spock
line: Yes, and to open it would destroy it's value. But remember, like me, you also have a human half.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm not going to dignify that with a response.

name: Spock
line: Consider this. What is the purpose of a toy?

name: Sheldon
line: To be played with.

name: Spock
line: Therefore? To not play with it would be?

name: Sheldon
line: Illogical. Oh, damn it Spock, you're right. I'll do it.

name: Spock
line: Sheldon, wait. You have to wake up first.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course. Set phasers to dumb, right?  Goody, goody, goody. This is wrong. This is wrong. I'm so excited, but this is wrong. I'm gonna do it. I'm doing it. I did it. Oh, that's what I always thought 1975 smelled like. One to beam down Mr Scott. Aye, aye, Mr Spock. Energise. . Energise.  Don't be broken. Please don't be broken.  What did you make me do? Okay, okay, think.  It's only logical.

name: Lakshmi
line: My goodness, that was delicious.

name: Raj
line: Well, I hope you saved room for chocolate lava cake.

name: Lakshmi
line: Impressive. What goes into making something like that.

name: Raj
line: Well, you start off by trying to make chocolate souffle, and when it falls you panic, quickly change the name, and voila! Lava cake.

name: Lakshmi
line: I bet our parents are dying to know how things are going here.

name: Raj
line: Well, let's see. Yup, three missed calls.

name: Lakshmi
line: Four missed calls, two text messages, and a failed video chat. I win. So, what are we going to tell them.

name: Raj
line: I'd like to tell them things are going well.

name: Lakshmi
line: Me too. But before we get their hopes up we should probably make sure we're on the same page.

name: Raj
line: Okay, what page are you on?

name: Lakshmi
line: I'm on the one where I'm on a lot of pressure from my parents to get married and settle down, and have a family, and I'm going to do it so they don't find out I'm gay.

name: Raj
line: Say again.

name: Lakshmi
line: I'm gay.

name: Raj
line: Like, dude on dude, but with women?

name: Lakshmi
line: I know a fake marriage isn't an honest way to live, but you of all people must know how difficult it is to come out in our culture.

name: Raj
line: Why me, of all people?

name: Lakshmi
line: Well, there is a rumour back in New Delhi that you're, how shall we say, comfortable in a sari.

name: Raj
line: I'm not gay.

name: Lakshmi
line: Really? The chocolate lava cake? The little soaps in the bathroom? And I'm sorry, but you're wearing more perfume than I am.

name: Raj
line: That's Unbreakable by Khloe and Lamar. And for your information, it's unisex.

name: Lakshmi
line: Fill in the blank. I love the nightlife?

name: Raj
line: I like to boogie.

name: Lakshmi
line: Got you.

name: Raj
line: W-w-with women. I like to boogie with women.

name: Lakshmi
line: That's disappointing. You were exactly the kind of phoney-baloney husband I was looking for.

name: Raj
line: Thankyou. And once again, my baloney likes girls. Wait-wait. You don't want to put a bit of that in your mouth without trying my homemade chantilly cream. Yeah, okay, that time I heard it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh dear. Two suns and no sunscreen.

name: Spock
line: Hello again, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: What is it now, tiny Spock?

name: Spock
line: I am very disappointed in you. You broke your toy and switched it with Leonard's. You should be ashamed of yourself.

name: Sheldon
line: You're the one who told me to play with it.

name: Spock
line: If I told you to jump off the bridge of the Enterprise, would you do it?

name: Sheldon
line: No. If I got on the bridge of the Enterprise, I would never, ever leave.

name: Spock
line: Trust me, it gets old after a while. You must right your wrong, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Why? I got away with it. Leonard has his toy, and he's never going to open it, so he won't know it's broken. And I have a toy that isn't broken. Everybody's happy.

name: Spock
line: Well I am unhappy.

name: Sheldon
line: I thought where you come from they don't have emotions.

name: Spock
line: I come from a factory in Taiwan. Now do the right thing.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what you are? Well, you're a green blooded buzzkill. Perhaps it's time you beam on out of here.

name: Spock
line: Fine. I will just use the transporter. Oh, right. You broke it.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. Cooper to Enterprise, one to beam up. Energise.  Ah. Tiny Spock. Help.

name: Raj
line: Ready for lunch?

name: Howard
line: Yep, one sec.  Ah, good. Ma would have killed me if she'd found out I'd broke my retainer.

name: Raj
line: Hey, uh, can I run something by you? It's about Lakshmi.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Sure. How are things going?

name: Raj
line: We hit a couple of bumps. She lives over on Manhattan Beach, so it takes over an hour to get there. And she's a lesbian.

name: Howard
line: What do you mean, she's a lesbian?

name: Raj
line: Well, you know whenever you and I would try to hit on women in bars, and they'd blow us off, and then we'd tell each other they were probably gay. It's like that. Except this time it's true.

name: Howard
line: Then why did she even go out with you?

name: Raj
line: She was looking for a husband so she can appear to be straight. And you know, it sounded crazy to me at first, but I'm actually thinking about doing it.

name: Howard
line: Okay, well, so the reason that might sound crazy, is 'cause it's crazy.

name: Raj
line: Look, Howard, you're in a relationship. You know you have to make compromises.

name: Howard
line: Well, yes. But my compromises are about which bedspread to buy, or whose turn it is to do the laundry, Bernadette's or my mom's.

name: Raj
line: It's a great deal. We both get our parents off our backs. I don't have to come home to an empty apartment every night, plus, once I'm married, I can finally eat carbs again and let myself go.

name: Howard
line: Why don't you tell your parents you want to try and find someone else, you know, maybe one who hasn't slept with more women than you.

name: Raj
line: Because this one wants to marry me. I might never find another one who does.

name: Howard
line: So you're seriously thinking about marrying someone you're never going to have sex with.

name: Raj
line: I can't believe your attitude. I thought you were in favour of gay people getting married.

name: Howard
line: Yes, to other gay people.

name: Raj
line: Do you hear how homophobic you sound?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I don't want a broken toy.  Nothing!

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Nothing. I said nothing.

name: Penny
line: That was weird.

name: Leonard
line: Really? I don't even notice any more.

name: Penny
line: I cannot believe you guys aren't going to play with these.

name: Leonard
line: Well I told you, you don't, it's mint in box.

name: Penny
line: I dunno. I just think it's a waste.  Relax. I'm just looking at the box.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps you should look with your eyes, and not your muscular Nebraska man-hands.

name: Penny
line: What is your problem?

name: Sheldon
line: My problem is that I don't want you to break Leonard's toy, which you probably did by shaking it. She shook it. We all saw her.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, I bought you this because I wanted you to have fun with it. I don't want it to just sit in this box.

name: Leonard
line: You know, you're right. I mean, it's from you, I'm never going to sell it. I'm opening it.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Mmmmm!

name: Leonard
line: It's broken.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, nice job, man-hands.

name: Penny
line: I didn't break it. I, I guess Stuart sold it to me like this.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Yes, he did, that is a perfectly satisfying and plausible explanation. Yeah, let's all be mad at Stuart.

name: Penny
line: You know, I paid a lot for this. Let's take it over there and show him.

name: Leonard
line: Absolutely.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. It was me. I opened your toy, discovered it was broken and didn't tell you.

name: Leonard
line: Why would you open mine?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't. That was a lie. I opened my own toy. And it was already broken so I switched them.

name: Leonard
line: Well, you should talk to Stuart.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't because that was a lie. Yours was broken in an earthquake. And that's a lie.

name: Penny
line: What is the truth?

name: Sheldon
line: My Mr Spock doll came to me in a dream and forced me to open it. And when the toy broke I switched it for yours. Later he encouraged me to do the right thing and I defied him. And then I was attacked by a Gorn.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, that I believe.

name: Penny
line: Mmm.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, Penny, I just, I want you both to know that I regret my actions toward the two of you. That's a lie.

name: Leonard
line: So, is that one mine.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: Well, hand it over so I can open it.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Leonard, even though I don't have one any more, I hope you have fun playing with it.

name: Leonard
line: And that's a lie, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Big fat whopper. I hope it breaks.

name: Raj
line: This is a treat, what brings you guys by?

name: Bernadette
line: Raj, Howie told me what's going on with you and Lakshmi.

name: Raj
line: What, you told her?

name: Howard
line: I told everybody.

name: Bernadette
line: We believe there's someone out there who'll love you for you.

name: Howard
line: Well, actually we kind of agreed to disagree on that one, but we both think you shouldn't marry this woman.

name: Raj
line: So, while I'm waiting for this mysterious perfect match, who may or may not exist, I'm supposed to just be alone.

name: Bernadette
line: Not necessarily. I think we've found someone for you to cuddle with.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my goodness. Aren't you the cutest little Yorkie ever? You got him for me?

name: Howard
line: Her. We thought you two would hit it off.

name: Raj
line: I think we already have. Thank you guys so much. Let's see if you fit in my man purse.

name: Bernadette
line: Metrosexual my ass.

name: Howard
line: So, I got the craziest e-mail this morning.

name: Raj
line: I don't mean to burst your bubble, dude, but those penile enlargement pills do not work.

name: Howard
line: Believe me, I know. The e-mail I got was from the office of Stephen Hawking.

name: Leonard
line: You're kidding.

name: Raj
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: He's coming to the university for a couple weeks to lecture, and he's looking for an engineer to help maintain the equipment on his wheelchair.

name: Leonard
line: That's amazing. You'll be like his pit crew. A word of caution, I would not do your Stephen Hawking impression in front of him.

name: Howard
line: You're right. I suppose that could be considered offensive.

name: Raj
line: Oh, boy, Sheldon's going to freak out.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, he worships Hawking.

name: Howard
line: I was actually thinking about bringing him along when I go over there so he can meet the great man.

name: Raj
line: That's really nice of you, Howard.

name: Howard
line: Hm, it's no big deal.

name: Leonard
line: Boy, a restraining order from Stephen Hawking. It'll look so nice next to the ones he's already got from Leonard Nimoy, Carl Sagan and Stan Lee.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, do you recall when I said that I was going to revolutionize humanity's understanding of the Higgs boson particle, and you said, Sheldon, it's two a.m., get out of my bedroom?

name: Leonard
line: Like it was ten hours ago. What about it?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I believe I've done it. And I'm only saying believe to sound modest, because, sweet Sam Houston, I did it.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Raj
line: That's incredible. Oh, here, break out the math.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, okay, let me see this. All right, so this particle here is the boson moving forward in time. Now, I was thinking... Howard, you go ahead and eat. This isn't going to make any sense to you.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, I have a working understanding of physics.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, good for you, and don't stop working on it.

name: Raj
line: Are you still going to tell him about you-know-who?

name: Howard
line: Yep.

name: Leonard
line: Still going to introduce him?

name: Howard
line: Not on your life.

name: Sheldon
line: Please, please, please let me meet Hawking.

name: Howard
line: I told you, no.

name: Sheldon
line: But I said I'm sorry.

name: Howard
line: No, you said, would it help if I said I'm sorry?

name: Sheldon
line: And you never answered me. So who owes whom an apology now?

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, you're a condescending jerk. Why on earth would I want to do something nice for you?

name: Sheldon
line: Um, to go to Jewish heaven?

name: Howard
line: Jews don't have heaven.

name: Sheldon
line: Then to avoid Jewish hell?

name: Howard
line: Have you met my mother? I live in Jewish hell.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, please. This is Stephen Hawking. Perhaps my only intellectual equal.

name: Howard
line: Oh, you can't be serious.

name: Sheldon
line: Try to put yourself in my place. Imagine you're the sole human being living on a planet populated with nothing but dogs. And then it turns out there's another human being.

name: Howard
line: Hang on. Are you saying the rest of us are dogs?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, okay, I can see you're going to take this the wrong way. Let me try again. Imagine you're the sole human being living on a planet populated with nothing but chimps.

name: Howard
line: Get out of my lab.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, now they're so much smarter than dogs. Have you seen them on those little bicycles?

name: Howard
line: Get out.

name: Sheldon
line: How about dolphins?

name: Howard
line: Out!

name: Leonard
line: So, come on, how was the first day with Hawking?

name: Howard
line: It was great. We talked about movies.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh!

name: Howard
line: I showed him some card tricks.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh!

name: Howard
line: He even let me read a couple pages from his new book.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh!

name: Howard
line: Something got you down there, bunky?

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, please, I'm begging you.

name: Leonard
line: Raj, you're our group historian. Has Sheldon ever begged before?

name: Raj
line: Three times. He begged the Fox network not to cancel Firefly. He begged the TNT network to cancel Babylon 5. And when he got food poisoning at the Rose Bowl Parade, he begged a deity he doesn't believe in to end his life quickly.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you understand how important Hawking is to me? When I was six years old, I dressed up as him for Halloween.

name: Howard
line: You're kidding.

name: Sheldon
line: No, sir, no, I took my dad's desk chair, attached a Speak & Spell to it and made my sister push me up and down the block to trick or treat. Granted most people thought I was R2-D2, but still, I got a lot of candy.

name: Howard
line: You don't seem to be understanding the English word no. Maybe a different language will help. Russian, nyet. Chinese, bu. Japanese, iie. Klingon, qo. Binary coded Ascii, 0110111001101111.

name: Sheldon
line: It's actually 01100111.

name: Howard
line: No!

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not asking for me, I'm asking for Hawking.

name: Howard
line: Let me try gansta, hells no.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, look, how about this? Just give him my paper on the Higgs boson. If he sees the incredible breakthrough I've made, he'll reach out to me.

name: Leonard
line: What if he doesn't?

name: Sheldon
line: He will, he's really smart.

name: Howard
line: That's an interesting idea. Why don't you give me a minute to talk it over with my friends?

name: Sheldon
line: How do I do that?

name: Howard
line: You walk away.

name: Sheldon
line: Walking away.

name: Leonard
line: You do realize you own his ass right now.

name: Howard
line: I do.

name: Raj
line: You can make him do anything you want.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I know, I'm just trying to figure out how much I want to punish him.

name: Raj
line: Well, don't be too mean.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, fellas, I'm thinking about making some freshly brewed iced tea if anyone would like some.

name: Raj
line: I wouldn't mind a glass.

name: Sheldon
line: I wasn't talking to you.

name: Raj
line: Bring him to his bony knees.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, come on back.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, yes. What did you decide?

name: Howard
line: I'll give your paper to Professor Hawking.

name: Sheldon
line: Great, thank you. Oh, that's terrific.

name: Howard
line: But in exchange, I'd like you to do a few things for me.

name: Sheldon
line: What kinds of things?

name: Howard
line: Are you familiar with the 12 labours of Hercules?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course.

name: Howard
line: You should be so lucky.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. What would you like me to do first?

name: Howard
line: Well, I thought I'd start you off by polishing my belt buckles.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. By all means. When I was a boy, I would polish my Mee-Maw's silver. And she would entertain me with stories about growing up in Oklahoma. Interesting woman. You know, she once killed a prairie dog with a gravy boat.

name: Howard
line: That's nice.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a lot of belt buckles.

name: Howard
line: Funny thing is, I only have one belt. Anyway, I'll let you get started. Oh, by the way, the little marks, uh, that look like water spots, I tend to stand too close to the urinal, so what you're seeing there is splash back.

name: Sheldon
line: You make sissy on your belt buckles? Mee-Maw's forks never had that.

name: Howard
line: Here is a black light to check them. And for your own peace of mind, you might not want to shine that around the rest of the room.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, these look great. They're like magnificent little crowns to hang over my magnificent little jewels. How'd you get them so shiny?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I-I buffed them with Turtle Wax. The man down at Pep Boys says from now on, the urine should just bead up and roll right off.

name: Howard
line: Way to go the extra mile. Your Mee-Maw would be proud.

name: Sheldon
line: My Mee-Maw must never know of this. Now will you give Professor Hawking my paper?

name: Howard
line: Oh, my dear boy, no. Okay. Next, this is a sexy French maid costume I bought for Bernadette. I thought it might spice things up and get her to dust my room at the same time, but I was wrong and really wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: And you want me to return it for you?

name: Howard
line: No, no, no, mon petit cherie.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you all staring at? Didn't you ever see a man try to get a meeting with Stephen Hawking before?

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: It's not Saturday night. Why are you doing your laundry?

name: Sheldon
line: This is not my laundry.

name: Penny
line: Wow, are these Amy's? Kind of trashy, good for her.

name: Sheldon
line: Those are Howard's.

name: Penny
line: Ugh. Why are you washing Howard's man panties?

name: Sheldon
line: Because if I don't, he won't give my paper to Stephen Hawking. He's a famous physicist.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah, I know, he's the wheelchair dude who invented time.

name: Sheldon
line: That's close enough.

name: Penny
line: I don't understand, why doesn't Howard just introduce you to the guy?

name: Sheldon
line: Because he's punishing me for being a, quote, condescending jerk. You don't think I'm condescending, do you?

name: Penny
line: Well...

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm sorry, condescending means...

name: Penny
line: I know what it means. And yes, you love correcting people and putting them down.

name: Sheldon
line: Au contraire. When I correct people I am raising them up. You should know, I do it for you more than anyone.

name: Penny
line: Come on, you do it to feel superior. I see that twinkle in your eye when someone says who instead of whom or thinks the moon is a planet.

name: Sheldon
line: Or Don Quixote is a book about a donkey named Hotay.

name: Penny
line: See, there it is, there's that twinkle.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I can't help it. That's an involuntary twinkle.

name: Penny
line: What do you want me to tell you, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: I want you to tell me that Howard is being mean to me for no reason.

name: Penny
line: Fine, Howard is being mean to you for no reason.

name: Sheldon
line: I knew it.

name: Howard
line: What's the matter?

name: Bernadette
line: Every time I spend the night, your mom slaps me on the behind and says, go get ‘im.

name: Howard
line: It's not her fault. She's getting hormone replacement therapy. Makes her crazy horny. Check this out, I got Sheldon to wear the French maid's costume.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, my God, that's terrible.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I gave you first crack at it.

name: Bernadette
line: Why are you doing that? You're being mean to him.

name: Howard
line: He's mean to me all the time. You've heard him tease me about not having a doctorate.

name: Bernadette
line: If you don't want to get teased about that, get a doctorate. I have one, they're great.

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on, the man torments me. I'm just letting him have a little taste of his own medicine.

name: Bernadette
line: It's not the same thing. Sheldon doesn't know when he's being mean because the part of his brain that should know is getting a wedgie from the rest of his brain.

name: Howard
line: Fine, I'll just make him do a couple more things, then I'll stop.

name: Bernadette
line: No, you have to stop now.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Bernadette, I want to remind you, you promised to take me dress shopping tomorrow!

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, damn. I'm sorry, I can't make it, but Sheldon's going to go with you! And that's the last thing you do to him.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Sheldon! I need your help!

name: Sheldon
line: What is it now, Mrs. Wolowitz?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: It's this dress. When I put my front in, my back pops out. When I put my back in, my front pops out. It's like trying to keep two dogs in a bathtub!

name: Sheldon
line: What do you want me to do?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: We're gonna have to work as a team. Get in here, grab a handful, and start stuffing.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not sure how to do this.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: It's easy, just pretend you're putting away a sleeping bag.

name: Sheldon
line: Sleeping bags don't usually sweat this much, but okay.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Now zip me up.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, if we squeeze you any tighter, you may turn into a diamond.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: You're right, who am I kidding? You should have seen me when I was young, Sheldon. The fellas used to line up and bring me boxes of candy. Why did I eat it all? Would you hold me?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, you know, I'm not really the holding kind of... Oh!

name: Howard
line: Oh, guys, I just remembered. I got you some Hawking souvenirs.

name: Leonard
line: What are these?

name: Howard
line: Gears and springs from his wheelchair. Pretty cool, huh?

name: Raj
line: Wow, that's amazing.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I made an adjustment on the motor drive and when I was putting it back together I could not for the life of me figure out where they went.

name: Sheldon
line: I did it. Had to go to three clothing stores, but we finally found a dress that could envelop your mother.

name: Howard
line: I should have sent you to the custom car cover place in Altadena. They have her pattern on file.

name: Sheldon
line: Humorous. Now will you please present my paper to Professor Hawking?

name: Howard
line: I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, for heaven's sake. I did your laundry, I pee-pee-proofed your belt buckles, I, I even sprained my wrist helping your mother lift her bosom.

name: Howard
line: All right, Sheldon, there's only one thing left I want you to do. Don't worry, it's an easy one.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: Give me a compliment.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. You have very tiny hands.

name: Howard
line: No, about my job. I want you to tell me I'm good at what I do.

name: Sheldon
line: You're obviously good at what you do.

name: Howard
line: Well, then why are you always ripping on me?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I understand the confusion. I have never said that you are not good at what you do. It's just that what you do is not worth doing.

name: Leonard
line: It's nicer than anything he's ever said to me. I'd take it and run.

name: Howard
line: Thank you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Now will you give my paper to Hawking?

name: Howard
line: Sorry, I can't.

name: Sheldon
line: What, why not?

name: Howard
line: I gave it to him three days ago. He was really impressed. He wants to meet you.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, then. Thank you, Howard. Please let Professor Hawking know that I'm available at his earliest convenience.

name: Raj
line: I thought he might be a little more excited.

name: Leonard
line: Give it a second.

name: Sheldon
line: Professor Hawking, it's an honour and a privilege to meet you, sir.

name: Hawking
line: I know.

name: Sheldon
line: I want to thank you for taking time to see me.

name: Hawking
line: My pleasure. I enjoyed reading your paper very much. You clearly have a brilliant mind.

name: Sheldon
line: I know.

name: Hawking
line: Your thesis that the Higgs boson is a black hole accelerating backwards through time is fascinating.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. It just, it came to me one morning in the shower.

name: Hawking
line: That's nice. Too bad it's wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you mean wrong?

name: Hawking
line: You made an arithmetic mistake on page two. It was quite the boner.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, th-th-th-that can't be right. I-I don't make arithmetic mistakes.

name: Hawking
line: Are you saying I do?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, no, no, of course not. It's just, I was thinking... Oh, gosh, golly, I made a boo-boo, and I gave it to Stephen Hawking.

name: Hawking
line: Great, another fainter.

name: Sheldon
line: I wish you could all be inside my head. The conversation is sparkling.  Fine, I'll tell you. A lichen is an organism made up of two separate species, fungi and algae. If you could merge with another species, what species would you pick and why? Hint, there is a right answer. None of you will get it.

name: Raj
line: Okay, uh, I'd pick swan because, uh, the resulting hybrid would have the advanced industrial civilization of a human and the long graceful neck I've always dreamed of having.

name: Sheldon
line: Wrong. Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Horse, but mostly just for the height. A little bit for the genital girth.

name: Sheldon
line: Wrong, and let's keep it clean, shall we?

name: Howard
line: Kangaroo, uh, I'd be a Kanga-Jew. The first of my people to dunk a basketball.

name: Leonard
line: Also instead of just living in your mother's house, you could actually live inside her body.

name: Sheldon
line: Clever, but also wrong. No, the best organism for human beings to merge with is the lichen itself. That way, you'd be human, fungus, and algae. Triple threat. Like three-bean salad.

name: Leonard
line: Give me one circumstance in which that would be useful.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, picture this, a beautiful outdoor concert. Now, as a human, I appreciate Beethoven. As a fungus, I have a terrific view, growing out of a towering maple tree. And no thank you, expensive concessions. Because as an algae, I'll just snack on this sunlight.

name: Raj
line: He got us again.

name: Leonard
line: No, he didn't.

name: Raj
line: Anyway, if it's okay with you, we should talk about Howard's bachelor party.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, seems like a bit of a let down after our lichen conversation, but, what do you know, you're half swan.

name: Raj
line: I've been doing some research on strippers. One agency I spoke to, said I could get us a great price if we're flexible on age range and number of limbs.

name: Howard
line: Sounds like loads of fun, but I promised Bernadette no strippers.

name: Raj
line: You don't want strippers? You're the king of strippers. The one club in North Hollywood named a pole after you.

name: Howard
line: What can I tell ya, I'm not into that stuff any more.

name: Leonard
line: Good for you, Howard. I'm proud of you. And still, you're the first one of us to get married. We have to do something special.

name: Sheldon
line: You know Germans have an interesting pre-wedding custom.

name: Howard
line: Well, it's probably not for me.

name: Raj
line: Maybe we can go up to Napa Valley. They've got that wine train.

name: Sheldon
line: Boo, wine! But yay, trains. I'm in.

name: Raj
line: Anyway, it's a beautiful time of year. Uh, you travel through the vineyards. There's a tasting on board. And all the wild flowers are in bloom. It's magic.

name: Leonard
line: Look at that, in 30 seconds, we went from hiring women to being them.

name: Penny
line: So, I hear you and the lost boys are having a bachelor party tonight.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, just going to a restaurant, get some steaks and scotch. Nothing to worry about.

name: Penny
line: Why should I worry?

name: Leonard
line: Well, I don't know. It's a bachelor party. There could be strippers. Wouldn't that make you a little jealous?

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on Leonard, it's you. What's going to happen? I mean, even if there was a stripper, all you'd do is avoid eye-contact and maybe offer to help her kid with his homework.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I am a young man in his sexual prime. Under the right conditions, I-I-I am capable of just, really crazy stuff.

name: Penny
line: Really? What is the craziest thing you've ever done with a woman? And the time you and I had sex in the ocean does not count.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on, that's got to count. There was a really strong undertow, we could have died.

name: Penny
line: Well, have fun tonight.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I will. There is no telling what might happen.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, there is.

name: Leonard
line: You know, there's nothing wrong helping some woman's kid get through their S.A.T.'s.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I got to hand it to Raj, he found a really nice spot to have a bachelor party.

name: Sheldon
line: It's not bad. Unless you compare it to a train; then it stinks.

name: Leonard
line: Are you drinking whisky?

name: Sheldon
line: Indeed. If I'm to participate in the social convention that is the stag night, then I must embrace all its components, including tobacco, swear words, and yes, alcohol. Jeepers! That's yucky.

name: Leonard
line: Whoa, it's a little early to start dropping J-bombs, don't you think?

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Hey, you guys.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey, Wil. Nice of you to make it out tonight for Howard.

name: Wil
line: Well, it was either this or another hot tub party at George Takei's house.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm confused. I thought since our reconciliation, I was your friend in this group.

name: Wil
line: Oh, I'm friends with Howard too.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I guess you're just friends with anybody.  Aagh!

name: Stuart
line: Hey, uh, Leonard, things are a little tight at the comic book store. I might need some help covering my share of the check.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah, no worries.

name: Stuart
line: And maybe a few bucks for the valet.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, all right.

name: Stuart
line: And gas money to get home.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Stuart
line: Great. You know what? This is my grandfather's watch.

name: Leonard
line: Oh.

name: Stuart
line: 18-carat gold, got it in Europe during the war.

name: Leonard
line: Wow, that's very nice.

name: Stuart
line: Mm-hmm. A hundred bucks and it's yours.

name: Raj
line: Hey, everybody! The bachelor boy has arrived! For he's a jolly good fellow...

name: All
line: For he's a jolly good fellow, for he's a jolly good fellow, which nobody can deny.

name: Kripke
line: Yes, yes, yes. He's a jowwy good fewwow. What time do the stwippers awwive?

name: Howard
line: Actually, Barry, we're not going to have strippers tonight.

name: Kripke
line: Ah, then what the fwig did I get two hundwed dowwaws in singles out for?

name: Stuart
line: You want to buy a watch?

name: Amy
line: This is Maid of Honour Amy Farrah Fowler, bringing you the wedding activities just weeks out from the big day. Let's check in with a beautiful, radiant young woman, and her friend who's about to get married. Ladies, can you tell us what you're doing?

name: Bernadette
line: Um, these are gift bags we're going to put in the hotel rooms of our out-of-town guests. This is a map of Pasadena. This is a list of local restaurants. And then, for Howie's relatives, we have antihistamines, antacids, and medicine for diarrhoea and constipation.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, we labeled them stop and go.

name: Amy
line: All right, pivoting to the big question. Bernadette, on your wedding night you'll be consummating your marriage. What do you think your first sexual position will be as husband and wife?

name: Bernadette
line: Amy, please.

name: Amy
line: Keeping in mind that whoever's on top may set the tone for the marriage.

name: Penny
line: Okay, show's over.

name: Amy
line: Hey, they may conceive a child on their wedding night. Don't you think the kid might get a kick out of knowing how it happened?

name: Penny
line: I don't care. Ask her things like are you going to take Howard's name? Not who's going to sit on who?

name: Penny
line: Nice. You know, you should totally get BernadetteMaryAnnRostenkowskiWolowitz.com before someone snaps it up.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard already took care of it. Plus, he set up our beautiful wedding website with cute little facts about our family histories. Do you know, for a while in Poland, my family and his family were neighbours.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's cool.

name: Amy
line: No, it's not. I'll explain it to you later.

name: Raj
line: May I have your attention, please? We are hear tonight to celebrate the upcoming nuptials of my best friend Howard Wolowitz.

name: All
line: Hear! Hear!

name: Sheldon
line: And, apparently, Wil Wheaton's best friend.

name: Wil
line: Sheldon...

name: Sheldon
line: Talk to the hand.

name: Raj
line: Does anyone have any words they'd like to say about our man of the evening?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I do. . As is the tradition, I have prepared a series of disrespectful jokes which generate humour at Howard's expense. Prepare to have your ribs tickled. Howard, I always thought you'd be the last one of us to ever get married, because you are so short and unappealing. Am I right? Let's see here. Oh, seriously though, Howard, you're actually one of the most intelligent people I know. And that's a zinger, because you're not. I've always thought that you'd make someone a fine husband someday. Assuming you'd be able to get the parts, and develop the engineering skills to assemble them, which I don't see as likely. Hacha! Okay, let me see here. Okay, kidding aside, Howard, you are a good friend. And I wish you nothing but happiness. Bazinga, I don't!

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon...

name: Sheldon
line: Doubleazinga! I do! Good luck following that.

name: Leonard
line: So, Howard Wolowitz tying the knot. Leaving his crazy bachelor days behind. He was a wild one. Well, I guess we all kind of were. I remember this one time, I was with this girl at the beach. We were in the ocean and we started making out. I know, it was crazy. I wasn't even wearing my Aquasocks. Then...

name: Kripke
line: Nobody cares, Hofstadter. Wwap it up.

name: Leonard
line: Right. To Howard.

name: All
line: To Howard.

name: Leonard
line: I totally had sex in the ocean.

name: Stuart
line: Okay, I'll go. Howard, when I think about you and Bernadette starting this wonderful life together, I can't help but get a little choked up. I mean, look at you. You have everything. Look at me. I'm 37. I sleep in the back of a comic book store, and I have the bone density of an 80-year-old man. To Howard.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, to Howard. Um, uh, who's next?

name: Kripke
line: I'll go. Howard, I'm gonna say something to you that evewybody's thinking but no one has the couwage to say out woud. When you invite a man to a bachewor pawty, the impwication is, there will be stwippews. Maybe not compwetewy nude, but at weast pasties and G-stwings. That's not unweasonable.

name: Raj
line: Hear, hear.

name: All
line: Hear, hear.

name: Raj
line: Okay, uh, anybody else? Huh? No? Okay, it all comes down to me, the best man. Ooh! This grasshopper is kicking my ass-hopper. Okay, when I first came to this country, I-I didn't know how to behave or how to dress, or what was cool, I was pretty lonely. But then I met Howard, and suddenly, my life changed, because we could be lonely together. This man became my whole world.

But that guy doesn't exist any more, he's gone, and the reason is because of her. So, if this relationship is over, let her know that she made me a better man, and tell her thank you.

line: Hey, Howard. Dave Roeger here at NASA. We need to talk about your upcoming mission.

line: You're kidding. So what does that mean? Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Boy, I got to tell you, I'm really disappointed. This was my dream ever since I was a little kid. Okay, well, uh, thanks for the call. Yep, you, too.  Yes! Thank you! Oh! Oh! I'm not gonna die in space! I'm gonna die the way God intended, in my late 50s, with a heart full of pastrami.

line: When you come back to Earth in a Soyuz capsule, you free-fall from space at 500 miles per hour, and the only thing that slows you down is a little parachute that pops out right before you crash into the ground. Hi, Dave. What's up? No kidding. Really? Well, that's great news. Great, great news. All right, I'll watch my e-mail for the details. Okay, talk soon.

For example, this morning, I was calculating the random motion of virtual particles in a vacuum, when suddenly the particles morphed into an image of Amy's dandruff gently cascading down onto her pale, slightly hunched shoulders. Oh, what has that vixen done to me, Leonard? And how do I make it stop?

line: So, the date is going to conflict with me marrying your daughter. Now, I know what you're going to say, I made a commitment to Bernadette and to your family and I've got a hell of a lot of nerve coming in here and demanding that we postpone this thing. Well, message heard and understood. Mission cancelled. Thank you.

line: Where are you going?

But then I heard about your astronaut thing, and I realized I judged you too fast. Maybe you are the right guy for my little girl.

line: I changed my mind. I don't want to do this.

line: Yeah, I'm a funny guy. I also have a hysterical bit planned for later where I pretend to cry through the whole launch.

line: 289, right between the Game Show Network at 288 and the East coast feed of the Disney Channel on 290.

line: I love his eidetic memory, it's so sexy. Sheldon, what are the ingredients in Pringles?

name: Sheldon
line: Dried potatoes, vegetable oil, corn flower, wheat starch, maltodextrin, salt, and my favourite ingredient of all, uniformity.

name: Amy

line: Oh, God, I'm so nervous. I don't think I can watch.

line: You're nervous? I've been stress-eating for four days. Look at me. I'm wearing my fat pants.

name: Sheldon
line: Remarkable. In just under a half hour, 200 metric tons of fuel will ignite in a controlled explosion right beneath Howard's keister. And all from a country whose entire contribution to the global economy, has been Tetris and mail-order brides.

line: Give me those damn Pringles.

line: Da.

line: Good! Good! Oh, quick question, I missed it in the briefing. How much urine do these suits hold?

line: Not exactly. Listen, if you don't mind, I'm not really up for chatting. I'm just going to sit here quietly and let my life flash before my eyes. That went really quick. Let me try it again.

line: Close your eyes. Put out your hand. I got you something special.

name: Howard

line: Okay, but I'm going to have to get it back from you so I can take it to the International Space Station. That way, when I come home, you will have a star that was actually in space.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, my God.

name: Howard
line: Take that, every guy who's ever bought you anything.

name: Bernadette
line: This is the most amazing gift I've ever gotten.

name: Howard
line: Really? Well, if you like it that much, then close your eyes and put out your hand.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: ‘m going to the supermarket to buy snacks for your trip. Do you want me to get those little boxes of Froot Loops you like?

line: No! When I eat Froot Loops, the other astronauts make fun of me!

line: Howard, I don't want to wait until you're back to get married.

line: We'll have a quick little ceremony with just our friends, and we'll still have the big reception with everyone when you get back.

line: So anyway, we decided to go down to City Hall this afternoon get married, and then have the reception when Howard gets back.

line: Yes, you made that brutally clear to me. What I was going to suggest is if that you're willing to wait until Sunday morning, the Google satellite will be over Pasadena. You can have a wedding photograph from space.

line: Oh, wait to go, Raj.

line: I bought you and Bernadette a gravy boat worth eighty-eight dollars. Which places me in your debt and I can't be in your debt because someday you might ask me to help you move, or to kill a man.

line: Well, what if it's his only way out? I can't risk it. Here is twelve dollars. Now, we're even. Wait, wait, wait, I bought a card. Give me two dollars. And for the record, this is why I hate gift-giving.

line: Guys, when I look at the two of you starting your lives together, it fills my heart, It fills my, heart, okay, I'm going to need a minute.

line: Okay, I'll, I'll go. Howard and Bernadette, I know you two planned on getting married in a big fancy wedding, but when you're in love, it doesn't matter where or how these things happen. It just matters that you have each other.

line: Well, I'm ending it. Bernadette, I want to thank you for allowing me to be your maid of honour. I also want you to know, that I will be happy to do it again if this marriage craps out.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you, Amy. Very touching. Howard and Bernadette, you are lucky enough to be best friends who love each other. And that's the strongest kind of love because at its core, it has kindness, patience, and respect. Qualities that are hard to find in people these days.

line: Would you like some aloe vera? You just got burned. All right, my turn. Howard, Bernadette. Daq tu' taH Daq yIn tlhej ghajtaH.

line: Fine, I'll do it in English, but it loses something. The need to find another human being to share one's life with has always puzzled me. Maybe because I'm so interesting all by myself. With that being said, may you find as much happiness with each other as I find on my own. The Klingon would have made you cry.

name: Raj
line: I believe you two have prepared vows?

name: Bernadette
line: Howard Joel Wolowitz, like you, this is going to be short and sweet. I love you with all my heart and soul and promise to be with you forever.

line: Bernadette Maryann Rostenkowski.

line: Hey, from now on, she's the only women who can yell at me! Until I met you, I couldn't imagine spending my life with just one person. And now I can't imagine spending one day of it without you.

line: Oy vay!

line: Penny, a moment. We just had Thai food. In that culture, the last morsel is called the krengjai piece, and it is reserved for the most important and valued member of the group.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, well, then I guess it doesn't matter which one of you drives me. Let's play a fun guessing game to see who gets to take me. All right, this four-letter word describes either a printer's type size or a compulsion to eat dirt.

line: I thought you were reading.

name: Leonard
line: I, I'm fine.

line: Should I go? I've been told sometimes I overstay my welcome.

name: Leonard
line: What, who told you that?

name: Amy

name: Leonard
line: Well, you stay as long as you'd like.

name: Amy
line: I'm glad to hear you say that, because I'm having a wonderful time. Hmm, I said the same thing to my gynaecologist.

line: What are you going to get at the train store, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm not buying anything. They're having a lecture. H-O gauge railroading. Half the size of O-gauge, but twice the fun. Very controversial topic.

name: Howard
line: Which side do you come down on?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll let you know after tonight. Unlike some people, I'm going in with an open mind. Who am I kidding? Of course we all know it's O-gauge or no gauge.

name: Howard
line: Can you believe grown men sit around and play with toy trains?

name: Bernadette
line: That's pretty big talk for a man with a closet full of magic tricks at his mother's house.

name: Howard
line: First of all, they're not tricks, they're illusions. And, secondly, when we get married, they're all going up in the attic so you can have that closet for clothes.

line: Why would I keep clothes at your mother's house?

line: Well, don't think of it that way. Once we move in, it'll be our house.

line: Why not? It's a great house, plenty of room, and if we have kids, Mom's there to help. You know, when she tells the Three Little Pigs story, she actually has hair on her chinny-chin-chin.

line: I'm not gonna live with your mother. Not now, not ever.

line: Take me home now.

name: Howard
line: Movie theatre.

name: Raj
line: Mmmmmm.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, everybody calm down. There is a simple solution here. Raj, take me to the train store, and then I don't care what you people do.

name: Amy
line: How was your shower?

name: Leonard
line: It was good, good. Just out of curiosity, what time do you usually go to bed?

name: Amy
line: Oh, I'm up all night. I'm like a possum. Boy, you were not liked in high school, were you?

name: Leonard
line: Not really. Is that my yearbook?

name: Amy
line: Mm-hmm. Dear Leonard, you're really good at science. Maybe one day you'll come up with a cure for being a dork.

name: Leonard
line: Well, it wasn't spray-painting a lightning bolt on my briefcase, I can tell you that.

name: Amy
line: If it makes you feel any better, the only person who signed my yearbook was my mother.

name: Leonard
line: Aw.

name: Amy
line: Dear Amy, self-respect and a hymen are better than friends and fun. Love, Mom.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you can add Jerry's Junction to the list of train stores Sheldon Cooper will never set foot in again.

name: Leonard
line: Rough night, Casey Jones?

name: Sheldon
line: You don't know the half of it. It was billed as a lively give-and-take on the merits of model train sizes. But it was actually a set-up to intimidate weak-minded spineless rubes into buying H-O starter sets.

name: Leonard
line: What's in the bag?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't want to talk about it. But it's not a spine,I'll tell you that.

name: Amy
line: Well, I had a delightful evening, Leonard. We should do this again sometime.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, sure. That'd be nice.

name: Amy
line: Glad to hear it. I need someone to accompany me to the wedding of Dr. Moranelli and Dr. Gustufson this Friday. They're kind of the Brad and Angelina of the primatology department.

line: I would, but the last wedding we went to was a disaster. He behaved like a child the entire time.

name: Amy
line: Doesn't matter. You're out, he's in. No date to the prom, two dates to a wedding. Hmm, how times change.

line: Ha-ha, you have to go to a wedding.

line: I'll get it!

line: Could you get it?

line: I said I'm getting it!

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, I'm sorry I didn't run it by you first.

line: I don't know who you're talking to, but in or out! We don't need bugs!

name: Howard
line: The bugs only come here because you're their queen! Listen, how about this. Before we make any kind of decision about where we live, we have a trial run. Stay here for a weekend, see what it's like.

line: And your mom would be okay with that?

name: Howard
line: Sure she would. Ma, do you mind if Bernadette stays here this weekend?

name: Howard
line: See? She's good with it.

line: Frankly, after all your sleepovers with the little brown boy, a girl is a big relief!

name: Sheldon
line: All this years, I've been so wrong. The tinier the train, the more concentrated the fun.

line: You're a brain scientist. Can you explain to me why a brilliant man likes playing with toy trains?

line: Not without cutting his head open, no. How about making my eyes like Cleopatra?

line: Really? For a wedding?

name: Amy

line: Yeah. Yeah, I guess. Does your mother always cut your meat for you?

line: Only when it's fatty. Well, don't be jealous, babe. Someday you'll get to cut it for me.

line: Okay.

name: Amy
line: I have a kinda-sorta boyfriend who's playing with a model train right now, you don't hear me bitching about it. Leonard, a word of advice, moody self-obsession is only attractive in men who can play guitar and are considerably taller than you.

name: Amy
line: We just had a lovely meal, the band is on fire, and you're sitting next to a beautiful woman wearing whorish makeup. Why don't we head outon the dance floor and see if I can sweat through these dress shields.

line: Great. Until I accidentally made Leonard fall in love with me.
