line: See that? I just saved us forty bucks.

name: Sheldon
line: I've long said, what you lack in academic knowledge you make up for in street smarts.

name: Stuart
line: You want me to wrap it?

name: Leonard
line: No, it's okay. I'm gonna stab my friend in the chest.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Ah, hey, Wil.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, Wil Wheaton.

name: Wil
line: Hi, Sheldon. Nice sword.

name: Sheldon
line: It's part of my sword collection. Do you have a sword collection?

name: Wil
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not surprised.

name: Stuart
line: Here's the Batman 612 with the Jim Lee alternate cover that you wanted.

name: Wil
line: Awesome. What do I owe you?

name: Stuart
line: Forty bucks.

name: Wil
line: Good deal.

name: Sheldon
line: Sucker. Didn't even ask for the friends and family discount.

name: Wil
line: Hey, I'm having a party at my house on Friday, and I was hoping you would stop by.

name: Stuart
line: Will there be girls there?

name: Wil
line: Yeah, of course.

name: Stuart
line: ‘Cause there wasn't last time.

name: Wil
line: There will be girls. You guys are invited if you want to come by.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Wil
line: All right, great. Later.

name: Sheldon
line: I see what you're doing. You accept an invitation to a party at the home of my sworn enemy, he tells everyone we're going to be there, and when we don't show, he looks the fool. Fiendishly clever.

name: Leonard
line: I was actually thinking about going.

name: Sheldon
line: And then declaring the party a fiasco and storming out, leaving him humiliated in front of his guests. Love it.

name: Leonard
line: No, I was gonna grab Raj and Howard and have a good time.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, great, more guys. It's gonna be another Wil Wheaton sausage-fest.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, can you grab me a water?

name: Sheldon
line: Possibly.

name: Leonard
line: Can you or can't you?

name: Sheldon
line: It's not that simple, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: It never is, is it?

name: Sheldon
line: At this moment, our relationship exists in two mutually contradictory states. Until you either do not go or go to Wil Wheaton's party, you are simultaneously my friend and not my friend. I'm characterizing this phenomenon as Schrodinger's Friendship.

name: Leonard
line: Got it. Can I have my water?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. Now get it yourself, you traitor.

name: Penny
line: Wait, what is going on?

name: Sheldon
line: In case you have forgotten, Schrodinger's cat is a thought experiment...

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, no, I didn't forget. Um, there's this cat in a box and until you open it, it's either dead or alive or both. Although, back in Nebraska, our cat got stuck in my brother's camp trunk, and we did not need to open it to know there was all kinds of dead cat in there.

name: Amy
line: Homespun stories, knowledge of physics and a bosom that defies it. You're the whole package, aren't you?

name: Howard
line: Sorry I'm late. Uh, I got great news. NASA picked my team's design for the deep field space telescope that's going on the International Space Station this spring.

name: All
line: Wow.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, that's wonderful! Congratulations!

name: Howard
line: It gets better. Someone has to go up with the telescope as a payload specialist, and guess who that someone is.

name: Sheldon
line: Mohammed Lee.

name: Howard
line: Who's Mohammed Lee?

name: Sheldon
line: Mohammed is the most common first name in the world, Lee, the most common surname. As I didn't know the answer, I thought that gave me a mathematical edge.

name: Howard
line: It's me, Sheldon. It's me. I'm going up in space! Technically, I'm an astronaut.

name: All
line: Wow, that's amazing!

name: Bernadette
line: Hang on a second. NASA doesn't have a shuttle any more. How are you going to get up there?

name: Howard
line: Oh, well, it's really cool. You fly to Moscow, they take you out to Kazakhstan, and then you get into a Russian Soyuz rocket which shoots you into a low earth orbit. Or just sits there on the launch pad because the Kazakhi mafia sold the rocket fuel on the black market.

name: Bernadette
line: Are those Russian rockets safe?

name: Howard
line: Well, I mean, safe as it can be when it was built by the good folks who brought you Chernobyl.

name: Leonard
line: I'd like to propose a toast. The dream to go up into space is one we all share, and Howard's making that a reality. We're all very proud of you.

name: All
line: Cheers.

name: Sheldon
line: That was a lovely toast. Kudos.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Simultaneously, a festival of cloying clichés. You sicken me.

name: Howard
line: You're really quiet. Is everything okay?

name: Bernadette
line: Fine. Just a little tired.

name: Howard
line: I hope not too tired, because I'm feeling particularly masculine right now. All systems go, if you catch my drift.

name: Bernadette
line: I always catch your drift.

name: Howard
line: All right, well, something's obviously bugging you. What is it?

name: Bernadette
line: I just can't believe you signed up for the space program without even talking to me.

name: Howard
line: Oh, I get it. You're worried about me. That is so sweet. You know, there's a saying we have at NASA. What makes the right stuff so right is that it always comes home.

name: Bernadette
line: Just stop talking, Howard.

name: Howard
line: This isn't the reaction I expected when I told you I was gonna be an astronaut.

name: Bernadette
line: What did you think was going to happen?

name: Howard
line: Honestly? Sex.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard.

name: Howard
line: Do you realize what a big deal this is? What an honour it is to be chosen to go into space?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, I get it. I just wish you included me in the decision. We're supposed to be partners. We're supposed to be a team.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry. You're right. Okay, let's try this again. Bernadette, an opportunity has come up that impacts both of us, and I'd like to discuss it.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: I've been offered a chance to go up to the International Space Station for three weeks. What are your thoughts on that?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, first of all, thank you for including me in the decision-making process.

name: Howard
line: Hey, we're a team. So, what do you think?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Howard
line: No?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Well why not?

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, my father was a police officer. We never knew from one night to the next if he was going to come home alive. It was horrible. And I don't want to live that way with you.

name: Howard
line: Hey, my father abandoned me and my mother when I was 11. We never saw him again.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, boo-hoo, you're not going to space!

name: Leonard
line: Pretty cool about Howard, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't talk to me as if nothing's happened between us. And yes, it sure is, buddy.

name: Leonard
line: For God's sake, will you stop with the Schrodinger stuff.

name: Sheldon
line: Would you prefer a simpler application of Heisenberg's uncertainty principle, in which I could either know where you are or whether I like you, but not both?

name: Leonard
line: You never stop talking, do you?

name: Amy
line: I don't understand. What differences does it make if Leonard goes to Wil Wheaton's party?

name: Penny
line: Wil Wheaton is Sheldon's mortal enemy.

name: Amy
line: Mortal enemy?

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I know you're a bit of a left-handed monkey wrench, but, you really have a mortal enemy?

name: Sheldon
line: In fact, I have 61 of them. Would you like to see the list?

name: Penny
line: Oh, say no, say no, say no, say no.

name: Sheldon
line: You just got off the list. Would you like back on it? This'll just take a moment. It's on a five and a quarter inch floppy.

name: Amy
line: A floppy disk?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I started the list when I was nine.

name: Amy
line: How did Wil Wheaton get on the list?

name: All
line: Oh! Oh, God!

name: Sheldon
line: As a child, I loved Wesley Crusher, Wil Wheaton's character on Star Trek. So, I drove for hours by bus to a Star Trek convention at which Wil Wheaton was scheduled to appear, so that I could get my Wesley Crusher action figure signed. But he never showed, because apparently, it was cooler for him to be the lower-left corner on Hollywood Squares. Oh, damn! The floppy failed. Well, whoever was in charge of quality control at the Verbatim Corporation in 1989, congratulations, you just made the list.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard?

name: Howard
line: Change your mind about sex? I'm still mad, but I'll do it.

name: Bernadette
line: No, I've just been thinking. It doesn't matter if I'm afraid for your safety. I don't want to be the person who stands between you and your dreams.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Bernadette
line: Really. If going into space means that much to you, I will never say another word about it.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Bernadette
line: I love you.

name: Howard
line: I love you, too. So, sex now?

name: Bernadette
line: Okay. I just forgot to brush my teeth. I'll be right back.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Over my dead body my son goes into outer space!

name: Bernadette
line: I'm ready.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, let me see if I got this right. You actually asked Bernadette to leave your house in the middle of the night?

name: Howard
line: What choice did I have? She went behind my back and turned my own mother against me.

name: Raj
line: Wow. You're not only our first astronaut. You're also the first one of us to kick a girl out of bed. You're like a rock star.

name: Howard
line: Little bit.

name: Leonard
line: I hate to say it, but she did kind of betray you.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. You see betrayal in others, but not yourself.

name: Leonard
line: Going to Wheaton's party is not betraying you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course you would have to believe that. Evil always thinks it's doing right. Excuse me, Stormtrooper. These are the droids you're looking for.

name: Leonard
line: I'm going to a party. I'm not turning R2-D2 and C-3PO over to the empire!

name: Sheldon
line: Not yet.

name: Raj
line: So, what's gonna happen next? Are you and Bernadette going to break up?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. If we're going to get back together, she's going to have to apologize and accept that I'm a grown man who can make his own decisions.

name: Raj
line: Then she's going to have to convince your mother to let you go into space.

name: Howard
line: Obviously.

name: Bernadette
line: I had no choice. I had to tell his mother. He can't go to space. He's like a baby bird. Do you know he once got an asthma attack from reading an old library book?

name: Amy
line: You're kidding.

name: Penny
line: No, I was there that day. Sheldon threw his back out handing him that book.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know what I'm going to do. I don't want to break up over this.

name: Penny
line: Okay, why don't you just tell him you made a mistake?

name: Bernadette
line: Do you guys think it was a mistake? Am I the bad guy in this?

name: Amy
line: It's not for us to judge. We're just here to provide comfort and support while you come to grips with what a despicable thing you've done.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, God, you're right. I took our love and threw it under his bus-sized mother. I need to apologize.

name: Penny
line: Well, that, that's good. I'm glad you came to that. But before you do, let me just ask you a big picture question.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Are you a hundred percent positive you love and want to marry Howard Wolowitz?

name: Bernadette
line: I do, with all my heart.

name: Penny
line: Got it. Just had to check.

name: Amy
line: He's great.

name: Leonard
line: All right, Sheldon, we're going to Wil's. This is your last chance.

name: Sheldon
line: No, Leonard, this is your last chance. One day, a historian is going to come to you and say, is it true you were friends with Dr. Sheldon Cooper? And you're going to have to choke back a hot sob of regret and humiliation as you mumble, I was, but I chose to go to a party thrown by the one kid from Stand By Me that no one remembers.

name: Leonard
line: You want to drive?

name: Raj
line: Sure.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good. You picked me, you picked me.

name: Leonard
line: No, I just got a text from Stuart. Brent Spiner is at the party.

name: Sheldon
line: Brent Spiner?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't care.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Brent Spiner, Mr. Data himself. You love him.

name: Sheldon
line: I did, but I think I've kind of outgrown Star Trek. You know, stock characters, ludicrous plots, beam me up. What a load of hooey.

name: Leonard
line: I'm going. Live long and prosper, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, even that. You look like a dork.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, Bernadette's here!

name: Howard
line: Tell her I'm not home!

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: What kind of a schmuck play is that? She can hear you shouting!

name: Bernadette
line: Can we talk?

name: Howard
line: You can. I have nothing to say.

name: Bernadette
line: All right. I just wanted to tell you I'm sorry I said something to your mother.

name: Howard
line: I was gonna tell her eventually, but you went behind my back.

name: Bernadette
line: I know. I'm sorry. I got scared.

name: Howard
line: If you're gonna love me, you're gonna have to love the whole package, the tenderhearted poet and the crazy daredevil.

name: Bernadette
line: I know.

name: Howard
line: Well, don't say it if you're not gonna mean it, 'cause I'm not just gonna stop with the space station. Yeah, I want to go to the Moon, I want to go to Mars. I want to take a one-man sub to the lowest depths of the ocean.

name: Bernadette
line: Really? You got seasick on Pirates of the Caribbean.

name: Howard
line: Well, those big kids were rocking it.

name: Bernadette
line: I just did what I did because I love you so much, and the thought of losing you is more than I can handle.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Bernadette
line: You're my soul mate. This is where you kiss me.

name: Howard
line: Right, right.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Make up all you want! Your tuchus is not leaving this planet!

name: Raj
line: Hey, you know that beautiful actress who plays the Borg Queen in First Contact?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: Well, I just met her gynaecologist!

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: Fighting for our friendship. As peculiar and annoying as you can be, you're still my little buddy. I'm not going to let that end here tonight. Now put down that drink, let's meet Brent Spiner and go home.

name: Wil
line: Hey, Sheldon, I'm so glad you made it. I found something I think you might like.

name: Sheldon
line: What I'd like is for him to have a more depressing home. This is quite lovely.

name: Wil
line: This is for you.

name: Sheldon
line: An original mint-in-package Wesley Crusher action figure.

name: Wil
line: I remembered your story about the time you went to a convention when you were a kid to get one signed, and I didn't show up.

name: Wil
line: Look at what I wrote.

name: Sheldon
line: To Sheldon, sorry this took so long. Your friend, Wil Wheaton.

name: Wil
line: It's my last one. I want you to have it.

name: Sheldon
line: Look, everyone. Wil Wheaton is my friend!

name: Brent Spiner
line: Oh, wow. I haven't seen one of these in years.  Remember how we used to make these things look like they were masturbating?

name: Sheldon
line: Brent Spiner, what have you done? That was an original mint-in-package Wesley Crusher action figure signed by my close personal friend, Wil Wheaton.

name: Brent
line: Sorry, Slim. I've got some Mr. Data dolls in the trunk of my car. You want me to sign one for you?

name: Sheldon
line: You've already signed something, Brent Spiner. Your name on my list. From this moment on, you are my mortal enemy.

name: Wil
line: Don't worry. It doesn't take up a whole lot of your time.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on, buddy. Let's not waste another second on this loser. Love your house.

name: Leonard
line: Can we get autographed dolls?

name: Brent
line: Sure. Twenty bucks.

name: Leonard
line: Ten.

name: Brent
line: Eighteen.

name: Leonard
line: Twelve.

name: Brent
line: Sixteen.

name: Leonard
line: Two for thirty. And you come to my birthday party.

name: Brent
line: Done.

name: Leonard
line: So what kind of cruise is this you're going on?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: It's called the Born Again Boat Ride. Christian Quarterly gave it their highest rating, five thorny crowns. I do wish you'd come with me, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Mom, if I did, it would be conclusive proof that your God can work miracles.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: You're missing out. It's gonna be wall-to-wall fun. It's all themed. There's Jonah and the Whale Watching, all-you-can-eat Last Supper Buffet, and my personal favourite, Gunning with God.

name: Leonard
line: What's Gunning with God? I'm afraid to ask.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, it is a hoot and a half. You write your sins on a clay pigeon, they fire 'em up in the air, and you pulverize them with a 12-gauge shotgun full of our Lord's forgiveness.

name: Sheldon
line: Frankly, Mom, I'm encouraged to see how advanced your group has become, willing to sail out into the ocean without fear of falling off the edge.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: For example, if Shelly was aboard, he'd write “smart mouth” on his pigeon, and then bam!

name: Sheldon
line: The Lord giveth and the Lord bloweth away. Well, Mom, according to my itinerary for our weekend together, the fun begins with fried chicken.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Sounds delicious.

name: Sheldon
line: Good, 'cause I got you everything you need to make it. You are in for a treat. My mother's fried chicken is why we had to buy my dad the extra large coffin.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, she just got off the plane. She doesn't want to cook.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course she does. Making me food is her way of saying I love you. Making me food when she's too tired to cook is her way of saying I really love you.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Actually, I wouldn't mind going out for a bite, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Won't that spoil our appetites for the chicken you're going to make me?

name: Leonard
line: All right, that settles it, we're going out. Do you like sushi? There's a great little place down the street.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: I've never had it, but there's no harm in trying something new.

name: Sheldon
line: There's a lot of harm in trying something new. That's why we test out drugs and cosmetics on bunny rabbits.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you're talking like a crazy person.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Actually, I had him tested as a child. Doctor says he's fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Told you.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Although, I do regret not following up with that specialist in Houston.

name: All
line: Irasshaimase!

name: Sheldon
line: Stop yelling! I'm not happy about this.

name: Leonard
line: What's the last thing you were ever happy about?

name: Sheldon
line: The prospect of fried chicken.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: This is exciting. Back home, the diner on Route Four serves sushi, but it's just cut up fish sticks and a side of Uncle Ben's. They put it on the menu in those kung fu letters, but that don't make it sushi.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, kung fu letters might not be politically correct.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, I thought the one we couldn't say was ching chong.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, yeah, that, too.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: So, Shelly, what's up with you and your friend Amy, if you don't mind a mother prying a bit?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, there's actually big news on the Amy front. She's been studying the neurobiology of addiction in lower animals. She is this close to getting a starfish hooked on cocaine.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Do you have any idea what's going on with those two?

name: Leonard
line: It's kind of like the Loch Ness monster. Maybe there's something there, maybe there isn't. We'll probably never know. But sometimes it's fun to creep yourself out thinking about it.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: How are you doing on the young lady front? I hear you're in some sort of a long distance situation?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah, it's Raj's sister. It's kind of tough. She's in India. Also, her parents aren't happy she's dating someone white.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, that's a funny turn, isn't it? You never think about it going the other way. Well, you can't force things. You need to figure out if you're in a relationship or if you're just calling it one. It's like they say, a cat can have kittens in the oven but that don't make 'em biscuits.

name: Sheldon
line: And that reminds me of another saying. You can lead a chicken to Crisco, but you can'tmake your mother fry it.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Sheldon, you pester me one more time about chicken, I will put you over my knee right here in this restaurant.

name: Leonard
line: Please pester her. Please, for me.

name: Leonard
line: So, Mrs. Cooper, what did you think of the sushi?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: It was good. The only thing that would have made it better is if it was cooked and if it was beef. Sheldon, when is your landlord going to fix the elevator?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. Lately we've been talking about converting it into a missile silo.

name: Leonard
line: Your son seems to think we need to launch a pre-emptive strike on Burbank.

name: Sheldon
line: Get them before they get us.

name: Raj
line: Hey, look who decided to show up.

name: Leonard
line: Raj, what are you doing?

name: Raj
line: I couldn't find you guys so I bought six new friends. Three, sadly, are dead.

name: Sheldon
line: Mom, you remember Rajesh? Rajesh, my mother.

name: Raj
line: Of course. Mrs. Cooper. So nice to see you again.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, it's so nice to see you, too. I thought it was our Indians that had the occasional alcohol problem.

name: Leonard
line: We don't say that, either. I'll make you a list.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, that would be mighty white of you. So, Raj, what pain are you trying to cover up with alcohol?

name: Raj
line: Nothing, I'm fine.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Are ya?

name: Raj
line: No.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: That's better. Now tell me what's bothering you.

name: Raj
line: I'm so lonely.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes, born alone, die alone. It's a tragic human condition. Now, Raj, if you'll excuse my mother, she's about to make a pecan pie that'll be so good I'll almost forget how she blew it with the fried chicken.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Sheldon, your friend is hurtin'. What do we do when someone's hurtin'?

name: Sheldon
line: Offer them a hot beverage.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: And when they're drunk as a skunk, what beverage do we offer?

name: Sheldon
line: Coffee.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: And what do we do it with?  Now you listen to me. I know you feel like you can't find someone, but there's a lock for every key. Back home, there's a girl works at the Wal-Mart. Tall, tall girl. Woman could hunt geese with a rake. Thought she'd never find a man, then one day, wouldn't ya know, Harlem Globetrotters come to town. Long story short, today that woman travels the world with a semi-professional basketball player and two beautiful mixed-race babies.

name: Raj
line: I didn't get a lot of that because of your accent, but the general tone was soothing and somehow I feel better.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not going to get my pecan pie, am I?

name: Leonard
line: You want some Oreos?

name: Sheldon
line: Double Stuf?

name: Leonard
line: No, regular.

name: Sheldon
line: Nice. Kick a man when he's down.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm glad we're finally getting to do something together, just the two of us.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Sure. One thing you really miss when you're on vacation is laundry.

name: Sheldon
line: Careful, you're using too much Downey. You know if my clothes get too soft it makes me sleepy.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, this takes me back. Me doing your laundry, you next to me criticizing.

name: Sheldon
line: It is nice, isn't it?

name: Penny
line: Mrs. Cooper. Hi!

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, hello, darlin'.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, you didn't tell me your mom was coming.

name: Sheldon
line: It was in my weekly e-mail blast. Right between beet season is finally here, and uh-oh, red stool from beets leads to cancer scare.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: So, how've you been?

name: Penny
line: Good, good.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: I hear that Leonard has a new girlfriend. How are you doing with all that?

name: Penny
line: Oh, fine. You know, it's been a while. I'm getting back out there.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Let me ask you, when you get back out there, are you wearing this?

name: Penny
line: Well, it's super cute on. That top has paid for itself in free drinks like ten times what it cost.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, Penny has a lot of her money tied up in promiscuity futures.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Hon, you think maybe the reason why you're having trouble finding a guy to settle down with is because you're letting them ride the roller coaster without buying a ticket?

name: Penny
line: Oh, they don't always get to ride the roller coaster. Sometimes they only get to spin the teacups. Now I'm going out tonight. Would it be crazy to ask you to look at the outfit I'm going to wear?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, not crazy at all. And don't beat yourself up. When I was your age, you could have me for a car ride and a bottle of strawberry wine.

name: Sheldon
line: Now that will not be in this week's e-mail blast.

name: Howard
line: So, this spring, I get to go to the International Space Station.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, my word, a trip to the heavens. If you ever want to live there eternally, I've got a good book you could read.

name: Howard
line: Thanks, but I watch the Charlie Brown Christmas special every year, so I get the gist.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: I bet your mom is really proud of you.

name: Howard
line: Nope. She says if I don't back out she's going to go on a hunger strike. It would take years before she'd be in any kind of danger, but still.

name: Sheldon

line: Oh, yeah. Sure. Just one sec?

name: Kevin
line: No problem.

name: Penny
line: What's up?

name: Leonard
line: I know what you're doing.

name: Penny
line: What am I doing?

name: Leonard
line: You're going out of your way to talk to that guy because I said we weren't on a date.

name: Penny
line: No, I'm talking to him because he's cute.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, he's not that cute.

name: Penny
line: Yes, he is. With his dorky T-shirt and his little hipster glasses.

name: Leonard
line: I wear dorky T-shirts and glasses.

name: Penny
line: Yes, but when you're tall and have great cheekbones, you're doing it ironically.

name: Leonard
line: If that's so, what if I start talking to a girl?

name: Penny
line: You should.

name: Leonard
line: I'm serious. I'll do it.

name: Penny
line: Good! Go! There are some girls right over there. What are you waiting for?

name: Leonard
line: They're in a group. I'm scared.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, what do you expect us to do?

name: Sheldon
line: You're biologists. Biology is the study of living things. That's a living thing, get cracking.

name: Bernadette
line: I specialize in microorganisms, and Amy studies brains.

name: Amy
line: Yeah, neither of us minored in bird-shooing.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, come now. Your undergraduate work must have included a varmints and critters class.

name: Bernadette
line: Come back in, Sheldon, he's not going to hurt you. He looks friendly. I think he might be someone's pet.

name: Sheldon
line: No, Bernadette, don't be a hero!

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, he's a sweetie.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. It's very sweet. Now, slowly and carefully, flush him down the toilet.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, the only way to get past this fear is to interact with it. Just like you did with the mailman.

name: Sheldon
line: Every year tens of people around the world are killed by birds. I'm not going to be another statistic.

name: Bernadette
line: Look how sweet he is. Come over and say hi. Come on. You can do it. Don't be scared. Come on. Oh, just pet the bird, you big baby!

name: Sheldon
line: I did it! I actually did it. Okay, now flush him.

name: Woman
line: So, Leonard, what do you do for fun?

name: Leonard
line: Um, let's see. Hiking. Karaoke in Koreatown. Any Jennifer Aniston movie.

name: Penny
line: Hey. Sorry I ditched you.

name: Leonard
line: No, it's fine. You can ditch away.

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, no. We said we were going to hang out, let's hang out.

name: Leonard
line: It's cool. Go back to Kevin.

name: Penny
line: Oh, he had to leave.

name: Leonard
line: Interesting. So now that he's gone, you want to hang out with me.

name: Woman
line: This must be Penny.

name: Leonard
line: Yep.

name: Woman
line: I totally get it.

name: Penny
line: Huh? I'm sorry, get what?

name: Leonard
line: Don't worry about it. You know, there's some guys over there. You should go talk to them.

name: Penny
line: No, no. I want to know what you told her.

name: Leonard
line: That's kind of between me and...

name: Woman
line: Laura.

name: Leonard
line: Laura.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Okay, I see. So while he was telling you things, did he mention he owns not one, but two Star Trek uniforms?

name: Laura
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Wears them. Not just for Halloween.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, pal. You didn't see me telling Kevin that you thought cold wars were only fought in winter.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Then I'll return the favour, and I won't tell...

name: Laura
line: Laura.

name: Penny
line: Laura that half the dirty movies you own are animated.

name: Leonard
line: When you were telling Kevin about your acting career, did you mention your long-running role as Waitress in a local production of The Cheesecake Factory?

name: Penny
line: Did you tell her about your lucky asthma inhaler?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah? Spell asthma.

name: Penny
line: A... S... Take me home.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe I'm not done hanging out with...  You're right, it's getting late.

name: Sheldon
line: It's remarkable. All that time spent in fear. And for what? He's magnificent. Oh, dear. I just realized I haven't offered you a beverage.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, it's just like my grandma with her parrot. And after she lost her marbles with her remote control.

name: Sheldon
line: My phone's on the desk over there. Take a picture of us together. Make it good enough to go on a mug, a mouse pad, and a calendar. If you were a dove, I'd call you Lovey-Dovey. Oh. Who am I kidding? This isn't a moment for strict adherence to the literal. You're just my little Lovey-Dovey, aren't you?

name: Amy
line: Guess you gotta have hollow bones to get some sugar around here.

name: Bernadette
line: I still think he looks like someone's pet. Maybe we should put up posters.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. It should have a big picture of him, and the words, is this your bird? Not anymore. We're going to have so much fun together. You can carry messages to all my enemies. I can tie a string to your leg and fly you like a kite.

name: Amy
line: If you're keeping him, I've got a cage you can borrow. One of the test monkeys slipped on a banana peel and broke his neck. It was both tragic and hysterical.

name: Sheldon
line: Nonsense. No. Lovey-Dovey doesn't sleep in a cage. No. Lovey-Dovey sleeps in his very own nest, which I'm going to get off the windowsill and put in my room. Isn't that right, LD?  No. Where are you going? Come back, Lovey-Dovey! This is your home now! I already ordered 20 pounds of bird feed off of Amazon! He's gone.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: How could he do this to me? Get back here, you stupid bird, so I can love you!

name: Leonard
line: Okay. So, we went out, saw a movie, met some nice people, said horrible things about each other in public, all in all, a pretty magical night.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm not innocent in all this, but you basically called me stupid, you asthmatic dumbass.

name: Leonard
line: I know, I, I, I crossed a line. And I'm sorry. No, no, no, hang on. I really mean it. And it's not like when we were going out, I'd just apologize for everything so we could end up in bed. This is a 100% sex-is-off-the-table I'm sorry.

name: Penny
line: All right. Thank you. I'm sorry, too.

name: Leonard
line: Just to be clear, sex is off the table, right?

name: Penny
line: Way off.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe we're not ready to hang out as friends.

name: Penny
line: I don't know. Up until the last part, I was kind of enjoying take-charge Leonard with a little backbone. Picking the movie, knowing what he wants, a little cocky.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Well, then, I'm putting sex back on the table. What do you think about that?

name: Penny
line: Ooh. Maybe I like it.

name: Leonard
line: You do? Because if that's what you like, I can be that guy. I swear, I'll be anything you want me to be.

name: Penny
line: Good night, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: I am such an asthmatic dumbass. I had a weird night.

name: Sheldon
line: Mine was great. I'm going to be a mommy.

name: Stuart
line: So, Howard's really in space, huh?

name: Leonard
line: Mm-hmm, International Space Station. 250 miles that way.

name: Raj
line: Right now, Howard's staring down at our planet like a tiny Jewish Greek god. Zeusowitz.

name: Sheldon
line: I must admit, I can't help but feel a twinge of envy. He can look out the window and see the majesty of the universe unfolding before his eyes. His dim, uncomprehending eyes. It's like a cat in an airport carrying case.

name: Leonard
line: You know, it's not exactly glamorous up there. The water that the astronauts drink is made from each other's recycled urine.

name: Stuart
line: Must be nice. Nobody wants anything that comes out of me.

name: Raj
line: I wonder what he's doing right this very second.

name: Leonard
line: Mm, conducting experiments in zero gravity.

name: Raj
line: Peering through his telescope at the birth of the cosmos.

name: Sheldon
line: Whatever it is, we know his life will never be the same.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard. Can you hear me?

name: Howard
line: I can hear you without the phone,

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Don't be snippy. I'm just excited to talk to my baby.

name: Howard
line: I'm excited to talk to you, too.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: So, what's this mishegas about you moving out to go live with the little Polish girl?

name: Howard
line: How about calling her my wife?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Wives don't take boys from their mothers.

name: Howard
line: They do. That's why we marry them.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I just hope I'm not dead from a broken heart before you get back.

name: Howard
line: Ma, please. Everyone from NASA is listening to this phone call.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Good. They should know what a horrible son you are.

name: Howard
line: Okay, Ma, great talking to you. Gotta go. Well, space is ruined.

name: Amy
line: This is so exciting. Soon, my upper lip will be the same fake blonde as my beautiful best friend.

name: Penny
line: Hey, this is my natural hair colour. Now. So, does Sheldon have anything special planned for you tomorrow night?

name: Amy
line: Oh, yes. According to the Relationship Agreement, on the anniversary of our first date, he must take me to a nice dinner, ask about my day and engage in casual physical contact that a disinterested onlooker might mistake for intimacy.

name: Penny
line: That's hot. You kids better use protection.

name: Amy
line: How long does this stay on?

name: Penny
line: Just a couple of minutes. You've really never done this before?

name: Amy
line: Once in high school, but I dozed off and woke up with second-degree chemical burns on my face.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my gosh, that's awful. The other kids make fun of you?

name: Amy
line: No, I had a cover story, I told everyone it was herpes. So, how's everything going with you and Leonard?

name: Penny
line: Uh, I don't know, it's still kind of weird. We haven't really recovered since he proposed to me in the middle of sex.

name: Amy
line: Oh, boo-hoo. If Sheldon proposed to me during sex, my ovaries would grab on to him and never let go.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, where do you stand on the anthropic principle?

name: Leonard
line: Interesting question. On the one hand, I always thought...

name: Sheldon
line: You don't even know what it is, do you? The anthropic principle states that if we wish to explain why our universe exists the way it does, the answer is that it must have qualities that allow intelligent creatures to arise who are capable of asking the question. As I am doing so eloquently right now.

name: Leonard
line: I know what the anthropic principle is.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. I just explained it to you. Now, where do you stand on it?

name: Leonard
line: Where do you stand on it?

name: Sheldon
line: Strongly pro.

name: Leonard
line: Then I believe that God created the world in six days, and on the seventh he made you to annoy me.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, wait, Raj, where do you stand on the anthropic principle?

name: Raj
line: I'm all for it.

name: Sheldon
line: Attaboy!

name: Leonard
line: Well, hang on. Why do you believe that he knows what it is and I don't?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Leonard. Let's not take a saw to the branch we're sitting on, shall we?

name: Raj
line: Hey, uh, if you guys are free tonight, I heard about a spa where you soak your feet n a pool full of little fish that eat all the dead skin right off them. I don't need to tell you in Los Angeles, sandal season is year round.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, I'm hanging out with Penny.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay. Sounds like it's me and you, Sheldon. How about we sic some guppies on those puppies?

name: Sheldon
line: As I've stated before on numerous occasions, the only sea creature I would even consider being eaten by is the Kraken, because the last words I would hear are “Release the Kraken.” That never gets old. “Release the Kraken!” Oh, chills. Besides, I'm having dinner with Amy.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay. I'll just go home and be alone. Which is cool. I eat alone, I sleep alone, I cry alone, so, cool.

name: Sheldon
line: Darn. If you weren't busy, I'd ask you to join us.

name: Raj
line: Really? I can come? Thanks.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, are you sure you want to be bringing Raj on your date night with Amy?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, absolutely. I have a contractual obligation to provide Amy with conversation and casual physical contact, but nowhere is it specified that I can't outsource that to an Indian.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie? Howie?

name: Howard
line: Hey, there's my beautiful bride. Can you see me?

name: Bernadette
line: I can. How are you?

name: Howard
line: I'm amazing. I mean, this is even better than I dreamed. I look out the window, and it's all so unbelievable.

name: Bernadette
line: Good for you. I just had a seemingly endless dinner with your mom.

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah? That's nice.

name: Bernadette
line: It was. Until I found out you never told her we're not gonna live with her. Let's talk about that for a minute.

name: Howard
line: Hey, look, this pen is floating. How crazy is that?

name: Bernadette
line: You said you told her, but you never did!

name: Howard
line: Okay, okay, I know you're upset, but let me share something I've learned since I got here. You realize how small your problems are when you're looking down on them from space. Now, come on, that's got to make you feel better.

name: Bernadette
line: How clear is the image of me on that screen?

name: Howard
line: Pretty clear.

name: Bernadette
line: Do I look like I feel better?

name: Howard
line: I mean, it's not, like, HD quality.

name: Bernadette
line: Listen, mister, you're gonna talk to your mother and you're gonna fix this, or that thing I said I was gonna do to you the minute you got home, you can do to yourself.

name: Dimitri
line: Like he's been doing since he got here.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, this place is so romantic.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm glad you like it. Raj picked it out.

name: Amy
line: Well, when you see him, tell him I say thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Tell him yourself.

name: Raj
line: Yoo-hoo! Over here!

name: Amy
line: I don't understand. What's he doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: I invited him.

name: Amy
line: On our date? Sheldon, that's not okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, it is. There's a loophole in the Relationship Agreement.

name: Amy
line: You found a loophole?

name: Raj
line: Sorry I started without you. I'm a little nervous. It's been a long time since I've been on a date.

name: Amy
line: I can't believe I bleached my moustache for this.

name: Raj
line: You should go to my girl. She'll knock out those sideburns for free.

name: Raj
line: You know, Amy, I don't even think you and I have had a real conversation. Let's use tonight to get to know each other a little better. You start.

name: Amy
line: Go home.

name: Raj
line: I don't understand.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, how could you do this? It's our second anniversary.

name: Raj
line: It's your anniversary? Oh, my God, I had no idea. Amy, please, let me make this right.

name: Amy
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: My pleasure. Waiter? A bottle of champagne and three glasses. Oh, boy, isn't this romantic?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I hope that's a rhetorical question, because I have no clue.

name: Penny
line: This is great. What's the occasion?

name: Leonard
line: No occasion. You know, things have been a little weird between us, so I wanted to throw together a fun night just for you.

name: Penny
line: That is so sweet.

name: Leonard
line: I got all your favourites. Beer, wings, sliders. We can watch the football game. I even painted my stomach.

name: Penny
line: Go Sports?

name: Leonard
line: Well, in case you were in the mood for baseball, I didn't want to look ridiculous.

name: Penny
line: This is awesome. I love it!

name: Leonard
line: Good, I'm glad.

name: Penny
line: Gosh, I worked my ass off today. This is exactly what I needed.

name: Leonard
line: Great. Just relax and enjoy. Tonight is all about you.

name: Penny
line: Ah, thank you!

name: Leonard
line: So, where exactly are we in this relationship?

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on. I just told you I had a hard day.

name: Leonard
line: You're right, I'm sorry. Let's watch the game.

name: Penny
line: Great.

name: Leonard
line: I just know the longer we wait to talk about it, the weirder it gets.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, can I just be the girl tonight?

name: Leonard
line: Absolutely. You're the girl, I'm the guy. Now, you watch your football game while I make you a little plate here.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I'll get it. Go sports.

name: Raj
line: Hello-lo-lo.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing here? I thought you were out with Sheldon and Amy.

name: Raj
line: I was, but it's their anniversary and I didn't want to be a third wheel, so I figured I'd come over here and hang out with you and Penny on your date.

name: Leonard
line: Well, it's not really a great time. Penny and I have some things we need to talk about.

name: Penny
line: No, we don't! Come on in!

name: Raj
line: Sweet!

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe I shaved my stomach for this.

name: Dimitri
line: Hey, Froot Loops. You got a phone call.

name: Howard
line: Who is it?

name: Dimitri
line: A woman who says she's your mother but sounds like your father.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Ma. You know, we could see each other if you turn on the computer.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I'm not going near that fakakta thing. I'll catch a computer virus.

name: Howard
line: You can't catch a computer virus.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Oh, so now you're an astronaut and a doctor?

name: Howard
line: What do you want, Ma?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Your wife says you have something important to tell me.

name: Howard
line: Okay, here it is. Bernadette and I are starting a life together and...

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Oh, God! You are gonna leave me.

name: Howard
line: Ma...

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: It's okay. Your father left me, you left me, I guess I'm just the kind of person people like to leave.

name: Howard
line: It's not definite. I'll talk to Bernadette.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Don't bother. I'll just go sit in a hole in the ground so I'm no trouble when I die.

name: Howard
line: Stop it, Ma. I'm sure I can get Bernie to come around.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I knew it. I knew she was behind this. You listen to me, if you want to be a man you can't let a woman tell you what to do.

name: Howard
line: Okay, okay.

name: Dimitri
line: Oy. I can't believe these people won the Cold War.

name: Howard
line: Now, can we please change the subject?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Fine. Explain why you've been gone so long and I haven't gotten a single letter. Not even a lousy postcard.

name: Raj
line: You know, I'm growing to like American football.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's fun, isn't it?

name: Raj
line: Well, it's not the balls-to-the-wall action of badminton or cricket, but hey, what is?

name: Penny
line: All right, who's ready for another beer?

name: Leonard
line: I'm good.

name: Raj
line: No, thank you.

name: Penny
line: Girls.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I'm having the nicest time. You guys are like family to me. You know that, right?

name: Leonard
line: That's great. Get out.

name: Raj
line: What? Why?

name: Leonard
line: Penny and I have some issues we need to talk about.

name: Raj
line: Oh pish on your issues. You guys are fine. Yes, you hit some bumps along the way. I mean, Penny, you've always known how this man has felt about you, but you made him grovel for affection.

name: Penny
line: Okay, hold on...

name: Raj
line: Now, don't blame yourself. He was a groveller from way back. But the point is, the two of you got past it. And, Leonard, you go and propose to this poor girl in the middle of sex? That was some weak tea, dude.

name: Leonard
line: Some people might say it was romantic.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, no. But yet, here you two are, still together. And that's even after you and I had our crazy naked night.

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: That's enough.

name: Raj
line: I'm just saying that after everything you've been through, you get to look into each other's eyes and say “I love you.” And that's beautiful.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, to this day, she's never really said it.

name: Raj
line: Oh, Penny. That's ridiculous. You know you love him. You, you look him in the eyes and you say it.

name: Penny
line: Raj.

name: Raj
line: Oh come on, you know you want to say it. Say it. Say you love him. Say it!

name: Raj
line: I really thought she would say it.

name: Amy
line: Have I ever told you you're like a sexy praying mantis?

name: Sheldon
line: Every time you drink alcohol.

name: Amy
line: You know what's wonderful about the praying mantis? They devour their mate.

name: Sheldon
line: Your point being?

name: Amy
line: Dessert is served.

name: Sheldon
line: I just had cobbler.

name: Amy
line: You know what? I'm done with this.

name: Sheldon
line: W-Where are you going?

name: Amy
line: I'm leaving.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't leave. I need you.

name: Amy
line: You do?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. You're my ride.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you either say something meaningful and from the heart, or you and I are done.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Please. Amy, when I look in your eyes and you're looking back in mine, everything feels not quite normal, because I feel stronger and weaker at the same time. I feel excited and, at the same time, terrified. The truth is, I don't know what I feel, except I know what kind of man I want to be.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, that was beautiful.

name: Sheldon
line: I should hope so. That's from the first Spider-Man movie.

name: Amy
line: I'll take it.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Now, I assume we're splitting the cheque?

name: Raj
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, hey. I was actually just about to close up.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I'm sorry. I'll leave.

name: Stuart
line: No, no. It's okay. Hang out.

name: Raj
line: You sure?

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, you're my first customer today.

name: Raj
line: All right. Great.

name: Stuart
line: I'm, uh, having a nightcap. You want to join me?

name: Raj
line: What are you drinking?

name: Stuart
line: Coffee liqueur in a Chewbacca mug. I call it a sad-tini.

name: Raj
line: Perfect for the night I'm having. Thank you.

name: Stuart
line: Hmm. Nice not to drink alone.

name: Raj
line: Amen to that. Sometimes I pour a little chardonnay into my dog's water bowl.

name: Stuart
line: You're kidding.

name: Raj
line: She's kind of a mean drunk, but what are you gonna do?

name: Stuart
line: Cheers.

name: Raj
line: Cheers.

name: Stuart
line: A little music?

name: Raj
line: Sure. Mmm. Bossa nova. You listen to that with your hips as well as your ears.

name: Stuart
line: Mmm.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Something about latin music just makes me feel like I'm on a white sand beach in Rio.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah. The sun, the waves, the beautiful bodies, tanned and glistening with sweat.

name: Raj
line: I should go.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: Uh, thank you for the drink.

name: Stuart
line: No problem.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah?

name: Raj
line: Do you want to hang out tomorrow night, maybe grab a bite to eat or catch a late movie?

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, I-I'd like to, but I'm a little tight on funds.

name: Raj
line: No problem. My treat. I'll swing by after work.

name: Stuart
line: Okay.

name: Raj
line: Okay.

name: Stuart
line: I could do worse.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw, that's such good news, Howie. Thank you for telling her.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I'm a grown man. I'm gonna live with my wife. My mother's just gonna have to learn to make do on her own.

name: Bernadette
line: Was she upset?

name: Howard
line: Who can tell? She yells everything. She might have been upset. She might have been hungry.

name: Bernadette
line: Thanks for fixing it. I love you.

name: Howard
line: I love you, too. Sweet dreams. I'll talk to you tomorrow?

name: Bernadette
line: Good night, Rocket Man.

name: Howard
line: To infinity and beyond, baby.

name: Dimitri
line: Loops. You realize you just lied your ass off to your wife and your mother.

name: Howard
line: I know.

name: Dimitri
line: What are you gonna do when you get back to Earth?

name: Howard
line: Oh, I'm never going back.

name: Sheldon
line: Is anyone else troubled by the Spider-Man theme song?

name: Leonard
line: Why would it trouble you? It's, like, your third favourite cartoon theme song.

name: Sheldon
line: It is, right behind do-do-do-do-do Inspector Gadget., and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, heroes in a half-shell.

name: Howard and Raj
line: Turtle power!

name: Sheldon
line: However, the Spider-Man lyrics posit that Spider-Man, Spider-Man does whatever a spider can.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, so?

name: Sheldon
line: I can think of many things Spider-Man can't do that a spider can. One, crawl in your ear and die. Two, legally leave Guatemala without a passport. Three, have sex with a spider.

name: Raj
line: an we change the subject? Spiders give me the jeebie-jeebies.

name: Howard
line: It's heebie-jeebies.

name: Raj
line: I know, but that sounds anti-Semitic. Anyway, I was thinking we could have a little film festival tonight. The theme, movies that killed their franchises.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Like Jaws 4, Indiana Jones 4, Daredevil 1.

name: Leonard
line: Penny's working tonight, I'm in.

name: Howard
line: Not me. I'm having dinner with Bernadette and her parents.

name: Leonard
line: Fun. We know how much you love that.

name: Howard
line: It's torture. Especially with her dad. We have nothing in common.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what I like to do when I'm forced to speak with those beneath my intellectual station? I bring up an interesting topic, like the difference between Spider-Man and spiders.

name: Howard
line: Thanks, Sheldon. I'll try that with my father-in-law.

name: Sheldon
line: No, you can't use that one. That's mine. Uh, try this one for an ice-breaker. Uh, despite popular lore, there is no place in the continental United States, Alaska or Hawaii from which one can dig straight through the centre of the earth and come up in China.

name: Howard
line: Great, thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, you can't have that one either. It's too good. Sorry.

name: Raj
line: What about you, Sheldon? Do you have any plans tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: Sadly, yes. Amy's taking me to a memorial service. It's for one of her colleagues who is of Asian descent, so my planned conversational gambit is to casually remark that no matter how deep they dig his grave, he'll never make his way back to China.

name: Leonard
line: That should lighten the mood.

name: Sheldon
line: What can I say? I put the fun in funeral.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy.  Amy. Oh, right, funeral.   Amy.

name: Amy
line: Hello, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not allowed to wear my Silver Surfer neck tie, but you can wear a bathrobe?

name: Amy
line: I think I'm too sick to go to the funeral.

name: Sheldon
line: You're sick? You poor kid. Well, see ya.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, aren't you gonna take care of me?

name: Sheldon
line: Me? No. No, I'm not that kind of doctor.

name: Amy
line: But our relationship agreement clearly states that when one of us is sick, the other must take care of them.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, I see the confusion. No, the intent behind that clause was to force you to take care of me when I'm ill. When you're feeling better, you'll think that's funny.

name: Amy
line: Never mind. Good night, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy.  Amy.  Amy. I made a commitment in writing to comfort you in times like this. Additionally, you are my girlfriend, and I care about your well-being.

name: Amy
line: Thank you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. Now let's get this over with.

name: Howard
line: So, how have you been?

line: It's fine.

line: I'm sensing a theme. You ever really think about the Spider-Man theme song? How's that dinner coming?

line: So, Mrs. Rostenkowski, you took that trip to the Grand Canyon. How was it?

name: Mrs. Rostenkowski
line: It was good.

line: Had no idea you were the chatty one.

name: Sheldon
line: 102.2. Exactly what it was half an hour ago. It's like you're not even trying to get better.

name: Amy
line: I have to say, I'm finding your bedside manner a little lacking.

line: I'm sorry. I just want you to get better as soon as possible. And with that goal in mind, let me ask you a question. Do you believe in the placebo effect?

name: Amy
line: Of course I do. There have been many studies proving its validity.

name: Sheldon
line: Great. Now, this may look like a Tic Tac, but it is really a powerful medication specifically designed to cure your illness as well as freshen your breath.

line: Sheldon, this isn't helping. Why don't you just let me get some rest.

line: How can you sleep? I'm not done making you feel better. I still have to put a cold rag on your head, sing to you and apply VapoRub to your chest.

name: Sheldon
line: And the control group displayed significantly fewer genetic abnormalities. But, because of flaws in the experimental design relating to environment and diet, they lived inconclusively ever after. The end.

line: Okay, Amy, I brought you some drugs we were working on in the lab. This is proving really good for congestion, but there's a slight chance it can make your tears burn like acid, so if you take it, happy thoughts.

line: This is a really good expectorant. Although some test subjects reported lactating uncontrollably when they heard music.

name: Penny
line: Now, let's assume, by some miracle, you actually catch a fish. You're going to have to know how to gut it. So, what you're going to do is you're going to take your knife, slice him right up the belly.  You want me to stop?

line: No, I'm fine. Keep going.

name: Penny
line: All right. Now, you don't want to cut too deep into its guts, or the blood will just squirt all over your face.  Oh, my God. What is with you guys?

name: Leonard
line: It's not our fault. Our dads never did anything like this with us.

name: Penny
line: What, never?

name: Leonard
line: My dad was an anthropologist. The only father-son time he spent was with a 2,000-year-old skeleton of an Etruscan boy. I hated that kid.

name: Raj
line: Mine just took me to his gynecology office. I got so bored, I'd put vaginal lubricant on the bottom of my shoes and pretend I was ice-skating.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, my quality father-son time was spending my adolescence looking out the window waiting for my dad to come back someday.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, okay, Howard wins.

name: Leonard
line: You know, maybe we didn't have opportunities like this when we were growing up, but right now, there's a dad that wants to take you on a fishing trip.

line: You're right. Oh! I should do this.

line: Oh, Sheldon, am I glad you're back. Taking a turn for the worst. I think I'm going to need another bath.

line: I'm surprised to hear that. See, the other day, I was concerned that you weren't recovering, so while you were sleeping, I took a cheek swab and had it cultured in the lab.

name: Amy
line: Oh?

name: Sheldon
line: I got the results back. Have you developed any of the following symptoms? A growing nose, or perhaps a warm sensation in the trouser region? Also known as full-blown liar, liar, pants on fire.

line: All right, all right. But I really was sick at the beginning. It's just been so nice having you take care of me.

line: It hurts that you would lie to me, Amy. I thought our relationship was based on trust and a mutual admiration that skews in my favour.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that seems overly harsh. I mean, you gave in to a human weakness, you didn't kill a man. You know, it's a tad old-school, but my father was not one to spare the rod when my brother would sneak into his truck and drink his driving whiskey.

name: Howard
line: Sir, I'm flattered that you invited me, and I really want you to like me, but I don't think this trip is the way to do it. And I can't return these things if there's chunks of duck all over them.

line: So, listen, I know we talked about getting a bite to eat in Silver Lake, and then seeing the Christmas lights in Griffith Park, but Leonard's talking about a big D and D game at his place.

line: All right, Sheldon, to start our quest you need to open this little Christmas gift I got you.

line: What's wrong with Christmas?

line: Oh, where to begin? Trees indoors. Overuse of the words 'tis and 'twas. And the absurd custom of one stocking. Everyone knows socks belong in pairs. Who uses one sock?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, a scroll. I like scrolls. They're my third favourite system of transmitting the written word. After stone tablets and skywriting. You have all been summoned to join a thrilling Dungeons and Dragons adventure. Your quest begins in a secret northern village of elves who have all been massacred. I like where this is heading. Your task is to rescue their leader from a dungeon of ogres. Oh, that's a saucy twist. That leader's name, Santa Claus. No, no, no.

name: Leonard
line: It's actually ho, ho, ho, but you'll get the hang of it. Thought it'd be fun to make a quest with a holiday theme.

line: Fun? Mixing Dungeons and Dragons with Christmas is like making a sandwich of grape jelly, the best-tasting jelly, and petroleum jelly, the worst-tasting jelly.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, here we go. You find yourselves in the smoking remains of Santa's village. Clearly, a great battle has taken place.

line: Okay, there are ogre tracks and a trail of broken candy canes in the snow. Sheldon, what do you do?

line: Hey, guys. I don't mean to interrupt your little game, but I thought you'd like to see what you're missing out on. So, Bernadette? Bernadette's wearing leopard-print pumps and a rack-tastic red dress from Forever 21. And there's Amy, showing all kinds of ankle. In an outfit I'm assuming is from Forever 63. And I, myself am wearing a little number that got me out of two speeding tickets and jury duty.

line: Sure. I get it. Why support a friend when you can support a multinational conglomerate that is crushing the life out of that friend?

line: Yeah, sorry. Uh, you come to the end of the tunnel and find a large chest. What do you do? And, Howard, do not say, I feel up the large chest.

line: Good King Wenceslas looked out, on the feast of Stephen. When the snow lay 'round about, deep and crisp and even

line: It was simple. I combined a well-known historical fact about Bohemia with the memory of my grandparents, Mee-Maw and Pop-Pop, singing Christmas carols while I sat in front of the fire and tried to build a high-energy particle accelerator out of Legos.

line: Okay, continuing our quest.

name: Sheldon
line: W-W-Wait. There's still four more verses. You don't sing a song and not finish it. Hither, page, and stand by me, if thou know'st it, telling. Yonder peasant, who is he? Where and what his dwelling? Brightly shone the moon that night, though the frost...

name: Bernadette
line: Looks like he's doing pretty good.

line: Of course he is. Look, that girl just got dumped by her boyfriend. She's angry, she's drunk, and her favorite movie is Slumdog Millionaire. I mean.
