line: That is some low-hanging fruit.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, here he comes.

name: Penny
line: So, how'd it go?

name: Raj
line: Great. I bought her a couple of drinks, and she gave me her e-mail address.

name: Penny
line: Ooh!

name: Bernadette
line: Jennifer at not-even-if-you-were-the-last-guy-on-earth dot loser.

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sorry, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Why can't I find someone? I'm smart, I've got a cool job, and my naturally bronzed complexion means I can pull off mustard yellow in a way most guys can't.

name: Penny
line: Oh, honey, it's not you, it's them.

name: Raj
line: No, it's not. She was too beautiful for me.

name: Bernadette
line: Why would you say that?

name: Raj
line: It's true. I'm always attracted to women I can't have. I do it all the time. I did the same thing with the two of you.

name: Amy
line: The two of them? I don't understand.

name: Raj
line: Well, uh, there was a time when I had a thing for Penny, and I thought she was into me, too, because she got drunk and naked and climbed into bed with me. But apparently I misread those signals.

name: Amy
line: And you liked Bernadette also?

name: Raj
line: That was before Penny. I make it a rule to only fall for one of my friends' girlfriends at a time. I'm very old-fashioned that way.

name: Amy
line: So at, uh, some point, you probably had a thing for me, too.

name: Raj
line: No, not really.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, Raj, not even a little bit?

name: Raj
line: Not that I can think of.

name: Bernadette
line: Think harder.

name: Raj
line: Nope. I guess the heart wants what the heart wants. Or in this case, doesn't, I mean, at all. What?

name: Sheldon
line: Ye who now will bless the poor, shall yourselves find blessing. Ba-da-bum.

name: Howard
line: Done?

name: Sheldon
line: I think the word you're looking for is bravo.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, you leave the room and find yourself standing before a pool of melted snowmen.

name: Sheldon
line: Melted snowmen? Are there carrots and lumps of coal in the water?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. What's the difference?

name: Sheldon
line: Well it's a game of the imagination, Leonard. Paint a picture.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. You leave the room and find yourself standing before a pool of melted snowmen. There are carrots and lumps of coal in the water.

name: Sheldon
line: What happened to the top hats and the corncob pipes?

name: Leonard
line: You see those, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's like I'm really there.

name: Stuart
line: I gotta tell you, this, this is the most holiday fun I've had since my therapist changed my anxiety medication and I stopped caring about the blood in my stool.

name: Howard
line: Good story.

name: Leonard
line: What are you drinking there? A little eggnog?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. What, is there a problem?

name: Leonard
line: No, it's nice to see you enjoying a holiday beverage. Pretty Christmassy.

name: Sheldon
line: Since when is eggnog a Christmas drink? Eggs are available all year 'round. I've been known to enjoy this poolside.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, Sheldon. You know all the Christmas stories, and the carols, you've got an eggnog moustache going on there. Just admit it. You're getting a little Yuletide spirit.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, don't be silly. Christmas is a bunch of baloney created by the tinsel industry. Why is this so important to you?

name: Leonard
line: Honestly, because I had enough crappy Christmases as a kid and I'm tired of you sucking the joy out of them now.

name: Stuart
line: What was so bad about them?

name: Leonard
line: I grew up in a house full of crazy academics. Instead of leaving Santa milk and cookies, we had to leave him a research paper. And in the morning, you could tell he'd been there because the paper would be graded.

name: Sheldon
line: No wonder you love Christmas. That sounds amazing.

name: Leonard
line: It wasn't amazing. I got a C-minus four years in a row.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I'm familiar with your work. C-minus was your gift.

name: Raj
line: Amy, I'm really sorry. I didn't mean to upset you.

name: Amy
line: It's fine. I'm used to being the girl who never gets looked at twice. I didn't have my first kiss till I was 22, and the guy only did it so I'd give him back his insulin.

name: Bernadette
line: Sometimes the pancreas wants what the pancreas wants.

name: Amy
line: Forget it. I don't expect you guys to understand.

name: Raj
line: I understand. In seventh grade, I played Spin the Bottle and it landed on Alina Shankar. She said if I came near her, she would break the bottle and cut me.

name: Amy
line: You think that's bad? In college, I passed out at a frat party and woke up with more clothes on.

name: Raj
line: Sometimes I get so lonely, I sit on my left hand until it goes numb, then I put it in my right hand and pretend I'm holding hands with another person.

name: Amy
line: I do that, too. Sometimes the left hand tries to cop a feel. And I let it.

name: Raj
line: It's kind of nice to talk to someone who understands what it feels like to be alone.

name: Amy
line: It is, isn't it?

name: Raj
line: But you're not alone anymore. Now you've got Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: I do. And don't worry, someday you'll have somebody, too.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. I hope she's half as lovely and amazing as you are.

name: Amy
line: Thank you, Rajesh. He wants me, I'm good. We can go now.

name: Raj
line: Damn it.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Raj
line: Now that I know she doesn't like me, I'm kind of into her.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. I think I cracked the code to lower the drawbridge.

name: Howard
line: Great. Let's do it.

name: Leonard
line: The drawbridge is lowering.

name: Stuart
line: My carpal tunnel's acting up.

name: Sheldon
line: Play through the pain.

name: Leonard
line: You did it. The drawbridge is down. You cross the chasm and find yourself in a small dungeon room. And in the corner, chained to the wall, you see a bloodied and beaten Santa Claus. He says, ho, ho, help me.

name: Howard
line: Yes, we found Santa. Christmas is saved. Don't ever tell my mother I said that.

name: Stuart
line: I take out my skeleton key and run to Santa to unchain him.

name: Sheldon
line: But first, I cast a spell of paralysis on Stuart and Howard.

name: Howard
line: Wait, what are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: You can't talk, you're paralyzed. I get right up in Santa's big, fat face and say, well, well, well, jolly old Saint Nick, we meet again. Yeah, I believe the last time we spoke was in the Baybrook Mall in Galveston, Texas, when I was five years old, isn't that right?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, okay.

name: Sheldon
line: My mother dragged me there and she plopped me down on your lap and you asked me what I wanted for Christmas. And I told you, my Pop-Pop, because that was the year my grandfather died. I missed him and I wanted him back.

name: Leonard
line: This is weird, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Pop-Pop was the only one in my family who encouraged me to pursue science. But you didn't bring him back, did you? No, instead, I got Lincoln Logs. Well, you can build a lot of neat things out of Lincoln Logs, but Pop-Pop ain't one of 'em. And now you're here asking me for something, to save you. Well, sorry, Mr. Kringle, but today's not your day. I'm leaving you here to rot, and I hope the ogres feast on your bones. I take the skeleton key, and I toss it into the chasm, and on the way out, I give Santa a swift kick in his bowl full of jelly!

name: Leonard
line: Okay. So Wolowitz and Stuart are paralyzed, Santa's dead, and I picked this over having sex with my girlfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: Santa?

name: Santa
line: Oh, hello, Sheldon. You should be asleep.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then, you shouldn't have jingle bells on your boots.

name: Santa
line: Oh. I've been wanting to talk to you. I'm sorry I disappointed you when you were a little boy. I can do a lot of magical things, but unfortunately bringing your Pop-Pop back isn't one of them.

name: Sheldon
line: I understand.

name: Santa
line: But I do have something special for you. Close your eyes.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I hope it's a train.

name: Santa
line: Oh, it's better than a train.

name: Sheldon
line: Two trains?

name: Santa
line: Better.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm getting three trains.

name: Santa
line: Okay, open 'em.  This is for leaving me in the dungeon to be eaten alive by ogres!

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, uh, uh, hang on. In my defense...

name: Santa
line: Ho, ho, ho, ya big dork.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I must say, Leonard, when I first heard your idea for Giant Jenga, I was sceptical.

name: Leonard
line: I can't blame you. Tiny Twister was a complete bust.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I was wrong. The looming threat of being crushed under a pile of lumber does add a certain spice. I've never felt so alive.  Oh, hello, Alex. Uh, let me go get you last night's recordings.

name: Leonard
line: What recordings?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you remember when you told me I talk in my sleep? Well, it occurred to me that, like most things I say, it's probably pure gold. So I started recording it all, and now Alex gets to comb through eight hours of what I like to call Sheldon After Dark.

name: Alex
line: Hey, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. Just playing a little Giant Jenga here.

name: Alex
line: Oh, I know, I'm the one who had to buy him the helmet. So, do you have any plans this weekend?

name: Leonard
line: Well, most of Saturday's gonna be figuring out where to put this game when we're done. How about you?

name: Alex
line: Oh, I'm gonna go see Kip Thorne give a lecture on subatomic space-time.

name: Leonard
line: Ooh. That's his take on John Wheeler's quantum foam. That should be great.

name: Alex
line: Well, if you want, you can come with me.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, I'd love to, but I'm supposed to hang out with Penny.

name: Alex
line: Well, bring her.

name: Leonard
line: Well, she's not really into that kind of stuff.

name: Alex
line: Yeah, okay. Well, if you want to hear about the lecture, I can tell you all about it at work, or, you know, over dinner sometime.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Jenga, I win!

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on, that can't be true.

name: Raj
line: I did the research. Tony the Tiger, Dig'em the Frog, Cap'n Crunch, Toucan Sam, Count Chocula, Trix the Rabbit, Snap, Crackle and Pop. Not one cereal mascot is a girl. It's a total breakfast sausage fest.

name: Leonard
line: Are we done with this?

name: Raj
line: Almost. Franken Berry, Boo Berry, Sugar Bear and the Honey Nut Cheerio bee, I believe his name is Buzz.

name: Leonard
line: Terrific. Something weird happened and I don't know what to do about it.

name: Howard
line: What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon's assistant asked me on a date last night.

name: Raj
line: How could you do that to me? You know I've been working it with Alex for weeks.

name: Leonard
line: Working it? You can't even talk to her.

name: Raj
line: I talk with my eyes.

name: Howard
line: You look like my little cousin when he's dropping one in his diaper.

name: Leonard
line: She knows I have a girlfriend. It's so weird.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God. You're loving this.

name: Leonard
line: To my bones. I mean, I'm not gonna do anything about it. I love Penny. It's just nice to have a young, attractive woman sniffing around the goods.

name: Raj
line: I both hate you and want to be you. This is Ryan Gosling all over again.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, gentlemen, what is on the conversational menu this morning?

name: Raj
line: Leonard stole my woman, and he knew full well I was only six to eight months away from making my move.

name: Leonard
line: I didn't steal anyone.

name: Raj
line: Your assistant is totally hitting on this jerk and he loves it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that's not acceptable. I mean, I'm her boss. She needs to be solely focused on my needs, not distracted by your pasty, androgynous brand of sexuality.

name: Leonard
line: I'm androgynous?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, please. Look at you with your pouty bee-stung lips.

name: Leonard
line: What do you guys think I should do?

name: Raj
line: I say you tell Alex your heart belongs to Penny, I provide her a shoulder to cry on, and then roughly half a year later I give it to her good.

name: Sheldon
line: I want to thank you all for coming on such short notice. Uh, in the past, I've reached out to each of you individually, but I believe my present situation requires the collective wisdom of the group, which as you can see from your commemorative T-shirts I have dubbed Sheldon Cooper's Council of Ladies.

name: Penny
line: What is happening?

name: Sheldon
line: I need your advice about a delicate workplace situation. Uh, to protect those involved, I'll be changing their names.

name: Bernadette
line: Who's involved?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, a short, bespectacled colleague of mine who lives in the shadow of his brilliant roommate. Let's call this colleague Ricardo Shilly-Shally.

name: Penny
line: You're talking about Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, Shilly-Shally has red hair and, uh, he briefly served in the Mexican Navy. Anyway, despite the fact that he has a girlfriend, Shilly-Shally has been the recipient of inappropriate workplace flirtations from a young lady.

name: Amy
line: It's your assistant Alex, isn't it?

name: Sheldon
line: No. No. No. This is Tondelaya della Ventimiglia.

name: Penny
line: Wait, what the hell's going on with Leonard and Alex?

name: Sheldon
line: No, uh, no, I'm sorry. Who's talking about Leonard and Alex?

name: Penny
line: Fine. Ricardo and Tondelaya.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, look, it's not really about Ricardo and Tondelaya. It is really about her boss, who doesn't quite know how to handle this situation and could use your advice, which is surprising because Dr. Einstein Von Brainstorm, he's usually pretty smart about these things.

name: Penny
line: I'm gonna kill her.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sure you've got nothing to worry about. Leonard would never cheat on you.

name: Amy
line: She's right. But say the word, I got a lab full of cocaine-addicted monkeys with nothing to lose. One of them could end up in the backseat of her car. Or her shower.

name: Sheldon
line: Ladies, ladies, please. We're not here to talk about Penny, okay? We're here to talk about me. Uh, I mean Einstein Von Brainstorm. Oh, darn it! All right, I guess the cat's out of the bag. Let me explain what's going on. Ricardo is really Leonard.

name: Penny
line: We know what's going on, Sheldon!

name: Sheldon
line: Well, what should I do?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, Alex is your employee. If she's doing something that's making Leonard uncomfortable, you should talk to her.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, he's not uncomfortable at all. No, he's loving it. Yeah, he's strutting around like he's five-foot-six.

name: Penny
line: What? He's loving it?

name: Bernadette
line: Sheldon, you need to talk to Alex right away.

name: Sheldon
line: Talk to her? That's all you've got? With a cool name like Sheldon Cooper's Council of Ladies, I really expected more. Give me back the T-shirts.

name: Sheldon
line: Alex, check my schedule. What does my afternoon look like?

name: Alex
line: I think it's pretty wide open. Oh, wait. Here's something at four o'clock. Give Alex a talking to?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that snuck up on us, didn't it?

name: Alex
line: Is there a problem?

name: Sheldon
line: Let's not call it a problem. Let's call it an opportunity. To solve a serious problem.

name: Alex
line: What did I do?

name: Sheldon
line: You don't know? Oh, you poor dear. Your ovaries are squirting so much goofy juice into your brains you don't even know which way is up. You made an inappropriate sexual advance towards Dr. Hofstadter.

name: Alex
line: What? I didn't make a sexual advance on anybody.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, there's no need to get defensive. I'm not unsympathetic to your plight. My father used to say that a woman is like an egg salad sandwich on a warm Texas day.

name: Alex
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Full of eggs and only appealing for a short time.

name: Alex
line: This conversation is making me uncomfortable.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, you and me both, sister. Now, please understand, I don't hold you responsible for your behaviour because, see, from an evolutionary standpoint, you're a slave to your desire to reproduce. But during the work day, when you feel possessed by amorous intent, may I suggest that you suppress it by leafing through this illustrated book of sexually transmitted diseases? Let's see here. Oh, yes. Check out this oozy doozy.

name: Alex
line: I have to go.

name: Sheldon
line: So does this fellow, but he can't without it burning like hot soup.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, pretty lady.

name: Penny
line: Oh, you seem extra happy.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I guess I am.

name: Penny
line: Any particular reason why?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, just having a good day. This morning Sheldon fell asleep on the way to work, so I got to listen to the radio. That was pretty crazy.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm. Anything else?

name: Leonard
line: Mm. I found this quiz online called Which Star Trek Character Are You? and it only took me four tries to get Captain Kirk.

name: Penny
line: That's great.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. It. Was.

name: Penny
line: Hmm. Well, I'm glad you're having such a great day.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. And the one thing that could make it even better is an evening with my special girl.

name: Penny
line: Oh, and who's that?

name: Leonard
line: What do you mean?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I just didn't know if you meant me or Alex.

name: Leonard
line: Um, why would I mean Alex?

name: Penny
line: Because I know she hit on you and I know you liked it.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Don't play dumb with me, Ricardo Shilly-Shally!

name: Leonard
line: I'm missing something.  Did you say something to Penny about Alex?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. Yeah, and a fat lot of good it did me. All she did was get mad at you.

name: Leonard
line: Why would you do that?

name: Sheldon
line: I needed advice about a woman. I would have asked you, but if the last few years have proven anything, it's that you can't tell a uterus from a unicycle.

name: Leonard
line: At least I know not to blab to a girl about somebody flirting with her boyfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: Good to know. Yeah, a few more helpful hints like that, you may find yourself on the Council of Ladies.  Hello. I see. Uh, what time? Very well, then. Huh. That was the Human Resources Department at the university. Apparently, my assistant Alex has filed a complaint accusing me of inappropriate behaviour in the workplace.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my God, what did you do?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm, let me think. Nothing. I'm a delight.

name: Sheldon
line: Human Resources Department.  Human Resources Department.  Human Resources Department.

name: HR Woman
line: Come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: HR Woman
line: Ah, Dr. Cooper, have a seat.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: HR Woman
line: I called you in today because your assistant Alex Jensen has lodged a complaint against you.

name: Sheldon
line: So I've been told. But I can't understand what she has to complain about. I mean, she has a front-row seat as I make scientific history. There's string cheese in my mini-fridge, and that's for anyone. Yeah, and just yesterday I led her away from a life of sexual promiscuity by making her look at pictures of disease-ridden genitalia.

name: HR Woman
line: Cancel my next appointment. This is gonna take a while. Dr. Cooper, you said things to your employee that you just cannot say in the workplace.

name: Sheldon
line: Like what?

name: HR Woman
line: Well, according to Ms. Jensen, you said that she was a slave to her biological urges and called her an egg salad sandwich. I don't even know what that means, but I'm gonna go ahead and tell you you can't say it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! I see the confusion here. No, no, Alex thought I was singling her out. No. I meant that all women are slaves to their biological urges, you know? Even you. You're a slave.

name: HR Woman
line: I'm a what?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, y-you, I-I'm just saying, you know, at a certain point in a woman's menstrual cycle...

name: HR Woman
line: Whuh-ah! Woah! You can't talk about that, either, Dr. Cooper. Your language is entirely inappropriate, and I'm gonna advise that you shut your mouth right now.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't see why I'm the one being persecuted here. Dr. Hofstadter, he was bragging about his sexual desirability to anyone who would listen. You know, and Howard Wolowitz, he spent two years using university resources building a six-breasted sex robot. Oh, and at the office Christmas party, I heard Rajesh Koothrappali refer to you several times as Brown Sugar.

name: HR Woman
line: Hofstadter... Wolowitz... and the last one was Rajesh Koothrappali?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. No, yeah, but in his defense, that wasn't racist. He's also brown.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry Alex hit on me, hit on me, hit on me. I'm sorry Alex hit on me, I'd no idea I'm cute.

name: Penny
line: Oh, damn it, you are.

name: Leonard
line: Please forgive me. I should have told you about Alex.

name: Penny
line: I don't care about Alex. Fine, I care. Okay, I hate that bitch. But what really hurt is that you liked it so much. I mean, do I need to be worried?

name: Leonard
line: Of course not. No. Why?

name: Penny
line: Because, she is pretty and smart, and when you talk about work, she doesn't have to go home and look up words in the dictionary to understand what you said.

name: Leonard
line: You do that?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on. Are you feeling insecure? Because that's my thing, and if you take it away, I don't know what I'm bringing to this relationship.

name: Penny
line: Yes, Leonard, I am insecure. Happy?

name: Leonard
line: No, I'm not happy.

name: Penny
line: Why are you smiling?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry. I just never think of you having feelings like that.

name: Penny
line: Well, I do.

name: Leonard
line: Why? Nothing is ever going to happen between me and Alex.

name: Penny
line: Good.

name: Leonard
line: Come here. Tell you a secret?

name: Penny
line: What's that?

name: Leonard
line: With all these women chasing me, I kind of do feel like Captain Kirk.

name: Penny
line: Can I tell you a secret?

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Penny
line: Keep talking about Captain Kirk, and we're all gonna stop.

name: Leonard
line: Message received. Ah, excuse me.  Hello. This is Dr. Hofstadter. Okay. All right, thank you. That's weird. I'm getting called in to Human Resources.

name: Penny
line: What did you do?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know.

name: Howard
line: Huh. I just got called in to Human Resources.

name: Bernadette
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: I don't know.

name: Raj
line: Huh. That is so strange. Human Resources wants to talk to me tomorrow.  Could you stop licking your ass for two minutes? I have a problem here.

name: Howard
line: Do you really think you should be drinking right now?

name: Raj
line: How else am I supposed to talk to the Human Resources lady?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. Seek professional help?

name: Raj
line: I did. The guy at the liquor store said this stuff tastes great in coffee.

name: Howard
line: Wait, you got called in, too? What is going on?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon threw us all under the bus.

name: Howard
line: Oh.

name: Raj
line: I feel like I've been called down to the principal's office. Although I wouldn't mind if Brown Sugar suspended me. From a sex swing. This may have been a mistake.

name: Howard
line: Relax. Everything's gonna be fine. Before I met Bernadette I was in here every other day. Uh, little tip, turn off your I Like Big Butts ringtone before you go in.

name: Raj
line: Well, this is all your fault.

name: Leonard
line: How is this my fault?

name: Raj
line: If you weren't screwing around with Sheldon's assistant, none of this would be happening.

name: Leonard
line: I wasn't screwing around with anyone.

name: Raj
line: Oh, of course not. She was just sniffing around your goods because she was hunting for truffles.

name: HR Woman
line: Ah, Mr. Wolowitz, it's been a while.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Janine. How are Tom and the kids?

name: Janine
line: Fine. You must be Dr. Hofstadter.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, but I think this is all a big misunderstanding.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, yeah, me, too. I didn't do anything.

name: Janine
line: Is that alcohol on your breath?

name: Raj
line: Howard built a sex robot.

name: Howard
line: That is not true. All I did was build a robot.

name: Janine
line: Did it have six breasts?

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry, I'm a feminist, I don't notice things like how many breasts a robot has.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, hello.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, I came to speak to Mrs. Davis.

name: Janine
line: And I'm a little busy right now.

name: Sheldon
line: But I came to file a complaint. Somebody has made me feel uncomfortable in the workplace by using language of an inappropriate and sexual nature.

name: Janine
line: And who was that?

name: Sheldon
line: You, you dirty birdie. I-I thought about the things you said to me yesterday, and I realized I'm deeply offended. Now, be a dear and get me one of those complaint forms.

name: Janine
line: That's it. All of you, in my office now!

name: Sheldon
line: And thanks to you, I know better than to ask if you're menstruating. And based on your behaviour, I don't have to.

name: Sheldon
line: It has been pointed out to me that some of the things I said to you could be construed as offensive, and I would like to offer you my sincerest apology.

name: Alex
line: Thank you, Dr. Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, additionally, you should know that the university has mandated that I take an online sexual harassment seminar so this sort of thing doesn't happen in the future.

name: Alex
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. Now, unfortunately, uh, my time is much too valuable to waste on nonsense like this, so, um, I'm gonna need you to take it for me. Oh, and, uh, you'd better ace it, they're pretty mad.

name: Penny
line: So, hey, I was thinking about that stuff with Alex.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, would you stop worrying about that?

name: Penny
line: I can't help it. But, look, I figured I could sit around and feel insecure, or I could do something about it. So I got a course catalogue at school and looked at some of the science classes.

name: Leonard
line: That's great.

name: Penny
line: No, it isn't, they are extremely boring. I mean, how do you not kill yourself, like, every day? Anyway, I decided I don't need to be a scientist, I could just look like one. So I bought these.

name: Leonard
line: Glasses? I really don't think that's gonna change... oh, my God, you look so smart and hot.

name: Penny
line: I know, right? Watch this. Molecules.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, come with me.

name: Penny
line: Where are we going?

name: Leonard
line: To my bedroom, so I can take everything off but those glasses. And maybe the boots.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, will you steam my uniform next?

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. Do you recall this conversation? Leonard, want to go halfsies on a steamer? No, Sheldon, we don't need a steamer. Looks like that rumpled chicken's come home to roost.

name: Penny
line: Hi. Here are the make-up sponges you asked for.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, thanks, I thought I had more.

name: Penny
line: Damn, you've got more makeup than I do. You've got better makeup than I do. Yeah, I'm borrowing this.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, hey, hey, hey. This is my Comic-Con makeup. I love you, but there are some things a man doesn't share with his girlfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a wise policy. I once borrowed my sister's makeup for a costume contest. Got a terrible case of pinkeye. But luckily, I was going as a zombie. I won second place.

name: Penny
line: I feel like you guys just went to Comic-Con.

name: Leonard
line: That was San Diego Comic-Con. This is Bakersfield Comic-Con.

name: Penny
line: Is that better?

name: Leonard
line: Well, it's a lot smaller. It's more about the comic books. The way these conventions used to be before they went all Hollywood.

name: Sheldon
line: So to answer your question, no, it's not better.

name: Penny
line: Well, then why are you going?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a comic book convention. You know, it's like pizza or particle accelerators, even the stinky one's still pretty good.

name: Penny
line: All right. Well, you guys have fun. I guess I'll see you Sunday night.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hang on a second.  Hold this.

name: Penny
line: What was that for?

name: Leonard
line: To show people when they don't believe me.

name: Penny
line: Oh, this is the best. You have booze with breakfast on a Tuesday, you got a problem. You do it on the weekend, you got brunch.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon doesn't believe in brunch. He can't stand being at a table where one person's having an omelette and another person's having a sandwich.

name: Bernadette
line: He's not exhausting at all.

name: Penny
line: Oh. It's Leonard. He says they're on the road and headed for Bakersfield at warp speed. Maybe it's the mimosa, but I'm gonna give the kid an LOL.

name: Bernadette
line: It's cute how excited they are. You should have seen Howard sewing his costume all week for the convention.

name: Amy
line: When did Howard learn to sew?

name: Bernadette
line: When he was a little boy, every couple months, he would have to let his mom's pants out.

name: Amy
line: I don't even understand why they go to these conventions.

name: Penny
line: I know. The four of them work at a major university. They're all super smart. How can they still be into something made for 12-year-olds?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't mind it. I think Howie's just in touch with his inner child. Although when he comes to bed in his Batman pyjamas, sometimes it feels like I'm touching his inner child.

name: Amy
line: It's probably because they were bullied growing up. In a world where you can't fight back, superheroes provide meaningful wish-fulfillment.

name: Penny
line: Mmmm. Now I feel bad for picking on all those kids. Although, in my defence, if Danny Biffle didn't want to eat a mouthful of dirt, he shouldn't have shown up to school wearing a bow tie.

name: Bernadette
line: I've never even read a comic book. You guys?

name: Penny
line: Uh-uh.

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Bernadette
line: I mean, it's such an important part of their lives. Maybe we should try reading some.

name: Amy
line: Seriously?

name: Bernadette
line: The comic book store isn't far from here.

name: Penny
line: That is an amazing idea. Okay, how many of these have I had?

name: Sheldon
line: I think you should turn on the GPS.

name: Leonard
line: It is on.

name: Sheldon
line: But the turn-by-turn voice option isn't on. I know I'd feel more safe if you turn on the turn-by-turn voice option. I love the turn-by-turn voice option.

name: Howard
line: Has it really only been ten miles?

name: Leonard
line: I'm turning it on, but just to shut you up.

name: GPS
line: Leonard, bear left and continue on Interstate 210.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, sounds like that fellow knows what he's talking about. I'd put on my listening ears if I were you.

name: Leonard
line: What did you do?

name: Sheldon
line: I found a hack online. I was able to upload MP3 recordings of my voice to your GPS.

name: Raj
line: That is so cool.

name: Leonard
line: Counterpoint, no, it's not.

name: GPS
line: Continue on Interstate 210 for five miles. Here's an interesting fact about interstates.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: Shh, he said it's interesting.

name: GPS
line: Interstates are numbered as follows. Even-numbered routes run east and west, odd-numbered routes run north and south. Three-digit route numbers indicate bypasses or spurs.

name: Howard
line: Look, Leonard, there's a bridge. Drive off it.

name: Raj
line: You know, we're not that far from Vazquez Rocks.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, they shot a lot of Star Trek episodes out there.

name: Howard
line: We've got our costumes in the trunk. We could go there and have a little photo shoot.

name: Raj
line: Great idea. I haven't had a carbohydrate in two weeks. These cheekbones need to be in front of a camera before I eat a pretzel and they're gone.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that sounds fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, smashing. Now, Leonard, do you know how to get there?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well luckily, someone in the car does.

name: GPS
line: Recalculating. While we're waiting, do you know which president signed the Intestate Highway System Act into law? The answer, coming up in 14 miles.

name: Sheldon
line: None of you will get it. It's Eisenhower.

name: Bernadette
line: Why are they staring?

name: Amy
line: Who cares? Just soak it in. Hello, boys.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, hey. Could you please stop staring? They're just girls. It's nothing you haven't seen in movies or in drawings.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: What brings you guys here?

name: Bernadette
line: We were looking for a recommendation about comic books.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, well, I recommend you don't open a store and sell them.

name: Penny
line: No, we were just wondering why the guys like this stuff so much, so we thought we'd give it a try.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, okay. What do you think you might be into? Superhero, fantasy, graphic novels, manga... I swear I will turn a hose on you.

name: Bernadette
line: What kind of comics do the guys like?

name: Stuart
line: Um, a little bit of everything. Mostly superhero stuff.

name: Amy
line: All right, well, who's the best superhero?

name: Stuart
line: Shh! You can't ask a question like that in here. Are you trying to start a rumble?

name: Penny
line: Well then, what do you recommend?

name: Stuart
line: Well, uh, let's see. You've got your basic clean-cut good guys, Superman, Spider-Man, Captain America. Then you have your darker anti-heroes, your Batman, your Wolverine, Punisher.

name: Amy
line: Ooh, I do love a bad boy.

name: Penny
line: As evidenced by your boyfriend and his fear of hamsters.

name: Stuart
line: If I were you, I'd go for Fables number one. The artwork is sophisticated, it's intelligently written, and it doesn't objectify or stereotype women.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, Thor! He's hot.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, he kind of is.

name: Raj
line: And we're blending, and we're blending, and we're done.

name: Sheldon
line: I know Mr. Data isn't supposed to smile, but here it comes.

name: Howard
line: Come on, guys. Let's do this.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm sweating my bald cap off.

name: Howard
line: So what's our first pose going to be?

name: Raj
line: I say we begin with a classic Star Trek fight scene.

name: Leonard
line: I'll set the timer.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, how is that a fight pose?

name: Sheldon
line: Mr. Data's weapon is his mind. I'm wielding it.

name: Raj
line: Phasers on the Borg! Charlie's Angels.

name: Howard
line: Okay, what's next?

name: Raj
line: Now let's do some sexy glamour shots. I'll set the mood.  Oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, Yeah, nice one, oontz, oontz. That's right. Oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz...

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God. Leonard, someone's stealing your car!

name: Leonard
line: What? Hey, hey! Come back here!

name: Raj
line: Stop!

name: Sheldon
line: Stealing is against the law!

name: Leonard
line: I don't believe this.

name: Howard
line: Son of a bitch.

name: Raj
line: I'll call 911. What, oh, no, my phone is in my other pants.

name: Howard
line: Oh, so is mine.

name: Leonard
line: Mine, too. Anybody got any ideas?

name: Sheldon
line: Nope. The only thing left to do now is assign blame.  Nice going.

name: Leonard
line: What kind of a person steals another person's car in broad daylight?

name: Sheldon
line: What kind of person leaves his keys in the car?

name: Leonard
line: I thought we agreed this was all Koothrappali's fault.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. Nice going.

name: Howard
line: Car.

name: Raj
line: What is wrong with people? Why don't they stop?

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe we're better off. What if we were to get in a car with a crazy person?

name: Leonard
line: Look at us, Sheldon. We're the crazy people.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, perhaps we should hold up a sign that assures passing motorists of our mental competence.

name: Howard
line: Good idea. Why don't you get started on that?

name: Leonard
line: Come on, let's just start walking. There's got to be a gas station or something nearby.

name: Sheldon
line: What, you think just because you're wearing a captain's uniform, you're in charge?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Penny
line: Hmm, okay, I'm done. How did you guys finish so fast?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know, there were a lot of pictures, and one page only had the word brakkadoom!

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, I have street smarts.

name: Bernadette
line: So, what'd you guys think?

name: Amy
line: Well, there was a lot of action.

name: Penny
line: Mmm.

name: Amy
line: And the story moved along at a brisk pace. It was, overall, what's the word I'm looking for?

name: Penny
line: Stupid?

name: Amy
line: So stupid.

name: Penny
line: I don't know how Leonard can get so caught up in this.

name: Bernadette
line: It's crazy, they spend hours arguing about things that don't even exist.

name: Amy
line: What a waste of time.

name: Penny
line: I know. A hammer so heavy that no one else can pick it up?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't think it's heavy. It's some sort of magic, so only Thor can lift it.

name: Penny
line: That makes even less sense, I mean...

name: Amy
line: No, no, no, it doesn't. Thor is a god. The hammer is his, only he can use it. It's like Sheldon and his toothbrush. Or his thin, beckoning lips.

name: Penny
line: Okay, hang on, what if Thor's hand is on the hammer? I mean, if he's touching it with his god magic, does that mean I could lift it?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Well, which is it?

name: Amy
line: Maybe we missed something.

name: Bernadette
line: Let's read it again.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Amy
line: Yeah.

name: Bernadette
line: You want some tea?

name: Amy
line: Good idea. I'll help you.

name: Penny
line: Wait, I thought we were reading.

name: Amy
line: We are. We're just, uh, giving you a head start.

name: Howard
line: I wish my mom was here. We could all hang out in her shadow.

name: Raj
line: Wool pants in the desert. I feel like I've got poached testicles.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, you poor thing, you're sweating. That's so much worse than having your car stolen.

name: Raj
line: Insurance is gonna buy you a new car. It's not gonna de-funk my junk.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, a little less bellyaching. We're Starfleet officers and a member of the Borg Collective.

name: Leonard
line: Please, Sheldon, I am so not in the mood.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, all our lives we have dreamed of finding ourselves inside one of the fantasy worlds we love. And look at us. At this moment, we are, in fact, a Star Trek landing party stranded in an alien and unforgiving environment, relying only on our wits, our fortitude and our moxie. As long as we have those things, nothing can stop...

name: Guys in Passing Car
line: Nerds!

name: Sheldon
line: I hate this planet.

name: Amy
line: It says right here on the hammer, whoever holds this hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor.

name: Bernadette
line: Hold on, who decides who's worthy? Does the hammer decide?

name: Penny
line: Yes!

name: Amy
line: No! It can't decide. It's a hammer.

name: Penny
line: You said it's a magic hammer.

name: Amy
line: Yeah, but, it can't make decisions.

name: Penny
line: If Harry Potter's wand can make decisions, why can't Thor's hammer?

name: Amy
line: Okay, if you're going to start comparing wands and hammers, I can't even take you seriously.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. Hello. Uh, uh, uh, four glasses of water, please. Anything for you guys?

name: Leonard
line: Can I use your phone? Our car got stolen.

name: Waitress
line: Why don't you ask Scotty to beam you up?

name: Sheldon
line: Scotty was on the original series, and we're Next Generation. So, joke's on you.

name: Howard
line: We're not with him.

name: Amy
line: You can't pick something up in outer space. In space, there is no up.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah? Then how does the sun come up every day?

name: Amy
line: Hard to argue with those kind of street smarts.

name: Bernadette
line: Leonard and Sheldon have boxes of comics across the hall. Why don't we go look at those?

name: Penny
line: Oh, great. Yes. And then you will see, I am not wrong, because if we were in outer space, then anyone could pick up the hammer because it would be floating around in a weightless environment. Yeah, that's right, the slow reader used science. Suck on that.

name: Policeman
line: Was there anything valuable in the car?

name: Leonard
line: Our clothes, our wallets, phones.

name: Raj
line: And about three hundred dollars worth of makeup, so this thief could look like anyone right now.

name: Policeman
line: Makeup? Sure.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, we're going to the Comic-Con in Bakersfield. They have a big costume contest. It's cooler than it sounds.

name: Policeman
line: I don't know, sounds pretty cool.

name: Raj
line: It, it is. It's not just comic books. They've got action figures, toys, a Tron-themed dance party.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, he gets how cool it is.

name: Policeman
line: I think I have all I need here. You guys need me to call someone? I'm guessing your moms?

name: Leonard
line: Thanks, but we've got it covered.

name: Howard
line: Okay, I just talked to my mom. She arranged for us to get a rental car.

name: Raj
line: Great. We can still make it to Comic-Con.

name: Leonard
line: Are you kidding me? After all we've been through, I just want to go home.

name: Raj
line: Don't be like that. Come on, Howard, talk to him.

name: Howard
line: I'm with Leonard. I'm done.

name: Raj
line: Fine, then I guess it's two against two. How do we decide?

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, it's three against one.

name: Raj
line: What? What about the mission? You said we were a real-life landing party.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, we're not. We're an imaginary landing party who had real-life garbage thrown at us by real-life strangers who think we're idiots. And to tell you the truth, I'm starting to feel like one. I want to go home now.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Did we at least rent the car from Enterprise? Get it? Enterprise? Screw you. That's funny.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, what if the Hulk picked up Thor while Thor is holding the hammer?

name: Amy
line: Yeah?

name: Bernadette
line: Then by the transitive property of picking things up, Hulk picked up the hammer.

name: Amy
line: No. Hulk picked up Thor, Thor picked up the hammer.

name: Penny
line: Okay, hang on. If I go to a bar and pick up a guy, and he picks up a girl, and then we all leave together, did I pick up the girl?

name: Amy
line: Did that ever happen?

name: Penny
line: Hey, are we talking about me or are we talking about Thor?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I say that's the last time we ever go outside.

name: Amy
line: Look, right here. Red Hulk is picking up Thor's hammer 'cause Thor's touching it.

name: Penny
line: No, it's because they're in space. He's really just touching the strap.

name: Amy
line: The strap is part of the hammer.

name: Bernadette
line: No, it's not!

name: Raj
line: Are they actually arguing about comic books?

name: Leonard
line: No, that can't be right.

name: Howard
line: Maybe Thor's Hammer is a new colour of nail polish.

name: Bernadette
line: Then Red Hulk must be worthy.

name: Penny
line: How could Red Hulk be worthy?

name: Bernadette
line: You don't know his life.

name: Sheldon
line: There's only one logical explanation. Somewhere in the desert we crossed into an alternate dimension where the women in our lives can finally appreciate great literature.

name: Raj
line: If it's an alternate dimension, sounds like a job for a landing party.

name: Sheldon
line: Captain, what are your orders?

name: Leonard
line: I say we investigate.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. They might be hostile.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, but set them to stun. If we vaporize Penny, I'll never find a girlfriend that pretty again.

name: GPS
line: Fun fact, President Eisenhower signed the Federal Aid Highway Act from his hospital room.

name: First Car Thief
line: Wow, that is interesting.

name: Second Car Thief
line: You learn something new every day.

name: GPS
line: Say, can you name the four state capitols that are not served by the interstate system?

name: First Car Thief
line: Ooh, another quiz.

name: Second Car Thief
line: Yes!

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, your food's getting cold.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll eat later. Right now, I'm suckling at the informative bosom of mother physics.

name: Penny
line: It's hot when Sheldon talks dirty.

name: Raj
line: So, I found this Web site where you send them pictures, they sculpt your head and make an action figure out of you. How awesome is that?

name: Howard
line: Let me see.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, you can pick your wardrobe. You can even choose your accessories.

name: Howard
line: Leonard, you can get a little asthma inhaler.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, this is neat. Think about all the action figures we've bought over the years. It would be kind of cool to have ones that look like us. Don't you think?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, if that's your idea of what's cool, you should get one.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, so, I'm out.

name: Raj
line: What do you think, Sheldon? Want an action figure that looks just like you?

name: Sheldon
line: Would it come with Kung-Fu grip?

name: Raj
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't waste my time.

name: Leonard
line: You get that these are personalised action figures.

name: Penny
line: Honey, if you want one, just get one.

name: Howard
line: You're still out, right?

name: Leonard
line: Yep.

name: Sheldon
line: A hush falls over the crowd as Cooper studies the board. He makes his move. He's dividing both sides by I. He's adding back the coefficient. He has a value for P. He's plugging that back in. He takes the derivative, and he solves the equation. The crowd goes wild. Nobel! Nobel!

name: Kripke
line: Cooper?

name: Sheldon
line: Nobel. Kripke. Don't look at my board.

name: Kripke
line: What's that?

name: Sheldon
line: That's a drawing of a really cool train. Don't look at that, either. What do you want?

name: Kripke
line: I have some bad news. You're working on a gwant pwoposal fow a new fusion weactow. I'm working on a gwant pwoposal fow a new fusion weactow. The university is only awowed to submit one pwoposal.

name: Sheldon
line: So they asked you to pack up your things and ship out. That's hard cheese, Barry. You're one of the good ones.

name: Kripke
line: No, they're making us work together.

name: Sheldon
line: That's ridiculous. I am one of the great minds of our generation. I work on a level so rarified you couldn't even imagine it. I said stop looking at my cool train!

name: Leonard
line: Hmm. Kind of a strange place to put a picture of you and Bernadette.

name: Howard
line: Well, I wanted everybody to know I love my wife. And nobody to know I forgot to turn off the laser.

name: Raj
line: They're here. Our action figures have arrived. This is the best five hundred dollars I've ever spent.

name: Leonard
line: A thousand dollars on action figures? How can you afford that?

name: Howard
line: Easy. His family's loaded, and Bernadette has a great job. My wife came with both fun bags and money bags.

name: Raj
line: Say hello to an exact scale model of me. Oh, I'm not dark chocolate. I'm melt-in-your-mouth caramel.

name: Howard
line: Oh, man. Look at my nose.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe it's a shipping problem.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Maybe Wesley Snipes and Toucan Sam just got action figures that look like you guys.

name: Raj
line: This sucks.

name: Howard
line: I can't believe I wasted all that money.

name: Leonard
line: Aw, and my girlfriend wouldn't let me get one. Look at my face. Do I look smug? I feel smug.

name: Penny
line: I hate it when you make me sit through all the credits.

name: Leonard
line: Well, sometimes there's a secret ending, like in The Avengers.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but I don't think that's going to happen in a documentary about the Holocaust.

name: Leonard
line: They could show bloopers. Oh, no.

name: Penny
line: What is that?

name: Leonard
line: That is Sheldon's “I'm unhappy and about to destroy the planet” music. Come on, let's just go to your place.

name: Penny
line: Well, wait, if he's unhappy,shouldn't we talk to him?

name: Leonard
line: Shouldn't we talk to him? Have you learned nothing in six years?

name: Penny
line: You doing okay, sweetie?

name: Sheldon
line: There is ominous music playing, and there is an afghan over my head. I don't know where you're from, but where I'm from, that means I'm not doing okay.

name: Leonard
line: Want me to make you some tea?

name: Sheldon
line: Tea is for when I'm upset. I'm not upset. The university's forcing me to work with Kripke. I'm outraged.

name: Leonard
line: So, cocoa?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, cocoa. Do you have any idea what it's like to be paired with someone who's so incredibly annoying?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, teacher! Me! Me!

name: Sheldon
line: See, I did all this great work, and now he's just going to come along and ruin it. I am angrier than ever and filled with despair.

name: Penny
line: What beverage do you make for that?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, no, no, I know this. Uh, hot apple cider with cinnamon sticks?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, hot apple cider with cinnamon sticks!

name: Kripke
line: What the fwig, Cooper? We were supposed to meet in my office a half an hour ago.

name: Sheldon
line: And yet, now you're in my office. Point, Cooper. Welcome to the Thunderdome, Kripke.

name: Kripke
line: We agweed to exchange copies of our work. Let me see yours.

name: Sheldon
line: Why don't you show me yours first.

name: Kripke
line: You think I just few off the turnip twuck? We exchange at the same time.

name: Sheldon
line: How do I know you're not going to take my ideas and publish them as your own?

name: Kripke
line: How do I know you're not going to do that with mine?

name: Sheldon
line: Because I'm not interested in getting published in Mad magazine. Zingers fly fast in the Thunderdome, Barry.

name: Kripke
line: Are we going to do this or not? Thank you. So, we wead each other's work, meet again tomowow?

name: Sheldon
line: Fine.

name: Kripke
line: Nice twy. This is bwank paper.

name: Sheldon
line: And I am sure it's still more valuable than whatever's in here.

name: Kripke
line: Cough it up, Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well.

name: Kripke
line: If this one's bwank, too, I'm going to be fuwious.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine.

name: Raj
line: You! Always bet on black.

name: Howard
line: Get that waste of money out of my face.

name: Raj
line: It's only a waste of money if we don't play with them.  He's right, dawg.

name: Howard
line: Please, I'm working.

name: Raj
line: You know, there is a way we can get action figures to look exactly like us.

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah? How's that?

name: Raj
line: Two words, 3-D printer. Wait, maybe it's three words. No, hang on. Okay, one word, a letter and a number and maybe a hyphen. 3-D printer.

name: Howard
line: I have always wanted a 3-D printer.

name: Raj
line: Of course you have. They're an engineer's dream. Anything you can design, a 3-D printer can make out of plastic.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but they're so expensive.

name: Raj
line: Oh, come on. You deserve one. You've worked hard to find a woman who makes a lot of money.

name: Howard
line: Well, the prices have been coming down.

name: Raj
line: Oh, true. They're practically giving them away. You know, in exchange for money.

name: Howard
line: And we can make stuff we need for work with it. Prototypes of my CAD/CAM designs, specialized tools...

name: Raj
line: Not to mention Malibu Koothrappali and his totally bitchin' dream house.

name: Howard
line: We don't need Malibu Koothrappali's dream house.

name: Raj
line: Really, smart guy? Where's he supposed to park his sweet little Corvette?

name: Amy
line: The monkey in my tobacco study has taken to smoking a pipe. I'm supposed to remove his brain to examine, but it's hard because now he reminds me of my uncle. You've been awfully quiet tonight. Is everything okay?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm fine.

name: Amy
line: All right, well, how was work today? Did you exchange your research with Kripke?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, what's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: I read his research, and, it's leaps and bounds ahead of mine. Which means the mommy of the smartest physicist at the university is not my mommy as I had thought. It's his mommy.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I wish there was something I could do to make you feel better. May I offer you a consoling hug?

name: Sheldon
line: What do we have to lose?

name: Amy
line: How's that?

name: Sheldon
line: I feel like I'm being strangled by a boa constrictor. Why'd you stop?

name: Leonard
line: Come on, Sheldon, we're going to be late.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't go in today. I'm sick.

name: Leonard
line: You're not sick. You just don't want to face Kripke.

name: Sheldon
line: No, look.

name: Sheldon
line: See?

name: Leonard
line: What did you do, put this in your tea?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear. Now I'm not even smarter than you.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, Kripke's not smarter than you. You just got stuck on a wrong path. Happened to Einstein. He got stuck on the unified field theory for decades.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, don't play the Einstein card. His great breakthroughs happened when no one knew anything. So everything was a great breakthrough.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon Lee Cooper, I do not have time for this nonsense. Now, go put your clothes on, get in the car, and lets go to work.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, geez. What a grouch.

name: Leonard
line: How did I do that? I got to remember how I did that.

name: Howard
line: Do you realize, by owning a 3-D printer, we are reclaiming the manufacturing process and taking jobs back from sweatshops in China?

name: Raj
line: I think this thing was made in China.

name: Howard
line: Eh, what can you do?

name: Raj
line: Ooh, I, I think it's done. Oh, it worked. We printed a whistle.

name: Howard
line: Amazing. You realize these things go for 25 cents a pop at a party store.

name: Raj
line: And we made it in only three hours. Sounds just like store-bought.

name: Howard
line: Okay, give me a superhero pose, and I will scan you into the computer for your action figure.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I wish I was in better shape.

name: Howard
line: Stop holding your stomach in. I'll give you a six-pack with the computer.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay, great. Now I can look like Val Kilmer as Batman instead of Val Kilmer as he looks today.

name: Howard
line: All right, you can suck it in a little bit.

name: Kripke
line: Cooper, we have a pwobwem. Your work is weawy not at a wevew I expected it to be.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. Go ahead, mock me. Just use small words so I understand.

name: Kripke
line: Don't pway dumb with me. We both know what your pwobwem is.

name: Sheldon
line: We do?

name: Kripke
line: You have a girlfwiend.

name: Sheldon
line: So?

name: Kripke
line: So my work would suffew, too, if I was getting waid all the time.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. That is the reason. My work is suffering because of all the laid I'm getting.

name: Kripke
line: You wucky bastard.

name: Sheldon
line: What can I say, you know? She enjoys my genitals. I am giving them to her on a nightly basis.

name: Kripke
line: Okay, stop bwagging. You had some bwiwiant insights in here, but if we're gonna make this work, you need to buckew down and focus.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll do what I can. But it's not going to be easy, because when I'm with Amy and our bathing suit areas mush together, boy howdy, is it magic

name: Howard
line: Oh, good, you're home. Got a little surprise for you.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: Say hello to my little friend.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, my God. That's so cute. I didn't think there could be a smaller version of you.

name: Howard
line: I know, right? And, thanks to photographs and a little 3-D modeling, here comes the bride.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, Howie, I love these.

name: Howard
line: I thought you might.

name: Bernadette
line: Were they expensive?

name: Howard
line: Didn't cost a thing. I made them myself.

name: Bernadette
line: How?

name: Howard
line: Koothrappali and I bought a used 3-D printer for $5,000.

name: Bernadette
line: $5,000 for a couple of dolls? Are you out of your mind?

name: Howard
line: Not just for a couple of dolls. For as many dolls as we want. And whistles.

name: Bernadette
line: At any point, did it dawn on you to talk to me about spending this kind of money?

name: Howard
line: It's kind of dawning on me now.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't believe you. Howie, we can't afford to waste money on junk like this.

name: Howard
line: What are you talking about? We make plenty of money.

name: Bernadette
line: I make plenty of money. You make peanuts.

name: Howard
line: Yes, but we're married now. That means, when you get sick, I take care of you. And when you make a bunch of money, I get to buy stuff. Sorry if you don't like it, but that's how love works.

name: Bernadette
line: No, here's how love works. You're gonna return the machine, or you can print out a working set of lady parts and sleep with those. Oh, my God! Are you actually thinking about it?

name: Penny
line: All right, I don't understand. Why didn't you just tell Kripke the truth?

name: Sheldon
line: Because the truth made me look bad, whereas a ridiculous bald-faced lie makes me look good. Anyway, if Kripke asks, tell him my coitus with Amy is frequent, intense and whimsically inventive.

name: Leonard
line: Is my coitus whimsically inventive?

name: Penny
line: That is what I write on the bathroom walls. For a whimsically inventive time, call Leonard Hofstadter.

name: Leonard
line: I know you're joking, but I'd be okay with that.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Sheldon, can I ask you a question?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course.

name: Penny
line: You ever going to sleep with Amy?

name: Sheldon
line: That's awfully personal.

name: Leonard
line: We don't ask Sheldon things like that.

name: Penny
line: Maybe you don't, I do. What's the deal?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, word around the university is I'm giving her sex organs a proper jostling.

name: Penny
line: All right, come on, be serious. Look, you guys have been going out a long time. She would clearly like to have a physical relationship with you, so what are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: All right, we're down the rabbit hole. What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, first of all, I'm quite fond of Amy.

name: Penny
line: Then what's the problem?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, all my life, I have been uncomfortable with the sort of physical contact that comes easily to others, hand-shaking, hugging, prostate exams. But I'm working on it, you know? Just recently, I had to put VapoRub on Amy's chest. A year ago, that would have been unthinkable.

name: Leonard
line: Now you know how I feel when I have to put it on you.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Hang on. Are you saying someday you and Amy might actually get physical?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a possibility.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God!  Sheldon, I know this wasn't easy for you, and I'm really glad we could have this conversation.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God!

name: Leonard
line: Ow!

name: Raj
line: Are you sure you want to do this? Give up your half of the 3-D printer?

name: Howard
line: Yes. And can you please make that out to Bernadette? I was taken off the joint account until I learn the value of money.

name: Raj
line: Wow, that's harsh.

name: Howard
line: Tell me about it.

name: Raj
line: Aren't you gonna eat lunch?

name: Howard
line: Nah, I blew my food allowance on Pokemon cards.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, the equation balances, but it's certainly not elegant.

name: Kripke
line: Whatever. You get any wast night?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Kripke
line: Gave it to her good, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I gave it to her well. Now, over here, I was thinking the turbulence could be reduced if we just put...

name: Kripke
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Was she naked, or was she weawing wingewie?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't notice.

name: Kripke
line: How could you not notice?

name: Sheldon
line: I was too busy squishing all the desirable parts of her body.

name: Kripke
line: Ah, you're kiwing me, Cooper!

name: Sheldon
line: Can we get back to work?

name: Kripke
line: Sure, sure, sure. You guys ever use any toys?

name: Sheldon
line: Toys? I do have a model rocket next to my bed.

name: Kripke
line: A wocket? You'we a fweak! I wove it!

name: Leonard
line: I don't know why I avoided the Harry Potter books for so long. These are great. I just started number six.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a good one. Dumbledore dies in that one. Yeah, I know, I didn't see it coming, either.

name: Leonard
line: Why would you say that?

name: Sheldon
line: You brought up the subject. I contributed an interesting fact on that subject. It's called the art of conversation. Okay, your turn.

name: Leonard
line: That was a huge spoiler.

name: Sheldon
line: Good.

name: Leonard
line: What is wrong with you? If I did that, you'd bitch about it for weeks.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, really, Leonard? Are you going to have another one of your hissy fits?

name: Leonard
line: Hissy fits? I have hissy fits?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, and I have a theory why. Because of your lactose intolerance, you switched over to soy milk. Soy contains estrogen-mimicking compounds. I think your morning Cocoa Puffs are turning you into a hysterical woman.

name: Leonard
line: You are unbelievable. I don't know why I put up with you. You're controlling, you're irritating.

name: Sheldon
line: There you go again, nag, nag, nag. You're only proving my point, little lady.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? Screw you, Sheldon. You are the most annoying person I have ever met.

name: Sheldon
line: What? I'm annoying? You criticize my behaviour all the time. Sheldon, don't talk about your bowel movements over breakfast. Sheldon, when the president of the university is giving a eulogy at a funeral, don't yawn and point at your watch. Sheldon, don't throw away my shirts 'cause you think they're ugly. You're impossible.

name: Leonard
line: That's it. I don't, I don't have to put up with this.

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, I have your signature on a roommate agreement that says you do.

name: Leonard
line: Aw. Here's what I think of your roommate agreement.

name: Sheldon
line: You pick that up right now.

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Roommate agreement, section 27, paragraph 5, the roommate agreement, like the American flag, cannot touch the ground.

name: Leonard
line: I don't care. I don't have to do anything you say because I don't think I want to live here anymore.

name: Sheldon
line: Where are you going?

name: Leonard
line: To live with Penny and not you, you crazy bastard.

name: Sheldon
line: Crazy bastard?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, wait.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Dobby the elf dies in book seven.

name: Raj
line: Here you go.

name: Howard
line: Great. Come on in.

name: Raj
line: What, you don't say thank you?

name: Howard
line: It's my suitcase. I lent it to you two years ago.

name: Raj
line: Well, then, I should tell you I broke the wheel and the handle. So, is everyone from Bernadette's company going to Vegas?

name: Howard
line: No, just me, her and a couple of the big wigs. It's part of a bonus she got.

name: Raj
line: Cool. Did she discover a cure for something?

name: Howard
line: Not exactly. They spent a ton of money developing this dandruff medication that had the side effect of horrible anal leakage.

name: Raj
line: Is there a good anal leakage?

name: Howard
line: Anyway, it was Bernie's idea to rebrand the stuff as a cure for constipation.

name: Raj
line: Way to make lemonade. You know, from around the corner where fudge is made.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I got a favour to ask.

name: Raj
line: Sure.

name: Howard
line: My mom's been kind of an emotional wreck since that dentist she was dating dumped her.

name: Raj
line: Dumped her? What, did he use a forklift? Sorry. There's nothing funny about morbid obesity.

name: Howard
line: She's huge. It was funny. Anyway, I was just hoping that maybe you could check in on her tomorrow night and make sure she's doing okay.

name: Raj
line: Dude, I'm a single man. Saturday night is my party night.

name: Howard
line: Really? What do you got going on?

name: Raj
line: I don't know, maybe drive down to Hollywood, hit a few hot spots, see if I can get lucky.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, tell me if this sounds familiar. You pay fifteen dollars to park, you stand on the pavement for an hour until you break down and give the bouncer twenty bucks to let you in. You push your way to the bar, where you drink an eighteen dollar cosmopolitan, then you stare at a pretty girl and imagine your perfect life together. Your children, grandchildren. Meanwhile, she leaves with a guy who claims he wrote Beverly Hills Chihuahua. Then you give up on anyone ever loving you, go to Marie Callender's, buy a pie and eat it in your car in the parking lot.

name: Raj
line: What time should I be at your mother's?

name: Howard
line: I told her around seven.

name: Leonard
line: I swear, that man is the most egotistical, insufferable human being I have ever met.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but you two make such a cute couple. Like Burt and Ernie. You guys even teach me stuff about words and numbers.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I've had it. I am done. I can't, I can't live with him for one more minute.

name: Penny
line: Wow. Where are you going to go?

name: Leonard
line: I was thinking here with you.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: That a problem?

name: Penny
line: No, not at all. No, it's, it's great. It's terrific. I, you know, I just can't help feel bad about Sheldon. I mean, how's he going to get by without you? Ernie.

name: Leonard
line: He's got Amy now.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, he does, but it's not the same.

name: Leonard
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: Um, well, um, all right. You, you know how in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, Ron didn't abandon Harry just because Harry started dating Ron's sister?

name: Leonard
line: Harry and Ginny get together?

name: Penny
line: Sorry. Spoiler alert. My point is, as much as I want to live with you, I can't do it knowing how much Sheldon needs you.

name: Leonard
line: Please, the only thing he needs me for is to be his whipping boy, his, his stooge, his doormat.

name: Penny
line: Well, you know what they say, if it ain't broke.

name: Leonard
line: Wow. It sounds to me like you don't want us to live together.

name: Penny
line: No. No, no, I do. I do. It's just, I mean, it's a really big step.

name: Leonard
line: Is it? We're together all the time. Financially, it makes great sense. Can you think of one reason why we shouldn't do this?

name: Penny
line: Well, um, I'm just a little thirsty.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: I got nothing.

name: Leonard
line: Great. I'll go get my stuff.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Okay, all right, don't freak out. You can make this work.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, could you clear off a shelf for me in the bathroom? I take a lot of medicine.

name: Penny
line: Oh, please let some of it be Xanax.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Are you ready for dessert?

name: Raj
line: No, thank you, Mrs. Wolowitz. As it is, I'm going to have to carry my stomach out of here like I'm a fireman rescuing an infant.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Oh, please. You're a tall glass of brown water. Have dessert.

name: Raj
line: Well, I, I really couldn't. But, uh, I've had a lovely time eating your brisket and hearing about the things you've had removed from your body over the years. Didn't know you could have a cyst inside another cyst.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: The doctor said they were like Russian nesting dolls. Well, if you have to go, how about I put a little doggie bag together for you?

name: Raj
line: That would be lovely. Thank you.  Mrs. Wolowitz, uh, are you okay?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Don't mind me. I just cry when I'm lonely and have nothing to live for.

name: Raj
line: I, uh, I suppose I could stay for some dessert.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Great. You like chocolate chip cheesecake?

name: Raj
line: Sure.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I'll make one.

name: Sheldon
line: One vintage Mr. Mxyzptlk action figure. That's Leonard's.

name: Amy
line: Children's toy.

name: Amy
line: Children's toy.

name: Sheldon
line: One Game of Thrones collector's edition Longclaw sword. Oh, Leonard and I bought that together. That's a bit of an ethical conundrum. Eh, I'll keep it.

name: Amy
line: So, uh, what's your plan moving forward?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, suppose I'll have to find and cultivate a new roommate. What a task that will be. Do you know how uncivilized Leonard was when I took him in?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it took me forever to get him on a bathroom schedule. He would just go whenever the mood struck him.

name: Amy
line: Like a dog-boy.

name: Sheldon
line: Exactly.

name: Amy
line: What if you could find a roommate who was a scientist and already familiar and comfortable with your ways?

name: Sheldon
line: That would be ideal. If a person like that existed, I would sign on, no further questions asked.

name: Amy
line: Great. Here I am!

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. Here who is where?

name: Amy
line: Me. Aren't I your perfect roommate?

name: Sheldon
line: Um...

name: Amy
line: Think about it, Sheldon. I'm not a stranger, we're intellectually compatible, I'm willing to chauffeur you around town, and your personality quirks, which others find abhorrent or rage-inducing, I find cute as a button. What do you think?

name: Sheldon
line: Um...

name: Amy
line: Tell me one reason why this isn't a fantastic idea.

name: Sheldon
line: Um...

name: Amy
line: See? You can't. I'm gonna go see if Leonard's room is big enough for my water bed.

name: Sheldon
line: Um...

name: Sheldon
line: Good buddy Leonard.  Good buddy Leonard.  Good buddy Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: What do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, good buddy. So, uh, I was just talking to Amy, and she made me realize that this little dust-up between you and me is much ado about nothing.

name: Leonard
line: Is that so?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. All is forgiven, so come back home. I'll make you some soy hot chocolate, and then I'll you tell you about our exciting new devil-may-care bathroom policy.

name: Leonard
line: Cut to the chase, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Amy's decided she wants to move in with me, so I need you to come back home, you lovable scamp. That's a lot of product.

name: Penny
line: Hey. What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, get this, suddenly, Sheldon wants me back because Amy wants to move in with him.

name: Penny
line: Really? Interesting.

name: Leonard
line: Well, too late, pal. I'm not going anywhere. Penny and I are very happy living together. Isn't that right?

name: Penny
line: It's like the happiness won't ever leave the apartment.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, please. You know Amy moving in marks a level of intimacy our relationship isn't ready for.

name: Penny
line: Yes. That is a real thing. And it doesn't mean you don't care about each other, it just means things are moving at a pace you're not comfortable with, and that's fine.

name: Leonard
line: Well, if he doesn't want to live with her, then he should tell her how he feels.

name: Penny
line: Well, maybe he doesn't know how to say it without hurting her feelings.

name: Sheldon
line: Feelings? What am I, a hippie at a love-in? No. The problem is, she laid out a series of logical arguments that I couldn't refute.

name: Penny
line: That is the worst, isn't it?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, Sheldon. I can't help you. Oh, spoiler alert, this door's about to slam in your face.

name: Amy
line: Oh, there you are. When do I get a key to our apartment?

name: Sheldon
line: Um...

name: Raj
line: Hello?

name: Howard
line: Hey. How'd it go last night with my mom?

name: Raj
line: Okay, I guess.

name: Howard
line: What time did you leave?

name: Raj
line: Actually, I'm still here.

name: Howard
line: What? You spent the night?

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Uh, after dinner, we watched a rerun of Rockford Files, and then she opened a bottle of, uh, cream sherry, and the next thing I know, she was tucking me into your bed.

name: Howard
line: You wore my pyjamas?

name: Raj
line: Mm-hmm. How do you sleep in these things? Silk pajamas on satin sheets? I slid out of the bed, like, three times.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Rajesh! You up? You ready for breakfast?

name: Raj
line: Oh, boy. Breakfast.

name: Howard
line: Okay, Raj, listen to me. You need to get out of there.

name: Raj
line: But I have a cream sherry hangover and I smell blintzes.

name: Howard
line: If you don't leave now, she'll use food and guilt to keep you there for the rest of your life.

name: Raj
line: Oh, Howard, stop.

name: Howard
line: Trust me, you're not Jewish. That's how they get you.

name: Raj
line: You're being silly. I can leave whenever I want.

name: Howard
line: Oh, really? Where are your clothes and your shoes?

name: Raj
line: They're on the chair, right over... Oy vey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, home wrecker.

name: Penny
line: What did I do?

name: Sheldon
line: You gave Leonard somewhere to go. Thanks to you, Amy's out buying his and hers bath towels. Like I'd ever dry myself with something that has a possessive pronoun on it.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Listen, the truth is I don't want him living with me.

name: Sheldon
line: Great. Kick him out. Break his heart. Everybody wins.

name: Penny
line: No, I don't want to break his heart. I love him. This is just happening too fast.

name: Sheldon
line: You think this is fast? It's just a matter of time before I see Amy's leg stubble in my shower.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and I've seen those legs. You might want to get some Drano.

name: Sheldon
line: Hold on. If you don't want to live with Leonard, why don't you just tell him?

name: Penny
line: Well, you know how he is. He's sensitive and emotional.

name: Sheldon
line: That's because he drinks too much soy milk.

name: Penny
line: Well, I don't know what else we can do but tell them the truth.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose there's no choice but to face the crying, angry accusations and the high-pitched wails of despair.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. And who knows how Amy will react.

name: Howard
line: Here's some more ice.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, thanks.

name: Howard
line: What were we thinking? We should have just done it the regular way.

name: Bernadette
line: Those Chinese acrobats in Cirque du Soleil made it look so easy.

name: Howard
line: Honestly, if I could bend that far, what would I need with you?

name: Bernadette
line: If you could bend that far, you'd be doing us both a favour.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Raj. What's up?

name: Raj
line: You were right. I can't get out of here.

name: Howard
line: You're still at my mother's?

name: Raj
line: I'm trapped. My clothes have been in the laundry all day, and she hid my keys. I think they might be in her bra, because she jingles when she walks. What do I do?

name: Howard
line: Hey, you wanted a woman in your life. Now you got one.

name: Raj
line: Come on, Howard, help me.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Rajesh, tatellah, I ran you a bath.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God. She's not gonna bathe me, is she?

name: Howard
line: Gee, I wish I could tell you no. All right, well, thanks again for helping me out.

name: Raj
line: But, Howard...

name: Bernadette
line: Should we go back and rescue him?

name: Howard
line: It's too late. We'll see him at his Bar Mitzvah.

name: Amy
line: Here you go. I picked up the Chinese food just the way Leonard used to.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it kung pao chicken?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Brown rice, not white rice?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Spicy mustard from the Korean deli?

name: Amy
line: Yes. I did good, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Amy, are you worried that us living together will take the mystery out of our relationship?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, why would you?

name: Amy
line: Oh, and, uh, check this out. I took the liberty of scripting a new outgoing voice mail message for both of us.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. This is Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: And this is Amy.

line: We're not home right now.

name: Amy
line: ‘Cause we out dropping science, son.

name: Together
line: Leave a message.

name: Amy
line: Beep.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't live here.

name: Amy
line: What? Why? Is it the message? I only used urban slang to sound tough so people wouldn't break in.

name: Sheldon
line: No. It's not the message.

name: Amy
line: Well, what is it, then? I did everything just the way you like it.

name: Sheldon
line: You did.

name: Amy
line: Then what the hell, Sheldon? We have been going out for over two years, and I have been nothing but patient with you. I watch your dopey space movies. I signed your ridiculous contract. I even stopped wearing lip gloss 'cause you said it made my mouth look too slippery. I am the best girlfriend you're ever gonna have. You give me one good reason why I can't live here.

name: Sheldon
line: It's Penny's fault.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: She doesn't want to live with Leonard, so he has to come live here again. She's the snake in our garden. She's the reason we can't be happy.

line: Hey, Ames.

name: Amy
line: Yeah. Hey, Ames, nothing. I was all set to move in with Sheldon, and now I hear I can't 'cause you don't want to live with Leonard.

line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I think we should talk about that.

name: Penny
line: And since you love the truth so much, why don't you tell Amy you don't want to live with her instead of blaming it on me?

line: This old guy was choking on his food, and I saved his life.

line: You're kidding. Did you Heimlich him?

line: No. I said, oh, my God, I think that old guy's choking, and then one of the busboys Heimlich'ed him.
