line: Well, at, at this point, I'm just glad someone's carrying me down the stairs.

name: Sheldon
line: Met my childhood hero, now I get to ride in an ambulance. Boy, if we can get him to do that calendar, this'll be the best day ever.

name: Bernadette
line: Can't believe we lost her. What was I thinking? I'd be a terrible mom.

name: Howard
line: Well, maybe with the first one. But kids are like pancakes. The first one's always a throwaway. How's this look?

name: Bernadette
line: It's fine. Where'd you get that picture of her?

name: Howard
line: It's not her. I just googled foo-foo little dogs.  It's Raj. Stay quiet. Hey, bad timing. Bernadette just took Cinnamon out for a walk.

name: Raj
line: Hmm. Interesting. Did they take a walk down Liars' Lane?

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Raj
line: A lane frequented by liars. Like you, you big liar.

name: Howard
line: You have her?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, thank God she's okay.

name: Raj
line: Well, I trusted you, and you let me down. The poor thing's been shaking for hours.

name: Howard
line: I'm really sorry.

name: Bernadette
line: Hang on, you've had her for hours?

name: Raj
line: Yes. I picked her up, and then we both went for massages to try and calm down. And then we got Pinkberry.

name: Bernadette
line: So you knew she was okay, and you couldn't pick up the phone to tell us?

name: Raj
line: Well, I, I thought about...

name: Bernadette
line: Don't well me, mister. We've been worried sick. She could have been dead for all we knew. You should be ashamed of yourself.

name: Raj
line: Sorry. I, I just...

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry's not good enough. Maybe you need to take some time and think about what you've done.

name: Howard
line: Nice guilt trip. You are gonna be an amazing mom.

name: Sheldon
line: Soft kitty, warm kitty, little ball of fur. Happy kitty, sleepy kitty, purr, purr, purr.

name: Arthur
line: Thank you, Sheldon. That, that was very nice.

name: Sheldon
line: Want me to sing it again?

name: Arthur
line: No. The fourth, the fourth time was, was the charm.

name: Sheldon
line: There anything I can get for you? Some apple juice? Uh, some Jell-O?

name: Arthur
line: No. No, thank you. But I, I do, I do have a favour to, to ask.

name: Sheldon
line: Name it.

name: Arthur
line: Well, I'm, I'm booked to do a children's party tomorrow, and, um, frankly I, you know, I, I don't feel up to it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you're not. You look awful.

name: Arthur
line: Thank you. Anyway, uh, I mean, you know my act better than anybody. I was, I was hoping that maybe, you know, maybe you'd fill in for me.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you saying that you want me to be Professor Proton?

name: Arthur
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, my. What an honour. Oh, this is like being asked to ascend Mount Olympus and dine with the gods.

name: Arthur
line: Or a Korean family in Alhambra.

name: Sheldon
line: But they'll know I'm not you. Should I call myself Professor Proton, Jr.?

name: Arthur
line: Sounds great.

name: Sheldon
line: So, in a way it's like I'm your son.

name: Arthur
line: What, Whatever.

name: Sheldon
line: Father.

name: Arthur
line: Sure, what the hell.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Bernie.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, how's my little astronautie hottie?

name: Howard
line: Okay, I guess. It's just, being cooped up in this tin can for weeks on end is starting to get to me.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, hang in there. You just have a couple more days to go, and then you'll be home.

name: Howard
line: I know.

name: Bernadette
line: I got to get back to work. I love you.

name: Howard
line: Love you too. Hey, Bernie? Before you go, can you do something for me?

name: Bernadette
line: What do you want me to do?

name: Howard
line: Okay, here it is. I really miss gravity. Can you drop something so I can watch it fall?

name: Bernadette
line: Really, you're serious? Okay.

name: Howard
line: Oh, baby, you're killing me.

name: Penny
line: Ugh. Hey, Sheldon? Hi. This came for you today. It's from your mom.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, thank you, Penny.

name: Penny
line: M-hmm.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, wait, here. For your troubles.

name: Penny
line: Oh, boy, a whole dollar. Now, I can quit my paper route. So, what's in it?

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, doesn't matter. Half the time, he just ends up playing with the box.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, it's journals and research papers I wrote as a child.

name: Penny
line: Aw, how cute. Is this like a diary?

name: Sheldon
line: No, that's my potty training journal.

name: Penny
line: Really, your potty training journal?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. And forgive my crude penmanship. I didn't start typing until I was six.

name: Sheldon
line: There are some charts in the back where I kept track of shape, colour and consistency.

name: Penny
line: Oh, disgusting.

name: Leonard
line: No, what's disgusting is he's still keeping track.

name: Penny
line: Why do you need all this stuff?

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, no.

name: Penny
line: Sorry!

name: Sheldon
line: I am glad you asked. Are you familiar with the Higgs boson?

name: Penny
line: Of course, it is, it's been in the news. And it's a very famous boson.

name: Sheldon
line: Nice try. Now, in 1964, Dr. Peter Higgs, accomplished self-promoter and physicist, he wrote a paper postulating the existence of a subatomic particle called the Higgs boson. Now, initially the paper was rejected, but recently, he was proven right, and now he's on the fast track to win a Nobel prize.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's basically what I said.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, the point is Higgs is being celebrated for work he did 50 years ago, so that got me thinking, perhaps I've already hit upon the idea that will win me my Nobel prize.

name: Leonard
line: I didn't know they gave Nobel prizes for making boom-boom in the potty.

name: Penny
line: You really think there's some kind of scientific discovery in here?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, this box only covers my work through nursery school. There's a good deal more to come. I didn't really hit my academic stride until I cut out that time-suck known as playing outdoors.

name: Leonard
line: So, you're going to spend hours and hours combing through all this stuff?

name: Sheldon
line: That's a good point. My time is much too valuable. You know, perhaps I should find someone to do it for me. You know, someone with a rudimentary understanding of science, but whose real talents lie in menial labour.

name: Leonard
line: Not gonna happen.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if I didn't think you could handle it, I wouldn't be asking.

name: Leonard
line: If you want help, just hire a grad student.

name: Penny
line: Maybe I could do it.

name: Sheldon
line: You, really? You can assess the quality of my work? Okay, um, here. I wrote this when I was five years old.

name: Penny
line: A proof that algebraic topology can never have a non self-contradictory set of abelion groups. I'm just a blonde monkey to you, aren't I?

name: Sheldon
line: You said it, not me.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, Ms. Jenson. Uh, before we begin, may I offer you a refreshment? Water, coffee, tea, a marijuana cigarette?

name: Ms Jenson
line: No, thanks. I'm fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, are you sure? Everyone's smoking them. I think they're the best.

name: Ms Jenson
line: I don't do drugs.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent, yeah. That was a ruse. They're not the best. Physics is the best. And by the way, coffee was also an unacceptable choice. All right, so I see here you're from Des Moines, Iowa. Uh, you're summa cum laude in theoretical physics from Stanford University. Oh, and two years ago, you had a persistent ear infection. I hope that didn't cause any hearing loss.

name: Ms Jenson
line: No, of course not. How did you know about that?

name: Sheldon
line: I did a comprehensive background check. Medical records, credit reports, criminal history.   I trust you paid off those parking tickets.

name: Ms Jenson
line: Yes, I did.

name: Sheldon
line: Hearing unimpaired, good.

name: Ms Jenson
line: Look, Dr. Cooper, I really want this position. It would be an incredible honour to work for a man of your brilliance.

name: Sheldon
line: Flattery will not get you this job, Ms. Jenson.

name: Ms Jenson
line: It's not flattery if it's the truth.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, well, thank you. Welcome aboard.

name: Leonard
line: You talk to Howard lately?

name: Raj
line: Uh, yeah, last night. He kept making me drop pencils for him. I got uncomfortable.   Hey, Sheldon, hope you're hungry, they're serving macaroni and...   che-ee-ee-ese.

name: Leonard
line: Smooth. Hi.

name: Ms Jenson
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, aren't you going to introduce us?

name: Sheldon
line: No. I have people for that now. You're up.

name: Ms Jenson
line: I'm Alex, Dr. Cooper's new assistant.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, congratulations and may God have mercy on your soul. I'm Leonard. This is Raj.

name: Alex
line: It's nice to meet you. I'm so excited to be working with Dr...

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, please reserve chitchat for your breaks, Ms. Jenson. FYI, there will be no breaks.

name: Alex
line: I should probably get to work.

name: Leonard
line: She seems nice.

name: Raj
line: Hey, you already got a girlfriend. I call dibs.

name: Leonard
line: All I said was she seems nice.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, well, I love her.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, I wasn't expecting to hear from you today. Everything okay?

name: Howard
line: Uh, no, not really.

name: Bernadette
line: What's wrong?

name: Howard
line: Well, remember the Soyuz capsule they were sending to bring us home?

name: Bernadette
line: Uh-huh.

name: Howard
line: It's delayed. We're gonna be here at least another week. Maybe ten days. It's the Russians, so you don't know. They left dogs up here in the sixties.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, Howard. No one's leaving you up there.

name: Howard
line: I don't know how much longer I can take this. I can't sleep, and zero gravity is giving me crazy acid reflux. I'm down to my last three Tums.

name: Bernadette
line: You're going to be fine. You survived that Weight Watchers cruise with your mom. And they ran out of low-fat ice cream on day two. Just calm down and take a few deep breaths.

name: Howard
line: Okay, okay. What am I doing? I'm using up all the oxygen. If I die, promise you'll never have sex with another man.

line: Oh, yeah. I'm a man-eater now.

name: Penny
line: Okay, for the final touch, this is an eyelash curler. You just place it on your lashes and squeeze it closed.

line: Oh, I don't know. Looks like something used by Tinkerbell's gynecologist.

name: Penny
line: Who I hope for her sake is not Captain Hook, so... who are you calling?

name: Amy
line: I'm going to video-chat Sheldon. If my new look leads to phone sex, I'm going to have to ask you to leave the room.

name: Alex
line: Dr. Cooper's office.

name: Amy
line: Oh, hello. Who are you?

name: Alex
line: I'm Alex, Dr. Cooper's assistant. Can I help you?

name: Amy
line: I'd like to speak to Sheldon.

name: Alex
line: I'm sorry. He's asked me to hold all calls unless you're Stephen Hawking, his mother or himself from the future.

line: All right. Well, tell him Amy called.

name: Alex

name: Amy
line: He knows my last name. I'm his girlfriend. We have a contract and everything. I'll send you a PDF.

name: Alex
line: All right, I will tell him you called.

name: Amy
line: Hmm, that's weird.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon told me he had a new assistant named Alex. He didn't mention that Alex was a girl.

name: Penny
line: Maybe he didn't notice.

name: Amy
line: You're right. I don't have to worry about Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: No, you do not.

name: Amy
line: It's her I have to worry about.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Amy, really? She is not going to come on to Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: Oh, really? Look at this face  How can any woman spend eight hours a day alone with this face and not fall in love with it?

name: Penny
line: Well, for starters, at some point, that face starts talking.

name: Penny
line: Amy, this is crazy. You have nothing to be suspicious about.

name: Amy
line: I'm not suspicious. I just want to stop in, say hi to my boyfriend and meet his new assistant.  Aha!

name: Penny
line: Can we go now?

name: Amy
line: Hang on.

name: Penny
line: What are you doing?

name: Amy
line: Isn't it obvious? I'm spreading my scent to mark my territory.

name: Penny
line: Come on, Amy. That is not gonna work.

name: Amy
line: Really? Because just before you became my best friend, I did this all over your apartment.

name: Raj
line: Has your, uh, assistant said anything about me?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, in fact, she has. Uh, her exact words were, what is that guy's problem?

name: Raj
line: I'm in her head. Let the dance begin.

name: Alex
line: Here's your frozen yoghurt, Dr. Cooper.

name: Leonard
line: This should be fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Half chocolate, half vanilla, side by side, not swirled?

name: Alex
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Half a teaspoon of sprinkles?

name: Alex
line: Rainbow, not chocolate.

name: Sheldon
line: Two cherries?

name: Alex
line: One on top, one on the bottom.

name: Sheldon
line: Stems removed?

name: Alex
line: Um, top one, yes. I didn't check the one on the bottom.

name: Leonard
line: Oh!

name: Alex
line: I'm so sorry, Dr. Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: It's all right, Alex. I'm not mad at you, I'm just disappointed.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, Alex. Do you want to join us?

name: Alex
line: Um...

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, Alex, a moment. I need a word with Dr. Hofstadter. Do you think it's appropriate for her to sit with us, given her station?

name: Leonard
line: Given her what?

name: Sheldon
line: If I've learned anything from British television shows on PBS, it's that servants dine downstairs with their own kind.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a kindness, Leonard. Otherwise, you're cruelly tempting them with a glimpse of a world that's just beyond their soot-stained fingertips.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, sure. Please join us.

name: Alex
line: Oh, okay. Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: So, Alex, what's the topic of your dissertation?

name: Alex
line: I'm looking for Trojan asteroids at Earth's L-Five Lagrange point.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that happens to be Dr. Koothrappali's field of expertise. You two have a lot to talk about.

name: Alex
line: Is that true? Is he all right?

name: Leonard
line: No. But compared to your boss, he's the poster boy for sanity.

name: Alex
line: It's okay, I've been around scientists all my life. My dad's an astronomer at SETI.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, SETI, the Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence. You should introduce him to Sheldon. The search is over.

name: Alex
line: So, what kind of research are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: High-energy lasers.

name: Alex
line: Ooh. Military?

name: Leonard
line: Not yet, but I can remove unwanted hair from two miles away.

name: Amy
line: You were right. I had nothing to worry about. That skank's your problem, not mine.

name: Alex
line: You're very funny, Dr. Hofstadter.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Cherry stem! Cherry stem!

name: Bernadette
line: How you doing, Howie? You feeling a little better?

name: Howard
line: Oh, a lot better, thanks. One sec. Listen close, I don't have a lot of time. I need you to go to my house. In my bedroom, you'll find a model rocket. I want you to take it and bring it back to your place.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: Step two, build a version roughly fourteen stories high. Fill it full of rocket fuel and come get me. I'll leave the door unlocked.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, honey, maybe you should talk to someone, let them know you're having a little anxiety.

name: Howard
line: No, no, I'm fine. No anxiety. We should probably talk in code. From now on, frog is me, sandwich means you and lemon means rocket. So, come on, sandwich, build me a lemon 'cause froggy wants to come home.

name: Amy
line: Look at you, putting on a brave face.

name: Penny
line: There's nothing to be brave about. Everything's fine.

name: Amy
line: Really? I don't know how much you know about primate behaviour, but Sheldon's assistant was clearly courting Leonard. Were she a mandrill, she would have bent over and displayed her brightly coloured hindquarters like a big red welcome mat. By the way, you try that at the junior prom, you get kicked out.

name: Penny
line: Okay, maybe she was flirting with him, but who cares? Look, I don't even know where my relationship is with Leonard is right now.

name: Amy
line: So says your prefrontal cortex. But meanwhile, the limbic system of your brain is calculating that if another woman is attracted to Leonard, it must be because he's desirable.

name: Penny
line: Well, of course he's desirable. I mean, he's great. He's smart, he's sweet, and, ooh, in the bedroom, whew, let me tell you, he really tries.

name: Amy
line: So it does bother you.

name: Penny
line: Fine, it bothers me a little. No. You know what? This is stupid. It doesn't bother me. Okay, it bothers me. But only because she wouldn't stop laughing. Leonard is not that funny.

name: Amy
line: And there you have it, prefrontal cortex reasoning versus limbic lust. If this were a boxing match, they might call it the thrilla adjacent to the amygdala. If you were a brain scientist, you would be busting a gut right now.

name: Penny
line: So, how was work today?

name: Leonard
line: Ah, it was all right, I guess. Got to Heimlich a cherry stem out of Sheldon. Caught Raj right in the eye.

name: Penny
line: Oh! You're kidding.

name: Leonard
line: No, Raj had to go to the nurse.

name: Penny
line: Wow. Anything else?

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, the nurse is a woman, so he couldn't talk to her. She had to bring him a Grover puppet so he could point at what hurt.

name: Penny
line: Oh, is that it?

name: Leonard
line: Isn't that enough? It had the weaponised fruit and a puppet. What more do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good, Leonard, you're here. Science news. This will interest you. And, Penny, feel free to paint your nails.

name: Leonard
line: What do you got?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe Alex may have unearthed the grade school science project that could be my ticket to the Nobel Prize. Behold.

name: Sheldon
line: The original title was “A Rederivation of Maxwell's Equations Regarding Electromagnetism”” I dumbed it down because some of the more religious people in town were starting to say I was a witch.

name: Alex
line: Sheldon thinks the approach in this paper might change the way we calculate ferromagnetic hysteresis.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's about time. I hated the old way. Hi. I'm Penny.

name: Alex
line: Alex. Uh, do you work with Dr. Hofstadter?

name: Penny
line: In a way. We've kind of been involved in a five-year experiment.

name: Alex
line: Oh. Well, you're lucky. He seems very talented. And I'm sure a lot of people want to work with him.

name: Penny
line: Well, a lot of people can't. Uh, hey.

name: Leonard
line: Where are we going?

name: Penny
line: My limbic system wants to take your pants off.

name: Alex
line: She seems nice.

name: Sheldon
line: Notice people on your own time. We're working.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Howie, how you feeling?

name: Howard
line: Better. Much better. The other astronauts held me down, gave me a shot. Oooh. Attention, people of Earth. Tonight, there will be two moons in the sky.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, stop that. NASA's watching this! Put your pants back on!

name: Howard
line: Whee! Whee!

name: Leonard
line: It'll be good to have him back.

name: Raj
line: The Fantastic Four reunited.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, you had a good run, Fake Wolowitz. We'll remember you with nostalgic fondness, the way we do the dial-up modem, the VHS tape, or, or Leonard's gym membership.

line: We're not kicking him out. Stuart and I have become good friends.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, one vote for, one vote against. Leonard, you're the tiebreaker.

line: Welcome aboard, old chum.

name: Howard

line: The Jewish prayer for eating bread! We don't have one for falling out of space! We did it! We're on the ground! We survived!

line: Waiting for my husband.

name: Man in Suit
line: That's nice.

line: I missed you so much.

line: I missed you, too. Where are the guys?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, it's just me.

name: Howard
line: Oh, I get it. They're waiting back home with a big surprise party. Don't worry, I can act surprised.

line: No, I told them they could have you tomorrow night. Tonight, you belong to me.

name: Howard
line: Gesundheit. You okay?

name: Bernadette
line: I am now that you're back. Come on, let's go home so I can tear off those little pants.

line: Great. Just keep in mind astronauts lose a lot of muscle tone in space, so you might have to do most of the heavy lifting.

line: You know, I am very disappointed that I won't be able to celebrate Howard's accomplishment tonight.

name: Amy
line: Me, too. But we'll see him tomorrow.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, it's just that in all the years I've known him, he's never had the opportunity to receive my admiration. I was excited to see the look on his face when it finally happened.

line: You're unbelievable.

line: I know.

line: Yeah, only after I eliminated all the obvious answers. You're welcome.

line: Oh, uh, uh, uh, sausage. Uh, uh, uh, uh, bratwurst? Oh, oh, a hot dog.

line: Wait, no, no. No. The word is Polish. See, look. Polish sausage. And the, the model of the solar system developed by Nicolaus Copernicus, a Polish astronomer. And then, finally, if that wasn't enough, which it should have been, this is Madame Curie killing herself by discovering radium, who, although she was a naturalized French citizen, was Polish by birth.
