line: Excuse me, the word is polish. See? Small P.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah. So it is. I guess we both share blame on this one.

name: Howard
line: Bernie, you okay?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, I'll be right there.

name: Howard
line: Did you get a sea lion while I was gone?

name: Bernadette
line: It's just allergies.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Bernadette
line: Took some Benadryl. I'll be fine. So, did you miss me?

name: Howard
line: Oh. Are you kidding? Every minute of every...

name: Bernadette
line: Ew. Excuse me.

name: Howard
line: Sweetie, we don't have to do this now.

name: Bernadette
line: Yes, we do. You left right after we got married. This is like our honeymoon. Now, hold on to your hat. Oh. Uh-oh.

name: Howard
line: You okay?

name: Bernadette
line: A little dizzy. Must be the Benadryl. Switch places with me.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Bernadette
line: Now, kiss me.

name: Howard
line: Bernadette? Bernie? Bernie?

name: Bernadette
line: That was amazing. You made me feel things I never...

name: Howard
line: Well, that was quick, and a little gross. Now, I know how she feels.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Sheldon, you're always full of fun little facts. Where did the expression got your ass handed to you come from?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't know.

name: Penny
line: I wonder if it's from, like, ancient Rome where they'd actually chop somebody's ass off and then go, here. You know, to appease Loseroneous, the god of losers.

name: Sheldon
line: I am not a loser. Pictionary is not a true test of any real intelligence or skill.

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, in all fairness, Pictionary has verbal skills, visual skills. It's a pretty well-rounded game.

name: Sheldon
line: Lot of big talk from a man who can't draw a chocolate chip cookie.

name: Penny
line: All right, fine, pick another game. Amy and I will beat you at anything.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Let's play Physics Fiesta.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, what is that?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a game that I just invented, in which the participants answer physics questions in remedial Spanish. Um, ¿Dónde está el boson de Higgs?

name: Leonard
line: En el acelerador de particulares.

name: Sheldon
line: Bueno, mi amigo.

name: Penny
line: No, no, we're not playing some dumb made-up game.

name: Sheldon
line: All games are made up. They're not found in nature. You don't just dig in the ground, come across a rich vein of Rock'em Sock'em Robots.

name: Leonard
line: Just pick another game.

name: Amy
line: Why don't we do something athletic like go over to the university pool and play water polo?

name: Leonard
line: No good, Sheldon doesn't float.

name: Sheldon
line: That is true. I have a higher than normal body density. If I run too deep a bath, I drown.

name: Amy
line: All right, let's keep it simple. How about darts?

name: Sheldon
line: No, that's not fair either.

name: Penny
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: Darts is a bar game. You've been frequenting drinking establishments since you were of legal age.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that's when it started.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, regardless, she has a distinct advantage in all tavern-based competitions. Pool, beer pong, wet T-shirt contests, they're all out.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Just for the record, I have never entered a wet T-shirt contest. I've won a few, but that's just because I spill when I'm drunk, so...

name: Amy
line: We could go to the cadaver lab at UCLA and play real-life Operation.

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-uh.

name: Penny
line: I don't think so.

name: Amy
line: Are you sure? I mean, the nose doesn't light up, but if the corpse is fresh enough, sometimes you can get the leg to jerk.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Ma, twinkle, twinkle, your little star is home. Ma, the chain's on the door.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard? I thought I wasn't going to see you till tomorrow.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, Bernie's not feeling well, so I thought I'd stop by, tell you about the greatest adventure of my life, see if you can make me feel bad about it.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Uh, uh, okay, hold on, I'm not decent.

name: Howard
line: All right. Woman hasn't tied her robe in 20 years. Suddenly she's not decent?

name: Man's Voice
line: You want me to hide in the closet or go out the back?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Shh, you need to whisper.

name: Howard
line: Ma, who is in there?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Uh, nobody. The TV is on.

name: Man's Voice
line: I only got one sock. Where's my other sock?

name: Howard
line: Who is that?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I told you, it's the TV. Jay Leno lost a sock, it's hilarious.

name: Howard
line: If you're busy, I can come back.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Just give me a second. Go, go, go, go.

name: Howard
line: Dr. Schneider?

name: Dr Schneider
line: Oh, hello, Howard.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing here?

name: Dr Schneider
line: Um, house call.

name: Howard
line: You're a dentist.

name: Dr Schneider
line: Yes, yes, I am. I think he's on to us.

name: Penny
line: Okay, glasses off. Find Waldo.

name: Sheldon
line: Hurry up, find him, find him.

name: Leonard
line: I'm trying. Don't yell at me.

name: Sheldon
line: For goodness' sake, he's wearing a hat, glasses, and a red striped shirt.

name: Leonard
line: I know what he looks like.

name: Amy
line: Oh, there he is, I got him.

name: Penny
line: Yes, we win again.

name: Sheldon
line: How could you not find him?

name: Leonard
line: Because he's hard to find. If he was easy to find, the books would be called There's Waldo.

name: Leonard
line: 57, 58, 59, that's one minute.

name: Amy
line: Long division, long division. Go, go, go.

name: Leonard
line: Remember, show your work.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm not okay.

name: Leonard
line: Get up, we can't lose at math.

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: Ready, set, wrestle.  One, two, three, pin.

name: Penny
line: Mwah!

name: Sheldon
line: Stop that.

name: Penny
line: Mwah!

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, do something. Amy, help. Amy, stop that. Amy, Penny, both of you, stop it.

name: Howard
line: One to beam aboard?

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God, you're back. Oh, look at you. You, you look like you grew.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. The lack of gravity did decompress my spine, so I'm like an inch and a half taller. I'm going to the DMV tomorrow to get my license changed before I shrink back.

name: Raj
line: Oh, uh, come in, come in. Oh, I, uh, I didn't think I was going to get to see you until tomorrow.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, Bernadette's a little under the weather and my mom's kind of under my dentist.

name: Raj
line: Wait, your, your mother is sleeping with your dentist?

name: Howard
line: Former dentist. I need a new one now that I know where his hands have been.

name: Raj
line: So you're wandering all around by yourself? That's not the kind of hero's welcome an astronaut should come home to.

name: Howard
line: It's okay, you know, we space cowboys don't do what we do for glory and fame. We leave that to your rock stars and your athletes and your Howie Mandels.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, hey, man, welcome back.

name: Howard
line: Oh, Stuart, thanks. What are you doing here?

name: Stuart
line: I, I kind of live here now.

name: Raj
line: Just until he gets back on his feet, which are looking pretty good in the boots I bought him for his birthday.

name: Stuart
line: Ah, he's spoiling me and I love it.

name: Howard
line: Wow, so you guys are like buds now?

name: Raj
line: Oh, yeah, we hang out all the time.

name: Stuart
line: Plus, he doesn't have a girlfriend, I don't have a girlfriend.

name: Raj
line: It's like we both had these holes in our lives, but now we fill each other's holes.

name: Stuart
line: Uh, that sounds a little funny to an American ear.

name: Raj
line: Which part?

name: Stuart
line: Just all of it.

name: Howard
line: Okay, so what do you guys got going on tonight?

name: Stuart
line: Raj is taking me to the Sound of Music sing-along.

name: Howard
line: Sound of Music sing-along? That used to be our thing, but that's cool.

name: Raj
line: Oh, Howard, it's still our thing. Come with us, we'll, we'll get you a scalped ticket.

name: Howard
line: So I'd be sitting by myself?

name: Raj
line: We'll switch. You'll come sit with me after intermission.

name: Stuart
line: So I, I, I'd be sitting by myself during Edelweiss?

name: Howard
line: No, no, you guys go. Have fun.

name: Raj
line: Okay, uh, will I get to see you tomorrow?

name: Howard
line: Absolutely. See you, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, yeah. Is he taller?

name: Howard
line: At least my mother made her boyfriend climb out the window.

name: Penny
line: All right, standard state fair pie-eating contest rules are, no hands, first one to clean the pan wins.

name: Amy
line: On the count of three. One, two...

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. I'm a little concerned. Blueberries are rich in antioxidants.

name: Leonard
line: So?

name: Sheldon
line: So, with all those antioxidants, what if I run out of oxidants?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, we haven't won a game all night. Now, you either stick your face in that pie or I'm gonna stick that pie in your face.

name: Sheldon
line: That's rude.

name: Amy
line: One, two, three, eat.

name: Howard
line: Hey, guys, guess who's back from space.

name: All
line: Not now!

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, ow, blueberry in my nose, blueberry in my nose!

name: Leonard
line: Snort it down and keep eating!

name: Waitress
line: You look familiar.

name: Howard
line: I don't think so.

name: Waitress
line: Yeah, I just saw you on the news. You're an astronaut.

name: Howard
line: Yes. Yes, I am.

name: Waitress
line: Good for you. How about a piece of cheesecake on the house?

name: Howard
line: Oh, thank you so much. I've been having the worst night. I just got back, and my friends don't care, my wife's sick, I went to my mom...

name: Waitress
line: You want the cheesecake or not?

name: Howard
line: Yes, please.  And I think it's gonna be long, long time till touchdown brings me 'round again to find I'm not the man they think I am at home, oh, no, oh, no, I'm a rocket man.  Perfect.

name: Howard
line: Oh, hey, Stuart, I got you a little souvenir from my trip to space.

name: Stuart
line: Well, Howard, that's very nice of you.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, maybe. Open it first.

name: Howard
line: It's my official NASA portrait.

name: Stuart
line: To Stuart, your comic book store is out of this world. Just like the guy in this picture was.”

name: Sheldon
line: For the record, he also thinks the Walgreens and the dry cleaners are out of this world.

name: Howard
line: That's not true. At the Walgreens I was over the moon for their store-brand antacids.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Stuart, I see you're getting ready for your Halloween party.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, it's my annual attempt to meet women. Ninth time's the charm.

name: Raj
line: Would you like me to help? I do have a certain je ne sais quois when it comes to soirees.

name: Stuart
line: Thanks, but I can't afford je ne sais quois. How much for just quois?

name: Raj
line: You know, you don't worry about money. I'll take care of everything.

name: Stuart
line: Really?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, you'll love it. Ain't no party like a Koothra-party.

name: Howard
line: But you know what wasn't a party? That hotel in Kazakhstan they put you up in before the launch. I mean, it's your last night on Earth. You'd think you'd get one porn channel.

name: Leonard
line: Have you noticed that Howard can take any topic and use it to remind you that he went to space?

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting hypothesis. Let's apply the scientific method, perform an experiment.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Hey, Howard, any thoughts on where we should get dinner?

name: Howard
line: Anywhere but the Space Station. On a good day, dinner was a bag full of meat loaf. But, hey, you don't go there for the food, you go there for the view.

name: Sheldon
line: It's fascinating. Let me see if I can duplicate the result. Howard, I've always thought the lemon was an underrated fruit. Care to weigh in?

name: Howard
line: Not really.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, well.

name: Howard
line: You know, people say the Soyuz capsule was a lemon. But, hey, that baby got me to space and back.

name: Amy
line: Ladies night at the Cheesecake Factory. Does it get any better than this?

name: Penny
line: I hope so.

name: Amy
line: Question. Do you think your husband's fondness for turtlenecks is an expression of longing for his missing foreskin?

name: Penny
line: It's not getting any better.  Ugh. It's Leonard. He wants to go costume shopping later.

name: Bernadette
line: I thought you liked Halloween.

name: Penny
line: I do, it's just he wants to go to that party at the comic book store. A lot of the guys that hang out there are kind of creepy.

name: Bernadette
line: Like my husband?

name: Amy
line: And my boyfriend?

name: Penny
line: I'm, I'm sorry, Amy. You were saying something about Howard's foreskin?

name: Bernadette
line: Nice try, but you have to go to that party because we're going.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm gonna go. It's just not my idea of a good time.

name: Bernadette
line: Leonard does thing he doesn't like to make you happy.

name: Penny
line: Well, yeah, he's my boyfriend. Isn't that, like, his job?

name: Amy
line: Then what's your job?

name: Penny
line: Letting him make me happy.

name: Bernadette
line: I just think in relationships you get back what you put into them.

name: Amy
line: That's not always true. Last night I gave Sheldon my best come-hither look, and he responded by explaining how wheat came to be cultivated.

name: Penny
line: I guess I could probably try a little harder.

name: Bernadette
line: You could start by taking an interest in his work.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's kind of a problem.

name: Amy
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: Not really clear on what he does.

name: Bernadette
line: He's an experimental physicist.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm not really clear on what that means.

name: Amy
line: He takes hypotheses and designs protocols to determine their accuracy.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you're really just making it worse.

name: Sheldon
line: What kind of tea would you like?

name: Amy
line: I think I'm gonna try green tea mixed with lemon zinger.

name: Sheldon
line: Two tea bags in one cup? You're not at a rave.

name: Amy
line: So, listen, Sheldon, I was thinking, since this is gonna be our first Halloween party as boyfriend and girlfriend, I thought it might be fun for us to go in a couples costume.

name: Sheldon
line: I couldn't agree more.

name: Amy
line: Really? I find that inconsistent with everything I know about you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, oh, on the contrary. Couples costumes are one of the few benefits of being in a relationship. Now imagine this, you and I entering Stuart's party and all eyes turn to see America's most beloved and glamorous couple.

name: Amy
line: Yeah?

name: Sheldon
line: R2-D2 and C-3PO. Dibs on Threepio.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, when I said couples costume, I meant like Romeo and Juliet or Cinderella and Prince Charming, not two robots from some silly movie I don't even like.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, I'm gonna let that slide because I know you're hopped up on tea bags.

name: Amy
line: I make compromises for you all the time. Just this once, can't we find something that we're both happy with?

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. How about one of the most beguiling and influential couples of the 20th century? Hewlett and Packard. Dibs on Hewlett. What? You want to be Hewlett?

name: Penny
line: Anybody home?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, what are you doing here?

name: Penny
line: I just thought I'd stop by and say hello.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, what a nice surprise. I don't think you've ever seen my lab before.

name: Penny
line: No, I know. It's long overdue. So, what ya doing? Better not be building a robot girlfriend.

name: Leonard
line: No. Although Howard was making some real strides in that area until he met Bernadette.

name: Penny
line: You're kidding.

name: Leonard
line: Nope. Now the Lisatronic 3000 just sits in a box waiting for the phone to ring.

name: Penny
line: Ooh! What's going on in here?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, no, no, don't look in there.

name: Penny
line: What, is it secret?

name: Leonard
line: No, it's a nitrogen laser. It'll cook your eyeball like a soft-boiled egg.

name: Penny
line: Oh. You might want to put a sign on it.

name: Leonard
line: Sign right there.

name: Penny
line: Ah. Danger. Sure, sure. Yeah. What's, what's that?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, that is an integrated ion trap and time-of-flight mass spectrometer.

name: Penny
line: Wow. High-techie-techie. What's this little box?

name: Leonard
line: That is a pencil sharpener.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, low-techie-techie. So, what are you working on right now?

name: Leonard
line: It's actually pretty neat.

name: Penny
line: Yeah?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. It's a front-projected holographic display combined with laser-based finger tracking. Here, I'll show you. We'll just put this pencil over here.

name: Penny
line: Sharp. Thanks to the machine we saw earlier.

name: Leonard
line: Very good. And then a laser will map the reflective surface, and voila.

name: Penny
line: Wow. That is amazing.

name: Leonard
line: You know, there's a foundational idea in string theory that the whole universe may be a hologram.

name: Penny
line: What do you mean? . Oh! Wow!

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh. Well, the holographic principle suggests that what we all experience every day in three dimensions may really  just be information  on a surface located at the farthest reaches of our cosmos.  So it's possible that our lives are really just acting out a painting on the largest canvas in the universe.

name: Penny
line: Hmm.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Sometimes I forget how smart you are.

name: Leonard
line: You should visit more often. What are you doing?

name: Penny
line: Take off your clothes.

name: Leonard
line: What? Here? Now?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. You got a problem with that?

name: Leonard
line: No, no. It's kind of crazy. I've never fooled around in the lab before.

name: Penny
line: Really? Never?

name: Leonard
line: No. I did have a shot with the Lisatronic, but the extension cord wasn't long enough.

name: Raj
line: Before I forget, I'd like your opinion on the menus I've prepared for the Halloween party. The theme is food that goes bump in the night.

name: Howard
line: Creature from the Black Forest Ham Lagoon.

name: Raj
line: On Sesame seed Bunzillas.

name: Sheldon
line: Night of the Living Garlic Bread?

name: Raj
line: It's funny because bread sounds like dead.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, but these are just ordinary foods with the names bent into tortured puns. The dishes themselves are in no way Halloweenie.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, Hallow-weenies! That's a good one. They'll pair nicely with my Draculoni and Cheese. How do I do it?

name: Howard
line: That reminds me, I was thinking about wearing my NASA jumpsuit as a costume. But then I realized everyone would be, like, where's your costume? Why are you wearing your work clothes, you nut?

name: Leonard
line: Hello, boys.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you smiling at?

name: Leonard
line: Nothing.

name: Howard
line: You know where's there's a lot of nothing.

name: All
line: Space.

name: Howard
line: Boy, it's nice to sleep in a bed with gravity again. Did I tell you about the night my retainer floated out of my mouth and into the air lock?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, you mentioned it once or twice.

name: Howard
line: So, here we are, just a couple of young newlyweds. What to do? What to do to you? Astronaut Wolowitz, reporting for booty. Preparing thrusters. We have liftoff. Are we clear to jettison that nightgown?

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, we need to talk.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, I know you went to space. I'm incredibly proud of you. But you might want to try and not bring it up every minute.

name: Howard
line: I don't talk about it every minute.

name: Bernadette
line: Tonight at dinner you went on bout it for an hour straight.

name: Howard
line: What was I supposed to talk about? We were eating at Johnny Rockets.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm just saying, people are getting a little tired of it.

name: Howard
line: So, I did this amazing thing and I'm never allowed to mention it?

name: Bernadette
line: Of course you can. But maybe a good rule would be to wait for people to bring it up.

name: Howard
line: Okay, no problem. It won't happen again.

name: Bernadette
line: I love you.

name: Howard
line: I love you, too. I can't tell you how many times I dreamed I was in bed here with you when I was... you know. What, I can't even point?

name: Leonard
line: So, basically, this is what's called mag-lev technology. It uses very powerful electromagnets to create a force strong enough to overcome gravity. Here, you hold this.

name: Penny
line: Whoa! That's heavy.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Oh, uh, you don't have on any jewellery, do you?

name: Penny
line: No. Why?

name: Leonard
line: A grad student forgot to take out one of his piercings. Now he's on a transplant list waiting for a nipple his size. Now watch this.

name: Penny
line: Whoa! That is very cool.

name: Leonard
line: Sometimes I like to turn this on and pretend I'm the super villain Magneto.

name: Penny
line: Getting a little less cool, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: But what I really am is a very smart scientist who understands the mechanics of the universe and is wearing the sexy black underwear you bought him.

name: Penny
line: There we go.

name: Raj
line: So, I thought the photo booth for the party could either be creepy like a mummy's tomb, or they also have the Tardis from Doctor Who.

name: Sheldon
line: A Tardis makes no sense. It's a time machine from a science-fiction show. It has nothing to do with Halloween. That being said, if you don't get a Tardis, you stink and your party stinks.

name: Raj
line: Do you have a preference?

name: Howard
line: I don't care. Get the Tardis.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes! This party just became a major rager.

name: Raj
line: Oh, by the way, can I borrow your bullwhip and fedora?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, sure, whatever.

name: Raj
line: I was thinking of dressing up as Indiana Jones' mocha-skinned love child. Indian Jones.

name: Howard
line: Clever.

name: Raj
line: What's wrong with you?

name: Howard
line: Nothing.

name: Raj
line: Oh, Howard, I've got a party to plan. Don't make me pull it out of you.

name: Howard
line: Okay, here it is. Bernadette said you guys are all sick of me talking about my trip to space. Is that true?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: We seem to have different approaches here. I was going for helpful honesty. I have no idea what you're doing.

name: Raj
line: It's called being nice.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. If you think being nice will get him to shut up, I'll try it.

name: Howard
line: You know what, guys? Never mind. I just won't talk about the greatest achievement of my life ever again.

name: Sheldon
line: Look at that, the problem solved itself.

name: Leonard
line: Hello, boys.

name: Sheldon
line: What if we were to go as dinner table favourites salt and pepper?

name: Amy
line: You know salt makes me retain water and my cousin William was ground to death in a pepper factory accident. How about Raggedy Ann and Andy? I loved them growing up.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I don't think so. Those dolls represent three things I do not care for, clowns, children and raggediness. I think it's a lost cause.

name: Amy
line: No. There are certain things that say to the world, I have a boyfriend, and he's not made up. Matching costumes, hickeys and sex tapes. Pick one.

name: Sheldon
line: What's a hickey?

name: Bernadette
line: How do I look?

name: Howard
line: Fine.

name: Bernadette
line: Uh-oh, is someone a little blue? Come on, Howie, that's like the funniest thing I've ever said in my life. What do you say? You ready to go?

name: Howard
line: To tell you the truth, I'm not really in the mood.

name: Bernadette
line: What are you talking about? It'll be fun. All your friends'll be there.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, some friends. They all think I'm boring. Maybe you should go without me.

name: Bernadette
line: No, if I'm there alone, people might think I'm just a really short person from Avatar.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry. I just don't want to go.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, I just spent the last three hours colouring myself blue. I'm gonna be washing paint out of my Smurf for a month.

name: Howard
line: Fine. Two weeks ago I was an astronaut.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, well, now you're a Smurf. Keep walking.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, you guys look adorable.

name: Bernadette
line: Thanks, so do you. Slutty cop?

name: Penny
line: No, sexy cop. Slutty cop only came with a skirt and two badges.

name: Bernadette
line: And Albert Einstein?

name: Leonard
line: Ja, und later she's going to arrest me for goink fashter zen da shpeed of light.

name: Penny
line: I thought we said in the car, no accents?

name: Leonard
line: Sorry, Officer.

name: Girl dressed as a Witch
line: Hello. It's a great party.

name: Stuart
line: Thank you.

name: Witch
line: The monster foods, they're really fun.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, yes, thank you. I like to think of fun things like that because I'm fun. I'm not clinically depressed at all.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, get in here.

name: Sheldon
line: I should've picked hickey.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, hey, look at you guys!

name: Amy
line: I'm Raggedy Ann, and he's Raggedy C-3PO.

name: Sheldon
line: It was a compromise. I lost.

name: Raj
line: Can you believe Stuart's walking around taking credit for this party?

name: Howard
line: Who cares?

name: Raj
line: What do you mean who cares? Look at what I pulled off here. The DJ's on fire, there's a Tardis photo booth in the back room, and, oh, my God, the food. Stuart wanted Kraft Draculoni and cheese.

name: Howard
line: You're right, the party's fantastic. Please, tell me more. I haven't heard enough about it all week because hearing about that never gets old.

name: Raj
line: Is this about the space thing again?

name: Howard
line: Well, I'm not allowed to talk about it, but since you brought it up, I went to space! Space, space! Space! Space, space! Space!

name: Bernadette
line: Whoa, Drinky Smurf. Can I talk to you for a second?

name: Howard
line: Great, now I'm in trouble. You happy?

name: Bernadette
line: You, out! You are being very rude.

name: Howard
line: No, I'm not. They're all being rude. And you're being rude.

name: Bernadette
line: Me? What did I do?

name: Howard
line: Oh, Howie, stop talking about space so much. Nobody likes it.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't sound like that.

name: Howard
line: You're my wife. You're supposed to be on my side.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm always on your side.

name: Howard
line: Then why are you trying to take this away from me? Being an astronaut is the coolest thing I'm ever gonna do. If I stop talking about it, then I'm just...

name: Bernadette
line: Just what?

name: Howard
line: Just plain old Howard Wolowitz again.

name: Bernadette
line: Plain old Howard Wolowitz is the best guy I know.

name: Howard
line: You're just saying that.

name: Bernadette
line: No, I'm not. I married him. On purpose. Come here.

name: Howard
line: I love you.

name: Bernadette
line: I love you, too.

name: Penny
line: Nothing to see here. Just sexy police business.

name: Leonard
line: Just explaining the theory of relativity. Twice.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, what you watching?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. Raj sent me some video of Buzz Aldrin.

name: Buzz
line: Here you go. It's a Milky Way. The Milky Way's a galaxy in space. I've been in space. Here's a Mars bar. I'm an astronaut. And this one's a Moon Pie. I walked on the Moon. What have you done?

name: Howard
line: Okay, I get it.

name: Raj
line: Try to keep up, Howard, I'm killing it.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I wish we looked as cool dancing in clubs as we do right now.

name: Leonard
line: Don't worry, this is exactly how you look when you're dancing in clubs.

name: Raj
line: You're welcome, ladies.

name: Sheldon
line: Paradigm-shifting news, gentlemen.

name: Raj
line: Dude! I was about to Bollywood this bitch.

name: Sheldon
line: Earlier today, I invited Professor Stephen Hawking to join me in the popular online game Words with Friends. Moments ago, he accepted my request. Do you understand what that means?

name: Howard
line: That somewhere right now Stephen Hawking is saying, damn it, I meant to click no.”

name: Sheldon
line: I'll walk you through it. The game is not called Words with Strangers. No, it's not even called Words with Acquaintances. It is called Words with...

name: Raj
line: I'm not finishing your sentence. You pulled the plug on my funk.

name: Sheldon
line: Friends! It's Words with Friends! Which Stephen Hawking and I officially are. Now all I need is a bunk bed with a slide, I'll have everything I've ever wanted since I was six years old.

name: Leonard
line: That's really nice, Sheldon, I'm happy for you.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm happy for you, too. You are now friends with someone who is officially friends with Stephen Hawking. Enjoy it, boys. You may have peaked.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, I know Stephen Hawking. I worked with him.

name: Sheldon
line: And if they ever come out with a game called Words with People You Once Worked With, you'll be off to the races.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I don't think this actually means...

name: Sheldon
line: Hold that thought! Professor Hawking has made a move. Boy, oh, boy. Oh, it's only a matter of time before we're coming up with fun nicknames for each other. I'll be Coop. He'll be Wheels. If he's okay with that.

name: Raj
line: All right. Crank up the AC, boys, it's gonna get hot in here!

name: Bernadette
line: So, I was taking a shower this morning, and when I got out, I started to dry off with what I thought was a towel but turned out to be Howard's mom's underwear. I had to take another shower. It wasn't enough. Nothing will ever be enough.

name: Amy
line: I once looked in Sheldon's underwear drawer. He yelled at me. But now I know what it looks like and he can never take that away.

name: Bernadette
line: There's a book under here.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'll get that.

name: Bernadette
line: I got it.

name: Penny
line: No, no, it's...

name: Bernadette
line: I got it. Why do you have a history textbook?

name: Penny
line: No, it's not a big deal. Just taking a class at the Pasadena Community College.

name: Bernadette
line: That's great. I didn't know you wanted to go back to school.

name: Penny
line: It's just one history class. Look, I didn't finish college, so I thought I would give it a try.

name: Amy
line: Not to mention, your acting career is going south like Sherman. Read about it in your book.

name: Bernadette
line: Why would you be embarrassed to tell us?

name: Penny
line: No, I'm not embarrassed. I just didn't want anyone to know because I haven't told Leonard yet.

name: Amy
line: Why wouldn't you tell Leonard?

name: Penny
line: Because it's me going back to school, and he's gonna be all “you can do it,” and “how can I help?” and “I'm so proud of you.” Ugh!

name: Bernadette
line: I just can't believe you could keep something like that from him.

name: Amy
line: You guys have got to be the weirdest couple I know.

name: Penny
line: Really? You can't think of anyone weirder?

name: Amy
line: I can, but she's sitting right there.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I play the word quiver with a triple letter and a double word score for 72 points. That ought to let the air out of your tyres, Hawking.

name: Amy
line: Wow, my boyfriend is friends with Stephen Hawking and my new dandruff shampoo doesn't smell like tar. Everything really is coming up Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: It is glorious. One of the greatest intellects of our time has agreed to engage with me in a gentlemanly battle of wits. And I'm spanking him so hard his grad students won't be able to sit down.

name: Amy
line: You know, when one male dominates another, his testosterone level rises.

name: Sheldon
line: What's your point?

name: Amy
line: It's exciting to think you might be getting a testosterone level.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, my friend Stephen just played the word act for 18 points. That's right, I call him Stephen now, because I checked, and he was not okay with Wheels.

name: Amy
line: Oh, you could turn his act into extract , and it would be for double points.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy. Why would you give me a word? Now, if I play extract it would be cheating.

name: Amy
line: Sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Although, I could play the completely unrelated and better word extract . Ethical conundrum avoided. Thanks, brain.

name: Penny
line: Spaghetti okay?

name: Leonard
line: It's crunchy. Just the way I like it.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I don't think the water was really boiling.

name: Leonard
line: It's great. I love it.

name: Penny
line: Okay, listen, there's something I need to tell you. I've been thinking about going back to school for a while now. So a couple months ago, I started taking a history class at the community college.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. That's great. Great, great, great. Why wait so long to tell me?

name: Penny
line: I don't want you to make a big deal out of it.

name: Leonard
line: Why do you think I'd be like that? I get it, you're taking one class. It's nice. Maybe if it goes well, you take another, you enrol full-time. Ooh, be sure to keep an eye on which credits transfer to a four-year college.

name: Penny
line: You're making it a big deal.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry. Whatever. It's all good.

name: Penny
line: Anyway, that's it. I just thought you should know.

name: Leonard
line: Am I allowed to ask how the class is going?

name: Penny
line: It's really good. We've been talking about the origins of slavery. Turn in my first paper tomorrow.

name: Leonard
line: Great topic. I can help with that. There are lots of different perspectives you can take, economic, sociological, political.

name: Penny
line: Hey hey hey, this is my paper. And my perspective is that slavery is bad. Oh, and my professor's black, so I'm pretty sure that's the right answer.

name: Leonard
line: Can I take a look?

name: Penny
line: No, Leonard, this is my thing.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I get it.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: It's like when I started doing chin-ups, I didn't want you to see until I could do one. FYI, really close.

name: Penny
line: Thank you. Now behave yourself and eat your dinner. Maybe later, if you're lucky, you get to sleep with a college girl.

name: Leonard
line: Really? ‘Cause I went to four years of college and five years of grad school, that never happened once.

name: Raj
line: I think the next time I have to speak to a call centre in India, I'm going to try using an American accent.

name: Howard
line: Why?

name: Raj
line: Because when I use my regular voice, I feel like I'm making fun of them.

name: Howard
line: That's ridiculous. Not to mention, your American accent is terrible.

name: Raj
line: Dude, my accent is brilliant.  Hey, my snow-white American friends, let's put some cow meat on the barbecue and eat it until we're all obese.

name: Howard
line: This is what you sound like. I think I'm talking in an American accent, but it really sounds like I'm wearing a set of giant dentures.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, do I really sound like that?

name: Howard
line: Tell him he sounds like that.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, you okay?

name: Sheldon
line: It's been three days. Why hasn't Stephen Hawking played a word?

name: Raj
line: The guy's a genius. Maybe you weren't challenging enough for him.

name: Sheldon
line: Not challenging? I was humiliating the man. I was thinking of writing a book called A Brief History of the Time I Made Stephen Hawking Cry Like a Little Girl.

name: Howard
line: There's the problem. You can't beat Hawking like that. He hates to lose. Everyone knows the guy's a big baby. I mean, forget the wheelchair, he should be in a stroller.

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: One time when I was working with him, he said that Johnny Depp was in The Matrix. I told him he was wrong, but he kept insisting. So I looked it up online and showed him. Well, the next day, he had a pizza party, and everyone got invited but me. And then he was all, your invitation must have gotten lost in the matrix.

name: Sheldon
line: Good Lord, what have I done?

name: Raj
line: Good Lord, what have I done?

name: Howard
line: Terrible.

name: Raj
line: All right, hotshot, let's hear your Indian.

name: Howard
line: I can't sit on that elephant, my ass is on fire from eating all this curry.

name: Raj
line: Okay, yeah, that's pretty good.

name: Leonard
line: Please be good. Please be good. Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Okay. She writes like she cooks.

name: Sheldon
line: Play. Play. Play. Play. Play.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Trying to use a Jedi mind trick to control Stephen Hawking. Play. Play. Ugh! He must be wearing a tinfoil hat or something.

name: Leonard
line: I did a bad thing.

name: Sheldon
line: Does it affect me?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Then suffer in silence. Play. Play. Play.  Stephen Hawking.  Stephen Hawking.  Stephen Hawking.

name: Leonard
line: Penny started taking a class. She wrote a paper, she didn't want me to read it, I went behind her back and I read it anyway.

name: Sheldon
line: Stephen Hawking hates me.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what to do. I mean, the paper's terrible. But if I tell her, she'll know that I read it and she'll get really mad.

name: Sheldon
line: I was beating him so bad, he doesn't want to be friends anymore. Why does everyone love me except Stephen Hawking?

name: Leonard
line: Is it possible we're having two different conversations?

name: Sheldon
line: How would I know? I'm not listening to you.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on. Okay, here's what we're gonna do. Chess clock. We each get five minutes to talk about our problems. We'll take turns. Each turn will consist of a statement and a helpful response from the friend. Begin.

name: Sheldon
line: I humiliated Stephen Hawking in a game of Words with Friends. He stopped playing, and now we're not friends anymore.

name: Leonard
line: He's probably busy. You're worried about nothing. Give it a couple more days. I'm sure he'll play, and you'll see that everything's fine. My turn. I can't let Penny hand in a bad paper, but how do I tell her it's bad without letting her know that I read it?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. Beats me. Now, I know Hawking's not busy because I can see he's playing other people right now.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe since you're so good, he's taking his time to meet the challenge. I want Penny to enjoy school...

name: Sheldon
line: Wolowitz told me he's a big baby. But I didn't know that, and I played extract for 82 points. It's all Amy's fault. She told me to play it. I have got to cut her loose.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I wasn't done talking. She hands in the paper tomorrow. I know I could help her. And she's my girlfriend. I, I should be allowed to help her. Why aren't I allowed to help her?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I hear you, brother.

name: Leonard
line: No. You need to give me some advice.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Women, huh?

name: Leonard
line: No, specific to my situation.

name: Sheldon
line: Blonde women, huh?

name: Leonard
line: Empathetic.

name: Sheldon
line: It sucks to be you.

name: Leonard
line: I quit.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, wait. No. I listened to your dumb thing. Leonard, come back. Leonard, come back. Leonard, come back.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course, it only works on the weak-minded.

name: Leonard
line: Good morning, sunshine.

name: Penny
line: Leonard. It's eight a.m. It's like the middle of the night.

name: Leonard
line: I know, but I have to go to work, and I made you breakfast.

name: Penny
line: Oh, wow, that's so sweet. Hey, what's this?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, before you open that, um, are you familiar with the story of The Shoemaker and the Elves?

name: Penny
line: Elves? Come on, Leonard. It's too early for Lord of the Rings.

name: Leonard
line: No, no. Listen, um, once upon a time, there was this shoemaker and when he went to bed at night, elves would sneak in and they would make all these amazing shoes for him. And when the shoemaker woke up in the morning, he, he would be super happy, not mad at the elves at all. Open it.

name: Penny
line: Okay. An examination of the economic, cultural, and political roots of slavery in the Old South, 1619 to 1865. What the hell is this?

name: Leonard
line: Don't ask me. A little elf did it.

name: Penny
line: So let me get this straight. You just assumed my paper would be bad so you wrote one for me?

name: Leonard
line: No, I assumed it would be good. Then I read it.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: No, I, I mean, it was good. There were just a few things that needed a little polishing.

name: Penny
line: You changed every word.

name: Leonard
line: That's not true. Uh, slavery. 1619. Your name at the top. That's all you.

name: Penny
line: You are such an ass. This is exactly why I didn't want to tell you I was taking a class in the first place.

name: Leonard
line: Please don't be upset. I just, I didn't want you ending up with a bad grade and get discouraged and give up on the idea of going back to school.

name: Penny
line: Right, because me being in school is so important to you. That way, you wouldn't have to be dating someone who's only a waitress.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on, you know that's not true.

name: Penny
line: Do I? Listen to me. I need to do this on my own. If I fail, I fail. If I pass, I pass. Do you get it?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry. I was just trying to help.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, next time don't. Oh, and since you like stories so much, this is not The Shoemaker

name: Howard
line: You ever hear back from Hawking?

name: Sheldon
line: No. It would appear as if I've lost him. Stupid brain.

name: Raj
line: It'll be okay.

name: Sheldon
line: How can it be okay? Stephen Hawking's a genius and he talks like a robot. It's everything I've ever wanted in a friend.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, but if he's a sore loser, maybe you're better off without him.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. I guess I just have to make lemonade out of the two of you. He played! He played! Coop and Rolling Thunder are together again. He was okay with that nickname.

name: Howard
line: So, now all you have to do is let him win.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, way ahead of you. I will play the word at for two measly points, throwing the game and thus securing my friendship with the smartest man in the world.

name: Howard
line: What are you waiting for? Hit send.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't. Losing on purpose is intellectually dishonest.

name: Raj
line: So don't do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, but I want to be Hawking's friend.

name: Howard
line: So do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, but if I do, I'll be a phony, a sellout, a Hollywood poser.

name: Raj
line: Then don't do it.

name: Sheldon
line: I won't. This feels right. My mother always said, to thine own self be true.

name: Howard
line: Good for you.

name: Sheldon
line: ‘Course she also told me that every animal in the world got on one boat, so what does she know? And send.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey. Haven't heard from you in a couple days. You still mad at me?

name: Penny
line: Nope. I have no reason to... “B” mad at you. Minus.

name: Leonard
line: Wow.

name: Penny
line: That's right. On my paper. Not yours, mine, you punk-ass elf.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what to say.

name: Penny
line: Hmm, how about, gee, Penny, you're smarter than I thought. You may be the one in school, but I'm the one who learned a lesson. I'm so stupid, Penny. Duh.

name: Sheldon
line: She sounds exactly like you.

name: Amy
line: How'd it go with Leonard?

name: Penny
line: I don't think he'll be making that mistake again.

name: Bernadette
line: Good.

name: Penny
line: So, I know this goes without saying, but if either of you tell Leonard you helped me rewrite this paper, I will beat you both with a bag of oranges.

name: Amy
line: Understood.

name: Bernadette
line: Got it.

name: Penny
line: Now, ladies, we got a B-minus on this paper. I think if we put our heads together, on the next one we could get an A.

name: Bernadette
line: Uh, but we got you a B-minus on purpose to make it believable.

name: Penny
line: Believable? You saying I'm not smart?

name: Bernadette
line: No, no!

name: Amy
line: You're smart.

name: Penny
line: That's better.

name: Amy
line: I feel like I'm in high school again.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, doing the prom queen's homework so she'll like us.

name: Amy
line: I know. It's finally working.

name: Sheldon
line: It's Stephen Hawking.

name: Leonard
line: Well answer it. I want to hear.

name: Sheldon
line: Professor Hawking, how nice of you to call.

name: Stephen Hawking
line: Hello. I really enjoyed our game, Dr. Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, me, too.

name: Stephen Hawking
line: Or should I say Dr. Loser? Ha, ha, ha.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, congratulations. You won fair and square. Uh, very impressive, sir.

name: Stephen Hawking
line: Do you like brain teasers?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I love brain teasers.

name: Stephen Hawking
line: What does Sheldon Cooper and a black hole have in common? They both suck. Neener neener.

name: Wil
line: Hi, Sheldon. Thanks for having me. I'm happy to be here.

name: Amy
line: Cut.

name: Sheldon
line: What's wrong?

name: Amy
line: Sorry, Sheldon, you were brilliant as always. Wil, that was a little wooden.

name: Wil
line: Wooden?

name: Amy
line: Don't worry, it wasn't terrible. Just, this time, try to say it the way people sound. And action.

name: Sheldon
line: My friend, Wil Wheaton.

name: Wil
line: Hi, Sheldon. Thanks for having me. I'm excited to be here.

name: Sheldon
line: So, Wil, what do you have for us first?

name: Wil
line: Well, this is an exciting one. This is the flag of the United Federation of Planets. Now what's interesting about this flag...

name: Amy
line: Cut.

name: Wil
line: What was wrong with that?

name: Amy
line: It's called Fun with Flags. They're not at half-mast, nobody died. Let's try and keep it upbeat.

name: Wil
line: Um, no offence, but I've been acting since I was a kid. I think I can handle a Web show without a lot of direction.

name: Sheldon
line: It's true. In 1982, Wil played the voice of Martin the mouse in The Secret of NIMH. You moved me.

name: Amy
line: You'll have to forgive me. This is my first time directing, I just want it to be good.

name: Wil
line: So do I.

name: Amy
line: Great. So, this time let's try more real boy, less Pinocchio. And action.

name: Wil
line: And cut. You realize that I'm doing this for free, right?

name: Amy
line: Yes. And so far, we're still not getting our money's worth. Let's try it again. Everybody's having fun. And action.

name: Sheldon
line: So, Wil, what do you have for us first?

name: Wil
line: Well, this is an exciting one. This is the flag of the United Federation of Planets.

name: Amy
line: Cut.

name: Wil
line: Problem, first-time director?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, none that I could see. I saw a man who loved flags almost as much as I do. I got goose bumps.

name: Amy
line: He was overacting on purpose.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? He reminded me of a young William Shatner.

name: Wil
line: Listen, Sheldon, I'm really happy to do this for you, but not if she's gonna be a huge pain in the ass the whole time.

name: Amy
line: You gonna let him speak to me like that?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you're my girlfriend and I don't want you to be upset. Then again, Wil Wheaton's my friend and I don't want him to be upset. Hmm, this is a sticky wicket.  What do you think?

name: Amy
line: Can I speak to you for a second?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll be right back. Feel free to play with yourself.

name: Amy
line: I don't care for your friend, he's being rude to me. You need to ask him to leave.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, I can't just ask Wil Wheaton to leave. He's a minor celebrity. Once you explain who he is, many people recognize him.

name: Amy
line: Fine. Then maybe I should go.

name: Sheldon
line: Could you? That would solve everything. You are the best. I'll see you at dinner tonight?

name: Amy
line: You sure you wouldn't rather have dinner with your friend Wil Wheaton?

name: Sheldon
line: Come to think of it, I would! You, little lady, are on fire.

name: Bernadette
line: Every time we eat dinner here, your mother refuses to let me help with the dishes.

name: Howard
line: Don't take it personally. She likes doing them by herself so she can lick the plates with no one looking.

name: Bernadette
line: You ready to go?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, let me just grab a couple of fresh turtlenecks.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't understand why you keep your stuff here when there's plenty of room at home.

name: Howard
line: What are you talking about? All I have here is a few sweaters, books, bank stuff, computers, mail, collectibles, medicine and my electric body groomer. Ooh, there's my plaid dickie. Oh, got this at the Goodwill store for 50 cents. Can you believe it?

name: Bernadette
line: 50 cents sounds right. Let's go.

name: Howard
line: You know, it's kinda late. Why don't we just spend the night here?

name: Bernadette
line: Because we don't live here.

name: Howard
line: I know.

name: Bernadette
line: Do you? You said when you got back from space you were gonna move into my apartment, but half the time we stay here.

name: Howard
line: That's not true.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, I'm doing laundry. You want me to put anything in for you?

name: Howard
line: There's some underwear in the hamper.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Oh, good, I got that new stain stick to try out.

name: Howard
line: Thank you, I only put it on the list two weeks ago. Okay, I see what you're getting at. How about this weekend I'll box up all my things and move them to our place.

name: Bernadette
line: Thank you.

name: Howard
line: The lightsabres are gonna look great in the living room.

name: Bernadette
line: Or in the closet. We can decide later.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, help, my hand's stuck in the garbage disposal.

name: Howard
line: Let go of whatever piece of food you're holding.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Are you kidding? It's a perfectly good chicken leg.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, look who's out after dark, like a big boy.

name: Sheldon
line: I was out raising heck with Mr. Wil Wheaton. Four hours more and we would have closed down the HomeTown Buffet.

name: Leonard
line: I thought you had plans with Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I did, but then Wil called Amy a pain in the A-S-S. She got huffy and left, then Wil and I headed out to dinner. That place really did remind me of my hometown. Because there we also have a HomeTown Buffet.

name: Leonard
line: Hold on. Wil and Amy had an argument?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, quite the kerfuffle.

name: Leonard
line: Then Amy got mad and left?

name: Sheldon
line: Walked right out the door.

name: Leonard
line: And you?

name: Sheldon
line: Enjoyed a delightful dinner at a reasonable price. The manager recognized Wil and let us sit right next to the frozen yoghurt machine. Right next to it. I was closer to it than I am to you right now.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy, I think Amy might be upset.

name: Sheldon
line: Why's that?

name: Leonard
line: Because your friend was rude to her, and then you went to dinner with him.

name: Sheldon
line: You're just repeating what I said. It's like living with a lactose-intolerant parrot.

name: Leonard
line: Trust me, call her.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. It's a shame you didn't go to dinner with us, because the buffet you're about to enjoy only serves humble pie, a dessert much less tasty than frozen yoghurt. I was this close.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: You'll appreciate this. Leonard has some ridiculous notion that you're mad at me. Tell him you're not mad at me. Go ahead, set him straight.

name: Amy
line: I'm mad at you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. Eat one of your Luna bars. Very often when women think they're angry, they're really just hungry.

name: Amy
line: I'm not hungry. Your friend insulted me, and you didn't do anything.

name: Sheldon
line: Precisely, I didn't do anything. Now does someone feel like checking her emotional math?

name: Leonard
line: Keep going, buddy, you're doing great.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I'm your girlfriend, and you should have taken my side. That's it. End of story. Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow, Amy's mad and Leonard was right. What a weird day.

name: Penny
line: Hey. Sorry this took so long. But you used to work here, you know how it is.

name: Bernadette
line: Kitchen slammed again?

name: Penny
line: No, I'm a terrible waitress, remember?

name: Bernadette
line: So, is there anything I can do to help you with the move tomorrow?

name: Howard
line: Now that you mention it, I was thinking tomorrow might not be great.

name: Bernadette
line: What's your excuse this time?

name: Howard
line: No excuse. It's just, you know, I'm Jewish, and technically, we're not supposed to drive or carry anything on the Sabbath. So this one's on God.

name: Bernadette
line: That might be a little more convincing if you didn't have a mouthful of bacon cheeseburger.

name: Howard
line: My religion's kinda loosey-goosey. Basically, as long as you got your schmekel clipped and don't wear a cross, you're good.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, you promised you'd move.

name: Howard
line: And I will.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, right.

name: Howard
line: I will. I'm obviously not going to live in my mother's house for the rest of my life. I'm not a child.

name: Penny
line: I've seen her burp you.

name: Howard
line: She did not burp me. She was patting me on the back, and I happened to burp. Don't you have other tables you should be waiting on?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but I told you, I'm not good at my job. Bernadette, listen to me. He is never gonna leave.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm starting to think you're right.

name: Howard
line: All right, I've had enough of this. I'm a grown man, I have a successful career, for the love of God, I've been to space. I will move out when I'm ready, and I don't need anyone badgering me into it.

name: Penny
line: Wow, excuse me.

name: Howard
line: That was just for her benefit. I'll move tomorrow. I love you. Don't leave me.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy.  Amy.  Angry Amy.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I've been thinking about what happened, and I hope this gift will make things better.

name: Amy
line: Star Trek DVDs? Why would I want this?

name: Sheldon
line: First of all, you're welcome. And furthermore, not being familiar with Wil Wheaton's body of work, there was no way for you to know you were being rude to a national treasure. Get ready for 130 hours of I told you so.  Fine. I'll just tell you what happens. Episode one, Encounter at Farpoint. Fade in. The new Enterprise heads out on its maiden voyage to contact the Bandi people of Deneb IV. Enter Wesley Crusher, played by my buddy...  She's hooked.

name: Raj
line: Wow. An end of an era.

name: Howard
line: Boy, if these walls could talk.

name: Leonard
line: They'd say, why does he touch himself so much?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. I can't believe I'm not going to live here anymore. This has always been my bedroom. Right here is where my mom used to mark my height.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. Fifth grade. Sixth grade. Seventh grade. Eighth grade. Ninth grade.

name: Howard
line: I remember when I was five, hiding under this desk with all my Halloween candy. Had some Peanut M&M'S, went into my first anaphylactic shock and had to be rushed to the hospital. Came home, celebrated with a Snickers, went into my second anaphylactic shock.

name: Raj
line: When did you figure out you were allergic to nuts?

name: Howard
line: Sometime around the third Almond Joy.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. You want to start loading this stuff into the truck?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I guess. Hey, would you do me a favour? Go on ahead. I just want one last moment alone in my old room.

name: Leonard
line: We're not standing outside by the U-Haul while you fondle yourself.

name: Howard
line: Fine, let's go.

name: Penny
line: Hey. What brings you in?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, if you wouldn't mind, I'd like to have a conversation about girls.

name: Penny
line: I had a feeling we'd have a talk like this sooner or later. Are you finally getting fuzz in weird places?

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, please, I'm on the horns of a relationship dilemma. And for the record, I had a full pubis of hair by the time I was 19.

name: Penny
line: And for the record, bleugh. So what are you drinking?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it's been a rough day. I usually go chamomile tea, but I don't think that's going to cut it.

name: Penny
line: You could have a Long Island Iced Tea.

name: Sheldon
line: Will that calm my nerves?

name: Penny
line: It's calmed the pants off me a couple of times.

name: Sheldon
line: Sold.

name: Penny
line: Oh. So, the heart you got from the wizard giving you trouble?

name: Sheldon
line: The trouble isn't with me, Penny, it's with your gender. Someday, scientists will discover that second X chromosome contains nothing but nonsense and twaddle.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, Amy told me what happened. Look, just apologize. It'll warm her twaddle.

name: Sheldon
line: It's a Band-Aid at best. See, the core problem is that Amy and Wil do not like each other. Which is baffling because they're both crazy about me. And I like them, which indicates they're bright and interesting and/or were on Star Trek.

name: Penny
line: Honey, you can't make people like each other.

name: Sheldon
line: Not true. Leonard made me like you. And let me tell you, that was a hard row to hoe. Cheers, pal. Ooh. Boy, that is a treat that's hard to beat. Get the Mad Hatter on the horn, I'm having a tea party.

name: Penny
line: You might want to pace yourself.

name: Sheldon
line: I drink tea all the time. I think I know what I'm doing.

name: Penny
line: Far be it from me to criticize a man with a full pubis. Look, Sheldon, your problem is not Wil Wheaton, okay? Your problem is the way you treated Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: My problem is I'm out of tea.

name: Penny
line: Come on, someone insulted your girlfriend and you just let him do it. I thought you Texas guys stood up for your womenfolk.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, please, I think I've evolved beyond my simple rustic upbringing.

name: Penny
line: Sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: On the other hand, that low-down polecat done wronged my woman.

name: Penny
line: Welcome to Long Island, Tex.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy deserves better. You know, when we buy the Planter's deluxe mix, she eats all the Brazil nuts so I don't have to look at them. She's a unique blend of saint and squirrel.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that she is. Here you go.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm a callous egomaniac. She's gonna leave me.

name: Penny
line: No, she won't.

name: Sheldon
line: No, she won't. I'm great.

name: Howard
line: Okay, I have now officially moved out of my mother's house. You are now the only woman in my life who I'll see naked in the bathroom.

name: Bernadette
line: I know this wasn't easy. You doing okay?

name: Howard
line: Oh, I'm fine. It's just her I'm worried about.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw, she'll be okay. She's a grown woman.

name: Howard
line: I know. It's just ever since my dad left, I've felt responsible for her.

name: Bernadette
line: That's a lot for a kid to deal with.

name: Howard
line: She was just so sad all the time. I was the only person who could cheer her up. Well, me and Ben and Jerry.

name: Bernadette
line: She's lucky you were there.

name: Howard
line: You know, she's why I first got into magic. I would do little shows for her, hang up a bedsheet like it was a curtain, put on a top hat and cape. And part way through the act, I would say I needed a volunteer from the audience to be my beautiful assistant and invite her up on stage. I can still remember the way she'd smile. For a few minutes, she'd forget how lonely she was.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw, crap. Let's go.

name: Howard
line: Where we going?

name: Bernadette
line: Grab a box. We'll sleep at your mother's place tonight.

name: Howard
line: No, but I want to live here.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, you should've thought of that before you told me the stupid magic trick story.

name: Howard
line: Can't we talk about this?

name: Bernadette
line: No husband of mine is gonna break his mother's heart!

name: Sheldon
line: Wil Wheaton!  Wil Wheaton! Wait, how many was that?

name: Wil
line: Hey, Sheldon, what's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Wouldn't you like to know?

name: Wil
line: Have you been drinking?

name: Sheldon
line: Just tea. S'the best tea I've ever had.

name: Wil
line: Why are you here?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll tell you. I'm from Texas. Need I say more?

name: Wil
line: Yeah, actually, a little more would be helpful.

name: Sheldon
line: You insulted my woman. I'm here to defend her honour. Two! It was two.  Wil Wheaton! Now prepare yourself for what may come.

name: Wil
line: Oh, Sheldon, do you really think we're gonna fight?

name: Sheldon
line: My fists are not up here because I'm milking a giant invisible cow. They're up to beat an apology out of you.

name: Wil
line: Okay, I'm sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that was a long bus ride for not very much.

name: Wil
line: Are you okay?

name: Sheldon
line: You're asking a lot of questions, Wil Wheaton. As a matter of idle curiosity, which of your shrubberies do you feel would benefit from a thorough vomiting? Never mind, I'll choose.  You were so good in Stand by Me.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, I'm Dr. Sheldon Cooper. Welcome to Sheldon Cooper Presents Fun with Flags. Get ready for a very special episode where we explore the flags of the popular entertainment franchise, Star Trek. And to help us, I'm pleased to introduce a special guest, surprisingly, it only took gas money and the promise of free food to get him here, Mr. LeVar Burton.

name: LeVar
line: Hey, Sheldon, it's a pleasure to be here. Well, we've got some interesting flags for...

name: Amy
line: Cut. Yikes, this guy is worse than Wil Wheaton.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know what she's talking about, but I'm obligated to agree with her. She's my girlfriend.

name: LeVar
line: Ah, I hear you, brother. I still get lunch, right?

name: Raj
line: What are you drawing over there?

name: Sheldon
line: It's a hypothetical containment field for a Frisbee-sized wormhole that could serve as a portal to a parallel universe.

name: Howard
line: Oh, you silly doodlebug.

name: Leonard
line: You know, a lot of scientists believe that making contact with other life-forms would probably not end well for us.

name: Sheldon
line: It's a Frisbee-sized wormhole, Leonard. You can block it with a Frisbee. Calm down.

name: Howard
line: Do you expect me to build this?

name: Sheldon
line: I expect you to wipe the pudding off your chin. Gentlemen.

name: Howard
line: Have you guys ever noticed that Sheldon always disappears every day at two forty-five?

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Raj
line: He probably just goes to the bathroom.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, no, he goes to the bathroom at eight a.m. with optional follow-ups at one forty-five and seven ten high-fibre Fridays.

name: Raj
line: It's sad that you know that.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that's just the tip of the sadness iceberg.

name: Howard
line: I'm looking at his public calendar. Two forty-five to three-oh-five, nothing. Yesterday, two forty-five to three-oh-five, nothing, last week, nothing, last month, nothing. He never has anything booked during that time.

name: Raj
line: Twenty minutes a day, completely unaccounted for.

name: Howard
line: We should figure out where he goes.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, this is exciting. Like one of my classic murder mystery dinner parties.

name: Leonard
line: Right, the case of who murdered three Saturday nights of my life?

name: Howard
line: Colonel Koothrapali in the kitchen with the olive spread.

name: Raj
line: It was tapenade and you guys suck.

name: Penny
line: So, how was work today?

name: Leonard
line: Well, I spent most of the afternoon growing isotopically pure crystals for neutrino detection.

name: Penny
line: That sounds like fun.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, it was.

name: Penny
line: Oh, good, I guessed right.

name: Leonard
line: Who you talking to?

name: Penny
line: Oh, just this guy I met at school.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, great. We're still dating, right?

name: Penny
line: Relax. He's just a friend. We're doing an oral report together. He's really nice.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, what was that? I had a little stroke after oral.

name: Penny
line: Would you stop? Look, he just moved here from London, okay? He doesn't really know anybody.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, good, an English accent, the sexiest accent you can have.

name: Penny
line: No. That's not true. There's French, there's Italian. No, you're right, it's the best.

name: Leonard
line: Did you tell him you have a boyfriend?

name: Penny
line: It didn't come up.

name: Leonard
line: Well, maybe you should tell him.

name: Penny
line: What am I supposed to say?

name: Leonard
line: Say, can't talk right now, hanging with my boyfriend. England sucks, you suck, USA number one.

name: Penny
line: Fine. Hanging with my boyfriend. Talk to you later. Happy?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm. Hmm.

name: Leonard
line: What did he say?

name: Penny
line: Nothing.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Did your boyfriend make you type that?

name: Leonard
line: I hate this guy.

name: Penny
line: Don't be like that.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, trust me, he's hitting on you.

name: Penny
line: No, he's not. We're just friends. Look, is this gonna be a problem? Because he's supposed to come over tomorrow to work.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Here?

name: Penny
line: If it makes you uncomfortable, I'll switch partners, even though the thing's due next week and everyone already has a partner and I'll probably end up failing the class.

name: Leonard
line: That'd be great. Thank you.

name: Howard
line: Two forty-four, Right on schedule. Hey, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, hello.

name: Howard
line: Raj and I are heading over to the genetics lab to pet the glow-in-the-dark bunny. Want to come with us?

name: Sheldon
line: No, thank you.

name: Raj
line: Are you sure? They turn off the lights, and it's like a cute little laser show that poops all over the place.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm quite sure. Good day.

name: Howard
line: Well, where are you going?

name: Sheldon
line: Where are you going?

name: Raj
line: We just told you.

name: Sheldon
line: I just told you.

name: Howard
line: No, you didn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it's your word against mine; see you in court.

name: Howard
line: Should we follow him?

name: Raj
line: I don't know, I'm torn. I want to know where he's going, but now I kind of want to play with the bunny.

name: Alex
line: Hi, guys.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Alex, do you know where your boss just went?

name: Alex
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Don't you know his schedule?

name: Alex
line: All I know is corduroy makes too much noise and I have to go find quieter pants.

name: Howard
line: Come on.

name: Raj
line: Boy, what I wouldn't give to get her out of those pants and into something a little more stylish.

name: Howard
line: This is where he goes? What's in there?

name: Raj
line: I think it's an old storage room.

name: Howard
line: What could he be doing in there every day for twenty minutes?

name: Raj
line: Well, he's not doing twenty-minute abs, because if he were, he would have way better abs. Can you hear anything?

name: Howard
line: Not yet. What are you doing?

name: Raj
line: I'm listening.

name: Howard
line: Can't you face the other way and listen?

name: Raj
line: I can't do anything right for you, can I?

name: Howard
line: What the hell is he up to?

name: Raj
line: He is kind of a weirdo. Maybe he's got Leonard Nimoy chained up in there. Or Bill Gates. Or Stephen Hawking.

name: Howard
line: Why would he chain up Stephen Hawking?

name: Raj
line: Howard, please, you can't treat the man differently just because he's disabled. That's not okay.

name: Leonard
line: If you're wondering why I've been staring through the peephole, I'm trying to get a look at this guy who's coming over to Penny's.

name: Sheldon
line: To be honest, I didn't know you were here.

name: Leonard
line: It's not a big deal. He's just in her history class. They're working on a project together. I don't even know why I care. You know what, I don't care.

name: Sheldon
line: You think you don't care?

name: Leonard
line: This is silly. I have nothing to worry about.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I don't know. I mean, statistically speaking, I'm sure you have something to worry about.

name: Leonard
line: What do you mean?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if we assume your looks are average, yeah, right off the bat, fifty percent of men on Earth are more attractive than you. That's one point five billion handsome lads standing by, waiting to rain on your parade.

name: Leonard
line: Well, yeah, but this isn't just about looks. I'm, I'm way above average in a lot of other things.

name: Sheldon
line: Not height, vision, athleticism, or ability to digest dairy products.

name: Leonard
line: I'm talking about important things like emotional maturity.

name: Sheldon
line: You were just spying on your girlfriend through a peephole.

name: Leonard
line: I liked it better when you thought I wasn't here.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not saying you don't have attractive qualities. Your choice of friends is impeccable, you're a good sleeper, and last but not least, you buy the grapes I like. You're a real catch compared to some snoring guy with a fridge full of lousy grapes.

name: Leonard
line: None of this matters. I trust that Penny cares about me, and nothing's gonna happen with this guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, unless of course he's a skilled hypnotist.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: While unlikely, it's still a statistical possibility. She might be performing sexual acts with him and not even know it.

name: Leonard
line: Now you're just being ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Am I? The mind's a mysterious thing, Leonard. He could be having the time of his life while she thinks she's a chicken pecking for corn.

name: Raj
line: Look at us, sneaking around in the middle of the night like a couple of cat burglars.

name: Howard
line: I think we're more like ninjas.

name: Raj
line: I don't want to be a ninja, I want to be a cat burglar.

name: Howard
line: Fine, I'll be a ninja, you be a cat burglar.

name: Raj
line: No, we both have to be the same thing. Okay, we're ninjas.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: But next time, we'll be cat burglars.

name: Howard
line: It's locked.

name: Raj
line: Are you sure?

name: Howard
line: Yes, I'm sure. Now, you stand guard, I'm going to...

name: Raj
line: It's locked.

name: Howard
line: Just keep an eye out. I'll have this open in a minute.

name: Raj
line: When did you learn how to pick locks?

name: Howard
line: When I was starting to do magic in junior high, I thought I could be an escape artist like Harry Houdini.

name: Raj
line: How did that work out?

name: Howard
line: Pretty good. I managed to escape friends, popularity, and every party thrown in a twelve mile radius. There. Ready?

name: Raj
line: Hold on, hold on.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Raj
line: Sheldon is a very smart man, and he obviously wants to keep this a secret.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, so?

name: Raj
line: What if it's booby-trapped?

name: Howard
line: Don't worry, I'm one step ahead of him.

name: Raj
line: Great, what's your pl...

name: Howard
line: Are we good?

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Huh. Forty-three? What the hell does that mean?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. The solution to an equation?

name: Raj
line: Maybe. It's a prime number. Encryption systems are built on prime numbers.

name: Howard
line: What kind of secret does Sheldon have to encrypt?

name: Raj
line: He's always been very cagey about what he puts in his egg salad to make it so tasty.

name: Howard
line: It's paprika.

name: Raj
line: Really? Well, oh, okay, one mystery solved.

name: Voice from Outside
line: Okay, good night.

name: Penny
line: Thanks, Cole. See you at school.

name: Cole
line: See you.

name: Leonard
line: I'll be right back.

name: Sheldon
line: I thought you left a long time ago.

name: Leonard
line: ‘sup?

name: Cole
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: You, uh, moving into the apartment on the fifth floor?

name: Cole
line: No, I was just visiting a friend.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, cool. That cute blonde on four?

name: Cole
line: Yeah. You know her?

name: Leonard
line: I, well, I see her around. I like to keep my distance because her boyfriend is a pretty scary dude.

name: Cole
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. He's ganged up.

name: Cole
line: She told me he's a scientist.

name: Leonard
line: That's the name of his gang. The Scientists. They are crazy.

name: Cole
line: Well, thanks for the tip.

name: Leonard
line: No problem, brother. Stay frosty.  We're still dating, right?

name: Alex
line: Oh, hello, Dr. Hofstadter.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Alex, and call me Leonard. Dr. Hofstadter is my father. And my mother. And my sister. And our cat. Although, I'm pretty sure Dr. Boots Hofstadter's degree was honorary.

name: Alex
line: May I join you, Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Alex
line: Thanks.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Alex, let me ask you something. My girlfriend knows this guy at school. He's got an English accent.

name: Alex
line: Ooh, I love English accents.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, you all do. Anyway, I feel like he's hitting on her. She says he's just being nice and that I should trust her.

name: Alex
line: It's probably harmless. You know how it is. I'm sure you get hit on all the time.

name: Leonard
line: Right. Because girls are always like, ooh, that guy owns two Star Trek uniforms and gets a lot of ear infections. I got to get me some of that.

name: Alex
line: I don't know, I bet it happens more than you realize.

name: Leonard
line: Trust me, it doesn't.

name: Alex
line: You sure? You're cute, you're funny. Maybe you're getting hit on, and you don't even know it.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Alex
line: Yep, pretty sure.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I got to get back to work. Thanks for listening.

name: Alex
line: No problem.

name: Leonard
line: Hope-hope no girls rip my clothes off on the way.

name: Raj
line: Come on, we're smart guys. We can figure this out.

name: Howard
line: Forty-three. What is forty-three? Besides my mom's neck size.

name: Raj
line: It's the atomic number for technetium.

name: Howard
line: That stuff's radioactive.

name: Raj
line: Do you think he's building a bomb?

name: Howard
line: Ah, it took him two years to put together that Lego Death Star, I'm not worried.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, this could be something. forty-three is the number of calories in half a cup of fat-free yoghurt.

name: Howard
line: Why would you know that?

name: Raj
line: I'm sorry. We can't all eat whatever we want and still stay thin. Wait, in the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, isn't forty-three the answer to the question of life, the universe,and everything?

name: Howard
line: That's forty-two, dumb-ass.

name: Raj
line: Hey, hey. Feelings.

name: Howard
line: We should stop. I'm exhausted.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, me, too. We've got more important things to do. Who cares what stupid forty-three means?

name: Howard
line: Not me.

name: Raj
line: Let's go home. You want to get something to eat?

name: Howard
line: Sounds good.

name: Raj
line: What the balls is forty-three?

name: Howard
line: I have to know!

name: Leonard
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Hey, shouldn't you be out with your gang, spray painting equations on the side of buildings?

name: Leonard
line: Come on, I'm sorry.

name: Penny
line: I just can't believe you don't trust me.

name: Leonard
line: I do, of course I do.

name: Penny
line: Then why did you embarrass me in front of my friend, who, by the way, knew exactly who you were?

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Your picture's on my refrigerator.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. You know, I'm really starting to not like this guy.

name: Penny
line: What is your problem? Do you use up all your thinking at work and then have none left over for when you get home?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. It-it-it's hard sometimes. Everywhere you go, guys hit on you, even if I'm standing right there. And they're all taller than me. Why is everyone taller than me? You know what, this is all in my head. It's my problem, not yours.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, why do you always do this? Listen to me, you're the one I'm with. You know I love you, so will you please relax because you're driving me crazy.

name: Leonard
line: You know that's the first time you ever said that you love me.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: We're just supposed to pretend it's not a big deal?

name: Penny

name: Sheldon
line: The first forty-three parallel universes I've checked proved to be empty. I see no reason to suspect universe number forty-four will be any different.

line: Oh! It's eating my face!

line: Yeah, really sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Sorry? You may not realize it, but I have difficulty navigating certain aspects of daily life. You know, understanding sarcasm, feigning interest in others, not talking about trains as much as I want to. It's exhausting. Which is why, for twenty minutes a day, I like to go down to that room, turn my mind off and do what I need to do to recharge.

name: Howard
line: But what are you doing in there?

name: Raj
line: And what does forty-three mean?

name: Sheldon
line: You don't need to know, you don't deserve to know, and you will never know.

line: Yeah, well, I know how to make your egg salad now.

name: Sheldon
line: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight... Drat. I'm never going to get to forty-three again. One, two, three, four... Rats.

name: Leonard
line: They are not.

name: Raj
line: They are, too.

name: Leonard
line: Your hypothesis is completely disconfirmed by all the data. You're just clinging to it out of intellectual stubbornness.

name: Raj
line: No, you're displaying a shocking ignorance of the subject matter. Mummies and zombies are the exact same thing.

line: Oh, yeah? Mummies are wrapped in bandages.

name: Raj
line: That's called a fashion choice.
