name: Sheldon
line: If a zombie bites you, you turn into a zombie. However, if a mummy bites you, all you turn into is some schmo with a mummy bite. So, like a zombie, that's been eaten from the waist down, you, sir, have no leg to stand on.

line: Thanks. Guess who picked up his new car this morning?

line: Yep. For as long as I can keep my mother out of it. If you want to check it out later, it's parked right out front, space 294.

line: Yeah.

line: Why do you have a parking spot? You don't have a car. You don't even drive.

line: I don't want another parking space. I want my parking space. It's perfect. It's a corner spot, cutting the risk of door-dings in half. It's a mere 28 steps from the building entrance. The nearby tree provides shade on hot days and is also home to a delightful squirrel. Which is fortuitous because most squirrels are real jerks.

name: Howard
line: Fun story. Meanwhile, you still don't have a car.

line: I always listen to myself. It's one of the great joys of my life. Now, get your car out of my spot.

line: Very well. You leave me no choice.

name: Sheldon
line: President Siebert, listen to reason. Yeah, I understand I don't use the parking spot, but that's not the point. I... Yes, I'm aware you told me not to call you at home, but you didn't answer the door. And I know you were there, because I saw you through the mail slot. Yeah, well, that's some salty language. May I remind you that you're the president of a major university, not the president of the Potty Mouth Club. There it is again. Do you kiss your mother with that mouth? Oh, well, I'm sorry for your loss. Good night, sir. Unbelievable. He says Wolowitz deserves my spot because he's a high-profile asset to the university.

line: Well, he's not wrong. Howard did go to the International Space Station.

line: No, no, this is a slippery slope, Leonard. It starts with a parking space, where does it end? It's like my dad always said, first they say you can't drink and drive, next thing you know, you can't let your 10-year-old take the wheel while you sleep one off in the backseat.

name: Bernadette
line: This is fun, we never really get to talk shop with Penny around. We usually just end up talking about boys.

name: Amy
line: Which is fine, but it's nice to mix it up with a little intellectual conversation.

name: Waiter
line: From the two gentlemen at the bar.

name: Amy
line: Oh, my gosh, boys bought us drinks, boys bought us drinks. Thank you, thank you, thank you so much.

name: Bernadette
line: Be cool.

name: Amy
line: You be cool. Guys are hitting on us, and not just to get to Penny.

name: Bernadette
line: You're right. Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh. Bad move.

name: Penny
line: Really? Why?

name: Sheldon
line: My queen can now take your rook from below.

name: Penny
line: So that means I lose, right? It's over?

name: Sheldon
line: If I make this move, but I won't because we're having too much fun.

name: Penny
line: Okay, let's take a break.

name: Sheldon
line: We're all out of alcohol.

name: Penny
line: I wasn't going to get alcohol. Gosh, I wonder what Leonard's doing right now. I miss him so much.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if you'd like, we could call him. I mean that you could call him. As I've explained, the absence of my friends does not cause me pain. As rock and roll bad boy Paul Simon once said, I am a rock, I am an i-i-i-island.

name: Penny
line: I'm calling him.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, goodie, put him on speaker phone.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me, ladies, my pants are buzzing. North Sea, how can I kelp you?

name: Penny
line: Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Penny? Hey, it's Penny. Everybody say hi to Penny.

name: Everybody
line: Hi, Penny!

name: Penny
line: Wow, it sounds like you're having a good time.

name: Leonard
line: Best time of my life.

name: Sheldon
line: Isn't it five thirty in the morning there?

name: Leonard
line: Is it? Hey, everybody, it's five thirty in the morning!

name: Penny
line: Uh, okay, well, we were just calling you because we were missing you.

name: Random voice
line: Iceberg!

name: Leonard
line: Uh-oh, hang on.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you in danger?

name: Leonard
line: No, it's a drinking game. Whenever we see an iceberg, we take a shot!

name: Everybody
line: Berg! Berg! Berg! Berg! Berg! Berg!

name: Penny
line: Leonard, Leonard? I cannot believe we were missing that jerk.

name: Sheldon
line: You were.

name: Amy
line: So what happened? How'd it go?

name: Bernadette
line: It's fine. I thanked them again and let them know we're not available.

name: Amy
line: So I can drink this without having to give up the goodies?

name: Bernadette
line: Yes, it's all cool. Although, if you wanted to talk to one of them, no one would blame you.

name: Amy
line: And why would no one blame me?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know what I'm saying.

name: Amy
line: Well, it sounds like you're saying that I could do better than Sheldon.

name: Bernadette
line: Boy, these drinks are strong. Hoo, mama, I'm gonna be huggin' the toilet tonight.

name: Amy
line: No, tell me, I want to know what you meant by that.

name: Bernadette
line: I just meant that you're not married and your boyfriend's kind of, Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: And your husband is extremely Howard. What's your point?

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry. I have no point. That was a stupid thing to say. Can we please just go back to having a nice time?

name: Amy
line: We could, but unfortunately my brain is lesion-free and I remember that rotten thing you just said about my sweet baboo.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on. I apologize. Can we please just let it go?

name: Amy
line: Sure.

name: Bernadette
line: Thanks.

name: Amy
line: Your husband's weird and his clothes are ridiculous.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe it. All this time I've been doing nothing but sit around and miss that guy. And you know what the worst part is?

name: Sheldon
line: That you're having to process your emotional pain without vodka?

name: Penny
line: No. Yeah. But you know what the second-worst part is? He does not miss me at all.

name: Sheldon
line: Allow me to comfort you. At least you've got your health.

name: Penny
line: Really? That, that's it? That's comforting?

name: Sheldon
line: Um, uh, in a hundred years, you'll both be dead and it won't matter?

name: Penny
line: No. Come on, you're supposed to say, of course he misses you, the only reason he's partying is to cover up his pain.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, I don't think that's true at all.

name: Penny
line: This is ridiculous. Why am I upset just because he's off having a good time?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, perhaps you're obsessively picturing him engaged in drunken coitus with another woman. Is that it? Did I get it right?

name: Penny
line: Okay, that, that's great. You can stop trying to make me feel better now.

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, I can't. Before Leonard left, he made me promise that I'd take care of you.

name: Penny
line: He did?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's really sweet.

name: Sheldon
line: Plus, if I do a good job, he said he'd bring me back a sailor's cap.

name: Penny
line: Well, now I miss him even more.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if it's any consolation, I'm sure Leonard's tormented every moment he's away from your warm embrace and cherry lips.

name: Penny
line: Thanks.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, seriously?

name: Raj
line: Uh, excuse me, Mrs. Davis?

name: Mrs Davis
line: What?

name: Raj
line: I'd like to apologize for being insensitive. And for possibly making penguins seem like jerks, because 99% of them are stand-up guys.

name: Mrs Davis
line: Forget about it.

name: Raj
line: You know, you, you and I, you and I have a lot in common.

name: Mrs Davis
line: Is that right?

name: Raj
line: Oh, yes, I, I too am in the throes of heartbreak. Okay, fine, I'll tell you about it.

name: Sheldon
line: Here is a hot beverage to comfort you. It's in a to-go cup. Make of that what you will.

name: Penny
line: Come on. It's still early. Let's do something.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I have been toying around with an idea for 4D chess.

name: Penny
line: How about we just talk?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. In 4D chess...

name: Penny
line: No. Come on, let's talk about our lives. Tell me something about you I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: I own nine pairs of pants.

name: Penny
line: Okay, that, that's a good start, but I was thinking maybe something a little more personal.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. I own nine pairs of underpants.

name: Penny
line: How about I go first?

name: Sheldon
line: But I don't want to know how many underpants you own. Although, based on the floor of your bedroom, I'd say it's a thousand.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, here's something people do not know about me. When I first moved out to L.A., I did a topless scene in a low-budget horror movie about a killer gorilla. Ugh! After I did it, I felt so ashamed. Thankfully, that thing never came out.

name: Sheldon
line: I've seen that. Yeah. Serial Apeist. Howard found it online the day we met you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, God.

name: Sheldon
line: And it was literally the moment you walked out the door. But I see the type of personal revelations you're going for. Okay, here's one I thought I'd take to the grave.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. A while back, YouTube changed its user interface from a star-based rating system to a thumbs-up rating system. I tell people I'm okay with it, but I'm really not.

name: Penny
line: That's your big revelation?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Whew, I feel ten pounds lighter.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you know what? I give up. I'm going to bed.

name: Sheldon
line: Here's something else you don't know about me. You just hurt my feelings.

name: Penny
line: What did I do?

name: Sheldon
line: I opened up and shared something deeply upsetting to me, and you treated it as if it were nothing.

name: Penny
line: I, I didn't think it was a big deal.

name: Sheldon
line: It is to me; that's the point.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, you are right. I'm really sorry. I should've known better.

name: Sheldon
line: Your apology is accepted.

name: Penny
line: Thank you. How about a hug?

name: Sheldon
line: How about a hearty handshake?

name: Penny
line: Come on.

name: Sheldon
line: Now I know how you felt getting mauled by that sex-crazed gorilla.

name: Bernadette
line: Good night.

name: Amy
line: Mm-hmm. It was rather flattering to have strangers send us drinks.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, that felt nice.

name: Amy
line: Maybe tomorrow morning we put on some hot pants and see if we can score us some free omelettes.

name: Bernadette
line: So, hypothetically, if, if we were to have gone with them, which one would you have picked?

name: Amy
line: I think I would have gone with the short one with the goofy haircut.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, good, 'cause I liked the tall thin one. He seemed intelligent, kind of a loner, maybe a little sexually inexperienced, like I'd have to teach him a thing or two.

name: Amy
line: Not my guy. I caught him staring at my rack. It'd be nice to be with a man who wants to know what's underneath my cardigan. FYI, it's another cardigan.

name: Bernadette
line: Your short sexed-up guy kind of sounds like Howard.

name: Amy
line: Your brainy virgin kind of sounds like Sheldon.

name: Both
line: Good night.

name: Mrs Davis
line: All right, Dr. Koothrappali, it's been nice talking to you, but I need to go home and relieve my babysitter.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, I can relate to being a single parent. I have a dog.

name: Mrs Davis
line: Yeah, it's exactly the same thing. Good night.

name: Raj
line: Mrs. Davis, I, uh, I must confess, I came here tonight in a futile attempt to pick up some lonely postdoc, but instead I got to connect with you at a human level. That's a much better evening. You're a lovely person.

name: Mrs Davis
line: Are you hitting on me?

name: Raj
line: No, no, no, that would be crazy. I mean, if I were hitting on you, you'd know it 'cause you'd feel uncomfortable and a little sad for me.

name: Mrs Davis
line: You're sweet. Good night, Dr. Koothrappali.

name: Raj
line: Good night.

name: Howard
line: Looks like she accepted your apology.

name: Raj
line: And then some. I think we had a moment.

name: Howard
line: Oh, please, you did not have a moment.

name: Raj
line: Who died and made you king of moments?

name: Howard
line: Okay, fine. Let's say there was a moment.

name: Raj
line: There was.

name: Howard
line: There wasn't. But, but even if there was, what are you gonna do about it?

name: Raj
line: I will slowly seduce her until she falls helpless into my bed, hungry for the pleasure only I can give her.

name: Howard
line: So nothing.

name: Raj
line: No, not a thing.

name: Penny
line: Ah, I'm so glad the police finally caught that psychotic genetically engineered ape.

name: Leonard
line: That is my girlfriend. I swear to God.

name: Everyone
line: Leonard! Leonard! Leonard! Leonard!

name: Penny
line: Aaaaaaah!

name: Ira Flatow
line: This is Science Friday. I'm Ira Flatow. My guest today is responsible for the discovery of the first stable super-heavy element. Welcome, Dr. Sheldon Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Uh, the university made me come here. I didn't want to. Uh, big fan of the show.

name: Ira
line: So, I understand that you actually discovered this element by mistake.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Ira
line: And some people in the science community are calling it The Wonder Blunder.

name: Sheldon
line: Who? Give me their names. I bet it's Wolowitz.

name: Ira
line: It's just such a fascinating story. Your calculations are way off, but they find the element anyway. It's like misreading a treasure map and still finding the treasure.

name: Sheldon
line: Can we talk about something else? Do you know that I yodel?

name: Ira
line: That's interesting, but this could be taking you down the path toward a Nobel Prize. And in chemistry, no less. And wouldn't that be unusual? Because you're a physicist.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, yes, I'd be a physicist with a Nobel in chemistry. Everyone laugh at the circus freak. You know, I don't need to sit here and take this, Flatow. It is because of bullies like you, every day more and more Americans are making the switch to television.

name: Sheldon
line: President Seibert, I don't know why you're yelling. You're the one who made me go on the radio. I was expecting a professional science interview, not an attack by some morning zoo shock jock. Well, if the university needs money so badly, perhaps you should start a swear jar. Whoa, that one's worth a dollar.

name: Amy
line: I know you don't like it, but every time you do an interview, it raises the profile of the university. That translates to funding.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, I'm not just some trained monkey dancing for coins.

name: Leonard
line: Of course you're not. People love trained monkeys.

name: Penny
line: How can you not be happy? You're tall, thin and famous. Oh, my God, I'm jealous of Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Look, you're gonna be doing this stuff for a while. You're just gonna have to find a way to get used to it.

name: Sheldon
line: But none of you know what this is like. Being celebrated for something you wish you never did.

name: Penny
line: Mmm, you clearly haven't been with me at Mardi Gras.

name: Bernadette
line: Want to pause the video game and help me clean up?

name: Howard
line: I am cleaning up. Look at the mess the Joker made of Gotham City.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, it's your friend who's coming to stay here.

name: Howard
line: Raj grew up in India. Trust me, he's seen worse.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie.

name: Howard
line: I promise I'll help out the rest of the week.

name: Bernadette
line: The rest of the week? You said it was just gonna be a night or two.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but if I told you a week, would you have said yes?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Then you left me no choice.

name: Bernadette
line: I love Raj, but that's a long time for a house guest.

name: Howard
line: I know, but they're tenting his building. He can't find a hotel he likes that allows dogs.

name: Bernadette
line: He's bringing Cinnamon?

name: Howard
line: For a whole week, the nerve of some people.

name: Sheldon
line: Here comes the Embarrassment Express. With stops at Fraudville, Wonder Blunderberg, and Kansas City. Because it's a hub.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, can I come in?

name: Sheldon
line: Do you have cookies?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. I don't deserve cookies. Come in. Wil?

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Hey, Sheldon. It's been a while.

name: Sheldon
line: Why are you here?

name: Wil
line: Amy said you were having a rough time, and I thought maybe we could talk. Is that okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Certainly. Although, right now, I'm having a rough time because there's three people in my room, and it's starting to feel like a discotheque.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you said you were unhappy getting attention for something you wished you never did.

name: Wil
line: Yeah, I know a little something about that.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, nonsense, Wil. Your endless tweets are not that bad.

name: Wil
line: I remember why it's been a while. Sheldon, I was actually talking about when I was a kid on Star Trek.

name: Sheldon
line: How could you not like getting attention for playing Wesley Crusher? You were wonderful. A know-it-all boy genius with an eidetic memory. Who couldn't relate to that?

name: Wil
line: Well, not everybody felt that way. A lot of people really hated the character, and some of them hated me because of it. I would do interviews, and people would be mean to me.

name: Sheldon
line: That just happened to me. Next time you're stuck for a tweet, feel free to say what a jerk Ira Flatow is.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, the point is Wil learned to embrace that part of his life and moved on to bigger and better things.

name: Wil
line: Yeah, I'm an author now, I do public speaking, and I have my own Web series about board games.

name: Amy
line: Uh, we're trying to cheer him up, so...

name: Wil
line: I'm just saying that there was a time when I thought I would never get out of Wesley Crusher's shadow. But now, it's just one small part of a pretty great life, and it's a part that I'm happy is there.

name: Sheldon
line: I do see what you're saying. That helps.

name: Wil
line: Good.

name: Sheldon
line: Would you two like to stay and play trains with me?

name: Wil
line: Sure.

name: Amy
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, great, now, I work the controls, I say all aboard. You sit quietly and watch.

name: Wil
line: Can I blow the whistle?

name: Sheldon
line: You should probably go.

name: Howard
line: You're gonna brush your teeth on my couch?

name: Raj
line: No, I'm gonna brush Cinnamon's teeth.

name: Howard
line: Why bother? She spends half the time licking her butt.

name: Raj
line: And the other half licking my face. That's why I'm brushing her teeth.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, guys. Sorry I'm so late. Did you already have dinner?

name: Howard
line: No, we were waiting for you.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw, that's so sweet.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. So what do you feel like making?

name: Raj
line: Howard, the poor thing just got home from work. Let me get you a glass of wine. I'll cook dinner.

name: Bermadette
line: Oh, Raj, you're our guest.

name: Raj
line: Don't be silly. Sit. You look like you've had a long day.

name: Howard
line: No, she always looks like that. Because she married an idiot.

name: Bernadette
line: Thank you, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Please, this is my way of thanking you for letting me stay here. Now, tell us all about your day.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, um, well, first, I was late to a meeting 'cause I was stuck in traffic.

name: Howard
line: Well, I keep telling you to put that traffic app on your phone.

name: Raj
line: Hey, when you got home today complaining that you felt sick from eating too many jelly beans, did I tell you how to fix it? No. I said, aw, that must hurt, and I rubbed your belly.

name: Howard
line: I thought of you the whole time.

name: Raj
line: All I'm saying is there's a time to just listen.

name: Bernadette
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: There's also a time to stop eating too many jelly beans. And it's when you're ten.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, President Siebert. Thank you for taking my call. I just wanted you to know that you can now expect enthusiastic participation from me regarding my discovery. Oh, no, no, no, no. No need to thank mNo, thank my friend, Wil Wheaton. For your information, I have nine friends, hmm? Ten if we include you. Nine it is. Ah, it's ten. I'll count Wolowitz. Hello, friend Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you're in a good mood.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm in a great mood.

name: Leonard
line: Well, you're about to be in an even better one. I didn't want to say anything until I knew for sure, but, I've been re-running the tests on your element in my lab and I disproved it. Your element does not exist.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, but what about the Chinese research team? They found it.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, it turns out someone added simulated signals to the data files. They faked the results.

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. Do you know what that means? That means all of this attention that you hate goes away.

name: Sheldon
line: So no more interviews?

name: Leonard
line: No, it's all over.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe it.

name: Leonard
line: Well, you're welcome.

name: Sheldon
line: You robbed me of my greatest achievement.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm back down to nine friends. Make it eight, I'm sick of Wolowitz, too.

name: Leonard
line: I, I don't understand. All you've done since you discovered this stupid element was complain. I was trying to make you happy.

name: Sheldon
line: By taking away my only claim to fame? Well, if you wanted to make me happy, you could have told me a joke. Or shown me a cute video of a koala and an otter becoming unlikely friends.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, there is no winning with you. And koalas and otters don't even live near each other.

name: Sheldon
line: That's what makes their friendship unlikely,

name: Penny
line: Hey, what's with all the yelling?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard disproved my element. Now all the attention is going to go away.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's great. You must be thrilled,

name: Sheldon
line: That's it, I'm down to seven friends.

name: Penny
line: He's counting hobbits and superheroes, right?

name: Sheldon
line: When I thought the element was real, I didn't want it. But now that Leonard made it not exist, I want it more than anything in the world.

name: Leonard
line: The, the element never existed. I didn't take it away, science took it away. Be mad at science.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't you dare use science against me. Science is my best friend. Oh, good, I'm back up to eight.

name: Leonard
line: Will you tell him he's out of his mind.

name: Penny
line: Actually, I get what he's saying.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes, nine. Welcome back, buddy.

name: Penny
line: It's like if you're dating someone you're not that into, and then they break up with you and then you want them more than ever.

name: Sheldon
line: I have no idea what she's talking about, but we're ganging up on you so I agree.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Sheldon, what do you want me to do, hide the information? If I don't publish it, it's just a matter of time before someone else does.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, of course you have to publish. That's your responsibility as a scientist. Doing otherwise would be unethical. You have no choice.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, I'll publish.

name: Sheldon
line: Can you believe this guy?

name: Bernadette
line: Aw! Raj did the dishes.

name: Howard
line: How do you know I didn't do them?

name: Bernadette
line: Because once, when all the knives were dirty, you cut a bagel with your keys.

name: Raj
line: Good morning, everybody. I picked up coffee while I was out. Bernadette, here's your soy peppermint mocha.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw, you didn't have to do that.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my pleasure, and don't worry about your presentation today. You're gonna be great.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, you're gonna knock it out of the park.

name: Bernadette
line: What presentation do I have today?

name: Howard
line: Just go.

name: Raj
line: He loves you.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing? Are you trying to make me look bad?

name: Raj
line: I'm just being a good house guest.

name: Howard
line: No, you're being a better husband than I am. Doing the dishes, getting coffee, knowing about her life, who does that?

name: Raj
line: Oh, come on, I brought you one, too.

name: Howard
line: I don't want coffee.

name: Raj
line: That's why I got you hot chocolate.

name: Howard
line: Give me that. Just stop showing me up.

name: Raj
line: Howard, listen to me. You're a great husband. Yes, your listening skills could use some work. But it's amazing how far you've come given that you're an only child raised by an over-protective mom.

name: Howard
line: Um, is this getting weird?

name: Raj
line: Hang on.

name: Howard
line: So, yes.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. I just wanted to let you know that I, I posted my findings.

name: Sheldon
line: I saw. And I just posted a retraction of my paper. Now the whole scientific community knows I was wrong.

name: Leonard
line: These things happen all the time, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Not to me. The only other retraction I ever had to issue was when I was seven and I conceded that my brother was the greatest ninja in East Texas. But that was just a ploy to get my face out of his armpit.

name: Barry
line: Thew he is. It's my favowite superhewo, the Wetwactor.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, don't give him a hard time.

name: Barry
line: I'm sowwy, Cooper. I wetwact it. By the way, Hofstadter, nice job dispwoving the Chinese team.

name: Leonard
line: It's not a big deal.

name: Barry
line: It's a huge deal. Cooper, maybe physics just isn't your thing. Have you ever considered a caweer in wetail? That way you could take things back for a wiving.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Barry, that's enough.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, that's okay. I can fight my own battles. Isn't that right, Bawwy.

name: Barry
line: Is? Is that a wefewence to my speech impediment? That's pwetty hurtful. I, I can't contwol it.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right, That was uncalled for. I take it back.

name: Barry
line: Of course you do. Because you're the Wetwactor.

name: Bernadette
line: Raj, this dinner was amazing. If you're here much longer, I'm gonna have to buy bigger clothes.

name: Raj
line: Nonsense. You need a little fattening up. You've been looking too skinny lately.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw. Howie, how come you never say anything sweet like that?

name: Howard
line: What are you talking about? Remember last week, when I asked you if you were wearing Spanx and you weren't? How's that different?

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe you could try being more thoughtful, like your friend Raj.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, maybe you could try being more like Raj.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, really?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, yeah. He packed me a lunch this morning. And there was a note inside that said go get 'em.

name: Bernadette
line: Like I don't do enough around here. Now I need to pack your lunch? And by the way, why do you need a note telling you to go get 'em? You're a grown man, you should know to go get 'em.

name: Howard
line: I do know to go get 'em, but sometimes it's nice to have emotional support when I'm going and getting them.

name: Raj
line: Hey, hey, do you hear yourselves? Let's just, you know, all calm down and take a step back.

name: Bernadette
line: This is stupid. Why are we fighting?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. I guess I was just feeling like I'm a lousy husband.

name: Bernadette
line: You're not a lousy husband. You're a great husband. I was the one feeling like a lousy wife.

name: Howard
line: Are you kidding? You're the best. I know what the problem is. It's him.

name: Raj
line: Oh, what did I do?

name: Howard
line: You made us feel like we're not trying hard enough.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, we were totally fine half-assing our marriage till you showed up.

name: Raj
line: Look, I'm sorry you're upset with me, but I just have to say it's nice to see the two of you on the same page.

name: Howard
line: Oh, it does feel good to have you backing me up for once.

name: Bernadette
line: I back you up all the time.

name: Howard
line: That is not... he's doing it again.

name: Bernadette
line: What is wrong with you?

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe they kicked you out.

name: Raj
line: I can't believe they're still married. Oh, no, I forgot Cinnamon's toothbrush at Howard's. I guess you're sharing with Daddy again.

name: Penny
line: Bark once if you need me to call PETA.

name: Sheldon
line: What's that animal doing in our apartment?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, relax, she's in her crate. She can't get out.

name: Sheldon
line: I have two words for you, Jurassic Park. This day just keeps getting worse and worse.

name: Penny
line: You know, if it makes you feel any better...

name: Sheldon
line: It probably won't.

name: Penny
line: You're probably right.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, it's a beautiful night. Why don't you and I go for a nice walk together?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, everything is just sex with you isn't it?

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, I think you might find the support you're looking for if you realize that relationships are a give and take. She can only be there for you as much as you are for her.

name: Amy
line: Thank you, Rajesh.

name: Raj
line: And, Amy, you need to be patient with Sheldon, instead of pressuring him to accept intimacy on your terms.

name: Amy
line: You should probably go.

name: Ira
line: I'm Ira Flatow, and this is Science Friday. I'd like to welcome back Dr. Sheldon Cooper, who thought he had discovered a new super-heavy element only to have it disproved by my next guest, Dr. Leonard Hofstadter. Welcome to Science< Friday, gentlemen.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Ira, if I may, I'd like to apologize for my behaviour last week.

name: Ira
line: It's all right.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, isn't there something you'd like to say to me?

name: Ira
line: No. Now, Dr. Hofstadter. Can you walk us through the process you used to disprove his theory?

name: Leonard
line: Well...

name: Sheldon
line: I believe I can answer that.

name: Leonard
line: He asked me.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine.

name: Leonard
line: As I was saying...

name: Sheldon
line: You're telling it wrong. Ira, to really understand the story here, you have to start at the very beginning. A small town in East Texas, where a young genius named...

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: That's right, Sheldon Cooper. He was bitten by his neighbour's dog, leading to his first scientific breakthrough, the doggie death-ray. Which, sadly, he couldn't build because Santa wouldn't bring him enriched uranium.

name: Ira
line: You know, I'd really like to hear it from Dr. Hofstadter, if it's okay with you.

name: Sheldon
line: What a surprise. Did you invite me back just so you could ignore me?

name: Ira
line: Actually, I didn't invite you. You came in, you took a seat, and I'm not comfortable with confrontation.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, this interview is supposed to be about me.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that seems like a snooze. Even for public radio.

name: Penny
line: You know, if we did a shot every time they said something embarrassing, this would be one hell of a drinking game.

name: Amy
line: A little early for alcohol, isn't it?

name: Sheldon
line: You know, I don't just say smart things about science. I also yodel.

name: Amy
line: I'll get the vodka.

name: Penny
line: Wow, you're really good at this.

name: Amy
line: Well, I have an extremely low centre of gravity. I'm like a pyramid.

name: Penny
line: How you doing over there?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I hope it's just a sprain. I cannot walk into that E.R. with another video game injury.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Sheldon, you want to play next?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I would, but I'm on my way out.

name: Leonard
line: Where?

name: Sheldon
line: Texas.

name: Amy
line: Right now? Why?

name: Leonard
line: Is someone sick?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. My sister's uterus came down with a baby.

name: Penny
line: Oh, she's pregnant? That's great. You're gone an uncle. Uncle Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I will be Uncle Dr. Cooper.

name: Amy
line: How come you never said she was pregnant?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I never told you about my brother's kidney stone. You want to hear about everything that comes out of my family's genitals?

name: Leonard
line: Well, congrats, and it's nice you're gonna be there for your sister.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I'm filling in for her husband who's recovering from a horrible motorcycle accident. Lucky duck.

name: Penny
line: Wow, so, how long will you be gone?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, she's due tomorrow. Although it did take her six years to finish high school, so who knows?

name: Amy
line: Can I give you a ride to the airport?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, thank you, I don't want to be an inconvenience. Chop-chop, Leonard. We leave in ten minutes.

name: Leonard
line: All right, here's the deal. Sheldon is gone, so the tree decorating rules are out the window.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, which means we don't have to use his ridiculous ornament-spacing template.

name: Leonard
line: And I'm happy to report its kickstarter campaign is holding strong at zero dollars.

name: Penny
line: Ah.

name: Raj
line: Wait, so Star Wars and Star Trek characters can go on the same branch?

name: Leonard
line: I know, it's crazy. Welcome to the Thunderdome, people.

name: Howard
line: I've never done this before. It's kind of fun.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, if your mom could see her little Bar Mitzvah boy right now, she'd have a heart attack.

name: Bernadette
line: Good idea, I'll take a picture.

name: Penny
line: Honey, I'm a little strapped for cash this year, so for Christmas I was thinking of giving you this.

name: Leonard
line: I love it.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

line: But it is what you got me last year.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

line: And last night.

line: Hello.

line: Hey, Hi, Stuart. etc

line: Oh, good, I'm glad you guys didn't wait for me to start. Although you said seven and it's, it's seven, but that's fine.

line: Oh, it's probably Sheldon. Hi, Sheldon. Everybody's here, say hi.

line: Hi.

line: That's so thoughtful. You guys are the best.

line: Hey, how's your sister?

line: <i>She went into labor an hour ago.

line: That's wonderful. So you're at the hospital?

line: No, she chose to have a home birth because she wants to live in the Stone Age and a cave wasn't available.

line: You know, many people believe that home births are better because the mother is in a warm, comfortable environment where she can be nurtured by loved ones.

line: But then he gets to see what the world would be like if he'd never been born.

line: Hey, you ever imagine what that would be like? Not being born?

name: Leonard
line: What do you think?  What do you think?  What do you think?

line: You make jokes about Sheldon, but if it weren't for him, I don't think any of us would be sitting in this room right now.

line: Really? Sheldon not being here is the main reason I'm in this room.

line: I'm gonna squirt chocolate milk out of my nipples. Sorry, I thought we're saying things that are never gonna happen.

line: Come on, I would not have peed my pants.

line: She nailed it.

line: But, you forget, I did ask you out in real life.

name: Amy
line: Which couldn't have happened if you didn't live across the hall from her, which couldn't have happened without Sheldon. Same goes with you guys. If Leonard wasn't with Penny, she never would have set you up.

name: Howard
line: Doesn't matter. Bernadette still would've been working at The Cheesecake Factory, and I still would've been working this beefcake factory. You would've been all over me.

line: Well...

line: Mm-hmm, chug-a-chug-a, yum, yum.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Hang on. You got a, you got a little something. Ah.

line: Never mind.

line: Oh, man, that is so us.

line: Doesn't matter. This is no way to make new humans. People coming out of people. It's some kind of dirty magic show.

line: Sheldon Lee Cooper. You get back in this room right now. And bring a mop.

line: Did you hear that? A mop. I have two PhDs yet somehow I'm the janitor of my sister's birth canal.

line: Hey, Sheldon sent us all an e-mail. Happy holidays from Texas. And there's pictures. Aah! Don't open them. Do not open them.

line: You know, I was thinking. Without Sheldon, most of us would have never met, but Penny would still live across from him.

line: Hello.

line: Of course I'm doing laundry. Saturday night is laundry night, and I'm in a laundry room, so, I believe your inference is justified.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my inference is justified. Sheldon, you are so funny. Anyway, I need to do my laundry, too, because these clothes are so dirty. Almost as dirty as the dirty girl who's wearing them.

line: Disagree.

line: Yeah, I was wrong. But I do think you and I would have had a great time.

line: Hang on. Why would I be fat?

name: Raj
line: You'd have no girlfriend to see you naked, you'd try to fill the void with food, and I'm an enabler who once deep-fried a pancake.

line: Why can't you be fat, too?

line: I don't know.

line: That's it. The baby's here. It's a boy.

line: Aw.

line: Yay.

line: Congrats.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, thank you. I wasn't sure I was gonna to make it. But my mother gave me some ice chips, my sister told me to breathe, and I just thought to myself, Sheldon, if you can make it through the Green Lantern movie, you can make it through this.

name: Leonard
line: Well, good for you, buddy. We'll let you get back in there.

line: Oh no, no, I'm not going back in there. That baby is so irritating. He has literally been crying his entire life.

line: Ugh, all right, I'll go. But from what I've seen, his attention span is as limited as his bladder control.

line: You actually got him to do it.

line: Yeah, you keep saying how much Sheldon has affected all of us, but you've clearly had an impact on him.

line: If that were true, I wouldn't still be living alone. Well, not exactly alone. I do have a 50 pound sack of rice with one of Sheldon's T-shirts on it.

name: Leonard
line: I'm telling you, Sheldon cares for you more than you think.

name: Amy
line: I wish I could believe you. I also wish there wasn't a mouse living in Rice Sheldon.

line: Hang on, I'm gonna give you a little early Christmas present. I'm gonna show you something, but if you ever told Sheldon he'd probably never speak to me again. So, if you want to tell him, that's fine. Look.

line: I don't understand.

line: I did.

line: Looking into the blank, innocent eyes of a creature that couldn't begin to comprehend anything I was saying? Basically just another day at the office.

line: I'm gonna do it. I'm gonna ask her out.

line: And chocolate milk is gonna squirt out of my nipples.

line: I'm sorry, I have a boyfriend. In fact, there he is now. Ready to go, sweetheart?

line: This is nice, that we all get to eat together.

line: What? That's great. Guys.

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah

line: Yay, Penny.

name: Penny
line: Um, NC... II... or, you know, NCSTD... I don't know, it's, it's, you know, it's the one with the letters and I'm gonna be on it!

line: That's amazing.

line: Yeah.

line: Um, I play a customer in a diner and I flirt with Mark Harmon.

line: So it, it's just flirting?

line: Uh, no reason. I just think it's sexier when things are left to the imagination.

name: Raj
line: So I read a study that says a man with a dog is three times more likely to get a woman's phone number.

name: Leonard
line: Is it true even when the man lets his dog lick peanut butter off his tongue?

name: Howard
line: If you're really desperate to meet women and like having food eaten out of your mouth, I could set you up with my mom.

name: Sheldon
line: Why is that funny? That's just unhygienic.

name: Leonard
line: It's a joke.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think so. I believe that a joke is a brief oral narrative with a climactic humorous twist. For example, uh, Wolowitz's mother is so fat that she decided to go on a diet, or exercise, or both. See? The twist is that people don't usually change. Well, they don't.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys, don't forget, my episode's on TV tomorrow night.

name: Howard
line: We'll be there.

name: Raj
line: Can we bring anything?

line: Oh, that's so sweet of you, but I was gonna steal food from here. You know, my treat.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, if Howard's mother is coming, then you should also steal marbles. Because she's obese, and hippos are obese, and in the popular board game Hungry Hungry Hippos, they eat marbles. Maybe I need to dumb these down for you.

line: Leonard, do you think I'm funny?

line: No. Do you?

name: Sheldon
line: I think I'm hysterical.

name: Leonard
line: I take it back. That was funny.

name: Sheldon
line: The philosopher Henri Bergson says it's funny when a human being behaves like an object.

line: Oh, he didn't perform stand-up comedy, he was a philosopher.

name: Leonard
line: You know, I think we're zeroing in on your problem.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps I'll spend some time developing a unified theory of comedy, which will allow me to elicit laughter from anyone at any time. Unless they're German, 'cause that's a tough crowd.

line: Are you set on people laughing with you? ‘Cause if you're cool with at you...

name: Sheldon
line: I don't get it.

line: Raj, when you said you were gonna bring a date to watch Penny's thing tonight, I didn't think you meant Stuart.

line: Really? I never for a second thought it'd be anything else.

line: I almost met someone last night, but I blew it. I was walking Cinnamon and this girl introduced herself, but she was so cute I panicked and said, wouldn't it be easier if instead of talking we could just sniff each other's butts?

line: Well, Stuart's cute in his own way.
