name: Stuart
line: Not at all.

name: Howard
line: If you're so intimidated by talking to attractive girls, maybe you should practice by talking to regular people.

name: Raj
line: You mean like fatties and uggos?

name: Bernadette
line: Or maybe just stop talking.

name: Howard
line: I'm serious. Go to the mall, talk to anybody, practice, that way when you eventually do talk to a cute girl, it won't be so scary.

name: Bernadette
line: Or just keep dating the possum.

name: Voice on television
line: Parsa doesn't have those kind of resources.

name: Second voice
line: No, and that's why he had Erin Pace rewire it...

name: Leonard
line: I'm so proud of you.

name: Penny
line: We haven't even gotten to my scene yet.

name: Leonard
line: I know, but you're going to be a TV star and you haven't left me yet. That takes guts.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know about you, but I'm very uncomfortable with all this.

name: Amy
line: Why?

name: Sheldon
line: I've never seen this show before and now I'm starting with episode 246? It's unnatural.

name: Amy
line: Just think of the first 245 as the prequel.

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Penny
line: Okay, shh, guys, guys, this is it.

name: Man on TV
line: I guess it's you and me, kid.

name: Mark Harmon on TV
line: What are you doing?

name: Woman on TV
line: I'm trying to make peace.

name: Mark Harmon on TV
line: We're good.

name: Woman on TV
line: Good.

name: Mark Harmon on TV
line: Really? Because...

name: Penny
line: Are you kidding me?

name: Leonard
line: What's wrong?

name: Penny
line: Well, the diner scene. Where's my diner scene?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, don't ask me. Until I see the prequel, I'm lost.

name: Penny
line: No, there was supposed to be a big scene with me and Mark Harmon, but it's gone.

name: Bernadette
line: What happened?

name: Penny
line: They must've cut it.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Penny, I'm, I'm sorry.

name: Howard
line: That stinks.

name: Raj
line: I'm sure you were great.

name: Penny
line: This doesn't make any sense. I mean, I, I thought I did a, a really good job, I... Excuse me.

name: Sheldon
line: I've been studying how to make people laugh. They say that comedy is tragedy plus time. Let's tickle some ribs.

name: Penny
line: No, Dad, I don't think they cut me out of the show because I was too pretty. No, I don't need you to come out and kick Mark Harmon's ass. Daddy, I gotta go. I love you. Bye.

name: Leonard
line: How you doing?

name: Penny
line: Ugh, this is such a disaster. My parents had all my relatives over. They got one of those six-foot sandwiches, and got my brother a day pass out of rehab and now he's missing and the sandwich is missing, and they're probably in Mexico by now. So humiliating.

name: Leonard
line: You still got the part. That's a huge accomplishment.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but this was supposed to be my break, okay? People were gonna see me in this show and it was gonna lead to bigger things. More auditions, more parts. Now none of that's gonna happen.

name: Leonard
line: Honey, you only had, like, three lines. That wasn't gonna happen anyway.

name: Penny
line: Unbelievable.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on, no, that's not what I meant.

name: Penny
line: Then what did you mean?

name: Leonard
line: I don't, look, you know, words don't always have to mean things.

name: Penny
line: I think you meant that you don't believe in me.

name: Leonard
line: Nope. Uh, uh, I might not know what I meant, but I know that I didn't mean that. Not this guy. Oh, no way.

name: Penny
line: I want you, right now, to give me your 100% honest opinion.

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Penny
line: Do you think I have what it takes to really make it as an actress?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: So you think I'll be on TV and in movies and win awards.

name: Leonard
line: Honestly?

name: Penny
line: Yes, honestly.

name: Leonard
line: I don't.

name: Penny
line: How could you say that?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, I got all confused when you said honestly.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: Look, do I think that you are talented and that you are beautiful? Of course I do. But isn't Los Angeles full of actresses who are just as talented, just as beautiful? All right, look, we'll come back to that.

name: Penny
line: No, please. Don't stop, go on. Tell me how I'm gonna be a waitress for the rest of my life.

name: Leonard
line: That is not what I said. Look, I think you're really good. I truly do. But this is an incredibly hard thing that you're shooting for. I mean, the odds of anyone becoming a successful actor are like a million to one.

name: Penny
line: Wow, thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Should've let Sheldon come.

name: Sheldon
line: This is interesting. Apparently, a key component in some forms of humour is the element of surprise.

name: Amy
line: Well, that makes sense. The prefrontal cortex is responsible for planning and anticipation, and patients with brain lesions on their...

name: Sheldon
line: BRAIN LESIONS!

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you scared me. That wasn't funny.

name: Sheldon
line: Or maybe you have a stick up your prefrontal cortex.

name: Amy
line: Okay, the notion that you can read a few books and come up with a definitive theory of comedy is absurd. I mean, humour is a complex neurological...  Okay, that's pretty good.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent.

name: Stuart
line: How about her?

name: Raj
line: No. No pretty girls. The point is to talk to regular people and work our way up to pretty girls.

name: Stuart
line: Fine. How about that old lady with the walker?

name: Raj
line: That depends. On any level, do you think she's hot?

name: Stuart
line: We'll find somebody else.

name: Sheldon
line: Kumquat?

name: Amy
line: I guess.

name: Sheldon
line: Ointment?

name: Amy
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, would you say ointment is more, equal to, or less funny than kumquat?

name: Amy
line: I don't think I want to go out with you anymore.

name: Sheldon
line: Will you please stop joking around? I'm trying to figure this out.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, how many words are you gonna go through?

name: Sheldon
line: All of them.

name: Penny
line: You didn't get your part cut.

name: Voice on TV
line: All right, baby, here's the deal.

name: Penny
line: And you didn't get your part cut. Yep, bunch of old guys rocking out in a band, all with erectile dysfunction, you didn't get your part cut!

name: Leonard
line: Hey. Can we talk?

name: Penny
line: We can, but the part of Penny might get cut.

name: Leonard
line: That was really crappy of me. What you're trying to do is hard, but people do make it, and I really do believe you could be one of them.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: And to show you how much I believe in you, I kind of got you an audition.

name: Penny
line: Are you serious? For what?

name: Leonard
line: The new Star Wars movie.

name: Penny
line: What? How did you manage that?

name: Leonard
line: There's this thing online, you put yourself on tape and just send it in, anyone can do it.

name: Penny
line: Come on Leonard, this is just a PR stunt.

name: Leonard
line: So? Even if it is, you have a huge advantage because you're an actual actress. Most of the people doing this are just weirdoes and nerds. Wolowitz sent his in two days ago.

name: Penny
line: Really, let it go.

name: Leonard
line: Look, maybe it is a long shot, but sometimes long shots happen. Luke Skywalker was only given one chance to destroy the Death Star. He had to get a torpedo into an exhaust port that was only two meters wide, but with the help of The Force, he... wow, I can feel you hating me right now.

name: Stuart
line: How about that lady in the sweat suit, speed-walking?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, she seems friendly and easy to... never mind, she's gone. You know, maybe talking to people is too hard.

name: Stuart
line: We could go over to that department store, practice on the mannequins.

name: Raj
line: I don't know. They're dressed very stylishly. They're probably stuck-up. This is ridiculous. The next person that walks by, no matter who it is, they're the one. We're gonna die here.

name: Amy
line: Hello.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: Where's Sheldon?

name: Amy
line: He's home trying to use science to determine the basis of humour.

name: Bernadette
line: That's interesting.

name: Amy
line: It's exhausting. Do you have any idea how hard it is to laugh at a knock-knock joke that starts with knock-knock-knock, Amy, knock-knock-knock, Amy, knock-knock-knock, Amy?

name: Bernadette
line: If you want him to stop, sometimes the easiest thing to do is just fake a laugh.

name: Howard
line: Fake a laugh? Do you ever do that with me?

name: Bernadette
line: No, of course not.

name: Howard
line: Well, I'd be able to tell anyway.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't think you would.

name: Howard
line: Please, I've made plenty of girls laugh, sometimes just by asking them out.  Yeah? Well, I fake my orgasms.

name: Leonard
line: Yes, how much for a hundred long-stemmed red roses? Really? How much for three?

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'll call you back.

name: Penny
line: Look, I know you were just trying to help with your Star Wars thing. I didn't mean to call it idiotic.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I don't think you called it idiotic.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Sorry, I meant to. Anyway, um, I was just upset with myself. I wasn't mad at you. I just feel like everything is falling apart.

name: Leonard
line: Come on. It's okay.

name: Penny
line: No, it's not okay. Look at me, okay? I took a temp job as a waitress forever ago, and I'm still doing it. I can't quit, because guess what? I can't do anything else. And I finally get my big break, and it goes away. I'm such a mess.

name: Leonard
line: No, you're not.

name: Penny
line: Really? ‘Cause this morning at Starbucks, a pair of old underwear fell out of my pant leg. And it wasn't the only one in there.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, listen to me, this is just a minor setback.

name: Penny
line: No, it's not, okay? I've been out here for, like, ten years. I've nothing to show for it.

name: Leonard
line: Well, you have me.

name: Penny
line: You're right. I do have you. Mm. Let's get married.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Ooh. Leonard Hofstadter, will you marry me?

name: Leonard
line: Um...

name: Penny
line: Did you seriously just say um?

name: Leonard
line: Look, you know I love you but, but you're, you're drunk and sad and feeling lost.

name: Penny
line: Okay, so, so you don't want to marry me?

name: Leonard
line: That is not what I said.

name: Penny
line: No, forget it. I take it back. Offer's off the table.

name: Sheldon
line: Who's in the mood to laugh?

name: Leonard
line: Really not a good time.

name: Sheldon
line: But I used science to construct the perfect joke.

name: Penny
line: I'm gonna go.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, don't.

name: Penny
line: No, no, I just need to be alone.

name: Sheldon
line: So, a sandwich, a rabbi and yo mama walk into a bar. Where are you going?

name: Leonard
line: To my room.

name: Sheldon
line: Should I follow you?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, wait.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I forgot to tell you the sandwich is promiscuous.

name: Stuart
line: How about those guys on that bench over there? They look pathetic. I bet we could talk to them.

name: Raj
line: That's a mirror.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Security Guard
line: Hey, fellas, mall's closing.

name: Raj
line: Sorry.

name: Security Guard
line: Yeah. Good night.

name: Raj
line: Uh, excuse me.

name: Security Guard
line: Yeah?

name: Raj
line: Uh, do, do you like being a mall security guard?

name: Security Guard
line: It's all right.

name: Raj
line: Okay, nice talking to you.

name: Stuart
line: Smooth.

name: Sheldon
line: Can't sleep?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Would you like to talk about it?

name: Leonard
line: Penny proposed, and I didn't say yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: That's a good question.

name: Sheldon
line: Does that mean the relationship is over?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: Why don't you ask her?

name: Leonard
line: Because I'm afraid to know the answer.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm sorry.

name: Leonard
line: That's it? You're not gonna make some dumb joke or some inappropriate comment?

name: Sheldon
line: No. You're my friend, and, I'm sorry.

name: Leonard
line: Did you just put a kick me sign on my back?

name: Sheldon
line: No. That wouldn't be funny at all.

name: Howard
line: Star Wars audition, take one, starring Howard Joel Wolowitz, real-life astronaut. Vader is here, now, on this moon. I felt his presence. He's come for me. He can feel when I'm near...

name: Bernadette
line: How many times do I have to tell you to replace the toilet paper when it's empty?

name: Howard
line: I'm in the middle of something.

name: Bernadette
line: So am I.

name: Sheldon
line: It's an outrage.

name: Leonard
line: I know.

name: Sheldon
line: The university, they think they can do whatever they want. We just have to sit there and take it.

name: Leonard
line: You need to let it go, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You work tirelessly for someone, and this is what you get.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my God, they're just making you use your vacation days.

name: Sheldon
line: But I don't want a vacation.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, listen, I don't mean to diminish what you're going through, but I'm a little distracted right now.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, this again? So, Penny proposed, you didn't say yes, and now you think you may have lost her love forever. How does this compare to me being forced to relax for a few days?

name: Leonard
line: It doesn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: I'm gonna go talk to Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm going to go inside, put on my coziest pajamas, curl up with a good book and wait for this nightmare to be over.  Penny. Sorry.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Look, I'm sorry I didn't text you back. I just needed some time to think.

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Come in.

name: Leonard
line: Look, if you want to break up, just say it.

name: Penny
line: Leonard...

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, no. I take it back. Don't say it. Just, just hate me, but stay with me. It worked for my parents.

name: Penny
line: Listen, I don't want to break up with you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Oh, okay. Good, good. So, it's cool if I cry a little?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I probably wouldn't.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Look, you did the right thing last night. I was a mess. I was just frustrated because my career is going nowhere.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I get it, and I want you to know that I support whatever you want to do.

name: Penny
line: Great, because I've been thinking, if I really want this acting thing to work, I need to focus all my energy on it. And to do that, I should quit waitressing at The Cheesecake Factory.

name: Leonard
line: Wow. That, that's a big step.

name: Penny
line: I know.

name: Leonard
line: So, well, before making any rash...

name: Penny
line: I already quit.

name: Leonard
line: And I support you.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on, take me to work with you.

name: Leonard
line: No. You're on vacation.

name: Sheldon
line: Please. What if there's a big breakthrough in science today and I'm not there to see it?

name: Leonard
line: Do you really think there's gonna be a breakthrough without you there to do it?

name: Sheldon
line: No. I was just tricking you.

name: Leonard
line: Bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, wait. Take me with you.

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Please.

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Too bad. I'm coming with you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Sheldon, stay.

name: Sheldon
line: But.

name: Leonard
line: I said stay. I'm going to work. Do not follow me.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Hey.

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry. Did I startle you?

name: Stuart
line: Yes, but at this point, pretty much any customer does. What can I do for you?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, I need a little help. I accidentally destroyed one of Howard's comic books this morning, and was hoping I could replace it.

name: Stuart
line: Wow. What happened?

name: Bernadette
line: Batman got his ass kicked by my curling iron.

name: Stuart
line: Well, don't let The Riddler know that. It's a comic book joke. Or maybe it's not.

name: Bernadette
line: Do you have this one?

name: Stuart
line: Uh, well, it's, it's pretty rare. Can you give me a few days to track it down?

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh, I was kind of hoping to get it before Howie comes home from work.

name: Stuart
line: Oh. What's the hurry?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, he's always saying I should be more careful with my curling iron, and it seems like a dangerous precedent to let him think he can be right.

name: Stuart
line: Well, I'll do what I can, but I can't make any promises.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, I do work at a pharmaceutical company. If you can make this happen today, I can hook you up with anxiety medication, antidepressants.

name: Stuart
line: Really? Do you have any of these?

name: Amy
line: Hello, Mr. Rat Brain. Not so bitey without the rest of the rat to back us up now, are we?

name: Howard
line: Anybody home?

name: Amy
line: Hey, what brings you guys here?

name: Raj
line: Well, we were just on our way to lunch and wanted to see if you'd like to join.

name: Amy
line: Why? Because Sheldon's not here this week, and you don't think I have any other options? I'm just kidding. I'll get my purse.

name: Bert
line: Hi, Amy. I, oh, I'm sorry. I didn't know you had any company.

name: Amy
line: That's okay. Uh, Bert, this is Howard and Rajesh. Guys, this is Bert.

name: Howard
line: Hi.

name: Raj
line: Hey. Good to see you.

name: Bert
line: Anyway, I wanted to show you this tourmalinated quartzthat we got in the lab.

name: Amy
line: This is so pretty. Bert works for the geology department.

name: Bert
line: Yeah. You know what, uh, geologists and Bon Jovi have in common?

name: Howard
line: You're both into rock?

name: Bert
line: Yeah. Well, see ya.

name: Amy
line: Oh, you forgot your quartz.

name: Bert
line: Oh, it's okay. I want you to have it. Bye.

name: Amy
line: He's nice.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, he's nice because he likes you.

name: Amy
line: What?! No, he doesn't.

name: Raj
line: He brought you a pretty rock.

name: Amy
line: So? He does that every day. Oh.

name: Howard
line: You know, if you'd rather skip lunch and hang out with your boyfriend Bert, it's totally okay.

name: Amy
line: He's not my boyfriend.

name: Raj
line: Are you sure? He's tall, pale and awkward. That sounds like your type.

name: Amy
line: Should someone as lonely as you really be making fun of me?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, grow up, Howard. God.

name: Amy
line: What do I do? I don't want to hurt his feelings.

name: Howard
line: Maybe the problem is he thinks you're available. Does he know you're dating Sheldon?

name: Amy
line: I guess it hasn't come up.

name: Howard
line: There you go.

name: Raj
line: And does Sheldon know you're dating Sheldon?

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry. Who are you dating?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, knock it off, Howard.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Hey, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: You okay?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm on vacation. What do you think?

name: Penny
line: Why are you sitting in the stairwell?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard told me to stay.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Well, good boy.

name: Sheldon
line: Where are you going?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I have a ton of errands to run. I need to make copies of my headshot, send them off to agents and sign up for a new acting class.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, have fun.

name: Penny
line: Okay. You want to come with me?

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Come on, boy. Come on. Let's go. Let's go. Get in the car. Come on.

name: Stuart
line: All right, thanks a lot. They have one at Capital Comics.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, that's great.

name: Stuart
line: No, it's not. I hate that place. Guy who owns it is a jerk. He's always making me feel bad about myself.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, that's terrible. What's the address?

name: Stuart
line: You know, why don't I just take you there? That way, I can make sure he doesn't rip you off.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, thanks, but I don'twant you to close up. I mean, won't you lose business? Sorry. That was mean.

name: Amy
line: Penny really quit The Cheesecake Factory?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: So, what is she doing today?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. She already thinks I don't support this, so if I call, it might look like I'm checking up on her.

name: Raj
line: Well, do you support this?

name: Leonard
line: Of course I do. She's a great actress. I'm proud she's taking this risk.

name: Amy
line: That's nice.

name: Leonard
line: You bought that? Great. I got to call her before I forget how I said it. Hey.

name: Penny
line: Hi. What's up?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, how's it going? You taking Hollywood by storm?

name: Penny
line: Actually, I'm at The Cheesecake Factory.

name: Leonard
line: You got your job back. That is great news. I didn't want to say anything, but you are making the right choice. To plunge yourself into debt right now would be literally insane.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. I'm just returning my uniform.

name: Leonard
line: And I support you.

name: Voice
line: Before we begin your guided meditation, close your eyes and picture yourself in a peaceful environment.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. I'm inside the CERN super collider.

name: Voice
line: Now, take a deep, relaxing breath in through your nose. And let it out.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow. Didn't see that coming.

name: Voice
line: In.

name: Sheldon
line: Let me guess.

name: Voice
line: And out.

name: Sheldon
line: What was I gonna do? Two ins in a row? Where's my lemonade?

name: Penny
line: I didn't get it.

name: Sheldon
line: A fitting swan song to your career as a waitress, to forget my order one last time.

name: Penny
line: Do you think quitting my job was a mistake?

name: Sheldon
line: Do you see me drinking lemonade?

name: Penny
line: No. I'm serious.

name: Sheldon
line: Why do you ask?

name: Penny
line: Because Leonard just pissed me off. Am I being an idiot or not?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I don't think you are.

name: Penny
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: The best way to achieve a goal is to devote 100% of your time and energy to it. When I decided I was going to be a physicist, I didn't take some other job in case it didn't work out. Which wasn't easy because there was a lot of pressure from Ms. Pearson for me to be chalk monitor that year.

name: Penny
line: Thank you. I needed to hear that. Why can't Leonard understand it?

name: Sheldon
line: Because he's not like us, Penny. We're dreamers.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I need to start cracking the window when I leave you in the car.

name: Bert
line: Hey.

name: Amy
line: Hello, Bert.

name: Bert
line: So, anyway, there's this big, uh, rock and mineral show next week in Santa Monica.

name: Amy
line: Listen, um, Bert, before you say anything else, I, I have a boyfriend.

name: Bert
line: Oh. This is awkward. You thought I was gonna ask you to go with me to the mineral show.

name: Amy
line: Weren't you?

name: Bert
line: Yeah.

name: Amy
line: That's very nice of you, but I do have a boyfriend.

name: Bert
line: That's what you all say. You just don't want to go out with me because I have an off-putting personality.

name: Amy
line: No, that's not true. My boyfriend has an off-putting personality, too. Like, way worse than you.

name: Bert
line: Don't worry. I'm used to it. I mean, I'm big and weird and funny-looking and no one ever wants to do anything with me.

name: Amy
line: Don't say that.

name: Bert
line: It's okay. I know I'm a monster.

name: Amy
line: No, Bert, come on. I'd love to go to the mineral show with you.

name: Bert
line: Sweet. It's a date.

name: Amy
line: No, it's not.

name: Bert
line: Too late.

name: Bernadette
line: Wow.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah. Haven't seen this many people in my store since that Korean church bus crashed through my front window.

name: Jesse
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Jesse.

name: Jesse
line: Haven't seen you in forever. Look how grey you've gotten.

name: Stuart
line: My hair's exactly the same colour as always.

name: Jesse
line: No, I was talking about your skin.

name: Stuart
line: Look, uh, my friend here needs a comic book.

name: Jesse
line: Ooh, and she went into your store by mistake. Good thing there was no one there to see you. What do you need? Oh, yeah, yeah. I got this. Right over here.

name: Stuart
line: Even you, Sweatpants?

name: Sweatpants
line: Free popcorn.

name: Jesse
line: Can I offer you a coffee? Espresso? Latte?

name: Bernadette
line: No, thanks.

name: Jesse
line: How about you, Stu? Mocha? Scone? Directions to the nearest soup kitchen?

name: Bernadette
line: Hey.

name: Jesse
line: I'm just kidding. He knows where the soup kitchen is.

name: Stuart
line: It's on Merton Avenue.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't think I like the way you're treating my friend.

name: Jesse
line: Sorry. You want the book or not?

name: Bernadette
line: Not from you. Let's go, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: You know something, Jesse? You may have a successful business and the kind of pink complexion that comes with good nutrition, but I have something more important.

name: Jesse
line: What's that?

name: Stuart
line: Friendship. Which I would trade in a heartbeat for all of this.

name: Howard
line: The mineral and rock show? That would be awful even without Bert.

name: Amy
line: So what am I supposed to do now?

name: Raj
line: Prepare your uterus for his gigantic offspring?

name: Amy
line: This isn't funny. I'm gonna have to tell him the truth, that even if I didn't have a boyfriend, I wouldn't be interested in him.

name: Howard
line: Oh, I've heard those words so many times. From Linda Nosenchuck, Tammy Rosenworcel.

name: Raj
line: Padma Kapur, Neha Chowdury.

name: Howard
line: Marci Grossman, Lisa Mazzarino.

name: Raj
line: Megan Pincus.

name: Howard
line: Tammy Cho.

name: Raj
line: Oh, who was that girl from our Starbucks?

name: Howard
line: Arlene Russel.

name: Raj
line: Yes. Arlene. She wrote no way on both our cappuccinos.

name: Howard
line: Poor Bert. That guy's got a rough afternoon ahead of him.

name: Amy
line: Well, how would you want a girl to tell you she wasn't interested?

name: Raj
line: I guess, uh, I'd like her to sit me down, look me in the eye and say, I was wrong. I love you. And then maybe she could touch me in a special way.

name: Howard
line: That's how you reject a guy.

name: Amy
line: Okay, I don't have time for this. I'm just gonna go find him and be brutally honest.

name: Howard
line: No, don't.

name: Raj
line: He'll be so upset. He'll probably climb up the Empire State Building and start swatting at planes.

name: Howard
line: You want us to talk to him?

name: Amy
line: Really? You would do that?

name: Raj
line: Sure. We've both been in his shoes. We'll let him down with compassion and respect.

name: Amy
line: Thank you.

name: Howard
line: Let's go.

name: Raj
line: So we tell him she's a lesbian, right?

name: Howard
line: Of course we tell him she's a lesbian.

name: Penny
line: And hold three, two, one. Very good. Now let's try Warrior 2. And hold.

name: Sheldon
line: I've read that there are great yogis who have such mastery over their bodies they can draw water in through their genitals.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, I don't think we're gonna get to do that today.

name: Sheldon
line: Too bad. It seems like a good way to drink a milk shake without getting brain freeze.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey.

name: Penny
line: And now we go to Reverse Warrior.

name: Leonard
line: How did she get you to do yoga?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, to be honest, I thought she said Yoda.

name: Penny
line: I'm helping him relax because, unlike you, he supports me.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, how many times do I have to say it? I support you.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, take a break.

name: Sheldon
line: Namaste.

name: Penny
line: Okay, if you support me, what was with that phone call?

name: Leonard
line: Fine. I'm not sure you should have quit. But if you care so much what I think, why didn't you ask me before you did it?

name: Penny
line: Oh, so now I need your permission? Would you have asked me before you quit your job?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. I thought we were in the kind of relationship where we make decisions together. If I'm wrong, then maybe we need to talk about the kind of relationship we're actually in.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, maybe we do.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm willing to if you guys are.

name: Leonard
line: Can we please have some privacy?

name: Sheldon
line: Y, No. I'm as much a part of this relationship as you two, and I think it's high time we put all our cards on the table. For example, where is this going? Are you two ever getting married? And, if so, where will we all live? Have you thought about that?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Okay, wait. What are we doing?

name: Leonard
line: For some reason, we're planning a future where we both live with Sheldon forever.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Now we're getting somewhere.

name: Penny
line: Look, I know you think I'm being reckless, and you might be right, but I need to take this shot.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, no kidding. Despite what it says on her résumé, she is no longer 22.

name: Leonard
line: I swear, I am on your side.

name: Penny
line: You keep saying you're on my side, but you don't act like it.

name: Sheldon
line: He does that to me, too. Why do we put up with it?

name: Leonard
line: Listen, I could never do what you're doing, okay? I would be terrified.

name: Penny
line: Well, it's scary for me, too.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm fine with it.

name: Leonard
line: My point is, just because I couldn't do it doesn't mean you shouldn't. And I'm proud of you.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, to celebrate this reconciliation, let's all share a milk shake. Uh, Penny, you'll need a straw.

name: Jesse
line: You're back.

name: Bernadette
line: Yes, I am, there's a few more things I want to say to you. Stuart's store is just fine, and he's a much nicer person than you are, and if you still have that comic, I'd like to buy it right now.

name: Jesse
line: No problem. Oh, you want a latte while you wait?

name: Bernadette
line: No, I don't want a latte. I want a cappuccino and a blueberry scone.

name: Jesse
line: I only have chocolate chip.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, that sounds even better.

name: Bert
line: Thanks for coming to the mineral and rock show with me.

name: Raj
line: We're sorry Amy didn't want to go.

name: Howard
line: Really, really sorry.

name: Bert
line: Eh. Who needs her when I have you guys? Rock show! Rock show! Rock show! Rock show! Rock show! Rock show! Rock sho-o-o-o-o-ow!

name: Howard
line: T-minus 60 seconds.

name: Raj
line: Oh, it all comes down to this.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I've got butterflies.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't get soft on me, Hofstadter. I will slap those glasses right off your face.

name: Penny
line: What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Hey. We're about to buy tickets for Comic-Con.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Howard
line: T Minus 45 seconds.

name: Leonard
line: They sell out incredibly fast, but as long as one of us gets in, we can buy passes...

name: Sheldon
line: Good Lord, this is not the time for flirting, keep it in your pants.

name: Penny
line: This is a whole lot of weird before coffee.

name: Howard
line: T-minus 30 seconds.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I have to go to the bathroom so bad.

name: Sheldon
line: Every year. I told you, wear a diaper.

name: Raj
line: And I told you I get diaper rash.

name: Howard
line: 15 seconds.

name: Leonard
line: Well, this is it, this is it. This is it.

name: Howard
line: Five, four, three, two, one.

name: Sheldon
line: It's live. Go, go, go, go, go.

name: Raj
line: Anyone in?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Not yet.

name: Howard
line: Nope.

name: Sheldon
line: Do not stop refreshing your screens.

name: All
line: Refresh. Refresh. Refresh....

name: Penny
line: Yeah, this is not gonna be enough coffee.

name: All
line: Refresh... Refresh... Refresh...

name: Howard
line: It's been ten minutes. We're running out of time.

name: Penny
line: To be cool? Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: I did it, I did it, I'm in the queue.

name: Sheldon
line: Yay! And they say firefighters are the real heroes.

name: Raj
line: Uh, what number in line are you?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, fifteen...

name: Howard
line: Great.

name: Leonard
line: ...thousand two hundred and eleven.

name: Howard
line: Damn.

name: Raj
line: Oh, they only have Thursday and Sunday passes left.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Thursday's gone. Just Sunday left.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Sunday's the worst. Everybody's leaving, most of the good panels are over, and the only T-shirts they have left are small and XXXXL.

name: Leonard
line: Sunday's gone.

name: Sheldon
line: Not Sunday, I love Sunday.

name: Raj
line: So that's it? Everything's sold out?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: I can't believe we're not going.

name: Sheldon
line: It's okay. You know, there, there's always WonderCon in Anaheim, you know? That, that's just as good. Excuse me.

name: Penny
line: Oh, guys, this is really sad. And in a different way than it was twenty minutes ago.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe we wasted all that time on our Hulk costumes.

name: Penny
line: What? You were all going as the Hulk?

name: Howard
line: Not the same Hulk. Ferrigno, Bana, Norton and Ruffalo.

name: Raj
line: We would have been the angry green belles of the masquerade ball.

name: All
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: And we're back to the first kind of sad.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, I have the solution to our Comic-Con problem. We don't need them. I'm starting my own convention.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, just buy scalped tickets with us.

name: Sheldon
line: I told you. Buying scalped tickets is against the rules. If you get caught, you get banned from Comic-Con for life. Life, Leonard. You're gonna feel pretty silly when we're 80 years old, and you have to drive me down there and then wait in the car for three days.

name: Leonard
line: Do what you want. We're getting scalped tickets.

name: Howard
line: I already found a guy online who's willing to sell.

name: Sheldon
line: How do you know this isn't a sting operation set up by the Comic-Con police?

name: Leonard
line: The same way I know that the people in the TV set can't see me.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, just come with us. You're not gonna make your own convention.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, there was a time when Comic-Con didn't exist at all until one lone dreamer with a unique vision made it happen. And you mark my words, I'm gonna rip that guy off.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I'm starting my own comic book convention, and I thought that your client, Robert Downey Jr., would be perfect to appear on our first panel. Oh, well, now, why are you saying no? You haven't even asked him yet. You know, excuse me, but I sat through Iron Man 2. I believe he owes me two hours of his time. They hung up on me.

name: Leonard
line: Did you tell them that you're holding your convention at a Marie Callender's, and that every panellist gets a free slice of pie?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't even get to that part.

name: Leonard
line: Look, even your friend Wil Wheaton thinks this is a waste of time.

name: Sheldon
line: Not true. Wil thinks this is a great idea. He was just concerned that he wasn't a big enough celebrity to headline such an amazing event. Also, that's the same day that he shampoos his beard.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, buddy, I just don't think this is going to come together for you.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't know that. I still have plenty of solid leads on this list.

name: Leonard
line: Good luck.

name: Sheldon
line: No, wait. I need you to call Stan Lee, Leonard Nimoy and Bill Nye the Science Guy, 'cause, legally, I'm not allowed to. Oh, and, also, Carrie Fisher, you know, 'cause I hear he can be pretty nuts.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe Leonard is spending hundreds of dollars on scalped tickets.

name: Amy
line: Last week, you spent that on a little dress.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but those tickets only get him into Comic-Con. That dress gets me into anywhere I want.

name: Bernadette
line: Those tickets were pretty expensive. I had to give Howie an advance on his allowance. Now he's never gonna put his toys away.

name: Amy
line: Why can't they do something sensible like Sheldon and start their own comic book convention? Also, who wants to throw me out that window?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, while they're acting like teenagers, we could do something grown-up.

name: Amy
line: Oh. You mean like a museum?

name: Penny
line: Yes, like a museum, but anything else.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I know. There's a nice hotel not far from here where they do afternoon tea.

name: Amy
line: Ooh, afternoon tea, how sophisticated of us.

name: Penny
line: Oh, all right, if we're gonna be fancy, I should probably put on clean underwear.

name: Bernadette
line: La-dee-da, look who has clean underwear.

name: Penny
line: No, we're gonna stop at Target on the way.

name: Raj
line: Hey, since Sheldon's not going to Comic-Con, maybe we could find a cool trio to dress up as.

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, what if we go as The Fantastic Four, and just tell people that the Invisible Girl is standing there with us.

name: Howard
line: Oh, and I thought our days of pretending to be with women who don't exist were over.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, I am one step away from securing a huge guest for my convention.

name: Leonard
line: Does that step include chloroform and a roll of duct tape?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think that will be necessary for Mr. James Earl Jones. You heard me. The voice of Darth Vader, the Lion King's dad, and FYI, the guy who says, This is CNN. Which also sounds like Darth Vader.

name: Raj
line: How are you gonna get James Earl Jones?

name: Sheldon
line: Simple. Earlier today, he tweeted that he's looking forward to going to his favourite sushi restaurant for dinner. I googled an interview from four years ago which was conducted in his favourite sushi restaurant. That's where he'll be, and that's where I'm going, and...

name: Howard
line: And that's where Darth Vader's gonna pour soy sauce on your head.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I don't care if you get scalped tickets with us or not, but please don't be creepy and go stalking this poor guy. You're gonna get in trouble.

name: Sheldon
line: You're the ones who are going to get in trouble. You're buying non-transferable tickets. And from a stranger, no less. Not only can you get banned from Comic-Con, if caught, you could be charged with petty theft. You think about that while I'm warning James Earl Jones about the danger of posting his location on Twitter. He got lucky this time. There are some weirdoes out there.  Bom, bom, bom, bom, badum, bom, badum. Bom, bom, bom, bom, badum, bom, badum. Bom, bom, badala, baba, badalum, bom, badala, bom, bom, forgot my keys, bom, bom, bom, bom, badum, bom, badum...

name: Howard
line: Okay, great. Bye. Our friendly neighbourhood scalper says he's running late.

name: Raj
line: Does he sound like a criminal?

name: Howard
line: What do you mean?

name: Raj
line: You know, did he say things like, youse guys, or, listen here, see?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. He, he's late because he's on his way here from 1940.

name: Raj
line: I'm just saying, we don't know who this guy is. What if he wants to steal our money or our kidneys, or make a suit outof our skins?

name: Howard
line: Why would someone want to make clothes out of your skin?

name: Raj
line: I don't know. Maybe 'cause dark doesn't show the stains?

name: Leonard
line: Well, now you're making me wonder if we should have met him at a neutral location.

name: Howard
line: Why do you think I told him to come to your place?

name: Amy
line: There sure are a lot of little kids here.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe we thought this would makes us feel grown up.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't believe the waiter thought I was your daughter.

name: Amy
line: Well, last time I got dressed up and had tea was when I was five. Just me, my teddy bear, Raggedy Ann and my hamster.

name: Bernadette
line: That's cute.

name: Amy
line: It was. Till my hamster ate all her babies. It got less cute really fast.

name: Bernadette
line: Should we leave?

name: Penny
line: Well, there's a bar in the lobby.

name: Bernadette
line: I could go for a drink.

name: Amy
line: Aw. Drinking in the afternoon, just like her mommy.

name: James Earl Jones
line: Let me guess. You like Star Wars. You know, I've been in other movies. But you don't care about those, do you? I have one thing to say to people like you. I like Star Wars, too. Care to join me?

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. My friend Leonard said if I bothered you while you were eating, you'd think I was a creepy stalker.

name: James Earl Jones
line: Well, your friend Leonard sounds like a real weenie.

name: Sheldon
line: He is, Mr. Earl Jones, he is.

name: Raj
line: Okay, so, I'm on a Comic-Con message board, and there's a post from a guy where he says he got caught using someone else's badge, and Sheldon was right, he did get charged with petty theft. Guys, if I go to jail dressed as the Human Torch, that might send the wrong message.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe this isn't a good idea.

name: Howard
line: I can text the guy and tell him we changed our minds.

name: Raj
line: Do it.

name: Howard
line: Okay. We're officially not going to Comic-Con.

name: Leonard
line: Hold on. We always do this.

name: Howard
line: Do what?

name: Leonard
line: Chicken out. We're, we're so afraid of getting into trouble that we never do anything wrong.

name: Raj
line: That's 'cause we're the good guys.

name: Leonard
line: Even Batman breaks the rules.

name: Raj
line: You know I struggle with Batman.

name: Leonard
line: I say, this one time, instead of wimping out, let's be badasses.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I'll be a badass, but only if you pinky-swear to be one, too.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, you in on this?

name: Howard
line: No need. I'm breaking rules all the time.

name: Leonard
line: Name one.

name: Howard
line: Last night. Drank my Pepto straight out of the bottle.

name: Raj
line: What about that little cup they give you?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. What about it?

name: Raj
line: Are you impressed by that?

name: Leonard
line: A little.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, me, too.

name: James
line: You know, when I first read the script for Empire Strikes Back and Darth Vader told Luke he was his father, I thought for sure he was lying.

name: Sheldon
line: Me, too. But he wasn't, was he?

name: James
line: He was not. How messed up was that?

name: Sheldon
line: So messed up.

name: James
line: What do you say let's go have some fun? My wife's in New York, and I got a Lion King residual cheque burning a hole in my pocket.

name: Penny
line: So, afternoon tea was a bust.

name: Amy
line: On the bright side, every six-year-old there was jealous of my tiara. Not gonna lie, it felt good.

name: Penny
line: Let me ask you a question, when did you guys start feeling grown up? ‘Cause I am not sure I do.

name: Bernadette
line: Honestly, I thought when I got married I would, but I still kind of feel like I'm pretending. It doesn't help that most of my clothes come from Gap Kids.

name: Penny
line: Okay, so I'm an adult, and the other day I saw an old man slip and fall down, and I laughed. I mean, I laughed hard. Like, like, out loud. If he was conscious, he would've heard me.

name: Amy
line: Gosh.

name: Penny
line: I know. One of the tennis balls came off his walker and bounced right off his head. I mean, I, I almost wet myself. I guess you had to be there.

name: Amy
line: I think I have you both beat. Imagine trying to feel like a grown-up when you've never even been with a man.

name: Penny
line: Okay, sex is not what makes you a grown-up.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. Or you'd be the oldest one here.

name: Penny
line: Really? Is that how you talk to your mother?

name: Howard
line: He just parked. He's on his way up.

name: Leonard
line: Good. This is exciting.

name: Raj
line: It is. I feel alive.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. What if we do get caught, who cares? So we get banned from Comic-Con.

name: Raj
line: Maybe slapped with a fine.

name: Howard
line: Oh, no. I'd be an astronaut and a bad boy, how will women keep their pants on?

name: Raj
line: Uh, maybe it'll come up when I apply for citizenship. Oh, crap, what if it comes up when I apply for citizenship?

name: Leonard
line: I wonder if we'd have to disclose something like this when we apply for grants.

name: Raj
line: He's gonna be here any second, what should we do?

name: Howard
line: Okay, you guys are such babies. I'll handle this. If he thinks we're not home, he'll go away.

name: Raj
line: I thought you were a badass.

name: Howard
line: I lied about the Pepto, I always use the little cup.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it true, as a child, you were a stutterer and were functionally mute for eight years?

name: James
line: It is true.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Is it true they used scuba gear to create the sound of Darth Vader breathing?

name: James
line: They sure did.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Is it true that you were pre-med in college and you almost became a doctor?

name: James
line: That's right.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, James, I could listen to your stories all night.

name: Penny
line: I mean, really, what's so great about being grown up?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, for starters, we'd be splitting this check three ways.

name: Penny
line: I'm serious. Who wants to do all that stuff? Have insurance, pay mortgages, leave one of those little notes when you hit a parked car.

name: Amy
line: I told you it was Penny.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, it wasn't me. Anyone could have knocked your mirror off, or whatever happened.

name: Amy
line: Maybe the guys are right. I mean, we spent the whole night trying to be mature, and it was kind of boring. I'm sure they're having more fun than we are.

name: Howard
line: Oh, God, I could really use exactly two tablespoons of Pepto right now.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, Los Angeles. I'm on a Ferris Wheel with Darth Vader. And he's nicer than you think.

name: James
line: I am.

name: Sheldon
line: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion sleeps tonight...

name: James
line: Ah-wimoweh, ah-wimoweh...

name: Sheldon
line: Bring it home, Mufasa. Eee, eee, eee, eee, eee, um, um-a-weh.

name: James
line: Ah-wimoweh, ah-wimoweh...

name: Sceme
line: Outside a house.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand what we're doing.

name: James
line: Shh.

name: Sheldon
line: Whose house is this?

name: James
line: Carrie Fisher. And she's a little crazy, so get ready to run.

name: Carrie Fisher
line: It's not funny anymore, James.

name: James
line: Then why am I laughing?

name: James
line: Ah, Sheldon, this is the perfect end to a perfect night.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. But I think it could have ended with the karaoke.

name: James
line: What were you trying to ask me at the strip club?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. How much does it cost to get them off my lap?

name: James
line: No. Something about a convention.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, right. Well, my friends and I couldn't get into Comic-Con this year, and I was trying to start my own convention, and I was going to ask if you would be a panelist.

name: James
line: Why don't you and your friends come to Comic-Con with me?

name: Sheldon
line: Really?

name: James
line: Of course. And San Diego is right across the border from my favorite city on Earth, Tijuana, where I'm taking you every night.

name: Sheldon
line: Ay-yi-yi.

name: James
line: Ay-yi-yi, bang-bang.

name: James
line: So, Beau Bridges is on my shoulders, and Jeff Bridges is on Marlon Brando's shoulders, and remember, we do not have permission to be in the pool... hey, Sheldon, wake up. And Angie Dickinson is about to sic the dogs on us, and I go under the water and Marlon goes under the water, and the water raises about two feet and sloshes all over her patio, and the dogs freak out and run like hell, and then we run like hell. Oh, boy, that was a lot of fun.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, who's Angie Dickinson?

name: Amy
line: Item 28, your pet name for me. Time's running out on this. You need to make a decision.

name: Sheldon
line: I submitted you a notarised list.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry, but Gollum and Flakey are not acceptable.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you don't like Princess Corncob, you don't like Fester, you're just impossible to please.

name: Amy
line: We'll come back to that one. This brings us to the final item in our annual State of the Relationship Summit. Item 29, Valentine's Day.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, the worst for last. Hmm. Classic Flakey.

name: Amy
line: Before you get upset, I believe I've come up with a way for us to celebrate the occasion that we both can enjoy.

name: Sheldon
line: People usually start a meeting with a joke, but you go ahead, end with one.

name: Amy
line: I propose we spend a weekend at a bed-and-breakfast in Napa Valley.

name: Sheldon
line: I hate every word in that sentence. Including in, at, we and a.

name: Amy
line: Come on, Sheldon. Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: For starters, a bed-and-breakfast forces you to eat with strangers at your table.

name: Amy
line: One step ahead of you, Bernadette and Wolowitz are going with us.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, very well. What are the sleeping arrangements? We've only been dating for three years. If we were to share a room, people might talk.

name: Amy
line: I got you your own room.

name: Sheldon
line: What if my room has a claw-foot bathtub?

name: Amy
line: It doesn't. I know it makes you feel like you're bathing inside a monster.

name: Sheldon
line: Look, I appreciate the effort, but I'm still unclear how this trip is supposed to be enjoyable for me.

name: Amy
line: We're going to have Valentine's Day dinner on a fully functioning vintage train.

name: Sheldon
line: Vintage? Be specific.

line: Or you're just a tall, annoying frog.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. I have to break up with my girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Sheldon, wait.

name: Sheldon
line: No. You've opened my eyes to the truth. Amy has made me a more affectionate, open-minded person. And that stops now.

name: Leonard
line: Well, we should call her.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, mm-hmm. Amy, it's Penny. Hey. Just a little heads-up. Leonard bought a dining room table. Yeah. Sheldon's breaking up with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy?  Amy?  Amy? I'll get right to the point. I think we need to end this relationship, so just sign this with your finger, and, uh, please don't cry on my iPad, I didn't get AppleCare.

name: Amy
line: I'm not surprised you want to end the relationship. I'm a little surprised you didn't get AppleCare. Anyway, enjoy your life. Where do I sign?

name: Sheldon
line: At the bottom. I must say, I'm relieved you're not making more of a scene out of this.

name: Amy
line: Oh, I've already moved on. Besides, this breakup has nothing to do with me.

name: Sheldon
line: It doesn't?

name: Amy
line: Of course not. This is just Leonard trying to take the focus off that dreadful table by sowing discord in our relationship. He's manipulating you like he always does.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, wait, now, hang on. You think he manipulates me?

name: Amy
line: All the time. And he knew that, as your girlfriend, I wasn't gonna stand by and let him bring a table into your apartment. I mean, a table? Come on?

name: Sheldon
line: It is hideous.

name: Amy
line: Well, thankfully, I won't have to see it, 'cause I won't be your girlfriend anymore. Amy Farrah Fowler. Why, yes, I would like to take a survey.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. You were really gonna stand by me against the dining room table?

name: Amy
line: Of course I was.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. How do I know that you're not manipulating me right now?

name: Amy
line: I think if I were manipulating you, you'd be smart enough to see it.

name: Sheldon
line: How do I know you're not saying that as part of the manipulation?

name: Amy
line: I think you'd be smart enough to see that, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. I'm sorry I gave you such a hard time, I just had to be sure.

name: Raj
line: It's pretty exciting that NASA wants to send Howard back up.

name: Bermadette
line: Yeah, exciting. Can I ask you something?

name: Raj
line: Course.

name: Bernadette
line: He hated that entire experience. Does it make me an awful wife if I don't think he should do it again?

name: Raj
line: Not at all. He's forgotten how miserable he was the entire time he was up there. It's like me in those moments when I miss India.

name: Bernadette
line: So you'll talk to him?

name: Raj
line: Why me?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, I'm his wife, I don't want to ruin it for him.

name: Raj
line: That's the dynamic, I'm the fun one, you're the buzzkill.

name: Bernadette
line: Since when am I the buzzkill?

name: Raj
line: Do you think this is cool?

name: Bernadette
line: No, I think it's stupid.

name: Raj
line: Aha.

name: Bernadette
line: You're right, it's great.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, hey. You guys didn't break up.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Sorry to disappoint you, but Amy pointed out that you were only trying to manipulate me.

name: Amy
line: Which you also figured out by yourself.

name: Sheldon
line: Which I also figured out by myself.

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm glad you're still together.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, okay, you can stop trying to make this about our relationship.

name: Amy
line: Which is stronger than ever.

name: Sheldon
line: Which is stronger than ever. This is about you trying to change my environment, which was perfect the way it was.

name: Howard
line: But it got the way it was through change. The-the-the spot that you love to sit in, that no one else can sit in, only exists because, despite your objections. I bought this couch. Me. So explain why that change was bad and this change was good.

name: Sheldon
line: Um.

name: Amy
line: You don't need to explain yourself to him.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't need to explain myself to you!

name: Amy
line: You're sick of his nonsense and ready to move in with me.

name: Sheldon
line: Keep the table. We don't use that space.

name: Amy
line: Damn it, I got cocky.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Bernie. I'm home. Hello.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi, honey.

name: Howard
line: What's going on?

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe you should have a seat.

name: Howard
line: Um, okay. I know my mom's not dead, there'd be balloons.

name: Raj
line: Um, okay. First off, know that we all love you and cherish you.

name: Mike Rostenkowski
line: Well, I wouldn't...

name: Bernadette
line: Daddy.

name: Mike R
line: You're great.

name: Mike Massimino
line: Can I say something?

name: Raj
line: Oh, of course.

name: Mike M
line: Hey, Fruit Loops.

name: Howard
line: Massimino? Why are you here?

name: Mike M
line: Well, I heard you were thinking about going back up to the space station, and as someone who's been there with you, well, you know how astronauts need to have the right stuff?

name: Howard
line: Sure.

name: Mike M
line: The stuff you have is wrong.

name: Howard
line: You don't think I did a good job up there?

name: Mike M
line: You did a fine job. It's just, you were scared and miserable the whole time.

name: Bernadette
line: I think what we're all trying to say is, you don't seem to be remembering how traumatic the experience was for you.

name: Raj
line: Like how women often forget the pain of childbirth.

name: Mike R
line: Like a woman. Great analogy.

name: Howard
line: Fine, maybe I was a little scared.

name: Mike M
line: You peed in your space suit.

name: Howard
line: You're supposed to do that.

name: Mike M
line: Not during the fitting.

name: Mike R
line: Son, do I need to remind you what you asked me to do before you went up last time?

name: Howard
line: Hang on. That was just me joking around.

name: Mike R
line: You wanted me to shoot you in the foot.

name: Howard
line: Come on, how is that not a joke? You got to get me out of this. Shoot me in the foot.

name: Bernadette
line: Don't forget all the other astronauts picking on you.

name: Raj
line: And how you threw up in zero gravity, and it floated back in your mouth. And you threw up again. And so on and so on.

name: Mike M
line: That was funny.

name: Howard
line: Okay, so I wasn't exactly John Glenn up there, but I've changed. I'm a different man now. Yeah, and I'm a little insulted that you guys don't think I can handle it.

name: Mike M
line: You know you're gonna have to go through survival training again.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: You've got to get me out of this.

name: Doctor
line: What do you want me to do? You're perfectly healthy.

name: Howard
line: Check my blood pressure again. I can get it higher. just give me a second.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Hello?

name: Howard
line: Hi, Ma. How are you?

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: How I am is not dead, but you wouldn't know that, because you don't love me enough to pick up the phone.

name: Howard
line: Go, go, go.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: For all you know, I could have slipped in the tub and drowned. That's what happened to your Aunt Ida.

name: Doctor
line: Wow.

name: Raj
line: Howard, I'm so sorry your blood pressure was off the charts.

name: Howard
line: Oh, me, too. I mean, the doctor was willing to fudge the results, but it just seemed so darned dishonest.

name: Leonard
line: But the mission wouldn't be for at least a year. Isn't that enough time to get your blood pressure under...

name: Howard
line: Look, my blood pressure's too high, okay? Drop it.

name: Penny
line: You know, my aunt changed her diet, and in a few months, she...

name: Howard
line: Went to space? I don't think so. Now, pass the soy sauce. Hey, not the green one, the red one.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, Amy, will you please come join us?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, it's fun up here.

name: Leonard
line: So why are you trying to ruin it?

name: Sheldon
line: No, thanks. We're fine. I mean, if you people want to eat at the table, then that's what you should do. I like eating down here because this is how we've always done things. But if those days are gone, they're gone. It just makes me sad.

name: Bernadette
line: Now I feel bad.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, don't anthropomorphize him, he's got big eyes, but his feelings are not like ours.

name: Bernadette
line: No, it just seems silly for us to sit in two groups.

name: Leonard
line: Well, it's not silly if you think of that group as being led by a big, evil baby.

name: Bernadette
line: Look at Amy down there. Should we go?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, let's go.

name: Leonard
line: But Penny, this was your idea. You said that I should stand up to him.

name: Penny
line: Forget it, Leonard. It's over.

name: Leonard
line: Fine.

name: Amy
line: Rajesh?

name: Raj
line: Screw that! I sat on the floor for seven years. I'm staying right here.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, Raj, it's not the same without you.

name: Raj
line: Fine. But no more making fun of how I say tings.

name: Howard
line: You mean tings like moo-stache?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, isn't this nice. Sometimes the baby wins.

name: Sceme
line: The apartment

name: Bernadette
line: Raj, your tag's sticking out.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. That was the closest I've come to sex in, like, two years.

name: Bernadette
line: Now I feel a little gross.

name: Raj
line: You're only making it seem more real for me.

name: Howard
line: Hey, that's my wife. If anyone's gonna make her feel gross about sex, it's me.

name: Raj
line: Can we please talk about something other than my depressing love life?

name: Sheldon
line: How about Penny's depressing acting career?

name: Leonard
line: Hey. I mean, it's been a little tough, but Penny's following her dreams, and in my book, that is not depressing.

name: Penny
line: Aw, thank you.

name: Howard
line: Is that book called Lies I Tell to Get Sex?

name: Raj
line: Is that a real book? I would totally read that book.

name: Amy
line: Can I borrow it when you're done?

name: Penny
line: Well, I'll have you guys know I turned down a part in a movie last week.

name: Leonard
line: Why would you do that?

name: Penny
line: Because it was crap. It's a sequel to that awful killer gorilla movie I was in.

name: Bernadette
line: Serial Ape-ist? I thought you died in that.

name: Sheldon
line: She does. 42 minutes in.

name: Raj
line: While showering topless, 16 minutes after brief side butt during a pillow fight with her sorority sisters.

name: Sheldon
line: I have an eidetic memory. I don't know what his problem is.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, there are no shower scenes in this one. They just try to clone me from my corpse, but my DNA gets mixed with the ape's DNA and I end up running around with giant gorilla hands and feet.

name: Sheldon
line: Am I missing something, or isn't that the part she was born to play?

name: Leonard
line: So are you really not gonna do this movie?

name: Penny
line: Well, I don't think it's the kind of part that's good for my career.

name: Leonard
line: Well, but don't a lot of famous actors get their start doing bad movies?

name: Penny
line: Okay, I don't think Meryl Streep ever had to say “Must keep gorilla hands from killing again!”

name: Raj
line: If she did, it would be amazing. That woman can do no wrong.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know anything about show business, so if you think it's reasonable to turn down paid work and just burn through your savings, I'm sure you know what you're doing.

name: Amy
line: I think we're gonna go.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure? We were making fun of failed careers. We didn't get to tap the juicy vein that is Howard's.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I work at the same university you do.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, and Hawkeye's in the Avengers, but no one ever says help, Hawkeye.

name: Bernadette
line: Can I ask you something? Why do you constantly feel the need to put down my husband?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'm sure he does it out of love. The same way my boyfriend makes me feel terrible about my life choices.

name: Amy
line: I think we're gonna go.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no. This is not a fight. I was just excited that someone offered you a part and a little surprised that you'd rather sit at home and do nothing than take it. Now it's a fight.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, with that sorted out, I'm happy to answer your question, Bernadette. Howard started it.

name: Howard
line: I didn't do anything. I was just sitting here.

name: Sheldon
line: I wasn't referring to this evening. Ten years ago, upon first seeing me, your husband claimed that I looked like C-3PO and Pee-wee Herman. And he called me C-3P-wee Herman.

name: Raj
line: Ha-a-a. Still funny.

name: Bernadette
line: That was ten years ago.

name: Sheldon
line: Nine years, 11 months and three weeks ago, he followed that up by replacing the slides for my lecture with photographs of nude fat women bending over.

name: Amy
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: The lecture was on cosmic gas clouds. That's funny.

name: Raj
line: I was there. It was funny.

name: Sheldon
line: In any event, that began a decade-long progression of insults, pranks and unwanted magazine subscriptions. To this day, I still get a monthly copy of Granny on Granny. Which, other than its surprisingly fun puzzle page, is complete filth.

name: Amy
line: Thanks for walking me to my car.

name: Raj
line: Actually, it's for both of us. Last night, I watched West Side Story, and I'm a little freaked out by street gangs.

name: Amy
line: Why can't Raj find a girl? The mystery continues.

name: Raj
line: I don't appreciate your sarcasm, but we've still got two blocks to go, so I'll put up with it.

name: Amy
line: Whatever happened with your online dating?

name: Raj
line: No one was writing me back, so I stopped checking my profile.

name: Amy
line: Before I met Sheldon, I was ready to give up, too. Once, I even dropped in on my OBGYN just to get some human contact.

name: Raj
line: It has been a while since I got my prostate checked.

name: Amy
line: Then I met Sheldon and look at where we are now.

name: Raj
line: What? You've kissed, like, once in three years.

name: Amy
line: That's true. Do whatever you want.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Howard
line: Listen, I was thinking you and I could probably try to be better friends.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? I was thinking what we have now is a bit much.

name: Howard
line: Seriously, I was talking to Bernadette last night and she made some great points. You and I have known each other a long time, and I didn't hear the rest 'cause she took her bra off.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. How do you propose we move forward?

name: Howard
line: Uh, for starters, we could stop insulting each other.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a great idea. And in the spirit of our new arrangement, I will mask my surprise that you came up with it.

name: Howard
line: Anyway, I got invited to do a little talk at NASA in Houston this weekend. They gave me two tickets. Bernadette can't go. You want to come with me? You can visit your mom, and I'll show you around the space centre.

name: Sheldon
line: I have one question. Is this a prank where we land in Houston and you've made up wanted posters that have my face with a moustache and a Spanish name and then I get arrested and deported to South America?

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm glad because I would not have seen that coming.

name: Raj
line: Amy, I could use some help.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Let me guess. There's an undergrad in a leather jacket snapping his fingers by the water fountain.

name: Raj
line: I thought about what you said last night, and I went back on the dating Web site and I was looking at this girl's profile. She's amazing.

name: Amy
line: Oh, she's cute. And smart. Phi Beta Kappa.

name: Raj
line: And judging by her lack of Adam's apple, she's been female her entire life. I like that in a woman.

name: Amy
line: Great, so what do you need me for?

name: Raj
line: Well, I was up all night trying to write to her, but I wanted to run it by you first.

name: Amy
line: All right.

name: Raj
line: Emily, your face is like a precious dew-kissed flower.

name: Amy
line: Wow.

name: Raj
line: I know. Powerful stuff, huh?

name: Amy
line: No. You're supposed to be yourself, not all desperate and creepy.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I'm getting some mixed messages here.

name: Amy
line: Just say something normal like, I saw your profile. Looks like we have a lot in common, let's get a cup of coffee sometime.”

name: Raj
line: Yes. Where I can be jealous of the cup touching your ruby lips. Or you just write it for me.

name: Amy
line: I'm not gonna pretend to be you.

name: Raj
line: I don't want you to pretend to be me. You can be like my, uh, online wingman. Like if we met her at a bar and you talked me up.

name: Amy
line: Well, what would I say to her?

name: Raj
line: Just tell her what I'm really like. And, if you think it'll help, that you saw me changing once and my package reminded you of the muscular tail of a jaguar. Use your own words.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks again for taking me to the pharmacy.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's no problem. Is everything okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm fine. It's just some, uh, stomach medication for my trip. There's the remote yet distinct possibility that I may end up in South America.

name: Penny
line: Remember the old days when I would've said something dumb like why? Uh, that doesn't sound good.

name: Sheldon
line: Remember the old days when I used to point out that your check engine light was on?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, get ready to stroll down memory lane. Penny, your check engine...

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I know it's on, Sheldon. Oh, no, no, no, no, no. I cannot afford this right now.

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe it's just something minor. Ooh, good news, the light just went out.

name: Leonard
line: Are we playing individual or teams?

name: Raj
line: Teams are fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, in that case, I'd like to be partnered with my good friend Howard.

name: Raj
line: But I'm always on Howard's team. We're best friends. The kind who finish each others...

name: Howard
line: I really don't think we do tha...

name: Raj
line: Do that. See?

name: Penny
line: Oh, hi.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, how'd it go at the mechanic?

name: Penny
line: Not great. Can I talk to you for a sec?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Raj
line: Maybe I can go with you guys to Houston?

name: Howard
line: Isn't it a little late to get plane tick...

name: Raj
line: Plane tickets? Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Will you please sto...

name: Raj
line: Stop that? Okay.

name: Penny
line: I don't know what to do. My car threw a rod and it's totaled. I can't afford a new one, I have no job, and now I can't drive to auditions.

name: Leonard
line: I'm so sorry. I know it's a sensitive subject, but can you reconsider that part in the movie?

name: Penny
line: I did. I called them. The part's gone. They gave it to someone else. Now that girl's gonna get discovered and become famous and go on Letterman and talk about how she got her big break on a cheap monkey movie all because some dumb girl thought it was beneath her.

name: Leonard
line: At least they talked about you on Letterman. Come on, I can drive you wherever you need to go.

name: Penny
line: How? Unlike me, you have a job. I'm just gonna have to go back to being a waitress, like I will be for the rest of my life.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, would you wrap it up? We're waiting on you.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, is the fact that my life's falling apart interfering with your board game?

name: Sheldon
line: It is. You were wrong, friend Howard. She completely understood.

name: Raj
line: Hey, you busy?

name: Amy
line: No. What's up?

name: Raj
line: Have you heard back from Emily?

name: Amy
line: I have.

name: Raj
line: Great. And?

name: Amy
line: And I'm afraid she doesn't think you're right for her.

name: Raj
line: I give you one simple thing to do, contact a complete stranger and make her fall in love with me, and you blow it.

name: Amy
line: I told her what a good guy you are, but she thought it was a bad sign that you didn't write to her yourself. She thought it made you seem too shy and passive.

name: Raj
line: I'm not too shy and passive. You write her back and tell her I said that. You know, when you have a second.

name: Amy
line: Look, I'll see if I can change her mind tomorrow night.

name: Raj
line: What's happening tomorrow night?

name: Amy
line: I'm meeting her for coffee.

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Amy
line: Well, we just, we e-mailed back and forth a bit, and we kind of hit it off.

name: Raj
line: I find a girl I like, and you're stealing her?

name: Amy
line: No. We just ended up having a lot in common. We went to Harvard, we like Chaucer, we're both hardcore into quilting.

name: Raj
line: Your words fall like acid rain on the wounded petals of my heart.

name: Howard
line: That's Sheldon. He says he'll be down in a minute.

name: Bernadette
line: What are you doing?

name: Howard
line: Oh, he's not coming out until he sees proof you don't have an air freshener in your car.

name: Bernadette
line: This is gonna be a long weekend for you.

name: Howard
line: You're the reason I'm doing it.

name: Bernadette
line: I said to stop insulting each other. I didn't tell you to take him on a romantic getaway.

name: Howard
line: How do I know what you said? Damn you and your noise-cancelling breasts.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi.

name: Howard
line: Hey, buddy.

name: Bernadette
line: You excited for Texas?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, very much so.

name: Howard
line: It's not every day you get to tour NASA with a real astronaut.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, who's the real astronaut?

name: Howard
line: Buzz Aldrin.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Yay.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard?  Howard?  Howard?

name: Howard
line: What now?

name: Sheldon
line: I have to go to the bathroom.

name: Howard
line: You just went to the bathroom.

name: Sheldon
line: But I didn't use it because it didn't seem safe. Despite all my e-mails, the toilet didn't have a seatbelt.

name: Howard
line: Well, it still doesn't.

name: Sheldon
line: I realize that, but safety concerns went out the window two apple juices ago.

name: Howard
line: Fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Why are you getting annoyed?

name: Howard
line: I'm trying to be a better friend, but you constantly say and do irritating things.

name: Sheldon
line: Like when?

name: Howard
line: When? How about in the car? I'm an astronaut, and you know it. You just don't like admitting it, because you're jealous.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, truth be told, as a child, I did dream of going to space. Those astronauts were my heroes. And when you got to go, it was hard for me.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Because it made me realize they'll just send anyone up there. Aren't you going to let me out?

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: But I still need to use the bathroom.

name: Howard
line: Here you go. Be creative. What's the matter? Scared of a little turbulence?

name: Sheldon
line: No, turbulence is just the equalization of diurnal temperature variations in the atmosphere. I'm not scared at all. Oh, apple juice, stay where you are.

name: Howard
line: Oh, this is nothing. I experienced way worse when I was plummeting back to Earth, apparently not being a real astronaut. Okay, that was a big one.

name: Sheldon
line: I take it back. I'm scared of turbulence!

name: Howard
line: I'm gonna need that bag back.

name: Leonard
line: You sure you want to do this?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Why wouldn't I want to get my old job back? It'll be fun to see everyone. I haven't talked to them since I said I quit, see you at the Oscars, bitches. Come on, let's just get this over with.

name: Leonard
line: Let's get this over with. Am I driving you to the Cheesecake Factory, or are we having sex? I'm just, I'm trying to lighten the mood.

name: Penny
line: I know. Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry.

name: Penny
line: It's just so humiliating.

name: Leonard
line: So humiliating? Am I driving you to the Cheesecake Factory...? I'm sorry. I'll. I'll stop. I'll stop.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, don't look so sad. You never know what's gonna happen. Maybe tonight will be great.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, I know you're trying to make me feel better, and I love you for that, but it's making me feel worse, and I kind of hate you. This isn't your car.

name: Leonard
line: I know. I thought we'd take yours.

name: Penny
line: I don't understand.

name: Leonard
line: It's nothing fancy, but it'll get you to auditions, and at least for now, you don't have to go back to waitressing.

name: Penny
line: I don't know what to say.

name: Leonard
line: Don't say anything.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God.

name: Leonard
line: I mean, you could say thank you. I did just buy you a car.

name: Amy
line: Look, I admit that it's odd that Rajesh didn't write to you himself, but if you get to know him, you'll see he's just a sweet, regular guy. As a counterpoint, here he is, uninvited and visibly sweaty.

name: Raj
line: Hello, Emily.

name: Emily
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Amy told me you were concerned that I might be too passive and shy. Let me ask you something. Would a passive guy barge in here to look you in the eye and say, hey, dew-kissed flower, what's up?

name: Emily
line: No, but a weird guy with no boundaries might.

name: Raj
line: Uh, okay, that's a separate issue. Let's put a pin in that and just focus on the passive thing.

name: Emily
line: I'm leaving.

name: Amy
line: Are we still going to go to that Chaucer reading Friday?

name: Emily
line: You know, I think I'm just gonna go by myself.
