line: You know what, why don't you just do it? You'll go have fun for a few weeks, make some money, and who knows what it might lead to?

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, here, page 58. I oil-wrestle an orang-utan in a bikini.

name: Leonard
line: Just to clarify, which one of you is wearing the bikini?

name: Penny
line: Both of us.

name: Leonard
line: So it's a family film.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you again for dinner.

name: Amy
line: You're welcome.

name: Sheldon
line: Good night.

name: Amy
line: Uh, it's date night. Aren't you, uh, forgetting something?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course.  Did I mention the PS4 controllers light up?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, they do.

name: Raj
line: And then after coffee, we went for a walk and she told me she always thought people from India were exotic and mysterious. So, with my mouth, I said, we're just like anybody else, but with my eyes, I said, straight up, Red, hop on my flying carpet.

name: Leonard
line: So, are you gonna see her again?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, we have plans this weekend. And if it's a clear night, I'm gonna lay some romantic astronomy on her.

name: Penny
line: Okay, like what? Show me.

name: Raj
line: I can't do that to Leonard. This is some powerful panty-dropping stuff.

name: Leonard
line: You have my blessing. Go for it.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Penny, two of the brightest stars in the night sky are Altair and Vega. And it is said they were deeply in love but forever separated by the celestial river of the Milky Way.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's sad.

name: Raj
line: It is. But once a year, on the seventh day of the seventh month, Vega cries so hard that all the magpies in the world fly up and create a bridge with their wings so the two lovers can be together for a single night of passion.

name: Penny
line: Wow.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, that's enough.

name: Sheldon
line: Quick poll, PS4 or Xbox One? Raj?

name: Raj
line: Uh, Xbox One.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Huh?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: PS4.

name: Sheldon
line: Wolowitz?

name: Howard
line: Both great.

name: Sheldon
line: Bernadette?

name: Bernadette
line: I like the Wii.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks, Grandma.

name: Raj
line: Oh, my goodness.

name: Leonard
line: What's up?

name: Raj
line: I just got an e-mail from my ex-girlfriend Lucy. She misses me and wants to get together.

name: Leonard
line: Two women at the same time? Nice job, playa.

name: Penny
line: Really?

name: Leonard
line: Was it the two women thing or the playa? It was the playa.

name: Raj
line: What am I supposed to do? How am I supposed to choose between Emily and Lucy?

name: Howard
line: Why do you have to choose? Date both of them.

name: Raj
line: I can't date two women at once. Zero women, that's my sweet spot.

name: Penny
line: Unless you're sleeping with one of them, seeing other people isn't a big deal.

name: Raj
line: But what if one of them asks me what I was up to the night before and I was with the other one? Then, what, do I lie?

name: Howard and Bernadette
line: Yes.

name: Bernadette
line: What do you mean, yes?

name: Howard
line: What do you mean, yes?

name: Bernadette
line: Were you seeing other women when we started dating?

name: Howard
line: No. Were you seeing other men?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Were you seeing other men?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Aren't you gonna ask me?

name: Penny
line: Come on, really?

name: Leonard
line: Thank you so much for letting us pick your brain.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Yeah, happy to help. So, what's going on?

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm having an impossible time getting my career off the ground, and I got offered a role in this crappy horror movie, and I just don't know if I should take it.

name: Wil
line: Well, I have certainly taken some jobs that I've been embarrassed by.

name: Penny
line: I wouldn't exactly call Star Trek embarrassing.

name: Wil
line: I wasn't.

name: Penny
line: Me, either.

name: Leonard
line: So, what do you think, is there a professional downside to doing it?

name: Wil
line: Well, it's tricky. You want to take projects that you're excited about, but sometimes you also have to pay the bills. When you're on the set working on something that you just know in your heart is bad, not Star Trek.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, beam me up. I love it.

name: Wil
line: Anyway, those jobs can be soul-crushing.

name: Penny
line: That's what I'm afraid of.

name: Wil
line: So, I was in Stand By Me when I was a kid, and it was a huge success. The terrible movies I did came after that. I mean, imagine how that feels.

name: Leonard
line: Sounds rough.

name: Wil
line: I'm telling you, this business is brutal. To this day, I hate going on auditions. Okay, I walk in, and I can just feel them thinking, he was such a cute kid, what happened to him? And then I don't get the job, and I can never find out why. Honestly, I get so depressed, there are entire weeks that I can't even get out of bed.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, this was helpful.

name: Raj
line: Any news on your co-worker who's in the hospital?

name: Bernadette
line: Poor thing, she was in surgery for 18 hours. She's alive, but she's still in critical condition.

name: Raj
line: Oh, no.

name: Bernadette
line: The one bit of good news is they put her in a medically induced coma before she read the card. So, you know, silver linings.

name: Howard
line: Were you like this when I married you?

name: Leonard
line: Don't worry about it, buddy. Okay, bye. That was Wil, he's feeling a lot better. Apparently, he's 12-down in the TV Guide crossword puzzle.

name: Raj
line: Did he help you make a decision about the movie?

name: Penny
line: No. Did you figure out what you're gonna do about the two girls?

name: Raj
line: As a matter of fact, I did. I've spent so many years living in fear, saying no to new experiences, but from now on, I'm gonna say yes, yes to love, yes to adventure, yes to life. Whatever it may be, the answer's going to be yes.

name: Howard
line: He's gonna die alone, right?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Bernadette
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: I'm proud of you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, I'm proud of me, too. I've done all my research, I conducted an informal poll, and I've arrived at the rock-solid certainty I've made the right choice.

name: Amy
line: Well, that's got to be a good feeling.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it is. Although.

name: Amy
line: Oh, crap.

name: Sheldon
line: I had the same feeling when I made my dad buy a Betamax instead of a VHS.

name: Amy
line: You were just a little kid.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, a little kid who picked the wrong format to record The MacNeil/Lehrer Report. Now I also was certain that HD DVD would win out over Blu-ray.

name: Amy
line: How old were you then?

name: Sheldon
line: Old enough to know better. You know, and now that I think about it, I stood in front of a case of iPods and I bought a Zune.

name: Amy
line: What's a Zune?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, exactly. It's an MP3 player brought to us by the makers of Xbox.

name: Amy
line: No, what are you doing? No, no, pick that back up. You know it's good. You did the research.

name: Sheldon
line: But what if I'm wrong?

name: Amy
line: You know what? How about I buy it for you? How about I buy you both?

name: Sheldon
line: You know I only have one slot available in my entertainment centre.

name: Amy
line: Then I'll buy you a new entertainment centre.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, yeah, okay, sure. But which one?

name: Amy
line: How about this? I've heard that if you flip a coin, it will tell you how you actually feel. Because you'll either be disappointed or excited by the outcome.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting.

name: Amy
line: So, heads it's PS4, tails it's Xbox One.

name: Amy

name: Amy
line: Could have given it back to me. That was a choice.

name: Raj
line: You look, you look really pretty tonight.

name: Emily
line: Thanks. I love that jacket.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. Thanks, thanks. I'm sorry. I can't do this. My, my ex-girlfriend e-mailed me, and I'm seeing her Saturday, And I'm glad you like it, it's from J. Crew.

line: I don't understand.

line: My friends told me it was okay to see more than one person at a time, but it, it feels like I'm being deceitful.

name: Emily

line: No. I, I have no idea. What would you do?

name: Emily
line: Uh, usually on first dates, I talk about music and stuff, but I was promised weird, so let's do this. How serious were you two?

name: Raj
line: Well, to be honest, we only went on four dates, hugged twice, kissed once, and there was a handshake loaded with sexual innuendo.

name: Emily
line: Wait, so, a girl you never slept with sent you an e-mail and you felt so guilty about it that you had to tell me?

name: Raj
line: Yeah.

name: Emily
line: That's kind of adorable.

name: Raj
line: Are you, are you sure? Because this is the part of the night where I've said something stupid and the girl usually leaves.

name: Emily
line: I'm still here.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, but now you make me wonder what's wrong with you.

name: Emily
line: We just met. You don't need to tell me about other people you're seeing.

name: Raj
line: Really? Because I'm dating two women is basically the only cool thing I can say about myself.

name: Sheldon
line: On the one hand, the Xbox One has a better camera, but the PS4 has a removable hard drive. Thoughts?

name: Amy
line: I can't feel my legs.

line: Oh, I'm sorry, guys, but the store closed five minutes ago.

name: Sheldon
line: And here's another interesting weather fact.

name: Penny
line: Another? Great.

name: Sheldon
line: Changes in jet streams can affect the speed at which the Earth rotates on its axis, so bad weather can actually make the day longer.

name: Penny
line: Well, there must be a hell of a storm somewhere.

name: Sheldon
line: Joke if you must, but you're going to miss these moments. With Leonard home in a few days, this was your last time driving me to the grocery store.

name: Penny
line: You know, I will miss this.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll tell you what, if my apples are mealy, we'll hit the produce section for one last crazy blowout. Heck, you can even push the cart. Please don't take my looking forward to Leonard's return as criticism of the job you've been doing in his absence.

name: Penny

line: Uh, Stuart, I was wondering if you could help me find something.

line: Happy to, unless it's hope or a reason to live.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you make me laugh, sad clown. Anyhoo, Leonard will be back in a couple days and I need a welcome home gift for him. As he's been at sea, perhaps something with a nautical theme might be appropriate.

name: Stuart
line: Okay, well, I don't know how much you want to spend, but I do have this pretty cool Aquaman statue.

line: Aquaman? Oh, this isn't a gag gift, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, just as well. It's a pretty rare piece. I'd rather just sell it to a real collector.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm a real collector. How rare is it?

name: Stuart
line: Oh, I shouldn't even have mentioned it. How about a Batman squirt gun?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't try and trick me into buying something I don't want. Now let's talk Aquaman.

line: What were they thinking, putting Doctor Octopus's mind in Spider-Man's body?

name: Raj
line: Well, I've been quite enjoying that. It combines all the superhero fun of Spider-Man with all the body-switching shenanigans of Freaky Friday. Both versions, original and Lohan.

name: Sheldon
line: Twelve hundred dollars. That's my final offer.

name: Stuart
line: All right, Sheldon, you win. I'm sure Leonard is gonna love this.

line: Oh, right, a present for Leonard. You better throw in that squirt gun.

line: Ooh, yeah, I don't know. This squirt gun, it's, uh, it's pretty rare.

line: Oh. Okay. Well, here's, um, thirty something cents and a promise I won't call your boss and tell him you reek of marijuana.

line: Oh, Penny, I see you've ordered pizza. I have Chinese food.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's a rather earthy cologne. My uncle used to wear that. Perhaps we can enjoy one last meal together before Leonard returns.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure? With your Italian pizza and my Chinese noodles, we could play Marco Polo. I mean, of course, a re-enactment of a meal in the life of Marco Polo the Venetian explorer, not Marco Polo the terrifying water sport.

line: Uh, yeah, it sounds fun, but no thanks.  Have a good night!

name: Penny

name: Penny

line: That's curious. If there's no one here, why are there two glasses of wine on the table?

name: Penny

line: That's odd.

line: What's odd is they're in the trash can.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Look, honey, I promise there's no one's here. I‘ve had a long day. I just want to have a quiet dinner by myself.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, very well. I'm no stranger to enjoying the pleasures of solitude. Oh!

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Have you gotten Leonard a welcome-home gift yet?

name: Penny

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, great. Do you want to go halfsies on a two hundred dollar squirt gun?

line: Hi, honey.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

line: I made some brownies. You want one?

name: Howard
line: You're kidding, right? I mean, you know I'm trying to lose weight. God, I thought we were partners in this marriage.

name: Bernadette
line: We are. Stop it. And for the last time, you're not fat.

name: Howard
line: Really? Tell that to the bathroom scale, 'cause one of you is lying.

line: Fine, forget I asked. How was dinner at your mom's?

line: Awful. I had to rub her ointment all over her again.

line: Why can't she do it?

name: Howard
line: ‘Cause we've got a deeply unhealthy relationship. Which reminds me, do you think you can get any samples of this from work? This was supposed to last her a month, but they didn't take into account the square footage of her back.

line: Let me see. How long have you been putting this on her?

line: Howie, the oestrogen's getting absorbed by your skin. That's why you've been all bloated and moody and a giant pain in the ass.

name: Bernadette
line: That's 'cause I'm a woman. I've had years of practice riding the dragon.

line: Fine. I'll wear gloves next time.

name: Bernadette
line: It's still gonna take a few weeks for the hormones to leave your system.

name: Howard
line: I feel so stupid. And fat.

name: Bernadette
line: It's okay. You still look great to me. In fact, why don't we go in the bedroom and I'll prove it to you?

name: Howard
line: Sex? Really? I mean, that's just your solution to everything.

name: Amy
line: Oh, and here's a fun thing. I worked it out so that there are two different words for spoon, planko and janko. Planko is a spoon with food, janko is a spoon without food. Janko is spelled with a silent ptang. Sheldon, you're not even listening to the rules of my made-up language.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I am.

name: Amy

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, elephant?

name: Amy
line: Lucky guess.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. I'm just distracted by something that happened over at Penny's.

name: Amy
line: What happened?

name: Sheldon
line: I fear Penny is being unfaithful to Leonard.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: She claimed to be alone when there was obviously someone else in her apartment. I have no choice but to assume the worst, given Leonard's lengthy sea voyage and her famously ravenous nether regions.

name: Amy
line: I don't think Penny would cheat on Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, really? She and I once had a staring contest. She clapped really loud and made me blink. It's a small leap from there to sexual infidelity.

name: Amy
line: You're being ridiculous.

line: Amy, there were Chinese food containers in the trash can.

line: I hear a woman's voice.

line: Is it Penny?

line: No, it's you. All right, I hear whispering and giggling. Now I think I hear kissing.

name: Amy
line: Yeah, like you know what kissing sounds like.

name: Sheldon
line: There's kissing in Star Trek, smarty-pants.

name: Amy
line: Let me listen. Sounds like Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: Please. Why would Leonard come home early and waste his time kissing Penny when he could be hanging out with his best buddy? Yeah, that's it. I'm catching her in the act.

name: Amy
line: No, Sheldon, don't.

name: Sheldon
line: Aha.

name: Penny
line: What the hell?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, you cannot just barge in here like that.

name: Sheldon
line: Right.   Penny.  Penny.  Penny. Are you going to answer the door or should I open it and say aha again?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, Sheldon. I should've told you I was back. I just wanted to have a couple days alone with Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, I should apologize. Uh, I never realized to what extent our friendship was a burden to you.

name: Leonard
line: That is not fair. I complain about what a burden it is at least once a month.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, no, let's not sugarcoat this. You find me finicky, pedantic and annoying.

name: Penny
line: No, he doesn't.

name: Leonard
line: I actually have used those exact words before. In that order.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Leonard, I think it's high time you and I address the tweepadock in the room.

name: Leonard
line: The what?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy?

name: Amy
line: Please leave me out of this.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Leonard, there's no need for you to pretend to like me anymore.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, I said I was sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, you save your apologies for after you've had disappointing coitus with Penny.

name: Penny
line: It was fine.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, this is silly. Hey, um, I brought you back a little present from my trip, huh? It's that sailor cap that you wanted. It's neat, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: You honestly think you can buy back my friendship with a cheap souvenir?

name: Leonard
line: I don't. I really don't. Just try it on. Oh, yeah.

name: Amy
line: Hello, sailor.

line: Ooh, now we're talking.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. This changes nothing. Except the Halloween costume I'm wearing this year. Amy, you're going to be Olive Oyl. Lay off the doughnuts.

line: Thanks for coming over.

line: No problem. Ooh, you made little sandwiches.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, that's cucumber and cream cheese. That's turkey and loganberry. And don't tell my hips, but I'm warming up a brie in the oven.

line: Nice. So, mmm. What's up?

line: Okay, well, I've been reading up on all the side effects you can get from oestrogen, and, I need you to be honest with me. Do my boobs look bigger to you?

line: Well, it's kind of hard to tell.

name: Howard
line: Come on, Raj, it's a yes or no question.

name: Raj
line: I'm not sure. Um, wait. Jump up and down, let's see if they jiggle. Uh, no, I, I still can't tell, uh, oh, you know what? Okay, uh, give me some of this.

name: Howard
line: Seriously?

name: Raj
line: Do you want my help or not?

name: Howard
line: Fine.

name: Raj
line: Okay, yup. See, see, that, that looks like, that looks like they could be bigger. But you know, I bet, I bet when I do it, mine do the same thing.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, they kind of do.

name: Raj
line: Hmm. Uh, let me see something.

name: Howard
line: Hey, easy, my nipples are sensitive.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Sorry, sorry, uh, okay.  I mean, yeah, maybe.

name: Howard
line: Okay, let me feel. No, I am definitely up a cup size.

name: Raj
line: You know, but, but they're very firm, so you've got that going for you.

name: Howard
line: You think?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, very perky.

name: Howard
line: Thank you. I really needed to hear that today.  Ooh, brie's ready.

name: Raj
line: Yay.

name: Leonard
line: Good morning.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: So am I driving you to work or are you still mad at me?

name: Sheldon
line: I'd like a ride. Assuming you actually do take me to work.

name: Leonard
line: Where do you think I would take you?

name: Sheldon
line: Who knows? Uh, you said you'd be home yesterday, but you came home three days ago. You say you're taking me to work, but for all I know, I'll end up in a deserted amusement park. Or a cornfield maze. Or a back alley dog fight. You tell me.

name: Leonard
line: I'm going to work. You can come if you want.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. By the way, you have something on your shirt.

name: Leonard
line: No, I don't.

name: Sheldon
line: Hurts, doesn't it? You know, I find myself wondering if anything you've ever told me is true.

name: Leonard
line: I didn't make it back. The ship sank, I'm in hell.

name: Sheldon
line: You say you're from New Jersey, but how can I believe you?

name: Leonard
line: Why would anyone claim to be from New Jersey if they weren't?

name: Sheldon
line: All right, I'll give you that one.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I said I was sorry. What else do you want from me?

name: Sheldon
line: I want you to admit that what you did was wrong.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. What I did was wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: I wish I could believe you.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? I'm not driving you to work, because you're incredibly annoying.

name: Sheldon
line: You say one thing and do the other, so then you are driving me and you find me a delight.

name: Leonard
line: Stop it.

name: Sheldon
line: Keep it up?

name: Leonard
line: Bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. So I guess you're really holding up the other four fingers?

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, what are you doing here so early?

name: Amy
line: Driving Sheldon to work.

name: Penny
line: He's still mad at Leonard, huh?

name: Amy
line: Well, he's mad at you, too. He says you're the succubus who led his friend astray.

name: Penny
line: I don't know what succubus is, but it has suck in it, so that can't be good.

name: Sheldon
line: Thought I heard you out here.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't get a hey. You get a hmm.

name: Penny
line: Come on, don't be like that. We had so much fun together the last couple of months.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. Which makes your betrayal all the more devastating.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I let you buy feminine hygiene products with my supermarket club card. You have any idea the kind of coupons I'm going to get in the mail now?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, your fight's with Leonard. Penny's got nothing to do...

name: Sheldon
line: Careful, Amy. The friend of my enemy's girlfriend is my enemy.

name: Amy
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. You're either with me or against me.

name: Amy
line: You want to take the bus to work?

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe there's a third option.

name: Amy
line: FYI, I had a doughnut for breakfast, you jerk.

name: Leonard
line: So now we're just waiting for the data from the ship to be crunched, but the numbers look pretty promising.

name: Howard
line: That's so great. If you guys prove the existence of Unruh radiation... Hey, hey, hey, hey. My eyes are up here.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, Raj. Judas.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? You're a crazy person.

name: Sheldon
line: A crazy person with a long memory, and if all goes according to plan, a robot army.

name: Howard
line: Stop it.

name: Sheldon
line: Or a mutant army. It depends on how my Kickstarter goes.

name: Howard
line: I said, stop it. Now, listen to me. You two aren't just friends. You're best friends. And that's a beautiful thing. I mean, Leonard, you know why he's so mad at you? It's 'cause he missed you. Yeah, and as his friend, you should be happy he has love in his life. As I do. This man held my breast the other day and I love him for it.

name: Raj
line: A little loud, dude.

name: Howard
line: So, can we please put aside these petty differences and just be glad we're here together?

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose so.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: Uh, it wasn't anything weird. It was just to see how big they were.

name: Sheldon
line: And then Leonard took me to the barber and the dentist, and then to cap off the perfect day, the Los Angeles Bureau of Weights and Measures.

name: Leonard
line: I thought the measures were going to be the stars of the show, turns out it was the weights.

name: Penny
line: I'm so glad you guys are friends again.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm glad you and I are friends again, too.

name: Penny
line: Aw.

name: Sheldon
line: Which reminds me. This came in the mail, and I want you to have it.

name: Penny
line: Fifty cents off Vagisil.

name: Sheldon
line: Think of me when you apply it.

name: Raj
line: Uh, can I just say, I've missed all of us hanging out together.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Me, too.

name: Leonard
line: Um, since when can Koothrappali talk in front of the girls without a beer?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, that happened right after you left.

name: Leonard
line: And no one told me?

name: Howard
line: Can't believe we forgot to tell him.

name: Penny
line: Think of Sheldon when you apply it.

name: Leonard
line: I got to tell you, the more I read about the primordial gravity wave discovery, the more excited I get.

name: Raj
line: I know. Being an astrophysicist right now is like being a rock star.

name: Howard
line: Only without the sex.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, literally, none of it.

name: Leonard
line: What do you think about it, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Meh.

name: Raj
line: Are you kidding me? This may be the biggest scientific breakthrough of our lifetime. How can you, as a theoretical physicist, not care about this?

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe it's because I'm not an elitist. What I'd like to know is, how does this gravity wave breakthrough help the man on the street? You know? Who's looking out for Joe six-pack and all his quantum physics concerns?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my God, you're jealous.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would I be jealous?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I don't know. Maybe because the origin of the universe just got proven, the Higgs field just got proven, and you've been working on string theory for the last 20 years and you're no closer to proving it than when you started.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, I've had a lot on my plate. We happen to live in a golden age of television.

name: Barry
line: Excuse me, fewwas. Sowwy for eavesdwopping, but there actually was some big stwing theowy news today out of the Hadwon Cowwider.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? Did they find evidence to support extra dimensions or supersymmetry?

name: Barry
line: No, but they did find evidence that you'll bewieve anything.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would you do that? You're a string theorist as well.

name: Barry
line: Incowwect. I am a stwing pwagmatist. I say I'm gonna pwove something that cannot be pwoved, I appwy for gwant money, and then I spend it on wiquor and bwoads. Water.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you think he's right? Am I wasting my life on a theory that can never be proven?

name: Howard
line: Maybe. But how great is Game of Thrones?

name: Penny
line: Hey, you're up early.

name: Sheldon
line: I couldn't sleep.

name: Penny
line: I told you those Walking Dead pillowcases were a bad idea.

name: Sheldon
line: No, that's not it.

name: Penny
line: Is something bothering you?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but you wouldn't understand.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, try me.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. I've devoted the prime of my life to string theory and its quest for the compactification of extra dimensions. I've got nothing to show for it, and I feel like a fool.

name: Penny
line: Okay. I get it. I mean, not all the jibberjabber in the middle, but I know what it's like to put your heart and soul into something and get nothing out of it.

name: Sheldon
line: You mean your acting career?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Your relationship with Leonard?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Your failed attempt to go back to college?

name: Penny
line: No. I'm saying you and string theory sound like a relationship, and I know what it's like to be in one and realize it's never gonna turn out the way you want.

name: Sheldon
line: I said Leonard, you said no.

name: Penny
line: I'm talking about other guys.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Well, what do you do?

name: Penny
line: You have to have the courage to end the relationship. You know? Break it off, shake hands, walk away.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know if I can do that.

name: Penny
line: I know it's hard, honey, but in the end, that's how you grow.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, have you seen my good inhaler?

name: Sheldon
line: Break it off, shake hands, walk away.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, how's dating two women going?

name: Raj
line: Um, kind of hit a bump. When I was honest and told Emily she wasn't the only person I was seeing, it went great. So I tried the same thing with Lucy.

name: Howard
line: And?

name: Raj
line: She had mixed feelings. But when I said, Emily was cool with it. Emily's the best. Why can't you

name: Leonard
line: Women. Who knows what'll set 'em off?

name: Raj
line: At least now I can focus all my energies on just one girl.

name: Howard
line: I hope I get to meet her as soon as possible.

name: Raj
line: Why the rush? She isn't going anywhere.

name: Howard
line: She is. But I like that attitude.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, is anybody interested in my old string theory books?

name: Raj
line: You're really going to do this?

name: Sheldon
line: I am. Yeah, Penny pointed out that what I'm going through is essentially a breakup. And according to Cosmopolitan magazine, one of the most effective techniques for moving on is to get rid of all reminders of the relationship.

name: Howard
line: You're reading Cosmo?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. As it turns out, there's an article on how to get over a breakup in literally every issue. Anyway, it suggests that I set these on fire, but the smell of burning books reminds me of church picnics in East Texas.

name: Howard
line: What's this?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's just a doodle of a hyperelliptic Riemann surface.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. Wasn't that the basis of your postdoc fellowship?

name: Sheldon
line: It was. This seemed so elegant at the time, but now I realize I was just a simple country boy seduced by a big city theory with variables in all the right places.

name: Raj
line: It's going to be okay.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. As hard as this is, I have to move on. I can't keep postulating multidimensional entities and get nothing in return. I have needs, too.

name: Howard
line: So, you and Emily still together?

name: Howard
line: I spoke to Bernadette. She's free tomorrow night.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay, great. But if we're really gonna do a double date, then we have to go over some ground rules about Emily.

name: Howard
line: Like when it turns out she's made of rubber, I don't say anything?

name: Raj
line: She's very real.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's what it says on the box. Right next to dishwasher safe.

name: Raj
line: See? This is exactly the kind of thing I'm worried about you saying in front of her.

name: Howard
line: I promise I'll be on my best behaviour.

name: Raj
line: You better be. No jokes about how close I am with my dog. Or the truth about how close I am with my dog.

name: Howard
line: You got it.

name: Raj
line: No jokes about the year I took ballet.

name: Howard
line: You took ballet?

name: Raj
line: God, you never listen.

name: Leonard
line: Are you sure you want to do this?

name: Sheldon
line: The magazine articles suggest that one of the ways to get over a breakup is a new look.

name: Leonard
line: What about your old look, well-groomed ventriloquist doll?

name: Penny
line: Oh my God, I do look like that.

name: Sheldon
line: You stop it.

name: Penny
line: So, how do you want me to cut it?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, how about Bill Gates meets Nikola Tesla?

name: Leonard
line: So, business in the front, science in the back.

name: Penny
line: Or I don't cut it and maybe just style it a little.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm in your hands. Do a good job and I'll tell you Cosmo's ten dynamite tips to enjoy your PMS.

name: Penny
line: Can you keep him quiet? Maybe jangle some keys in front of him?

name: Leonard
line: That doesn't work any more. He just thinks I'm taking him to the doctor. So, now that you're no longer invested in string theory, what are you gonna pursue?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, there are so many exciting areas. Black holes, dark matter.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Leonard was telling me about dark matter, but I didn't really understand it.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't feel bad. Neither does he.

name: Penny
line: Okay, what do you think?

name: Sheldon
line: Have you ever even seen a picture of Tesla?

name: Leonard
line: It actually looks good, Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Doesn't it?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose I could see myself in a scientific boy band. Of course, I'd be the dreamy one and the smart one.

name: Amy
line: Sorry I'm late. What did you do?

name: Penny
line: I gave him a new look. It's cute, huh?

name: Amy
line: Yeah, it's cute. That's the problem. I don't need other girls to see him walking around like sex on a stick.

name: Sheldon
line: She's right. I'm too hot.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm excited to meet Emily.

name: Howard
line: Me, too. I just hope he doesn't blow it.

name: Bernadette
line: Why would you say that?

name: Howard
line: Because he's Raj, that's his thing. Beckham can bend it, Ralph can wreck it, Raj can blow it. Look, I don't want it to happen, but odds are he's gonna find a way to... Oh, crap, I know that girl.

name: Bernadette
line: How?

name: Howard
line: In a bad way, very bad.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys.

name: Howard
line: Whatever you hear tonight, just remember I love you. Hey.

name: Raj
line: Emily, these are my good friends, Howard and Bernadette. Guys, this is Emily.

name: Emily
line: Nice to meet you.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi.

name: Emily
line: Have we met before?

name: Howard
line: Uh, no. I, I don't, I don't think so.

name: Emily
line: You sure? You look familiar.

name: Howard
line: Well, you sure don't. You I know, you I know, you? Total stranger. Even if you had yummy candy, I would not get in your van.

name: Emily
line: Did you go to that spin class on Green Street?

name: Howard
line: That must be it.

name: Raj
line: Since when do you go to spin class?

name: Howard
line: Wow. Now who doesn't listen?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, your food's getting cold. What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, looking through my textbooks for a new field of inquiry. Why do we have a geology book? Leonard, did you throw a children's party while I was in Texas?

name: Penny
line: Wait. What's wrong with geology?

name: Sheldon
line: Let me put this in a way you'll understand, Penny. You remember how you explained to me that the Kardashians aren't real celebrities? Well, geology is the Kardashians of science.

name: Sheldon
line: Have you considered studying standard model physics?

name: Sheldon
line: You want me to give up string theory for something that's less advanced? You know, why don't you break up with Penny and start dating a brown bear?

name: Penny
line: Like you could get a brown bear.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I've got a good job. I could buy salmon. You don't know.

name: Amy
line: Maybe you could make your new field of study the calculation of nuclear matrix elements.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, please. If I wanted to take up a fad, I'd get a tramp stamp.

name: Leonard
line: What about loop quantum gravity?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Duchess, look at me. My quantum gravity's positively loopy.

name: Penny
line: Who's the duchess?

name: Leonard
line: One of the people that lives in his head.

name: Amy
line: I hope he's this distraught if he ever breaks up with me.

name: Leonard
line: Well, if he does, I'll see if my bear has a friend.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, have you ever considered not rushing into something new? I mean, why don't you take your time, enjoy your freedom? Maybe something new to study will find you.

name: Sheldon
line: That's actually not bad advice. You know, I didn't seek out string theory. It just hit me over the head one day.

name: Amy
line: How does that happen?

name: Sheldon
line: A bully chased me through the school library and hit me over the head with the biggest book he could find.

name: Penny
line: Okay, how about we toast your newfound freedom?

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, normally I refrain from alcohol, but since my cerebral cortex is twiddling its proverbial thumbs, why not soak it in grape juice that's been predigested by a fungus?

name: Penny
line: And you wonder why other children beat you with books. Cheers!

name: Bernadette
line: Emily, what do you do?

name: Emily
line: I'm a dermatology resident at Huntington Hospital.

name: Raj
line: Mmm, and you know what that means. Someone's skin's about to be softer than ever.

name: Emily
line: This is making me crazy. I know I know you from somewhere.

name: Raj
line: Oh, uh, Howard was an astronaut. Maybe that's where you saw him.

name: Emily
line: Wow. That's amazing. What was that like?

name: Howard
line: It was the most incredible experience of my life. Up there in the space station, you're...

name: Emily
line: Oh, my God, I remember.

name: Howard
line: Can I finish my astronaut story?

name: Emily
line: It was four years ago.

name: Howard
line: Please don't say it.

name: Emily
line: We were set up on a blind date.

name: Howard
line: Please don't say it.

name: Emily
line: You came to my apartment.

name: Howard
line: You're saying it.

name: Raj
line: Wh, what happened?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, what happened?

name: Howard
line: Okay, I'll say it. I was on the way to pick her up. My stomach felt a little funny. When I got there, I asked if I could use her bathroom.

name: Bernadette
line: Please don't say it.

name: Howard
line: One roll of toilet paper and 20 minutes later, I was so humiliated, I snuck out the window and never saw her again.

name: Emily
line: You know what else I never saw again, my security deposit.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry. I tried to unclog it, but you didn't have a plunger, and water was spilling out everywhere.

name: Emily
line: Right, just water.

name: Howard
line: Look, I have felt terrible about this for years, and I'm glad I have the opportunity to tell you just how sorry I am.

name: Emily
line: It's fine. All my friends love this story. They call you Clogzilla.

name: Raj
line: Get it? Because you clogged up her bathroom like a radioactive monster!

name: Howard
line: Yeah, yeah, I get it.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie.

name: Howard
line: Well, hey, it's not like cotton candy comes out of you.

name: Amy
line: Come on, let's get you to bed. You've had a lot to drink.

name: Sheldon
line: No more than Penny.

name: Amy
line: That's what I'm saying.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait.  Empty room.  Empty room.  Empty room. If somebody says come in, I'm gonna freak out.

name: Bernadette
line: So, Emily, why did you decide to specialize in dermatology?

name: Emily
line: I like cutting people with knives, and all the other jobs where you get to do that are illegal.

name: Bernadette
line: You're kidding, right?

name: Raj
line: She's scary, but it's a cute scary.

name: Howard
line: Can I say just one more thing? I had some kind of food poisoning that day. Sure, in retrospect, gas station sushi, maybe not the best choice. Nor was climbing out your window and running away. But I think we can all understand how humiliating that was, and I'd really appreciate it if we could move on.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, we moved on a long time ago.

name: Howard
line: I'm just saying...

name: Bernadette
line: We moved on.

name: Howard
line: Okay. Fine.

name: Bernadette
line: How's your soup?

name: Howard
line: Ah, it's all right. They could've filled the bowl a little more. Excuse me.

name: Bernadette
line: Where are you going?

name: Howard
line: I need some fresh air.

name: Emily
line: Been there.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no. What have I done?

name: Leonard
line: How you feeling?

name: Sheldon
line: Not so good.

name: Leonard
line: Are you gonna introduce me to your friend?

name: Sheldon
line: It's not my friend. Nothing happened.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. I heard you reading pretty loud last night.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear Lord. Where's Amy?

name: Leonard
line: After she put you to bed, she went home.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I should call her and apologize. Oh, no.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Apparently, I called Stephen Hawking last night.

name: Answerphone
line: First new message.

name: Sheldon
line: Hawkman. It's your old buddy Sheldonoscopy. How come you didn't pick up the phone? Oh, right. My bad.

name: Howard
line: You're awful quiet. Everything okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Not really. I had a bit of an embarrassing evening.

name: Howard
line: Ugh. Me, too. What happened?

name: Sheldon
line: I drank alcohol and may have left an unfortunate voice mail for Stephen Hawking.

name: Howard
line: I wouldn't worry about it. He's got a pretty good sense of humour.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I hope so. What happened to you last night?

name: Howard
line: Oh, well, turns out I'd already met the girl Raj is seeing when I did a number on her bathroom. And that number was two.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you know, I've always been a fan of a story told by Attar of Nishapur, about a king who assembled a group of wise men to create a ring that would make him happy when he was sad. And that ring was inscribed with the phrase, this too shall pass.

name: Barry
line: Hey, Cooper. I heard you dwunk-dialed Stephen Hawking last night? Classic.

name: Howard
line: Get out of here, Barry.

name: Barry
line: Whatever you say, Cwogziwwa.

name: Sheldon
line: Clogzilla. That's pretty funny. I don't think that's gonna pass.

name: Answerphone
line: Next message.

name: Sheldon
line: It's me again. I gave up string theory. You should give up black holes, and we can totally solve crimes together.

name: Answerphone
line: Next message.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you know what's great? Geology. Oh. Look at this geode. That's fun to say. Gee-ode. Gee-ode.

name: Answerphone
line: Next message.

name: Sheldon
line: Gee-ode. Gee-ode. I kiss girls now.

name: Answerphone
line: Next message.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, guess who I am. Beep bop boop bop. I'm you. Get it?

name: Answerphone
line: Next message.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you mad at me? Oh, no, you're mad at me. I'm so sorry. Beep bop boop bop.

name: Answerphone
line: Next message.

name: Sheldon
line: Thiospinel sulfide. Thiospinel sulfide. That's even more fun than gee-ode. Hey, did you see The Lego Movie?

name: Stephen Hawking
line: What a jackass.

name: Penny
line: So, we're about to shoot this scene in the movie where the killer ape DNA is slowly taking over my body.

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: But I realize they're gluing fur everywhere except my cleavage. So, I asked the director why and he says, it's important to the story that my boobs be the last things to turn ape.

name: Leonard
line: It's sweet that he thinks there's a story.

name: Penny
line: Oh, and there's not even a bathroom on set. I have to go to the gas station across the street. I mean, I was dressed like half an ape and still not even close to the most disgusting person in there.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I could use your assistance.

name: Leonard
line: Sure. What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, now that I've given up string theory, I'm struggling to find my next area of focus. So, in your professional opinion, which of these areas do you think is the most promising?

name: Leonard
line: Huh, well, I think there's some really innovative stuff going on in dark matter.

name: Sheldon
line: That's helpful. Okay. Of these four areas...

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, what did we say about being a nicer friend?

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, what did we say about being a gullible weenie?

name: Sheldon
line: It is just so frustrating.

name: Penny
line: ‘Cause you're trying too hard. You need to do something else, get your mind off it.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. How about we bring back Anything Can Happen Thursdays?

name: Penny
line: Hey, that's good. Why'd you guys stop doing that?

name: Leonard
line: You made fun of us. Said it was stupid.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Sounds like me. Come on, Sheldon. What do you say?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. I officially reinstate Anything Can Happen Thursday.

name: Leonard
line: Great, what do you want to do?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. What do you want to do?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. What do you want to do?

name: Leonard
line: I'm starting to remember the problem with Anything Can Happen Thursdays.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm, what can we do that's fun?

name: Leonard
line: What can we do that's different?

name: Penny
line: What can we do that's free?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, got it. We order a pizza.

name: Penny
line: Are you kidding? That's what you always do. Think harder.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. You're right. Got it. We order calzones, cut them open, eat them like pizza. All right, all right, I'll shake the brain bush one more time, see what falls out. Got it. There's a live-action role-playing group that meets every Thursday night in Griffith Park and re-enacts battles from Lord of the Rings.

name: Penny
line: Uh, tell me more about this calzone idea.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? Why don't we just ease into this. Let, let's go for a walk and, and, and see if we find a new restaurant.

name: Sheldon
line: Any chance that restaurant is near Griffith Park?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Leonard
line: Raj and Howard are at Howard's mom's, but should we call the girls and see if they want to come?

name: Penny
line: No. Bernadette's working late.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy's sick.

name: Leonard
line: Aw. What's wrong with her?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, she talks a lot. She always wants to hold hands.

name: Leonard
line: That's not what I meant.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if you were referring to her illness your question should have been, what ails her?

name: Leonard
line: What ails her?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Who knows?

name: Penny
line: Come on, anything can happen. We can push him down the stairs.

name: Howard
line: Hey. Thanks for coming to hang out.

name: Raj
line: No problem. How's your mom feeling?

name: Howard
line: Okay, but she'd feel better if she took her medicine.

name: Raj
line: You know, when Cinnamon won't take her medicine, I hide it in a piece of cheese.

name: Howard
line: Good idea. We can wrap the pill in cheese, feed it to Cinnamon, and then my mom can eat Cinnamon. So what do you feel like doing?

name: Raj
line: I was thinking we could watch a DVD.

name: Howard
line: Well, my mom doesn't have a lot to choose from. Unless you want to watch the video of her colonoscopy. Spoiler alert, 20 minutes in they find a prune pit.

name: Raj
line: Actually, how do you feel about watching House of 1000 Corpses?

name: Howard
line: A straight-up gore-fest? You hate this stuff.

name: Raj
line: I do, but for some reason, Emily loves it and wants to watch it with me tomorrow, so I thought if I start with you first, then I could act cool about it with her.

name: Howard
line: That's actually not a bad plan. I can sit through the colonoscopy now, but that first time I was like, oh my God, a prune pit.

name: Raj
line: Uh, so, you'll watch it?

name: Howard
line: Sure.

name: Raj
line: You're a good friend. I owe you one.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard. Help me get out of the tub.

name: Raj
line: Not that one.

name: Sheldon
line: So, we're just randomly choosing a restaurant without researching it online?

name: Penny
line: Yep.

name: Sheldon
line: Great. You know, this is how Anything Can Happen Thursday turns into It Won't Stop Coming Up Friday.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, how about that Asian fusion place?

name: Sheldon
line: Fusion and Asians? I'm trying not to think about science.

name: Penny
line: What the hell? What? She's not working late.

name: Sheldon
line: And Amy doesn't look sick.

name: Penny
line: Why would they lie to us?

name: Sheldon
line: That's a good question.  Amy and Bernadette.  Amy and Bernadette.  Amy and Bernadette. Why did you lie to us?

name: Raj
line: Hey. Listen to this. Murder, cannibalism and satanic rituals are just a few of the thousand plus horrors that await.

name: Howard
line: I just helped my mom out of the tub, so, I'm one slippery horror ahead of you.

name: Raj
line: You're a good son. I don't know how you do it.

name: Howard
line: Beach blankets, my friend, it's all about beach blankets.

name: Raj
line: All right, let's get this over with. Ew, it's got someone's hair on it.

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah, you're gonna do great with this movie.

name: Penny
line: You're not working late. Why did you lie to me?

name: Sheldon
line: And Amy, you told me you were sick, but you look just as pale and tired as always.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry, I just needed a break from hearing you obsess about what to do after string theory.

name: Bernadette
line: We kind of just wanted one night where we didn't have to hear about how miserable you are making this movie.

name: Amy
line: But none of that means we don't love you.

name: Penny
line: I haven't been complaining that much about the movie. Have I?

name: Leonard
line: I also love you.

name: Penny
line: Well you know what? Maybe I need a break from all of you. Come on, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Where are we going?

name: Penny
line: We're gonna have Anything Can Happen Thursday, you're gonna tell me all about your science stuff and I'm gonna complain about my movie, and we're gonna support each other because that's what friends do.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. ‘Cause if I had to pick now, I'd probably go with dark matter because...

name: Penny
line: Shut up.

name: Penny
line: What's wrong?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand my food. Chinese noodles with Korean barbecue in a taco.

name: Penny
line: It's fusion.

name: Sheldon
line: My mother would lock her car doors if she had to drive through this hodgepodge of ethnicity.

name: Penny
line: Think I've been complaining too much about the movie?

name: Sheldon
line: Not at all.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: But to be fair, when you talk, most of what you say sounds like, wah, wah, wah, clothes, wah, wah, wah.

name: Penny
line: Hey, I don't understand why you're not upset with Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: I am. So much so that I'm gonna bring her here for dinner on our next date night.

name: Raj
line: Okay. So, in the last 20 minutes, we've seen a crazy woman kissing a fetus in a jar. We've seen a guy cut in half and sewn to a fish.

name: Howard
line: And the brutal dismemberment of a rotisserie chicken by my mother.

name: Raj
line: On the bright side, she didn't even notice the pill. Why does Emily like this stuff? Do you think there's something psychologically wrong with her?

name: Howard
line: What difference does it make?

name: Raj
line: What do you mean?

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on, she could have a freezer full of ex-boyfriend's body parts and you'd still go out with her.

name: Raj
line: I do like that the ex-boyfriend's out of the picture.

name: Amy
line: I feel so bad about lying to Sheldon. How am I gonna make it up to him?

name: Bernadette
line: I'd tell you what I do with Howard, but I don't think dressing up like a Catholic schoolgirl is gonna work with Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: He'd probably give you homework.

name: Amy
line: Did you lie to Howard about tonight?

name: Bernadette
line: Of course.

name: Amy
line: And you don't feel guilty about it?

name: Bernadette
line: Between Penny's gorilla movie and Howard's gorilla mother, I had no choice.

name: Leonard
line: Thankfully Penny and I have a relationship based on honesty. What? I don't lie to her.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, we know you don't lie to her.

name: Penny
line: Thank you. Hey, maybe the answer to your career question is in one of these.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, there's only one cookie with something in the middle that solves life's problems, and that's an Oreo. Or a Nutter Butter, if you're in a pinch.

name: Penny
line: Come on, open it. I bet it says something great.

name: Sheldon
line: This is Asian fusion. For all you know, there's a tiny Chihuahua in here.

name: Penny
line: Fine, I'll go. Hmm. People turn to you for guidance and wisdom. Yeah, that's a good one.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's not.

name: Penny
line: How is that not good?

name: Sheldon
line: Turn to you for wisdom? Clearly, that cookie is mocking you. You'd never hear that kind of sass from a Nutter Butter.

name: Penny
line: Uh, since you're paying for dinner, I'll let that slide. Open yours.

name: Sheldon
line: Have you ever paid for a meal?

name: Penny
line: Not with money. Read.

name: Sheldon
line: Your warm and fun-loving nature delights those around you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, try again.

name: Howard
line: Let me get this straight. So, he kills this girl's father, cuts off the guy's face, and is wearing it as a mask while he makes out with her.

name: Raj
line: I'm just gonna say it. That's not okay. Why can't I be in a relationship with a girl who likes The Sound of Music?

name: Howard
line: Raj, you are the girl in the relationship who likes The Sound of Music.  Hey, Penny. What's up? No, Bernie's working late. Really? Thanks for telling me.

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Howard
line: I'm having sex with a Catholic schoolgirl tonight.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I think I see our next stop.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't be serious. If I wanted to waste my time on nonsense, I'd follow Leonard on Instagram.

name: Penny
line: No, come on, tonight we are trying new things.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. That's a lot of incense. Or someone set a hippie on fire.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, honey, I'm still stuck at work. Really? Penny said that? Okay, it's true. I'm sorry. I'll see you at home. Yeah, yeah, I'll put it on.

name: Leonard
line: You and I never just hang out like this. Why is that?

name: Amy
line: I know, it's weird, right?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. We should do it more often.

name: Amy
line: Oh, no. I mean, this is weird right now.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, it's Penny.

name: Amy
line: Is she still mad?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, doesn't seem like it. She got Sheldon to go to a psychic with her.

name: Amy
line: A psychic? He considers them not just mumbo jumbo, but extra-jumbo mumbo jumbo.

name: Leonard
line: Well, Penny can be very persuasive. She's gotten me to do a lot of things I wouldn't normally do.

name: Amy
line: Because she has sex with you.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, she does.

name: Amy
line: Can I confess something? Once in a while, I get a little jealous of how close Penny and Sheldon are.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Amy
line: I mean, not in a romantic way. It's just, she really has some sort of connection with him.

name: Leonard
line: Well, well they've known each other a long time, and Penny grew up around horses, so she knows how to approach him without making him skittish.

name: Amy
line: Don't get me wrong, I'm glad they're friends. I just wish he'd be that comfortable around me already.

name: Leonard
line: Well, it took him a long time to get comfortable around me, too.

name: Amy
line: Really? What did you do?

name: Leonard
line: Something terrible in a former life? I don't know.

name: Bernadette
line: I gotta go. Penny ratted me out. FYI, she's getting you a watch for your birthday with money she took out of your wallet.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't mean to be rude or discourteous, but before we begin, I'd just like to say there is absolutely no scientific evidence to support clairvoyance of any kind. Which means, and again, no insult intended, that you're a fraud, your profession is a swindle, and, uh, your livelihood is dependent on the gullibility of stupid people. Again, no offence.

name: Penny
line: All right, Sheldon, just ask your question.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, I just did. What was it?

name: Penny
line: Oh, for God's sake. Look, he's a physicist who's trying to figure out what his next field of study should be.

name: Sheldon
line: For your information, I was asking her about the next Star Trek movie.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I can answer that one, I'll be bored.

name: Psychic
line: All right, why don't we begin? Your spirit guides are telling me that there's a woman in your life you're having problems with.

name: Sheldon
line: That's an easy guess. I'm clearly an annoying person and have problems with both genders.

name: Psychic
line: Yes, you clearly are. But I'm seeing a specific woman that you're in a romantic relationship with.

name: Penny
line: Oh, oh, here we go.

name: Psychic
line: Does she have dark hair?

name: Penny
line: Yes, yes, your spirit guides are on fire.

name: Sheldon
line: The majority of people have dark hair. Even you, at one time.

name: Psychic
line: Does she work in a similar field to you?

name: Sheldon
line: Ha. The opposite. She's a neurobiologist, and I'm a theoretical physicist. My spirit guides can go suck an egg.

name: Psychic
line: They're telling me that you have difficulty being close with her.

name: Penny
line: Oh, he does. He so does. What should he do?

name: Psychic
line: He should give himself to this relationship. Once he does, all his other pursuits will come into focus.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, do you hear that? I mean, Amy is the key to your happiness.

name: Psychic
line: Exactly. Personally and professionally. Everything will fall into place once you commit to her.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what this is? Yeah, and I reserve this word for those rare instances when it's truly deserved. This is malarkey.

name: Penny
line: Wow, you really struck a nerve. I've never heard him use the M word before.

name: Raj
line: Here we go, House of a 1,000 Corpses.

name: Emily
line: Now, just so you know, I was a nanny for three years, so if you get scared, I can totally change your diaper.

name: Raj
line: Actually, I have to tell you something. These kind of movies really aren't my thing, so, last night, I watched it just to see what I was getting myself into.

name: Emily
line: Okay.

name: Raj
line: And I have to be honest, I thought it was disturbing and weird, and it made me wonder what it says about someone who enjoys it.

name: Emily
line: I wonder that, too.

name: Raj
line: Then, why do you watch these things?

name: Emily
line: Can I tell you something without you judging me?

name: Raj
line: Sure.

name: Emily
line: They kind of turn me on.

name: Raj
line: And play.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. I didn't expect you this evening.

name: Amy
line: Well, I was just feeling so bad about lying to you the other night, I wanted to make it up to you.

name: Sheldon
line: And how do you propose to do that?  Unless you have Gravity on Blu-ray under that skirt, I don't know where you're going with this.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, Star Wars Day is rapidly approaching. We should finalize our plans.

name: Penny
line: What? That's a real thing? What is it, Star Wars Christmas?

name: Howard
line: No. Don't be ridiculous. That's Wookiee Life Day.

name: Penny
line: So, when is it?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, well, it's not May the fifth, and it's not May the third. It's May the fourth.

name: Sheldon
line: Get it?

name: Raj
line: May the fourth be with you?

name: Leonard
line: May the force be with you. Get it?

name: Penny
line: Oh, no. This face wasn't because I didn't get it.

name: Sheldon
line: Come in.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you got a second?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Actually, I'm glad you're here. I'm working on the Star Wars Day schedule. Now, I have a window built in after Phantom Menace for complaining, but I'm worried an hour won't be enough time.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I've got some bad news.

name: Sheldon
line: What is it?

name: Leonard
line: I just read online that Arthur Jeffries passed away.

name: Sheldon
line: Professor Proton is dead?

name: Leonard
line: Sorry, buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Comforting you?

name: Sheldon
line: Your heart might be in the right place, but your head, chest and arms certainly aren't.

name: Leonard
line: Anyway, the, the funeral's on Sunday.

name: Sheldon
line: But, that's Star Wars Day.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, um, of all the things about this that are sad, that might not be number one. You okay? I know he meant a lot to you.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm fine.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Yet he cried when they changed the Raisin Bran box.

name: Professor Proton
line: This, uh, this is something interesting boys and girls. After an owl eats, he spits up part of his meal that he can't digest, in the form of a pellet. Is, isn't that a hoot? We'll be right back after I fire my writers.  Oh, shut up.

name: Amy
line: Watching your old friend?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. Yes. Look at him, Amy. It's such a shame. Struck down in the prime of my life.

name: Amy
line: Do you want me to go to the funeral with you?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm not going to the funeral.

name: Amy
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: All those people blowing their noses. You can't tell the sick from the sad. Mm. I'll be at home celebrating Star Wars Day, as planned.

name: Amy
line: Are you sure you don't want to go say good-bye?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, mourning the inevitable is a complete waste of time.

name: Amy
line: And watching a bunch of goofy space movies you've seen hundreds of times isn't?

name: Sheldon
line: If we were in a physical relationship, you just lost sex tonight.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Penny. Happy Star Wars Day.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Raj
line: Can I make you breakfast? Admiral Ackbar's Snack Bar is open for business.

name: Penny
line: No, thanks. Leonard and I are just going to the funeral.

name: Howard
line: You sure. Not even coffee? We have R2-Decaf. Maybe a nice Cafe Au Leia?

name: Raj
line: And if you're not in the mood for coffee I can always make you a Chai Tea-3PO.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I get it, like C3PO. What happened to me?

name: Raj
line: Hey, uh, Sheldon, you want anything?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, no, thank you.

name: Howard
line: You're being so quiet. Are you upset or are you just rebooting?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm fine.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, are you sure you don't want to come with us to the funeral?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I appreciate the offer, but Arthur is gone and there's nothing I can do about it. When Darth Vader struck down Obi-Wan, did Luke cry like a baby and go to his funeral?

name: Penny
line: No, he blew up the Death Star. Why do I know this?

name: Sheldon
line: Arthur Jeffries was a scientist. I'm sure he didn't care about silly superstitions like funerals. You know, if he were here, I think he'd say enjoy Star Wars Day.

name: Leonard
line: He was 84, he'd say where's my pudding?

name: Raj
line: Before you go, at least let me pack you some Attack of the Scones for the road.

name: Penny
line: Oh, like Attack of the Clones. We are leaving right now.

name: Amy
line: Arthur passing away was harder on Sheldon than he's ready to admit. Really hoping this will cheer him up.

name: Bernadette
line: Me, too. Although, it might've been thoughtless of us to bake a Death Star cake.

name: Amy
line: No, it combines two of Sheldon's favorite things, chocolate chips and the ability to destroy a planet at the push of a button.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, anyway, it'll be a nice surprise for the boys. And Howie doesn't think I take his interests seriously, so hopefully this will keep him fooled for a while.

name: Amy
line: Okay, let's get the fondant and start decorating.

name: Bernadette
line: This is pretty cool. You don't see too many spherical cakes.

name: Amy
line: I wonder why that is.

name: Penny
line: I have a confession to make.

name: Leonard
line: Hmm?

name: Penny
line: I've never been to a funeral before.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: I just never knew anyone that died. I had a pet pig when I was a kid. I mean, when he died, we didn't have a funeral, we had a barbecue.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, we won't be eating Arthur tonight.

name: Penny
line: I didn't know him very well, but I still really liked him. It's weird that he's just gone.

name: Leonard
line: I know.

name: Penny
line: I feel like I want to cry.

name: Leonard
line: Oh that's, that's fine. Go ahead.

name: Penny
line: I can't do it with you staring at me.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry.

name: Penny
line: No, I'm dry. You're a big crybaby, you start, I'll join in.

name: Leonard
line: I am not a crybaby.

name: Penny
line: Toy Story 3?

name: Leonard
line: The toys were holding hands in a furnace. Look, Arthur lived a full life. And he inspired a lot of people. Sure, he, he was my childhood hero, but the fact that I got to work with him, side by side, before he died was, it was, it was a gift.

name: Penny
line: It was a gift. Thank you for being the emotional one in this relationship.

name: Leonard
line: I got your back.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: Ugh, let's get this over with.

name: Howard
line: Since we all agree Episode I isn't our favourite, maybe we just skip it this time.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard, I think you of all people should avoid espousing the principle that if something is not our favourite we should just get rid of it.

name: Raj
line: You know, I heard of this way of watching the movies called the Machete Order, where you watch Episodes IV and V, then skip Episode I, watch II and III as a flashback, and then finish with VI.

name: Howard
line: Okay, so you'd lose most of Jar Jar, all the trade route talk and the boring senate hearings, which are like watching C-SPAN with monsters.

name: Sheldon
line: Get rid of the trade route part? Then how would Palpatine get Chancellor Valorum kicked out of office? How would he get himself elected? How? Can we get through one holiday without you saying something ridiculous?

name: Raj
line: It was just a suggestion.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you know what else was just a suggestion? Why don't we change the Raisin Bran box? Hmm? And you know who got hurt by that? Every single person who eats breakfast.

name: Raj
line: Wow.

name: Howard
line: I think he's taking this Professor Proton thing pretty hard.

name: Raj
line: Should we try to console him?

name: Howard
line: Or should we respect his privacy in this moment of grief?

name: Raj
line: By staying here and watching the movie.

name: Howard
line: That's what good friends would do.

name: Howard
line: Well, at least without Sheldon here, we got to start with Episode IV.

name: Raj
line: Mm, true. I do feel guilty about him.

name: Howard
line: Me, too.

name: Raj
line: Maybe we should see how he's doing.

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: But after the cantina scene.

name: Howard
line: Obviously.

name: Sheldon
line: Look at Arthur, cracking up at a joke I told him. I'll never hear that laugh again.

name: Arthur
line: You never heard it that time.

name: Sheldon
line: Arthur. I thought you were dead.

name: Arthur
line: I am. Oh, it, it's fantastic. I mean this, this is the longest that I've gone without running into a men's room in, in, in years.

name: Sheldon
line: Why are you here?

name: Arthur
line: I don't know. I was, I was hoping I was going to haunt my ex-wife.

name: Sheldon
line: I know why. You've come to me because you're my Obi-Wan.

name: Arthur
line: I'm, I'm not, I'm not familiar with that. Is, is, is that an, an Internet?

name: Sheldon
line: Wow. Uh, you're dead, so I'm going to let that slide. Obi-Wan Kenobi is a character from Star Wars. After his physical demise, he comes to Luke Skywalker as his mentor in spirit form.

name: Arthur
line: Well, that, that clears that up.

name: Sheldon
line: You must be here to give me advice.

name: Arthur
line: Well, this, this is weird. Most, most of my robes open in, in the back.

name: Sheldon
line: Those are your Jedi robes.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, wait. What, what, what is, what is this?

name: Sheldon
line: Be careful with that.

name: Arthur
line: Oh. Oh. Oh, neato. I'm, uh, I'm going to need a Band-Aid.

name: Leonard
line: So, what did you think of your first funeral?

name: Penny
line: Well, I don't want to be a jerk, but it was kind of a bummer.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, well, when I die, you can rent a bounce house.

name: Penny
line: You think about dying?

name: Leonard
line: Mm. Well, I think more about if I'd have any regrets.

name: Penny
line: What would you regret?

name: Leonard
line: Mm, you know, that I didn't travel more, take more risks, learn another language.

name: Penny
line: You know Klingon.

name: Leonard
line: That's true.

name: Penny
line: No, I meant that as a regret.

name: Leonard
line: I just thought of one more.

name: Penny
line: What's that?

name: Leonard
line: I regret not saying yes when you asked me to marry you.

name: Penny
line: Well, it just wasn't the right time.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: And this is also not the right time. Do not propose.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: I know that face. That's your propose face.

name: Leonard
line: I was not gonna propose. It's already two to one.

name: Penny
line: What's two to one?

name: Leonard
line: I proposed twice, you proposed once. Two to one.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my. It's not a contest.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what you're upset about. I'm the one who's losing.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Fine. Would you feel better if I propose so you could turn me down again?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I think I would.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Leonard, will you marry me?

name: Leonard
line: Hmm.

name: Penny
line: No, don't you dare. You reject me right now and tie things up.

name: Leonard
line: It's just such a big decision. I don't want to have any regrets.

name: Amy
line: Did you ever watch Professor Proton when you were a kid?

name: Bernadette
line: No. My dad controlled the TV, so unless someone was a Texas Ranger, Jake or the Fatman, we didn't see it.

name: Amy
line: I never watched him, either, but he seems to be the reason that Sheldon got interested in science.

name: Bernadette
line: Not me. I got into science 'cause I was always the smallest kid in school, so I thought if I became a scientist, I could invent a formula that made me taller.

name: Amy
line: That's cute.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, I thought it was working for a while, but then I found out my brother was just lowering the pencil marks on the door frame. How about you?

name: Amy
line: Oh, I guess it must have been back when I was in the Girl Sprouts.

name: Bernadette
line: Girl Sprouts?

name: Amy
line: My mom made it up as an alternative to the Girl Scouts. She didn't want me selling cookies on some street corner like a whore.

name: Bernadette
line: How did that get you into science?

name: Amy
line: Oh, I went to the library and took out a book on biology to see what whores did.

name: Leonard
line: On the one hand, if I say yes...

name: Penny
line: This isn't funny anymore. Just say no so we're done with this. Will you marry me or not?

name: Leonard
line: Ooh, interesting. Did you just propose to me again?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Because I just heard will you marry me? That's two proposals, one day. Sounds like someone wants to spend the rest of her life telling people how to spell the name Hofstadter.

name: Penny
line: You know what? Fine. Do whatever you want.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. Penny, don't get upset. Here. I love you, but, no, I will not marry you.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Now, about that second proposal. On the one hand...

name: Arthur
line: Where, where, where are we?

name: Sheldon
line: This is the swampland of Dagobah. It's where Luke was trained in the ways of the Jedi.

name: Arthur
line: Oh. Too bad. I thought it was Florida.

name: Sheldon
line: When Obi-Wan came to Luke on this very spot, he gave him all sorts of helpful advice. So, um, what do you got for me?

name: Arthur
line: Um, always, get, get a prenup.

name: Sheldon
line: That's it? I thought there'd be more of a reason why you're here.

name: Arthur
line: Well, why, why do you think I'm here?

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose it has something to do with your recent passing.

name: Arthur
line: Is, is this the, the first time you've lost, you know, someone close to you?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no. No. I've already had to say good-bye to 11 Dr. Whos.

name: Arthur
line: Yeah, I've, I've outlived a few of my doctors, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course, my grandfather died when I was five. My father died when I was 14.

name: Arthur
line: I'm, I'm sorry about that.

name: Sheldon
line: And now you're gone, too. It's like all the men I've looked up to have gone away.

name: Arthur
line: Well, you know, it's, it's okay to, to be sad about them. Just, just make sure, you know, you appreciate those who, who are still there for you.

name: Sheldon
line: But I do appreciate them.

name: Arthur
line: Well, then, what am I doing in a swamp dressed like Friar Tuck? Appreciate them, Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, buddy. Heard you're having a rough day. You all right?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm okay. How was the funeral?

name: Leonard
line: It was nice, you know. A lot of people showed up, told some great stories about him. Did you know that Arthur's son is a high school sci...?  Hey, the guys are about to start Jedi. You want to go watch?

name: Sheldon
line: I do. After I make them go back and watch one through five first.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, that, that'll take us all night.

name: Sheldon
line: That's true. Oh, it's a good thing I had a nap.

name: Howard
line: Boy, some of the physical comedy with Jar Jar is a little tough to watch.

name: Leonard
line: At least they toned him down in the second one.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, he is pretty stupid.

name: Raj
line: Hey, we can say it. You can't.

name: Amy
line: Hey, guys.

name: Bernadette
line: Happy Star Wars Day.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow. A Death Star cake.

name: Amy
line: Yeah. We were hoping it might cheer you up.

name: Bernadette
line: And even though it meant we had to miss the movies, we could still be part of the fun.

name: Howard
line: Well, you didn't miss anything. We just started over.

name: Bernadette
line: Son of a bitch.

name: Sheldon
line: You're back.

name: Arthur
line: Yeah, apparently, um, I'm here whenever, when, whenever you need me.

name: Sheldon
line: That's nice.

name: Arthur
line: May, maybe for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Why do I need you now?

name: Arthur
line: Well, as near as I could tell, you, you fell asleep watching Star Wars, and now you're, you're dreaming you're watching Star Wars.

name: Sheldon
line: So?

name: Arthur
line: I mean, don't, don't you see a problem there? I mean, how, how you're spending your limited time on Earth?

name: Sheldon
line: Not at all.

name: Arthur
line: Okay, good luck to you.

name: Bernadette
line: Almost there. You're doing great.

name: Howard
line: Thanks for lifting my spirits. Next time, try lifting the box.

name: Raj
line: Please hurry.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I don't need a treadmill.

name: Howard
line: The doctor says you need to get exercise.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I get plenty of exercise.

name: Howard
line: Crushing my will to live isn't exercise.

name: Raj
line: If she isn't gonna use it, then why are we doing this?

name: Howard
line: She'll use it. All I need is to rig it with a fishing pole and a HoneyBaked Ham.

name: Raj
line: All right. Now what?

name: Bernadette
line: We set it up in Howie's old room.

name: Raj
line: Do you know how to set it up?

name: Howard
line: Please, I'm an MIT-trained engineer. I think I can handle... Ma, look out.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Aaaaah! I told you this thing would kill me.

name: Raj
line: So she's gonna be laid up for at least six weeks.

name: Leonard
line: Poor Mrs. Wolowitz.

name: Amy
line: Should we do something for her?

name: Sheldon
line: I know. Let's go see the new Spider-Man movie.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, we're talking about your friend's mother. She got hurt.

name: Sheldon
line: I thought that subject had run its course, so I changed it. It's called reading the room, Amy.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, how were things on the set?

name: Penny
line: Uh, pretty good, actually.

name: Raj
line: So the movie's not as bad as you thought?

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, it is, but I decided instead of complaining about it, I'm just gonna go in every day and give it my all.

name: Amy
line: Good for you.

name: Penny
line: Thanks. There's no reason why I shouldn't be the best bisexual go-go dancer slowly transforming into a killer gorilla anyone's ever seen.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. The bisexual gorilla go-go dancer in Schindler's List is tough to beat.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, very good. Because a gorilla go-go dancer of any sexual preference would be out of place in a film about the Holocaust.

name: Leonard
line: It only gets funnier when you explain it, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I know.

name: Howard
line: Okay, she's all settled in the guest room.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe we should get one of those machines to help her up the stairs.

name: Howard
line: You mean a forklift?

name: Bernadette
line: Howie.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry. I just can't deal with this right now.

name: Bernadette
line: Taking care of your own mother? How can you say that?

name: Howard
line: Bernie, she's gonna be off her feet for six to eight weeks. Are you prepared to feed her, wash her and take her to the toilet?

name: Bernadette
line: I would do it for my mother.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, of course you would, you're a loving person. I'm what my people would call a putz.

name: Bernadette
line: Look, I'm not crazy about the idea, but what other choice do we have?

name: Howard
line: We get a nurse. Preferably someone from a third world country who's used to suffering and unpleasant smells.

name: Bernadette
line: You'd hire a total stranger to take care of the woman who raised you? That's so cruel.

name: Howard
line: Not if we pay them well and let them listen to the music of their homeland.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I need to tinkle.

name: Howard
line: Sounds like a job for a loving person. Would you like me to play some Polish music while you carry her to the toilet?

name: Bernadette
line: You are a putz.

name: Howard
line: As advertised.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks for coming with me.

name: Raj
line: Thanks for inviting me after everyone else said no. Aren't you gonna get 3-D glasses?

name: Sheldon
line: I brought my own. No sense in risking bridge-of-nose herpes.

name: Raj
line: Is that a real thing?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, until they invent nose condoms, I'm not finding out.

name: Raj
line: Emily, Hey.

name: Emily
line: Oh, hey, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Uh, this is my friend, Sheldon. Sheldon, this is Emily.

name: Sheldon
