line: Oh, yes, you're the dermatologist. I went for a walk yesterday without sunscreen. Do you see anything on my forehead that I should be concerned about?

name: Emily
line: Um, you know what? I better go. My movie's about to start.

name: Raj
line: Are you here alone?

name: Emily
line: No, not really.

name: Raj
line: What do you mean, not really?

name: Man
line: Hey, should we get our seats?

name: Emily
line: Yeah. It was nice seeing you. Um, I'll call you later.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, okay.

name: Sheldon
line: That was awkward, right?

name: Raj
line: Uh-huh.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it because she's dating you but was out with that other fellow?

name: Raj
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. I thought she saw something on my forehead.

name: Director
line: And action.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Please don't shut me out.

name: Penny
line: Go away. Just go away.

name: Wil
line: I swear, I will find a way to turn you back.

name: Penny
line: What gave you the right to mix my DNA with that of a killer gorilla?

name: Wil
line: I was trying to save your life.

name: Penny
line: Life? What life? Look at me, I'm a monster. And now I have blood on my hands, or paws. I don't know.

name: Wil
line: You can't give up. I love you.

name: Penny
line: I love you, too. But I'm afraid I love killing more. Like, one day, I might actually try and kill you.

name: Director
line: And cut. All right. All right, let's set up for the next scene.

name: Penny
line: Actually, you know what? Can we do one more? I think I could do it better.

name: Director
line: Let's just move on. No one cares.

name: Penny
line: Well, I care. I mean, look, if we're gonna do this, why not try and make it something we're actually proud of?

name: Director
line: Look, sweetie, this movie is garbage, but you should be happy about that, 'cause if it was a good movie, you wouldn't be in it.

name: Leonard
line: Whoa, whoa, hang on. There's no need to insult her.

name: Director
line: And who are you?

name: Leonard
line: I'm her boyfriend.

name: Director
line: Isn't she too hot for you?

name: Leonard
line: A little, yeah.

name: Director
line: Well, boyfriend, get off my set.

name: Penny
line: You can't do that. He's with me.

name: Director
line: You know what? You can get off my set, too. You're fired.

name: Penny
line: What? You can't fire me. I'm the star. I'm the girl that goes bananas. It says so on the poster.

name: Director
line: Yeah, but we just shot the last scene where we see your face. So from now own, the star of the movie is whoever wears this.

name: Wil
line: Hey, if you're gonna fire her, then you have to fire me, too.

name: Wil
line: Wow, that fell apart really fast.

name: Raj
line: Thanks for skipping the movie. I couldn't sit in that theatre for two hours wondering about Emily and that guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, quite all right. After my forehead melanoma scare I've learned not to sweat the small stuff. Well, sorry, I don't have all the ingredients to make chai tea.

name: Raj
line: You don't have to make me anything.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I do. You're upset about Emily and you're Indian. I need to make you chai tea. Now, I have all the ingredients except cardamom seeds. Do you happen to have any on you?

name: Raj
line: Sorry, I left them in my turban.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'll make English breakfast tea. They destroyed your culture. That's close enough. You know, I'm curious, why are you so upset about seeing Emily with another man?

name: Raj
line: Wouldn't you be upset if you saw Amy out with someone else?

name: Sheldon
line: Can't happen. We have an ironclad relationship agreement which precludes her from physical contact with anyone other than me.

name: Raj
line: But you don't have sex with her, either.

name: Sheldon
line: Slick, huh?

name: Raj
line: To be truthful, Emily and I haven't dated that long, and we never agreed to be exclusive to each other.

name: Sheldon
line: Have you had intercourse?

name: Raj
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, stick to your guns. There will be a lot of pressure.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I'm hungry again.

name: Howard
line: It's like the world's fattest cuckoo clock.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, you're always talking about having a baby someday. This is exactly what it's gonna be like.

name: Howard
line: No, it's not.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on. The constant fussing, eating, pooping, burping, drooling. We're even waiting for the day when she can finally walk on her own.

name: Howard
line: Maybe you're right. Anything she finds on the floor goes right in her mouth.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm just telling you now, if we do have kids, don't expect me to do all the work.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I'm a very paternal person. I'd be excellent at taking care of a baby.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: I'm still hungry.

name: Howard
line: I'm coming, you big baby.

name: Penny
line: You know, the only thing worse than doing a movie where they glue monkey hair to your ass is getting fired from a movie where they glue monkey hair to your ass.

name: Wil
line: Forget it, man, it's crap. You just move on to the next thing.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, it's easy for you to say. You used to be famous.

name: Wil
line: Hey. I just lost a job for you.

name: Penny
line: All right, I'm sorry, you're famous.

name: Wil
line: Penny, it's not about being famous. It's about the art. It's about the passion we have for our craft.  I have an audition for Sharknado 2. If I book this, I am totally gonna pay you back for this beer.

name: Penny
line: God, what am I doing with my life?

name: Leonard
line: You having second thoughts about acting?

name: Penny
line: You were on set, you saw what it was like.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, but it's not always that bad.

name: Penny
line: Oh, really?

name: Leonard
line: What about when you did, uh, Anne Frank at that cute little theater?

name: Penny
line: It was over a bowling alley.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, but there was ample parking.

name: Penny
line: Are you done?

name: Leonard
line: And you were so good in the TV commercial.

name: Penny
line: It was for haemorrhoid cream.

name: Leonard
line: And I got itchy and swollen just watching you.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, you are really not cheering me up.

name: Leonard
line: Come on. How can you be sad when you're going home with all five-foot-six of this?

name: Penny
line: Hmm. You think you're five-foot-six, that's funny.

name: Raj
line: I don't understand it. I'm a nice guy, I have a great job, I'm well-educated, come from a good family. Why don't women want to be with me?

name: Sheldon
line: An interesting question. Well, good night.

name: Raj
line: What? Don't send me home. I can't be alone right now.

name: Sheldon
line: That's your problem. You can't be alone.

name: Raj
line: What do you mean?

name: Sheldon
line: How many women have you had dates with?

name: Raj
line: Eleven.

name: Sheldon
line: How many of those women did you think would become your perfect companion?

name: Raj
line: Eleven. Wait. Do I count the 200-pound Sailor Moon girl that Howard and I had a threesome with at Comic Con?

name: Sheldon
line: Sure.

name: Raj
line: I'll stick with eleven. She liked Howard better.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, now do you see the problem?

name: Raj
line: Maybe. I, I don't know.It's late, I should, I should go. Look, I do get what you're saying. Instead of desperately clinging to any woman who will go out with me, I need to work on my fear of being alone.

name: Sheldon
line: I was trying to suggest chemical castration, but it's my bedtime, so whatever gets you out the door. Good night.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, I'm back!

name: Howard
line: Shh, I just got her to sleep.

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry.

name: Howard
line: What took you so long? The grocery store is a few blocks away.

name: Bernadette
line: They only had regular yoghurt. I had to go to a different store to get the extra-fat kind your mom likes.

name: Howard
line: Then why do I smell coffee on your breath?

name: Bernadette
line: So what? After two days of taking care of her, excuse me for stopping to get a mocha.

name: Howard
line: A mocha? Well, it must be nice to be queen.

name: Bernadette
line: Queen? I've been killing myself here.

name: Howard
line: Well, whose fault is that? I wanted to get a nurse, but you were all, I'm nice, I want to take care of people.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm glad I got that mocha. And you know what else I'm glad about? I bought you a brownie and I ate it in the car.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard.

name: Howard
line: Thanks a lot. Now I have to go rub her belly again.

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Emily
line: Thanks for letting me come over.

name: Raj
line: Of course. Please, come in.

name: Emily
line: I just wanted to say how sorry I am about tonight, and I want to make sure that we're okay.

name: Raj
line: Uh, look, you and I haven't made any commitments to each other.

name: Emily
line: I know. I just felt like I needed to explain. The guy I was with did my last tattoo, and he's been asking me out for months. I finally said yes just to get it over with.

name: Raj
line: It's okay.

name: Emily
line: Really?

name: Raj
line: Well, I mean, yeah, it freaked me out a little, but that's my issue, not yours.

name: Emily
line: Wow. If I saw you out with another woman, I'd be pretty upset.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. Not just for being upset, but for believing that could happen.

name: Emily
line: Just so you know, I'm not seeing anyone else.

name: Raj
line: Well, me, neither.

name: Emily
line: Okay.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Please. So, uh, you, you have tattoos?

name: Emily
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: I don't. I have a hole in my belly button that may or may not have been a piercing.

name: Emily
line: That's cool.

name: Raj
line: It's a piercing. So, uh, how many tattoos?

name: Emily
line: One on my shoulder, one not on my shoulder and one really not on my shoulder.

name: Raj
line: It's, uh, been a long time since I've seen a girl's really not her shoulder.

name: Emily
line: Well, how about you show me your piercing and I show you my tattoos?

name: Raj
line: But, uh, before I take my shirt off, I just need like ten minutes to do some crunches.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God. What a day.

name: Leonard
line: Can I get you anything?

name: Penny
line: No. I need to start making some smart decisions.

name: Leonard
line: With your career?

name: Penny
line: With my life.

name: Leonard
line: Like what?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. We could get married.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, be serious.

name: Penny
line: I am.

name: Leonard
line: Why? Because I'm a, a smart decision?

name: Penny
line: Well, yeah.

name: Leonard
line: So I'm like a bran muffin.

name: Penny
line: What? No, that's not what I'm saying.

name: Leonard
line: No, it's exactly what you're saying. I'm the boring thing you're choosing because I'm good for you.

name: Penny
line: What does it matter? The point is, I'm choosing you.

name: Leonard
line: Well, it matters a lot. I don't want to be a bran muffin. I, I want to be a Cinnabon, you know? A strawberry Pop-Tart. Something you're excited about even though it could give you diabetes.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, you can be any pastry you want.

name: Leonard
line: No, no. No, it's too late. I'm your bran muffin. Probably fat-free and good for your colon.

name: Penny
line: You know what? Forget it. I never should've brought it up.

name: Leonard
line: You know I want to marry you, but you're only doing this because you got fired and you're feeling sorry for yourself.

name: Penny
line: Okay, it may look that way, but getting fired from that movie was the best thing that could have happened to me, okay? I finally realize I don't need to be famous or have some big career to be happy.

name: Leonard
line: Then what do you need?

name: Penny
line: You, you stupid Pop-Tart.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Then I guess I'm in.

name: Penny
line: Really? You guess you're in?

name: Leonard
line: Not like, I guess I'm in. Like I guess, I'm in!

name: Leonard
line: So is that it? Are, are we engaged?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I think so.

name: Leonard
line: All right.

name: Penny
line: What's wrong?

name: Leonard
line: I'm not sure. Just feels a little anticlimactic.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it kind of does, huh?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I know. This might help.

name: Penny
line: Where did you get a ring?

name: Leonard
line: I've had it for a couple years, not important. Penny, will you marry me?

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, yes.

name: Leonard
line: This would have been so much more romantic if you didn't have monkey hair on your finger.

name: Howard
line: How you feeling?

name: Bernadette
line: Last night was a little rough, but I think we're gonna get through this.

name: Howard
line: I'm proud of us.

name: Bernadette
line: Me, too.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Where's my pancakes?!

name: Foreign Nurse
line: Coming, Mrs. Wolowitz!

name: Bernadette
line: You were right.

name: Howard
line: Welcome to Team Putz.

name: Leonard
line: How's your mom holding up?

name: Howard
line: She's doing okay, but we just lost another nurse.

name: Amy
line: How many is that now?

name: Howard
line: Two, and I know what you're thinking, she's eating them.

name: Bernadette
line: She's just so impossible, they keep quitting.

name: Sheldon
line: So, who's watching her now?

name: Howard
line: A bowl full of M&M's with a few Ambien tossed in.

name: Raj
line: What up, guys?

name: All
line: Hello, hey!

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Well, now that everyone's here, Penny and I have some big news. We're engaged.

name: Raj
line: And I thought me having sex with Emily was gonna be the big news.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, hey, what the hell?

name: Bernadette
line: You guys propose all the time. This never happens.

name: Penny
line: You're right! Yay!

name: Raj
line: Boy, I'm so hungry today. I wonder why?

name: Howard
line: Because you had sex the other night?

name: Raj
line: You know what? That may be it. By the way, it isn't like riding a bike. Like, I fell off a few times.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: You okay?

name: Sheldon
line: I just got called into President Siebert's office. The university won't let me switch my field of study to inflationary cosmology. They're forcing me to continue with string theory.

name: Howard
line: Why?

name: Sheldon
line: He said it's why they hired me, it's, it's what my grant was designated for, and that everybody has to do things they don't want to do. He then gave an example of something he had to do, even though he didn't want to, which was look at my stupid face.

name: Leonard
line: That's a rude thing to say, out loud.

name: Sheldon
line: It's an outrage. Honestly, I'm tempted to leave the university.

name: Howard
line: You know, if you're really serious about that, I hear there are some exciting opportunities in home care for the old and fat.

name: Leonard
line: Whatever you do, just don't make any rash decisions.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. I am really aggravated.

name: Raj
line: When I'm feeling low, I have sex with a girl. But that's just me.

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on, give her a chance.

name: Nurse
line: No. Life, it is too short.

name: Bernadette
line: I know you've only been here a day and a half, but you're like part of the family. I don't think the service is gonna send any more people.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, maybe it's time we just release Ma back into the sea.

name: Bernadette
line: That's not helpful.

name: Howard
line: Well, then, we may need to get used to the idea that we're gonna be living here the next few months.

name: Bernadette
line: But we have jobs. We can't baby-sit her 24 hours a day.

name: Howard
line: Well, what if we use our vacation time?

name: Bernadette
line: I wanted to go to Hawaii, not hell.

name: Howard
line: I don't know what else we can do.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, I love you, and as your wife, your mother is every bit as much my problem as she is yours, so, I want a divorce.

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: Hello, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hi, Mom. I have some exciting news.

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: I'm listening.

name: Leonard
line: Before I tell you, will you promise to try and be happy for me and keep any concerns you have to yourself?

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: No. Let me save you all of your hemming and hawing. Sheldon already told me that you and Penny are engaged.

name: Leonard
line: I hate that you talk to him more than you talk to me.

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: Would you like for you and me to talk more?

name: Leonard
line: You know what? It's probably fine.

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: In any event, while I've had my misgivings about Penny, Sheldon spoke very fondly of her, and if she is good enough for him, then she's good enough for me.

name: Leonard
line: I'm your son. What about the fact that she's good enough for me?

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: Sure.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks, Mom.

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: Leonard, would it make you feel better to hear that your mother approved of your life choices?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, it would.

name: Mrs Hofstadter
line: Yeah. Well, you should work on that.

name: Penny
line: No, Mom, it's the same guy I've been going out with for the past two years. Yeah, the scientist. Well, it's complicated. I mean, he works with lasers and atomic magnets. No, I did not see it coming. No, we did not set a date. No, I am not pregnant. Yeah, this is a first for our family. All right, tell Dad I love him. I gotta go. All right, bye.

name: Amy
line: Atomic magnets?

name: Penny
line: Shut up.

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry I'm late. The leaf blower broke, so I had to hand-dry my mother-in-law.

name: Penny
line: You want some wine?

name: Bernadette
line: Thanks. Little warning before you jump into this marriage business. You're not just marrying him, you're marrying his family.

name: Penny
line: I think Leonard's mom's okay with me.

name: Bernadette
line: It doesn't matter if she's okay with you. The question is, can she go to the bathroom by herself? Hit me again.

name: Amy
line: So, what are the living arrangements gonna be?

name: Penny
line: Well, haven't really talked about it yet, but I figure at some point, I'll move in with him, or he'll move in with me.

name: Amy
line: Well, with you not working, that makes financial sense.

name: Bernadette
line: You're not working. How would you like a job in home health care?

name: Penny
line: Not a chance.

name: Bernadette
line: Please. I'm desperate.

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Bernadette
line: I'll pay you anything you want.

name: Penny
line: Okay, then, yeah.

name: Penny
line: No, keep your money.

name: Bernadette
line: I could've ridden a bull longer than that.

name: Leonard
line: What you working on?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm writing an appeal to the Faculty Senate, so that I can move on from string theory.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. How's it going?

name: Sheldon
line: You tell me. Dear Esteemed Colleagues, as you may know, I have requested to change my field of study. My decision to do so is, I believe, in the best interest of science. At your convenience, I'd be happy to explain it to you in words you'll understand.

name: Leonard
line: It's nice that you called them esteemed.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right. I'll take that out.

name: Leonard
line: So, listen, there was something I was hoping to float past you.

name: Sheldon
line: Mm.

name: Leonard
line: Now that Penny and I are engaged, I thought we might want to talk about our living arrangements.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. She's spent many nights here, and you're worried about preserving the myth of her virginity before the wedding.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not.

name: Sheldon
line: Good, because not only has that ship sailed, if it hit an iceberg, countless men would perish.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, this is about where she and I are going to live.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you mean?

name: Leonard
line: Well, well, we might want to live together.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yeah, well, I've already given this some thought, and I'm willing to let Penny live with us one day a week for a trial period. Now, obviously, not when she's made cranky by the shedding of her uterine lining.

name: Leonard
line: That's very sweet. But we were thinking more of us maybe living together with... not you.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand. How could we all live together if I'm not there?

name: Leonard
line: Look, I, I know this is, this is change, and that sounds scary.

name: Sheldon
line: Where are you going to go?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. We just started to think about this. Maybe I'll move in with Penny, or maybe she and I'll take this place, and you can move across the hall.

name: Sheldon
line: Move across the hall? Did you take a marijuana?

name: Leonard
line: No, I did not.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you get hit on the head with a coconut?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then, I'm all out of guesses. What? Me move across the hall. Why would you even suggest such a thing?

name: Leonard
line: Because I love Penny, and want to give her the life she deserves.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. You're putting your future bride's happiness above mine.

name: Leonard
line: Well, yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow.

name: Sheldon
line: How dare the university force me to go back to string theory?

name: Amy
line: They just don't appreciate you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, and on top of that, Leonard has the audacity to suggest that now that he and Penny are engaged, he may not want to live with me any more.

name: Amy
line: Here, I made you some Strawberry Quik.

name: Sheldon
line: I have real problems here, Amy. I can't be mollified with a beverage designed for children. Mmm, yummy.

name: Amy
line: You know, this might work out for the best. I mean, you're always complaining about what a terrible roommate Leonard is. Like how he turns up the thermostat when you're not there.

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh, it's like walking into the Amazon. And not the good Amazon with one-day shipping. The awful one with birds and snakes.

name: Amy
line: You hate the sound of all those keys on his key chain.

name: Sheldon
line: Four keys! Who does he think he is, a warden?

name: Amy
line: See? Maybe you'll love living alone.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. Perhaps.

name: Amy
line: And if it turns out you don't, you and I could live together.

name: Sheldon
line: You and... oh, sure, and while we're at it, why don't we get engaged, too? Why don't we get a little house, start a family? Enjoy our sunset years together? Do you hear yourself, woman?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, it was just a thought.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Here's a thought. You're not moving in, Leonard's not moving out, everything stays exactly the way it is. And by the way, I saw you make this Strawberry Quik with syrup, you're supposed to use the powder.

name: Amy
line: It tastes the same.

name: Sheldon
line: No. The syrup tastes better and I don't like it.

name: Penny
line: This is so sweet. You never cook for me.

name: Leonard
line: Well, you cook for me all the time and, ugh.

name: Penny
line: If you don't like my cooking, why haven't you ever said anything?

name: Leonard
line: It's hard to talk with so much heavy chewing to do.

name: Penny
line: Sorry. I'll get better.

name: Leonard
line: I know you'll try. So, should we talk about setting a date?

name: Penny
line: Well, I'd like to pick one that works with my brother's schedule.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. And when would that be?

name: Penny
line: Uh, 12 to 18 months from now, depending on good behaviour.

name: Amy
line: Hi, is Sheldon here?

name: Leonard
line: No, I thought he was with you.

name: Amy
line: He was, but he stormed off and now he isn't answering his phone.

name: Leonard
line: What happened?

name: Amy
line: He was really angry that you suggested he move out.

name: Leonard
line: Oh.

name: Amy
line: I also mentioned that he and I could live together but he was too mad at you to realize what a great idea that is.

name: Leonard
line: Well, he's been having a couple of tough days. I'm sure he's fine. He probably just needs a little alone time to decompress.

name: Amy
line: You're probably right. So, what are you guys doing?

name: Penny
line: Well, Leonard cooked for me and now we're just having a nice dinner, you know, as a newly engaged couple.

name: Amy
line: That's nice.

name: Leonard
line: Anyway, as I was saying, Sheldon probably just needs a little alone time. ‘Cause that's important. Not just for him, but for most anybody, really.

name: Amy
line: Don't I know it. What is that, polenta?

name: Penny
line: Amy, get out.

name: Amy
line: Right.

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: What happened?

name: Stuart
line: I was cooking in the back room last night and the hot plate caught on fire.

name: Sheldon
line: And you couldn't put it out?

name: Stuart
line: I was across the street at the do-it-yourself car wash, taking a shower.

name: Sheldon
line: So when will you reopen?

name: Stuart
line: Um, I don't know. I'm waiting to hear back from the insurance company.

name: Sheldon
line: So, tomorrow?

name: Stuart
line: I don't mean to be rude, Sheldon, but, uh, my life is kind of falling apart right now.

name: Sheldon
line: Your life? The university is making me do string theory and my girlfriend loves me so much she wants to live with me. And now, the place I need to go when I'm sad is damp and smells funny.

name: Stuart
line: Well, sorry I let you down.

name: Sheldon
line: No. I do not accept this. Everything is changing and I hate it. It stops now. I'm helping you get back on your feet. I would like to purchase this comic book, please.

name: Stuart
line: That'll be $2.99.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? It's soaking wet.

name: Stuart
line: Fine, a dollar.

name: Sheldon
line: Can you break a twenty?

name: Stuart
line: No, I only have hundreds.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what? I don't always recognize sarcasm, but I do right now, and I don't appreciate it. I'm sorry for your loss. But you're not the only one whose day has been a disaster.

name: Stuart
line: That could have killed me. I can't catch a break.

name: Leonard
line: I haven't heard from Sheldon in a while. You think he's okay?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'm sure he's fine.

name: Leonard
line: I'm gonna see where he is.

name: Penny
line: How?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I know his password, so I can track his phone.

name: Penny
line: You do that?

name: Leonard
line: Not always, but ever since he wandered off at the swap meet chasing a balloon, I get worried.

name: Penny
line: He can take care of himself. Look, we went over stranger danger and gave him that whistle.

name: Leonard
line: That's weird.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: He's at the train station.

name: Penny
line: So? He loves trains.

name: Leonard
line: It's dark out and he's alone, I don't like it. Let's go get him.

name: Penny
line: It's sweet how you look out for him. You're a good guy.

name: Leonard
line: It's not just that. My mother would kill me if I let something happen to him.

name: Raj
line: Dude, I'm so sorry.

name: Howard
line: Don't take this the wrong way, but did you do this for the insurance money?

name: Stuart
line: No. God, you sound like the police, the firemen, my parents, my therapist and the insurance company.

name: Raj
line: We're here for you, man. Whatever you need, okay?

name: Stuart
line: Uh, actually, I was wondering if I could crash at your place for a few nights.

name: Raj
line: Sure, of course. Oh, actually, Emily was gonna spend the night.

name: Stuart
line: You slept with her? Nice.

name: Raj
line: Well, I can't take all the credit. She let me do it to her, but, uh, but I can always call her and cancel.

name: Howard
line: Hang on. I know a place you can stay and earn some money at the same time.

name: Stuart
line: Great.

name: Howard
line: I just have to warn you, it'll involve humiliation, degradation and verbal abuse.

name: Stuart
line: So what's the catch?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You tracked my phone?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Boy, you chase one balloon for three miles.

name: Penny
line: We were worried about you.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't be melodramatic. I'm just getting on a train and leaving forever.

name: Leonard
line: Seriously? You don't even have a change of clothes or a toothbrush.

name: Sheldon
line: My plan is to stop at malls and buy what I need. It's called living off the land.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I know you're upset and there's a lot of stuff going on, but it's nothing we can't work out. Come on, let's get you home.

name: Sheldon
line: No. I've reached my breaking point. I need to leave. Now.

name: Penny
line: And go where?

name: Sheldon
line: It doesn't matter.

name: Leonard
line: So a few things don't go your way and your best decision is to ride the rails like a hobo?

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose it is. Except I have a credit card. And I refuse to carry my laptop at the end of a stick. And I'd sooner die than eat beans out of a can.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, come home with us and tomorrow I'll, I'll take you to Legoland.

name: Sheldon
line: Legoland is not the solution to everything. And it's too much of a scene since that movie came out.

name: Leonard
line: Then what can I do?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I am overwhelmed. Everything is changing and it's simply too much. I need to get away and think.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, come on, you know you're overreacting.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, hang on. Just come here. Maybe we need to let him go.

name: Leonard
line: What? Why?

name: Penny
line: It might be good for him.

name: Leonard
line: You know he can't take a trip like this by himself.

name: Penny
line: He's a grown man.

name: Leonard
line: No, he looks like a grown man. You've seen Freaky Friday, sometimes little kids end up in big person bodies.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, we can't protect him forever.

name: Leonard
line: I know, but...

name: Penny
line: He'll be okay. You taught him well, Padawan.

name: Sheldon
line: Good Lord. Padawan's the student, not the teacher.

name: Penny
line: Seriously, let him go.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, if you really need to do this, I'm not gonna stand in your way.

name: Sheldon
line: I do.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Good luck.

name: Penny
line: Be safe and call us.

name: Sheldon
line: I will.

line: Bye, buddy. Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes?

name: Leonard
line: I'm gonna miss you.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course you are.

name: Leonard
line: He just made that easier.

name: Penny
line: Mm.

name: Stuart
line: Hey. What are you guys still doing here? I got this, go. Go home.

line: You sure?

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, she's fed, she took her pills, she's all tucked in and watching TV.

name: Bernadette
line: So, she's not too much for you?

name: Stuart
line: Are you kidding? I love her, she's great.

line: Stewie, you gonna watch Wheel of Fortune with me?

name: Stuart
line: Coming, Debbie.

line: You call her Debbie?

line: She insisted. So, hey, guys, thank you so much. This job is a dream come true.

name: Howard
line: Was that a little weird?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. I don't know why, but something about it feels unnatural.

name: Howard
line: Okay, let's go.

name: Bernadette
line: Yep.

name: Amy
line: Okay, Sheldon, thanks for checking in. Talk to you tomorrow? Oh, okay, bye.

name: Leonard
line: He's okay?

name: Amy
line: Actually sounds like he's doing pretty well.

name: Penny
line: I really think this is gonna be for the best.

name: Leonard
line: Me, too. And he was able to take a sabbatical from...

name: Amy
line: How could you let him go?

name: Raj
line: So, couldn't help but notice none of you RSVP'd to my murder mystery dinner party.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah. We were meaning to do that.

name: Raj
line: No, you weren't because it was a week ago and nobody came. So, if you want to solve the mystery of who stabbed Koothrappali in the back with the weapon of indifference, it was all of you.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think thatqualifies as a mystery, we all knew what we were doing.

name: Amy
line: We're sorry, Rajesh.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe we can do it next week.

name: Howard
line: Whoa, whoa, we're not that sorry.

name: Raj
line: Don't worry, I can take a hint. No more murder mystery parties.

name: Leonard
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Howard
line: Hallelujah.

name: Leonard

name: Sheldon
line: Come on.

name: Raj
line: Just hear me out. I'm going to make you guys a scavenger hunt like they have at M.I.T.

line: Oh, I loved those. I did them every year there.

line: We did them at Princeton, too.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's cute. Like it's a real college.

name: Sheldon
line: That's amusing, I was going to say that about M.I.T., but it works for Princeton, too.

name: Amy
line: Scavenger hunts at Harvard were really tough. I always got stuck on the first challenge, trying to find someone to be on a team with me. I guess that story's more sad than funny.

name: Penny
line: I love scavenger hunts. My friends and I had them all the time.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, these are a little different. There's a tradition at elite universities...

name: Howard
line: And Princeton.

name: Leonard
line: A tradition of hunts full of puzzles that rely on logic and obscure knowledge, science.

name: Penny
line: Oh, in ours we would just run around town looking for a store that would sell us beer.

name: Raj
line: So, uh, who's in?

name: Leonard
line: I think it sounds fun.

line: Yeah, me, too.

name: Various
line: I'm in, let's do it.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. Are we really doing this or are we tricking Koothrappali again like with the dinner party?

name: Leonard
line: What's all this?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, everything I could possibly need to win the scavenger hunt.

name: Leonard
line: You really think he's gonna send us to a bowling alley?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if he does, do you know how filthy those rental balls are? They might as well stand on the corner and give away free rectal exams.

name: Raj
line: Okay, everybody. Who's ready for a scavenger hunt?  Somewhere in the city of Pasadena, I've hidden a golden coin. You will be faced with a total of ten puzzles. Each p...  each, each puzzle will lead you to the location of the next, the last of which will lead you to the coin. The first team that finds it wins.

name: Sheldon
line: He is a born showman.

name: Raj
line: Any questions?

name: Howard
line: Yes, to be fair, do people who went to Princeton get a head start?

name: Leonard
line: It's not funny.

name: Sheldon
line: No, Oh, it actually is if you get the joke. It's based on the premise that Princeton isn't a very good school.

name: Leonard
line: Ha-ha.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, see? Now he gets it.

name: Raj
line: Okay, guys, go ahead and divide yourselves into teams of two.

name: Bernadette
line: Should we just do couples?

name: Leonard
line: Couples sounds great. Or we could mix things up. Maybe pick names out of a hat. Whatever.

name: Penny
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Why don't you just admit you don't want to be on a team with me.

name: Leonard
line: I just said, couples sound great.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm, yeah, you don't think I'm smart enough. You think I'm gonna be a liability. Even though I totally just used the word liability correctly in a sentence. Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: All right, let's, let's do couples. I want to.

name: Penny
line: No, no. Let's mix things up. I choose Sheldon, and we're gonna kick your ass!

name: Sheldon
line: Really? The only time I'm ever picked first for a team and I'm stuck with the liability?

name: Amy
line: Stop that. Penny is not a liability.

name: Penny
line: Thank you. Do you want to be on my team?

name: Amy
line: Maybe we pick names out of a hat.

name: Penny
line: All right, hurry up and close the door so they can't hear us. Would you stop pouting? So, you picked my name. Get over it.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, and do you know what the odds are I'd pick your name?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: It's not hard, one in five. Now you know why I'm pouting.

name: Raj
line: All right, teams. Get ready to open your first puzzle. Go. Do you see what I did? The first puzzle is a puzzle. Oh, my God, how adorable is that? I wish I had a friend like me.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing? You have to start with the edges.

name: Penny
line: Well, there's no right way, Sheldon. I already found a few pieces that fit.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, take them apart and start with the edges. And stop wasting time.

name: Howard
line: Wow, you're really good at puzzles.

line: I did them all the time as a kid. As my mom used to say, when you're doing a puzzle, it's like having a thousand friends. She was full of fun lies like that.

line: If it makes you feel any better, my mom's just full of pound cake.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry you got stuck with me. I bet you wanted to be with Bernadette.

line: Have you ever played a game with Bernadette?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Have you ever gone into a steel cage with a wolverine?

name: Bernadette
line: Faster, faster, faster! Do you not know that word? It means more fast!

name: Leonard
line: Stop yelling at me.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, you'll know when I'm yelling at you.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, ooh, it's the comic book store. All right, come on, that's where we have to go.

name: Sheldon
line: But we haven't finished the puzzle.

name: Penny
line: But, it, it doesn't matter. We know the answer, come on.

name: Sheldon
line: You think you know the answer. But it could be a trick. What if when the puzzle's complete, there's a sign in the window that says go to the train store?

name: Penny
line: Okay, it's not gonna say that.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I hope you're wrong. I really want to go to the train store.

name: Howard
line: It's the comic book store. Let's go.

line: Come on, numb nuts, it's the comic book store.

name: Penny
line: It's the comic book store, it's the comic book store, it's the comic book store.

name: Sheldon
line: It's the comic book store.

name: Leonard
line: Do you think Penny's mad at me?

name: Bernadette
line: Because you're in the right lane behind a bus and you won't go around it? I'm sure she finds it charming.

name: Leonard
line: No, because I didn't want her on my team.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm starting to think she dodged a bullet. The slowest bullet in the world.

name: Leonard
line: Geez, I never realized you were so competitive.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, I know. Its, it's probably because I grew up with five brothers and sisters so I had to fight for every... Oh, my God, you did not just slow down for a bird, you know they fly, right?

name: Amy
line: I think this is the first time we've ever actually been alone together.

name: Howard
line: Huh, I guess you're right. Wonder why that is?

name: Amy
line: Well, off the top of my head, I'd say we don't have a lot in common except for the people we're involved with. Plus, when we first met, Penny warned me never to get into a car alone with you.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. You know, I bet you and I have more in common than we think.

name: Amy
line: Such as?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. Tell me some things you like.

name: Amy
line: Uh, let's see. I like harps, Little House on the Prairie, medieval poetry, medieval literature...

name: Howard
line: Hey, how about some music?

name: Amy
line: Great. Sheldon never lets me listen to music in the car. He doesn't want to be mistaken for a gang member.

name: Howard
line: Find something you like.

name: Amy
line: Beatles, boring. Eminem, scary. Weird Al? How old are you? Neil Diamond?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I love Neil Diamond.

name: Amy
line: I love Neil Diamond.

name: Both
line: Sweet Caroline, bum-ba-da, good times never seemed so good, so good, so good, so good. I've been inclined...

name: Raj
line: Oh, hey, thanks for letting me use the comic book store as part of the scavenger hunt.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, my pleasure. Always happy to help out with fun things that I wasn't invited to be a part of.

name: Raj
line: Oh, congratulations. You're the first team to arrive.

name: Amy
line: Yes, it's not a ruse to make fun of me. It's a real game and I'm winning it.

name: Raj
line: Your next puzzle is a riddle. And who better to give it to you than The Riddler?

name: Bernadette
line: Go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go! How am I faster than you? I'm in heels and I stopped to take a phone call.

line: I have asthma. Back off.

name: Howard
line: Riddle me this. Arrah, Arrah, and gather round, the work of this hero is legion-bound. He multiplies N by the number of He, and in this room the thing you'll see.

line: Good riddle, huh?

line: Yeah. So when you guys plan fun activities, does my name even come up, or...?

line: I invited you to my murder mystery party.

name: Stuart
line: No, you didn't.

name: Raj
line: Oh.

name: Penny
line: Ugh, we're the last ones here, hurry up.

line: It is a marathon, not a sprint.

line: People run in a marathon.

name: Sheldon
line: Not with a bowling ball on their back.

line: Hey, Penny, I just wanted to say good luck, and I hope there's no hard feelings.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Romeo. Repair your relationship on your own time.

name: Leonard
line: Relax, it's a hard puzzle. It's gonna take a while to solve.

name: Penny
line: Riddle me this...

line: Got it.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Princeton, look at that, Team Community College Night School is in the lead.

line: I thought we were the Lightning Sharks.

name: Howard
line: Hey, you know what this could mean .

line: Oh, oh, that's good. Then this would be

line: That's it.

name: Amy
line: To the Neil Mobile.

line: I knew it, we're gonna lose.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, I got it. I got it/

name: Bernadette
line: Congratulations, you got it last.

name: Leonard
line: You're really mean, you know that?

name: Stuart
line: So no one's gonna buy anything.

name: Penny
line: Aha. Okay, let's see. To continue on your quest, leave no stone unturned. Ooh.

name: Sheldon
line: The next clue must be hidden under one of these rocks.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Okay. Sheldon, I, I've got to ask, how did you figure out that it was the geology lab?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, simple, the ‘arrah, ‘arrah in the riddle mean Jan Arrah, a member of the Legion of Superheroes, known as Element Lad. And then the word He, it wasn't the masculine pronoun, but rather H e, the abbreviation for helium. See where I'm going with this?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Nice try. Now, Element Lad's ability is the power to transmute chemical elements. Helium has an atomic number of two. If you multiply that by the atomic number of N, nitrogen, you get 14, which is the atomic number of? I'm just funnin' you, silicon. And that is the most common element in the Earth's surface. So that narrowed it down to the geology lab or the chemistry lab.

name: Penny
line: Wow. I can drink a beer underwater.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm sure your parents are proud. Now, finally, the line in this room the thing you'll see was an obvious reference to Fantastic Four member The Thing, who's made entirely of...

name: Penny
line: Shut up. I solved it.

line: Those are map coordinates. Got 'em. Let's go.

name: Penny

line: Hold on. Pause. Something doesn't make sense. Look, in 2015, Biff steals the sports almanac and takes the time machine back to 1955, to give it to his younger self. line: This is Hot Tub Time Machine all over again. If future Biff goes back to 2015 right after he gives young Biff the almanac, he could get back to the 2015 with Marty and Doc in it. Because it wasn't until his 21st birthday that 1955 Biff placed his first bet.

Therefore, the timeline in which 1955 Biff gets the almanac is also the timeline in which 1955 Biff never gets the almanac. And not just never gets. Never have, never hasn't, never had have hasn't.
