line: Woo!

name: Sheldon
line: And no woos. Oh, not you, Dr. Woo. You're fine. I want you all to know that you have no reason to applaud me. My so-called breakthrough wasn't the result of my genius. It was nothing more than a boneheaded mistake. So please refrain from praising me for it in the future.

name: Raj
line: Wait, I don't understand. They didn't find the element?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, they found the element.  No, no, stop it. I don't need to take this admiration from the likes of you people. How do I make them stop loving me?

name: Leonard
line: Invite them to live with us.

name: Penny
line: Boy, Bernadette is gonna love this.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. It must be nice to have someone do something so romantic.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you know what's not romantic? Rubbing it in someone's face.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, it can be, but I told you sex doesn't count.

name: Howard
line: I'm getting worried about Bernadette. I'm gonna call and check on her.

name: Sheldon
line: The National Science Foundation wants to give me a substantial grant.

name: Raj
line: Oh, that's a big deal.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. When will this nightmare end?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I get that you feel bad about all the attention, but still, what you did is amazing. We're really proud of you.

name: Amy
line: I'm not.

name: Sheldon
line: You're not?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I've been thinking about it, and you're right. You don't deserve any credit. All you did was misread some numbers on a table. A very easy table, too. Honestly, I'm embarrassed for you.

name: Sheldon
line: That's the most romantic thing I've ever heard.

name: Penny
line: Damn it, everyone's better at this than me.

name: Sheldon
line: Congratulations, Dr. Fowler. You just made the fort.

name: Howard
line: Guys, there was an accident at Bernie's lab.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my God, is she okay?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but she's at the hospital in quarantine.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Amy
line: Poor Bernadette.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no.

name: Sheldon
line: I hate to pile on the bad news, but I just got a raise.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God, Bernie, what happened?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, let's just say the next time you move a dozen vials of raccoon virus to the fridge, make two trips.

name: Howard
line: You're sure you're okay?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, it's just a precaution. If there was a problem, I'd be throwing up out of my eyeballs by now. Sorry I messed up our date.

name: Howard
line: Oh, don't worry about it. I brought the date here. Guys, come on in.

name: Bernadette
line: What's all this?

name: Howard
line: Well, tonight is the anniversary of our first date, and I wanted to celebrate it by writing a song for you.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, get over here.

name: Sheldon
line: She might be contagious. Don't you think I'm having a rough enough day?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon.

name: Howard
line: If I didn't have you, life would be blue, I'd be Dr. Who without the TARDIS.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it me, or does she not look so good?

name: Amy
line: Shh.

name: Howard
line: A candle without a wick, a Watson without a Crick, I'd be one of my outfits without a dick-ie. I'd be cheese without the mac, Jobs without the Wozniak, I'd be solving exponential equations that use bases not found on your calculator making it much harder to crack. I'd be an atom without a bomb, a dot without the com, and I'd probably still live with my mom.

name: All
line: And he'd probably still live with his mom.

name: Howard
line: Ever since I met you, you turned my world around. You supported all my dreams and all my hopes. You're like uranium-235 and I'm uranium-238, almost inseparable isotopes. I couldn't have imagined how good my life would get from the moment that I met you Bernadette.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, Howie.

name: Howard
line: If I didn't have you life would be dreary, I'd be string theory without any string. I'd be binary code without a one, a cathode ray tube without an electron gun. I'd be Firefly, Buffy and Avengers without Joss Whedon. I'd speak a lot more Klingon, Heghlu'meH QaQ jajvam.

name: All
line: And he'd definitely still live with his mom.

name: Howard
line: Ever since I met you, you turned my world around. You're my best friend and my lover. We're like changing electric and magnetic fields. You can't have one without the other. I couldn't have imagined how good my life would get from the moment that I met you, Bernadette.

name: All
line: Oh, we couldn't have imagined how good our lives would get from the moment that we met you, Bernadette.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, that was amazing. Look, I'm shaking.

name: Sheldon
line: She's sick, I knew it. Bye.

name: Leonard
line: I have to say, this is the best Top Ramen you've ever made.

name: Penny
line: I discovered a secret ingredient. The flavour packet. That sucker is well named. All right, lover boy, get ready, 'cause there is a crap storm of romance coming your way.

name: Leonard
line: Stop it, you're gonna make me cry. All right. You seem pretty confident.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I am. Maybe if you follow this trail, you'll see why.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, rose petals.

name: Penny
line: Yes. The most beautiful and shockingly expensive of all the flowers.

name: Leonard
line: You made the bed? You really are pulling out all the stops.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I gave this a lot of thought, and I finally found something to show you how much I love you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, wow.

name: Penny
line: It's a first edition of Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. I remember it was your favourite book growing up.

name: Leonard
line: This is great. It, thank you, it's, so much.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Nothing. I love it.

name: Penny
line: No. Something's going on. What's wrong with it? I remember you saying how great it would be to have a first edition.

name: Leonard
line: It's true, I did. I did say that. When we were at the used bookstore together and I saw the first edition and I bought it.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, I am the worst.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, it's okay. It's really thoughtful.

name: Penny
line: No, it's not. I mean, what's thoughtful is everything you do. Here, you know what? Look at this. Look, here's the, the plane ticket you bought me when I was too poor to go home for the holidays. And the rose you left on my windshield just because. Here's the, the thank-you letter you wrote me after the first time I slept with you. All 11 pages of it.

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe you saved all this stuff.

name: Penny
line: Of course I did. It's you.

name: Leonard
line: Come here.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: Is that a pregnancy test?

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, just the first one. I didn't save them all.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe I read this table wrong. I blame you.

name: Amy
line: Me? What did I do?

name: Sheldon
line: You distract me. I've been distracted since the moment I met you.

name: Amy
line: Sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you should be. Because all I can think about is how much I want to kiss you. And not just on the cheek, but on the mouth. Like mommies and daddies do.

name: Amy
line: Oh, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy? Amy? Did you hear what I said?

name: Amy
line: Can't talk, in the zone.

name: Amy
line: I've never seen him this happy before.

name: Leonard
line: That's because you've never seen him on restock the medicine cabinet day.

name: Sheldon
line: Look. A new topical antihistamine with lidocaine. Wow. I can't wait until I get a rash.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Gas-X has a new ultra strength. I guess they really do read their mail.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, isn't that Professor Proton?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Look at him, just standing in line like he wasn't moderately famous 30 years ago. Let's go say hello.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, maybe we shouldn't bother him.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not going to bother him, I'm going to talk to him.

name: Leonard
line: He thinks there's a difference.

name: Sheldon
line: Arthur? Arthur, it's me, Sheldon Cooper. You may not remember because of your advanced age.

name: Arthur
line: Trust me, I, I remember.

name: Sheldon
line: This is my girlfriend, Amy. Amy, this is television legend Arthur Jeffries. His science show inspired millions of children.

name: Arthur
line: Hold, hold, hold on. You, you have a girlfriend?

name: Amy
line: Yes, and I've heard so much about you. Hey look, we're wearing the same orthopaedic shoes. I can't believe I dress like a celebrity.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, okay, I get it now.

name: Leonard
line: Dr. Jeffries, hello again. Leonard Hofstadter.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, oh, right, I remember your, your girlfriend. Is, is she, is she here?

name: Leonard
line: No, she's not.

name: Sheldon
line: So, what prescription are you getting filled?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Wait, I want to guess. Don't tell me.

name: Arthur
line: I wasn't going to tell you.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, come on.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no. I'm really good at this. All right, give me a hint. Does it involve difficulty initiating a stream of anything?

name: Arthur
line: Well, given my age, that's more than just a lucky guess.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Sheldon, let's go mock the people buying homeopathic medicine, you love that.

name: Sheldon
line: But I'm hanging out with my friend, and we're having fun. Look how happy he is.

name: Howard
line: Bernie's having a girls' night on Friday at our place. You want to do something?

name: Raj
line: Actually, I'm busy.

name: Howard
line: Doing what?

name: Raj
line: There's a new sports bar over on Colorado Ave...

name: Howard
line: You're going to girls' night.

name: Raj
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: You know they're making jewellery right?

name: Raj
line: You think they came up with that? They were going to drink beer and play darts.

name: Leonard
line: What's up?

name: Howard
line: Not his testosterone levels.

name: Raj
line: Excuse me. I happen to be very comfortable with my masculinity.

name: Howard
line: How is that possible?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I got an email from Professor Proton.

name: Sheldon
line: Goody. What's it say?

name: Leonard
line: He's working on a paper about nano vacuum tubes, and wants to know if I'd take a look at it.

name: Sheldon
line: That's strange. That he would come to you for that and not me. Oh, I got two emails from him. Do you have Leonard's email address? And. Never mind, I found it. I can't believe he picked you over me.

name: Howard
line: You don't want to read a paper by some old has-been who hasn't done any real science in decades.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, it's nothing to cry about.

name: Sheldon
line: Sheldon Cooper does not cry.

name: Howard
line: It's true, you'd rust.

name: Sheldon
line: And to think I idolized that man. And why? At the end of the day he's just another Hollywood phony.

name: Amy
line: Is it really worth getting upset about?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, they say don't meet your heroes. Don't peek behind that curtain of fame and celebrity, because if you do, you'll see them as they really are, degenerate carnival folk.

name: Amy
line: Come on, he's a retired kids show host.

name: Sheldon
line: That's even worse. Using the sweet candy of science to trick children into loving him. Pervert.

name: Amy
line: Have you ever thought about why Arthur didn't want you to read his paper?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I have. And my only conclusion is the prescription he was picking up the other day was for cuckoo pills.

name: Amy
line: Maybe he found you, um, a bit much.

name: Sheldon
line: That's kind of a stretch. Look, when it comes to social skills, I've mastered the big three. There's the coy smile. There's the friendly chuckle. There's the vocalization of sympathy. Aw. That last one's tricky, I'm still working on it.

name: Amy
line: From what I saw the other day, I could understand why he and some people might find you...

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Amy
line: Doesn't matter.

name: Sheldon
line: No, go ahead, say it. I know what it is. I've heard it my whole life. The word's annoying. Go ahead, say it. Say it. Say I'm annoying.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it won't hurt my feelings. Go ahead, Amy, say I'm annoying. I'm annoying. I'm annoying. I'm annoying. Yeah, now, uh, now where are you going? Look, you know you want to say it, say it. Say I'm annoying. Go ahead, say it. Say it. Say it. Amy, say it. Well, she can't stand it when I'm right.

name: Amy
line: This is fun. I'm going to feel like such a vixen wearing jewellery that doesn't have a list of medications I'm allergic to.

name: Raj
line: Penny, how's it going over there?

name: Penny
line: Good, I'm just having little trouble with the glue.

name: Amy
line: How do you not know how to use glue? Did you ditch pre-school?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but only because I was dating a second grader.

name: Howard
line: Hello, everyone.

name: Raj
line: Okay, let me have it. Let's hear all the Raj is a girl jokes.

name: Howard
line: Nope. Bernadette told me it isn't nice and I'm not allowed.

name: Raj
line: Thank you.

name: Howard
line: So I won't be making fun of you, or the things you like, or the fact that you just want to have fu-un.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, stop. Come on, look at what I'm making.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's actually pretty nice.

name: Amy
line: I'm making a bracelet.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm just making a mess.

name: Howard
line: You know, instead of beads and glue, you guys can use my soldering iron. You'd be able to make much cooler stuff.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I think we're doing just fine, thank you.

name: Amy
line: Actually, I'd kind of like to try that.

name: Bernadette
line: Me, too.

name: Howard
line: Be right back.

name: Penny
line: When did I have pistachios?

name: Sheldon
line: Arthur.  Arthur.  Arthur. Door knocker. That's TV money.

name: Arthur
line: Sheldon, what are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, did I wake you?

name: Arthur
line: Of course you woke me, it's seven thirty.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I would have been here sooner, but for some reason your home isn't on this map of Hollywood stars.

name: Arthur
line: What do you want, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: It's been pointed out by my girlfriend that I may have been annoying to you.

name: Arthur
line: She sounds like a keeper.

name: Sheldon
line: Anyway, I wanted to apologize. I am truly sorry.

name: Arthur
line: All right, apology accepted. Have a nice night.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, now that we've cleared the air, I wanted to discuss another matter with you.

name: Arthur
line: Sheldon, in a couple hours I have to get up, pee and then wander around the house.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then, I'll make this quick. Um, I want to talk about the paper you sent Leonard. Now, I know he said it's promising and he's going to collaborate on it, but now that you and I are friends again, I am at your disposal. And, um, frankly, lending my name and reputation to it will help, because a lot of people think that you're a washed-up has-been. Or dead.

name: Arthur
line: I should be so lucky.

name: Sheldon
line: So, uh, what do you say?

name: Arthur
line: You know, if it's all the same with you, I, I think I'll, I'll stick with Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: It's because I'm annoying, right? I know it is. Say it. Say it. Say I'm annoying.

name: Arthur
line: Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Say it. Arthur, say it. Say I'm annoying. Say it. Say it. I'm annoying. Say it.

name: Arthur
line: You're annoying.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that really hurt.

name: Leonard
line: If you would have told me when I was a kid that someday I would be doing science next to Professor Proton, I would not have believed you.

name: Arthur
line: If someone had told me that people would still call me Professor Proton when I was 83 years old, I never would have quit smoking.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, Dr. Jeffries, I'm just excited. This nano vacuum tube idea of yours is, it's really interesting.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, Leonard. Oh, hello, Arthur. What an odd coincidence that you're both here.

name: Leonard
line: Why is it odd?

name: Sheldon
line: Because as it just so happens, I'm also spending the day with a beloved children's television science personality. Isn't that right, new friend and colleague Bill Nye the Science Guy. Sorry, I replaced you with a newer model.

name: Bill Nye
line: Wow, Arthur Jeffries. It's an honour to meet you. My show never would have happened without yours.

name: Arthur
line: That's what I told my lawyers.

name: Leonard
line: Mr. Nye, hello. I'm sorry he got you involved in this nonsense.

name: Bill
line: He said I'd be speaking to a class.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I said you were teaching someone a lesson. Now let's go.

name: Bill
line: What are you guys working on?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, we're making nano vacuum tubes.

name: Bill
line: Oh, that's interesting.

name: Arthur
line: Haven't you stolen enough from me? Back off, bow tie.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys, what do you think?

name: Amy
line: Wow, Penny, good job.

name: Penny
line: Thanks. Target, four ninety-nine. I'm getting a drink.

name: Amy
line: What are you working on?

name: Raj
line: Ah, I'm making a necklace for my mom.

name: Amy
line: That's sweet.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, she and my dad are going through a bit of a rough patch, so I wanted to do something to let her know I was thinking about her.

name: Penny
line: What's going on with them?

name: Raj
line: They're just having a little trouble communicating. My dad says it's because the sound of my mom's voice makes him want to tear his ears off and sew them over his eyes so he never has to look at her again.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys.

name: Amy
line: Hello.

name: Howard
line: Look who's here to put the Jew in jewellery night.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, sure, so it's fine when you say it.

name: Howard
line: Sorry we're late. I wanted to swing by the lab and pick up some even cooler tools for us to use.

name: Raj
line: I didn't know you were coming again.

name: Howard
line: Well, last week was a blast. Plus, I thought you might like having a guy here.

name: Penny
line: It was not funny.

name: Amy
line: So, what tools did you bring?

name: Howard
line: Everything we need to make jewellery moulds. Here's some silver, a crucible and an acetylene torch to melt it down.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, that looks like fun.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe you should master glue before you move on to fire.

name: Howard
line: Okay, who's up first?

name: Amy
line: Rajesh, do you want to make a bracelet for your mom to go with the necklace?

name: Raj
line: No, thanks.

name: Howard
line: I was gonna make a necklace for my mom, but unfortunately she doesn't have a neck. She's just chins and fat and feet.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we're almost ready to go. Once we bond the wires, we can test the tubes.

name: Arthur
line: This is so exciting, I, I feel like I'm 75 again.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, God.

name: Arthur
line: What, what is it?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon just sent me a picture of him and Bill Nye getting smoothies.

name: Arthur
line: Can, can I ask you a question?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Arthur
line: Why do you put up with Sheldon?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, you know, because we're friends.

name: Arthur
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: Wow, you ask really hard questions.

name: Arthur
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I know he can be aggravating, but what you have to remember is that he's not doing it on purpose. It's just how he is. But he's also loyal and trustworthy and we have fun together.

name: Arthur
line: You, you know you're describing a dog.

name: Leonard
line: He did bite me once. But in his defence, I came up behind him while he was eating, so...

name: Arthur
line: Yeah, they, they hate that.

name: Leonard
line: You know what, Sheldon is the smartest person I have ever met. And he's a little broken and he needs me. I guess I need him, too.

name: Arthur
line: Why, why is that?

name: Leonard
line: Boy, you will not let this go, will you? Oh, jeez.

name: Arthur
line: Another photo from Sheldon?

name: Leonard
line: No, I have to go pick him up. Bill Nye ditched him at the smoothie place.

name: Arthur
line: He probably stole his wallet, too.

name: Howard
line: You know, if you guys are interested, there's a technique where I can take a lock of your hair, refine it into carbon dust and use the hydraulic press at work to turn it into a tiny little diamond with your DNA in it.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's amazing,

name: Howard
line: Yeah. See Bernie's engagement ring? That came right off my mom's back.

name: Bernadette
line: He's kidding. If that were true, it'd be so much bigger.

name: Raj
line: My name is Howard. I can make your hair into diamonds. My mom is morbidly obese. Everybody love me.

name: Howard
line: Whoa, where is that coming from?

name: Raj
line: I'll tell you where it's coming from. All you do is make fun of me for coming to girls' night and now you're here ruining it for everyone.

name: Penny
line: Raj, cool it, he's gonna make us hair diamonds.

name: Howard
line: How am I ruining anything? I'm just trying to help you make better jewellery.

name: Raj
line: But this isn't about the jewellery. This is about me having a place where I can open up about my feelings.

name: Howard
line: Since when can't you open up with me?

name: Raj
line: There are just some things that I feel more comfortable sharing with the girls, because they won't make fun of me or and call me names, or ask me if my Koothrapanties are in a bunch.

name: Howard
line: Buddy, I was just joking around.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, well, sometimes your jokes hurt.

name: Howard
line: You're right. I didn't realize I was making you feel that way. It was very brave of you to tell me.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. It wasn't easy.

name: Amy
line: They're gonna have sex before Sheldon and I do, I know it.

name: Sheldon
line: Arthur?

name: Arthur
line: Hi, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm surprised to see you here.

name: Arthur
line: Yeah, me, too. Somewhere around the third floor I began to see a, a white light.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll get Leonard.

name: Arthur
line: No, no, no, I'm, I'm here, I'm here to see you.

name: Sheldon
line: If you're hoping to get in touch with Bill Nye, I can't help you. I've been informed that he's now Bill Nye the Restraining Order Guy.

name: Arthur
line: No, I, I, I was thinking, if it isn't too much trouble, I'd like to get your opinion about my, my paper.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. It would be an honour.

name: Arthur
line: Oh. Uh, great.

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, I don't need that. I hacked into your e-mail account and read it.

name: Arthur
line: And, what did you think?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, first, I think the fact that you use your birthday as a password is embarrassing.

name: Arthur
line: Mmm. Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Second, um, I thought your paper was inspired.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, well, that, that means a lot to me.

name: Sheldon
line: Can I invite you in for tea?

name: Arthur
line: Uh, no, no. I, I really, I have, I have to run.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Arthur. How are you?

name: Arthur
line: Well, I guess one cup wouldn't hurt.

name: Howard
line: Oh, hey, buddy, what's up?

name: Raj
line: Well, I was feeling bad about how I acted the other night so I made you a little something.

name: Howard
line: You didn't have to do that.

name: Raj
line: Well, it was fun. I used some of the jewellery techniques you taught us. It's a lightsabre belt buckle.

name: Howard
line: Wow, this is so cool. Thanks.

name: Raj
line: Oh gets better.

name: Howard
line: Wow.

name: Raj
line: And that's not even the best part. See? I have one, too. Check it out. You can wear yours and we can have little sword fights whenever we want.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, and my eighth favourite episode of Professor Proton was Alka-Seltzer rocket. You said, plop, plop, fizz, fizz, oh, what a blast-off it is. Remember? Remember that? Remember?

name: Leonard
line: He can't help it. He can't. He really can't.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, wait here. I'll get some Alka-Seltzer, we can build that rocket, and we can shoot it at Bill Nye's house. As long as I'm not within 500 feet of it.

name: Arthur
line: So, you, uh, you have, you have any, single grandmothers?

name: Penny
line: Sorry, they're both married.

name: Arthur
line: Good.

name: Penny
line: Mmm.

name: Arthur
line: Hap, hap, happily?

name: Penny
line: Hey, can I ask you a question?

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Penny
line: You've had this dart board since I've known you, but I've never seen you play.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, uh, we played, once. I broke a window.

name: Penny
line: What window?

name: Leonard
line: That one over there.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, where are the Skee-Ball tickets?

name: Leonard
line: Skee-Ball tickets?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, from when we went to the arcade three years ago? I finally decided what prize I want. Hurry up.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, if I still have them, they're probably in the junk box.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, what are you gonna get?

name: Sheldon
line: None of your business. But when you see me wearing a flower in my lapel later, you are most welcome to sniff it.

name: Leonard
line: Yup, oh, here you go.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, thank you. Here, get yourself an eraser for your troubles.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. I forgot about this. My aunt made it for me when I started college.

name: Penny
line: Aw, did she hate you?

name: Leonard
line: Why? Because I got an ugly, itchy sweater, and my brother got a car? No, I was her favorite.

name: Sheldon
line: I seem to be a few tickets short. Are there more in the box?

name: Leonard
line: Hmm, I think I got them all. Nope, they're not in there.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you barely looked. Let me see.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, I, I looked, and there's, there's, there's no more tickets.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, let me look in the box.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, okay. I'm gonna show you what's in the box. But just promise not to flip out.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would I flip out? Is it a spider? It's a spider.

name: Penny
line: No, if it was a spider, Lenny would've flipped out.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Sheldon, I know I was supposed to return this DVD a long time ago, and I know we rented it on your card. But it's been, like, seven years and clearly nothing bad has happened. So in-in-in-instead of being a giant pain in the ass like you always are, what if this one time you just tried staying calm?

name: Sheldon
line: That seems like a reasonable request. Although so did, hey, Leonard, would you mind returning that DVD?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry. I'll, I'll take care of it.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: I mean it, I'm going to.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe you.

name: Leonard
line: And you're going to stay calm?

name: Sheldon
line: I said I would.

name: Leonard
line: How about that? Sheldon's being reasonable.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's freaking me out. I'm gonna go.

name: Leonard
line: So, when you say you're not going to freak out about the DVD, here's what that means. Don't fixate on it. Don't wake me up in the middle of the night. Or nag me through the door while I'm on the toilet.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, first, talking to you while you're on the toilet isn't exactly a picnic for me either, okay? Remember, when you can hear me, I can hear you. And second, you completely disregard how uncomfortable unresolved issues are for me. It's, it's like, a, an itch in my brain I can't scratch.

name: Leonard
line: When I broke my arm I used to stick a coat hanger down there. You ever try that? Maybe go in through the ear?

name: Sheldon
line: You wouldn't make jokes if you could feel the way I feel.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I don't know how to do that.

name: Sheldon
line: How about this? I promise I won't pester you about the DVD. You can defecate in peace. That's a win for both of us. But, until this matter is resolved, I would like you to wear this sweater. With nothing underneath it.

name: Leonard
line: That's stupid. Why?

name: Sheldon
line: You say it's itchy and uncomfortable. I say situations like this make me feel the same way.

name: Leonard
line: I'm telling you, try the hanger.

name: Sheldon
line: Put it on. Let's share the experience.

name: Leonard
line: You got it. If this sweater shuts you up, I'm gonna make a fortune selling them to everyone we know. Now all I need to do is head down to the video store and return the DVD.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, did I forget to tell you? That store went out of business years ago.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: How those nipples feeling, chief?

name: Bernadette
line: Penny, can we please get our drinks?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, hang on, just give me sec.

name: Amy
line: At work today, I did an in vivo stereotaxic surgery.

name: Bernadette
line: Cool. At my lab, I performed ten laser capture micro-dissections.

name: Penny
line: I scraped gum off the bottom of that table. Only 'cause my manager saw me put it there.

name: Amy
line: Oh, my gosh. That's the girl that broke Rajesh's heart.

name: Bernadette
line: That's Lucy?

name: Penny
line: I don't know why but I always pictured her as Indian.

name: Bernadette
line: I think that reason's called racism.

name: Penny
line: I'm gonna go talk to her.

name: Bernadette
line: Why? What are you gonna say?

name: Penny
line: I'm not gonna say anything. I just want to check her out. Because she hurt my friend. My Indian friend. Who's racist now?

name: Bernadette
line: You because you just called him your Indian friend.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, you're short.

name: Amy
line: We're never getting our drinks.

name: Bernadette
line: No, but we knew that.

name: Penny
line: Hey, can I start you off with something to drink?

name: Lucy
line: Oh, water would be great.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Um, you're Lucy, right? I'm a friend of Raj Koothrappali's. Actually Amy recognized you.

name: Lucy
line: Wow. How's he doing?

name: Penny
line: Oh, you know, he's good.

name: Lucy
line: Great.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, this is none of my business. But why did you break up with him in an e-mail?

name: Lucy
line: Oh, I don't know. I guess I thought it would be easier.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I get that. I'll go get you your water. When you say easier, you mean easier for you, right? ‘Cause it certainly didn't make it easier for him.

name: Lucy
line: Any chance I can get a different waitress?

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, this is rude of me. I will go get that water. See, see, see, see. Just now you expressed your feelings to my face. How come you could do that with me, but not Raj?

name: Lucy
line: I don't know your e-mail.

name: Penny
line: You know what the worst part is? You're sitting here, perfectly happy and he's at home, a blubbering mess.

name: Lucy
line: Oh, I thought you said he was okay.

name: Penny
line: Well, I also said I was getting you water, but look at me still standing here. You know, I may be a bad waitress, but you are a bad person. Now, you want to hear the specials?

name: Howard
line: So, you can never take it off?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Raj
line: Not even to sleep?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: So, you're just an idiot?

name: Leonard
line: It's called proving a point.

name: Howard
line: Is the point that you're an idiot?

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, please. Leonard is trying to walk a mile in my metaphorical shoes. He can't walk in my actual shoes. He has the feet of a toddler.

name: Raj
line: So, how are you gonna return the DVD if the store went out of business?

name: Leonard
line: Monday morning I'll go downtown, look up the owner's information and send him the DVD. Pay the late fee, and prove to Sheldon that you can have a problem and solve it without acting like a complete lunatic. Ah!

name: Howard
line: And the man impersonating a bear would like everyone to know that only you can prevent forest fires.

name: Raj
line: I don't get it.

name: Howard
line: You didn't have Smokey the Bear in India?

name: Raj
line: No. Oh, is he anything like, uh, Mun-Mun the Mongoose? He taught us not to play with cobras.

name: Howard
line: You had to be taught not to play with cobras?

name: Raj
line: You had to be taught not to burn down the forest?

name: Penny
line: Hey, if you guys were hungry, why didn't you order something at the restaurant?

name: Bernadette
line: We did, you never brought it.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's right. Nachos and a turkey club.

name: Amy
line: Not even close.

name: Penny
line: Well, I was too busy standing up for my friend to worry about your, I want to say salmon.

name: Amy
line: You want to say sorry.

name: Bernadette
line: So, how are you gonna tell Raj abut what you did?

name: Penny
line: What do you mean how? What's the big deal?

name: Amy
line: You told Lucy he was a pathetic mess.

name: Bernadette
line: Then you made her cry and leave.

name: Penny
line: Okay, you guys are overreacting. Raj is gonna appreciate how I had his back.

name: Raj
line: What is wrong with you, Penny? You ruined any chance I had of getting back with Lucy. Now she knows I'm a desperate mess instead of just being pretty sure.  It's Lucy. She wants to meet for coffee. I love you, Penny.

name: Howard
line: Hey, what're you working on?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm thinking about how one could use the fact that a rapidly rotating mirror turns virtual photons into real ones as a method of observing dark energy.

name: Howard
line: That's a pretty cool idea.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. It's great you're here. I'd love to get an engineer's opinion.

name: Howard
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: This chair is squeaky. Now, do I fix it or get a new one?

name: Leonard
line: Well, Sheldon, it took me all morning, but I found the owner of the video store. And I am happy to report that he died peacefully in his sleep, drunk at the bottom of a pool. Anyway, there is no one to return the DVD to, so this issue is resolved. Ah! And I'd just like to point out that even though the sweater was uncomfortable, I didn't use it as an excuse to antagonize everyone around me.

name: Howard
line: You know, you could reimburse the video store owner's next of kin.

name: Leonard
line: Or it's resolved.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, that next of kin thing sounds pretty good.

name: Howard
line: I believe this is yours.

name: Raj
line: Can I ask you guys a question? So, I'm seeing Lucy tomorrow night, and I've never hung out with someone who broke up with me. How do you do it?

name: Howard
line: You can't let her know you're hurting. You know, the key is confidence.

name: Raj
line: Why is the key always confidence? How come it's never love handles and flop sweat?

name: Bernadette
line: If this girl hurt you so much, are you sure you want to see her again?

name: Howard
line: Well, if I may, he has so little self-respect and is so desperate for the smallest crumb of affection, she could literally sleep with his own father in his own bed and post the video to YouTube, and he'd still buy her flowers and ask her to be his bride.

name: Raj
line: He's right. But in my defence, if we could survive that, we could survive anything.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, if you're sure you want to do this, it's only coffee, just relax and see what happens.

name: Raj
line: Well, can I say she looks nice?

name: Bernadette
line: Sure.

name: Raj
line: Can I tell her I miss her?

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe, if she asks.

name: Raj
line: Oh, can I show her an oil painting I made of us surrounded by our children and grandchildren?

name: Bernadette
line: I'd save that for the second date.

name: Raj
line: Good, good. ‘Cause no matter how hard I try, I cannot get the twins to look alike.

name: Penny
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I'm just trying to find the stupid next of kin to this stupid video store owner so I can return the DVD and see the look on Sheldon's stupid face when he sees that I didn't let this get to me.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon's not here. Why don't you take the sweater off?

name: Leonard
line: There's a principle at stake.

name: Penny
line: Which is?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I don't know. Who cares? Look at me.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God! Is that sweater made of bees? Come on, take it off. I won't tell.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, honey, if I take it off, Sheldon wins.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, every night you don't kill him in his sleep, he wins.

name: Leonard
line: No, it's, it's almost done. I just, I have to find the next of kin, and send 'em the DVD and then just wait for someone with my complexion to die so I can get a skin graft.

name: Penny
line: Smile.

name: Leonard
line: What is that? What is that for?

name: Penny
line: So you can send it to Princeton and get your money back.

name: Amy
line: I must say, Sheldon, you're handling this DVD business with an impressive amount of maturity.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know why that surprises you. I'm a grown man. As should be evident by this sport coat and very real flower in my lapel.

name: Amy
line: Is there some kind of new coping mechanism you're employing?

name: Sheldon
line: The more interesting question you should be asking is, what does this flower smell like?

name: Amy
line: I'm gonna go with sad. So what's the story with you and this DVD?

name: Sheldon
line: There's nothing to tell. Maybe I purchased a book entitled Don't Sweat the Small Stuff and I followed its wise suggestions, one of which was stop and smell the flowers.

name: Amy
line: Seriously?

name: Sheldon
line: Please. Ha-ha, Oh.

name: Lucy
line: Hi.

name: Raj
line: Hello. Oh, it's so good to see you.

name: Lucy
line: You, too.

name: Raj
line: Please, sit. I, uh, I got you a cappuccino. I remembered it was your favourite. I also got crumb cake, but I remembered it was my favourite and I ate it. Anyway, uh, how are you?

name: Lucy
line: I'm pretty good. Listen, I just wanted to apologize for breaking up with you in an e-mail.

name: Raj
line: Well, and I ate all the crumb cake. We both made mistakes.

name: Lucy
line: Okay.

name: Raj
line: I'm so happy you asked me here, and I hope we can hang out again sometime. You know, as friends, lovemaking partners, whatever.

name: Lucy
line: Oh, uh, I'm kind of seeing someone.

name: Raj
line: I think I know the answer to this, but just to be clear, it's not me, right?

name: Raj
line: This is all your fault, I should've listened to Mun-Mun because I've been playing with a cobra and her name is Penny. Why are you so cruel? Do you enjoy my pain?

name: Penny
line: There's a girl at the Cheesecake Factory I can set you up with.

name: Raj
line: I love you, Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: How is it I can conceptualize a methodology of examining dark matter in the universe but can't figure out how to fix a novelty squirt flower?

name: Amy
line: I think the real question is, why do you waste your time with cheap, childish pranks?

name: Sheldon
line: There's probably a deep reason. Which I'd be happy to discuss with you over some peanut brittle in a can.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Sheldon, I am out of options. Video store owner, Nursis Manookian, has no next of kin.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you seem hot under the collar, or is that the sweater?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, oh, no, no. It's because I spent all afternoon at the Armenian church where his funeral mass was held. According to Father Solakian, no one attended. Luckily, my trip wasn't a complete waste. I lit a candle and prayed for your death but I'm not Armenian, so it probably won't work. This is over, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, not necessarily. I suggest you look for long-lost relatives either in Armenia or Lebanon.

name: Leonard
line: Listen to me, Sheldon. I am not going to Lebanon to return Super Mario Brothers the movie.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, it might be fun. You love hummus.

name: Leonard
line: Why isn't this bothering you? Isn't your brain getting itchy? This is on your card. This could be ruining your credit score. Why isn't this making you crazy?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I have something to tell you, but I want you to promise not to flip out.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Seven years ago, I found out the DVD was late and I paid for it.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I was going to mention it at the time, but then I thought, some day, this might be a teachable moment.

name: Leonard
line: Aaaah! I, you, how can, what!

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, that was diabolical.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. And it wasn't easy. Do you have any idea what it's like to wait for years and never know if you're going to finally get satisfaction?

name: Raj
line: Wow. You're even prettier than Penny said. I can't believe a girl like you doesn't have a boyfriend.

name: Girl
line: Well, I don't.

name: Raj
line: I don't believe you, you're lying to me.

name: Girl
line: What?

name: Raj
line: Oh, it's okay. I have no morals and I'm desperately lonely. I'll be the other man if you want a little something-something on the side.

name: Girl
line: What is wrong with you?

name: Penny
line: What is wrong with you?

name: Raj
line: What is wrong with you?

name: Leonard
line: The math is all there. It's not real.

name: Penny
line: Yes, it is.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah,uh, look, it is scientifically impossible for a person to tip a cow. Even you, with your stocky build and lumberjack shoulders, you couldn't do it.

name: Raj
line: It's horrible. Why would you push a cow over? They're sacred.

name: Penny
line: Oh, stop it. I've seen you eat, like, a million hamburgers.

name: Raj
line: Hey, an animal can be both sacred and delicious.

name: Penny
line: Look, I'm telling you I've done it, okay? I clearly remember the cow standing up and then the cow on its side.

name: Leonard
line: Were you drunk?

name: Penny
line: I was 16 in Nebraska. What do you think?

name: Leonard
line: I think you're the one who fell over.

name: Penny
line: That would explain why the sky was also on its side.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Howard. Cow tipping. Real or not?

name: Howard
line: Mmm. I'm gonna say not. That's just based on me trying to roll my mom over when she's snoring. Speaking of that big side of beef, uh, she's invited all of you to Thanksgiving at her house.

name: Sheldon
line: Mmm. You know, I've been told that a bald refusal of an invitation is rude and one must instead offer up a polite excuse, so I'd love to go, but, unfortunately, that sounds awful.

name: Howard
line: Come on, it'll be fun.

name: Penny
line: Uh, we were actually gonna do it here.

name: Howard
line: Please? Bernadette's bringing her dad 'cause her mom's out of town, and I never have anything to say to that guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, since you put it that way, I'd love to go, but that sounds even more awful.

name: Leonard
line: It'd actually be nice to not hear Sheldon complain about my cooking all day.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, excuse me, but every year you prepare a terrible meal and every year I criticize it. Do our traditions mean nothing to you?

name: Leonard
line: I want to go.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, me, too.

name: Raj
line: I'm in.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh, fine, I'll go. But if her food is delicious, Thanksgiving is ruined, and it's on you.

name: Sheldon
line: Do we really have to go to Mrs. Wolowitz's house?

name: Amy
line: We do. And I expect you to be on your best behaviour.

name: Sheldon
line: Now I know how the African slaves felt. Being dragged from their homes to labour under the yoke of the white man.

name: Amy
line: Are you honestly comparing Thanksgiving dinner at Wolowitz's mom's with one of the greatest tragedies in the history of mankind?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, you can have a nice Thanksgiving anywhere. I spent one in Vegas.

name: Leonard
line: You did?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, back when I was dating Zack. It was actually more fun than I thought. We gambled, we went to one of those cheesy wedding chapels, we had a really good turkey dinner. Which was surprising, since we were at a strip club.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, you went to a chapel?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: We had one of those silly fake weddings.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, you know those are real, right?

name: Penny
line: No, they're not.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, they are.

name: Penny
line: No, they're not.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, they are.

name: Sheldon
line: He's right.

name: Amy
line: They're real.

name: Penny
line: But it didn't seem real.

name: Sheldon
line: Let me ask you a question. At any point, was Las Vegas on its side?

name: Bernadette
line: Hi, Dad.

name: Mike
line: Hi, honey.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, you brought beer for everybody.

name: Mike
line: Uh, okay, yeah, it's for everybody. I really just wanted to have a nice, quiet day at home and watch the game.

name: Bernadette
line: You can have a quiet day and watch the game here.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: Howard, the medicine's not working.

name: Howard
line: You just took it. At least let it reach your first stomach.  Hey, Mike. Let me help you out, there.

name: Mike
line: Thanks. What's wrong with your mom?

name: Howard
line: Oh, her gout's flaring up. Turns out an apple pie a day does not keep the doctor away.

name: Mrs Wolowitz
line: How can one little toe hurt so bad?

name: Howard
line: Maybe because that little piggy is being crushed by the barn. She should quiet down soon. I gave her enough pain meds to choke a, well, her.

name: Bernadette
line: I guess we're gonna have to do all the cooking.

name: Howard
line: I have a better idea.

name: Bernadette
line: If you think you're gonna make me do all this by myself, you're crazy.

name: Howard
line: I was gonna make Raj do it all by himself.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, well, that's a great idea.

name: Amy
line: No traffic, we're sailing.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Like we're on a ship. Coming from Africa to America.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, that's completely inappropriate. You can't keep comparing yourself to a slave.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, Miss Amy.

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe you're married to that idiot.

name: Penny
line: Ugh, would you stop? We just did it as a goof.

name: Leonard
line: Well, a goof or not, you're actually married. You need to get this taken care of.

name: Penny
line: I will. Why are you making this such a big deal?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, oh, oh, I have a reason. It could be because you said yes to marrying Zack, but every time Leonard's proposed, he's gotten a resounding no. Yeah, that's just off the top of my head.

name: Penny
line: So how do I undo this?

name: Leonard
line: I'm hoping you can get an annulment. It's just like it never happened.

name: Penny
line: Great, well, what do I have to do?

name: Amy
line: It says here you can get an annulment if any of the following conditions are met. Were you unable to consummate the marriage?

name: Sheldon
line: Hah!Penny? Next.

name: Amy
line: Is there any evidence of fraud, bigamy, want of understanding?

name: Penny
line: Want of understanding? What does that even mean?

name: Amy
line: Ding, ding, ding. We have a winner.

name: Bernadette
line: Thanks for saving the day.

name: Raj
line: Ah, no problem. It wouldn't be Thanksgiving without an Indian providing the food. Uh, now, where does your mom keep the Crisco?

name: Howard
line: Um, I don't know. Probably in a wad in her cheek.

name: Bernadette
line: I'll help Raj in here. Why don't you go keep my dad company?

name: Howard
line: He doesn't want me in there. I'm the creepy little guy who has sex with his daughter.

name: Bernadette
line: Don't be silly, he loves you.

name: Howard
line: Does he?

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, he cares about you a lot.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Bernadette
line: I do crap for you all the time. Get out there.

name: Howard
line: So your wife's in Arizona with the grandkids?

name: Mike
line: Uh-huh.

name: Howard
line: You know, my mom's been to Arizona. She rode one of those mules down in the Grand Canyon. Long story short, they had to shoot it. ‘Cause she's so fat. I'll get the door while you finish laughing. Hey, guys.

name: Amy
line: Happy Thanksgiving.

name: Sheldon
line: It smells wonderful. Is anyone slaving away in the kitchen? Because I, too, know...

name: Amy
line: Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Here. Thank you for having us.

name: Howard
line: What's with you?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, she's mad at me because she just found out she's married to Zack.

name: Howard
line: Really? That dumb-ass she used to date? That's hysterical.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe I felt bad for opening this in the car.

name: Amy
line: You need any help?

name: Raj
line: Uh, yeah, can you, uh, reach that, uh, gravy boat up there?

name: Amy
line: Uh, sure.

name: Raj
line: Great. That makes one of you. Okay, we have a lot to do and not much time to do it. Bernadette, you're on corn, gravy and yam detail. Amy, you're on rolls, cranberries and making sure Bernadette stays away from the marshmallows. That's right, I see you. Okay, if you have any questions, I'll be over here basting my ass off. Focus is key.

name: Amy
line: Did you guys know Penny married Zack three years ago?

name: Together
line: What?

name: Howard
line: You ever play football?

name: Mike
line: A little in college. You?

name: Howard
line: No. But I did get tackled in the hallway once. The whole school cheered.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I found the, uh, court papers that you and Zack need to fill out. I'll print them when we get home.

name: Penny
line: Fine.

name: Leonard
line: And we can just put this whole thing behind us.

name: Penny
line: Are you done?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Look, I get it, I screwed up. Is this all we're gonna talk about the rest of the day?

name: Leonard
line: Why are you mad at me? You're the one that did the stupid thing. I'm just trying to fix it.

name: Penny
line: Ugh, I need some air.

name: Leonard
line: Wuh, Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know the first thing about women, but I would not follow her.

name: Mike
line: Listen to Stretch.

name: Leonard
line: How am I the bad guy? She's the one who married someone else. I'm the victim.

name: Howard
line: Sounds like Zack's the victim. You're sleeping with his wife.

name: Mike
line: I've kept my marriage together for 35 years. Can I weigh in here?

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Mike
line: I'm trying to watch the game. Shut up. Oh, how do you not make a first down there?

name: Sheldon
line: They passed against a nickel defence. They should have run it off-tackle.

name: Mike
line: How the hell do you know that?

name: Sheldon
line: My father loved football. He always made me watch it before I was allowed to do my homework.

name: Penny
line: Well, you'll be happy to know I just spoke to Zack and he's willing to sign the court papers. He's on his way here now.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, you invited him here?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Mike
line: I'm getting ready to weigh in again.

name: Leonard
line: Come on.

name: Mike
line: What do you think they ought to do now?

name: Sheldon

line: I just don't understand why you invited him here today.

line: That is not what I expected when you said you were gonna burp pie.

line: I don't know what's scarier, the bathroom clowns or the woman that put them there.

line: All I know is you can only fit one of her in a car. And there's the clown that came out of her. I really didn't want to come here, but this is shaping up to be one of the best Thanksgivings I've had in a long time.

line: Me, too.

line: Hey. Howie says you've been making fun of him all day. Now, both of you apologize right now.

line: Hey, I'm sorry about today. And I promise, next time I get married, it won't be a joke. It'll be for love. Or money.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Is it at all possible that you're knitting a pair of pants? Oh, well, no, you're understandably terrified. But, you know, allow me to explain. 45 days ago, um, I embarked on a railroad journey of healing because my university was making me do string theory, and my favorite comic book store burned down, and when my room mate got engaged, my girlfriend wanted to move in with me, which was no doubt a ploy just to see my, well, excuse my language, but my bathing suit parts. Uh, sir, may I use your phone?

name: Man
line: I don't think so.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, I understand that I'm half naked, but there is a reasonable explanation. While I slept in my sleeper car, all my possessions were stolen. Now, typically, I wear pyjamas, but I recently adopted a hobo lifestyle and pyjamas are the sleep-pants of the Man. I'll have you know, Mahatma Gandhi wore no pants and a nation rallied behind him. My good man, now, before you walk away, I know that I may appear deranged, but I am, in fact, a world-renowned physicist. Ask me the difference between a boson and a fermion. Go ahead, ask. Bosons have integer spin, fermions have half-integer spin. My legs are getting cold. Why won't anybody help me?

name: Leonard
line: Morning.

line: Hi. Want to do yoga with me?

line: Um, let me just have some coffee first, and then I'll have the strength to tell you how much I won't be doing that.  Hello?

line: So are you worried because he's replacing you as a son or are you worried because he's becoming her lover?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I understand. You want to do something you're already good at. I know. Why don't I get you a job at the Sitting Around All Day Wearing Yoga Pants Factory?

line: Oh, I'm fine. Why did you come?

line: So, Sheldon, tell us about your trip. Where'd you go?

line: Good. So, how do you feel your previous job experience has prepared you for a career like this?

line: Uh, well, as a waitress, sales was a big part of my job. I mean, believe me, I convinced a lot of very large customers, who should not be eating cheesecake, to have more cheesecake. I mean, one of those chubsters even had an insulin pump.

name: Dan
line: Uh-huh. I have an insulin pump.

name: Penny
line: People.

line: It's weird, right? A grown man in his thirties living with my mother.

line: That is weird. I thought he was, like, 45.

name: Howard
line: Come on, you don't think it's a little odd?

name: Raj
line: I don't know. I mean, she's lonely. He needs a place to stay. I doubt there's any funny business going on. And even if there was, who cares? They're both adults.

line: Who cares? You wouldn't care if I slept with your mom?

line: You know what? You're my best friend, and she's in a bad marriage. I give you my blessing.

line: This is stupid. I'm just gonna call my mother and be honest with her.

line: All right, let's say a physician was prescribing one of our competitor's drugs. How would you convince them to switch to ours?

line: Um, any chance his car needs to be washed by a girl in a bikini? No. Okay, I'm really sorry for wasting your time.

line: Don't worry about it. Thanks for stopping by.

line: Okay, thanks. Um, I'm sorry, listen, could you do me a favour and not tell Bernadette how badly I blew this interview? She'll get upset. And honestly I'm a, a little terrified of her.

line: I thought it was just me. Everyone thinks she's so nice with that squeaky little voice.

line: I know, but she's kind of a bully.

line: Yeah, yeah. One, one time, I had, I had to tell her we were cutting the, the research funding for one of the drugs she was developing.

line: I couldn't do it. She's still working on it. Oh, we're not gonna tell her about this, right?

line: Oh, my God, no.

line: At the hot dog stand in the Denver train station, Heinz ketchup. At the hot dog stand in the Salt Lake City train station, Heinz ketchup. At the hot dog stand in the Indianapolis train station?

line: I don't care.

name: Sheldon
line: Wrong. Hunt's. Hey, Amy, what do you say? You ready to move on to the mustard round?

line: Have you not noticed that I've been sitting back here quietly stewing for the past two hours?

line: I just thought you were bad at the game.

name: Amy
line: I'm mad at you. How could you just go away like that without even saying good-bye, and then call Leonard for help instead of me?

line: Amy, may I please have a moment of privacy to speak with my roommate?

line: We're in a moving car. What do you expect me to do? Stick my fingers in my ears?

line: Well, I was thinking put your head out the window like a dog, but that'll work. Please? This'll be quick. Leonard? As soon as we get home, I want to have coitus with Amy. Okay, she can't hear. The reason I called you is because I didn't want Amy to know I couldn't make it on my own.

name: Leonard
line: What's the big deal?

line: Oh, of course it's no big deal to you. You idolize me, and nothing could ever knock me off that pedestal you put me on.

line: Well, yeah, it's true. You, you are a god to me.

line: Just tell her.

line: I never thought I'd say this, but Penny got a job today.

line: Well, the only reason she got it is 'cause the guy who interviewed her loves me.

line: What do you want?

line: You're right, I'm not. I think it's weird.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie?

line: It is. He's a grown man. He's just gonna live there rent-free? How is that gonna motivate him to get off his butt and get a job? I mean, do you even have a plan?

line: Well, I didn't say I was your father.

line: Okay, calm down. You're not his father, he's not your father. Nobody's anybody's father.

line: Well, it's my house, it's my rules.

line: Oh, oh, okay, Dad, if I mow the lawn, can I have my allowance?

line: Hey, don't you take that sarcastic tone with him.

line: I don't have to listen to you.

line: Don't talk to her like that. That is my mother. Wife. My wife. I said my wife.

line: You know what? This isn't getting us anywhere. When you're ready to apologize, you know where to find me.

line: Yeah, in my house.

line: That's right, sucka.

line: I wish I'd never gone on that trip. I feel no better now than when I left.

line: Yeah. If you had told anyone that you were going away on a train by yourself across the country, do you know what they would have said?

line: That I couldn't do it?

line: Exactly. Right after they said yeah.

name: Amy
line: But you did do it. So what if it didn't all go your way? That's what makes it an adventure.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a good point. You know, I'm a lot like Gandalf the Grey. He fought the Balrog and emerged stronger than ever as Gandalf the White. I was robbed of my phone and pants, and I, too, came back stronger. And whiter, too, 'cause I wasn't in direct sunlight for six weeks.

name: Amy
line: See? This trip was good for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Indeed. I was the world's smartest caterpillar. And then after pupating in our nation's railway system, I've burst forth as the world's smartest butterfly.

line: Butterfly could've gotten himself home from Arizona.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I feel renewed. I'm ready to deal with any changes that come my way.

line: Your hair is different. You changed your hair. I can't take this. I'm out.

line: I thought your phone got stolen.
