line: Yeah, it did, but luckily all my photos got backed up to the Cloud.

name: Leonard
line: And you thought they all had a silver lining.

name: Sheldon
line: Here, day one, uh, this was the seat I was going to sit in but didn't because there were cracker crumbs on it. As it was first class, I suspect Ritz. This is the train bathroom. This is the Imodium I took so I would never have to use the train bathroom.

name: Penny
line: I cannot believe you travelled the entire country and never left the train station.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. You know, I almost died in a fire in Des Moines, but I stayed put. FYI, that's when the Imodium gave out.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. I'm Doctor Sheldon Cooper, and welcome to Sheldon Cooper presents Fun with Flags, the final episode flagtacular. I knew it was coming. Still scary. Now, I'm sure you're thinking, the final episode? Who will stand between us and flag ignorance?

name: Amy
line: I know I was thinking that. Is this a show on flags or mind reading?

name: Sheldon
line: But the truth is I can no longer balance a full-time career, a popular Internet show, and a girlfriend.

name: Amy
line: And he really does have one, you jerks on the comment board.

name: Sheldon
line: So as they say, all good things must come to an end.

name: Amy
line: After only 232 episodes.

name: Sheldon
line: 233 if we include the one somebody forgot to press record on.

name: Amy
line: You said you weren't gonna bring that up.

name: Sheldon
line: And you said you pressed record. Anyway, please sit back, relax, and join us as we take our final lap, as indicated by the waving of this racing flag. And, of course, white flags can also represent surrender, the Stewards of Gondor, and the Japanese Minamoto clan, but I'm sure you remember that from episode sixty-two, White Flags, Who's Wavin' ‘Em and Why?

name: Amy
line: That was a good one.

name: Sheldon
line: It was so good.

name: Raj
line: You know, I thought cleaning out a dead professor's office was gonna just be boring, but then I found his dentures and realized it's also gross.

name: Howard
line: Doesn't Professor Abbott's family want any of this stuff?

name: Leonard
line: I don't think he had a family.

name: Raj
line: That's rough.

name: Leonard
line: I know. You can spend your whole life working, and at the end all that's left are some papers in a box.

name: Howard
line: Makes you think. Oh, well.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. Hey, we're supposed to look through all this stuff before we throw it away in case it's important.

name: Howard
line: I did. It's all outdated or disproved.

name: Raj
line: I don't know. This old pen kind of proves gravity. When I tilt it, her bathing suit falls right off.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my dad used to have a pen like that. I dated it all through sixth grade.

name: Leonard
line: It still feels weird just throwing away his work like this.

name: Howard
line: Don't feel bad. Someday someone will be throwing out your work, too.

name: Leonard
line: That someone was Sheldon, and the day was yesterday. Hey, look at this. Dear Roger, to be opened upon your first great discovery. Love, Mom. Wow, look at the date. He saved this fifty years and never got to open it.

name: Howard
line: That's intense.

name: Raj
line: Poor Roger Abbott.

name: Howard
line: Roger Abbott sounds just like Roger Rabbit.

name: Raj
line: Roger Abbott, Roger Abbott, Roger Abbott. Oh, my God, Leonard, I know he's dead, but try it. It's fun. Roger Abbott, Roger Abbott.

name: Dan
line: Penny. Oh, my rookie of the year.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Dan. My boss who didn't want to hire me and now's a little hug machine.

name: Dan
line: Oh, look at you. Brand-new and already the third best sales rep.

name: Penny
line: Aw.

name: Dan
line: Yes. Why don't you come over to my table.

name: Penny
line: I'll be right there. Bernadette's just parking the car.

name: Dan
line: Oh, good. Bernadette. Cute, sweet, vicious little Bernadette.

name: Penny
line: Come on. She's not that bad.

name: Dan
line: Oh, yeah? At the company picnic she yelled at me and my grandson for losing the three-legged race. I mean, he still calls her that mean kid with the big boobies.

name: Penny
line: I know she can be a little intense, but, I swear, she is so sweet once you get past all the...

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, what are you talking about?

name: Penny
line: Oh. We were just talking about how much we love working with you. Isn't that right? Dan?

name: Sheldon
line: Over the years here at Fun With Flags, we've had an opportunity to learn, laugh, wonder.

name: Amy
line: And, yes, even shed a tear or two.

name: Sheldon
line: Like when you do a two-hour Fourth of July spectacular and it doesn't get recorded.

name: Amy
line: How many times do I have to say I'm sorry?

name: Sheldon
line: How about four thousand. One for every domino I set up to make that American flag. Please enjoy these highlights.

name: Sheldon
line: Crikey, what flag do we have today?

name: Amy
line: Australia, mate.

name: Sheldon
line: And now it's time for the speed round of Flag or Not a Flag.

name: Kripke
line: Fwag, fwag, not a fwag, fwag, I am cwushing this.

name: Amy
line: Say, Betsy Ross, what you working on?

name: Sheldon
line: I have no idea. Because the story of me sewing the first American flag is unsupported poppycock.

name: Amy
line: Then who did sew it, hmm?

name: Sheldon
line: Don't ask me. I'm just a simple seamstress whose descendants are out to make a quick buck.

name: Sheldon
line: Fancy a dip, my dear?

name: Amy
line: I do.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, that purple flag indicates that marine pests, such as jellyfish, are present.

name: Amy
line: Wow, that flag is a lifesaver.

name: Sheldon
line: No. This is. Stop looking at my legs.

name: Kripke
line: Not a fwag, fwag, fwag, not a fwag. Fwag. Ugh cwap.

name: Raj
line: When stuff like this gets me down, you know what I like to do?

name: Howard
line: Sing Hakuna Matata like an eight-year-old girl?

name: Raj
line: Wrong, smarty-pants. It's Everything Is Awesome from The Lego Movie.

name: Leonard
line: Look at these notebooks. They're full of pages and pages of data. He clearly spent years on this.

name: Howard
line: Mmm. It's just columns of random numbers. Toss it.

name: Leonard
line: Well, but what if this was a potential breakthrough for him? What if, what if this is the thing that would've finally let him open that bottle of champagne?

name: Raj
line: Maybe he didn't know what to pair champagne with. Strawberries, caviar, oysters. All good choices. Yeah, that look right there is why people eat before they come to your parties.

name: Leonard
line: This has to mean something.

name: Howard
line: Well, there's no discernible pattern that I can see, but it shouldn't be too hard to run the numbers and check.

name: Leonard
line: Well, maybe we can get some time on the supercomputer.

name: Howard
line: Sure. We could try multiple regressions with varying physical and experimental constants.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, we could run a pattern-matching algorithm against well-known unsolved physics problems.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, it might be a substitution cipher. We could start with basic cryptanalysis.

name: Raj
line: Or we could talk to this guy he used to share an office with.

name: Howard
line: Oh, let's do that.

name: Leonard
line: Because you don't know how to do cryptanalysis, do you?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I'm not even sure if it's the right word.

name: Penny
line: So, Dan, you have a grandson. How old is he?

name: Dan
line: Seven.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, yeah. I remember him from the picnic. He was the one crying like a wuss the whole time.

name: Penny
line: I heard he was being picked on by a mean kid.

name: Bernadette
line: Just builds character. Like my dad said, nobody likes a crybaby except their mommies and Democrats.”

name: Dan
line: I need another drink.

name: Bernadette
line: What's his problem?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I don't know. Maybe he didn't like the fact that you called his grandson a wuss.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, I didn't think you were supposed to say sissy anymore.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, I know what a good person you are, but sometimes people think you might come off a little harsh.

name: Bernadette
line: What? I'm, like, the sweetest person I know. Look at me. I should be in a tree baking cookies.

name: Penny
line: Yes, but once in a while, people think you're a little mean.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, yeah? You one of those people?

name: Penny
line: No. No, no, no. I think the cookie thing.

name: Amy
line: Action.

name: Sheldon
line: Welcome back. Our guest today is a returning fan favourite. He puts the reading in your rainbow, the Geordi in your La Forge, and the Kunta in your Kinte, Mr. LeVar Burton.

name: LeVar Burton
line: Thank you, Sheldon. Now, remember our deal.

name: Sheldon
line: You do this, I delete your contact information.

name: LeVar
line: While?

name: Sheldon
line: While you watch me do it.

name: LeVar
line: Great. Happy to be back.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, since you're here, I'd like to get your opinion on something. In honour of Black History Month, I portrayed George Washington Carver in a loving tribute that my roommate called wildly racist. What do you think?  Hi. My name is George.

name: LeVar
line: Oh, hell, no.

name: Sheldon
line: You heard him, Leonard. No, it's not racist.

name: Howard
line: Are we sure this is the place?

name: Raj
line: The doorman said this is the right building.

name: Leonard
line: I think if you're pulling up your pants, you're not a doorman.

name: Man
line: Who is it?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I've been looking for a Professor Sharpe?

name: Prof Sharpe
line: Hold on. Can I help you?

name: Leonard
line: Hi. We're from the university. We're trying to get some information about Professor Abbott.

name: Howard
line: We were cleaning out his office and found these books full of numbers.

name: Leonard
line: Any chance you know what it is?

name: Prof Sharpe
line: Yes, he was always working on this.

name: Raj
line: I was thinking it might be some sort of interstellar coordinate system, maybe an updated version of Hubble's law. I keep seeing the number 90 repeating. That could be the angle of perturbation of a distant galaxy.

name: Prof Sharpe
line: It's the number of calories in a yoghurt. That's his food diary.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Prof Sharpe
line: Yeah, he wrote down everything he ever ate. He was convinced that calorie restriction was the key to living forever.

name: Raj
line: Does it work?

name: Howard
line: Seriously?

name: Raj
line: Well, he could have been hit by a bus. You don't know.

name: Prof Sharpe
line: Sorry it's not more interesting. On the bright side, you didn't have to listen to his stomach growl for 35 years.

name: Leonard
line: So, was there anything that Professor Abbott worked on during his life that came close to an accomplishment?

name: Prof Sharpe
line: To be honest, his research never amounted to anything.

name: Raj
line: You were his colleague. How did your research turn out? Great. Hey, this is the apartment you get when you win a Nobel.

name: Raj
line: Well, you could be very frugal. I'm getting a little tired of everybody's sarcasm.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm not a bully. I mean, maybe I come off a little strong, but that's only because my dad raised me to be tough and not to take crap from anybody.

name: Penny
line: No. That's fine, but there's a difference between being tough and telling your friend her new pants look like a saggy diaper.

name: Bernadette
line: I did say that, didn't I?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you did. I felt so self-conscious, I had to return them.

name: Bernadette
line: Where? To Babies R Us?

name: Penny
line: You're doing it again.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, sorry. Can we just go? I feel like everybody hates me.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, they don't hate you, all right? They're just a little intimidated. All you need to do is show everyone how sweet you really are.

name: Bernadette
line: I think I'd rather go.

name: Penny
line: No, come on. You are not going anywhere, all right? I am here for you, and we are gonna fix this together.

name: Bernadette
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Even though your dress is ugly.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my little flag-keteers, it looks like the last episode of Fun with Flags is at an end. If I could, I would run each and every one of you viewers up a flagpole and salute you. And if you touched the ground, burn you. I'd like to take a moment to personally thank Dr. Amy Farrah Fowler, who you may or may not know is the first woman to co-host a flag or banner-related Internet info-tainment show.

name: Amy
line: Take that, glass ceiling.

name: Sheldon
line: And if I may get serious for a moment, hosting this show has been one crazy ride. But with all its ups and downs, I wouldn't give it up for the world. Except for now, when I'm giving it up. Before I sign off, I'd, uh, I'd like to share with you all one last use for a white flag. It's good for times like this. Good night.

name: Amy
line: Cut. Sheldon, that was beautiful.

name: Sheldon
line: If you didn't press record...

name: Amy
line: I pressed it.

name: Leonard
line: Well, that's it. That's the end of Roger Abbott.

name: Raj
line: And we still don't know who framed him.

name: Leonard
line: I still keep thinking about how an entire life can seemingly amount to nothing.

name: Howard
line: I guess the sad truth is, not everyone will accomplish something great. Some of us may just have to find meaning in the little moments that make up life.

name: Leonard
line: That's a nice way of looking at it.

name: Howard
line: Yeah for you, not for me. I went to space. I'm covered.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? This bottle was meant to celebrate an achievement. Let's make a pact. When one of us gets their first big breakthrough, we'll celebrate by opening this bottle of champagne and toasting Professor Abbott.

name: Howard
line: I love that.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, me, too.

name: Leonard
line: Then, of course, rubbing our success in Sheldon's face.

name: Raj
line: Oh, well, that's the best part.

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Bernadette
line: Dan, could I talk to you for a minute?

name: Dan
line: Sure, go ahead.

name: Bernadette
line: Just want you to know I didn't mean to be rude about your grandson.

name: Dan
line: No, it's okay.

name: Bernadette
line: No, it's not. Penny told me that everyone's scared of me.

name: Dan
line: What? What? Why would she say that? You know she drinks, right?

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Bernadette
line: No, she's right, and I just want you to know that from now on, I'm gonna be much more sensitive. I don't want anyone walking on eggshells around me.

name: Dan
line: Oh, well, okay, then, uh, one thing I've been meaning to tell you is that the company is gonna stop paying for our coffee.

name: Bernadette
line: No problem. When does that start?

name: Dan
line: Five months ago.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Dan
line: Yeah.

name: Bernadette
line: Who's been paying for my coffee?

name: Dan
line: All of us.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. It comes from the swear jar we put money in when you curse.

name: Bernadette
line: What else don't I know about?

name: Penny
line: Uh, well, you know your private bathroom?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah?

name: Penny
line: That was supposed to be for the whole floor.

name: Bernadette
line: You're kidding.

name: Dan
line: No, no. It's okay. It only really affected Wheelchair Kathy, and she's back in the hospital now, so it all worked out.

name: Bernadette
line: I feel so bad.

name: Penny
line: Well, then, maybe you shouldn't have named her Wheelchair Kathy.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, my God. I thought everybody liked me, but I'm just a monster.

name: Dan
line: But a cute one, like that, uh, eyeball guy in Monsters, Inc.

name: Bernadette
line: No, I'm the worst. I'm a terrible person.

name: Dan
line: Come on, don't cry. It's okay.

name: Bernadette
line: It's not okay. How can I even work here anymore?

name: Penny
line: Because this company needs you.

name: Dan
line: It's fine. We don't mind paying for the coffee.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't let you do that.

name: Dan
line: Maybe we could get you an espresso machine for your office.

name: Bernadette
line: I guess that would be all right.

name: Penny
line: See? You don't have to be mean to get what you want.

name: Bernadette
line: You're right. Now where did we land on my bathroom?

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: How come you're up so late?

name: Sheldon
line: I posted the last episode of Fun with Flags hours ago, and not a single person cared enough to comment. All that effort for nothing.

name: Leonard
line: Mm. I know how you feel. I spent the day throwing out a man's entire career, and all that's left is an old bottle of champagne and a naked lady pen that Raj took when he thought no one was looking.

name: Sheldon
line: It's not the same thing. I don't think you know how I feel at all.

name: Leonard
line: Sad?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. You do get me. Someone left a comment.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. What did they say?

name: Sheldon
line: Too bad your show is done. I kind of liked it. Leonard, did you hear that? Oh, the people are heartbroken. I can't take this away from the world. Fun with Flags is back.

name: Leonard
line: Congratulations.

name: Sheldon
line: Let's celebrate.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, that wasn't for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, I'm not going to drink it. I just wanted to hear the pop. Yeah, I knew it was coming. Still scary.

name: Sheldon
line: LeVar Burton?  LeVar Burton?  LeVar Burton?

name: LeVar
line: Ugh. What are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: You told me not to call, and I didn't know how else to give you the good news. Fun with Flags is back, and you can be in the next episode.

name: LeVar
line: Wil Wheaton said, get a gate. I don't know why I didn't get a gate.

name: Sheldon
line: You, at least listen to the premise. Since you were born in Germany, I thought we could talk

name: Penny
line: Hey, how are things going with your parents?

name: Sheldon
line: You know, speaking of attorneys, if I ever needed a lawyer, I would not hire She-Hulk.

name: Penny
line: You know what? That was almost on topic. I'm gonna say good job, Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: Wait, She-Hulk's a lawyer?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, she works at a law firm in New York.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but she's the only monster at the firm. Between you, me and the wall, I think she's an affirmative action hire.

name: Raj
line: Anyway, Dad's gonna be here in town, so I won't be able to do Christmas dinner this year.

name: Amy
line: If you're not up to hosting Christmas dinner, I'm happy to do it. You can even bring your father.

name: Raj
line: That would be nice.

name: Amy
line: I've always wanted to do a traditional Victorian Christmas. Parlour games, goose and figgy pudding.

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh. English pudding. You get yourself all excited for pudding, and here comes a cake with raisins in it. I'm not going.

name: Amy
line: You're going.

name: Sheldon
line: Why do you hate me?

name: Amy
line: I don't hate you. I love you.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you call it love, but it has a lot of raisins in it.

name: Raj
line: Amy, good luck getting these guys excited about a dinner with a theme. I gave up when no one cared about my Tom Hanks-giving.

name: Bernadette
line: I think a Victorian Christmas sounds nice.

name: Howard
line: I agree.

name: Leonard
line: Why not?

name: Penny
line: Me, too.

name: Raj
line: You guys suck.

name: Leonard
line: You know the best part of working in the clean room? No allergies. Check it out. Oh, that, that, that's a lot of oxygen.

name: Howard
line: We should get going to Amy's.

name: Leonard
line: Can you believe there was a time when we would have needed an array of giant Cherenkov telescopes to detect cosmic particles? And here we are building our own multi-wire detector like a couple of badasses.

name: Howard
line: I know. If we were still single, we'd be tripping over all that booty.

name: Leonard
line: Ladies do love a man dressed like a kitchen garbage bag. Oh, no.

name: Howard
line: How the hell did a pigeon get in here?

name: Leonard
line: You shut the loading doors, right?

name: Howard
line: I thought you did.

name: Leonard
line: Do you know what a disaster this is?

name: Howard
line: You mean 'cause this room isn't supposed to have dust in it, and we just let in a flying crap machine?

name: Leonard
line: What do we do? Should we call someone?

name: Howard
line: And tell them that we compromised all the equipment? Let's just get it out of here before anyone knows.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, how do we catch it?

name: Howard
line: Well, what if we turn off all the lights except for one, and it'll come to it.

name: Leonard
line: It's not a moth.

name: Howard
line: Don't yell at me. You're not gonna get any good ideas out of me if you're yelling.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, so if I remain calm, I'll get more gems like turn off the lights?

name: Howard
line: Great, we're turning on each other. That's just what the bird wants us to do.

name: Penny
line: So, Dr. Koothrappali, long flight?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Twenty hours.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's rough.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Not at all. Did you know that when you fly transcontinental without your wife, you don't pray for the plane to crash?

name: Raj
line: Can we please talk about anything else?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Forgive me. How are you and Leonard?

name: Penny
line: Oh, great. Everything's good.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: I see you got engaged.

name: Penny
line: Yes, we did.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Let me tell you a story.

name: Raj
line: Dad.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Sorry. I'm sure you won't grow to hate each other.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Leonard. What's up? What? How did that happen? Yeah, okay. I'll be there as soon as I can. Sorry. I have to run to the university.

name: Amy
line: What's going on?

name: Raj
line: There's been a problem with an experiment. A bird got into the clean room.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: You want me to come?

name: Raj
line: Uh, no. You had a long flight. You stay here and relax.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Relax. Easy for you to say. Your mother isn't cleaning out your bank account. Forty years, the woman never cleaned a thing.

name: Penny
line: You're just gonna leave him here?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Relax, he says.

name: Raj
line: Yup. Bye.

name: Bernadette
line: Here comes Santa Claus, here comes Santa Claus, right down Santa Claus Lane. Vixen and Blitzen and all his reindeer pulling on the reins.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I appreciate the ride.

name: Bernadette
line: Bells are ringing, children singing, all is merry and bright. So hang your stockings and say your prayers 'cause Santa Claus is coming tonight. Why'd you turn it off?

name: Sheldon
line: Because in the last ten minutes, Santa came to town, kissed Mommy and ran Grandma over with a reindeer. I had a drunk uncle who did all those things. Nobody sings songs about him.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe you'd like it more if you thought of Santa as a superhero and his power is bringing joy to children.

name: Sheldon
line: My uncle was accused of that, too. It turned out to be legal in Oklahoma.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, new subject. Let's talk about presents. What did you get Amy?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, we're not exchanging gifts.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, Sheldon, you have to get her something.

name: Sheldon
line: Why should I? She knows that I don't like Christmas, and yet, every year, she forces me to celebrate it. Not only am I going to this foolish dinner against my will, at the Christmas tree lot, there was mistletoe, and she kissed me under it in public. Like we were the stars of a Tijuana sex show.

name: Bernadette
line: She's just excited about the holidays.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, and she's not taking my feelings into account at all. Maybe it's time I teach her a lesson.

name: Bernadette
line: How?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. It'd have to be something heinous, something that makes her as miserable as she's making me. Oh, I've got it. This is good.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm going to buy her a present.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, you're gonna have to walk me through that.

name: Sheldon
line: With gift-giving, there's an implied social contract. If I show up tonight with a present, and she doesn't have one for me, she'll feel terrible.

name: Bernadette
line: Then you're both sad?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Maybe she'll feel so guilty, she'll never make me celebrate the holidays again.

name: Bernadette
line: So your evil plot here is to buy your girlfriend a present?

name: Sheldon
line: That's right. So stay on my good side, or I'll get you a little something, too.

name: Howard
line: Okay, here's the plan. I'm gonna put the food in the bag, and when he lands in the bag to eat it, we close it up.

name: Leonard
line: A Slim Jim?

name: Howard
line: It's all I could find. It'll work.

name: Leonard
line: Sure. If the pigeon's stoned or a trucker.

name: Howard
line: Okay, well, what's your plan?

name: Leonard
line: I told you my plan. Let's call Building Services and get help.

name: Howard
line: And admit that we contaminated the clean room?

name: Leonard
line: No, admit that you contaminated the clean room.

name: Howard
line: Why do you keep assuming it was me?

name: Leonard
line: Because you do this kind of thing all the time, and then you try to cover it up.

name: Howard
line: Like when?

name: Leonard
line: What about when you flipped the Mars Rover, or lost Koothrappali's dog, or almost drove off with that baby?

name: Howard
line: Again, it looked like my car, and the baby didn't even cry until his mother punched me with her keys.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, put the Slim Jim in the garbage bag.

name: Howard
line: Well, what if you said it without sounding so condescending?

name: Leonard
line: I can try, but your plan has the words garbage bag and Slim Jim in it.

name: Raj
line: Hey, what's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Genius here wants to catch a bird with a garbage bag and a Slim Jim.

name: Raj
line: Should have put it in the bag first.

name: Penny
line: So, if you don't mind me asking, do you think you might start dating again?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: It's much too soon for that. Why? Do you know someone?

name: Penny
line: No, but if things don't work out with me and Leonard, I'll give you a call. Wait. How much do you talk about Star Trek?

name: Amy
line: Okay, let's get this Victorian party started. I've done some research about some traditional parlour games we can play.

name: Penny
line: Like what?

name: Amy
line: Well, there's a fun one called Ball of Wool. You take a ball of wool, and you put it right in the centre of the table. Then people sit on opposite sides of the table and try to blow the wool off.

name: Penny
line: Sorry. She's taken, too.

name: Howard
line: You know what I think your problem is? You're jealous because you and I used to be best friends until Koothrappali came along.

name: Leonard
line: And you found somebody you could push around?

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: Stay out of this.

name: Raj
line: Okay.

name: Howard
line: You know, maybe I'm best friends with Raj because he doesn't think he's smarter than me.

name: Raj
line: Actually.

name: Howard
line: I said, stay out of it.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no. No, Raj, go ahead, say what you were gonna say.

name: Raj
line: All I'm gonna say is you guys need to stop this right now. It. it's bad enough that my parents are fighting, now I have to hear the two of you? And who cares who's smarter? If it's Leonard or me or, you know, it's Christmas, let's say it's Howard.

name: Howard
line: Well, if you're so smart, you get the bird out.

name: Raj
line: No, you're the one who let him in.

name: Howard
line: How do you know it wasn't Leonard?

name: Raj
line: Come on.

name: Bernadette
line: What about that sweater?

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's not good enough. It has to be perfect.

name: Bernadette
line: I think the nicest gifts I've got from Howie show how well he knows me.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. Let's see, what do I know about Amy? She loves medieval literature, Chaucer's her favourite. And her eyes sparkle when she watches old French movies. I enjoy how harp music causes her fingers to dance as if she's playing along.

name: Bernadette
line: Wow, you really do love her.

name: Sheldon
line: I do. Now, let's find the kind of gift that makes her feel small and worthless.

name: Amy
line: You won.

name: Penny
line: Certainly doesn't feel like it, does it?

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: You know, my wife used to throw theme parties like this all the time.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I guess that's where Raj gets it from.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Well, he and his mother spent a lot of time together when he was young. I was always working.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you know, Raj is dating a doctor who works a lot. Him and his mom have a type. You, you got to laugh at that, right? No? All right.

name: Santa
line: All right, let me see if I've got this straight. A picture of you on my lap is a way to punish your girlfriend for making you celebrate Christmas?

name: Sheldon
line: Correct.

name: Santa
line: Santa thinks dating you may be punishment enough.

name: Sheldon
line: There's an argument for that. But I want to make sure.

name: Photographer
line: Smile.

name: Santa
line: Ho, ho. ho.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. On the count of three, I'll shoot the fire extinguisher and get him airborne. Howard, you wave the blanket and guide him towards the exit. Raj, you hold open the curtain so he can fly out.

name: Howard
line: Are you sure a dummy like me can handle something as complicated as a blanket?

name: Leonard
line: Do you want the fire extinguisher?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I do.

name: Leonard
line: Great. Here you go.

name: Howard
line: Okay. One, two, three.

name: Raj
line: Uh, you have to take the pin out.

name: Leonard
line: You miss the blanket now, don't you?

name: Howard
line: On three. One, two, three.

name: Raj
line: What did you do?

name: Howard
line: It was an accident. Oh, my God. Oh, my God.

name: Leonard
line: Relax, it wasn't your fault.

name: Howard
line: Uh, maybe it's just stunned.

name: Raj
line: Dude, it's not breathing.

name: Howard
line: Oh, no. I killed it. Oh, not again.

name: Raj
line: What do you mean, not again?

name: Howard
line: When I was ten, I was playing in my backyard and sat on a blue jay. I mean, I tried to bring it back to life with electricity, but it just caught on fire. The worst part was it smelled delicious.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, guys, I found an article here that says you can do CPR on birds.

name: Howard
line: Great. Do it.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not doing it. You killed him, you do it.

name: Raj
line: I'll do it.

name: Howard
line: No. I need to do it. This is on me.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Mouth over beak and light chest compressions.

name: Raj
line: Don't blow too hard. If you pop him, I will vomit.

name: Leonard
line: Anything?

name: Howard
line: I am tasting a lot of Slim Jim.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, wait, his wing moved.

name: Howard
line: Oh, he blinked his eyes. He's alive.

name: Raj
line: It's a Christmas miracle.

name: Howard
line: I might argue a Hanukkah miracle, but I'll take it. Come on, little guy, let's get you outside. Get the curtain.

name: Raj
line: Someone should really close that loading door.

name: Raj
line: Well, that's that. The room's compromised. They'll have to change all the filters, probably shut it down for weeks.

name: Howard
line: You were right. Go ahead, call Building Services. Tell them it was my fault.

name: Leonard
line: No, we're both to blame. You know, let me take the heat on this one.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, just leave me out of it. You know if they come here and see crap everywhere, they're just gonna blame the Indian guy.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. I'm sorry, we're still here. Is everything okay?

name: Penny
line: It's kind of boring. Although it did get exciting for a minute when Amy inhaled a wool ball. How much longer do you think you'll be?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. There's still a bird in here. We are gonna get in a ton of trouble.

name: Penny
line: Honey, it's Christmas Eve. Who even knows you're in there?

name: Leonard
line: No, our names are on the sign-in sheet.

name: Penny
line: So erase them and walk out.

name: Leonard
line: I can't do that.

name: Howard
line: Can't do what?

name: Leonard
line: She says take our names off the sign-in sheet and leave.

name: Howard
line: We can't do that.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard, Howard and Raj
line: Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way. Oh, what fun it is to ride in a one-horse open sleigh, hey.

name: Raj
line: Mmm. Amy, that pudding was delicious.

name: Sheldon
line: If you like raisins.

name: Amy
line: Thank you. And it's figs.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Oh, in that case, it was pretty good.

name: Bernadette
line: You feeling okay? You hardly touched your goose.

name: Howard
line: It smelled too much like blue jay.

name: Dr Koothrappali
line: Can I help you clean up?

name: Amy
line: Oh, you Heimliched a ball of wool out of me; you're good.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, what do you say we exchange gifts?

name: Penny
line: Oh, Sheldon, we didn't bring any.

name: Leonard
line: I thought you hate giving gifts.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I do. Which is why I got Amy this.

name: Amy
line: You got me something?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, not just something, no. It's from the heart, it's holiday-themed, and I swallowed the gift receipt so you cannot return it.

name: Amy
line: Look at you on Santa's lap. That's so sweet.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course it is. It's the perfect gift. How are you feeling right now? Guilty? Sad? Wishing you were Jewish?

name: Amy
line: No, I love it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, really? Well, how about now?  Happy holidays to my dear Amy. I hope you treasure this as much as I treasure you.  And you got me nothing. Christmas is ruined. Let's never speak of it again. Well, this was fun.

name: Amy
line: Actually, I did get you something.

name: Sheldon
line: But what about our agreement?

name: Amy
line: Well, you got me something. Here.

name: Sheldon
line: Cookies?

name: Amy
line: They're your Meemaw's Christmas cookies. I called and got the recipe.

name: Sheldon
line: They're perfect. It tastes like her hugs.

name: Amy
line: Merry Christmas, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe this. You're happy, I'm happy. Well, maybe a holiday that's all about giving isn't so... Get your hand out of that box.

name: Amy
line: Okay. The next game is called Hot Boiled Beans.

name: Penny
line: Of course it is.

name: Amy
line: One person is sent out of the room while the others hide a small item. Then they invite the first person back by saying hot boiled beans and bacon for supper, hurry up before it gets cold.

name: Raj
line: If you people think this is better than Tom Hanks-giving, you're all crazy.

name: Sheldon
line: What colour would you like to be?

name: Leonard
line: Well, I'd like to be green, but you know you always take it.

name: Sheldon
line: That's not true. Any colour's fine with me. Yeah, I could be a-a combination of blue and yellow.

name: Leonard
line: Blue and yellow make green.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then it's settled.

name: Penny
line: Hi. Ready to go?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good news, we ordered lunch, so we can all stay here and play Lord of the Rings Risk.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, we said that we would play games with you tonight.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, we'll still be playing it tonight, this game can easily take eight hours.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, you really thought I'd want to do this?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Well, did you tell him that?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Did you say it out loud with words?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: I don't want to spend the whole day playing a board game.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, you may change your mind when you hear that this is the new expanded edition which contains a more complete map of Middle Earth, now including the Haradwaith Territories.

name: Amy
line: I will literally race you to the car.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, come on, don't leave. Just try it.

name: Penny
line: No. We're always doing what you guys want. Just once, it'd be nice if you did something we wanted.

name: Sheldon
line: You want to be green?

name: Leonard
line: You know, they really have tried to like a lot of the same stuff we're into.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, we do game nights and video game nights and we watch movies with director's commentary.

name: Amy
line: Oh, my favourite, George Lucas can talk all the way through Star Wars, I say one word and I'm banished to the kitchen.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, today Amy and I are deciding what we're all gonna do.

name: Leonard
line: You got it, you girls are in charge.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Now that we're not playing, you can be green.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: And since you're green this time, I can be it next time.

name: Penny
line: All right, let's see. What's something fun the guys would never take us to do? Oh, I know, we could go horseback riding.

name: Amy
line: I actually can't. My hips don't open wider than 22 degrees. I rode a very thin pony once. On the first bump, just popped right off.

name: Penny
line: All right, well, what do you want to do?

name: Amy
line: There's a craft and folk art museum on Wilshire.

name: Penny
line: Well, that's Wilshire's problem. Come on, you know, there, there's got to be something fun we could do that the guys will hate.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on, why do we have to hate it?

name: Penny
line: Three words, Doctor Who convention.

name: Leonard
line: I did not force you to go to that.

name: Penny
line: You walked out of the house in a fez and bow tie. I went so you didn't get beat up.

name: Leonard
line: I wasn't gonna get beat up.

name: Penny
line: You were, but somehow I held myself back.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what you could make us do? Ice-skating. The cold air will trigger Leonard's asthma and it plays right into my well-known fear of getting flattened by a Zamboni.

name: Leonard
line: Now you're helping them find ways to make us miserable?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm sorry, Leonard, I'm a problem-solver, it's what I do.

name: Amy
line: I actually can't go ice-skating. I have unnaturally brittle ankles.

name: Penny
line: Is there any part of your body that's normal?

name: Raj
line: Oh, my God, oh, my God, oh, my God.

name: Howard
line: Will you please relax?

name: Raj
line: I can't take it, dude.

name: Bernadette
line: You okay?

name: Raj
line: No, I'm not okay. I feel like I'm gonna jump out of my skin.

name: Bernadette
line: I told you not to wax down there. It's itchy when it grows back.

name: Raj
line: I'm worried about the New Horizons space probe.

name: Bernadette
line: What's he talking about?

name: Howard
line: Nine years ago he was part of a team that launched a spacecraft to collect data about Pluto, and it's finally close enough, so this morning it turned itself on.

name: Raj
line: We hope. The signal has to travel over three billion miles. So it's gonna be hours before we know if it even survived.

name: Howard
line: Now we get to see him flip out because he's worried it was demolished by space ice.

name: Raj
line: Space ice is no joke. I can't even watch Frozen anymore.

name: Amy
line: Ooh, the philharmonic is playing Beethoven downtown.

name: Sheldon
line: Before you say yes, it's not the movie about the big dog.

name: Penny
line: How come we can't think of something we both want to do?

name: Amy
line: Because you always pick what we do and I just go along with it.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, interesting, we're being accused of making you do things you don't like, and here you are, doing the same thing to poor Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: You should point out the hypocrisy of that.

name: Leonard
line: That's what I was doing.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that wasn't clear. Try it again, but this time drive it home with how do you like them apples, Missy?

name: Penny
line: All right, keep thinking.

name: Sheldon
line: You're making it too complicated. Why not stick to the basics? Go shopping for clothes while Leonard and I sit in those uncomfortable chairs and hold your purses, hmm? I know I'd hate that. Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Well, yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then, it's settled?

name: Amy
line: What do you say? Sounds kind of perfect.

name: Penny
line: It does, somehow he managed to take all the fun out of it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, once again, it's what I do.

name: Raj
line: Oh, another two hours to go. The wait is killing me.

name: Howard
line: I know. I get it. When I was in the Soyuz capsule returning from the space station, plummeting toward Earth at 17,000 miles per hour...

name: Raj
line: Before you finish, is this a story about patience and waiting or just another reminder that you went to space?

name: Howard
line: A story can do two things.

name: Raj
line: Ugh, I feel like I'm gonna have a heart attack.

name: Howard
line: You work in pharmaceuticals, don't you have anything you can give him?

name: Bernadette
line: All I have is our new urine flow drug. Won't help with his anxiety, but it's so strong, when he pees he'll fly around the room like he's got a jet pack.

name: Raj
line: I can't stop thinking about it.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, worrying won't have any effect on what happens.

name: Raj
line: I know.

name: Howard
line: Maybe you need to do something more productive.

name: Raj
line: Okay. If I make this shot in the trash can, the probe will have arrived in perfect working order.

name: Howard
line: So, in addition to being crazy, you're resting the fate of the mission on your athletic prowess.

name: Raj
line: Yes.

name: Howard
line: The man who crashed his stationary bike.

name: Raj
line: I didn't crash it, okay? My playlist was too up-tempo, I got light-headed and I fell off. Okay. It all comes down to this.

name: Howard
line: You happy? Now you can relax.

name: Raj
line: What kind of scientist are you? Everyone knows you got to make two out of three.

name: Leonard
line: This isn't so bad.

name: Sheldon
line: That's easy for you to say. Your chair's not facing the lingerie section. Boy, that's a lot of panties.

name: Amy
line: You guys comfy? This might take a while.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand why women insist on making a big production out of buying clothes.

name: Penny
line: No, you're right, we should do what you do. Have our mom send us pants from the Walmart in Houston.

name: Sheldon
line: They have a man there who understands my personal style.

name: Penny
line: Bye.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I've got some bad news. There's no cell service in here.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Well, that's all right. There were plenty of ways to pass the time before smart phones were invented.

name: Leonard
line: That's true.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll look them up. Son of a biscuit.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, it's fine.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's not fine. What kind of store in the 21st century doesn't at least have Wi-Fi? I'm going to call their corporate office. Son of a biscuit.

name: Sheldon
line: Let's see, my armies are going to attack the Shire from Buckland. And I roll a five and a three.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. And to defend, I roll two sixes. I win.

name: Sheldon
line: Boy, double-sixes again. You know, if I hadn't seen it with my own eyes, I wouldn't believe it. I wonder how long we're gonna be stuck here.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, but the girls do a lot for us. It's the least we can do.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's true. I suppose it's only fair we make compromises.

name: Leonard
line: Look at you, being all mature.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know why you're so surprised. If there's one thing I know about after living with you for so many years, it's how to compromise.

name: Leonard
line: I, I'm sorry? You make compromises for me?

name: Sheldon
line: All the time.

name: Leonard
line: On Earth? In our lives? That, that, that we're living?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. I, just yesterday, you had a, a big piece of lettuce stuck in your teeth at lunch. Did I say anything? No. I compromised and kept my mouth shut. Like you should've, because everyone was laughing at you.

name: Leonard
line: That is not a compromise. A compromise is me driving you everywhere because you refuse to learn how.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I learned how. Amy taught me.

name: Leonard
line: What? Then. then why don't you do it?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, well, it's scary. And sometimes I get the pedals mixed up. But, more importantly, driving me to work is one of the things that gives your life purpose. I can't take that away from you, so what do I do? Oh, come on, I'm practically feeding you the answer. I compromise.

name: Raj
line: Hey, uh, thanks for keeping me company.

name: Howard
line: I'm happy to. I think getting out of the apartment will do you good. So, where we headed?

name: Raj
line: If it's okay with you, I'd like to go to temple.

name: Howard
line: Buddy, trust me, you don't want to convert to Judaism. I mean, I know I make it look cool, but it's not all briskets and dreidels.

name: Raj
line: I meant a Hindu temple.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Okay. It's not like Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, right? Some bald guy with horns isn't gonna rip my heart out.

name: Raj
line: Dude, that movie's an imperialist fantasy that makes the followers of a beautiful and peaceful religion look like a bunch of bloodthirsty barbarians.

name: Howard
line: You love that movie.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, it's pretty great.

name: Howard
line: I'm surprised to see you suddenly get religious.

name: Raj
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: Well, because I've known you for ten years and you've never gone to temple, you never talked about believing in God, and last Diwali I watched you eat two pounds of sacred cow at a Brazilian steak house.

name: Raj
line: Religion is a very personal thing. I do go to temple, I just, I don't talk about it.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but you're a scientist.

name: Raj
line: So?

name: Howard
line: So, as a scientist, you believe the way to understand the universe is through facts and evidence, and now you're counting on some blue chick with a hundred arms to help you?

name: Raj
line: That is so offensive. Does everything you know about Hinduism come from Indiana Jones?

name: Howard
line: No. There's also Apu from The Simpsons.

name: Raj
line: Well, lots of scientists believe in God. Okay? Newton, uh, Faraday, uh, Pascal, all were believers. Even Einstein was famous for attacking quantum theory on the grounds that God does not play dice with the universe.

name: Howard
line: Well, of course he believed in God. he slept with Marilyn Monroe.

name: Raj
line: Actually there's no proof of that.

name: Howard
line: You believe in your religion, I'll believe in mine.

name: Amy
line: How's it going in there?

name: Penny
line: Uh, not really a great outfit for work, unless something opens up in the hookers and whores division. Hey, can I ask you something?

name: Amy
line: Sure.

name: Penny
line: Do I really force you to do things you don't want to?

name: Amy
line: Yeah, but it's okay.

name: Penny
line: How is it okay?

name: Amy
line: I promised myself, if I ever got friends, I'd do whatever they said. Really, I'm lucky you found me before a cult did.

name: Penny
line: Well, you know, that was a long time ago. You're a different woman now. You're smart, you've got great friends, you've got a boyfriend, you're pretty, you have zero fashion sense, but, anyway, tonight we're gonna do whatever you want.

name: Amy
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Absolutely. You name it, we're doing it.

name: Amy
line: Basket weaving at the craft museum.

name: Penny
line: Well, you named it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, here's another one. I wish that the apple pancake mix was on the top shelf because it starts with an A, but I don't put it there because I don't want you breaking one of your little legs when you're supposed to be making my breakfast.

name: Leonard
line: Is it my turn to talk about the compromises I make?

name: Sheldon
line: I wasn't done, but go ahead. He said, compromising.

name: Leonard
line: Because of you, I'm not allowed to adjust the temperature in my own home. I'm not allowed to whistle. I don't wear shoes that might squeak.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you're a physicist, not a circus clown.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, do you realize I don't live with the woman I love because of you? No other reason. Just you.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that true?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, it's true. The last time I brought it up, you had an emotional breakdown and got on a train and ran away.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, given my history on the subject, t seems a little reckless to bring it up now.

name: Leonard
line: You have no idea how much you inconvenience the lives of everyone around you. It's exhausting.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what? You think you're so tolerant, but the truth is you're mean to me a lot. Yeah, you think that I don't notice all those sarcastic comments and those eye rolls, but I do. Hmm? I have excellent peripheral vision. On a good day, I can see my ears.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I, I'm sorry if I hurt your feelings. I've been holding a lot of this in for a while.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm sorry, too. And if you want to live with Penny, then I think you should.

name: Leonard
line: Do you mean that?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Yeah, just put on your squeaky shoes and eee-eee-eee your way out of my life.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, don't get upset.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not upset. I'm just imagining a world without my best friend in it.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: It's okay.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not leaving your world. I'm just talking about living across the hall.

name: Sheldon
line: I understand. Either way, I want you to know that I'm aware of how difficult I can be. So I just want to say thank you for putting up with me.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy.

name: Penny
line: How are you guys getting along? What? Why are there tears?

name: Leonard
line: Everything's fine. We just started talking about living arrangements.

name: Amy
line: Are you crazy? You know he's a flight risk.

name: Sheldon
line: That's exactly what I told him.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, we know this is a sensitive subject, and Leonard's not gonna move out until you're ready.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, what if you did it gradually?

name: Leonard
line: All right. How about we start with two nights a week I live with Penny?

name: Sheldon
line: How about one night and I let you whistle?

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: When I'm not home.

name: Leonard
line: You got it.

name: Sheldon
line: There we go, compromising again. We really are the best.

name: Howard
line: Here we go, my first Hindu temple.

name: Raj
line: You see behind the fountain, that tower that looks like a pyramid? It's called a Sikhara. It symbolizes the, the connection between the human and the divine.

name: Howard
line: Huh. I always thought it was mini golf.

name: Raj
line: All right. Shall we?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Just, uh, is there anything I should know before I go in?

name: Raj
line: Like what?

name: Howard
line: Like am I dressed okay?

name: Raj
line: Really? So every other place you've been, you thought this was fine?

name: Howard
line: I know you're under a lot of pressure, so I'm gonna let that pass.

name: Raj
line: Sorry. You're right. I'm so stressed. But you know what, whenever I walk into that temple I realize that whatever happens, it's okay. We're all part of an immense pattern, and though we can't understand it, we can be happy to know that it's, it's working its will through us.

name: Howard
line: That's nice.

name: Raj
line: Whether you call it God or the universe or the self, we're all interconnected, and that's just a beautiful... Son of a bitch, that guy just dinged my car. S, seriously? You were just gonna drive away? Like my life isn't hard enough right now. A space probe might be destroyed, my parents are going through an awful divorce, the guy who cuts my dog's hair just gave her bangs.

name: Howard
line: Raj.

name: Raj
line: You saw her. She looks like Jim Carrey from Dumb and Dumber.

name: Howard
line: Raj, you just got a text. The probe turned on. It's fine.

name: Raj
line: Oh, good. Namaste, Grandpa.

name: Leonard
line: I thought this was gonna be boring, but it's actually kind of fun.

name: Penny
line: Don't tell Amy that. We'll be here every Sunday.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, that really is an excellent basket.

line: It's not a basket. It's a soldier's helmet from 16th century China.

name: Amy
line: Very nice.

line: Yeah, it looks great.

name: Sheldon
line: I saw that.

line: Well, roomie, it's only one night a week, but it's a start.

name: Penny
line: I know. I'm really proud of Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm proud of him, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Can you keep it down? Some of us are trying to sleep out here.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we're headed out, see you later.

name: Sheldon
line: Before you leave, could you test these noise-cancelling headphones?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Go ahead.

name: Leonard
line: Hello, can you hear me? Sheldon, I haven't changed the filter in the water pitcher in two years.

name: Penny
line: Uh, Bernadette's nickname for you is the virgin piña colada.

name: Leonard
line: Your George Lucas autograph is really a me autograph.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, once I was too lazy to walk across the hall, so I used your toothbrush.

name: Leonard
line: Ooh, and one time when you were asleep, Amy totally took off her... and that's why you're the best roommate ever.

name: Sheldon
line: Aw, now I'm sad I didn't hear it.

name: Penny
line: So what do you need the headphones for?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I've been struggling for months to come up with a theory of dark matter that doesn't make protons decay. I'm hoping to finally tackle it by optimising my work environment. See, I've got, uh, my tea is at the perfect sipping temperature. Uh, I have fleece-lined boxer shorts to keep my tushie toasty. And then, oh, last but not least, this inspirational cat poster improved with the reassuring face of physics renegade Richard Feynman.

name: Penny
line: Is that why you had to take him to Office Depot last night?

name: Leonard
line: I don't want to talk about it. There, the place is all yours.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, have fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I will, nothing more fun than a paradigm-shifting evening of science.

name: Penny
line: And you thought it was soaping me up in the shower.

name: Leonard
line: Bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Here we go. Proton decay. Proton decay.  Proton decay. Proton decay.  Proton decay. Proton decay.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, we're home. Any progress?

name: Sheldon
line: How could there be, with these constant interruptions?

name: Penny
line: I love him, but if he's broken, let's not get a new one.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing? It's time to go.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not going to work today. And would you like to know why?

name: Leonard
line: Ah, you're upset because you spent the whole night working on dark matter and didn't make a breakthrough, and now you're worried you made a huge mistake switching fields, and you're gonna sit around and sulk all day?

name: Sheldon
line: Like a big old baby.

name: Leonard
line: Call me if you need anything.

name: Sheldon
line: I've been cooped up in here too long. Maybe I need some fresh air.

name: Penny
line: Ugh! Ugh! Ugh! Ugh!

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Ugh!

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Ugh!

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Ugh, what?

name: Sheldon
line: You sounded in distress. I was worried something unpleasant was happening to you. Like a murder. Or spontaneous coitus with Leonard.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'm just doing this awful workout. I hate it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if you hate it, then why are you doing it? Although I could ask the same question about coitus with Leonard.

name: Penny
line: I don't know, I guess I like that I hate it. It makes me work harder.

name: Sheldon
line: And to clarify?

name: Penny
line: The exercise, Sheldon. Shouldn't you be getting ready for work?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not going. Would you like to know why?

name: Penny
line: Uh, you're sad about not getting anything done last night, so you're gonna sit around and pout about it?

name: Sheldon
line: Boy, I'm not nearly as mysterious as I think I am.

name: Howard
line: I invented a game. You want to play?

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Howard
line: It's called Emily or Cinnamon. I give you actual quotes I've heard Raj say, and you guess if he was talking to his girlfriend or his dog.

name: Raj
line: Go ahead, make fun. You can't embarrass me, I've got a beautiful girlfriend and a dog who loves me so much she drinks my bathwater.

name: Howard
line: Okay, who was he talking to, Emily or Cinnamon? I want you to know, the bed feels so lonely when you're not in it.

name: Raj
line: I may not be liking this game so much.

name: Leonard
line: Cinnamon. Give me another one.

name: Howard
line: Okay, Emily or Cinnamon? Check it out, I got us matching sweaters.

name: Leonard
line: We all got the Christmas card, Cinnamon.

name: Raj
line: You know, a man can care deeply about a woman and a pet. It's not strange.

name: Leonard
line: Ooh, Emily. I heard him say that to Emily. Hey, I thought you were staying home.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I was, but after talking to Penny, I realised something. I, first, she's trying much harder to stay attractive in this relationship than you are. And second, the reason I may not be progressing in my research is I've created too pleasant of an environment for myself.

name: Howard
line: What do you mean?

name: Sheldon
line: According to a classic psychological experiment by Yerkes and Dodson, in order to maximize performance, one must create a state of productive anxiety. So I'd like to ask you all to do something for me. Keep me on my toes. Just throw me off my game. Essentially, go out of your way to make my life miserable.

name: Howard
line: Hold on. What's in it for us?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I suppose...

name: Howard
line: Okay, we'll do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Done.

name: Amy
line: 33 seconds. Okay, that'll be our baseline.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, I don't want to tell you how to do your job, but when a mouse completes a maze, it gets a food pellet.

name: Amy
line: It also gets its brain plucked out with tweezers.

name: Sheldon
line: And his last meal was a food pellet? You're a monster.

name: Amy
line: All right, next, we're gonna introduce an anxiety-inducing stimulus, measure your stress levels and see how it affects your problem-solving rate.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. And good luck, I'm a pretty laid-back guy.

name: Amy
line: Ready? Begin. Why'd you pop it?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry, I was aiming for your heart.

name: Amy
line: Look, I know you don't like it, but that's the point of the experiment. I need to irritate you to find your optimal anxiety zone. And you said no to tickling, polka music or watching me eat a banana.

name: Sheldon
line: Who eats them horizontally?

name: Amy
line: My mother said that's how good girls do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps this was a waste of time.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you're a remarkable scientist. Just be patient, I'm sure you'll find the breakthrough you've been looking for.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: And if you only do solid research instead of making a groundbreaking discovery, what does it matter?

name: Sheldon
line: Only do solid research? I come to you for help, and you insult me? I thought the least that you would do would be...

name: Amy
line: Look, your anxiety levels are right in the zone.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? Oh, that's fantastic. Now, wait, they're dropping. Why are they dropping?

name: Amy
line: Because you're happy they're elevated.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that is infuriating. Ooh, look, they went back up again. Terrific. Oh, no, they went back down.

name: Raj
line: All right, guys, what game do you want to play?

name: Howard
line: Let's see. How about Emily or Cinnamon?

name: Raj
line: You know what? I think it's a little weird that you remember me saying all these things. Maybe the truth is, you're jealous of all my relationships.

name: Howard
line: Oh, maybe I am. Who wouldn't want to be the girl, or possibly dog, to hear the words you're so lucky, you have the shiniest hair.

name: Leonard
line: That is a tough one. Uh, I know he brushes both of them.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen, I have figured out the perfect way for you to irritate me. I'd like you to be my intellectual sparring partners. From now on, when I make an assertion, I need you to challenge it.

name: Leonard
line: So you just want us to disagree with whatever you say?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: And you think that's going to help?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Howard
line: Well, I don't think that's gonna help at all.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, it will. See, by keeping my mind engaged, I'll become more focused.

name: Leonard
line: Howard's right, that'll never work.

name: Sheldon
line: Stop fighting me on the premise. It's scientifically valid. I'm going to advance propositions, I just want you to challenge me.

name: Raj
line: I don't think that's what you want at all.

name: Sheldon
line: Why, of course it's what I want. Why would I say it's what I want if it's not what I want?

name: Leonard
line: Because it is what you want, and it's not what you said.

name: Sheldon
line: I ask you for one simple thing, and you can't even do it.

name: Howard
line: Yes, we can.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, then do it.

name: Howard
line: Nah.

name: Sheldon
line: You guys are the worst. Thank you, I think that was helpful.

name: Penny
line: So, whichever rep has the best sales for the quarter gets a trip for two to Hawaii.

name: Amy
line: That would be so romantic for you and Leonard.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, clearly you haven't seen him on the beach walking around with his metal detector.

name: Amy
line: If I were going to Hawaii, I'd spend all my time at the Keck Observatory. Did you know that the telescopes there have better resolution than the Hubble?

name: Penny
line: Really? Want to go to Hawaii?

name: Sheldon
line: Ladies?  Ladies?  Ladies?

name: Penny
line: Come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Ladies.

name: Penny
line: What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, as you may know, I've been experimenting with elevated anxiety levels, and I thought, what better way to increase my discomfort than to subject myself to an evening of tasteless uncensored crotch talk?

name: Penny
line: What exactly do you think goes on here?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, conversations that you wouldn't be comfortable having in front of the opposite sex. You know, who has the best cervix. Which sanitary napkin is all the rage right now. Men's buttocks, and how you want to pat and squeeze them.

name: Bernadette
line: We were talking about Penny's job.

name: Sheldon
line: And how difficult it is to do when she's bloated, cranky and crampy? Continue.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, we are just people. We talk about the same things you guys talk about.

name: Sheldon
line: You talk about if werewolves can swim? See, Leonard says yes, but I say it depends on if the human could swim before he was bitten. What do you think?

name: Penny
line: Let's just talk about our periods.

name: Amy
line: No, hold on. All canines instinctively know how to swim. Why wouldn't a werewolf have the same abilities?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, they're not a hundred percent wolf. They're a werewolf, that's only part wolf. It's like comparing apples to oranges.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Oh, and technically, it's apples that turn into were-oranges when the moon is full. Hey, this is fun. We should do it sometime when you aren't all PMS'ing. Bye.

name: Leonard
line: What is going on?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Uh, I need to keep my anxiety at the right level, so I'm using Darth Vader, the Joker, and Godzilla's roar to keep me in that sweet spot. Uh, I tried including Taylor Swift in the mix, but turns out I love her.

name: Leonard
line: Well, at least listen to it through headphones. I'm trying to sleep. Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Boy, Taylor was right, haters gonna hate, hate, hate, hate, hate.

name: Amy
line: You've been working so much lately, I'm glad you didn't forget about date night.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah.

name: Amy
line: Maybe you want to put the notebook away and talk to me.

name: Sheldon
line: I can do both. My brain is working at optimal capacity. I can have a conversation with you and solve the dark matter proton decay problem at the same time.

name: Amy
line: Fine. How was your day?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you said it.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon. Sheldon, I'm worried about you. You're not eating, you haven't slept in days, and, to be honest, that cap is starting to smell.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. It's replaced Godzilla as my principle source of anxiety.

name: Howard
line: Okay, so it's one vote Emily, one vote Cinnamon. Penny, you're the tiebreaker.

name: Penny
line: Say the quote again.

name: Howard
line: It's just so perfect that we're both Libras.

name: Penny
line: Wow, this is hard. I'm gonna say Cinnamon.

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: Come on.

name: Howard
line: That was the last one, I promise. We won't play any more.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. ‘Cause if she ever found out, it would hurt her feelings.

line: Emily's feelings?

name: Raj
line: Yes, Emily. Whatever. Where's Sheldon?

name: Penny
line: Date night.

name: Leonard
line: That can't be much fun for Amy. You know, at work today, he tried his first Red Bull.

line: What happened?

line: He chased a squirrel around the quad for a while and then threw up in my car.

name: Bernadette
line: Don't you think you should make him stop all this?

name: Howard
line: I don't know, he's not really hurting anybody.

name: Leonard
line: You didn't have to scoop vomit out of your glove compartment.

name: Sheldon
line: He is getting a lot of work done. He had a pretty interesting take on proton decay.

name: Raj
line: Wow, if he cracks that it's a game changer, guys. It'll completely redefine our understanding of the physical universe.

name: Howard
line: Hmm, it would. Okay, back to Emily or Cinnamon? How can such a little girl eat such a big steak?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I want you to take that cap off.

name: Sheldon
line: That nagging tone is helping my anxiety, yeah. But if you could maybe just go ten percent less shrill, that'd really put the zip-a-dee in my doo-dah.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry, but you know we agreed not to bring work to date night.

name: Sheldon
line: There you go, perfect.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, stop it, I'm not kidding. Take the cap off, and put the notebook away.

name: Sheldon
line: But after months of struggling, I'm finally making progress.

name: Amy
line: You don't need to drive yourself crazy in order to be productive.

name: Sheldon
line: Or do I, hmm? Sir Isaac Newton wrote his Principia while convinced he was an armadillo.

name: Amy
line: That's not true.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, maybe it is, maybe it isn't. I have been hallucinating lately.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, this has to stop. You need to get some sleep and take care of yourself.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, I have gotten more done in the last few days than I have since I made the switch to dark matter. What if I stop doing this, and it all goes away?

name: Amy
line: Your thoughts and ideas come from you, not from your anxiety.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm, perhaps. But I'm not taking the cap off.

name: Amy
line: It's one thing to make yourself miserable, but you're making everyone around you miserable, too. Now, I'm telling you for the last time, take the cap off.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, really? What if I don't? And before you answer that, can I have my dessert?

name: Sheldon
line: And then she threw me out. Me, her very own boyfriend. When all I've done is try to help humanity reach of the world we live in.

name: Man
line: Yeah, well, women, what are you gonna do?

name: Sheldon
line: I knew you'd understand, Armadillo Isaac Newton.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Here we are.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey. What are you trying to pull? The president of science isn't in here.

name: Leonard
line: You lie down, he'll be here in a minute.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Hey, I thought you were trying to trick me.

name: Penny
line: Now, you just get comfortable.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, comfort is the enemy. You know what's comfortable? Slippers and blankets and panda bears. Imagine a panda bear with Richard Feynman's face on it. Warm up the car, Leonard, it's poster time.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe in the morning.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you get some sleep.

line: No, I don't want to go to sleep, you can't make me.

name: Penny

line: Yeah, darn straight, you can't. Try to tell a grown man to go to sleep.

name: Penny
line: Soft kitty, warm kitty.

name: Leonard
line: Little ball of fur.

name: Sheldon
line: That's not gonna work.

name: Penny
line: Happy kitty, sleepy kitty.

name: Together
line: Purr, purr, purr.

name: Leonard
line: You know, he can be a lot of trouble, but when I see him lying here asleep like this, I just think how easy it would be to hold a pillow over his face.

name: Penny
line: Mmmm.

name: Howard
line: You look like you got some rest.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm feeling much better. And I've also been continuing to make progress without artificially raising my anxiety levels.

name: Leonard
line: I turned on the heat in my car and some vomit came out, so my levels, right up there.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys. Mind if Emily joins us for lunch?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, no problem.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course not.

name: Emily
line: So I hear you guys have been playing a little game.

name: Howard
line: Well, um, we were just kidding around.

name: Emily
line: Well, you may think it's funny that Raj is sweet and sensitive, but I think it's sexy. Ugh, why is there dog hair in your mouth?

name: Penny
line: So, tell me about your day, how's it going with the particle detector?

name: Leonard
line: Wow, you remember that?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I listen to what you say. You're building a particle detector using superfluid helium.

name: Leonard
line: You know, when you talk like that, I want to take you right here on this table.

name: Penny
line: And you know from past experience this table cannot support both our weight. So, how's the detector going?

name: Leonard
line: Well, it's tricky working with superfluids. Whatever container you put them in, they kind of creep up the sides and crawl out all on their own.

name: Penny
line: Kind of like Sheldon's ant farm.

name: Leonard
line: Exactly, except you don't have a lunatic running around, yelling, I fed you sugar water, why are you biting me? Come on, this is boring, you really want to talk about this?

name: Penny
line: No, I do. I didn't write superfluid helium on this napkin for nothing.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, this is cool. Uh, there's a thing called superfluid vacuum theory, where empty space is imagined as a superfluid with all of its qualities, viscosity, density, surface tension...

name: Penny
line: Hey, if you're pausing for dramatic effect, I'd keep it moving.

name: Leonard
line: No, no. People don't talk about surface tension. If you imagine our three-space as the surface of an N-dimensional superfluid bubble... This is exciting. This is really exciting. I have to go find Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, if you find him, use the kitchen island, that coffee table will not support both of you.

name: Leonard
line: Which means a spherical multidimensional superfluid shows the same negative-energy density as space-time. So what do you think? What do you think? So what do you think?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm.

name: Leonard
line: What? Is it wrong? Have you seen it somewhere else?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm.

name: Leonard
line: I know this isn't my area, and I could never do the math like you can, but could this be something?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you could have set Newton's gravitational constant to one. And, ugh, the whole thing reeks of blueberry. You know I can't stand these scented markers.

name: Leonard
line: No one told you to taste them. Come on, is, is this good or not?

name: Sheldon
line: It's good.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: I like it. I think you're on to something.

name: Leonard
line: You do? You're not messing with me?

name: Sheldon
line: Not at all. In fact, I have got something for just such an occasion. I was starting to think I might never get a chance to give it to you. Good job.

name: Leonard
line: You're giving me a sticker?

name: Sheldon
line: Not just a sticker. That is a sticker of a kitty saying me-wow.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not a preschooler.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, I'll take it back.

name: Leonard
line: I earned this. Back off.

name: Leonard
line: You're still awake?

name: Sheldon
line: For a man whose last observation was our universe may be the surface of a multidimensional supercooled liquid, you're still awake seems like quite the sophomore slump.

name: Leonard
line: You worked out all the math.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I did more than work out all the math. I wrote a paper.

name: Leonard
line: You wrote a paper on my idea?

name: Sheldon
line: I wrote a paper on our idea.

name: Leonard
line: When did my idea become our idea?

name: Sheldon
line: When I mixed it with Sheldony goodness and cooked it in the Easy-Bake oven of my mind.

name: Leonard
line: This is good. Our idea is really good.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, the lightbulb in this oven is ridiculously bright.

name: Leonard
line: You know, if no one's thought of this, yet, this could be a big deal.

name: Sheldon
line: Only way we'll know for sure is if we post it online to the pre-print server. I have it ready to go, but I wasn't gonna do it without you.

name: Leonard
line: Wow, it's all happening so fast. Should we just sleep on it?

name: Sheldon
line: We could, but we always run the risk of someone else beating us to the punch.

name: Leonard
line: You're sure it's good?

name: Sheldon
line: My name is right on there with yours. That is a surefire mark of quality. That might as well say directed by Joss Whedon.

line: Okay, partner, let's do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on. Click the mouse with me.

name: Leonard
line: One, two three.

line: Click.

name: Leonard
line: Well, we did it.

line: Yes, we did, my friend.

name: Leonard
line: Is your tongue blue?

line: I don't want to talk about it.

line: Okay, movie night, what do you want to watch?

name: Amy
line: Whatever happened to that ape movie you were in?

name: Penny
line: Oh, God. Probably nothing. I think I saw the director twirling a sign outside the Verizon store.

name: Bernadette
line: Search for it.

line: What, no, why?

name: Bernadette
line: ‘Cause it would be fun to watch.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, now we have two reasons.

line: They have it.

line: Please, can we watch it?

name: Amy
line: Please?

line: Fine, but I'm telling you, it's terrible.

line: Have you even seen it?

name: Penny

name: Bernadette
line: Well, maybe it turned out better than you think.

line: Bananas, get your fresh bananas.

name: Bernadette
line: Ho-ho, it really didn't.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, this is superfluid helium. Put this in your mouth, your tongue will freeze and break off.

name: Sheldon
line: Does it smell like blueberries?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Then we're probably okay.

name: Howard
line: Hey, your paper got mentioned on the Quantum Diaries physics blog.

name: Leonard
line: Really? What'd they say?

name: Howard
line: Uh, it's basically a summary of the theory, but there's a bunch of positive comments on the message board.

name: Leonard
line: Let me see, let me see. One calls it insightful and innovative. We're insightful and innovative.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, nice to meet you, Mr. Insightful.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, the pleasure is mine, Mr. Innovative. Uh, another one says the concept shows some real out-of-the-box thinking. Do you hear that, Mr. Out-Of-The?

name: Sheldon
line: I do, indeed, Mr. Box-Thinking.

name: Howard
line: How are you today, Mr. Can-You-Believe-These-Jack-Asses?

name: Raj
line: Just dandy, Mr I-Wish-I-Was-Better-At-Improv.

name: Sheldon
line: Read another one.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, okay. Uh, the analogy between space-time and a supercooled fluid is either meaningless or false. I wish this blog would devote itself to real science instead of wasting our time with crackpot wannabe theoreticians in a rush to publish.

name: Sheldon
line: Who wrote that?

name: Leonard
line: It's anonymous, and user name General Relativity.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm responding to it.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, don't lower yourself to their level.

name: Sheldon
line: Look, I am simply going to defend our work, scientist to scientist. And failing that, suggest that his mother enjoys a string of both human and non-human lovers.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, my name's on that paper, too. There's no upside to doing this.

name: Sheldon
line: He just left another comment.

name: Raj
line: What does it say?

name: Leonard
line: Upon review, I've changed my mind about the Cooper-Hofstadter hypothesis that space-time is like a superfluid. In fact, it's inspired me to come up with my own theory. Maybe space-time is like two clowns with their heads in a bucket, much like Cooper and Hofstadter.

name: Sheldon
line: Can I respond now?

name: Leonard
line: Do it.

name: Sheldon
line: You mess with the bull, you get the horns. I'm about to show this guy just how horny I can be.

name: Leonard
line: Somebody else do it.

name: Penny
line: Doctor, please help me. I think I might be turning into a killer gorilla.

name: Doctor
line: Why do you think you're turning into a killer gorilla and not just a regular gorilla?

name: Penny
line: Because regular gorillas are vegetarians, and I just bit the fingers off your receptionist.

name: Penny
line: Okay, we've seen plenty.

name: Bernadette
line: No, give me the remote.

name: Amy
line: Careful. She'll bite your fingers off.

name: Penny
