line: Okay, well, I've been poking around the internet, and I think I found something we'll enjoy watching even more.

name: Amy
line: What is it?

name: Penny
line: Oh, just a video of Bernadette in a beauty pageant.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, I learned my lesson. Making fun of people is wrong.

name: Amy
line: I haven't learned my lesson. Play it. Play it.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi. I'm Bernadette Maryann Rostenkowski from Yorba Linda, California.

name: Penny
line: You look like a talking cupcake.

name: Bernadette
line: And you should pick me for Miss California Quiznos 1999, because I want to  tell you what I want, what I really really want, l tell you what I want, what I really really want, I wanna, I wanna, I wanna, I wanna Really, really, really be Miss California Quiznos 1999.

name: Amy
line: Play it again. Play it again.

name: Raj
line: Did he respond yet?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. No, not yet.

name: Leonard
line: Well, maybe we shouldn't have sunk to his level.

name: Howard
line: It wasn't that bad.

name: Leonard
line: Read it back one more time.

name: Sheldon
line: My good sir, we are neither crackpots nor wannabes. In fact, we are experts in our fields. And while you hide behind your anonymity, we stand behind our paper. And later tonight, your mother.

name: Leonard
line: And you don't think that's too rough?

name: Sheldon
line: We're just standing behind her. It's not like we're gonna say boo and scare her.

name: Penny
line: How could you not tell us you were in beauty pageants?

name: Bernadette
line: ‘Cause it's embarrassing.

name: Penny
line: It is; it truly is.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, well, Amy writes Little House on the Prairie fan fiction about herself and posts it on the Internet.

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Amy
line: Why? What did I do?

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry, I had to get the spotlight off me, and tearing down other women is part of my pageant training.

name: Penny
line: Okay. We are reading that right now.

name: Amy
line: No, please don't.

name: Bernadette
line: We got embarrassed tonight. Come on.

name: Amy
line: But it's personal.

name: Penny
line: Why? Is it about you and Sheldon?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, it's about her and Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: It's not about me and Sheldon. It's about a young woman in the 1800s named Amelia, and the time-traveling physicist named Cooper she falls in love with.

name: Penny
line: Please show us?

name: Bernadette
line: Please?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Penny
line: You know I'm gonna read it either way.

name: Amy
line: Good luck finding it.

name: Penny
line: Amelia and the time-trav... found it. It was just past dawn on the prairie, and like every morning, Amelia prepared to do her chores. Except something about this morning felt different.

name: Bernadette
line: Why? Why did it feel different?

name: Penny
line: Maybe it was the first whisper of winter in the air, or maybe it was the unconscious handsome man with porcelain skin and curious clothing she was about to discover lying in the field. A man who would open her mind to new possibilities and her body to new feelings.

name: Amy
line: You know, there was a time when I was alone and had no friends. I'm starting to miss that.

name: Sheldon
line: He still hasn't responded. What's taking him so long?

name: Leonard
line: Do you really want him to write back?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I do. Then no matter how he responds, I am going to destroy him with a picture of a bored cat saying oh, really?

name: Leonard
line: Me-wow.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing?

name: Raj
line: I've, uh, created some other user accounts so I can post positive comments about their paper.

name: Howard
line: This wee li'l bairn of a theory nearly blew my kilt off.

name: Raj
line: No. You have to read it how Dr. Angus McDougal of the University of Edinburgh would. This wee li'l bairn of a theory nearly blew me kilt off.

name: Sheldon
line: He wrote back. Cooper and Hofstadter resorting to juvenile attempts at humour is proof they have nothing to back up their ridiculous paper. It should come as no surprise given they work at Cal Tech, essentially a technical school, where even the physicists are basically engineers. Engineers? Do you know how insulting that is?

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: Guys, this person's just going out of their way to get a rise out of you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, but it's still so aggravating.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, well, all the other comments said really nice things. Focus on those.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Dr. Dmitri Plancovik of Moscow University said dis paper great, I love it more than wodka.

name: Raj
line: See? Better with the accent.

name: Sheldon
line: And send.

name: Leonard
line: What did you write?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm done hiding from bullies. I'm taking this into the real world.

name: Leonard
line: What does that mean?

name: Sheldon
line: I told him we'll meet him face-to-face anytime, anywhere.

name: Leonard
line: Are you crazy? You don't know who this person is. Delete that.

name: Raj
line: Come on, Sheldon!

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, okay, okay, calm down.  It's him. He's trying to video chat. Perhaps I shouldn't have taken this into the real world.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, really?

name: Penny
line: “Time travel? I don't understand,” said Amelia. Cooper stared at her. ‘Which word don't you understand, time or travel?”

name: Bernadette
line: Wow, even in your fantasies Sheldon's kind of exhausting.

name: Amy
line: He's like that in the beginning, so she can change him. It's called good writing. And wishful thinking.

name: Penny
line: It stung Amelia when he spoke to her this way. In her little one-room schoolhouse, she was always the smartest student, regularly besting the boys in her class, but this was no boy in front of her, this was a man.

name: Bernadette
line: Here we go.

name: Penny
line: Cooper told Amelia about all the strange and incredible things the future would hold, like computers and living past 30. He asked her if she had any questions. All she longed to ask was if his heart was beating as fast as hers, but she was too afraid to hear the answer.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, Amelia.

name: Penny
line: So instead she asked if, in the future, Montana ever became a state.

name: Amy
line: In the 1800s that was considered flirting.

name: Raj
line: I'm so sick of people being mean on the Internet.

name: Howard
line: Well, I think the anonymity makes everyone feel like they can say things they'd never say to your face.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. I can't think of a single thing I wouldn't say to someone's face.

name: Leonard
line: Never noticed that about you.

name: Raj
line: You know what? At least you guys did something. You know, you, you had a theory, you wrote a paper, you made an actual contribution. All guys like this do is just stand on other people's work.

name: Sheldon
line: He's right. I say we call this person back. We've got no reason to hide.

name: Leonard
line: All right, do it. Call him. Let's find out what this loser's ever accomplished.

name: Sheldon
line: Click it with me. One, two, three, click.

name: Stephen Hawking
line: Well, hello there.

name: Sheldon
line: Professor Hawking?

name: Stephen Hawking
line: Oh, brother, you should see the look on your faces.

name: Leonard
line: You really didn't like our paper?

name: Stephen Hawking
line: I like your paper very much. The premise is intriguing.

name: Sheldon
line: Then why are you attacking us?

name: Stephen Hawking
line: If you were sitting in a chair for 40 years, you'd get bored, too. Anyway, got to go. I promised to help the neighbour kid with his maths homework. Ciao.

name: Leonard
line: Stephen Hawking liked our paper. Said the premise is intriguing.

name: Sheldon
line: Good to see you again, Mr. Stephen-Hawking Liked-Our-Paper.

name: Leonard
line: And you as well, Mr. Our-Premise-Is-Intriguing.

name: Howard
line: How do you do, Mr. I'll-Admit-That's-Pretty-Cool?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, you keep setting me up for failure.

name: Penny
line: With a heavy heart, Amelia stood before the newly repaired time machine. She regretted giving Cooper the part he needed.

name: Bernadette
line: Because she wanted him to give her the part she needed.

name: Amy
line: Okay, that's enough.

name: Penny
line: What? No, I really want to know what happens, and Bernadette really, really, really wants to know what happens.

name: Amy
line: You're just making fun of me.

name: Bernadette
line: I was just kidding. I'm sorry. And the story's really good.

name: Penny
line: No, it is. Does he stay? Do they kiss? Does she find out about Montana?

name: Bernadette
line: Please?

name: Amy
line: Fine. As Cooper prepared to depart, tears filled Amelia's eyes. He took her hand in his and said, “I can't stay, but I will never forget you.” He brushed his fingers against her cheek, then quickly stepped into the machine. “Please don't go,” she whispered. But it was too late. The engine hummed to life.

name: Bernadette
line: But they didn't even kiss.

name: Amy
line: She turned away, wiping her eyes. She couldn't bear to watch her one chance at true love disappear forever. Then she felt a strong hand on her shoulder spin her around. It was Cooper.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: “What about the future?” asked Amelia. He looked deeply into her eyes and whispered, “There is no future without you.” He pulled her in close. She began to tremble all over. She felt his warm breath...

name: Leonard
line: You will not believe what Stephen Hawking just said.

name: Penny
line: Get out!

name: Bernadette
line: Not now!

name: Amelia
line: Is the water warm enough?

name: Cooper
line: Given the fact that you took the time to build a wood fire, draw the water from the well and heat it, it would be rude to complain. But since you asked, it's a little nippy.

name: Amelia
line: I can fix that. I couldn't help but notice your unusual undergarments.

name: Cooper
line: They're not undergarments. They're Underoos. Where I come from, they're known as underwear that's fun to wear.

name: Amelia
line: And what's the significance of the spider?

name: Cooper
line: Oh, that represents Spider-Man. He does whatever a spider can.

name: Amelia
line: There's a lot of rhyming in the future, isn't there?

name: Leonard
line: You're right. This is even weirder than I thought.

name: Penny
line: You want me to stop reading?

name: Leonard
line: Are you kidding? No, no.

name: Penny
line: As he stood for Amelia to dry him...

name: Amelia
line: So, tell me, Cooper, are the ways of physical love different in the future?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, okay, I'm good.

name: Sheldon
line: I've invented a science joke, would you like to hear it?

name: Amy
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: How many Edisons does it take to screw in a light bulb?

name: Amy
line: How many?

name: Sheldon
line: Who cares? He stole the idea and doesn't deserve his own joke.

name: Amy
line: Is that really true?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course, that's how you know it's a good joke. It not only entertains, it informs.

name: Barry
line: Hey, sowwy to intewupt.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, Barry, uh, how many Edisons does it take to screw in a light bulb?

name: Barry
line: Did you know Edison didn't actuawy invent the wight bulb?

name: Sheldon
line: What do you want, Barry?

name: Barry
line: Just wanted to dwop this off as a wittle thank you for Amy.

name: Amy
line: What's this for?

name: Barry
line: Your idea weawy hewped me out. My wight-cone quantization paper's onwine alweady. The wesponse has been amazing.

name: Amy
line: Well, that's fascinating. I can't wait to read it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, me as well. Uh, please e-mail it to Sheldon at bazinga dot biz. Why dot biz? Because I just gave you the business. And also bazinga dot com was taken.

name: Barry
line: Anyway, thanks again. Cooper, suck eggs.

name: Sheldon
line: Since when do you help out Barry Kripke?

name: Amy
line: Well, I'd been thinking about a cellular automata approach to neuronal connectivity, and I thought it might have some interesting applications to string theory, it's not a big deal.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, really? When I was doing string theory and hit a dead end, why didn't you try to help me?

name: Amy
line: I did. You said the only math biologists know is if you have three frogs and one hops away, that leaves two frogs.

name: Sheldon
line: That's pretty funny, that does sound like me. But that doesn't mean that you should be standing on street corners handing out your math to whatever guy comes along.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, we're all scientists. I helped out a fellow colleague. You're being petty.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm being petty? You know Barry and I have a professional rivalry. You heard him, he told me to suck eggs. If we were friends, he would have suggested I suck something more pleasant. Why are you laughing? Did you learn something?

name: Howard
line: Okay, Ma. Say hi to Aunt Gladys. Yeah, I love you, too. Bye.

name: Bernadette
line: Your mom having fun in Florida?

name: Howard
line: Mmm, she loves it. She finally found a place where everyone talks about how sweaty they are. Anyway, she wants us to go to the house and check in on Stuart because he might be lonely.

name: Bernadette
line: She's just being nice.

name: Howard
line: Well, I'm her son, how come she doesn't send someone to check on me if I'm lonely?

name: Bernadette
line: Because you have a wife.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, sometimes you work late.

name: Bernadette
line: I know you don't like Stuart being in the house, but the store's about to reopen, I'm sure he'll get back on his feet.

name: Howard
line: That would be great. I'd love for things between me and Mom to get back to normal.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, normal's a strong word, but sure.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: You okay?

name: Sheldon
line: If I was okay, I would've said hello, and not the much more ominous hello.

name: Penny
line: What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm mad at Amy.

name: Penny
line: Did she leave pit stains in your favourite crop top, too?

name: Sheldon
line: No. She helped Barry Kripke make an advancement in string theory.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that sounds like a good thing.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it would be, except that I left string theory because I decided it was a dead end. Yeah, and then she went behind my back to help someone else prove me wrong. My rival, no less. I'm sorry you had to see that.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry I didn't have a camera.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would she do this to me?

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm sure she didn't upset you on purpose. Besides, aren't you the one who says there's nothing more important than the advancement of science?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I said there's nothing more important than me advancing science.

name: Penny
line: All right, well, if I'm understanding this right, and all she did was help out another scientist, I'm thinking you might have to let this one go.

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh, let it go. I have heard that my whole life. Every time something upsets me somebody says, let it go, you know, like it's my fault, and it's not okay to feel the way I feel.

name: Penny
line: I don't know what to tell you. I mean, why don't you talk to her?

name: Sheldon
line: Is that all you have? Shopworn tidbits like talk to her and let it go? Gee, Penny, life's giving me lemons. What should I do?

name: Penny
line: Well, you could shove them somewhere.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, now you're getting creative.

name: Stuart
line: Thanks again for your help.

name: Leonard
line: No problem.

name: Raj
line: Our pleasure.

name: Leonard
line: The place really looks great.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, you should have burned it down years ago.

name: Stuart
line: I keep telling you I didn't burn it down.

name: Leonard
line: We know, we know, because burning something down for the insurance money is a crime.

name: Bernadette
line: Stuart, this place looks amazing.

name: Stuart
line: Thanks.

name: Howard
line: You really did a nice job.

name: Stuart
line: And thank you for putting up with me staying at your mom's through all this. I couldn't have done it otherwise.

name: Howard
line: I appreciate that, and I'm glad you were able to... is that my mother's furniture?

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, she said I could use it. Doesn't it look great?

name: Howard
line: Not as great as it looks in the den where it belongs.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie.

name: Howard
line: Why don't you just clean out the whole room? Take the string art clown I made her in third grade and the ribbon I got in swim class for putting my face in the water.

name: Stuart
line: What is your problem? She said it was okay.

name: Howard
line: Well, I'm her son, and I say it's not okay.

name: Stuart
line: Some son, looks like you spent ten minutes on that clown art.

name: Howard
line: Well, maybe I should've gone to a fancy art school like you. Then I could run a failed comic shop and mooch off some guy's mother.

name: Bernadette
line: Why don't we leave so you can cool off?

name: Stuart
line: I think that's a good idea. Take him out of my store.

name: Howard
line: Your store? My mother gave you the money to reopen. I'm not going anywhere.

name: Leonard
line: Why don't we go get the food for the party.

name: Stuart
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: Smart, looks like we're being helpful.

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, when really we're just exiting an uncomfortable situation.

name: Sheldon
line: Kripke, you know, of all the people, Barry Kripke. I'm so... Are you folding that like a crazy person to get me to do it for you?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, give me that. Just out of curiosity, if I were to let something go, how would I do that?

name: Penny
line: I don't know, just think about something else.

name: Sheldon
line: Can I think about the spiny anteater?

name: Penny
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: The spiny anteater never went behind my back and worked with Barry Kripke. That didn't help at all.

name: Penny
line: You know, some people try visualization.

name: Sheldon
line: How does that work?

name: Penny
line: Okay, imagine your problems are a pen.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: Now imagine you're holding that pen.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: Now open your hand and let it go.

name: Sheldon
line: But I just got this pen. It's got my initials on it and everything. Look.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, this isn't that hard.

name: Sheldon
line: I may have a better way that you can teach me.

name: Penny
line: How?

name: Sheldon
line: What if I told you that over the past few months Amy has secretly been giving you little puzzles to test your intelligence against chimpanzees in her lab?

name: Penny
line: What? She didn't give me any puzzles.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure?

name: Amy
line: Boy, I just can't seem to get these scissors back together. Can you do it?

name: Amy
line: Darn it. There's something in my eye, and I need to sort these coins by size. Can you help?

name: Amy
line: Penny? I really want to eat this banana, but it's stuck inside this bamboo puzzle box.

name: Penny
line: Son of a bitch.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, that's great. Now, let it go.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe you were testing me against a chimp.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, excuse me, Amy was testing you. I was rooting for you. Good job on that banana box, by the way.

name: Penny
line: Why would she even do this?

name: Sheldon
line: She's been conducting an experiment on apes where they're given various puzzles to solve. I was surprised at the complexity of the puzzles and thought some humans wouldn't be able to solve them. That's when Amy said, want to make this interesting?

name: Penny
line: Make this interesting? You bet money on me?

name: Sheldon
line: No, no. We designed an experiment involving you. See? Now, isn't that interesting?

name: Penny
line: It's not interesting. It's incredibly insulting.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, maybe this will help. Imagine you're holding a pen. Before you go too far, not a special pen with your initials engraved on it, that'll make the next part really hard.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my, that's it. Get out.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand why you're mad at me. You should be mad at Amy. Like I was this afternoon. Hey, look at that, I let it go.

name: Penny
line: Get out.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I think I left my pen in there.

name: Bernadette
line: I understand why you're upset, but he worked really hard to get the store ready. And it's just furniture.

name: Howard
line: It's my mom's furniture. It belongs in the house I grew up in, next to that pile of TV Guides and in plain view of what, for a ten-year-old, was a quality piece of string art.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, if the store succeeds, Stuart has a source of income, and he can move out of your mother's house. Seems like some old furniture is a reasonable price to pay for that.

name: Howard
line: That is a good point. But I didn't marry you for good points. I married you to blindly support me no matter how ridiculous I'm being.

name: Bernadette
line: This is why I had to rewrite our wedding vows.

name: Leonard
line: Hi, we're here to pick up an order for Comic Center.

name: Waitress
line: Sure, let me go check on that.

name: Raj
line: Dude, I, I think that's Nathan Fillion.

name: Leonard
line: Oh yeah, look at that.

name: Raj
line: And he's picking the tomatoes out of his salad just like I do. I always did feel a connection with him. Oh, I have got an idea.

name: Leonard
line: We're not selling his tomatoes on eBay.

name: Raj
line: No, if we got Captain Reynolds from Firefly to do a signing at Stuart's store, that would be amazing.

name: Leonard
line: That would be great.

name: Raj
line: So should we go talk to him?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. I mean, if he's not nice, it's gonna make it hard for me to watch him in anything again.

name: Raj
line: What? The, the guy who plays Jon Snow was a jerk. We still watch Game of Thrones.

name: Leonard
line: He was a jerk because you rear-ended him.

name: Raj
line: I was distracted. It's weird seeing a member of the Night's Watch with a kayak strapped to his car. Come on. Hi, excuse me, s, sorry, I, I don't mean to bother you, but we're just really big fans of Firefly. And Dr. Horrible.

name: Nathan Fillion
line: Oh, uh, I think you made a mistake. I'm not an actor.

name: Raj
line: Don't say that. I mean, you're not Dame Judi Dench, but you're pretty great.

name: Nathan Fillion
line: Oh, yeah, I get it, you think I'm Nathan Fillion, but I'm not. So if you don't mind, I would just love to eat my lunch.

name: Leonard
line: Come on. Sorry to bother you.

name: Raj
line: Don't know why he's so grumpy. I got mistaken for that guy in Life of Pi once, and I'm still floating.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, it's me.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey. Did you see that? I, I figured out how to open the door all by myself. Maybe I'll fling some faeces around my cage to celebrate.

name: Amy
line: What are you talking about?

name: Penny
line: I know you've been giving me secret puzzle tests.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, open the door.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't. I'm naked.

name: Amy
line: I just saw you.

name: Sheldon
line: Hang on.

name: Penny
line: Open the door now.

name: Amy
line: Oh, hey.

name: Penny
line: Pull up your pants.

name: Amy
line: It's not a big deal. I run tests like this on undergrads all the time. If you fill out some paperwork at the university, I can get you five dollars.

name: Penny
line: I don't want five dollars. I want my dignity.

name: Amy
line: So what are we talking, like, ten bucks?

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: Thanks.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry again.

name: Nathan Fillion
line: No problem.

name: Raj
line: Are you sure you're not him? Uh, you can tell us. We're scientists, not crazy fanboys.

name: Nathan Fillion
line: All right, fine. I'm him.

name: Raj
line: And you're eating alone at a deli. I don't buy it, you're not him.

name: Nathan Fillion
line: I just wanted to eat my lunch in peace. But I really am him. And thank you very much for being a fan. If you want, uh, let's take a picture.

name: Leonard
line: That would be great.

name: Raj
line: Great.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, thank you.

name: Nathan Fillion
line: You bet.

name: Raj
line: Wait, hang on. If you're really Nathan Fillion, what's the line from Firefly about your bonnet?

name: Nathan Fillion
line: I swear by my pretty floral bonnet, I will end you.

name: Leonard
line: That's it, that's the line.

name: Raj
line: Although, I knew the line, doesn't make me Nathan Fillion.

name: Nathan Fillion
line: Do you want the picture or not?

name: Raj
line: I want a picture with Nathan Fillion.

name: Nathan
line: How about a picture with a guy who looks like Nathan Fillion but a little more annoyed than Nathan Fillion usually is?

name: Leonard
line: What do you think?

name: Raj
line: Ah, it's good enough for Facebook.

name: Leonard
line: I can't believe they did that.

name: Penny
line: I know, it's so insulting. At one point, they had me figure out how to get a banana out of a puzzle box.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, Sheldon gave me a banana in a box. He was testing me, too.

name: Penny
line: Unbelievable.

name: Leonard
line: And how could a chimp even solve that? That was impossible.

name: Penny
line: Really? You couldn't get it out?

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Wow, the store looks great.

name: Leonard
line: So you guys were testing us both? What is the matter with you?

name: Penny
line: Eh, what's the matter with them is they think they're so smart they don't care if they hurt other people's feelings.

name: Amy
line: That's not true.

name: Sheldon
line: That sounds like us. I still don't understand why you're upset. You solved every puzzle faster than all of the chimps.

name: Amy
line: Well, except Barnabas, but he was on Adderall.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry, but it's making me crazy.

name: Bernadette
line: Can you please just let it go?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I can help you with that. Imagine you're holding an ordinary pen. While your favourite pen is safe and secure in your pocket.

name: Howard
line: Hold that thought.  Hello?

name: Amy
line: How can I make this up to you?

name: Penny
line: The answer's in this puzzle box. Let's see if you can open it.

name: Stuart
line: You could have at least warned him about the furniture.

name: Raj
line: That's what I said when we moved it.

name: Bernadette
line: You helped him?

name: Raj
line: No, Stuart picked out those throw pillows all on his own.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you okay?

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: What's wrong?

name: Howard
line: My mom died.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: Uh, that was my aunt. Ma took a nap. She never woke up.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, my God, Howie.

name: Leonard
line: I'm so sorry.

name: Raj
line: What can we do?

name: Howard
line: I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: May I say something?

name: Leonard
line: Not right now, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: But I think it would be comforting.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy.

name: Howard
line: No, it's okay. What?

name: Sheldon
line: When I lost my own father, I didn't have any friends to help me through it. You do.

name: Penny
line: I really thought he was gonna say let it go.

name: Raj
line: Okay, thanks, Bernadette. Travel safe. Okay, bye. Well, they've booked a flight. They're heading to the airport now.

name: Penny
line: How's Howard holding up?

name: Raj
line: He's hanging in there.

name: Leonard
line: How are you doing, Stuart?

name: Stuart
line: Still can't believe she's gone. I mean, that woman took me in. If it wasn't for her, I, I would have been homeless.

name: Amy
line: One of us would have taken you in.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, I don't recall any offers. But, you know what, uh, I, I'm glad it worked out the way it did because I got to know this wonderful person.

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Mrs. Wolowitz was pretty special. When I first moved to America, Howard was my only friend and she made me feel so welcome in her home. Which says a lot, because, those first few years, she thought I was the gardener.

name: Penny
line: Whenever I saw her, she'd say I was too skinny and try and feed me.

name: Amy
line: She did that to me, too.

name: Penny
line: Don't take this away from me.

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't care for her yelling. But now that I'm not going to hear it again, I'm sad.

name: Leonard
line: If you want, I can yell at you later.

name: Sheldon
line: It won't be as good.

name: Leonard
line: Let's have a toast. To Mrs. Wolowitz. A loving mother to all of us. We'll miss you.

name: Amy
line: I just read about an experiment designed to see if you could make two people fall in love in a matter of hours.

name: Leonard
line: That doesn't sound right. My research has shown that it takes three to five years of shameless begging.

name: Penny
line: Honey, neither of us comes off good in that story.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, I, I, I saw that article you're talking about. Uh, the participants ask each other a series of questions designed to promote intimacy.

name: Amy
line: And then they finish it off by staring into each other's eyes for four minutes.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's nonsense. I proclaimed my love for you. And the last time I looked into your eyes was when you thought you had conjunctivitis.

name: Amy
line: Other than the fact that I had it, that was a magical night.

name: Penny
line: Raj, would you ever try an experiment like that with Emily?

name: Raj
line: What? I don't need science to win her heart. I have my family's wealth for that.

name: Leonard
line: I'm telling you, you can't create love in a few hours. Right?

name: Penny
line: Oh, careful. You're poking at the whole foundation of The Bachelor.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, but we don't have to debate this. We're scientists. We can conduct our own research. I propose that we imprison two street people and...

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: You didn't even let me finish.

name: Amy
line: Forget it.

name: Sheldon
line: So, you can experiment on all the apes you want. But I want to manipulate the emotions of two captive human beings, suddenly I'm the monster.

name: Raj
line: Why don't you just do the test?

name: Sheldon
line: In the interest of science, I'd be willing to.

name: Penny
line: What? You're okay with an experiment where you have to answer awkward questions about your innermost feelings?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Please, can I do it with him? Please?

name: Leonard
line: I've been listening to Sheldon's feelings on things for ten years. Tag, you're it.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, but what if the experiment works?

name: Penny
line: I'm not gonna fall in love with Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: That's what I said. Before I knew it, he pontificated his way right into my heart.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, fun fact, pontificate comes from the Latin word pontifex, which means bridge builder or Pope.

name: Leonard
line: In love yet?

name: Sheldon
line: Just out of curiosity, Penny, if this experiment does make us fall in love, would you drive me to Lake Geneva, Wisconsin for Gary Con? It's the only convention celebrating the life and work of Gary Gygax, the co-creator of Dungeons and Dragons.

name: Penny
line: You know what? I can honestly say if we fall in love, not only will I drive you there, I will buy you all the dragon T-shirts you want.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, babe, let's do this.

name: Raj
line: You guys are really being calm about Penny and Sheldon doing this thing. If it were me I'd, I'd be a little nervous.

name: Amy
line: Why?

name: Raj
line: Well, even if the study's nonsense, I don't believe in tempting fate. Same reason I wouldn't use a Ouija board, or pick a fight with an Asian guy. He probably doesn't know karate, but why risk it?

name: Amy
line: I think we're safe.

name: Raj
line: Well, that's what the bullies at Bruce Lee's high school thought. And then, bam. Karate.

name: Leonard
line: Well, are we just gonna sit here while they do the experiment?

name: Amy
line: The two of us could do it.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, sure, that might be fun.

name: Amy
line: What's the first question?

name: Raj
line: Hang on. Okay. Given the choice of anyone in the world, whom would you want as a dinner guest?

name: Leonard
line: Hmm. I can honestly say Penny.

name: Amy
line: Oh, then I choose a janitor, 'cause I'm about to throw up.

name: Leonard
line: I'm in love. Let's do something else.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, uh, Emily gets off work soon. Why don't the four of us go out?

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Amy
line: Sounds good.

name: Leonard
line: Should we call Howard and Bernadette?

name: Raj
line: I don't know what time their plane gets in, but let me, let me shoot them a text.

name: Amy
line: Did he say anything about the funeral?

name: Raj
line: Not much, but he seemed to be in a pretty good place.

name: Howard
line: Are you kidding me? You lost my mother's ashes?

name: Baggage Clerk
line: No, I'm just saying that sometimes bags are misrouted.

name: Howard
line: All right, fine. Where did you misroute the only woman who ever loved me? The first, well,

name: Clerk
line: I just need some information. Uh, what's the flight number?

name: Bernadette
line: Eight sixteen.

name: Howard
line: I really did mean first.

name: Bernadette
line: Just drop it.

name: Clerk
line: And can you describe the bag?

name: Bernadette
line: Um, well, it's, uh, black. There's a red ribbon tied to the handle.

name: Howard
line: The world's greatest mom is in the shoe compartment.

name: Sheldon
line: You ready to begin?

name: Penny
line: Yup. Be right there. I assume you don't want wine.

name: Sheldon
line: Correct. You're not supposed to drink alcohol when operating heavy machinery.

name: Penny
line: What heavy machinery? Let's just start.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, as a Texas gentleman, I'm inclined to say ladies first. Although, I'm concerned that level of politeness and charm might make you fall in love with me before the test even begins. Perhaps we should flip a coin. Or if you're familiar with the rules of Rock, Paper, Scissors...

name: Penny
line: Question one. Given the choice of anyone in the world, whom would you want as a dinner guest?

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. Living or dead?

name: Penny
line: Just says anyone in the world. I guess that means living.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, that's just as well. As much as I'd love to meet Euclid, inventor of the geometric proof, he probably wore sandals and I cannot look at toes during dinner. Oh, I know, the person I'd most like to have dinner with is myself.

name: Penny
line: You sure that's your choice? ‘Cause I've had that dinner.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I haven't. And while they say never meet your heroes, I just don't see how I could disappoint. Who would you choose?

name: Penny
line: Robert Downey, Jr.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I didn't think of Iron Man. You know, maybe after myself and I have dinner, we can meet you two for dessert.

name: Raj
line: So, what do you guys want to do?

name: Amy
line: Well, we're the ones tagging along, you pick.

name: Emily
line: Ooh, have you ever been to an escape room?

name: Leonard
line: What's that?

name: Emily
line: Um, it's kind of like interactive theatre, except you have to solve puzzles in a certain amount of time to get out. There's one downtown where they trap you in a room with a zombie.

name: Raj
line: Oh, so kind of like what's happening with Penny right now.

name: Sheldon
line: What would constitute a perfect day for you?

name: Penny
line: Uh, well, I'd probably sleep in, do a little yoga, then lie on the beach while cute cabana boys brought me drinks and probably get a massage and then cap off the night with some dancing.

name: Sheldon
line: That's it?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, why?

name: Sheldon
line: You didn't mention Leonard.

name: Penny
line: He's there.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think so. Leonard can't stand yoga, the beach, massages or dancing.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, he brought a book, okay? What's yours?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, I wake up. Uh, I enjoy some French toast with butter and syrup. Uh, then a wormhole opens, and whisks me millions of years into the future where my towering intellect is used to save the last remnants of mankind from a predatory alien race.

name: Penny
line: Interesting, you didn't mention Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Who do you think made the French toast with butter and syrup?

name: Woman in lab coat
line: You're about to enter the lab of the late Dr. David Saltzberg. While conducting studies on slowing the aging process, there was a catastrophic accident and he died. Or did he?

name: Leonard
line: Ladies?

name: Emily
line: Are you being polite or scared?

name: Leonard
line: Yup.

name: Emily
line: Ah, what a room!

name: Amy
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: This is cool.

name: Amy
line: So, how do we start?

name: Emily
line: We have to look for the clues hidden around the room.

name: Raj
line: Uh, wasn't there supposed to be a zombie?

name: Zombie
line: Uuuuuuuh!

name: Raj
line: Ooh. Okay, let's hope one of the clues is written on a pair of clean underwear.

name: Clerk
line: Mr. and Mrs. Wolowitz? As far as I can tell, your bag arrived in Los Angeles.

name: Bernadette
line: So, where is it?

name: Clerk
line: I don't know, perhaps somebody took it off the carousel by mistake?

name: Howard
line: So, some stranger has my mom? Is that what you're telling me? My poor mother can be anywhere in Los Angeles right now?

name: Clerk
line: I, I wish I was telling you that. Um, but the passenger could've gotten on an international flight.

name: Howard
line: Oh, okay, great. So, your entire job is to find lost luggage, and you've narrowed down the location of my mother to the planet Earth.

name: Clerk
line: I'm sorry. W, would 500 frequent-flyer miles help? That could get you to Sacramento.

name: Sheldon
line: If you could wake up tomorrow having gained any one quality or ability, what would it be?

name: Penny
line: Well, not to steal from the Bible, but turning water into wine sounds pretty good.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think you're taking this seriously.

name: Penny
line: Come on, I'm just having some fun with you.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe what you're doing is using humour to avoid vulnerability.

name: Penny
line: Fine. Honestly, if I could have one quality, I wish I could be as smart as you guys.

name: Sheldon
line: Ha. Keep dreaming.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Shedon
line: I'm sorry. That was me having fun with you. Look, you may not be as, as academically inclined as are we. Yes, that's how you say it. But, you possess an intelligence I envy. Which leads me to my answer. I would choose the ability to read people's minds.

name: Penny
line: Well, I can't read people's minds. Actually, that's not true, I can read men's minds, but only 'cause it's usually the one thing.

name: Sheldon
line: When are we going to get robot eyes?

name: Penny
line: You're all alike.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, what I meant was I often misinterpret how others are feeling. Like, I can't always tell if someone is only joking or laughing at me. You know, like, uh, if they're mad at something I've done or just in a bad mood. It, it's incredibly stressful.

name: Penny
line: Really? You always seem so confident.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm not. And if I could read people's minds, life would be so much simpler.

name: Penny
line: Well, now I wish I had the ability to make that stuff easier for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Wow, I just felt this wave of affection for you.

name: Sheldon
line: You sure it's not too much Bible juice?

name: Penny
line: And the wave is gone.

name: Zombie
line: Brains!

name: Amy
line: Keep it down, we're working here.

name: Raj
line: Okay, we've got the cipher decoded.

name: Emily
line: How's it going with the globe?

name: Amy
line: We used the coordinates to locate the cities.

name: Leonard
line: I'm putting the city names in the grid now. I'm sure that'll give us the code to the safe.

name: Zombie
line: Solve puzzle too fast! Slow down!

name: Leonard
line: Yup. Got the code.

name: Zombie
line: Just saying, no refund for finish early!

name: Bernadette
line: Sure you don't want to go home? When the bag's returned, they'll deliver it to us.

name: Howard
line: No, I'm not leaving without her.

name: Bernadette
line: All right, we'll wait.

name: Howard
line: I could've driven her.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: The day she left for Florida. She asked me to drive her to the airport. I was too busy. And I made her take a cab. I was too busy.

name: Bernadette
line: There's no way you could've known. Be right back. Excuse me?

name: Clerk
line: Yes?

name: Bernadette
line: You better find my husband's mother 'cause one way or another, w e're walking out of this airport with a dead woman.

name: Leonard
line: Which book are we looking for?

name: Raj
line: Uh, Origin of Species.

name: Leonard
line: Here it is. There's a black light.

name: Emily
line: Oh, hang on.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay. Uh, brothers and sisters I have none, but this man's father is my father's son. Who am I looking at? Yeah, yeah, we get it, you want brains. Calm down.

name: Amy
line: Well, if I don't have a brother, my father's son is me. And if I'm this man's father, then he's my son. The answer's son.

name: Emily
line: Ooh. There's a picture of the sun over there.

name: Leonard
line: I bet the key's behind it.

name: Zombie
line: Could be somewhere else.

name: Emily
line: Oh, got the key.

name: Amy
line: So, that's the key to the door? That's it?

name: Leonard
line: We spent two hundred dollars on six minutes of fun?

name: Raj
line: It's like when you bought that remote-controlled helicopter, and it just flew away.

name: Emily
line: Sorry, guys. Really thought the puzzles would be better.

name: Amy
line: Well, to be fair, we do all have advanced degrees.

name: Zombie
line: Remember that before you post on Yelp.

name: Penny
line: If you were to die this evening with no opportunity to communicate with anyone, what would you most regret not having told someone?

name: Sheldon
line: So, it would be today? Huh. Well, I suppose there's something satisfying about dying on my birthday.

name: Penny
line: Today's your birthday?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Well, that's always been a secret. Not even Amy knows.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I don't enjoy presents. And the thought of people jumping out and yelling surprise fills me with more dread than the words George Lucas Director's Cut.

name: Penny
line: So, why did you finally tell me?

name: Sheldon
line: The point of the experiment is to be completely honest with each other.

name: Penny
line: Well, thank you for sharing it with me. I won't tell anyone.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: That is so funny. I never would have pegged you for a Pisces.

name: Sheldon
line: You're making it difficult to love you right now.

name: Clerk
line: Great news, your bag was returned.

name: Howard
line: Oh, thank God. It's okay, she's here. Ma's here.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, thank you so much.

name: Howard
line: Ma? I'm sorry I didn't take you to the airport. I just want you to know that I'll never forgive myself for being so selfish. And I promise to keep you close for the rest of my life.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, no. That thing's gonna end up in my bedroom.

name: Sheldon
line: That's it. We're done with the questions.

name: Penny
line: All that's left to do is stare into each other's eyes for four minutes without talking.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Wait, hang on. Bladder check. We're good to go.

name: Penny
line: You ready?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: And begin. This is kind of creepy.

name: Sheldon
line: We're not supposed to talk during this part.

name: Penny
line: Sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: This is kind of creepy.

name: Penny
line: Do you want to stop? I know you have trouble with eye contact.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you have a brown fleck in your right iris that looks like a Formula One race car. So I'm just concentrating on that. Plus, it's easier around people that I'm comfortable with.

name: Penny
line: Aw, sweetie, I'm comfortable around you, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course you are, I'm warm and soothing. I'm like a human bowl of tomato soup.

name: Penny
line: I meant more like a little brother.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Well, I suppose I do think of you as a sister. And sometimes, a mother.

name: Penny
line: It's getting creepy again.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Just thinking about the day I met you and Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: It was a Monday afternoon. You joined us for Indian food.

name: Penny
line: Can you believe it's been eight years?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, and you're still eating our food.

name: Penny
line: I can't remember a time you guys weren't in my life.

name: Sheldon
line: I remember it perfectly. But I have an eidetic memory. If you're interested, I also remember how much you owe us for the food.

name: Penny
line: That's it. That wasn't so bad.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it wasn't. Uh, now let's tabulate the results of the experiment. I think it's safe to say that you're not in love with me and I'm not in love with you. And psychology has once again proved itself the doofus of the sciences.

name: Penny
line: Well, maybe. But I'm still glad we did it. I do feel closer to you.

name: Sheldon
line: And I, you. And yes, that's how you say that. Yeah, so, given our newfound intimacy, I'd say we have some hard choices to make.

name: Penny
line: Like what?

name: Sheldon
line: Gary Con, do we fly or drive? Do we wear costumes? And if so, who gets to be Gary?

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for walking me home.

name: Penny
line: I just want to make sure you get there safe.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, this is me. It's been a very interesting evening.

name: Penny
line: It really has.

name: All
line: SURPRISE!

name: Sheldon
line: Aah! And after I let you be Gary.

name: Leonard
line: I was unstoppable. I mean, I was, I was on fire. It was like my mind and my body were totally connected, like, like athletes must feel when they're in the zone.

name: Penny
line: Again, it was miniature golf.

name: Leonard
line: Admit it, you're a little turned on.

name: Penny
line: You can't be this proud.

name: Leonard
line: Why not?

name: Penny
line: Because I beat you.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good. You're back.

name: Amy
line: We have some exciting news.

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: As you know, Amy and I have been together a long time, and a lot of things I never thought possible now seem possible.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Amy
line: After a careful evaluation of our relationship, we decided that the time was right to take a step forward.

name: Leonard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you want to say it?

name: Amy
line: Let's say it together.

name: Together
line: We're getting a turtle.

name: Penny
line: This is why I've been saying we should keep champagne on ice.

name: Sheldon
line: Sarcasm?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. That was tricky, 'cause when it comes to alcohol, she generally means business.

name: Leonard
line: Well, we're, we're very happy for you.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: Thank you. Acquiring a joint pet is a big step for us.

name: Sheldon
line: No. It's true. It means that we care so much about each other, there's enough left over for an eight-ounce reptile.

name: Leonard
line: Why a turtle?

name: Sheldon
line: After much deliberation, we've determined that a turtle is the ideal pet. They don't shed fur, they don't make noise.

name: Amy
line: For Halloween, we can dress him as a cobblestone.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. And if he ever goes berserk, I know I can outrun him. Coincidentally, that's also why I chose you as a roommate.

name: Leonard
line: Well, congratulations. Who would've thought you two would be the first in our group to start a family?

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Amy
line: That's what I said.

name: Raj
line: So, where's your roommate tonight?

name: Emily
line: Well, I thought it was a little unfair that she's always here, and you never get a chance to stay over, so I killed her.

name: Raj
line: But remember our agreement? You can joke about murdering people, but you have to say just kidding.

name: Emily
line: And the more important thing to remember is that I'd never hurt you. Oh, crap. I have to run over to the hospital and check on a patient.

name: Raj
line: That's okay. I can come back later.

name: Emily
line: No. No, don't be silly. I won't be gone long. Just stay here.

name: Raj
line: Okay, cool. Oh, and you're sure your roommate's not gonna come back while I'm here alone, right? ‘Cause that'll be awkward.

name: Emily
line: Oh, don't worry. She's in Palm Springs.

name: Raj
line: Oh, good.

name: Emily
line: Well, her torso is. Just kidding. I put her in a wood chipper.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear Lord. Oh, dear Lord.

name: Amy
line: It's okay. You made it. We're fine.

name: Sheldon
line: That was a lot of puppies.

name: Amy
line: Let's forget about them, and pick ourselves out a nice turtle. Oh, how about this one up on the log?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I don't know. He kind of looks like a jerk. How about this one?

name: Amy
line: Well, he's barely moving. He looks half dead.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. I like him, too. Hi, little guy. How'd you like to come home with us? You'll be living with me because we don't live in the same house.

name: Amy
line: But that's not your fault. Like you, we're taking it ridiculously slow. You'll stay with me when he's at Comic-Con or away for work.

name: Sheldon
line: Or if they accept Daddy's application to live on Mars.

name: Amy
line: What are you talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, there's this company that's attempting to establish a colony on Mars, and I applied to be among the first to go. What should we name him? You know, I came in thinking Seth, but he kind of looks Italian.

name: Amy
line: You applied for a mission to be a colonist on another planet, and couldn't be bothered to tell me?

name: Sheldon
line: Would you have approved?

name: Amy
line: Of course not.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, based on your reaction, it looks like I made the right choice. Isn't that right, Giuseppe?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, hey. Listen, I, I have a little confession to make.

name: Penny
line: Aw, is this your first time?

name: Leonard
line: No, I got you something for Valentine's Day, and I was too embarrassed to give it to you.

name: Penny
line: Well, why?

name: Leonard
line: Well, 'cause I got it at the dirty store.

name: Penny
line: You went to the dirty store without me?

name: Leonard
line: In sunglasses and a hat after I parked two blocks away.

name: Penny
line: Well, get it. Get it for me.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, uh, well, I hope it's fun. I mean, it, it comes with paints, and, and it's kind of creative and artistic.

name: Penny
line: Okay, did you go to the dirty store or Michaels?

name: Leonard
line: No, no. We cover ourselves in body paint, and then, then we get on this big canvas and do our thing.

name: Penny
line: Whoa, that's kind of a big step for a guy who only recently agreed to take his socks off.

name: Leonard
line: You're making fun of me. Forget it.

name: Penny
line: No. No, come on, I want to do it.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, let's you, me, and your very, very pale feet make some art. Hey, when you got back to this store, I want to go with you.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, but it's a drive, the one I went to is in San Diego.

name: Howard
line: How are the taxes going?

name: Bernadette
line: Okay. But you got a lot of receipts for the Lego store in here.

name: Howard
line: Those are business expenses. You can write those off.

name: Bernadette
line: A two hundred dollar R2-D2 is a business expense?

name: Howard
line: Oh, Bernie, you're gonna have to sound a lot more confident when we get audited.  Hey, what's up?

name: Raj
line: Oh, Emily ran back to the hospital, so I'm just hanging out at her place. What are you, uh, what are you doing?

name: Howard
line: Just playing video games while Bernie does the taxes.

name: Raj
line: What are you, a little kid? Is she gonna cut your dinner into little pieces, too?

name: Howard
line: She doesn't have to, I filled up on jelly beans.

name: Raj
line: So, uh, what game are you... Oh. Crap.

name: Howard
line: What's wrong?

name: Raj
line: I can't get Emily's night-stand to close.

name: Howard
line: So?

name: Raj
line: She's gonna know I was looking in it.

name: Howard
line: Why were you looking in it?

name: Raj
line: Well, there's a question I better have a good answer to before she gets back.

name: Howard
line: Okay, calm down. There's probably something jammed behind it. Just, uh, pull it out and see what's there.

name: Raj
line: Hang on. Oh no. Oh, no. Oh, God, no.

name: Howard
line: You know what, you sound busy, I'm gonna let you go.

name: Raj
line: Dude, the whole front came off. Now she's gonna know I was snooping.

name: Bernadette
line: What's happening?

name: Howard
line: Raj was snooping through Emily's drawers and broke one.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw. I'm gonna miss her.

name: Penny
line: So what do you think?

name: Leonard
line: I thought it'd be a little more, just more.

name: Penny
line: I'm not even sure why we were out of breath. Uh, I mean, did we move at all?

name: Leonard
line: Maybe along the z-axis, but x and y are looking pretty sad.

name: Penny
line: Okay, come on. We are not old boring people. We can do better than this.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, Th, that's true. How late did we stay up last night?

name: Penny
line: Almost 1am.

name: Leonard
line: Damn straight, almost 1am. And we weren't even watching TV. We were watching Netflix, like the kids do.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, is it a comedy? Is it a drama? Nobody knows. Now, come on. We are gonna do this.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. You get the paint, I'll rest for 30 to 40 minutes, and then we do this.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe you almost had me bring a wild animal into my home.

name: Amy
line: No one told you to poke the turtle's face.

name: Sheldon
line: I was playing Got Your Nose. That's how you get children to like you.

name: Amy
line: I'm surprised you even care if he likes you, since you're planning on leaving the planet the first chance you get.

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh, this again. Amy, I've already had one new hole torn in my body today. I don't need another one.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I know the odds of you even going to Mars are incredibly small, but it still hurts that you would volunteer for something that would take you away from me forever.

name: Sheldon
line: So you're saying you wouldn't leave me for the chance to be one of the first humans to colonize another planet?

name: Amy
line: I would at least mention it before filling out the application.

name: Sheldon
line: Huh, that's exactly what Leonard, Wolowitz, Koothrappali, Bernadette and Penny said.

name: Amy
line: And who says you could even survive an interplanetary mission, anyway? You could barely survive a tiny turtle bite.

name: Sheldon
line: First of all, this has only made me stronger. But beyond that, all I did was fill out an application.

name: Amy
line: You know what? Go to Mars, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Is there anything I can do to cheer you up?

name: Amy
line: No. Forget it.

name: Sheldon
line: What if I play the Star Trek theme on my nose?

name: Amy
line: Please don't.

name: Sheldon
line: Yep, you're mad.

name: Howard
line: Okay, let me see the damage.

name: Raj
line: Hang on.

name: Howard
line: Well, I think you broke the dowels. You're not gonna have time to glue it back on, you'll have to nail it.

name: Raj
line: With what?

name: Howard
line: Does she have any pillows or wine glasses?

name: Raj
line: She does.

name: Howard
line: Great. Neither of those. Try a hammer.

name: Raj
line: Did that feel good? You feel like a big man now?

name: Sheldon
line: I was going to make you red zinger, but since Mars is the red planet, I went with peppermint.

name: Amy
line: Why do you even want to do this?

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, as part of the application, I was required to make a short video answering that very question. You want to see it?

name: Amy
line: Can't you just tell me?

name: Sheldon
line: But I made a video.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm Dr. Sheldon Cooper, and I'd like to tell you why I should be chosen to go to Mars. I'm exceedingly smart. I graduated college at 14. While my brother was getting an STD I was getting a PhD. Penicillin can't take this away. Being in close quarters, cleanliness is important and my hygiene is impeccable. In fact, animals don't trust me because I smell like nothing. Literally nothing. During the seven-month space flight, I can keep up morale with my wacky sense of humour. Hey, Leonard, is there any peanut brittle left in that can?

name: Leonard
line: You mean this weirdly suspicious one?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Open it and check.

name: Leonard
line: I don't get it. There's actually peanut brittle in... Please go to Mars.

name: Sheldon
line: But on a more serious note, the most important reason I want to go to Mars is that I believe, as a scientist, it's my duty to push the boundaries of human knowledge forward. Now, I know that life on Mars will be difficult. But life here on Earth is no picnic. Also, picnics are no picnic. Where should we go for lunch? Oh, I know, the ground. In conclusion, thank you for considering me for this journey of a lifetime. To Mars.

name: Sheldon
line: Afterwards, Leonard blew his nose, and pie came out.

name: Leonard
line: Right there, right there, Oh, God, that's it.

name: Penny
line: How did you get paint in your eye?

name: Leonard
line: Because you wouldn't let me wear safety goggles.

name: Raj
line: This looks terrible. She, she's gonna know.

name: Howard
line: It's fine. You just need two more nails.

name: Raj
line: Okay, where should I put them?

name: Howard
line: In Emily's eyes.

name: Raj
line: You're not helping.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, maybe this is what you get for snooping.

name: Raj
line: You know, it, it's bad enough that I have to deal with this...

name: Emily
line: Raj? I'm back.

name: Raj
line: Oh, no. Hey.

name: Emily
line: Hi.

name: Raj
line: How was the hospital?

name: Emily
line: Fine. What were you doing in there?

name: Raj
line: Uh w, well, okay, look, I, I don't want to lie to you. I got curious, I was looking around and I broke the drawer on your night stand.

name: Emily
line: You were looking in my night stand?

name: Raj
line: Yeah.

name: Emily
line: So, the first time I leave you alone, you snoop on me?

name: Raj
line: You've never snooped around my apartment?

name: Emily
line: No.

name: Raj
line: Come on, think back. It would really help if you had.

name: Emily
line: I can't believe you don't trust me.

name: Bernadette
line: She sounds really mad.

name: Howard
line: We should hang up.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, we should.

name: Howard
line: But we're not going to, are we?

name: Bernadette
line: Not a chance.

name: Howard
line: What happened to snooping is wrong?

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, you're going to jail for tax fraud. Who cares?

name: Leonard
line: Well, we did it.

name: Penny
line: We sure did.

name: Leonard
line: I mean, I was on fire. I, I was in the zone, like an athlete.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, I beat you at this, too.

name: Leonard
line: So, where do we want to hang it?

name: Penny
line: What? Are you kidding? We're not hanging it.

name: Leonard
line: But it's an expression of our love.

name: Penny
line: And our butts. Not hanging it.

name: Leonard
line: Seems a shame to throw it away.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. We could give it to Sheldon, and tell him William Shatner painted it.

name: Leonard
line: God, I love you. I love you so much.

name: Amy
line: I think I'm gonna go home.

name: Sheldon
line: Why? I really don't understand what's happening here.

name: Amy
line: You know, Sheldon, at any other time, learning that you had plans to go live on Mars would be a slow news day. But a couple of hours ago, we were getting a turtle. And silly as it sounds, I thought that meant something.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy. Oh, why didn't I give her Sleepy Time tea? Amy, wait. Getting a turtle meant a great deal to me, too.

name: Amy
line: Sure. Unless something better comes along.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you want me to withdraw my application?

name: Amy
line: What I want is for us to be planning our future together.

name: Sheldon
line: And in that future, are we on the same planet? Because I've seen people make the long-distance thing work.

name: Amy
line: We're on the same planet.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Does that planet have to be Earth?

name: Amy
line: Are you asking me to go to Mars with you?

name: Sheldon
line: I am. Yeah, if I'm going to a barren, lifeless environment where the chances of survival are slim to none, I want you there with me. Why don't we go back to the apartment, and fill out your application?

name: Amy
line: Okay. I suppose being the first people on a new planet would be incredibly exciting.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I know. We could be the first to plant a flag on Mars. We could be the first to watch Mars Attacks! on Mars. We could be the first to say good lord, what on Mars are you talking about?

name: Amy
line: You know, we could also be the first people to procreate on Mars.

name: Sheldon
line: You just can't keep it in your space pants, can you?

name: Amy
line: Think about it. If we had a family there, our kids would be Martians.

name: Sheldon
line: They would, wouldn't they? We could give them cool Martian names. And we could teach them about Martian history. Like, who planted those flags? And, uh, where did that copy of Mars Attacks! come from?

name: Amy
line: I guess we'll have to make a new video together, as a couple.

name: Sheldon
line: Good idea. And since you've had such a rough day, I'm gonna let you throw the pie in Leonard's face.

name: Raj
line: Thank you for forgiving me.

name: Emily
line: That's okay. At some point, we were bound to have our first fight.

name: Raj
line: Well, it almost happened when you called my apple pie crust doughy, but the truth is you were right, and I was just angry at myself.

name: Emily
line: Can I ask you one thing?

name: Raj
line: Of course. What?

name: Emily
line: Did you look in my closet?

name: Raj
line: No. Just the drawer.

name: Emily
line: You promise you didn't look in the closet?

name: Raj
line: I promise. Why, what's in there?

name: Emily
line: Don't worry about it. Good night.

name: Sheldon
line: Two one six four two zero one nine eight nine. And that, little lady, is pi to a thousand places.

name: Amy
line: I'd say I'm sorry I asked, except I didn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, look, it's the Scientific American that covered the paper Leonard and I wrote.

name: Amy
line: Oh, let me see.

name: Sheldon
line: I have mixed feelings about doing interviews. I like the part where I talk. I do not like the part where the other man talks.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, this article doesn't mention Leonard at all.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that can't be right.

name: Amy
line: It only refers to Dr. Cooper and his team. Did you even talk about him?

name: Sheldon
line: All I did was answer a few questions about the theory. And then expressed my gratitude that Scientific American doesn't include any of those smelly perfume cards.

name: Amy
line: Poor Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: Why? The theory he came up with just got mentioned in Scientific American. He ought to be thrilled.

name: Amy
line: He might not be.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, maybe you're right. He is kind of a lump.

name: Amy
line: Think about it. How would you feel if you were referred to as part of Leonard's team?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'd be incensed.

name: Amy
line: So you see what I'm getting at?

name: Sheldon
line: Squeaky wheel gets the grease?

name: Amy
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Grass is always greener?

name: Amy
line: Try again.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I don't know, we're all Groot? Just tell me.

name: Amy
line: Leonard is as much a part of this paper as you are, and he was overlooked. He's going to feel bad.

name: Sheldon
line: But it wasn't my fault. I didn't exclude him. And I didn't write the article.

name: Amy
line: Remember that time you didn't get picked to pull the sword out of the stone at Disneyland and they let that other kid do it?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that kid. Poor Leonard.

name: Amy
line: Exactly.

name: Sheldon
line: For the record, that kid was a terrible choice. If you cry when you drop your churro, you do not have what it takes to rule England.

name: Howard
line: Thanks for helping us sort through all my mom's stuff.

name: Raj
line: Of course. I know what it's like having to go through a loved one's possessions. My uncle was a worshipper of Krishna. But after he died, you know what we found? A statue of Shiva. It may not be Crips and Bloods, okay? But in India, it's a thing.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, it'll be good that you're there. Howard's been having trouble deciding what to keep and what to let go.

name: Howard
line: Well, it's hard. A lot of Ma's stuff brings back fond memories.

name: Bernadette
line: Is that why you couldn't get rid of her drawer full of ketchup packets?

name: Howard
line: Yes. It reminds me of us eating out and her saying quick, nobody's looking, fill your pockets with ketchup.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard? Have you ever noticed that only my name is on the cable bill?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Good, good. And your name is on the electric bill and mine isn't. And I'm okay with that.

name: Leonard
line: Actually, your name is on the electric bill.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, right. This is a disaster.

name: Leonard
line: I don't even know what you're talking about and I agree.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, I have to tell you something, but you're not going to like it.

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: An article was just published in Scientific American about our theory.

name: Leonard
line: Did they hate it?

name: Sheldon
line: No. No, they loved it. They, uh, couldn't say enough nice things about it.

name: Leonard
line: So what's the problem?

name: Sheldon
line: You know how the PennySaver only has my name...

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: They didn't mention you in the article. Only me.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: I know. It's not fair. Let the anger go, buddy. You just, you relax all your muscles. Except for your pubococcygeus and anal sphincter. Let's keep those tight.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, that, that's not necessary.

name: Sheldon
line: It is. They're what hold back the urine and the faeces. Look, maybe, maybe you shouldn't read it. It'll only make you feel worse.

name: Leonard
line: Cooper and his team?

name: Sheldon
line: You should know I had nothing to do with that.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, at least they're talking about the theory. I mean, that's what's important.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, you're right. Yeah. You know, it's like when Stan Lee and Steve Ditko created Spider-Man. Stan Lee may get all the credit, but Steve Ditko knows he was just as important. Even though Stan Lee gets to be in all the Marvel movies. And. and he's far richer. And he's a household name, you know? Whereas, you know, you say Ditko, and that sounds like a company that makes Dits.

name: Leonard
line: That's not helping.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'd give more examples, but, well, everyone in your position's so forgettable.

name: Howard
line: Stuart, we're here.

name: Raj
line: It's nice of you to let him keep staying at your mom's house.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, well, I tried putting him out on the curb, but nobody took him.

name: Stuart
line: Hey. Just so you know, the power's out.

name: Bernadette
line: What happened?

name: Stuart
line: I called, they said a transformer blew. It's the whole block. Should be fixed by tomorrow.

name: Howard
line: Wait, when did it go out?

name: Stuart
line: In the middle of the night.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, what's wrong?

name: Howard
line: It's all defrosting.

name: Bernadette
line: It's okay. It's just food.

name: Howard
line: It's not just food. This is the last food my mother ever made. This is her last brisket. This is her last meatloaf. This is her last. I have no idea what this is, but it's the last one.

name: Raj
line: Everything okay?

name: Howard
line: No. All Ma's food is gonna be ruined.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, why don't we take it home and put it in our freezer?

name: Raj
line: You don't want to do that. Refreezing not only removes moisture, but it creates ice crystals in the fibres of the meat that can compromise its taste and texture. What? I saw a teachable moment. I dropped some culinary science.

name: Bernadette
line: What should we do?

name: Howard
line: I'll tell you exactly what we're gonna do. We're gonna eat it.

name: Bernadette
line: There's, like, twenty pounds of food in there.

name: Howard
line: All you said was I had to get rid of things. You didn't say they couldn't pass through my colon first.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie.

name: Howard
line: Okay. Then how about this? Let's invite everyone over to dinner. It'll be like Ma's feeding us one last time.

name: Bernadette
line: I love that.

name: Raj
line: Me, too. Oh, look, we've got enough ketchup to cover every ounce of it.

name: Penny
line: I mean, who even reads Scientific American?

name: Leonard
line: It's kind of a big deal.

name: Penny
line: If it's such a big deal, how come the biggest celebrity they could get for the cover is a molecule?

name: Leonard
line: Can we please just stop talking about it?

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. What can I do?

name: Leonard
line: Nothing, I'm fine.

name: Penny
line: No, no. I'm gonna cheer you up. Here we go.

name: Leonard
line: What are we doing?

name: Penny
line: I am taking you shopping.

name: Leonard
line: Oh.

name: Penny
line: My baby is sad, and I'm gonna make him happy again.

name: Leonard
line: Look, I know shopping cheers you up, but it's just not really my thing.

name: Penny
line: Well, what about this helicopter you control with an iPad?

name: Leonard
line: Does it have a camera in it?

name: Penny
line: It does have a camera in it.

name: Leonard
line: Baby's listening.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard?  Leonard?  Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I spoke to the reporter at the magazine.

name: Leonard
line: What happened? Did you tell him it was my idea?

name: Sheldon
line: I did.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you. What did he say?

name: Sheldon
line: He said they made the editorial decision to only cite the lead scientist.

name: Leonard
line: Why did he think you're the lead scientist? It was my idea.

name: Penny
line: You know, for an extra four bucks, I can have this thing here tomorrow.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I know it was your idea, but the reporter said he's been following my work for a while, and the only reason they even mentioned it in the magazine is 'cause my name is on it.

name: Penny
line: You know what? I did it. What's four bucks?

name: Leonard
line: If you're trying to make me feel better, it's not working.

name: Sheldon
line: Well then what if I told you that I added your name to the cable bill?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. That's just as well. They had me on hold for 20 minutes and I hung up.  Leonard?  Leonard?  Leonard? Also, Wolowitz invited us all to dinner, so I'm ready whenever you are.

name: Sheldon
line: All he had was an idea.

name: Amy
line: Well, that is an important part.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, please. I have ideas all day long. Reverse SeaWorld where dolphins are allowed to pet people. A new clothing size between medium and large called Marge. Snow White retold from the point of view of Sneezy. Why won't Doc prescribe him something? We finally find out.

name: Amy
line: But Leonard's idea was good.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Then Grumpy, what's he so grumpy about? Maybe his girlfriend won't take his side.

name: Leonard
line: I'm the one who thought of it.

name: Penny
line: Well, didn't he do a lot of the work?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. But now he's happy to let people think he's responsible for everything.

name: Penny
line: And that's why you get an iPad helicopter.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it my fault I have a much bigger reputation than he does?

name: Amy
line: It's not your fault.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it my fault that my name came first on the paper alphabetically?

name: Amy
line: Not your fault.

name: Sheldon
line: Is it my fault that when the reporter cited me as the lead scientist I didn't correct him?

name: Amy
line: Hey, look at that pretty bird.

name: Leonard
line: He always needs all the attention. He's such a baby.

name: Penny
line: I know, I know.

name: Leonard
line: I swear, he is never ever playing with my helicopter.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I'll start heating some of this stuff up.

name: Bernadette
line: Thanks.

name: Howard
line: Oh, man. This is the boutonniere from my high school prom. A piece of cake from my Bar Mitzvah.

name: Bernadette
line: Did she throw anything away?

name: Howard
line: No. If I find my foreskin, I'm gonna kill myself.

name: Raj
line: Okay, so we've got, um, three briskets, four meatloafs, one lasagna.

name: Howard
line: No, that's noodle kugel.

name: Raj
line: One Jewish lasagna, two pound cakes that are about eight pounds each, and one giant container of matzoh ball soup.

name: Howard
line: Ma always kept it on hand, in case I got sick. She thought she could cure anything with her cooking. Even the time I got food poisoning. From her cooking.

name: Bernadette
line: You okay?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I'm okay. Let's get started.

name: Raj
line: You got it.

name: Howard
line: I'm never gonna talk to her again.

name: Bernadette
line: Should we tell everyone not to come?

name: Howard
line: No. I want to do this.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay. Well, I'll keep it together if you can.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Raj
line: I'm not making any promises.

name: Stuart
line: Glad you guys could make it.

name: Leonard
line: Of course.

name: Penny
line: Wow, it looks really pretty in here.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, turns out half a dozen menorahs really sets a mood.

name: Leonard
line: So, Stuart, have you thought about what you'd do if Howard sells the house?

name: Stuart
line: And there goes the mood.

name: Sheldon
line: Hi. Hello. Oh, and a special hello to Leonard, who needs to be mentioned by name.

name: Leonard
line: Subtle.

name: Sheldon
line: But you got it, right?

name: Howard
line: Hey, guys.

name: All
line: Hey. Hi. Hello.

name: Howard
line: I just want everyone to know, uh, tonight's not a sad occasion.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, we just want to have the kind of dinner that we've all had here so many times before.

name: Howard
line: Good food, good friends, and sometime around midnight, heartburn that makes you pray for death.

name: Amy
line: Do you need any help in the kitchen?

name: Bernadette
line: No, we got it. You guys make yourselves comfortable.

name: Penny
line: All right, hey, you two, we're here for Howard right now, okay?

name: Amy
line: Yes, so please behave yourselves.

name: Leonard
line: Fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course.

name: Stuart
line: So I heard you two, uh, wrote a paper together. How's that going?

name: Penny
line: This food is amazing.

name: Raj
line: Mm, and not a vegetable in sight.

name: Howard
line: That's not true. We've got tomatoes right here.

name: Amy
line: All these bright people sitting around a table by candlelight. Feels like we could be an 18th century French salon.

name: Sheldon
line: Indeed. Penny, a salon is a gathering where intellectuals entertained each other with sparkling conversations about issues of the day.

name: Penny
line: Oh, so it's like The View.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, The View is a daytime talk show hosted by women.

name: Penny
line: Shut up.

name: Raj
line: I would like to propose a salon topic.

name: Amy
line: Ooh, please do, Rajesh.

name: Raj
line: The lead in The Hunger Games is a woman. Marvel has made Tor a female.

name: Penny
line: Wait, who's Tor?

name: Raj
line: You know, Tor, the God of Tunder. As I was saying, is this a sign that our society is approaching gender equality?

name: Howard
line: Certainly a lot more women are reading comic books now.

name: Stuart
line: It's true. At the store, I had to put a seat on the toilet.

name: Amy
line: We won't know if there's equality until female Thor has a baby and the Avengers are cool with her pumping breast milk at work.

name: Howard
line: I wonder if only a baby who is worthy can suckle at the bosom of Thor.

name: Penny
line: Okay, new salon topic. Salons, dumb thing from a long time ago or interesting thing made dumb by talking about superheroes? Discuss.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't believe it matters what the topic is. What's crucial for a salon is that we conduct the discussion in an elevated and insightful way. It's all about the execution.

name: Leonard
line: Of course you'd focus on that rather than the inspiration. Uh, new salon topic. What's more important, an idea or its execution?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, that's fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, good for you, Leonard. That's a lovely little notion. Kind of like, I wish I could talk to my uncle in Chicago. Yeah, now stand back while I invent the telephone. Hello? Oh, hold on. Leonard, it's your uncle. He says you just got burned.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Guys.

name: Leonard
line: No, it's okay. We're all adults trying to have an intelligent discussion. At least I am. Howard, what do you think?

name: Howard
line: Well, I guess, as an engineer, I lean towards execution. I spend my days trying to take ideas and make them real.

name: Sheldon
line: Well said, old chap. I thought eloquence had died, here it stands before us. Starting today, it'll go Gettysburg Address, I have a dream, and what he just said.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, now he's a genius? All you ever do is make fun of him and engineering.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, please. His mother just died.

name: Leonard
line: You're being ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, so are you.

name: Penny
line: Guys, if I wanted to hear people be bitchy, I'd go to my real salon.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, lots of people could've had that idea, but very few people could've worked out the math the way I did.

name: Leonard
line: Lots of people also didn't have that idea, like everyone in the entire world except for me.

name: Sheldon
