line: Oh, well, apparently Leonard thinks he's better than everyone in the whole world, including those fighting for our freedom. Yeah, well, I don't know about you, but I support our boys overseas.

name: Amy
line: And girls.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, you already ruined Thor, give it a rest.

name: Leonard
line: So I'm just supposed to be okay with you hogging all the credit?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't hog anything. Unlike you and that weird lasagna with raisins in it.

name: Leonard
line: You want some of this? I'll give you some.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey. Sheldon, Leonard, living room, right now!

name: Sheldon
line: She said my name first, that must kill you.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know what you think you're doing, but this is a very difficult time for my husband. We're eating the last food his mother ever made, and you were gonna throw it at each other like children? Whatever it is you're fighting about, put it aside, go back in there and be a good friend to Howard or there's no dessert for either of you. Look at me when I'm talking to you. And don't think...

name: Howard
line: You guys ever notice sometimes Bernadette sounds like my mom?

name: Amy
line: I don't hear it.

name: Raj
line: No, not at all.

name: Penny
line: I don't think I've eaten that much in my entire life.

name: Howard
line: It's why my people wandered the desert for 40 years. Took that long to walk it off.

name: Sheldon
line: You see, Penny, the Israelites were in the desert...

name: Penny
line: Shut up.

name: Ra
line: So glad you two are done fighting.

name: Leonard
line: Right now, I'm just trying to burp without throwing up.

name: Sheldon
line: Hang on. Physics Today mentioned the paper.

name: Stuart
line: What'd they say?

name: Amy
line: Who cares? Did they mention Leonard?

name: Sheldon
line: They did.

name: All
line: Yay.

name: Bernadette
line: Good news, I found more Tums.

name: All
line: Yay.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I've been working on an opening joke for our lecture at Berkeley.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I like to laugh. But say it anyway.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, um, what do you say to a graduate of the UC Berkeley physics department? I'll have fries with that. Because his education hasn't prepared him for a career in the sciences.

name: Penny
line: You know, when they chase you out of there, you only have to run faster than Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: Are you all set for your trip?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I think so. I just restocked the old PRK.

name: Penny
line: PRK?

name: Leonard
line: Public restroom kit. Everything a boy needs for making pee pee in new and strange places.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't see what's crazy about bringing a backpack with your own toilet paper and Purell.

name: Leonard
line: Keep going.

name: Sheldon
line: And rubber gloves, uh, air freshener. Um, noise-cancelling headphones. Oh, danger whistle. Um, pepper spray. Ooh, a multi-language occupied sign. Uh, let's see, we have seat protectors, uh, booties for my shoes, a clothespin for my nose. Oh, and a mirror on a stick, so I can make sure the person in the stall next to me isn't some kind of weirdo.

name: Penny
line: You still worried some Berkeley girl is gonna steal him away?

name: Amy
line: Yes, who do you think gave him the danger whistle?

name: Sheldon
line: Would you like to play a physics car game I invented called I Can't Spy? It's all the nail-biting tension of I Spy but the added fun of subatomic particles and waves outside the visible spectrum.

name: Leonard
line: If it's half as much fun as One Times Ten to the Fourth Bottles of Beer on the Wall, I'm in.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll begin. Uh, I can't spy with my little eye something passing right through us.

name: Leonard
line: That soy Frappuccino I had.

name: Sheldon
line: Will you please play the game? I can't spy with my little eye something passing right through us.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, um, if 65 billion solar neutrinos pass through a square centimetre every second, given the surface area of this car is about 60,000 square centimetres, that means 3.9 times ten to the 15th solar neutrinos?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't want to play anymore.

name: Leonard
line: We haven't been on a road trip in a while. This is fun.

name: Sheldon
line: We get it, you won the game. Stop bragging.

name: Leonard
line: No, listen, we wrote a paper together. Now we get to go to a university and talk about it? That's pretty cool.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose it is. In fact, if you'd like to celebrate with a little music, I'd be okay with that.

name: Leonard
line: What? This road trip just got crazy.

name: Sheldon
line: Play that funky music, white boy.

name: Leonard
line: I'm surprised you know that reference.

name: Sheldon
line: What reference?

name: Bernadette
line: So, I put stickers on everything we're gonna sell. We just need help taking it all out to the driveway.

name: Amy
line: Can I be in charge of pricing? I've been going to garage sales my whole life. Can you believe I got these pantyhose for a nickel?

name: Howard
line: All right, Amy's in charge of pricing and being 75.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Penny, can you give me a hand with this?

name: Penny
line: Sure. Oh, we had one of these growing up. I used to play all the time.

name: Raj
line: Oh, yeah? I love Ping-Pong.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I meant beer pong.

name: Amy
line: I had a table, too, but I didn't have any friends, so all I did was serve.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, you can leave one side up and play against it.

name: Amy
line: And if I had a friend, they might have told me that.

name: Howard
line: Excuse me. Why is there a sticker on this? It's my TARDIS from Doctor Who. I was planning on moving it in the house.

name: Bernadette
line: I think you just answered your own question.

name: Howard
line: Come on, one day, this may double in value and be worth half what I paid for it.

name: Bernadette
line: Sweetie, we have a lot to do. We don't need to decide this right now.

name: Howard
line: Well, I guess as long as you're keeping an open mind.

name: Bernadette
line: Of course.

name: Sheldon
line: So they're requesting that the white boy play the funky music, yes?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: And this music we're listening to right now is funky as well?

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Let me ask you this. Do you think this song is the music the white boy ultimately plays?

name: Leonard
line: It could be.

name: Sheldon
line: So it's like the musical equivalent of Russell's Paradox, the question of whether the set of all sets that don't contain themselves as members contains itself?

name: Leonard
line: Exactly.

name: Sheldon
line: Well then I hate it. Music should just be fun.

name: Leonard
line: Making great time. Gonna be there pretty early.

name: Sheldon
line: Will our hotel room be ready?

name: Leonard
line: I doubt it.

name: Sheldon
line: Aren't you worried that sitting in the lobby for a long period of time might attract the attention of the hotel detective?

name: Leonard
line: If we do, we'll just tell him to hit the bricks, see?

name: Sheldon
line: Seems a little confrontational, but all right. You know, we won't be very far from Skywalker Ranch.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that's true. It's not like we can get in there.

name: Sheldon
line: Why not?

name: Leonard
line: I don't think George Lucas put his headquarters in the middle of nowhere because he wanted people dropping in.

name: Sheldon
line: Yoda's swamp was in the middle of nowhere. Tatooine was in the middle of nowhere. Hoth was in the middle of nowhere. That's code, Leonard. He wants us to drop in.

name: Leonard
line: We do have time. I mean, we could drive by and just look at it.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Oh, I'm so excited. And I just can't hide it.

name: Leonard
line: I'm about to lose control, and I think I like it.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you talking about?

name: Penny
line: So when do you guys think you're gonna move in?

name: Howard
line: We're still figuring how much remodeling we want to do.

name: Bernadette
line: It's tricky finding the right balance between tasteful modern and Jewish mother tchotchke crapfest.

name: Amy
line: Have you made a decision about the TARDIS? I think I can sell it if we call it Big British Porta-Potty.

name: Howard
line: We're not selling it, it's mine.

name: Bernadette
line: You can't just decide. How about I arm-wrestle you?

name: Howard
line: That's not fair. It's like me challenging you to a sexy pants contest.

name: Raj
line: You could play Ping-Pong for it.

name: Howard
line: I would do that.

name: Bernadette
line: How is that fair? You grew up with a table.

name: Howard
line: Yes, but I mostly used it as a battlefield in an ongoing war between the Transformers and the ThunderCats for control of a bra I had found in the woods.

name: Penny
line: Bernadette, for every episode of Doctor Who Leonard has made me sit through, I will play on your behalf and send that TARDIS back to Gallifrey, where I hate that I know it belongs.

name: Bernadette
line: Yes, Penny plays for me.

name: Howard
line: That's not fair, she has upper body muscles.

name: Raj
line: Dude, three-time Sanskriti School for Well-Born Boys badminton champion.

name: Howard
line: That's right, okay, Raj can play for me.

name: Amy
line: Ooh, you just chose champions. It's like we're re-enacting the ancient German practice of trial by combat.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's also like when the Mountain fought the Red Viper in Game of Thrones.

name: Bernadette
line: Leonard makes you watch that, too?

name: Penny
line: No, no, I like that show. It's got dragons and people doing it.

name: Howard
line: So it's settled. The fate of Doctor Who's TARDIS will be decided by a Game of Thrones inspired death-match on the battlefield of ThunderCats versus Transformers.

name: Amy
line: If you still have that bra, I'll give you a nickel for it.

name: Sheldon
line: There it is. It's just a gate. On a road.

name: Leonard
line: Wasn't even that hard to find.

name: Sheldon
line: This is so amazing.

name: Leonard
line: I know. You want to get a picture?

name: Sheldon
line: I want more than a picture. I want to go in.

name: Leonard
line: Well, so do I, but they'll never let us.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that the attitude that helped you get Penny?

name: Leonard
line: No, but I don't have three years to make that gate feel sorry for me.

name: Sheldon
line: There's a speaker box. Drive up, push the button, and let's see what happens.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, yeah. What do we have to lose? I'm a little nervous.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, get over it. Confidence is key in these situations.

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Sheldon
line: You pushed it, are you out of your mind?

name: Voice
line: May I help you?

name: Leonard
line: Um, uh, uh, uh, we don't have an appointment, and, and we don't belong here, but we, we're, like, crazy-big fans. I mean uh, buh, buh, crazy for Star Wars crazy, not crazy like we have a backpack full of duct tape, although we do have a backpack that you really don't want to look in.

name: Sheldon
line: You're blowing it. We want to meet George Lucas and become his friends and play with him.

name: Voice
line: Hello? This speaker's not working, just pull up.

name: Leonard
line: And that's how it's done.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, we've defeated the first challenge. Now we must steel ourselves to face the monster who defends the gate.

name: Leonard
line: We're trying to get past a security guard, not rescue Zelda.

name: Sheldon
line: I think what really needs to be rescued is your sense of whimsy, but one quest at a time. So what's the plan?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I'm just gonna be honest with the guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Honesty will never get us in.

name: Leonard
line: Well, what's your plan?

name: Sheldon
line: All right, my plan is predicated on the assumption that they have a nurse's office and your willingness to be lightly stabbed.

name: Security Guard
line: Who are you here to see?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I'm just gonna tell you the truth.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you are killing me.

name: Leonard
line: We don't have an appointment. We, we're just fans of Mr. Lucas's work, and we thought we'd take a shot and see if we could get in and look around.

name: Security Guard
line: Sorry, guys, we get this a lot. Can't let you in.

name: Sheldon
line: What if I told you that I was the voice of Yoda? A recording session I must attend.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry, don't listen to him. We're actually physicists. We're giving a lecture at Berkeley later today. We just, we had some time to kill.

name: Security Guard
line: Hey, listen, you seem like decent guys. I can't let you in, but I got some hats and T-shirts I can give you.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you so much. See? Maybe honesty is the best... What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Shedding the yoke of my oppressors, you blind, sad little man.

name: Security Guard
line: Don't move. Code A-A-23, A-A-23.

name: Voice
line: Copy.

name: Sheldon
line: I can see the ranch, Leonard. Oh, it's rustic, it's lovely. I'd take a picture, but people are chasing me. I'm gonna make it. I'm gonna make it. They have Tasers, but they wouldn't dare use... Aaaaaaagh!

name: Howard
line: Come on, Raj. You are the King Kong of Ping-Pong. You are the menace of table tennis. Put her away, 'cause I don't have a third one. Yes. Woo.

name: Amy
line: Rajesh eight, Penny four.

name: Penny
line: Sorry, he's really good.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Raj. if Howard can't keep the TARDIS, how great would it look at your place?

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, what?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know much about Doctor Who, but if, um, you were to put this right outside your front door and open up the back, it would be like your entire apartment was the inside of the TARDIS, which is pretty cool 'cause on the show, the inside of the TARDIS is bigger than the outside. But then again, I don't know much about<i> Doctor Who.

name: Howard
line: Don't listen to her. You and I go way back, we're like brothers.

name: Raj
line: We are. We are. Oh, no. What a terrible serve. Sorry, brother.

name: Amy
line: Eight-five.

name: Howard
line: This is ridiculous. I want a new champion. Amy, were you serious about being able to serve?

name: Amy
line: Uh, it, it's been a long time. I don't know. I'm probably pretty rusty.

name: Penny
line: Wow.

name: Howard
line: She's my champion.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, if you can switch champions, so can I. I want Raj.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, come on, like you even care.

name: Penny
line: I care. Oh, wait, no, I don't. Good luck, Raj.

name: Howard
line: You know, I thought our friendship meant more to you.

name: Raj
line: So did I.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you think they're gonna call the police?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. Maybe they'll call Imperial Officers to take us to a holding cell on the Death Star.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I think that's below the pay grade of an Imperial Officer. Stormtroopers are really the ones who...

name: Leonard
line: Oh, shut up.

name: Nerdy Guy
line: He's right. Uh, Stormtroopers actually combine both the function of infantry and military police.

name: Leonard
line: Uh-huh, I'm normally very nice, but you shut up, too.

name: Sheldon
line: So, what are you in for?

name: Nerdy Guy
line: Honestly, I just wanted to meet Mr. Lucas and say thank you. You know, growing up, the movies had such an impact on my life. I never really fit in anywhere. Till I discovered the worlds he created and finally found a place where I belong.

name: Sheldon
line: But why are you here?

name: Nerdy Guy
line: Oh, I, uh, I hopped a fence, and they caught me in the sculpture gallery making out with a Chewbacca statue.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Leonard, they have a sculpture gallery.

name: Security Guard
line: All right, I talked to my supervisor, and we're gonna let you go with a warning. But if you ever come back, we will call the police and press charges.

name: Leonard
line: We understand. Thank you so much.

name: Nerdy Guy
line: Uh, what about me?

name: Security Guard
line: No, you're not going anywhere, kissy face. Let's go. I have to take your picture to post at the guard gate.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, one question about that picture. Can it be with George Lucas? Ooh, grumpy you are.

name: Howard
line: Okay, this is the match that decides it all. First to 11 wins. Serve switches every five points. And just so you know, when this started, I was going to put the TARDIS in a discreet corner of the house, but I've since turned mean, and now it's going right in the middle of the living room on a rotating platform with a sign that says suck it. Game on.

name: Bernadette
line: Except, Raj is gonna win. Isn't that right, Raj?

name: Raj
line: Uh, yeah, I mean, her serve was pretty good.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, get in her head. Be intimidating.

name: Raj
line: Okay, uh, I'm gonna own you, bitch.

name: Penny
line: Whoa.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey.

name: Amy
line: That's not nice.

name: Raj
line: Let's just play.

name: Howard
line: One-zero. Two. Three. Four. Five-nothing. Wait, did you play badminton or sad-minton?

name: Bernadette
line: Don't listen to him, all she's got is a serve. Now, grab a fresh tampon and put her away.

name: Raj
line: What, and that's not offensive? Where's the line?

name: Penny
line: It's in your purse. Play.

name: Bernadette
line: One-five. Two-five. Three-five. Four-five. Five-five.

name: Howard
line: Six. Seven. Eight. Nine. Ten-five.

name: Bernadette
line: Six. Seven. Eight. Nine. Ten-ten.

name: Amy
line: Well, that was an exciting 40 seconds.

name: Howard
line: It was, and now the serve is back to you, and the game is over.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, Amy, I, uh, can't help but wonder how Sheldon would react if the TARDIS was at your place.

name: Howard
line: Don't listen to her, just hit the ball.

name: Amy
line: Keep talking.

name: Bernadette
line: If this doesn't get him into your bedroom, nothing will.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you still mad at me?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, we missed our lecture, we were almost arrested, and you got me locked in a room with a man who forced his tongue down the throat of a stuffed Wookiee.

name: Sheldon
line: Boy, some people are just glass-half-empty.

name: Leonard
line: The glass is empty, Sheldon. It's completely empty. If you gave that glass to a man who was dying of thirst, he would be dead, do you know why?

name: Sheldon
line: Before I answer, was he a smoker? I think you're looking at this all wrong.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, then tell me how I should be looking at it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, not only did we go to Skywalker Ranch, we got in. And no one we know can say that. And for all the times you find me irritating, today you got to watch someone shoot me with a Taser.

name: Leonard
line: That part was pretty good.

name: Sheldon
line: See?

name: Leonard
line: You did flop around a lot.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll take your word for it. I was too busy trying not to defecate.

name: Leonard
line: You know, when they were escorting us to the detaining room, I looked through a door, and I'm pretty sure I saw a display case with the Ark of the Covenant.

name: Sheldon
line: That's amazing.

name: Leonard
line: I know.

name: Sheldon
line: And I saw Jabba the Hutt riding by on a motorcycle. Although that was right after the Tasing, so who can say for sure?

name: Leonard
line: I guess this could count as an adventure.

name: Sheldon
line: It was. And even though we're not allowed back there, they can never take today away from us. Unlike my sense of smell, which hasn't returned since the Tasing. No, I got nothing.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, the Daleks are right on my tail, quick, we need to reset the time circuits. Oh, no, I left my sonic screwdriver behind.

name: Amy
line: Really should have thought this through.

name: Sheldon
line: I recently read that during World War Two, Joseph Stalin had a research program to create supersoldiers by having women impregnated by gorillas.

name: Howard
line: What a sick use of science.

name: Raj
line: Hey, as long as the baby's healthy.

name: Amy
line: I wonder if Stalin considered any other animals.

name: Leonard
line: Hippos are the deadliest creature. A half-human, half-hippo soldier would be pretty badass.

name: Howard
line: Yes, but when they're hungry-hungry, you can stop them with marbles.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, the correct animal for interspecies supersolider is koala. You would wind up with an army so cute it couldn't be attacked.

name: Raj
line: But half-man, half-owl could fly...

name: Sheldon
line: The answer is cuddly soldiers with big flat noses. Moving on.

name: Howard
line: So, Penny, when's the new job start?

name: Penny
line: Next Monday.

name: Bernadette
line: Did you get a chance to look over the materials I gave you?

name: Penny
line: Uh, not yet, but I will.

name: Bernadette
line: Great. When?

name: Penny
line: I said I'll get to it.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sensing awkwardness, am I right?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Swish.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't want to be pushy, but you've never done pharmaceutical sales before. It seems like you could use this time to get a head start.

name: Penny
line: Well, the first few weeks will be all training. They'll tell me everything I need to know.

name: Bernadette
line: But imagine how impressed they'd be if you showed up already familiar with the material.

name: Penny
line: Okay, so what, you want me to be like a teacher's pet?

name: Bernadette
line: Couldn't hurt.

name: Leonard
line: Mm, I don't know. Who here has ever been hurt because they were the teacher's pet?

name: Sheldon
line: It was like the rest of the class wanted Ms. McDonald to forget the quiz.

name: Sheldon
line: Mrs. Davis.  Guess who?

name: Mrs Davis
line: Dr. Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: That's right, good job. Hello. Uh, you wanted to see me?

name: Mrs Davis
line: Yes. Uh, welcome back.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. I assume you'd like to reopen our dialogue about the university forcing me to continue with string theory?

name: Mrs Davis
line: You mean the dialogue that went, please, no, please, no, please, no.

name: Sheldon
line: That's the one. I believe you went last, so, uh, please?

name: Mrs Davis
line: Dr. Cooper, while you were away, we came up with a solution that would allow you to change your field of study.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow. Pouting and running away actually worked. I must say, that may not be a lesson you want to reinforce with me. So, um, what is the solution?

name: Mrs Davis
line: Currently, you're being paid under a grant to specifically research string theory. If we promote you to junior professor, you'll be able to choose whatever field of research you'd like.

name: Sheldon
line: But if I'm a professor, then I'll have to teach a class.

name: Mrs Davis
line: That is correct.

name: Sheldon
line: So your solution is to promote me and pay me more money so that I can impart my knowledge to the next generation of scientists?

name: Mrs Davis
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: You people are sick.

name: Penny
line: Hey. Ready to go to lunch?

name: Amy
line: Just give me a minute. I'm stimulating the pleasure cells of this starfish. I just need to turn it off.

name: Penny
line: What happens if you don't?

name: Amy
line: Then I have to sit through lunch knowing this starfish is having a better day than I am. Is Bernadette meeting us at the restaurant?

name: Penny
line: Uh, no. Actually, I didn't invite her.

name: Amy
line: How come?

name: Penny
line: Well, ever since she helped me get this job, she won't stop bugging me.

name: Amy
line: Well, I think she just wants you to do well, and she's worried that you won't 'cause you were just a stunningly poor waitress.

name: Penny
line: That is not true.

name: Amy
line: I'm still waiting on my mini corndogs from two years ago.

name: Penny
line: I told you, they'll be right out.

name: Amy
line: Okay, so no Bernadette.

name: Penny
line: Well, you saw her the other night. Am I wrong?

name: Amy
line: No, I just, I feel kind of uncomfortable talking about her like this. Usually when someone's being talked about behind their back, it's me and it's right in front of my face.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. I just need a little break from her.

name: Amy
line: I understand. You know, there is some research that indicates that sharing negative attitudes about a third party can be a powerful bonding force between two friends.

name: Penny
line: So, what are you saying?

name: Amy
line: I'm saying, in the spirit of science, what is that little skank's problem?

name: Raj
line: So, I've been trying to come up with a cute couple's nickname for me and Emily. What do you like better? Emippali or Koothrapemily?

name: Howard
line: Why is it your last name and her first name?

name: Raj
line: Oh, well, her last name is Sweeney, and something just didn't seem right about Koothrapeeney.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, how'd it go with human resources?

name: Sheldon
line: Awful. They're allowing me to move on from string theory, but they made me a junior professor and are requiring me to teach a class.

name: Raj
line: I don't understand. Why is it bad that you have to teach?

name: Sheldon
line: What a stupid question.

name: Leonard
line: The kids are gonna love him.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe I have to waste my time babysitting a bunch of grad students who probably think dark matter is what's in their diapers.

name: Leonard
line: This might not be that bad. Uh, you like telling people they're wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: Wrong, Just because I enjoyed that one doesn't mean I always do.

name: Raj
line: You enjoy giving people grades.

name: Sheldon
line: A valid point, but unoriginal. B-minus.

name: Howard
line: And you love the sound of your own voice.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, of course I do. Listen to it. It's like an earful of melted caramel.

name: Leonard
line: Look, most importantly, this will let you move on and study dark matter.

name: Sheldon
line: It is true that many of my heroes have taken students under their wings. Feynman, Einstein, Professor X. Humorously, in the case of Professor X, some of his students actually had wings. That's rich. I'll use that one to lighten the mood after my entire class fails the midterm.

name: Amy
line: Measuring starfish serotonin levels in response to one point two molar stimulation of pleasure cells. You like that, don't you? That's right, say my name.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey.

name: Amy
line: Hey, what's going on?

name: Bernadette
line: Not much. You want to get a drink later? Just the two of us?

name: Amy
line: No Penny?

name: Bernadette
line: Not tonight. I'm a little frustrated with her.

name: Amy
line: Because you got her the job and you think she should be working harder to prepare for it?

name: Bernadette
line: So it's not just me. You see it, too.

name: Amy
line: I do, I see it.

name: Bernadette
line: It's driving me crazy. Just this afternoon, I saw on Instagram that instead of studying, she went out to lunch and got a manicure.

name: Amy
line: That's outrageous.

name: Bernadette
line: I know.

name: Amy
line: If she doesn't do well, this could reflect poorly on you.

name: Bernadette
line: Exactly. Does she not realize it or does she not care?

name: Amy
line: I don't know. The important thing is I am here for you so we can mutually disparage this unpleasing third party.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. We just wanted to see how your class was going. Where is everybody?

name: Sheldon
line: There is no class.

name: Howard
line: Did you send everyone to the principal's office already?

name: Sheldon
line: No one signed up.

name: Leonard
line: Well, that's not your fault.

name: Sheldon
line: I called the department secretary to see what happened. Apparently, I have a reputation for being obnoxious.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Raj
line: Hey, Sheldon, I'm sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's fine. Now I can devote all my time to dark matter.

name: Raj
line: Aw, you brought cookies for everyone?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yes. Fig Newtons. I was going to ask them which scientist both helped to develop calculus and had a famous cookie named after him? And then after someone said Newton, I was going to tell them they're wrong. The cookies are named after a town in Massachusetts. And then I'd throw the cookies away.

name: Howard
line: Hey, what if I took your class?

name: Sheldon
line: Why would you do that?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, why would you do that?

name: Raj
line: What's wrong with you?

name: Howard
line: I'm thinking about getting my doctorate, and he wants to teach. Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Howard. I appreciate the gesture, but this is a graduate-level physics class. I don't think you'd understand a single thing I was talking about.

name: Raj
line: Ask why not again, I've got an answer.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, I'm more than smart enough to take your class.

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: How would you determine the ground state of a quantum system with no exact solution?

name: Howard
line: I would guess a wave-function and then vary its parameters until I found the lowest energy solution.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. Do you know how to integrate X squared times E to the minus X, without looking it up?

name: Howard
line: I'd use Feynman's trick, differentiate under the integral sign.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Um, what is the correct interpretation of quantum mechanics?

name: Howard
line: Since every interpretation gives exactly the same answer to every measurement, they are all equally correct. However, I know you believe in the Many Worlds Interpretation, so I'll say that. Now do you think I'm smart enough?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on. You might've gone to school for a couple more years than me, but guess what, engineers are just as smart as physicists.

name: Sheldon
line: You take that back.

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Amy
line: So, after drinks with Bernadette, I get home, and Penny calls to complain about her. And then while I'm talking to Penny, I get a text from Bernadette.

name: Sheldon
line: I am trying to prepare my lesson plan for Howard. Why are you telling me this?

name: Amy
line: Because it's taken 15 years, but high school is finally awesome. I love them both, but I'm in the centre now, and I love that even more.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, please. I am trying to figure out a way to intellectually emasculate a dear friend of mine.

name: Amy
line: But I'm just...

name: Sheldon
line: Not now.

name: Amy
line: You better watch that attitude, buddy. You're dating the popular girl now.

name: Leonard
line: Hmm. You're up late.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm working on my lesson plan for Wolowitz. He is going to be so lost. Look at this section over here. Even I don't really understand it.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, why are you doing this?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm a teacher, Leonard. It's my job.

name: Leonard
line: No, I mean, why are you going to so much trouble to prove that you're smarter than Wolowitz?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's no trouble, it's actually a pleasure.

name: Leonard
line: You want to know what I think? I think the idea that someone could be as smart as you, or even smarter, scares the pants off you, and you can't deal with it.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting point. You're suggesting that I have emotional issues below my consciousness which drive my behaviour, thus causing me to lash out at anything or anyone that threatens my intellectual superiority.

name: Leonard
line: Might be something to think about.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Howard's allergic to peanuts. How can I use that against him?

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, now that everyone's here, we can begin.

name: Howard
line: Before we do, I just talked to Leonard. And if you're gonna spend all your time trying to belittle me by making this class unnecessarily hard, then I'm out. But if you're interested in making a sincere effort to be a good teacher, then I'm willing to give this a shot.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose that's a fair request. There's no reason we both can't benefit from this experience.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Well, then, uh, first things first. Um, are you familiar with the Brachistochrone problem?

name: Howard
line: I am.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. And how it relates to the calculus of variations?

name: Howard
line: It's an inverted cycloid.

name: Sheldon
line: Wonderful. Now, what about Euler-Lagrange theorems?

name: Howard
line: That's where I'm a little fuzzy.

name: Sheldon
line: Ha! I knew it. All right. We have a lot of information to cover before your first test. Which, by the way, is in eight minutes. The good news is I'm grading on a curve, so you're pretty much guaranteed a C.

name: Howard
line: All I do is win, win, win no matter what.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing?

name: Howard
line: Everybody hands go up, up and they stay there!

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing?

name: Howard
line: If you're gonna be a crappy teacher, then I'm gonna be a crappy student.  Uh, uh, Ludacris going in on the verse. 'cause I never been defeated and I won't stop now...

name: Sheldon
line: Will you stop it. This is a classroom. This is not American Bandstand.

name: Howard
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, where was I? Let's see. Oh, yes. Over here. You... What are you doing now?

name: Howard
line: Making a straw.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: So I can shoot you with a spitball.

name: Sheldon
line: You're not going to do that, and I'll tell you why. This is an institution of higher learning, I am your professor, and you're going to treat me with the prop... You shot your spit in my mouth!

name: Howard
line: Is that gonna be on the test? Because I don't think I can do that again.

name: Amy
line: Hey, girlfriend. Can I get a what what?

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Amy
line: Close enough. Um, I was just calling to see what you were up tonight. Thought maybe we could hit up Color Me Mine, maybe sneak in some Pinot Greej. Whatevs.

name: Penny
line: Uh, thanks, but I think I'm gonna stay in and go over the stuff Bernadette gave me.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Oh, I hear you. Try and get that nag off your back, right? I mean, you're not a bicycle, why's she riding you like that?

name: Penny
line: No, I think she was just trying to help. Plus, I really want to do well at this job. So...

name: Amy
line: Okay, good luck. And call me later, you know, if you decide she's a bitch or something. Hey, girlfriend.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Amy.

name: Amy
line: Tonight. You, me, Color Me Mine. Maybe we sneak in some Pinot, make it Color Me Wine.

name: Bernadette
line: That sounds fun, but I promised Penny I'd come by and help her study.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Well, good luck getting her to do that. She's probably off getting another manicure. You remember when she did that? You remember?

name: Bernadette
line: I was probably being too hard on her. We talked, we're good.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Great. I'm happy for you guys. You know, when the two of you aren't getting along, it puts me in a really weird position.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, don't worry, everything's back to normal.

name: Amy
line: You mean, like, where she's nice to your face? Okay got it. Bye. Hey, boyfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: Can't talk. Spitball. Probably gonna die.

name: Sheldon
line: Well?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I promise. Your uvula does not have an STD.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure? It just doesn't feel as innocent as it used to.

name: Howard
line: You reported me to human resources?

name: Sheldon
line: You violated the sanctity of my mouth.

name: Howard
line: Well, I dropped your class, so I hope you're happy.

name: Sheldon
line: I told you you weren't smart enough to take it.

name: Howard
line: I'm smart enough, Sheldon. Asking me a bunch of questions about a topic I'm not familiar with doesn't prove anything. I could do the same to you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, try me.

name: Howard
line: Okay. You enjoy making fun of engineering so much, how do you quantify the strength of materials?

name: Sheldon
line: Young's modulus.

name: Raj
line: Is that right?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Okay, how do you prevent eddy currents in a transformer?

name: Sheldon
line: Laminate the core material.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, give him a hard one.

name: Howard
line: That was a hard one. All right. How does the flow rate in a pipe depend on its diameter? You don't know, do you? What's the matter, smart guy? Don't know Poiseuille's law?

name: Sheldon
line: Thank goodness I got it. Now I can quit checking my stool.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, what are the potential side effects for our erectile dysfunction drug?

name: Penny
line: Headaches, dizziness and nausea.

name: Bernadette
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: Those are also the side effects of having a 75-year-old man with an erection climb on top of you.

name: Bernadette
line: Want to stop here?

name: Penny
line: Uh, no. I can keep going.

name: Bernadette
line: Nah, you got this. Let's go for a drink. I'll call Amy.

name: Penny
line: Okay, good. She seemed like she really wanted to go out tonight.

name: Amy
line: Hey, girl.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, next question, for the Butterfinger. How long is a galactic yea

name: Raj
line: 250 million years.

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Howard
line: Okay, this one is for a Cadbury Creme Egg.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh! It's not even Easter time. This is crazy.

name: Howard
line: Which Archimedean solid has 20 regular triangular faces, 30 square faces, 12 pentagonal faces, 60 vertices and 120 edges?

name: All together
line: The Rhombicosidodecahedron.

name: Leonard
line: We are so smart.

name: Raj
line: Why didn't girls like us in high school?

name: Howard
line: Because we were awkward and weird and couldn't play sports!

name: Leonard
line: Right again.

name: Raj
line: You're wrong.

name: Howard
line: No, I'm not.

name: Raj
line: Yes, you are.

name: Howard
line: No, I'm not. Settle this. Those little animated pictures on the Internet, are they called gifs or jifs?

name: Leonard
line: Well, the G stands for graphics. That's a hard G, so I'd say gif.

name: Raj
line: The guy who invented it says it's jif.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry, do you mean the guy or the juy?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'll give you three guesses why I'm so irritated.

name: Howard
line: Something happened different from the way you wanted it.

name: Sheldon
line: I guess news travels fast. It's true, a select group of scientists was invited to a weekend symposium at a former home of Richard Feynman, and I wasn't included.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Sheldon, I'm sure it's not because they don't think you're an elite scientist.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I bet you anything it's just 'cause you're a pain in the ass.

name: Sheldon
line: You're just saying that to make me feel better.

name: Leonard
line: Look, you can spend the rest of the day being bitter about this.

name: Sheldon
line: Agreed.

name: Leonard
line: I was gonna say or, but why bother?

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Hey, I got you a little gift.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, that's a lot of Girl Scout Cookies.

name: Raj
line: You know me. I'm from India. I can't resist children begging. So, how's it going with the title to the house?

name: Howard
line: Great, it's all done. The lawyer tracked down my father and got him to sign it over. I didn't have to meet him, I didn't have to talk to him, I don't even know where he is.

name: Raj
line: Wow, so you're not curious at all?

name: Howard
line: Nope.

name: Raj
line: Hmm. What if he's in prison? What if he's a spy? What if he's in a Beatles cover band? I'm just saying, if he's got your nose and haircut, he'd make a killer Ringo.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Thanks again for agreeing to do this.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's cool, I've never been on a podcast before.

name: Leonard
line: Well, you picked a good one to start. Wil's had lots of great guests. Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, Michael Dorn, Gates McFadden.

name: Penny
line: Those are Star Trek people.

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: I only figured that out because I've never heard of any of them.

name: Wil
line: I deserve that. I invited you on my show and I drove here.

name: Penny
line: Sorry.

name: Wil
line: Okay, so, this is basically gonna be just like a little talk show. Uh, we're gonna take some calls, we'll talk about what it was like on the set of Serial Ape-ist 2. It should be really fun.

name: Leonard
line: This is exciting.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, so, how many people listen?

name: Wil
line: Most people download it later, but usually a few thousand people listen live.

name: Penny
line: What? A few thousand people listen to you talk about nerd stuff?

name: Wil
line: Again, right in the ears, straight to the feelings.

name: Amy
line: Can you please pass the salt?

name: Sheldon
line: Sure. It's not like I was invited to Richard Feynman's house and have anything better to do.

name: Amy
line: Is this how the rest of the night's going to be?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know the future. Do you think there's a chance that an asteroid could hit the Earth, destroying Feynman's house and everyone in it?

name: Amy
line: No, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Then buckle up, you're in for a cranky night.

name: Amy
line: According to the codicil of the Relationship Agreement which you insisted upon, we're not allowed to pout or be moody on date night.

name: Sheldon
line: You know I just put that in because of uterus stuff.

name: Amy
line: Well, it applies to you, too.

name: Sheldon
line: I was afraid you might bring this up, so I have a work-around. There you go. As far as you're concerned, I'm smiling. Although, I must admit, I'm smiling a little bit at the moment because this loophole is so brilliant.

name: Raj
line: So, Bernadette, have you thought about how you're going to redecorate this place?

name: Bernadette
line: You know, I'm thinking ripping up the carpets, maybe lose the wallpaper, all new light fixtures.

name: Raj
line: You know, if you knocked out this wall, it would give you an open floor plan, and then, it's a little scary, but could be fun, indoor fire pit.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I grew up in this house, okay? No one's knocking anything down.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, okay. When he's at Comic-Con, I'm bringing in a wrecking ball.

name: Howard
line: Can I help you?

name: Guy at door
line: Hi. Are you Howard Wolowitz?

name: Howard
line: Yes.

name: Guy
line: Um, this is a little weird, but a lawyer was trying to contact my father, because his name was still on the title for this house.

name: Howard
line: Wuh, uh, who's your father?

name: Guy
line: Sam Wolowitz.

name: Howard
line: Sam Wolowitz is my father.

name: Guy
line: I know.

name: Howard
line: Well, wait, so if we have the same father, are, are you saying you're my half-brother?

name: Guy
line: I think so.

name: Howard
line: Bernadette, weird things are happening out here.

name: Wil
line: Uh, spoiler alert, after the monkey sees, it kills.

name: Leonard
line: Psst.

name: Wil
line: I've just been handed a note. I'm going to read it. Wil, do you want more Diet Coke? Also, we have juice.

name: Leonard
line: I, I didn't want to interrupt.

name: Wil
line: Uh, that voice you just heard belongs to Leonard, Penny's fiancé. Uh, Leonard, why don't you grab some headphones and join us?

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Wil
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, great.

name: Wil
line: So, while Leonard gets set up, let's take a call. Hello, caller, you are on with Penny and Wil from Serial Ape-ist 2.

name: Caller
line: I don't have a question. I just want to say I'm a big fan of the movie. I've seen it, like, ten times.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, I'll apologize for the first time, but the other nine are on you.

name: Wil
line: Thanks a lot, caller. You know that the movie actually has a little bit of a cult following.

name: Penny
line: Really?

name: Wil
line: Yeah. I was at a science-fiction convention, and I saw a woman dressed as your half-ape character.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, if she was with an Indian guy dressed like a banana, that was just my friends, Howard and Raj.

name: Wil
line: All right, it's time for a very special guest caller, a friend of mine, who you probably know as the director of such movies as Clerks, or from podcasts and books where he often reminds you that he's the guy who directed Clerks. Hello, Kevin Smith.

name: Kevn
line: Hey, man, yo, is everything okay, Wil? ‘Cause it's been, like, two minutes and you haven't even brought up Stand By Me.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Kevin. It's really exciting to talk to you.

name: Leonard
line: It really is.

name: Kevin
line: Oh, you guys are very sweet. So, Penny, listen, I saw your movie.

name: Penny
line: Oh, wow. I wish it was better.

name: Wil
line: Oh, don't worry about it. Have you seen some of Kevin's films?

name: Kevin
line: You're cruisin' for a beatin', Wheaton. Anyway, man, I dug the ape movie, Penny. And I thought you were, like, really great in it.

name: Penny
line: Aw.

name: Wil
line: You know, I'm in the movie, too.

name: Kevin
line: Yeah, whatever. Penny. Penny, how come you're not in more stuff, man? I'd cast you in a minute.

name: Penny
line: Seriously?

name: Kevin
line: Oh, yeah, man. I'm actually in pre-production on a movie right now. Way different than anything I've ever done before. It's called Clerks 3. You should come over and read for a part.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my, I would love that.

name: Leonard
line: You have a new job.

name: Penny
line: Well, maybe I can do both.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think you can do both.

name: Penny
line: I don't think I asked you.

name: Kevin
line: Yeah, you tell him, Penny.

name: Leonard
line: Stay out of it, Kevin Smith.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you think there comes a point in life when it stops feeling bad to be left out of things?

name: Amy
line: Probably not. It's an evolutionary advantage to be included in group activities.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what? I used to be a fan of evolution, but I've since evolved, and now I think it's dumb.

name: Amy
line: Being left out is a terrible feeling. No one understands that better than I do.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, look at that. Even in your example, you're all by yourself.

name: Amy
line: When there was a lice epidemic at my school, everybody got it except me. I tried to fool everyone by sprinkling sugar in my hair, but I just got attacked by bees.

name: Sheldon
line: I can just picture them all right now at Feynman's house, probably discussing Schrodinger and at the same time, not discussing Schrodinger. See? They're missing out on hilarious jokes like that.

name: Amy
line: And at the same time, not.

name: Sheldon
line: It reminds me of when my stupid brother and sister would build forts in the living room and wouldn't let me in. I hated that so much.

name: Amy
line: You know, there's nothing I can do about getting you invited to the symposium, but if you wanted, we could build a fort.

name: Sheldon
line: Isn't that a little juvenile?

name: Amy
line: More juvenile than this?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll get the blankets. You Google how to have childlike fun.

name: Howard
line: You know what, I'm being a bad host. Let me get some more coffee.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, let me do it, Howard.

name: Howard
line: No, I got it.

name: Bernadette
line: So, Josh, what do you do?

name: Josh
line: I'm studying oceanography down in San Diego.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, how nice. I loved Finding Nemo.

name: Raj
line: Enough chitchat. How do we know you are who you say you are?

name: Josh
line: Why would I lie?

name: Raj
line: Okay, you got me there. You here looking for money?

name: Josh
line: No.

name: Raj
line: A kidney, cornea, piece of his liver?

name: Josh
line: No.

name: Raj
line: You're in a Beatles cover band and you need Howard to replace your dad as Ringo.

name: Bernadette
line: Why don't you help with the coffee?

name: Raj
line: Okay, but something smells fishy. And not just because you work around sea animals. That actually sounds interesting, and I'd like to learn more about it. Hey, you okay?

name: Howard
line: Not really. This guy shows up out of the blue, and now I have a brother? My father has another family?

name: Raj
line: I get it. What do you want to do?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. I, I'd just like him to go away. I can't deal with this.

name: Raj
line: All right, I've got your back.

name: Howard
line: Thank you. Come on. And I'd like to point out, this wall just provided a lot of privacy.

name: Josh
line: I can't believe my brother's an astronaut. That's amazing. What was it like?

name: Raj
line: Listen, dude, it's time for you to hit the road.

name: Howard
line: Hey, hey, the young man asked a good question.

name: Wil
line: So, for those of you just tuning in, we are listening to a really fun fight between my co-star...

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no. We're not fighting, we're just having a conversation.

name: Wil
line: All right. We're listening to a really fun conversation between my co-star from Serial Ape-ist 2 and her fiancé, who doesn't believe women should have dreams.

name: Leonard
line: Give me back that juice.

name: Penny
line: What is the harm if I audition?

name: Leonard
line: Well, what if you get it?

name: Penny
line: I don't know, I make a movie, become rich and famous, win an Oscar, a Golden Globe and live an incredibly wonderful life.

name: Leonard
line: From a Kevin Smith movie?

name: Kevin
line: Oh, I'm hanging up now.

name: Wil
line: Don't you listen to him, buddy. You're awesome. You're one of the greatest directors of our time.

name: Kevin
line: I don't have a part for you, Wheaton.

name: Wil
line: And that was Kevin Smith.

name: Penny
line: Thanks a lot.

name: Leonard
line: I'm just trying to protect you. How many times did I see you get your heart broken trying to make it as an actress?

name: Penny
line: Okay, instead of protecting me, why don't you try being excited when something good happens?

name: Leonard
line: I'm always excited for you. I'm excited that you found this new job where you're making decent money.

name: Penny
line: Decent? I make twice what you make.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, twice?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Like, times two twice?

name: Wil
line: For those of you at home, Leonard just found out his fiancée makes way more money than he does. Let's listen.

name: Leonard
line: I went to school for half my life. I have a doctorate. I'm still paying off college loans.

name: Penny
line: Well, how much do you owe? Maybe I can help you out.

name: Leonard
line: Wil, can we just turn off the podcast for a little bit?

name: Wil
line: For those of you at home, I am shaking my head no.

name: Amy
line: How's it going, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Wonderful. I just finished hanging the lights.

name: Amy
line: Can I come in?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, oh, but enter through the side. Batman is a load-bearing blanket.

name: Amy
line: Amazing.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. This isn't the printout. This is my real face.

name: Amy
line: What are we doing? This is a fort. Let's sit on the floor.

name: Sheldon
line: Roughing it? Okay. Everything looks so big from down here. This must be how Leonard feels.

name: Howard
line: I'm surprised you could hear me with this Thin Mint in your ear. Yeah, pretty cool, huh?

name: Josh
line: Yeah. Anyway, I should probably get going.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, have you noticed how often people say that when you start to do magic?

name: Josh
line: Sorry, I have a long drive.

name: Howard
line: Well, I hope I get to see you again.

name: Josh
line: I hope so, too. I've always dreamed of having a brother to play catch with.

name: Bernadette
line: Keep dreaming.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I threw out the first pitch at an Angels game.

name: Josh
line: Wow.

name: Bernadette
line: He did it with a robot.

name: Josh
line: You had sex with a robot?

name: Howard
line: That's not what she meant.

name: Raj
line: But technically, yes.

name: Leonard
line: Hang on, if you're making all this money, where is it?

name: Penny
line: In a safe place.

name: Leonard
line: What does that mean, under your bed?

name: Penny
line: No, it means a diversified portfolio of stocks and bonds. I'm not overly conservative. I'm young, so my guy said I can afford to take some risks.

name: Leonard
line: Wait a minute, you have a guy?

name: Penny
line: Don't you have a guy?

name: Leonard
line: Why would I have a guy? I don't have any money.

name: Penny
line: Oh, sweetie, you should really get some money.

name: Wil
line: For those of you listening at home, how great is this?

name: Leonard
line: Wil, I'm begging you, just please turn that off.

name: Wil
line: Sure. And we're back.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, why are you making such a big deal out of this? So our roles have changed a bit over the last couple years. This is the way life is. And I'm sure in time they'll change again.

name: Leonard
line: Great, you're not only more successful than me, now you're more mature.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, would it make you feel better if I did something dumb like sneak out of work one day to go audition for a Kevin Smith movie?

name: Leonard
line: That would be great, thank you.

name: Wil
line: I'm just gonna jump in here real quick. Leonard, a moment ago, you were dead set against Penny resuming her acting career, but now you're all for it. Is it fair to say that she played you like a violin?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, it is, Wil.

name: Josh
line: So, I have to ask, was the robot sexy?

name: Howard
line: It was actually just a mechanical hand.

name: Josh
line: ‘Cause that's all you need, right?

name: Howard
line: You are my brother.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, so the final four forts in the first annual best fort ever contest, or fort off, are, Fort Knox, Fort Ticonderoga, Fort Sumter and Fort Cozy McBlanket.

name: Amy
line: I'd say, Knox over Ticonderoga, 'cause it's got the gold.

name: Sheldon
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Amy
line: And McBlanket over Sumter 'cause it has a higher thread count. Oh. Ten o'clock. Date night's over.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, no. We haven't picked a winner.

name: Amy
line: We both know this one's gonna win.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, of course we do. Fort Knox doesn't have a secret physics lending library.

name: Amy
line: Come on, I'll help you take this down.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, wait. What if, just this once, we suspend the date night parameters and you stay later?

name: Amy
line: Well, as long as we're suspending the parameters, I could stay really late and we could have our first sleepover.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a big step.

name: Amy
line: It's a big fort.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. I will agree to a family-friendly, G-rated, boy-girl sleepover.

name: Amy
line: PG. Some scenes may be too intense for younger viewers.

name: Sheldon
line: G-rated, with a warning for families with babies and toddlers.

name: Amy
line: You got yourself a sleepover.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you need to borrow a toothbrush or pajamas?

name: Amy
line: Would it alarm you to know that I hid those things here two years ago just in case this ever came up?

name: Sheldon
line: It would, but you know how much I admire preparedness. How did you know we'd be in the living room?

name: Amy
line: Who says this is the only one I hid?

name: Leonard
line: Hello? What is this?

name: Sheldon
line: We built a fort.

name: Leonard
line: Are those my sheets?

name: Amy
line: Yes, they are.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Well, you kids have fun. I'm gonna go to sleep.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Leonard, don't you want to see the inside of the fort?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm good.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, come on. I really wanted to tell someone they can't come in.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, fine. Sheldon, may I please visit your fort?

name: Sheldon
line: I want to say no, but it's too glorious. Get in here.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Okay, have a seat on the floor.

name: Sheldon
line: Not there. That's my spot.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, would you like to hear some songs I've rewritten to get children interested in the hard sciences?

name: Howard
line: Sure.

name: Leonard
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Well, I like music, I like science, I like making fun of Sheldon. Hit it.

name: Sheldon
line: There was a scientist who had a theory and James Clerk Maxwell was his name-o. J-A-M-E-S, C-L-E-R-K space M-A-X-W-E-L-L, And James Clerk Maxwell was his name-o. There was a scientist who had a theory and James Clerk Maxwell was his name-o, A-M-E-S...

name: Leonard
line: Uh, okay, okay. Uh, we, we get it.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps you'd prefer this one. The itsy bitsy spider is not an insect at all, because it haseight legs and two body parts.

name: Leonard
line: That's pretty cool, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. Do either of you know Beyoncé? I'd love her to get behind it.

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: You guys know the new Discovery class missions that NASA's been working on?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Raj
line: Well, they're looking to include a message from Earth in case one of them is encountered by alien life.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. When I encountered alien life, I discovered that the key thing was not to sit in its spot.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, you can't breathe our air without an inhaler, he's allergic to Earth nuts, but I'm the alien.

name: Raj
line: Anyway, I'm among a handful of scientists that have been asked to submit a design proposal for the message and its delivery system.

name: Sheldon
line: Excellent.

name: Howard
line: Good for you.

name: Leonard
line: Congratulations.

name: Raj
line: And I was wondering if any of you guys would like to help me do it.

name: Leonard
line: Are you kidding? Yes. What did you have in mind?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll tell you exactly what you should do, avoid the presumption of the Terran sensory input paradigm.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, absolutely. You need a device capable of delivering information across a wide range of perceptual modalities.

name: Sheldon
line: Any intelligent organism would at the very least need the ability to locate the position of objects in space. So the ideal interstellar lingua franca would be haptic.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, how about a 3-D tactile communicator rigged for cross-sensory transposition?

name: Raj
line: Exactly what I expected. Two people forcing their ideas on me and only one gentleman who could be bothered to ask me what my thoughts were. You two are out. Congratulations, Leonard, you're on the team.

name: Leonard
line: My mommy raised a gentleman.

name: Raj
line: Hey. Thanks for coming by.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. I'm excited to help.

name: Raj
line: I would have included the others, but you know exactly what would've happened. They would've taken over the project and bossed us around.

name: Leonard
line: I get it. Uh, just this morning, Sheldon wouldn't let me put almond milk on my Grape-Nuts because he said it was a theoretical nut conflict.

name: Raj
line: You should have told him to mind his own business.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. That's better than what I did say, which was, fine, I'll eat them with club soda.

name: Raj
line: What makes them think they're always in charge of everything?

name: Leonard
line: Mmm, they're alpha males.

name: Raj
line: Huh, what does that make us?

name: Leonard
line: We could be betas. They're second in charge.

name: Raj
line: Okay, that sounds good.

name: Leonard
line: Or we could be omegas. They get pushed around by the alphas and the betas.

name: Raj
line: Okay, that sounds like us.

name: Leonard
line: Whatever. There's no alphas here, and this is your project. You're in charge. How do you want to start?

name: Raj
line: I don't know. How do you want to start?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. Should we call Sheldon and Howard?

name: Raj
line: No. We can do this by ourselves.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Great. How do you want to start?

name: Raj
line: I don't know. How do you want to start?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.  Sheldon.  Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I bet that started off as a joke, but by the third one you realized there was something strangely enjoyable about it.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I kind of want to do it again.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't recommend it. You'll be doing it the rest of your life. Anyway, if you're looking for Leonard, he's with Koothrappali.

name: Penny
line: Uh, no, I actually came to talk to you.

name: Sheldon
line: How nice. Here are some topics that interest me, quantum mechanics, trains, flags.

name: Penny
line: No, no. It's about my acting career.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, sorry. That's not on the list.

name: Penny
line: Well.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, wait. No. How about we split the difference and discuss why Austria was an archduchy and not just a regular duchy.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, here's the thing. I like pharmaceutical sales, it's going great, but I have an audition for a movie, and if I get it, it could screw everything up.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. I know exactly what you should do. Unfortunately, I cannot tell you.

name: Penny
line: Well, why?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm attempting to turn over a new leaf. Earlier today, it was pointed out to me that I tend to force my ideas on people.

name: Penny
line: You're really not gonna tell me?

name: Sheldon
line: No, that train has left the station. Now, we can play this one of two ways. You can say, trains, tell me more, or you can just look at me like that and I'll start.

name: Bernadette
line: What's going on in here?

name: Howard
line: I am making molecular cocktails. This sphere is actually a cosmopolitan.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. How do you drink it?

name: Howard
line: Oh, just put it in your mouth and pop it like a zit.

name: Bernadette
line: I think I'll have a beer.

name: Howard
line: First take a picture with me.

name: Bernadette
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: Well, Raj and I always talked about learning how to make cocktails like this together, so I taught myself and I'm putting this on Instagram so he can see it and feel like a turd. Say cheese.

name: Bernadette
line: Is this about the space probe he's working on without you?

name: Howard
line: You betcha. The very one.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, you're grown men. You guys don't have to do everything together.

name: Howard
line: I know. That's why I'm spending tonight with you.

name: Bernadette
line: Trying to hurt Raj's feelings.

name: Howard
line: With my honeybunch.

name: Bernadette
line: You're being childish.

name: Howard
line: No. He is. So I have a dominant personality. We all know that.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sorry. What do we know?

name: Howard
line: In social groupings, I just naturally wind up in charge.

name: Bernadette
line: Don't take this the wrong way, but how many of these little booze balls have you had?

name: Howard
line: You don't think I'm a leader?

name: Bernadette
line: I was kidding. Of course you are.

name: Howard
line: Right. I couldn't change if I wanted to.

name: Bernadette
line: You better not change, because I love who you are. Now, will you need help cleaning all this up when you're done or can you do it all by yourself?

name: Howard
line: All by myself.

name: Bernadette
line: There's my big boss man.

name: Sheldon
line: So, often on the front of the locomotive is a large iron wedge for clearing objects off the tracks. Now, while commonly known as a cowcatcher, I prefer the more accurate cow exploder.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Sheldon, let me ask you a question.

name: Sheldon
line: Mmm.

name: Penny
line: If I was at a train station and one train could take me to my current job and the other train could take me to an audition for a movie, which train should I get on?

name: Sheldon
line: Are you using trains to trick me into giving you advice?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, then. You should take a third train where you audition for the movie but hold off on making a career decision until you have more information.

name: Penny
line: Oh. You're right. I'm worried about something that hasn't even happened yet. Huh. You are a wise man.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Penny, who's smarter, the wise man or the person who comes to him for advice?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I guess you're right. Maybe it is the person who asks.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's the wise man. That's why he's called the wise man. You know how I know that? I'm the wise man.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. What was I thinking?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, just out of curiosity, why didn't you ask Leonard for advice about this?

name: Penny
line: ‘Cause I already know what he'll say. Wah, wah, wah, you shouldn't do it.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, it's just like he's here.

name: Raj
line: Okay, so we know that previous attempts to send a message into space, like the Golden Record on Voyager, were heavily criticized.

name: Leonard
line: Well, aliens could only play the Golden Record if they figured out how to build a record player.

name: Raj
line: Eh. Although, to be fair, I watched E.T. build a telephone out of a Speak & Spell and an umbrella. Dude was like a little brown MacGyver.

name: Leonard
line: That would be more helpful if E.T. were real.

name: Raj
line: Well, my feelings were real when he was about to die.

name: Leonard
line: My God, when he's on the table and they use the paddles on him.

name: Raj
line: And he's all white.

name: Leonard
line: They zip him up in that bag.

name: Raj
line: And Gertie can't stop crying.

name: Leonard
line: The flower dies.

name: Raj
line: Okay, let's talk about something else.

name: Leonard
line: All right, so it sounds like we need a way to communicate that's simple.

name: Raj
line: And doesn't require outside machinery to be built to access it.

name: Leonard
line: It's also a problem because we don't even know if the aliens who find this can see. I mean, they might communicate in a totally different way than us.

name: Raj
line: Like when my dog is mad at me, she tells me by peeing in my slippers.

name: Leonard
line: That's actually a valid example. Animals do deliver messages through scent.

name: Raj
line: Bees talk to each other by dancing. Whales have their songs.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Penny has about twenty different ways of rolling her eyes that each mean something different.

name: Raj
line: Okay, so, what it sounds like is, what we want is a device that can deliver a message through not only sight, but other senses, as well.

name: Leonard
line: The most basic sense that any space-faring civilization would have to possess is touch.

name: Raj
line: Ooh. Ooh, ooh. We could make a video-playing device that simultaneously translates the information into a tactile medium.

name: Leonard
line: All we have to do is rig up a 3-D communication system.

name: Raj
line: We, we can totally do that.

name: Leonard
line: I know.

name: Raj
line: This is great.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, you know what else it is?

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Howard
line: Exactly what Sheldon and Howard said.

name: Raj
line: Well, thank you for peeing in my slippers.

name: Sheldon
line: It's the eye of the tiger, it's the ear of the bat, it's the whiskers of the catfish and the walrus.

name: Howard
line: Hang on. Not that your song isn't terrible, it is. but how do you mention bats and leave out sonar?

name: Sheldon
line: You didn't let me finish. And also regarding the bat, it has sonar.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Look, I know you guys are upset, but we've talked about it, and we think it'd be beneficial for you to be part of the project.

name: Howard
line: Well, well, well, did you hear that, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry. I was trying to think of what rhymes with nose of the aardvark.

name: Leonard
line: We want you back on the project with us.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, well, well, did you hear that, Howard?

name: Raj
line: Look, we admit it. The idea that you guys came up with was really good, and I'd love your help.

name: Howard
line: I suppose it couldn't have been easy for you to say that.

name: Raj
line: It wasn't, so are you in?

name: Sheldon
line: Certainly.

name: Howard
line: Sure.

name: Leonard
line: Great. Now that we're all on the same page, let's get together tonight and work on it.

name: Sheldon
line: Get together tonight? Leonard, stop trying to control everything, and give poor Raj a chance to come up with what we should do. Go ahead, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I think we should do it right now.

name: Sheldon
line: Tonight works better for me.

name: Raj
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: Okay, it's just an audition. Why am I nervous? Maybe it's a good thing. Just means I want it. And I can have it. This feels right. Why did I ever give this up?  I'm starting to remember.

name: Raj
line: So, I'd like to try a technique where no one gets steamrolled. When you talk, instead of bringing up a new idea, respect what was just said by building on it.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, building on that, we should order dinner.

name: Leonard
line: How is that building on what he just said?

name: Howard
line: Building on what Sheldon said, I could go for Chinese.

name: Raj
line: Hang on. Building on what Leonard said, no one built on what I said.

name: Sheldon
line: Building on building on that, there's a new build-your-own pizza place on Colorado.

name: Leonard
line: Building on that, I'd like to remind you, I'm lactose intolerant.

name: Howard
line: I saw the menu. They have soy cheese.

name: Sheldon
line: Bah, you didn't say building on. You're out.

name: Leonard
line: It's not Simon Says.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, you're missing the point, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You're out, and you're out. I win. Who wants pizza?

name: Girl
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey.

name: Girl
line: Hey. I haven't seen you auditioning in a while.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, uh, I got a job as a pharmaceutical sales rep.

name: Girl
line: You quit acting?

name: Penny
line: Well, kind of. But now I get to act like inflamed heart is only a mild side effect.

name: Second Girl
line: I heard you can make good money doing that.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's going okay, but I do miss this sometimes.

name: First Girl
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Mmm.

name: First Girl
line: ‘Cause I got to tell you, I am so sick of the humiliation and being treated like a piece of meat.

name: Audiitoner
line: Chelsea?

name: First Girl
line: Wish me luck.

name: Second Girl
line: They're gonna love you. I heard she's pushing 40 and everything's fake.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. I started that rumour.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, since we agree on the delivery system for the message, maybe we should talk about what the message could be.

name: Raj
line: Well, I think we should show what earthlings look like.

name: Howard
line: The plaque they sent up on the Pioneer probe had a drawing of a naked man and woman on it.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I never cared for that. It's advertising to predator races just how soft and squishy we are.

name: Leonard
line: Squeeze yourself.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, don't be offended. You know, of the four of us, you have the most veal-like consistency.

name: Raj
line: Well, maybe there's a way to appear non-aggressive, but also be able to protect ourselves if necessary. Like smiling and waving with one hand, but the other hand holding the severed head of a tiger.

name: Howard
line: You want to send a passive-aggressive message out into the universe? That's ridiculous.

name: Raj
line: Oh, you mean passive-aggressive like posting pictures of you and your wife eating cosmopolitan balls that you know belong in my mouth?

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps Howard meant passive-aggressive like asking our group to help on your project, and then only choosing Leonard.

name: Raj
line: Look, I'm sorry I hurt your feelings, but you do have strong personalities and always end up taking over.

name: Howard
line: It's not always.

name: Leonard
line: What about when we went to Comic-Con and dressed like Jabba the Hutt? You got to be Jabba's head, and I got to be his fat slug butt.

name: Sheldon
line: We looked great.

name: Leonard
line: You let a guy sit on me.

name: Howard
line: He was dressed as Princess Leia. It made a nice picture.

name: Leonard
line: I'm just saying, sometimes Raj and I feel pushed aside.

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Like when you took Sheldon to Texas and showed him all around NASA, you didn't even think to ask me and Leonard.

name: Howard
line: You know what? You're right. I should have asked you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, and if he does ask you, go. It's amazing.

name: Howard
line: Okay, and if we're talking about being left out of things, you guys went to Skywalker Ranch without us.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I recommend that, too. That was a magical experience.

name: Leonard
line: Wait a minute. Sheldon spent a whole day with James Earl Jones and never told any of us.

name: Sheldon
line: I sure did. Oh, my goodness. Well, from Jabba's head to ice cream with Darth Vader, I'm having a heck of a ride. Yeah, look, clearly, good things happen when I'm in charge. Now, why don't you boys step aside, let me knock this project out?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you're not in charge. Raj is in charge.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, who's really in charge? The person in charge, or those who put him in charge?

name: Raj
line: He's right. If you think about it, we're all in charge.

name: Sheldon
line: No, the guy in charge is in ch... why is everyone so bad at these?

name: Penny
line: I mean, the whole experience reminded me about how much I hated about that world. You, you know, the anxiety, the depression, the negativity. I don't want to feel those things. I want to sell drugs to people who feel those things.

name: Amy
line: I can't believe you got up and walked out of an audition for a big movie.

name: Penny
line: I did. I mean, I walked in, read for the part, then stunk up the place, but then I walked right out.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, I'm glad you have a new appreciation for your job.

name: Penny
line: I do, and you know, I don't think I've ever thanked you properly for helping me get it.

name: Bernadette
line: Properly, at all. It's just words I've never heard.

name: Penny
line: Well, thank you. You're a good friend, and you changed my life.

name: Bernadette
line: You're welcome. Hey, now that you're making some real money, maybe you can take your friend out for a nice thank-you dinner.

name: Penny
line: Sure.

name: Amy
line: And you probably have to invite your other friend 'cause she overheard you talking about it, and it would be awkward to exclude her.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Bernadette
line: How about now?

name: Penny
line: All right.

name: Bernadette
line: Don't forget your wallet.

name: Penny
line: I, uh, huh.

name: Sheldon
line: Greetings from planet Earth. Just turn left at Alpha Centauri. You can't miss it.

name: First Alien
line: That soft pink alien looks delicious.

name: Second Alien
line: I could eat.

name: Raj
line: It's, like, the best one they make, I just can't get it to work.

name: Howard
line: I'll figure it out.

name: Raj
line: It streams HD video straight to your phone while it's flying.

name: Howard
line: Nice. Where were you when I was single?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we should leave in about an hour. You all packed?

name: Penny
line: Uh, yeah, I just need to throw in a few last minute things, you know, makeup, underwear, clothes.

name: Sheldon
line: If your bathroom floor counts as a carry-on, you're packed.

name: Amy
line: Leonard, have you ever given a high school commencement speech before?

name: Leonard
line: Nope. It's pretty exciting.

name: Sheldon
line: Aren't you afraid of being blinded?

name: Leonard
line: How would I be blinded?

name: Sheldon
line: At the end of the ceremony, all the students throw those pointy hats in the air. It's all pomp and circumstance until someone loses an eye.

name: Leonard
line: I'll take my chances.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. I wonder if they make I told you so cards in braille.

name: Raj
line: Look, the problem with commencement speeches is that they're boring. Ooh, do you own a T-shirt cannon?

name: Howard
line: Why would he own a T-shirt cannon?

name: Raj
line: I don't know. Why do I own one?

name: Amy
line: I think it's really nice that you're sharing this experience with Penny.

name: Leonard
line: Mm, I thought it'd be fun to show her my old stomping grounds. I even know the exact spot where they used to stomp me.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, now you get to go back as a successful scientist.

name: Amy
line: With a beautiful girl on your arm.

name: Sheldon
line: And a pointy hat sticking out of your eyeball.

name: Leonard
line: How'd you get ready so fast?

name: Penny
line: Oh, I pack light. Once, I got through an entire spring break with nothing but a long T-shirt and a belt.

name: Leonard
line: Why did you need a belt?

name: Penny
line: It's called an evening look. I've never been to New Jersey before.

name: Leonard
line: It gets a bad rap from shows like Jersey Shore and Real Housewives.

name: Penny
line: So it's not really like that?

name: Leonard
line: No, it's like that. Well, I'm excited to show you around.

name: Penny
line: You think we'll have time to visit your mom over there?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. We'll also have time to put my junk in a garlic press, but I'm not doing that either.  Uh-oh. I just got an alert. Our flight's been cancelled.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, looks like there's a big storm all up the East Coast.

name: Penny
line: Well, can we get on another airline?

name: Leonard
line: I don't think so.

name: Penny
line: So, that's it? We're not going?

name: Leonard
line: I guess not.

name: Penny
line: Well, that sucks.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. I worked hard on that speech, too.

name: Penny
line: Oh. You could tell it to me.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, thank you, but I'm okay.

name: Penny
line: Are you sure? I could pretend I'm a high school cheerleader who can't control herself around esteemed alumni.

name: Leonard
line: Greetings, distinguished cheerleaders.

name: Penny
line: Ooh.

name: Howard
line: Okay, the WiFi extender is on, the camera's on, they're both on the same network. We should be getting an image.

name: Sheldon
line: All I see is a black screen. And my own reflection. I look sad.

name: Howard
line: Maybe we should recalibrate it.

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Howard
line: Step one, rapidly flip the calibration switch from the fully up to the fully down positions for at least ten times.

name: Sheldon
line: It actually says at least?

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
