line: Why would they say at least? Is it ten toggles? Is it a hundred toggles? You know? Is it a thousand toggles? Ten thousand toggles? A hundred thousand toggles?

name: Howard
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You see where I'm going with this.

name: Howard
line: Just flip the switch until the lights on the drone change to solid yellow.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, that seems simple enough. Initiating calibration sequence. One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten. Well, I suppose ten is technically at least ten. But they're still getting at least one angry letter.

name: Howard
line: Now I rotate it horizontally on its centre axis until the lights turn green.

name: Sheldon
line: Initiating rotation sequence. Don't look at me, initiate. What does red and yellow mean?

name: Howard
line: It means the calibration failed. We have to start over.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Very well. Re-initiating calibration sequence. One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten... eleven. It's a good thing I didn't send that letter.

name: Raj
line: Mm. Hello, Daddy. What's up?

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: Not much, just wanted to see how my son's doing.

name: Raj
line: Very well, thank you.

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: Are you still dating that dermatologist?

name: Raj
line: If you could feel how soft my skin is, you wouldn't have to ask.

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: Oh, and there's something else I wanted to ask you. Why did you spend a month's rent on a toy helicopter?!

name: Raj
line: Oh, you're where that bill goes.

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: I'm tired of indulging your foolish lifestyle. It's time you learned responsibility. And the only way to teach you that is to cut off your allowance.

name: Raj
line: No, Daddy, no. There are lots of other ways to teach me responsibility. I know, you can give me an egg and make me take care of it for a week.

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: No, my mind is made up. Starting now, you're on your own.

name: Raj
line: But, Daddy, I, I miss my family so much, and with you and Mummy getting a divorce, I feel sad and empty. Buying a little toy every now and then helps me fill that void. So while I can't hug you every day, flying that helicopter...

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: I'm cutting you off.

name: Raj
line: Just to be clear, financially or mid-sentence?

name: Howard
line: No red and yellow, no red and yellow.

name: Sheldon
line: Yay.

name: Howard
line: It's green.

name: Sheldon
line: We did it. Oh, if it's this much fun to rotate, imagine when we fly it.

name: Howard
line: Okay, now all I have to do is rotate it vertically until the lights turn off.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no.

name: Howard
line: Oh. All right, playtime's over. Let's open this baby up.

name: Sheldon
line: Won't that void the warranty?

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, I have a master's degree in engineering. I wipe my bottom with warranties. Except for AppleCare. That pays for itself in the long run.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, where'd you go?

name: Penny
line: I got you a little something to cheer you up.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Sex last night, pancakes this morning, am I dying?

name: Penny
line: Just open it.

name: Leonard
line: A cap and gown? Why do I need a cap and gown?

name: Penny
line: Because you are giving your commencement speech.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Penny
line: I called your old high school and convinced them to let you give your speech over Skype.

name: Leonard
line: Really? That's amazing. And you gave me the robes to give it in. Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, now about those, uh, they came from a costume shop, and all they had left was sexy graduate, so they might be a little short.

name: Leonard
line: Short and sexy, that's my wheelhouse.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Boy, oh, boy, that's a lot of pieces.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what they all do, right?

name: Howard
line: Yes, of course.

name: Sheldon
line: What about this one?

name: Howard
line: Well, I, how familiar are you with miniaturized integrated logic circuits?

name: Sheldon
line: Not very.

name: Howard
line: That right there is a miniaturized integrated logic circuit.

name: Sheldon
line: So, can you get it working?

name: Howard
line: I'm an MIT-trained engineer. I've built components for the space station.

name: Sheldon
line: I thought the zero-gravity toilet didn't work.

name: Howard
line: It worked fine, it just wasn't designed for Russian cosmonauts and their potato-based diet.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: I have to return the helicopter. My father... What did you do?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, don't worry. He went to MIT. He can solve any problem, as long as it doesn't originate in a Russian man's colon.

name: Raj
line: I don't freaking believe this.

name: Howard
line: Relax, it'll be fine.

name: Raj
line: No, you have to put this back together right now, so I can return it.

name: Sheldon
line: You can't return it. Howard wiped his bottom with the warranty.

name: Raj
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I think metaphorically. But he was in the bathroom for a while.

name: Raj
line: Howard, my father cut me off. I have to get my money back for this.

name: Howard
line: Calm down.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Okay, you're right. It's time for me to step up and take responsibility for my life. Be a man.  Hello, Mummy.

name: Mrs Koothrapalli
line: Hello, Rajesh. What a nice surprise.

name: Raj
line: Well, I've been thinking about you. How are you doing? Are you happy, Mummy?

name: Mrs Koothrapalli
line: Such a sweet boy for asking. Can't believe you come from the poison seed of your father.

name: Raj
line: Well, I like to think I take mostly after you. Anyway, speaking of Daddy, I had a very strange conversation with him. He said he couldn't afford to send me money any more because of his active social life.

name: Mrs Koothrapalli
line: What does that mean, active social life?

name: Raj
line: Well, let's not talk about him or whatever shenanigans he may or may not be up to. Let's talk about you.

name: Mrs Koothrapalli
line: Rajesh, is your father seeing someone?

name: Raj
line: All I know, Mummy, is that he's a single wealthy doctor, and now, for some reason, there's no money for your little boy.

name: Mrs Koothrapalli
line: Well, however much money your father was giving you, I'll give you more.

name: Raj
line: Thank you, Mummy, I love you. Helicopters for everybody.

name: Penny
line: What's taking so long?

name: Leonard
line: I don't think this is gonna work.

name: Penny
line: Just let me see. Sweetie, you know you're supposed to wear clothes underneath a graduation gown.

name: Leonard
line: A, surprised you know that. B, I wanted to look like a sexy graduate for you.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Well, you do.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. You're gonna be on Skype, they're not gonna see your legs.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I'm gonna go put on some pants just in case. But I have to say, this is very freeing.

name: Penny
line: Add a belt and I'll take you some place nice.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Done and done.

name: Howard
line: Okay, I think I've narrowed it down to a faulty pin on the onboard communication chip.

name: Sheldon
line: Very impressive. You know, when you're done with that, can you look at this? It doesn't make smoke anymore.

name: Howard
line: One toy at a time.

name: Sheldon
line: Mm. Sorry. Ah, maybe it's for the best. I hear locomotive smoke is the second leading cause of death among train aficionados.

name: Raj
line: What's the first one?

name: Howard
line: Suicide.

name: Sheldon
line: Wrong. Obesity.

name: Bernadette
line: I have the tool you wanted.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: You guys don't have to go to the trouble. I'm back in the money now, I can just buy another helicopter.

name: Howard
line: It's not about the money. It's about solving a problem. It's why I became an engineer. It's what I like to do, it's what I'm trained to do. It's who I am.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, look at you, the little engineer that could.

name: Bernadette
line: Why don't you just call tech support?

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Whoa.

name: Raj
line: Not cool.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: There's two kinds of people in this world, those who call tech support, and those who make fun of the people who call tech support.

name: Bernadette
line: I call tech support all the time.

name: Howard
line: Ha-ha.

name: Sheldon
line: You call tech support.

name: Raj
line: What a baby.

name: Headmaster
line: And now, for our commencement address, one of our most distinguished alumni, noted Caltech physicist Dr. Leonard Hofstadter.

name: Leonard
line: Members of the faculty, students, I'm excited to speak to you today. I can't help but remember the last time I was in this auditorium. Two guys from the lacrosse team played keep-away with my asthma inhaler. But enough about my ten-year reunion. I'd also like to take a moment to thank my beautiful fiancée for to helping make this speech possible, even though weather nearly prevented it.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Hello. I, I didn't know he was gonna point it at me, so, don't do drugs and stay in school.

name: Leonard
line: They're graduating.

name: Penny
line: Okay, bye.

name: Howard
line: All right, the power supply is reconnected. I think we're back in business. Let's just run a few tests before we take it outside. Sheldon, we got WiFi?

name: Sheldon
line: Check.

name: Howard
line: GPS?

name: Raj
line: Check.

name: Howard
line: Battery charged?

name: Sheldon
line: Check.

name: Bernadette
line: Four hours of our lives gone? Check.

name: Howard
line: All right. All systems go. In five...

name: Together
line: Four, three, two, one.

name: Sheldon
line: That's what my train used to do.

name: Bernadette
line: Ready to call tech support?

name: Howard
line: Give me the number. Probably wind up talking to some foreign guy who's reading from the same manual I have.

name: Raj
line: It's my father, you jerks. Hello, Daddy.

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: What did you say to your mother?

name: Raj
line: Nothing. I was just calling to check in, make sure she's doing okay.

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: Well, after talking to you, she seems to think I'm some sort of playboy.

name: Raj
line: Really? I don't know where she'd get an idea like that. You know Mummy and her crazy imagination I'm so lucky I take after you.

name: Dr Koothrapalli
line: You think you take after me?

name: Raj
line: Well, I try to. I certainly wouldn't be a scientist if you hadn't been my role model.  Who wants to go to Vegas in a real helicopter?

name: Leonard
line: It was L. Frank Baum who said no thief, however skillful, can rob one of knowledge, and that is why knowledge is the best and safest treasure, wow, I'm boring myself. Sorry, I can't see any of your faces right now, but I bet they look like this. Uh, you know, I, I wrote an entire speech to say how high school prepares you and what a wonderful place it is, but I hated it. Maybe high school's great if you look like this, but I didn't even feel like I existed at that school. And now that I think about it, I bet a lot of you feel the same way. So, for the remainder of my speech, this is for the invisible kids. Uh, maybe you never fit in. Or maybe you're the smallest kid in the school, or the heaviest or the weirdest. Maybe you're graduating and you still haven't had your first kiss. By the way, 19, and Geraldine Coco, wherever you are, thank you. Maybe you don't have any friends. And guess what? That's okay. While all the popular kids are off doing whatever, I don't know what they were doing 'cause I was never there.

name: Penny
line: I'll, I'll tell you later.

name: Leonard
line: My point is, while you're spending all this time on your own, building computers or practicing your cello, what you're really doing is becoming interesting. And when people finally do notice you, they're gonna find someone a lot cooler than they thought. And for those of you who were popular in high school, it's over, sorry. Thank you and congratulations.

name: Tech Support Voice
line: Your call is important to us. All our technicians are busy helping other customers. Please stay on the line and someone will be with you shortly.

name: Howard
line: What happened to me? When did I become an old man baffled by modern technology? Next thing you know, I'll be hitching my pants up to my armpits and complaining about the awful music the kids are listening to.

name: Sheldon
line: It is awful, isn't it? Listen to that noise.

name: Howard
line: Hang on, hang on. It's working. I did it.

name: Raj
line: How'd you do that?

name: Howard
line: No idea, but I did it.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe you shouldn't be flying it inside.

name: Howard
line: Well, I'm not flying it.

name: Sheldon
line: Then who is?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. Must be getting a WiFi signal from somewhere else.

name: Sheldon
line: Initiate landing sequence. Initiate landing sequence. Hey, the camera's working. Oh, look, it's me.

name: Tech Support Guy
line: Tech Support, can I help you?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, it's a robot uprising. Call the police.

name: Leonard
line: So you really think they liked it?

name: Penny
line: Oh, sweetie, it was the best speech I...

name: Sheldon
line: Don't worry, everyone in here is safe.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, what time does your mom's plane get in?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know, some time tomorrow morning.

name: Penny
line: Don't you want to know for sure?

name: Leonard
line: No need to. As soon as she flies into California airspace, I'll feel a disturbance in the Force.

name: Amy
line: It's so nice both of your moms are coming in to see you guys get an award.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my mother's been there for every honour I've won since I beat out my twin sister for the did it on the potty trophy. How does this look?

name: Penny
line: Aw, it's so nice. She's gonna love it.

name: Amy
line: Sure, his mom gets roses. When I want them, they're a bouquet of severed plant genitals.

name: Sheldon
line: You act like I didn't get you that mushroom log on Valentine's Day.

name: Amy
line: He's right. Roses die, but a moist rotting log will pump out mushrooms for two or three magical years.

name: Penny
line: You know, your mom's never been too thrilled with our relationship. Maybe I should get her something so she warms up to me.

name: Leonard
line: If you could run out and get a PhD, that might make her like you.

name: Penny
line: Really? It didn't work for you.

name: Amy
line: Do you think the moms will get along?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I don't know. They're pretty different.

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe they'll be best friends. One of them is brilliant, one is sweet and simple. Sound familiar?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Shelly, I'm so proud of you and Leonard for getting this award.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, thank you, Mother.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: I tried to read your paper, but it was very hard for me to understand.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's quite straightforward, actually. It describes a new model of the universe that conceptualizes it as the surface of an n-dimensional superfluid.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Interesting. You can believe that, but God filling an ark with animals two-by-two is nonsense.

name: Sheldon
line: What did they feed the lions, Mother?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: The floating bodies of drowned sinners, of course.

name: Sheldon
line: Listen, Leonard's mom is a renowned psychiatrist and woman of science. Can you please keep the Bible babble to yourself while she's here?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Are you ashamed of me?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course not. I love you. I'm just embarrassed by the things you believe, do and say.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, I love you, too. My little bowl of lion chow.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: So, have you and Penny set a wedding date?

name: Leonard
line: No, we're kind of taking it slow.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: I see.

name: Leonard
line: What does that mean?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: You've been on and off with this woman for seven years and engaged for one year. One has to wonder if there's a problem. Are you having satisfactory intercourse?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, Mother.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Only satisfactory. I see.

name: Leonard
line: I change my answer. It, it's amazing. It's hot. We can barely keep our hands off each other.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Seems odd to try and impress your mother with your sexual prowess. But then, you always did have that unresolved Oedipal complex.

name: Leonard
line: See, this right here, what you're doing, can you please not do that around Sheldon's mom?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Why? Are you attracted to her, too?

name: Leonard
line: Of course not. She's, she's just a very sweet and God-fearing lady, and you have to be respectful of her beliefs.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Leonard, I'm an adult. I know how to conduct myself around people from different walks of life.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Where is she from again?

name: Leonard
line: East Texas.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Ugh.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, look who's here.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Doctor Hofstadter, it's so good to see you again.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Likewise. I read your paper, it was very impressive.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, thank you.

name: Leonard
line: We just spent two hours in traffic. Did you think to mention to me that you liked our paper?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Of course I did, but it's a mother's job to make sure her child's self-esteem is not dependent on anyone's approval.

name: Leonard
line: That's so sweet, you think I have self-esteem.

name: Sheldon
line: Doctor Hofstadter, I want you to meet my mother, Mary.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Nice to meet you, too. How was your flight?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Very pleasant. And yours?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Lovely. Almost as if someone, not saying who, was watching over the plane.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: You're kidding, right?

name: Leonard
line: Subtle, mom, real subtle.

name: Bernadette
line: Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Morning.

name: Bernadette
line: We talked about this. I don't mind you still living here, but we got to have some rules. And rule number one is pants.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: You must be very proud of your son.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Oh, yes. He recently argued a case before the Supreme Court.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: He did?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Oh, you mean this son. Uh, sure, he's terrific.

name: Sheldon
line: Beverly, would you like to see the math I worked out to support our hypothesis?

name: Leonard
line: You mean, my hypothesis. I hypothesized it all by myself.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Calm down, dear. Mary, I'm curious. When did you first realize that your son had such a remarkable mind?

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, good question. Everyone loves stories about Sheldon Cooper, boy genius.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, I would have to say when he was 13 and tried to build a nuclear reactor in the tool shed.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, this is a good one.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Now, the first thing you have to know about Shelly is ever since he was a little boy, he was always concerned with the well-being of others. And he didn't think that it was fair for people to pay for electricity, so he was gonna power the entire town for free.

name: Sheldon
line: Tell her about the uranium. Tell her about the uranium.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, well. Oh, this is adorable. When he arranged to get some yellowcake from Chad, I thought he was talking about Twinkies from one of his friends.

name: Sheldon
line: But I wasn't. ‘Cause I didn't have any friends.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: No. It turns out that this little scallywag was trying to use my Visa card to buy uranium from an African warlord in the country of Chad.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Sounds like Sheldon was a handful.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, he was a handful.

name: Sheldon
line: I was a handful.

name: Leonard
line: You still are. Uh, Mom, hey, tell Mary the story about how I made a Van der Graaf generator out of our vacuum cleaner.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: All right. He broke the vacuum cleaner.

name: Howard
line: I mean, for a while, everything was vampires. Now it's all zombies. I wonder what the next monster fad will be.

name: Raj
line: We haven't had a good invisible man in a while.

name: Stuart
line: Clearly, you've never seen me try to talk to a woman.

name: Bernadette
line: Guys. In the time you've been sitting here playing video games, I got the car washed, picked up cleaning supplies and went to the bank.

name: Stuart
line: I put on pants.

name: Howard
line: Kiss-ass.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, I don't know when I became the mother to three lazy teenagers, but it stops today. You guys are cleaning the kitchen, top to bottom.

name: Raj
line: Hey, I don't even live here.

name: Bernadette
line: Yes or no, do you have clothes in my laundry right now?

name: Raj
line: I do. And some of it's wool, so dry flat if possible.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, and here's a picture of me receiving my bachelor of science degree.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: You don't look very happy.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I had just begun puberty. It was figuratively and literally one of the hairiest moments of my life.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Shelly does not like change.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, true. But all the clenching in the world will not keep testicles in your abdomen.

name: Penny
line: Hey, sorry, got caught up at work. Hi, Beverly.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Hello. Oh, okay.

name: Penny
line: Sorry, I forgot.

name: Sheldon
line: You remember my mother.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yes. Hi, Mary.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Good to see you again, dear.

name: Penny
line: Ah, yeah, now that's what I'm talking about.

name: Leonard
line: So, Mom, you haven't seen Penny since we got engaged.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, let me show you the ring.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Oh, lovely. Must have been very expensive.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, not at all. No, we, uh, found a place online that, uh, repurposes diamond drill bits.

name: Leonard
line: We did not. That's not true. Can I speak to you alone for a second?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, sure.

name: Leonard
line: It came from Tiffany's.

name: Sheldon
line: You mean the box, right?

name: Leonard
line: Keep walking.

name: Penny
line: Really doesn't matter to me how much he spent on the ring. I think.

name: Sheldon
line: Did I misspeak about the ring?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, and we'll get back to that. But, uh, even with your mother here, you are deliberately hogging all the attention from my mom. You're like one of those elephant seal pups that steals the milk from two mothers.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you mean what marine biologists refer to as super weaning?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, you are a super weaner.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, now I have to correct you. As a bit of an elephant seal buff, the more accurate comparison would be when two mother seals actively seek to nourish the same pup. So I believe the term you're looking for is a double mother suckler.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, you're right. That is the term I'm looking for. You are a dirty double mother suckler.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, well, now that we have the terminology straightened out. How dare you.

name: Penny
line: We're not in a rush. We'll set a date when the time is right.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: It doesn't matter, sweetie. The moment a man lays with a woman, they are married in the eyes of the Lord.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Uch.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Uch? The bible is uch to you?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: No, I'm sorry. That was inappropriate. As a psychiatrist, I know how important people's superstitions can be to them.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: You want to talk about superstitions? Sheldon sent me the books you wrote, all that nonsense about superegos and ids. What bull dropped that on the barn floor?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: His name is Sigmund Freud.

name: Penny
line: Hey, look at that. You both believe in Jewish bearded guys.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Stay out of this.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: At least the bearded man that I believe in preaches love and compassion. All yours talks about is why you hold in your poop and want to crawl back inside your mama.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: It's fascinating. How can someone as enlightened as Sheldon come from someone like you?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: I know the answer. You're not gonna like it.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Try me.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: When I was pregnant with Shelly, I was driving to church, and I was praying to the Lord to give me a son smarter than his dumb-ass daddy. And I looked over and I saw a Jesus bobblehead in the Subaru next to me nodding yes. What is that supposed to mean?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, do it some more. Maybe you can knock some sense into yourself.

name: Penny
line: Why don't we all stop hitting ourselves and talk about something safe, you know, like shoes or how cute little Chinese babies are.

name: Sheldon
line: It is not my fault that your mother likes me better than she likes you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, don't flatter yourself. She likes everybody better than she likes me.

name: Raj
line: How old is this Jell-O?

name: Stuart
line: Well, it's carrots, so gonna say very.

name: Howard
line: Sorry we have to do this.

name: Stuart
line: Bernadette's not wrong. She does work hard around here.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, maybe it's a good thing if she stops babying you so much.

name: Howard
line: She doesn't baby me.

name: Stuart
line: I saw her pull you home in a wagon.

name: Howard
line: For your information, I twisted my ankle chasing the ice cream truck.

name: Raj
line: Face it, dude, Bernadette treats you the same way your mother used to, and that was not a healthy relationship.

name: Howard
line: You're right. It's time for me to act like an adult in this marriage. Starting with my husbandly duty of taking out the trash. Bernie, I made a mess.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: I'm terribly sorry that I upset your mother.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's all right. She'll forgive you. She has to or she goes to hell.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: I can't help but notice how her unconditional love for you is diametrically opposed to my own parenting strategies.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you doled out affection as a reward for achievement, a proven way to raise a child. Or train a rat.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: But look how well you turned out.

name: Sheldon
line: I'd feign modesty at this point, but who would believe me? Still, you need to consider how successful Leonard's brother and sister are.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: I suppose.

name: Sheldon
line: While my brother and sister are mouth-breathing idiots.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Do you suppose you would've flourished more in a reward-based environment?

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps. But my mom made me spaghetti with chopped-up hot dogs whenever I wanted, so who cares?

name: Leonard
line: Not once did my mother ever give me any love or affection for just being myself, I always had to earn it.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, Leonard, I'm sure she loves you very much. In her own cold godless way.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and you certainly don't have to earn my love.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Of course, you already knew that when you bought me this princess-cut drill bit.

name: Leonard
line: That's not what it is.

name: Penny
line: I know, I know. Zzzzzzzz.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: When your mom gets back, I'm gonna need to apologize for the way I spoke to her.

name: Penny
line: Well, come on now, she did kind of start it.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Doesn't matter, a good Christian would've turned the other cheek. On the other hand, a good Texan would've shot her, so, I just kind of split the difference. Hey, who's in the mood for spaghetti and hot dogs?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, me.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, me, too.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Coming up.

name: Leonard
line: I don't really feel I deserve it.

name: Howard
line: That was a big sticky mess, but I think I got it.

name: Raj
line: Looks good.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah.

name: Bernadette
line: Look at that. You cleaned it up all by yourself.

name: Howard
line: Yes, I cleaned it up all by myself. Honestly, I don't know why you complain so... okay, maybe I missed one spot. Just leave.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: I'm so glad that you and I were able to bury the hatchet.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Me, too. And I respect your right to your beliefs.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: And I will pray for you.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Mom, let's get you back to your hotel before anyone says anything else.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: One moment. There's something I need to say to you.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, really? That's too bad.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Leonard, I always made you earn my affection, but today I realize that there's more than one way to raise a child.

name: Sheldon
line: I taught her that.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Therefore, I would like to initiate a new protocol wherein I shower you with unconditional love.

name: Leonard
line: Wow. When does that start?

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: So needy. Come to Mommy.

name: Penny
line: It's okay, go ahead.

name: Dr Hofstadter
line: Oh, my son.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, my mother.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God.

name: Stuart
line: It's a hard-knock life.

name: Together
line: It's the hard-knock life for us, it's the hard-knock life for us. ‘Stead of treated, we get tricked, ‘stead of kisses, we get kicked, it's the hard-knock life. Got no folks to speak of so it's the hard-knock row we hoe, cotton blankets ‘stead of wool, empty bellies ‘stead of full, it's a hard-knock life.

name: Amy
line: Can you believe it's been five years since our first date?

name: Sheldon
line: I know. Do you think I should start watching The Flash TV show?

name: Amy
line: That's what you're thinking about?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, one of the things.

name: Amy
line: Are any of them me?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I thought, I can't decide if I should watch The Flash TV show. I know, I'll ask Amy. Anyway.

name: Amy
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: You're right, you did kind of kill the mood.

name: Amy
line: I didn't kill anything. You did, talking about your stupid TV show.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Starting to watch a television show that might run for years isn't a decision to take lightly. I'm wrestling with a big commitment issue here.

name: Amy
line: Really? That's the commitment issue you're wrestling with? Sheldon, do you understand the irony of your fixation on a man with super speed, while after five years all I can get out of you is a distracted make-out session on a couch?

name: Sheldon
line: Irony's not really my strong suit. But I have been getting better with sarcasm, if you want to give that a try.

name: Amy
line: Oh, sure, I'd love to.

name: Sheldon
line: Whenever you're ready.

name: Stuart
line: I don't want to rush you, but I'm closing a little early tonight.

name: Raj
line: Ooh. Hot date?

name: Stuart
line: Uh, no. I overheard Bernadette tell Howard she was making him a meat loaf, and you don't have to not ask me twice.

name: Emily
line: If I stick a light bulb on this, wouldn't it make a great lamp for my bedroom?

name: Raj
line: You're kidding, right?

name: Emily
line: Oh. Is this freaking you out?

name: Raj
line: I guess I'm just more of a Pottery Barn, Crate and Barrel kind of guy. Maybe Pier 1 if I really want to cut loose.

name: Emily
line: All right. Never mind.

name: Raj
line: No, no, no. Hey, you should totally get it. In fact, I'll buy it for you.

name: Stuart
line: Sold.

name: Emily
line: Raj, you don't have to do that.

name: Stuart
line: Too late. No returns.

name: Leonard
line: That was really intense.

name: Penny
line: Well, now we know, next time we go to the farmers' market, the order is petting zoo first, then buy vegetables.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, good. You're here. I need your assistance.

name: Leonard
line: Can it wait until I put a Band-Aid on a goat bite?

name: Sheldon
line: What happened?

name: Penny
line: Oh, your buddy got mugged by some baby farm animals.

name: Sheldon
line: Been there.

name: Penny
line: Mmm. So what do you need help with?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy's mad at me, and I'm not clear why.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Were you talking before she got upset?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: That's probably it. What'd you say to her?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I just asked her if I should start watching the new Flash TV series.

name: Penny
line: And that made her angry?

name: Sheldon
line: Baffling, right? We were necking like a couple of hooligans under the school bleachers. I stopped so I could ask the question. Next thing I know, good-bye, kissy face. Hello, yelly face.

name: Penny
line: Well, Sheldon, when you're kissing a girl, she expects the attention to be on her.

name: Sheldon
line: It was. I asked her if she thought I should watch The Flash.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. I'm tapping out. Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: I'm gonna guess that your main concern is the time commitment of watching an entire season of a new show.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, not just a season. If I'm in, I'm in for the whole run, even if the quality declines.

name: Leonard
line: I get it. Smallville almost wrecked you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. Exactly. You know, I waited ten years to see a guy everyone knows can fly, fly.

name: Penny
line: Wait, what is wrong with you two? He was talking about television during their date night.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, not just date night, our fifth anniversary.

name: Penny
line: Okay, see, that's even dumber than you wondering if being bitten by a goat would give you the powers of a goat.

name: Sheldon
line: If that happens, don't make me wait ten years to watch you eat a tin can.

name: Raj
line: You guys ever notice that Emily has a bit of a twisted side?

name: Bernadette
line: You mean 'cause she has weird tattoos?

name: Raj
line: No, because she wants to have sex with me in a graveyard.

name: Howard
line: One more time?

name: Raj
line: She and I were supposed to watch the new Avengers movie tonight, but it was sold out. So I said, what else do you want to do? She said, let's go to a cemetery and do it on somebody's grave.

name: Howard
line: Like, a random person or somebody she knew?

name: Raj
line: What difference does it make?

name: Howard
line: Well, if it's her father's grave and they didn't get along, then you know she holds a grudge.

name: Bernadette
line: The only issue is that everybody has their own thing, and as long as it's two consenting adults, I guess I don't see the harm in it.

name: Raj
line: Well, what if it's one consenting adult and one adult who pretends to consent because he's afraid of being alone?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, then I guess bring a blanket. The grass gets damp at night.

name: Raj
line: I don't know, guys. Maybe this relationship isn't for me. Maybe I should break up with her.

name: Howard
line: Right. You're gonna break up with a girl who has sex with you. Can you believe this guy?

name: Bernadette
line: I think if Raj wants to break up with a girl, he can do it.

name: Howard
line: How are you saying that with a straight face?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know.

name: Raj
line: You guys are being jerks.

name: Howard
line: Buddy, other than Jenny Craig, you've never broken up with a girl in your life.

name: Raj
line: You're one to talk. You've been complaining about Stuart living here for the past year. I don't see you showing him the door.

name: Howard
line: That's not the same thing. Emily's a person. Stuart's more like an infestation, something you spray for.

name: Raj
line: Baloney, okay? You two are as afraid of hurting someone's feelings as I am.

name: Bernadette
line: That's not true. We were just laughing right in your face.

name: Penny
line: Thanks for cooking.

name: Leonard
line: Mmm. My pleasure.

name: Penny
line: That carrot was delicious.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. I wish I'd fought harder for the rest of 'em.

name: Penny
line: Still haven't heard from her?

name: Sheldon
line: No, and I'm confused. It's been nearly 24 hours. Amy should have figured out she's wrong by now.

name: Penny
line: Hey, I don't think she's wrong about you going too slow in the relationship.

name: Sheldon
line: Too slow?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you've been going out for years. You haven't even slept together.

name: Sheldon
line: That's right. It's called foreplay. And I could make the case that you two aren't moving forward in your relationship.

name: Penny
line: Uh, hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: No. Sheldon, we're getting married.

name: Sheldon
line: But you've been engaged for over a year now, and you don't even have a wedding date.

name: Penny
line: Well, we will. We're just not in a rush.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: We're gonna set a date.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. If you say so.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's just, things are good right now.

name: Leonard
line: Really good.

name: Penny
line: I'm focusing on my job.

name: Leonard
line: And we've been busy with our paper.

name: Penny
line: So busy.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, we'll pick a date when we pick a date.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: You know, I can see why Amy's mad at you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, shut up, Sheldon.

name: Bernadette
line: Did you eat all my yoghurt?

name: Howard
line: You mean the one that makes ladies do the thing that ladies pretend they don't do even though they do?

name: Bernadette
line: You know which yoghurt I mean.

name: Howard
line: I didn't touch it. Must have been Stuart.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe Raj is right. Maybe it's time we tell him he needs to move out.

name: Howard
line: We should have done it months ago.

name: Bernadette
line: I know, but his store was reopening, and then there were the holidays, and then he was sick.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, right. Sick. He didn't have jaundice. He just looks like that.

name: Bernadette
line: All right. Tonight's the night.

name: Howard
line: Agreed. When he gets home, I'm dropping the hammer.

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh, I like when you take charge.

name: Howard
line: Oh, I'm not taking charge, you're the hammer.

name: Leonard
line: So, why haven't we picked a date?

name: Penny
line: You know why.

name: Leonard
line: Well, of course I know why. But just for fun, why?

name: Penny
line: Not in a rush, busy with work...

name: Sheldon
line: Things are good right now.

name: Penny
line: Really good.

name: Leonard
line: You still want to get married, right?

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God. Yes. Why would you even ask that?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. Because we don't have a date?

name: Penny
line: Well, you want a date, pick a date.

name: Leonard
line: It's not just the date. We haven't talked about anything. Big wedding, small wedding, indoor, outdoor?

name: Sheldon
line: Outdoor? Oh. I can RSVP no right now.

name: Penny
line: Okay, indoor it is. Big or small?

name: Leonard
line: Is your dad paying for it?

name: Penny
line: I doubt it.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, two friends each.

name: Penny
line: All right, well, I want it in a church.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. I want black-tie.

name: Penny
line: Fine. I want to release butterflies.

name: Sheldon
line: Seriously? Airborne worms?

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Well, then it's settled. Small indoor church wedding, black-tie, no butterflies.

name: Penny
line: Sounds perfect.

name: Leonard
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: You still didn't pick a date.

name: Penny
line: Stay out of it.

name: Leonard
line: Shut up.

name: Emily
line: Mmm. It's a beautiful night.

name: Raj
line: Oh, yes, we've got the moon and the trees and Elizabeth McNulty, who apparently died when she was the same age I am.

name: Emily
line: Makes you feel alive, doesn't it?

name: Raj
line: So does enjoying a meal at a well-lit restaurant, but here we are.

name: Emily
line: You aren't scared, are you?

name: Raj
line: Of ghosts, no. Of you, little bit.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sorry I've upset you. I shouldn't have asked so many questions.

name: Penny
line: No, it's okay.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, maybe it's good you got us talking about this stuff.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, look at that, even when I'm causing problems, I make the world a better place. Hey, next, why don't we tackle your penchant for whining and Penny's love of the ol' glug-glug?

name: Penny
line: Uh, Sheldon, I think we're good for now.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, well, very well. So does this mean you'll finally pick a wedding date?

name: Penny
line: Here we go again. Why is everyone so concerned with us setting a date? We're committed to each other. We're happy. A ceremony isn't gonna change anything.

name: Sheldon
line: So you're never getting married? It's his whining, isn't it?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I'm not a whiner.

name: Sheldon
line: It's amusing that he doesn't hear it.

name: Leonard
line: Look, all she's saying is we are in love so it doesn't matter if we get married tomorrow or a year from now or 50 years from now.

name: Penny
line: Ew, 50? We'll be old and gross.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, but we'll be old and gross together.

name: Sheldon
line: My aunt and uncle were married 63 years. Towards the end, it was like watching cheese melt.

name: Penny
line: Um, I'm free tonight.

name: Leonard
line: Are you saying you want to get married?

name: Penny
line: Vegas isn't that far away.

name: Leonard
line: I'm in. Let's do it.

name: Sheldon
line: After all these years. I'm really happy for the two of you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks.

name: Sheldon
line: Now get out of my spot.

name: Howard
line: Bernie, Stuart just pulled up. So remember, the key is to be firm. Show no weakness.

name: Bernadette
line: Right.

name: Howard
line: Good luck.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard Joel Wolowitz, you get back here.

name: Howard
line: Never should have told you my middle name.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, guys.

name: Howard
line: Hey, you got a minute?

name: Stuart
line: Sure. Uh, let me just put this stuff in the fridge. I felt bad for finishing your yoghurt, so I bought more. And, Howard, your favourite fruit is in season. Crunch Berries.

name: Bernadette
line: Don't let that sway you.

name: Howard
line: It's hard not to. They taste so much better than real berries.

name: Stuart
line: What's up?

name: Bernadette
line: So, we need to talk.

name: Emily
line: You okay?

name: Raj
line: I think we should talk.

name: Stuart
line: Is everything okay?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, you've been living here a while now.

name: Stuart
line: I know. I may sell comic books at work, but the real superheroes are sitting right in front of me.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: His middle name is David. Go.

name: Raj
line: Look, I care about you a lot, but we are very different people.

name: Emily
line: Are you breaking up with me?

name: Raj
line: No, no, I'm just pointing out that you're dark on the inside and I'm dark on the outside.

name: Bernadette
line: So, anyway, what I'm trying to say is...

name: Howard
line: You need to take that?

name: Stuart
line: It's just my dad, probably calling to wish me a happy birthday. I'll call him back. You were saying?

name: Emily
line: Look, Raj, be honest with me. If you want to end things, just do it. Don't expect me to do it for you.

name: Raj
line: End things? I'm trying to tell you that I love you.

name: Howard and Bernadette
line: Happy birthday to you.

name: Penny
line: Wow, there's a Denny's in Vegas you can actually get married in.

name: Leonard
line: Doesn't sound very romantic.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, but we could get heart-shaped pancakes.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sure we'll find a decent chapel.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. This is crazy.

name: Leonard
line: I know. You think people are gonna be mad?

name: Penny
line: Maybe. But this isn't about them, it's about us.

name: Leonard
line: It is. It is about us.

name: Penny
line: And you know what the best part is? We took our time. I mean, we met, we were friends for a couple years, then we got together, and then we got untogether, then we worked out all our problems, and now we know everything about each other, we can just go forward with no surprises and no regrets.

name: Leonard
line: Right. No surprises.

name: Penny
line: And no regrets.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, well, there, there's one thing I feel I should tell you.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: You know, so we can go into this with no secrets between us.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Remember, uh, a couple years back when I was on that research ship in the North Sea?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, there, there was a lot of drinking and craziness going on.

name: Penny
line: No, you told me.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, um, well, there was this girl.

name: Penny
line: What did you do?

name: Leonard
line: Nothing really. It was just kissing.

name: Penny
line: And then what?

name: Leonard
line: And then nothing. I stopped it. But it still bothers me, and I wanted you to know.

name: Penny
line: All right.

name: Leonard
line: Did you ever do anything like this since we've been?

name: Penny
line: Nope, never.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that's too bad.

name: Penny
line: You know, can I ask you a question?

name: Leonard
line: Hmm?

name: Penny
line: Why are you telling me this now?

name: Leonard
line: Well, like I said, we're about to get married, and I, I want a clean slate. No secrets.

name: Penny
line: Really? Because to me, it seems like we're about to get married and you're trying to sabotage it.

name: Leonard
line: Would you rather I didn't tell you?

name: Penny
line: No, I don't want there to be secrets between us.

name: Leonard
line: See, now I'm confused. I mean, what, what am I supposed to do?

name: Penny
line: Uh, keep your mouth off other women.

name: Leonard
line: I can do that. Uh, uh, from now on, this mouth, you and food, that's it.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah?

name: Penny
line: Look, I'm not happy this happened, but I think I can get past it. I mean, we weren't engaged at the time, and it was just kissing.

name: Leonard
line: Right.

name: Penny
line: Just kissing.

name: Leonard
line: It wasn't even very good. She was a smoker, I'd just been seasick.

name: Penny
line: Okay, that's enough. Stop talking.

name: Leonard
line: So, we're still getting married?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: Because we love each other.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: And it's the happiest day of our lives.

name: Penny
line: Ha-ha, don't push it.

name: Amy
line: Hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. Listen, I've been thinking a lot about relationships and how difficult they can be, and I think...

name: Amy
line: I've been thinking about them, too, Sheldon. Being your girlfriend is so challenging. Emotionally, physically. I've been incredibly patient for years.

name: Sheldon
line: Strongly disagree. Go on.

name: Amy
line: Okay, well, this isn't easy to say, because I love you, but I need some time to take a step back and re-evaluate our situation.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh.

name: Amy
line: I hope you understand.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.

name: Amy
line: Bye, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Gollum, you're an expert on rings. What do I do with this one?

name: Howard
line: So, how does this game work? I just throw it, like a real ball?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, just nice and easy, right over the plate.

name: Howard
line: All right.

name: Raj
line: You suck, Wolowitz.

name: Howard
line: What's that about?

name: Raj
line: I'm heckling you. It's a beloved part of baseball.

name: Sheldon
line: He's right. And given that you're probably still waiting to be picked for a game that was played in fifth grade, I'm sure you do suck.

name: Penny
line: Hi. What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Baseball.

name: Penny
line: Okay, this is not what I meant when I said go outside and play.

name: Leonard
line: He's practicing.

name: Penny
line: For what?

name: Howard
line: The Angels wanted an astronaut to throw out the first pitch, so guess who they called?

name: Penny
line: What, you? Really?

name: Howard
line: Well, a lot of people who weren't available, but then me.

name: Penny
line: That's so cool. Congratulations. I guess that makes you the athlete of the group.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, not just him. May I remind you that you're talking to the seeker, beater, chaser and water boy of the third place Griffith Park Quidditch team.

name: Penny
line: I know. Watching your boyfriend run around with a broomstick between his legs isn't something you forget.

name: Leonard
line: C'mon now, throw one.

name: Howard
line: All right, here we go.

name: Raj
line: You look like a jackass.

name: Howard
line: Cut it out. You're hurting my feelings.

name: Leonard
line: Now you know why we're not outside.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you enjoy my lecture?

name: Amy
line: No, and neither did our waiter.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if you're going to serve Cornish game hen, you should either be familiar with the history of Cornwall or be prepared to learn it.

name: Amy
line: It's hard to argue with that. And I know because I saw a sad man with a pepper mill desperately try and fail.

name: Penny
line: Hey, how was dinner?

name: Sheldon
line: Good, I had Cornish game hen.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that poor waiter.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, how about tomorrow night we see a movie?

name: Penny
line: You guys are going out two nights in a row?

name: Sheldon
line: I missed a number of date nights while I was on my train trip, and I'm contractually obligated to make them up under the terms of the Relationship Agreement.

name: Penny
line: That's so hot.

name: Amy
line: It's better than hot, it's binding.

name: Sheldon
line: If you're free tomorrow night, I'd love to have you join us on a double date.

name: Penny
line: Aw.

name: Amy
line: You are aware that a double date doesn't count as two dates.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Well, then come or don't. I don't care.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't believe you're sore.

name: Howard
line: Hey, even professional pitchers need a rubdown after the game.

name: Bernadette
line: But they throw an actual ball. You were throwing air at a TV.

name: Howard
line: For your information, I also gave Leonard one hell of a high five.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm kind of surprised you agreed to do this in front of a stadium full of people.

name: Howard
line: They're doing Space Day and NASA asked me. I felt like I couldn't say no.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay. Well, if you want, I could help you practice. I played a lot of softball growing up.

name: Howard
line: Thank you, that would be great.

name: Bernadette
line: Great. And while we're at it, maybe we could butch up your run for when you head out to the mound.

name: Howard
line: What's wrong with the way I run?

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I'm surprised you'd choose to go to a pub.

name: Sheldon
line: At our committee meeting, Amy made a motion for a picnic in a park, but I tacked so many amendments on that thing it sank like a lead balloon.

name: Amy
line: I then suggested a pub.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, which I was initially sceptical of until I saw online that they serve Yorkshire pudding.

name: Leonard
line: You don't even like Yorkshire pudding.

name: Sheldon
line: No, it's yucky, but informing people about the history of Yorkshire is yummy, yum-yum.

name: Amy
line: After a lively debate, that proposal passed by a two-zero margin.

name: Leonard
line: Nice to see a busy couple keep the spark of bureaucracy alive.

name: Sheldon
line: Ignore them, Amy. They're just jealous because they'll never have a relationship as good as ours.

name: Penny
line: Isn't this when he says bazooka or something?

name: Sheldon
line: I wasn't making a joke, I was merely stating fact. Amy and I have a superior relationship to yours.

name: Leonard
line: You don't honestly think that, do you?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I assumed you knew. The ranking of relationships in our circle by quality is me and Amy, Howard and Bernadette, Raj and his girlfriend, Penny and Chardonnay, Penny and you.

name: Leonard
line: There isn't any ranking. And if there were, we wouldn't be at the bottom of it.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and actually, I drink Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Leonard
line: That's the part you have a problem with?

name: Penny
line: Relax.

name: Amy
line: There they go, fighting again. You'd never hear her talk that way to Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Raj
line: So you never played baseball as a kid, not even Little League?

name: Howard
line: Well, I was going to, but the day of tryouts I found my dad's Playboy collection. Threw my arm out.

name: Bernadette
line: All right, the pitcher's mound in Major League Baseball is sixty feet, six inches away from home plate.

name: Howard
line: Great. You take this and say when to stop. How much further?

name: Bernadette
line: Keep going.

name: Howard
line: How about now?

name: Bernadette
line: I'll let you know.

name: Howard
line: Are you saying stop and we're just too far away to hear you?

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, stop.

name: Howard
line: Are you kidding me?!

name: Bernadette
line: That's sixty feet.

name: Howard
line: There's no way this is sixty feet.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm looking at it.

name: Howard
line: You realize this isn't one of those times I want you to exaggerate how long something is.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I got to, I, I, I, I got to ask. What makes you think that your relationship is so wonderful and ours isn't?

name: Sheldon
line: For starters, we enjoy spending time together.

name: Leonard
line: So do we. And I've seen you guys ignore each other for hours doing totally different things.

name: Sheldon
line: It's called parallel play.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, toddlers do that.

name: Sheldon
line: Not as well as we do.

name: Leonard
line: You believe this guy? He has to be the best at everything.

name: Penny
line: So what? Why do you even care?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, listen to them. Not even married and the honeymoon's over.

name: Leonard
line: Whatever. You can't even go on a date without checking your relationship agreement.

name: Sheldon
line: If you've got a problem basing a relationship on a contract, I'd like to tell you about 13 plucky colonies that entered a relationship agreement called the U.S. Constitution. And it may not be cool to say so, but I think that love affair is still pretty hot today.

name: Amy
line: It's a good thing I'm not wearing flag underwear right now, 'cause there's about to be a fire.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, it's not that hard. You just look to where you want to throw it, step towards where you want to throw, and throw it.

name: Howard
line: That's your help? That's like saying here's how you fly a plane, get in the airplane, know where you want to go and fly it.

name: Bernadette
line: Just throw the ball. Let's see what we're working with.

name: Raj
line: Come on Howard, fire it in.

name: Bernadette
line: Throw the damn ball!

name: Amy
line: So when do you guys plan on getting married?

name: Penny
line: Uh, we're not sure. But I want to wait long enough to prove to my mother I'm not pregnant.

name: Sheldon
line: May I have one of your fries?

name: Amy
line: Of course. Can I have a bite of your burger?

name: Sheldon
line: Absolutely not.

name: Leonard
line: Some perfect couple. He won't even share his food with her.

name: Sheldon
line: It has avocado on it. She's allergic to avocado. Are you so jealous of our relationship you want Amy to die?

name: Leonard
line: I'm not jealous. I just think it's silly for you to compare relationships like they're something that can be quantified.

name: Sheldon
line: Everything is quantifiable. That French fry? A seven. Spider-Man? A nine. The number nine? Oddly, only a four.

name: Leonard
line: How ridiculous is he?

name: Penny
line: A hundred.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, you're just assigning random numbers to things based on your opinion.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I'm not. French fries have three variables, crispiness, saltiness and shape. Which is why a curly fry only gets a two. If I wanted curls for dinner, I'd order a clown wig.

name: Penny
line: Well, a relationship is more complicated than a French fry.

name: Sheldon
line: Not according to the work of Berscheid, Snyder and Omoto.

name: Penny
line: Oh, what did those rascals do now?

name: Amy
line: They developed the Relationship Closeness Inventory, which predicts the stability of a couple based on behaviour.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, not to be confused with the French Fry Goodness Inventory. That's pure Cooper.

name: Leonard
line: So, this is accurate?

name: Sheldon
line: It's been around for 25 years, and has been extensively corroborated by other researchers.

name: Penny
line: Well, kind of takes the romance out of relationships.

name: Sheldon
line: Kind of? It does it perfectly.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon and I got an eight-point-two out of ten.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. We'll take it right now.

name: Penny
line: No, don't.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Just don't take it.

name: Leonard
line: Why not?

name: Penny
line: ‘Cause it's stupid. Who cares what number it is?

name: Leonard
line: Come on. It'll be fun.

name: Penny
line: I said I don't want you to. I'm getting another drink.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry.

name: Amy
line: I'm gonna let you count this as two dates. They're a lot of work.

name: Bernadette
line: Think he's getting any better?

name: Raj
line: Yup.

name: Howard
line: That was a close one.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay.

name: Raj
line: Is it too late for him to cancel?

name: Bernadette
line: I think so.

name: Howard
line: Heads up! Watch out!

name: Leonard
line: Are you mad at me?

name: Penny
line: No, stop being stupid.

name: Leonard
line: Um, whew? Is this about the test, or is this about us?

name: Penny
line: Look, I don't need a score on a test to make me worry about something I'm already worried about.

name: Leonard
line: What are you worried about?

name: Penny
line: That we're engaged and have nothing in common, and it scares me.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that scares me, too.

name: Penny
line: It does?

name: Leonard
line: Sometimes.

name: Penny
line: Well, that's not good. You being blindly infatuated with me was the rock we were building this relationship on.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, well, this might make you feel better. Uh, we're both scared that our marriage will be a disaster, and so, that's something that we have in common. Also, we both think I'm not funny. Huh? See, you're not laughing.

name: Mike
line: Hey, Froot Loops, what's up?

name: Howard
line: Hey, Mike. Listen, NASA asked me to throw out the first pitch at an Angels game. You got any advice?

name: Mike
line: Yeah. Don't do it. What else you up to?

name: Howard
line: Why shouldn't I do it?

name: Mike
line: There's no upside. If you do well, no one cares. And if you screw up, you're an idiot on YouTube forever.

name: Howard
line: But it's for a good cause. What about all the kids that'll be there?

name: Mike
line: That's what I'm telling you. Kids are the worst. My own daughter tweeted I have a giant nose.

name: Howard
line: Well, maybe I'll do a good job.

name: Mike
line: I don't know. In space, you couldn't even toss me a pen, and that was in zero gravity.

name: Howard
line: Okay, thanks for the pep talk.

name: Mike
line: Anytime, Froot Loops. Give your wife a hug for me. She's so much cuter than you, I don't know how you ever got her.

name: Bernadette
line: He's so nice.

name: Penny
line: Hey, sorry about that.

name: Amy
line: No, we're sorry. We never should have been comparing relationships in the first place.

name: Sheldon
line: Why? We won. You know, I say, next, we take on Koothrappali and his dog. Really give ourselves a challenge.

name: Leonard
line: I just want to say one more thing about this. Just because Penny and I are very different people does not mean that we're a bad couple.

name: Sheldon
line: The answer is one simple test away. Hmm? You know, it's like when I thought there was a possum in my closet. Did I sit around wondering? No, I sent Leonard in with a pointy stick and a bag.

name: Leonard
line: I killed his Chewbacca slippers.

name: Penny
line: Let's just take the test.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, I don't want to.

name: Penny
line: Oh, well, 'cause you know we're gonna do bad.

name: Leonard
line: Because it doesn't matter. I don't care if we're a ten or a two.

name: Sheldon
line: Or a one. A one is possible.

name: Leonard
line: Marriage is scary. You're scared, I'm scared. But it doesn't make me not want to do it. It, it just makes me want to hold your hand and do it with you.

name: Penny
line: Leonard.

name: Amy
line: It would make me so happy if you said things like that.

name: Sheldon
line: We got an eight-point-two. Trust me, you're happy.

name: Raj
line: Mmm, I love how they put a waterfall at centre field. It really ties the whole stadium together.

name: Penny
line: Look at you, talking sports.

name: Leonard
line: This is fun, huh? We get to see our friend throw out the first pitch, have a hot dog, watch the game.

name: Sheldon
line: Whoa. Nobody said anything about watching the game.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, what did you expect?

name: Sheldon
line: I expected to see Howard throw the baseball, finish my hot dog, and hightail it across the street to Disneyland just in time for Mickey's Soundsational Parade.

name: Amy
line: I'll tell you what. If we stay, I'll buy you cotton candy and a bobblehead.

name: Sheldon
line: Who's the bobblehead of?

name: Amy
line: Does it matter?

name: Sheldon
line: No, as long as it bobbles.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, I am so proud of you.

name: Howard
line: Thanks. I'm proud of me, too.

name: Man
line: You ready?

name: Howard
line: Let's do it.

name: Man
line: All right.

name: Howard
line: Wish me luck.

name: Bernadette
line: Go get 'em.

name: Stadium Announcer
line: Ladies and gentlemen, in honour of Space Day at Angel Stadium, the first pitch will be thrown out by NASA astronaut Howard Wolowitz.

name: Howard
line: Thank you. Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Can he really throw a ball?

name: Leonard
line: On our Quidditch team, he...

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's a no.

name: Howard
line: I have a message for the young people here today. When I was asked to throw the first pitch, a little voice in my head said I couldn't do it. So, I practiced and practiced, and you know what? That little voice was right, but then I remembered that I'm not an athlete. I'm a scientist. So, today's first pitch will be delivered to home plate by science. Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls, I present to you a working prototype of the Mars Rover. And here's the wind-up, and the pitch.

name: Bernadette
line: Why is it going so slow?

name: Howard
line: ‘Cause I'm an idiot who didn't think this through.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, new plan. We go to Disneyland, play hide and seek on Tom Sawyer's Island, and then come back and see the end of the pitch.

name: Howard
line: Okay, while we're waiting for the ball to arrive, here's some fun facts about Mars.

name: Man in Crowd
line: You suck, Wolowitz!

name: Sheldon
line: He makes a valid point.

name: Howard
line: Okay, booing isn't gonna make it go any faster.

name: Leonard
line: Have you guys heard about this research team that's trying to transgenically manipulate chicken DNA to create some sort of chicken dinosaur?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I think that sounds wonderful.

name: Howard
line: What? You're afraid of both dinosaurs and chickens.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but tell me a dinosaur chicken salad sandwich wouldn't hit the Mesozoic spot.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: We still on for tomorrow night?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. I'm excited to finally meet your girlfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: Speaking of which, according to a recent study out of Oxford University, when someone takes on a new romantic partner, that person loses one or two close friends.

name: Howard
line: Since when do you read social science?

name: Sheldon
line: I go to the bathroom like everybody else.

name: Raj
line: Why would I lose friends just because I started dating someone?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, you didn't lose anyone when you met Amy. Yeah, well, no, this study refers to romantic partners. Not the way I would categorize the two of us.

name: Raj
line: You guys kiss and hold hands.

name: Leonard
line: I've seen him do it. It's not romantic.

name: Raj
line: Look, I'm not the kind of guy who drops his friends just because he's in a relationship.

name: Leonard
line: What happens if she doesn't like us?

name: Raj
line: Well, hey, you're my dear friends. You'll get a Christmas card for a couple of years, and then you're dead to me.

name: Amy
line: So, Howard, is Stuart still living with your mom?

name: Howard
line: I don't want to talk about it.

name: Bernadette
line: But he's going to.

name: Howard
line: My mom got him cable. In my whole life, growing up in that house, no cable. Do you know how many HBOs that leech had my mother get him? Seven. Seven HBOs. Seven.

name: Bernadette
line: Long story short, they have seven HBOs.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Emily, you know almost everybody here.

name: Emily
line: Hi.

name: Raj
line: And this is Leonard, this is Penny.

name: Emily
line: Oh, it's so nice to meet you.

name: Leonard
line: Nice to finally meet you, too.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Emily
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Wow, Raj, you were not lying about her.

name: Raj
line: I told you she exists.

name: Penny
line: Hey, I hear you're a dermatologist.

name: Emily
line: Uh, yeah, I'm a resident at Huntington Hospital.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I like their emergency room. Yeah, even if it turns out you don't have Dengue fever, they still let you take a lollipop.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, Penny just started training to be a pharmaceutical sales rep. Maybe she can practice on you some time.

name: Penny
line: Oh, it would be great to practice on a real doctor.

name: Emily
line: Yeah. I'm sure that'd be fine.

name: Sheldon
line: I have some odd freckles on my buttocks. Can I make an appointment for you to look at them?

name: Emily
line: Um, okay, I guess.

name: Amy
line: I'm with him three years, nothing. She's with him two minutes, and he's taking his pants off.

name: Bernadette
line: Last night was fun. What did you think of Emily?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. I kind of got the sense she didn't like me.

name: Bernadette
line: Did she say she didn't like you?

name: Penny
line: Of course not. No one ever says they don't like you straight to your face.

name: Amy
line: We have led different lives.

name: Bernadette
line: You guys just met. Why would she feel that way?

name: Penny
line: It's just this vibe I got.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sure you're worried about nothing.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. You're probably right. I used to think my high school P.E. teacher didn't like me, but it turned out, she liked me a little too much.

name: Bernadette
line: Really?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. It was fine. We went to a Melissa Etheridge concert, I got an A, it all worked out.

name: Bernadette
line: When you go to Emily's office to practice, you'll see. It's fine.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I hope you're right.

name: Amy
line: You really went your entire life without anyone saying I hate you to your face?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Amy
line: I'd say it now, but look at those cheekbones.

name: Sheldon
line: I miss Stuart's place. All this loud music and exposed brick. What, is this a comic book store, or a rave at the third little pig's house?

name: Howard
line: Yep, I wish Stuart would reopen. I hate this place, too.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, him I believe because he's an 80-year-old man in a 15-year-old's tee shirt. But you're just upset about Stuart and your mom and all their HBOs.

name: Howard
line: Yes, I am. You know, I can't even watch Game of Thrones now without thinking of mother saying, Stuart, which one is Thrones?

name: Raj
line: You know, he might not reopen. He didn't get a lot of money from the insurance company.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, boy, if there is one thing that gets my goat, it's those dad-gum insurance companies.

name: Leonard
line: Why? Because they won't get off your lawn? Is Stuart trying to get a loan, or, or find investors?

name: Howard
line: All I know is, he's got my mother buying four-ply toilet paper. I mean, four-ply. If his butt is so delicate, why doesn't he just use an angora rabbit?

name: Sheldon
line: For starters, they shed and bite.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, here's a thought. Why don't we put up the rest of the money that Stuart needs?

name: Raj
line: So, we'd be, like, owners of a comic book store?

name: Leonard
line: It's kind of a dream come true.

name: Howard
line: That does sound fun.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, maybe we could come up with a business plan to compete with this place.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll give you a plan right now. Step one, open comic book store. Step two, start rumour this comic book store gives you genital warts. Step three, buy a big bag to put the money in.

name: Leonard
line: It's not that bad.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Emily
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Thank you so much for letting me practice my sales pitch on you. I really appreciate it.

name: Emily
line: Sure.

name: Penny
line: Um, I brought coffee. I wasn't sure what you like, so I got a regular, a cappuccino and a Chai tea. Since you like Raj, I thought you might be into that.

name: Emily
line: Thanks. If we could get started. I'm a little busy.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, sure. Let me just get out my materials. Leonard gave me this briefcase. He used to carry it around in high school. You can still see the dent where they whacked him with it. Okay, I would like to talk to you about our new birth control pill, Femevra.

name: Emily
line: Great.

name: Penny
line: So, Femevra's triphasic design provides balanced hormonal exposure.

name: Emily
line: All right.

name: Penny
line: It has also been shown to cause significantly fewer side effects than other oral contraceptives. Although it can cause acne, which, if you ask me, kind of increases its effectiveness as a contraceptive.

name: Emily
line: Funny.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'm sorry. Did we get off on the wrong foot? Because since the other night, I kind of feel like you might have a problem with me.

name: Emily
line: No, it's fine.

name: Penny
line: Are you sure, because it doesn't seem fine?

name: Emily
line: Okay. If you really want to talk about this, I do have a problem.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God. Tell me, what did I do?

name: Emily
line: Look, it's nothing. It's just, Raj told me that a while ago, you two hooked up.

name: Penny
line: What? Oh, why would he say that?

name: Emily
line: Did it not happen?

name: Penny
line: Well, I wouldn't exactly call it a hook-up.

name: Emily
line: Did you kiss?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Emily
line: Were you naked?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Emily
line: So, it was a hook-up.

name: Penny
line: No. Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: So, what are some ways we could set our comic book store apart from the competition?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, kids buy comic books. It would be great to figure out a way to get more kids in the store.

name: Howard
line: You know, when I was a kid, I loved going there, but I could never get a ride.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, what if we got a van and drove around and picked kids up?

name: Sheldon
line: Nice. You mean, like at parks and schools?

name: Howard
line: Toy stores, puppet shows.

name: Leonard
line: Hold on. So, your idea is to get a van and cruise the streets looking for kids to pick up?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: And are you gonna use candy to lure them in?

name: Raj
line: We are now.

name: Penny
line: You told Emily we hooked up?

name: Raj
line: Um, well, in my defence, I tell everybody.

name: Penny
line: Why would you say that?

name: Raj
line: We were having a conversation about past lovers.

name: Penny
line: We weren't lovers. Come on. Everyone knows we didn't sleep together. We got drunk and fooled around. Why couldn't you just leave me out of it?

name: Raj
line: Well, we were being honest. You would leave me out of the conversation with the next guy if you dumped Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Why say it?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Raj
line: Well, I would never leave you off my list, and not just because, without you, we're playing fast and loose with the word list.

name: Penny
line: Well, good job. Now she hates me. Ugh.

name: Raj
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: On the bright side, that Oxford study was right. One friend down. I wonder who you're going to lose next.

name: Raj
line: You, okay? It's you. You're, you're next.

name: Sheldon
line: No. You're crazy about me.

name: Penny
line: I don't know what Emily's so upset about anyway. Even if I had slept with him, so what? Everyone has a past.

name: Amy
line: Hmm-hmm.

name: Penny
line: Almost everyone has a past.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, look how pretty you are. I'm sure this isn't the first girl to hate you.

name: Penny
line: It's not.

name: Bernadette
line: And I'm sure you can turn it around.

name: Penny
line: How? You can't force someone to like you.

name: Amy
line: What if you just hang around and act like her friend until you wear her down? I mean, next thing you know, you're in her home, you're eating her food, drinking her wine.

name: Penny
line: No, that won't work.

name: Amy
line: You're right. Cheers.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I know. Why don't you use your sales training to go back down there and sell yourself?

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. But instead of selling a drug, you'd be selling Penny. it's cute.

name: Penny
line: It's stupid.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, maybe people would like you more if you didn't crap all over their ideas.

name: Amy
line: I'm gonna go with Penny on this one. Then again, why wouldn't I? I mean, we go way back.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God. I didn't used to like you.

name: Amy
line: Shh. Amy's here now.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, the more I think about it, the more intrigued I am about having our own store.

name: Howard
line: We'll get to see all the new stuff before it hits the shelves.

name: Sheldon
line: And we'll get to have fun interactions with our customers. Like, this isn't a library, buy it or get out.

name: Howard
line: You say things like that all the time.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but as a store owner, I'll finally have a good comeback to, You don't work here, shut up.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, do you know how Penny told Raj he should have left her off his list?

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Well, do you think when she and I had that conversation, she left people off her list?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sure she did.

name: Leonard
line: Why?

name: Sheldon
line: Because if she hadn't, she'd still be wading through the list.

name: Leonard
line: Will you stay out of this?

name: Sheldon
line: If only Penny had said that once in a while.

name: Howard
line: Hey, what difference does it make? You're the one she wants to marry.

name: Leonard
line: That's true.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, and I'm not sure that complete honesty is always the best thing for a relationship.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, he's right. Once, in a moment of candour, I told Amy that her hair reminded me of a duck caught in an oil spill. She stormed out. Which was sad, because we were playing Scrabble, and I had all the letters to spell persimmon.

name: Leonard
line: Why are you even part of this conversation? You don't know anything about women.

name: Sheldon
line: I know that if I had a wife or a fiancée, I'd ask her first before I invested money in a comic book store.

name: Howard
line: He's right.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, of course I am. I was also right about her hair. It did everything but quack.

name: Leonard
line: There's something I wanted to run past you.

name: Penny
line: What's up?

name: Leonard
line: Mm, the guys and I were thinking about investing in Stuart's comic book store. Is that okay?

name: Penny
line: Why are you asking me?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you know, we're engaged, and it's kind of a big deal financially. It seems like something we should talk about.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Well, would you consider mounds of credit card debt kind of a big deal financially?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Huh.

name: Howard
line: Mm. So, me and the guys were talking about this great investment opportunity.

name: Bernadette
line: Nope.

name: Howard
line: But you didn't hear what it was.

name: Bernadette
line: I know.

name: Howard
line: Oh, come on.

name: Bernadette
line: Fine. What is it?

name: Howard
line: It's to help reopen the comic book store.

name: Bernadette
line: Nope.

name: Howard
line: Well, hear me out.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, you know we're saving up for a house.

name: Howard
line: I know, but all the guys are doing it. We're splitting it four ways, so it's really not that much money.

name: Bernadette
line: It just seems like a risky investment.

name: Howard
line: I get that. I, okay, look, the real reason this is important is, before my dad left me and my mom, he used to take me to the comic book store. It was one of the few things we did together.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. Howie, I had no idea.

name: Howard
line: Well, I don't like to talk about it.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, baby. That story's made up, isn't it?

name: Howard
line: That's how much buying a comic book store means to me.

name: Sheldon
line: I'd like your honest opinion on something.

name: Amy
line: Of course.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, before I start, I need you to know that I'm very excited about this, and anything you say that isn't enthusiastically supportive will throw our entire relationship into question. So, keep an open mind.

name: Amy
line: I'm feeling a little backed into a corner, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Perfect. Now, I'm considering investing in Stuart's comic book store.

name: Amy
line: Interesting. Can you see how a grown man, an accomplished scientist, who invests in a store that sells picture books about flying men in colourful underwear might be wasting both his financial and intellectual resources?

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Amy
line: Then I think it's a terrific idea.

name: Sheldon
line: Great. Wait till you hear about our van.

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Raj
line: Thanks for inviting us over.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thank you for coming.

name: Emily
