line: Uh, listen, Penny, before you start, I just want to apologise for being so rude the other day in my office.

name: Penny
line: No, no. No need to apologise.

name: Raj
line: Excuse me, can I say something? I just love both you guys, and I want you to get along. And when I say love I meant as a friend. And, uh, way too soon, right?

name: Penny
line: Okay, sit down. Listen, Emily, what happened between me and Raj was a long time ago.

name: Raj
line: It was, and I may have made it seem like a bigger deal than I should have.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and Leonard and I are engaged now, and I'm just hoping we can put this whole thing behind us.

name: Emily
line: Mm. I'd like that, too. Yeah, I thought I'd be okay with it, but then I saw how pretty you are.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's so sweet. I mean, look at you, you are gorgeous.

name: Raj
line: It's true, you're both gorgeous. Kind of says something about the man who could bed you both. You get why I've been alone most of my adult life.

name: Stuart
line: So, what brings you by?

name: Howard
line: Well, I don't need a reason, it's my house.

name: Stuart
line: Technically, it's your mom's house, but we certainly want you to feel welcome.

name: Howard
line: I'm always welcome.

name: Stuart
line: Mm, just try and call first.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, let's get down to business. Howie was thinking about putting up some money to help you reopen the store, but before that happens, I have a few questions.

name: Stuart
line: Oh. I appreciate the offer, but actually your mother already gave me the money.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Stuart
line: Yeah. I told her it was too much, but she said she was happy to help out her bubala.

name: Howard
line: Excuse me. Ma, you are cancelling that cheque, and Stuart is not your bubala, I'm your bubala. You can't have more than one bubala.

name: Stuart
line: I don't know who he's talking to. She's at Target, buying me shirts.

name: Raj
line: I'm so glad we could work this all out.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, me, too.

name: Emily
line: You know, we should have dinner one night with you and Leonard.

name: Penny
line: Oh, we would love that.

name: Raj
line: Great.

name: Penny
line: Okay, good night, guys.

name: Emily
line: All right, night.

name: Penny
line: Bye.

name: Emily and Penny
line: I hate her.

name: Raj
line: I'm really disappointed we're not gonna have our own comic book store.

name: Leonard
line: I know. I was looking forward to it.

name: Sheldon
line: It would've been so nice to have a place that was ours, where we could just sit and read comics in peace.

name: Howard
line: With comfy seats.

name: Raj
line: And snacks.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I guess it was too good to be true.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Bernadette
line: I like your suit.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thanks. Got a couple new outfits for work.

name: Howard
line: How does it feel knowing your fiancée's job is to go out and flirt with doctors, looking like that, while you sit here, you know, looking like this?

name: Leonard
line: She doesn't flirt with doctors.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. It's all very professional.

name: Amy
line: You know when you bend over, I can see down your shirt?

name: Penny
line: Okay, good.

name: Bernadette
line: Speaking of new careers, how are things going with dark matter, Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, yeah, I'd have to say it's the most exiting time in the history of the field.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: I started doing it.

name: Raj
line: You know, the government funded the biggest experiment yet to detect dark matter.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I've read about that, they're sending research teams down into abandoned salt mines.

name: Raj
line: You know, Sheldon, if we apply to be one of those teams, we could be on the ground floor of something big, not just for theoretical physics but for astrophysics as well.

name: Penny
line: Wait, hang on, you guys are gonna work in a mine?

name: Sheldon
line: Why not?

name: Penny
line: You had a panic attack when we went through the car wash.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps the emotion you're referring to was shock at you having something cleaned.

name: Leonard
line: I think what Penny meant is, the thought of you two in a mine is kind of funny, it's like a cat riding a Roomba.

name: Howard
line: If they get scared, they'll have those hats with the lights on them, 'cause down there it's night-night all the time.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe they could ride around in one of those mine carts that go ee-oo-ee-oo-ee-oo.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, it'll help them get away when they see a g-g-ghost.

name: Sheldon
line: Are they making fun of us?

name: Raj
line: Yup.

name: Sheldon
line: I miss the old days when I couldn't tell.

name: Leonard
line: So, one of my favourite video games of all time is called Shadow of the Colossus, and it was only for PlayStation 2, but then they came out with a new version for PS3 with better graphics. I finally got the chance to play it, and for some reason, it just wasn't as good as the first one. Or something about yoga.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, I was thinking about work.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I was just saying that there was this video game...

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's when I started thinking about work. Uh, listen, I've got some good news.

name: Leonard
line: Hmm.

name: Penny
line: This is for you.

name: Leonard
line: Huh. What is this?

name: Penny
line: Well, you know how they gave me the company car? Didn't make sense to have two, so I sold the other one.

name: Leonard
line: The one I gave you?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. And there's your money back, and now we're even. How great is that?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: Nothing.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, Leonard, I know the car was a thoughtful gesture and I really appreciate it, but it doesn't make sense to have both.

name: Leonard
line: You're right.

name: Penny
line: What should I have done? Taken a picture of us in the car and put it in a pink frame with puffy paint around it that says best fiancé ever?

name: Leonard
line: Doesn't sound that bad.

name: Penny
line: Well, good, because that's what I did.

name: Leonard
line: Aw, oh, thank you. That is so sweet.

name: Penny
line: Well, it's not that sweet, I paid for the frame with your money and then got a massage.

name: Leonard
line: You know what, you don't have to give me this. You keep it.

name: Penny
line: Why?

name: Leonard
line: The car was a gift, it was something you needed. I was happy to help you out.

name: Penny
line: And I really appreciate it, but now I don't need it, so here you go.

name: Leonard
line: Well, this is silly, so you don't need the car, but you could use it to buy yourself something else, like a new purse to put all this money in.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, I can buy my own stuff. I have a good job now.

name: Leonard
line: I know, and I'm proud of you, but that doesn't mean I can't do something nice. Like this.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I don't want this to turn into a fight.

name: Leonard
line: I don't, either.

name: Penny
line: Great. Thank you. Can you pass the salt, please?

name: Leonard
line: Sure. In my mind, that broke the tension with comedy and led to sex.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Sheldon, you busy?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm always busy. This mind is capable of advanced multitasking. You know, currently, I'm attempting to solve the Penrose conjecture, I'm composing my Nobel acceptance speech for when I've solved the Penrose conjecture, and I'm wondering how mermaids have babies.

name: Raj
line: Don't they lay eggs on a rock?

name: Sheldon
line: Now I've got room for another thing. What do you want?

name: Raj
line: So, I did a little research on what the conditions are like in the mines, and the guys might be right, sounds pretty rough down there. For starters, it's very humid, and about a hundred degrees.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm from Texas and you're from India, we're no strangers to the fragrant armpit. Next.

name: Raj
line: It's also a live mine, so there'll be dynamite explosions going off in the distance.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I have a lactose intolerant roommate with a taste for ice cream. Next.

name: Raj
line: Oh, you have to be down there for 12 hours at a time.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah? We have to be somewhere.

name: Raj
line: Well, there's no toilets, we'll have to do our business in a bucket.

name: Sheldon
line: So it's settled, we're not doing it.

name: Raj
line: Look, I get it, but before we pass up on an incredible opportunity, I was thinking about when Howard was training to go to space, they put him in a simulated environment.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting. You're suggesting that we recreate the conditions of the mine to see if we can handle it.

name: Raj
line: Exactly.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well.

name: Raj
line: So where should we do it?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'll just Google hot, dark and moist, see what comes up.

name: Raj
line: Uh, Sheldon...

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, there, well, look, there's all kinds of videos.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you got a sec?

name: Penny
line: Hi. Sure.

name: Leonard
line: I was hoping we could talk about the money again.

name: Penny
line: Oh, sweetie, just forget about it.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no, no, hear me out. I know things got a little weird last night.

name: Penny
line: Well, leaving an envelope full of cash on my dresser after sex would count as weird.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I think I came up with a pretty good solution.

name: Penny
line: Mm.

name: Leonard
line: Why don't we just put the money in a joint account? It'll be our first money together. We can use it for the wedding, the honeymoon, whatever.

name: Penny
line: You know what, that's great. I love that.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, of course you do, I'm not just a genius in bed. You sure are, baby.

name: Penny
line: You two want to be alone?

name: Leonard
line: I want you to know I get why you don't want the money, you've got this new job, you're excited about being financially independent, and I am nothing but proud of you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thank you so much. It feels so good to hear you say that. And I want you to know that I get this job kind of changes the balance in our relationship, and I'm trying to be sensitive to that.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Well, I just think that maybe you're a little hung up on the money because I'm less reliant on you now, and that's a little scary.

name: Leonard
line: Hmm. Maybe. Or maybe I tried to do something nice and maybe you had a problem with it because of your control issues.

name: Penny
line: Control issues?

name: Leonard
line: Maybe.

name: Penny
line: Or, maybe now that I'm no longer an out-of-work actress who can't pay for her own dinner, that makes you a little insecure.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I can't believe you'd say that. You know how insecure I am about my insecurities.

name: Penny
line: You know what? I'm sorry. It's stupid to fight over money.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm sorry, too. We're about to share the rest of our lives together. It's our money, who cares who has it?

name: Penny
line: Ugh, You're right, who cares? Mm. Get that money out of my back pocket or I will break your fingers.

name: Raj
line: Huh. All this time I never knew there were steam tunnels down here.

name: Amy
line: Most universities have them. When I was an undergrad, I spent three days in one pledging a sorority.

name: Raj
line: Did you get in?

name: Amy
line: No. They forgot I was there. But it really opened up my pores.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, according to my research, the steam tunnels below this access point should be the closest analog to the mines.

name: Raj
line: This is gonna be so much more accurate than the steam room at the gym.

name: Sheldon
line: Plus, there's almost no chance we'll see any of our coworkers half naked.

name: Raj
line: Or totally naked. I love Howard, but the dude needs a little shame.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, Amy, this walkie-talkie is yours. If we run into any problems, I'll contact you. And if anything bad happens, what's the rule?

name: Amy
line: Save you first; come back for Raj only if there's time.

name: Raj
line: We're going to be fine.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I'm really impressed you're willing to try this.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, admittedly, this brushes up against my well-known aversions to heat, small places, going below floor-level, dampness, hatches, ladders, darkness, echoes, and eliminating in Home Depot buckets. That last one is quite new, but I have a feeling that's gonna rocket to the top of the list.

name: Raj
line: I'm sweating already.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, as the person beneath you, allow me to say, I know.

name: Raj
line: How hot is it?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, let's see. 704? No, wait, it's on clock. Uh, the real answer isn't much better. 102 degrees.

name: Raj
line: Well, that's what we wanted. This is as hot as the mines will be.

name: Sheldon
line: True. Sheldon's Mine Simulation Log, entry one. Koothrappali's restating of the obvious is already getting on my nerves.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks again for having us.

name: Howard
line: Oh, of course. What did you guys want to talk about?

name: Penny
line: Well, you know, now that we're engaged, we had some questions about how you handle money as a couple.

name: Bernadette
line: I told you they weren't gonna ask us to swing with them.

name: Howard
line: I didn't think they were going to. I just wanted to have a way to say no without hurting Leonard's feelings.

name: Leonard
line: Well, nailed it.

name: Howard
line: So what did you want to know?

name: Penny
line: Well, do you guys ever fight over money?

name: Bernadette
line: Sure, sometimes. I mean, it can be a little awkward since I make so much more money than Howie.

name: Howard
line: You didn't have to say so much more.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, I didn't have to, but for the sake of accuracy I felt that I should.

name: Howard
line: I brought a lot of significant assets into the relationship, too.

name: Bernadette
line: Like what? Your incomplete set of Star Trek collector plates?

name: Howard
line: For your information, I just bought the last one I needed on eBay.

name: Bernadette
line: Without asking me?

name: Howard
line: There were only three minutes left in the auction and it was a mint condition Scotty from a smoke-free home.

name: Bernadette
line: How much, Howie?

name: Howard
line: Not a lot.

name: Bernadette
line: How much?

name: Howard
line: Let's not talk about this in front of our friends.

name: Bernadette
line: Was it more or less than falconry school?

name: Howard
line: For the tenth time, that was a Groupon.

name: Leonard
line: Like I would swing with him.

name: Raj
line: How you feeling?

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Little claustrophobic.

name: Raj
line: Let's set up the equipment. It'll help take your mind off of it.

name: Sheldon
line: Miners often sang mining songs to keep their spirits up.

name: Raj
line: Do you know any mining songs?

name: Sheldon
line: Just the hits.  Where it's dark as a dungeon, and it's damp as the dew.

name: Rajj
line: That's pretty.

name: Sheldon
line: Where the dangers are double, and the pleasures are few. Where the rain never falls and the sun never shines, yes, it's dark as a dungeon way down in the mine.

name: Raj
line: It's a little more bleak than I thought.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I pray when I'm dead and the ages shall roll, that my body will blacken and turn into coal.

name: Raj
line: Getting kind of grim.

name: Sheldon
line: Then I'll look from the door of my heavenly home, and pity the miner that mines my poor bones.

name: Raj
line: Okay. How 'bout a little Miley Cyrus next?

name: Sheldon
line: Who's he?

name: Howard
line: Talk about wasted money. What about the late fees on our credit card because somebody didn't pay the bill on time?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, maybe I would have paid it if I wasn't also doing everything else around here.

name: Howard
line: Oh, you're saying I don't do anything around here. Look at my chore chart.

name: Leonard
line: She made him a chore chart.

name: Penny
line: I see it.

name: Howard
line: Do the dishes. There's a star right there.

name: Bernadette
line: That was a pity star. Putting water in the roasting pan and leaving it in the sink is not doing the dishes.

name: Howard
line: That pan had to soak and you know it.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, don't come crying to me when you don't get your allowance.

name: Howard
line: It's not an allowance. It's a stipend, and we said we weren't gonna call it an allowance in front of my friends.

name: Leonard
line: I usually don't like lemon bars, but these, these are really good.

name: Raj
line: So, as Hannah Montana, Miley was a world-famous pop star. But then she would take off her wig and go to school like a normal girl. Which, I don't have to tell you, at that age, is its own headache.

name: Sheldon
line: That's preposterous. How would she go unrecognized just by wearing a wig?

name: Raj
line: But you're okay with Superman concealing his identity with a pair of glasses?

name: Sheldon
line: He doesn't just put on a pair of glasses. He combs back his curlicue and affects a mild-mannered personality.

name: Amy
line: You guys doing okay down there?

name: Sheldon
line: I told you to use the walkie-talkie!

name: Amy
line: You guys doing okay down there?

name: Sheldon
line: Please keep this channel clear for emergencies. Thank you.

name: Amy
line: I'm going to the vending machine. Do you want anything?

name: Sheldon
line: This is a simulation. We have to survive on the supplies we brought.

name: Amy
line: Okay, just checking.

name: Raj
line: We should have asked her to get some Funyuns.

name: Sheldon
line: You're not going to have Funyuns when we're a mile below the surface of the Earth.

name: Raj
line: What if we brought them down with us?

name: Sheldon
line: We'll take some Funyuns.

name: Amy
line: Anything else?

name: Sheldon
line: Some York Peppermint Patties, a couple of Dr. Peppers, and run to Best Buy and see if they have a portable DVD player and season one of a show called Hannah Montana.

name: Rajj
line: Have her get season two. Season one, it was still finding itself.

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry you guys had to see that.

name: Penny
line: Oh, don't apologize.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. It just makes it a lot harder to pretend it never happened.

name: Bernadette
line: Money's a sensitive subject for Howie because of the difference in our income.

name: Penny
line: It really bothers him?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, sure. There's still a lot of pressure on guys to be providers. So even though he's happy for me, it's just a little tough on him.

name: Penny
line: Uh-oh.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Well, if I do well in sales, I could end up making a lot more money than you.

name: Leonard
line: Not a problem. I grew up with a mother who emasculated my father financially and in every other aspect of his life, so really, it's what I think love looks like.

name: Bernadette
line: I'll be right back. I'm gonna go check on him.

name: Penny
line: Maybe it's a good thing we came here. It's like a lesson in what not to do.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah I don't want something dumb like money to come between us.

name: Penny
line: It won't. Let's just promise to figure this kind of stuff out before we get married.

name: Howard
line: Why are you being so bossy?

name: Bernadette
line: Why are you being a baby?

name: Howard
line: I'm not a baby. I'm a grown man, and I made the bed. Now where's my star?

name: Leonard
line: Should we go?

name: Penny
line: Hang on. I want to see if he gets the star.

name: Raj
line: Oh, this heat is brutal.

name: Sheldon
line: As someone from the tropical subcontinent of India, you should know that fanning yourself in a humid environment only raises your body temperature.

name: Rajj
line: Huh. That does explain why the servants used to look so hot while they were fanning me. Let's get our minds off how uncomfortable we are. We could take some more simulated instrument readings.

name: Sheldon
line: My major focus at the moment is keeping my claustrophobia at bay.

name: Raj
line: How's that going?

name: Sheldon
line: You tell me. I feel like I can't breathe, and I am tempted to crack you open and suck the air right out of your lungs.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, if this is too much, we can stop.

name: Sheldon
line: We're not stopping.

name: Raj
line: You don't have to bite my head off.

name: Sheldon
line: I apologize. I just, I'm plagued by an internal struggle.

name: Raj
line: If you would just use the bucket, you'd be so much more comfortable.

name: Sheldon
line: My struggle is emotional.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Is it Amy?

name: Sheldon
line: It's dark matter. When I entered the field of string theory, I was a prodigy. I rose to a position of respect, and I assumed my career would continue on that upward trajectory. Now here I am in my 30s, I'm back at square one. And, frankly, it's frightening.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, you know what I think of when I'm scared? Voyager.

name: Sheldon
line: Voyager the space probe or Voyager the Star Trek TV show?

name: Raj
line: The space probe.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Because I am too hot and tired to go on about how much I hate Voyager the TV show.

name: Raj
line: By the time I was born, Voyager 1's mission was supposed to be over. It had seen Jupiter and Saturn and all their moons, but it kept going. When I left India for America, I was never more scared in my life. I had no idea what lay ahead. Whenever I feel that way, I think about how Voyager is still out there somewhere beyond our solar system, going further than anyone ever thought it could. Don't leave. You can do this.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, is everything okay?

name: Sheldon
line: It's too late for Koothrappali. Let's go.

name: Amy
line: 11 minutes. That's longer than I thought.

name: Raj
line: They're in my shirt. They're in my shirt. They're in my shirt.

name: Penny
line: Okay, this is definitely the most fun thing we can do with the money.

name: Leonard
line: I've never done it on a big old pile of cash before. Me neither, Leonard. It's my first time, too.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm so sorry I made you feel bad about the money stuff.

name: Howard
line: It's okay.

name: Bernadette
line: No, it's not okay. I want us to be partners, equals. Adults in a mature relationship.

name: Howard
line: I want that, too.

name: Bernadette
line: Now, let's talk about your birthday party.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, laser tag, laser tag.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh.

name: Amy
line: Do you really need me to transcribe this?

name: Sheldon
line: You're not doing it for me. You're doing it for future generations who will benefit from my struggle.  Sheldon's Mine Simulation Log, entry four. My Kit Kat has melted. All is lost.

name: Raj
line: You call yourself a friend? I was trying to help you, and at the first sign of trouble you ran away, leaving me to fend off a family of rats. You're a completely selfish human being and a, and a physical and a moral coward.

name: Sheldon
line: His statements of the obvious continue to annoy.

name: Bernadette
line: So, what are you working on these days?

name: Amy
line: I'm studying one-celled organisms to try and find the neurochemicals that lead to the feeling of shame.

name: Bernadette
line: What would a one-celled organism have to be embarrassed about?

name: Penny
line: Same as all of us, getting out of a car without underwear.

name: Bermadette
line: Speaking of underwear, I have some interesting news.

name: Penny
line: Okay, if it's sometimes Howie wears yours, Leonard already told us.

name: Bernadette
line: He was being funny. I'm pretty sure. Anyway, I was asked to be a part of a magazine article about the 50 sexiest female scientists in California. Isn't that cool?

name: Amy
line: I think it's awful.

name: Penny
line: Why would you say that?

name: Amy
line: Bernadette is a successful microbiologist. She should be celebrated for her achievements, not her looks. I mean, what kind of message does that send?

name: Penny
line: I think the message is check out the rack on that scientist.

name: Bernadette
line: Why can't someone be thought of as both smart and pretty?

name: Amy
line: I just don't think a professional woman should have to flaunt her sexuality in order to get ahead.

name: Penny
line: Okay, what's the big deal? Look, if it helps me make a sale with a physician, I don't think it hurts to flirt a little. I mean, laugh at their joke, touch their arm, maybe crank up the AC in the car beforehand, you know, to wake up the girls.

name: Amy
line: Maybe it's different in the world of sales, but it's already hard enough for women to be taken seriously in science.

name: Bernadette
line: I was kind of excited about the article, but now you're making me feel bad.

name: Penny
line: No, I think you should do whatever you want. You know, maybe if fashion magazines had female scientists in them, I would've become a theoretical physicist. Stop smirking at each other.

name: Man with Flowers
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: No, thank you. Delivery men are the unsung foot soldiers of our nation's commerce. It's because of people like you, people like me can limit our human contact. I'd shake your hand, but, well, you know.

name: Man
line: I'm not a delivery man, I'm a doctor. Although I do often deliver alarming biopsy results to my patients.

name: Sheldon
line: That's humorous.

name: Man
line: All right.

line: Yeah, I bet you leave your patients in stitches. That was also humorous.

name: Man
line: All right.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you bringing flowers to a patient to cushion the blow of a terminal diagnosis? That wasn't a joke.

name: Man
line: All right. These are actually for a nice woman who makes sales calls to my office.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. You know, they have delivery people that will do that for you.

name: Man
line: I was hoping to impress her by tracking her down on the Internet and then showing up unannounced at her door.

line: Eh, well, very well. Oh, and on the topic of sharing things that are yours, there is a gentleman caller bringing flowers to your fiancée as we speak.

line: Why didn't you get extra peanut sauce? We can both play this game.

line: I got it, I got it. Listen, um, I think there's been a misunderstanding. See, Penny is my fiancée.

name: Leonard
line: Excuse me?

name: Man
line: Oh, uh, she touched my arm for five Mississippis, and I bought a two thousand dollar iguana habitat. Which she was always too busy to come over and see. You give these to Penny. You're a, you're a lucky man.

line: Thank you. Sorry.

name: Man
line: Oh, uh, you probably don't want her to see this. It's unnecessarily graphic.

line: Hold on, Doctor. Leonard, where are your social skills? This man is clearly upset. We should invite him in for a hot beverage.

name: Leonard
line: He tried to score with Penny.

name: Sheldon
line: So have these two, and they're having dinner with us.

line: So, how was work today?

line: It was fine, but you'll be happy to know they pulled the sexy scientists article.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know. They just canceled the photo shoot and said they're rethinking it.

name: Amy
line: Well, I'm really sorry, but I think it's for the best. You want people focusing on your achievements, not staring at your breasts in some magazine.

name: Bernadette
line: I guess. It's really not that important. Hey, up here.

name: Amy
line: Sorry, it's just we're, we were talking about them. So, look, I, I wasn't going to say anything, but since you seem to be okay with the article being canceled, I have a little confession. I'm the reason it was pulled.

name: Bernadette
line: What? How?

name: Amy
line: I sent the editors of the magazine a pretty scathing e-mail.

name: Bernadette
line: Amy, what did you say?

name: Amy
line: I simply pointed out that they would never consider doing an article ranking male scientists on their sexuality, let alone showing them in various stages of undress.

name: Bernadette
line: Because no one wants to see Neil deGrasse Tyson in a wet T-shirt, bent over the hood of a Porsche.

name: Amy
line: Well, it doesn't make a difference, because they agreed it was in bad taste, and now you agree, so Amy saves the day.

line: No, what happened was you got jealous, so you took away a chance for me to get some publicity.

name: Amy
line: But it was bad publicity.

name: Amy
line: I disagree. As a female scientist, I think what you do affects all of us.

name: Bernadette
line: And I think you don't like people expressing their sexuality because no one wants you to express yours. Oh, Amy, I'm so sorry. That was over the line.

line: He was so happy after he passed it, he gave me a Terminator.

line: You think you've got problems. The gibbon is the only member of the ape family not classified as a great ape.

line: All the non-human apes are classified as great apes except one. That means taxonomists created the entire category of lesser ape just to single out the poor gibbon as the weird kid on the playground. Now there's a hairy little fellow with a genuine beef.

line: But the gibbon doesn't know what it's categorized as. It doesn't even know it's called a gibbon.

line: Oh, yeah, I got that Evite. Ever since I saw Pretty in Pink, I've wanted to go to an American prom. But then I saw Carrie, and I did not want to go to an American prom. But then I saw Never Been Kissed, and I'm back on the prom bandwagon. This prom thing's been a real roller coaster.

line: Bernie's really excited. I could tell because her voice got so high, the beagle next door started howling.

line: No. I had a date with a proper education. Instead of a tuxedo, I dressed myself in good habits. Instead of spiked punch, I enjoyed the intoxicating flavour of knowledge. Instead of dancing in a gym, I shook my bootyto the seductive rhythms...

line: Penny?  Penny?  Penny?  Penny?  Penny?

line: I'd like to discuss this party that Amy and Bernadette are throwing. Since you and I are both reluctant to go, I think I've come up with a perfect way for us to enjoy it.

name: Penny
line: Great, how?

name: Sheldon
line: We pretend we're aliens. I'm not the best at reading facial cues, but I'm gonna say that you love it and want to hear more. Now, in the beloved novel Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, an alien named Ford Prefect pretended to be human in order to blend in so that he could write an entry about Earth for The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, which is a travel book within the actual book, which is also called The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.

name: Penny
line: Okay, just one question. What?

name: Sheldon
line: My point is, pretending to be an alien is a valuable coping mechanism I've used many times. I did it the first time I went to see you in a play. You had no idea Commander Umfrumf of Ceti Alpha Three was in the audience. Oh, don't worry, he gave you seven thumbs up.

name: Penny
line: Here's a question, as an alien pretending to be human, are you planning to engage in any post-prom mating rituals with Amy?

name: Sheldon
line: There are post-prom mating rituals?

name: Penny
line: Not always. Unless your date drives a van with an air mattress, then always.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if it's part of the prom experience, then I'm open to it.

name: Penny
line: You're kidding.

name: Sheldon
line: I may be an alien, but I have urges. If Amy wants to copulate by firing her eggs into space, well, then, I will happily catch them with the reproductive sac on my upper flermin. I'm not the best at reading facial cues, but I can see that you're a little turned on.

name: Leonard
line: You know, if you're not gonna learn how to do this, they make some pretty good clip-ons.

name: Sheldon
line: Bruce Wayne doesn't wear a clip-on.

name: Leonard
line: Bruce Wayne doesn't make his roommate tie it for him.

name: Sheldon
line: His name is Alfred, and, yes, he does.

name: Leonard
line: There, perfect.

name: Sheldon
line: What, are you sure? It's my first prom, I want to do it correctly.

name: Leonard
line: I thought you were gonna pretend to be an alien.

name: Sheldon
line: I was, but Penny didn't want to. You didn't want to. Bernadette, Amy, Koothrappali and Wolowitz didn't want to. And even I knew it was weird to hire somebody.

name: Leonard
line: Was that a flask?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. I've decided to embrace all of the traditions associated with prom, including spiking the punch.

name: Leonard
line: You're gonna put alcohol in the punch?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, this is pomegranate juice. It's all the fun of high school high jinks with the cell-protecting zip of antioxidants.

name: Leonard
line: If you had ripped jeans and a leather jacket, you'd be like the toughest kid on the Disney Channel. So, anything else planned for tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, everything. Getting our picture taken, slow-dancing, being elected prom king. Pointing out that kings aren't elected. It's gonna be off the hook.

name: Leonard
line: And while you're at it, I know that at this age your hormones are raging, but just because all your friends are having sex doesn't mean you have to.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would you say that?

name: Leonard
line: You know, 'cause, 'cause a lot of people lose their virginity on prom night.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny implied the same thing. Is this true?

name: Leonard
line: Just relax, it's a joke. You don't have hormones.

name: Leonard
line: Wow, you look amazing.

name: Penny
line: Thank you, so do you.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you look so handsome.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, doesn't Amy look hot? That's got to put some starch in the upper flermin.

name: Amy
line: What's that?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, it's a scaly genital organ that grows between his shoulder blades. Try not to touch it when you're dancing.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me.

name: Amy
line: Where are you going?

name: Sheldon
line: I can't do this. And for your information, Leonard, the upper flermin doesn't grow between my shoulder blades, it grows out of the belly button on my neck.

name: Leonard
line: He's right, I was thinking of the lower flermin.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, I'll, uh, text Stuart, let him know we're close.

name: Bernadette
line: That's a neat tattoo.

name: Emily
line: Oh, thanks, it's Sally from Nightmare before Christmas.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw, that movie's so cute.

name: Howard
line: Do you like her because you both have red hair?

name: Emily
line: Uh, a little, but more that she's covered in scars and can pull her own limbs off and sew them back on.

name: Bernadette
line: I like Cinderella.

name: Emily
line: Did you know, in the original book, the sisters cut off their toes with knives in order to fit in the glass slipper?

name: Bernadette
line: I like Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo.

name: Raj
line: Hey, here comes Stuart and his date.

name: Emily
line: Oh, she's cute.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: That's Jeanie.

name: Bernadette
line: That's Jeanie?

name: Emily
line: Who's Jeanie?

name: Howard
line: Don't say it.

name: Raj
line: That's Howard's cousin that he had sex with.

name: Howard
line: She is my second cousin. We were 15, I just said, don't say it.

name: Emily
line: No, it's okay. He told me that story a long time ago.

name: Howard
line: Raj.

name: Raj
line: It was our first date, there was an awkward silence. What was I supposed to say?

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's beautiful.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, the girls really did a nice job.

name: Penny
line: Aw, I know I wasn't into this before, but I'm so glad I get to take you to your first prom.

name: Leonard
line: What makes you think I didn't go to my prom? I went.

name: Penny
line: Well, who'd you go with?

name: Leonard
line: I took a little lady I like to call loneliness.

name: Penny
line: Aw.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, it's all right. We ended up having a threesome with her friend humiliation, so...

name: Penny
line: Well, if I would have been there and saw you alone, I would've asked you to dance.

name: Leonard
line: No, you wouldn't have.

name: Penny
line: Well, you don't know that.

name: Leonard
line: It was before my growth spurt.

name: Penny
line: What, that already happened?

name: Leonard
line: Very funny.

name: Penny
line: Well, you wouldn't have asked me either.

name: Leonard
line: I would have asked you. In my head. On the way home. While I was having a good cry.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, can I come in?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think that's a good idea.

name: Amy
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: According to an online message board, I may be having a panic attack. SoccerMom09 had similar symptoms. But to be fair, the twins were a real handful that day.

name: Amy
line: You're making me worry. What's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: What's going on is we're about to go to a prom. And there's a great deal of pressure on young couples like us to engage in what Mr. Bob Eubanks called making whoopee.

name: Amy
line: What pressure? All I said was you look handsome. Can you please open the door?

name: Sheldon
line: It's not just that. Leonard and Penny also made comments about it. And I'm not blind. Even I looked twice when I saw my posterior in these tuxedo pants.

name: Sceme
line: The limo.

name: Stuart
line: So, I met Jeanie at your Aunt Gladys'. She passed me the Manischewitz, I took one look at this punim, and I almost plotzed on the kugel.

name: Rajj
line: Is this what I sound like when I talk about India?

name: Howard
line: So, my mother's okay with this?

name: Jeannie
line: Why would your mother have a problem with me and Stuart?

name: Howard
line: ‘Cause they have a weird, inappropriate relationship.

name: Jeannie
line: Weirder than what you and I did in my dad's Corolla?

name: Raj
line: This is so messed up.

name: Emily
line: I know, I'm having the best time.

name: Howard
line: Why would you even come to this? Didn't you know I'd be here?

name: Jeannie
line: It was a long time ago, Howard.

name: Stuart
line: And you're only second cousins, who cares?

name: Bernadette
line: So, you knew and you brought her anyway?

name: Stuart
line: Oh, so she's good enough for Howard, but not for me?

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, go have weird relationships with your own mother and cousin. This is his turf.

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Well, I might not have asked you to dance then, but I will ask you now.

name: Leonard
line: There's no music.

name: Penny
line: I don't care. We'll make our own music.

name: Leonard
line: My God, who's the dork now? Thank you for wearing your flats.

name: Penny
line: Thank you for wearing your heels.

name: Leonard
line: Look at me. Dancing with the prettiest girl at the prom.

name: Penny
line: Want to take a picture of us and send it to your old friends in the chess club?

name: Leonard
line: I sent them a bikini shot of you years ago. This is nice. I kind of wish no one else was coming.

name: Penny
line: I know, me, too. But it will be fun to have a prom without all the drama.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, get off of him.

name: Howard
line: Not until he stops humping his way up my family tree.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, this is silly. I'm not missing another prom. I'm going upstairs now. Good-bye.

name: Sheldon
line: I really did think you looked pretty.

name: Amy
line: You did?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. So much so that I started to panic.

name: Amy
line: Well, you can relax. Just because you think I look pretty doesn't mean we have to spend the night together.

name: Sheldon
line: Were you hoping we would because it's prom?

name: Amy
line: I'm always hoping. But tonight I just wanted to have a nice time with you. And maybe dance with someone who has arms.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for understanding.

name: Amy
line: Of course I understand. Sheldon, there's something else I've been wanting to say, but before I do, I just, I want you to know that you don't have to say it back. I know you're not ready, and I don't want you to say it just because social convention dictates...

name: Sheldon
line: I love you, too.

name: Amy
line: You said it.

name: Sheldon
line: There's no denying I have feelings for you that can't be explained in any other way. I briefly considered that I had a brain parasite. But that seems even more farfetched. The only conclusion was love. I know what's happening. This is a panic attack. SoccerMom09 says to lie down with your feet elevated.

name: Amy
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Just because I love you doesn't mean girls are allowed in my room.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Here we go, say cheese. Iskip) Say cheese. Iskip) Say cousin. Iskip) Say...

name: Stuart
line: Oh, sorry. Hang on, sorry.  Hey, Debbie. I, yeah, yeah, I'm here with Jeanie. Okay, but we're just friends. It's, yeah. I got to go.

name: Amy
line: This is an easy one. You love this guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Me.

name: Amy
line: Come on, he's an under-appreciated genius.

name: Sheldon
line: Still think it's me.

name: Amy
line: It's not you. Now think, there's a car named after him.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course there is. The Mini Cooper, 'cause it's me.

name: Amy
line: How about this, he's a poor man's Sheldon Cooper.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Tesla.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Amy
line: Hello.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, how did it go?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, not fun. The doctor shoved a camera up into my sinuses.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I watched. It was like the scary boat tunnel in Willy Wonka.

name: Amy
line: Did they figure out what's wrong?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. It's a deviated septum. The surgery to correct it is simple. He's gonna do it next week.

name: Sheldon
line: Why would you have surgery?

name: Leonard
line: Because I can't breathe. I snore, I get sinus infections.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, back off, he's all mine.

name: Sheldon
line: But you don't have a life-threatening condition. Why would you take the risk of surgery?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, it's a routine procedure, I've heard you complain about his snoring.

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, for the first five or six years, but I've gotten used to it. It helps me sleep. He's like my mucus-powered white noise machine.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I'm gonna get the surgery, it's no big deal. End of story.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. I'm done talking about it.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe it was your turn in the game.

name: Amy
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Let's see. Oh, this person is most famous for never having gotten his nose mutilated with elective surgery and never living the rest of his life in the shadows as a hideous, disfigured freak.

name: Leonard
line: I think you could give a better clue.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't. I'm not even sure if that's a person or a typo.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, why?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm listening to you snore. I'm wondering how I'll ever sleep without it.

name: Leonard
line: If it helps you sleep, then why are you sitting here staring at me like the albino boogeyman?

name: Sheldon
line: Really Leonard. Insults? After I spent two hours in your closet, waiting for you to fall asleep?

name: Leonard
line: What's your problem?

name: Sheldon
line: If the surgery is successful, the snoring is gone. And if you die during surgery, the snoring is gone.

name: Leonard
line: It sounds like either way, I finally get some rest.

name: Sheldon
line: I have to be honest with you Leonard, I'm truly worried.

name: Leonard
line: I told you, there's nothing to worry about.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I've been doing some research and I've learned that one in 700,000 people die from general anaesthesia.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy, wh, do you realize that that also means 699,999 people don't die?

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose that's true. You're such a glass half-full kind of guy. I'm going to miss that.

name: Raj
line: Oh, so, my, uh, parents' 40th anniversary's coming up and I can't think of a thing to get them.

name: Howard
line: Damn, can you imagine being married to someone for 40 years?

name: Bernadette
line: Not anymore.

name: Raj
line: Anyway, any ideas on a gift?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, what are some of the things they like?

name: Raj
line: They used to like going to the Mumbai Symphony, but last year my mom thought they were phoning it in. Then my dad said based on their love life, she should know about phoning it in.

name: Bernadette
line: He said that to her?

name: Raj
line: Well, they weren't speaking at the time, so he had a servant say it to her. Oh, maybe I could make a gift for them. I know how much you guys love the coasters I made for you.

name: Bernadette
line: They're yours in the divorce.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. What're you working on?

name: Sheldon
line: Remember when I said if you went through with your surgery, there was a one-in-700,000 chance of dying?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I've been crunching the numbers, and so far, I've gotten your probability of death all the way to a sphincter-tightening one in 300.

name: Leonard
line: Great timing. My check sphincter light just went on.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, what if you have an allergic reaction to the surgeon's latex gloves?

name: Leonard
line: I'm not allergic to latex.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then why don't you wear the rubber gloves I bought for you to do the dishes?

name: Leonard
line: For the same reason I don't wear the apron or the hair net.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. What about epilepsy?

name: Leonard
line: I don't have epilepsy, either.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't, but the surgeon might, hmm? And your carotid artery is just one shaky scalpel away from becoming the dancing fountain at Disneyland.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, do you realize that driving is riskier than surgery?

name: Sheldon
line: I do. I have the drive to the hospital right here. That is if you make it to the car without falling down the stairs. And don't expect me to carry you, I do that enough in life.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy, I, I get that you're worried about me and I, I appreciate that, but I'm not going to die.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't know that.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I do know that it won't be from an asteroid strike.

name: Sheldon
line: You know who else said that? Every cocky T. Rex currently swimming around in the gas tank of your car.

name: Leonard
line: If there was an asteroid strike, wouldn't you die, too?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know, I'm smart and scrappy, I think I'd find a way.

name: Leonard
line: Tell you what, the surgery's not for a week, I'll think about it.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. And while you're thinking about it, if you have the surgery in Nicaragua during monsoon season, I can practically guarantee your death.

name: Raj
line: Yes. Okay. I, I understand. Of course, yes. I'll call you tomorrow. Bye.

name: Howard
line: So I found this fencing school in Burbank that has a Jedi class. And if you're cool being the only adults there, they said they are.

name: Raj
line: Dude, my parents just split up.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Raj
line: Uh, that was my dad on the phone. He moved out.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God, I, I'm sorry. I mean, if you're not up to it, we don't have to go out, we can just hang here.

name: Raj
line: No, it's fine. It's not that big a deal. As long as they're happy, I'm happy. And when I get to see them for the holidays, I'll get to celebrate Diwali twice, one at each house. That's double the Diwali.

name: Howard
line: You sure you're okay?

name: Raj
line: I'm okay.

name: Howard
line: You don't look okay.

name: Raj
line: How can I be okay? I come from a broken home.

name: Leonard
line: The doctor said I should be out of surgery by ten.

name: Penny
line: Okay. And Sheldon really believes we're at a public swimming pool?

name: Leonard
line: He was so busy figuring out how many parts per million of urine we'd be floating around in, he didn't even question it.

name: Sheldon
line: 18 parts per million. And he's still doing it.

name: Amy
line: Don't worry about that. I'm happy to take you to work.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, thank you. And Leonard never lets me have French toast sticks in the car. I can't have syrupy fingers, but he can do the backstroke in a toilet bowl.

name: Amy
line: It's nice they're getting exercise.

name: Sheldon
line: Although now that I think about it, Leonard would never go swimming in public without his swim shirt.

name: Amy
line: I'm sure he brought it.

name: Sheldon
line: No, but last year, at Magic Mountain, he got such a bad sunburn, we had to cut him out of it.

name: Amy
line: He probably got a new one. Finish your breakfast. Look, there's an entire section of my dashboard that doesn't have any syrup on it.

name: Sheldon
line: You're acting odd. Why?

name: Amy
line: I'm odd all the time, everyone knows that. Just last night I tried to see how many fava beans I could fit in my mouth.

name: Sheldon
line: Tell me the truth.

name: Amy
line: Twenty eight.

name: Sheldon
line: Come on.

name: Amy
line: Fifty six.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy. What's going on?

name: Amy
line: All right. Don't get upset, but, an earlier appointment opened up for Leonard and he's getting the surgery right now.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. Take me to Leonard.

name: Amy
line: Just go to work, he'll be fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, he's my best friend, and if you don't take me, I'm going there anyway.

name: Amy
line: Fine. It's sweet that you care about him so much.

name: Sheldon
line: I do. And I wouldn't be able to forgive myself if something happened to him and I wasn't at his bedside to say I told you so.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: We had a really nice swim.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, stop it. I assume this medical centre's already treated the burns on your bottom from the recent pants fire.

name: Penny
line: ‘Cause I'm a liar, liar?

name: Sheldon
line: That's for the fire marshal to determine.

name: Penny
line: You had to tell him?

name: Amy
line: He wore me down. And I was distracted, he has on extra baby powder today.

name: Sheldon
line: Is he okay?

name: Penny
line: He's still in surgery.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well.

name: Penny
line: He's gonna be all right. That is sticky.

name: Amy
line: Come on, let's talk about something other than the surgery.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a good idea. Penny, did you and Leonard ever discuss funeral arrangements?

name: Penny
line: I think she meant something a little happier.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose we could try to make it a celebration, but he died so young.

name: Howard
line: Knock, knock.

name: Bernadette
line: Hi.

name: Raj
line: Hey. What brings you by?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, muffin much.

name: Howard
line: Told you, not funny.

name: Bernadette
line: He's just not laughing because he's feeling blueberry. Tough crowd.

name: Raj
line: I'm sorry. This is very sweet. Thanks.

name: Howard
line: So, how you doing?

name: Raj
line: Better. I guess the news just hit me a lot harder than I expected.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, of course. I would be devastated if my parents split up.

name: Howard
line: Why? Your father barely speaks to your mother.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, at least he stuck around, not like your dad, who just took off.

name: Howard
line: As you can see, we're here to cheer you up.

name: Bernadette
line: Sorry, Raj. Do you have any sense of what happened with your folks?

name: Raj
line: I think, over time, they started to resent each other, and instead of talking about the things that bothered them, they kept it bottled up, and the hate just grew.

name: Bernadette
line: It's a shame they spent all that time unhappy. But sometimes, there's muffin you can do about it. You get it, right?

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's nice you got him that.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, this isn't for Leonard, no. Amy bought it for me.

name: Amy
line: Stubbed his toe on the revolving door on the way in.

name: Sheldon
line: You know those confounded things make me dizzy.

name: Amy
line: Who told you to keep going around?

name: Sheldon
line: There was a large plant in the lobby. It kept looking like the outside.

name: Penny
line: Okay, listen, when Leonard comes out, he is not gonna feel great, so, please don't give him a hard time.

name: Amy
line: Penny has a good point. This is like the man in the supermarket with the goiter on his neck. Whatever you're thinking, just keep it to yourself.

name: Sheldon
line: It was like a grapefruit.

name: Amy
line: And I'm sure he knew that before you held a grapefruit up next to it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm not making any promises. Not only did Leonard take what I feel is an unnecessary risk, he deceived me.

name: Penny
line: Okay, the reason he deceived you is you were being a pain in the ass.

name: Sheldon
line: The reason I was being a pain in the B is because I was worried about him, and no one else was.

name: Penny
line: Really? You won't even say A?

name: Sheldon
line: You bet your sweet B I won't.

name: Penny
line: Obviously, I care about Leonard. I'm gonna spend the rest of my life with him.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm not? It's an earthquake. I knew it.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, it was just a little tremor.

name: Sheldon
line: A little tremor that turns routine sinus surgery into a frontal lobotomy. Oh, I don't care for this at all. Oh, I need to see he's okay.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you can't go back there.

name: Sheldon
line: Try and stop me.

name: Amy
line: Are you okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Why didn't you stop me?

name: Bernadette
line: Can I tell you something? This whole thing with Raj's parents just got me a little worried about us.

name: Howard
line: What are you talking about? We're fine. And Raj's parents probably split up because of Raj.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Howard
line: They always say the children aren't to blame, but, come on.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm not joking, Howie. You heard what he said about his parents. It was the little things they kept bottled up. I don't want that to happen to us.

name: Howard
line: How can I convince you it won't?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, is there anything about me you're keeping inside?

name: Howard
line: I'm not answering that. It's a trap.

name: Bernadette
line: So there are things you don't like.

name: Howard
line: And here I am in the trap. You just keep talking. I'm gonna chew my leg off.

name: Bernadette
line: Just tell me one thing that bothers you, and I promise I won't get mad.

name: Howard
line: Okay. The truth is, sometimes, you're too beautiful.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. Howie, be serious.

name: Howard
line: Okay, okay. I really don't like how your wings poke me when we sleep 'cause you're an angel.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, fine, maybe it was a bad idea.

name: Howard
line: I just don't think the secret to a happy marriage is going out of our way to criticize each other. Although, there are ways to improve our communication. One thing I learned when I was in couples therapy was...

name: Bernadette
line: Who were you in couples therapy with?

name: Howard
line: Not important.

name: Bernadette
line: Was it your mom?

name: Howard
line: Not important.

name: Bernadette
line: It was your mom.

name: Howard
line: Anyway, the therapist had us tell each other what we loved about one another.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, that's so sweet. I want to do that.

name: Howard
line: All right.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, um, I love that you make me laugh.

name: Howard
line: Thank you. And I love that you're strong and independent.

name: Bernadette
line: And yet, I still love when you hold a door for me.

name: Howard
line: I love that I'm kind of a slob around here, and you're okay with that.

name: Bernadette
line: Uh-huh. And I love that I work and do all the cleaning, and you're okay with that.

name: Howard
line: See, I am. Isn't this great?

name: Penny
line: Come on, smile. This is gonna be my Christmas card.

name: Sheldon
line: You know this is all your fault.

name: Leonard
line: How is it my fault?

name: Sheldon
line: I told you not to get the surgery.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, first of all, the surgery was a success, and secondly, I didn't even want you there.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow. I don't know which hurts worse, my nose or my heart. Well, I'm done speaking to you.

name: Amy
line: Don't be like that. You two need to talk this out.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, 'cause you sound really funny.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I'm sorry I didn't tell you about the surgery, but you were worried about nothing.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you're hardly out of the woods, no. You still run the risk of infection, a blood clot, the possibility that an inattentive surgeon let a barn spider lay eggs in your nose. The minute you sneeze web, I'm moving out.

name: Leonard
line: I never thought I'd say these words, but come on, nose spider.

name: Penny
line: Who are you kidding? You were so panicked Leonard was gonna die, you'll never leave him.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon will move out eventually.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, once he figures out how to work a door.

name: Sheldon
line: I was not panicked, and I am not overly attached to Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: You were so worried that you smashed your face trying to check on me. You love me.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. Tell me those aren't the words of a man with a spider eating its way through his brain. Amy, you're a neuroscientist. Crack his skull open, spray some Raid in there.

name: Bernadette
line: I love that you take pride in your looks, even when I have to pee in the morning, and you're in there spending an hour on your hair.

name: Howard
line: I love that you're too good to pee in the kitchen sink.

name: Bernadette
line: I love that you have the confidence to speak, even without giving it an ounce of thought.

name: Howard
line: And I love how your hair is always on the soap. It's like washing myself with a hamster.

name: Raj
line: Hey, guys. Sorry I am so late. I was on the phone with my mother.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, how is she?

name: Raj
line: Pretty good. She bought the book Eat, Pray, Love and used it to set my father's Mercedes on fire. So, what's up with you guys?

name: Howard
line: We're just saying all the things we love about each other.

name: Raj
line: Oh, like you and I did at couples therapy.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, what'd you get?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I ordered it before your surgery. It's the urn I was going to put you in.

name: Penny
line: Okay, that's morbid. Send it back.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't send it back, I had it engraved. Here lie the ashes of Leonard Hofstadter. He thought he was right, but his room mate knew better.”

name: Leonard
line: That's funny. Boy, I'm gonna miss these painkillers.

name: Penny
line: Hey, why did you get two? I'm with stupid.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that one's mine.

name: Penny
line: So, what package are you thinking?

name: Leonard
line: Mm, this one comes with music and flowers. Oh, they even stream the whole thing live on the Internet.

name: Penny
line: Why would we want that?

name: Leonard
line: ‘Cause there's a lot of gorgeous blondes out there who don't believe they can land a short, nearsighted scientist. Let's give them hope.

name: Penny
line: Whatever. Put us on the Internet. I've always wanted a wedding with a comment section.

name: Leonard
line: If you're not into this, we can do it another time.

name: Penny
line: No. No, I want to. Look, we've put this off long enough. Let's do it.

name: Leonard
line: Aw. That's exactly what you said the first time we slept together.  Oh, excuse me. Sheldon. Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, have you gotten married yet?

name: Leonard
line: No. Why?

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Don't do it.

name: Leonard
line: Why not?

name: Sheldon
line: Some important new information has come to light. Women are the worst. I thought it was paper cuts, but I was wrong. No piece of paper ever cut me this deep.

name: Leonard
line: What happened now?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy has ended our relationship.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no. Seriously?

name: Penny
line: What's going on?

name: Leonard
line: Amy broke up with Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: She did?

name: Sheldon
line: Is Penny crying?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: No, of course not. They thrive on our suffering.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy, I'm so sorry. Is there anything I can do?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. If I ever talk about going out with a girl again, roll your eyes at me like I do to you when you say dumb things.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, uh, okay, just because you're going through this with Amy doesn't mean that all women are bad.

name: Sheldon
line: Whatever.

name: Penny
line: Hey, I just heard about you and Sheldon. Are you okay?

name: Amy
line: Not really. Can you come over?

name: Penny
line: Uh, actually I'm in Vegas. Leonard and I are about to get married.

name: Amy
line: Hold on. You're getting married and you didn't invite me?

name: Penny
line: Well, it was kind of a spur-of-the-moment thing.

name: Amy
line: Wow. Hope I can catch the bouquet from here.

name: Penny
line: Amy, don't be like that.

name: Sheldon
line: Why did I just hear Amy's name?

name: Leonard
line: Penny's on the phone with her.

name: Sheldon
line: Did she say anything about me? Never mind. I don't care. Well, if you care, you can find out and tell me. Just don't be shocked when you find out that I don't care.

name: Penny
line: Okay, will you relax? You're not missing anything special.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: She's upset. Look, it's gonna be a great wedding. Look at you in your little suit.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy's upset? Is it about me?

name: Leonard
line: No, I think it's because we're eloping.

name: Sheldon
line: Your marriage is causing her pain? Yeah, great, I take it back. Go ahead and do it. Yay for love.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Amy
line: Oh. What are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: When last we spoke, you said you needed time.

name: Amy
line: Well, it's only been 11 hours.

name: Sheldon
line: The Lord of the Rings trilogy was nearly 11 hours. I made you watch that, you said it was an eternity.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, when I'm ready to talk, I'll let you know.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. You seem to be headed somewhere. May I walk with you?

name: Amy
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Boy, I'm glad we're going out again.

name: Amy
line: We're not back together.

name: Sheldon
line: Why? Is there someone else? Just couldn't wait for that first notch on your bedpost, could you?

name: Amy
line: If you must know, I'm going to Howard and Bernadette's to watch the wedding.

name: Sheldon
line: And who's this guy you're taking?

name: Amy
line: There's no guy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you're going to a wedding alone? That's sad.

name: Amy
line: I'm not gonna be alone. I'll be with my friends.

name: Sheldon
line: Your friends? Well, I think you mean my friends. And why wasn't I invited to this?

name: Amy
line: Maybe because the two of us being there would make them feel awkward.

name: Sheldon
line: We make everyone feel awkward. That's our thing.

name: Leonard
line: They're running a little behind. Should be pretty soon.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, if you're hungry, there's a breakfast buffet at the strip club next door.

name: Penny
line: Thanks, but I don't like glitter on my scrambled eggs.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think the strippers prepare the meal, but okay. Look, it's not how I pictured it either, but I'm still glad we're doing it.

name: Penny
line: Me, too.

name: Leonard
line: You sure?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Leonard
line: And you promise you're okay with everything from the car?

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, would you stop bringing it up?

name: Leonard
line: You're right. I'm sorry. We have the rest of our lives to dredge stuff up from the past and fight about it. So what do you think? Should we run next door and grab a bite?

name: Penny
line: What if they call our names?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, don't worry. They gave me this vibrating coaster.

name: Penny
line: Oh, and the fairy tale continues.

name: Amy
line: Thank you for doing this.

name: Bernadette
line: Our pleasure. You feeling okay?

name: Amy
line: We were together for so long, I honestly don't know what I'm feeling.

name: Howard
line: Well, that's understandable. You forgot. It's called happy.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard.

name: Howard
line: I'm not saying anything bad. Just that she was in love with her captor and somehow managed to escape from his dark and crazy dungeon.

name: Stuart
line: I know what you're going through. My, my, my last breakup was pretty tough.

name: Amy
line: Oh. What was her name?

name: Stuart
line: Hey, it's a true story. I don't need the third degree.

name: Bernadette
line: For God's sake, Sheldon, what are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't want to come in. I was told it would make everyone feel uncomfortable. So I'll just stay out here and pretend that I don't have to go to the bathroom.

name: Bernadette
line: Howard, do something.

name: Howard
line: I'm on it.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, you being here might not be making things better.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. And is that why everybody was invited but me?

name: Amy
line: They didn't invite everybody but you.Bernadette invited me, and Stuart lives here.

name: Raj
line: Who wants hot cinnamon rolls?

name: Official
line: So, when you hear the music, that's your cue. Any questions?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, the package that we paid for said the aisle was supposed to be strewn with rose petals.

name: Official
line: Where are the rose petals?!

name: Leonard
line: You know what? It's fine.

name: Female Voice
line: We can use the potpourri from the bathroom!

name: Penny
line: Really, we're good.

name: Leonard
line: Yup, just want to get married.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Official
line: Great. I'll see you two up there.

name: Leonard
line: This is it.

name: Penny
line: I know.

name: Leonard
line: I love you.

name: Penny
line: I love you, too.

name: Female Voice
line: Was that a yes or no on the potpourri?

name: Penny
line: No, thank you.

name: Leonard
line: We're good.

name: Sheldon
line: Raj, you're probably wondering why Amy and I aren't showing any affection to one another.

name: Raj
line: Didn't even crack the top ten.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you should know that she recently broke up with me.

name: Amy
line: I said I needed time to think.

name: Raj
line: I'm sure you guys will figure something out.

name: Sheldon
line: You hear that? Raj is devastated.

name: Bernadette
line: Sheldon, shh. The wedding's starting.

name: Sheldon
line: I see what's happening. Sides are forming. Well, if Bernadette's on Amy's team, I pick Howard.

name: Howard
line: I'm not taking sides.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, I guess I'm stuck with Raj.

name: Raj
line: Really?

name: Stuart
line: At least you got picked.

name: Official
line: Before I go any further, have either of you prepared your own vows?

name: Leonard
line: Yes.

name: Penny
line: No. You wrote vows?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Penny
line: Well, I don't have any. You're kind of making me look bad.

name: Leonard
line: It's okay. I don't have to say them.

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, go ahead. I'll come up with something mushy, you'll cry, we got this.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, we are made of particles that have existed since the moment the universe began. I like to think those atoms travelled 14 billion years through time and space to create us, so that we could be together and make each other whole.

name: Penny
line: Wow.

name: Official
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Right. Um, okay. Leonard, I mean, you're not only the love of my life. I mean, you're my best friend, and, you've got a friend in me. You got troubles. I got 'em, too. There isn't anything I wouldn't do for you. We stick together, and we can see it through, 'cause you've got a friend in me.

name: Official
line: Is that the song from Toy Story?

name: Penny
line: He loves that movie.

name: Leonard
line: I do.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw, that was beautiful.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. I mean, not like our wedding beautiful.

name: Bernadette
line: No, we totally won.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, I don't understand, are we broken up or not? It's like you can't make up your mind.

name: Amy
line: It's because you're not giving me any space to think.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you should think fast, because men can sire offspring their entire lives, but those eggs you're toting around have a sell-by date.

name: Amy
line: You know what, Sheldon, you've made this really easy. You're immature, you're selfish, you just insulted me to my face. I don't need any more time to think. We're broken up.

name: Bernadette
line: Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Will someone take me home?

name: Raj
line: Yeah. Come on, I'll give you a ride.

name: Penny
line: We did it.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, I'm so glad you guys could watch.

name: Howard
line: We'll say it was beautiful in the comment section.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no. Hang on. I believe I'm supposed to carry you across the threshold.

name: Penny
line: Can you?

name: Leonard
line: Who do you think carries Sheldon to bed when he falls asleep in front of the TV?

name: Penny
line: Okay, let's do it. You gonna make it?

name: Leonard
line: I'm okay.

name: Penny
line: Nicely done.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you. Finally, there's a Mrs. Hofstadter who isn't disappointed in me.

name: Penny
line: Well, the night is still young.

name: Leonard
line: Everything all right?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. I guess.

name: Leonard
line: Just tell me.

name: Penny
line: It's just, when we were kissing, I couldn't help but picture you with that other girl.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no. No, come on. I have a friend in you. You said so.

name: Penny
line: You're right. Just forget it.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Okay, listen. If you're imagining that it was sexy, it wasn't. We, we were both drunk, and she smelled like an ashtray. The boat was moving a lot, so I chipped her tooth.

name: Penny
line: Did you feel guilty?

name: Leonard
line: No, she had dental insurance.

name: Penny
line: Did you feel guilty after kissing her?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. I felt guilty as soon as it happened. I feel guilty every time I see her.

name: Penny
line: What do you mean, every time you see her?

name: Leonard
line: What do I mean? Boy, that's a toughie.

name: Penny
line: You still see her?

name: Leonard
line: Well, no, not socially. But, you know, just at work.

name: Penny
line: You work with her? How could you not tell me that?

name: Leonard
line: I wanted to tell you in the car, but you told me to stop talking

name: Penny
line: Oh, okay. So you're saying this is my fault?

name: Leonard
line: No, of course not. Okay, look, instead of fighting, why don't we dim the lights, um, get naked and make a baby? I was trying to lighten the mood. It's not easy. You try it.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, Mother.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Shelly! How's my baby doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I just wanted to let you know that you can remove Amy from your nightly prayers. Unless you're open to praying for a beehive to fall on her head.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, what's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: She broke up with me.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Oh, Shelly.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I'll be okay. But I think that I'd like to send the ring back to you.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, let's not be hasty. Are you sure it's over for good?

name: Sheldon
line: It's over for me. I'm done with women. Like when I swore off Pop Rocks. They both hurt you on purpose.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: You want to tell me what happened?

name: Sheldon
line: Are you going to say it's all part of God's plan?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Good chance.

name: Sheldon
line: Then no, thank you.

name: Mrs Cooper
line: Well, honey, don't send it back yet. Your sister's married, and I'm not letting your brother give my grandmother's ring to that whore he's dating.

name: Sheldon
line: Wasn't Mary Magdalene a woman of ill repute?

name: Mrs Cooper
line: When your idiot brother redeems mankind, he can date whoever he wants.

name: Bernadette
line: I know it hurts now, but it's gonna get better.

name: Amy
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Everything's gonna be okay.

name: Stuart
line: You've got so much to offer.

name: Amy
line: Thank you.

name: Stuart
line: Any man would be lucky to have you.

name: Bernadette
line: That's true.

name: Amy
line: I just hope I did the right thing.

name: Stuart
line: I'm sure you did. Maybe that's the problem, you always do the right thing. Maybe it's time to do the wrong thing.

name: Amy
line: Like you're doing right now?

name: Stuart
line: Exactly.

name: Leonard
line: I asked you over and over if you were okay. Why would you go through with the wedding if you weren't?

name: Penny
line: I thought I was okay, but it turns out I'm not.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, listen, I may not have been entirely faithful, but you, you are not easy to lift.

name: Sheldon
line: Wow. Well, marriage must agree with you. Well, you are just glowing.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not glowing. I'm upset.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, whatever it is, it agrees with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Knock, knock, knock, Penny? Knock, knock, knock, Penny? Knock, knock, knock, Penny?

name: Penny
line: What's this?

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard told me what happened, so I took it upon myself to make you a hot beverage.

name: Penny
line: Oh. That's so sweet of you.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. I know. Turns out, being sweet isn't enough to keep a girl these days. I blame Madonna.

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry to hear about you and Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm sorry about Leonard. Thought I raised him better than that.

name: Penny
line: You know, it's bad enough what happened, but then he tried to hide the fact that he sees her all the time at the university.

name: Sheldon
line: He does? Who is it?

name: Penny
line: Some girl named Mandy.

name: Sheldon
line: Mandy Chao?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you don't need to worry about her. She's brilliant and attractive. She can do way better

name: Penny
line: That's great.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait a minute. I know this may sound far fetched, but I'm on the market now. You know, if I dated Mandy, that would teach both Leonard and Amy a lesson.

name: Penny
line: That's ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you're right. I could never be with a woman whose self-esteem was so low she'd be with Leonard.

name: Penny
line: I'm with Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I know. Forever. Who would have believed these things would happen to us?

name: Penny
line: Right? I can't believe Amy actually went through with it.

name: Sheldon
line: Hang on. You knew that she was going to end it with me? Did you try and stop her?

name: Penny
line: I told her to be true to herself and do what makes her happy.

name: Sheldon
line: Do what makes her happy? She plays the harp and her car is paid for. How much happier can she be?

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, it's not my fault that she thought you were a bad boyfriend.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. Well, I think I'll be going.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, no. We are done here. Would you mind opening the door and then angrily slamming it behind me?

name: Penny
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. And slam it hard, because I am pretty steamed.

name: Howard
line: All right, Leonard, hang in there. Talk to you tomorrow.

name: Bernadette
line: What happened? They just got married.

name: Howard
line: I don't know. It's a mess. They had a huge fight in Vegas.

name: Bernadette
line: Think they'll break up?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. Sounds pretty bad. Penny's back in her apartment all by herself.

name: Stuart
line: Really?

name: Sheldon
line: Would you like to hear another reason why men are better than women?

name: Leonard
line: Sure, let's make it an even hundred.

name: Sheldon
line: You would never kiss me and make me say I love you and then break up with me.

name: Leonard
line: I wouldn't.

name: Sheldon
line: And you know why? ‘Cause you're a man. The champagne of genders.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I may be a man, but I think I'm the one that screwed up on this one.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, and you admit it, like a man. All you hear women say is, I'll just have a salad. You know? Where's my lip gloss? I think this element should be called radium. That last one was Madame Curie.

name: Leonard
line: I figured that out.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what? She was kind of an honorary man. She had a penis made of science.

name: Leonard
line: Can't believe I'm spending my wedding night with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? I never imagined it any other way.

name: Leonard
line: Since when do you hum songs?

name: Sheldon
line: What are you talking about?

name: Leonard
line: You were just humming.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure? Sometimes when my brain really gets moving, it makes noise.

name: Leonard
line: How does your brain feel about calculating the surface tension of the domain walls?

name: Sheldon
line: Let's see. Hey, I was humming. One point for Hufflepuff. What song is that?

name: Leonard
line: Well, hum it again. Is that the SpongeBob song?

name: Sheldon
line: Who lives in a pineapple. Nope.

name: Leonard
line: Whatever. Can we just get back to this?

name: Sheldon
line: I feel like I know what song that is, but I can't put my finger on it.  My country, 'tis of thee. No.

name: Leonard
line: It's just an earworm. It'll come to you.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay.  R-E-S-P-E-C-T. No.

name: Leonard
line: Is this what we're doing the rest of the night?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm surprised you have to ask.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, yes, I was hoping you could help me. What song is this? La, la, la, la, la, la, la. You don't know? Well, how dare you call yourselves a Rock and Roll Hall of Fame? My goodness. Do you sing along to the greatest hits of Elvis Presley with that mouth? Well, they were no help at all.

name: Leonard
line: Which is crazy, since rock and roll is all about good customer service.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. So you have a song stuck in your head. It happens to everybody.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm not everybody. I have an eidetic memory. I should be able to remember what song this is, but I can't. Something's wrong with me.

name: Penny
line: I told you if we were patient, he'd figure it out for himself.

name: Sheldon
line: I was always afraid this day would come. This might be the first step of my descent into madness, where I gradually test the limits of public nudity.

name: Penny
line: Public nudity?

name: Leonard
line: Eh, that just means going barefoot.

name: Dave
line: Hello?

name: Amy
line: Hi, Dave. Uh, it's Amy.

name: Dave
line: Oh. How are you?

name: Amy
line: I'm fine. How are you?

name: Dave
