line: Terrific. And pleasantly surprised to hear from you, given how I acted on our last date.

name: Amy
line: Yeah, well, we both made mistakes, you know. I took the last breadstick, you gushed over my ex-boyfriend like he was Leonard Nimoy and you were my ex-boyfriend.

name: Dave
line: So, to what do I owe the pleasure?

name: Amy
line: Well, I was wondering if you'd like to get dinner again sometime.

name: Dave
line: Yes, please.

name: Amy
line: Great.

name: Dave
line: Let me just check my schedule, he said, trying to seem like a man with things on his schedule.

name: Amy
line: How 'bout Saturday?

name: Dave
line: Uh, hmm, let me see. Uh, Friday, farmers' market with Jay Z. Sunday, piano shopping with Elton John. Saturday works.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Did you know, at the United Nations, there's a Department for Outer Space Affairs?

name: Howard
line: Really? Why?

name: Raj
line: They exist in case we ever make contact with an alien civilization.

name: Howard
line: Mm, boy, that's one of those jobs that's boring, boring, boring, then, oh, God, where's the memo with what we do now?

name: Raj
line: Oh, this is cool. So, a few weeks ago I set up a fan page on Facebook for our band and...

name: Howard
line: Wait a second. How could you do that without consulting me?

name: Raj
line: It's not a big deal. It just took, like, five minutes to set up.

name: Howard
line: That's not the point. When we created Footprints on the Moon, we agreed that every band decision would be mutual. Now you're just trying to take over the whole thing. You know, maybe I should go solo.

name: Raj
line: But someone joined our page. We have an actual fan.

name: Howard
line: All right. This thing's bigger than you and me, band's back together.

name: Raj
line: So, listen to what he wrote. Uh, I saw you play at the comic book store. You guys rock. And then there's an animated smiley face raising the roof like this.

name: Howard
line: We did raise the roof that night.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, we totally did.

name: Howard
line: Why do rock stars do drugs when this feels so great?

name: Sheldon
line: Why can't I recall this song? This is taking far too long. The urge to bang my head against the wall again and again and again and again and again is strong.

name: Leonard
line: Put on some headphones.

name: Sheldon
line: No they make my earlobes sweat.

name: Penny
line: Hey, sweetie, why don't you take a break and do something else for a while?

name: Sheldon
line: There was a project I've been thinking about starting.

name: Penny
line: Okay, great. What is it?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll show you.  Dear Crazy Future Sheldon, you were driven mad by an earworm. Your mind, once your most trusted asset, is now a sack of parrots and monkeys. So, I'm going to tell you everything you need to know. Uh, first, music is dangerous. The movie Footloose tried to warn us, but we wouldn't listen. Oh, wait.  Everyody cut footloose. Nope.

name: Penny
line: I'll pay a thousand dollars to watch you cut footloose.

name: Sheldon
line: This is Penny. She is your friend. If she offers you food, it's safe to take it. You probably paid for it, anyway.

name: Bernadette
line: So, you're really going out with Dave again?

name: Amy
line: Why not? He's actually a very nice guy.

name: Bernadette
line: But he spent an entire date talking about how much he loves Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: That's nothing Sheldon hasn't done before. Dave's just a big fan of his work. Besides, he said he wouldn't bring it up again.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay. So where's he taking you?

name: Amy
line: Oh, he's coming here. I'm actually making dinner.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. That's a big step.

name: Amy
line: It is?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. You're inviting him into your home. It's intimate. It's where your underpants live.

name: Amy
line: You know what? Good. I tried to get back together with Sheldon, he shot me down. Dave likes me. Maybe intimate is what I need.

name: Bernadette
line: You sure? You've never really been with a man. Do you really want to start with one that's six-foot-seven?

name: Amy
line: Why not?

name: Bernadette
line: ‘Cause it's like taking your driver's test in a bus.

name: Raj
line: Maybe we should post a comment back to our fan and thank him.

name: Howard
line: What should we write?

name: Raj
line: How about, uh, oh, how about, we might be Footprints on the Moon, but your kind words sent us over the moon.

name: Howard
line: Someday you're gonna make an amazing grandma.

name: Raj
line: Well what do you want to write?

name: Howard
line: Something badass, you know, like, thanks for diggin' our vibe. We'll keep rockin' if you keep rollin'.

name: Raj
line: Dude, if I was wearing a bra, I'd throw it at your head right now.

name: Howard
line: I'll keep rockin'. You don't do that.

name: Raj
line: Okay. I posted it.

name: Howard
line: So, who is this guy?

name: Raj
line: Let's see. Uh, his name is Trent Monaco.

name: Howard
line: Cool name.

name: Raj
line: Yeah. He's 24. He's a deejay. He brews his own beer. He's got awesome tattoos. Dude, he's got a hot girlfriend, too.

name: Howard
line: Damn. I don't know if he's our biggest fan or I'm his. Hey, Trent just liked our comment.

name: Raj
line: He is so cool. Hey, no hard feelings, but I'm throwing my hypothetical bra at him.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, he won't stop.

name: Leonard
line: How does he keep coming up with new ways to be annoying?

name: Penny
line: Nobody knows. That's why he's number one. Can you please go talk to him?

name: Leonard
line: Come on. I take care of him all day long. You do it for once.

name: Penny
line: Once? Who got the gum out of his hair?

name: Leonard
line: What do you want, a medal? It was your gum.

name: Penny
line: Fine.

name: Leonard
line: I love you.

name: Penny
line: Who cares?

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing in my room? Stop it. That's mine. Why are you so strong?

name: Penny
line: Problem solved.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah, he got a tuba.

name: Sheldon
line: Dear Crazy Future Sheldon, this is a thermostat. It controls the temperature of the apartment. The ideal setting is 72 degrees. If you find this too cold, then put on a jacket. A straitjacket, 'cause 72's the best and you're crazy. Now, this is your spot. You're very protective of it. When anyone else tries to sit here, you berate them relentlessly. It sounds mean, but somehow you make it adorable. People are also delighted by your love of pranks. For example, Leonard has no idea what I did to his coffee. It wasn't replace it with Folger's crystals, I'll tell you that much.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, can we please get back to work?

name: Sheldon
line: This is Leonard. He's your best friend in the world.

name: Leonard
line: All right, just stop. This is ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: Sometimes he gets cranky, but you can trust him with your life. And he does more things for you than I can even begin to list.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, he's drinking it.

name: Howard
line: Look at this. Trent is rebuilding a vintage motorcycle.

name: Raj
line: That is so cool. Old broken things are so much better than new things that work.

name: Bernadette
line: Who's Trent?

name: Howard
line: Oh, he's our fan.

name: Bernadette
line: Fan of what?

name: Howard
line: Uh, did you forget? We're in a band.

name: Bernadette
line: You mean because you played one time in the comic book store?

name: Howard
line: And at the children's hospital until they asked us to leave.

name: Raj
line: Hey, dude, Trent just checked in at the coffee shop on Fair Oaks.

name: Howard
line: Really? You want to go down there and meet him?

name: Bernadette
line: Are you stalking him? That's creepy.

name: Raj
line: It's not creepy. I built a Footprints on the Moon fan page, Trent joined it.

name: Howard
line: After that, all I did was check out his profile, go back in the archive of his feed until I found his Twitter handle.

name: Raj
line: From there, it was easy to find him on Instagram, Snapchat and pretty much track his every movement.

name: Howard
line: So if you think that's creepy, you married the wrong guy.

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe I should marry Trent.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, like she could get Trent.

name: Dave
line: This is delicious.

name: Amy
line: Thank you.

name: Dave
line: Been a long time since I had a home-cooked meal.

name: Amy
line: When you were married, did your wife cook?

name: Dave
line: Not at first, no. But when she began cheating on me with a French chef, she became quite the wiz in the kitchen.

name: Amy
line: So, a little silver lining.

name: Dave
line: I suppose. Yeah. Nothing takes the sting out of a shattered life like a properly-seasoned bowl of onion soup. How long have you, uh, lived here?

name: Amy
line: Uh, about five years. I'm actually thinking of moving to a better place now that I don't need to be so close to, well, you know.

name: Dave
line: I do. The brilliant physicist that I now know lives in the area, not that I care.

name: Amy
line: Yeah. Anyway, he doesn't drive, so, I pretty much had to take him everywhere.

name: Dave
line: Had to or got to? Sorry.

name: Amy
line: My fault. I brought him up.

name: Dave
line: Yeah. Well, let's change the subject. No more mentions of you-know-who. That's a cool train. Where did you get that?

name: Sheldon
line: Bah, bam, bum-bum, bah, bum, bum. This song is never going to stop. Have you ever dealt with something so relentlessly irritating?

name: Leonard
line: That's a trick question, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I shouldn't be surprised. There's a rich history of brilliant minds descending into madness.

name: Penny
line: Come on, Sheldon. There are plenty of smart people who don't have mental problems.

name: Leonard
line: Yup, she's right. For every Newton who had a psychological issue, there's an Edison who was just a jerk. That could totally be you.

name: Sheldon
line: Empedocles thought he was a god and jumped into a volcano. And Pythagoras had an irrational fear of beans. Tesla fell madly in love with a pigeon who he claimed loved him back.

name: Penny
line: Maybe he just had bread in his pocket.

name: Sheldon
line: The list extends outside of science. Painters like Van Gogh and Pollock, chess champion Bobby Fischer, Brian Wilson of the Beach Boys.  I remember the song. It's called Darlin' by the Beach Boys. Oh, thank goodness. I'm not crazy. I don't have to take a pigeon as my bride.

name: Leonard
line: There goes our shot at him living on the roof.

name: Raj
line: So, all right, there he is. So, should we introduce ourselves?

name: Howard
line: No. Let him spot us.

name: Raj
line: I wonder if he's listening to our music right now.

name: Howard
line: Could you imagine? What a cool way for us to meet. He's playing our song and looks up, and there we are, his favorite two-piece acoustic sci-fi novelty rock band.

name: Raj
line: And he's, all, like, aren't you the guys from Footprints on the Moo-oo-ooh what is he doing?!

name: Howard
line: I can't watch.

name: Raj
line: It's okay. Oh, it's okay. He's done.

name: Howard
line: Why is he looking at it?

name: Raj
line: Eh, no, he's not going to eat it, is he?

name: Howard
line: Come on, Trent, you're better than th-ah.

name: Raj
line: Ooh!

name: Howard
line: Let's just go.

name: Trent
line: Hey, aren't you the guys?

name: Howard
line: Nope.

name: Raj
line: No, never heard of 'em!

name: Sheldon
line: I wonder why it was this particular song that was stuck in my head.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. It's pretty catchy.

name: Penny
line: Do you even like the Beach Boys?

name: Sheldon
line: They have beach right in the name. What do you think?

name: Leonard
line: Well, now that you can focus again, what do you say we get back to surface tension of domain walls?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. I'm already seeing a more efficient way of taming the ultravi... I know why the song was in my head.

name: Penny
line: Why?

name: Sheldon
line: It's about Amy.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, I know Amy's like an old lady, but she's not old enough to have a song from the sixties written about her.

name: Sheldon
line: It's about how she made my life better. Consider the lyrics. I was living like half a man. Then I couldn't love, but now I can. More soul than I ever had. I love the way you soften my life.”

name: Penny
line: She did soften your life, didn't she?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. She's like the dryer sheets of my heart. I have to go.

name: Leonard
line: Aw. Am I like the dryer sheets of your heart?

name: Penny
line: Better. You're the lint trap of my love.

name: Leonard
line: Aw.

name: Amy
line: That's an interesting tie clip.

name: Dave
line: Oh, thanks. It's, uh, Avogadro's constant. It's useful for calculating the number of atoms in a substance, or causing regret in anyone who asks about it.

name: Amy
line: No, I, I think it's neat. Oh.

name: Dave
line: Sorry. Sorry. No one's ever liked the tie clip before, so I just lost all control.

name: Amy
line: No, it, it's okay, and we are on a date. I'm, I'm just a little nervous.

name: Dave
line: Well, no need to be nervous with me. I'm just a harmless giant from a foreign land.

name: Amy
line: You know, I'm just being silly. I, I don't know what I'm waiting for.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy?  Amy?  Amy?

name: Amy
line: That's Sheldon.

name: Dave
line: You're kidding. How's my hair?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, this, this isn't a good time.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't care. Amy, there was a song I couldn't get out of my head. Eventually, I realized the song was about you, and like that earworm, I can't get you out of my heart. So, what I'm trying to say is, you're my heartworm. The metaphorical kind, not, not the poodle-killing kind.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Dave
line: If I may, I believe what he's saying, in a charming and delightful way, is that he loves you and wants you back. Dave Gibbs, huge fan of your work. Don't mind me.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm, I'm sorry; I didn't realize you were on a date.

name: Amy
line: No, it, it, it's okay. Keep going?

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, if you want to be my girlfriend again, I really want to be your boyfriend.

name: Amy
line: I really want that, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Because I love you.

name: Amy
line: I love you, too.

name: Dave
line: Kiss her, you brilliant fool.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'll let you get back to your date.

name: Amy
line: Get back here.

name: Dave
line: Okay, then. I'll, uh, see myself out. Amy, thank you for dinner. Dr. Cooper, pleasure to meet you, sir. Uh, if perhaps sometime you have a spare moment, I'd, uh, love to discuss physics, or shoot the breeze, as you Yanks say. Ah. What a lovely evening.

name: Caption
line: A short time ago in an apartment in Pasadena....

name: Caption
line: THE BIG BANG THEORY

name: Caption
line: EPISODE 194

name: Caption
line: THE OPENING NIGHT EXCITATION

name: Caption
line: It is a period of great tension. Our heroes, Leonard, Sheldon, Wolowitz and Koothrappali know that tickets to the new Star Wars movie are about to be available for pre-sale.

name: Caption
line: If they fail in their mission and can't see it on opening night Sheldon has sworn that they will never hear the end of it for the rest of their lives...

name: Caption
line: They believe him.

name: Leonard
line: Guys, tickets already went on sale.

name: Sheldon
line: What?

name: Howard
line: They're not supposed to be available yet.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know what to tell you, but they're on sale.

name: Raj
line: Wait. You're sure they're Star Wars tickets?

name: Sheldon
line: The Web site's frozen. I can't get in.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, me, too.

name: Howard
line: Same here!

name: Raj
line: Guys, they're gonna sell out.

name: Howard
line: What are we gonna do?!

name: Sheldon
line: All right, this goes against everything I stand for, but desperate times call for desperate measures. Lord, this is Sheldon Cooper. You're good friends with my mom. I know I've spent my life denying that you exist.

name: Howard
line: Got 'em.

name: Sheldon
line: And I will continue to do so!

name: Penny
line: I'm really happy you and Amy are back together.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, thank you.

name: Leonard
line: I'm also really happy, but I can't pretend it's for you. New Star Wars in three days.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, Thursday can't get here soon enough. I'm taking off work to watch the original trilogy while I eat enough Star Wars cereal to choke a Wookiee.

name: Penny
line: Uh, sweetie, you do realize Thursday is Amy's birthday.

name: Sheldon
line: And you do realize I bought my ticket when Amy and I were broken up? I hope you didn't need anything in that case, 'cause it's closed.

name: Penny
line: You guys just got back together. You might not want to ditch her on her birthday.

name: Leonard
line: I think Penny has a point. You can see it another day.

name: Sheldon
line: But someone might spoil the movie. No one can spoil Amy's birthday for me. Surprise, she's even older. Who saw that coming?

name: Penny
line: Aw, that's nice. Put that on her cake.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, great. This again.

name: Sheldon
line: Arthur, what brings you back?

name: Arthur
line: Uh, beats me. I, I just hope this isn't a, a sex dream.

name: Sheldon
line: In the past, you've come to me when I'm struggling with a dilemma.

name: Arthur
line: And, and the one time where, where you were afraid, and you needed me for, for a night light. What's, what's troubling you?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my friends are telling me I shouldn't abandon my girlfriend on her birthday to see the new Star Wars movie.

name: Arthur
line: Well, sounds right. Can, can I get out of this muumuu now?

name: Sheldon
line: Those are the robes of the Jedi, the guardians of peace and justice in the galaxy.

name: Arthur
line: And they, they, they don't wear underwear.

name: Sheldon
line: So, you agree with my friends that I should skip the premiere?

name: Arthur
line: Uh, do, do you love this girl?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. But she knows how important Star Wars is to me.

name: Arthur
line: Well, maybe you should show her how, how important she is to you.

name: Sheldon
line: By seeing the movie she'd want me to see?

name: Arthur
line: Sheldon, you, you can see this movie whenever you want. But you only have a limited number of days that you, you can be with this woman. Be with her.

name: Sheldon
line: You're right.

name: Arthur
line: Great.

name: Sheldon
line: Where are you going?

name: Arthur
line: I don't know, but hopefully, somewhere I can wear pants.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, what's wrong?

name: Sheldon
line: I wanted to let you know I'll be spending your birthday with you.

name: Amy
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: See, I, I had tickets to the Star Wars premiere that night, but Professor Proton came to me in a dream dressed as Obi-Wan Kenobi and convinced me I should be with you.

name: Amy
line: Obi-what?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll, I'll let you get back to sleep now. Good night.

name: Amy
line: Okay. Good night. Wait. Um, Sheldon, were you actually not gonna spend my birthday with me?

name: Sheldon
line: It's late. Got to go. Bye.

name: Raj
line: Good for Sheldon deciding to stay with Amy on her birthday.

name: Leonard
line: I know. It's still gonna be weird to see the movie without him.

name: Howard
line: Well, we could wait a couple days and see it together.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Hey. We're going to the comic book store. You want to come?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I can't. I need to make preparations for Amy's birthday. Which leads me to the following bit of business. This is my ticket to Star Wars. I don't have to tell you it is worth far more than its face value of fifteen dollars and fifty cents. I trust you'll give it to someone worthy.

name: Leonard
line: You got it. Well, Penny might want to join us.

name: Sheldon
line: This is my ticket to Star Wars....

name: Sheldon
line: Penny.  Penny.  Penny.

name: Bernadette
line: What happens if I say, come in?

name: Penny
line: Well, find out.

name: Bernadette
line: Come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Bernadette.  Bernadette.  Bernadette.

name: Penny
line: Come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Keep it up. I got nowhere else to be.

name: Bernadette
line: Just come in.

name: Sheldon
line: For future reference, if I want to watch Mean Girls, I'll stream it on Netflix.

name: Penny
line: We're sorry. What do you need?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, as you know, I'll be celebrating Amy's birthday with her, and I could use your assistance in helping me select the perfect gift.

name: Bernadette
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, so far, I've come up with three ideas. The first is a chance for her to play the harp with the L.A. Philharmonic.

name: Penny
line: Wow. You can really arrange that?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I said a chance, you know. When you tell them it's your birthday at Bennigan's, they make a fuss. I don't see why the Philharmonic would be any different.

name: Bernadette
line: How about something a little more realistic?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Amy enjoys knitting her own sweaters, so I was thinking of getting her an all-expense-paid trip to the Wisconsin Sheep and Wool Festival.

name: Penny
line: Sorry. I was waiting for the bazinga.

name: Bernadette
line: Hold on. It could be romantic. The two of them away together, keeping each other warm in snowy Wisconsin.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, no. She'd be going alone. Well, if you think I'm afraid of birds, you should see me around sheep.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, what's the third option?

name: Sheldon
line: That I have coitus with her.

name: Leonard
line: What do you think about giving Sheldon's ticket to Stuart?

name: Raj
line: I don't know. Have you ever seen a movie with Stuart before?

name: Howard
line: It's like going with your grandpa. Instead of eating popcorn, he brings little pieces of chicken in Tupperware and a thermos full of soup.

name: Leonard
line: He's not that bad. Hey, Stuart, got any plans Thursday night?

name: Stuart
line: My, uh, my doctor's worried about my circulation, so I was thinking about walking around the mall. Why?

name: Leonard
line: Well...

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Hey, you guys.

name: Howard
line: Oh, make sure to wear sensible shoes. Wil, want to go to Star Wars Thursday?

name: Wil
line: Absolutely.

name: Stuart
line: Fine, take Wil. See if he brings you clam chowder.

name: Penny
line: Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay. Let's, let's, let's just recap our options. All right, we've got harp thing, sheep thing.

name: Bernadette
line: Wild thang.

name: Sheldon
line: Which do you think she'd prefer? Because I checked the Sheep and Wool Festival Web site, and there's only 8,000 tickets left.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, being physical with Amy is a huge step for you.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, are you ready for this?

name: Sheldon
line: Intimacy in any form has been challenging for me, but I'd like to show her how important she is, and it feels like now might be the right time.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, that's so beautiful.

name: Sheldon
line: Then it's settled. Amy's birthday present will be my genitals.

name: Amy
line: Thanks for taking me out.

name: Penny
line: Well, you're spending your birthday with Sheldon. Why not celebrate early?

name: Bernadette
line: So where do you want to go?

name: Amy
line: I heard that new Mexican place on Green Street is good.

name: Penny
line: Sure, sure. Or we could take you to get a bikini wax.

name: Amy
line: Why would I get a bikini wax for my birthday?

name: Penny
line: Uh, I don't know. It was just a thought.

name: Amy
line: I think I'll just stick to Mexican.

name: Bernadette
line: Great. And then maybe after, we can watch a dirty movie, and if anybody has any questions about what happened or how, we can answer them.

name: Amy
line: Okay, what is going on?

name: Penny
line: Oh, we just want you to be prepared for any surprises that might happen tomorrow.

name: Amy
line: What surprises?

name: Bernadette
line: We don't want to spoil anything, but you should know that Sheldon said he's ready to be physical.

name: Amy
line: You shut your damn mouth. You actually heard him say this?

name: Penny
line: Yes. He said he wants to do something to show you how much you mean to him.

name: Amy
line: I, I can't believe it. I, I don't know what to say.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, we're really happy for you, and we know how much he cares...

name: Amy
line: I do know what to say. Let's get me waxed.

name: Arthur
line: Why isn't it ever Angie Dickinson's bedroom?

name: Sheldon
line: You're back.

name: Arthur
line: It, it doesn't seem like it's up to me.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose you're here because I've decided to be physical with my girlfriend, and I've never done that before.

name: Arthur
line: Eh, excuse me for a moment. Well, it was worth a shot.

name: Sheldon
line: So, can you help me?

name: Arthur
line: Uh, all right. Um, once, once the man gets the, the woman out of her, out of her bloomers...

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no. Not that. I, I understand the mechanics.

name: Arthur
line: Oh, good, good. ‘Cause, uh, I have no idea what kids these days are calling their, their parts.

name: Sheldon
line: I think they say junk.

name: Arthur
line: What is happening to this world? What, what do you actually need to know?

name: Sheldon
line: This is an important night for us, and I'm worried I might be overwhelmed and ruin everything.

name: Arthur
line: Sheldon, if, if you're with the right person, it, it'll be okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you, Arthur. You are the wisest of the wise.

name: Arthur
line: Well, that's, that's very nice of you to say, but I think I'm just an expression of, of your unconscious mind.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, sure. Well, you're fun to look at.

name: Raj
line: Tonight's the night.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, the wait is finally over.

name: Penny
line: I know. Then you'll finally stop talking about it.

name: Howard
line: Ready to go?

name: Raj
line: Let's do this.

name: Penny
line: Have fun, guys.

name: Leonard
line: We will.

name: Raj
line: I can't believe Sheldon gave this up.

name: Howard
line: I know.

name: Leonard
line: We're gonna have so much more fun than him.

name: Bernadette
line: No, they're not.

name: Penny
line: Knowing them, they will.

name: Howard
line: T minus 15 minutes.

name: Raj
line: Oh, did you hear from Wil?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, he's on his way. Time for bladder check.

name: Raj
line: Check.

name: Leonard
line: Check.

name: Howard
line: Check. Wait. Screw it. I'm holding it.

name: Raj
line: What is everyone booing at?

name: Wil
line: Hey, guys. What's up?

name: Leonard
line: Um, hey, Wil. What you doin'?

name: Wil
line: I was on Star Trek. Just rooting for the home team.

name: Man
line: Star Trek stinks!

name: Wil
line: Yeah? Live long and suck it.

name: Sheldon
line: Birthday girl.  Birthday girl.  Birthday girl.

name: Amy
line: Come in.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh.

name: Amy
line: Hi, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello. Sorry I'm late. I also got you a balloon, but it floated away, and I chased it for a while.

name: Amy
line: That's okay. Come on in. Thank you. Um, I'll, I'm gonna go put these in water.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Ooh, this is different, hmm? Candles and music.

name: Amy
line: Do you like it?

name: Sheldon
line: It's kind of spooky.

name: Amy
line: I can change it back.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no. It's your birthday. As long as no one jumps out in a hockey mask, I'll be fine.

name: Amy
line: So, what'd you have in mind for tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: I thought I could take you out to a nice birthday dinner. If we pick a place east of here, we might find the balloon.

name: Amy
line: Um, that sounds nice, but I'm not really hungry right now. I thought maybe we could do presents first.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. All right. Um. I should probably tell you something about this gift.

name: Amy
line: You mean before you give it to me?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. May I ask you a question before I give it to you?

name: Amy
line: Of course.

name: Sheldon
line: Why are we saying give it to you like that?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I know your present is for us to be intimate tonight.

name: Sheldon
line: I see. Is that all right? I'm sorry, but this is a litigious society. I'm gonna need verbal consent.

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what, let me pull a quick contract off the Internet.

name: Leonard
line: So, if you don't like Star Wars, why are you here?

name: Wil
line: Oh, I'm just having fun. Everyone takes Star Wars so seriously. Like if the movie's bad, it's gonna ruin their lives.

name: Raj
line: Is it bad? Did you hear something? Oh, my God. It's bad. Somebody kill me.

name: Wil
line: See? That's what I mean. When you wake up in the morning, whether this is the greatest movie ever or a total piece of crap, your life isn't gonna change at all.

name: Howard
line: He's right.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. No matter what happens, we're coming back tomorrow to watch it again.

name: Bernadette
line: Do you think Sheldon's actually gonna go through with it?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. He said he's ready.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, but he also swore this was the year he'd be able to pull the guts out of a pumpkin.

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm gonna stay positive. I mean, we talked, I told him what women like, and after he stopped giggling, he seemed pretty sure of himself.

name: Amy
line: Hi.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Amy
line: So, um, should I get under the covers with you?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Hello.

name: Amy
line: Hi.

name: Sheldon
line: Why are you shaking? Are you cold?

name: Amy
line: I'm just, um, really nervous.

name: Sheldon
line: Why?

name: Amy
line: Well, I've been waiting for this for so long, I've just built it up in my head. I don't know what to expect.

name: Sheldon
line: Neither do I. But we can find out together.

name: Amy
line: Okay.

name: Leonard
line: I'm really nervous.

name: Howard
line: I know. We've been waiting so long for this.

name: Raj
line: And we've built it up in our heads so much.

name: Wil
line: Guys, it's just a movie.

name: Leonard
line: That's true.

name: Howard
line: He's right.

name: Raj
line: It is.

name: Wil
line: Although, we all remember Jar Jar.

name: Raj
line: Leonard, I, I'm scared again.

name: Caption
line: A few hours later, in a bedroom not far away....

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I enjoyed that more than I thought I would.

name: Amy
line: Me, too.

name: Sheldon
line: I look forward to your next birthday when we do it again.

name: Amy
line: That works for me.

name: Wil
line: I enjoyed that more than I thought I would.

name: Raj
line: I don't think I can walk right now.

name: Arthur
line: Uh, Sheldon? Sheldon?

name: Sheldon
line: Arthur. What are you doing here? I, I don't think I need any more advice.

name: Arthur
line: I, I was just curious. How, how'd it go?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. It was amazing. I, I saw it a few days later. What a movie.

name: Arthur
line: But, uh, what, what about Amy?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Uh, uh, she liked it fine. But she doesn't have the history with the franchise I do.

name: Arthur
line: Okay. Good, good talk.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm glad to see you made it safely. How's your hotel?

name: Amy
line: It's not the best Best Western I've been to, but I'd say it's the third best Best Western I've been to.

name: Sheldon
line: I know how you feel. The Best Buy by my house is only the third best Best Buy. They have the best buys, but having the best buys isn't the only thing that makes a Best Buy the best Best Buy.

name: Amy
line: What makes a best Best Buy the best Best Buy?

name: Sheldon
line: Mm, that's a great question. I like when they're next to a Chipotle.

name: Amy
line: Okay, well, I should unpack.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Enjoy the neurobiology conference.

name: Amy
line: I will. I wish you were here.

name: Sheldon
line: At a neurobiology conference? What a mean thing to say.

name: Amy
line: Okay, I'm glad you're not here?

name: Sheldon
line: Aw, you always know just what to say after I tell you what to say.

name: Amy
line: Good-bye, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Bye. Oh, good news, gentlemen. Amy's at a conference this weekend, which means I'm available to be entertained, hmm. As today's youth might put it, who wants to get their Sheld-on?

name: Howard
line: Bernie and I are getting the house ready for the remodel. We could always use an extra pair of hands.

name: Sheldon
line: That sounds awful. Raj?

name: Raj
line: Uh, I've got time booked in the telescope room all weekend scanning for rogue planets. You're more than welcome to join me.

name: Sheldon
line: That's the one to beat. Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, if anything, I'm trying to get my Sheld-off.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then it looks like we have a winner. Congratulations.

name: Raj
line: Well, I should warn you, it's just looking at data for hours and hours on a computer screen.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, stop selling it, kid. You won.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Raj
line: Hello.

name: Howard
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: How was your day?

name: Penny
line: Oh, not good. Still couldn't get in to see Dr. Gallo.

name: Sheldon
line: A doctor? Well, I hope you're not contagious. I've got a weekend in the telescope room I've been excited about for almost three minutes.

name: Penny
line: I'm not sick. It's for work. There's this doctor who refuses to see any sales reps. I've been trying to get in for months.

name: Leonard
line: Well, did you try wearing the shirt I said was inappropriate for work?

name: Penny
line: Well, the doctor's a woman, but yes, because you never know.

name: Howard
line: What kind of doctor is she?

name: Penny
line: Um, a psychiatrist. Why?

name: Howard
line: Well, what if you make an appointment as a patient? Then you'll get to talk to her.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, they already know I'm a pharmaceutical sales rep.

name: Raj
line: Oh. What if Leonard made an appointment and tried to lay some groundwork for you?

name: Penny
line: That's interesting.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not gonna make a fake appointment with a psychiatrist. What would I say is wrong with me?

name: Raj
line: Low self-esteem.

name: Howard
line: Social anxiety.

name: Sheldon
line: Sexual insecurity.

name: Leonard
line: None of that is true.

name: Penny
line: Uh, denial. See, sweetie, the list goes on and on.

name: Leonard
line: That's just crazy. How would my going in there even help you?

name: Penny
line: I don't know. You could talk to her, and maybe if it comes up, you could ask if she's heard about the drug.

name: Leonard
line: What if I get caught?

name: Howard
line: Fear of failure.

name: Raj
line: Lack of confidence.

name: Sheldon
line: Kind of a wuss.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, I'll do it. But not because of them, because I love you.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Raj
line: Pushover.

name: Howard
line: Spineless.

name: Sheldon
line: Still hasn't bought milk even though I told him two days ago.

name: Howard
line: That was incredible.

name: Bernadette
line: It was. I just wish Stuart wasn't around so we didn't have to be so quiet.

name: Howard
line: I know. It's not like he returns the favour when he watches his Japanese porn cartoons.

name: Stuart
line: You guys got a minute, or are you still cuddling?

name: Howard
line: What is it, Stuart?

name: Stuart
line: Can I come in?

name: Howard
line: Hang on. Should I send him away?

name: Bernadette
line: No, it's okay.

name: Stuart
line: Thanks, Bernie.

name: Howard
line: What's up?

name: Stuart
line: Uh, well, I know the remodel is coming up, so I thought I'd make it easy on you guys and find my own place.

name: Howard
line: Wow. I thought I was done getting lucky tonight.

name: Bernadette
line: So, when are you thinking of moving?

name: Stuart
line: Uh, actually, I already found an apartment, so in a couple of days.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. Okay. Sorry to see you go?

name: Stuart
line: Okay, well, thank you guys for everything. I, I really appreciate it.

name: Stuart
line: Hmm.

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Stuart
line: Hmm, I just have never been in this room while you're awake.

name: Sheldon
line: What are you doing?

name: Raj
line: Uh, making sure the telescope's camera is white-field balanced.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm. What are you doing now?

name: Raj
line: Still making sure the telescope's camera is white-field balanced.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I see. How about now?

name: Raj
line: Now I'm making sure the telescope's camera is white-field balanced and wishing you had a colouring book.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I can be helpful. Give me something to do. You know, my father took me to work once, and in ten minutes I figured out who'd been stealing from the cash register. It was my father. Yeah, Dad lost his job, but Mr. Hinckley gave me a Fudgsicle.

name: Raj
line: Fine, you want something to do? There's about six months of data on this hard drive. Why don't you go through it and see if you can spot any patterns or anomalies.

name: Sheldon
line: Yep, I'm on it. Hey, look at that, an Indian guy outsourcing a computer job to a white fella.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, okay, whatever it takes to keep you busy for a few hours.

name: Sheldon
line: Found one.

name: Raj
line: No, you didn't. There are millions of data points there.

name: Sheldon
line: But, look, an optical transient.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, maybe that is something. How did you find that?

name: Sheldon
line: It wasn't difficult. You know how when you see prime numbers, they appear red, but when they're twin primes, they're pink and smell like gasoline?

name: Raj
line: No.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I guess I'm a special boy. You know, sometimes when a boy is special, he gets a Fudgsicle. Which, by the way, tastes like the speed of light.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you for seeing me on such short notice.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Ah, it's my pleasure. I'm curious, are you related to Dr. Beverly Hofstadter?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, she's my mother. You know her?

name: Dr Gallo
line: No, not personally, but I have read all of her books.

name: Leonard
line: Well, then you know her better than I do.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Well, I'm not so sure about that. But I can tell you I do not agree with her theories on child rearing at all.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Any chance you find them cold, cruel and unsuitable for innocent little boys who just want to be happy?

name: Dr Gallo
line: Well, I didn't want to say it.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, say it. Sing it. Rent a plane, write it in the sky.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Sounds like you're holding on to quite a bit of anger towards her.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, I, I've worked through a lot of that stuff, I'm better now.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Mm. Good for you.

name: Leonard
line: Do you know she never let me celebrate my birthday because being born was her achievement, not mine?

name: Dr Gallo
line: That's heartbreaking.

name: Leonard
line: Right? To this day, I send her a card every year with a little money in it.

name: Howard
line: You know, once we get the house back to ourselves, we can be romantic in any room we want.

name: Bernadette
line: Great. I can finally show you where the laundry room is.

name: Stuart
line: Boy, who would've thought when you asked me to move in and help take care of your mom, I'd still be here two years later?

name: Howard
line: No one.

name: Bernadette
line: Nobody thought that.

name: Stuart
line: Well, that's it.

name: Bernadette
line: I guess so.

name: Stuart
line: This is weird.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. A grown man moving into his own apartment. Crazy times. See ya.

name: Bernadette
line: Ignore him. He's just using humour to express how happy he is.

name: Stuart
line: It's okay. I know he loves me.

name: Bernadette
line: Sure he does. Well, let us know when you're all settled in.

name: Stuart
line: I will. And I really can't thank you guys enough.

name: Bernadette
line: Our pleasure.

name: Stuart
line: Bye.

name: Bernadette
line: Goodbye.

name: Howard
line: He's gone. Let's start in the garage.

name: Raj
line: Okay, so once we receive the next image and compare it to the ones we've already collected, we'll know what it is that we found.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, perhaps it's a Heliosheath scintillation.

name: Raj
line: It could be a trans-Neptunian object.

name: Sheldon
line: Maybe it's a new planet.

name: Raj
line: Unlikely, but it could be a dwarf planet.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, as long as it has a healthy gravity and all its moons, I'll be happy.

name: Raj
line: Okay, the final image is coming in. And the object we discovered is...

name: Sheldon
line: Come on, Daddy needs a livable planet he can rule with an iron fist.

name: Raj
line: A medium-sized asteroid.

name: Sheldon
line: That's it? How common. That's the chicken fingers on the menu of space.

name: Raj
line: I kind of like chicken fingers.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, me, too. I was stuck for a metaphor.

name: Raj
line: Come on, a medium-sized asteroid is still an interesting discovery.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose it could end up on a collision course with Earth and destroy life as we know it.

name: Raj
line: You dream different than me.

name: Sheldon
line: It is kind of cute.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, it is. And you know we get to name it.

name: Sheldon
line: We better choose a name no one can make fun of. Sir Frederick William Herschel didn't do Uranus any favours.

name: Leonard
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Hey, how'd it go?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, great. Dr. Gallo is terrific. You know, I, I've always been insecure that no one cares about what I have to say, but she made me see...

name: Penny
line: Yeah, no one cares. Did you help me out or not?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, now, what I'm hearing is that you feel that I sometimes take too long to express myself, and you wish I'd be more succinct.

name: Penny
line: You're only hearing that because I cannot roll my eyes any louder.

name: Leonard
line: All right, well, after we talked about my issues with my mother, nothing too deep, just how she ruined my life, I told her about you and your drug. She said she'd be happy to meet you.

name: Penny
line: Really? Oh, you're the best husband ever.

name: Leonard
line: So you'll go to the Doctor Who convention with me next week?

name: Penny
line: I guess.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I actually did hear your eyes roll that time.

name: Bernadette
line: Boy, when was the last time Stuart cleaned this place?

name: Howard
line: No kidding. Oh, okay, I'm about to suck something up. What do you think this object sounds like?

name: Bernadette
line: Howie, I don't want to play Lego, Toenail or Pill anymore. So, what do you think we should do with this room?

name: Howard
line: Well, I was thinking a home theatre or a gaming room, you know, like a man cave.

name: Bernadette
line: Why can't it be a woman cave?

name: Howard
line: As long as it has a home theatre, a video game system and you're not allowed in it, you can call it whatever you want.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm being serious.

name: Howard
line: Well, what do you think we should do?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know, maybe a home office or, oh look. The teddy bear Stuart won the night we took him to the fair.

name: Howard
line: Oh. He was so excited.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. You know, no matter how hard they tried, they could not guess his age.

name: Howard
line: I'll give it to him next time I see him.

name: Bernadette
line: Have you heard from him since he left?

name: Howard
line: No. You'd think he would've called once he got settled in.

name: Bernadette
line: Hmm. Maybe he's busy.

name: Howard
line: Too busy to call? He wasn't too busy to binge-watch Hot in Cleveland with my Hulu password. What is happening? Are we missing him?

name: Bernadette
line: No, that's not what this feeling is. Is it?

name: Howard
line: Of course not. He drove us crazy. Like when you were gonna make that pie and Stuart ate all the blueberries.

name: Bernadette
line: And he tried to deny it, but his teeth were all purple.

name: Howard
line: That was pretty cute.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah. Ew, we are missing him!

name: Raj
line: So I was thinking, maybe we can come up with a name for the asteroid by combining our names.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a great idea. I've got it. We'll call it Cooper.

name: Raj
line: How is that both our names?

name: Sheldon
line: Koo from Koothrappali and per from Cooper.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, s-so it's, like, Kooper with a K?

name: Sheldon
line: Nah, you're right, that's dumb.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Leonard, great news. We discovered a medium-sized asteroid together.

name: Leonard
line: Wow, that's amazing. I'm in a pretty great mood today myself.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Guess we're gonna talk about you now.

name: Leonard
line: Well, we are, because Dr. Gallo made me realize that I'm a worthwhile person and that my feelings matter.

name: Raj
line: I learned that for free from a cat poster, but good for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay, back to me. I discovered an asteroid, and now I get to name it.

name: Raj
line: Wait, what happened to us?

name: Sheldon
line: Now, this isn't about us, this is about what's best for the asteroid.

name: Leonard
line: Well, what are you thinking of naming it?

name: Sheldon
line: I haven't settled on anything yet.

name: Raj
line: We haven't settled on anything yet.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, way to go, Cat Poster. You hang in there.

name: Leonard
line: You know what'd be nice? Name it after your girlfriends. Show them how much you care.

name: Raj
line: That is a great idea.

name: Sheldon
line: It's perfect. It appears romantic, but it's really just a rock in space that gets me out of Valentine's Day forever.

name: Raj
line: So, uh, what were you thinking? Combine their names?

name: Sheldon
line: I like it. Yeah, we'll take the A-M from Amy and, uh, the Y from Emily.

name: Raj
line: That's just Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Exactly. See how well we work together?

name: Penny
line: And in double-blind studies, Placinex proved extremely effective in treating all kinds of anxiety. Actually, funny story, the boys in the lab were worried about getting FDA approval for Placinex. They started taking it, stopped worrying.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Got it.

name: Penny
line: Uh, do you have any questions?

name: Dr Gallo
line: Just one.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm?

name: Dr Gallo
line: When you made your husband pretend to be a patient so you could get access to me, what were you thinking there?

name: Penny
line: I just meant a question about the drug.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Yeah, I know what you meant. Let's put that aside for a minute and talk about why you married Leonard.

name: Penny
line: I don't wanna.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Here is a man raised by an overbearing woman who completely dominated every aspect of his formative years. Do you think he's perpetuating that relationship by seeking out a partner like you?

name: Penny
line: You know, I used to wear tank tops a lot. That was a big selling point.

name: Amy
line: Hi, Sheldon. What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Good news. You're an asteroid.

name: Amy
line: Uh, please tell me what to say next.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps I should explain. While working with Koothrappali, we discovered an asteroid, and I named it after you.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Sheldon, thank you. That's so romantic. But what about Rajesh? He was okay with you choosing the name?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it took a little negotiating, but I wore him down. Uh, we get the asteroid, and if you and I have children, they all have to be named Rajesh.

name: Amy
line: All of them?

name: Sheldon
line: Even the girls.

name: Amy
line: Okay, I think I know what to say now.

name: Penny
line: How can I not sound like his mother when our entire bedroom is filled with Star Wars toys? I mean, have you ever had sex with a stuffed Wookiee watching you?

name: Dr Gallo
line: I went to college in the '70s. It was a hairier time. I'm gonna say yes.

name: Penny
line: You know, if anything, he's turning me into his mother. Before I did pharmaceutical sales, I was an actress. You know, I was pretty good. You know, girl-next-door type, but hot. Doable.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Hmm.

name: Penny
line: And not only am I Leonard's mother, but we have this man-child living with us named Sheldon.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Oh, Leonard talked a lot about him. I wasn't sure if he was real.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, he's as real as the fine I get when I use too much toilet paper.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Wow, you really do have a lot on your plate.

name: Penny
line: I do. You know, Leonard's right. Talking to you is really helping.

name: Dr Gallo
line: Oh, I'm glad. You know, you might also benefit from a prescription for anxiety.

name: Penny
line: Okay, if you think it'll help. Oh, just don't make it Placinex. I do not need sudden fits of homicidal rage.

name: Amy
line: I miss you.

name: Sheldon
line: I miss you as well.

name: Howard
line: I can't believe I miss Stuart.

name: Penny
line: I guess I just miss when life was simpler.

name: Girls
line: Go, Leonard! Go, Leonard! Go, Leonard! Go, Leonard!

name: Leonard
line: Remember, girls, you decide what makes you happy, not your emotionally withholding mothers.

name: Girls
line: Go, Leonard! Go, Leonard! Go, Leonard! Go, Leonard! Go, Leonard!

name: Stuart
line: I really miss this.

name: Penny
line: Hey, so I saw a movie trailer the other day. How could Batman possibly fight Superman? I mean, isn't that dumb?

name: Bernadette
line: Maybe he uses Kryptonite.

name: Emily
line: Well, Batman's got a lot of money. Maybe he builds a suit that can do everything Superman can do.

name: Penny
line: No, no, no, no, no. I've seen that movie. It's called Iron Man.

name: Leonard
line: What is happening?

name: Howard
line: I don't know.

name: Raj
line: But it's beautiful.

name: Penny
line: And now Ben Affleck is Batman?

name: Emily
line: Oh, he was great in Shakespeare in Love.

name: Penny
line: Ooh, we should watch that next girls' night.

name: Bernadette
line: We could do a double feature with the Leonardo Di Caprio Romeo and Juliet.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I love me some Leo.

name: Leonard
line: And it's gone.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, hello, everyone. I am happy to report I'm feeling much better.

name: Leonard
line: Good for you.

name: Sheldon
line: My fever is gone, my sinuses are pressure-free, and my mucus is as clear as a Yosemite waterfall.

name: Howard
line: Glad to hear it.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll be able to return to work tomorrow.

name: Raj
line: Yay.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, why isn't everyone happy? Your little ray of sunshine is ready to beam again.

name: Penny
line: You really don't know why?

name: Sheldon
line: No. But I knew that his yay was sarcastic. Not bad for a guy whose last bowel movement sounded like rain on a roof.

name: Leonard
line: Let me refresh your memory.

name: Sheldon
line: Penny, rub Vicks on my chest.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I cooked you breakfast. I made your bed. I checked your mouth for thrush. You can rub your own chest.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, sure, grope every other male on the planet, but draw the line with me.

name: Bernadette
line: I brought you a little care package from work. It's our latest antiviral and the best decongestant we make.

name: Sheldon
line: I hope laughter is the best medicine, 'cause this care package is a joke.

name: Howard
line: Hey, she came all the way here...

name: Bernadette
line: You're gonna want to take these with food.

name: Raj
line: Sheldon, stop being a baby and let Emily take a look at you.

name: Sheldon
line: She's a dermatologist.

name: Emily
line: I went to medical school.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, in that case, try removing the irritating patch of brown skin standing next to you.

name: Leonard
line: All right, here you go.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, I'm dying.

name: Leonard
line: You're not dying. It's just the flu.

name: Sheldon
line: I asked for chicken noodle. This is chicken and stars. It's killing me.

name: Sheldon
line: I never did get that chicken noodle, did I?

name: Amy
line: Hi, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Amy
line: Are you feeling any better?

name: Sheldon
line: Physically, yes, but I'm upset because everyone's mad at me for no good reason.

name: Amy
line: Why don't you tell me what happened, and in a gentle, loving way, I'll explain to you why you're wrong.

name: Sheldon
line: You know how, when you're sick, you're allowed to be cranky and say whatever you want and other people's feelings don't matter?

name: Amy
line: Ooh. Gentle and loving, this is gonna be tricky.

name: Sheldon
line: I had a hundred and one fever. If that's not a time to verbally abuse my loved ones, when is?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, when you're sick, you can be unbearable. That's why your friends have been known to work late or sneak out to the movies or stay at a neurobiology conference three days after it's ended.

name: Sheldon
line: You stayed in Michigan all week to avoid being around me?

name: Amy
line: No, no, not just that. I mean, Detroit is beautiful when it's sleeting.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, I'm not the only one who's unpleasant when they're sick. When Penny got food poisoning, she threw up so loudly I could barely hear the television.

name: Amy
line: Ooh, I just heard something. Might be hail, might be gunfire. Either way, I'm gonna go take pictures. Bye.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Hey. Where's Sheldon? Still sick?

name: Leonard
line: No, he's fine. We just needed a little break.

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, I get that. When I brought him his comics the other day he said, oh great, death is literally at my door.

name: Howard
line: He was being a jerk to everyone. Don't take it personally.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, I'm on so many antidepressants, I couldn't if I wanted to.

name: Raj
line: I wish we could do more stuff without Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: I wish that all the time. Usually before I blow out birthday candles.

name: Howard
line: You know, Amy took some time off from him. Really improved their relationship.

name: Raj
line: Huh. Okay. As long as it doesn't end with us having coitus with him, I'm in.

name: Howard
line: We should all take a trip or something.

name: Leonard
line: Well, you know, Penny and I have been talking about taking a weekend in Vegas. Maybe we should all go.

name: Howard
line: Bernie would love that.

name: Raj
line: Oh, Ooh, maybe we could get one of those party buses to take us there.

name: Leonard
line: That sounds really fun.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, that sounds fun. A party-bus party don't stop. Ooh, when I say party, you say bus.

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Howard
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: So, the guys and I were talking about renting a party bus and everyone going to Vegas.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that could be fun. But just to be clear, you mean a party bus with booze and music, right, not, like, juice boxes and video games?

name: Leonard
line: Yes. And Howard's birthday was a drop-off party, you didn't have to stay.

name: Penny
line: Well, I'm in. When are we going?

name: Leonard
line: This weekend.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, where are we going?

name: Leonard
line: Well, Vegas, but...

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh, Atlantic City without the taffy? No, thank you.

name: Leonard
line: That's fine, 'cause actually you're not invited.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, now, well, that's hurtful.

name: Penny
line: Oh, Sheldon, you don't even like it there.

name: Sheldon
line: I can consider a place America's urinal cake and still enjoy the occasional visit.

name: Leonard
line: Not this time.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, fine. Then I'll just hang out with Wolowitz.

name: Leonard
line: He's coming, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then Raj and I will...

name: Leonard
line: Nope.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. Stuart.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, great. Do that.

name: Sheldon
line: Ugh. Stuart.

name: Amy
line: Hi, Sheldon. What's new?

name: Sheldon
line: Our friends are jerks, and I'm mad at all of them.

name: Amy
line: I said what's new, but sure.

name: Sheldon
line: Can you believe they planned a trip to Las Vegas and didn't invite me?

name: Amy
line: Did you refuse to apologize and act like they were stupid for being mad?

name: Sheldon
line: You know, I liked it better when there was still a little mystery left in our relationship.

name: Amy
line: Everyone tried to take care of you, and you were nothing but mean to them.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe you're not on my side. I was on your side when someone stole your car radio.

name: Amy
line: Who else's side could you have been on?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. A music-loving hobo with a heart of gold?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I understand that you're upset because you feel left out, but I don't know why we're even talking about this. Just apologize to them.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, if that's what it takes to go on their dumb trip.

name: Amy
line: Maybe you could try apologizing because you actually feel bad. It's called empathy. It's something you could work on.

name: Sheldon
line: I have empathy. Watch. Leonard made me soup, and I was mean to him.

name: Amy
line: Great. Now try it as if this isn't your first day as a person.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. Leonard made me soup, and I was mean to him. Hey, I felt a little something. Let me try again. Leonard made me soup, and I was mean to him. I was mean to him. He must have felt terrible. Oh, now I feel terrible. Neat.

name: Amy
line: Glad I could help.

name: Sheldon
line: Now let me see you feel bad for lying and staying in Detroit longer than you needed to.

name: Amy
line: I feel so, so bad.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, we're both great at this.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, get ready for an apology. And with the added twist of an M. Night Shyamalan movie, I'm going to mean it.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, so like every other M. Night Shyamalan movie I've seen, you spoil it in advance.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, if you didn't know Bruce Willis was dead the whole time, that's not on me. Okay. Here it comes. You tried to take care of me when I was sick, and I was mean to you. There's no excuse for that. And I'm truly sorry.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you. I appreciate that.

name: Sheldon
line: I want you to know that that is sincere. I do feel bad. I'm not just saying it to be included on your trip.

name: Leonard
line: Appreciate that, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Terrific. Now all that's left is for you to invite me to come, me to ask are you sure, you to say absolutely, and then me to bring it home with, how could I say no to that face?

name: Leonard
line: You're still not coming.

name: Sheldon
line: What? I apologized and I meant it. I know that we don't play this game very often, but you're doing it wrong.

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, I accept your apology, but you upset a lot of people while you were sick. I'm not in a position to just say you can come.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, all right. What if I apologize to all of them?

name: Leonard
line: Fine, if you apologize to everyone, they all say it's okay, then yes, you can come.

name: Sheldon
line: Challenge accepted. Sounds like it's time for the Sheldon Cooper Apology Tour.

name: Leonard
line: Well, I hope it's as much fun as the Sheldon Cooper Spell-Checks Local Menus Tour.

name: Sheldon
line: My goodness, do you remember comes with apsparagus?

name: Sheldon
line: Howard and Bernadette, you tried to comfort me when I was ill, and I treated you terribly. I'm sorry.

name: Howard
line: Wow. I'm impressed.

name: Sheldon
line: No, no, no, wait. I'm not done. Allow me to underscore my sentiment with a haunting rendition of Brenda Lee's I'm Sorry played on the pan flute.

name: Howard
line: Apology accepted.

name: Bernadette
line: Forgiven, forgiven.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, that's eight hours of practice down the drain. And to memorialise this occasion, here are your commemorative T-shirts.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon Cooper apologized to me

name: Bernadette
line: And he made it all better.

name: Sheldon
line: All you did was offer maternal care and affection, and all you received in return was rude and insensitive behavior.

name: Penny
line: Can this wait?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm afraid it can't. The trip is tomorrow. And I have more apologies to make.

name: Penny
line: Okay, fine, I accept your apology, now get out.

name: Sheldon
line: Wonderful. would you mind holding up this shirt while I take a quick...?

name: Penny
line: Leonard.

name: Sheldon
line: You brought me my comic books when I wasn't feeling well. That, that was thoughtful. And I was insensitive. I'm sorry.

name: Stuart
line: Thank you, Sheldon. I appreciate that.

name: Sheldon
line: And I want you to know that I mean it, you know? This isn't me just wanting to go on the trip to Las Vegas.

name: Stuart
line: What trip to Las Vegas?

name: Sheldon
line: The one everyone's taking this weekend on the party bus.

name: Stuart
line: Of course, I wasn't invited.

name: Sheldon
line: That would be my understanding. On a less painful subject, what size T-shirt do you take?

name: Sheldon
line: Raj, you were being a good friend, and my illness was no excuse for my behaviour. I hope that you can accept my apology.

name: Raj
line: Of course I do.

name: Sheldon
line: And, Emily, I'm sorry for saying dermatologists aren't real doctors. And I'm sure you're tired of hearing that.

name: Emily
line: Do you honestly think I hear that a lot?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I would imagine when your job is popping zits and squirting Botox into old lady faces...

name: Raj
line: Okay, okay, the point is that we accept your apology.

name: Emily
line: Uh, maybe you do. He just insulted me again.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, but he doesn't mean it.

name: Emily
line: Why are you defending him?

name: Sheldon
line: I believe I can answer that. Uh, like me, Raj is demonstrating empathy. Now, why don't you accept my apology receive your free T-shirt, uh, I hope extra small is okay. For some reason Wolowitz took a medium.

name: Emily
line: Well, I don't accept your apology.

name: Raj
line: What are you doing?

name: Emily
line: It's called standing up for myself. You should try it some time.

name: Raj
line: Fine, how about this? You're making me uncomfortable by prolonging this ridiculous fight, and I wish you'd stop.

name: Emily
line: Oh, you want me to stop? No problem.

name: Raj
line: No, come on, please don't leave.

name: Sheldon
line: Point of clarification, are you still going on the trip? Because if not...

name: Emily
line: Don't worry, you're good.

name: Sheldon
line: I caused that fight, I feel terrible. Wait, I can do that better. I caused that fight. I feel terrible. Yeah, wow, I don't know which one I like more.

name: Penny
line: So, was the fight really bad?

name: Sheldon
line: No. As a fight, it was excellent. She used harsh language and slammed the door. Although as I say this, that might not have been what you were asking.

name: Leonard
line: You think they'll still go on the trip?

name: Sheldon
line: All I know is after the fight I went to Emily's to smooth...

name: Leonard
line: They're not going on the trip.

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Raj
line: What is wrong with you?

name: Sheldon
line: Look at him, caring about what's wrong with me. That is some top-shelf empathy. Hey, well, we should start a club.

name: Raj
line: You went to Emily's to apologise, and when you left, she was crying.

name: Sheldon
line: That is true. Well, I suppose I should apologize again.

name: All
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Is she okay?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, I calmed her down, but she's not going to Vegas if he's going.

name: Howard
line: Wait, that's an option? I didn't know that was an option.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that is fine, because I've decided that I won't be joining you. I've realized that the most genuine way to demonstrate the remorse I feel is to let you have this weekend to yourselves.

name: Raj
line: That's very mature of you.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I've been on a little trip myself recently. Not to Sin City but to Sincere City. Where instead of genital warts, the only growth you'll come back with is personal growth.

name: Penny
line: And there's your next T-shirt.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, check out the stripper pole.

name: Bernadette
line: You know what that means.

name: Leonard
line: That Raj'll be on it before we make it to the freeway?

name: Raj
line: You know it. Oo-ah, oo-ah.

name: Bernadette
line: This is so cool.

name: Penny
line: Here's some champagne.

name: Leonard
line: Mm-hmm. Well, I would like to propose a toast to a well-deserved weekend of...

name: Sheldon
line: Aha.

name: Leonard
line: What are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: My plan was to jump out at the state line, but one of my nose plugs fell into the toilet.

name: Penny
line: You couldn't give us just one weekend?

name: Stuart
line: I told him this was a bad idea.

name: Leonard
line: What do we do, kick them off?

name: Penny
line: If we drop them off at a fire station, they have to take them, no questions asked.

name: Sheldon
line: Before you do, please give me one more chance to apologize to Emily.

name: Raj
line: Oh, God.

name: Sheldon
line: Emily, as I'm sure you know, I'm considered an odd fellow. But what you don't know is that, while I often say the wrong thing, in my heart I mean well. I think that you are a smart and wonderful woman, you know? And we all think that you can do better than Koothrappali.

name: Raj
line: You know, Sheldon...

name: Emily
line: Shh, let him finish.

name: Sheldon
line: So, for all the times I've offended you and all the times that I'll offend you in the future, I'm sorry.

name: Emily
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Then I'll be leaving now.

name: Emily
line: Oh, it's okay, Sheldon. Come with us.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that's very kind of you. But I'm sure you'll all have a better time without me. Let's go, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: But I want to stay.

name: Sheldon
line: Stuart, now.

name: Emily
line: You know, I know he's a jerk, but I actually feel bad for him.

name: Penny
line: And now you see the problem.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, you pain in the ass.

name: Sheldon
line: That's me. Bye, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Wait. I'm a pain in the ass, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you relieved that you and Raj were able to patch things up?

name: Emily
line: At the moment? No, not really.

name: Penny
line: Shake it, baby.

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh, work that thing.

name: Sheldon
line: Here's a fun Postal fact. The inner side of our mailbox is under federal jurisdiction. So, if you broke my right thumb, that's Pasadena city police. But if you broke my left thumb, that's the FBI.

name: Leonard
line: If I'm going to jail, I'm killing him, not breaking his thumb.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I got a letter from my Meemaw. Umm. Smell this.

name: Penny
line: What is that?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, roses, bengay, and Dr. Scholls' foot powder.

name: Penny
line: Ah, yeah, Grandma by Calvin Klein. You know, the last time I got a hand written letter it was from someone who told me I parked like a blind person.

name: Leonard
line: That someone has a name.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, thank you. Oh, Meemaw got a new set of teeth. Oh, but then she found her old ones. Oh, so now the new ones are just gonna be her church teeth.

name: Leonard
line: Fun. Like your Comic-Con Spock ears and your around the house Spock ears.

name: Penny
line: I park fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, my goodness, she's coming to visit!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, it'll be nice to finally meet her.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you are going to love her. She is the kindest, sweetest woman you'll ever meet. Unless you're a gopher digging up her vegetable garden. In that case, you can expect to have your head bashed in with a shovel.

name: Sheldon
line: That's not her. That's not her. That's not her. That's not her. That's not her. That's not her. That's not her. That's not her.

name: Leonard
line: Really? The old Asian man is not your Meemaw?

name: Sheldon
line: And that's not helpful. You know, I got her an iPhone for Christmas. I'll see where she is.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, that's nice. Most people her age don't embrace technology.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, she doesn't even know she has it. No, I had my sister slip it in her bag so that I can track her like a sea turtle.

name: Leonard
line: Same as when we lost you at the zoo.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, for the hundredth time, I smelled kettle corn and couldn't find the cart.

name: Leonard
line: Still doesn't explain how you ended up on the freeway divider.

name: Meemaw
line: Moon Pie.

name: Sheldon
line: Meemaw. I'm so happy to see you.

name: Meemaw
line: I'm so happy to see you, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. You got even smaller. I love it. Uh, Meemaw, this is Leonard. Leonard, this is my Meemaw.

name: Leonard
line: Hi. So nice to finally meet you. Let me take this for you, Meemaw.

name: Meemaw
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: No. Oh, no. Now you call her Constance. I call her Meemaw. You have your own Meemaw. It's not my fault she died when you were four.

name: Meemaw
line: Is that nice to say to your friend?

name: Sheldon
line: It isn't, Meemaw. Sorry, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Can you please live with us forever?

name: Howard
line: That's ridiculous. If you had a superpower, and spent your whole life being told to suppress it, when you finally decide to embrace that power, why hide in isolation?

name: Raj
line: I'm sorry, and how much money did your version of Frozen make?

name: Howard
line: I'm just saying, instead of Let it Go, she should really sing, Look At Me Hiding in a Freezer Like a Dove Bar.

name: Raj
line: She built an ice castle, made a snow monster and gave herself a complete makeover in one day. You know what I saw you do today? Eat a block of cream cheese straight from the foil and lie about it to your wife.

name: Girl
line: Sorry for eavesdropping, but did you know they actually had the song Let It Go in place before they finalized the story?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, that's true. In fact, they liked the song so much, they retooled the whole script around it.

name: Girl
line: Which is probably why that movie sucks.

name: Howard
line: Here we are talking about Frozen, and yet, you got burned.

name: Raj
line: I'm so sorry but, how can you not like that movie?

name: Girl
line: I just think it gets more credit than it deserves.

name: Howard
line: Oh, that's what I said an hour ago.

name: Girl
line: Wow. You've been talking about Frozen for an hour?

name: Howard
line: You should've seen us after The Good Dinosaur.

name: Raj
line: It was a classic western set in the post-Jurassic period, and it changed my life.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you comfortable?

name: Meemaw
line: Very. It's nice to rest after 800 flights of stairs.

name: Sheldon
line: You were so cute, huffin' and puffin'. There's Amy. I just know you're gonna hit it off. You both have the same fashion sense. Hello. Come in, say hi to my Meemaw.

name: Amy
line: Hi. Nice to meet you.

name: Meemaw
line: Nice to meet you, too.

name: Amy
line: How was your trip?

name: Meemaw
line: Wonderful. And the pilot did such a good job, I gave him a butterscotch.

name: Amy
line: That's great. And look at you, sitting in Sheldon's spot. You know, I don't even get to sit there.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. And you never will. Ooh, hey, oh, ask her to do the tissue thing. Do it, ask her.

name: Amy
line: Can I have a tissue?

name: Meemaw
line: Of course.

name: Sheldon
line: Isn't that the best? She's like Grandma Spider-Man.

name: Meemaw
line: He's been saying that since he was little. I still don't know what it means.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, well, you two sit down and get to know each other. I'll get your room ready.

name: Meemaw
line: Oh, now don't you go looking through my suitcase for presents.

name: Sheldon
line: If I did, would I find any?

name: Meemaw
line: Maybe. But you also might find my brassieres and bloomers.

name: Sheldon
line: That's a risk I'm willing to take.

name: Amy
line: Well, this is so nice. He's so excited to have you here and...

name: Meemaw
line: Okay, now let's you and me get something straight. He may think that I came to bake him cookies, but the real reason is to size you up.

name: Amy
line: S, s, si, size me up?

name: Meemaw
line: Sheldon's mother may be okay with you, but I'm not so easy.

name: Amy
line: Well, I, I'm, I'm sure you'll like me once you get to know me.

name: Meemaw
line: Oh, you better hope so.

name: Sheldon
line: A Texas Special cattle and calf car train set with authentic horn and bell. Thank you, Meemaw.

name: Meemaw
line: Oh, you're welcome, Moon Pie.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, why don't you look excited? Well, you get to watch me play with this.

name: Raj
line: Oh, I see you're reading Saga.

name: Girl
line: Yeah, I hear it's pretty good.

name: Raj
line: It is, and not a lot of comics have a woman with wings breastfeeding a baby right on the cover.

name: Girl
line: I'll take your word for it.

name: Howard
line: You should. He's really looked.

name: Raj
line: I'm Raj, by the way. This is Howard.

name: Howard
line: Hi.

name: Girl
line: Claire.

name: Raj
line: Well, I've never seen you here before, Claire.

name: Claire
line: It's my first time. I'm looking for inspiration for this movie I'm writing.

name: Howard
line: You're a screenwriter?

name: Claire
line: Well, screenwriter, slash bartender, slash, a month away from living in my car.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, I get that. I'm a scientist, slash party planner, slash small-dog enthusiast, slash guy who probably should have stopped at scientist.

name: Claire
line: You're really a scientist?

name: Raj
line: Well, astrophysicist.

name: Claire
line: That's perfect. Do you think I could pick your brain for my movie some time? It's animated sci-fi for kids.

name: Raj
line: Sure. I love animated movies.

name: Howard
line: He does, and he has the Lilo & Stitch collector plates to prove it.

name: Raj
line: Excuse me for wanting a little magic in my life.

name: Claire
line: Here's my number. Give me a call, we'll get together.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, great.

name: Claire
line: See ya.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, bye.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing? You have a girlfriend.

name: Raj
line: So?

name: Howard
line: So, how do you think she'd feel about you helping a beautiful girl with her screenplay?

name: Raj
line: I wouldn't say she's beautiful.

name: Howard
line: Really? You don't think she's attractive?

name: Raj
line: I do. I just wouldn't tell my girlfriend.

name: Penny
line: Constance, are you sure I can't pour you some wine?

name: Meemaw
line: Oh, no wine for me. Sheldon's bringing me my whiskey.

name: Sheldon
line: Here you go, Meemaw. I made it just how you like, a lot in a glass.

name: Meemaw
line: Thank you, Moon Pie.

name: Amy
line: I'm curious. Why do you call Sheldon Moon Pie?

name: Meemaw
line: ‘Cause he's so nummy-nummy.

name: Leonard and Penny
line: She could just eat him up.

name: Sheldon
line: And I call her Meemaw because, well, just, well, look at her.

name: Meemaw
line: It's interesting that Leonard and Penny know about his nickname and you don't.

name: Amy
line: Oh, well, you know, now, now that I'm hearing it, it does sound familiar.

name: Sheldon
line: How could it? I never told you, and you never bothered to ask.

name: Amy
line: Well, now I know.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah.

name: Meemaw
line: So, Penny, I understand you have a new job.

name: Penny
line: Yes. I'm a pharmaceutical sales rep.

name: Meemaw
line: Oh. It's so wonderful that you modern gals can have it all. A husband and a full-time career.

name: Amy
line: I have a relationship and a full-time career, too.

name: Meemaw
line: That doesn't bode well.

name: Amy
line: Why not? You, you just said it's okay for her to work.

name: Meemaw
line: Well, Leonard doesn't need as much tending to as Sheldon does. And as Moon Pie explained, Leonard's work is more of a hobby.

name: Leonard
line: That's my best friend.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Amy
line: Look, I, I get that you're protective of your grandson, but he's an adult now. Maybe I understand what he needs better than you do.

name: Meemaw
line: I appreciate your honesty, dear.

name: Amy
line: Thank you.

name: Meemaw
line: And here's some more honesty. I don't like you very much.

name: Amy
line: Well, maybe I don't like you either.

name: Amy
line: I think I should leave.

name: Sheldon
line: But why? Other than you two fighting, we're having such a good time.

name: Amy
line: The minute you left the room, your precious meemaw started giving me a really hard time. I don't need this.

name: Meemaw
line: Let her go. And under no circumstance will you give her that engagement ring.

name: Amy
line: What ring?

name: Leonard
line: Maybe we should give them some privacy.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah. You go ahead. I'll catch up with you.

name: Amy
line: You have an engagement ring?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: Penny, did you know about this?

name: Penny
line: All right, let's go.

name: Amy
line: When did you get an engagement ring?

name: Sheldon
line: My mother gave it to me, and I had been thinking about giving it to you, but then we broke up.

name: Meemaw
line: Well, thank goodness for that.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, will you please tell your grandmother to stay out of this?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I don't think I could do that.

name: Meemaw
line: Sheldon, tell this girl that my ring will never be on her finger.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm gonna opt out of that one, too.

name: Amy
line: Who said I even want to be engaged to him? And if I do, I, I don't need your hand-me-downs.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, all right, look, l, let's all, let's remain calm and analyse this situation. Now, I realize that you've only known each other for less than a day, but is it possible this crankiness is because your cycles have synced?

name: Meemaw
line: You leave the room and let the grown-ups talk. Now.

name: Amy
line: Don't speak to him like he's a child.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. I'm gonna go next door and play with Leonard.

name: Bernadette
