line: But how's this all gonna work? Do we get a nanny? I mean, can we afford a nanny? And if we can, we can't get a pretty one, 'cause it'll wreck our marriage. We can't get an ugly one, 'cause it'll scare the kid.

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know, Howie.

name: Howard
line: Are we in a good school district? You're Catholic, I'm Jewish. What religion do we raise it? And if it's a boy, do we get him circumcised? People say it's barbaric, but if we don't, it looks like a pig in a blanket.

name: Bernadette
line: Calm down, it's gonna be okay.

name: Howard
line: How's it gonna be okay? Look at me, I'm a mess. And that means this baby's gonna be half a mess. And that's even before we screw it up with our cut-rate moderately attractive nanny.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, Raj, I read a couple of guys in your department may have discovered a new planet in our solar system?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I heard about that. Why didn't you discover it?

name: Raj
line: Because instead of being in the telescope room, I was busy making you guys home made jam for the holidays.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you be sure to let us know when you win the Nobel Prize for boysenberry.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Hey, bud.

name: Leonard
line: Ready to play when you are.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, um, in a minute. I actually need to tell you guys something.

name: Raj
line: If it's thank you for the home made jam you got in December, congratulations, you're the first one.

name: Leonard
line: What's going on?

name: Howard
line: I'm, uh, uh, gonna be a father.

name: Leonard
line: What? Congratulations.

name: Raj
line: That's so amazing.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no.

name: Leonard
line: Why oh, no?

name: Sheldon
line: Because this changes everything. What about comic book night? Uh, what about playing games together? What about our trips to Disneyland? How can we do those things with a child around?

name: Leonard
line: Relax, there's room for two babies in this group.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, dear lord, Penny's pregnant, too?

name: Leonard
line: You're the other baby.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, really? Okay, well, would a baby have to shave once every 11 days?

name: Leonard
line: Would an adult refuse to eat his graham crackers because one of them was broken?

name: Sheldon
line: I guess we'll call this a draw.

name: Bernadette
line: So, I'm glad you guys are here. There's something I want to share with you. Howie and I are going to...

name: Penny
line: Leonard says you're pregnant.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Don't say anything. act surprised when she tells you. All right, how you want to do this?

name: Bernadette
line: I'm pregnant.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God, I can't believe it.

name: Amy
line: This is so exciting.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, it's all real exciting.

name: Penny
line: Are, are you not happy about this?

name: Bernadette
line: I am. Of-of course I am. I'm, I'm sure it's just the hormones. But it's weird, Howie's the one who's been talking about having kids for years, and I was all excited to tell him because I thought he'd be thrilled, but then he started to flip out and now this feels like a bad idea and I'm gonna get fat.

name: Penny
line: No, no, come on. Come on, you're not gonna get fat. You're gonna be beautiful and glowing and, and have the cutest little baby bump ever.

name: Bernadette
line: Easy for you to say, skinny bitch. Sorry, hormones.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's all right. All I heard was skinny.

name: Amy
line: I wouldn't make too much out of Howard not reacting the way you expected him to.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm sure it was just the initial shock of it all.

name: Bernadette
line: You're probably right. After we talked about it, he started to calm down.

name: Howard
line: I shouldn't be raising a kid. I don't even eat my own vegetables.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy, I, I think you might be overreacting.

name: Howard
line: And then there's this nose. I mean, what if he looks like me? Or worse, what if she looks like me?

name: Sheldon
line: Not to mention the impact on our social circle. Everything's going to change. Howard won't be able to come over as much.

name: Raj
line: Well, he could bring the baby here.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, but then we'd have to baby-proof the apartment. You know, my sister has one of those toilet locks in her bathroom. I have two doctorates, I still had to go in the sink.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God, and do you have any idea how expensive having a kid is?

name: Raj
line: I read that in Los Angeles, raising a child through college can cost over a million dollars.

name: Howard
line: A million dollars? God, it's like my nuts just kicked me in the nuts. That's it, I got to start earning more money right now.

name: Raj
line: I know, you could ask Bernadette for a raise in your allowance.

name: Howard
line: This isn't a joke.

name: Raj
line: I wasn't joking.

name: Leonard
line: It'll be fine. People have kids every day. You'll figure this out.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, come on, this is great news and you know it.

name: Howard
line: You're right, it is, I'm just a little overwhelmed right now.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you know what we should do?

name: Sheldon
line: All get vasectomies so this doesn't happen to us?

name: Leonard
line: Go out and celebrate. But not your worst idea.

name: Amy
line: Hey, let's go do something to get your mind off this.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah, we should go out.

name: Bernadette
line: Where?

name: Penny
line: Uh, I don't know, a bar?

name: Bernadette
line: Can't drink.

name: Penny
line: We can, but all right.

name: Amy
line: Are you hungry? How about that sushi place you love?

name: Bernadette
line: Doctor said I can't have sushi.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, we don't have to go anywhere. We can just, you know, stay here and hang out in the hot tub.

name: Bernadette
line: Doctor said I can't go in the hot tub.

name: Amy
line: Maybe you should get a new doctor. What, he said you can't laugh either?

name: Raj
line: I'd like to propose a toast to our friend, Howard, his, um, his big heart, his beautiful soul...

name: Leonard
line: And his tight little pants that somehow did not make him sterile.

name: All
line: Cheers.

name: Howard
line: Well, look at this. I bet whoever invented tiny umbrellas doesn't have to worry about money. He can have all the kids he wants.

name: Sheldon
line: And can keep a small portion of their heads dry.

name: Howard
line: If I'm gonna have any chance of raising this kid, I need to come up with a big idea to make some money.

name: Leonard
line: There's no reason you can't.

name: Howard
line: That's easy for you to say. You and Sheldon already came up with your superfluid helium model.

name: Leonard
line: That's just research. We're never gonna make any money from it.

name: Sheldon
line: Forget helium. The real superfluid is the fruit punch in this mug. Reminds me of my daddy's secret don't tell mama juice.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, these are strong, you should slow down.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I'll just take one last sip. Ah.

name: Howard
line: Okay, how about this for an invention, slightly bigger cocktail umbrellas.

name: Leonard
line: How is that a new invention?

name: Howard
line: I don't know, all Apple does is change the size of things and we keep buying them.

name: Raj
line: It's true. I like my giant iPad and my little iPad almost as much as my regular-sized iPad.

name: Sheldon
line: This place is terrific. Why. why have we never been here before?

name: Leonard
line: The same reason we don't do a lot of fun stuff. You.

name: Sheldon
line: That's some smart talk from a guy who can't even keep his face in focus. Where's the bathroom?

name: Raj
line: Uh, it's in the corner.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Hey, how you doin'?

name: Raj
line: I hope the bathroom is clearly marked.

name: Leonard
line: Doesn't matter. He's headed for the kitchen anyway.

name: Howard
line: Maybe that's an idea, guidance systems for drunk people.

name: Raj
line: They have that. It's called Uber.

name: Howard
line: Hey. In your supercooled helium experiments, did you create quantum vortices?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah. Why?

name: Howard
line: Well, if you made a guidance system, couldn't you use those vortices as a gyroscope?

name: Leonard
line: Wow. I've never thought about that.

name: Howard
line: And since it's in a quantum state, it would maintain an infinite persistence.

name: Raj
line: Groundbreaking revelations, tropical drinks. Tell me this isn't like the best episode of Sex and the City.

name: Leonard
line: You may have actually just come up with something.

name: Howard
line: You think so?

name: Leonard
line: I really do.

name: Sheldon
line: You guys, the bathroom here is amazing. There's people cooking in it.

name: Amy
line: Think about all the fun things you get to do when you have a baby.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah, you get to buy toys and little clothes.

name: Bernadette
line: I kind of already do that for Howie.

name: Penny
line: And whenever you're hungry, you'll be in a minivan with Cheerios all over the floor.

name: Amy
line: Oh, and I just found a new travel cup for Sheldon. It only lets out three at a time. So, when did you guys decide to get pregnant?

name: Bernadette
line: Well, we didn't exactly decide. We were talking about it, and then one night we got a little reckless.

name: Penny
line: Oh, tell us.

name: Amy
line: Yeah, tell us.

name: Bernadette
line: No, I'm embarrassed.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on, we're all grown-ups. We've all done it.

name: Amy
line: Me, me, me too. I'm a grown-up and I've done it.

name: Bernadette
line: Fine. We were out one night, and things got a little spontaneous.

name: Amy
line: Oh, that sounds juicy.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, Sheldon was going on and on about time zones and railroad schedules, and I went out...

name: Penny
line: Wait, I remember that. Hang on. You did it at our place?

name: Bernadette
line: Kind of on Sheldon's bed.

name: Amy
line: What?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Bernadette
line: I was headed to the bathroom, and I passed Howie on his way out. Usually he says, do not go in there, but this time he said, hey, let's go in here.

name: Amy
line: How could you do that?

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sorry, but you know what it's like when you're with your man and one thing leads to another.

name: Amy
line: I do know what that's like. I really do.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not seeing anyone using liquid helium vortices like this.

name: Howard
line: I'm not finding anything either.

name: Raj
line: It's a good sign.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, wait, I found something.

name: Howard
line: Damn. What is it?

name: Sheldon
line: This video. The baby panda sneezes, and the mama panda gets so scared.

name: Leonard
line: Can you focus on what we're talking about?

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Look, now, this may be the rum talking, but as long as the unpinning rate of the vortices is kept within 1.1 and 1.3, the Magnus force issue should be negligible.

name: Raj
line: Even drunk, he's still smarter than all of us.

name: Sheldon
line: And stronger. Who wants to see me beat up the bartender?

name: Leonard
line: I'd enjoy that.

name: Sheldon
line: Nah, she's a good kid.

name: Howard
line: If this is a viable thing, we could get a patent and license it to companies that make guidance systems.

name: Raj
line: Look at that. You've known you're gonna be a father for less than a day and you're already stepping up.

name: Leonard
line: I'm telling you, you got this.

name: Howard
line: Maybe you're right.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course he's right. You and I both know how hard it is growing up without a father. That's why I'm confident you're gonna be the best dad you can be.

name: Howard
line: Thank you, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. And if he has twins, we can do all kinds of neat experiments on them.

name: Bernadette
line: You guys can go in if you want.

name: Penny
line: No, we're a team. If you can't go in, we're not going in.

name: Amy
line: Then why are we drinking?

name: Penny
line: Okay, it's not like she's got the Christ child in there, all right?  Oh. It's Leonard. He says Sheldon's drunk and they're gonna do karaoke if we want to join them.

name: Bernadette
line: That sounds fun.

name: Amy
line: Oh, no. Sheldon's drunk texting me.

name: Penny
line: What's it say?

name: Amy
line: Would you like to sing karaoke with us.

name: Bernadette
line: How is that a drunk text?

name: Amy
line: He used a period instead of a question mark. He's so wasted.

name: Raj
line: Your movie's showing, so you're going. Could care less about the five you're blowing. Theatre gets dark just to start the show. You spot a fine woman sitting in your row, she's dressed in yellow, she says hello, come sit next to me, you fine fellow. You run over there without a second to lose, and what comes next, hey, bust a move.

name: Leonard
line: You want it, you got it, oh, you want it, baby you got it

name: Raj
line: Just bust a move,

name: Leonard
line: You want it, you got it, oh, you want it, baby you got it

name: Raj
line: Just bust a move,

name: Leonard
line: You want it, you got it, oh, you want it, baby you got it

name: Penny
line: Hey, guys. Congratulations.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Hi. How are you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Wonderful. I'm being musically encouraged to bust a move. If I knew what that meant, I might just do it.

name: Howard
line: I'm really glad you're here. Can we talk?

name: Bernadette
line: Sure.

name: Penny
line: So, you gonna get up there later?

name: Sheldon
line: A microphone, a room full of inaccurate depictions of Polynesian religion, and a captive audience to hear about it? You bet I am.

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry I freaked out this morning. I want you to know I'm done being scared.

name: Bernadette
line: It's okay to be nervous. I am, too.

name: Howard
line: Thank God, 'cause I was lying, you might not have to wait nine months to see someone soil their pants. But I'm also really excited. I mean it.

name: Bernadette
line: Me, too.

name: Howard
line: I love you. Mmm. And I'm not just saying that because your breasts are gonna get bigger.

name: Penny
line: Are we an item? Girl, quit playin'.

name: Amy
line: We're just friends, what are you sayin'?

name: Penny
line: Say there's another and look right in my eyes.

name: Amy
line: My first love broke my heart for the first time.

name: Together
line: And I was like, baby, baby, baby, ooh, like, baby, baby, baby, no, like, baby, baby, baby, ooh, I thought you'd always be mine.

name: Howard
line: Baby, I need your lovin', got to have all your lovin'. Baby, I need your lovin', got to have all your lovin'.

name: Raj
line: Ooh, baby, baby, baby, baby. Ooh, baby, baby, baby, baby.

name: Leonard
line: Ah, push it.

name: Bernadette
line: I appreciate this, but you really...

name: Leonard
line: Push it real good.

name: Sheldon
line: Land where my fathers died, land of the pilgrims' pride, from every mountainside let freedom ring.

name: Howard
line: I'd like to dedicate my last song of the evening to my wife, best friend, and now the mother of our child. I love you, Bernie.  Havin' my baby, what a lovely way of sayin' how much you love me. Havin' my baby, what a lovely way of sayin' what you're thinkin' of me.

name: Sheldon
line: You're kidding. What kind of maniacs have coitus in someone else's bedroom?

name: Howard
line: Thank you, Pasadena. Good night.

name: Penny
line: That was such a fun night.

name: Leonard
line: Probably 'cause you got to see your man up there rockin' the mic.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, yeah. I was a little surprised when you decided to beat-box.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. That was really an asthma attack. I just sold it.

name: Penny
line: Well, I am so happy for Howard and Bernadette.

name: Leonard
line: Me, too. So, you ever think about it?

name: Penny
line: Babies? Well, I'm not in a rush but someday, yeah, sure. What about you?

name: Leonard
line: I think we'd make amazing parents.

name: Sheldon
line: Will you guys keep it down?

name: Penny
line: On the other hand, we might lack a certain maturity.

name: Amy
line: So Sheldon, there's something I've been wanting to talk about but I know it's kind of a touchy subject.

name: Leonard
line: Way to narrow it down to everything.

name: Sheldon
line: What is it?

name: Amy
line: Well, your birthday's coming up, and you've never let us celebrate it, and I was hoping maybe this year we could.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I suppose that's a discussion we could have.

name: Amy
line: Okay, great, I mean, it doesn't have to be a big party or anything. I was just, where'd he go?

name: Penny
line: W, wait a minute. You mention his birthday and he vanishes?

name: Leonard
line: Well, where's that information been this whole time?

name: Penny
line: Well, where is he?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon?

name: Leonard
line: I'll check his room.

name: Sheldon
line: Surprise.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God.

name: Sheldon
line: Just one example of how birthdays can be terrible. Now, can we please drop this subject and pick a new one? I suggest how thick can a soup get before it becomes a stew? You know, the answer, it may surprise you.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry I brought it up.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, what is the problem? Is it about getting older?

name: Sheldon
line: Please, look at this porcelain skin. I'm like a human sink.

name: Amy
line: But it's the one day a year that's just all about you.

name: Leonard
line: One day. Right.

name: Amy
line: Can you please just tell me why?

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. As you know, I have a twin sister with whom I obviously share a birthday. Every year we'd have a party. No one I invited would ever come, because they didn't like me.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, that part wasn't so bad. I didn't like them, either. But then I'd inevitably spend the whole day being tortured by my sister's friends.

name: Penny
line: Oh, poor thing.

name: Sheldon
line: When I was six, they told me Batman was coming to my party. I waited by the door for hours. Closest thing to Batman I saw was when a robin flew into the window.

name: Amy
line: You realize none of those things would happen now?

name: Sheldon
line: I do, but why do you care if I celebrate my birthday at all?

name: Amy
line: Well, you made my last birthday so memorable, I wanted to return the favour.

name: Penny
line: You know, if you had a party now, you have plenty of friends that would love to come.

name: Leonard
line: And we live here, so we have no choice.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. You may celebrate my life by throwing a party with cake, presents and a shower of admiration and love. But then you owe me big-time.

name: Howard
line: You have any idea what you're getting Sheldon for his birthday?

name: Raj
line: He's been fascinated with dinosaurs lately. Maybe we could get him a fossil.

name: Leonard
line: Well, just don't get anything Jurassic. He feels like that whole chunk of time has gone Hollywood. Hey, uh, you know, he told a sad story about how his sister tricked him into thinking Batman was coming to his party.

name: Howard
line: That's funny. Let's do that.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe we could get Batman to actually show up.

name: Raj
line: You mean, some guy in a lame suit?

name: Leonard
line: Or a real Batman. Hey, Stuart? Didn't you try to get Adam West to do a signing here once?

name: Stuart
line: Yeah, but there was kind of a scheduling conflict. He, uh, wanted to know when he'd get paid. And I wouldn't tell him.

name: Leonard
line: Can I get his contact info?

name: Stuart
line: Sure, uh, but just so you know, he's kind of a diva.

name: Leonard
line: He is?

name: Stuart
line: Oh, yeah. Won't take the bus. He won't pack his own lunch. Won't let you spend the night on his couch.

name: Amy
line: Okay, so how do you feel about party balloons?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, Mylar balloons, yes. Latex balloons, no. Water balloons, I will jump off the roof and aim for your car.

name: Penny
line: All right, what about music?

name: Sheldon
line: I enjoy marching bands and Tibetan throat singing.

name: Penny
line: No music it is.

name: Bernadette
line: What kind of cake do you like?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my favourite is chocolate with strawberry frosting, three layers, and if there's writing on it, make sure it's not all caps. I don't need my dessert yelling at me.

name: Raj
line: Hey, so what was Adam West like on the phone?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, nice guy. But it was a little weird to hear Batman say don't ring the doorbell or my poodles will go crazy.

name: Raj
line: You know, Adam West is my favourite Batman? Well, after Michael Keaton, Christian Bale and Batman from The Lego Movie.

name: Howard
line: Don't say that to him.

name: Raj
line: What? He beat out George Clooney, and that's something. Like, I love me some Clooney.

name: Leonard
line: Don't say that to anyone.

name: Penny
line: Thank you so much for helping us, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Oh, I, I was just glad to be invited. To be honest, I don't always feel like I'm part of the group.

name: Penny
line: Okay, sweetie, we're on the clock here. Can you hate yourself and frost at the same time?

name: Barry
line: Hewwo, I hope I'm not too earwy.

name: Bernadette
line: No, no, no. Come on in.

name: Barry
line: And how is the wadiant mommy-to-be?

name: Bernadette
line: Doing great.

name: Stuart
line: You, you're pregnant?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Stuart
line: Sounds like something a member of the group might know.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, birthday party first. Pity party later.

name: Leonard
line: Are you crazy? How can you put Michael Keaton in front of Christian Bale?

name: Adam West
line: Oh, please. Even my poodles know Bale's overrated.

name: Raj
line: Thank you. That's why I say Keaton's number one. He brought a sense of humour to the role.

name: Adam
line: Oh, if you're gonna factor in a sense of humour, then I should be at the top of the list. It should be me, Keaton, Kilmer, Lego, Bale, and that pretty boy Clooney.

name: Howard
line: Really? You're ahead of Bale? The man who personified the words, I'm Batman.

name: Adam
line: I never had to say I'm Batman. I showed up, people knew I was Batman. Everywhere I went, on the TV show, mall openings, Julie Newmar's bungalow.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sold, you're ahead of Bale.

name: Adam
line: There's another reason I should be higher on the list. All those other guys had muscles built into their costumes. All I had in my Batsuit was 100%, grade-A West.

name: Howard
line: Can we just all agree we're worried about Affleck?

name: Leonard
line: Sure.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, of course.

name: Adam
line: What's an Affleck?

name: Sheldon
line: Is there a reason I had to leave my own apartment?

name: Amy
line: Well, I think they just want you to see it for the first time all decorated.

name: Sheldon
line: But who's gonna tell them they're doing it wrong?

name: Amy
line: Well, I'm, I'm sure they'll ask you to give a speech, and that's when you just tear 'em a new one. Have to say, you, you do look good in that suit.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Thank you.

name: Amy
line: Maybe later I'll, uh, get to see you in your birthday suit.

name: Sheldon
line: But this is my birthday suit. Are you having a stroke? Because that's the kind of thing that just ruins a birthday party.

name: Leonard
line: So, Mother, I'm surprised you came all this way for Sheldon's birthday.

name: Beverley
line: Oh, I was happy to. He did come to my 60th.

name: Leonard
line: Oh. You had a party for your 60th?

name: Beverley
line: Oh, I wouldn't call it a party. Just a few close friends. And your sister and brother.

name: Penny
line: You know, to be fair, we did get married in Vegas and didn't invite her.

name: Beverley
line: And I never did thank you for that, dear.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Penny says everyone's there. Are you ready?

name: Sheldon
line: I am. Oh. Wait.

name: Amy
line: Are you all right?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I just, I got a little light-headed.

name: Amy
line: Oh, do you need a minute?

name: Sheldon
line: No. No, if I can walk past that pet shop with the parrot in the window, I suppose I can do this.

name: All
line: Happy birthday!

name: Leonard
line: Speech! Speech!

name: Raj
line: Come on, Sheldon, say something.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, um, uh, thank you all so much for coming. Beverly. Wil Wheaton. Adam West, for some reason.

name: Leonard
line: Batman finally came to your party.

name: Adam
line: Happy birthday, Sherman.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. This is all so thoughtful. Excuse me.

name: Adam
line: I still get paid, don't I?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I'd better go in there and talk to him.

name: Amy
line: Well, don't you think I'm the one who should go in?

name: Leonard
line: No offence, but I've known the guy a really long time.

name: Amy
line: Well, I've, you know, seen him without pants on.

name: Leonard
line: Again, no offence, but so have I.

name: Amy
line: Well, he's seen me without pants on.

name: Leonard
line: Again, no...

name: Penny
line: Okay, this is ridiculous.  Sheldon? Can I come in?

name: Sheldon
line: How do you know I'm not using the facilities?

name: Penny
line: Because you e-mail me your bathroom schedule once a week, even though I've clicked unsubscribe, like, a thousand times. So, what's going on?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know. I looked around the room, and I saw all the faces and the presents, and it, it was just too much.

name: Penny
line: I get that. Hey, you want to just bring a few people in here? You know, Wil Wheaton in the bathtub, Batman on the toilet. It'll be like the weirdest Comic-Con ever.

name: Sheldon
line: I know that you worked hard to put this together. I'm sorry I'm ruining it.

name: Penny
line: Oh, pl, you're not ruining it. Look, at some point, Raj will try to get everyone to do the Electric Slide. Now, that will ruin it.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't think I can go back out there.

name: Penny
line: That's fine. You know, I hate that your sister and her friends used to torture you. But what I hate even more is, if I was there, I would have tortured you, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Based on this pep talk, I'd say you're still doing it.

name: Penny
line: My point is, there was a time I never would've been friends with someone like you, and now you are one of my favourite people. So, if what you need is to spend your birthday in a bathroom, I'm happy to do it with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, everyone will think I'm weird.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, you are weird. Everyone knows you're weird, but they're all still here because they care about you so much.

name: Barry
line: Hewwo. Some of us need to check our hair because we might have a shot with Weonard's mother.

name: Leslie Winkle
line: Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Leslie
line: It's been a while.

name: Leonard
line: Leslie. I can't remember the last time we talked. So much has changed.

name: Leslie
line: Has it?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, uh, um, Penny and I got married.

name: Leslie
line: Wow, congratulations. You know, actually, I thought you'd be living with Sheldon forever.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, well, don't be a stranger.

name: Penny
line: Okay, everybody, Sheldon is gonna come back out, but I think he's a little embarrassed, so let's all be extra nice, okay?

name: Barry
line: What are you wooking at me for? I'm a saint. But a sinner in the sack.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, everyone. I, I'd like to apologize for my behaviour. I hope it hasn't put a damper on the party. So, please, enjoy yourselves. Oh, this is quickly getting out of hand.

name: Amy
line: If I may, I, I'd like to propose a toast. Um, thank you all for coming tonight. I know it's customary for the birthday boy to receive presents, but I feel like I got the greatest gift the day he was born.

name: Sheldon
line: Aw, Amy, that was lovely. You know, this is fun. Let's do more. Someone else say something wonderful about me.

name: Howard
line: Sheldon, I don't think everyone...

name: Sheldon
line: Wolowitz, perfect. Everyone listen to Wolowitz.

name: Howard
line: Okay, then, uh, Sheldon, we've known each other a long time. And it is a pleasure to work with you and call you my friend.

name: Sheldon
line: Little generic. Keep thinking. We'll circle back. Wil Wheaton, go.

name: Wil
line: Sheldon, I know that we've had our ups and downs, but I can honestly say that my life is so much more interesting because you are in it. We may have met because you are a fan of Star Trek. But I have become a fan of Sheldon Cooper. Live long and prosper, buddy. And happy birthday.

name: Sheldon
line: That's how you do it, Wolowitz. Now you see why he's famous and you're not.

name: Beverley
line: Sheldon, I know the future holds great things for you, and we all can't wait to see what they are. Happy birthday, dear.

line: Someone caw Animal Contwol. There's a cougar on the woose.

line: Barry, stop.

line: Seriously, Barry, stop.

name: Raj
line: And it was Gandhi who said, live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

name: Sheldon
line: And it was Sheldon Cooper who said let's speed this up. A lot of people want to talk.

name: Leslie
line: Uh, in the past, I would've said something obnoxious, like, happy birthday, dumbass. But I'm not gonna do it. You and I have both grown a lot, and it's just so nice to see you all again. So, happy birthday, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Oh, now, you know I hate change. Say it.

name: Leslie
line: Happy birthday, dumbass.

line: Happy birthday, young man. And if any of you have enjoyed seeing me here today, I'm also available for Comic-Cons, bachelor parties, bar mitzvahs...

name: Bernadette
line: I can't think of anything to say that hasn't already been said, so, here's to you, Sheldon.

line: Thank you, Bernadette. That was perfect.

name: Howard
line: What? You gotta be kidding me?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, we've been together so long, it's hard to remember a time you weren't in my life. And believe me, I try. You make me laugh. You make me a better scientist. You make me crazy. You're more than just my roommate, you're my brother.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Happy birthday, buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. That, that was wonderful.

line: Hey, everybody, listen up.

name: Penny
line: You nailed it.

line: Okay, while they get the cake, Sheldon, I just want to say, I hope you didn't think you were gonna get through tonight without a hug.

line: Happy birthday to you,

line: So, I've reviewed your paperwork, and it seems like we've got everything we need to file a patent for your infinite persistence gyroscope.

line: Just need you to review and sign this document acknowledging that you understand the university will own 75% of the patent.

line: And as far as Mr. Wolowitz is concerned, I'm afraid as a federal employee on loan from NASA, your name can be on the patent, but you're not entitled to an ownership share.

line: Okay. I'm just, I'm having a really hard time, but that's not your problem, that's mine. I, I won't bother you again, but please know that you'll always have a place in my heart. Bye, Raj. You're a good guy.

line: Article three, as it pertains to this project, Dr. Sheldon Cooper promises to abstain from all insulting or disrespectful language directed toward Howard Wolowitz, including but not limited to mockery of engineering, his height, his hair, his wardrobe, and his insane belief that the Ghost Rider movie was, quote, not that bad.
