line: So, how's it goin'?

name: Leonard
line: Good. Slow.

name: Howard
line: There's a lot of tedious setup, but once we get through that it should go quicker.

name: Penny
line: Is there anything we can do to help?

name: Leonard
line: You know what, this part isn't that technical. You actually could.

name: Penny
line: Wow, really? Called my bluff. All righty then.

name: Bernadette
line: Can we really help?

name: Howard
line: While we finish soldering these boards, it'd be great if you guys could wrap these pipe fittings with Teflon tape.

name: Leonard
line: I'll show you how to do one.

name: Penny
line: Hey, wouldn't it be funny if after all your years of hard work, I'm the one who makes a scientific breakthrough? He doesn't think that's funny.

name: Amy
line: I got here as quickly as I could.

name: Sheldon
line: You're too late.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, this is silly.

name: Sheldon
line: You got emotional when that lab monkey died.

name: Amy
line: That lab monkey told me he loved me in sign language.

name: Sheldon
line: Great. Now I'm gonna have that song in my head all day.

name: Amy
line: Look, I'm, I'm sorry for your loss, but I think I have something that might make you feel better. I got you a new computer.

name: Sheldon
line: How could you do that?

name: Amy
line: Do what?

name: Sheldon
line: Choosing a new laptop Is an incredibly personal ritual. You have taken away weeks of agonizing thought, tedious research, sleepless nights filled with indecision. I, haven't I lost enough today?

name: Amy
line: Well, the guy at the store said this one is great.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, oh, the guy. Oh, pardon me. I didn't realize you'd spoken to the guy. Yeah, tell me, did the guy choose one with a 4K display and a Thunderbolt port?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah? Did the guy make sure that this has a one terabyte solid-state drive?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah? Oh, well, was this guy Rick from Computer Solutions on Colorado?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, well, he does know his stuff.

name: Leonard
line: After you wrap the body in reflective tape, the ends get Teflon tape so we can get a tight seal.

name: Penny
line: Like this?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, perfect.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: And it helps to have small, delicate fingers. So don't be discouraged if you can't do it as fast as me and Howard.

name: Howard
line: I don't know if we have enough solder to finish these circuit boards.

name: Leonard
line: We had a full spool yesterday.

name: Howard
line: What can I say, I play hard, I solder even harder.

name: Bernadette
line: Sometimes he solders at home with his shirt off. It's like a beer commercial.

name: Leonard
line: Well, we got to make a run to the hardware store.

name: Penny
line: How can you call yourself a scientist and run out of solder?

name: Leonard
line: Well, funny story. So, we have plenty of the 60/40 tin-to-lead ratio solder, but the spools look a lot like the 63/37 tin-to-lead...

name: Penny
line: Honey, honey, honey, let me stop you. That is, is not a funny story.

name: Howard
line: You want to come with us?

name: Bernadette
line: I'm kind of getting into the groove here.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you guys run to the store and let the women handle the science for a change.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. We'll be back as soon as we can.

name: Penny
line: Okay, so what is solder?

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose I should set this up. Or would you like to rob me of that, too?

name: Amy
line: Knock it off or I'll start making W-H sounds for words that just have a W.

name: Sheldon
line: You wouldn't.

name: Amy
line: Whatch me.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine. I'm sorry. Thank you for the thoughtful gift. I really do appreciate it. As you know, I had become attached to my old laptop. But I'm sure, in time, that this one will... Jeepers creepers, that started up fast.

name: Amy
line: I thought you might like it.

name: Sheldon
line: Look at the 4K resolution. Next time we Skype, I'm gonna count all those nostril hairs.

name: Amy
line: Or you could just look into my eyes.

name: Sheldon
line: But you only have two eyes. You got a lot of nostril hairs.

name: Amy
line: Well, you know, as long as you're happy.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I am.

name: Amy
line: And Rick said you could bring in your old one to recycle it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Uh, no, no, no, thank you.

name: Amy
line: Oh, but he said you can get store credit.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, no, I just, I, I don't want to recycle it. And I don't want store credit.

name: Amy
line: But why wouldn't...

name: Sheldon
line: Can we please change the subject?

name: Amy
line: Okay. How 'bout we change it to why you're being weird about this?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not being weird. I, it's hard to explain.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, just tell me.

name: Sheldon
line: It might be easier to show you.

name: Amy
line: Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: We'd have to take your car.

name: Amy
line: All right.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm gonna need you to sign a non-disclosure agreement.

name: Amy
line: Well, I signed one before we slept together. Why not now?

name: Leonard
line: Penny says they're having fun working on the prototype.

name: Howard
line: Remember when her fun was nightclubs and drinking games?

name: Leonard
line: I know. I'm lowering the bar so slowly. This time next year she'll have a coin collection.

name: Man
line: Excuse me. You guys interested in a free screening of an upcoming movie?

name: Leonard
line: Oh. Sorry, we can't.

name: Howard
line: Well, hang on. What movie is it?

name: Man
line: Oh, I can't tell you. But it does star Will Smith.

name: Howard
line: Wait. I bet it's Suicide Squad. Let's check it out.

name: Leonard
line: What about the girls?

name: Howard
line: Penny just said they're having fun. Honestly, you want to wrap tape around a bunch of pipe fittings all afternoon?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we'll take 'em. But, I swear, if it's Will Smith in Shark Tale 2, it better be at least as good as the original.

name: Penny
line: I mean, it's crazy, isn't it? I moved here from Nebraska to be an actress, and now I'm sitting in an engineering lab at Caltech helping to build a prototype for a high-tech guidance system.

name: Bernadette
line: It is crazy. It's also crazy that I've made fourteen of these and you've made three.

name: Raj
line: Hey. Where are the guys?

name: Penny
line: Oh, they went to the store to get solder, which is metal you melt to make science things.

name: Bernadette
line: Since when do you work on weekends?

name: Raj
line: I'm an astrophysicist. The stars don't take a day off.

name: Penny
line: You were home alone and had no one to play with?

name: Raj
line: Well, the cleaning lady was there, but she doesn't like me. You need any help?

name: Bernadette
line: Not with Lightning McQueen here.

name: Penny
line: I think we're good.

name: Raj
line: Okay. That's cool. I guess everybody's involved in this project but me. So, see ya.

name: Bernadette
line: I feel bad. Should we have asked him to stay?

name: Raj
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: Will you please tell me where we're going?

name: Sheldon
line: Sorry, you're on a need-to-know basis.

name: Amy
line: I'm driving the car. I need to know.

name: Sheldon
line: Right.

name: Amy
line: So where are we going?

name: Sheldon
line: No, I meant turn right, and you missed it. Maybe you do need to know.

name: Leonard
line: What are we gonna tell the girls?

name: Howard
line: It's not a problem.

name: Leonard
line: I mean without lying.

name: Howard
line: And now you've made it a problem.

name: Leonard
line: Come on. We're a couple of smart guys. I'm sure we can come up with a way to explain this that doesn't make us look bad.

name: Penny
line: Oh, the boys had to drive all the way to San Bernardino for the solder and got a flat.

name: Leonard
line: They bought it.

name: Howard
line: But we're gonna have to put the spare on before we go back.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, you're good at this.

name: Howard
line: Well, I lie a lot.

name: Man
line: Hey, guys, thank you for being a part of our test screening. You're about to be one of the first audiences to see Suicide Squad.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you were right.

name: Howard
line: Well, I keep telling you, good things happen to bad people.

name: Man
line: Uh, we're gonna get started in a couple minutes. Enjoy.

name: Leonard
line: Who are you texting?

name: Howard
line: Raj. He really wants to see this movie.

name: Leonard
line: He'll never make it in time.

name: Howard
line: I know. I want to make him feel bad.

name: Leonard
line: Ha, ha. Leonard and I are about to see Suicide Squad. Spoiler alert, when I see you I'm gonna spoil it. You're a good friend.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Would you ladies please leave the room for a moment?

name: Penny
line: Why?

name: Raj
line: I need to rub my genitals on their prototype.

name: Bernadette
line: What's going on?

name: Raj
line: Leonard and Howard don't have a flat. They went to the movies. Look.

name: Penny
line: Un-freakin' believable.

name: Bernadette
line: Son of a bitch.

name: Raj
line: Oh. You know what? I'm gonna let them know that I'm here with you and that they're busted.

name: Penny
line: No. You know what? Don't. Don't. Let's let them think they're getting away with it.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, let's see how deep a hole they can dig for themselves.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Raj
line: Interesting. I mean, it's not testicles on a cryostat, but I like it.

name: Amy
line: Why do you have a storage unit?

name: Sheldon
line: Just wait.

name: Amy
line: How long have you had it?

name: Sheldon
line: Just wait.

name: Amy
line: Do you want me to hold that computer?

name: Sheldon
line: Just wait. You know what? Actually, yes, thank you. Welcome to my Fortress of Shame.

name: Amy
line: I'm sorry. What, what am I looking at?

name: Sheldon
line: It's basically everything I've ever owned. Um, every book, every tee shirt, every piece of broken electronics. Just all of it.

name: Amy
line: All of it?

name: Sheldon
line: I have a Ziploc bag filled with all my old Ziploc bags.

name: Amy
line: Okay. Well, I would like to tell you that there is nothing here to be ashamed of. So I'm gonna need a minute.

name: Penny
line: All right, how are we gonna play this when they return?

name: Raj
line: I know. You guys should totally be making out with me.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, I know you think jokes like that are funny, but do you really think you could handle making out with both of us?

name: Raj
line: No, ma'am.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay. Okay, how about this? They don't know you're here with us, so you hide in the closet. When they show up, we'll hear whatever their dumb story is about where they were, we'll pretend to believe them and just when they think they got away with it, you jump out.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, that's pretty good.

name: Raj
line: I love it, I'll be all like, busted, and they'll be like, what? And then we'll all be like, oh yeah. Yeah, I get it. I wouldn't make out with me, either.

name: Sheldon
line: In here is every clock radio I've ever owned. Calculators, VHS tapes. Yeah. Oh. Sporting equipment.

name: Amy
line: You have sporting equipment?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, oh, it's just a, it's a, a golf ball that my brother threw at my head. You can still feel the dent. It's right next to the hockey puck dent.

name: Amy
line: Okay, why do you have a bin of pine cones?

name: Sheldon
line: I used to collect them as a child. The spiral of scales open in the Fibonacci sequence. A fact that, when you tell your brother, gets a golf ball thrown at your head.

name: Amy
line: So, why do you feel you need to save these things?

name: Sheldon
line: I'd like to say it's nostalgia, but every time I think of throwing anything away, my ears start to ring, and I get butterflies in my stomach. And then it feels like the butterflies get eaten by rats, and then the, the rats get eaten by...

name: Amy
line: Okay. I get it. I get it.

name: Sheldon
line: It ends with dinosaurs. I'm sorry if you think less of me.

name: Amy
line: I don't.

name: Sheldon
line: Really? ‘Cause every time I come in here, I think less of me.

name: Amy
line: Why?

name: Sheldon
line: Because I'm a fraud. No. I purport to be a man of the mind. I've been such a, a vocal champion of the singularity, but how can I leave my body behind and become one with the internet when I've never even thrown a toothbrush away?

name: Amy
line: It's okay, Sheldon. You know, I've saved a lot of weird things, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Like what?

name: Amy
line: Well, um, did you know I have a microscope slide with a little bit of tissue from the first brain I ever dissected?

name: Sheldon
line: I have an old teddy bear I secretly wiped my nose on for years.

name: Amy
line: It's not a contest.

name: Penny
line: Okay, here they come.

name: Bernadette
line: Go hide.

name: Raj
line: Oh, man, when I come out of the closet, I'm gonna nail those guys. Yeah, I heard it. Shut up.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Hey, what's this?

name: Leonard
line: Listen, we did a stupid thing.

name: Howard
line: We went to a movie and lied about it, but we feel bad and want to make it up to you.

name: Leonard
line: So, these are for you, and if you're not too mad, we'd love to take you guys to dinner.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Anywhere you want.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. Well, thank you for being honest.

name: Penny
line: Yeah. You know, I want to be upset, but we did kind of have fun working on the prototype.

name: Raj
line: Don't forgive them. Stay mad at them.

name: Howard
line: What is he doing in there?

name: Raj
line: Busting you.

name: Bernadette
line: It's okay. They apologized.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, it's fine.

name: Raj
line: Well this is kind of anti-climactic.

name: Howard
line: You know what wasn't anti-climactic? The end of the movie. Get this.

name: Raj
line: No spoilers. No spoilers.

name: Penny
line: And he's back in the closet.

name: Howard
line: Ready for dinner?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Bernadette
line: Should we invite Raj?

name: Raj
line: Yes.

name: Amy
line: So, no one else knows about this?

name: Sheldon
line: Only you.

name: Amy
line: Thank you for trusting me.

name: Sheldon
line: What good is having a girlfriend if you can't unload your psychological sewage on her?

name: Amy
line: That's me, your emotional outhouse. You know, if you ever decide you want to do something about this, I'm, I'm here for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you. I wouldn't even know how to begin.

name: Amy
line: Baby steps, I guess.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose I could try getting rid of the golf ball.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Okay.

name: Sheldon
line: I will always have the dent to remember it by.

name: Amy
line: You did it. Do you feel okay?

name: Sheldon
line: Actually, yes. I do.

name: Amy
line: Well, I'm proud of you.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm glad I told you about the storage unit.

name: Amy
line: Well, I feel closer to you now.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I feel closer to you, too. You know, it's still a couple of hours until my bedtime.

name: Amy
line: What did you have in mind?

name: Sheldon
line: You look amazing. I mean, this resolution is remarkable.

name: Amy
line: I really had to go home for this?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, but it's like you're right here in the room.

name: Amy
line: And yet, I'm not.

name: Sheldon
line: But I feel like I could reach out and touch you.

name: Amy
line: And yet, you can't.

name: Sheldon
line: I know.

name: Sheldon
line: Why are you up?

name: Leonard
line: How am I supposed to sleep? I've been married less than 24 hours, and my wife isn't speaking to me.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps you can think of this n a more positive light. In one day, you've managed to do what it takes many couples decades to achieve.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: You couldn't sleep either?

name: Leonard
line: Of course not.

name: Sheldon
line: Me neither. But I just had a tickle in my throat, not profound marital problems.

name: Leonard
line: What are we gonna do?

name: Penny
line: I don't know.

name: Leonard
line: Please, tell me how I can fix it.

name: Sheldon
line: Glad you asked. As I see it, there's a simple solution. Your lips had a dalliance with the lips of another woman. It seems only logical that to restore balance to the relationship, you should find another man and dally with him. And by dally, I mean some hardcore mouth-on-mouth action.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, that is the stupidest thing I've ever heard.

name: Penny
line: Actually, I think he's onto something.

name: Leonard
line: You can't be serious. ‘Cause I messed up and made out with a girl, you're gonna do the same with a random guy?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm currently single.

name: Penny
line: That's true. You are.

name: Leonard
line: What is happening?

name: Sheldon
line: I will tell you what is happening. I am saving my best friend's marriage.

name: Leonard
line: U-u-u-uh!

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I don't think you understand how being broken up works. The only way I can sort through my feelings is if there is space between us. Every time I see you, it re-traumatizes me. I go through the pain all over again.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, hello to you, too.

name: Amy
line: What do you want?

name: Sheldon
line: I understand we're no longer a couple, but I would like to remind you that we made a baby together.

name: Amy
line: What baby?

name: Sheldon
line: A precocious little Internet show known as Fun With Flags.

name: Amy
line: I'm hanging up.

name: Sheldon
line: Great. See you in about half an hour.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I am not doing Fun With Flags with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Why not?

name: Amy
line: Because we're broken up.

name: Sheldon
line: Sonny and Cher made it work. Their variety show kept going long after the divorce, and here we are still talking about them.

name: Amy
line: No one's talking about Sonny and Cher.

name: Sheldon
line: You must be thinking about Donny and Marie, 'cause you and I are clearly talking about Sonny and Cher.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, this has to stop. I know it's hard. It's hard for me, too. But I've seen and talked to you more in the two days we've been broken up than in the last two months that we were together.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, if you want to see less of me, maybe we should go out again.

name: Raj
line: I can't believe you made out with Mandy Chao.

name: Leonard
line: Well, trust me, I wish it never happened.

name: Raj
line: And you knew about this this whole time?

name: Howard
line: I did.

name: Raj
line: And you didn't think to tell me?

name: Howard
line: Leonard asked me to keep it to myself.

name: Raj
line: Let's leave Leonard out of this for the moment. This is about you and me.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, wait, wait, how is my day-old marriage falling apart becoming about you two?

name: Raj
line: Hang on. What do I need to do to make you trust me?

name: Howard
line: You think it's hard having one wife, try having two.

name: Raj
line: I bet you told Bernadette all about how he was screwing around with Mandy Chao.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, we didn't screw around. We just got drunk and made out.

name: Raj
line: Whatever. It would have been nice to hear it from you.

name: Amy
line: What are you doing here?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm here to return your belongings. That's what people who've broken up do.

name: Amy
line: And you didn't do your compulsive knocking ritual so I would open the door.

name: Sheldon
line: On the contrary, you no longer get to enjoy my charming eccentricities. We're not friends with benefits.

name: Amy
line: Just give me the box.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. Don't you want to go through it to make sure I haven't forgotten anything?

name: Amy
line: Fine. My old scarf.

name: Sheldon
line: You wore it the night we went ice-skating. Remember?

name: Amy
line: You mean the night that I went ice-skating, and you stood at the rail googling the symptoms of hypothermia?

name: Sheldon
line: We made one heck of a team, huh?

name: Amy
line: Whose bra is this?

name: Sheldon
line: It's not yours? Oh, my. How embarrassing for both of us.

name: Amy
line: It's Penny's.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, you broke up with me. It is none of your business whose naked bosom I'm smooshing around like pizza dough.

name: Amy
line: Good-bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy.  Amy.  Amy. Hmm. Tables work, too. Good to know.

name: Howard
line: Ooh, brownies for girls' night!

name: Bernadette
line: Hands off. I'm mad at you.

name: Howard
line: Look, I know it's a lot of money, but the guy at the store said in five to seven years, it'll pay for itself.

name: Bernadette
line: What will pay for itself?

name: Howard
line: Doesn't matter. What are you mad about?

name: Bernadette
line: I'm mad at you for blabbing to me what Leonard did on the North Sea, and I'm mad that I've had to hide this from Penny for two years.

name: Howard
line: And you have every right to be mad about those things. So, why don't you let me handle the credit card bill this month, huh? I mean, don't even look at it.

name: Bernadette
line: I mean, if Penny finds out I've known all this time and haven't told her, she's gonna think I'm a terrible friend. I wish you never told me.

name: Howard
line: And I wish Leonard never told me. He's the bad guy here.

name: Bernadette
line: I guess that's true.

name: Howard
line: And you let Penny marry him. Compared to that, who cares if I bought a George Clooney limited edition manscaping kit?

name: Leonard
line: Hi. I'm calling about your marriage counselling services and was curious what your rate is. Really? Um, okay. Is there any kind of discount for length of marriage? ‘Cause we're just talking hours here.

name: Penny
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: Call you back. Hey.

name: Penny
line: Can we talk?

name: Leonard
line: I would love that.

name: Penny
line: All right, look, I'm sorry I said I was okay with everything before we got married. I hate that we're going through this, but I don't know what to do.

name: Leonard
line: If you don't mind waiting for a Groupon, we can try marriage counselling.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, uh, buddy, can we have some privacy?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course. Wouldn't want to intrude. This is yours.

name: Penny
line: Okay, when I'm done with him, I'm gonna need more information.

name: Sheldon
line: Nothing odd. I just wanted to rub Amy's nose in it.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, I might be overreacting, but how am I supposed to get past this when I know tomorrow you're gonna go to work and see this woman?

name: Sheldon
line: Now, forgive me for eavesdropping, but as I see it, there's a simple solution.

name: Leonard
line: Wake up, wake up, wake up.

name: Sheldon
line: Bring Penny to meet Mandy.

name: Leonard
line: What? Why?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, right now, Penny's imagination is running wild, but if they meet, that will eliminate the mystery and alleviate her fears. Like when that Sparkletts guy let me look under his eye patch.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, first of all, you made that guy cry.

name: Sheldon
line: And we learned that you don't need an eyeball to do that.

name: Leonard
line: Secondly, I can't think of a more horrible idea than Penny meeting Mandy.

name: Penny
line: Really? Why is that?

name: Leonard
line: What, you actually want to meet her?

name: Penny
line: No, but now that you're being weird about it, maybe I should.

name: Leonard
line: I'm not being weird. Am I being weird?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. And that's coming from me.

name: Leonard
line: Fine, you want to meet her?

name: Penny
line: No, I just want to know that when you're at work, there's nothing going on.

name: Leonard
line: How many times do I have to tell you? I have no interest in this woman.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, well, maybe she has interest in you.

name: Sheldon
line: In Leonard? Oh, even the Sparkletts guy could see that's unlikely.

name: Penny
line: I guess my big problem is I never saw Leonard as the kind of guy who would do something like this.

name: Amy
line: Anybody can make a mistake in a weak moment.

name: Penny
line: What do you think?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't know what to think. But then again, I just found out about it.

name: Penny
line: You know, I fell in love with Leonard because he wasn't anything like the guys I was used to dating. I mean, I knew those guys weren't above cheating because that's usually how we met.

name: Amy
line: Come on, you know Leonard's not like that.

name: Penny
line: I want to believe you. I really do. Am I being naive?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I don't know. This is all so new to me. I'm still processing.

name: Penny
line: You know, he never would've done this when we first met. He's cockier now.

name: Amy
line: That's because you made him more confident.

name: Bernadette
line: You know, if you think about it, without you, he never would've grown into the person he is now. I mean, sure, more women might notice him, but I think it's better to have a guy be with you because he wants to be and not because he thinks he doesn't have any other choice.

name: Penny
line: I never thought about it like that.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, me neither, not until just now.

name: Leonard
line: You guys have any idea how much it costs to see a marriage counsellor?

name: Howard
line: 250 dollars an hour. Why?

name: Raj
line: How do you know?

name: Howard
line: Bernadette and I have occasionally gone to one to, you know, stay on top of things.

name: Raj
line: And I'm just hearing about this now?

name: Howard
line: Dude, just because we're best friends doesn't mean that I have to tell you everything that goes on.

name: Raj
line: You don't have to, you should want to.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, great, there's Mandy.

name: Howard
line: Why are marine biologists always so cute?

name: Raj
line: I don't know, but I'd like to get lost in her Bermuda Triangle.

name: Leonard
line: That's not helpful.

name: Howard
line: Then I won't say I'd like to cover three-quarters of her surface area.

name: Leonard
line: Are we done?

name: Raj
line: Not yet, this is fun. Ooh, I know. I'd let her free my willy. Where you going?

name: Leonard
line: I'm gonna ask her if she'd be willing to talk to Penny, tell her she has nothing to worry about.

name: Howard
line: Leonard, wait.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Howard
line: I'd like to SpongeBob her SquarePants.

name: Raj
line: Now we are done.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Mandy
line: Oh, hi, Leonard. What's up?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, do you mind if I sit?

name: Mandy
line: Sure.

name: Leonard
line: So, um, I've been thinking a lot about you and me and the boat.

name: Mandy
line: What about it?

name: Leonard
line: You know, what we did, when we were drunk.

name: Mandy
line: Oh, no, did I sleep with you, too?

name: Leonard
line: No, we just made out.

name: Mandy
line: Oh. Well, good for me. So what can I do for you?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, okay, well, um, I got married recently.

name: Mandy
line: Oh, congratulations. To Sheldon?

name: Leonard
line: Never gets old. No, no, to a girl. Anyway, I told her what happened between you and me, and she's concerned about us seeing each other at work.

name: Mandy
line: It was just a kiss. Why would you even tell her?

name: Leonard
line: Because I didn't want there to be any secrets between us.

name: Mandy
line: Is that really the reason?

name: Leonard
line: What else would it be?

name: Mandy
line: I don't know. Sounds like you're trying to sabotage the relationship.

name: Leonard
line: No, I don't think so. Although, Penny did say exactly that.

name: Mandy
line: Okay, well, that's something to think about.

name: Leonard
line: You know, on some level, I've always believed that I don't deserve a woman like her.

name: Mandy
line: Oh, you're gonna think about that right here?

name: Leonard
line: I mean, she's really beautiful. She could have any guy she wants. Which is probably why it took her so many years to tell me she loved me.

name: Mandy
line: Maybe you should talk to a therapist about this.

name: Leonard
line: Too expensive. You'd think I'd be used to women withholding their love. I mean, my mother did. I mean, no matter how hard I tried, she just didn't have any interest in me.

name: Mandy
line: Imagine that.

name: Leonard
line: I wonder if that's why I have such a dysfunctional relationship with Sheldon. I had a dream the other night that I was in a cave and I was nursing a baby, but the baby had Sheldon's head on it.

name: Mandy
line: And your wife is worried about me?

name: Raj
line: Hey, Leonard, when you're done, we came up with a bunch more.

name: Sheldon
line: And then the Czech Republic says to Slovakia, I don't think you understand how being broken up works. Can you believe that? You'd think that the Czech Republic would try to hold on to what it had, given that it's not as young as it used to be. And I don't see any other countries lining up to invade its southern borders.

name: Amy
line: I'm gonna kill him.

name: Sheldon
line: But enough about the Czech Republic. Let's talk about the time Moldova made Romania a birthday cake and Romania said it tasted good even though it didn't. And yet Romania gets dumped. I'll pause here while you mull that one over. I know, right?

name: Penny
line: So, you said you had something to tell me.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, yeah, um, do you remember when you accused me of trying to sabotage our wedding?

name: Penny
line: Uh-huh.

name: Leonard
line: I've been thinking about it, and you might be right. But the good news is that I'm pretty sure I know why.

name: Penny
line: I'm listening.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, after all these years, I still feel like maybe I don't deserve you.

name: Penny
line: Okay, that is the lamest excuse you could've possibly come up with. But I get it.

name: Leonard
line: You do?

name: Penny
line: Yeah. Yeah, sometimes I worry you're gonna wake up and leave me for someone more like you.

name: Leonard
line: I don't even understand why you're with someone like me. Why would I want to be with someone like me?

name: Penny
line: You know what I mean. And, you know, maybe the way I've been reacting was me sabotaging this, too.

name: Leonard
line: Well, how about we stop being so scared of losing each other and just be together?

name: Penny
line: That sounds nice.

name: Leonard
line: Good. Because I've loved you since the moment we met, and I will keep loving you until the end of time.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Oh, my God, that is the most beautiful thing anyone's ever said to me.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah? That's because you're beautiful, and your beauty fills my heart with love and song.

name: Penny
line: It's getting kind of cheesy, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Huh? If you think that's cheesy, buckle up. Penny Hofstadter, will you please stay married to me?

name: Penny
line: Oh, damn it, you topped it. Should we go to the bedroom and make this marriage official?

name: Leonard
line: Yes, please.

name: Penny
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, I can't believe you got us a wedding gift.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know why you're so surprised. I watch movies, I see what people do.

name: Leonard
line: What is this?

name: Sheldon
line: Plane tickets and hotel reservations for a weekend away in San Francisco.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: Wow.

name: Penny
line: That's so great.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, there's Fisherman's Wharf and Alcatraz and cable cars. We're gonna have so much fun.

name: Penny
line: We?

name: Sheldon
line: Is there a problem?

name: Penny
line: Oh, no, no, I just, I said, Whee.

name: Amy
line: How dare you go on the Internet and say mean things about me and compare my genitalia to part of Czechoslovakia?

name: Sheldon
line: You saw through that one, did you?

name: Amy
line: I don't know what you were thinking, but take the video down now.

name: Sheldon
line: She watched it. I'm gonna get that girl back.

name: Amy
line: I only watched it because you e-mailed it to me with the subject line this is gonna make you mad.

name: Sheldon
line: She was listening through the door. She wants me.

name: Sheldon
line: It's nice to get back to nature. Why don't I do this more often? What a beautiful forest. Hello, little butterfly. What's your Na-oh!

name: Leonard
line: Whatcha doing?

name: Sheldon
line: I was enjoying some virtual reality, until you ruined it with your actual face.

name: Penny
line: What am I smelling?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's car air freshener. I was simulating the smell of the forest.

name: Penny
line: That's not what the forest smells like.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, how would I know?

name: Leonard
line: Why are you pretending to be outdoors? You hate it.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm? Oh. Amy showed me a compelling study that demonstrated the cognitive benefit of spending time in the wilderness.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy, I am ready to drive you into the wilderness any time you want and leave you there.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, make your jokes, but some of the participants who spent four days in the woods away from all technology reported a fifty percent gain in reasoning skills upon their return.

name: Penny
line: Okay, if that's true, why aren't there more genius squirrels?

name: Sheldon
line: You may need this more than I do.

name: Amy
line: Here's your tea.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Do not sneak up on a guy when he's sitting on a log.

name: Amy
line: You know, if you really want to be in nature, why don't we rent a cabin?

name: Sheldon
line: Look, I'm sorry, when did you even get here? I...

name: Penny
line: You know, there's a cabin in Big Bear that a doctor I work with keeps offering me.

name: Leonard
line: Because he's hitting on you?

name: Penny
line: She.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, good.

name: Penny
line: But I could get her.

name: Amy
line: We could all go for the weekend. It'll be fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. Here, look up fun, get back to me.

name: Leonard
line: You and I could still go and have a nice weekend.

name: Penny
line: Sure.

name: Amy
line: Come on, Sheldon, let's go with them.

name: Sheldon
line: I hardly think so. You be sure and say hello to all the mosquitoes, bees, bears, snakes, possums, poison oak, oh, and last, but not least, teenagers with guitars.

name: Penny
line: I'll see if it's available.

name: Amy
line: You know, if that study's real, Leonard might come back smarter than you.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you trying to manipulate me?

name: Amy
line: Yes.

name: Sheldon
line: Well done, it worked, we're going.

name: Amy
line: Yay.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, Raj, give me a bag.

name: Raj
line: No, no, you're pregnant. The only thing you carry is our hope for a better tomorrow.

name: Howard
line: Hey, where you been?

name: Bernadette
line: Uh, Raj took me to the baby doctor and then we swung by the grocery store.

name: Howard
line: Did you get graham crackers? I mean, are, wuh, is the baby okay?

name: Bernadette
line: Yes and yes.

name: Howard
line: I didn't know you needed help running errands today.

name: Bernadette
line: I didn't, but Raj volunteered.

name: Howard
line: Really?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, ever since you told him I was pregnant, he's really been making a fuss over me.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Well, I guess that's kind of sweet.

name: Raj
line: Bernie, I just forwarded you a list of the top five lactation consultants in Los Angeles. I know my favourite, but I'd love to hear what you think.

name: Howard
line: And it just got weird.

name: Penny
line: Hey. Amy's downstairs.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, one sec.

name: Penny
line: Uh, what, what you got goin' on here?

name: Leonard
line: I bought a baseball cap.

name: Penny
line: I can see that. What team did you get?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, Hufflepuff, from Harry Potter.

name: Penny
line: Well, we'll be in the woods.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm ready to go.

name: Leonard
line: Anything you'd like to say to him?

name: Penny
line: Nice hat, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Thanks.

name: Leonard
line: Why are you so mean to me?

name: Howard
line: What the hell are you watching?

name: Bernadette
line: Raj found all these childbirth videos online. This one is of a woman giving birth in a river.

name: Howard
line: Okay, that is the least Jewish thing I've ever seen in my life. You feel like Raj is getting a little carried away with all the baby stuff?

name: Bernadette
line: I don't think so. He just wants to be part of the experience.

name: Howard
line: All right, if you say so. What's in the box?

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, it's an ultrasonic microphone so we can hear the baby's heartbeat.

name: Howard
line: Oh. That's cool. Can we try it?

name: Bernadette
line: Actually, Raj ordered it. He made me promise to wait till he was here.

name: Howard
line: So he can be part of the experience?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: I'm surprised he let us conceive without him.

name: Bernadette
line: It's a sore spot, don't bring it up.

name: Penny
line: It's so cute and rustic up here.

name: Leonard
line: I know. Did you see they still have a video rental place? it's like Colonial Williamsburg.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, cell service is down to one bar, so if anyone needs medical attention or to tell a stranger their political views are stupid, now's the time.

name: Amy
line: Have you ever been off the grid before?

name: Sheldon
line: Once. The battery ran out on my phone. I had to wait for my iPad to turn on.

name: Leonard
line: I was afraid he was gonna eat me.

name: Howard
line: Raj just pulled up. I'm gonna say something to him.

name: Bernadette
line: Leave it alone. He means well.

name: Howard
line: So you don't think he needs to rein it in a little?

name: Bernadette
line: No, not really.

name: Howard
line: And you're not concerned he's acting like somehow this is his kid, too?

name: Bernadette
line: He's just trying to be supportive.

name: Howard
line: Just supportive. Not over-the-top in any way?

name: Bernadette
line: No.

name: Raj
line: Hello.

name: Bernadette
line: You saw him carrying that.

name: Howard
line: Astronauts saw him carrying that.

name: Penny
line: This place is great.

name: Leonard
line: So nice of that doctor to just let you use it.

name: Penny
line: Well, she is taking me to an Indigo Girls concert, so hold that thought.

name: Sheldon
line: Okay. Well, shall we check each other for ticks?

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, all we did was walk in from the car.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Well, suit yourself. Who wants to check me?

name: Amy
line: On the other hand, safety first.

name: Amy
line: Wow, it's really coming down.

name: Penny
line: This sucks.

name: Leonard
line: And there goes our hike.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, not our hike, now we have to stay safe and warm.

name: Penny
line: You know, we could still go. A little rain isn't gonna kill us.

name: Leonard
line: Have you been outside in the rain with Sheldon?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Leonard
line: You'll wish it would kill you.

name: Amy
line: So what do we do now?

name: Leonard
line: They have some board games.

name: Sheldon
line: Eh, most of the Jenga pieces are missing and the Scrabble only has seven tiles, so unless you want to build an unimpressive structure with the word shnerpf next to it, move on.

name: Penny
line: Hey, let's light a fire.

name: Amy
line: Ooh, that sounds cozy.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think I've lit a real fire before.

name: Sheldon
line: Ah, it's basic thermodynamics. I'm sure we can figure that out.

name: Leonard
line: I could stack the logs conically to facilitate airflow.

name: Sheldon
line: That would maximize oxygen for optimal combustion.

name: Leonard
line: Right. So all we need is to...

name: Penny
line: Got it.

name: Leonard
line: A scientist made that.

name: Howard
line: Look, Raj, you're my best friend in the world and I really appreciate your enthusiasm about the baby.

name: Raj
line: Please, my pleasure.

name: Bernadette
line: And, of course, Howie and I both want you to be a part of all this.

name: Howard
line: But we have to set some boundaries.

name: Raj
line: I don't understand.

name: Howard
line: The three of us aren't having this baby. Just the two of us.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Okay. Yeah, I get it. I'll back off.

name: Howard
line: Thanks for understanding.

name: Raj
line: Of course. I'll give you guys some space. Let me just get this out of your way.

name: Howard
line: You need some help?

name: Raj
line: No, I got it.

name: Bernadette
line: Raj, Raj, wait.

name: Raj
line: Please, Bernadette. Let me leave with my dignity.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you guys want to play a drinking game?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, well now, we'll never win. You always play the drinking game.

name: Penny
line: Not the drinking game, a drinking game.

name: Leonard
line: To be fair, good at both.

name: Amy
line: What's the game?

name: Penny
line: All right, it's called Never Have I Ever. The rules are simple. Someone says something they've never done, but if you have done it, you take a drink.

name: Leonard
line: I've never played that before.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, now, wait. Have we started? Do I drink? What is happening?

name: Penny
line: Okay. Calm down. I'll go first. All right, let's see. Never have I ever...

name: Amy
line: She's trying to think of something she's never done before. This could take a while.

name: Penny
line: Very funny. Okay, never have I ever... yeah, you know what? Let's just circle back.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, I'll go. Never have I ever been arrested.

name: Sheldon
line: So I drink.

name: Amy
line: No, it's only if you've done it.

name: Sheldon
line: Got it.

name: Amy
line: I can't believe you've been arrested.

name: Sheldon
line: I can't believe Penny hasn't.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, what did you do?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm not proud of it, but I jaywalked.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, no, it's like a horror movie. We're trapped in a cabin with a maniac.

name: Amy
line: I'm surprised you would do that.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I crossed in the middle of the street. And normally, I wouldn't, but I saw an aggressive-looking Girl Scout, and it was the heart of cookie season. Anyway, there was a police officer, and he witnessed the whole thing.

name: Penny
line: What, he arrested you for that?

name: Sheldon
line: No, he didn't do anything. So I said, you just saw me jaywalk, why aren't you doing your job? You know? May, maybe I should arrest you for, for impersonating a police officer.

name: Penny
line: And then you got arrested.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, and how.

name: Howard
line: I feel like I just made a horrible mistake.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: But on the other hand, I didn't kick him out of our lives. I just asked him to back off a little.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: What? Are you gonna cry?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Howard
line: Is it baby hormones or actually sad?

name: Bernadette
line: I can't tell anymore.

name: Howard
line: I'll go get him.

name: Bernadette
line: And bring back the bear.

name: Leonard
line: This game's dangerous. I could get you in trouble.

name: Penny
line: How?

name: Leonard
line: Well, never have I ever used Sheldon's toothbrush to clean the sink.

name: Penny
line: Fine, is that how you want to play this? All right, never have I ever come up with a nickname for my own genitals.

name: Leonard
line: Never should've told you about Alvin and the Chipmunks.

name: Amy
line: Okay. My turn. Um, never have I ever completely rocked my girlfriend's world in bed.

name: Sheldon
line: Amy.

name: Amy
line: You know the rules. Drink.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, go ahead.

name: Leonard
line: That's right.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, my turn. Mm. Oh, I know. Never have I ever kept a secret bank account, because I think my wife can't handle money. Did I win? I feel like I won.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe this. You realize I make more money than you?

name: Leonard
line: I don't, I know, but this isn't a big deal. It's just a little savings I put aside.

name: Penny
line: We're married. We're supposed to share everything.

name: Leonard
line: What, you mean, like, your massive credit card debt?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm calling it. I won.

name: Raj
line: I appreciate the apology, but it's really not necessary. I overstepped my bounds.

name: Howard
line: No, Raj, you've been great. I just, I need to start doing my part around here.

name: Bernadette
line: I hear that.

name: Raj
line: Well, if that's the case, is there anything I can do to help?

name: Howard
line: Well, not right now. But we could try out that microphone you got us, and listen to the baby's heartbeat.

name: Raj
line: Really? It's okay if I listen with you?

name: Bernadette
line: Of course.

name: Raj
line: Can I squirt the ultrasound jelly on your stomach?

name: Howard
line: Hey, look at that. It's weird again.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, you have every right to be mad. And what you said is true. You do make more money than me. So I had no right to do what I did. And I'm so sorry. I hope you can forgive me.

name: Penny
line: How long have you had this secret account?

name: Leonard
line: A couple years, but I just put a few bucks aside every month for emergencies.

name: Penny
line: Well, how much you got in there?

name: Leonard
line: Six thousand four hundred and twenty seven dollars. Forty seven dollars once my nana's birthday check gets here.

name: Penny
line: My God, Leonard, do you know what I could do with that kind of money?

name: Leonard
line: No, I do, and that's why I hid it.

name: Penny
line: What good is it if you don't use it?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, you have shoes you love, but never wear. I have money I love, but never spend. We're kind of a cute couple that way. Again, I'm sorry. I shouldn't have kept it a secret.

name: Penny
line: Well, I have a secret I've been keeping from you, too.

name: Leonard
line: Is it a secret bank account? Because that would be awesome.

name: Penny
line: I hate my job.

name: Leonard
line: Really? Why?

name: Penny
line: Because I don't feel good flirting with doctors for sales. I mean, I know I make a lot of money. But I haven't been happy for a while.

name: Leonard
line: Why didn't you tell me?

name: Penny
line: Because I know how important it is to you that I'm having some success.

name: Leonard
line: That's not true.

name: Penny
line: Okay, really? So you'd be fine if I went back to acting and waiting tables again?

name: Leonard
line: If that's what you want to do, yes.

name: Penny
line: Well, it's not what I want to do.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yes.

name: Penny
line: Doesn't matter what I want. Look, this job is gonna get me out of debt. So I'm gonna do the grown-up thing and see it through.

name: Leonard
line: Well, that is the grown-up thing.

name: Penny
line: I guess.

name: Leonard
line: I love you.

name: Penny
line: I love you, too.

name: Leonard
line: You know, never have I ever made love in the forest while it was raining.

name: Penny
line: Well, guess I gotta drink.

name: Howard
line: All right, here we go.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm not hearing anything.

name: Howard
line: Well, give me a second.

name: Raj
line: Are you sure you can do this?

name: Howard
line: Hey, who found four dollars and change on the beach with his metal detector?

name: Raj
line: I buried it there, so we could go home.

name: Bernadette
line: Wait, that's it.

name: Raj
line: Wow.

name: Bernadette
line: Isn't that the best?

name: Raj
line: You guys made a person.

name: Howard
line: We did.

name: Raj
line: And I like to think I helped.

name: Howard
line: You didn't.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, never have I ever drunk milk past its expiration date.

name: Amy
line: Never have I ever cancelled a dentist appointment.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, uh, never have I ever put my foot in the ocean.

name: Amy
line: Never have I ever honked if I liked anything.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, uh, never have I ever thrown, caught or touched a Frisbee.

name: Amy
line: Never have I ever put salt on my food without trying it first.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Never have I ever pushed all the buttons in an elevator.

name: Amy
line: Well, we all have a past.

name: Sheldon
line: I have a question about Batman. Batman is a man who dresses up like a bat. Man-bat is a part man, part bat hybrid. Now, if Man-Bat dressed up as a man to fight crime, would he be Man-Batman?

name: Leonard
line: No, he'd be Bat-Man-Bat.

name: Raj
line: But wouldn't Man-Batman just be a Batman that was bitten by a radioactive man?

name: Howard
line: But Batman is a man. You're talking about a man who would have the powers of a man. That's just Man-Man.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, isn't Man-Man just Man?

name: Leonard
line: But what if Man-Man dressed as a bat?

name: Raj
line: Well, that's just Batman.

name: Leonard
line: No, if a man dresses as a bat, that's Batman, but if Man-Man dresses as a bat, that's Batman-Man.

name: Howard
line: So does that answer your question?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I haven't asked it yet.

name: Raj
line: Oh, that's Claire. Got to run.

name: Leonard
line: I thought you were back with Emily.

name: Raj
line: Uh, actually I'm seeing both of them.

name: Leonard
line: You mean like through their window from behind a bush?

name: Raj
line: No, I'm actually dating two women. Later.

name: Leonard
line: Really? The guy who for years couldn't even talk to women is suddenly going out with two of them? How is that possible?

name: Howard
line: I know. Scientists have tried to reproduce it with computational models, but, in each case, the world blows up.

name: Leonard
line: Seriously, that guy's dating two women?

name: Sheldon
line: What, why did you get a party sub?

name: Leonard
line: People are coming over, it looked fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, we're only watching Game of Thrones. A party sub implies it's a party.

name: Leonard
line: Your attendance implies it's not.

name: Sheldon
line: I like a party as much as the next man, as long as the next man doesn't like a party. Oh, by the way, don't forget, tomorrow is our quarterly roommate agreement meeting.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Sheldon, we don't need a meeting every three months.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm? Well, it sounds like the kind of thing one would bring up at a quarterly roommate agreement meeting. Lucky for you it's tomorrow.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, you know what? I'm not going.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you have to go. It's Penny's first time leading the Pledge of Allegiance.

name: Leonard
line: This meeting is a waste of time. Whether we make the switch from Post Raisin Bran to Kellogg's Raisin Bran should not require parliamentary procedure.

name: Sheldon
line: You realize one of them has sugar on the raisins.

name: Leonard
line: You're the only one who eats them.

name: Sheldon
line: And yet you get to weigh in. Democracy, it's pretty cool, isn't it?

name: Leonard
line: I'm not going, you can't make me.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, we'll just see about that.

name: Penny
line: What is the problem?

name: Sheldon
line: He says he's not coming to the roommate agreement meeting tomorrow.

name: Penny
line: Well, why the hell did I memorize the Pledge?

name: Leonard
line: You have fun. I will not be attending.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, fine. We don't have to have a roommate agreement meeting if you don't want to.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: Of course, it will require a vote. Unfortunately, my official gavel is in my bedroom, but luckily, I have my travel gavel.

name: Leonard
line: You're being ridiculous.

name: Sheldon
line: There's a motion on the floor, I'm ridiculous. Do we have a second? Hmm? Hmm? There is no second. The motion is denied. Next time, make sure you have the votes first. That was embarrassing.

name: Leonard
line: Can you please talk to him?

name: Penny
line: Well, why are you fighting him on this?

name: Leonard
line: Because I am tired of him always getting his way. We don't need a stupid meeting. We don't even need a roommate agreement, and I hope that sandwich does cause a party.

name: Penny
line: Well, I will still come to your meeting.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I should hope so. Tomorrow's picture day.

name: Leonard
line: Why are you taking his side?

name: Penny
line: Because it's important to him, and when we signed the roommate agreement, we made a deal.

name: Sheldon
line: You keep talking like that, you're gonna make colour guard.

name: Raj
line: Man, I'm worn out.

name: Howard
line: I know. Imagine if we were actually moving.

name: Raj
line: No, it's just, ever since I started dating Claire and Emily at the same time, it's exhausting.

name: Howard
line: You're exhausted? Try folding every five pages in a pregnancy book so your wife thinks you read it.

name: Raj
line: But, dude, you're so lucky. Getting to stay home at night with the woman you love.

name: Howard
line: I guess I am lucky.

name: Raj
line: You are, because dating two women, I mean, I can't even remember the last time I slept in my own apartment. I wake up and I'm like, am I at Claire's or am I at Emily's? Is there a third girl I've forgotten about? Like, where am I?

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Hey, how's the mommy-to-be?

name: Bernadette
line: Good. A little tired.

name: Raj
line: I feel you. I've been dating multiple women.

name: Howard
line: You sure you don't want to come watch Game of Thrones with us?

name: Bernadette
line: You guys have fun. I'm just gonna snuggle up in bed with a book.

name: Raj
line: Oh, that sounds great, a bed to yourself. Can't even remember what that's like.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you up-to-date on Game of Thrones?

name: Penny
line: Mm, I think so. Dragons, snow zombies, and all the hot guys are dead.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I don't know. Theon Greyjoy looks pretty good for a guy who had his genitals cut off.

name: Penny
line: Uh-oh, somebody's still pouting.

name: Leonard
line: Leave me alone.

name: Penny
line: If it's because you lost a stick, I know where it went.

name: Leonard
line: Not funny.

name: Penny
line: You know you're gonna make up with him. Can we just skip to that part?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, of course, because I'm the only adult around here.

name: Penny
line: Really? The only adult?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, that's right.

name: Sheldon
line: Tonight I'll be watching a show rated M.A., and that stands for mature audiences, buster.

name: Penny
line: All right, you would think the only adult wouldn't let something silly ruin our entire night.

name: Leonard
line: And I'd think you'd understand why I'm annoyed.

name: Sheldon
line: All this could be avoided if you'd just come to the meeting.

name: Leonard
line: I don't want to.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's just a meeting. One simple meeting.

name: Leonard
line: Stop saying meeting.

name: Sheldon
line: Meeting, meeting, bo-beeting, banana-fana, fo-feeting, fee-fi mo-meeting.

name: Amy
line: I brought my famous spinach dip.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, Amy, just one second. Meeting.

name: Howard
line: I'm not sure if I'm hoping for a boy or a girl. I mean, if it's a boy, I'm gonna have to teach him to play catch. Which means I'm gonna have to google how to play catch. If it's a girl, I mean, they're so innocent and you know how guys are.

name: Raj
line: Totally, guys are the worst. I mean, look at me. I let Emily make me a frittata and I kept the leftovers in Claire's fridge that night. I'm such a dog.

name: Howard
line: There you go again.

name: Raj
line: I'm sorry, have I been complaining about it too much?

name: Howard
line: Actually, what you're doing is pretending to complain, but really trying to brag.

name: Raj
line: How could you say that?

name: Howard
line: Oh, I wish could enjoy a cup of tea without a naked girl bouncing up and down on me.

name: Raj
line: I never said that.

name: Howard
line: Don't you hate it when you can't remember whose bra it is you found wedged in your couch?

name: Raj
line: Okay, that I said. But that's a real problem. You give a girl another woman's bra, and you will not be having sex with her that night. Maybe the other girl, but not her.

name: Amy
line: What's going on with him?

name: Penny
line: Oh, he's all bent out of shape about having a roommate agreement meeting.

name: Sheldon
line: Apparently, perfect attendance isn't cool any more.

name: Penny
line: Don't worry, he'll come around.

name: Amy
line: Well, I get why he's annoyed.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, then you don't understand what's happening. See, Leonard refused to participate in a mandatory quarterly roommate agreement meeting. This is what a generation raised on Bart Simpson looks like.

name: Leonard
line: You love The Simpsons.

name: Sheldon
line: I love Lisa Simpson.

name: Amy
line: Well, I know how he feels. I never enjoyed our relationship agreement meetings.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait. You were pretending?

name: Amy
line: Sorry.

name: Sheldon
line: No. I don't believe you. I could tell.

name: Amy
line: Oh, Sheldon, I never thought re-filing a matter in a standing subcommittee could be so fascinating.

name: Sheldon
line: Hmm, what do you think?

name: Penny
line: You don't know?

name: Raj
line: Hey, did I say something to upset you?

name: Howard
line: No, I'm fine.

name: Raj
line: Really? Because usually we walk side by side, and I just went up two flights of stairs staring at your bottom.

name: Howard
line: Just drop it.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I think I see what's happening here. You're jealous of me.

name: Howard
line: Oh, please. What could you possibly have that I would be jealous of?

name: Raj
line: It's not what I have, it's how many people I'm having it with.

name: Penny
line: Come on, Sheldon, we'll watch Game of Thrones over here.

name: Sheldon
line: Gladly.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, good, go. You know, it'll be nice to watch an episode without someone saying, I read the books, don't get too fond of this character.

name: Sheldon
line: It's not always because they die. In one case, it's because they've become involved with underground tree people from the dawn of time. Yeah, but I won't say who it is. It's Brann.

name: Howard
line: Wait, what is going on?

name: Penny
line: Leonard's being a jerk, so we're gonna watch over here.

name: Amy
line: Do you guys want to watch with us?

name: Howard
line: As long as I don't have to watch with him.

name: Raj
line: Fine, I don't want to watch with you either. I'll go over here.

name: Howard
line: Why do you get to pick?

name: Raj
line: Okay, then you go there.

name: Howard
line: Don't tell me where to go.

name: Leonard
line: Howard, just come in here.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, come on, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Wait, did Amy make her spinach dip?

name: Sheldon
line: She did.

name: Howard
line: And I'm gonna eat it all.

name: Howard
line: So what the hell happened?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I just ran out of patience with Sheldon's nonsense.

name: Howard
line: Tell me about it. I've had it with Raj, too.

name: Amy
line: You know, like women, men have a monthly hormone cycle. Dips in testosterone can cause irritability.

name: Howard
line: Interesting. Maybe my male cycle synced up with Raj's actual period.

name: Leonard
line: If Sheldon's testosterone dipped, he'd become a butterfly.  Oh. Maybe someone's here to apologize.

name: Stuart
line: Hey, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Uh, is this not a dress-up party?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Stuart
line: Was it ever a dress-up party?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Stuart
line: Howard, didn't you tell me it was a dress-up party?

name: Howard
line: Yeah.

name: Stuart
line: I was told this is where to go if I'm mad at Howard.

name: Penny
line: May I take your cloak?

name: Stuart
line: Thanks. This thing kept getting caught in the chain of my bike.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'll catch you up. Uh, Penny is angry at Leonard, Leonard's angry at me and Penny, I'm angry at Leonard and Amy, Raj is angry at Howard, and I'm angry at George R.R. Martin 'cause there are no new books for me to spoil for Leonard.

name: Stuart
line: So what happened with you and Howard?

name: Raj
line: Says I was talking too much about dating Claire and Emily, and I accused him of being jealous.

name: Stuart
line: I'm jealous. Closest I've come to dating two women was that time I dated one woman.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know how you put up with it. He's impossible. I mean, holding a meeting to decide what breakfast cereal we should buy.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Cap'n Crunch with Crunch Berries, move on.

name: Leonard
line: Anyway, Amy, thank you for sticking up for me.

name: Amy
line: Oh, I honestly couldn't care less.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry?

name: Amy
line: Well, I just took your side 'cause sometimes I get annoyed at how close Sheldon and Penny are.

name: Leonard
line: Well, they argue all the time. They aren't that close.

name: Amy
line: Who's always comforting him when he's upset?

name: Leonard
line: Penny, but...

name: Amy
line: Who's the only one who can make him take his medicine when he's sick?

name: Leonard
line: I try to hide it in his peanut butter, but he spits it out.

name: Amy
line: Okay. And did you know she has him add things to the roommate agreement so she can get her way and not fight with you about it?

name: Leonard
line: Son of a bitch. Why is that funny?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. I like the pain of others.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, well, then you'll enjoy this. Bernadette does the same thing with you and Koothrappali.

name: Howard
line: No, she doesn't.

name: Leonard
line: She defends him all the time.

name: Howard
line: She does not.

name: Amy
line: Who told you to stop making all those Gandhi jokes about him?

name: Howard
line: Well, she did. And human resources.

name: Leonard
line: Who do you think told Koothrappali to go to human resources?

name: Howard
line: Son of a bitch.

name: Leonard
line: You're, you're right, it feels good.

name: Raj
line: All right, it's almost game time. Get it? Game of Thrones, game time?

name: Stuart
line: Two women, huh?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, perhaps it's Amy coming to her senses.

name: Penny
line: What's up?

name: Leonard
line: You know, you don't need to use Sheldon to get your way with me in a dumb roommate agreement.

name: Penny
line: Where'd you get that from?

name: Leonard
line: From Amy.

name: Penny
line: Ugh. Amy, why did you tell him that?

name: Amy
line: Because you were defending Sheldon like you always do.

name: Penny
line: I don't always defend Sheldon.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yes, you do. You know you have a weird brother-sister-Elliott-E.T. relationship with him.

name: Penny
line: What about your weird relationship with him?

name: Leonard
line: That's different. I'm like the little girl in Poltergeist and he's the creepy thing in the TV.

name: Howard
line: Um, guys? Were there any nuts in that food?

name: Leonard
line: I don't think so. Why?

name: Howard
line: Well just a feeling.

name: Leonard
line: It just said Italian sub. I had no idea mortadella has pistachios in it.

name: Sheldon
line: Interesting fact, in Italian, the morta in mortadella means death.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I didn't say fun fact. I'm not a monster.

name: Bernadette
line: He's gonna be okay.

name: Sheldon
line: Now it's a fun fact.

name: Stuart
line: Boy, stuff like this really puts things in perspective.

name: Bernadette
line: Why are you dressed like that?

name: Stuart
line: Oh, uh, Howard thought it'd be funny to tell me it was a costume party.

name: Bernadette
line: That wasn't nice.

name: Stuart
line: No, but he almost died, so we're cool.

name: Raj
line: You know, if you think about it, tonight was kind of like a real-life Game of Thrones.

name: Amy
line: How?

name: Raj
line: Well, Howard eating that pistachio was like when King Joffrey got poisoned.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, that was murder, this was an accident.

name: Raj
line: Okay. But you using Sheldon to do your dirty work is like when Cersei used the King's Guard to do her bidding.

name: Sheldon
line: Cersei uses her body to manipulate men. Penny just takes me to The LEGO Store.

name: Raj
line: Okay. Oh, how about this? Stuart's dressed like a brother of the Night's Watch, and they don't have sex.

name: Penny
line: There you go.

name: Leonard
line: That's true.

name: Sheldon
line: Fair enough.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Bernadette
line: You all right?

name: Howard
line: I'm fine. Just a little embarrassed I had to be carried down the stairs like a baby. Thanks.

name: Leonard
line: Let's get out of here.

name: Amy
line: That was scary.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, the important thing is I said that big sandwich would ruin everything, and I was right.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Jon Snow. How come your horse has a basket on it?

name: Stuart
line: How come your head has your face on it?

name: Sheldon
line: They don't wear bicycle helmets in Game of Thrones. You're thematically inaccurate, but I applaud your commitment to safety.

name: Stuart
line: Don't you guys have anything better to do?

name: Leonard
line: Better than watching a guy in a fur cloak ride a girl's bike? Nope.

name: Stuart
line: That's it, you just lost bathroom privileges at the comic book store. Horse has a basket on it. Stupid... aaargh!

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard.  Leonard.  Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I never got to ask my question about Batman.

name: Leonard
line: What is it?

name: Sheldon
line: If Batman were bitten by a radioactive Man-Bat, and then fought crime disguised as Man-Bat, would he be Man-Bat-Man-Bat-Man or simply Man-Bat-Man-Bat-Batman?

name: Penny
line: Is he still wearing the Batman suit under the Man-Bat suit?

name: Sheldon
line: I'll be back.

name: Penny
line: Oh, hey, if you guys are free this weekend, I won a night of wine tasting from work.

name: Leonard
line: That sounds fun.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Leonard
line: How come scientists don't win free stuff like salespeople do?

name: Howard
line: ‘Cause we're not in it for the stuff. We're in it for the groupies.

name: Sheldon
line: Personally, I find the notion of external rewards demeaning. I pursue science for the intrinsic joy of discovery.

name: Amy
line: But you always say that you want to win a Nobel Prize.

name: Sheldon
line: I also say don't contradict me in front of my friends, but that you don't remember.

name: Penny
line: All right, well, let me know if you guys want to go.

name: Raj
line: I would love to. I do enjoy the complexity of an aged Pinot noir.

name: Leonard
line: I'm sure that would pair nicely with your fried nuggets of chicken.

name: Amy
line: Well, it sounds like a nice night. We should go.

name: Sheldon
line: Wine again? Yeah, no, thank you. I like my grapes the old-fashioned way, in a juice box.

name: Amy
line: Well, I'm going. You couldn't stop me from getting a massage at the mall, and you're not stopping me now.

name: Sheldon
line: I shouldn't have to see my girlfriend get groped in public by another man.

name: Amy
line: And I shouldn't have to see my boyfriend riding on a train for children around the mall.

name: Penny
line: The little choo-choo for toddlers?

name: Amy
line: And now you know why I needed the massage.

name: Howard
line: Well, we're out. Bernie can't drink 'cause she's pregnant. And she's pregnant because we had sex. And we had sex because, well, come on.

name: Bernadette
line: It's okay, you should go.

name: Howard
line: You sure?

name: Bernadette
line: Of course.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, give her a break from, well, come on.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Bernadette, looks like Saturday night, it's you and me.

name: Bernadette
line: Me? How? Why?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it makes perfect sense. Because you're an expectant mother, you can't drink alcohol. I don't like to. You can't have sushi. I don't like to. You can't go in hot tubs. I consider them vats of sweaty people soup.

name: Bernadette
line: Gee, Sheldon, I don't know.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, come on. Roller coasters, caffeine, runny eggs, I've been avoiding these things all my life. And now, because you're pregnant, you have to.

name: Leonard
line: The difference is she's bringing life into the world, and you suck it out.

name: Bernadette
line: I guess we could give it a try.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, little lady, you've heard of party hearty, get ready to party hardly.

name: Howard
line: I bet you'd like a drink right now.

name: Raj
line: Hey, you think it'd be okay if I brought Claire to the wine tasting?

name: Leonard
line: Sure. I'd like to meet her.

name: Raj
line: Oh, that's great. I've been wanting her to meet you guys, too, so this seems like the perfect opportunity.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, but I won't be there.

name: Raj
line: Funny how that worked out.

name: Leonard
line: Does this mean Emily's not in the picture anymore?

name: Raj
line: No, I'm still dating her.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, help me out. How are you doing this? Do they know about each other?

name: Raj
line: They know that we're not exclusive, and we just don't ask too many questions.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, it's like how I play Warlords of Ka'a with you and Elder Sign with Frank and Alicia.

name: Leonard
line: Who's Frank and Alicia?

name: Sheldon
line: You, you and I spend a lot of time together. Can there be a little mystery between us?

name: Howard
line: Okay. Everything's hooked up. We're ready.

name: Sheldon
line: I am going to record this for posterity.

name: Leonard
line: All right, here goes nothing.

name: Sheldon
line: Here goes nothing? This is the initial test of our prototype. Can we give it a little more gravitas?

name: Leonard
line: Fine. Preliminary trial of the infinite persistence gyroscopic navigational system, phase one commencing.

name: Sheldon
line: Eh, maybe it's your voice. I'm gonna see if I can get James Earl Jones to do it in post.

name: Raj
line: It's, it's beautiful.

name: Howard
line: Actually, it's making me dizzy.

name: Leonard
line: Good, it's not just me.

name: Claire
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Claire.

name: Claire
line: Hey, what's up?

name: Raj
line: Hi, yeah. Um, I was wondering, if you're free Saturday night, all my friends are going to a wine tasting.

name: Claire
line: Sure, I guess. If you don't think meeting your friends is too big a step.

name: Raj
line: Why would it be too big a step?

name: Claire
line: I don't know. I just don't want things to get weird.

name: Raj
line: Nothing to worry about. People meet people all the time, and it isn't weird. I met Bon Jovi once, which you'd think might be weird. Turns out, total sweetheart.

name: Claire
line: Okay, but you and I have been keeping things casual. Uh, will you introduce me as your friend or as your girlfriend? What if I like them and they don't like me? What if they like me and I don't like them?

name: Raj
line: Boy, it wasn't this hard with Bon Jovi. I said you rock, he said, thanks, man, and that was that.

name: Penny
line: Hey, you ready to go?

name: Leonard
line: Hang on.

name: Penny
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, I found a scratch-and-sniff book about wine tasting. It teaches the different flavour notes to look for.

name: Penny
line: You actually smell the wine?

name: Leonard
line: I mostly just smell my nasal spray.

name: Penny
line: Are your sinuses acting up?

name: Leonard
line: Since my preschool got a bunny.

name: Penny
line: Hey, are you still hanging out with Bernadette tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. And we're going to prove that we don't need alcohol to enjoy ourselves.

name: Penny
line: Oh, good for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Or caffeine, tobacco, sushi, soft cheese, processed meats and jacuzzis, which can all be harmful to an unborn baby.

name: Penny
line: No honey baked ham in a hot tub, got it.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no bubble baths either. They can increase the risk of a urinary tract infection.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, have fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, and no swordfish, king mackerel, shark or tilefish, which are all high in mercury.

name: Leonard
line: We're leaving now!

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, and no contact with guinea pigs or hamsters or their droppings, uh, no-no cat litter boxes, no paint fumes.

name: Penny
line: Okay, we're leaving, love you, bye.

name: Sheldon
line: Boy, do I love restrictions.

name: Howard
line: Hey. Where is everybody?

name: Amy
line: Oh, we're the first ones here.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Cool.

name: Amy
line: Yeah. Cool.

name: Howard
line: You know, I don't remember the last time it was just you and me hanging out.

name: Amy
line: Oh, I do. It was three years ago.

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah, and we said we should do it more often. And, and, and, and, and here we are.

name: Amy
line: So, Sheldon and Bernadette are hanging out.

name: Howard
line: I know. What are they gonna talk about?

name: Amy
line: I don't know. I really don't know.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: Oh, good.

name: Amy
line: Oh, thank God.

name: Penny
line: You guys been here long?

name: Howard
line: No, two minutes.

name: Amy
line: But yes.

name: Howard
line: Where's Claire?

name: Raj
line: Oh, she's meeting us here. Hey, guys, do me a favour and don't ask too many questions about the relationship. We're just keeping it casual.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, so I shouldn't ask her how she feels about being a member of your harem?

name: Raj
line: Yeah, I know you're teasing, but watch out for karma.

name: Amy
line: Hey, Penny, isn't that your old boyfriend Zack?

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Amy
line: Are you gonna say hi to him?

name: Penny
line: Uh, I don't know.

name: Raj
line: Hey, while you decide, who was better in bed, big hot Zack or wheezy little Leonard? Neener neener.

name: Bernadette
line: I brought sparkling cider.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, the bubbles tickle my nose. I'll just open this now so it can get nice and flat before we drink it.

name: Bernadette
line: So what do you want to do tonight?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I have quite the evening planned. Our foetus-friendly festival of fun begins with an in-depth look at the world of model trains, and then we'll kick things up a notch and explore all the different ways that you can make toast.

name: Bernadette
line: There's more than one?

name: Sheldon
line: You've heard of French toast?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Cinnamon toast?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Melba toast?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: You get where I'm going here?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah.

name: Amy
line: I'm getting an earthy note.

name: Penny
line: Ah, there's definitely some oak.

name: Raj
line: Also, uh, cherries?

name: Leonard
line: I smell nothing.

name: Howard
line: Really? Nothing?

name: Leonard
line: Just a whole lot of Afrin.

name: Zack
line: Penny?

name: Penny
line: Oh. Zack, hi. You guys remember Zack.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, hey, buddy.

name: Amy
line: Hello.

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Zack
line: Hey, did you two get married?

name: Penny
line: We did.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, mm-hmm.

name: Zack
line: To each other?

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Zack
line: Cool. ‘Cause other than when you broke up with him and dated me, then broke up with me, and then dated me one more time before going back to him, I was always rooting for you two.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks.

name: Zack
line: So how's the science world? What are you guys up to?

name: Howard
line: We've actually been working on a prototype for a navigation system we invented.

name: Leonard
line: But we won't bore you with the details.

name: Zack
line: Are you kidding? I love science. Einstein, Stephen Hawking, Mike deGrasse Tyson.

name: Amy
line: Mike deGrasse Tyson?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, you know, the boxer who grew a moustache and became a scientist.

name: Zack
line: So what's your invention?

name: Howard
line: Well, we're using quantum vortices to replace gyroscopes in guidance systems.

name: Leonard
line: What's neat is that they can maintain angular momentum indefinitely.

name: Zack
line: Angular momentum. I was wondering about that.

name: Howard
line: You could put it in a satellite or a rocket, and it'll run forever.

name: Zack
line: Cool. Could it be used for missiles and war stuff?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, but we didn't create it for weapons.

name: Leonard
line: And I doubt the military would be interested in our little guidance system.

name: Zack
line: Is it better than the one they use now?

name: Howard
line: A lot.

name: Leonard
line: Way better.

name: Zack
line: Huh. You sure you guys are smart?

name: Sheldon
line: H-O gauge trains are 1/87th scale. N gauge are 1/160th scale. And that brings us to Z gauge, at a, you could easily swallow it, don't ask how I know, 1 to 220.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sorry, I have to ask.

name: Sheldon
line: When I was five, I ingested a Z gauge locomotive. I spent the next three days saying, I think I can pass it, I think I can pass it, I think I can pass it.

name: Bernadette
line: What is it about trains that you like so much?

name: Sheldon
line: What an interesting question. When I was a child, life was confusing and chaotic for me, and trains represented order. I could line them up, categorize them, control them. I guess you could say that they gave me a sense of calm in a world that didn't.

name: Bernadette
line: That's lovely, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, other than when they're chugging through your bowels, these things are magic.

name: Leonard
line: I have to admit, I've been worried about the military applications since we started talking about this.

name: Howard
line: Me, too.

name: Leonard
line: Why didn't you say something?

name: Howard
line: Same reason I don't talk about ass cancer. It's not a pleasant topic.

name: Raj
line: You can't let this stop you. Almost any scientific advancement can be used for destructive purposes.

name: Amy
line: It's true. Even Einstein's theory of relativity was later applied to the development of nuclear weapons.

name: Penny
line: E equals MC squared. Yeah. E is for energy, M for mass, and C for the speed of light.

name: Amy
line: How do you know that?

name: Penny
line: Oh, Leonard mumbles it when he wants sex to last longer.

name: Claire
line: Hey, Raj.

name: Raj
line: Hey, Claire. Good, you're here. Guys, this is my friend Claire. We're casually dating, and there's no need for any further questions about it.

name: Leonard
line: Would you like a glass of wine?

name: Raj
line: I said no questions.

name: Sheldon
line: And last but not least, this is one that I like to call Star Wars Toast because it has a light side and a dark side. All righty, it's time for Dungeons & Dragons.

name: Bernadette
line: Dungeons & Dragons? That sounds about right.

name: Sheldon
line: You're gonna enjoy this. I designed it especially for you.
