line: Okay, but just for a little bit.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I have a feeling that once you start, you're not gonna want to or be allowed to stop.

name: Bernadette
line: All right.

name: Sheldon
line: Ready?

name: Bernadette
line: You bet.

name: Sheldon
line: Your name is Bernatrix. You are a warrior queen. You're strong, beautiful and tall.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. I like the idea of being tall.

name: Sheldon
line: I think you're gonna like a lot of things I have in store. For example, in this world, only the men get pregnant, so your husband is home trying not to pee when he laughs.

name: Bernadette
line: This is getting fun. What's next?

name: Sheldon
line: You're parched and weary from battle. You stand in front of a tavern that serves the coldest, most delicious ale in all the realm.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, I haven't had a drink in months.

name: Sheldon
line: What do you do?

name: Bernadette
line: I storm in, slam my sword down, and say, barkeep, bring me the strongest ale you have and serve it in the skull of a goblin.

line: He wants to see I.D.

line: So, Claire, we've heard so many wonderful things about you.

line: Boy, you get some dirty looks over there when you ask for ice.

line: Zack, this is my friend Claire.

line: You're hot. You seeing anybody?

line: We're just keeping it casual.

line: Why is he being casual with you? You seem great.

name: Claire
line: I don't know. Ask him.

name: Zack
line: Why are you being casual with her? She seems great.

name: Leonard
line: Maybe we should take a step back.

line: Take a step back? I'm not a young man any more.

name: Leonard
line: No, I mean re-evaluate what we're doing with the guidance system.

name: Howard
line: But I got a baby on the way. I got to make some money.

name: Leonard
line: What good is money gonna do if we inadvertently bring about Armageddon?

name: Howard
line: Okay, let me stop you right there. We absolutely know our invention will not be used to destroy the world.

line: Very funny.

name: Howard
line: Okay, then. Geez, how much wine did you drink?

line: Not a lot. I just couldn't start until you walked away.

name: Sheldon
line: The Hell Prawn lunges out of the hot spring. You block it with your shield. Do you attack?

name: Bernadette
line: Does it have eyes?

name: Sheldon
line: Three giant red ones and they never blink. It's unsettling.

name: Bernadette
line: I stab it in the middle eye.

name: Sheldon
line: Good choice. Critical hit. Your sword goes through its eye into its tiny brain. With its final dying gasp, it says, you have reduced me to a pile of sushi. Enjoy me with this packet of soy sauce. It's low sodium. Aaaah.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, I guess I should eat the Hell Prawn.

name: Sheldon
line: Using your sword, you prepare a beautiful sushi dinner. You slip into the hot spring and enjoy the warm water on your aching joints. As you happily close your eyes, you recall the incredible evening you've had and notice that your feet and ankles are smaller than they've ever been. The end.

name: Bernadette
line: Wow, this night turned out to be so much more fun than I thought.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, the fun doesn't stop. You're still going home with a goodie bag full of toast.

name: Bernadette
line: Thank you for this. You know, ever since people found out I'm having a baby, I feel like I became Pregnant Bernadette. It was nice to take a little break tonight.

name: Sheldon
line: I can understand that. From the moment people realized I was a genius, I've been Sheldon the Genius. Although I've never really wanted a break from that, so I suppose I don't understand. Which is ironic 'cause, you know, genius.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, thanks again.

name: Sheldon
line: You're welcome. And any time you need a break from being Bernadette the Pregnant, Bernatrix the Warrior Queen is here waiting.

line: I might just take you up on that.

line: I mean, come on, look at you. You're classically handsome, you've got a swimmer's body. Next to you, I look like me.

line: Anything for you, my little foreign friend.

line: Yes.

line: Taylor Swift.

line: Yes. Kardashian.

line: See, I remembered because if it looks like Kim it's Kim, if it looks kind of like Kim it's Kourtney, and if it looks nothing like Kim it's Khloe.

line: I'm not surprised Leonard chose to avoid picking me up. He's battled intimacy issues his whole life. Does he have difficulty maintaining erections?

line: Wow. Didn't even make it out of the parking lot. Uh, you know what, enough about Leonard. Let's talk about you. What would you like to do while you're here?

line: Stuart, what are you doing here?

line: I don't understand. You were happy to do this when I hired you. Why, why are you upset with me now?

name: Amy

line: Oh, it's all right, dear. Sheldon has a brilliant and complicated mind. It's understandable that being in a relationship with him could be trying.

line: Well, I do admire your resolve. You're an extraordinary woman.

line: Hello, everyone. Oh, Beverly, good to see you. I'd love to chat, but there's a line that could start moving any minute, so let's do this. Amy? A proper apology requires three steps. Step one, an admission of wrongdoing. Amy, I was wrong. Step two, a promise never to repeat said action. Amy, that action will never be repeated, and that's a promise. Step three, an earnest request for forgiveness. Amy, I hope you can forgive me. And I hope you do it right now, 'cause there's an Uber waiting downstairs, and I don't want to repeat this apology nonsense with my driver Ganesh.

line: Oh, thanks, you're a peach. Beverly, we'll catch up soon. Bernadette, it was a pleasure as always, Penny, you have spinach in your teeth.

line: Okay, you know what? This is ridiculous. I've been trying to make a connection with you all day, and clearly I'm getting nowhere.

line: They work for SHIELD, which is a sanctioned department of the U.S. Government. Do you work for a sanctioned department of the U.S. Government?

line: Well, what a sad state of affairs. That you've all been so ground down by life, you don't even notice when someone disrespects you.

line: I can't believe we're gonna get beat up, and it's not because of your chair.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, right now, at the back of this line, there's a movie fan like you who's not going to get in, because this person simply doesn't care. Yeah, well, 61 years ago, there was another person at the back of the line and her name was Rosa Parks.

line: Okay, you may have to pretend you're black to get us out of here.

name: Sheldon
line: Now, let's follow in that brave woman's footsteps, and stand up for ourselves. And, and I realize that she stood up by remaining seated, but now is not the time to enjoy the irony of that. Now, I ask you again. Who here takes issue with this person...

name: Woman
line: Why should we listen to you? You cut the line yourself.

name: Sheldon
line: I most certainly did not.

name: Woman
line: I saw you.

name: Man
line: If you're feeling dizzy, it's because the tables have turned.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, I paid someone to wait in line for me, and then when I arrived, he left, so what you saw, my good woman, was swapsies, not cutsies. Oh, no, no, no, no, wait, I ask you all again, a show of hands. Who here takes issue... well, stop moving. he's gonna get in.

name: Leonard
line: Buddy, let it go.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I can't. This isn't right.

name: Leonard
line: You did everything you could.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I could've done more.

name: Leonard
line: Now, now, you denigrated the memory of a great civil rights pioneer. That's all anyone could ask.

name: Penny
line: To be honest, I'm surprised you cared about the wedding at all.

name: Beverly
line: I'm still human, Penny. Not getting invited to my own son's wedding is difficult to ignore.

name: Amy
line: I know how you feel. She didn't invite any of us.

name: Penny
line: It was spur of the moment.

name: Bernadette
line: But we did get to see a live stream of it on the Internet.

name: Beverly
line: I could've watched it on the Internet?

name: Penny
line: Thank you. So if we would have asked you to come to Vegas to see us get married, you would've come?

name: Beverly
line: No, I would've said you're making a huge mistake. But an invitation would've been nice.

name: Penny
line: You really think we made a mistake?

name: Beverly
line: At the time I did. But I've never seen Leonard so happy, so perhaps I was wrong.

name: Penny
line: Wow. Okay. Well, um, how about this? Maybe while you're still in town, Leonard and I could have another small ceremony. You know, if you're interested.

name: Beverly
line: I would find that perfectly acceptable.

name: Penny
line: She would find it perfectly acceptable. You guys saw it. We bonded.

name: Bernadette
line: Howie? You doing okay? You've been in there a while.

name: Howard
line: I'm fine. Be right out. Am I an American hero? Well, that's a good question, Jim. Don't you think once an astronaut leaves the planet, he's a hero to all the nations of the Earth? Okey dokey. I think I have time for one more question.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Hi, how was the screening?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Sheldon invoked Rosa Parks to make somebody who cut the line feel bad, but only the white people felt bad.

name: Penny
line: Ugh, I should've never bought him that colouring book that explains Black History Month.

name: Leonard
line: How'd it go with my mother?

name: Penny
line: Uh, you know, it started a little rocky, but I think we got to a good place.

name: Leonard
line: Wow. Well done.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, and when I dropped her off at the hotel, she even gave me a hug.

name: Leonard
line: Did she think you were choking or... I'm sorry, that's great. Thank you for spending time with her.

name: Penny
line: No problem. Um, so listen, I don't know if you have any plans next weekend, but I kind of promised your mom we'd have another wedding ceremony so she could attend this time.

name: Leonard
line: Wait, we're gonna get married again?

name: Penny
line: Yeah, kind of, but now we can invite our friends and family.

name: Leonard
line: Seems like a lot of trouble for a hug.

name: Penny
line: Come on, it'll be fun, and, you know, your mom was genuinely hurt we didn't invite her to the first one.

name: Leonard
line: Look, in our defence, it was kind of a spur of the moment thing, and also, we don't like her.

name: Penny
line: Leonard, come on, she's your mom. If we can do something to make her happy, why wouldn't we?

name: Leonard
line: I just said why, we don't like her.

name: Penny
line: Hey, look, then forget about her, let's do it for us. We could keep it small and informal. This time we can invite our families.

name: Leonard
line: Is your brother out of prison?

name: Penny
line: Thanks to overcrowding, yeah.

name: Leonard
line: I'd love it if my dad could come.

name: Penny
line: Oh, you have to invite him. I haven't seen him since the divorce.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, he's like a different man. He stopped twitching, and I think he grew an inch and a half.

name: Penny
line: Well, then it's settled. Yay. So funny. I never thought my second marriage would be to you.

name: Penny
line: Okay, so it's not a legal ceremony, it's just a chance for us to redo our vows so everyone can be part of it.

name: Amy
line: So there's no maid of honour?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Amy
line: Huh. But if I were to, say, wear a purple satin dress with a sweetheart neckline and stand near you, you wouldn't be able to stop me, right?

name: Penny
line: I don't see how I could.

name: Amy
line: Then I graciously accept.

name: Bernadette
line: Who's going to officiate?

name: Penny
line: I was kind of hoping you would.

name: Amy
line: Wait, now I'm just some lousy maid of honour?

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, good news, I just got off the phone with my mother. She is coming to the wedding.

name: Penny
line: Okay, wait, you're inviting people to our wedding?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, I'm inviting people to our wedding. Yeah, I've already asked Stephen Hawking and Robert Downey Jr, and, now don't get your hopes up, 'cause he's pretty busy, but Erno Rubik.

name: Bernadette
line: Who's Erno Rubik?

name: Sheldon
line: Seriously? He invented the Rubik's Cube.

name: Penny
line: Okay, fine, but why would you invite him to our wedding?

name: Sheldon
line: Because, despite his fame and fortune, he strikes me as a lonely man.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, it's very sweet of you to go to all this trouble for Leonard's mother.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm also doing it for Leonard. I think this could really help their relationship.

name: Beverly
line: How dare you invite your father without consulting me.

name: Leonard
line: Sorry, but I don't think I need your permission to have my father at my wedding.

name: Beverly
line: You do understand our marriage ended because he had an affair.

name: Leonard
line: I know, and there's no excuse for that.

name: Beverly
line: He claimed I was cold, emasculating, and hadn't shown him any physical affection for years.

name: Leonard
line: I was wrong, there's three excuses for that.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God. It's working.

name: Raj
line: You sure?

name: Howard
line: Look. The system is maintaining its own stability, the quantum vortex apparatus is now controlling the orientation.

name: Raj
line: You're right. You realize what this means?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. I do. It's proof of concept. We've got a workable guidance system.

name: Raj
line: Congratulations.

name: Howard
line: Thanks. Hey, I just got an e-mail from the U.S. Air Force.

name: Raj
line: Open it.

name: Howard
line: Hmm. We request a meeting at your earliest convenience regarding your quantum guidance system, provisional patent 62/295118. That's weird.

name: Raj
line: Is there a window around here we don't know about?

name: Howard
line: I'm sure it's just a coincidence.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, of course. What else could it be? Boy, do I love America.

name: Mary Cooper
line: Thank you for picking me up.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, you're welcome.

name: Mary
line: I was speaking to your young lady.

name: Amy
line: My pleasure, Mrs. Cooper.

name: Mary
line: Oh, please call me Mary.

name: Amy
line: Okay, Mary.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, that doesn't work for me, let's stay with Mrs. Cooper.

name: Mary
line: Sheldon, don't be silly.

name: Sheldon
line: Wu-wu, what? That's what I called you till I got to know you better.

name: Mary
line: It was so nice of Leonard and Penny to invite me.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, actually, I...

name: Amy
line: It sure was.

name: Mary
line: I've always had a special place in my heart for Leonard. Taking care of my baby all these years.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me, I take care of him.

name: Mary
line: Sure you do. So who else is coming to this shindig?

name: Amy
line: Oh, well, the usual gang. Penny's family is coming tomorrow.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, and Leonard's mother's already here.

name: Mary
line: Oh, Beverly. How nice.

name: Amy
line: You've met her, right?

name: Mary
line: Yes, I have.

name: Sheldon
line: Mother, she's an atheist, not a vampire.

name: Mary
line: Either way, let's stop and get some garlic.

name: Beverly
line: So, Mary, how have you been?

name: Mary
line: Well, thank you so much for asking. I've been well, and you?

name: Beverly
line: Very good.

name: Mary
line: Good.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know what we were worried about, they're getting along great.

name: Mary
line: Sheldon tells me your husband's coming.

name: Beverly
line: My ex-husband.

name: Mary
line: Oh, I'm so sorry.

name: Beverly
line: Don't be.

name: Mary
line: All right.

name: Penny
line: Whew, chilly.

name: Amy
line: I think I can see my breath.

name: Beverly
line: We can hear you.

name: Penny
line: Sorry.

name: Amy
line: Sorry.

name: Howard
line: I can't believe I was so naive. The military is just gonna take over the whole project. And you know what happens if we object? We disappear. Like off the map. Like every American Idol winner since season four.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, Howard, you're overreacting.

name: Howard
line: Am I? Am I? What, what do you want to bet some black ops guy is reprinting my high school yearbook and I'm no longer in it? That chess club picture is now just David Zimmerman and Elaine Cho.

name: Raj
line: Okay, look, I'm on the Air Force Web site, and the department that e-mailed you is in charge of acquisitions. So maybe they just want to give you a lot of money for your invention.

name: Howard
line: Oh, please, that's not how it works. You saw E.T., Avatar, Jurassic World. The military just shows up and takes over.

name: Bernadette
line: You do realize those weren't documentaries, right?

name: Howard
line: I'm sorry, you find this funny?

name: Raj
line: No, I was just thinking about Jurassic World. Boy, that was terrible.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, we have to use the stairs.

name: Alfred Hofstadter
line: When are they gonna fix your elevator?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I don't, any day now.

name: Alfred
line: Well, the stairs are fine. Besides, your mother is up there. Maybe I'll have a heart attack and not have to see her.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I, I know things are a little rough with you and Mom, but I'm really glad you're here.

name: Alfred
line: Me, too. I should have never had that angioplasty because I feel fine.

name: Leonard
line: Penny's really looking forward to seeing you.

name: Alfred
line: Ah, she's a sweetie. You got a good one there, Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: Thanks, Dad.

name: Alfred
line: How the hell did you do that?

name: Sheldon
line: Isn't this nice?

name: Leonard
line: Hey, we're here.

name: Penny
line: Alfred. Thank you for coming!

name: Alfred
line: Oh. Well, happy to be here. And congratulations.

name: Penny
line: Thank you.

name: Leonard
line: Dad, you remember Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: Dr. Hofstadter.

name: Alfred
line: Dr. Cooper.

name: Leonard
line: This is Sheldon's mother, Mary.

name: Alfred
line: How do you do?

name: Mary
line: Nice to meet you.

name: Leonard
line: And his girlfriend, Amy.

name: Alfred
line: A pleasure.

name: Amy
line: Hi.

name: Leonard
line: And, of course, Mom.

name: Alfred
line: Hello, my hateful shrew.

name: Beverly
line: Hello to you, you wrinkled old bastard.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, now I'm starting to sense a little tension.

name: Leonard
line: All right, you two, don't start. Penny and I are throwing this second wedding for your benefit. Can you please not ruin it?

name: Alfred
line: Of course. I'm sorry.

name: Beverly
line: Oh, look at that, you can apologize.

name: Leonard
line: Mom.

name: Beverly
line: I'm sorry.

name: Mary
line: You know, the Bible says forgiveness...

name: Sheldon
line: Mom.

name: Mary
line: I'm sorry.

name: Penny
line: Uh, who's hungry? We have a reservation at the best restaurant in town.

name: Sheldon
line: It only got three-and-a-half stars on Yelp.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm not sorry. That's true.

name: Howard
line: I don't know what to do. It's the Air Force. I mean, should I respond to their e-mail? Ignore it?

name: Raj
line: You can't ignore it. It's not that postcard that says it's time to go back to the dentist.

name: Bernadette
line: Guys, come on. We're meeting everyone for dinner.

name: Howard
line: One sec. I'm just afraid if I respond, then they'll know I got it.

name: Raj
line: Oh, dude. The minute you opened that e-mail, they knew you got it. I mean, they're probably looking at you through the camera right now. I love America.

name: Bernadette
line: Are you done with this nonsense?

name: Howard
line: It's not nonsense. This is how the U.S. military works.

name: Raj
line: Oh, if it's even the U.S. Military. It could be foreign military pretending to be American.

name: Howard
line: You're right. We turn our guidance system over to them, next thing we know, they're using it against us.

name: Raj
line: I also love the enemies of America.

name: Beverly
line: Penny, I hope the example of my failed marriage to Leonard's father doesn't discourage you from the commitment you've made to one another.

name: Penny
line: No, of course not.

name: Beverly
line: Although Alfred and I had a lot more going for us than you two.

name: Leonard
line: Mom, please save something for the toast.

name: Mary
line: So, Alfred, what is it that you do for a living?

name: Alfred
line: Oh, I'm an anthropologist. I study ancient peoples and cultures.

name: Mary
line: My goodness, so all the way back to the Flood.

name: Sheldon
line: Don't laugh, she wasn't joking.

name: Amy
line: Play with your phone.

name: Alfred
line: Well, on that note, there are many cultures that have an apocalyptic flood as part of their mythology.

name: Mary
line: I don't have a mythology. I have the unerring Word of God. But that's very interesting.

name: Alfred
line: Oh. I, I didn't mean to disparage your faith. Actually, I admire it.

name: Mary
line: Really?

name: Alfred
line: Yes. Yes, I'm an agnostic myself, but I have prayed, many times, to God, to turn my wife into a pillar of salt.

name: Mary
line: Well, He came close. Turned her into a giant block of ice.

name: Raj
line: Howard, there must be someone at the university you can go to for help.

name: Howard
line: Are you kidding? They're probably the ones who leaked it to the military in the first place.

name: Raj
line: What about the guy on the Channel Four News? You know, Four on Your Side? Maybe he can be on your side.

name: Howard
line: I'm being harassed by the government, not trying to get to the bottom of a dog-walking scam.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, stop. You know what's really happening? All the movies you've watched, the TV shows, the comic books, they've completely twisted your thinking. No one's after you, no one's listening to you, no one cares about you.

name: Raj
line: I'd like to think the Four on Your Side guy cares about me.

name: Penny
line: You know, Beverly, I know you and Alfred have your differences, but if you think about it, if you hadn't married him, there'd be no Leonard. So that's good, right?

name: Beverly
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Is that Howard in front of us?

name: Penny
line: Oh, maybe. Get closer.

name: Howard
line: Oh, God. I think someone's following us.

name: Bernadette
line: You're being ridiculous.

name: Howard
line: I'm not being ridiculous, he's right on my tail.

name: Raj
line: Uh, turn left here and see if he turns with us.

name: Penny
line: Well, why is he turning here? The restaurant's the other way.

name: Leonard
line: I don't know. He uses that traffic app. Maybe there's an accident.

name: Penny
line: Oh, so follow him.

name: Raj
line: Oh, no.

name: Howard
line: I told you.

name: Bernadette
line: It's probably just a coincidence. Speed up a little, see if he stays with you.

name: Penny
line: Well, go faster. You're losing him.

name: Leonard
line: What is his hurry?

name: Penny
line: You know what, flash your lights. Let him know it's you.

name: Howard
line: He's flashing his lights. What's that mean?

name: Raj
line: I, I think he wants us to pull over.

name: Bernadette
line: Do not pull over. I'm not raising this baby alone.

name: Howard
line: Hang on.

name: Alfred
line: So, after your husband passed, you never remarried?

name: Mary
line: No, just focused on work and the church.

name: Alfred
line: Ah. And what do you do?

name: Mary
line: I work at the church.

name: Alfred
line: Well, they're lucky to have you.

name: Mary
line: Well, thank you.

name: Alfred
line: You're welcome.

name: Amy
line: Do you realize what's happening here?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I do. They're filling up on bread and ruining their meal.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Amy
line: What took you guys so long?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, we were following Howard, but for some reason, he turned off his headlights and went up a one-way street.

name: Penny
line: So, what did we miss?

name: Alfred
line: Oh, just Mary and I getting to know each other a little.

name: Mary
line: Leonard, your father is just charming.

name: Beverly
line: He's also broke. Did he mention that?

name: Leonard
line: Okay, Mom, you sit over there.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, I'm gonna call Bernadette and see what's keeping them.

name: Sheldon
line: If I'd known you were broke, I wouldn't have made a big deal about the bread.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Penny. What are you talking about? Oh, that was you? Long story. Why don't you go ahead and eat. We're gonna be a while.

name: Howard
line: I'm telling you, I'm not on drugs. The government's out to get me.

name: Alfred
line: Now, one of the more exciting things to be found recently is that Neanderthals and Homo Sapiens frequently mated with each other.

name: Mary
line: Well, that certainly explains my marriage to Sheldon's father.

name: Sheldon
line: That's funny, because my father was not a very clever man.

name: Amy
line: I'd be lost without you.

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I would like to propose a toast to my wife and bride-to-be.

name: Sheldon
line: See, that's funny because...

name: Amy
line: Back to your phone.

name: Leonard
line: Penny, I've always known I loved you, but this last year has shown me that I also love being married to you. Thank you for saying yes.

name: Penny
line: Oh, thanks for asking until I did.

name: Amy
line: Hear, hear.

name: Leonard
line: Cheers.

name: Alfred
line: I, uh, I would also like to make a toast.

name: Penny
line: Aw.

name: Alfred
line: Leonard, I am so happy that you have found a woman who loves and cares for you.

name: Beverly
line: What the hell is that supposed to mean?

name: Alfred
line: Why don't you take a pill?

name: Beverly
line: Like you did before sex?

name: Alfred
line: What I really needed was a blindfold.

name: Beverly
line: Oh, dear woman, can you please read another book?

name: Mary
line: When God writes one, I will.

name: Penny
line: Um, if, if we want to order the soufflé, we might want to get on that.

name: Alfred
line: Leonard, if you don't mind, I, I think I'm a little tired. I'm gonna call it a night.

name: Leonard
line: Sure, Dad.

name: Mary
line: I'm a little tuckered out myself, so I will see you all in the morning.

name: Alfred
line: Would you like to share a cab?

name: Mary
line: That would be fine.

name: Alfred
line: Where are you staying?

name: Mary
line: I'm at the Westin.

name: Alfred
line: Oh, so am I. Can I interest you in a nightcap?

name: Mary
line: I think that you could.

name: Leonard
line: What is happening there?

name: Sheldon
line: I think it's pretty obvious. They don't want dessert 'cause they filled up on bread.

name: Sheldon
line: She's still not answering.

name: Leonard
line: My father's not texting me back.

name: Penny
line: ‘Cause they both turned their phones off.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't like this at all.

name: Leonard
line: I don't like it either.

name: Penny
line: Really? ‘Cause I love it.

name: Sheldon
line: Would you pass the mustard?

name: Leonard
line: Sure. Hey, want to hear a fun fact about mustard?

name: Sheldon
line: Is it that the glucosinolates which give mustard its flavour were evolved by the cabbage family as a chemical defence against caterpillars?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that was fun. Good for you, Leonard.

name: Raj
line: Hey, there.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, you're early. The movie doesn't start for an hour.

name: Howard
line: Actually, we're not going to the movies. We are here to kidnap you.

name: Leonard
line: What are you talking about?

name: Raj
line: Well, you eloped and we didn't get a chance to throw you a bachelor party, so there's a van downstairs and we're here to take you to a surprise location for the weekend.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'd hardly call this kidnapping. Where's the blindfold? Where's the duct tape? Where's the part where you call me and demand ransom and I try to keep you on the phone, but you hang up seconds before I can trace it and then I say I'm getting too old for this crud?

name: Leonard
line: When do we leave?

name: Howard
line: Right now.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, Penny packed you a bag.

name: Howard
line: Wow, okay.

name: Sheldon
line: You're seriously going to get in a van and let these two take you to an unknown destination for an entire weekend?

name: Raj
line: Oh, not just him, you're coming, too.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, and how do you think you're going to get me to do that?

name: Sheldon
line: Unhand me. This is ridiculous.

name: Howard
line: I told you to put tape on his mouth.

name: Raj
line: And I told you he bit me.

name: Sheldon
line: It's bad enough I'm being taken against my will. I don't see why it has to be in some hippie's mobile sex dungeon.

name: Howard
line: Well, Sheldon, there's something about this van that you're going to find very interesting.

name: Sheldon
line: It runs on syphilis?

name: Raj
line: This van was owned and driven by your personal physics hero, Richard Feynman.

name: Sheldon
line: No.

name: Howard
line: Yeah. A buddy of mine let me borrow it.

name: Leonard
line: This was Feynman's van? That's so cool.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, nothing's been changed since he drove it.

name: Howard
line: I bet he picked up a lot of cute grad students in this bad boy.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, and talked about physics with them.

name: Leonard
line: So, are you gonna give us a clue where we're headed?

name: Raj
line: Uh, okay, let's see. They've got spicy food and there's a chance you'll get diarrhoea.

name: Leonard
line: India.

name: Raj
line: We can drive there.

name: Leonard
line: Your house?

name: Howard
line: We are going to Me-hi-co.

name: Leonard
line: Fun, I've never been there.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, don't be fooled. I'm from Texas, Me-hi-co is Spanish for Mexico.

name: Raj
line: What's wrong with Mexico?

name: Sheldon
line: Uh, mariachi bands, wild dogs, beans that jump around 'cause there's a worm inside.

name: Howard
line: Okay, calm down. There's a theme to this weekend. We are going to Mexico in Feynman's van to stay at the vacation house Feynman bought with the money from his Nobel Prize.

name: Sheldon
line: Viva la Imodium. Ay-ay-ay.

name: Bernadette
line: Come on, Leonard's doing bachelor stuff. You sure we can't take you to a strip club?

name: Penny
line: Nah, if I want to see a naked dancing man, I just flush the toilet while Leonard's in the shower.

name: Amy
line: Hi.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Amy
line: I know we're not making a fuss, but in the spirit of bachelorette parties, I made cookies in the shape of male genitals.

name: Penny
line: You really didn't have to, whoa! That is anatomic.

name: Amy
line: Thank you. The veins are gummy worms.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, look, Jewish and gentile.

name: Amy
line: I had extra dough.

name: Penny
line: Oh, that's Leonard. He said they're about to cross the border.

name: Bernadette
line: I hope the boys don't get too crazy in Mexico.

name: Penny
line: Oh, yeah, right. Lock up your daughters or Sheldon might lecture them about the North American Free Trade Agreement.

name: Amy
line: Boy, that was a long night for me.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh-oh. According to this Mexican customs website, visitors may not bring more than five laser discs, 20 compact discs or 12 VHS tapes.

name: Raj
line: We don't have any of those.

name: Sheldon
line: How can you be sure? VHS was king when Feynman drove this van. For all we know, there are hidden compartments lousy with Jane Fonda workout videos.

name: Leonard
line: If there was a hidden compartment, don't you think you'd be stuffed in it by now?

name: Sheldon
line: Are we all up to date on our yellow fever inoculations?

name: Howard
line: You don't need a yellow fever shot to go to Mexico.

name: Sheldon
line: You can never be too careful. I got one last year before I went to Epcot.

name: Amy
line: So, Penny, how's married life?

name: Penny
line: Oh, it's good. I just wish Leonard would work up the courage to tell Sheldon he's moving in here.

name: Bernadette
line: You guys still aren't living together?

name: Penny
line: We are. I mean, he sleeps here. But it's only a matter of time before Sheldon has a bad dream and tries to climb into bed with the Leonard-shaped pile of pillows.

name: Bernadette
line: Speaking of Sheldon, how's single life treating you?

name: Amy
line: Fine, I guess. I've been focusing on me. I was thinking about changing my wardrobe.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Bernadette
line: Good for you.

name: Amy
line: But then I decided I don't want to go changing who I am just because of some man.

name: Penny
line: Yes.

name: Bernadette
line: Good for you.

name: Penny
line: You know, it is normal to want to change your look after a breakup.

name: Amy
line: Actually, I was thinking of making one small change.

name: Bernadette
line: Your sweater?

name: Penny
line: Your glasses?

name: Bernadette
line: Your hair?

name: Penny
line: Your shoes.

name: Amy
line: Piercing my ears.

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Bernadette
line: You really never had that done?

name: Amy
line: My mom said pierced ears were for whores, pirates and genies.

name: Penny
line: Okay, well, you're a grown woman now.

name: Amy
line: I know, but Sheldon had this clause in the Relationship Agreement forbidding cosmetic surgery unless it's to look like a Klingon.

name: Bernadette
line: We'll take you to the mall to get it done.

name: Penny
line: Why? I can do it right here.

name: Amy
line: Really? You have a piercing gun?

name: Penny
line: No. All you need is a needle and an ice cube. I've done it, like, a dozen times.

name: Amy
line: Oh, I don't know.

name: Penny
line: Oh, come on. I'll be gentle. Let me take your ear virginity.

name: Bernadette
line: This party's weird.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, watch your speed. I hear the Mexican police target tourists.

name: Howard
line: Oh, not a problem. If anything goes down, we just put Koothrappali in the driver's seat and slap a sombrero on his head.

name: Raj
line: Dude, how many races can you offend in a single breath?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. Have you watched the Olympics with me?

name: Leonard
line: Sheldon, can you believe that we're driving in a van that was owned by one of the greatest scientific minds of the 20th century? It's like the Batmobile. If Batman was real and a physicist and his car wasn't cool.

name: Sheldon
line: It is extraordinary.

name: Raj
line: Perhaps some of his mojo will rub off on us. Maybe between this and his beach house, we will be inspired to greatness.

name: Sheldon
line: I usually don't put too much stock in charms and talismans. However, even I must admit feeling Richard Feynman's butt dent cupping my own bottom that does get the creative juices flowing.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I have to return this van. Keep your creative juices in your pants.

name: Sheldon
line: What was that?

name: Howard
line: I think it's a tyre.

name: Sheldon
line: What if it's banditos shooting at us? What if we get kidnapped? What if we end up in a factory making Bart Simpson piñatas for the rest of our lives?

name: Howard
line: It's the tyre.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard?

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: I am getting too old for this crud.

name: Bernadette
line: Amy, I noticed your status still says in a relationship on Facebook.

name: Amy
line: You're right. I should probably let all of my Facebook friends know. Penny, I'm no longer in a relationship.

name: Bernadette
line: Did you change yours to married yet?

name: Penny
line: Uh, no, not yet. There's still a few people I haven't told personally.

name: Amy
line: Who?

name: Penny
line: Oh, just my parents and my entire family.

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Amy
line: Why?

name: Penny
line: Well, I don't want to hurt my dad. You know, he always wanted to dance with his daughter at her wedding.

name: Bernadette
line: What about your sister's wedding?

name: Penny
line: They started to, then her water broke. You know, if he finds out we eloped, it's gonna break his heart.

name: Amy
line: How long do you think you can keep it from him?

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, isn't it gonna get worse the longer you wait?

name: Penny
line: Well, not necessarily. You know, Dad's not getting any younger, so if I wait long enough, I'll just tell him he walked me down the aisle and it was magical.

name: Raj
line: When did you learn how to change a tyre?

name: Howard
line: Every self-respecting gentleman should know how in case he comes across a damsel in distress by the side of the road.

name: Sheldon
line: If I see one scorpion, I am getting on someone's shoulders and never coming down.

name: Leonard
line: And there's your damsel.

name: Howard
line: Wow, this one's really stuck.

name: Raj
line: Are you turning it the right way?

name: Howard
line: No. I took the other four off and when I got to this one, I thought, you know, I'm in a rut, let's shake things up.

name: Raj
line: Here, let me try. You're right, it doesn't turn the other way.

name: Penny
line: There you go. You're all done.

name: Amy
line: That wasn't so bad. Nice. Boy, if my mom could see me now, she'd lock me in the sin closet.

name: Bernadette
line: That's a joke, right?

name: Amy
line: Actually, the joke was on her. I could still see the TV through the slats.

name: Penny
line: I'm starting to see why you and your mom aren't very close.

name: Bernadette
line: Bet she'd still tell her if she got married.

name: Penny
line: You're not gonna let this go, are you?

name: Amy
line: Well, it's kind of sad that they don't know. I mean, they love Leonard.

name: Penny
line: Fine, you want me to call? I'll call. Why am I so nervous?

name: Bernadette
line: It's understandable. Amy was afraid to tell her mom she broke up with Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Yeah? How did it go? Did she make you crawl into the breaking-up drawer?

name: Amy
line: Uh, well, actually, to be honest, I haven't told her yet.

name: Penny
line: You've been giving me a hard time and you haven't even told your mom about Sheldon?

name: Amy
line: I'm feeling a little dizzy from all the blood loss. I don't know what you're talking about.

name: Penny
line: Fine. I'm calling home, but when I'm done, you're calling your mother.

name: Amy
line: Easy for you to say. You never had to watch 60 Minutes like this.

name: Penny
line: Hey, Daddy.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Hey, slugger. How's my girl?

name: Penny
line: Uh, good. Is Mom around?

name: Penny's Dad
line: Ah, she took your brother out to celebrate. He just got his tenth one-month sober chip. Yeah, she's gonna make him a little necklace.

name: Penny
line: Okay, I'll talk to her later. Uh, Dad, there's something I need to tell you. Leonard and I got married.

name: Penny's Dad
line: You did? When?

name: Penny
line: Last week. I'm sorry, I should've told you. It was a spur of the moment thing. I feel terrible. Please don't be too disappointed.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Are you happy?

name: Penny
line: Very. Leonard is so great.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Well, then I'm happy for you.

name: Penny
line: Aw, thank you, Daddy. That means so much.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Well, I understand it's hard to tell someone something if you think it's gonna upset 'em.

name: Penny
line: It is. You're the best dad ever.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Yeah. Uh, hold that thought. I've been sitting on a little news myself.

name: Penny
line: Well, what is it?

name: Penny's Dad
line: You know that rototiller I got for the tractor?

name: Penny
line: No.

name: Penny's Dad
line: Oh, you should see it. It is a beautiful piece of machinery. Anyway, uh, I backed over your pet pig with it.

name: Penny
line: Moondance?

name: Penny's Dad
line: Yeah, he's, uh, not dancing anymore.

name: Penny
line: You killed my pig?

name: Penny's Dad
line: I did not kill him. The vet took care of that.

name: Penny
line: When?

name: Penny's Dad
line: Oh, ten, twelve months ago.

name: Penny
line: You didn't tell me for a year?

name: Penny's Dad
line: Well, apple doesn't fall far from the tree, does it? Love ya, slugger. Gotta go.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, Amy, your turn.

name: Howard
line: What are you doing?

name: Raj
line: It's called Lamaze breathing. It helps you push.

name: Howard
line: Great. He's pushing with his uterus.

name: Raj
line: There's got to be a smarter way of removing it.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, this is nothing more than a physics problem.

name: Sheldon
line: Right. Archimedes once said give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.

name: Raj
line: Of course. All we need is to find stuff to make a lever big enough to fix this.

name: Howard
line: Exactly. I'll bet there's something around here that could be a lever.

name: Leonard
line: Let's see, a lever, a lever.

name: Sheldon
line: Everybody hold on. Let's take this problem one step at a time. First, we need to decide whether we're calling it leever or lehver. And the sooner we decide it's leever, the sooner we can roll up our sleeves, not slehves, and get to work.

name: Leonard
line: We're gonna be here foreever.

name: Penny
line: Thanks a lot, guys.

name: Bernadette
line: What did we do?

name: Penny
line: Before I made that call, my pig was alive and happy and rolling around in the mud. Now he's illegally buried in our backyard next to my great-grandmother.

name: Bernadette
line: Really? They didn't eat him?

name: Penny
line: No. He was a beloved member of the family.

name: Bernadette
line: The breakfast meat family?

name: Penny
line: It's not funny. You're up. Call your mother.

name: Amy
line: Oh, maybe later. Your pig dying made me sad. And a little hungry.

name: Penny
line: Phone, now.

name: Amy
line: Okay. Okay. Fine. Hi, Mom.

name: Penny
line: Try dialing.

name: Amy
line: You saw that, huh? Hi, Mom. How are you doing? Oh, good. How's work? That's nice. I'm fine. Hey, listen, I've been meaning to ask, how come Aunt Doe and Aunt Florence never got along?

name: Penny
line: Okay, just give me that. Amy broke up with Sheldon, she got her ears pierced and she made us eat penis cookies. Hang on. She wants to talk to you.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think the lever's working.

name: Howard
line: What makes you say that?

name: Leonard
line: There's gotta be something else we could try.

name: Raj
line: If this was Star Trek, we could use a phaser to blast it off.

name: Howard
line: No, it's too broad of a beam. You'd need something more precise, like Superman's heat vision.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, the Green Lantern's ring could make a big green hand that unscrews it.

name: Raj
line: If you need a green hand, why not just use the Hulk?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, please, the Hulk would never get across the border with that temper.

name: Leonard
line: Guys, excuse me, not that calling one of the Avengers isn't a perfectly reasonable choice, but we're scientists. Don't you think we can figure this out using actual science?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes, we could use science. But it's your bachelor party. Lighten up.

name: Howard
line: We will, we will percussive shock you.

name: Howard and Raj
line: We will, we will percussive shock you.

name: Sheldon
line: Buddy you're a boy, make a big noise playin' in the street, gonna be a big man someday. You got mud on your face, you big disgrace, kickin' your can all over the place. I have an eidetic memory. Sometimes it's a curse.

name: Raj
line: I had no idea tortilla chips were such a good fuel source.

name: Leonard
line: They're basically pure hydrocarbons soaked in fat. Let's hope the lug nut expands.

name: Sheldon
line: What if that burning food attracts animals?

name: Howard
line: We have plenty of food for the animals.

name: Sheldon
line: We do?

name: Howard
line: Yep. A six-foot wiener in a Flash T-shirt.

name: Sheldon
line: That's not very nice.

name: Leonard
line: It's a bachelor party. Lighten up.

name: Sheldon
line: What is that awful smell?

name: Howard
line: It's burning salsa. I'm hoping the acidity and salinity combined with electricity will corrode the lug nut off.

name: Sheldon
line: What an innovative solution. Perhaps I don't give your MIT education enough credit.

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I saw it on Mythbusters.

name: Sheldon
line: All right, this rust, combined with the aluminium recovered from the van, is now thermite.

name: Howard
line: Great. Couple of pinches ought to do the trick.

name: Raj
line: Is that enough to melt the lug nut?

name: Leonard
line: Well, let's start small. We can always add more.

name: Howard
line: You put up a good fight, lug nut, but you've met your match.

name: Raj
line: Hey, look, the lug nut's off.

name: Penny
line: What? What are you doing back?

name: Leonard
line: We got a flat and couldn't get the tyre off.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I'm sorry.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Penny
line: If it makes you feel any better, I pierced Amy's ears and her mom made her sit in my closet.

name: Sheldon
line: We blew up Feynman's van.

name: Penny
line: My dad killed my pig with his tractor.

name: Leonard
line: I spent the night in Mexico with Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: You win.

name: Sheldon
line: What a wonderful day, thank you.

name: Penny
line: Oh, we're glad you had fun.

name: Sheldon
line: Blue Icees and a trip to The Container Store? It's like I died and went to the post-mortem, neuron-induced hallucination commonly mistaken as heaven.

name: Leonard
line: I still don't understand why you bought that pill caddie. You're a young man.

name: Sheldon
line: Age is a state of mind, Leonard. In here I'm 90. Why are you taking your bins over there?

name: Leonard
line: It's just where I need them. You know, she doesn't have a lot of closet space.

name: Sheldon
line: What's wrong with your closet?

name: Penny
line: Uh, well, honey, you know, now that Leonard and I are married, it kind of makes sense that we actually live together.

name: Sheldon
line: So that's all this day was? A plan to butter me up before delivering bad news?

name: Leonard
line: Come on, buddy.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I thought we were friends. You asked for a sip of my Icee. If you had your own straw, I might've said yes.

name: Penny
line: Sheldon, please, we already feel bad about this.

name: Sheldon
line: You know what they don't sell at The Container Store? Something large enough to contain my disappointment. Although, if anyone did, it would be them.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for letting me come speak with you.

name: Bernadette
line: Of course.

name: Sheldon
line: As my relationships with Penny and Amy are currently strained, I'm turning to you for female comfort and encouragement.

name: Bernadette
line: Aw. I'm honoured.

name: Sheldon
line: I tried reaching out to my mother, but she was in Bible study. Leonard's mother is on a book tour. My Mee-Maw was taking a nap, and after a while Siri started repeating her answers.

name: Bernadette
line: So, I'm your seventh choice.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I know, top ten, pretty exciting.

name: Bernadette
line: How can I help you?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, in addition to Amy leaving me, Leonard's moving in with Penny. It's difficult not to feel abandoned.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, why don't you look at this as an opportunity? You had other roommates before Leonard. Maybe this is a chance to find someone new.

name: Sheldon
line: Perhaps I could find someone better than Leonard. Someone I can rub in his face. Chris Pratt's all the rage right now. I wonder how he'd feel about taking the smaller bedroom.

name: Stuart
line: Hey.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey. You know who would be the perfect roomie?

name: Sheldon
line: Gandalf, but he's a smoker.

name: Bernadette
line: Stuart. He's been living with us for a while now. I'm sure he'd love to get us out of his hair.

name: Stuart
line: Nope, couldn't be happier.

name: Bernadette
line: Well, Sheldon's looking for a roommate.

name: Stuart
line: Nope.

name: Bernadette
line: He'll think about it.

name: Stuart
line: No I won't.

name: Raj
line: Have you seen this Archie comic? It's actually Archie versus Predator.

name: Howard
line: How could Archie defeat Predator?

name: Raj
line: I don't know. Maybe Jughead's a Terminator.

name: Stuart
line: Hey.

name: Howard
line: Hey, Stuart.

name: Stuart
line: Do you guys know any musicians?

name: Howard
line: Why?

name: Stuart
line: I was thinking it might be cool to have live music here a few nights a week. You know, give this place more of a staying in business vibe.

name: Howard
line: What kind of music are you thinking of?

name: Stuart
line: I like all kinds of music, but my favourite genre is free.

name: Raj
line: Hey, we've always talked about playing together.

name: Howard
line: Well, it could be fun to try a little acoustic thing.

name: Raj
line: Oh, we could play filk music.

name: Stuart
line: What's that?

name: Raj
line: It's been around for years. It's like folk music, but with a sci-fi/fantasy theme.

name: Stuart
line: I like it. It sounds exactly like something I shouldn't be expected to pay for.

name: Raj
line: Dude, if we do this, we're gonna need a cool band name.

name: Howard
line: You know, I've actually had one I've been sitting on for years.

name: Raj
line: Really?

name: Howard
line: It was for this power trio I tried to put together in junior high, but I was short two friends.

name: Raj
line: What is it?

name: Howard
line: Footprints on the Moon.

name: Raj
line: I just got chills.

name: Howard
line: So did I.

name: Stuart
line: Me, too. But I, uh, might have Lyme Disease.

name: Sheldon
line: Just a few more signatures, and we'll be finished. Initial here to acknowledge that you've returned your key. Okay. As my future neighbour, I'd like you to have a key. Initial here to acknowledge you received it.

name: Penny
line: I'm proud of you. You're taking this really well.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it's not like I'm never going to see you two again. Which brings us to article 23 subsection C, please check here to reserve your spot at the ten year roommate reunion.

name: Leonard
line: Do I really have to do that now?

name: Sheldon
line: No, but if you want chicken and get stuck with the fish, that's on you. All right. Oh, and lastly, please initial here to confirm that ownership of the living room couch is hereby transferred to me in perpetuity all throughout the universe and all alternate universes except for those universes where owning a couch is forbidden by the hive queen. In which case, all glory to the hive queen. All right, now all that's left is for us to sign and date the document, and we will officially no longer be roommates.

name: Penny
line: What's the matter?

name: Leonard
line: It's harder than I thought.

name: Sheldon
line: Let me help you. L. E. O. N.

name: Leonard
line: That helped.

name: Raj
line: So I have an idea for a filk song. It's kind of a, a power ballad, superhero crossover tale of epic proportions.

name: Howard
line: Is it cold in here, 'cause, oh, my.

name: Raj
line: Okay, so it's a, it's a David and Goliath story. It's about man against God. It's called Hammer and Whip, The Untold Story of Thor versus Indiana Jones.

name: Howard
line: Thor versus Indiana Jones? You just blew my filking mind.

name: Raj
line: Okay, I don't have it all worked out yet, but I was thinking something like, um, Oh, Indy, oh, Indy, the skies are so windy. Is that a flying man with a killer bod? Wait, that's no man, it's a Norse god.

name: Howard
line: Oh yes, definitely. Hang on. Thunder clapped as Thor raised his mighty hammer. Indy rapped, that's one bad mamma-jamma.

name: Raj
line: That is, that is so good!

name: Howard
line: Right? Mamma-jamma just came to me.

name: Raj
line: Okay, and here's the hook. Thor and Dr. Jones. Thor and Dr. Jones. One plays with lightning, the other plays with bones.

name: Together
line: Thor and Dr. Jones. Thor and Dr. Jones. One plays with lightning, the other plays with bones.

name: Howard
line: Oh, man, that rocks.

name: Raj
line: Hey, remember The Ark of the Covenant?

name: Howard
line: Yeah?

name: Raj
line: That's how much we're gonna melt people's faces off.

name: Sheldon
line: I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I just need to ask you a few standard questions.

name: Bespectacled Man
line: Sure.

name: Sheldon
line: It says here you're a chemist. Which element on the periodic table do you feel is too big for its britches?

name: Bespectacled Man
line: Is that supposed to be a joke?

name: Sheldon
line: Looks like argon's not the only one with an attitude problem.

name: Sheldon
line: In general, would you say that you smell better, worse or the same as you do right now?

name: Sheldon
line: I was going to ask you what is the best fruit, but then I realized what I want to ask you is why is there a Band-Aid on your forearm, but then I realized what I really want to ask you is just can you just go?

name: Sheldon
line: You're healthy. You have a job in the sciences. I've got to say, if this credit report comes back good, you're the frontrunner.

name: Amy
line: I'm not gonna be your roommate, Sheldon.

name: Sheldon
line: But I met with 11 people, and they all walked out. And that Hollywood phoney Chris Pratt never tweeted me back.

name: Amy
line: I'm sure you'll find somebody else.

name: Sheldon
line: I suppose. What happened to me, Amy? Years ago I was completely disengaged from my feelings. I'd say it was a happier time, but I was disengaged from my feelings, so who can tell?

name: Amy
line: I don't know how to help you. You know, feelings are a part of life.

name: Sheldon
line: They didn't used to be. You and Leonard and Penny, you all poisoned me with emotions. I was like the Tin Man, perfectly content until that evil wizard gave him a heart.

name: Amy
line: I don't think that was the point of the movie.

name: Sheldon
line: Fine, then I was like Pinocchio before that jerk Geppetto went and made him a real boy.

name: Amy
line: There you go.

name: Penny
line: So, what are you thinking for dinner?

name: Leonard
line: Well, it's Thai food night.

name: Penny
line: Well, honey, you don't live with Sheldon any more. You can have anything you want.

name: Leonard
line: You're right. But what? Mexican? Italian? German? Indian? Greek? Cuban? Chinese? Pizza? Barbecue? Korean? Korean barbecue?

name: Penny
line: How about Thai food?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, thank God.

name: Penny
line: Hey, we're going to dinner. You want to come?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I wish I could, but I realized I've become too emotionally vulnerable, so, like an operating system, I'm restoring my life to the last stable version, which was in 2003, the day before I met Leonard.

name: Leonard
line: You heard him, no.

name: Penny
line: Hang on. Wait, you actually think it's 2003?

name: Sheldon
line: No, just because I'm living my life like it was 12 years ago doesn't mean I'm delusional. And since it is 2003, I don't know who you are, so please exit the premises before I call the police on my stylish new flip phone.

name: Penny
line: Are you doing okay?

name: Leonard
line: I guess. I'm just, you know, worried about Sheldon.

name: Penny
line: Well, come on, he's a grown man in his 30s pretending to be a grown man in his 20s. He's fine.

name: Leonard
line: I hope so.

name: Penny
line: What else can you do? Move back in with him?

name: Leonard
line: No, of course not. I just feel bad.

name: Penny
line: Well, so do I, but don't you want to live with your wife and set the thermostat to whatever you want and have your body tell you when it's time to go to the bathroom, you know, not a schedule slipped underneath your door every morning?

name: Leonard
line: I did like that he had the weather on it.

name: Penny
line: Trust me, this is the right thing.

name: Leonard
line: I know. And it's not like we're abandoning him. Plus, we can FaceTime him whenever we want, you know, once iPhones are invented in his universe.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't believe Sheldon asked you to be his roommate.

name: Amy
line: I can't believe he ran my credit.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, if you're open to living with someone great, I'll give you a thousand dollars to take Stuart.

name: Amy
line: You really should've gone on the Internet and checked how long that kind of thing lives before you got one.

name: Bernadette
line: I'm sorry. I just thought you might have a pasty, weirdo-shaped hole in your life.

name: Amy
line: Hey, I know Sheldon's quirky, but he's also brilliant and insightful. I think calling him a weirdo is a little unfair.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, 2003.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, we brought you Thai. Where is everything?

name: Sheldon
line: In my present, it's in the future. In your present, it's been crammed in the bedroom by an enterprising young man I met in The Home Depot parking lot.

name: Leonard
line: I know what you're doing. You're trying to get attention so we'll feel bad for you, but it's not happening.

name: Sheldon
line: No, what I'm doing is trying to figure out how to live my life now that everyone is leaving me.

name: Leonard
line: Will you knock it off? We're across the hall.

name: Sheldon
line: As the kids are saying today, talk to the hand.

name: Penny
line: They're not saying that.

name: Sheldon
line: They are in 2003.

name: Penny
line: No, no, they're really not.

name: Raj
line: Thor and Dr. Jones. Thor and Dr. Jones. One runs from Loki, the other runs from stones. So, what do you think?

name: Emily
line: Wow.

name: Raj
line: Runs from stones means that, that big boulder, but I couldn't rhyme anything with boulder.

name: Emily
line: Colder, shoulder, soldier, folder.

name: Raj
line: Right, yeah, right. But, what do you think?

name: Emily
line: I think it's very cute.

name: Raj
line: Cute? It's not cute. Cute is children dressed as vegetables.

name: Emily
line: Okay, fine, it's not cute.

name: Raj
line: Just be honest. You don't like it.

name: Emily
line: I didn't say that. I, I just like music you can dance to.

name: Raj
line: You can dance to this. Um, uh, uh, Thor and Dr. Jones. Thor and Dr. Jones. One plays with lightning, the other plays with bones.

name: Raj
line: I'm telling you, dude, the song has no groove, you can't dance to it.

name: Howard

line: Buddy, I know me moving in with Penny feels like a big change, but it's not.

line: No, I do. Eventually you'll want more space, and you'll move into a house, and then instead of dinner a couple of times a week, it'll only be a couple of times a month, and then it'll only be on special occasions, like when Bernadette divorces Wolowitz. Or, or, or like when Koothrappali's weird girlfriend admits where she buried his body. Or Amy's wedding, where she's marrying someone better than me.

name: Penny
line: Okay, look, we don't need to rush into anything. All right? Maybe instead of Leonard moving in with me, we just leave things the way they are, and sometimes we'll sleep over there, and sometimes we'll sleep over here.

line: You can. I'm happy when you come home. And I'm scared of fireworks. By the way, on July Fourth, we're all sleeping here.

line: Fine.
