line: One of which would've ended in sex had she not said no. Okay, all set.

name: Penny
line: Okay, let me see. Nope, nope, nope, oh, he's cute.

name: Bernadette
line: Doesn't a teardrop tattoo mean he murdered someone?

name: Penny
line: And he's sad about it.

name: Howard
line: Hey.

name: Raj
line: Hello.

name: Penny
line: Hey.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, I thought you were gonna be out late?

name: Howard
line: If you wanted me to stay out later, you should've given me more spending money.

name: Raj
line: What are you guys up to?

name: Bernadette
line: We put Amy on a dating app, and we're seeing what's out there.

name: Raj
line: Oh, fun. Let me see. Uh, no, no, uh, definitely not.

name: Howard
line: What was wrong with that guy?

name: Raj
line: Uh, he's Indian. We've already got one of those. Ooh, we should find a nice Latino, really round us out.

name: Howard
line: Hey, I want to try.

name: Amy
line: Uh, excuse me, can I have my phone back?

name: Howard
line: Hang on, I'm trying to find you the next great love of your life. The man who will father your children. Okay, yes or no on white guy with dreadlocks?

name: Leonard
line: That must be him.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, of course. An nondescript, white panel van. You may be familiar with it from the sentence, their bodies were found in a nondescript, white panel van.

name: Leonard
line: Hey.

name: Man
line: What's up?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, I'm Leonard. This is my friend...

name: Sheldon
line: I'm Skippy. Skippy Cavanaugh.

name: Man
line: Great. You got the cash?

name: Leonard
line: Uh, yeah, uh, right here.

name: Sheldon
line: Wait, hold on, hold on. How do we know that you're not gonna take the money and drive away?

name: Leonard
line: What ya doing, Skippy?

name: Sheldon
line: Exactly what 1970s television crime dramas have taught us. You give us the helium first.

name: Man
line: Oh, how do I know you're not gonna drive away without paying me?

name: Sheldon
line: Guess I'm not the only one who watches '70s television crime dramas.

name: Leonard
line: Look, you can trust us. We're respected scientists.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, he is. I'm a wedding planner who can't find love himself. It's ironic, but the point is we can't trust you. You're a sketchy character in a parking garage.

name: Man
line: Yeah, well, from my perspective, that's how you two appear to me.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I never thought of it like that. Boy, frame of reference will just sneak up on you, won't it?

name: Leonard
line: My friend does make a decent point about the money. I don't feel comfortable just handing it over up front.

name: Man
line: Ah, no money, no helium. Seems we're at a, uh, stalemate.

name: Sheldon
line: Not technically. In chess, a stalemate refers to a situation in which there are no remaining moves. Uh, you have plenty of moves available. You could beat us up and steal the money. You could kill us, you know. Really, you're only limited by your imagination.

name: Man
line: Huh. All these years I've been using stalemate, when I really mean impasse. I feel foolish.

name: Leonard
line: I don't think it matters if this is a stalemate or an impasse or a Mexican standoff. What are we gonna do here?

name: Man
line: Oh, whoa, whoa, how can it bea Mexican standoff? Everybody knows you need three sides for that.

name: Sheldon
line: Not necessarily. Uh, many argue the essence of a Mexican standoff is that no one can walk away from the conflict without incurring harm.

name: Man
line: Hmm, I don't follow.

name: Sheldon
line: Let me give you an example. Earlier today, I decoded the headers on your e-mail, and I know that your name is Kenneth Fitzgerald. From that, I figured out where you live and where you work. Now, to make this a Mexican standoff, I would say something like, uh, you give us the helium or I'll turn you in to the authorities.

name: Man
line: Is that a threat?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, exactly. See, you're getting it.

name: Man
line: Yeah, well, I know where you work, all right? And if you mess with me, I'll report you, then I'll pound your asses into the ground.

name: Sheldon
line: Perfect. Now we really are in a Mexican standoff. Is this one of those times where I've won the battle but lost the war?

name: Leonard
line: Afraid so, Skippy.

name: Sheldon
line: I told you we shouldn't go shopping at night.

name: Leonard
line: All right, let's all just calm down. Nobody wants to report anybody.

name: Man
line: No, I don't like this. I'm out.

name: Leonard
line: No, no, no. Wait, don't go. Just let me explain. We're physicists, and we're trying to prove a hypothesis that we've been working on for over a year.

name: Man
line: Really? What's the hypothesis?

name: Sheldon
line: Space-time can be interpreted as the surface of an n-dimensional superfluid.

name: Man
line: Hmm. Could be, could be. Go on.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, but now there's this Swedish team that read our paper and they're trying to beat us to our own discovery. We really need this helium.

name: Sheldon
line: And I'm sorry I lied about being a wedding planner who can't find love. Although I am currently single, if you know anybody.

name: Leonard
line: Here's the money. Can we do this?

name: Man
line: Okay. It's a shame about those scientists ripping you off. I expected a higher ethical standard from our friends in Sweden.

name: Leonard
line: It's actually pretty common in our field. There's not much you can do about it.

name: Man
line: Well, for the right amount of money, if you know where they live, there's, uh, plenty we could do about it.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you hear that, Leonard? There's plenty we could do about it. Do you have a card?

name: Penny
line: Okay, here we go. Now everyone can see. All right. Where do we stand on cross-eyed Mike?

name: Raj
line: You know he won't be looking at other girls.

name: Howard
line: Unless they're sitting on the end of his nose.

name: Penny
line: Okay, okay, okay. Thumbs down. Next.

name: Bernadette
line: Ew, check out his tiny teeth. He looks like a man-dolphin.

name: Penny
line: Well if he's good in bed, she can throw him a fish.

name: Howard
line: I love you, Amy.

name: Amy
line: Okay, I'm starting to feel guilty. Aren't we being a little mean?

name: Raj
line: That's a fair point. We wouldn't make fun of someone like this to their face.

name: Penny
line: Look, it's Stuart.

name: Raj
line: You may want to leave the room.

name: Sheldon
line: Right this way, Uncle Harvey.

name: Leonard
line: Will you stop with that already?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm trying not to attract attention.

name: Leonard
line: And tipping his hat to the cleaning lady didn't do that?

name: Sheldon
line: She said buenas noches. What was he supposed to do?

name: Leonard
line: Let's just start the experiment.

name: Sheldon
line: Leonard, we should probably have our story straight in case we get caught.

name: Leonard
line: We're not getting caught.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, you can't be sure of that. What if the helium dealer rats us out? What if Kripke asks where we got it? What if the university checks my family tree and finds out I don't have an Uncle Harvey?

name: Leonard
line: The dealer doesn't care, Kripke has no authority over us, and you being related to a metal container would explain a lot. Help me hook this up.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh-oh.

name: Leonard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, did you see this sticker?

name: Leonard
line: What is it?

name: Sheldon
line: It's partially torn off, but the segment that remains reads property of and the letter U.

name: Leonard
line: It's probably USC or UCLA.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, but what if it's Property of U.S. Government? There's a national helium reserve in Amarillo, Texas. If this was stolen from there, we're accessories to a federal crime.

name: Leonard
line: Let's not jump to conclusions. A lot of things start with U.

name: Sheldon
line: That's true. There's the U.S. Air Force, U.S. Department of Defence, U.S. Navy, you and I are going to jail.

name: Leonard
line: Listen, we can do the experiment as planned and beat the Swedish team to the punch, or we can kiss our dreams good-bye because we were to afraid to break a few rules.

name: Leonard
line: Ma'am.

name: Penny
line: Okay, does everyone remember the rules? If he's shirtless, one sip. Posing with a pet, two sips. Pet and shirtless, chug like it's your job. And pull.

name: Raj
line: I have that same underwear.

name: Penny
line: Chug.

name: Penny
line: Amy, you're getting a text.

name: Amy
line: Oh, um, give me that.

name: Raj
line: I had a great time last night.

name: Amy
line: No, no, stop reading that.

name: Howard
line: Who's Dave?

name: Penny
line: You went on a date last night? Are you seeing someone?

name: Amy
line: No, it, it's not like that.

name: Bernadette
line: And I'd love to take you out again”?

name: All
line: Amy/What?/Can't believe it/Oh, my God.

name: Amy
line: Okay, it's like that.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you for coming back.

name: Man
line: Yeah, well, normally I wouldn't, but my daughter's having a sleepover, and there's only so much screaming and Katy Perry a man can take.

name: Sheldon
line: Anyway, if you could just give us our money back, you can have your helium and we'll be on our way.

name: Man
line: Yeah, well, is there something wrong with it?

name: Leonard
line: No, nothing. We just changed our mind.

name: Sheldon
line: He has glasses and I'm a know-it-all, we are not built for prison.

name: Man
line: Yeah, I hear you. Well, you're good guys, so I'll, uh, I'll take the helium off your hands.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Man
line: But you ain't getting your money back.

name: Sheldon
line: You're taking advantage of us? We clarified nomenclature together.

name: Man
line: Look, I enjoy semantic digressions as much as the next guy, but, uh, this is business.

name: Leonard
line: You know what? It's fine. Keep the money. We just want to be done with this.

name: Man
line: No problem, but I am gonna have to charge you a small helium restocking fee.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't understand.

name: Leonard
line: He wants more money.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it better not be more than a thousand dollars. That's all I've got on me.

name: Man
line: That's exactly how much it is.

name: Sheldon
line: Finally, something breaks our way.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe you're seeing someone and we don't even know about it.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, why wouldn't you tell us?

name: Amy
line: Because it's new and weird and I'm just trying to figure it all out. And I knew if I told you guys I had been out with a few people that you'd get way too excited about it.

name: Stuart
line: A few people?

name: Bernadette
line: What?

name: Penny
line: Amy.

name: Stuart
line: So, are we allowed to ask how it's going?

name: Amy
line: It's going fine. It's mostly just been meeting people for coffee.

name: Raj
line: What? I thought we were all... never mind.

name: Bernadette
line: I, I thought you weren't ready to start seeing people.

name: Amy
line: Well, I don't have much experience dating, so I decided it would be good for me to, you know, get out there a little.

name: Penny
line: Well, good for you.

name: Amy
line: Thank you.

name: Bernadette
line: And how many guys have you gone out with?

name: Stuart
line: Please be less than two.

name: Amy
line: Three.

name: Stuart
line: Damn it.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, the Swedes might beat us, but at least we won't get gang-noogied in prison.

name: Leonard
line: Is Ernest Goes to Jail the only prison movie you've seen?

name: Sheldon
line: It scared me straight, Leonard.

name: Barry
line: Hey, I've been thinking. I was being petty. You can have my hewium.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you, Barry.

name: Barry
line: But you have to add my name to your paper.

name: Sheldon
line: That's preposterous.

name: Barry
line: I don't know, seems fair. You can't do it without me.

name: Leonard
line: Can you give us a minute?

name: Barry
line: Take your time. I'll walk out backwards for dwamatic effect.

name: Sheldon
line: I don't like being extorted like this. Especially by him of all people.

name: Leonard
line: Me neither, but what other choice do we have?

name: Leonard
line: I promise this is the last time.

name: Leonard
line: It says right here on Wikipedia. A Mexican standoff is a confrontation between at least three parties.

name: Sheldon
line: How can you trust Wikipedia if they use between to refer to three parties?

name: Helium Man
line: They should've used among, right?

name: Sheldon
line: Or amongst, if they were feeling whimsically archaic.

name: Helium Man
line: All right, enough with the chitchat. Are we gonna watch Ernest Goes to Jail or not?

name: Sheldon
line: Absolutely. But don't be surprised if this movie sets you on the straight and narrow.

name: Helium Man
line: I am open to change.

name: Leonard
line: Did you hear about this study that found people that were cool and popular at 13 have problems succeeding later in life?

name: Raj
line: Hmm. I'm doing okay, and I was very popular at 13.

name: Penny
line: In school?

name: Raj
line: Oh, no. At home. The servants would sing to me, laugh at my jokes. I wish I knew their names.

name: Penny
line: Does the study say what happens to the unpopular kids?

name: Leonard
line: You tell me, you woke up in bed with one.

name: Sheldon
line: Listen to this. I just received an e-mail from Wil Wheaton. Leonard Nimoy's son is working on a documentary that he started with his father before he passed away. It's about Mr. Spock and his impact on our culture.

name: Leonard
line: Why is he writing to you?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, they're looking for fans to interview, and Wil thought I'd be good for it.

name: Raj
line: Oh. Hey, high five.

name: Sheldon
line: Absolutely not. Yeah, Penny, you spent some time in front of the camera. Any words of advice?

name: Penny
line: Yes. Don't take your shirt off just because the director said so.

name: Sheldon
line: This is a documentary about Mr. Spock. I'm sure if there's nudity, it will be tasteful.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey. You got a minute?

name: Howard
line: Not really. Visigoths are kind of up my butt right now.

name: Bernadette
line: Pause the game, Howard.

name: Howard
line: Howard? Uh-oh. Make room, Visigoths. ‘Sup?

name: Bernadette
line: We need to talk about redecorating this place.

name: Howard
line: Oh, no, not this again.

name: Bernadette
line: Look, I get that you grew up here and you're attached to things looking a certain way, but I want this to feel like my house, too.

name: Howard
line: Oh, honey, of course it's your house. Why else would you be cleaning it all the time?

name: Bernadette
line: All right. Let's start over. I'm redecorating. The furniture, the carpeting, the walls. I'm changing everything that depresses me when I look at it. Try not to be one of those things.

name: Howard
line: May I say something?

name: Bernadette
line: Is it about how I can't have new wallpaper 'cause your dad left when you were little and your mom died?

name: Howard
line: Never mind.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello, Amy. It's Sheldon. Yeah, I, I know that we're broken up, but I'm leaving this message because I thought perhaps you'd like to watch me be interviewed for a documentary about Mr. Spock. Or as I like to call it, a Spockumentary. Yeah, I'm going to use that joke in the interview, so try to laugh like you're hearing it for the first time. You know, hysterically, hmm? And with a tinge of sadness that I'm no longer in your life.

name: Leonard
line: I'm the one who thought of Spockumentary.

name: Penny
line: And I'm laughing like I did the first time I heard it.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Wil Wheaton
line: Hey, Sheldon. This is Adam Nimoy.

name: Adam
line: Nice to meet you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, it's nice to meet you. I admire your father's work very much. It's not every day I get to meet someone whose life's journey began in my hero's scrotum.

name: Wil
line: I told you. This guy is gold.

name: Bernadette
line: Whatcha doing?

name: Howard
line: Oh. Making myself a bologna sandwich like my mom used to make me after my dad left, but before she died.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, listen, I'm thinking that maybe we can compromise on the house.

name: Howard
line: I'm listening.

name: Bernadette
line: Let's just redo one room and see how it goes.

name: Howard
line: That is reasonable. But what room?

name: Bernadette
line: How 'bout this one?

name: Howard
line: No way. No, this is the room I associate the most with my mom.

name: Bernadette
line: Then how 'bout the bathroom?

name: Howard
line: I want to change my answer.

name: Bernadette
line: Fine. Then the dining room.

name: Howard
line: I guess we didn't use it very often. Unless we had company. Which didn't happen much after my dad left and not at all after my mom...

name: Bernadette
line: Great. I'm gonna go pick out paint samples.

name: Adam
line: All right, we're just gonna have a conversation. Pretend the camera's not here.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. But this better not be some elaborate scheme to get me out of my shirt.

name: Leonard
line: How long have you known Adam?

name: Wil
line: A few years.

name: Leonard
line: And what are you getting him back for?

name: Adam
line: Let's start with your name and occupation.

name: Sheldon
line: Dr. Sheldon Cooper, theoretical physicist, Caltech.

name: Adam
line: And what is your earliest memory of the character Spock?

name: Adam
line: What was it about Spock that appealed to you?

name: Sheldon
line: I think the same thing that appeals to people everywhere, the dream of a cold, rational world entirely without human emotion. Spock came from a planet governed only by logic. You know, on Vulcan, when your brother asks, why are you hitting yourself? the answer is, I'm not. You're moving my arm. To which he says, Fascinating. And then you both watch educational television.

name: Penny
line: Aw. When he says things like that, I just want to hug him and make everything better.

name: Leonard
line: My brother was mean to me, too.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, you probably had it coming.

name: Adam
line: Do you have any Spock collectibles?

name: Sheldon
line: I have many. My most treasured is an autographed napkin given to me by my very thoughtful friend Penny. That's her over there.

name: Penny
line: Hi. Look at that. I'm in a movie, my shirt stayed on.

name: Adam
line: Can we see the napkin?

name: Sheldon
line: Of course. Excuse me. This will just take a moment.

name: Leonard
line: When did we get a wall safe?

name: Sheldon
line: When there was no more room in the floor safe.

name: Leonard
line: When did we get a floor safe?

name: Sheldon
line: When we got the security camera.

name: Leonard
line: There's a security camera?

name: Sheldon
line: Aquaman, protecting your home since 2012.

name: Penny
line: Oh, my God. We've done things on that couch.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. You don't have to tell me.

name: Raj
line: So, your father-in-law is in there right now?

name: Howard
line: Yes. So back me up. The house is good the way it is.

name: Raj
line: Oh, okay. Got it.

name: Howard
line: Hey. What's going on?

name: Raj
line: Hey.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, Raj. Dad and I were just talking about taking down this wall.

name: Raj
line: You sure? It's a pretty great wall.

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: What's so great about it?

name: Raj
line: I'm sorry. I did what I could.

name: Bernadette
line: Seriously? You brought Raj over to take your side?

name: Howard
line: Your dad's on your side.

name: Bernadette
line: He's not on my side. He's doing all the work for free.

name: Raj
line: That is so generous of you. I'd like to switch sides.

name: Howard
line: Look, uh, I don't even think you can take this wall down 'cause it's load-bearing.

name: Raj
line: Well, it's easy to find out. Just go into the crawlspace under the house and check.

name: Howard
line: When is your visa up?

name: Sheldon
line: Not only is it signed to me but this is where he wiped his mouth. So we are currently in the presence of Leonard Nimoy's DNA.

name: Wil
line: Um, doesn't Adam count as Leonard Nimoy's DNA?

name: Sheldon
line: No offence, but this is pure 100% Nimoy. Because of your mother, you're only 50%. Which isn't bad, but anything that you wipe your mouth on gets thrown away.

name: Penny
line: Okay, enough about the napkin. What else you hiding in there?

name: Sheldon
line: Wouldn't you like to know?

name: Penny
line: I would.

name: Sheldon
line: All right then. See? Just my valuables. My passport, uh, my will.

name: Leonard
line: You have a will?

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah. My 1/18 scale Wil Wheaton action figure. I also have the other kind of will, and in it I will my Wil back to Wil.

name: Leonard
line: Will Wil want it?

name: Wil
line: Wil won't.

name: Penny
line: Oh, what's that ring box?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. That is an engagement ring that I was going to give my girlfriend Amy.

name: Penny
line: What?

name: Leonard
line: You bought her a ring?

name: Sheldon
line: No, no. This has been in my family for generations. Except for a short time when Comanches cut off my great-great-great-grandmother's finger and stole it.

name: Wil
line: Sheldon, that's awful.

name: Sheldon
line: No. The Texas Rangers tracked them down to their village and slaughtered every last one of them. It was a happy ending. Well, for my nine-fingered Nana.

name: Penny
line: Okay, back to the ring. Does Amy even know about this?

name: Sheldon
line: No. She broke up with me before I could broach the subject.

name: Leonard
line: Oh, man, I'm sorry, that must have been devastating for you.

name: Sheldon
line: No, not at all. No, I'm fine. You know, Amy had reservations about our relationship, so all worked out for the best.

name: Penny
line: I know. It just...

name: Sheldon
line: I said I'm fine!  We've gotten a little off-topic. Allow me to make things entertaining again in this little Spockumentary. That was Leonard's joke. As a child, when faced with a dilemma, my mother encouraged me to ask what would Jesus do? The answer to that was always love thy neighbour. But my neighbour had a dead tooth, so that wasn't going to happen. But that's why I changed it to, what would Spock do?

name: Adam
line: Did you find that helpful?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes. Oh, for example, three years ago when I discovered Penny was eating all my Pop-Tarts, instead of getting angry or vindictive, you know, I got a floor safe.

name: Penny
line: I knew I could smell 'em.

name: Adam
line: What about from when you were a kid?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, certainly. Uh, when I was eight years old, Billy Sparks cornered me in the playground. I asked myself what would Spock do? Then I grabbed Billy on his shoulder and performed my first Vulcan nerve pinch.

name: Adam
line: Did it work?

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, he broke my collarbone. I can still hear it click.

name: Adam
line: That must have been very upsetting for you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, not at all. As I said, the entire point of emulating Spock was to rise above human emotion, which I've spent a lifetime mastering.

name: Penny
line: Oh pfft.

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me?

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry. I'm not here.

name: Sheldon
line: No. You went pfft. What does pfft mean?

name: Penny
line: Um.

name: Leonard
line: You did go pfft.

name: Penny
line: All right, fine. Well, Sheldon, I'm no expert, but aren't you completely missing the point of Spock? I mean, he liked to act like he had no emotions, but he was still half human.

name: Leonard
line: Just like you.

name: Penny
line: I'm just saying, you pretend you don't, but you have feelings just like everybody else.

name: Sheldon
line: Not true. No, look at me. I had an engagement ring to give a girl, and instead, she rejected me. And am I emotional about that? No. No, I am sitting here on a couch, talking about my favourite TV character like nothing happened. ‘Cause I am just like him, all logical, all the time.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, you're yelling.

name: Sheldon
line: Because when I speak at a regular volume, no one seems to believe me that I've put this Amy nonsense behind me.

name: Wil
line: This documentary is gonna be awesome.

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: You gonna be okay down here?

name: Howard
line: Yeah. Yeah, I feel like an archaeologist. Indiana Jones and the Single-Family Dwelling. Hey. Look. Found a seashell.

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: Yeah, that's a rat skull.

name: Howard
line: Oh.

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: Relax. There's enough droppings down here without you making more.

name: Howard
line: Sorry. Do you have a sense of where we are?

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: Yeah. I think that's the den.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Okay, so we must be under the dining room.

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: Uh-huh. Yep. You know, I know you don't want to hear this, but it wouldn't take that much work to turn that den into a nursery.

name: Howard
line: Why wouldn't I want to hear it?

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: ‘Cause Bernie said you didn't want kids.

name: Howard
line: That's not true at all. I wish she'd get pregnant, believe me. I'm climbing on top of her every chance I get. In a loving and respectful manner. The point is, I really do want kids.

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: Huh.

name: Howard
line: I don't know why she's lying to you. She's the one who doesn't want kids. In fact, every time I bring up the subject...

name: Bernadette
line: Earthquake.

name: Howard
line: Oh, my God, we're gonna die.

name: Bernadette
line: Aftershock.

name: Penny
line: I can't believe Sheldon was gonna ask Amy to marry him.

name: Leonard
line: I know. I also can't believe he watched what we did on that couch and still sits on it.

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, buddy. How you doing?

name: Sheldon
line: Better. Did Wil and Adam leave?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Sheldon
line: Do you think they're going to put my outburst in the documentary?

name: Leonard
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Penny
line: Definitely.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, there's no point in dwelling on it. As the Vulcans say, Kup-fun-tor ha'kiv na'ish Du stau.

name: Penny
line: Do you know what that means?

name: Leonard
line: No.

name: Penny
line: Are you telling the truth?

name: Leonard
line: Nirsh.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, this is ridiculous. Being upset about Amy all the time isn't accomplishing anything. If I want to resolve this situation, then I need to take action.

name: Penny
line: What are you gonna do?

name: Sheldon
line: I'm going to find her and ask her to marry me. And if she says yes, we can put this behind us and resume our relationship. And if she says no, well, then she can just ponfo miran.

name: Leonard
line: He didn't meant that.

name: Bernadette
line: So I should probably explain why I kind of fibbed.

name: Howard
line: That would be nice.

name: Bernadette
line: I told my dad that you were the one who didn't want kids because I didn't want to disappoint him.

name: Howard
line: But you were okay throwing me under the bus?

name: Bernadette
line: Turns out yeah, I didn't think twice about it.

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: Bernie, you don't need to worry about me. But I don't want to see you miss out. Raising children was the most rewarding experience of my life.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, please. Mom did everything. All you did was come home from work, sit on the couch and drink beer. How is that raising kids?

name: Mr Rostenkowski
line: This is really a conversation for husband and wife. I'm gonna go clean up, hit the road. If your mother asks, I was here till ten.

name: Raj
line: It's interesting your father didn't help around the house and Howard doesn't help, either, so in a way, Howard's not only like your father, but he's also like the child that you're afraid to have.

name: Howard
line: Why are you still here?

name: Raj
line: Fine, I'll leave. But it sounds like somebody needs a fresh diaper.

name: Howard
line: All right, I admit that I don't help out a lot. And I need to work on that. But if we had a kid, it would be different.

name: Bernadette
line: Why?

name: Howard
line: Because when my dad left, I promised myself that if I ever had a chance to be a father I'd always be there.

name: Bernadette
line: Okay, I'll think about it.

name: Howard
line: And this an actual I'll think about it, not like the can we get a motorcycle with a sidecar I'll think about it”?

name: Bernadette
line: It's an actual I'll think about it.

name: Howard
line: I really believe I'd be a great dad.

name: Bernadette
line: I know you would.

name: Howard
line: Speaking of making babies, what do you say I wash up and poke around your crawlspace?

name: Kirk
line: Dr. Dana feels he isn't that dangerous. What makes you right and a trained psychiatrist wrong?

name: Spock
line: Because she feels. I don't. All I know is logic.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, right. You can just shut your feelings off. There goes television, lying to us again. We let you raise our children, and this is the thanks we get. Leonard, how could I have been so foolish to try and follow in the footsteps of a made-up alien race with no emotions?

name: Leonard
line: Well now instead of idolizing fictional characters, you can focus on the real people who are already in your life.

name: Sheldon
line: Those are very wise words.

name: Leonard
line: Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: They'd just be so much more comforting if they came out of a television.

name: Penny
line: I think it's so adorable you're making Sheldon breakfast.

name: Leonard
line: Well, he's having a rough time. Amy broke his heart, the DVR cut off the last minute of Doctor Who. That crow followed him home.

name: Penny
line: Aren't you worried you're making French toast on oatmeal day?

name: Leonard
line: Ah, well, what's this? A pot of oatmeal? Or, thanks to you, what I will now call gloatmeal.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I don't want credit for that.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, Dr. and Mrs. Hofstadter, lovely to see you this fine morning.

name: Leonard
line: You're in a good mood.

name: Sheldon
line: Yeah, I am indeed. I have decided, instead of wallowing in sadness about Amy, it is time that I find myself a new female companion.

name: Penny
line: Oh. Good for you.

name: Leonard
line: What brought this on?

name: Sheldon
line: I realized something. When Amy was in my life, I was hyper-focused on my work and ignored her.

name: Penny
line: And you don't want to make the same mistake with the next woman.

name: Sheldon
line: No, I need a new woman in my life to ignore so I can hyper-focus on my work again.

name: Leonard
line: Hey, I made French toast sticks.

name: Sheldon
line: On oatmeal day?

name: Leonard
line: Ah, I also made oatmeal.

name: Sheldon
line: Ooh, that's a lot of carbohydrates for a man on the prowl. You know what? You eat it. You're married, it doesn't matter what you look like.

name: Penny
line: Don't take advice from a man who threw his shoe at a crow.

name: Sheldon
line: Thank you for coming by, gentlemen.

name: Howard
line: No problem.

name: Raj
line: So what's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, it was the two of you who found Amy Farrah Fowler for me. Now that I'm looking for my next girlfriend, it seemed only logical that I employ your services once again.

name: Howard
line: You sure you're up for that? She did hurt you.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, no, it's all right. I think of my time with Amy as a stick of Fruit Stripe gum. Sweet and enjoyable at first, but ultimately a flavourless lump of sadness.

name: Raj
line: You're not wrong about Fruit Stripe. I was always a Hubba Bubba man.

name: Howard
line: Hubba Bubba over Dubble Bubble? You're crazy.

name: Raj
line: Hey, the jaw wants what it wants.

name: Sheldon
line: Gentlemen.

name: Raj
line: Oh, right, uh, girlfriend. Okay.

name: Howard
line: But what are you looking for?

name: Sheldon
line: All I'm looking for is an educated, intelligent woman who shares my interests while retaining her own unique point of view. She should be kind, patient, and most important, unable to imagine life without me by ten o'clock tonight.

name: Howard
line: Isn't that a little unreasonable?

name: Sheldon
line: All right, fine, she doesn't need her own point of view. Now, chop-chop.

name: Penny
line: Come on, Amy, show us the dress.

name: Amy
line: Okay. But I'm really stepping outside of my comfort zone here.

name: Penny
line: Uh, I don't think any of your comfort zones are showing.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, it's your third date, maybe you could go more sexy.

name: Amy
line: Well, some people think the sexiest organ is the brain.

name: Penny
line: No one ever bought me drinks at a bar because my brain just popped out of my shirt.

name: Amy
line: Do you have any heels higher than this? He's pretty tall.

name: Penny
line: Ooh.

name: Bernadette
line: Ooh, tall. Finally some details about this mystery man.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, come on, tell us more.

name: Amy
line: Well, I told you his name and that he's tall. What more do you need?

name: Bernadette
line: Did you kiss him yet?

name: Amy
line: Just a little peck on the lips.

name: Penny
line: Well, we're your best friends, give us one more detail and we promise we'll leave you alone.

name: Amy
line: Fine. Um, he's British. All right, that is a juicy one.

name: Penny
line: All right, where is tall British Dave taking you?

name: Bernadette
line: Tea and basketball?

name: Amy
line: To that new Italian place on Walnut.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, nice.

name: Amy
line: I'm gonna go look for other shoes.

name: Penny
line: Good luck. I threw out all my tall ones when I married Leonard.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, you want to swing by that place tonight and get a look at this guy?

name: Penny
line: We don't even know what time they're gonna be there.

name: Bernadette
line: I'll just call the restaurant, pretend I'm Amy and check the reservation.

name: Penny
line: Damn, you're sneaky.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, but I'm little, so it's adorable.

name: Howard
line: I think the quickest way to find you a new girlfriend is just to get you on every dating Web site out there.

name: Sheldon
line: Are you sure? I've heard that on those sites, often when you think you're corresponding with someone, it's actually a computer program pretending to be a real person.

name: Raj
line: And you're afraid it'll do a better job than you?

name: Sheldon
line: Excuse me. No one does a better job pretending to be a person than I do. Siri comes close, but I know more jokes.

name: Howard
line: If you don't want to use dating Web sites, what do you suggest?

name: Sheldon
line: Off the top of my head? Uh, prospective women weed themselves out in a battle of wits until only one champion remains, and she shows up at my door flush with the thrill of victory, and then sits quietly by my side while I watch Daredevil.

name: Howard
line: You seriously think women would fight for you?

name: Sheldon
line: People compete for jobs and trophies, why not me?

name: Howard
line: He's right, he knows a lot of jokes.

name: Raj
line: Yeah, no, but it is basic human nature. If we present him as a prize, maybe they would.

name: Howard
line: Well, he's smart, he's a respected scientist.

name: Sheldon
line: And I have the soulful eyes of a cow.

name: Raj
line: I don't know if I'd say you... oh.

name: Howard
line: I have an idea. What if we put a post on Craigslist that says world-class Caltech physicist seeking girlfriend. If interested, solve the following puzzles for a chance to meet him.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, we'll make the puzzles extremely challenging to eliminate unworthy candidates.

name: Raj
line: Oh, we could set it up like a scavenger hunt where the last puzzle gives the winner Sheldon's contact information.

name: Howard
line: Well, this is actually an interesting social experiment.

name: Raj
line: I'm a little jealous of the people who get to do it.

name: Howard
line: Me, too. And we've seen the prize.

name: Leonard
line: I don't understand why we're leaving so early for the movie.

name: Penny
line: Oh, I forgot to tell you, we're gonna meet up with Bernadette to spy on Amy and her date.

name: Leonard
line: What? I don't want to do that.

name: Penny
line: What, and you think I want to see a documentary about aluminium can recycling?

name: Leonard
line: This is the movie that big soda doesn't want you to see.

name: Penny
line: No, it's the movie your wife doesn't want you to see.

name: Leonard
line: So you're actually okay with invading your friend's privacy?

name: Penny
line: You're not curious who she's out with?

name: Leonard
line: Not really.

name: Penny
line: But you're curious about aluminium cans? You're a weird little guy.

name: Sheldon
line: That's it. The Sheldon Cooper Girlfriend Challenge is officially live.

name: Howard
line: Congratulations.

name: Raj
line: This is exciting.

name: Sheldon
line: Right now, somewhere, a woman is dividing the atomic weight of the best noble gas by the number of colours in the oldest national flag still in use.

name: Howard
line: Then using that number as the average speed to calculate the travel time from Mordor to the Shire.

name: Sheldon
line: And, taking her first step towards a lifetime of laughter, love and, best of all, rules.

name: Raj
line: I, I hope we didn't make the puzzles too hard.

name: Howard
line: Well, if she can solve them, it'll prove she's intelligent, tenacious and so socially awkward she has nothing better to do on a Saturday night.

name: Sheldon
line: Golly, she sounds too good to be true.

name: Tall British Dave
line: This is fun. I haven't dated much since my divorce.

name: Amy
line: Well, I'm having a good time, too. If you don't mind me asking, why did you and your wife split up?

name: Dave
line: Oh, you know how it is, we wanted different things. I wanted children, and she wanted a pastry chef named Jean-Philippe.

name: Amy
line: Oh, I'm, I'm so sorry.

name: Dave
line: No, it's, it's fine. It's why I left England. It reminded me too much of her. Cold, gloomy and easily accessed by a Frenchman through a tunnel.

name: Penny
line: Hey. So, where are they?

name: Bernadette
line: Across the street, in the left window.

name: Penny
line: Oh, damn it, we should have brought binoculars.

name: Bernadette
line: Right here.

name: Leonard
line: You just happen to have those in the car?

name: Bernadette
line: Kinda. Before I met Howie, I liked to keep close tabs on my boyfriends.

name: Leonard
line: By stalking them?

name: Bernadette
line: No. Stalkers are creepy. I'm just a harmless little girl with military-grade spy equipment.

name: Penny
line: Oh, there he is.

name: Bernadette
line: He's cute, right?

name: Penny
line: Yeah.

name: Leonard
line: Can I see?

name: Penny
line: What, now you're interested? You didn't even want to come.

name: Leonard
line: I know, but you guys make being a crappy friend look fun.

name: Penny
line: Fine.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, okay, I see him. It looks like they're having a nice time. I wish I could hear what they're saying.

name: Bernadette
line: Yeah, I should've brought my parabolic microphone.

name: Penny
line: Your what?

name: Bernadette
line: Nothing. Not important.

name: Dave
line: So you've never been married?

name: Amy
line: No. I mean, to be completely honest, I've, I've only been in one long-term relationship.

name: Dave
line: Oh. What happened with that?

name: Amy
line: That's a good question. After five years, it was just feeling like more work than it should be.

name: Dave
line: Oh, that's too bad. Was he a neurobiologist like you?

name: Amy
line: No. He's a theoretical physicist at Caltech.

name: Dave
line: I love teaching math, but that would be my dream job. What's his focus?

name: Amy
line: Um, used to be string theory, now it's dark matter. But let's not discuss Sheldon. Let's get back to you.

name: Dave
line: Wait, you're not talking about Dr. Sheldon Cooper?

name: Amy
line: I'm trying not to. Do you know him?

name: Dave
line: No, but I've followed his work for years. He's a rock star. You've got to tell me about him. What's he like?

name: Penny
line: He really seems into her.

name: Bernadette
line: I took a video. I forgot how much fun this is.

name: Leonard
line: Okay, we saw them. Can we go catch the movie?

name: Bernadette
line: Why'd you bring him?

name: Penny
line: I had to; we're married now.

name: Bernadette
line: Ugh, I hear that.

name: Dave
line: I'm sorry, just one more question about Sheldon.

name: Amy
line: Sure, why not?

name: Dave
line: It's more of a four-part question, really. When he wrote his paper on supersingular prime numbers, how long did it take?

name: Amy
line: Um about an hour and half.

name: Dave
line: Wow. I mean, wow. And you were there to see it?

name: Amy
line: Yes. Yep. We were on a date. Very much like this one.

name: Dave
line: Mm. I doubt it was like this one. I mean, he's a genius, and I wasn't even smart enough to figure out why my wife always smelled of croissants.

name: Amy
line: What was the rest of your question?

name: Dave
line: Do you think you could introduce me to him?

name: Amy
line: Really? You-you want me to introduce you to my ex-boyfriend?

name: Dave
line: You're right, it's, it's weird. No, wait. Do it. No. I changed my mind. I'd be too nervous. Oh, I don't know what to do.

name: Leonard
line: Are we gonna be much longer? I really have to go to the bathroom.

name: Bernadette
line: Right here.

name: Raj
line: 37 minutes left until the deadline.

name: Sheldon
line: Someone will show.

name: Howard
line: And no matter what happens, this is still a fun experiment.

name: Raj
line: Not as fun as the night we blew up grapes in the microwave. We really have led full lives.

name: Sheldon
line: Someone will show.

name: Raj
line: Maybe you don't want someone exactly like you. You know what they say, opposites attract.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, by that logic, I should be with someone short, dull and needy, eh? Not to cast aspersions, but I can't shake a stick around here without hitting that.

name: Dave
line: You know, I once drove 500 miles to hear him speak at Stanford.

name: Amy
line: I have a DVD of that lecture.

name: Dave
line: Really? Wasn't it great?

name: Amy
line: Not as a Valentine's present, no.

name: Dave
line: Well, the next time you watch it, I'm the bloke who asked the question that he said was stupid and obvious. It was the nicest thing he said to anyone there.

name: Amy
line: That's, um, terrific. Listen, I'm, I'm kind of tired. Can we call it a night?

name: Dave
line: Oh, gosh. Sorry, I've just spent the whole night talking about your ex-boyfriend. I'm such an idiot.

name: Amy
line: No, you're not.

name: Dave
line: Well, maybe not an idiot, but certainly not as smart as someone we won't mention.

name: Amy
line: Thank you.

name: Dave
line: That you said you might introduce me to, I'm free on Thursday.

name: Bernadette
line: Hey, hey, they're leaving.

name: Penny
line: What? Here, give me, give me. Oh, my God. Oh, my God, they're coming right towards us.

name: Bernadette
line: We got to get out of here.

name: Penny
line: Okay. Well, wait, what about Leonard?

name: Bernadette
line: He and his tiny bladder can take the bus.

name: Penny
line: Oh, no.

name: Dave
line: She just hit my car.

name: Amy
line: What are you guys doing here?

name: Bernadette
line: Hi, Ames, what are you doing here?

name: Leonard
line: What happened?

name: Dave
line: O-M-G. Aren't you Leonard Hofstadter?

name: Leonard
line: Yeah.

name: Dave
line: I saw you speak at Stanford with Sheldon Cooper. Amy, can you believe it? It's Dr. Leonard Hofstadter.

name: Amy
line: No. Pinch me.

name: Dave
line: It's an absolute pleasure to meet you. Can I shake your hand?

name: Leonard
line: I don't know if you want to do that, I was just, okay, never mind.

name: Dave
line: Amy, I'm never washing this hand again.

name: Leonard
line: You really should.

name: Raj
line: Sixty seconds. This is not looking good.

name: Sheldon
line: One minute is a long time.

name: Howard
line: I've been telling women that for 20 years.

name: Raj
line: Forty-five.

name: Sheldon
line: 45 seconds is plenty of time for a woman to walk through that door and fall in love with me. You know, probably half that if I break out the old cow eyes.

name: Raj
line: Thirty seconds.

name: Sheldon
line: Uh-oh. What if it's Jennifer Lawrence?

name: Howard
line: What?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, that last Hunger Games was not my cup of tea.

name: Howard
line: You thought she was great in X-Men.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, fine, I won't shut my heart to the love of Jennifer Lawrence.

name: Raj
line: Guys, fifteen seconds.

name: Howard
line: Maybe she's waiting to show up at the last possible moment.

name: Sheldon
line: Sounds like a drama queen. Oh, no. It is Jennifer Lawrence.

name: Raj
line: Five, four, three, two, one. That's too bad.

name: Howard
line: Maybe we did make the test too difficult.

name: Raj
line: I don't think it matters. Look, Sheldon, I believe when the time is right for you to meet someone, it'll just happen. Okay? Not because of a test or a Web site, but because...  we are the dreamers of dreams.

name: Howard
line: It's an actual girl, and she's really pretty.

name: Raj
line: Answer it.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Can I help you?

name: Girl
line: Um, are you the physicist that placed the ad on Craigslist?

name: Sheldon
line: Yes.

name: Girl
line: Hi. I'm Vanessa Bennett. Sorry it took a while for me to get here. I was stuck in this boring symposium on atomic spectroscopy when I came across your ad, and it saved my night. The puzzles were, were really fun. I've never had to translate Klingon into ancient Sanskrit before.

name: Sheldon
line: Careful, it's addictive.

name: Vanessa
line: Chija”e'vlKub je. Or, as they say in Sanskrit, Ahm asman matey-bee ta-teyva.

name: Sheldon
line: And just like that, you're a Klingon-Sanskrit junkie.

name: Vanessa
line: Anyway, I, I just, I knew I had to meet the person responsible for such a brilliant idea. And I don't need to tell you, there aren't a lot of men who love physics, archaic languages and flags of the world.

name: Sheldon
line: I am a bit of a unicorn. Well, you certainly seem like a special lady, uh, but as you know, you missed the deadline, so thanks for playing.

name: Raj
line: How could you send her away?

name: Sheldon
line: She was late. And she found atomic spectroscopy boring. Well, I wouldn't coitus her with your genitals.

name: Dave
line: Uh, thanks for driving me home.

name: Amy
line: No problem. I'm really sorry about your car.

name: Dave
line: Oh, it's all right. If you're free next weekend, I'd love to take you out again.

name: Amy
line: Um, listen, you're a really nice guy, but I just, I don't think this is working out.

name: Dave
line: Oh. Okay.

name: Amy
line: I'm, I'm really sorry.

name: Dave
line: No, it's, at least the same woman that rejected Sheldon Cooper rejected me.

name: Amy
line: There you go.

name: Dave
line: If I ever do meet him, we'll have that in common.

name: Amy
line: Sure. Heh.

name: Dave
line: And, he's kissed you and I've kissed you, so if you think about it...

name: Amy
line: Okay, get out.

name: Raj
line: Have you guys seen this feature that lets you talk to Siri without pressing any buttons?

name: Howard
line: No. How does it work?

name: Raj
line: You just say, uh, Hey, Siri, what time is it?

name: Howard
line: So now anyone can control your phone? Hey, Siri, show me pictures of naked grandma butts.

name: Raj
line: Nice try. It only recognizes my voice.

name: Howard
line: Oh. Cool.  Hey, Siri, show me pictures of naked grandma butts.

name: Raj
line: I don't sound like that.

name: Siri
line: Here are some images of naked grandma butts.

name: Sheldon
line: Hey. Good news, everybody. Now that I'm no longer with Amy, I have an extra ticket to the annual Thanksgiving lunch buffet at the aquarium cafeteria. Who wants it? Well, you realize you won't be going alone, I'll be there the whole time. Providing fish and pilgrim facts. Can you people hear me?

name: Leonard
line: Well, we're having everyone over.

name: Penny
line: Yeah, Leonard and I are gonna be cooking all day.

name: Leonard
line: Otherwise we'd love to.

name: Penny
line: But we can't.

name: Leonard
line: Yeah, poor us.

name: Penny
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Bernadette
line: And Raj and I are volunteering at the soup kitchen, feeding food to the homeless.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, Howard, what about you?

name: Howard
line: Oh, I can't. I'm going to the soup kitchen, too.

name: Bernadette
line: You said that sounded like the worst thing ever.

name: Howard
line: If you can't support me when I'm lying, why are we married?

name: Amy
line: Hi, Sheldon. What's up?

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'm calling because Thanksgiving is coming up, and I wanted to offer you the aquarium tickets.

name: Amy
line: No one can go with you?

name: Sheldon
line: No. They'd rather spend the holiday with each other than find out of this is the year I finally touch a starfish. Anyway, I wouldn't want the tickets to go to waste, so take whomever you'd like.

name: Amy
line: Oh. Okay. Thank you.

name: Sheldon
line: And feel free to tell your guest that the Myanmar catfish is also known as the pilgrim fish. In case the turkey's dry and you need something juicy.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon, I can tell you want to go, so if you'd be comfortable with it, maybe we could go as friends.

name: Sheldon
line: You don't think that will be awkward?

name: Amy
line: Well it is Thanksgiving in an aquarium cafeteria, so I'm gonna go out on a limb here and say yes. But if you mean between us, I think it'll be fine.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well, then. I'll see you on Thanksgiving morning.

name: Amy
line: See you then.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, and forget what I said about the Myanmar catfish. My list of marine-themed pilgrim facts is pretty short.

name: Amy
line: Did you know they served shellfish and eel at the very first Thanksgiving?

name: Sheldon
line: And there goes my list.

name: Emily
line: So, how does this work?

name: Bernadette
line: The soup kitchen manager assigns the jobs, and the shifts are six hours.

name: Howard
line: Six hours? Oh, God, I don't want to complain for that long.

name: Raj
line: Do you ever do anything for anyone else?

name: Howard
line: I happen to be a giving and generous lover.

name: Emily
line: Are you and I close enough for me to say that's creepy?

name: Bernadette
line: We are, and I believe the word you're looking for is yu-huh-huh-huh.

name: Soup Kitchen Manager
line: Uh, can I help you?

name: Bernadette
line: Hi. We'd like to volunteer.

name: Soup Kitchen Manager
line: Oh, I appreciate you guys coming down, but we already have enough people. Any other day, please, come back.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh. Okay. Wipe that smug smile off your face.

name: Howard
line: Maybe I'm happy that so many people turned up to help the less fortunate.

name: Emily
line: Are you and I close enough for me to say...

name: Bernadette
line: That he's an ass? He beat you to it.

name: Soup Kitchen Manager
line: I was wrong. A large group had to cancel.

name: Bernadette
line: Oh, great. We'd love to help.

name: Howard
line: Wipe that smug smile off your face.

name: Bernadette
line: I can't.

name: Penny
line: Look at us. Our first Thanksgiving as husband and wife.

name: Leonard
line: I know. I feel so grown up.

name: Penny
line: Sweetie, you are grown up.

name: Leonard
line: Really? How many grown-ups do you know who have Mr. Spock oven mitts? Hey, the recipes are on my iPad. Will you pull 'em up?

name: Penny
line: Yep. What's the code?

name: Leonard
line: My birthday.

name: Penny
line: It's not working.

name: Leonard
line: It's just the four digits, month and day.

name: Penny
line: Nope.

name: Leonard
line: Let me see. Yeah, there. What number were you putting in?

name: Penny
line: Uh.

name: Leonard
line: You don't know my birthday, do you?

name: Penny
line: Yes, I do.

name: Leonard
line: Well, what is it?

name: Penny
line: May.

name: Leonard
line: May what?

name: Penny
line: I'm not gonna say your password out loud. That is not secure.

name: Leonard
line: You don't know your own husband's birthday.

name: Penny
line: Well, you don't know everything about me.

name: Leonard
line: Your birthday is December 2, you grew up on Perkins Street, the last four digits of your social are 7 6-2 1, and the odds of me letting you forget this are zero.

name: Penny
line: Oh, look at us. Our last Thanksgiving as husband and wife.

name: Sheldon
line: Hello.

name: Amy
line: Hi. Ready for the aquarium?

name: Sheldon
line: I am. You know, and in an effort to reduce awkwardness as we learn how to function as friends, I printed out a list of safe topics for polite conversation.

name: Amy
line: If that makes you more comfortable.

name: Sheldon
line: If there were a list of things that make me more comfortable, lists would be on the top of that list. Okay, now, oh, since last we spoke, have you acquired any pets?

name: Amy
line: No. You?

name: Sheldon
line: No. Um, since last we spoke, have you planned or gone on any vacations?

name: Amy
line: I might go visit my aunt next week.

name: Sheldon
line: Mm. Your aunt in Modesto?

name: Amy
line: No, the one in Bakersfield.

name: Sheldon
line: Bakersfield. I see. Where has this list been all my life?

name: Soup Kitchen Manager
line: We're gonna have you washing dishes. Uh, aprons and rubber gloves are here, just scrape, wash and stack. If you need me, I'll be around.

name: Howard
line: So we don't even get to be up front where the action is?

name: Bernadette
line: What difference does it make?

name: Howard
line: I don't know. I was hoping some poor kid would come up to me and say, please, sir, I want some more.

name: Raj
line: You're in a soup kitchen, not a production of Oliver!

name: Howard
line: It's not like I'm expecting them to sing.

name: Sheldon
line: and then the next day was 73 degrees, and the day after that was 72, and then it was 72 again, uh, then it was 74, and that brings us to today, at I'd wear shorts if I had a pair. 78.

name: Amy
line: Are we done discussing the weather?

name: Sheldon
line: I don't know if I'd call it discussing. You kind of sat back and let me do all the work. Let's see, what's next on the list. Oh, uh, do you whittle, and if so, what kind of knife do you use.

name: Amy
line: Sheldon. We've known each other a long time. We are perfectly capable of having a conversation without relying on a list off the Internet.

name: Sheldon
line: All right. Well, what should we talk about?

name: Amy
line: I don't know. Just ask me whatever comes to mind.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well. I know you've been seeing other men. Have you had coitus with any of them?

name: Amy
line: Man, I walked right into that one.

name: Leonard
line: Next we need a teaspoon of pepper, which, I believe, was also the name of your childhood dog.

name: Penny
line: Fine. You think you know so much. Who's my favourite Spice Girl?

name: Leonard
line: Baby.

name: Penny
line: Who's my favorite member of NSYNC?

name: Leonard
line: Justin.

name: Penny
line: Who's my favorite Backstreet Boy?

name: Leonard
line: Nice try. NSYNC forever.

name: Penny
line: Damn it.

name: Leonard
line: Face it, you can't stump me. I am the king of husbands. I know that you don't like the lingerie that I got you on Valentine's Day. I know you hate the word moist. I know...

name: Penny
line: Hang on. Wait, wait. Why don't I like the lingerie you got me?

name: Leonard
line: Because it's orange and you think it makes you look like a slutty carrot.

name: Penny
line: Interesting. I never told you that.

name: Leonard
line: Sure you did.

name: Penny
line: No. I never told anyone that. But I did write it in my journal.

name: Leonard
line: What? I didn't know you had a journal.

name: Penny
line: I also know your voice gets higher when you're lying.

name: Leonard
line: No, it doesn't.

name: Raj
line: You know, this reminds me of high school.

name: Emily
line: You worked in a restaurant?

name: Raj
line: No, I was in India, it was humid and smelled funny.

name: Howard
line: All right, I think I'm getting into a groove here. This isn't so bad.

name: Emly
line: Only five hours and 40 minutes to go.

name: Howard
line: We've only been doing this 20 minutes?

name: Raj
line: You know, I read that washing dishes can be an excellent form of meditation. The key is that while washing the dishes one should only be washing the dishes.

name: Howard
line: Just because you have that accent doesn't mean what you say isn't stupid.

name: Raj
line: No, seriously. It's about being present in the moment, focusing on the feeling of the warm water, the smell of the detergent, the sound of the dishes squeaking, and following your own breath. It's about, it's about simply being.

name: Howard
line: Huh. Okay, I'll try it.

name: Soup Kitchen Manager
line: I need three people out front.

name: Bernadette
line: I'll do it.

name: Raj
line: Me.

name: Emily
line: Right here!

name: Howard
line: No fair, I was meditating.

name: Leonard
line: Come on, don't be mad. It was a long time ago, and it was an accident.

name: Penny
line: How can reading my journal be an accident?

name: Leonard
line: I didn't even know what it was. I saw it on your nightstand. I picked it up.

name: Penny
line: Well, when you realized what it was, why didn't you stop?

name: Leonard
line: You know me, I'm a big ol' bookworm.

name: Penny
line: All right. Let's just finish cooking.

name: Leonard
line: Well, hey, okay. Let me make this up to you. Sometimes I keep an online journal. I want you to read something that I wrote.

name: Penny
line: Okay, really, I'm fine.

name: Leonard
line: Okay. Well, then I'll read it to you. It's from the day we first met. Beauty, thy name is Penny.

name: Penny
line: Oh, God. Stop. I don't want you to read something you think'll just butter me up. I want to hear the most recent thing you wrote.

name: Leonard
line: Fine. Mmm, Penny's beauty, like our love, grows more with each passing day.”

name: Penny
line: Does it really say that?

name: Leonard
line: Why would I lie?

name: Penny
line: OMG. OMG. We're so close to the new Star Wars. I can't take it. Gah. Gah?

name: Leonard
line: Well, you didn't read it right. The new Star Wars is coming. Gah.

name: Sheldon
line: I'm sensing things have gotten awkward.

name: Amy
line: No. It's okay. If we're friends, we should be able to talk about anything.

name: Sheldon
line: All right.

name: Amy
line: So, you had some questions about me seeing other people.

name: Sheldon
line: Just a few.

name: Amy
line: Go ahead.

name: Sheldon
line: How many dates have you been on? Who were they with? Where'd you go? Where did you meet them? Did you sleep with them? And how much longer to the aquarium? I'm getting kind of hungry.

name: Amy
line: Let's see. I have been on six dates with three different people. It was either for coffee or dinner. One I met at a bookstore and two I met online. I haven't slept with anyone. The aquarium is 40 minutes away. And there's a baggie of Cheerios for you in the glove compartment.

name: Sheldon
line: Is that regular or honey nut?

name: Amy
line: I mixed them.

name: Sheldon
line: You mixed them. No wonder gentleman callers are pounding down your door. Do you have any questions for me?

name: Amy
line: Just one. Are you doing okay?

name: Sheldon
line: I am.

name: Amy
line: Good. I want you to be happy.

name: Sheldon
line: I believe you. I'd believe you more if you threw a few Apple Jacks in here.

name: Man
line: Here you go.

name: Howard
line: Thanks. You got to be kidding me.

name: Man
line: Sorry?

name: Howard
line: Y, you're Elon Musk.

name: Elon
line: I am.

name: Howard
line: Wh, what are you doing here?

name: Elon
line: I'm washing dishes. Well, I was on the turkey line, but I got demoted for being too generous with the gravy.

name: Howard
line: Oh, man. I, what an honour to meet you. I'm, I'm such a fan of Tesla and SpaceX. All your companies. Howard Wolowitz, Caltech.

name: Elon
line: Nice to meet you, Howard. Feels great to come down here and help the less fortunate, huh?

name: Howard
line: Oh, yeah. Nothing better than helping people. Which is something I realized when I was viewing Earth from the deck of the International Space Station, where I spent two months as a payload specialist, a job I was qualified for because I'm an MIT-trained engineer.

name: Elon
line: And I thought I ladled the gravy on thick.

name: Howard
line: Sorry. It's just, you're you, you know? And I really want you to adopt me.

name: Elon
line: Well, you're here on Thanksgiving, so you're probably a good person.

name: Howard
line: Oh. I made my wife come down, too.

name: Elon
line: You think you might ever get back out to space?

name: Howard
line: Is that a job offer? ‘Cause I really want to go to Mars. Assuming I can bring my wife. She hardly takes up any room. She's basically a carry-on.

name: Elon
line: Well, we're not quite there yet, but we're always looking for engineers. So let me give you my e-mail. We can stay in touch.

name: Howard
line: Thank you.

name: Elon
line: Oh, look. Someone hardly touched their pumpkin pie. Want to share it with me?

name: Howard
line: A partially eaten piece of pumpkin pie from a homeless shelter? With Elon Musk, you bet I do.

name: Sheldon
line: You know, for a Thanksgiving buffet in an aquarium cafeteria, that was really bad.

name: Amy
line: You're just upset 'cause they ran out of Pilgrim hats.

name: Sheldon
line: They gave one to that baby. He wasn't even awake.

name: Amy
line: Well, it wouldn't be a holiday without you being mad at a baby.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. Would you care to play an ocean-themed game I invented?

name: Amy
line: Sure. What is it?

name: Sheldon
line: It's called Food, Friend, Fight. One of us chooses three aquatic creatures, and the other one must decide which he would eat, befriend, or battle.

name: Amy
line: So it's like Kiss, Marry, Kill.

name: Sheldon
line: What is that?

name: Amy
line: It's a game where you're given three people and you choose which one you'd kiss, marry, or kill.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, my game is better, 'cause instead of marrying someone, you get to eat them.

name: Amy
line: Let's just play.

name: Sheldon
line: I'll start you off easy. Electric eel, pufferfish, shrimp.

name: Amy
line: Hmm. Well, I wouldn't fight the eel, because I know it can generate enough current to kill a horse. So I'd eat the eel, fight the shrimp, and befriend the pufferfish, because it would be nice to have company on those days I feel bloated.

name: Sheldon
line: Very well done.

name: Amy
line: Thank you. Okay, your turn. Hmm. Seal, hagfish, SpongeBob SquarePants.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I'd befriend SpongeBob but he's not real, so I can't do that, can I?

name: Amy
line: But you can pal around with a hagfish?

name: Sheldon
line: Hey, let's not pull at that thread. Okay. I'll fight SpongeBob, because he's so friendly we'll just end up tickling each other. Um, I'll befriend the seal, because he's trainable, which is the problem I'm having with my current friends. Which means I'll have to eat the hagfish.

name: Amy
line: Isn't that gross? I mean, a hagfish can produce enough mucus to fill a bucket in a minute.

name: Sheldon
line: I know. It makes its own gravy, it'll slide right down.

name: Amy
line: I miss this.

name: Sheldon
line: How can you miss a game you've never played before, silly?

name: Amy
line: I guess sometimes I'm silly.

name: Penny
line: Hey. Where'd you go? I can't tell if the turkey's done.

name: Leonard
line: Be right there. Hi, lover.

name: Penny
line: What are you doing?

name: Leonard
line: I'm sorry about the journal. I want to make it up to you. So I'm gonna let you post a shame photo of me on Facebook.

name: Penny
line: I am not putting that on the Internet. I don't want people to see this. I don't want to see it.

name: Leonard
line: Don't want people to see what, huh? A little bit of this?

name: Penny
line: Oh.

name: Leonard
line: Huh? Some of this? And, since it's Thanksgiving, an extra helping of this?

name: Bernadette
line: Happy Thanks... Yikes.

name: Leonard
line: I'm glad you had a nice time with Amy.

name: Sheldon
line: Me, too. It's comforting to know that she and I are able to function as friends.

name: Penny
line: Well, I've never been friends with any of my exes.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh, I'm sure you and Leonard will be able to pull it off.  Oh. It's my friend Amy. Hello.

name: Amy
line: Hi, Sheldon. I'm just driving home from my mother's.

name: Sheldon
line: Did you have a nice time?

name: Amy
line: I did. Um, listen, I really enjoyed spending this morning with you.

name: Sheldon
line: Well, I can't take all the credit. It was pretty funny when that one anchovy started going the wrong way.

name: Amy
line: It was. Uh, listen, I, I was thinking that, um, maybe I'm ready to be your girlfriend again.

name: Sheldon
line: Oh. I thought we were just friends.

name: Amy
line: We are. But I was hoping, maybe...

name: Sheldon
line: Amy, I excel at many things, but getting over you wasn't one of them. I think I need to just be your friend.

name: Amy
line: Okay. I understand.

name: Sheldon
line: Good. Oh, I watched a video of the hagfish producing mucus, so I'm gonna change my answer and eat SpongeBob.

name: Amy
line: Okay. Sure.
